40001001	Ɛyan nu ɛdiee ɛ bo'icee kfuu di bo Jisos Klistu le. Jisos Klistu to nu waa Nfon Dawe wvù to nu waa Abla'am.
40001002	Abla'am to nu icee Aysik, ɛ Aysik nu icee Yakow, ɛ Yakow nu icee Judas bô boom bo ice le,
40001003	ɛ Judas nu icee Bɛlɛs bô Sɛla bò bwee bó to nu Tama. Ɛ Bɛlɛs nu icee Ɛslon, ɛ Ɛslon nu icee Lam.
40001004	Ɛ Lam nu icee Aminada, ɛ Aminada nu icee Na'shon, ɛ Na'shon nu icee Salmon.
40001005	Ɛ Salmon nu icee Boas wvù bwee to nu La'ab. Ɛ Boas nu icee Obɛd wvù bwee to nu Lut. Ɛ Obɛd nu icee Jɛɛse.
40001006	Ɛ Jɛɛse nu icee Nfon Dawe. Ɛ Nfon Dawe nu icee Saamun wvù bwee to nu kpwɛɛ Uliaa.
40001007	Ɛ Saamun nu icee Lɛ'ubwam, ɛ Lɛ'ubwam nu icee Abija, ɛ Abija nu icee Asa.
40001008	Ɛ Asa nu icee Jɛ'ushɛfat, ɛ Jɛ'ushɛfat nu icee Jolam, ɛ Jolam nu icee Usaya.
40001009	Ɛ Usaya nu icee Jotam, ɛ Jotam nu icee A'as, ɛ A'as nu icee Ɛsikaya,
40001010	ɛ Ɛsikaya nu icee Manase, ɛ Manase nu icee Amos, ɛ Amos nu icee Josaya.
40001011	Ɛ Josaya nu icee Jɛkonaya bô boom bo bwee bó le. Bó to boke bó ɛ ɛ̀ to nu kefew kè bonyii bo Babilon to kooyɛɛ bonyii bo Islael gɛn dvú woŋ wvubo wvù Babilon e.
40001012	Ɛjim jodvu, no bó to kooyɛɛ bonyii bo Islael gɛn dvú Babilon, ɛ Jɛkonaya no nu icee Shiltia, ɛ Shiltia nu icee Sɛlubabɛl,
40001013	ɛ Sɛlubabɛl nu icee Abiud, ɛ Abiud nu icee Ɛliakim, ɛ Ɛliakim nu icee Aso,
40001014	ɛ Aso nu icee Sadok, ɛ Sadok nu icee Akim, ɛ Akim nu icee Ɛliyu,
40001015	ɛ Ɛliyu nu icee Ɛliɛsa, ɛ Ɛliɛsa nu icee Matan, ɛ Matan nu icee Yakow.
40001016	Ɛ Yakow nu icee Yosɛw wvù dwee Maalia, ɛ Maalia nu wvù to bokɛɛ Jisos wvù bó teŋe lɛ Klistu.
40001017	Nonɛn bo'icee kfuu di bo Jisos e ban ɛ mum ɛ no nu yuufe ncow bonɛw keekɛw yî Abla'am e eto ebuy yî Nfon Dawe le, bvuu nu yuufe ncow bonɛw keekɛw yî Nfon Dawe le eto ebuy seke bó to kooyɛɛ bonyii bo Islael gɛn dvú Babilon. Ɛ keekɛw seke bó to kooyɛɛ bonyii bo Islael eto ebuy seke bó to bokɛɛ Klistu nu tɛn ɛ bo'icee kfuu dibole nu yuufe ncow bonɛw.
40001018	Boo di Jisos Klistu le to lɛn ɛ̂ je yin e. Bwee wvù Maalia to nu ɛ bó ɛ seyse wase lɛ wvú nu ke enu kpwɛɛ Yosɛw. Ɛ́ bó sɛ keeke etaashɛ bvujen, nu ɛ fí to nɛ buy lɛ wvú nu wase bô fue ɛ̂ mvuŋgay mvu Keyoy ke Yuule le.
40001019	No fí kooyɛɛ nonɛn, ɛ Yosɛw wvù dweese, no ɛ̀ to nu wee wvu teytey yaa kooŋke keeshoose wvú kɛ, mum yɛn lɛ wen nu egawsɛn bô wvú ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛjim ɛjim.
40001020	No wvú to bɛɛ kpwaake keege nonɛn, ɛ fí kooy lɛ nceendaa Tata to nu ɛ nɛ to fô wvú le ɛ̂ ɛfilɛ le seke wvú to leete gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Yosɛw, waa Nfon Dawe, fo wo efan keejo Maalia bwee yew wo le kɛ, njefo fue din dì wvú nu bô dí nu ɛ wvú kɛŋke ɛ̂ mvuŋgay mvu Keyoy ke Yuule le.
40001021	Wvú nu ke eboo wan diemsɛn ɛ́ wo ecu diee diew lɛ Jisos, njefo wvú nu ke eboyse bonyii bew can bibefɛ bibole.”
40001022	Mwɛɛm mvun mvunciim to kooyi keege ɛ́ fí eto ekocɛn no Tata to jemyɛɛ wase diuw wee we ntum e lɛ,
40001023	“Ben eyekɛ eyuw, wan wvu tfu mvu nu ke eleem bô fue, eboo wan diemsɛn ɛ́ bó eteŋe wvú lɛ Ɛmanwɛl.” Diee din nu lɛ, “Nyo' nu beene ɛ bó.”
40001024	No ɛfilɛ kiɛ lamɛɛ Yosɛw nonɛn, ɛ wvú ke kamse mum ge kɛ no nceendaa Tata gayɛɛ ɛ̂ wvú. Wvú to nu ɛ jo Maalia bwee yew we le,
40001025	geenɛn ɛ bô wvú faŋɛ yaa ecee diɛwɛ no wee bô kpwɛse ké no cee kɛ. Ɛ bô wvú ke ce nonɛn gɛn buy no Maalia to ghanɛɛ eboo. Ɛ Yosɛw mum cu diee di wan e lɛ Jisos.
40002001	Bó to boke Jisos ntɛw wvù Bɛtelɛ'ɛm wvu ɛ̂ keba ke woŋ e kè Judea le. Ɛ ɛ̀ to nu kefew kedvu le ɛ 'Ɛlod nu Nfon wvu Judea jodvu. Ɛ fí kooy lɛ bogoyfee bomew to nu ɛ nɛ woŋ wvumew e ɛ̂ keba kè diuu sane le, to Jɛlusalɛm no biwci lɛ,
40002002	“Nfon Bojuu wvù bó boke wɛ nu fɛɛ? Bese biwci nɛn njefo bese nu ɛ yɛn jon ye le ɛ̂ keba kè diuu sane le, ɛ mum ɛ no too keebun wvú.”
40002003	Ɛ Nfon 'Ɛlod dioo yuw saaka wvun ɛ wvú shiw fitele fiew, shiw noo fi bonyii bo Jɛlusalɛm e bocii.
40002004	Ɛ wvú tooy bocee ncese bo baay baay bocii bô bonyii bocii bò duŋci bonci bo Nyo' le ɛ̂ bonyii, ɛ bó tase. Ɛ wvú bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ laa fò bó to nu keeke eboo Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ, nu fɛɛ lɛ?
40002005	Ɛ bó tfuse lɛ, “Bó to nu keeke eboo ntɛw wvù Bɛtelɛ'ɛm wvu ɛ̂ keba kè Judea le. Fifin nu no wee ntum Nyo' to saŋɛɛ lɛ,
40002006	‘Wo wvù Bɛtelɛ'ɛm wvu woŋ wvù Juda le, fo wo ekpwaakè lɛ wo nu fintɛw fi caan baay woŋ wvù Juda le kɛ. Ɛ̀ keè lɛ wee nu ke ebuy ntɛw wvun e wvù nu ke esaake bonyii bem bo Islael.’”
40002007	Ɛ Nfon 'Ɛlod mum tooy tɛn bogoyfee ba ɛjim ɛjim biwcɛ yuw ɛ̂ bó ntay kefew kè jon yidvu to buyɛɛ.
40002008	No wvú yuw mum tum bó Bɛtelɛ'ɛm gay lɛ, “Ben egɛn ebosɛn egom wan wvudvu ntay. Ben dioo ɛ gom ɛ yɛn, kase to see ɛ̂ me, wvu lɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me tɛn eŋgɛn embun wvú.”
40002009	Ɛ bonyii bodvu yuw no Nfon gay nonɛn, mum buy no gɛne ŋgɛn wvubo. Ɛ bó dioo gɛne, ɛ fí kooy lɛ jon yì bó to yɛnɛɛ ɛ̂ keba kè diuu sane le yɛ to nu ɛ no lɛne gɛne ɛ̂ bó fwe duŋci bó je. Ɛ yí ke gɛn nɛn buy fò wan wvudvu to nu, mum leem fó.
40002010	No bó yɛnɛɛ jon yidvu le nonɛn, ɛ njoŋ yuwyɛ bó baay, ɛ ye no jee bó.
40002011	Ɛ bó ke gɛn ley yew yì wan to nu dvú le, yɛn wan bô bwee wvù Maalia le, mum gbwe ɛ̂ wan ɛjise bun wvú. No bó bun mum yene bikele bibole bvuse mwɛɛm mvubole mvu kembunfon e, nya ɛ̂ wvú. Ɛ mwɛɛm mvun to nu ketwaa ke bigew e kè yɛɛle, bô kfuu jiin dimew, noo kfuu nfiey mvu.
40002012	Ɛ Nyo' ke ciise lo ɛ̂ bó ɛ̂ ɛfilɛ le lɛ bó eyɛne fo bó ebvuu etu jim lɛ bó eyɛn Nfon 'Ɛlod e kɛ. Ɛ bó ke mum tu wase jim woŋ wvubole ɛ̂ je mi le jɛɛy.
40002013	No bogoyfee ba nɛn'yɛɛ wase gɛn, ɛ fí kooy lɛ nceendaa Tata to nu ɛ nɛ to fô Yosɛw e ɛ̂ ɛfilɛ le gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ja we ejo wan bô bwee ɛ́ ben ɛ bó efɛɛ egɛn woŋ wvù Ijiw e, enù jó egɛn ebuy kefew kè me nu ŋke eŋgay lɛ ben ekase le. Me ŋgayte nɛn njefo Nfon 'Ɛlod nu egomte wan wvudvu keeyu.”
40002014	Ɛ Yosɛw mum ja we, jo wan bô bwee ɛntaŋ nɛ gɛn Ijiw,
40002015	mum no nu jó gɛn buy kefew kè Nfon 'Ɛlod to laɛ le. Fí to kooy nonɛn keege ɛ́ fí eto ekocɛn no Nyo' to jemyɛɛ diuw wee ntum we le lɛ, “Me nteŋe waa wɛm wvú ɛ buy ɛ ɛ̀ nu woŋ wvù Ijiw e.”
40002016	Ɛ 'Ɛlod ke dioo yɛn lɛ bogoyfee ba nu ɛ lɛɛ wen, ɛ fí ffuw wvú baay. Ɛ wvú mum tum bonyii lɛ bó egɛn Bɛtelɛ'ɛm noo biba bi mbew jó le bicii, eyuwyɛ boom bolemsɛ bò nu ɛ kɛw bilum bifɛɛ ɛ tu jim. Wvú to nya bilum bin bii no wvú to biwcɛɛ ɛ̂ bogoyfee ba yuw ntay kefew kè bó to yɛnɛɛ jon yɛ le.
40002017	Ɛ bó gɛn yuwyɛ boom ba nonɛn, ɛ fí mum kocɛn no wee ntum Nyo' wvù Yɛlimia to jemyɛɛ wase lɛ,
40002018	“Bó nu ɛ yuw ɛtalɛ ntɛw wvù Lama le, ɛ wee fuuŋke kpwe, beele ffule. Ɛ ɛ̀ nu Lashɛl ɛ wvú beele boom bew. Ɛ bó cimse wvú cimse ŋkuuŋ, njefo kɛ boom bew bɛɛ kɛ.”
40002019	Ɛ Nfon 'Ɛlod ke dioo la, ɛ fí kooy lɛ nceendaa Tata to nu ɛ buynɛn fô Yosɛw e ɛ̂ ɛfilɛ le woŋ wvù Ijiw e, gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ,
40002020	“Ja we ejo wan bô bwee ɛ́ ben ɛ bó ekase etu jim woŋ wvù Islael e, njefo bó ba bò se gomte keeyu wan wvun nu ɛ kpwekɛn wase.”
40002021	Nonɛn ɛ Yosɛw mum ja we jo wan bô bwee ɛ bô bó no tuu jim woŋ wvù Islael e.
40002022	Geenɛn, ɛ wvú ke dioo to, yuw lɛ waa Nfon 'Ɛlod wvù Akilius nu ɛ die kentaw ke ice le Judea ɛ no saake, ɛ wvú mum fan keegɛn jó. Ɛ bó bvuu lew ɛ wvú ɛ̂ ɛfilɛ le lɛ fo wvú egɛn jó kɛ. Ɛ wvú mum bɛɛ gɛn wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ keba ke woŋ e kè Galilee le,
40002023	gɛn no cee ntɛw wvù bó teŋe lɛ Nasalɛt e. Fí to kooy nonɛn keekocɛn no wee ntum Nyo' to jemyɛɛ wase lɛ, “Bó nu ke eteŋe wvú lɛ Wee wvu Nasalɛt.”
40003001	Ɛ̀ to nu kefew kekiɛ le, ɛ Jon Nleseɛjoo nɛ buy gɛn ŋkpwaante ɛ̂ keba ke woŋ e kè Judea le no fewci ɛ̂ bonyii lɛ,
40003002	“Ben ekumɛn mvuntelem mvunɛn, njefo bvunfon bvu fowe nu wase nceencee.”
40003003	Jon wvun nu wvù wee ntum Nyo' wvù Yɛsaya to jemyɛɛ ɛkumɛ wvú seke wvú to gayɛɛ lɛ, “Diɛw wee fuuŋke ŋkpwaante lɛ, ‘Bó eseyse je Tata, enɛle ɛ́ yí enù teytey.’”
40003004	Jon to jiise ndvú ɛ bó kene bô yvúw nyam mi yì bó teŋe lɛ kamɛl, seeŋke kecaw cin ɛ bó kene bô jew nyam, ɛ mwɛɛm mwew mvudien nu cúma bô ndoŋ.
40003005	No wvú to fewci nonɛn, ɛ bonyii mum no buyte Jɛlusalɛm bô bontɛw bocii bo Judea jodvu le noo biba bi mbew Joo Joodan e bicii, gɛne fô wvú le.
40003006	No bó gɛne nonɛn no seŋe bibefɛ bibole, ɛ wvú mum leese bó ɛ̂ joo ɛ̂ Joo Joodan e.
40003007	Geenɛn, ɛ wvú ke dioo yɛn ɛ Bofalasii bô Bosadusii bomew nteen too lɛ wvú elese bó ɛ̂ joo, ɛ wvú gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ɛŋgokɛ ke yó le, ɛ̀ tefe yɛɛ ben lɛ ben elewtè shém Nyo' yì ffuuke yì wvú nu ke eduŋcɛ ɛ̂ ben, ɛ sɛ no too nɛn?
40003008	Ben egeè mwɛɛm mvù duŋci lɛ ben nu ɛ kumɛn wase mvuntelem mvunɛn.
40003009	Fo ben emum eduù kɛ lo ɛ̂ bikuu binɛn lɛ Abla'am nu icee wene kɛ. Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben lɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ Nyo' ebaŋke ɛta ɛyan ɛ́ yó etu boom bo Abla'am e.
40003010	Ben ekeè lɛ bó nu ɛ gɛɛ wase teme ɛ̂ binyi bi bite le. Kete kecii kè baa yumte mvuntam mvù jee, nu ɛ bó nu egbwo naa eley yî gɛŋ e, eton lo.
40003011	Me nleese ben ɛ̂ joo njefo ben nu ɛ kumɛn wase mvuntelem mvunɛn. Geenɛn ɛ wee wvù too ɛ̂ me ɛjim nu ɛ wvú kuuke fele me. Ɛ bolaba bew nu ɛ me mbaa ncim ŋkpwɛntɛn keentuu kɛ. Wvú nu ke elese fiew ben ɛ ɛ̀ nu can Keyoy ke Yuule le noo ŋguy e.
40003012	Wvú kɛŋke fiɛɛ fiew ɛbo fì wvú nu efɛɛtɛn ɛgiŋ dvú, eyɛse fò wvú fɛɛtene, ebaancɛ ɛgiŋ egɛɛ ɛ̂ ŋwaw e, emum ekuu nyiim eton ɛ̂ ŋguy wvù fiee sɛ njimɛ le.”
40003013	No Jon to leese bonyii ɛ̂ joo nonɛn, ɛ Jisos ke mum nɛ ɛ̂ keba ke woŋ e kè Galilee le gɛn fô Joo Joodan e lɛ Jon elese tɛn wen ɛ̂ joo.
40003014	Geenɛn ɛ Jon no tune gayte lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu wo wvù be kɛŋke keelese me ɛ̂ joo, wo ɛ kaa ɛ no too fô me le nɛɛ le?”
40003015	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Cinɛ ɛ́ fí enù nonɛn keseen. Ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ yin je le yì bee wo nu ege fiɛɛ ficii fì Nyo' gomte.” Nonɛn ɛ Jon mum bee,
40003016	lese Jisos ɛ̂ joo. Kɛ no Jisos to buyte ɛ̂ joo nonɛn, ɛ fí kooy lɛ ɛbulɛ to nu ɛ yene, ɛ wvú yɛn Keyoy ke Nyo' le no kí shiile too nu diɛwɛ ɛbembɛ le, to mum bɛɛm yî ye le.
40003017	Ɛ fí kooy lɛ diɛw to nu ɛ jeme fowe lɛ, “Wvun nu Waa wɛm. Wvú nu fitele fiem. Me n'yuuke njoŋ bô wvú baay.”
40004001	Ɛ Keyoy ke Yuule mum nɛ jo Jisos gɛn bô wvú ŋkpwaante lɛ dɛwle emom wvú.
40004002	Ɛ wvú gɛn no nu jó shee too cee, yaa diee fiɛɛ yî ɛdiuw e mbaanyɛ. Ɛjim jodvu ɛ jeŋ no yuu wvú.
40004003	Ɛ wvú wvuwɛ wvù ké no momte bonyii mum to gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ́ wo fɛn nu Waa Nyo', ɛ́ wo gay ɛ ɛta ɛyan tu bontuw bo bvulɛm e.”
40004004	Ɛ Jisos tfuse lɛ, “Fí nu ɛ bó ɛ saŋ lɛ, ‘Kɛ wee cee kɛ nje bvulɛm maaŋ kɛ. Wee cee tɛn nje diɛw yicii yì buyte diuw Nyo' le.’”
40004005	Nonɛn ɛ dɛwle mum jo wvú gɛn dvú ɛ̂ kelaante kè yuule le, leke fô kegoy ke yew ncese le,
40004006	gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ́ wo fɛn nu Waa Nyo', ɛ́ wo sele ɛkuse, njefo fí nu ɛ bó ɛ saŋ lɛ, ‘Nyo' nu ke egay ɛ́ bonceendaa bew ecɛycɛy wo.’ Ɛ fí bvuu nu ɛ bó ɛ saŋ lɛ, ‘Bó nu ke eka wo fo wo ekfun ɛkalɛ yî tɛ le.’”
40004007	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ “Bó nu ɛ saŋ tɛn lɛ, ‘Fo wo emomtè Tata wvù Nyo' wo kɛ.’”
40004008	Ɛ dɛwle bvuu jo Jisos fó, gɛn wase dvú yî ɛkolɛ ke kum mvu le ɛ wvú defe ɛwe ntay, mum duŋcɛ bitum bi yî ɛkolɛ ke nshɛ le bicii bô bvukukɛ bvù nu bí le ɛ̂ wvú.
40004009	No wvú duŋci nonɛn mum gay lɛ, “Me nu enya mwɛɛm mvun mvunciim ɛ̂ wo, ɛ́ wo fɛn ɛ gbwe ɛ̂ me ɛjise ɛ wvum me.”
40004010	Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Gɛnɛ ɛke Satan! Bó nu ɛ saŋ lɛ, ‘Ɛ̀ wvumtè Tata wvù Nyo' wo, lemte kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvú le maaŋ.’”
40004011	Nonɛn ɛ dɛwle mum cinɛ Jisos e, gɛn. Ɛ fí kooy lɛ bonceendaa bo Nyo' le to nu ɛ nɛ to no taale fô wvú le.
40004012	Ɛ Jisos ke nɛ yuw lɛ bó nu ɛ koo Jon Nleseɛjoo ɛ fen yew ncaw e, ɛ wvú mum nɛ kase tu jim keba kè Galilee le.
40004013	Ɛ wvú gɛn buy Nasalɛt, nɛ jó gɛn no cee ɛ̂ kelaante kè Kafana'um e. Kelaante kin nu mbew Mamase yì Galilee le noo mbew biba bi bonyii bo Sɛbulun bô bo Naftali le.
40004014	Fifin to kooy nɛn keekocɛn no wee ntum Nyo' wvù Yɛsaya to jemyɛɛ wase lɛ,
40004015	“Keba kè Sɛbulun bô kè Naftali bì nu mbew mamase le Joo Joodan kewvu keki, nshɛ yì Galilee jo bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu,
40004016	bonyii bò se shee cee ɛjiwɛ le, nu ɛ yɛn wase n'yuu wvu baay e. Diuu nu ɛ san wase fô bonyii ban bò se shee cee gbwen ɛjiwɛ ke kpwe le.”
40004017	Ɛ kɛw kefew kekiɛ le, ɛ Jisos mum kɛw no fewci ɛ̂ bonyii gayte lɛ, “Ben ekumɛn mvuntelem mvunɛn, njefo bvunfon bvu fowe nu wase nceencee.”
40004018	Ɛ Jisos ke nɛ no lɛne mbew Mamase yì Galilee le, yɛn bonyii bomew e bofɛɛ, ɛ ɛ̀ nu wee bô waa bwee. Bonyii ban to nu Semon wvù bó to teŋe lɛ Bita, bô waa bwee wvù Andulu, ɛ bó laaŋke kensaŋ ɛ̂ mamase le, no ŋkiɛŋ wvubo to nu byé yì koolɛɛn.
40004019	Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben ebiì me le ɛ́ me eŋge ɛ́ ben ekoole wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu bonyii.”
40004020	Kaŋ mwaaŋ ɛ bó mum cinɛ binsaŋ bibole no bii wvú le.
40004021	Ɛ Jisos ke dioo nɛ fó gɛncɛ, bvuu yɛn bonyii bomew e bofɛɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu tɛn wee bô waa bwee. Bonyii ban to nu Jɛm bô waa bwee wvù Jon bò to nu boom bo Sɛbɛdee le, ɛ bó nu ɛ̂ kekoŋ e bô bo icee bó wvù Sɛbɛdee tumci binsaŋ. Ɛ wvú tee tɛn bó.
40004022	Kaŋ mwaaŋ ɛ bó mum cinɛ kekoŋ e bô icee bó le no bii wvú le.
40004023	Ɛ Jisos ke nɛ mum no ghane ɛ̂ keba kè Galilee le kecii yɛɛyi bonyii yéw bunle yibole bvuu fewci saaka wvù jee wvu ɛkumɛ bvunfon bvu Nyo' le. Wvú to fɛle tɛn kencɛm kecii noo ntum tfuu yî bonyii le.
40004024	Nonɛn, ɛ saaka wvu ɛkumɛ wvú saaŋkɛn gɛn woŋ wvù Silia le tfuu. Ɛ bonyii mum no too bô bonyii bocii bò to cɛmkene noo bò to nu yî monlum e fô wvú le, kɛnɛɛ ɛ̀ nu bò bonceendaa bo dɛwle le njiŋsene bô bó, kɛnɛɛ bò gbwee keŋgbwe, kɛnɛɛ bò nu ɛ kpwe keba kemwaaŋ. Ɛ bó too dvú nonɛn ɛ wvú fɛle bó bocii.
40004025	Naa fɛɛ fô wvú to gɛne nu ɛ bibombom bi bonyii le bi baay no shfumte kɛ ɛ̂ wvú ɛjim. Bonyii ban to nɛn'yi ɛ̂ keba ke woŋ e kè Galilee le, ɛ bomew nɛn'yi ɛ̂ Bilaante bi Yuufe le, bomew Jɛlusalɛm noo bontɛw bo Judea le bomew e. Ɛ bomew nɛn'yi Joo Joodan kewvu keki.
40005001	Ɛ Jisos ke dioo yɛn kebombom ke bonyii le nonɛn, mum nɛ ben gɛn shii yî kum e, ɛ boom bew bo ŋgoo le baancɛ to mbew ye le.
40005002	Ɛ wvú mum kɛw no yɛɛyi bó gayte lɛ,
40005003	“Njoŋ wvu baay nu fô bonyii bò kee lɛ bó fuute yî mwɛɛm mvu ɛ̂ keyoy e, njefo bvunfon bvu fowe nu bvubole.
40005004	Njoŋ wvu baay nu fô bonyii bò beele le, njefo Nyo' nu ke ecimse bó.
40005005	Njoŋ wvu baay nu fô bonyii bò joo bikuu bibole fokuse, njefo bó nu ke eyow ɛkolɛ ke nshɛ le.
40005006	Njoŋ wvu baay nu fô bonyii bò jeŋ yuu bó ɛ kendoŋ yumte bó ɛkumɛ nce wvu teytey e, njefo Nyo' nu ke ege ɛ́ bó effuu.
40005007	Njoŋ wvu baay nu fô bonyii bò camte shen fô bomew e, njefo Nyo' nu ke ecam tɛn shen fô bó le.
40005008	Njoŋ wvu baay nu fô bonyii bò yuule ɛ̂ mvuntelem e, njefo bó nu ke eyɛn Nyo' le.
40005009	Njoŋ wvu baay nu fô bonyii bò too bô nyɛkeey e, njefo Nyo' nu ke eteŋe bó lɛ boom bew.
40005010	Njoŋ wvu baay nu fô bonyii bò bonyii bone bikaa ɛ̂ bó ɛjim nje bó cee nce wvu teytey, njefo bvunfon bvu fowe nu bvubole.
40005011	Njoŋ wvu baay nu wene, seke bonyii nan'yi ben, bone bikaa ɛ̂ ben ɛjim, jemyi kfuu mwɛɛm mvù befe mvunciim ɛ̂ ben yî ɛcici le nje ben nu bonyii bem.
40005012	Fí ke dioo kooyi nonɛn ɛ ben no yuukè njoŋ laŋlaŋè, njefo mmawcɛ wene wvù kuuke nu woŋ wvu we le. Ben ekeè lɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ nonɛn no bonyii to bone bikaa ɛjim jo bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le bò to yawɛɛ to fwe ɛ̂ ben e.
40005013	Ɛ̀ nu ben ŋkauw yi yî nshɛ yin e. Geenɛn ɛ́ ŋkauw nɛ lo ɛ cife, ɛ́ bó ebvuu ege nɛɛ dvú ɛ́ yí sɛ ebvuu ekase eyeke? Kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó ebvuu ege fiɛɛ fì jee dvú ɛfey lɛ bó elaŋ lo ɛ́ bonyii efele lɛɛnci bô bikaa kɛ.
40005014	Ɛ̀ nu tɛn ben n'yuu wvu yî woŋ wvun e. Kɛ kelaante kè bó bom yî kum e ké no nyiime kɛ.
40005015	Kɛ wee ké tfuuke tɛn ken'yeese bvuu jo ŋkaa kfuke dvú kɛ. Wvú ké tome ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî fiɛɛ fì bó tomyi ken'yeese yî dvú le, ɛ kí mum no yeese wee tfuu wvù nu yew.
40005016	Ɛ̀ nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no n'yuu wene kɛŋke keebaa ɛ̂ bonyii ɛjise, wvu lɛ bó eyɛne lemme dinɛn dì jee le emum enyaa mbense ɛ̂ icee wene wvù nu fowe.
40005017	Fo ben ekpwaakè lɛ me nto keenfiwsɛ mwɛɛm mvù nu ɛ̂ Ŋwa' bonci bo Muses e noo mvù nu ɛ̂ Boŋwa' bo bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le kɛ. Me nto keeŋge ɛ́ mvú ekocɛn lo. Kɛ me nto keenfiwsɛ lo kɛ.
40005018	Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy lɛ ɛ gɛn ɛ buy naa no ɛbulɛ bô nshɛ nu ke eka, nu ɛ kɛ fijise fi ŋwa' le ɛ̂ Ŋwa' bonci le naa ɛ́ fí cim doose nɛɛ, nu ke eyuu efey kuse sɛ fiɛɛ fidvu ɛ kocɛn no fí duŋci kɛ.
40005019	Fí ɛ mum ɛ no nu lɛ ɛ́ ɛ̀ nu naa yɛɛ wvù jine nci mvu ɛ̂ bonci ban e, ɛ́ wvuwɛ nci cim doose naa nɛɛ, ɛ no yɛɛyi bonyii lɛ bó ejinè tɛn nonɛn, tu mwɛtɛn nu ke enu lo wee wvu caan ɛnte jo bvunfon bvu fowe. Geenɛn ɛ́ wee gɛɛle bonci ban, bvuu yɛɛyi tɛn bonyii lɛ bó egɛɛlè, tu mwɛtɛn nu ke enu lo wee wvu baay ɛnte jo bvunfon bvu fowe.
40005020	Nonɛn me ɛ no nseŋe ɛ̂ ben lɛ, ɛ́ gee dinɛn di teytey baa fele di bonyii bò duŋci bonci bo Nyo' le noo di Bofalasii le, ben saa ke eyuu eley bvunfon bvu fowe le kɛ.
40005021	Ben nu ɛ yuw wase lɛ bó to nu ɛ gay ɛ̂ bonyii bo fwele lɛ, ‘Fo wo eyu wee kɛ. Ɛ́ wee yu lo wee, tu wvú kɛŋke nsaw.’
40005022	Geenɛn me ɛ no ŋgayte ɛ̂ ben lɛ wee tfuu wvù ton'yi shém bô waa bwee, nu ɛ wvú kɛŋke tɛn nsaw. Wee ɛ́ nan waa bwee, ɛ́ wvú no keè lɛ wvú nu ke eleem fwe dvu bonyii bò saake bonsaw. Wee ɛ́ tee waa bwee lɛ, ‘keyuŋ’ ɛ́ wvú no keè lɛ wvú nu ke eley ŋguy wvu baay e.
40005023	Fí ɛ mum ɛ no nu lɛ, ɛ́ wo leeme keenya nnya yo fô ketaŋ ke ncese le, ɛ kume lɛ waa bwoo kɛŋke wo fô shem,
40005024	ɛ́ wo cinɛ nnya yo le mbew ketaŋ ke ncese le, gɛn ɛ ben ɛ wvú yaw mancɛ mwɛɛm, ɛ wo sɛ kase to nya nnya yo.
40005025	Ɛ́ wee jo wo ɛ no gɛne dvú yew nsaw e, ɛ́ wo mom ɛ ben ɛ wvú yaŋsɛn seyse tu wee bô nsan ɛ ɛ̀ bɛɛ ɛ̂ je, fo wvú ke egɛn efese wo can wee wvù saake bonsaw e, ɛ́ wvú efese wo can nci le ɛ́ bó efen wo yew ncaw e.
40005026	Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ wo kecɛɛy lɛ kɛ wo nu ke ebuy dvú sɛ wo ɛ mɛse ɛ law finyinyi ficii fì bó shieele kɛ.
40005027	Ben nu ɛ yuw wase lɛ bó to nu ɛ gay lɛ, ‘Fo wo ejaŋ kpwɛɛ wee kɛ.’
40005028	Geenɛn me ɛ no ŋgayte ɛ̂ ben lɛ, wee tfuu wvù taale kpwoon kɛŋke shiee we, nu ɛ wvú ɛ jaŋ kɛ wase wvú ɛ̂ fitele le.
40005029	Ɛ́ jise diuw di ɛcɛɛy gee ɛ wo gee kebefɛ, ɛ́ wo min jise didvu laŋ. Fí jee lɛ wo elase keba kuw ke ye le kemwaaŋ, ɛfey fo bó ke elaŋ ye yo yicii ŋguy wvu baay e.
40005030	Kebo kuw ke ɛcɛɛy ɛ́ no gee tɛn ɛ wo gee kebefɛ, ɛ́ wo sum kebo kedvu laŋ. Fí jee lɛ wo elase keba kuw ke ye le kemwaaŋ, ɛfey fo ye yo yicii egɛn ŋguy wvu baay e.
40005031	Bó to nu ɛ gay tɛn lɛ ‘Ɛ́ wee kuŋ lo kpwɛse, ɛ́ wvú saŋ ŋwa' nya ɛ̂ kpwoon wvudvu wvù duŋci lɛ kɛ wvú bɛɛ kpwɛɛ wen kɛ.’
40005032	Geenɛn me no ŋgayte ɛ̂ ben lɛ, ɛ́ wee kuŋ lo kpwɛse, ɛ ɛ̀ baa nu lɛ kpwoon wvudvu nu ɛ ge nsake, tu wvú nu ɛ ge lɛ wvú egɛn etu kpwoon nsake. Wee ɛ́ jo kpwoon wvù buy ɛ̂ diemsɛn yew ɛ gɛɛ yew dvu wvú, tu wvú nu ɛ jo kpwɛɛ wee.
40005033	Ben nu ɛ yuw wase tɛn no bó to gayɛɛ ɛ̂ bonyii bo fwele lɛ, ‘Fo wo ejeme fiɛɛ ekan sɛ wo nu ke ege fí kɛ. Wo kɛŋke keege fiɛɛ fì wo nu ɛ jeme ɛ kan lɛ wo nu ege fô Tata le.’
40005034	Geenɛn me ɛ no ŋgayte ɛ̂ ben lɛ, fo wee dioo ɛ jeme fiɛɛ kan naa lo kɛ. Fo wvú ekan ɛ̂ diee di fowe le kɛ, njefo fowe nu kawla Nyo'.
40005035	Fo wvú ekan nshɛ kɛ, njefo nshɛ nu kedvuushɛɛ ke bikaa bi Nyo' le. Fo wvú ekan Jɛlusalɛm kɛ, njefo Jɛlusalɛm nu kelaante ke Nfon wvu baay e.
40005036	Fo wvú cim ekan naa ɛkolɛ kew kɛ, njefo kɛ wvú nulo ege ɛ́ yvuw miaaŋ etu dibvuu kɛnɛɛ eyiile kɛ.
40005037	Ɛ́ wee beŋe fiɛɛ lɛ ‘'Ɛɛ,’ ɛ́ fí kocɛn nonɛn. Wvú ɛ́ tun lɛ, ‘'Aay,’ ɛ́ fí kocɛn nonɛn. Ɛ́ wvú bvuu bise lo fiɛɛ fó, tu fifiɛ nɛ wase fô Satan wvù wee kebefɛ le.
40005038	Ben nu ɛ yuw wase tɛn lɛ bó to nu ɛ gay lɛ, ‘Ɛ́ wee bvuse jise di wee le, ɛ́ bó bvuse tɛn diew. Wee ɛ́ baa ɛge ke wee le, ɛ́ bó baa tɛn kew.’
40005039	Geenɛn me ɛ no ŋgayte ɛ̂ ben lɛ, fo wee etɛɛncinè fiɛɛ bô wee wvù befe kɛ. Ɛ́ wee suŋ lo kediɛw kuw ke ɛcɛɛy, ɛ́ wo baŋke ke ɛŋkoŋko ɛ wvú mɛse.
40005040	Wee ɛ́ shomse wo lɛ wen efi kekum kuw ke ɛnte, ɛ́ wo mɛse nya naa noo ke ɛkfuŋ fó.
40005041	Wee ɛ́ kan wo lɛ wo elɛn egɛn may mwaaŋ, ɛ́ wo lɛn buy naa bomay bofɛɛ ben ɛ wvú.
40005042	Wee ɛ́ no lɛke fiɛɛ ɛ̂ wo, ɛ́ wo nya. Wee ɛ́ no foole fiɛɛ ɛ̂ wo, fo wo etun keenya kɛ.
40005043	Ben nu ɛ yuw wase lɛ bó to nu ɛ gay lɛ, ‘Ɛ̀ kooŋkè waa bwoo banè wee wo bvuban.’
40005044	Geenɛn me ɛ no ŋgayte ɛ̂ ben lɛ, ben ekooŋkè bonyii bonɛn bo bvuban e, ebunleè fô bò bone bikaa ɛ̂ ben ɛjim e.
40005045	Nonɛn, ɛ́ ben emum enu boom bo Icee wene wvù nu fowe le. Ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù ké no gee ɛ diuu sane fô bonyii bò befe le noo bò jee le. Wvú ké no gee tɛn ɛ jaŋ too fô bonyii bò gee mwɛɛm teytey, noo fô bò yaa gee kɛ mwɛɛm teytey e.
40005046	Ben kpwaake lɛ ɛ́ ben kooŋke kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu bonyii bò kooŋke ben, ɛ́ sɛw wvudvu enu la fô ben e? Kɛ naa bonyii bò fii shile gee kɛ tɛn nonɛn e?
40005047	Ɛ́ ben fɛn gayte kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu boom bo bwee wene le, tu fiɛɛ fì ben gee fì bonyii bomew yaa gee kɛ nu la? Kɛ bonyii bò yaa kee kɛ Nyo' ké no gee kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ e?
40005048	Fí ɛ mum ɛ no nu lɛ ben kɛŋke keejeè gɛne mɛɛse no Icee wene wvù nu fowe jee gɛne mɛɛse.”
40006001	“Ben eyɛnè fo ben dioo gee mwɛɛm mvù jee, no gee fwe dvu bonyii wvu lɛ bó eyɛnè kɛ. Ɛ́ ben gee nonɛn, ɛ́ icee wene wvù nu fowe saa ke emawcɛ ben kɛ.
40006002	Nonɛn, seke wo nyaa fiɛɛ ɛ̂ wee wvù fuute, fo wo emum etooŋke soŋ diɛwɛ no bonyii bo kensaa ye le ké no gee yéw bunle le noo jé le, wvu lɛ bonyii ebɛnseè bó kɛ. Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy lɛ bó nu ɛ kɛŋkɛ wase mmawcɛ wvubo.
40006003	Geenɛn, seke wo nyaa fiɛɛ ɛ̂ wee wvù fuute, fo wo ege ɛ́ kebo kuw ke ɛŋkoŋko ekiɛɛ fiɛɛ fì ke ɛcɛɛy gee kɛ.
40006004	Nonɛn ɛ́ nnya yo enù ɛ̂ nnyilɛ le, ɛ́ Ico wvù ké no yɛne mwɛɛm mvù bó gee ɛ̂ nnyilɛ le ke emawcɛ wo.
40006005	Seke ben bunlee, fo ben egeè diɛwɛ no bonyii bo kensaa ye le ké no gee kɛ. Bó ké no kooŋke keeleemene yéw bunle le, noo ntasɛn jé le sɛ bunlee, wvu lɛ bonyii eyɛnè bó le. Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy lɛ bó nu ɛ kɛŋkɛ wase mmawcɛ wvubo.
40006006	Geenɛn seke wo nu keebunle, ɛ wo ley gɛn yew ɛnte, faa kembuŋ sɛ no bunlee ɛ̂ Ico wvù nu ɛ̂ nnyilɛ le. Ɛ́ Ico wvù ké no yɛne mwɛɛm mvù bó gee ɛ̂ kenyilɛ le ke emawcɛ wo.
40006007	Ben dioo bunlee, fo ben eshe elamtè diɛwɛ no bonyii bò maa Nyo' ké no gee kɛ. Bó ké no gee nonɛn kpwaake lɛ bó nu eyuw bunle yibo nje díɛw yì bó jemyi nteen.
40006008	Fo ben enù kɛ diɛwɛ bó le kɛ. Ben ekeè lɛ Icee wene ké no kee wase fiɛɛ fì ben shieele ɛ ben sɛ ké no biite.
40006009	Ɛ̀ nɛɛ no ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ ben ebunleè nɛn: ‘Icee wese wvù nu fowe, geɛ ɛ́ bonyii ewvumtè diee diuw,
40006010	ege ɛ́ bvunfon bwuw eto, ege ɛ́ fiɛɛ fì wo shieele enù fokuse fɛn no fí nu fowe.
40006011	Nya bese bô mwɛɛm mvudien mvu ɛbɛn.
40006012	Lɛɛshɛ bibefɛ bisɛse, no bese lɛɛshi bibefɛ bì bonyii bomew gee fô bese le.
40006013	Fo wo ecinɛ ɛ́ bese eley mmom yì eghaw bese le kɛ. Fi bese can wee kebefɛ le.’ [Bvunfon nu bwuw, ɛ mvuŋgay nu mwuw, ɛ bvukukɛ nu bwuw sekecii sɛ ŋka. Fí enù nonɛn.]
40006014	Ben ekeè lɛ ɛ́ ben lɛɛshi bibefɛ bì bonyii bomew gee fô ben e, ɛ́ Icee wene wvù nu fowe elɛɛshi tɛn binɛn.
40006015	Geenɛn, ɛ́ ben nu sɛ ben lɛɛshi bibefɛ bì bonyii bomew gee fô ben e, ɛ́ Icee wene wvù nu fowe saa elɛɛshi tɛn binɛn kɛ.
40006016	Seke ben bamte mwɛɛm mvudien, fo ben etaalè nɛn yvulaa diɛwɛ no bonyii bo kenduŋcɛ ye le ké no gee kɛ. Bó ké kumɛn monshim mobole sekekiɛ, wvu lɛ bonyii eyɛnè lɛ bowen bamte mwɛɛm mvudien. Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy lɛ bó nu ɛ kɛŋkɛ wase mmawcɛ wvubo.
40006017	Geenɛn, seke wo bamte mwɛɛm mvudien, ɛ wo yefe ɛkolɛ kuw, cukɛ bvushiw bwuw,
40006018	wvu lɛ fo eyɛnè bonyii lɛ wo bamte mwɛɛm mvudien kɛ, ɛ́ eyɛne Ico wvù nu ɛ̂ nnyilɛ le. Ɛ́ Ico wvù ké no yɛne mwɛɛm mvù bonyii gee ɛ̂ kenyilɛ le ke emawcɛ wo.
40006019	Fo ben egɛɛ ntfu wene fokuse fɛn fò ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ shéw ekan, ɛ ɛ̀ nulo tɛn ɛ́ wvú eduwsɛ, ɛ bocooŋ nulo eŋgoy eley ecoŋ kɛ.
40006020	Ben egɛɛ ntfu wene ɛ ɛ̀ nu woŋ wvu we le, fò ɛ̀ yaa nulo ɛ́ shéw ekan kɛ, ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nulo tɛn ɛ́ wvú eduwsɛ kɛ, ɛ bocooŋ yaa nulo tɛn eŋgoy eley ecoŋ kɛ.
40006021	Ben ekeè lɛ fò wee gɛke kpwaw we nu kɛ fó fò fitele fiew nu enu.
40006022	Jise di wee le nu ken'yeese ke ye ye le. Nonɛn, ɛ́ jise diuw yuule lo, ɛ́ ye yo yicii enu ɛ yí ɛ yiŋsɛn bô n'yuu.
40006023	Geenɛn, ɛ́ jise diuw jiime lo, ɛ́ ye yo yicii enu ɛ yí ɛ yiŋsɛn bô kejiwɛ. Ɛ́ n'yuu wee nɛ ɛ tu kejiwɛ, ɛ́ kejiwɛ kedvu ebɛmte wase nɛɛ?
40006024	Kɛ wee nulo elemte bocee ɛkolɛ le bofɛɛ kɛ. Ɛ́ wvú lemte nonɛn, ɛ́ wvú ebane wvumvu, kooŋke wvumvu, kɛnɛɛ eyuuke wvumvu le ntay, joo wvumvu ɛkuse. Kɛ ben nulo elemte Nyo' le bvuu lemte bigew e kɛ.
40006025	Nonɛn, me ɛ no ŋgayte ɛ̂ ben lɛ fo ben eyaŋyaŋè ɛkumɛ nshii wene lɛ laa ben nu ke edie la, kɛnɛɛ ewu la, kɛnɛɛ ɛkumɛ ye yene laa ben nu ke ejise la lɛ. Kɛ keyoy ke wee le fele mwɛɛm mvudien, ɛ ye wee fele tɛn ndvú le?
40006026	Ben etaa eyɛn no mvunyiim mvù bile we nu. Kɛ mvú ké no jewyi, kɛnɛɛ gbweci ŋgu baanci gɛɛle ɛ̂ bigonɛ le kɛ. Geenɛn, Icee wene wvù nu fowe nyaŋyi kɛ mvú. Kɛ ben fele mvunyiim e?
40006027	Ɛ̀ nu yɛɛ ɛ̂ ben ɛntelɛŋ wvù yaŋyaŋe, wvù nulo ebise kɛ naa kefew caan yî nshii we le?
40006028	Ben yaŋyaŋe ɛkumɛ ndvú nje la? Ben kɛ etaa eyɛn no fow kuu ŋkpwaante nu. Kɛ fow ké no lemte kɛnɛɛ shile ndvú kɛ.
40006029	Geenɛn, ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben lɛ kɛ naa Nfon Saamun bô bvukukɛ bvucii bvù wvú to kɛŋke to ké suute ye no nu ɛ wvú ɛ buy fô fow mvu le kɛ.
40006030	Ɛ́ Nyo' suute ɛgay yo ŋkpwaante nɛn, ɛgay yò kuu ɛbɛn, buy ntfuu ɛ bó ɛ fwɛɛ wase fotaŋ, tu kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wvú esufe ben efey lo nonɛn e? O oo bonyii bo mbee wvù doose le!
40006031	Nonɛn, fo ben eyaŋyaŋè duu lɛ laa ben nu ke edie la, ewu la, kɛnɛɛ ejise la ye le lɛ.
40006032	Mwɛɛm mvun mvunciim nu mvù bonyii bò yaa kee kɛ Nyo' ké no leese bvufee yî dvú le. Ben nu finɛn ɛ Icee wene wvù nu fowe kee lɛ ben shieele mwɛɛm mvun mvunciim.
40006033	Ben eyaw elese bvufee bvunɛn ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî bvunfon bvu Nyo' le noo yî fiɛɛ fi lɛŋ fì wvú gomte le, ɛ́ wvú emum enyaa tɛn mwɛɛm mvun mvunciim ɛ̂ ben.
40006034	Fí ɛ mum ɛ no nu lɛ, fo ben eyaŋyaŋè ɛkumɛ ntfuu kɛ. Bó nu ebuy eyaŋyaŋe yî fiɛɛ fi ntfuu le, ɛ ɛ̀ nu ntfuu. Ŋgɛw wvu yî diuu le ekocɛn kɛ yî diuu didvu diɛ le.”
40007001	“Fo ben elomtè gee di bonyii bomew e kɛ, nonɛn ɛ́ Nyo' saa ke elom tɛn dinɛn kɛ.
40007002	Ben ekeè lɛ je yì ben lomte gee di wee mvu le jó, nu kɛ yì Nyo' nu ke elom tɛn dinɛn jó. Fiɛɛ fì wee feeke fiɛɛ jó sɛ nyaa ɛ̂ wee, nu kɛ fí fì Nyo' nu ke efew jó sɛ nya ɛ̂ mwɛtɛn.
40007003	Ɛ̀ nu nje la wvù wo ké no taale ɛ ɛ̀ nu sheshe yì nu ɛ̂ waa bwoo jise, geenɛn yaa yɛne kekew kè nu ɛ̂ diuw jise le kɛ?
40007004	Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wo eghan nɛɛ sɛ no gayte ɛ̂ waa bwoo lɛ, ‘Kɛ leem ɛ́ me embvuse sheshe ɛ̂ wo jise,’ geenɛn ɛ kekew nu ɛ̂ diuw jise le?
40007005	Wo nu wee kenduŋcɛ ye! Yawɛ ebvuse kekew kè nu ɛ̂ diuw jise le sɛ loocɛ eyɛn sheshe yì nu ɛ̂ jise di waa bwoo le, emum ebvuse.
40007006	Fo ben ejo fiɛɛ fi Nyo' le enya ɛ̂ bwé kɛ. Ɛ́ ben ge nonɛn, ɛ́ yí ebaŋke ye elumyɛ lo ben. Fo ben ejo tɛn ɛjisɛ ɛ baŋ ɛyene enya ɛ̂ boŋkunyam kɛ. Ɛ́ ben ge nonɛn, ɛ́ bó efoy kɛ lo bô bikaa.
40007007	Ben ebiitè, ɛ́ Nyo' ke enya ɛ̂ ben. Ben egomtè, ɛ́ Nyo' ke ege ɛ́ ben eyɛn. Ben ekumcì kembuŋ, ɛ́ Nyo' ke eyene ɛ̂ ben.
40007008	Ben ekeè lɛ wee tfuu wvù biite, nu ke ekɛŋkɛ, ɛ wee tfuu wvù gomte, nu ke eyɛn, ɛ wvù kumci kembuŋ nu ɛ bó nu ke eyene ɛ̂ wvú.
40007009	Ɛ̀ nu yɛɛ ɛ̂ ben ɛntelɛŋ wvù waa we bife bvulɛm, ɛ́ wvú enya ɛ ɛ̀ nu tɛ ɛ̂ wvú?
40007010	Kɛnɛɛ wvú bife bye, ɛ́ wvú enya ɛ ɛ̀ nu yo ɛ̂ wvú?
40007011	Ɛ́ ben fɛn bò ɛ̀ nu bonyii bò befe kee keenya mwɛɛm mvù jee ɛ̂ boom bonɛn, tu kɛ Icee wene wvù nu fowe nulo enya mwɛɛm mvù jee ɛ̂ bonyii bò biite ɛ̂ wvú efey naa lo nonɛn e?
40007012	Fí ɛ mum ɛ no nu lɛ, naa la fì ben shieele lɛ bonyii egeè fô ben e, enù fí fì ben egeè tɛn fô bó le, njefo fifin nu naa fiɛɛ ficii fì Ŋwa' bonci bo Muses e noo Boŋwa' bo bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le yɛɛyi.
40007013	Ben eley ɛ̂ ketaaŋ e ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô diuw wvu fiasaa le, njefo diuw wvù nu gbwuuu nu wvu cekey keeley fó, ɛ wvuwɛ nu wvù gɛne fô bó nu ke elɛse lo bonyii, ɛ bonyii leyte fô wvuwɛ le nteen.
40007014	Ben ekeè lɛ diuw ketaaŋ wvu fiasaa, bô je yì tɛmyi nu yì gɛne fô nshii wvù mɛy lo le. Ɛ bonyii bò yɛne yí le nu caan.
40007015	Ben eyɛnè ɛkumɛ bonyii bò mbiayte lɛ bó nu bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le. Bó too fô ben e yen'yi ye le lɛ ɛ̀ nu njée, geenɛn ɛ ɛnte nu bokuula bò nulo eyɛse lo njée.
40007016	Ben nu ke ekiɛɛ bó ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî gee dibole kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no bó ké kiɛɛ kete yî mvuntam mvù yumte yî dvú le. Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó ekoy yoŋ yî bisafe le, kɛnɛɛ ekoy fimbi yî ɛwantɛ le?
40007017	Fí nu lɛ kete kè jee kecii ké no yumte mvuntam mvù jee, ɛ kete kè befe yumte mvuntam mvù befe.
40007018	Kɛ kete kè jee nulo eyum mvuntam mvù befe kɛ. Ɛ kɛ ɛ̀ nulo tɛn ɛ́ kete kè befe eyum mvuntam mvù jee kɛ.
40007019	Kete kecii kè yaa yumte mvuntam mvù jee nu ɛ bó ké gbwo ton lo.
40007020	Nonɛn, ben nu ke ekiɛɛ bonyii bo mbiay e bodvu ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî gee dibole.
40007021	Kɛ ɛ̀ nu wee tfuu wvù teŋe me lɛ, ‘Tata, Tata’, wvù nu ke eley bvunfon bvu fowe le kɛ. Ɛ̀ nu ke eley kɛ wee wvù gee fiɛɛ fì Icɛm wvù nu fowe shieele.
40007022	Ɛ̀ nu ke enu ɛbvubwɛ bvu nsaw wvu fokemɛse le, ɛ́ bonyii nteen ebiite ɛ̂ me lɛ, ‘Tata, Tata, bese se teete kɛ bontum bo Nyo' le yî mvuŋgay mvu diee diuw e, bvuuse bonceendaa bo dɛwle le yî bonyii le yî mvuŋgay mvu diee diuw e, bvuu gee biŋghaw bi mwɛɛm e yî mvuŋgay mvu diee diuw e?’
40007023	Ɛ me emum eŋgay lo ɛ̂ bó lɛ, ‘Kɛ me ŋke nu ɛ ŋkiɛɛ wa lo ben kɛ. Ben enɛ lo ɛ̂ me ɛjise bonyii bò buwyi mwɛɛm.’
40007024	Nonɛn, wee tfuu wvù yuuke njeme wɛm wvun, gee no wvú gayte nu diɛwɛ wee bvufee wvù to bomɛɛ yew ye yî kembaan e.
40007025	Ɛ jaŋ ke gbwe, ɛ jóo yiŋsɛn buy, ɛ fwefwe fey ci yew yidvu, geenɛn ɛ yí faŋɛ yaa ekesɛ kɛ, njefo wvú to nu ɛ lese kenffuy kedvu yî kembaan e.
40007026	Geenɛn, ɛ wee wvù yuuke njeme wɛm wvun yaa gee no wvú gayte, nu kɛ diɛwɛ keyuŋ ke wee le wvù to bomɛɛ ye yew ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî monshɛɛm e.
40007027	Ɛ jaŋ ke gbwe, ɛ jóo yiŋsɛn buy, ɛ fwefwe fey ci yew yidvu, ɛ yí kesɛ, shii fokuse yicii nɛn wuuu.”
40007028	Ɛ Jisos ke jeme mwɛɛm mvun mvunciim mɛse, ɛ kebombom ke bonyii le kedvu no kɛŋke lo ŋghaw yî n'yɛɛyi we le,
40007029	njefo wvú to yɛɛyi diɛwɛ wee wvù kɛŋke mvuŋgay mvu n'yɛɛyi le. Kɛ wvú to yɛɛyi diɛwɛ no bonyii bobole bò duŋci bonci bo Nyo' le to ké no yɛɛyi kɛ.
40008001	Ɛ Jisos ke nɛ yî kum e bow, ɛ kebombom ke bonyii le ke baay shfum bi wvú le.
40008002	Ɛ fí kooy lɛ wee mvu wvù to cɛmte bô ntun wvu baay, to nu ɛ nɛ to tum ɛnvuw fwe dvu Jisos gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Tata, wo nulo efɛ me ɛ́ me en'yuule, ɛ́ wo fɛn kooŋke lo.”
40008003	Ɛ Jisos mum nɛke kebo kum wvú le gay lɛ, “Me ŋkooŋke lo, bonɛn lɛ eyuule.” Kaŋ mwaaŋ, ɛ ntun wvu baay wvudvu mum ka yî ye le, ɛ wvú no yuule.
40008004	Ɛ Jisos ciise lo ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ̀ yɛnè, fo wo esee ɛ̂ wee kɛ. Geenɛn, gɛnɛ duŋcɛ ɛkolɛ kuw ɛ̂ cee ncese, emum enya nnya yì Muses to gayɛɛ lɛ wee kɛŋke keenya keeduŋcɛ ɛ̂ bonyii lɛ wen nu ɛ bonɛn wase yî ntun wvun e ɛ no yuule.”
40008005	Ɛ Jisos ke nɛ gɛn ley kelaante kè Kafana'um e, ɛ ɛkolɛ ke bonyii bo nci le kemew to yɛn wvú le no kule can ɛ̂ wvú gayte lɛ,
40008006	“Tata, waa wɛm lemme jiime yew ŋgɛyte lo, ɛ wvú ɛ kpwe wase keba kemwaaŋ.”
40008007	Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Me nu ento enfɛ wvú.”
40008008	Geenɛn, ɛ ɛkolɛ ke bonyii bo nci le kedvu tfuse ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Tata, kɛ me wvun nu ɛ me ɛ ŋkocɛn wee wvù wo eto ɛ̂ wvú yew kɛ. Jeme kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu diɛw ɛ́ waa wɛm lemme emum ebonɛn.
40008009	Ɛ̀ keè lɛ me nu ɛ̂ mvuŋgay mvu wee mvu le ɛkuse, ɛ bonyii bo nci le nu tɛn ɛ̂ me ɛkuse. Ɛ́ me ŋké engay ɛ̂ mvu lɛ, ‘Ɛ̀ gɛnè,’ ɛ́ wvú no gɛne lo, ŋké eŋgay ɛ̂ mvu lɛ, ‘To,’ ɛ́ wvú no too lo. Ɛ́ me ŋké eŋgay tɛn ɛ̂ nfwa wɛm lɛ, ‘Geɛ nɛn,’ ɛ́ wvú no gee lo.”
40008010	Ɛ Jisos dioo yuw fiɛɛ fì wvú jeme, ɛ diuw yum lo wvú. Ɛ wvú jeme ɛ̂ bonyii bò to bii wvú le lɛ, “Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy lɛ, me ŋke mbaa n'yɛn wase wee le kɛ naa Islael ɛ wvú ɛ lese kfuu fin fitele yî yɛm e nɛn kɛ.
40008011	Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben lɛ bonyii nteen nu ke enɛ biba bicii ɛ kɛw jò diuu sane ɛ gɛn ɛ buy jò dí seeyi, eto eshii ediekene bô bo Abla'am noo Aysik noo Yakow woŋ Nyo' wvu we le,
40008012	geenɛn, ɛ boom bò woŋ wvudvu nu wvubo nu ɛ bó ɛ laŋ ɛ̂ ɛjiwɛ le ɛkfuŋ fò bonyii nu ke ebeele ŋgeci bigew.”
40008013	No Jisos jeme nonɛn mum gay ɛ̂ ɛkolɛ ke bonyii bo nci le kiɛ lɛ, “Ɛ̀ gɛnè lɛ, fí ege ye fô wo le no wo nu ɛ lese fitele yî yɛm e.” Ɛ waa lemme ɛkolɛ ke bonyii bo nci le wvudvu mum bonɛn lo kɛ sekedvu.
40008014	Ɛ Jisos ke nɛ gɛn ley yew dvu Bita, yɛn ɛ mwɛse Bita jiime cɛmte bô ken'ya'.
40008015	Ɛ Jisos kum kebo kew e, ɛ ken'ya' kedvu mum cinɛ wvú le, ɛ wvú mum ja we taa fiɛɛ ɛ Jisos die.
40008016	Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu ɛkiɛguu, ɛ bonyii no too bô bonyii nteen bò bonceendaa bo dɛwle le to njiŋsene bô bó. Ɛ Jisos no bvuuse biyoy bidvu ɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ bô diɛw maaŋ. Ɛ wvú bvuu no fɛle tɛn bonyii bocii bò to cɛmkene.
40008017	Fifin to kooy keege ɛ́ fí ekocɛn no wee ntum Nyo' wvù Yɛsaya to jemyɛɛ wase lɛ, “Wvú nu ɛ jo wase bontun bosɛse, ɛ tuu bincɛm bisɛse.”
40008018	Ɛ Jisos ke dioo yɛn ɛ kebombom ke bonyii le ke baay ɛ tase wase mbew ye le, ɛ wvú gay ɛ̂ boom bew bo ŋgoo le lɛ, “Beene elente mamase egɛn kewvu keki.”
40008019	Ɛ wee mvu wvù to duŋci bonci bo Nyo' le mum bencɛ gay ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Wee n'yɛɛyi, me nu embii wo le naa fɛɛ fô wo gɛne.”
40008020	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Nyám yi ŋkpwaante kɛŋke bibuw bibole, ɛ mvunyiim mvù bile we kɛŋke yéw yibo, geenɛn kɛ wee wvù diee nu Waawee kɛŋke naa lo fô wvú ejike ɛkolɛ kew kɛ.”
40008021	Ɛ wee we ŋgoo mvu gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Tata, yawɛ ecinɛ ɛ́ me eŋgɛn endwey icɛm nsɛ no mbii.”
40008022	Geenɛn ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ̀ biì me le, ecinɛ ɛ́ bonyii bò nu lɛ bó nu ɛ kpwekɛn wase edweyte bonyii bobole bò kpwekene.”
40008023	Ɛ Jisos ke gɛn ley ɛ̂ kekoŋ e, ɛ boom bew bo ŋgoo le bi tɛn wvú le jó.
40008024	Ɛ fí kooy lɛ nffum mvu wvu baay to nu ɛ nɛ sɛsɛ kɛw ɛ̂ mamase yidvu le no bvuyte joo ɛ yí bene, gomte keeyiŋsɛn ɛ̂ kekoŋ e. Ɛ ɛ̀ to nu ɛ Jisos leete lo fiew.
40008025	Ɛ boom bew bo ŋgoo le gɛn no kamsee wvú gayte lɛ, “Tata, ficɛ, beene nu ekpwekɛn.”
40008026	Ɛ wvú kamse gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “O oo bonyii bo mbee wvù doose le. Ben fane la?” No wvú gay nonɛn mum ja we wam nffum wvudvu noo joo yi baay, ɛ mvú lu, ɛ mondvuum cife nɛn ndvumm.
40008027	Ɛ diuw yum bonyii bodvu nɛn kaww. Ɛ bó ghay lɛ, “Kfuu wvuwvun wee nu wvu nɛɛ wvù naa nffum noo joo yuuke wvú le?”
40008028	Ɛ Jisos ke lente buy kewvu keki ɛ̂ keba ke bonyii bo Gadala le. Ɛ bô bonyii bofɛɛ tasɛn ɛ bonceendaa bo dɛwle le nu yî bó le. Bonyii bodvu to buy ɛ̂ ditfum dì bó dweyte bonyii jó le, ɛ bó to ké no cɛwkene baay, ɛ wee yaa nulo efey lo je jó kɛ.
40008029	Ɛ fí kooy lɛ bó to nu ɛ kɛw no wamte foweɛwe biite lɛ, “Waa Nyo', wo fii la ɛ̂ bese? Wo to fɛn keenya ŋgɛw ɛ̂ bese sɛ kefew ɛ kpwɛn e?”
40008030	Ɛ̀ to nu ɛ ŋgoo boŋkunyam bomew diekene keleŋ kedvu le ɛ bó duule lo.
40008031	Ɛ bonceendaa bo dɛwle le bodvu mum lɛkɛ Jisos lɛ, “Kee wo, ɛ́ wo bvuse lo bese, ɛ́ wo ciinse bese yî boŋkunyam boba le.”
40008032	Ɛ Jisos mum gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben egɛn lo.” Ɛ bó mum buy, gɛn ley yî boŋkunyam bodvu le. Ɛ fí kooy lɛ ŋgoo boŋkunyam yidvu yicii to nu ɛ sɛn bow ɛ̂ ŋkoŋ e, shii ɛ̂ mamase yidvu le kpwekɛn jó.
40008033	Ɛ bonyii bò to cɛyte boŋkunyam bodvu fɛɛ lo, gɛn ɛlaante, see fiɛɛ ficii naa noo fì kooyɛɛ bô bonyii bò bonceendaa bo dɛwle le to nu yî bó le.
40008034	Ɛ fí kooy lɛ kelaante kedvu kecii to nu ɛ buy lo keeto yɛn Jisos e. No bó toɛ yɛn wvú le, lɛkɛ lɛ wvú enɛ gbwen bowene.
40009001	Ɛ Jisos ley ɛ̂ kekoŋ e, kase lente gɛn ɛ̂ kelaante kew e.
40009002	Ɛ fí kooy lɛ bonyii bomew to nu ɛ to bô wee mvu fô wvú le ɛ wvú ɛ kpwe wase keba kemwaaŋ, ɛ bó ɛ tuu ɛ̂ fikɛɛy e. Ɛ Jisos yɛn no bonyii bodvu nu ɛ lese fitele yî ye le, ɛ wvú gay ɛ̂ wee wvù to kpweɛ keba kemwaaŋ wɛ lɛ, “Nsaa yɛm, jicɛ fitele le. Me nu ɛ nlɛɛshɛ wase bibefɛ biuw.”
40009003	Ɛ fí kooy lɛ bonyii bomew bò to duŋci bonci bo Nyo' le to nu ɛ kɛw no wvukene ɛbonɛbon gayte lɛ, “Wee wvun joo bvudvuu bvu Nyo' le.”
40009004	Ɛ Jisos kiɛɛ fiɛɛ fì bó kpwawci, bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben kɛŋke ŋkpwawcɛ wvù befe ɛ̂ mvuntelem mvunɛn e nɛn nje la?
40009005	Fiɛɛ fì nu cekey keegay nu fì la? Keegay ɛ̂ wee wvun lɛ me nu ɛ nlɛɛshɛ wase bibefɛ biew, nuu lɛ wvú eja we elɛne lɛ?
40009006	Geenɛn, me nu eŋge ɛ́ ben ekiɛɛ lɛ wee wvù diee nu Waawee kɛŋke mvuŋgay fokuse fɛn keelɛɛshɛ bibefɛ.” No wvú gay nonɛn mum gay ɛ̂ wee wvù to kpweɛ keba kemwaaŋ wɛ lɛ, “Ja we, ejo fikɛɛy fiuw egɛne fô yew e.”
40009007	Ɛ wvú mum ja we no gɛne fô yew e.
40009008	Ɛ kebombom ke bonyii le yɛn fiɛɛ fì kooyɛɛ le, ɛ nfan koo bó, ɛ bó no tumte moŋkum mo Nyo' wvù nu ɛ nya kfuu mvumvun mvuŋgay ɛ̂ wee wvu wum.
40009009	Ɛ Jisos ke nɛ fó dioo lɛne gɛne yɛn wee mvu le ɛ bó teŋe lɛ Matio, ɛ ɛ̀ nu wee wvù to fii shile, ɛ wvú ɛ shii fô bvudvuu bwew bvu lemme le. Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ̀ biì me le.” Ɛ wvú mum nɛ we no bii wvú le.
40009010	Ɛ Jisos ke gɛn shii dioo diekene yew dvu Matio, ɛ fí kooy lɛ bonyii bomew nteen bò to fii shile, noo bonyii bò befe bomew tɛn to nu ɛ to shii no diekene bô bo Jisos noo boom bew bo ŋgoo le.
40009011	Ɛ Bofalasii dioo yɛn no bô bó diekene nonɛn mum bife ɛ̂ boom bew bo ŋgoo le lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu nje la wvù wee wene n'yɛɛyi diekene bô bonyii bò fii shile noo bonyii bò befe bomew?”
40009012	Ɛ Jisos yuw no bó bife, gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Kɛ bonyii bò tɛmyi ké no gomte wee ɛfuwɛ kɛ. Ɛ̀ ké no gomte bò cɛmkene.
40009013	Ben egɛn ekpwawcɛ, eyɛn laa kenyi ke fiɛɛ fì bó saŋ fin ɛ Nyo' jemyi lɛ, ‘Me nshieele lɛ bonyii ecamtè ɛ ɛ̀ nu shen fô bonyii le, kɛ me nshieele lɛ bó egeè boncese fô me le kɛ’, nu lɛ la lɛ? Ben ekeè lɛ kɛ me nto keentee bonyii bò nu teytey kɛ. Me nto keentee ɛ ɛ̀ nu bò befe.”
40009014	Ɛ boom bo ŋgoo le bo Jon Nleseɛjoo le ke nɛ to bife ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu nje la wvù bee Bofalasii ké no bamte mwɛɛm mvudien, ɛ boom buw bo ŋgoo le yaa bamte kɛ?”
40009015	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben kpwaake lɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó ebe bonyii bô bvujen, ɛ́ bó egɛn enu yii yii ɛ cee bvujen nu bô bó? Geenɛn, diuu too lo dì bó nu ke efi cee bvujen wvudvu ɛ̂ bó, ɛ́ bó emum ekɛw ebamte mwɛɛm mvudien.
40009016	Kɛ wee nulo ejo njaw ndvu yi fiɛ, etumcɛ ndvu yi yvum dvú kɛ. Ɛ́ wvú ge lo nonɛn, ɛ́ njaw ndvu yidvu emɛse esaa ndvu yi yvum yidvu, ɛ́ kebuw kè nu fó emɛse ekuw efey lo no kí be shee nu.
40009017	Ɛ kɛ wee nulo tɛn ejo mbvuum mo monfɛm egɛɛ ɛ̂ gham mbvuum wvù bó kene bô jew nyam e, ɛ wvú ɛ yvumɛn wase kɛ. Ɛ́ wvú ge lo nonɛn, ɛ́ mbvuum mo monfɛm modvu ke ekoo, ɛ́ gham wvudvu ebvuyɛ etawse lo, ɛ́ mbvuum modvu emum egɛn kuse. Fi lɛŋ nu lɛ bó kɛŋke keegɛɛ mbvuum mo monfɛm ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ gham wvu fwɛ le. Nonɛn, ɛ́ mbvuum bô gham emum enù.”
40009018	Kɛ no Jisos to bɛɛ jemyi ɛ̂ bó nonɛn, ɛ fí kooy lɛ wee wvu baay mvu to nu ɛ to ley tum ɛnvuw ɛ̂ wvú ɛjise lɛkɛ lɛ, “Waa wɛm wvù kpwoon nu ɛ kpwe kɛ keseen nɛn, geenɛn, to ekum wvú le bô kebo kuw ɛ́ wvú ekase etu dvú.”
40009019	Ɛ Jisos mum nɛ we ɛ bô wvú no gɛne, ɛ boom bew bo ŋgoo le bii tɛn wvú le.
40009020	Ɛ fí kooy lɛ kpwoon mvu wvù to nu ɛ cɛm wase bô kencɛm ke bokɛnɛ le bilum yuufe ncow bifɛɛ to nu ɛ to ɛ̂ Jisos ɛjim kum ŋgem ndvu ye le.
40009021	Wvú to kum nonɛn, ɛ wvú to jeme wase fô fitele fiew e lɛ, “Ɛ́ me encim eŋkum kɛ naa ɛ ɛ̀ nu ndvu ye le, tu me ɛ mbonɛn wase.”
40009022	No wvú kumɛɛ nonɛn, ɛ Jisos baŋke ye yɛn wvú le, gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Bwɛɛm, fo wo efanè kɛ. Fitele fiuw fì wo lese yî yɛm e nu ɛ ge wase wo ɛ bonɛn.” Kɛ sekedvu, ɛ kpwoon wvudvu mum bonɛn lo.
40009023	Ɛ Jisos ke gɛn fɛse fô yew e fo wee wvu baay wɛ, yɛn bonyii bò to ké no tooŋke bondoŋ bo kpwe le noo kebombom ke bonyii le. Ɛ fó ffule lo bô kpwe.
40009024	Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben etawse, wan wvudvu baa kpwe kɛ, wvú leete lo.” Ɛ bonyii bodvu no kieele lo wvú.
40009025	Ɛ bó ke dioo bvuse bonyii bodvu ɛkfuŋ, ɛ wvú mum ley gɛn yew, jicɛ wan wvudvu yî kebo le, ɛ wvú mum ja we.
40009026	Ɛ saaka wvu ɛkumɛ fiɛɛ fidvu ghan gɛn ɛ̂ keba ke woŋ e kedvu le kecii.
40009027	Ɛ Jisos ke nɛ fô yew e fɛ, dioo lɛne gɛne, ɛ binfefe bimew bifɛɛ, ɛ ɛ̀ nu bolemsɛ no kuŋene bii wvú le wamte foweɛwe gayte lɛ, “Waa Nfon Dawe, camɛ shen fô bese le.”
40009028	Ɛ Jisos ke gɛn ley yew, ɛ binfefe bidvu bi wvú le, ɛ wvú bife ɛ̂ bó le, “Ben nu ɛ bee lɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me eŋge fiɛɛ fì ben beele fin e?” Ɛ bó bee lɛ, “'Ɛɛ Tata.”
40009029	Ɛ Jisos mum kum ɛjisɛ ɛbole gay lɛ, “Bii fitele fì ben lese yî yɛm e, fí ege lɛ ye nonɛn fô ben e.”
40009030	Ɛ ɛjisɛ ɛbo mum yene. Ɛ Jisos loocɛ lew lo ɛ̂ bó gay lɛ, “Ben eyɛnè fo ben emom ege ɛ́ wee ekiɛɛ kɛ.”
40009031	Geenɛn, ɛ bó kaa gɛn no saŋse lo saaka ɛkumɛ lemme di Jisos e ɛ̂ keba ke woŋ e kedvu le kecii.
40009032	No bonyii bodvu to nɛn'yɛɛ wase egɛne, ɛ fí kooy lɛ bonyii to nu ɛ nɛ to bô kencife kemew fô Jisos e ɛ nceendaa dɛwle nu yî ye le.
40009033	Ɛ Jisos dioo bvuse nceendaa dɛwle wvudvu yî wee wvudvu le ɛ wvú mum kɛw no jemyi. Ɛ kebombom ke bonyii le yɛn nonɛn no ghayte gayte lɛ, “Kɛ bó ke nu ɛ yuu wase eyɛn fiɛɛ le diɛwɛ fin e woŋ wvù Islael e kɛ.”
40009034	Geenɛn, ɛ Bofalasii gay fibole lɛ, “Wvú bvuuse bonceendaa bo dɛwle le ban nɛn ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô mvuŋgay mvu nfon bonceendaa bo dɛwle le bodvu.”
40009035	Ɛ Jisos ke nɛ no ghane ɛ̂ bilaante le bicii noo ɛ̂ bontɛw e yɛɛyi bonyii yéw bunle yibole, bvuu fewci tɛn saaka wvù jee ɛkumɛ bvunfon bvu Nyo' le. Wvú to ghane nonɛn fɛle tɛn kencɛm kecii noo ntun tfuu.
40009036	Ɛ́ wvú ké eyɛn kebombom ke bonyii le, ɛ́ shen koo wvú bô bó njefo bó to nu yî monlum e, sɛ wee wvù efi bó, diɛwɛ njée yì nu sɛ wee ncɛy e.
40009037	Ɛ wvú ke mum nɛ gay ɛ̂ boom bew bo ŋgoo le lɛ, “Ŋgbwele duule baay, geenɛn ɛ bonyii bo ŋgbwele le nu caan.
40009038	Nonɛn, ben ebunleè lɛ Tata wvù Cee wɛɛ eciinse bonyii bo ŋgbwele le wɛne dvu wvú.”
40010001	Ɛ Jisos ke nɛ tee boom bew bo ŋgoo le bo yuufe ncow bofɛɛ ɛ bó to. Ɛ wvú nya mvuŋgay ɛ̂ bó mvù bó ebvuuse biyoy bì yiile yî bonyii le bvuu fɛle kencɛm kecii noo ntun tfuu dvú.
40010002	Ɛyan nu ɛdiee ɛ boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e bo yuufe ncow bofɛɛ le bodvu: Wvu fwe nu Semon wvù bó to bvuu teŋe lɛ Bita, bô Andulu wvù waa bwee. Ɛ bomew nu Jɛm wvù waa Sɛbɛdee bô waa bwee wvù Jon noo
40010003	Filew bô Batolomu, Toma bô Matio wvù to fii shile, Jɛm wvù waa Alfiyus, Tadio bô
40010004	Semon wvù to nu ŋgoo Bosɛlot e bô Judas Iskaliot wvù to gesɛɛ Jisos.
40010005	Ɛ Jisos tum bonyii bo yuufe ncow bofɛɛ ban, gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben dioo gɛne, fo ben egɛn bvudvuu le sɛ ɛ̀ nu bvu wee Juu le kɛ. Fo ben egɛn bilaante bì ɛ̀ nu bi bonyii bo Samalia le kɛ.
40010006	Ben egɛn ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô boom bo Islael e bò nu ɛ lakɛn wase diɛwɛ njée le.
40010007	Ben dioo gɛne no fewci ɛ̂ bó gayte lɛ, ‘Bvunfon bvu fowe nu wase nceencee.’
40010008	Ben efɛlè tɛn bonyii bò cɛmkene, geè ɛ bonyii bò kpwekene tuu dvú, fɛlè bonyii bò kɛŋke ntun wvu baay, bvuusè bonceendaa bo dɛwle le yî bonyii le. Me nu ɛ nya mvuŋgay ɛ̂ ben ɛcici. Ben egɛn lɛ efii tɛn bonyii dvú ɛcici.
40010009	Ben dioo gɛne, fo wee ejo bigew suu yî kecaw e kɛ, kɛnɛɛ ɛ̀ nu bì bó kene bô ketwaa ke bigew e kè yɛɛle, kɛnɛɛ ɛ̀ nu kè baa, kɛnɛɛ kè bó kene bô kfuu ketwaa kè nɛɛ.
40010010	Fo wee ejo ɛkɛlɛ. Fo wee ejo bikum bifɛɛ kɛnɛɛ bolaba bomew, kɛnɛɛ kembaŋ kɛ. Ben ekeè lɛ ɛ́ wee lemte lemme, tu ɛ̀ nu fò wvú kɛŋke keediekene.
40010011	Ben dioo ɛ gɛn ɛ ley ɛ̂ kelaante le, kɛnɛɛ ntɛw e, gom yɛn wee wvù nu ɛ kocɛn e, ɛ ben ɛ bó no cee gɛn buy kefew kè ben ke enɛnɛ jó le.
40010012	Ben ke dioo ɛ gɛn, ɛ dioo leyte yew dvu wee, gay yew e.
40010013	Ɛ́ yew yidvu nu ɛ yí ɛ kocɛn, ɛ́ kembonɛn kenɛn eto yew dvudvu. Ɛ́ yew yidvu baa nu ɛ yí ɛ kocɛn, ɛ́ kembonɛn kenɛn ekase etu ɛ̂ ben.
40010014	Ɛ́ wee faŋ keefiisɛn ben kɛnɛɛ keeyuw fiɛɛ fì ben jemyi le, ɛ́ ben dioo buyte yew dvudvu kɛnɛɛ kelaante kedvu le kucɛ kebvu ke yî bikaa binɛn e.
40010015	Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy lɛ ɛ̀ nu ke edioo enu diuu di nsaw wvu fokemɛse le, ɛ́ mwɛɛm ebonɛn yî kelaante kè Sodom bô kè Gomola le efey kelaante kekiɛ.
40010016	Ben eyekɛ yuw, me ntumte ben ɛ ben nu egɛn enu diɛwɛ njée le ɛnte jo bokuula. Nonɛn ben dioo ghane no feefenè diɛwɛ yó le, enù tɛn nyɛkeey diɛwɛ bibembɛ le.
40010017	Ben dioo ghane no yɛnè ɛkumɛ bonyii. Ben ekeè lɛ bó nu ke enya ben can bonyii bò saake bonsaw e. Bó nu ke etamte ben yéw bunle yibole.
40010018	Bó nu ke egufe ben egɛn dvú fwe dvu bonyii bò saake biba bi woŋ e, noo fwe dvu bonfon nje me, wvu lɛ ben emum ejeme ɛ̂ bó noo ɛ̂ bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu ɛkumɛ me.
40010019	Bó ke dioo ɛ nya ben ɛ̂ bó nonɛn, fo ɛkolɛ ekfumtè ben lɛ laa ben nu ke egɛn ejeme naa la ɛ̂ je yì nɛɛ le lɛ, njefo Nyo' nu ke enya fiɛɛ fì ben ejeme kefew kedvu le.
40010020	Ben ekeè lɛ kɛ ɛ̀ bɛɛ ke ejemyi ben kɛ. Ɛ̀ nu ke ejemyi Keyoy ke Icee wene le diuw wene le.
40010021	Wee nu ke enɛ ejo waa bwee enya ɛ́ bó eyu, ɛ́ cee wan ejo waa we enya ɛ́ bó eyu. Boom nu ke enɛ ebone bikaa ɛ̂ bo'icee bobole ɛjim, gee ɛ bó yuwyi bó.
40010022	Bonyii nu ke ebane ben nje diee diem. Geenɛn wee wvù nu ke ekuu shém egɛn ebuy fokemɛse nu wvù nu ke eboy.
40010023	Seke bonyii ɛ bon bikaa ɛ̂ ben ɛjim ɛ̂ kelaante kemew e, ɛ ben fɛɛ gɛn ɛ̂ kemew e. Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy lɛ, kɛ ben nu ke elɛn bilaante bi Islael e bicii sɛ wee wvù diee nu Waawee ɛ to kɛ.
40010024	Kɛ waa ŋwa' ké no fele wee wvù yɛɛyi wvú kɛ, ɛ kɛ waa lemme ké no fele tɛn cee ɛkolɛ we kɛ.
40010025	Fí nu lɛŋ lɛ waa ŋwa' nulo enu diɛwɛ wee wvù yɛɛyi wvú le, ɛ waa lemme nu tɛn diɛwɛ cee ɛkolɛ we le. Ɛ́ bó teŋe cee yew lɛ wvú nu Bɛlsebu, ɛ́ bó saa ke etee boom bo yew e bô diee dì bɛmte fele lo didiɛ?
40010026	Nonɛn fo ben efanè wee kɛ. Ben ekeè lɛ kɛ fiɛɛ nu dvú fì bó baŋyi fì nu ke enu sɛ fí ɛ buy ɛmwa kɛ. Ɛ kɛ fiɛɛ nu dvú tɛn fì bó nyile fì nu ke enu sɛ bó ɛ kiɛɛ kɛ.
40010027	Fiɛɛ fì me nseŋe ɛ̂ ben ɛntaŋ, ɛ ben no jemyi ɛ̂ bonyii ɛmvunsheeŋ. Ɛ fì me ntfumtfume lo ɛ̂ ben, ɛ ben jaŋ ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô ɛkolɛ ke yew e.
40010028	Fo ben efanè bonyii bò nulo eyu kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu nyam ye maaŋ sɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó eyu tɛn keyoy kɛ. Ben efanè ɛ ɛ̀ nu Nyo' wvù nulo elɛse keyoy ke wee le bô ye ye ŋguy wvu baay e.
40010029	Kɛ bó geese mvunsha mvunfɛɛm kɛ yî finyinyi le maaŋ? Geenɛn, kɛ fimwaaŋ ké gbwe fokuse sɛ Icee wene nu ɛ bee kɛ.
40010030	Finɛn nu ɛ Nyo' kee naa yvúw yicii yì nu ɛ̂ ben ɛfa.
40010031	Nonɛn fo ben efanè kɛ. Ben fele lo mvunsha fó nteen.
40010032	Ɛ́ wee beŋe ɛ̂ bonyii fwe lɛ wen kee me, tu wee wvù diee nu Waawee nu ke ebee tɛn mwɛtɛn fwe dvu Ice wvù nu fowe.
40010033	Geenɛn naa yɛɛ wvù ma lo me fwe dvu bonyii, nu ɛ me nu ŋke ema lo tɛn wvú fwe dvu Icɛm wvù nu fowe.
40010034	Fo ben ekpwaakè lɛ me nto ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô nyɛkeey yî nshɛ le fɛn kɛ. Kɛ ɛ̀ nu fifiɛ fì me nto dvú kɛ. Me nto ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô jem.
40010035	Ben ekeè lɛ me nto keeŋge ɛ́ wan wvù diemsɛn ediuu bô ice, ɛ wan wvù kpwoon diuu bô bwee, ɛ kpwɛɛ wan diuu bô bwee dweese.
40010036	Bonyii bo bvuban e bo wee le nu ke enu kɛ bonyii bo ɛ̂ wvú yew.
40010037	Ɛ́ wee kooŋke ice kɛnɛɛ bwee fele me, tu wvú baa ekpwɛntɛn keenu wee wɛm kɛ. Wee ɛ́ no kooŋke tɛn waa we wvù diemsɛn kɛnɛɛ wvù kpwoon fele me, tu wvú baa ekpwɛntɛn tɛn keenu wee wɛm kɛ.
40010038	Ɛ́ wee baa etuu kew kentam ebii me le, tu wvú baa ekpwɛntɛn keenu wee wɛm kɛ.
40010039	Ɛ́ wee bawci nshii we, ɛ́ wvú ke elase kɛ nshii wvudvu. Geenɛn ɛ́ wee lase nshii we nje me, ɛ́ wvú ke ekɛŋkɛ nshii wvù mɛy lo.
40010040	Ɛ́ wee fiisene ben, tu wvú fiisene ɛ ɛ̀ nu me. Wee ɛ́ fiisɛn me, tu wvú fiisene ɛ ɛ̀ nu wee wvù tum me.
40010041	Ɛ́ wee fiisene wee ntum Nyo' njefo wvú kee lɛ ɛ̀ tum Nyo' wvú, tu wvú nu ke ekɛŋkɛ mmawcɛ wvù Nyo' mawci bonyii bew bo ntum e dvú. Ɛ́ wee fiisene wee wvu teytey njefo wvú kee lɛ mwɛtɛn nu wee wvu teytey, tu wvú nu ke ekɛŋkɛ mmawcɛ wvù Nyo' mawci bonyii bo teytey dvú.
40010042	Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy lɛ, ɛ́ wee nya kɛ naa fiko fi joo yì lɛɛ le ɛ̂ wee mwaaŋ ŋgoo bonyii bo caan caan ban e njefo wvú kee lɛ ɛ̀ nu wee wɛm ŋgoo, tu kɛ mwɛtɛn nu ke efufe mmawcɛ we kɛ.”
40011001	Ɛ Jisos ke mɛse tefe boom bew bo ŋgoo le bo yuufe ncow bofɛɛ mum nɛ fó no ghane ɛ̂ bilaante bi jó le yɛɛyi bonyii bvuu fewci saaka wvù jee.
40011002	Ɛ̀ to nu kefew kedvu le, ɛ Jon Nleseɛjoo nu yew ncaw e. Ɛ wvú ke nɛ yuw ɛkumɛ mwɛɛm mvù Klistu to gee, mum tum boom bew bo ŋgoo le lɛ bó egɛn,
40011003	ebife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ laa, ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù to nu keeke eto, nuu bó ecɛytè wee mvu lɛ.
40011004	Ɛ bó gɛn bife, ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben ekase egɛn esee ɛ̂ Jon mwɛɛm mvù ben nu ɛ yuw bô mvù ben yɛn e.
40011005	Binfefe yɛne wase mwɛɛm e, ɛ bontɛŋɛ lɛne teytey, ɛ bonyii bò cɛmkene bô ntun wvu baay bonene, ɛ bincife yuuke mwɛɛm, ɛ bonyii bò kpwekɛn kaase tuu dvú, ɛ bó bvuu fewci tɛn saaka wvù jee wvù wvu Nyo' ɛ̂ bonyii bo kefufe le.
40011006	Njoŋ wvu baay nu wvu wee wvù baa maŋene me kɛ.”
40011007	Ɛ boom bo Jon e bo ŋgoo le ba ke nɛ, ɛ Jisos mum kɛw no jemyi ɛ̂ kebombom ke bonyii le ɛkumɛ Jon biite lɛ, “Ben se shee buyte gɛne ŋkpwaante keegɛn yɛn ɛ ɛ̀ nu la le? Gayi dì fwefwe fele shiike?
40011008	No ɛ̀ baa nu nonɛn, ben ɛ se ɛ no buyte gɛne jó nje la? Ben se gɛne keeyɛn wee le ɛ wvú ɛ sufe ye bô ndvú yì bonene? Ben eyekɛ eyuw, bonyii bò suute ye bô ndvú yì bonene ké no nu ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ bontow e.
40011009	No ɛ̀ baa nu nonɛn, ben ɛ se ɛ no buyte gɛne jó nje la? Keegɛn yɛn wee ntum Nyo' le nuu? 'Ɛɛ, ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben lɛ ɛ̀ nu wee ɛ wvú fele wee ntum Nyo'.
40011010	Ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù bó to saŋɛɛ ɛkumɛ wvú ɛ Nyo' gayte lɛ, ‘Yekɛ eyuw, me nu ŋke enciinse wee wɛm ntum ɛ́ wvú esa fwe dvu wo, eseyse je yo ɛ́ wo sɛ no too.’
40011011	Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy lɛ, ɛnte jo bonyii bò bokɛnɛ nu ɛ boo wase, nu ɛ bó baa boo wase wee wvù kuuke fele Jon Nleseɛjoo kɛ. Geenɛn, ɛ wee wvù nu naa wee wvu caan ɛnte jo bvunfon bvu fowe nu ɛ wvú kuuke fele wvú.
40011012	Ɛ kɛw yî kefew kè Jon Nleseɛjoo to kɛwɛɛ lemme diew e ɛ to ɛ buy keseen e, nu ɛ bonyii taaŋke bvunfon bvu fowe, ɛ bonyii bo mvuŋgay e lole bô mvuŋgay.
40011013	Ɛ fí nu nonɛn njefo bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le bocii noo bonci bo Muses e to jemyi ɛkumɛ bvunfon bvu fowe ke ghan to buy kefew ke Jon Nleseɛjoo le.
40011014	Ɛ́ ben nu ɛ yɛn lɛ ben nulo ebee, ɛ́ ben bee lɛ Jon wvun nu Ɛlayja wvù to nu keeke eto.
40011015	Wee wvù kɛŋke bitem ɛ wvú yuw.”
40011016	Ɛ Jisos nɛ ghay ye lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me enfewsɛn ɛŋgokɛ ke keseen kin ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô la? Bó nu kɛ lo diɛwɛ boom bo caan caan e bò shiiyɛn mondvuum mo way e, ɛ bomew teŋe bomew biite lɛ,
40011017	‘Bese tooŋke ndoŋ sɛ ben bine lo le? Nyaa ŋkiee kpwe sɛ ben beŋe lo le?’
40011018	Me njemyi nonɛn njefo Jon to nu ɛ to faŋɛ yaa diekene kɛnɛɛ wukene kɛ, ɛ ben no jemyi lɛ wvú kɛŋke nceendaa dɛwle yî ye le.
40011019	Wee wvù diee nu Waawee ɛ dioo to, diekene bvuu wukene, ben lɛ bó etaa eyɛn, wvú ghane wuwte mwɛɛm mvudien wuwte mbvuum, bvuu nu nsaa bonyii bò fii shile noo bonyii bò befe bomew. Ben ekeè lɛ bvufee ké no duŋci ye ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî fiɛɛ fì bvú lemte le.”
40011020	Ɛ Jisos mum nɛ kɛw no shaaŋke gee di bilaante bimew bì wvú to yamɛɛ ge biŋghaw bi mwɛɛm e bí le, njefo wvú to nu ɛ ge nonɛn, ɛ bonyii bo jó faŋɛ yaa cim kumɛn nce wvubo kɛ.
40011021	Ɛ wvú no shaaŋke nonɛn, jemyi lɛ, “Ŋgɛw wvu baay nu wene ben bonyii bo Kolasen, ɛ ŋgɛw wvu baay nu tɛn wene ben bonyii bo Bɛsayda. Ben ekeè lɛ, ɛ́ me nto ndioo ŋge biŋghaw bi mwɛɛm e bì me nto ŋgeɛ jo ben ɛ ɛ̀ nu Taya bô Sidon, tu bó to nu ɛ jise wase bimbamkpwe, kfum taan ye le ncekɛ keeduŋcɛ lɛ bó nu ɛ kumɛn wase mvuntelem mvubole.
40011022	Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben lɛ, ɛ̀ nu ke edioo enu diuu di nsaw wvu fokemɛse le, ɛ́ mwɛɛm ebonene fô bonyii bo Taya noo bo Sidon e fele ben.
40011023	Noo ben bonyii bo Kafana'um, ben kpwaake lɛ bó nu ke ebense ben ɛ́ ben eben we? 'Aay! Bó nu ke eshike lo ben ɛ́ ben eshii egɛn woŋ boŋkfu le. Ben ekeè lɛ, ɛ́ me nto ndioo ŋge biŋghaw bi mwɛɛm e bì me nto ŋgeɛ jo ben ɛ ɛ̀ nu Sodom, tu kelaante kedvu be bɛɛ dvú ɛ to ɛ buy ɛbɛn e.
40011024	Geenɛn, ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben lɛ, ɛ̀ nu ke edioo enu diuu di nsaw wvu fokemɛse le, ɛ́ mwɛɛm ebonene fô bonyii bo Sodom e fele ben.”
40011025	Kɛ kefew kedvu le, ɛ Jisos nɛ gay lɛ, “Me nyaa keyoone ɛ̂ wo Icɛm Nfon ɛbulɛ bô nshɛ lɛ wo nu ɛ nyilɛ mwɛɛm mvun ɛ̂ bogoyfee noo boŋkiɛɛfiɛɛ, ɛ duŋcɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ mvunlɛy mvu boom e.
40011026	Ɛ̀ nu no fí nu Icɛm, njefo ɛ̀ nu no wo to shieele lɛ fí enù.
40011027	Icɛm nu ɛ nya wase mwɛɛm mvunciim ɛ̂ me. Kɛ wee nu dvú wvù kee Waa Nyo' ɛfey Ice kɛ. Ɛ kɛ wee nu dvú wvù kee Ice ɛfey Waa we noo bonyii bò Wan nu ɛ caw keeduŋcɛ Ice ɛ̂ bó kɛ.
40011028	Ben bocii bò nu ɛkuse jo bvujitɛ ɛ bvú ghaake ben, ben eto fô me le, ɛ́ me eŋge ɛ́ ben elɛɛtɛn.
40011029	Ben ejo ɛ ɛ̀ nu kemmbuŋ kem eshfumɛ, ebiì n'yɛɛyi wɛm e, njefo me nu fiem wee wvu nyɛkeey, ŋkɛŋke fitele fì lɛɛtene, ɛ́ ben ke ekɛŋkɛ nlɛɛtɛn fô mvuntelem mvunɛn e.
40011030	Kɛ kemmbuŋ kem ghaake nshfumɛ le kɛ, ɛ kɛ bvujitɛ bwem jite kɛ.”
40012001	Ɛ ɛ̀ no nu kɛ kefew kedvu le, ɛ Jisos bô boom bew bo ŋgoo le no lɛne fele wɛɛ ɛgiŋ wvumew e, ɛ ɛ̀ nu diuu di mbam e. Ɛ̀ to nu ɛ jeŋ yuu boom bew bo ŋgoo le, ɛ bó mum nɛ kɛw no sumyi bicɛɛ diee.
40012002	Ɛ Bofalasii yɛn, gay ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Taa eyɛn, boom buw bo ŋgoo le gee fiɛɛ fì nci baa bee lɛ wee ege diuu di mbam e kɛ.”
40012003	Ɛ wvú bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben ke baa taŋ wase ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le no jeŋ to yuu Nfon Dawe bô ŋgoo ye, ɛ wvú ge le?
40012004	Wvú to nu ɛ ley yew Nyo' le, die blɛɛd wvù bó to geɛ ncese dvú fô Nyo' le, ɛ ɛ̀ to nu nci fo wvú kɛnɛɛ bonyii bò to nu bô wvú edie. Ɛ̀ to nulo edie kɛ bocee ncese.
40012005	Nuu lɛ ben ke baa taŋ wase tɛn ɛ̂ bonci bo Muses e no ɛ̀ ké dioo nu diuu di mbam e, ɛ bocee ncese ŋgoy nci mbam ge lemme dibole yew ncese le, geenɛn ɛ nsaw saa nu kɛ?
40012006	Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben lɛ fiɛɛ nu dvú fɛn keseen fì kuuke fele yew ncese.
40012007	Bó nu ɛ saŋ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le ɛ Nyo' jemyi lɛ, ‘Me nshieele lɛ bonyii ecamtè ɛ ɛ̀ nu shen fô bonyii le, kɛ me nshieele lɛ bó egeè boncese fô me le kɛ.’ Ɛ́ ben fɛn be kee fiɛɛ fì bvudvuu bvudvu bvun gayte, ben saa esaake bonyii sɛ bó kɛŋke jay kɛ.
40012008	Fí nu lɛ wee wvù diee nu Waawee nu Cee Ɛkolɛ wvu mbam.”
40012009	Ɛ Jisos ke nɛ fó, gɛn ley yew bunle yibole.
40012010	Ɛ fí kooy lɛ wee mvu to nu dvú ɛ kebo kew kemew ɛ kpwe wase. Ɛ bonyii bomew nɛ bife ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Nci nu ɛ bee lɛ ɛ̀ nɛlo ɛ́ bó efɛ wee diuu di mbam e?” Ɛ bó to biite nonɛn gomte ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì bó etey yî ye le.
40012011	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu yɛɛ ɛ̂ ben ɛnte wvù kɛŋke njee, yí ɛ gbwe ɛ̂ fwɛŋ diuu di mbam e, ɛ́ wvú enu sɛ wvú ɛ jicɛ ɛ gufe ɛ bvuse?
40012012	Kɛ wee wvu wum fele naa lo njee baay e? Nonɛn tu nci nu ɛ bee lɛ wee ege lemme dì jee diuu di mbam e.”
40012013	Ɛ wvú mum gay ɛ̂ wee wvù kebo to nu ɛ kpwe wɛ lɛ, “Nɛke kebo kuw.” Ɛ wee wvudvu nɛke. Ɛ kí mum bonɛn no nu kɛ diɛwɛ kemew kiɛ le.
40012014	Geenɛn ɛ Bofalasii buy gɛn mum jo nsey no bó nu ege sɛ yu Jisos.
40012015	Ɛ Jisos kiɛɛ ɛkumɛ nsey wvù bó joɛ, mum nɛnɛ fó. Ɛ bonyii nteen bi wvú le. Ɛ wvú fɛ bó bocii bò to kɛŋke bincɛm,
40012016	ciise ɛ̂ bó lɛ fo bó ege ɛ́ bonyii ekiɛɛ wen kɛ.
40012017	Fí to nu nonɛn keege ɛ́ fí ekocɛn no wee ntum Nyo' wvù Yɛsaya to jemyɛɛ lɛ,
40012018	“Ben etaa eyɛn, wvun nu waa wɛm lemme wvù me nu ɛ ncaw. Me ŋkooŋke wvú, ɛ fitele fiem yuuke njoŋ bô wvú. Me nu ŋke enya Keyoy kem ɛ̂ wvú, ɛ́ wvú efewci ɛ̂ bitum ɛkumɛ je yi teytey yì me nsumtene bonsaw jó.
40012019	Kɛ wvú nu ke ewaale bô bonyii, kɛnɛɛ kumte diuw kɛ. Ɛ kɛ wee nu ke eyuw diɛw ye bifiaŋ bi jé le kɛ.
40012020	Kɛ wvú nu ke emɛse eŋgoy gayi dì ŋgeyte wase kɛ. Ɛ kɛ wvú nu ke ejimse ken'yeese kè bɛɛnci jiwejiwe kɛ. Wvú nu ke ege nonɛn egɛn ebuy no je yi teytey yì wvú sumtene bonsaw jó nu ke eso.
40012021	Ɛ bitum bicii nu ke etaale fwe ɛ bí ɛ gɛɛ bvufee yî ye le.”
40012022	Ɛ bonyii bomew ke nɛ to bô wee mvu ɛ wvú ɛ fefe, nu kencife, ɛ nceendaa dɛwle nu yî ye le. Ɛ Jisos fɛ wvú ɛ wvú no jemyi bvuu yɛne mwɛɛm e.
40012023	Ɛ diuw yum bonyii bò to nu fó bocii, ɛ bó no biite lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wee wvun enu waa Nfon Dawe?”
40012024	Geenɛn ɛ Bofalasii dioo yuw no bó biite nonɛn gay lɛ, “Wee wvun bvuuse bonceendaa bo dɛwle le nɛn ɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ bô mvuŋgay mvu Bɛlsebu wvù nfon bonceendaa bo dɛwle le.”
40012025	Ɛ Jisos kiɛɛ fiɛɛ fì bó kpwawci mum gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ɛ́ ketum nɛ ɛ gawsɛn ɛ no diuu ɛkinɛkin, tu kí nu ke enɛ etu binffuy. Kelaante kɛnɛɛ yew ɛ nɛ ɛ gawsɛn ɛ no diuu ɛyinɛyin, yí saa ke eleem kɛ.
40012026	Nonɛn, ɛ́ Satan bvuuse Satan mvu yî wee le, tu wvú nu ɛ gawsɛn wase ye ye. Ɛ́ fí nu nonɛn, bvunfon bwew saa ke eleem kɛ.
40012027	Ɛ́ ɛ̀ nu lɛ me mbvuuse bonceendaa bo dɛwle le nɛn ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô mvuŋgay mvu Bɛlsebu le, tu bonɛn boom bvuuse bô mvu yɛɛ le? Fiɛɛ fì boom bonɛn bodvu gee nu eduŋcɛ lɛ ben nu ɛ gbwe wase nsaw.
40012028	Geenɛn ɛ́ me mbvuuse bonceendaa bodvu ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô mvuŋgay mvu Keyoy ke Nyo' le, tu bvunfon bvu Nyo' le nu ɛ to wase fô ben e.
40012029	Ben kpwaake lɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wee eley yew dvu ntɛmemvuŋgay, ekuu mwɛɛm mwew ebuy dvú, sɛ wvú ɛ yaw ɛ koo ntɛmemvuŋgay wvudvu ɛ kay e? Seke wvú ɛ kay nonɛn sɛ kuu mwɛɛm mwew kecɛɛy buy dvú.
40012030	Ɛ́ wee baa nu ɛ̂ keba kem e, tu wvú bane me. Wee ɛ́ no nu sɛ wvú fici me keebaanci lo, tu wvú tawse lo.
40012031	Nonɛn, ɛ́ me nsee ɛ̂ ben lɛ Nyo' nulo elɛɛshɛ mwɛɛm mvù befe noo díɛw yì befe yicii yì bonyii jemyi. Geenɛn ɛ́ wee jeme diɛw yì befe ɛkumɛ Keyoy ke Yuule, tu kɛ ɛ̀ nu naa lo ɛ́ Nyo' elɛɛshɛ kɛ.
40012032	Ɛ́ wee jeme diɛw yì befe ɛkumɛ wee wvù diee nu Waawee, tu Nyo' nulo elɛɛshɛ. Geenɛn ɛ́ wee jeme diɛw yì befe ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛkumɛ Keyoy ke Yuule, tu kɛ ɛ̀ nu naa lo ɛ́ Nyo' ke eyuu elɛɛshɛ ɛ́ ɛ̀ cim nu kefew kin e kɛnɛɛ kefew kè too le kɛ.
40012033	Ɛ́ wee kɛŋke kete kè jee, ɛ́ wvú ekɛŋke mvuntam mvù jee mvù yumte yî dvú le. Wee ɛ́ no kɛŋke kete kè befe, ɛ́ wvú ekɛŋke tɛn mvuntam mvù befe mvù yumte yî dvú le. Bó ké kiɛɛ kete ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî mvuntam mvù yumte yî dvú le.
40012034	Ɛŋgokɛ ke yó le kin. Ben nulo ege nɛɛ sɛ no jemyi njeme wvù jee ɛ ben nu bonyii bò befe? Ben ekeè lɛ fiɛɛ fì nu ɛ yiŋsɛn ɛ̂ fitele fi wee le nu fí fì ké no buyte diuw we le.
40012035	Wee dioo nu wee wvù kɛŋke ntfu mwɛɛm mvù jee yî ye le, ɛ wvú no bvuuse mwɛɛm mvù jee. Ɛ́ dioo nu wvù kɛŋke ɛ ɛ̀ nu ntfu mwɛɛm mvù befe, ɛ wvú no bvuuse mwɛɛm mvù befe.
40012036	Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben lɛ ɛ̀ nu ke edioo enu diuu di nsaw wvu fokemɛse le, ɛ́ wee ekɛŋke keetaŋe diuw yî díɛw yi ncɛwncɛw yì wvú ke nu ɛ jeme wase le.
40012037	Ben ekeè lɛ bó nu ke edioo esaake wee, ɛ́ enu díɛw yì buyte diuw we le yì nu ke ege ɛ́ wvú eyuu, ɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ tɛn díɛw yì buyte diuw we le yì nu ke ege ɛ́ wvú eley ŋgɛw e.”
40012038	Ɛ bonyii bomew bò to duŋci bonci bo Nyo' le noo Bofalasii mum nɛ gay ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Wee n'yɛɛyi, bese gomte lɛ wo ege fiɛɛ fì duŋci mvuŋgay mwuw ɛ́ bese eyɛn.”
40012039	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ɛŋgokɛ kè befe kè nu ɛ cinɛ wase Nyo' le ɛ tu diɛwɛ kpwoon nsake le, gomte keeyɛn fiɛɛ fì duŋci mvuŋgay mwem e! Kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me enduŋcɛ fiɛɛ ɛ̂ ɛŋgokɛ kin ɛfey fi wee ntum Nyo' wvù Jona le kɛ.
40012040	No Jona to ceɛ ɛ̂ shem jo bye yi baay ɛdiuw ɛta, nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no wee wvù diee nu Waawee nu ke enu ɛnte jo nshɛ ɛdiuw ɛta.
40012041	Ɛ̀ nu ke edioo nu diuu di nsaw wvu fokemɛse le, ɛ́ bonyii bo Ninivɛ eleem bô ɛŋgokɛ ke keseen kin ege ɛ́ bó elese kí ŋgɛw e, njefo bó, bonyii bo Ninivɛ to nu ɛ yuw fiɛɛ fì Jona to fewci, kumɛn nce wvubo. Geenɛn ben eyekɛ eyuw, wee nu fɛn bô fiɛɛ ɛ fí kuuke fele fi Jona le.
40012042	Yaa wvù to saake ketum kè Shɛba nu ke eleem tɛn diuu di nsaw wvu fokemɛse le bô ɛŋgokɛ ke keseen kin ege ɛ́ bó elese kí ŋgɛw e, njefo wvú to nu ɛ nɛ ketum kew e ɛ̂ kendvuse ke woŋ e keeto eyuw bvufee bvu Nfon Saamun e. Geenɛn ben eyekɛ eyuw, wee mvu nu fɛn bô fiɛɛ ɛ fí kuuke fele fi Saamun e.
40012043	Keyoy kè yiile ké buyte yî wee le mum gɛn ŋkpwaante no gomte fô kí ecee. Geenɛn ke dioo ɛ gom ŋkuuŋ,
40012044	mum jeme ɛ̂ ɛkolɛ kew lɛ, ‘Me nu eŋkase entu ɛ̂ me yew fô me nse mbuyɛɛ.’ Seke kí ɛ kase ɛ to ɛ yɛn ɛ yew nu sɛ fiɛɛ dvú, ɛ bó ɛ yɛse ɛ seyse yí ɛ no yuule,
40012045	nonɛn ɛ kí mum kase gɛn, to bô biyoy bimew bisooshwiy bì befe fele kí, ɛ bô bí mum to ley no cee dvú. Ɛ mwɛɛm mum mɛse fo yî mwɛtɛn e sekedvu fey no mvú se shee nu. Ɛ̀ nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no fí nu ke enu fô ɛŋgokɛ kè befe ke keseen kin e.”
40012046	Kɛ no Jisos to bɛɛ jemyi ɛ̂ bonyii nonɛn, ɛ fí kooy lɛ bwee Jisos bô boom bo bwee Jisos e to nu ɛ to leem ɛkfuŋ no gomte lɛ bô bó ejeme.
40012047	Ɛ wee mvu gay ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Bwoo bô boom bo bwoo le leeme ɛkfuŋ gomte lɛ ben ɛ bó ejeme.”
40012048	Ɛ wvú bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Bwɛɛm nu yɛɛ, ɛ boom bo bwɛɛm e nu baa?”
40012049	No wvú bife nonɛn, mum no lomte bonyii bew bo ŋgoo le, gayte lɛ, “Bwɛɛm bô boom bo bwɛɛm e ban.
40012050	Ben ekeè lɛ wee tfuu wvù gee fiɛɛ fì Icɛm wvu fowe shieele nu ɛ wvú nu waa bwɛɛm bô jɛme yɛm no bwɛɛm.”
40013001	Kɛ ɛbvubwɛ, ɛ Jisos ke nɛ buy yew, gɛn shii mbew mamase le.
40013002	Ɛ kebombom ke bonyii le ke baay tase mbew ye le nɛn ghemm. Ɛ wvú mum nɛ wase ley shii ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ kekoŋ e ɛ̂ joo, ɛ kebombom kedvu no leeme ɛ̂ ŋkpwaante ŋgem joo le.
40013003	Ɛ wvú no jemyi mwɛɛm nteen ɛ̂ bó ɛ̂ boŋgan e. Wvú to nu ɛ gay lɛ, “Wee to nu ɛ laa keegɛn etfume ŋgow.
40013004	Ɛ wvú ke dioo etfumyi, ɛ yimi gbwekɛn ɛ̂ je, ɛ mvunyiim to tacɛ die.
40013005	Ɛ yimi ŋgow gbwekɛn fô bvudvuu bvu ɛta le ɛ nshɛ yaa nu fó ntay kɛ, ke mum yaŋsɛn buy njefo kɛ nshɛ to nu fó ntay kɛ.
40013006	Ɛ mvum ke dioo kɛw ebaa mum suŋ ŋgow yidvu. No yí to baa cime gɛŋ ntay kɛ, ɛ yí mum yowlɛn.
40013007	Ɛ yimi ŋgow gbwekɛn ɛ̂ bisafe le. Ɛ bisafe bidvu ke ku mum baŋ ŋgow yidvu.
40013008	Ɛ yimi ŋgow gbwekɛn ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî nshɛ yì jee le, ke buy, ku yum ntay. Ɛ binyi bimew no nu ɛjisɛ gbwee, bimew mbaŋsoocaan, bimew mbaanshɛ.
40013009	Wee wvù kɛŋke bitem, ɛ wvú yuw.”
40013010	Ɛ boom bo ŋgoo le bo Jisos e nɛ bencɛ gɛn bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu nje la wvù wo jemyi ɛ̂ bonyii ban ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ boŋgan e?”
40013011	Ɛ wvú tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu ben bò Nyo' nu ɛ ge wase lɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ ben ekiɛɛ mwɛɛm mvu bvunfon bvu fowe le mvù nu ɛ̂ kenyilɛ le. Geenɛn wvú baa ge lɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bonyii ban ekiɛɛ kɛ.
40013012	Ben ekeè lɛ wee wvù kɛŋke fiɛɛ nu ɛ bó nu ke ebise ɛ́ wvú ekɛŋke ɛ fí duule. Ɛ wee wvù yaa kɛŋke kɛ fiɛɛ nu ɛ naa fi caan fì wvú kɛŋke nu ɛ bó nu ke efi lo ɛ̂ wvú.
40013013	Ɛ̀ nɛɛ fiɛɛ fì me njemyi ɛ̂ bó ɛ̂ boŋgan e, njefo bó taale mwɛɛm yaa yɛne kɛ. Bó yeke mwɛɛm, yaa yuuke kɛnɛɛ kee mvú kɛ.
40013014	Fiɛɛ fì wee ntum Nyo' wvù Yɛsaya to jemyɛɛ nu ɛ loocɛ naa ɛ kocɛn bô fiɛɛ fì bonyii ban gee. Wvú to nu ɛ gay lɛ, ‘Ben nu ke eyeke naa mwɛɛm, geenɛn yaa yuuke kɛ. Ben nu ke etaale naa mwɛɛm, geenɛn yaa yɛne kɛ.
40013015	Ɛ ɛ̀ ge njefo mvuntelem mvu bonyii ban e nu ɛ lɛ wase, ɛ bitem bibole nu ɛ bí ɛ cin wase, ɛ bó ɛ kfukɛ wase ɛjisɛ ɛbo. Ɛ bó ge nonɛn wvu lɛ fo bó eyɛnè mwɛɛm e bô ɛjisɛ ɛbo, yuuke mwɛɛm bô bitem bibole, ɛ́ mvuntelem mvubole eyvuwsee, ɛ́ bó emum ekase etu jim fô me le, ɛ́ me enfɛ bó.’
40013016	Geenɛn, njoŋ wvu baay nu wene njefo ɛjisɛ ɛyene nu yò yɛne mwɛɛm e, ɛ bitem binɛn nu bì yuuke mwɛɛm.
40013017	Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy lɛ, bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le nteen bô bonyii bo teytey bomew to shee beele keeyɛn mwɛɛm mvù ben yɛne le, ke faŋɛ yaa eyɛn kɛ. No beele tɛn keeyuw mwɛɛm mvù ben yuuke, ke faŋɛ yaa eyuw kɛ.
40013018	Ben eyuw lɛ fiɛɛ fì ŋgan wɛ wvu ɛkumɛ wee wvù to tfumyi ŋgow duŋci.
40013019	Wee ké yuuke fiɛɛ fi ɛkumɛ bvunfon bvu fowe sɛ wvú ɛ kiɛɛ kenyi kedvu, ɛ Satan wvù wee kebefɛ mum to cun diɛw yì bó jewe fô fitele fiew e bvuse. Fifin nu ŋgow yì bó to dioo tfumyi ɛ yí gbwekɛn ɛ̂ je.
40013020	Ɛ ŋgow yì bó to tfumyi ɛ yí gbwekɛn fô bvudvuu bvu ɛta le nu wee wvù yuuke diɛw Nyo' mum fiisɛn lo kaŋ mwaaŋ bô njoŋ.
40013021	Geenɛn, ɛ yí baa cime gɛŋ yî ye le kɛ. Ɛ yí moocɛ kɛ caan. Ɛ́ ŋgɛw ke dioo ɛ kɛw kɛnɛɛ bó bone ɛ ɛ̀ nu bikaa ɛ̂ wvú ɛjim nje diɛw yidvu, ɛ wvú mum tfuw bikaa kaŋ mwaaŋ.
40013022	Ɛ ŋgow yì bó to tfumyi ɛ yí gbwekɛn ɛ̂ bisafe le, nu wee wvù yuuke diɛw Nyo', ɛ ken'yaŋyaŋ ke ɛkumɛ mwɛɛm mvu yî woŋ wvun e, noo shiee bvukukɛ mum tase baŋ diɛw yidvu ɛ yí laayɛ lo ɛcici.
40013023	Ɛ ŋgow yì bó to tfumyɛɛ yî nshɛ yì jee le mum nu wee wvù yuuke diɛw yidvu, yuw naa ntay no gee no yí gomte diɛwɛ ŋgow yì yum yimi ɛ nya ɛjisɛ gbwee, yimi ɛjisɛ mbaŋsoocaan, yimi mbaanshɛ le.”
40013024	Ɛ Jisos bvuu ma ŋgan mvu ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Bvunfon bvu fowe nu ɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó efewsɛn bô wee mvu wvù to gɛnɛɛ tfume ŋgow yì jee yì ɛ̀ nu ɛgiŋ ɛ̂ wvú wɛne.
40013025	Ɛ bonyii ke dioo eleete wase, ɛ wee we bvuban gɛn tfume ŋgow ɛgay yò fieesene ɛgiŋ ɛnte dvudvu mum nɛnɛ.
40013026	Ɛ ɛgiŋ yodvu ke dioo eku wase ekɛw etfumyi, ɛ ŋgow ɛgay yɛ mum yenɛ tɛn.
40013027	Ɛ bonyii bo lemme le bo wee wɛɛ wvudvu le to bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, ‘Cee ɛkolɛ, wo to dioo tfume ŋgow wɛne ɛ ɛ̀ nu yi ɛgiŋ, yi ɛgay yin ɛ ghan nɛɛ le ɛ sɛ no nu ɛnte dvudvu?’
40013028	Ɛ wvú tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, ‘Ɛ̀ ge kɛ wee wɛm bvuban fifiɛ fiɛɛ.’ Ɛ bonyii bo lemme le bodvu bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, ‘Wo gomte lɛ bese egɛn edvun'yɛ?’
40013029	Ɛ cee ɛkolɛ wvubo tun gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, ‘Ɛ̀ nɛlo ɛ́ ben dioo dvun'yi enɛ ebaale tɛn ɛgiŋ ɛnte dvudvu.
40013030	Ben ecinɛ ɛ́ mvú ekuu mvunciim egɛn ebuy kefew ke ŋgbwele le. Ɛ́ ke dioo enu kefew ke ŋgbwele le, ɛ́ me eŋgay ɛ̂ bonyii bo ŋgbwele le lɛ bó eyaw edvun'yɛ ɛgay yodvu ebaancɛ eyilɛ egɛɛ bijiw e bijiw e, ɛ́ bó ke eton, emum ebaancɛ ɛgiŋ egɛɛ ɛ̂ ŋwaw wɛm e.’”
40013031	Ɛ Jisos bvuu ma wvumvu ŋgan ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Bvunfon bvu fowe nu diɛwɛ jise di ŋgow fintam fimew e, fì wee to joɛ tfume ɛ̂ wvú wɛne.
40013032	Ŋgow yin nu ɛ yí ŋoynene baay fele ŋgów mi yicii. Geenɛn, seke yí ɛ buy, ɛ yí ku kuw fey teŋ mwɛɛm mvunciim, mum nɛ tu wase kete wvu lɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ mvunyiim mvù bile we eyoote yî tíɛw yidvu le.”
40013033	Ɛ wvú bvuu ma wvumvu ŋgan ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Bvunfon bvu fowe nu diɛwɛ fintuŋlɛɛn fì kpwoon to fewɛɛ mvuum bintee bi baay baay bitɛte, jo fiysɛn dvú, tow gɛɛ, ɛ fí mum ge ɛ mvuum modvu ben.”
40013034	Jisos to jemyi mwɛɛm mvun mvunciim ɛ̂ kebombom ke bonyii le ɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ ɛ̂ boŋgan e. Kecɛɛy, kɛ wvú to ké jeme fiɛɛ ɛ̂ bó sɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ ŋgan e kɛ.
40013035	Wvú to gee nonɛn keege ɛ́ fí ekocɛn no wee ntum Nyo' mvu to jemyɛɛ wase lɛ, “Me nu ŋke endioo eŋawse diuw wɛm ɛ́ ebuyte kɛ boŋgan. Me nu ŋke embwaashɛ mwɛɛm mvù to nu ɛ̂ kenyilɛ le ɛ kɛw no bó to bomɛɛ woŋ.”
40013036	Ɛ Jisos ke nɛ cinɛ kebombom ke bonyii le ley gɛn yew. Ɛ boom bew bo ŋgoo le bi wvú le bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Kɛ yuuse ɛ̂ bese fiɛɛ fì ŋgan wvu ɛkumɛ ɛgay yo wɛne ɛya duŋci.”
40013037	Ɛ wvú mum gay lɛ, “Wee wvù tfumyi ŋgow yì jee nu wee wvù diee nu Waawee.
40013038	Ɛ wɛɛ nu woŋ wvun. Ɛ ŋgow yì jee duŋci boom bò ɛ̀ nu bo bvunfon bvu Nyo' le. Ɛ ɛgay nu boom bò ɛ̀ nu bo wee kebefɛ wɛ le.
40013039	Ɛ wee bvuban wvù to tfumyɛɛ ŋgow yidvu nu dɛwle. Kefew ke ŋgbwele le nu kefew kè woŋ wvun nu ke eka. Ɛ bonyii bo ŋgbwele le nu bonceendaa bo Nyo' le.
40013040	Kɛ no bó ké baayi ɛgay baancɛ ton bô ŋguy, nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no fí nu ke enu kefew kè woŋ kaa wase le.
40013041	Wee wvù diee nu Waawee nu ke eciinse bonceendaa bew, ɛ́ bó eghan ebaancɛ mwɛɛm mvunciim mvù too bô kebefɛ noo bonyii bò gee bibefɛ bocii ebvuse ɛ̂ bvunfon bwew e,
40013042	elaŋ ɛ̂ kembvuwlɛn ke ŋguy e. Ɛ̀ nu fó fò bonyii nu ke ebeele ŋgeci bigew.
40013043	Nonɛn ɛ́ bonyii bo teytey ebaa diɛwɛ diuu le ɛ̂ bvunfon bvu Icee bó le. Wee wvù kɛŋke bitem ɛ wvú yuw.
40013044	Bvunfon bvu fowe nu diɛwɛ ntfu mvu wvù wee to joɛ gɛn nyilɛ wɛne le. Ɛ wee mvu ke to yɛn mum kase baŋyɛ, no kfuuyi ɛ njoŋ yuu lo wvú. Ɛ wvú mum gɛn gese mwɛɛm mvunciim mvù wvú to kɛŋke, gɛn guy wɛɛ wvudvu.
40013045	Ɛ bvunfon bvu fowe bvuu nu kɛ diɛwɛ wee way mvu wvù to ghane gomte ɛjisɛ ɛ baŋ yò jee nɛn ntay.
40013046	Ɛ wvú ke dioo egomte, gɛn yɛn dimew e ɛ ɛ̀ nu naa dì lumte. Ɛ wvú mum gɛn gese mwɛɛm mvunciim mvù wvú to kɛŋke gɛn guy jise di baŋe le didvu.
40013047	Bvunfon bvu fowe bvuu nu kɛ diɛwɛ kensaŋ e kè bó to tfumyɛɛ ɛ̂ joo, ɛ dikfuu di byé le dicii tase jó,
40013048	ɛ kí yiŋsɛn. Ɛ bonyii mum gufe bvuse ɛ̂ ŋkpwaante, shii fokuse, caw byé yì jee gɛɛ ɛ̂ ŋkáa le, laŋ yì befe.
40013049	Ɛ̀ nu kɛ no fí nu ke enu kefew kè woŋ kaa le. Bonceendaa bo Nyo' le nu ke ebuy eto egawsɛn bonyii bò befe fô bo teytey e,
40013050	emum elaŋ bò befe ɛ̂ kembvuwlɛn ke ŋguy e, fô bonyii nu ke ebeele ŋgeci bigew.”
40013051	Ɛ Jisos mum bife ɛ̂ boom bew bo ŋgoo le lɛ, “Ben nu ɛ yuw mwɛɛm mvun mvunciim ntay e?” Ɛ bó bee lɛ, “'Ɛɛ.”
40013052	Ɛ wvú mum gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Fí ɛ mum ɛ no nu lɛ, wee tfuu wvù duŋci bonci bo Nyo' le wvù bó nu ɛ yɛɛyi wase wvú ɛkumɛ bvunfon bvu fowe nu diɛwɛ cee yew wvù kɛŋke ntfu, ɛ wvú nulo ebvuse mwɛɛm mvu mvunfɛm kɛnɛɛ mvu mvuyvuum jó.”
40013053	Ɛ Jisos ke mɛse ma boŋgan ban, mum nɛ jó,
40013054	gɛn ntɛw we le, gɛn ley no yɛɛyi bonyii yew yibo yi bunle le. Ɛ bó yuw n'yɛɛyi we no kɛŋke lo ŋghaw, mum kɛw no ghayte lɛ, “Wee wvun jo fɛɛ bvun bvufee bvu baay bô mvuŋgay mvù wvú gee biŋghaw bi mwɛɛm e dvú nɛn?
40013055	Ɛ̀ nu kɛ waa cee la wvun wvù kane bite? Kɛ bwee nu Maalia le? Kɛ boom bo bwee le nu Jɛm bô Yosɛw noo Semon noo Judas e?
40013056	Kɛ jɛ́me ye yicii nu beene ɛ bó fɛn e? Wee wvun ɛ ja fɛɛ bô mwɛɛm mvun mvunciim nɛn?”
40013057	No bó ghay nonɛn mum ma lo wvú. Nonɛn ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Bó ké no wvumte wee ntum Nyo' mondvuum e monciim, ɛfuw kɛ woŋ we le noo ɛ̂ kfuu diew e.”
40013058	Ɛ Jisos faŋɛ yaa ebvuu ege biŋghaw bi mwɛɛm e jó nteen kɛ, njefo bó to baa elese fitele yî ye le kɛ.
40014001	Ɛ̀ to nu kefew kedvu le, ɛ Nfon 'Ɛlod wvù to saake keba ke woŋ e kè Galilee yuw ɛkumɛ lemme di Jisos e.
40014002	Ɛ wvú gay ɛ̂ bocee woŋ bew lɛ, “Wee wvun nu Jon Nleseɛjoo ɛ wvú ɛ kase ɛ buy yî kpwe le. Ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì ge wvú ɛ sɛ no kɛŋke mvuŋgay keegee biŋghaw bi mwɛɛm e bin nɛn.”
40014003	Fí nu ɛ 'Ɛlod to gay ɛ bó koo Jon, kay, fen yew ncaw e nje 'Ɛlodia wvù kpwɛɛ Filew wvù waa bwee 'Ɛlod, ɛ 'Ɛlod to jo kpwɛse le.
40014004	Ɛ Jon no tune gayte lɛ nci baa bee lɛ wvú ejo wvú kpwɛse le kɛ.
40014005	Ɛ 'Ɛlod mum no gomte lɛ wen eyu Jon, geenɛn no fane bonyii, njefo bonyii to kɛŋke Jon diɛwɛ wee ntum Nyo' le.
40014006	Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu diuu dì Nfon 'Ɛlod to gee ŋkaw keekume diuu dì bó to bokɛɛ wvú, ɛ waa 'Ɛlodia wvù kpwoon ley cɛŋ bine fwe dvu bonyii bò to nu fô ŋkaw wvudvu le, ɛ 'Ɛlod yɛn ɛ ye yvuwsɛ wvú.
40014007	Ɛ wvú mum kaw wan wvudvu, die kelew lɛ wen nu efene wvú ɛ ɛ̀ cim nu naa bô la fì wvú ɛ bife lɛ wen efene wvú dvú.
40014008	Ɛ bwee wan mum bɛyse wan lɛ wvú egay lɛ wvú enya ɛkolɛ ke Jon Nleseɛjoo le ɛ̂ juy e ɛ̂ wvú.
40014009	Ɛ wvú gay, ɛ Nfon 'Ɛlod yuw nonɛn ɛ ye keeshɛ lo wvú. Geenɛn nje kelew kè wvú to dieɛ wase fwe dvu bonyii bò to nu fô ŋkaw e, ɛ wvú mum gay lɛ bó ege no wan gay.
40014010	Ɛ wvú mum tum bonyii ɛ bó gɛn yew ncaw e bvuse ɛkolɛ ke Jon e,
40014011	to dvú ɛ̂ juy e nya ɛ̂ wan kpwoon wvudvu, ɛ wvú mum gɛn dvú nya ɛ̂ bwee.
40014012	Ɛ boom bo Jon e bo ŋgoo le ke gɛn jo gvune di Jon e dwey, gɛn see saaka wvudvu ɛ̂ Jisos.
40014013	Ɛ Jisos ke dioo yuw fiɛɛ fì kooy bô Jon, mum ley ɛ̂ kekoŋ e lɛwse ye gɛn fô bonyii yaa nu kɛ. Geenɛn ɛ bibombom bi bonyii le yuw, mum buy ɛ̂ bilaante le lɛn bô bikaa bi wvú le.
40014014	Ɛ wvú ke buy ɛ̂ kekoŋ e dioo fɛɛse ɛ̂ ŋkpwaante, yɛn kebombom ke bonyii le nɛn ghemm. Ɛ shen koo wvú bô bó, ɛ wvú mum no fɛle bonyii bò to cɛmkene.
40014015	Ɛ ɛ̀ ke dioo nu ɛkiɛguu, ɛ boom bew bo ŋgoo le bencɛ gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Fɛn nu ŋkpwaante, ɛ diuu ɛ gɛn wase, gayɛ lɛ bonyii ban egɛn bontɛw e eguy mwɛɛm mvubole mvudien.”
40014016	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Kɛ shiee nu dvú wvù bó enɛnɛ kɛ. Ɛ̀ nu enya ben fiɛɛ ɛ́ bó edie.”
40014017	Ɛ bó tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Bese kɛŋke kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu bontuw bo blɛɛd e botin bô byé yifiɛɛ maaŋ.”
40014018	Ɛ wvú gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben eto dvú enya ɛ̂ me.”
40014019	Ɛ bó to dvú, ɛ wvú fi, mum gay lɛ kebombom ke bonyii le kedvu eshii fokuse yî ɛgay e. Ɛ wvú jo bontuw bo blɛɛd e bo botin ba bô byé yi yifiɛɛ yɛ, taa we, nya keyoone ɛ̂ Nyo', mum guushɛ bontuw bodvu nya ɛ̂ boom bew bo ŋgoo le, ɛ bó mum gawcɛ ɛ̂ kebombom kedvu.
40014020	Ɛ bonyii bocii die ffuu. Ɛ boom bo Jisos e bo ŋgoo le baancɛ bimbɛke bì to shɛɛtɛɛ ɛ bí yiŋsɛn ŋkáa yuufe ncow fiɛɛ.
40014021	Bonyii bò to dieɛ mwɛɛm mvudien mvudvu to nu bolemsɛ diɛwɛ bontfuke botin e, ɛ sɛ jo bokɛnɛ bô boom.
40014022	Ɛ Jisos mum gay ɛ̂ boom bew bo ŋgoo le lɛ bó eley ɛ̂ kekoŋ e esaa fwe kewvu keki ɛ́ wen eshɛɛ egay kebombom ke bonyii le ɛ́ kí ekfuuyi.
40014023	Ɛ wvú ke shɛɛ gay bó le, mum nɛ ben yî kum e wvú ɛmbeŋ keegɛn ebunle. Ɛ ɛkfuŋ ke jiim ɛ wvú nu kɛ fó wvú ɛmbeŋ.
40014024	Geenɛn ɛ̀ to nu kefew kedvu le, ɛ kekoŋ nu wase ɛ̂ joo ncejole, ɛ joo kale kí, njefo fwefwe to too je fwe cile kí.
40014025	Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu wase ɛn'yulem, ɛ Jisos nɛ no too fô bó le lɛne yî joo le.
40014026	Ɛ boom bew bo ŋgoo le dioo yɛn no wvú lɛne yî joo le, ɛ kedvum gbwo bó. Ɛ bó no gayte lɛ “Ɛ̀ nu ŋkfusay.” Ɛ bó mum no wamte foweɛwe bô nfan.
40014027	Kaŋ mwaaŋ ɛ Jisos mum jeme ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben ejicɛ mvuntelem mvunɛn e, ɛ̀ nu me. Fo ben efanè kɛ.”
40014028	Ɛ Bita gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Tata ɛ́ ɛ̀ fɛn nu wo, ɛ́ wo gay ɛ me nlɛn tɛn yî joo le nto fô wo le.”
40014029	Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ̀ toò lɛ.” Nonɛn ɛ Bita mum buy ɛ̂ kekoŋ e no lɛne yî joo le gɛne fô Jisos e.
40014030	No wvú to lɛne gɛne, dioo yɛn no fwefwe gee, ɛ wvú mum no fane, mum kɛw no shiile ɛ̂ joo. No wvú shiile mum bee lɛ, “Tata fi me!”
40014031	Kaŋ mwaaŋ ɛ Jisos laŋ kebo jicɛ wvú le gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “O oo, mbee wo doose baay! Wo be kɛŋke kemaŋɛn nje la?”
40014032	Ɛ bô wvú mum ben ley ɛ̂ kekoŋ e, ɛ fwefwe wvudvu mum lu.
40014033	Ɛ boom bew bo ŋgoo le bò to nu ɛ̂ kekoŋ e mum nya n'wvum ɛ̂ wvú gay lɛ, “Kecɛɛy, wo nu Waa Nyo'.”
40014034	Ɛ bó ke lente mamase buy keba kè Gɛnɛsalɛt e.
40014035	Ɛ bonyii bo jó yɛn wvú le kiɛɛ wvú, mum ciinse ntum ɛ̂ keba kedvu le kecii, ɛ bonyii no too bô bonyii bo bincɛm e bocii fô Jisos e,
40014036	lɛke lɛ wvú ecinɛ ɛ́ bó ekum kɛ naa ɛ ɛ̀ nu ŋgem ndvu ye le. Ɛ wee tfuu wvù to kumte, mum no bonene.
40015001	Ɛ Bofalasii bô bonyii bomew bò to duŋci bonci bo Nyo' le ke mum nɛ Jɛlusalɛm to fô Jisos e bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ,
40015002	“Ɛ̀ nu nje la wvù boom buw bo ŋgoo le beete bô nce woŋ bo'icee bosɛɛbeene bo fwele? Kɛ bó cuke can ɛ̂ je yì nci gomte le sɛ diekene kɛ.”
40015003	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu nje la wvù ben beete finɛn bô bonci bo Nyo' le bii ɛ ɛ̀ nu nce wene woŋ e?
40015004	Me njemyi nɛn, njefo Nyo' to nu ɛ gay lɛ, ‘Wvumɛ ico bô bwoo.’ Bvuu gay tɛn lɛ, ‘Ɛ́ wee nan lo ice kɛnɛɛ bwee, ɛ́ bó yu lo mwɛtɛn.’
40015005	Geenɛn, ben ɛ no gayte finɛn lɛ, ‘Ɛ́ wee nɛ ɛ gay ɛ̂ ice kɛnɛɛ bwee lɛ, “Fiɛɛ fì wo bee keekɛŋkɛ can yɛm e nu ɛ me ɛ nya wase ɛ̂ Nyo',” tu kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wvú ebvuu ejo fiɛɛ fidvu efi ice kɛnɛɛ bwee dvú kɛ.’
40015006	Ɛ̀ nɛɛ no ben bii nce wene woŋ e nɛn mum gee ɛ diɛw Nyo' tuu fiɛɛ fi ɛcici.
40015007	Bonyii bò jemyi jɛɛy gee jɛɛy ban! Fiɛɛ fì wee ntum Nyo' wvù Yɛsaya to jemyɛɛ ɛkumɛ ben nu naa lo kecɛɛy, no wvú to gayɛɛ lɛ,
40015008	‘Bonyii ban wvumte me kɛ fomvu fomvu, ɛ mvuntelem mvubole nu ncejole fô me le.
40015009	Bó bunlee me ɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ ɛcici, njefo bó joo mwɛɛm mvù ɛ̀ kpwawci bonyii yɛɛyi lɛ ɛ̀ nu diɛw yɛm.’”
40015010	Ɛ Jisos ke nɛ tee kebombom ke bonyii le ɛ kí to. Ɛ wvú gay ɛ̂ kí lɛ, “Ben eyekɛ eyuw, ekiɛɛ ntay.
40015011	Kɛ fiɛɛ fì leyte ɛ̂ wee ɛmvu nulo ebefe bô wvú kɛ. Ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì buyte lo ɛ̂ wee ɛmvu fì nulo ebefe bô wvú.”
40015012	Ɛ boom bo Jisos e bo ŋgoo le ke nɛ to gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wo kee kɛ lɛ Bofalasii be ɛ yuw fiɛɛ fì wo be jeme fiɛ fí ɛ gbwe bó?”
40015013	Ɛ wvú tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Kete kecii kè ɛ̀ nu sɛ ɛ̀ yele Icɛm wvù nu fowe nu ɛ bó nu ke ebaa.
40015014	Ben edaayɛ ɛ̂ bó le, ɛ̀ nu binfefe bì duŋci je ɛ̂ bonyii. Ɛ́ kenfefe duŋci je ɛ̂ kemew, ɛ́ bó bocii ke egɛn egbwekɛn ɛ̂ kentuke le.”
40015015	Ɛ Bita gay ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Kɛ yuuse ɛ̂ bese fiɛɛ fì ŋgan wɛ jemyi.”
40015016	Ɛ Jisos bife lɛ, “Kɛ ben tɛn kee mwɛɛm e?
40015017	Kɛ ben kee lɛ fiɛɛ ficii fì leyte ɛ̂ wee ɛmvu booke ɛ̂ shem ké ghan buy lo le?
40015018	Geenɛn, ɛ fiɛɛ fì buyte diuw wee le nɛn'yi ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô fitele le. Ɛ ɛ̀ nu fifiɛ fì beete bô wee.
40015019	Fí ké nɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô fitele le, ɛ wee sɛ no kɛŋke ŋkpwawcɛ wvù befe, mum yu wee, jo kpwɛɛ wee kɛnɛɛ dwee wee, jaŋ kenjaŋ, coŋ bvucoŋ, ben jim nsaw mbiay kɛnɛɛ befe bô diee di wee le.
40015020	Mvun nu mwɛɛm mvù nulo ebefe bô wee. Kɛ keediekɛn bô can sɛ bó ɛ cukɛ nulo ebefe bô wee kɛ.”
40015021	Ɛ Jisos ke nɛ fó lɛwse ye gɛn keba ke Taya bô Sidon e.
40015022	Ɛ fí kooy lɛ kpwoon mvu wvu Kaanan wvù to nu jó to nu ɛ nɛ to yɛn Jisos e, bee fô wvú le lɛ, “O Tata, waa Nfon Dawe, camɛ kɛ shen fô me le. Waa wɛm wvù kpwoon nu ɛ nceendaa dɛwle mvu njiŋsene naa lo bô wvú baay.”
40015023	Geenɛn ɛ Jisos yuw faŋɛ yaa ghay lo kɛ. Ɛ boom bew bo ŋgoo le bencɛ to lɛkɛ wvú gay lɛ, “Gayɛ kɛ ɛ̂ kpwoon wvun lɛ wvú egɛnè. Wvú bii nyaa njɛɛse ɛ̂ beene.”
40015024	Ɛ Jisos tfuse lɛ, “Bó to tum me ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô bonyii bo Islael e maaŋ bò nu diɛwɛ njée yì nu ɛ nɛ wase ɛ no bvuyte lo le.”
40015025	Geenɛn ɛ kpwoon wvudvu to kɛ tum ɛnvuw ɛ̂ Jisos ɛjise gay lɛ, “Tata, fi kɛ me.”
40015026	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Kɛ fí nu lɛŋ keejo ŋgu boom elaŋ fô bwé le kɛ.”
40015027	Ɛ kpwoon wvudvu gay lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu kecɛɛy icɛm. Geenɛn naa bwé ké no boŋyi kɛ tfúw yì icee bó dioo diekene ɛ yí no gbwekene.”
40015028	Ɛ Jisos mum tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “O kpwoon wvun, mbee wo tɛmyi lo. Fí ekooy fô wo le no wo shieele.” Kɛ nonɛn ɛ waa we mum bonɛn lo.
40015029	Ɛ Jisos ke nɛ fó no gɛne, gɛn fey mbew Mamase yì Galilee le, ben gɛn yî kum e, shii fó.
40015030	Ɛ kebombom ke bonyii le ke baay to fô wvú le nɛn ghemm. Ɛ bomew to too bô bonyii bò nu bontɛŋɛ, noo bò kɛŋke bonfiaw ye le, noo bò nu binfefe, noo bò nu bincife, noo bomew bo bincɛm e nteen. No bó too bô bó, no jiwse ɛ̂ wvú ɛjise ɛ wvú fɛle bó.
40015031	Ɛ kebombom kedvu no kɛŋke lo ŋghaw no bó to yɛne ɛ bincife jemyi, ɛ bonyii bò kɛŋke bonfiaw ye le bonene, ɛ bontɛŋɛ lɛne tɛn teytey, ɛ binfefe yɛne mwɛɛm e. Ɛ bó tum moŋkum mo Nyo' bonyii bo Islael e.
40015032	Ɛ Jisos mum tee boom bew bo ŋgoo le gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Me ŋkɛŋke shen fô kebombom kin e, njefo bó nu wase bee bó ɛdiuw ɛta, ɛ fiɛɛ fì bó edie yaa bvuu nu kɛ. Ɛ kɛ me ŋgomte lɛ me encinɛ bó le ɛ́ bó egɛne jeŋ kɛ, njefo ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó egɛn egbwe jeŋ ɛ̂ je.”
40015033	Ɛ boom bew bo ŋgoo le gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ beene ejo fɛɛ mwɛɛm mvudien ŋkpwaante jan mvù ekpwɛntɛn keenyaŋe kfuu kin kebombom ke bonyii le dvú?”
40015034	Ɛ Jisos bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben kɛŋke bontuw bo blɛɛd e bomɛɛ?” Ɛ bó tfuse lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu bosooshwiy bô mvubyetɛlɛ nɛn caan.”
40015035	Ɛ Jisos mum gay lɛ kebombom ke bonyii le kedvu eshii fokuse.
40015036	Ɛ bó shii, ɛ wvú jo bontuw bo blɛɛd e bo bosooshwiy ba noo byé yidvu, nya keyoone ɛ̂ Nyo', mum guushɛ nya ɛ̂ boom bew bo ŋgoo le, ɛ bó mum gawcɛ ɛ̂ bonyii bodvu.
40015037	Ɛ wee tfuu die, ffuu. Ɛ bó baancɛ bimbɛke bì to shɛɛtɛɛ, ɛ bí yiŋsɛn ŋkáa yisooshwiy.
40015038	Bonyii bò to dieɛ to nu bolemsɛ bontfuke bonɛw, ɛ sɛ jo bokɛnɛ noo boom.
40015039	Ɛ wvú mum cinɛ kebombom kedvu le ɛ kí no kfuuyi. Ɛ wvú ley ɛ̂ kekoŋ e gɛn ɛ̂ keba kè Magadan e.
40016001	Ɛ Bofalasii bô Bosadusii ke nɛ to fô Jisos e keemom wvú, mum gay lɛ wvú ege fiɛɛ fì duŋci mvuŋgay mvù nɛ fowe.
40016002	Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ɛ̀ ke dioo nu seke diuu seeyi ɛ ɛbulɛ yɛɛle, ɛ ben no gayte lɛ, ‘Ɛkfuŋ nu ebuy ejoŋ,’ njefo ben nu ɛ yɛn ɛ ɛbulɛ yɛɛle.
40016003	Ɛ́ ke dioo nu seke diuu sane ɛ ɛbulɛ yɛɛle ɛ kembɛw ɛ suu, ɛ ben no gayte lɛ, ‘Nffum nu ke efey ɛbɛn,’ njefo ben nu ɛ yɛn ɛ ɛbulɛ yɛɛle ɛ kembɛw ɛ suu. Ben kee keetaa ɛbulɛ mum kiɛɛ no ɛkfuŋ nu enu, geenɛn yaa kee kɛ bonciise bò mwɛɛm mvù kooyi yî kefew kin e duŋci nje la?
40016004	Ɛŋgokɛ kè befe kè nu ɛ cinɛ wase Nyo' le ɛ no nu diɛwɛ kpwoon nsake le kin, gomte fiɛɛ fì duŋci mvuŋgay mvù nɛ fowe. Kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me enduŋcɛ fiɛɛ ɛ̂ kí ɛfey fi wee ntum Nyo' wvù Jona le kɛ.” No wvú gay nonɛn mum cinɛ bó le nɛ no gɛne.
40016005	Ɛ boom bo Jisos e bo ŋgoo le ke dioo fɛse kewvu keki yɛn lɛ bó be ɛ daayɛ keejo blɛɛd.
40016006	Ɛ Jisos ke nɛ gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben eyɛnè, bvuu joo kefew yî fintuŋlɛɛn fi Bofalasii noo fi Bosadusii le.”
40016007	Ɛ boom bew bo ŋgoo le mum kɛw no jemyi ɛbonɛbon ɛkumɛ fiɛɛ fidvu, gayte lɛ, “Wvú jemyi fintuŋlɛɛn fin nɛn njefo beene baa to bô blɛɛd kɛ.”
40016008	Ɛ Jisos kiɛɛ fiɛɛ fì bó jemyi ɛkumɛ fí mum gay lɛ, “O oo bonyii bo mbee wvù doose le ban! Ben jemyi ɛbenɛben ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛkumɛ blɛɛd wvù ben baa kɛŋke kɛ nje la?
40016009	Ben baa yɛne wase mwɛɛm e le? Kɛ ben kumyi bontuw bo blɛɛd e bo botin bò bonyii se dieɛ bontfuke botin e? Bimbɛke bì ben se baancɛ se nu ŋkáa yimiɛɛ?
40016010	Ɛ kɛ ben bvuu kumyi tɛn bontuw bo blɛɛd e bo bosooshwiy bò bonyii be die bontfuke bonɛw e? Ben be baanci bimbɛke bí ɛ buy ŋkáa yimiɛɛ?
40016011	Ɛ̀ ge la wvù ben baa kiɛɛ lɛ kɛ me njemyi ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛkumɛ blɛɛd kɛ? Me mbvuu ŋgayte kɛ lɛ ben ejoò kefew ɛkumɛ fintuŋlɛɛn fi Bofalasii bô Bosadusii le.”
40016012	No wvú jeme nonɛn ɛ bó mum kiɛɛ lɛ kɛ wvú jemyi lɛ bó ejoo kefew ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛkumɛ fintuŋlɛɛn fì bó towte ɛ̂ blɛɛd e kɛ, lɛ wvú jemyi ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛkumɛ n'yɛɛyi wvu Bofalasii bô Bosadusii.
40016013	Ɛ Jisos ke gɛn buy ɛ̂ keba ke woŋ e kè Kaysalia Filibi le, ke nɛ bife ɛ̂ boom bew bo ŋgoo le lɛ, “Bonyii duu lɛ wee wvù diee nu Waawee nu yɛɛ?”
40016014	Ɛ bó tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Bonyii bomew duu lɛ wo nu Jon Nleseɛjoo, bomew lɛ Ɛlayja, ɛ bomew duu lɛ wo nu Yɛlimia kɛnɛɛ wee ntum Nyo' wvumvu.”
40016015	Ɛ wvú bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben duu finɛn lɛ me nu yɛɛ?”
40016016	Ɛ Semon Bita tfuse lɛ, “Wo nu Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ wvù Waa Nyo', Nyo' wvù kɛŋke nshii.”
