40016017	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Semon waa Jona, Nyo' nu ɛ buw wo, njefo kɛ fin nu ɛ ɛ̀ seŋe wee wvu wum ɛ̂ wo kɛ, ɛ̀ seŋe Icɛm wvù nu fowe ɛ̂ wo.
40016018	Me ɛ no ŋgayte ɛ̂ wo lɛ wo nu Bita, ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî kembaan kin e wvù me nu ŋke en'yoo kentaashɛ kem ke bonyii bo mbee le. Ɛ kɛ mvuŋgay mvu kpwe le nu ke eyuu eghaw kentaashɛ kedvu kɛ.
40016019	Me nu ŋke enya ken'yene ke bvunfon bvu fowe le ɛ̂ wo. Fiɛɛ fì wo ɛ ke ɛ suu fokuse fɛn, tu bó nu ɛ suu wase fowe. Fiɛɛ fì wo ɛ ke ɛ fay fokuse fɛn, tu bó nu ɛ fay wase fowe.”
40016020	No Jisos gayɛɛ nonɛn, mum loocɛ ciise lo ɛ̂ boom bew bo ŋgoo le lɛ bó eyɛne fo bó ke emom esee ɛ̂ wee lɛ wen nu Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ kɛ.
40016021	Ɛ kɛw yî kefew kekiɛ le, ɛ Jisos mum kɛw no duŋci ɛ̂ boom bew bo ŋgoo le lɛ wen kɛŋke kɛ keegɛn Jɛlusalɛm. Ɛ wen nu egɛn eyɛn boŋgɛw nteen can bonyii bò saake woŋ e bô bocee ncese bo baay baay noo bonyii bò duŋci bonci bo Nyo' le. Bó nu ke eyu wen, ɛ́ ɛdiuw ebuy ɛta ɛ́ wen ekase ebuy yî kpwe le.
40016022	Ɛ Bita mum jo wvú ɛ bô wvú lɛwse ye. Ɛ wvú mum kɛw no saake wvú yî fiɛɛ fidvu le, gayte lɛ, “Tata, Nyo' elɛwseè. Kɛ fin fiɛɛ nu ke eyuu ekooy bô wo kɛ.”
40016023	Ɛ Jisos baŋke ye gay ɛ̂ Bita lɛ, “Ja ɛ̂ me ɛjim Satan! Wo jewsee lo me njefo kɛ wo leeme ɛ̂ keba ke Nyo' le kɛ. Wo leeme ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ ke wee wvu wum e.”
40016024	No Jisos jeme nonɛn, mum gay ɛ̂ boom bew bo ŋgoo le lɛ, “Ɛ́ wee gomte keenu wee wɛm ŋgoo, tu wvú kɛŋke keetun ɛkolɛ kew, etuu kentam kew ebii me le.
40016025	Ben ekeè lɛ wee wvù bawci nshii we fo wvú elase nu ke elase kɛ lo. Geenɛn ɛ wee wvù lase nshii we nje me nu ke ekɛŋkɛ nshii.
40016026	Ɛ́ bó baanci naa woŋ wvun nɛn tfuu, ɛ nya ɛ̂ wee wvú ɛ die, ɛ ke ɛ lase nshii we, ɛ́ sɛw wvudvu enu la? Nuu lɛ fiɛɛ nu dvú fì ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wee esum keyoy kew dvú lɛ?
40016027	Ben ekeè lɛ wee wvù diee nu Waawee nu ke eto bô bonceendaa bew ɛ̂ bvukukɛ bvu Ice le, emum elaw wee tfuu yî fiɛɛ fì wee nu ɛ ge le.
40016028	Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy lɛ bonyii bomew leeme fɛn bò yaa nu ke eyuw wvuŋ kpwe sɛ bó ɛ yɛn no wee wvù diee nu Waawee too bô bvunfon bwew kɛ.”
40017001	Ɛ ɛdiuw ke fey ɛsoocaan, ɛ Jisos jo Bita bô Jɛm noo Jon wvù waa bwee Jɛm, ɛ bô bó ben yî kum wvumew e ɛ wvú defe ɛwe, no nu fó ɛbonɛbon.
40017002	Ɛ bó ke nɛ yɛn ɛ nfieesɛn ye ɛ kumɛn ɛ̂ bó ɛjise, bvushiw bwew ɛ no baa lawkene diɛwɛ diuu le, ɛ ndvú ye baa tɛn lawkene nɛn mwawmwawmwaw.
40017003	Ɛ fí kooy lɛ Muses bô Ɛlayja to nu ɛ nɛ buynɛn fô bó le, no jemyi bô bo Jisos.
40017004	Ɛ Bita mum nɛ bvumtɛn gay ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Tata, fí jee no beene nu fɛn. Ɛ́ wo fɛn kooŋke lo ɛ́ me en'yoo cún fɛn shɛ, ɛ́ yimi enu yo, yimi yi Muses, yimi yi Ɛlayja.”
40017005	Kɛ no wvú to bɛɛ jemyi, ɛ fí kooy lɛ kembɛw kè baa nɛn bvuuu to nu ɛ nɛ to baŋ bó, ɛ diɛw jeme ɛ̂ kembɛw kedvu le lɛ, “Wvun nu Waa wɛm, wvú nu fitele fiem. Me n'yuuke njoŋ bô wvú baay. Ben eyuukè ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvú le.”
40017006	Ɛ boom bew bo ŋgoo le dioo yuw diɛw yidvu ɛ kedvum gbwo bó, ɛ bó gbwekɛn tum monshim fokuse.
40017007	Geenɛn ɛ Jisos gɛn kum bó le gay lɛ, “Ben eja we. Fo ben efanè kɛ.”
40017008	Ɛ bó dioo cake ɛjisɛ we faŋɛ yaa bvuu yɛn wee mvu le ɛfey Jisos kɛ.
40017009	Ɛ bó ke nɛ yî kum wvudvu le dioo booke, ɛ Jisos lew ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Fo ben ke esee fiɛɛ fì ɛjisɛ ɛyene be yɛn ɛ̂ wee sɛ wee wvù diee nu Waawee ɛ buy wase yî kpwe le kɛ.”
40017010	Ɛ boom bew bo ŋgoo le bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu nje la wvù bonyii bò duŋci bonci duu lɛ Ɛlayja kɛŋke keeke eyaw eto ɛ́ Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ sɛ to?”
40017011	Ɛ Jisos tfuse lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu kecɛɛy lɛ Ɛlayja kɛŋke keeyaw eto ekene mwɛɛm mvunciim.
40017012	Geenɛn ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben lɛ Ɛlayja nu ɛ to wase bó faŋɛ yaa kiɛɛ wvú kɛ, ɛ mum ɛ ge fiɛɛ fì bó kooŋke bô wvú. Ɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no wee wvù diee nu Waawee nu ke eyɛn ŋgɛw can yibole.”
40017013	No wvú gay nonɛn, ɛ boom bew bo ŋgoo le mum kiɛɛ lɛ wvú jemyi ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛkumɛ Jon Nleseɛjoo.
40017014	Ɛ Jisos bô boom bew bo ŋgoo le ke bow fɛse fô kebombom ke bonyii le to nu. Ɛ wee mvu nɛ to tum ɛnvuw ɛ̂ Jisos fwe, gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ,
40017015	“Tata, camɛ kɛ shen fô waa wɛm e. Wvú gbwee keŋgbwe, yɛne ŋgɛw baay. Wvú nɛn'yi gbwe fotaŋ, ké nɛ gbwe ɛ̂ joo le.
40017016	Me mbe ɛ nto bô wvú fô boom buw bo ŋgoo le bó ɛ mom ŋkuuŋ keefɛ wvú.”
40017017	Ɛ Jisos gay lɛ, “O oo! Ɛŋgokɛ ke ɛcici kè baa lese fitele yî Nyo' le kin. Me nu ŋke enu beene eŋgɛn embuy nɛɛ? Me nu ŋke eŋkuu shém bô ben eŋgɛn embuy nɛɛ? Ben eto bô wan wvudvu fɛn enya ɛ̂ me.”
40017018	Ɛ bó to dvú, ɛ Jisos wam nceendaa dɛwle wvù to nu yî wan wvudvu le ɛ wvú buy, ɛ wvú mum bonɛn lo kaŋ mwaaŋ.
40017019	Ɛ boom bo Jisos e bo ŋgoo le ke nɛ gɛn fô wvú le ɛjim ɛjim, bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu nje la wvù bese be mom ŋkuuŋ keebvuse nceendaa dɛwle wvudvu?”
40017020	Ɛ wvú tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu njefo mbee wene doose lo. Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy lɛ, ɛ́ ben be kɛŋke mbee ɛ wvú nu kɛ naa diɛwɛ shem nsusu le, tu ben nulo egay ɛ̂ kum wvun lɛ wvú emvuw ye fɛn egɛn eleem fofe, ɛ́ wvú mvuwɛ, fiɛɛ saa nu dvú fì nulo eghaw ben kɛ.
40017021	[Geenɛn, kɛ kfuu wvuwvun nceendaa dɛwle nulo ebuy sɛ wee ɛ bunle ɛ she mbam mwɛɛm mvudien kɛ.]”
40017022	No Jisos bô boom bew bo ŋgoo le to taashɛɛ Galilee, ɛ wvú gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Wee wvù diee nu Waawee nu ɛ bó nu ke enya wvú can bonyii le,
40017023	ɛ́ bó eyu wvú, ɛ́ ke edioo enu ɛdiuw ɛta, ɛ́ wvú ebuy yî kpwe le.” Ɛ bó yuw nonɛn, ɛ ye keeshɛ bó baay.
40017024	Ɛ Jisos bô boom bew bo ŋgoo le ke gɛn buy Kafana'um, ɛ bonyii bò to fii shile wvu yew ncese ke to yɛn Bita le sow ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wee wene n'yɛɛyi ké no laaŋke kɛ shile wvu yew ncese?”
40017025	Ɛ wvú bee lɛ, “'Ɛɛ.” Ɛ Bita ke dioo tu fô yew e, ɛ ɛ̀ yaw Jisos jike fiɛɛ fidvu fokuse, bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Semon, wo yɛne fiuw lɛ la? Bonfon bo fokuse fɛn ké no fii shile bô kensuw ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ baa? Bó ké no fii ɛ̂ boom bo woŋ e, nuu ɛ̂ botolo lɛ?”
40017026	Ɛ Bita tfuse lɛ, “Bó ké no fii ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ botolo.” Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Tu kɛ boom bo woŋ e yaa kɛŋke keelaaŋke kɛ.
40017027	Geenɛn, wvu lɛ fo bee wo eteensɛn mvuntelem mvu bonyii bodvu le, gɛnɛ elaŋ fincaw ɛ̂ mamase le, bye yì wo ɛ yaw ɛ koo, ɛ wo yene diuw wvudvu, ɛ́ wo eyɛn jise di bigew e jó, emum ebvuse egɛn enya ɛ̂ bó keelaŋ shile wesebeewo dvú.”
40018001	Ɛ ɛ̀ no nu kɛ kefew kedvu le, ɛ boom bo Jisos e bo ŋgoo le to bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wee wvù kuuke fele wee tfuu ɛ̂ bvunfon bvu fowe le nu wvù la?”
40018002	Ɛ Jisos mum tee wan caan leke ɛ̂ bó ɛntelɛŋ,
40018003	gay lɛ, “Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy lɛ, ɛ́ ben baa ekumɛn etu diɛwɛ boom bo caan caan e, tu kɛ ben nu ke eyuu eley naa lo bvunfon bvu fowe le kɛ.
40018004	Naa yɛɛ wvù nu ɛ jo ɛkolɛ kew caan ɛ no nu diɛwɛ wan wvun e, nu ɛ wvú nu wee wvù kuuke ɛnte jo bvunfon bvu fowe.
40018005	Ɛ́ wee fiisene wan diɛwɛ wvun e ɛ̂ diee diem e, tu wvú fiisene ɛ ɛ̀ nu me.
40018006	Ɛ́ ɛ̀ nu lɛ wee ege ɛ́ wee wvù nu ɛ lese fitele yî yɛm e diɛwɛ boom bo caan caan ban e ege kebefɛ, ɛ́ fí ejee fô wvuwɛ wee le lɛ bó eshɛŋke kebwee ke diene le ɛ̂ kendoŋ kew e, edomse wvú ɛ́ wvú eshii egɛn ɛ̂ joo yi baay e.
40018007	Ŋgɛw wvu baay nu fô bonyii bo yî woŋ wvun e. Mwɛɛm mvù teeyi bonyii ɛ bó gee bibefɛ kɛŋke kɛ keenu. Geenɛn ɛ ŋgɛw wvu baay nu fô wee wvù teeyi wee mvu ɛ wvú gee kebefɛ le.
40018008	Ɛ́ kebo kuw kɛnɛɛ ɛkalɛ kuw gee ɛ wo gee kebefɛ, ɛ́ wo sum kebo kedvu kɛnɛɛ ɛkalɛ kedvu laŋ. Fí jee lɛ wo ke eley nshii wvù mɛy lo le bô kebo kɛnɛɛ ɛkalɛ keŋkfuyte, ɛfey keekɛŋke can yicii kɛnɛɛ bikaa bicii ɛ́ bó ke ejo wo etfume ŋguy wvù mɛy lo le.
40018009	Ɛ́ jise diuw gee ɛ wo gee kebefɛ, ɛ́ wo min jise didvu laŋ. Fí jee lɛ wo ke eley nshii wvù mɛy lo le bô jise dimwaaŋ, ɛfey keekɛŋke ɛjisɛ ɛcii, ɛ́ bó ke elaŋ wo ŋguy wvu baay e.”
40018010	“Ben eyɛnè fo ben ejoò mvu boom bo caan caan ban e ɛkuse kɛ. Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben lɛ fowe nu ɛ bonceendaa bo Nyo' le bò shee bô bó ké no nu kɛ sekecii ɛjise jo Icɛm wvù nu fowe.
40018011	[Ɛ wee wvù diee nu Waawee to to keeboyse bonyii bò nu ɛ lakɛn wase.]
40018012	Ben kpwaake lɛ la? Ɛ́ wee kɛŋke njée gbwee, yimiaaŋ ɛ la ɛnte dvudvu, wvú saa eyaw ecinɛ yi mbaŋ bvuukɛ ncow bvuukɛ le ɛ̂ kum, egɛn egom njee yimiaaŋ yì la yidvu?
40018013	Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy lɛ, ɛ́ wvú gom ɛ yɛn, ɛ́ wvú eyuuke njoŋ bô njee yimiaaŋ yidvu fele yi mbaŋ bvuukɛ ncow bvuukɛ yì baa la kɛ.
40018014	Ɛ̀ nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ tɛn no Icen wvù nu fowe baa shieele lɛ wee mwaaŋ ŋgoo boom bo caan caan ban e ela kɛ.
40018015	Ɛ́ waa bwoo ge fiɛɛ fí ɛ befe fô wo le, ɛ́ wo gɛn yɛn wvú le duŋcɛ jay we ɛ̂ wvú kɛ ben ɛ wvú bofɛɛ. Wvú ɛ́ yuw fiɛɛ fì wo jeme, tu wo ɛ kase wase ɛ kɛŋkɛ waa bwoo jim.
40018016	Wvú ɛ́ no nu sɛ wvú ɛ yuw fiɛɛ fì wo jeme, ɛ́ wo jo wee mwaaŋ kɛnɛɛ bofɛɛ ɛ ben ɛ bó kase gɛn fô wvú le, wvu lɛ njeme wemɛn ekɛŋkɛ bonyii bofɛɛ kɛnɛɛ botɛte bò eben jim nsaw wvudvu.
40018017	Wvú ɛ́ gɛn ɛ faŋ keeyuw fiɛɛ fì bó jemyi, ɛ́ wo jo keseen gɛn dvú fô kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le. Wvú ɛ́ faŋ keeyuw naa noo kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le, ɛ́ wo jo wvú diɛwɛ wee wvù yaa kee kɛ Nyo' kɛnɛɛ diɛwɛ wee wvù fii shile le.
40018018	Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy lɛ fiɛɛ fì ben ɛ ke ɛ suu fokuse fɛn, tu bó nu ɛ suu wase fowe, fiɛɛ fì ben ɛ ke ɛ fay fokuse fɛn, tu bó nu ɛ fay wase fowe.
40018019	Me ɛ mbvuu ɛ no ŋgayte ɛ̂ ben lɛ, ɛ́ bonyii bofɛɛ ɛ̂ ben ɛnte beŋe yî fiɛɛ le fokuse fɛn, ɛ lɛkɛ ɛ̂ bunle le, ɛ́ Icɛm wvù nu fowe ege fimwɛtɛn fô bó le.
40018020	Ben ekeè lɛ fô bonyii bofɛɛ kɛnɛɛ botɛte nu ɛ taashɛ ɛ̂ diee diem e, nu ɛ me nu ɛ̂ bó ɛntelɛŋ.”
40018021	Ɛ Bita mum bencɛ bife ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Tata, ɛ̀ nu bokaŋ bomɛɛ bò waa bwɛɛm gee mwɛɛm mvù befe fô me le, ɛ́ me enlɛɛshi kɛ lo? Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ ke egɛn ebuy bokaŋ bosooshwiy e?”
40018022	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Kɛ ɛ̀ nɛlo ɛ́ me eŋgay ɛ̂ wo lɛ ɛ̀ nɛlo enu kɛ bokaŋ bosooshwiy maaŋ kɛ. Ɛ̀ nɛlo enu mbaŋsooshwiy bokaŋ bosooshwiy.
40018023	Ɛ̀ nɛɛ fiɛɛ fì bó nɛlo efewsɛn bvunfon bvu fowe bô nfon mvu wvù to gomte keekpwaŋsɛn bô bonyii bew bo lemme le bò kpwaw we to nu can yibole.
40018024	No wvú to kɛwɛɛ keetaasse, ɛ bó to bô wee mvu ɛ ye fioo nu bikele bi bigew e bontfuke yuufe.
40018025	No kɛ ɛ̀ to nulo ɛ́ wvú elaw, ɛ nfon wvudvu mum gay lɛ bó ejo wvú bô kpwɛse noo boom noo mwɛɛm mwew mvunciim egese eto bô bigew bidvu elaw fioo ye dvú.
40018026	No nfon gay nonɛn, ɛ wee wvudvu gbwe ɛ̂ wvú ɛjise ku can ɛ̂ wvú gay lɛ, ‘Tata, kuu kɛ shém bee wo, me nu ŋke enlaw fiɛɛ ficii.’
40018027	Ɛ shen ge ɛ cee ɛkolɛ we cinɛ wvú le daayɛ lo ɛ̂ fioo yidvu le.
40018028	Geenɛn, ɛ wee wɛ kebɛɛ ke buy dioo gɛne, buynɛn yî wee mvu wvù bô bó lemte nfon e, ɛ wvú to kɛŋke wvú fioo ɛkɛlɛ ke bigew e kɛ kemwaaŋ. Ɛ wvú mum jicɛ wvú yî sew e gay lɛ, ‘Lawɛ fioo yo.’
40018029	Ɛ wee lemme wvudvu mum gbwe tɛn ɛ̂ wvú ɛjise, lɛkɛ wvú gay lɛ, ‘Kuu kɛ shém bee wo, ɛ́ me ŋke enlaw wo.’
40018030	Ɛ wvú tun, jo wvú gɛn fen yew ncaw e lɛ wvú enù dvú egɛn ebuy no wvú ke elaw fioo ye.
40018031	Ɛ bonyii bomew bò bô bó to lemte dioo yɛn fiɛɛ fì kooy le, ɛ fí ley bó baay. Ɛ bó mum gɛn see fiɛɛ ficii fì be kooy ɛ̂ nfon.
40018032	Ɛ nfon tooy wvú ɛ wvú to, ɛ wvú gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, ‘Wo nu fiɛɛ fi ɛcici. Me mbe ɛ ndaayɛ ɛ̂ yo fioo le yicii njefo wo be ɛ ku can ɛ̂ me.
40018033	Kɛ ɛ̀ be nulo tɛn ɛ́ wo ecam shen fô wee wvù ben ɛ bó lemte le no me mbe ɛ ncam tɛn fô wo le?’
40018034	Ɛ nfon ton'yɛ shém, nya wvú lɛ bó efen yew ncaw e, enyɛwle bô wvú egɛn ebuy no wvú ke elaw fioo ye yicii.
40018035	Nonɛn, ɛ̀ nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no Icɛm wvù nu fowe nu ke ege bô wee mwaaŋ mwaaŋ ben e, fɛn ɛ́ wee baa elɛɛshɛ bô fitele fiew ficii fiɛɛ fì befe fì waa bwee nu ɛ ge fô wvú le.”
40019001	Ɛ Jisos ke jeme mwɛɛm mvun mɛse, mum nɛ ɛ̂ keba ke woŋ e kè Galilee le gɛn ɛ̂ kè Judea le Joo Joodan wvuke.
40019002	No wvú gɛn, ɛ kebombom ke bonyii le shfum bi wvú le, ɛ wvú fɛ bó bocii bò to cɛmkene jó.
40019003	Ɛ Bofalasii ke nɛ to fô wvú le keemom wvú, mum bife lɛ, “Nci nu ɛ bee lɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wee ekuŋ kpwɛse yî fiɛɛ le kɛnɛɛ ɛ̀ nu naa fì la?”
40019004	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben ke baa taŋ wase fiɛɛ fì bó saŋ lɛ, ‘Foŋkɛw nu ɛ wee wvù to bomɛɛ bonyii to bom bó ɛ bó no nu diemsɛn bô kpwoon’ e?
40019005	Wvú to bom nonɛn mum gay lɛ, ‘Ɛ̀ nu nje fifin wvù diemsɛn nu ke ecinɛ ice bô bwee le etaashɛ bô kpwɛse, ɛ́ bó bofɛɛ emum etu wase wee mwaaŋ.’
40019006	Nonɛn, kɛ bó bɛɛ bonyii bofɛɛ kɛ, bó nu wase wee mwaaŋ. Fí ɛ mum ɛ no nu lɛ, fiɛɛ fì Nyo' nu ɛ taashɛ wase, fo wee emom egawsɛn kɛ.”
40019007	Ɛ bonyii bodvu mum bife ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Ɛ̀ no nu nje la wvù Muses to gayɛɛ lɛ wee nulo esaŋ ŋwa' enya ɛ̂ kpwɛse wvù duŋci lɛ wen nu ɛ kuŋ wase wvú, emum ekuŋ wvú?”
40019008	Ɛ Jisos tfuse lɛ, “Ɛ̀ to nu nje bikuu binɛn bì tɛmyɛɛn wvù Muses to cin'yɛɛ lɛ wee nulo ekuŋ kpwɛse. Geenɛn, kɛ ɛ̀ nu no fí to nu foŋkɛw kɛ.
40019009	Me ɛ no ŋgayte fiem ɛ̂ ben lɛ, ɛ́ wee nɛ ɛ kuŋ kpwɛse ɛ jo wvumvu, ɛ́ ɛ̀ baa nu lɛ kpwoon wvudvu nu ɛ nɛ ɛ no ghane gee nsake, tu wvú nu ɛ ge kebefɛ kɛ diɛwɛ keejaŋ kpwoon mvu.”
40019010	Ɛ boom bo Jisos e bo ŋgoo le yuw fin gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ́ ɛ̀ fɛn nu no fí nu ɛkumɛ diemsɛn bô kpwoon, ɛ́ fí ejee lɛ wee emɛy fiew nonɛn sɛ wvú ɛ taashɛ bvujen.”
40019011	Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Kɛ ɛ̀ nu wee tfuu wvù nulo ebee fifin fiɛɛ kɛ. Ɛ̀ nulo ebee kɛ bonyii bò Nyo' nu ɛ ge lɛ bó ebee.
40019012	Ben ekeè lɛ bonyii bomew nu dvú ɛ bó yaa ké no kɛŋke shiee kpwoon kɛ, ɛ ɛ̀ nu no bó to bokɛɛ wase bó ɛ bó nu. Ɛ bomew nu nonɛn ɛ ɛ̀ ge bonyii bô can lɛ bó enu nonɛn. Ɛ bomew nu fibole nonɛn ɛ ɛ̀ ge bó bô bikuu bibole lɛ bó enu nonɛn nje bvunfon bvu fowe. Wee wvù nulo ebee fifin ɛ wvú bee.”
40019013	Ɛ bonyii ke nɛ no too bô boom fô Jisos e lɛ wvú ekum bó le, ebunle fô bó le, ɛ boom bew bo ŋgoo le mum no saake lo bonyii bodvu.
40019014	Ɛ Jisos gay fiew lɛ, “Ben ecinɛ ɛ́ boom bodvu etoo fô me le. Fo ben ejewsè bó kɛ, njefo bvunfon bvu fowe nu ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô bonyii diɛwɛ boban e.”
40019015	No wvú gay nonɛn, mum gɛɛ can ye yî bó le mum nɛ no gɛne.
40019016	Ɛ fí kooy lɛ wee mvu to nu ɛ nɛ to fô Jisos e, bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wee N'yɛɛyi, fiɛɛ fì jee fì me ŋkɛŋke keeŋge nsɛ ŋkɛŋkɛ nshii wvù mɛy lo nu la?”
40019017	Ɛ Jisos bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wo biite ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ me ɛkumɛ fiɛɛ fì jee nje la? Wee wvù jee mɛy kɛ mwaaŋ. Ɛ́ wo gomte keeke eley nshii wvù mɛy lo le, ɛ́ wo no gɛɛlè bonci bo Nyo' le.”
40019018	Ɛ wee wvudvu bife ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Bonci bo Nyo' le nu bò la?” Ɛ Jisos tfuse lɛ, “Fo wo eyu wee, fo wo ejaŋ kpwɛɛ wee, fo wo ecoŋ bvucoŋ, fo wo eben jim nsaw mbiay,
40019019	ɛ̀ wvumtè ico bô bwoo, noo lɛ, ɛ̀ kooŋkè waa bwoo no wo kooŋke ɛkolɛ kuw.”
40019020	Ɛ cuwee wvudvu mum gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Bonci ban bocii nu ɛ me nse ŋgɛɛle wase. Ɛ̀ bvuu shɛke la?”
40019021	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ́ wo fɛn gomte keenu wee wvù jee gɛne mɛɛse, ɛ́ wo gɛn gese mwɛɛm mvù wo kɛŋke, gaw bigew bidvu ɛ̂ bo kefufe le, ɛ́ wo ke emum ekɛŋkɛ ntfu ɛ ɛ̀ nu fowe. Ɛ́ wo dioo ɛ ge nonɛn emum eto ebii me le.”
40019022	Ɛ cuwee wvudvu yuw nonɛn, mum nɛ no gɛne nu lo shen shen, njefo wvú to kɛŋke kpwaw baay.
40019023	Ɛ Jisos mum gay ɛ̂ boom bew bo ŋgoo le lɛ, “Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy lɛ fí nu ke etɛmyi fô wee kpwaw e keeley bvunfon bvu fowe le.
40019024	Ɛ́ me embvuu ensee ɛ̂ ben lɛ, fí nu cekey fô nyambala le keeley ɛ̂ jise di tase le fele fô wee kpwaw e keeley bvunfon bvu Nyo' le.”
40019025	Ɛ boom bo Jisos e bo ŋgoo le yuw fifin, ɛ diuw yum bó baay. Ɛ bó bife lɛ, “Ɛ́ ɛ̀ fɛn nu nonɛn, ɛ́ ke yuu eboy yɛɛ?”
40019026	Ɛ Jisos taa bó nɛn, gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ɛ́ ɛ̀ nu fô wee wvu wum e, tu fí nulo eghaw. Geenɛn ɛ fô Nyo' le nu ɛ kɛ fiɛɛ yaa nulo eghaw wvú kɛ.”
40019027	Ɛ Bita gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Taa eyɛn, bese nu ɛ cinɛ wase fiɛɛ ficii le ɛ no bii wo le. Bese nu ke ekɛŋkɛ la?”
40019028	Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy lɛ seke wee wvù diee nu Waawee ɛ shii wase yî kawla we bvukukɛ le woŋ wvu fwɛ le, ɛ́ ben ban bò se bii me le, eshii tɛn yî bokawla le yuufe ncow bofɛɛ esaake dikfuu di Islael di yuufe ncow difɛɛ.
40019029	Wee tfuu wvù nu ɛ cinɛ la diew e, kɛnɛɛ boom bo bwee le, kɛnɛɛ jɛ́me ye le, kɛnɛɛ ice le, kɛnɛɛ bwee le, kɛnɛɛ boom e, kɛnɛɛ ŋɛɛ le, ɛ wvú cin'yi nje yɛm, nu ke ekɛŋkɛ bonyii bô mwɛɛm bokaŋ gbwee fele no wvú se kɛŋke. Ɛ wvú nu ke ekɛŋkɛ tɛn nshii wvù mɛy lo.
40019030	Geenɛn, bonyii nteen bò nu fwe keseen nu ke enu ɛjim, ɛ́ nteen bò nu ɛjim keseen enu fwe.”
40020001	Ɛ Jisos bvuu gay lɛ, “Bvunfon bvu fowe nu diɛwɛ cee la mvu wvù to buyɛɛ ja fontaŋɛntaŋ gɛn keejo bonyii bo lemme le elese ɛ̂ wvú wɛne.
40020002	No wvú to gɛnɛɛ yɛn bó le, ɛ bô bó mum kamɛn lɛ wvú nu ke elaw bó danali danali yî diuu le. Ɛ wvú mum ciinse bó ɛ bó gɛn no lemte ɛ̂ wvú wɛne.
40020003	Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu diɛwɛ didiuu bvuukɛ le, ɛ wvú buy gɛn yɛn bomew bonyii le ɛ bó leeme fô way laame.
40020004	Ɛ wvú gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, ‘Ben egɛn tɛn elemtè ɛ̂ me wɛne, ɛ́ me ŋke enlaw ben no bó ké no laake.’ Ɛ bó mum gɛn.
40020005	Ɛ wvú ke bvuu buy kɛ diɛwɛ ɛmvunsheeŋ ɛntelɛŋ e, bvuu kase buy kɛ diɛwɛ didiuu ditɛte le, joo kɛ bonyii bo lemme le.
40020006	Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu diɛwɛ didiuu ditin e ɛkiɛguu, ɛ wvú bvuu buy gɛn yɛn bonyii bomew e ɛ bó leemene. Ɛ wvú bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, ‘Ɛ̀ nu nje la wvù ben to ɛ she leemene fɛn diuu dicile ɛcici?’
40020007	Ɛ bó tfuse lɛ, ‘Ɛ̀ nu njefo wee baa jo bese lemme le kɛ.’ Ɛ wvú mum gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, ‘Ben egɛn lɛ tɛn elemtè ɛ̂ me wɛne.’
40020008	Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu ɛkiɛguu, ɛ cee wɛɛ mum to gay ɛ̂ cee ɛkolɛ bonyii bew bo lemme le lɛ wvú etee bonyii bo lemme le, enya nlawma wvubo, kɛɛke yî bonyii bò be to ɛjim e, egɛn emɛse yî bò be to fwe le.
40020009	Ɛ wvú mum kɛw no laake. Ɛ bonyii bò bó to joɛ bó yî lemme le didiuu ditin to ɛ wvú law bó danali danali.
40020010	Ɛ bonyii bò bó to yawɛɛ ejo ke dioo to mum no kpwaake lɛ bó nu elaw bó efey bomew ba. Geenɛn, ɛ bó law kɛ tɛn bó danali danali.
40020011	Ɛ bó fi nlawma wvubo mum kɛw no wvukene cee la wɛ,
40020012	gayte lɛ, ‘Bonyii ban bò wo be jo ɛjim lem kɛ ntam kefew mwaaŋ maaŋ, geenɛn wo ɛ law bee bó lɛŋlɛŋ, ɛ bese nu bò be she ɛ ŋgvuse yî lemme le diuu dicile ɛ mvum sheyte yî yese le.’
40020013	Geenɛn ɛ cee wɛɛ wvudvu tfuse ɛ̂ wee mvu bó le lɛ, ‘Nsaa yɛm, kɛ me mbaa njay fiɛɛ bee wo kɛ. Bee wo be kamene kɛ lemme din yî danali le?
40020014	Joo nlawma wo egɛnè. Ɛ̀ koŋ me lɛ me enlaw wee wvu ɛjim lɛŋlɛŋ diɛwɛ no me nlaw wo.
40020015	Kɛ me ŋkɛŋke mvuŋgay keeŋge fiɛɛ fì me ŋkooŋke bô fiɛɛ fì ɛ̀ nu fiem e? Nuu lɛ wo bene kendoŋ njefo me nu ɛ n'yene can yɛm fô bonyii le lɛ?’”
40020016	No Jisos jeme nɛn, mum mɛse lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu kɛ no bonyii bò nu ɛjim keseen nu ke enu bo fwe, ɛ bo fwe nu bo ɛjim.”
40020017	Ɛ Jisos ke no bene Jɛlusalɛm, ɛ bô boom bew bo ŋgoo le bo yuufe ncow bofɛɛ buy ɛ̂ je, ɛ wvú tee bó ɛ bô bó lɛwse ye, ɛ wvú gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ,
40020018	“Ben eyekɛ eyuw, beene bene wase gɛne Jɛlusalɛm, ɛ bó nu egɛn enya wee wvù diee nu Waawee can bocee ncese bo baay baay noo bonyii bò duŋci bonci bo Nyo' le, ɛ́ bó esaw wvú esumtɛn lɛ bó eyu wvú,
40020019	emum enya wvú can bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu le, ɛ́ bó esɛwse wvú, tamte wvú bô boŋgbwan, emum eta wvú yî kentam e, ɛ́ ke edioo enu ɛdiuw ɛta ɛ́ Nyo' ekase ebvuse wvú yî kpwe le.”
40020020	Ɛ bwee boom bo Sɛbɛdee le ke nɛ to fô Jisos e bô boom bew, tum ɛnvuw ɛ̂ wvú ɛjise keelɛkɛ fiɛɛ.
40020021	Ɛ Jisos bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ “Wo be gomte lɛ la?” Ɛ wvú gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Kawɛ lɛ ɛ̀ nu ke edioo enu seke wo saake wase bvunfon bwuw, ɛ́ boom bem bo bofɛɛ ban eshii mbew yo le, wvumvu ɛ̂ ɛbo kuw ke ɛlemsɛ le, wvumvu ɛ̂ ke ɛkɛnɛ le.”
40020022	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ boom bodvu lɛ, “Kɛ ben kee fiɛɛ fì ben biite kɛ. Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ ben ke ewu fiko fi ŋgɛw e fì me nu ŋke eŋ'wu?” Ɛ bó tfuse lɛ, “Bese nulo ke ewu.”
40020023	Ɛ wvú gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ ben ke ewu fiko fiem kecɛɛy. Geenɛn keeshii ɛ̂ ɛbo kem ke ɛlemsɛ bô ke ɛkɛnɛ le yaa nu bvudvuu bwem keenya ɛ̂ ben kɛ. Mondvuum modvu nu ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô bonyii bò Icɛm nu ɛ seyse wase ɛ gɛɛ fô bó le.”
40020024	Ɛ kebɛse ke boom bo ŋgoo le bo Jisos e bo yuufe dioo yuw ɛkumɛ fiɛɛ fidvu, ɛ shém ton'yɛ bó bô boom bo bofɛɛ bodvu.
40020025	Geenɛn ɛ Jisos tee bó bocii, ɛ bó to ɛ wvú gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Kɛ ben kee lɛ bonyii bò saake bitum ké no shiile lo yî bonyii bobole, ɛ bonyii bo baay baay bobole duŋci mvuŋgay mvubole ɛ̂ we jo bó?
40020026	Kɛ fifiɛ kɛŋke keenu ɛ̂ ben ɛntelɛŋ kɛ. Wee wvù gomte keenu wee wvu baay ɛ̂ ben ɛntelɛŋ kɛŋke keenu wvù lemte lo ben e.
40020027	Wee ɛ́ no gomte keenu wee wvu fwe ɛ̂ ben ɛntelɛŋ, tu wvú kɛŋke keenu nfwa wene.
40020028	Ɛ̀ nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no kɛ wee wvù diee nu Waawee to to lɛ bonyii elemte lo wvú le kɛ. Wvú to to keelem lo fô bonyii le, enya nshii we keesum wee nteen yî kpwe le.”
40020029	Ɛ Jisos bô boom bew bo ŋgoo le ke gɛn dioo fele Jɛliku, ɛ kebombom ke bonyii le no shfumte ɛ̂ wvú ɛjim.
40020030	Ɛ fí kooy lɛ binfefe bimew bifɛɛ, ɛ ɛ̀ nu bolemsɛ bì to ké no shiile diuw je le, to nu ɛ dioo yuw lɛ Jisos fele lo, ɛ bí mum no wamte gayte lɛ, “Tata, Waa Nfon Dawe, camɛ shen fô bese le.”
40020031	Ɛ kebombom ke bonyii le no wamene bó gayte lɛ bó ebaŋ lo. Geenɛn ɛ bó bvuu wam gɛn lo fwe fwe lɛ, “Tata, Waa Nfon Dawe camɛ shen fô bese le.”
40020032	Ɛ Jisos mum leem, tee bó, ɛ bó to, ɛ wvú bife lɛ, “Ben gomte lɛ me eŋge la fô ben e?”
40020033	Ɛ bó tfuse lɛ, “Tata, geɛ ɛ́ ɛjisɛ ɛyese eyene ye.”
40020034	Ɛ shen koo Jisos, ɛ wvú kum ɛjisɛ ɛbole. Kaŋ mwaaŋ ɛ bó mum no yɛne mwɛɛm e, mum nɛ no bii Jisos e.
40021001	Ɛ Jisos bô boom bew bo ŋgoo le ke dioo feŋene Jɛlusalɛm, ɛ bó nu wase ntɛw wvù Bɛtfaj e yî Kum Bite bi Olif e, ɛ wvú mum tum boom bew bo ŋgoo le bomew bofɛɛ,
40021002	gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben egɛn ntɛw wvu fwe we le. Ben nu dioo ɛ gɛn, emum eyɛn lo bwee kembɛɛbey e ɛ bó ɛ suu ɛ waa we nu mbew ye le, ɛ́ ben efay, eto dvú ɛ̂ me.
40021003	Ɛ́ wee bife lo fiɛɛ ɛ̂ ben, ɛ́ ben tfuse lɛ Cee Ɛkolɛ kɛŋke shiee wvudvu, ɛ́ wvú emum ecinɛ lo kaŋ mwaaŋ ɛ́ ben eto dvú.”
40021004	Fifin to kooy nonɛn keege ɛ́ fí eto ekocɛn no wee ntum Nyo' mvu to jemyɛɛ, gayte lɛ,
40021005	“Wee egay ɛ̂ kelaante kè Sayon lɛ, ‘Ben etaa eyɛn, Nfon wene too ɛ̂ ben e. Wvú nu ɛ shike ɛkolɛ kew, ɛ ben yî kembɛɛbey e, ɛ ɛ̀ nu waa kembɛɛbey, kembɛɛbey ɛ kí bɛɛ caan.’”
40021006	Ɛ boom bo Jisos e bo ŋgoo le ba gɛn, ge kɛ no wvú to jemyɛɛ.
40021007	Ɛ bó to bô kembɛɛbey kedvu noo wan, yɛy bikum bibole yî dvú le, ɛ Jisos ben shii yî kemew e, no gɛne.
40021008	Ɛ kebombom ke bonyii le nteen no yɛyte tɛn bikum bibole ɛ̂ je, ɛ bomew faasshi tíɛw bite yɛyte.
40021009	Ɛ kebombom kè to gɛne fwe dvu Jisos bô kè to bii ɛjim no wvuuyi lɛ, “Eeeee, mbense enù fô waa Nfon Dawe le lɛɛɛ! Nyo' nu ɛ laŋ kembonɛn yî wee wvù too ɛ̂ diee di Tata le lɛɛɛ! Eeeee, mbense enù fô Nyo' wvu fowe le lɛɛɛ!”
40021010	Ɛ Jisos ke gɛn fɛse Jɛlusalɛm, ɛ kelaante kedvu kecii shiw. Ɛ bonyii no ghayte, biite lɛ, “Wvun sɛ nu yɛɛ le?”
40021011	Ɛ kebombom tfuse lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu wee ntum Nyo' wvù Jisos wvù nɛ ntɛw wvù Nasalɛt e, Galilee.”
40021012	Ɛ Jisos ke gɛn fô yew ncese Nyo' le, kuŋ bonyii bocii bò to geese bô bò to guyte mwɛɛm fó, baashɛ bidaŋ bi bonyii bò to kumene bigew e, bô bintaw bi bonyii bò to geese bibembɛ le.
40021013	Wvú to kuuŋke gayte lɛ, “Fí nu ɛ bo ɛ saŋ ɛ Nyo' gayte lɛ, ‘Bó nu ke eteŋe yew yɛm lɛ yew bunle.’ Ben ɛ baŋke ɛ tu tfum bocooŋ.”
40021014	Ɛ Jisos no nu fô yew ncese le, ɛ binfefe bô bontɛŋɛ too ɛ wvú fɛle bó.
40021015	Geenɛn, ɛ bocee ncese bo baay baay bô bonyii bò to duŋci bonci bo Nyo' le ke dioo yɛn biŋghaw bi mwɛɛm e bì wvú to gee, bô no boom bo caan caan wvuuyi fô yew ncese le, gayte lɛ, “Eeeee, mbense enù fô waa Nfon Dawe le lɛɛɛ,” ɛ fí no ton'yi lo bó.
40021016	Ɛ bó mum waa lo Jisos lɛ, “Kɛ wo yuuke fiɛɛ fì boom ban gayte le?” Ɛ wvú tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “'Ɛɛ, me n'yuuke lo. Fí nu lɛ ben ke baa taŋ wase fiɛɛ fì bó saŋ lɛ, ‘Nyo' nu ɛ ge mbense wvù jee gɛne mɛɛse ɛ no buyte dew boom bo caan caan e, noo dew boom bò bɛɛ yamte ɛmben e?’”
40021017	Ɛ Jisos ke nɛ cinɛ bó le, buy ɛ̂ kelaante kedvu le, gɛn ntɛw wvù Bɛtani le, ce jó.
40021018	Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu ɛntaŋɛntaŋ, no Jisos to kaase tuu jim ɛlaante, ɛ jeŋ no yuu wvú.
40021019	Ɛ wvú yɛn kete kemew e mbew je le ɛ bó ké no diee, mum gɛn fó, geenɛn faŋɛ yaa yɛn fiɛɛ le yî dvú le kɛ, yɛn kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu bibɛ yî dvú le maaŋ. Ɛ wvú mum low kete kedvu gay lɛ, “Fo fintam bɛɛ ke ebvuu eyuu eyum lo yî yo le kɛ!” Kaŋ mwaaŋ, ɛ kete kedvu mum yowlɛn lo.
40021020	Ɛ boom bo ŋgoo le bo Jisos e dioo yɛn nonɛn, ɛ diuw yum bó. Ɛ bó no ghayte lɛ, “Kete kedvu ghan nɛɛ ɛ sɛ yowlɛn lo kaŋ mwaaŋ nɛn?”
40021021	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy lɛ, ɛ́ ben lese fitele yî Nyo' le, yaa kɛŋke naa lo kemaŋɛn kɛ, ben saa ge kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì me ŋge bô kete kin maaŋ kɛ. Ben ɛ́ cim ɛ gay ɛ̂ kum wvun lɛ, ‘Mvuwɛ ye fɛn egɛn egbwe ɛ̂ joo yi baay e,’ ɛ́ fí ekooy nonɛn.
40021022	Ɛ naa la fì ben bunlee lɛke, nu ɛ ben nu ke ekɛŋkɛ fɛn ɛ́ ben nu ɛ lese fitele yî Nyo' le.”
40021023	Ɛ Jisos ke bvuu kase ley fô yew ncese le, ɛ bocee ncese bo baay baay bô bonyii bò saake woŋ Bojuu ke to yɛn no wvú yɛɛyi bonyii, mum bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wo jo fɛɛ mvuŋgay ɛ sɛ no gee mwɛɛm mvun? Ɛ̀ nya yɛɛ mvuŋgay mvudvu ɛ̂ wo?”
40021024	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Me tɛn nu embife fiɛɛ ɛ̂ ben. Ɛ́ ben tfuse lo, ɛ́ me emum ensee ɛ̂ ben wee wvù nya mvuŋgay lɛ me eŋgeè mwɛɛm mvun.
40021025	Jon to leese bonyii ɛ̂ joo ɛ mvuŋgay mvudvu nɛ fɛɛ? Ɛ̀ to nya Nyo', nuu wee wvu wum ɛ?” No wvú bife nonɛn, ɛ bó no keŋene ɛbonɛbon gayte lɛ, “Ɛ́ beene tfuse lɛ ɛ̀ to nya Nyo', ɛ́ wvú ebife ɛ̂ beene lɛ laa ɛ ɛ̀ ge la fo beene ebee Jon e lɛ?
40021026	Geenɛn, ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nulo ɛ́ beene etfuse lɛ, ‘Ɛ̀ to nya wee wvu wum,’ kɛ, njefo beene fane kebombom ke bonyii le, no bó bocii nu ɛ bee lɛ Jon to nu wee ntum Nyo'.”
40021027	Nonɛn, ɛ bó mum tfuse ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Kɛ bese kee kɛ.” Ɛ Jisos mum gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Tu kɛ me nu ensee tɛn ɛ̂ ben wee wvù nya mvuŋgay ɛ̂ me lɛ me eŋgeè mwɛɛm mvun kɛ.”
40021028	Ɛ Jisos gɛn fwe bife lɛ, “Ben kpwaake lɛ la ɛkumɛ fin? Wee mvu to kɛŋke boom bolemsɛ bofɛɛ. Ɛ wvú ke nɛ gɛn fô wan wvu fwe le, gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, ‘Waa wɛm, gɛnɛ eshe elemtè wɛne ɛbɛn.’
40021029	Ɛ wvú tfuse lɛ, ‘Kɛ me nu eŋgɛn kɛ.’ Geenɛn ke nɛ kase kumɛn fitele fiew mum gɛn wɛne dvudvu.
40021030	Ɛ wee wvudvu gɛn fô wvu ɛjim e gay kɛ fiɛɛ fì wvú be gay wase ɛ̂ wvu fwe. Ɛ wvú tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, ‘Me nu eŋgɛn icɛm.’ Geenɛn, faŋɛ yaa gɛn kɛ.
40021031	Tu ɛntelɛŋ jo boom bo bofɛɛ ban, nu ɛ wvù to geɛ fiɛɛ fì ice shieele nu wvù la?” Ɛ bó tfuse lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu wvu fwe.” Ɛ Jisos mum gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy lɛ, bonyii bò fii shile noo bokɛnɛ bo nsake le nu ɛ bó leyte wase bvunfon bvu Nyo' le fwe ɛ̂ ben e.
40021032	Me njemyi nɛn njefo Jon Nleseɛjoo to nu ɛ to keeduŋcɛ je yi teytey ɛ̂ ben, ɛ ben faŋɛ yaa bee wvú le kɛ, geenɛn ɛ bonyii bò fii shile bô bokɛnɛ bo nsake le bee wvú le. Ɛ ben ke dioo cim yɛn no bó beŋe nonɛn, faŋɛ yaa ekumɛn mvuntelem mvunɛn ebee tɛn wvú le kɛ.”
40021033	Ɛ Jisos bvuu jeme lɛ, “Ben ebvuu eyuw ŋgan mvu. Wee mvu to nu ɛ lem wɛɛ mvuntam mvù bó keenci mbvuum dvú, gem bô ketaaŋ kɛɛkɛɛ, cim fò bó nu ke ekoyte mvuntam mvudvu somte ɛ mbvuum buyte, tum ketaale ke wee ncɛy e wɛne dvudvu, mum tɛse wɛɛ wvudvu ɛ̂ bonyii, mum nɛ gɛn ketum kemew e.
40021034	Ɛ kefew kè bó ké no koyte mvuntam mvudvu ke to kocɛn, ɛ wvú tum bonyii bew bo lemme le fô bonyii bò wvú to tɛsɛɛ wɛɛ ɛ̂ bó le, lɛ bó egɛn efi mwuwene mvuntam.
40021035	Ɛ bó gɛn, ɛ bonyii bò wvú to tɛsɛɛ wɛɛ wvudvu ɛ̂ bó koo bó, suŋ mvu, yu mvu, tumyɛ mvu bô ɛta.
40021036	Ɛ wvú bvuu tum bomew bonyii bo lemme le ɛ bó duule fele bo fwe ba, ɛ bonyii ba bvuu ge kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no bó geɛ bô bo fwe ba.
40021037	Ɛjim jodvu ɛ wvú tum wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu waa we, kpwaake lɛ bó nu egɛn ewvum waa wen wvun.
40021038	Geenɛn, ɛ wvú gɛn, ɛ bonyii bodvu dioo yɛn wvú le, jeme ɛbonɛbon lɛ, ‘Wvun nu ndiela wee wɛɛ wvun. Ben eto ɛ́ beene eyu wvú emum eyow bvushɛw bvudvu.’
40021039	Ɛ bó mum koo wvú bvuse wɛne, mum yu.”
40021040	No Jisos fɛ nɛn, mum bife lɛ, “Wee wɛɛ wvudvu nu ke edioo ɛ to ege nɛɛ bô bonyii bodvu?”
40021041	Ɛ bó tfuse lɛ, “Wvú nu ke eto elɛse lo mvunyaame mvudvu, etɛse wɛɛ wvudvu ɛ̂ bonyii bomew bò nu ke enyaa mwew mvuntam seke ŋkoy e.”
40021042	Ɛ Jisos bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben ke baa taŋ wase ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le lɛ, ‘Tɛ didvu diɛ dì bonyii bo kembom e to tunɛɛ, to nu ɛ kase nɛ tu tɛ di buu di yew e. Ɛ fifin nu ɛ ɛ̀ ge kɛ Tata, bonyii ɛ no taale kɛŋke ŋghaw’ e?
40021043	Me ɛ mum ɛ no nseŋe ɛ̂ ben lɛ, Nyo' nu ke efi bvunfon bwew can yene le, enya ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ ketum kè nu ke egee no wvú gomte le.”
40021044	[“Tɛ didvu din nu ɛ́ wee gbwe yî dvú le, ecaafiɛ lo, ɛ́ dí gbwe yî wee le, efooncɛ lo mwɛtɛn.”]
40021045	No Jisos ma ŋgan wvun nɛn, ɛ bocee ncese bo baay baay noo Bofalasii dioo yuw, mum kiɛɛ lɛ wvú ma ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛkumɛ bowen.
40021046	Ɛ bó mum no gomte keekoo wvú, geenɛn, kase fan kebombom ke bonyii le, njefo kebombom kedvu to kɛŋke Jisos lɛ ɛ̀ nu naa wee ntum Nyo'.
40022001	Ɛ Jisos bvuu no jemyi ɛ̂ bó ɛ̂ boŋgan e, ɛ wvumvu no nu lɛ,
40022002	“Bvunfon bvu fowe nu ɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó efewsɛn bô nfon mvu wvù to seysɛɛ ŋkaw bvujen bvu waa we wvù diemsɛn e.
40022003	Ɛ wvú ke tum bonceendaa bew lɛ bó egɛn etooy bonyii bò wvú to beɛ bó bô ŋkaw bvujen wvudvu lɛ bó etoò. Geenɛn, ɛ bonceendaa bodvu gɛn ɛ bonyii bodvu faŋɛ yaa to kɛ.
40022004	Ɛ wvú tum bomew bonceendaa gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, ‘Ben egɛn ejeme ɛ̂ bonyii bò me nse mbeɛ bô ŋkaw bvujen wvun lɛ bó eyekɛ eyuw, me nu ɛ nseyse wase mwɛɛm mvudien, ɛ ŋgbwo binsoŋ bi nyám e bô boom bo bona' le bò faŋkɛn. Me nu ɛ nseyse wase mwɛɛm mvunciim, lɛ bó etoò lɛ fô ŋkaw e.’
40022005	Geenɛn, ɛ bó gɛn ɛ bonyii bodvu case lo, nɛ fibole no gɛne. Ɛ wee mvu laa wɛne dvu wvú, ɛ wee mvu laa way we.
40022006	Ɛ kebɛse ke bonyii le kooyɛ bonceendaa bodvu nyɛwle bô bó, mum yuwyɛ bó.
40022007	Ɛ fitele bɛnte nfon wvudvu, ɛ wvú ciinse bonyii bew bo jem e, ɛ bó gɛn lɛse lo bonyii bò yuwyɛɛ bonceendaa bew, mum ton kelaante kebole.
40022008	No wvú ge nonɛn, mum gay ɛ̂ bonceendaa bew bomew lɛ, ‘Me nu ɛ nseyse wase ŋkaw bvujen. Geenɛn bonyii bò me nse mbeɛ ba se baa nu naa lo bonyii kɛ.
40022009	Ben egɛn ntasɛn jé le yicii, ebe bonyii bocii bò ben ɛ yɛn, lɛ bó eto fô ŋkaw bvujen wvun e.’
40022010	Ɛ bonceendaa bodvu mum buy gɛn jé le yicii, kum bonyii bocii bò bó to yɛnɛɛ, bonyii bò jee bô bò befe to dvú. Ɛ yew bvujen mum yiŋsɛn bô bonyii.
40022011	Ɛ nfon ke nɛ ley yew bvujen yidvu le keeyɛn bonyii bò to toɛ fô ŋkaw e, mum yɛn wee mvu le dvú ɛ wvú baa jise ndvú ŋkaw bvujen kɛ.
40022012	Ɛ wvú bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, ‘Nsaa yɛm, wo ghan nɛɛ ɛ sɛ ley dvun sɛ ndvú ŋkaw?’ Ɛ wee wvudvu mɛy diuw tfu.
40022013	Nonɛn, ɛ nfon mum gay ɛ̂ bonceendaa bew lɛ, ‘Ben ekay can ye noo bikaa, etfume wvú ɛ̂ ɛjiwɛ le ɛkfuŋ, jò bonyii nu ke ebeele ŋgeci bigew.’”
40022014	No Jisos jeme nonɛn, mum gay lɛ, “Ben ekeè lɛ Nyo' nu ɛ be bonyii nteen, geenɛn ɛ caw kɛ caan.”
40022015	Ɛ Bofalasii mum nɛ gɛn seyse no bó nu ege ɛ́ Jisos sɛ lowsɛn njeme ɛ́ bó ekoo wvú.
40022016	Ɛ bó mum tum boom bobole bo ŋgoo le noo ŋgoo bonyii bo Nfon 'Ɛlod e fô Jisos e. Ɛ bó gɛn jeme ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wee n'yɛɛyi bese kee naa lɛ wo nu wee kecɛɛy, ɛ wo yɛɛyi bonyii bô je yì yi Nyo' ɛ̂ je yi kecɛɛy e. Kɛ wo ké no joo lɛ wee mvu nu jɛɛy kɛ, njefo kɛ wo taale laa mwɛtɛn nu naa la lɛ.
40022017	Kɛ see ɛ̂ bese wo ŋkpwawcɛ. Nci nu ɛ bee lɛ beene elaaŋke shile ɛ̂ Kaysa, nuu fo bó elaaŋke lɛ?”
40022018	Ɛ Jisos kiɛɛ fiɛɛ fì bó wɛɛntene bô fí, mum gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben bonyii bò jemyi jɛɛy, gee jɛɛy ban, ben teeyi me nje la?
40022019	Ben eto bô bigew bì ben ké no laaŋke shile dvú ɛ́ me en'yɛn.” Ɛ bó to bô danali, nya ɛ̂ wvú.
40022020	Ɛ Jisos bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ɛkolɛ kin kè nu yî dvú le nu ke yɛɛ le? Ɛ diee nu di yɛɛ le?”
40022021	Ɛ bó tfuse lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu ke Kaysa le, ɛ diee nu kɛ tɛn diew.” Ɛ wvú mum gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben emum enyaà lɛ ɛ̂ Kaysa fiɛɛ fì ɛ̀ nu fi Kaysa le, nyaà ɛ̂ Nyo' fì ɛ̀ nu fi Nyo' le.”
40022022	Ɛ bó yuw nonɛn, ɛ diuw yum lo bó. Ɛ bó mum cinɛ wvú le nɛ no gɛne.
40022023	Kɛ ɛbvubwɛ, ɛ Bosadusii nɛ to fô Jisos e. Bosadusii nu ŋgoo bonyii bò to ké no duu lɛ kɛ bonyii nu ke ebuy yî kpwe le kɛ. No bó toɛ, mum bife ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ,
40022024	“Wee n'yɛɛyi, Muses to nu ɛ gay lɛ, ‘Ɛ́ wee kpwe lo sɛ wan, tu waa bwee kɛŋke keegɛɛ kpwɛse ɛ́ bô wvú eboo boom ɛ̂ diee di ŋkfu waa bwee wvudvu le.’
40022025	Keseen, boom bo wee mvu le to cee bee bó jan bosooshwiy. Ɛ wvu ŋgaywee ke jo kpwoon, ke ghan kpwe ɛ bô wvú baa kɛŋkɛ wan kɛ, cinɛ kpwɛse le ɛ̂ ɛjimɛ kew.
40022026	Ɛ fí kooy kɛ nonɛn bô ɛjimɛ kew noo ɛjimɛ ke wvuwɛ le, gɛn buy yî wvu bosooshwiy e.
40022027	Ɛjim jodvu, ɛ kpwoon wvudvu tɛn kpwe.
40022028	Nonɛn keseen no bó bocii bosooshwiy to nu ɛ jo kpwoon wvudvu, ɛ̀ nu ke edioo enu seke bonyii buyte yî kpwe le, ɛ́ kpwoon wvudvu enu kpwɛɛ yɛɛ?”
40022029	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben nu ɛ jay baay, ɛ ɛ̀ nu njefo kɛ ben kee fiɛɛ fì bó saŋ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le kɛ. Ɛ ben yaa kee tɛn mvuŋgay mvu Nyo' le kɛ.
40022030	Ben ekeè lɛ ɛ̀ nu ke enu seke bonyii buyte yî kpwe le, kɛ bolemsɛ bô bokɛnɛ bɛɛ ke ebvuu etaashi bvujen kɛ, ɛ bonyii yaa bɛɛ ke ebvuu enyaa boom ɛ bó taashi bvujen kɛ. Bó nu ke enu wase kɛ diɛwɛ bonceendaa bo Nyo' le fowe.
40022031	Ɛ̀ dioo nu fi ɛkumɛ mbuy wvù bonyii nu ke ebuy yî kpwe le, ben ke baa taŋ wase Ŋwa' Nyo' yuw fiɛɛ fì wvú jemyi ɛ̂ ben e? Nyo' to nu ɛ gay lɛ,
40022032	‘Ɛ̀ nu me Nyo' Abla'am bô Nyo' Aysik noo Nyo' Yakow.’ Fì nu lɛ kɛ Nyo' nu Nyo' boŋkfu kɛ, ɛ̀ nu Nyo' bonyii bò nu dvú.”
40022033	Ɛ kebombom kè to leeme fó yuw ntfuse wvù Jisos nya, ɛ diuw yum lo bó bô n'yɛɛyi we.
40022034	Ɛ Bofalasii ke dioo yuw lɛ Jisos nu ɛ baŋ lo diuw Bosadusii, ɛ bó mum baancɛ ye to fô wvú le.
40022035	Ɛ wee mvu bó le wvù to looci kee bonci bo Nyo' le, mum telɛ wvú bô mbife mvu lɛ,
40022036	“Wee n'yɛɛyi, nci wvù kuuke fele bonci bocii nu wvù la?”
40022037	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Nci wvù kuuke nu wvù gayte lɛ, ‘Ɛ̀ kooŋkè Tata wvù Nyo' wo bô fitele fiuw ficii, enya ɛkolɛ kuw ɛ̂ wvú kecii, egɛɛ bvufee bwuw yî ye le bvucii.’
40022038	Wvuwvun nu nci wvu fwe wvù kuuke fele bonci bocii.
40022039	Ɛ wvù bii wvú le nu kɛ diɛwɛ wvuwɛ le. Ɛ wvú nu lɛ, ‘Ɛ̀ kooŋkè waa bwoo no wo kooŋke ɛkolɛ kuw.’
40022040	Mwɛɛm mvunciim mvù nu ɛ̂ Ŋwa' bonci le, noo mvù nu ɛ̂ Boŋwa' bo bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le, leeme ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî bonci bo bofɛɛ ban e.”
40022041	No Bofalasii to nu ɛ bó taashɛ fó, ɛ Jisos mum nɛ bife mbife mvu ɛ̂ bó lɛ,
40022042	“Ben kpwaake lɛ la ɛkumɛ Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ? Ben kpwaake lɛ ɛ̀ nu waa yɛɛ?” Ɛ bó tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu waa Nfon Dawe.”
40022043	Ɛ Jisos kase bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “No ɛ̀ nu waa Nfon Dawe, ɛ fí ghan nɛɛ ɛ Keyoy ke Yuule sɛ ge ɛ Dawe no teŋe wvú lɛ Tata wen? Dawe to nu ɛ jeme lɛ,
40022044	‘Tata Nyo' to nu ɛ gay ɛ̂ Tata wɛm lɛ wvú eshii ɛ̂ ɛbo kew ke ɛcɛɛy e, egɛn ebuy seke wen ke ejike bonyii bew bo bvuban e ɛ́ wvú etome bikaa biew yî bó le.’
40022045	Ɛ́ Dawe fɛn teŋe wvú lɛ Tata wen, ɛ́ wvú ebvuu eghan nɛɛ sɛ no nu waa we?”
40022046	No Jisos jeme nɛn, ɛ wee faŋɛ yaa nu dvú mwaaŋ wvù etfuse fiɛɛ ɛ̂ wvú kɛ. Ɛ kɛw tɛn ɛbvubwɛ le, ɛ wee faŋɛ yaa ke ebvuu emom lo ebife fiɛɛ ɛ̂ wvú kɛ.
40023001	Ɛ Jisos mum nɛ jeme ɛ̂ kebombom ke bonyii le bô boom bew bo ŋgoo le lɛ,
40023002	“Bonyii bò duŋci bonci bô Bofalasii nu bonyii bò nu ɛ jo kentaw ke Muses e.
40023003	Fí ɛ mum ɛ no nu lɛ, ben eyuukè fiɛɛ ficii fì bó seŋe ɛ̂ ben, mum geè. Geenɛn, fo ben egeè fiɛɛ fì bó gee kɛ, njefo bó fewci jɛɛy, gee jɛɛy.
40023004	Bó nɛn'yi yilɛ bvujitɛ ɛ bvú fele mvuŋgay mvu bonyii le yikɛ bonyii dvú, ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu naa lo ɛ́ bó kebɛɛ emom keelaw kɛ naa lo kpwan ɛbo keeficɛ bó kɛ.
40023005	Mwɛɛm mvù bó gee mvunciim nu kɛ keege lɛ bonyii eyɛnè bó le. Mvuŋkuw mvubole mvu Ŋwa' Nyo' le nu naa mvù kukene. Ɛ mvunjɛɛŋkɛn mvu ŋgem ndvú yibo le nu naa mvù dewkene.
40023006	Bó ké gɛne fô ŋkaw e no kooŋke keeshii kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô bonyii ewvumte bó, ké gɛn yéw bunle le no kooŋke kɛ keeshii ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî bintaw bi fwe le.
40023007	Bó ké no kooŋke tɛn keelɛne ɛ̂ way ɛ bonyii gayte bó le, bvuu kooŋke lɛ bonyii eteŋè bó lɛ Bolabay.
40023008	Geenɛn, fo wee ebeŋè ɛ bonyii teŋe wvú lɛ Labay kɛ, njefo ben kɛŋke Wee N'yɛɛyi kɛ mwaaŋ maaŋ, ɛ ben bocii nu boom bo bwee wan e.
40023009	Fo ben eteŋè wee mvu yî nshɛ le fɛn lɛ ɛ̀ nu icee wene kɛ, njefo ben kɛŋke Icee wene mwaaŋ wvù nu fowe.
40023010	Fo wee ebeŋè ɛ bó teŋe wvú lɛ Cee Ɛkolɛ kɛ, njefo Cee Ɛkolɛ wene nu kɛ mwaaŋ wvù ɛ̀ nu Klistu.
40023011	Wee wvu baay ɛ̂ ben ɛntelɛŋ kɛŋke keenu wee wvù lemte lo ben e.
40023012	Naa yɛɛ wvù bensee ɛkolɛ kew, nu ɛ Nyo' nu ke eshike lo wvú, ɛ naa yɛɛ wvù shiwse ɛkolɛ kew, nu ɛ Nyo' nu ke ebense lo wvú.
40023013	Ŋgɛw wvu baay nu wene ben bonyii bò duŋci bonci noo ben Bofalasii. Ben nu bonyii bò jemyi jɛɛy, gee jɛɛy! Ben leeme ɛjise jo bonyii baŋyi je yì leyte bvunfon bvu fowe le. Kɛ ben kooŋke keeley bvú le kɛ, ɛ bvuu ɛ no baaŋke je fo bonyii bò kooŋke keeley e. [
40023014	Ŋgɛw wvu baay nu wene ben bonyii bò duŋci bonci noo ben Bofalasii. Ben looci shiwse lo bokɛ' bo boŋkfu le, gee dibunle dì dewkene keeduuŋke ye. Ben ekeè lɛ wene ŋgɛw nu ke efo lo.]
40023015	Ŋgɛw wvu baay nu wene ben bonyii bò duŋci bonci noo ben Bofalasii. Ben nu bonyii bò jemyi jɛɛy, gee jɛɛy! Ben nɛn'yi lɛn woŋ tfuu bvuu lente jóo yi baay baay kɛ lɛ ben gomte wee mwaaŋ wvù ebaŋke etu wee wene mbee. Ɛ́ wvú ké tu wase wee wene mbee, ɛ ben kase ge ɛ fiew mɛse fo lo, ɛ wvú no nu wase wee ŋguy wvu baay kɛ diɛwɛ ben e.
40023016	Ŋgɛw wvu baay nu wene. Ben nu binfefe duu lɛ ben duŋci je ɛ̂ bonyii! Ben nu bonyii bò duu lɛ, ‘Ɛ́ wee jeme fiɛɛ, ɛ kan diee di yew ncese le, tu kɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ kɛ. Geenɛn, ɛ́ wee jeme fiɛɛ ɛ kan ɛ ɛ̀ nu diee di ketwaa ke bigew e kè yɛɛle ke yew ncese le, tu wvú kɛŋke keege no wvú jeme ɛ kan.’
40023017	Binfefe bin! Ben nu biyuŋ! Fiɛɛ fì kuuke fele fimew nu fì la? Ɛ̀ baay kuuke ketwaa ke bigew e kè yɛɛle, nuu yew ncese yì gee ɛ ketwaa kedvu sɛ nu fiɛɛ fì ɛ̀ nu fi Nyo' le lɛ?
40023018	Ben jemyi tɛn lɛ, ‘Ɛ́ wee jeme fiɛɛ ɛ kan diee di ketaŋ ke ncese le, tu kɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ kɛ. Geenɛn ɛ́ wee jeme fiɛɛ ɛ kan ɛ ɛ̀ nu diee di fiɛɛ fì wee nya ncese dvú, tu wvú kɛŋke keege no wvú jeme ɛ kan.’
40023019	Binfefe bin! Fiɛɛ fì kuuke fele fimew nu fì la? Ɛ̀ baay nnya yidvu kuuke, nuu ketaŋ ke ncese le kè gee ɛ nnya yidvu sɛ nu fiɛɛ fì ɛ̀ nu fi Nyo' le lɛ?
40023020	Fiɛɛ fì nu, nu lɛ ɛ́ wee kan diee di ketaŋ ke ncese le, tu wvú kan nonɛn ɛ kan noo mwɛɛm mvunciim mvu yî dvú le.
40023021	Ɛ́ wee kan diee di yew ncese le, tu wvú kan nonɛn ɛ kan noo Nyo' wvù cee dvú.
40023022	Ɛ́ wee kan woŋ wvu we, tu wvú kan ɛ ɛ̀ nu kawla Nyo' noo wvú wvù Nyo' wvù shiile yî dvú le.
40023023	Ŋgɛw wvu baay nu wene ben bonyii bò duŋci bonci noo ben Bofalasii. Ben nu bonyii bò jemyi jɛɛy, gee jɛɛy! Ben ké no nyaa keba kemwaaŋ ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛnte jo biba yuufe bi mbáse yicii yì ben keeke naa noo mwɛɛm jɛɛy jɛɛy mvù ben keeke gɛɛle ɛ̂ mbáse le lɛ yí eshumte, geenɛn laaŋke fiɛɛ fì jite fì nci jemyi ɛkumɛ fí lɛ ben egeè, fì ɛ̀ nu keegee mwɛɛm lɛŋ fô bonyii le, camte shen fô bonyii le noo keelese fitele yî Nyo' le. Ben be kɛŋke keegeè mwɛɛm mvudvu mvunciim yaa cin'yi fimew e kɛ.
40023024	Binfefe bì duŋci je ɛ̂ bonyii! Ben kuŋyi yɛɛguu bvuuse ɛ̂ mbvuum e, geenɛn kaa mii nyam yi baay ɛshem!
40023025	Ŋgɛw wvu baay nu wene ben bonyii bò duŋci bonci noo ben Bofalasii. Ben nu bonyii bò jemyi jɛɛy, gee jɛɛy! Ben cuke mvuŋkom bô shúw ye le, geenɛn ɛ mwɛɛm mvù nu ɛ yiŋsɛn jó nu mvù ben loci ɛ̂ bonyii noo mvù ben yɛɛle ɛjisɛ dvú.
40023026	Binfefe bi Bofalasii le, ben eyaw ecukɛ mvuŋkom bô shúw ɛnte, wvu lɛ mvú emum eyuule tɛn ye le.
40023027	Ŋgɛw wvu baay nu wene ben bonyii bò duŋci bonci noo ben Bofalasii. Ben nu bonyii bò jemyi jɛɛy, gee jɛɛy! Ben nu diɛwɛ jém yì bó nu ɛ seyse ɛ yefe yí ɛ no baa yen'yi ɛjise jee, geenɛn ɛ ɛnte jodvu nu ɛ jó ɛ yiŋsɛn bô bikufɛ bi biŋkpwe bi bonyii le noo mwɛɛm mvunciim mvu nyɛne.
40023028	Ɛ̀ nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no ben yen'yi ɛjise lɛ ben nu bonyii bo teytey, geenɛn ɛ ɛnte nu ɛ ben ɛ yiŋsɛn bô kenlɛɛma noo gee dì befe.
40023029	Ŋgɛw wvu baay nu wene ben bonyii bò duŋci bonci noo ben Bofalasii. Ben nu bonyii bò jemyi jɛɛy, gee jɛɛy! Ben bomte jém bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le, feele tɛn jém bonyii bò to kɛŋke nce wvu teytey seyse ɛ yí jee.
40023030	Ben gee nonɛn gayte lɛ, ‘Ɛ́ bese to bee nu wase dvú kefew ke bo'icee bosɛse le, tu bese to baa leem fisɛse fô fiɛɛ fì bó to gee keeyuwyi bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le kɛ.’
40023031	Ben jemyi nonɛn, jemyi ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛkumɛ bikuu binɛn mum tomte bô dew yene lɛ ben nu naa boom bo bonyii bò to yuwyɛɛ bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le.
40023032	Ben emum egɛn lo fwe emɛse lemme dì bo'icee bonɛn to kɛwɛɛ!
40023033	Yó yin! Ɛŋgokɛ ke yó le kin! Ben kpwaake lɛ ben nu ke enu sɛ bó ɛ lese ben ŋguy wvu baay e?
40023034	No fí nu nonɛn, me ɛ mum ɛ no ntumte bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le fô ben e noo bonyii bo bvufee le bô bonyii bò duŋci bonci. Ben nu ke eyuwyɛ bomew, etawyɛ bomew yî bintam e, etam bomew yéw yene bunle le, ebone bikaa ɛ̂ bomew ɛjim bilaante bicii bì bó gɛne bí le.
40023035	Ben nu ke egeè nonɛn wvu lɛ ɛlɛmɛ ke bonyii bocii bò to cee nce wvu teytey yî nshɛ le bò bó yuwyɛɛ enù fô ben ɛfa. Ɛlɛmɛ kin nu ke enù fô ben ɛfa ɛ kɛw yî ke Abɛl wvù bó yuɛ sɛ wvú kɛŋke jay e, ɛ to ɛ buy yî ke Sakalia wvù waa Belekaya wvù ben to yuɛ ɛntelɛŋ jo yew ncese bô ketaŋ ke ncese le.
40023036	Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy lɛ, lon mwɛɛm mvun mvunciim nu ke ekoo ɛŋgokɛ ke keseen kin.”
40023037	No Jisos jeme nɛn, mum bɛm lɛ, “Ɛbɛɛy Jelusalɛm! Ɛbɛɛy Jɛlusalɛm! Wo wvù yuwyi bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le, bvuu tumyi bonyii bò Nyo' tumte fô wo le bô ɛta! Ɛ̀ nu wase bokaŋ bomɛɛ no me mom keembaancɛ boom buw kɛ diɛwɛ no bweeshie ké baancɛ boom bew kfukɛ ɛ̂ bibɛ biew e, wo ɛ faŋ?
40023038	Taa eyɛn, bó nu ɛ laŋ wase yew yo, ɛ yí nu etu binffuy.
40023039	Me nseŋe lo ɛ̂ wo lɛ kɛ wo bɛɛ ke ebvuu eyɛn me le kɛ, egɛn ebuy kefew kè wo ke egay lɛ, ‘Nyo' nu ɛ laŋ kembonɛn yî wee wvù too ɛ̂ diee di Tata Nyo' le.’”
40024001	Ɛ Jisos ke buy yew ncese le, ke dioo gɛne, ɛ boom bew bo ŋgoo le bencɛ to mbew ye le no duŋci yéw yi fô yew ncese le ɛ̂ wvú.
40024002	Geenɛn, ɛ Jisos jeme ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben yɛne yéw yin e? Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy lɛ kɛ tɛ dimwaaŋ nu ke eshɛɛ yî dimew e sɛ bó ɛ base fokuse kɛ.”
40024003	Ɛ Jisos ke dioo gɛn ben shii yî Kum Bite bi Olif e, ɛ boom bew bo ŋgoo le bencɛ to ɛbonɛbon fô wvú le bife lɛ, “Kɛ see ɛ̂ bese kefew kè fiɛɛ fidvu fin nu ke ekooy, noo nciise wvù nu ke eduŋcɛ kefew kè wo nu ke ekase eto noo lɛ woŋ kaa wase?”
40024004	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben eyɛnè fo wee ke elɛɛ ben ɛ́ ben ejay je.
40024005	Ben ekeè lɛ bonyii nteen nu ke etoo joo diee diem tɛɛke fojise, ɛ wee duu lɛ ɛ̀ nu wen wvù Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ. Ɛ́ bó dioo gee nonɛn emum elɛɛle bonyii nteen ɛ bó jayte je.
40024006	Ben nu ke eyuuke lɛ bó tumte jem, bvuu yuuke tɛn bosaaka lɛ jem nu enu. Fo ben ke dioo eyuuke nonɛn, ɛ finteem no buyte ben kɛ. Mvumvun nu mwɛɛm mvù kɛŋke keeke ekooy. Geenɛn ɛ mvú yaa mum duŋci lɛ woŋ kaa wase kɛ.
40024007	Ketum nu ke etumte jem bô kemew, ɛ nfon mvu tumte jem bô wvumvu. Jeŋ nu ke ekoole, ɛ nshɛ shiike mondvuum e mondvuum e.
40024008	Ɛ mvumvun mvunciim bɛɛ kɛ lo mvun'yaŋ kɛ diɛwɛ seke kpwoon ɛ kɛw lume.
40024009	Bonyii nu ke enya ben ɛ́ bó enyɛwle bô ben, eyuwyɛ ben. Bitum bicii nu ke ebane ben nje diee diem.
40024010	Nonɛn ɛ́ bonyii nteen emum etfuw bikaa ɛ̂ me ɛjim, banene, geese bikuu bibole.
40024011	Ɛ bonyii nteen bò mbiayte lɛ ɛ̀ tum Nyo' bó nu ke ebuynɛn emum elɛɛle bonyii nteen.
40024012	No kebefɛ nu ke eduule kɛ gɛne lo fwe, nu ɛ fí nu ke ege ɛ́ keŋkoŋɛn ke bonyii le nteen emum ewɛɛ.
40024013	Geenɛn, wee wvù nu ke ekuu shém egɛn ebuy fokemɛse nu wvù nu ke eboy.
40024014	Ɛ bó kɛŋke kɛ keeke efewcɛ saaka wvù jee wvun wvu ɛkumɛ bvunfon bvu Nyo' le egɛn ebuy yî ɛkolɛ ke nshɛ le kecii ɛ́ bitum bicii eyuw, nonɛn ɛ́ woŋ sɛ keeke eka.
40024015	Nonɛn seke ben ɛ yɛn ɛ kemaante ke fiɛɛ le kè nulo ejiŋ bvudvuu kè wee ntum Nyo' wvù Dania to jemyɛɛ ɛkumɛ kí, ɛ kí leeme wase yew ncese le, (wee wvù taaŋke ŋwa' wvun eyuw fin ntay,)
40024016	ɛ bonyii bò nu Judea mum fɛɛ ben yî dikum e.
40024017	Fo wee wvù nu ɛ̂ yew we dioo ɛ shii bvuu ley keejo fiɛɛ fì nu yew kɛ.
40024018	Fo wvù nu wɛne ebvuu ekfulɛ lɛ wen egɛn ejo ndvu ye yi bulɛɛn kɛ.
40024019	Ŋgɛw wvu baay ɛdiuw yoya le nu ke enu wvu bokɛnɛ bò nu bô difue, noo bò yamsee boom e.
40024020	Ben ebunleè lɛ fo kenlewtɛ kin ke enu ɛ ɛ̀ nu kefew ke nffum e, kɛnɛɛ diuu di mbam e kɛ,
40024021	njefo ŋgɛw wvu baay nu ke enu kefew kekiɛ lɛ, ɛ kfuu wvuwɛ ŋgɛw ke baa yuu nu wase ɛ kɛw no woŋ to kɛwɛɛ ɛ to ɛ buy keseen e, ɛ kɛ kfuu wvuwɛ bɛɛ ke ebvuu eyuu enu dvú kɛ.
40024022	Ɛ́ Nyo' to baa fafe ɛdiuw ɛ ŋgɛw wvudvu, tu kɛ wee wvu wum mwaaŋ bee ke eboy kɛ. Geenɛn Nyo' nu ɛ fafe ɛdiuw yodvu nje bonyii bew bò wvú nu ɛ caw.
40024023	Ɛ̀ nu ke edioo enu sekekiɛ wee ɛ́ jeme ɛ̂ ben lɛ, ‘Ben etaa eyɛn, Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ wvun fɛn!’ Kɛnɛɛ lɛ, ‘Wvuwe fofe!’ Fo ben ebee kɛ.
40024024	Ben ekeè lɛ bonyii nu ke etoo mbiayte lɛ bowen nu bomboyse bò Nyo' to kawɛɛ, ɛ bomew duu lɛ bowen nu bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le, emum egee mwɛɛm mvù tɛmyi mvù duŋci mvuŋgay mvubole, egee tɛn mwɛɛm mvu diuw wvù yumɛɛn e wvu lɛ bó elɛɛ bonyii ɛ́ bó ejay je, lɛɛ naa noo bonyii bò Nyo' nu ɛ caw, fɛn ɛ́ je nu dvú.
40024025	Ben eyekɛ eyuw, me nu ɛ nsee wase mwɛɛm mvun ɛ̂ ben ɛ́ mvú sɛ keeke ekooyi.
40024026	Nonɛn, ɛ́ bonyii nɛ ɛ no gayte ɛ̂ ben lɛ, ‘Ben etaa eyɛn, Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ wɛ ŋkpwaante,’ fo ben egɛn jó kɛ. Kɛnɛɛ lɛ, ‘Ben etaa eyɛn, wvuwɛ yew ɛnte,’ fo ben ebee bó le kɛ.
40024027	Ben ekeè lɛ no jaŋ ké lawte we ɛ̂ keba ke diuu sane le, ba gɛn buy jò diuu seeyi, nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no nto wee wvù diee nu Waawee nu ke enu.
40024028	‘Naa fɛɛ fò keŋkpwe ke fiɛɛ le nu, nu kɛ fó fò boŋguluŋ nu etaashi.’
40024029	Kaŋ mwaaŋ seke kefew ke ŋgɛw wvu baay wvun e ɛ to wase ɛ fey, ɛ́ diuu nɛ esɛsɛ ejimɛ, kpwee saa ebvuu ebaa kɛ, ɛ́ jón enɛ fowe egbwekɛn, ɛ́ mwɛɛm mvu fowe mvunciim mvù kɛŋke mvuŋgay eshiike.
40024030	Ɛ́ nciise wee wvù diee nu Waawee emum ebuynɛn yî ɛbulɛ le. Ɛ́ bitum bicii bi yî nshɛ le emum ekɛw effule lo bô kpwe. Bonyii nu ke eyɛn no wee wvù diee nu Waawee shiile too ɛ̂ kembɛw e fowe bô mvuŋgay noo bvukukɛ bvu baay.
40024031	Soŋ yi baay nu ke edioo ɛ jeme foweɛwe, ɛ́ wvú emum eciinse bonceendaa bew ɛ́ bó egɛn ɛbuw ɛ woŋ yo ɛna le noo fowe, ebaancɛ bonyii bew bò wvú nu ɛ caw.
40024032	Ben eyɛɛyi fiɛɛ yî keŋgvum e. Tíɛw ye ké boci, ɛ́ bibɛ ekɛw etɛɛke yî dvú le, ɛ́ ben mum kiɛɛ lɛ ɛkfuŋ kumene wase.
40024033	Ɛ̀ nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no ben nu ke edioo ɛ yɛn mwɛɛm mvun e mvunciim, ɛ́ ben emum ekiɛɛ lɛ wvú nu wase nceencee naa wase ɛ̂ yew fwese.
40024034	Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy lɛ kɛ ɛŋgokɛ ke keseen kin nu ke eka sɛ mwɛɛm mvun mvunciim ɛ kooy wase kɛ.
40024035	Ɛbulɛ bô nshɛ nu ke eka, geenɛn kɛ diɛw yɛm nu ke eyuu eshiw kɛ.
40024036	Kɛ wee nu dvú wvù kee diuu didvu kɛnɛɛ kefew kɛ. Kɛ naa bonceendaa bo Nyo' le bo fowe kɛnɛɛ Waa Nyo' kee tɛn kɛ. Ɛ̀ kee kɛ Nyo' Ice wvú ɛmbeŋ.
40024037	Kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no fí to nu kefew ke Noa' le nu kɛ no fí nu ke enu seke wee wvù diee nu Waawee kaase too.
40024038	Ɛ̀ to nu ɛ joo baa yiŋsɛn wase yî ɛkolɛ ke nshɛ le, ɛ bonyii nu fibole diekene bvuu wukene, ɛ bokɛnɛ bô bolemsɛ taashi bvujen, ɛ bonyii nyaa boom ɛ bolemsɛ taashi bvujen bô bó, ke gɛn buy diuu dì Noa' to leyɛɛ ɛ̂ ŋguw e,
40024039	ɛ bonyii bodvu yaa kee fiɛɛ fì nu ekooy kɛ, gɛn buy seke joo to yiŋsɛnɛɛ yî nshɛ le, kuu bó bocii gɛn dvú. Ɛ̀ nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no fí nu ke enu diuu dì wee wvù diee nu Waawee nu ke eto le.
40024040	Bolemsɛ bofɛɛ nu ke enu wɛne, ɛ́ bó ejo mwaaŋ ɛ́ mwaaŋ eshɛɛ.
40024041	Ɛ bokɛnɛ bofɛɛ nu ke egooke bvulɛm fodien, ɛ́ bó ejo mwaaŋ ɛ́ mwaaŋ eshɛɛ.
40024042	Nonɛn, ben emum ecɛytè njefo kɛ ben kee diuu dì Tata wene nu ke eto kɛ.
40024043	Ben ekeè lɛ ɛ́ cee yew kee kefew kè cooŋ nu ke eto ɛntaŋ, ɛ́ wvú ecɛyte, wvú saa ke ecinɛ ɛ́ bó eto eŋgoy yew ye kɛ.
40024044	Fí ɛ mum ɛ no nu lɛ, ben tɛn kɛŋke keecɛytè njefo wee wvù diee nu Waawee nu ke eto ɛ̂ kefew kè ben yaa kee kɛ le.
40024045	Waa lemme wvù nu wvu kecɛɛy bvuu kɛŋke bvufee nu wvù la? Kɛ ɛ̀ nu wvuwɛ wvù cee ɛkolɛ we nu ɛ gɛɛ wvú lɛ wvú etaalè fô yew ye le, lɛ kefew ke edioo ɛ kocɛn, ɛ wvú nya mwɛɛm mvudien mvu boom bo lemme le ɛ̂ bó le?
40024046	Njoŋ wvu baay nu ke enu wvu waa lemme wvuwɛ wvù cee ɛkolɛ we nu ke edioo etoo eyɛn ɛ wvú gee lemme lɛŋlɛŋ no wvú bee keegee.
40024047	Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy lɛ cee ɛkolɛ we nu ke ebense wvú ɛ́ wvú etaale fô mwɛɛm mwew e mvunciim.
40024048	Geenɛn ɛ́ waa lemme wvudvu nɛ ɛ no nu wvù kɛŋke keŋge kè befe, ɛ jeme ɛ̂ ɛkolɛ kew lɛ, ‘Kɛ cee ɛkolɛ wɛm nu ke eyaŋsɛn ekase eto kɛ’,
40024049	ɛ mum ɛ kɛw ɛ no suuŋke boom bo lemme le bomew bò bô bó lemte, diekene bvuu wukene bô bonyii bò wuwte mbvuum,
40024050	tu cee ɛkolɛ we nu ke enɛ esɛsɛ ebuynɛn diuu dimew dì wvú yaa be kpwaake le noo ɛ̂ kefew kè wvú yaa be kee le kɛ.
40024051	Wvú nu ke edioo ɛ buynɛn nonɛn, emum enya ŋgɛw ɛ̂ waa lemme wvudvu, eciinse wvú ɛ́ wvú egɛn enu ŋgoo bonyii bò jemyi jɛɛy, gee jɛɛy e, ɛ ɛ̀ nu fó fò bonyii nu ke ebeele ŋgeci bigew.”
40025001	“Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó emum efewsɛn bvunfon bvu fowe bô ŋgón bokɛnɛ bomew yuufe bò to joɛ bin'yeese bibole, buy keegɛn efiisɛn cee bvujen mvu.
40025002	Bó to nu nonɛn ɛ bo botin nu biyuŋ, ɛ bo botin feefene.
40025003	Fì nu lɛ bò to nu biyuŋ to dioo jo bin'yeese bibole faŋɛ yaa jo mɛɛm momew kɛ,
40025004	geenɛn ɛ bò to feefene jo bibole bin'yeese jo mɛɛm momew mbew yî dvú le.
40025005	Ɛ bó gɛn no cɛyte cee bvujen wvudvu, ɛ wvú no dvuyte keeto, ɛ nyii mum nɛ no yɛɛke bó, ɛ bó mum lefe.
40025006	Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu ɛntaŋ ɛntelɛŋ, ɛ bó nɛ yuw ɛ wee wvule lɛ, ‘Eeeee, ben etaa eyɛn, cee bvujen wvun ɛɛɛ! Ben ebuy eto efiisɛn wvú lɛɛɛ.’
40025007	Ɛ ŋgón bokɛnɛ ba bocii mum ja we bense bin'yeese bibole.
40025008	Ɛ ŋgón bokɛnɛ bò to nu biyuŋ ba gay ɛ̂ bò to feefene ba lɛ, ‘Ben enya kɛ bese bô mɛɛm monɛn momew. Bin'yeese bisɛse shiile wa lo.’
40025009	Geenɛn ɛ bò to feefene ba tfuse lɛ, ‘Kɛ ɛ̀ nɛlo ɛ́ mó ekocɛn fô beene le bocii kɛ. Ben egɛn ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô bonyii bò geese le, eguy monɛn.’
40025010	No bó to gɛne keeguy, ɛ cee bvujen mum shɛɛ fɛse. Ɛ ba bò to nu ɛ seyse wase ye ɛ no cɛyte, mum gɛn ley bô wvú yew ŋkaw bvujen e, ɛ bó mum faa kembuŋ.
40025011	Ɛjim jodvu ɛ ŋgón bokɛnɛ bomew ba bò to gɛnɛɛ keeguy mɛɛm fɛse, leem ɛ̂ yew fwese no gayte lɛ, ‘Cee ɛkolɛ, cee ɛkolɛ, yene kembuŋ ɛ́ bese eley.’
40025012	Geenɛn, ɛ wvú tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, ‘Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy lɛ kɛ me ŋkee ben kɛ.’
40025013	Fí ɛ mum ɛ no nu lɛ, ben eseyse ye, ecɛytè, njefo kɛ ben yaa kee diuu kɛnɛɛ kefew kè me nu ŋke eŋkase nto kɛ.
40025014	Kefew kedvu nu ɛ fí nu ke enu diɛwɛ wee mvu wvù to nu keegɛn ghane, tee boom bew bo lemme le gɛɛ kpwaw we can yibole.
40025015	Wvú to nu ɛ nya mvu waa lemme bikele bi bigew e bitin, nya mvu bikele bifɛɛ, nya mvu ɛkɛlɛ ke bigew e kemwaaŋ. Wvú to nyaa kɛ bii no mvuŋgay mvu wee le nu. No wvú nyaɛ nonɛn, mum laa ghane diew.
40025016	Ɛ waa lemme wvù to fiɛ bikele bi bigew e bitin mum gɛn lo kaŋ mwaaŋ ge way dvú, die sɛw bikele bitin.
40025017	Ɛ wvù to fiɛ bikele bifɛɛ ge tɛn way, die sɛw bikele bifɛɛ.
40025018	Geenɛn, ɛ waa lemme wvù to fiɛ ɛkɛlɛ kemwaaŋ wɛ, gɛn fiew cim fokuse nyilɛ bigew bi cee ɛkolɛ we le bidvu fó.
40025019	Ɛ cee ɛkolɛ boom bo lemme le bodvu ke laa ghane diɛ, gɛn ce jó baay. Ɛ wvú ke dioo kase to, mum tee boom bew bo lemme le lɛ bô bó ekpwaŋsɛn mwɛɛm.
40025020	Ɛ waa lemme wvù to fiɛ bikele bi bigew e bitin mum to wase bô bikele yuufe, gay lɛ, ‘Cee ɛkolɛ, wo to nya me bikele bi bigew e bitin, taa eyɛn me nu ɛ nshɛɛ ɛ ŋge way dvú, ɛ ŋkɛŋkɛ bimew bikele bitin ɛ̂ we jodvu.’
40025021	Ɛ cee ɛkolɛ we gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, ‘Keyoone baay. Wo nu waa lemme wvù jee bvuu nu wvu kecɛɛy! Wo se nu ɛ shɛɛ ɛ kiɛɛ keetaa fô fiɛɛ fi caan e ntay. Nonɛn, me nu eŋgɛɛ wo keseen ɛ́ wo etaale wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô fi baay e. Leyɛ lɛ ɛnte jo bvujoŋkɛ bvu cee ɛkolɛ wo le.’
40025022	Ɛ waa lemme wvù biew bigew to nu bikele bifɛɛ to tɛn, gay lɛ, ‘Cee ɛkolɛ, wo to nya me bikele bi bigew e bifɛɛ. Taa eyɛn, me nu ɛ nshɛɛ ɛ ŋge way dvú, ɛ ŋkɛŋkɛ bimew bikele bi bigew e bifɛɛ ɛ̂ we jodvu.’
40025023	Ɛ cee ɛkolɛ we gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, ‘Keyoone baay. Wo nu waa lemme wvù jee bvuu nu wvu kecɛɛy! Wo se nu ɛ shɛɛ ɛ kiɛɛ keetaa fô fiɛɛ fi caan e. Nonɛn, me nu eŋgɛɛ wo keseen ɛ́ wo etaale wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô fi baay e. Leyɛ lɛ ɛnte jo bvujoŋkɛ bvu cee ɛkolɛ wo le.’
40025024	Ɛ waa lemme wvumvu wɛ wvù to fiɛ ɛkɛlɛ ke bigew e kemwaaŋ to tɛn, gay lɛ, ‘Cee ɛkolɛ, me ŋkee lɛ wo nu wee wvù tɛmyi ɛjim. Wo ké no gbweci ɛ wo baa jewe kɛ, baanci ɛgiŋ ɛ wo baa lɛ kɛ.
40025025	Nonɛn me nse ɛ mum ɛ nfan ɛ ŋgɛn ɛ nyilɛ bigew biuw fokuse. Taa eyɛn, bigew biuw bin, jicɛ.’
40025026	Ɛ cee ɛkolɛ we tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, ‘Wo nu waa lemme wvù befe, nu keŋkpwen! Wo se kee lɛ me ŋké no ŋgbweci ɛ me mbaa njewe kɛ, mbaanci ɛgiŋ ɛ mbaa nlɛ kɛ.
40025027	No wo se kee nonɛn, tu wo se bee egɛɛ bigew biem ntfu wvu lɛ seke me ɛ ŋkase enfi bigew biem bidvu bô sɛw ɛ̂ we jodvu.’
40025028	No wvú gay nonɛn, mum gay lɛ bó efi ɛkɛlɛ ke bigew e kedvu ɛ̂ wvú, enya ɛ̂ wvù kɛŋke bikele bi bigew e yuufe.
40025029	Lɛ bó ekeè lɛ wee wvù kɛŋke nu ɛ bó nu ke ebise ɛ́ wvú ekɛŋke nteen. Geenɛn ɛ wee wvù baa kɛŋke, nu ɛ naa fi caan fì wvú kɛŋke nu ɛ bó nu ke efi lo ɛ̂ wvú.
40025030	No wvú gay nonɛn mum gay lɛ, ‘Ben etfume kenɛnɛ ke waa lemme le kin ɛ̂ ɛjiwɛ le ɛkfuŋ, fô bonyii nu ke ebeele ŋgeci bigew.’
40025031	Ɛ̀ nu ke edioo enu kefew kè wee wvù diee nu Waawee kaase too ɛ̂ bvukukɛ bwew e, ɛ wvú too bô bonceendaa bo Nyo' le bocii, ɛ́ wvú emum eshii yî kawla we bvukukɛ le.
40025032	Bitum bicii bi yî ɛkolɛ ke nshɛ le nu ke ebaancɛ ɛ̂ wvú fwe, ɛ́ wvú emum egaw bó diɛwɛ no wee ncɛy ké gaw njée bvuse ɛ̂ bíe tewe le.
40025033	Wvú nu ke egɛɛ njée ɛbo ɛcɛɛy, gɛɛ bíe tewe ɛbo ɛŋkoŋko.
40025034	Wvú wvù Nfon nu ke emum egay ɛ̂ ba bò nu ɛbo ɛcɛɛy lɛ, ‘Bonyii bò Icɛm nu ɛ laŋ kembonɛn yî bó le, ben eto ekɛŋkɛ bvudvuu ɛnte jo bvunfon bvù wvú to seysɛɛ fô ben e ɛ kɛw no bó to bomɛɛ woŋ,
40025035	njefo jeŋ to yuu me, ɛ ben nya me bô mwɛɛm mvudien. Kendoŋ to yumte me, ɛ ben nya me bô fiɛɛ ɛ me ŋ'wu. Me nto nu tolo, ɛ ben fiisɛn me.
40025036	Me nto nu kenyi kencimte, ɛ ben jise ndvu yî yɛm e. Me nto ncɛmte ɛ ben to gay me le. Me nto nu yew ncaw e, ɛ ben to gay me le.’
40025037	Wvú nu ke edioo ɛ gay nonɛn, ɛ́ bonyii bo teytey bodvu emum ebife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, ‘Tata, ɛ̀ nu seke la wvù bese to yɛnɛɛ wo le ɛ jeŋ yuu wo, ɛ bese nya mwɛɛm mvudien ɛ̂ wo, kɛnɛɛ seke la wvù kendoŋ to yumte wo ɛ bese nya fiɛɛ ɛ wo wu?
40025038	Ɛ̀ nu seke la wvù bese to yɛnɛɛ wo le ɛ wo nu tolo, ɛ bese fiisɛn wo, kɛnɛɛ kenyi kencimte, ɛ bese jise ndvu yî yo le?
40025039	Ɛ ɛ̀ nu seke la wvù bese to yɛnɛɛ wo le ɛ wo cɛmte kɛnɛɛ nu yew ncaw e, ɛ bese to gay wo le?’
40025040	Nfon nu ke emum etfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, ‘Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy lɛ no ben to geɛ mwɛɛm mvun, kɛ naa fô wee wvu caan boom bo bwɛɛm e ban e, nu ɛ ben to ge ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô me le.’
40025041	Nonɛn, wvú nu ke emum egay ɛ̂ ba bò nu ɛbo ɛŋkoŋko lɛ, ‘Ben bò lon nu ɛ koo, ben enɛ lo ɛ̂ me ɛjise, egɛn eley ŋguy wvù mɛy lo wvù bó to seysɛɛ fô dɛwle bô bonceendaa bew e,
40025042	njefo jeŋ to yuu me, ɛ ben faŋɛ yaa enya me bô fiɛɛ fidien kɛ. Kendoŋ to yumte me, ɛ ben faŋɛ yaa enya me bô fiɛɛ ɛ́ me eŋ'wu kɛ.
40025043	Me nto nu tolo, ɛ ben faŋɛ yaa efiisɛn me kɛ. Me nto nu kenyi kencimte, ɛ ben faŋɛ yaa ejise ndvu yî yɛm e kɛ. Me nto ncɛmte, mbvuu no nu yew ncaw e, ɛ ben faŋɛ yaa eto egay me le kɛ.’
40025044	Bó tɛn nu ke emum bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, ‘Tata, ɛ̀ nu seke la wvù bese to yɛnɛɛ wo le ɛ jeŋ yuu wo, kɛnɛɛ ɛ kendoŋ yumte wo, kɛnɛɛ ɛ wo nu tolo, kɛnɛɛ kenyi kencimte, kɛnɛɛ cɛmte, kɛnɛɛ yew ncaw e, ɛ bese faŋɛ yaa efi wo kɛ?’
40025045	Wvú nu ke emum etfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, ‘Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy lɛ, no ben to baa ege mwɛɛm mvun, kɛ naa fô wee wvu caan boom bo bwɛɛm e ban e, nu ɛ ben to baa ege ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô me le kɛ.’
40025046	Boba bonyii nu ke emum egɛn eley ŋgɛw wvù mɛy lo le. Geenɛn, ɛ́ ba bò nu teytey egɛn eley fibole ɛ ɛ̀ nu nshii wvù mɛy lo le.”
40026001	Ɛ Jisos ke jeme mwɛɛm mvun mvunciim mɛse, gay ɛ̂ boom bew bo ŋgoo le lɛ,
40026002	“Ben ekeè lɛ ɛ̀ shɛɛte wase ɛdiuw ɛfaa, ɛ́ emum enu Ŋkaw Daŋɛfey, ɛ bó nu ke emum enya wee wvù diee nu Waawee can bonyii le ɛ́ bó eta yî kentam e.”
40026003	Kɛ kefew kedvu le, ɛ bocee ncese bo baay baay bô bonyii bò saake woŋ mum gɛn baancɛ ye ɛ̂ ntow Kayfas wvù to nu ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le,
40026004	mum cu ntaŋ no bó nu ke ewɛɛntɛn sɛ koo Jisos, eyu.
40026005	Ɛ bó dioo cu nonɛn, gay lɛ, “Fo beene emom fiɛɛ fin kefew ke Ŋkaw e kɛ, njefo ɛ́ beene mom lo, ɛ́ fí eto bô diuw ɛ̂ bonyii ɛntelɛŋ.”
40026006	Ɛ Jisos ke no nu ntɛw wvù Bɛtani le, yew dvu Semon wvù wee ntun wvu baay.
40026007	Ɛ bó ke shii no diekene, ɛ kpwoon mvu nɛ ley bô fikaa fimew ɛ bó kene bô tɛ, ɛ ɛ̀ nu fi nfiey mvu wvù shfuuŋkene le, ɛ wvú lumte naa baay, mum fucɛ yî ɛkolɛ ke Jisos e.
40026008	Ɛ boom bo Jisos e bo ŋgoo le yɛn nonɛn ɛ fiɛɛ fidvu ton'yɛ lo bó. Ɛ bó gay lɛ, “Wvú nyɛw bô nfiey wvun nɛn nje la?
40026009	Bó be nɛlo egese nfiey wvun bigew nteen, enya bigew bidvu ɛ̂ bonyii bo kefufe le.”
40026010	Geenɛn, ɛ Jisos kiɛɛ ŋkpwawcɛ wvubo, gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben nyaa ŋgɛw ɛ̂ kpwoon wvun nje la? Wvú nu ɛ ge ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì jee fô me le.
40026011	Ben ekeè lɛ bonyii bo kefufe le nu ke enu kɛ ben ɛ bó sekecii, geenɛn kɛ me nu ŋke enu beene sekecii kɛ.
40026012	Wvú fuci nfiey wvun yî yɛm e nɛn seysee lo me no bó nu ke edwey me.
40026013	Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy lɛ naa fɛɛ fô bó nu ke efewci saaka wvù jee wvun yî ɛkolɛ ke nshɛ le kecii nu ɛ fiɛɛ fì kpwoon wvun ge nu ɛ bó nu ke eseŋe tɛn, keekumyi wvú.”
40026014	Ɛ wee mvu ŋgoo boom bo ŋgoo le bo Jisos e bo yuufe ncow bofɛɛ wvù bó to teŋe lɛ Judas Iskaliot mum nɛ gɛn fô bocee ncese bo baay baay,
40026015	bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ɛ́ me nya Jisos can yene le, ɛ́ ben enya la ɛ̂ me?” Ɛ bó mum taŋ bigew mbaanshɛ bì bó kene bô ketwaa kè baa, nya ɛ̂ wvú.
40026016	Ɛ kɛw sekekiɛ le, ɛ wvú mum kɛw no gomte je yì wvú nu enya Jisos jó can yibole.
40026017	Ɛ ɛ̀ ke dioo nu diuu di fwe di Ŋkaw Blɛɛd wvù bó baa gɛɛ Fintuŋlɛɛn jó, ɛ boom bo ŋgoo le bo Jisos e to fô wvú le, bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wo gomte lɛ bese egɛn eseyse fô wo nu edie Ŋkaw Daŋɛfey ɛ ɛ̀ nu fɛɛ?”
40026018	Ɛ wvú tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben egɛn ɛlaante, eyɛn kɛy e, egay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, ‘Wee N'yɛɛyi gayte lɛ kefew kewene nu ɛ kocɛn wase. Wen nu edie lɛ Ŋkaw Daŋɛfey bô boom bowene bo ŋgoo le ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ wvú yew.’”
40026019	Ɛ boom bo ŋgoo le bodvu gɛn ge kɛ no Jisos be gay ɛ̂ bó, mum seyse mwɛɛm mvudien mvu Ŋkaw Daŋɛfey e dvú.
40026020	Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu ɛkiɛguu, ɛ wvú shii bô boom bew bo ŋgoo le bo yuufe ncow bofɛɛ keediekene.
40026021	Ɛ bó dioo diekene, ɛ wvú nɛ gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy lɛ, wee mvu ben e nu egese me.”
40026022	No wvú gay nonɛn, ɛ boom bew bo ŋgoo le nɛ no nu yii yii baay, mum kɛw no biwci ɛ̂ wvú mwaaŋ mwaaŋ lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu me le Tata?”
40026023	Ɛ wvú tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Wee wvù nu egese me nu wvù nu ɛ lese ɛbo ɛ̂ shuw e bee wvú.
40026024	Wee wvù diee nu Waawee nu ke egɛn kɛ no bó to saŋɛɛ ɛkumɛ wvú. Geenɛn, ŋgɛw wvu baay nu fô wee wvù gese wee wvù diee nu Waawee le. Fí to bee ejee fô wvuwɛ wee le baay fɛn ɛ́ bó to baa eboo wvú kɛ.”
40026025	Ɛ Judas wvù to nu keegese Jisos bife tɛn ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu me le Wee N'yɛɛyi?” Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wo nu ɛ jeme bô diuw wo.”
40026026	No bó to diekene, ɛ Jisos nɛ jo blɛɛd, nya keyoone ɛ̂ Nyo', mum guushɛ nya ɛ̂ boom bew bo ŋgoo le gay lɛ, “Ben eko edie, fin nu ye yɛm.”
40026027	Ɛ wvú mum jo tɛn fiko, nya keyoone ɛ̂ Nyo' mum nya fiko fidvu ɛ̂ bó gay lɛ, “Ben ewu bocii.
40026028	Fin nu ɛlɛmɛ kem kè Nyo' gbwo moŋkan dvú kí ɛ buy nje wee nteen, wvu lɛ wvú elɛɛshɛ bibefɛ bibole.
40026029	Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben lɛ kɛ me mbɛɛ ŋke embvuu eŋ'wu mbvuum mo tweŋ kete kè lane le man ɛ kɛw keseen e, ɛ gɛn ɛ buy diuu dì me nu ŋke eŋ'wu mó monfɛm beene ɛnte jo bvunfon bvu Icɛm e kɛ.”
40026030	Ɛ Jisos bô boom bew bo ŋgoo le ke mɛse, yem ŋkiee mbense, mum buy ben gɛn yî Kum Bite bi Olif e.
40026031	No Jisos bô boom bew bo ŋgoo le to gɛne, ɛ wvú nɛ gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ɛntaŋ jo ɛbɛn nu ɛ ben bocii nu ke etfuw bikaa ɛ̂ me ɛjim nje fiɛɛ fì nu ke ekooy bô me. Ɛ̀ nu no bó nu ɛ saŋ ɛ Nyo' gayte lɛ, ‘Me nu eŋke en'yu ncɛy njée ɛ́ ŋgoo njée esaaŋkɛn.’
40026032	Geenɛn, seke Nyo' ɛ bvuse me yî kpwe le, ɛ́ me ensa fwe jo ben Galilee.”
40026033	Ɛ Bita mum gay lo fiew ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ́ bonyii bocii cim tfuw lo bikaa ɛ̂ wo ɛjim nje fiɛɛ fì nu ke ekooy bô wo, tu kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me ŋke en'yuu entfuw bikaa ɛ̂ wo ɛjim kɛ.”
40026034	Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ wo kecɛɛy lɛ ɛntaŋ jo ɛbɛn jan, nu ɛ nyimshie nu ke enu lɛ yí etoŋ, ɛ wo ɛ ma wase me bokaŋ botɛte.”
40026035	Ɛ Bita gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ́ ɛ̀ cim nu naa lɛ me nu eŋkpwe lo bee wo, tu kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me en'yuu ma wo kɛ.” No wvú gay nonɛn, ɛ boom bo ŋgoo le bo Jisos e bomew ba bocii gay kɛ tɛn nonɛn.
40026036	Ɛ Jisos bô boom bew bo ŋgoo le ke gɛn ley fô wɛɛ ketaaŋ wvumew e, ɛ bó teŋe lɛ Gɛsɛmane, ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ boom bew bo ŋgoo le lɛ, “Ben eshii fɛn ɛ́ me en'wawcɛ ɛceŋ nene embunle.”
40026037	Ɛ wvú jo Bita bô boom bo Sɛbɛdee le bo bofɛɛ, ɛ bô bó gɛn. Ɛ wvú kɛw no nu yii yii, ɛ fitele fiew buuke.
40026038	Ɛ wvú mum gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Fitele fiem nu yii yii baay naa fì me eŋkpwe lo. Ben eshɛɛ fɛn ɛ́ beene ecɛyte.”
40026039	No wvú gay nonɛn, mum bencɛ gɛn fwe caan, gbwe tum bvushiw fokuse mum bunle lɛ, “Icɛm, ɛ́ je nu dvú yì ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wo ege ɛ́ fiko fi ŋgɛw e fin efey sɛ me ɛ ŋ'wu, ɛ́ wo ge. Geenɛn, fo wo ege no ɛ̀ shieele me kɛ, geɛ no ɛ̀ shieele wo.”
40026040	Ɛ wvú ke nɛ kase tu jim fô boom bew bo ŋgoo le, yɛn ɛ bó leete. Ɛ wvú bife ɛ̂ Bita lɛ, “Fí nu lɛ kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ ben eshii we ebuy ntam kefew mwaaŋ e?
40026041	Ben enù we, bunleè fo mmom ke eto fô ben e, eghaw ben. Ɛ̀ nu kecɛɛy lɛ fitele kooŋke lo, geenɛn ɛ nyam ye wɛɛyi.”
40026042	Ɛ wvú bvuu kase gɛn yî bokaŋ bofɛɛ le bunle lɛ, “Icɛm, ɛ́ ɛ̀ fɛn nu lɛ kɛ fiko fin nulo efey sɛ me ɛ ŋ'wu, ɛ́ wo ge kɛ no wo kooŋke.”
40026043	Ɛ wvú dioo ekase etu jim bvuu yɛn ɛ boom bew bo ŋgoo le leete njefo nyii to nu ɛ̂ bó ɛjise.
40026044	Ɛ wvú bvuu cinɛ bó le, kase gɛn bvuu bunle yî bokaŋ e botɛte, bunlee jemyi kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì wvú be shee jemyi wase.
40026045	Ɛ wvú bvuu kase tu jim fô boom bew bo ŋgoo le gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben fɛn bɛɛ kɛ leete lɛɛtene finɛn e? Ben etaa eyɛn, kefew nu ɛ kocɛn wase. Bó nu ɛ gese wase wee wvù diee nu Waawee ɛ̂ bonyii bò befe.
40026046	Ben enɛ we ɛ́ beene egɛnè. Ben etaa eyɛn, wee wvù gese me wvun ɛ wvú too wase.”
40026047	Kɛ no Jisos to bɛɛ jemyi nonɛn, ɛ Judas wvù to nu wee ŋgoo boom bo Jisos e bo yuufe ncow bofɛɛ mum buynɛn. Wvú to too bô kebombom ke bonyii le ke baay, ɛ bó kɛŋke nyó bô bibuse, ɛ ɛ̀ to tum bocee ncese bo baay baay noo bonyii bò saake woŋ.
40026048	Ɛ̀ to nu ɛ wee wvù to gesɛɛ Jisos to seyse wase nciise bô bonyii bodvu gay lɛ, “Wee wvù me nu ŋke eŋgay wvú le, embam eŋocɛ, nu wvú, ɛ́ ben emum ekoo.”
40026049	No bô bó toɛ, ɛ wvú mum gɛn lo fô Jisos e kaŋ mwaaŋ gay wvú le lɛ, “Me ŋgayte wo le Wee N'yɛɛyi.” No wvú gay nonɛn, mum bam wvú ŋocɛ.
40026050	Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Nsaa yɛm, geɛ lo fiɛɛ fì wo to keege.” Ɛ bonyii ba mum gɛn lo fô Jisos e koo wvú, gheŋ.
40026051	Ɛ fí kooy lɛ wee mvu wvù to nu bô Jisos to nu ɛ mum dvun nyo ye jem, cun kentuŋtuŋ ke nfwa ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le dvú, sum.
40026052	Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ wee wvudvu lɛ, “Kase etfuse nyo yo jim fô bvudvuu bwew e. Ɛ̀ keè lɛ wee tfuu wvù cawse nyo we, nu ke ekpwe yî nyo le.
40026053	Wo kpwaake lɛ kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me eŋgay ɛ́ Icɛm eciinse bonceendaa bew fɛn kaŋ mwaaŋ bontfuke le, ɛ bó fele ŋgóo yuufe ncow fɛɛ le?
40026054	Geenɛn, ɛ́ me nɛ ɛ ŋge nonɛn, ɛ́ fí ke eghan nɛɛ sɛ kooy no bó saŋ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le lɛ fí kɛŋke keenu?”
40026055	Sekekiɛ, ɛ Jisos mum bife ɛ̂ kebombom kiɛ lɛ, “Ben to keekoo me ɛ no too bô nyó noo bibuse kɛ diɛwɛ ben too keekoo ɛ ɛ̀ nu cooŋ e? Me nse nshee no diuu nu, ɛ me ɛ nshii yew ncese le n'yɛɛyi bonyii sɛ ben koo me nje la?
40026056	Geenɛn, fifin ficii jo bvudvu keege ɛ fí eto ekocɛn kɛ no bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le to saŋɛɛ.” Ɛ boom bo Jisos e bo ŋgoo le bocii mum laŋ wvú fó, fɛɛ lo.
40026057	Ɛ bonyii bò to koolɛɛ Jisos mum jo wvú gɛn bô wvú fô Kayfas wvù cee ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le. Ɛ bonyii bò duŋci bonci bo Nyo' le bô bonyii bò saake woŋ to taashɛ wase fó.
40026058	Bó to gɛne bô Jisos ɛ Bita bii lo ɛjim ncejole. Ɛ wvú gɛn buy naa lakfulɛɛŋ ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le, mum ley gɛn shii bô bonyii bò to cɛyte la didvu keeyɛn no fí nu ke eghan eleem.
40026059	Ɛ bocee ncese bo baay baay bô bonyii bocii bò saake bonsaw mum no gomte fiɛɛ fi mbiay e fì bó etey yî Jisos e wvu lɛ bó eyu wvú.
40026060	Geenɛn, faŋɛ yaa kɛŋkɛ fiɛɛ kɛ, naa no bonyii nteen to cim too fwe bene jim nsaw mbiay. Ɛ fí ke ghan nɛn, ɛ bonyii bomew bofɛɛ to leem fwe,
40026061	gay lɛ, “Mbwɛ wvun se gayte lɛ wen nulo esâw yew ncese Nyo' ekase ebom yî ɛdiuw e ɛta.”
40026062	Ɛ ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le mum ja we bife ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Kɛ wo kɛŋke fiɛɛ keetfuse le? Wo yuuke kɛ mwɛɛm mvù bonyii ban jemyi yî yo le?”
40026063	Ɛ Jisos mɛy diuw tfu. Ɛ ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le kase gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ̂ diee di Nyo' wvù kɛŋke nshii le, ɛ́ wo fɛn nu Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ wvù Waa Nyo', ɛ́ wo see ɛ̂ bese.”
40026064	Ɛ Jisos tfuse lɛ, “Fí nu no wo gay. Geenɛn ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ wo lɛ, ɛjim jo kefew kin nu ɛ ben nu ke eyɛn wee wvù diee nu Waawee le, ɛ wvú ɛ shii ɛ̂ ɛbo ke ɛcɛɛy ke Wee wvù kɛŋke Mvuŋgay e, ke ebvuu eyɛn no wvú too ɛ̂ kembɛw e fowe.”
40026065	Ɛ ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le yuw nonɛn, mum saayɛ ndvú ye le, gay lɛ, “Wvú joo bvudvuu bvu Nyo' le. Shiee nu dvú wvù beene ebvuu egomte wee lɛ wvú eleem fɛn ejeme fiɛɛ le? Ben nu ɛ yuw wase no wvú joo bvudvuu bvu Nyo' le.
40026066	Ben ɛ sumtɛn lɛ la?” Ɛ bó tfuse lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu wee wvù bó eyu lo.”
40026067	Ɛ bó mum kɛw no cuyte ncɛŋ yî bvushiw bvu Jisos e, kfune wvú bô mvuŋko, suuŋke bô can gayte ɛ̂ wvú lɛ,
40026068	“Wo wvù nu Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ, kɛ geɛ kewee ntum Nyo' kuw keseen fô bese le. Kɛ see wee wvù suŋ wo.”
40026069	Ɛ̀ to nu ɛ Bita ɛ shii ɛkfuŋ lakfulɛɛŋ e. Ɛ wan kpwoon mvu wvù to lemte fó, nɛ to mbew ye le gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wo tɛn bee ben ɛ Jisos wvu Galilee wvudvu.”
40026070	Geenɛn, ɛ Bita tun fwe dvu bonyii bocii gay lɛ, “Kɛ me ŋkee fiɛɛ fì wo jemyi kɛ.”
40026071	Ɛ Bita mum nɛ buy gɛn no nu diuw kebuw e. Ɛ wvumvu wan kpwoon wvù to lemte tɛn fó, yɛn wvú le, mum jeme ɛ̂ bonyii bò to leemene fó lɛ, “Wee wvun bee bô Jisos wvu Nasalɛt wvudvu.”
40026072	Ɛ Bita bvuu tun, lew lo gay lɛ, “Kɛ me ŋkee wee wvudvu kɛ.”
40026073	Ɛ kefew ke dioo bvuu gɛncɛ caan, ɛ bonyii bò to leemene fó bencɛ gɛn mbew Bita le gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Kecɛɛy, kecɛɛy wo nu tɛn wee mvu bó le, njefo njeme wo gɛne diɛwɛ wvubole.”
40026074	Ɛ Bita mum kan, tee lon yî ɛkolɛ kew e gay lɛ, “Kɛ me ŋkee wee wvun kɛ.” Kaŋ mwaaŋ ɛ nyimshie mum toŋ.
40026075	Ɛ Bita kume njeme wvù Jisos be jeme ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Nyimshie ke enu lɛ yí etoŋ, ɛ wo ɛ ma wase me bokaŋ botɛte.” Ɛ wvú nɛ fó buy ɛkfuŋ, bee kpwe baay.
40027001	Ɛ ɛkfuŋ ke dioo yuule too, ɛ bocee ncese bo baay baay bô bonyii bò saake woŋ, shii cu ntaŋ ɛkumɛ Jisos keeyu wvú.
40027002	Ɛ bó mum kay wvú, jo gɛn nya can Baylɛt wvù wee sa' wvu ɛ̂ keba kedvu le.
40027003	Ɛ Judas wvù to gesɛɛ Jisos ke dioo yɛn lɛ bó nu ɛ leke lɛ bó nu eyu wvú, ɛ wvú kumɛn fitele fiew, jo bigew bi mbaanshɛ biɛ kase gɛn dvú keetfuse ɛ̂ bocee ncese bo baay baay bô bonyii bò saake woŋ.
40027004	No wvú gɛn, gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Me nu ɛ ŋge kebefɛ keeŋgese wee ɛ wvú baa kɛŋke jay kɛ.” Ɛ bó tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Fifiɛ kɛŋke la keege bô bese? Ɛ̀ kee wo fifiɛ.”
40027005	Ɛ Judas mwase bigew bidvu fokuse yew ncese le, mum buy, gɛn shiim.
40027006	Ɛ bocee ncese bo baay baay tacɛ bigew bidvu gay lɛ, “Bin nu bigew bi ɛlɛmɛ le, ɛ nci baa bee lɛ bó egɛɛ bibin ntfu wvu yew ncese le kɛ.”
40027007	Ɛ bó shii cu ntaŋ, gɛn guy gbwen wee mvu wvù bomte nsháan dvú lɛ bó ke edweyte botolo fó.
40027008	Ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì bó teŋe gbwen wvudvu ɛ to ɛ buy ɛbɛn e lɛ, “Gbwen ɛlɛmɛ.”
40027009	Fí to kooy nonɛn ɛ fiɛɛ fì wee ntum Nyo' wvù Yɛlimia to jemyɛɛ mum to kocɛn no wvú to gayɛɛ lɛ, “Bó to nu ɛ jo bigew bi mbaanshɛ bì ɛ̀ to nu kpwaw we no boom bo Islael to seysɛɛ yî ɛkolɛ kew e,
40027010	guy gbwen wee wvù bomte nsháan dvú, kɛ no Tata Nyo' to gayɛɛ ɛ̂ me.”
40027011	No Jisos to leemɛɛ fwe dvu Baylɛt wvù wee sa', ɛ Baylɛt bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ “Ɛ̀ nu wo wvù Nfon Bojuu le?” Ɛ Jisos tfuse lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu no wo gay.”
40027012	Geenɛn, ɛ bocee ncese bo baay baay bô bonyii bò saake woŋ ke dioo kɛw keeteyte mwɛɛm yî ye le, ɛ wvú faŋɛ yaa bvuu tfuse fiɛɛ kɛ.
40027013	Ɛ Baylɛt mum bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Kɛ wo yuuke kfuu mwɛɛm mvun mvù bó jemyi yî yo le le?”
40027014	Geenɛn, ɛ Jisos faŋɛ yaa tfuse fiɛɛ ɛ̂ wvú naa kɛ fimwaaŋ ɛ̂ mvù bó teyɛɛ yî ye le kɛ. Ɛ wee sa' wvudvu taa nɛn ɛ diuw yum wvú baay.
40027015	Ɛ̀ to ké dioo nu kefew ke Ŋkaw Daŋɛfey e, ɛ wee sa' wvun bvuse wee mwaaŋ yew ncaw e wvù bonyii gomte lɛ wvú ebvuse.
40027016	Ɛ̀ to nu kefew kedvu le, ɛ wee mvu nu yew ncaw e, ɛ bó ké no kee wa lo wvú yî gee dì befe le, ɛ diee diew nu lɛ Balabas.
40027017	Ɛ bonyii ke dioo to tase, ɛ Baylɛt bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben gomte lɛ me embvuse ɛ ɛ̀ nu yɛɛ yew ncaw e? Ben gomte lɛ me embvuse Balabas, nuu Jisos wvù bó teŋe lɛ ɛ̀ nu Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ lɛ?”
40027018	Wvú to biite nonɛn njefo wvú to kee lo lɛ bó to nya Jisos can wen e ɛ ɛ̀ nu njefo bó to bene kendoŋ bô wvú.
40027019	Ɛ keebvuu bise fó nu ɛ seke wvú to shiilɛɛ wase fô bó ké no saake bonsaw, ɛ kpwɛse tum ntum fô wvú le gay lɛ, “Fo wo ege fiɛɛ bô wee wɛ kɛ. Ɛ̀ nu wee wvu teytey. Me njemyi nɛn njefo ɛfilɛ nu ɛ njiŋsɛn bô me ɛntaŋ ɛbɛn baay ɛkumɛ wvú.”
40027020	No Baylɛt bifɛɛ nonɛn, ɛ bocee ncese bo baay baay bô bonyii bò saake woŋ bɛyse bonyii lɛ bó egay lɛ wvú ebvuse ɛ ɛ̀ nu Balabas, elɛse lo Jisos.
40027021	Ɛ wee sa' bvuu nɛ bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Wee wvù ben gomte lɛ me encinɛ ɛnte jo bonyii bo bofɛɛ ban nu wvù la?” Ɛ bó tfuse lɛ, “Balabas.”
40027022	Ɛ Baylɛt bvuu bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ɛ́ me ndioo ɛ ncinɛ nonɛn, eŋge nɛɛ bô Jisos wvú bó teŋe lɛ Klistu?” Ɛ bó bocii gay lɛ, “Bó eta lo wvú yî kentam e.”
40027023	Ɛ wvú kase bife lɛ, “Bó eta wvú nje la? Fiɛɛ fì befe fì wvú ge nu la?” Ɛ bó bvuu no wamte gɛne kɛ lo fwe lɛ, “Bó eta lo wvú yî kentam e.”
40027024	Ɛ Baylɛt ke dioo yɛn lɛ kɛ je nu kɛ, lɛ ɛ́ wen lumtene bô fiɛɛ fin, ɛ́ diuw ke enɛ ebuy. Ɛ wvú fi joo, cukɛ can ye dvú fwe dvu kebombom ke bonyii le gay lɛ, “Kɛ ɛbo kem nu fô kpwe wee wvun e kɛ. Ɛ̀ kee ben dvú.”
40027025	Ɛ bonyii bocii tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “'Ɛɛ, cinɛ ɛ́ ɛlɛmɛ kew enu yî bikuu bisɛse le noo yî boom bosɛse le.”
40027026	Ɛ Baylɛt mum bvuse Balabas no bó to gomte, gay ɛ bó tam Jisos, mum nya lɛ bó egɛn eta yî kentam e.
40027027	Ɛ bonyii bo nci le bo wee sa' le mum jo Jisos ley dvú ɛntow we le fô bó to teŋe lɛ Bletolium, mum kum kebɛse ke ŋgoo bonyii bo nci le kecii ɛ kí tase gem Jisos kɛɛkɛɛ.
40027028	Ɛ bó baayɛ ndvú ye, jo ndvu bvunfon yì yɛɛle shfuse yî ye le,
40027029	mum lu kefo ke bvunfon e ɛ kí nu bíay bíay bon ɛ̂ wvú ɛfa, mum nya ŋkêw ɛ̂ ɛbo kew ke ɛcɛɛy e lɛ ɛ̀ nu ketoome. Ɛ bó mum no too ŋgvuumene ɛ̂ wvú fwe sɛwse wvú gayte lɛ, “Biaa kembaan! Nfon Bojuu!”
40027030	No bó gee nonɛn, no cuyte ncɛŋ yî ye le, fii ŋkêw wɛ shɛle wvú dvú fofa.
40027031	Ɛ bó ke sɛwse wvú nonɛn mɛse, mum baa ndvu bvunfon yɛ, jise wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu ndvú ye yî ye le, mum jo wvú keegɛn eta yî kentam e.
40027032	No bó to gɛne, buynɛn yî wee mvu wvu ɛ̂ kelaante kè Sɛlin e ɛ diee diew nu lɛ Semon. Ɛ bó kan wee wvun ɛ wvú tuu kentam ke Jisos e.
40027033	Ɛ bó ke gɛn buy bvudvuu bvumew e ɛ bó teŋe lɛ Golgota, (ɛ diee din nu lɛ Ŋgbwow Ɛkolɛ,)
40027034	ɛ bó mum nya mbvuum ɛ̂ wvú ɛ bó ɛ fiysɛn bô fiɛɛ fimew ɛ fí cewcewe diɛwɛ lelɛ lɛ wvú ewu. Geenɛn ɛ wvú dioo mom, faŋ keewu.
40027035	Ɛ bó mum ta wvú yî kentam e, jo ndvú ye tum kaŋ dvú keegaw ɛ̂ bikuu bibole.
40027036	No bó ge nonɛn mum shii fó no cɛyte wvú.
40027037	Ɛ bó saŋ ŋwa' wvù duŋci fiɛɛ fì bó taɛ wvú yî kentam e nje fí, mum ta yî kentam e ɛ̂ we jo ɛkolɛ kew ɛ wvú nu lɛ, “Wvun nu Jisos, Nfon Bojuu.”
40027038	Ɛ bó ta tɛn bocooŋ bofɛɛ yî bintam e bô bo Jisos, wvumvu ɛbo ɛcɛɛy, wvumvu ɛbo ɛŋkoŋko jo Jisos.
40027039	Ɛ bonyii no fele yɛne Jisos e mɛɛke lo bikuu, baale wvú bô boncun,
40027040	gayte lɛ, “Wo wvù se nu keeke esâw yew ncese ekase eyoo yî ɛdiuw e ɛta, kɛ fi lɛ ɛkolɛ kuw! Ɛ́ wo fɛn nu Waa Nyo', ɛ́ wo shii yî kentam kiɛ le.”
40027041	Ɛ bocee ncese bo baay baay bô bonyii bò duŋci bonci noo bonyii bò saake woŋ no sɛwse tɛn wvú gayte lɛ,
40027042	“Wvú se fii bonyii bomew sɛ wvú nulo efi kew ɛkolɛ ŋkuuŋ. Kɛ wvú nu Nfon bonyii bo Islael. Wvú eshii lɛ yî kentam e keseen ɛ́ bese emum ebee wvú le.
40027043	Wvú se gɛɛle ɛkolɛ yî Nyo' le. Ɛ́ Nyo' fɛn kooŋke wvú, ɛ́ wvú fi lɛ wvú keseen no wvú se duu lɛ wen nu Waa Nyo'.”
40027044	Ɛ bocooŋ ba bò bó to taɛ yî bintam e bô bo Jisos, no baale tɛn wvú bô boncun kɛ nonɛn.
40027045	Ɛ diuu ke ben leke, ɛ ɛkfuŋ nɛ jiim woŋ tfuu gɛn buy didiuu ditɛte ɛmvunsheeŋ.
40027046	Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu kɛ diɛwɛ didiuu ditɛte le, ɛ Jisos nɛ fuŋ foweɛwe lɛ, “Ɛli, Ɛli, lama sabaktani.” Fì nu lɛ, “Nyo' wɛm, Nyo' wɛm, wo laŋ me nɛn nje la?”
40027047	Ɛ bonyii bomew bò to leeme fó dioo yuw, gay lɛ, “Wee wvudvu teŋe Ɛlayja.”
40027048	Ɛ wee mvu bó le mum lewtɛ lo kaŋ mwaaŋ jo kuca, ffum ɛ̂ mbvuum mo ŋgbwayŋgbwayi le, bon yî fite le nɛke lɛ wvú ewu.
40027049	Geenɛn ɛ bomew bonyii gay lɛ “Kɛ leem nɛn ɛ́ beene eyɛn laa Ɛlayja nu eto efi wvú lɛ!”
40027050	Ɛ Jisos bvuu wam foweɛwe, ɛ keyoy kew mum buy.
40027051	Ɛ fí nɛ kooy lɛ, ndvu yì to gawsene yew ncese ɛnte to nu ɛ sɛlɛ ɛntelɛŋ kɛw fowe bow buy fokuse biba bifɛɛ. Ɛ nshɛ shiw, ɛ ɛta wamkɛn,
40027052	ɛ jém tɛn yene ye ɛ bonyii bò ɛ̀ to nu bo Nyo' le nteen bò to kpwekɛnɛɛ wase mum kase buy yî kpwe le.
40027053	Ɛ Jisos ke dioo buy yî kpwe le, ɛ bonyii bodvu nɛ gɛn ɛ̂ kelaante kè yuule le Jɛlusalɛm, ɛ bonyii nteen yɛn bó le.
40027054	Ɛ cee ɛkolɛ bonyii bo nci le bô bonyii bò bô bó to nu fó cɛyte Jisos ke dioo eyɛn no nshɛ shiw, bô fiɛɛ ficii fì to kooyɛɛ, ɛ nfan koo bó baay. Ɛ bó gay lɛ, “Kecɛɛy, kecɛɛy wee wvun se nu Waa Nyo'.”
40027055	Bokɛnɛ nteen to leeme tɛn fó ntamndwee taale. Ɛ bokɛnɛ ban nu bò to nɛn'yɛɛ Galilee no bii Jisos e fici wvú.
40027056	Ŋgoo bó le to nu Maalia Magdalen noo Maalia wvù bwee Jɛm bô Yosɛw, noo bwee boom bo Sɛbɛdee le.
40027057	Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu ɛkiɛguu, ɛ cee kpwaw mvu wvu Alimatia nɛ to ɛ diee diew nu lɛ Yosɛw. Wvú tɛn to nu wee ŋgoo Jisos mvu.
40027058	Ɛ wvú gɛn yɛn Baylɛt e lɛkɛ lɛ wvú enya gvune di Jisos e ɛ̂ wen ɛ́ wen egɛn edwey. Nonɛn ɛ Baylɛt mum gay lɛ bó egɛn enya ɛ̂ wvú.
40027059	Ɛ Yosɛw fi gvune didvu mum kule ɛ̂ ndvu yì yuule le,
40027060	mum gɛn jike ɛ̂ jem yi ye le ɛ yí bɛɛ fiɛ, ɛ wvú to cow jem yidvu yî kembaan e, mum biŋse kebwee ke tɛ le baŋ diuw jem yidvu dvú, mum nɛnɛ.
40027061	Maalia Magdalen bô Maalia wvumvu wɛ to nu fó, ɛ bó ɛ shii mbew jem yidvu le keba keki.
40027062	Ɛ ɛkfuŋ buy yuu, ɛ diuu dì bó to ké no seysee mwɛɛm mvu mbam wvubole ɛ fey wase, ɛ bocee ncese bo baay baay bô Bofalasii gɛn yɛn Baylɛt e,
40027063	gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wee wvu baay, bese kumyi fiɛɛ fì wee mbiay wɛ to jemyɛɛ seke wvú to bɛɛ dvú. Wvú to nu ɛ gay lɛ, ɛ̀ nu ke edioo ɛ buy ɛdiuw ɛta ɛ́ wen ekase ebuy yî kpwe le.
40027064	No fí nu nonɛn, gayɛ ɛ́ bonyii egɛn ecɛyte jem egɛn ebuy ɛdiuw ɛta, njefo bese fane lɛ ɛ̀ nɛlo ɛ́ boom bew bo ŋgoo le ke enɛ egɛn ecoŋ gvune diew enɛnɛ dvú emum eseŋe ɛ̂ bonyii lɛ, ‘Wvú nu ɛ buy yî kpwe le.’ Ɛ́ bó ge nonɛn, ɛ́ yiyin mbiay yi keseen efo efey lo yi fwe.”
40027065	Ɛ Baylɛt gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben ejo bonyii bo nci le ɛ́ ben ɛ bó egɛn, ɛ́ ben egay ɛ́ bó ecɛyte jem yidvu ntay no ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ ben ecɛyte.”
40027066	Nonɛn ɛ bó mum gɛn loocɛ fen diuw jem, mum ge nciise yî tɛ dì bó to baŋɛɛ diuw jem dvú, mum gɛɛ bonyii bo nci le bò ecɛyte.
40028001	Ɛ diuu di mbam e ke fey, ɛ ɛkfuŋ ke no gbwekene too, ɛ ɛ̀ nu diuu di fwe yî kemaa le, ɛ Maalia Magdalen bô Maalia wvumvu wɛ gɛn keetaa jem.
40028002	Ɛ fí kooy lɛ, nshɛ to nu ɛ nɛ shiw bô mvuŋgay, njefo nceendaa Tata to nu ɛ shii we to biŋse kebwee ke tɛ diɛ dì bó to baŋɛɛ diuw jem dvú mum shii yî dvú le.
40028003	Nceendaa wvudvu nu ɛ bvushiw bwew to lawkene diɛwɛ jaŋ e, ɛ ndvú ye baa nɛn bvuuu.
40028004	Ɛ bonyii bò to cɛyte jem ba yɛn wvú le fan baay, ciŋ nɛn kikikiki, gbwekɛn fokuse no jiimene diɛwɛ biŋkpwe bi bonyii le.
40028005	Ɛ nceendaa Nyo' wvudvu gay ɛ̂ bokɛnɛ ba lɛ, “Fo ben efanè kɛ. Me ŋkee lo lɛ ben gomte ɛ ɛ̀ nu Jisos wvù bó se taɛ yî kentam e.
40028006	Kɛ wvú bɛɛ fɛn kɛ, wvú nu ɛ buy wase yî kpwe le no wvú to gayɛɛ. Ben eto eyɛn fô wvú se jiime.
40028007	Ben emum egɛn cekey esee ɛ̂ boom bew bo ŋgoo le lɛ wvú nu ɛ buy wase yî kpwe le, lɛ wvú nu ɛ sa wase fwe dvunɛn Galilee. Ben nu ke eyɛn wvú le jó. Ben eyekɛ eyuw, ben nu ɛ yuw wase no me nseŋe ɛ̂ ben.”
40028008	Ɛ bokɛnɛ ba mum ja fô jem cekey cekey bô nfan, geenɛn kɛŋke tɛn njoŋ wvu baay, no lewte gɛne keegɛn see ɛ̂ boom bo Jisos e bo ŋgoo le.
40028009	No bó to gɛne, ɛ fí kooy lɛ bô bo Jisos to nu ɛ tasɛn, ɛ wvú gay bó le lɛ, “Me ŋgayte ben e.” Ɛ bó mum to mbew ye le, gbwe bam bikaa biew, wvum wvú.
40028010	Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Fo ben efanè kɛ. Ben egɛn egay ɛ̂ boom bo bwɛɛm e lɛ bó egɛnè Galilee eyɛn me le jó.”
40028011	Ɛ bokɛnɛ ba ke nɛ dioo egɛne, ɛ fí kooy lɛ bonyii bo nci le bò to cɛyte jem bomew to nu ɛ nɛ gɛn ɛlaante gɛn see fiɛɛ ficii fì to kooyɛɛ ɛ̂ bocee ncese bo baay baay.
40028012	Ɛ bocee ncese bo baay baay bodvu mum kum bonyii bò saake woŋ ɛ bô bó shii cu ntaŋ, mum baŋ diuw bonyii bo nci le ba bô bigew nteen,
40028013	gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben egaytè ɛ̂ bonyii lɛ ben se leete boom bew bo ŋgoo le ɛ se ɛ to ɛ coŋ gvune diew ɛ gɛn dvú.
40028014	Ɛ́ ben seŋe nonɛn, fí ɛ ley bitem bi wee sa' le, wvú ɛ no gomte keenya ŋgɛw ɛ̂ ben, ɛ́ bese eseyse wvú, wvú saa ebvuu enya ŋgɛw ɛ̂ ben kɛ.”
40028015	Nonɛn ɛ bó mum fi bigew bidvu mum no seŋe kɛ no bó to gayɛɛ ɛ̂ bó. Kenfɛ kedvu kin ɛ mum ɛ lam ɛnte jo Bojuu ɛ to ɛ buy ɛbɛn e lɛ bó to coŋ lo gvune di Jisos e.
40028016	Ɛ boom bo ŋgoo le bo Jisos e bo yuufe ncow mwaaŋ mum nɛ gɛn Galilee, ben gɛn yî kum wvù Jisos to gayɛɛ ɛ̂ bó le.
40028017	Ɛ bó dioo yɛn wvú le, wvum wvú. Geenɛn ɛ bomew no maŋene wvú.
40028018	Ɛ Jisos bencɛ to gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Bó nu ɛ nya wase mvuŋgay mvunciim mvu fowe noo mvu fokuse ɛ̂ me.
40028019	Nonɛn, ben egɛn lɛ bitum e bicii, egeè ɛ bonyii nu bonyii bem bo ŋgoo le, eleesè bó ɛ̂ joo ɛ̂ diee di Nyo' Ice bô Wan noo Keyoy ke Yuule le.
40028020	Ben eyɛɛyì bó lɛ bó egeè fiɛɛ ficii fì me nu ɛ n'yɛɛyi ben dvú. Ben eyekɛ eyuw, me nu enu beene sekecii eŋgɛn embuy naa kefew kè woŋ nu ke eka.”
41001001	Wvun nu saaka wvù jee wvu ɛkumɛ Jisos Klistu wvù Waa Nyo'.
41001002	Wvú to kɛw kɛ no Yɛsaya wvù wee ntum Nyo' to saŋɛɛ ɛ Nyo' gayte lɛ, “Yekɛ eyuw, me nu ŋke enciinse wee wɛm ntum ɛ́ wvú esa fwe dvu wo, wvù nu egɛn eseyse je yo.
41001003	Diɛw wee fuuŋke ŋkpwaante lɛ bó eseyse je Tata, enɛle ɛ́ yí enù teytey.”
41001004	Nonɛn, ɛ wee mvu wvù bó to teŋe lɛ Jon Nleseɛjoo ke mum nɛ buynɛn ŋkpwaante, no fewci ɛ̂ bonyii lɛ bó ekumɛn mvuntelem mvubole, ɛ́ wen elese bó ɛ̂ joo wvu lɛ Nyo' elɛɛshɛ bibefɛ bibole.
41001005	Ɛ bonyii mum no buyte ɛ̂ bontɛw bo woŋ wvù Judea le tfuu noo ɛ̂ kelaante kè Jɛlusalɛm e kecii gɛne fô Jon e, seŋe bibefɛ bibole, ɛ wvú mum leese bó ɛ̂ joo ɛ̂ Joo Joodan e.
41001006	Jon to jiise ndvú ɛ bó kene bô yvúw nyam mi yì bó teŋe lɛ kamɛl, seeŋke kecaw cin ɛ bó kene bô jew nyam, diee ɛ ɛ̀ nu cúma bô ndoŋ.
41001007	Wvú to fewci, gayte lɛ, “Wee mvu too ɛ̂ me ɛjim kuuke fele me, ɛ me mbaa ncim eŋkocɛn keeŋgvuwcɛ fokuse enfay laba we kɛ.
41001008	Me nleese ben ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ joo, geenɛn, ɛ wvú nu ke elese fiew ben ɛ ɛ̀ nu can Keyoy ke Yuule le.”
41001009	Kɛ ɛdiuw yoya le, ɛ Jisos nɛ Nasalɛt ɛ̂ keba ke woŋ e kè Galilee le, to ɛ Jon lese wvú ɛ̂ joo ɛ̂ Joo Joodan e.
41001010	Kɛ no Jisos to buyte ɛ̂ joo nɛn, mum yɛn ɛ ɛbulɛ yene ye, ɛ Keyoy ke Yuule no shiile too yî ye le diɛwɛ ɛbembɛ le.
41001011	Ɛ diɛw jeme fowe lɛ, “Wo nu Waa wɛm, nu fitele fiem, ɛ me n'yuuke njoŋ bô wo baay.”
41001012	Ɛ Keyoy ke Yuule mum ge lo kaŋ mwaaŋ ɛ Jisos gɛn no cee ŋkpwaante.
41001013	Ɛ wvú no nu jó yî ɛdiuw e mbaanyɛ, ɛ Satan momte wvú. Wvú to nu jó nonɛn bô nyám yi ŋkpwaante, ɛ bonceendaa bo Nyo' le taale fô wvú le.
41001014	Ɛ bó ke nɛ koo Jon lese yew ncaw e. Ɛ ɛ̀ no nu ɛjim jodvu, ɛ Jisos gɛn Galilee, no fewci saaka wvù jee wvù wvu Nyo' jó.
41001015	Ɛ wvú no fewci, gayte lɛ, “Kefew nu ɛ to wase ɛ kocɛn, ɛ bvunfon bvu Nyo' le nu wase nceencee. Ben ekumɛn mvuntelem mvunɛn, ebee saaka wvù jee wvun e.”
41001016	Ɛ Jisos ke no fele mbew Mamase yì Galilee le, yɛn Semon bô waa bwee wvù Andulu le ɛ bó laaŋke kensaŋ ɛ̂ mamase le, no ŋkiɛŋ wvubo to nu byé yì koolɛɛn.
41001017	Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben ebiì me le ɛ́ me eŋge ɛ́ ben ekoole wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu bonyii.”
41001018	Kaŋ mwaaŋ, ɛ bó mum cinɛ binsaŋ bibole, no bii wvú le.
41001019	Ɛ Jisos ke dioo keŋci gɛne fwe, yɛn Jɛm bô waa bwee wvù Jon e, bò to nu boom bo Sɛbɛdee le, ɛ bô bó nu ɛ̂ kekoŋ e tumci binsaŋ.
41001020	Ɛ Jisos mum tee lo tɛn bó. Ɛ bó cinɛ icee bó le ɛ̂ kekoŋ e bô bonyii bò bó to joɛ ɛ́ bó elemte bó le, mum no bii wvú le.
41001021	Ɛ bô bo Jisos nɛ gɛn ɛ̂ kelaante kè Kafana'um. Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu diuu di mbam e, ɛ Jisos mum gɛn lo yew bunle le no yɛɛyi bonyii dvú.
