41001022	Ɛ bonyii no yuuke kɛŋke lo ŋghaw yî n'yɛɛyi we le, njefo wvú to yɛɛyi diɛwɛ wee wvù kɛŋke mvuŋgay mvu n'yɛɛyi le. Kɛ wvú to yɛɛyi diɛwɛ no bonyii bò duŋci bonci bo Nyo' le to ké no yɛɛyi kɛ.
41001023	Kɛ sekedvu, ɛ wee mvu nɛ fɛse yew bunle yidvu le, ɛ ɛ̀ to nu wee ɛ keyoy kè yiile nu yî ye le.
41001024	No wvú ley dvú, mum wam lɛ, “Jisos wvu Nasalɛt, wo fii la ɛ̂ bese? Wo to keelɛse bese le? Me ŋkee naa wo. Ɛ̀ nu wo wvudvu wvù yuule wvù nɛ fô Nyo' le.”
41001025	Ɛ Jisos kan keyoy kè yiile kedvu, gay lɛ, “Baŋ lo, buy yî wee wvun e.”
41001026	Ɛ keyoy kedvu mum ge ɛ wvú gbwe fokuse no taake, ɛ kí fuŋ foweɛwe, mum buy yî ye le.
41001027	Ɛ bonyii yɛn nonɛn, ɛ diuw yum bó, ɛ bó no ghayte ɛbonɛbon biite lɛ, “Fin nu la? Ɛ̀ nu n'yɛɛyi mvu wvu fwɛ le? Wee wvun kɛŋke mvuŋgay kane naa noo biyoy bì yiile ɛ bí yuuke wvú le.”
41001028	Kaŋ mwaaŋ, ɛ saaka wvu ɛkumɛ Jisos saaŋkɛn gɛn bontɛw bocii bo ɛ̂ keba kè Galilee le.
41001029	Ɛ Jisos ke buy yew bunle yidvu le, gɛn yew dvu Semon bô Andulu, ɛ Jɛm bô Jon nu bô bó.
41001030	Ɛ̀ to nu ɛ mwɛse Semon jiime, cɛmte bô ken'ya'. Kɛ no Jisos ley yew, ɛ bó mum see lo ɛ̂ wvú ɛkumɛ kpwoon wvudvu.
41001031	Ɛ Jisos gɛn fô wvú to jiime, jicɛ wvú le yî kebo le, cake wvú we. Ɛ ken'ya' kedvu mum cinɛ wvú le, ɛ wvú ja we, taa fiɛɛ ɛ bó die.
41001032	Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu ɛkiɛguu ɛbvubwɛ no diuu to seeyi, ɛ bó no too bô bonyii bocii bò to cɛmkene noo bonyii bò bonceendaa bo dɛwle le to njiŋsene bô bó fô Jisos e.
41001033	Ɛ kelaante kedvu kecii tase ɛ̂ fwese.
41001034	Ɛ wvú fɛ bonyii nteen bò to kɛŋke bincɛm jɛɛy jɛɛy, bvuu bvuse bonceendaa bo dɛwle le nteen yî bonyii bomew e. Ɛ́ wvú dioo bvuuse, saa ebee lɛ bonceendaa bodvu ejemyi lo kɛ, njefo bó to kee wee wvù ɛ̀ nu wvú.
41001035	Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu kebitele, ɛ Jisos ja we, buy gɛn bvudvuu bvumew e wvú ɛmbeŋ no bunlee.
41001036	Ɛ Semon bô bonyii bò bô bó to nu, shɛɛ buy gɛn keegom wvú.
41001037	Ɛ bó yɛn wvú le, gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Bonyii bocii nu ɛ shɛɛ ɛ no gomte wo.”
41001038	Ɛ Jisos tfuse fiew ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Beene edaŋsɛn egɛn bontɛw bomew e wvu lɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me enfewcɛ tɛn diɛw Nyo' jó. Ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì me nto nje fí.”
41001039	Ɛ wvú mum no ghane keba kè Galilee le kecii fewci diɛw Nyo' yéw bunle yibole, bvuuse bonceendaa bo dɛwle le yî bonyii le.
41001040	Ɛ wee mvu wvù to cɛmte bô ntun wvu baay ke nɛ to, tum ɛnvuw ɛ̂ Jisos ɛjise, lɛkɛ wvú gay lɛ, “Wo nulo efɛ me ɛ́ me en'yuule, ɛ́ wo fɛn kooŋke lo.”
41001041	Ɛ shen koo Jisos, ɛ wvú nɛke kebo kum wvú le, gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Me ŋkooŋke lo, bonɛn lɛ, eyuule.”
41001042	Kaŋ mwaaŋ, ɛ ntun wvu baay wvudvu mum cinɛ wvú le, ɛ wvú bonɛn mum no yuule.
41001043	Ɛ Jisos mum gay lɛ wvú egɛnè lo, loocɛ ciise lo ɛ̂ wvú,
41001044	gay lɛ, “Ɛ̀ yɛnè fo wo esee ɛ̂ wee kɛ. Geenɛn, gɛnɛ eduŋcɛ ɛkolɛ kuw ɛ̂ cee ncese, emum enya nnya yì Muses to gayɛɛ lɛ wee kɛŋke keenya keeduŋcɛ ɛ̂ bonyii lɛ wen nu ɛ bonɛn wase yî ntun wvun e ɛ no yuule.”
41001045	No Jisos ciise nonɛn, ɛ wee wvudvu kaa no gɛne bwaashi lo fiɛɛ fidvu. Ɛ saaka wvudvu saaŋkɛn, ɛ je faŋɛ yaa bvuu nu dvú yì ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ Jisos eley kelaante le ɛndan kɛ. Ɛ wvú mum mɛy kɛ wase no nu ŋkpwaante, ɛ bonyii nɛn'yi mondvuum e mondvuum e, too fô wvú le.
41002001	Ɛ ɛdiuw ke dioo gɛnci, ɛ Jisos kase tu jim Kafana'um. Ɛ bonyii yuw lɛ wvú nu wase fô yew e,
41002002	ɛ bó mum to tase fó nteen, ɛ je faŋɛ yaa nu dvú fó yì ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wee tome ɛkalɛ naa noo ɛ̂ yew fwese kɛ. Ɛ wvú no fewci diɛw Nyo' ɛ̂ bó.
41002003	Ɛ bonyii bomew ke nɛ no too bonɛw bô wee mvu fô wvú le ɛ bó ɛ shfumɛ ɛ̂ fikɛɛy e, ɛ wvú ɛ kpwe wase keba kemwaaŋ.
41002004	Ɛ fí ghaw keeley gɛn bô wvú fô wvú le njefo bonyii to faci baay. Ɛ bó mum ben ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ yew we, too keyɛy. No bó tolɛɛ nonɛn, mum shike wee wvudvu ɛ̂ fiɛɛ fì wvú to jiime jó le.
41002005	Ɛ Jisos yɛn no bó nu ɛ lese fitele yî ye le, ɛ wvú mum gay ɛ̂ wee wvù to nu ɛ kpwe keba kemwaaŋ wɛ lɛ, “Nsaa yɛm, me nu ɛ nlɛɛshɛ wase bibefɛ biuw.”
41002006	Ɛ bonyii bomew bò to duŋci bonci bo Nyo' le bò to nu fó yuw nonɛn, mum no wvukene ɛ̂ mvuntelem e, biite lɛ,
41002007	“Wee wvun jemyi nɛn nɛɛ le? Wvú joo bvudvuu bvu Nyo' le. Ɛ̀ nu yɛɛ dvú wvù nulo elɛɛshɛ bibefɛ ɛfey Nyo' maaŋ?”
41002008	Ɛ Jisos mum kiɛɛ lo ɛ̂ fitele fiew e fiɛɛ fì bó to kpwaake, mum bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben sɛ kɛŋke kfuu ban boŋkpwawcɛ ɛ̂ mvuntelem mvunɛn e nɛn nje la?
41002009	Fi cekey keegay ɛ̂ wee wvun nu fì la? Keegay lɛ me nu ɛ nlɛɛshɛ wase bibefɛ biew, nuu lɛ wvú ejo fikɛɛy fiew egɛne lɛ?
41002010	Geenɛn, me nu eŋge ɛ́ ben ekiɛɛ lɛ wee wvù diee nu Waawee kɛŋke mvuŋgay fokuse fɛn keelɛɛshɛ bibefɛ.” Ɛ wvú mum gay ɛ̂ wee wvù to nu ɛ kpwe keba kemwaaŋ wɛ lɛ,
41002011	“Me njemyi ɛ̂ wo, ja we ejo fikɛɛy fiuw egɛne fô yew e.”
41002012	Ɛ wvú mum ja we, jo no buyte ɛ bonyii bocii taale wvú. Ɛ bó taa nɛn, ɛ diuw yum bó, ɛ bó no tumte moŋkum mo Nyo' le, gayte lɛ, “Bese ke baa yɛn wase kfuu fin fiɛɛ le kɛ.”
41002013	Ɛ Jisos ke bvuu nɛ gɛn mbew mamase le, ɛ kebombom ke bonyii le to fó, ɛ wvú no yɛɛyi bó.
41002014	Ɛ wvú ke nɛ dioo gɛne, yɛn Lɛwe wvù waa Alfiyus e, ɛ wvú ɛ shii fô bvudvuu bwew bvu lemme le, ɛ no fii shile. Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ̀ biì me le.” Ɛ wvú mum nɛ we no bii wvú le.
41002015	Ɛ Jisos bô boom bew bo ŋgoo le ke gɛn no diekene yew dvu Lɛwe bô bonyii bò to fii shile noo bonyii bomew bò befe tɛn. Kfuu ban bonyii to ké no bii wvú le naa nteen.
41002016	Ɛ Bofalasii bò to duŋci bonci bo Nyo' le yɛn no Jisos diekene bô bonyii bò befe noo bò to fii shile, mum bife ɛ̂ boom bew bo ŋgoo le lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu nje la wvù wvú diekene bô bonyii bò fii shile noo bonyii bò befe bomew?”
41002017	Ɛ Jisos yuw no bó bife, gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Kɛ bonyii bò tɛmyi ké no gomte wee ɛfuwɛ kɛ. Ɛ̀ ké no gomte bò cɛmkene. Kɛ me nto keentee bonyii bò nu teytey kɛ. Me nto keentee ɛ ɛ̀ nu bò befe.”
41002018	Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu, ɛ boom bo Jon e bo ŋgoo le, noo bo Bofalasii le bamte mwɛɛm mvudien. Ɛ bonyii bomew mum to bife ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu nje la wvù boom bo ŋgoo le bo Jon e, noo bo Bofalasii le bamte mwɛɛm mvudien, ɛ boom buw bo ŋgoo le yaa bamte kɛ?”
41002019	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó ebe bonyii bô bvujen ɛ́ bó egɛn ebvuu ebamte mwɛɛm mvudien ɛ cee bvujen nu bô bó? Kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó ebamte mwɛɛm mvudien ɛ wvú nu bô bó kɛ.
41002020	Geenɛn, kefew nu ke eto kè bó nu ke eloo cee bvujen wvudvu ɛ̂ bó, ɛ́ bó emum ekɛw eshee mbam mwɛɛm mvudien kefew kedvu le.
41002021	Kɛ wee nulo ejo njaw ndvu yi fiɛ, etumcɛ ndvu yi yvum dvú kɛ. Ɛ́ wvú ge nonɛn, ɛ́ njaw ndvu yidvu ke emɛse esaa lo ndvu yi yvum yidvu, ɛ́ kebuw kè nu fó emɛse ekuw efey lo no kí be shee nu.
41002022	Kɛ ɛ̀ nulo tɛn ɛ́ wee ejo mbvuum mo monfɛm, egɛɛ ɛ̂ gham mbvuum wvù bó kene bô jew nyam e, ɛ wvù ɛ yvumɛn wase kɛ. Ɛ́ wvú ge nonɛn, ɛ́ mbvuum mo monfɛm modvu ke ekoo, esawyɛ gham wvu yvum wvudvu, ɛ́ mbvuum bô gham ela ɛcici. Fi lɛŋ nu lɛ, bó kɛŋke keegɛɛ mbvuum mo monfɛm kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ gham wvu fwɛ le.”
41002023	Ɛ̀ to nu diuu di mbam e dimew, ɛ Jisos bô boom bew bo ŋgoo le no lɛne fele wɛɛ ɛgiŋ wvumew e. Ɛ boom bew bo ŋgoo le kɛw no sumyi bicɛɛ diee.
41002024	Ɛ Bofalasii yɛn, bife ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Tata, taa eyɛn, ɛ̀ nu nje la wvù boom buw bo ŋgoo le gee fiɛɛ fì nci baa bee lɛ wee ege diuu di mbam e?”
41002025	Ɛ Jisos bife tɛn ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben ke baa taŋ wase ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le no jeŋ to yuu Nfon Dawe bô ŋgoo ye ɛ wvú ge le?
41002026	Ɛ̀ to nu kefew kè Abiata to nu ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le, ɛ Dawe ley yew Nyo' le jo blɛɛd wvù bó to geɛ ncese dvú fô Nyo' le, die bvuu nya tɛn ŋgoo ye dvú, ɛ ɛ̀ to nu nci fo wee edie blɛɛd wvudvu ɛfey bocee ncese.”
41002027	Ɛ Jisos mum mɛse gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Nyo' to gɛke diuu di mbam e nje wee. Wvú to baa bom wee nje diuu di mbam e kɛ.
41002028	Nonɛn, wee wvù diee nu Waawee nu Cee Ɛkolɛ naa noo wvu mbam.”
41003001	Ɛ Jisos ke bvuu gɛn ley yew bunle le. Ɛ wee mvu nu dvú ɛ kebo kew ɛ kpwe.
41003002	Ɛ bonyii bomew bò to nu dvú no gomte fiɛɛ fì bó etey yî Jisos e, mum luŋ ɛjisɛ yî ye le no taale laa wvú nu efɛ wee wvudvu diuu di mbam e lɛ.
41003003	Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ wee wvù kebo to nu ɛ kpwe wɛ lɛ, “Ja we eto fɛn.”
41003004	No wvú toɛ, ɛ Jisos bife ɛ̂ bonyii lɛ, “Fiɛɛ fì nci nu ɛ bee lɛ wee ege diuu di mbam e nu fì la? Keege fiɛɛ fì jee, nuu fì befe lɛ? Keeboyse wee, nuu keeyu lo lɛ?” Ɛ bó cife.
41003005	Ɛ Jisos ton'yɛ shém bô bó, taa bó bocii kɛnɛn, ɛ shen koo wvú yî mvuntelem mvubole mvù yiile le. Ɛ wvú gay ɛ̂ wee wvù kebo to nu ɛ kpwe wɛ lɛ, “Nɛke kebo kuw.” Ɛ wvú nɛke ɛ kí mum bonɛn.
41003006	Ɛ Bofalasii mum buy, gɛn lo kaŋ mwaaŋ ɛ bô bo ŋgoo bonyii bo Nfon 'Ɛlod e jo nsey no ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó ege sɛ yu Jisos.
41003007	Ɛ Jisos bô boom bew bo ŋgoo le mum nɛ jó gɛn fô Mamase yì Galilee le. Ɛ kebombom ke bonyii le ke baay bi wvú le. Ɛ bomew bonyii to nɛ keba kè Galilee bô kè Judea le.
41003008	Ɛ bomew to nɛ Jɛlusalɛm, bomew keba kè Idumea le, bomew Joo Joodan wvuke, bomew biba bì Taya bô Sidon e. Kebombom kedvu to to nonɛn njefo bó to yuuke mwɛɛm mvù wvú to gee mvunciim.
41003009	Ɛ Jisos nɛ gay lɛ boom bew bo ŋgoo le egom kekoŋ eseyse egɛɛ ɛ́ wen eley jó fo kebombom ke enɛ efacɛ wen.
41003010	Wvú to gay nonɛn njefo wvú to nu ɛ fɛ wase bonyii nteen, ɛ bonyii bo bincɛm e bɛɛ kɛ too keekum wvú le.
41003011	Ɛ́ bonyii bò biyoy bì yiile to njiŋsene bô bó ké yɛn Jisos e mum no gbwekene fwe dvu wvú wamte gayte lɛ, “Wo nu Waa Nyo'.”
41003012	No bó wamte nonɛn, ɛ Jisos loocɛ ciise lo ɛ̂ bó lɛ fo bó ege ɛ́ bonyii kiɛɛ wen kɛ.
41003013	Ɛ wvú ke nɛ ben gɛn yî kum e, tee bonyii bò wvú to shieele ɛ bó to fô wvú le.
41003014	Ɛ wvú baa bonyii yuufe ncow bofɛɛ, tee bó lɛ boom bew bo ntum e, wvu lɛ bô bó enù, ɛ́ wen etumte bó ɛ bó ghane fewci diɛw Nyo',
41003015	bvuu kɛŋke mvuŋgay keebvuuse bonceendaa bo dɛwle le yî bonyii le.
41003016	Bonyii bodvu to nu: Semon, wvù wvú to nyaɛ diee diew dimew lɛ Bita.
41003017	Jɛm bô waa bwee wvù Jon bò to nu boom bo Sɛbɛdee le, bò wvú to nyaɛ diee ɛ̂ bó lɛ “Boanɛgɛs” dì nu lɛ, “Boom bo jaŋ yì baykene le.”
41003018	Ɛ bomew nu Andulu, Filew, Batolomu, Matio, Toma, Jɛm wvù waa Alfiyus, Tadio, Semon wvù to nu wee ŋgoo Bosɛlot,
41003019	noo Judas Iskaliot wvù to ghanɛɛ gese Jisos.
41003020	Ɛ Jisos ke nɛ gɛn fô wvú to cee, ɛ kebombom ke bonyii le bvuu tase fó, ɛ bô boom bew bo ŋgoo le faŋɛ yaa kɛŋke naa lo je keediekɛn kɛ.
41003021	Ɛ kfuu diew ke dioo yuw, mum gɛn keejo wvú njefo bonyii to duu lɛ wvú ghaanene lo.
41003022	Ɛ bonyii bò to duŋci bonci bo Nyo' le bò to nɛn'yɛɛ Jɛlusalɛm bow jó no gayte lɛ, “Bɛlsebu nu yî ye le, ɛ wvú bvuuse bonceendaa bo dɛwle le nɛn ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô mvuŋgay mvu nfon bonceendaa bodvu le.”
41003023	Ɛ Jisos bɛn bó, bife ɛ̂ bó ɛ̂ ŋgan e lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ Satan ebvuu ebvuuse ɛkolɛ kew yî wee le nɛɛ le?
41003024	Ɛ́ ketum nɛ ɛ gawsɛn ɛ no diuu ɛkinɛkin, kí saa ke eleem kɛ.
41003025	Yew ɛ́ nɛ ɛ gawsɛn ɛ no diuu ɛyinɛyin, yí saa ke eleem kɛ.
41003026	Nonɛn, ɛ́ Satan nɛ ɛ gawsɛn bô ŋgoo ye ɛ no diuu ɛbonɛbon, wvú saa ke eleem kɛ, ɛ́ emum enu kemɛse kew.
41003027	Geenɛn, ben ekeè lɛ kɛ wee nu dvú wvù nulo eley yew dvu ntɛmemvuŋgay, ekuu mwɛɛm mwew kecɛɛy elewtɛ dvú, sɛ wvú ɛ yaw ɛ kay ntɛmemvuŋgay wvudvu ɛ sɛ kuu kɛ.
41003028	Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy lɛ, Nyo' nulo elɛɛshɛ mwɛɛm mvù befe noo díɛw yì befe yicii yì bonyii jemyi.
41003029	Geenɛn, ɛ́ wee jeme diɛw yì befe ɛkumɛ Keyoy ke Yuule, tu kɛ ɛ̀ nu naa lo ɛ́ Nyo' elɛɛshɛ kɛ, njefo wvú nu ɛ ge kebefɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu kè mɛy lo.”
41003030	Jisos to jemyi nonɛn njefo bonyii bodvu to duu lɛ keyoy kè yiile nu yî ye le.
41003031	Ɛ bwee Jisos bô boom bo bwee Jisos e mum fɛse, leem ɛkfuŋ, tum wee lɛ wvú etee wvú.
41003032	Ɛ̀ to nu ɛ kebombom ke bonyii le ɛ shii ɛ gem wvú ɛ tase. Ɛ bó gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Bwoo bô boom bo bwoo le gomte wo ɛkfuŋ.”
41003033	Ɛ Jisos bife lɛ, “Bwɛɛm bô boom bo bwɛɛm e nu baa?”
41003034	No wvú bife nonɛn mum jiŋe bonyii bò to shilɛɛ gem wvú ba, gay lɛ, “Bwɛɛm bô boom bo bwɛɛm e ban.
41003035	Wee tfuu wvù gee fiɛɛ fì Nyo' gomte, nu wvú wvù nu waa bwɛɛm bô jɛme yɛm noo bwɛɛm.”
41004001	Ɛ Jisos ke bvuu kɛw no yɛɛyi bonyii mbew mamase le, ɛ kebombom ke bonyii le ɛ tase fó nɛn ghemm. Ɛ wvú mum nɛ wase ley shii ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ kekoŋ e ɛ̂ joo, ɛ kebombom kedvu no leeme ŋgem joo le ɛ̂ ŋkpwaante.
41004002	Ɛ wvú no yɛɛyi bó bô mwɛɛm nteen ɛ̂ boŋgan e. Ɛ wvú nɛ ma ŋgan mvu ɛ̂ bó lɛ,
41004003	“Ben eyekɛ eyuw, wee to nu ɛ laa keegɛn etfume ŋgow.
41004004	Ɛ wvú ke dioo etfumyi, ɛ yimi gbwekɛn ɛ̂ je, ɛ mvunyiim to tacɛ die.
41004005	Ɛ yimi ŋgow gbwekɛn fô bvudvuu bvu ɛta le ɛ nshɛ yaa nu fó ntay kɛ. Ɛ yí mum yaŋsɛn buy njefo kɛ nshɛ to nu fó ntay kɛ.
41004006	Ɛ mvum ke dioo ekɛw ebaa, mum suŋ ŋgow yidvu ɛ yí yowlɛn, njefo yí to baa cime gɛŋ kɛ.
41004007	Ɛ yimi ŋgow gbwekɛn ɛ̂ bisafe le. Ɛ bisafe bidvu ke ku mum baŋ ŋgow yidvu ɛ yí faŋɛ yaa eyum mvuntam kɛ.
41004008	Ɛ yimi ŋgow gbwekɛn ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî nshɛ yì jee le, ke buy, ku yum, duu fey no bó to tfumyɛɛ, ɛ jise di ŋgow e yumte ɛjisɛ mbaanshɛ, dimew ɛjisɛ mbaŋsoocaan, dimew ɛjisɛ gbwee.”
41004009	No Jisos ma nonɛn mum mɛse lɛ, “Wee wvù kɛŋke bitem ɛ wvú yuw.”
41004010	Ɛ Jisos ke dioo nu wase wvú ɛmbeŋ, ɛ bonyii bomew bò bô bó to nu noo boom bew bo ŋgoo le bo yuufe ncow bofɛɛ bife ɛ̂ wvú ɛkumɛ ŋgan wvudvu.
41004011	Ɛ wvú tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ ben bò Nyo' nu ɛ duŋcɛ wase kenyilɛ ke bvunfon bwew e. Geenɛn, fô bonyii bomew e nu ɛ fiɛɛ ficii nu kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ boŋgan e,
41004012	wvu lɛ bó ke etaale naa ntay, geenɛn yaa yɛne kɛ, ke eyeke naa ntay, yaa yuuke kɛ. Ɛ fí nu nonɛn wvu lɛ fo bó ke ekumɛn mvuntelem mvubole, ɛ́ Nyo' elɛɛshɛ bibefɛ bibole.”
41004013	Ɛ Jisos nɛ bife ɛ̂ bonyii ba lɛ, “Fí nu lɛ ben baa kiɛɛ fiɛɛ fì ŋgan wvun jemyi le? Ɛ́ ben baa kiɛɛ wvun, ɛ́ ben ke ekiɛɛ bomew boŋgan nɛɛ le?
41004014	Ŋgow yì wee wvudvu tfumyɛɛ nu diɛw Nyo'.
41004015	Ŋgow yì gbweɛ ɛ̂ je nu bonyii bò yuuke diɛw Nyo', ɛ Satan mum to lo kaŋ mwaaŋ bvuse diɛw yidvu fô mvuntelem mvubole.
41004016	Ɛ ŋgow yì gbweɛ fô bvudvuu bvu ɛta le nu bonyii bò yuuke diɛw Nyo', fiisɛn lo kaŋ mwaaŋ bô njoŋ,
41004017	geenen, ɛ yí baa cime gɛŋ fô mvuntelem mvubole kɛ. Ɛ yí moocɛ kɛ fó caan, ɛ́ ŋgɛw ke dioo ɛ to, kɛnɛɛ bonyii bon ɛ ɛ̀ nu bikaa ɛ̂ bó ɛjim nje diɛw yidvu, ɛ bó mum tfuw lo bikaa kaŋ mwaaŋ.
41004018	Ɛ ŋgow yì to gbweɛ ɛ̂ bisafe le nu bonyii bò yuuke diɛw Nyo',
41004019	ɛ ken'yaŋyaŋ ke ɛkumɛ mwɛɛm mvu yî woŋ wvun e, bô shiee bvukukɛ noo shiee mwɛɛm mvumew mum tase baŋ diɛw yidvu ɛ yí laayɛ ɛcici.
41004020	Ŋgow yì gbweɛ yî nshɛ yì jee le ɛ mum ɛ no nu bonyii bò yuuke diɛw Nyo', fiisɛn, no gee no yí gomte gɛne lo fwe fwe, kɛ diɛwɛ ŋgow e fò yí ɛ yum ɛjisɛ mbaanshɛ, yimi ɛjisɛ mbaŋsoocaan, yimi ɛjisɛ gbwee.”
41004021	Ɛ Jisos nɛ bife lɛ, “Wee ké leyte bô ken'yeese yew kfukɛ bô ŋkaa, kɛnɛɛ lese ɛgaaku le? Kɛ wee ké leyte dvú tome ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî fiɛɛ fì bó tomyi ken'yeese yî dvú le le?
41004022	Ben ekeè lɛ fiɛɛ ficii fì nu ɛ̂ nnyilɛ le nu ɛ bó to nyile lɛ bó ke ege ɛ́ fí eyenɛ, ɛ́ fì nu ɛjim ɛjim ficii ɛ́ bó ege ɛ́ fí ebuy ɛmwa.
41004023	Wee wvù kɛŋke bitem, ɛ wvú yuw.”
41004024	Ɛ Jisos bvuu gay lɛ, “Ben dioo yeke diɛw Nyo' no yeke ntay, ekeè lɛ je yì wee yeke jó nu no Nyo' nu ke efew sɛ nya ɛ̂ mwɛtɛn, ɛ wvú nu ke enya naa fesɛn lo.
41004025	Wee wvù kɛŋke fiɛɛ nu ɛ bó nu ke ebise. Ɛ wee wvù yaa kɛŋke kɛ fiɛɛ nu ɛ naa fi caan fì wvú kɛŋke nu ɛ bó nu ke efi lo ɛ̂ wvú.”
41004026	Ɛ Jisos bvuu jeme lɛ, “Bvunfon bvu Nyo' le nu diɛwɛ ŋgow fò wee ɛ tfume wɛne.
41004027	Ɛ́ ké dioo nu ɛntaŋ ɛ wvú no leete, ɛ́ ɛkfuŋ ké yuu ɛ wvú nɛ we. Ɛ́ ŋgow yidvu ké buy no kuu, ɛ wvú yaa cim kee laa yí gee nɛɛ sɛ kuu lɛ,
41004028	ɛ ɛ̀ gee kɛ nshɛ ɛ yí sɛ kuu. Ɛ́ yí ké nɛ yaw low, nɛ fó nya bikem, ké nɛ fó tum ɛjisɛ.
41004029	Ɛ́ yó ké dioo ɛ be, ɛ́ wvú mum jo finyo ley wɛne, njefo kefew ke ŋgbwele le nu ɛ kocɛn wase.”
41004030	Ɛ Jisos bvuu nɛ gay lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ beene efewsɛn bvunfon bvu Nyo' le bô la? Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ beene efewsɛn bô ŋgan wvù la?
41004031	Bvú nu kɛ diɛwɛ kfuu ŋgow fintam fimew, fì ŋoynene ɛjisɛ fele mvuŋgokɛ mvunciim fokuse fɛn. Ɛ́ wee ké tfume wɛne,
41004032	ɛ yí ku, yiŋ fey bite bicii bì bó tfumyi wɛne, ɛ tíɛw ye faŋkɛn no nyaa kendvuŋ, ɛ mvunyiim mvù bile we nulo eyoote yéw yî dvú le ɛ̂ kendvuŋ kedvu le.”
41004033	Ɛ̀ nɛɛ no Jisos to fewci diɛw Nyo' ɛ̂ bonyii ɛ̂ boŋgan e diɛwɛ ban e, ɛ̂ je yì ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó eyuw e.
41004034	Kɛ wvú to ké jeme fiɛɛ ɛ̂ bó sɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ ŋgan e kɛ. Geenɛn, ɛ́ wvú ké dioo nu wase bô boom bew bo ŋgoo le ɛbonɛbon, mum mɛse yuuse boŋgan bodvu bocii ɛ̂ bó.
41004035	Ɛ Jisos yɛɛyi bonyii ɛbvubwɛ, ɛ ɛ̀ ke dioo nu fokiɛguu, ɛ wvú gay ɛ̂ boom bew bo ŋgoo le lɛ, “Beene elente mamase egɛn kewvu keki.”
41004036	Ɛ bó mum cinɛ kebombom ke bonyii le kè to nu fó le, ley ɛ̂ kekoŋ kè Jisos to nu wase jó kiɛ le, ɛ bô bó no leenci, ɛ bikoŋ bimew bii bó le.
41004037	No bó to leenci, ɛ nffum wvu baay nɛ sɛsɛ kɛw no bvuyte joo ɛ yí leyte ɛ̂ kekoŋ e gomte keeyiŋsɛn.
41004038	Jisos to nu ɛ̂ kekoŋ e ɛjim leete, ɛ wvú ɛ jike ɛkolɛ yî mbwaan e. Ɛ bó gɛn no kamsee wvú gayte lɛ, “Wee n'yɛɛyi, kpwe gomte keejo beene nɛn ɛ wo yaa ghayte kɛ le?”
41004039	Ɛ Jisos kamse, wam nffum wvudvu, gay ɛ̂ joo lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nù nyɛkeey.” Ɛ nffum wvudvu mum lu, ɛ mondvuum cife nɛn ndvumm.
41004040	Ɛ wvú mum bife ɛ̂ boom bew bo ŋgoo le lɛ, “Ben fane la? Ben baa lese wase fitele yî yɛm e le?”
41004041	Ɛ ye bɛm bó, ɛ bó no ghayte ɛbonɛbon lɛ, “Wvun wee nu wvù nɛɛ, wvù naa nffum bô joo yuuke wvú le?”
41005001	Ɛ Jisos bô boom bew bo ŋgoo le lente mamase yidvu buy wvuke, keba ke bonyii bo Gɛlasen e.
41005002	No wvú to buyte ɛ̂ kekoŋ e, ɛ bô wee mvu tasɛn ɛ keyoy kè yiile njiŋsene bô wvú, ɛ wvú buy ɛ̂ ditfum dì bó to dweyte bonyii jó le.
41005003	Wee wvudvu to ké no cee ɛ̂ ditfum didvu le. Ɛ wee yaa to nu dvú wvù nulo ebvuu ekay wvú ɛ ɛ̀ cim nu naa bô ncaw kɛ.
41005004	Bokaŋ nteen nu ɛ bó to ké leese wvú ɛ̂ difwaŋ e, kay can ye bô boncaw, ɛ wvú sumyɛ boncaw bodvu, sawyɛ difwaŋ. Kɛ wee to nu dvú wvù nulo ejicɛ wvú le kɛ.
41005005	Wee wvudvu to ké no kale ɛ̂ ditfum didvu le bene buyte yî dikum e ɛntaŋ bô ɛmvunsheeŋ, wamte, kaashi ye ye bô ɛta.
41005006	No wvú yɛnɛɛ Jisos e bɛɛ ncejole, lewtɛ to tum ɛnvuw ɛ̂ wvú ɛjise,
41005007	wam foweɛwe lɛ, “Jisos Waa Nyo', Nyo' wvù nu Ɛkolɛ ke Mwɛɛm Mvunciim e, wo fii la ɛ̂ me? Me nlɛke lo wo ɛ̂ diee di Nyo' le lɛ fo wo enya ŋgɛw ɛ̂ me kɛ.”
41005008	Wvú to jemyi nonɛn, njefo Jisos to nu ɛ wam wase lɛ, “Keyoy kè yiile kin, buyɛ lo yî wee wvun e.”
41005009	Ɛ Jisos bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Diee diuw nu yɛɛ.” Ɛ wvú tfuse lɛ, “Diee diem nu kebombom, njefo bese duule lo.”
41005010	No wvú tfuse nonɛn, mum lɛkɛ Jisos shiee le lɛ fo wvú ekuŋ bowen keba kedvu le kɛ.
41005011	Ɛ̀ to nu ɛ ŋgoo boŋkunyam diekene yî mbɛke le fó.
41005012	Ɛ biyoy bì yiile bidvu mum lɛkɛ Jisos lɛ, “Ciinse bese ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ boŋkunyam boba le ɛ́ bese eley yî bó le.”
41005013	Ɛ Jisos bee. Ɛ biyoy bidvu mum buy yî wee wvudvu le, gɛn ley yî boŋkunyam e. Ɛ ŋgoo yidvu to nu boŋkunyam diɛwɛ bontfuke bofɛɛ le. Ɛ bó sɛn, bow ɛ̂ ŋkoŋ e, shii ɛ̂ mamase yidvu le, lɛ jó.
41005014	Ɛ bonyii bò to cɛyte boŋkunyam bodvu ja fó, fɛɛ lo, gɛn see saaka wvudvu ɛlaante bô ɛ̂ bontɛw bo jó le. Ɛ bonyii no yuuke, buyte keeto eyɛn fiɛɛ fì to kooyɛɛ le.
41005015	Ɛ bó to fô Jisos to nu, yɛn wee wɛ wvù kebombom ke bonceendaa bo dɛwle le to shee njiŋsene bô wvú, ɛ wvù ɛ shii fó, ɛ jise ndvú, ɛ bvufee bwew ɛ kase wase ɛ tu fó. Ɛ bó fan baay.
41005016	Ɛ bonyii bò to yɛnɛɛ fiɛɛ fì to kooyɛɛ le, mum no seŋe ɛ̂ bó no fí to kooyɛɛ bô wee wɛ noo ŋgoo boŋkunyam ba.
41005017	No bó yuw nonɛn, kɛw no lɛke Jisos lɛ wvú enɛ gbwen bowene.
41005018	Ɛ Jisos dioo leyte ɛ̂ kekoŋ e, ɛ wee wvù bonceendaa bo dɛwle le to buyɛɛ yî ye le wɛ mum no lɛke Jisos lɛ bô wen egɛne.
41005019	Ɛ Jisos tun, gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ̀ gɛnè ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô yew e, egɛn esee ɛ̂ bonyii buw fiɛɛ fì Tata ge fô wo le, bô no wvú nu ɛ cam shen fô wo le.”
41005020	Nonɛn, ɛ wee wvudvu mum nɛ, gɛn no ghane woŋ wvudvu le tfuu wvù bó to teŋe lɛ Bilaante bi Yuufe le, seŋe fiɛɛ fì Jisos ge fô wvú le. Ɛ bonyii no yuuke, kɛŋke lo ŋghaw.
41005021	Ɛ Jisos kase lente ɛ̂ kekoŋ e tu kewvu keki no nu mbew mamase le, ɛ kebombom ke bonyii le bvuu tase fó.
41005022	Ɛ cee ɛkolɛ yew bunle mvu mum nɛ to fó, ɛ diee nu Jaylus. No wvú yɛn Jisos e, gɛn gbwe ɛ̂ wvú ɛjise,
41005023	lɛkɛ wvú shiee le gay lɛ, “Waa wɛm wvu caan wvù kpwoon kpwee lo. Kee wo, to kɛ ekum wvú le ɛ́ wvú ebonɛn fo wvú ekpwe.”
41005024	Ɛ Jisos mum nɛ ɛ bô wvú no gɛne, ɛ kebombom ke bonyii le shfumte bii faci Jisos.
41005025	Kpwoon mvu to nu ɛnte jo kebombom kedvu ɛ wvú ɛ cɛm wase bô kencɛm ke bokɛnɛ le bilum yuufe ncow bifɛɛ.
41005026	Wvú to nu ɛ yɛn wase ŋgɛw can bonyii bo bifuu le nteen, jewse fiɛɛ ficii fì wvú to kɛŋke, ɛ mwɛɛm foo kɛ gɛne lo.
41005027	No wvú to nu ɛ yuw wase ɛkumɛ Jisos, ɛ wvú mum to ɛ̂ wvú ɛjim ɛ̂ kebombom ɛnte, kum ndvu ye le,
41005028	njefo wvú to gayte fô fitele fiew e lɛ, “Ɛ́ me ncim eŋkum kɛ naa ɛ ɛ̀ nu ndvu ye le, tu me ɛ mbonɛn wase.”
41005029	No wvú to kumɛɛ nonɛn, ɛ kencɛm kew mum semɛ lo kaŋ mwaaŋ. Ɛ kpwoon wvudvu yuw tɛn ye ye le lɛ wen nu ɛ bonɛn.
41005030	Ɛ Jisos dioo yuw ye ye le lɛ mvuŋgay nu ɛ buy yî wen e, ɛ wvú baŋke ye kaŋ mwaaŋ, bife ɛ̂ bonyii lɛ, “Ɛ̀ kum yɛɛ ndvu yɛm e?”
41005031	Ɛ boom bew bo ŋgoo le tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wo yɛne ɛ kebombom ke bonyii le faci wo, ɛ wo bvuu biite wee wvù kum wo le le?”
41005032	Ɛ Jisos mɛy kɛ no taale kɛnene keeyɛn wee wvù kum wvú le.
41005033	Nonɛn, ɛ kpwoon wvudvu no wvú to kee fiɛɛ fì to kooyɛɛ bô wvú, ɛ wvú mum to, fane, ciiŋke, tum ɛnvuw ɛ̂ Jisos ɛjise see kecɛɛy kew kecii ɛ̂ wvú.
41005034	Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Waa wɛm, fitele fiuw fì wo lese yî yɛm e nu ɛ ge wase wo ɛ bonɛn. Ɛ̀ gɛnè ntay. Kencɛm kuw ka wa lo nɛn.”
41005035	Kɛ no Jisos to bɛɛ jemyi ɛ̂ kpwoon wvudvu nonɛn, ɛ bonyii bomew fɛse fó ɛ bó nɛ fô yew e fo Jaylus wvù cee ɛkolɛ yew bunle wɛ, gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Waa wo nu ɛ mɛse wase. Wo bvuu shee nyaa ŋgɛw ɛ̂ wee n'yɛɛyi ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvù la?”
41005036	No bó gay nonɛn, ɛ Jisos yuw, geenɛn ge kɛ diɛwɛ wvú baa yuw kɛ, gay ɛ̂ Jaylus lɛ, “Fo wo efanè kɛ, lese kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu fitele yî yɛm e maaŋ.”
41005037	Ɛ bó no gɛne kɛ lo, ɛ Jisos faŋɛ yaa bee lɛ wee mvu ebi wen e ɛfey Bita bô Jɛm noo Jon wvù waa bwee Jɛm kɛ.
41005038	Ɛ bó ke gɛn fɛse fô yew e fo Jaylus, ɛ Jisos yɛn ɛ bonyii beele ffule lo fó, ɛ kpwe ghamte lo.
41005039	Ɛ wvú ley yew, bife lɛ, “Ben beele, ffule mondvuum nɛn nje la? Wan baa kpwe kɛ, wvú leete lo.”
41005040	Ɛ bó no kieele lo wvú. Ɛ wvú nɛ bvuse bonyii bocii ɛkfuŋ, jo kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu cee wan bô bwee wan noo bonyii bew bo ŋgoo le bo botɛte ba, ɛ bô bó ley gɛn fô wan wvudvu to jiime.
41005041	Ɛ wvú jicɛ wan wvudvu le yî kebo le jeme ɛ̂ díɛw yibole lɛ, “Talita kum!” Fì nu lɛ, “Wan kpwoon, me njemyi ɛ̂ wo le, ja we.”
41005042	Kaŋ mwaaŋ nonɛn, ɛ wvú mum ja we no lɛne. Ɛ bó yɛn nonɛn ɛ diuw yum bó. Wan kpwoon wvudvu to nu bilum yuufe ncow bifɛɛ.
41005043	Ɛ Jisos ciise lo ɛ̂ bó lɛ fo bó ege ɛ́ wee ekiɛɛ fiɛɛ fì be nu kɛ, mum gay lɛ bó enya fiɛɛ ɛ́ wvú edie.
41006001	Ɛ Jisos ke nɛ fó, ɛ bô boom bew bo ŋgoo le gɛn ntɛw wvubole.
41006002	Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu diuu dibole di mbam e, ɛ wvú gɛn yew bunle le kɛw no yɛɛyi bonyii. Ɛ bonyii nteen no yuuke no wvú yɛɛyi kɛŋke lo ŋghaw. Ɛ bó mum nɛ no ghayte gayte lɛ, “Wee wvun yɛɛyi mvun mwɛɛm fɛɛ nɛn? Wvú jo bvun bvufee fɛɛ? Wvú ghan nɛɛ ɛ sɛ no gee bin biŋghaw bi mwɛɛm e?
41006003	Ɛ̀ nu kɛ wvú wɛ wvù kane bite wvù waa Maalia le? Kɛ ɛ̀ nu waa bwee Jɛm bô Yosɛs noo Judas bô Semon e? Ɛ kɛ jɛ́me ye nu jan beene ɛ bó le?” No bó ghay nonɛn mum ma wvú.
41006004	Nonɛn ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Bó ké no wvumte wee ntum Nyo' naa mondvuum e monciim. Ɛ̀ nu kɛ woŋ we le bô ɛ̂ kfuu diew e noo ɛ̂ wvú yew dvù bó yaa ké no wvumte wvú kɛ.”
41006005	No bó ma Jisos nonɛn, ɛ fí mum ghaw wvú keebvuu ege biŋghaw bi mwɛɛm e jó nteen, ɛfey kɛ lɛ wvú to nu ɛ kum bonyii bo bincɛm e caan ɛ bó bonɛn.
41006006	Ɛ wvú kɛŋkɛ lo ŋghaw no bó to baa lese fitele yî ye le kɛ. Ɛ Jisos ke nɛ fó no ghane bontɛw bo jó le yɛɛyi bonyii.
41006007	Ɛ wvú ke nɛ tee boom bew bo ŋgoo le bo yuufe ncow bofɛɛ, no tumte bó ɛkfuŋ bofɛɛ bofɛɛ, nyaa mvuŋgay ɛ̂ bó mvù bó ebvuuse biyoy bì yiile yî bonyii le dvú.
41006008	Ɛ wvú dioo tumte bó gay lɛ fo bó ejo naa lo fiɛɛ ɛfey kembaŋ kɛ. Fo bó ejo mwɛɛm mvudien kɛ. Fo bó ejo ɛkɛlɛ kɛnɛɛ bigew ɛ̂ bicaw bibole kɛ.
41006009	Bó elese bolaba, geenɛn fo bó etfume bikum bifɛɛ kɛ.
41006010	Ɛ wvú bvuu gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben ke dioo ɛ gɛn ntɛw e, ɛ ley yew, no cee kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu dvú gɛn buy diuu dì ben ke enɛ jó.
41006011	Ɛ́ ntɛw mvu tun keefiisɛn ben, eyuw fiɛɛ fì ben jemyi, ɛ́ ben nɛnɛ jó, dioo nɛn'yi kucɛ kebvu ke yî bikaa binɛn e, ɛ́ enu nciise fiɛɛ fì bó mom.”
41006012	Nonɛn, ɛ bó mum nɛ gɛn no ghane fewci lɛ bonyii ekumɛn mvuntelem mvubole.
41006013	Ɛ bó bvuu no bvuuse tɛn bonceendaa bo dɛwle le nteen yî bonyii le, yeefe bonyii bo bincɛm e nteen bô mɛɛm ɛ bó bonene.
41006014	Ɛ Nfon 'Ɛlod ke yuw saaka wvu ɛkumɛ Jisos, no bonyii to yuuke wase diee diew mondvuum e monciim, ɛ bonyii bomew no gayte lɛ, “Jisos wvun nu Jon Nleseɛjoo ɛ wvú ɛ kase ɛ buy yî kpwe le. Ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì ge wvú ɛ sɛ no kɛŋke mvuŋgay keegee biŋghaw bi mwɛɛm e bin nɛn.”
41006015	Ɛ bomew gayte lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu Ɛlayja ɛ wvú ɛ kase ɛ to.” Bomew lɛ, “Wvú nu wee ntum Nyo' mvu kɛ diɛwɛ bo fwele fwele le.”
41006016	Ɛ 'Ɛlod dioo yuw mwɛɛm mvun nɛn gay fiew lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu Jon Nleseɛjoo wvù me nto mbvusɛɛ ɛkolɛ kew ɛ wvú ɛ kase ɛ buy yî kpwe le.”
41006017	Jon nu ɛ 'Ɛlod to tum bonyii ɛ bó gɛn koo wvú, kay fen yew ncaw e nje 'Ɛlodia wvù kpwɛɛ Filew wvù waa bwee 'Ɛlod, ɛ 'Ɛlod to jo kpwɛse le.
41006018	Ɛ Jon no tune gayte ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Nci baa bee lɛ wee ejo kpwɛɛ waa bwee kpwɛse le kɛ.”
41006019	No Jon to gayte nonɛn, ɛ 'Ɛlodia mum no kɛŋke wvú fô fitele le gomte keeyu wvú, geenɛn yaa kɛŋke je kɛ,
41006020	njefo 'Ɛlod to fane Jon lɛ wvú nu wee wvu teytey bvuu nu wee Nyo'. Ɛ wvú mum no yɛne fo bó eyu wvú. 'Ɛlod to ké dioo yeke fiɛɛ fì Jon jemyi, ɛ fitele fiew no saake wvú baay, geenɛn ɛ wvú no yuuke kɛ njoŋ keeyeke fiɛɛ fì wvú jemyi.
41006021	Ɛ je ke mum yenɛ fô 'Ɛlodia le diuu dimew dì 'Ɛlod to gee ŋkaw bô bocee woŋ noo bikuu bi nci le noo bonyii bo baay baay bo Galilee keekume diuu dì bó to bokɛɛ wvú.
41006022	Ɛ waa 'Ɛlodia wvù kpwoon ke ley cɛŋ bine, ɛ fí joŋ 'Ɛlod bô bonyii bew bo ŋkaw e. Ɛ wvú mum gay ɛ̂ wan wvudvu lɛ, “Bife naa fiɛɛ fì wo kooŋke, ɛ́ me enfene wo dvú.”
41006023	Ɛ wvú bvuu die kelew gay lɛ, “Ɛ́ wo bife naa la ɛ̂ me, ɛ ɛ̀ cim nu naa keŋgawtɛn ke woŋ wɛm e, ɛ́ me enya ɛ̂ wo.”
41006024	Ɛ wan kpwoon wvudvu mum buy gɛn bife ɛ̂ bwee lɛ, “Me eŋgay lɛ bó efene me bô la?” Ɛ bwee tfuse lɛ, “Gɛnɛ egay lɛ bó enya ɛkolɛ ke Jon Nleseɛjoo le ɛ̂ wo.”
41006025	Ɛ wvù mum yaŋsɛn tu jim kaŋ mwaaŋ, gay ɛ̂ Nfon 'Ɛlod lɛ, “Me ŋgomte lɛ wo enya ɛkolɛ ke Jon Nleseɛjoo le ɛ̂ me keseen ɛ̂ juy e.”
41006026	Ɛ Nfon yuw nonɛn, ɛ ye keeshɛ wvú baay. Geenɛn nje kelew kè wvú to dieɛ wase fwe dvu bonyii bò to nu fô ŋkaw e, ɛ wvú faŋɛ yaa egomte keebvuu ekumɛn diɛw ye yì wvú to jemyɛɛ ɛ̂ wan kɛ.
41006027	Ɛ wvú mum tum lo nceendaa kaŋ mwaaŋ lɛ wvú egɛn eto bô ɛkolɛ ke Jon e. Ɛ wvú mum gɛn yew ncaw e, bvuse ɛkolɛ ke Jon e,
41006028	gɛɛ ɛ̂ juy e, to dvú nya ɛ̂ wan wvudvu. Ɛ wvú fi, buy dvú gɛn nya ɛ̂ bwee.
41006029	Ɛ boom bo ŋgoo le bo Jon e ke dioo yuw, mum gɛn jo gvune di Jon e dwey.
41006030	Ɛ boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e ke ghan kase tu jim fô wvú le, see mwɛɛm mvunciim mvù bó to geɛ bô mvù bó to yɛɛyɛɛ bonyii dvú ɛ̂ wvú.
41006031	Ɛ wvú mum nɛ gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben eto kɛ ben ben ɛ́ beene egɛn bvudvuu bvù bonyii yaa nu kɛ fó le, elɛɛtɛn caan.” Wvú to gay nonɛn njefo bonyii nteen to too fô bó to nu, ɛ́ bomew dioo nɛn'yi, ɛ́ bomew no too. Ɛ bó yaa cim kɛŋke naa lo kefew keediekɛn kɛ.
41006032	Ɛ bô bó mum ley ɛ̂ kekoŋ e base ye ɛbonɛbon no gɛnɛ fô bvudvuu bvù bonyii yaa nu kɛ le.
41006033	Geenɛn, ɛ bonyii nteen yɛn kɛ bó le no bó gɛne, kiɛɛ bó, mum nɛ ɛ̂ bilaante le bicii no lewte sumtene bó. Ɛ bó gɛn fɛse fó, ɛ Jisos bô boom bew bo ŋgoo le sɛ ke fɛse.
41006034	Ɛ Jisos ke dioo fɛɛse ɛ̂ ŋkpwaante, yɛn kebombom ke bonyii le nɛn ghemm, ɛ shen koo wvú bô bó, njefo bó to nu diɛwɛ njée yì nu sɛ wee ncɛy e. Ɛ wvú mum kɛw no yɛɛyi bó, ke yɛɛyi bó bô mwɛɛm nteen.
41006035	Ɛ diuu ke dioo seeyi, ɛ boom bew bo ŋgoo le bencɛ gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Fɛn nu ŋkpwaante ɛ kefew ɛ gɛn wase,
41006036	kɛ cinɛ bonyii ban e ɛ́ bó egɛn bontɛw bô ɛla yo nceencee le, eguy mwɛɛm mvubole mvudien.”
41006037	Ɛ Jisos tfuse fiew lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu enya ben fiɛɛ ɛ́ bó edie.” Ɛ bó bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wo gomte lɛ bese egom bodanali gee fɛɛ eguy mwɛɛm mvudien dvú eto enya ɛ̂ bó?”
41006038	Ɛ Jisos bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben kɛŋke bontuw bo blɛɛd e bomɛɛ? Ben kɛ gɛn taa.” Ɛ bó gɛn taa, to see lɛ, “Bontuw bo blɛɛd e nu botin bô byé yifiɛɛ.”
41006039	Ɛ Jisos mum gay lɛ boom bew bo ŋgoo le egay lɛ bonyii eshiiyɛn ŋgóo le ŋgóo le, yî ŋkfuŋkfun e.
41006040	Nonɛn, ɛ bonyii bodvu mum shiiyɛn fokuse ŋgóo le gbwee gbwee bomew mbaanshen mbaanshen.
41006041	Ɛ Jisos jo bontuw bo blɛɛd e bo botin ba bô byé yi yifiɛɛ yɛ, taa we, nya keyoone ɛ̂ Nyo', mum guushɛ nya ɛ̂ boom bew bo ŋgoo le, ɛ bó nya ɛ̂ bonyii. Ɛ wvú gawcɛ tɛn byé yi yifiɛɛ yɛ ɛ̂ bó bocii.
41006042	Ɛ bonyii bocii die ffuu.
41006043	Ɛ boom bo Jisos e bo ŋgoo le baancɛ bimbɛke bi blɛɛd e bô bi byé yì shɛɛtɛɛ le, ɛ bí yiŋsɛn ŋkáa yuufe ncow fiɛɛ.
41006044	Bonyii bò to dieɛ mwɛɛm mvudien mvudvu to nu bolemsɛ bontfuke botin.
41006045	Ɛ Jisos mum gay lɛ boom bew bo ŋgoo le eley ɛ̂ kekoŋ e kaŋ mwaaŋ esaa fwe Bɛsayda ɛ́ wen eshɛɛ egay bonyii le ɛ́ bó ekfuuyi.
41006046	Ɛ wvú ke shɛɛ gay bó le, mum nɛ ben yî kum e keebunle.
41006047	Ɛ ɛkfuŋ ke jiim, ɛ kekoŋ nu wase ɛ̂ joo ɛntelɛŋ, ɛ Jisos bɛɛ kɛ ŋkpwaante wvú ɛmbeŋ.
41006048	Ɛ wvú yɛn no boom bew bo ŋgoo le katene bô kekoŋ keekey, njefo fwefwe to too je fwe cile kí. Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu kɛ diɛwɛ ɛn'yulem e ɛ wvú nɛ no too fô bó le, lɛne yî joo le. Ɛ wvú to too gomte keefey mbew bó le.
41006049	Ɛ bó dioo yɛn wvú le no wvú lɛne yî joo le, no kpwaake lɛ ɛ̀ nu ŋkfusay. Ɛ bó wam foweɛwe,
41006050	njefo bó bocii to nu ɛ yɛn wvú le ɛ kedvum gbwo bó. Kaŋ mwaaŋ, ɛ Jisos mum jeme ɛ̂ bó gay lɛ, “Ben ejicɛ mvuntelem mvunɛn e, ɛ̀ nu me. Fo ben efanè kɛ.”
41006051	No wvú gay nonɛn, mum ley shii ɛ̂ kekoŋ e bô bó, ɛ fwefwe wvudvu mum lu. Ɛ bó taa nɛn, ɛ diuw yum bó nɛn kaww,
41006052	nje bvufee bvubole to kfufene lo, ɛ bó to baa cim kiɛɛ tɛn fiɛɛ fì bontuw bo blɛɛd e ba to duŋci ɛkumɛ Jisos kɛ.
41006053	Ɛ bó ke lente mamase buy keba kè Gɛnɛsalɛt e, wow kekoŋ ŋgem joo le.
41006054	No bó buyɛɛ ɛ̂ kekoŋ e, ɛ bonyii mum kiɛɛ lo Jisos kaŋ mwaaŋ,
41006055	no lewte gɛne bontɛw bo jó le bocii, bvuuse bonyii bo bincɛm e too bô bó ɛ̂ mvuŋkɛɛy e naa fɛɛ fò bó to yuuke lɛ Jisos nu fó le.
41006056	Ɛ́ Jisos ké gɛn naa fɛɛ kɛnɛɛ wvú gɛn ntɛw e, kɛnɛɛ ɛlaante, kɛnɛɛ ŋkpwaante, ɛ bonyii no gɛɛle kɛ bonyii bo bincɛm e fô bonyii ké no taashi. Ɛ́ Jisos ké dioo fele, ɛ bó no lɛke lɛ wvú ecinɛ ɛ́ bó ekum kɛ naa ŋgem ndvu ye le. Ɛ wee tfuu wvù to kumte, mum no bonene.
41007001	Diuu dimew ɛ Bofalasii bô bonyii bomew bò to duŋci bonci bo Nyo' le nɛ Jɛlusalɛm to tase mbew Jisos e.
41007002	Ɛ bó ke nɛ yɛn ɛ boom bo ŋgoo le bo Jisos e bomew diekene bô can yile, fì nu lɛ bó to baa cukɛ can kɛ.
41007003	Bojuu bocii, sɛ bvuu ge Bofalasii to bii kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu nce woŋ wvu bo'icee bobole bo fwele le, lɛ kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wee edie fiɛɛ sɛ wvú ɛ cukɛ can lɛŋlɛŋ no bó to ké cukɛ kɛ.
41007004	Kɛ ɛ̀ nulo tɛn ɛ́ wee ke ekfulɛ fô way edie fiɛɛ sɛ wvú ɛ cukɛ ye ɛ̂ yiyɛ je le kɛ. Ɛ bó bvuu gee mwɛɛm mvumew mvu nce woŋ e nteen, kɛ diɛwɛ keecukɛ mvuŋkom noo bibɛɛŋ noo bonton.
41007005	Ɛ Bofalasii bô bonyii bò duŋci bonci bodvu mum bife ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu nje la wvù boom buw bo ŋgoo le yaa bii nce woŋ bo'icee bosɛɛbeene bo fwele le kɛ? Ɛ̀ nu nje la wvù bó diekene bô can yile?”
41007006	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Yɛsaya wvù wee ntum Nyo' to nu ɛ jeme kecɛɛy lɛ ben nu bonyii bò jemyi jɛɛy gee jɛɛy. Ben gee kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì wvú to saŋɛɛ lɛ, Nyo' gayte lɛ, ‘Bonyii ban wvumte me kɛ fomvu fomvu, ɛ mvuntelem mvubole nu ncejole fô me le.
41007007	Bó bunlee me ɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ ɛcici, njefo bó joo mwɛɛm mvù ɛ̀ kpwawci bonyii, yɛɛyi lɛ ɛ̀ nu diɛw yɛm.’
41007008	Ɛ̀ nu kɛ tɛn no ben cin'yi bonci bo Nyo' le, gɛɛle ɛ ɛ̀ nu bò ɛ̀ gɛke bonyii.”
41007009	Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben looci naa kee keetun bonci bo Nyo' le wvu lɛ ben ebii ɛ ɛ̀ nu bonɛn e.
41007010	Fí nu ɛ Muses to gay lɛ, ‘Wvumɛ ico bô bwoo.’ Bvuu gay tɛn lɛ, ‘Ɛ́ wee nan lo ice kɛnɛɛ bwee, ɛ́ bó yu lo mwɛtɛn.’
41007011	Geenɛn, ben ɛ no gayte finɛn lɛ, ‘Ɛ́ wee kɛŋke fiɛɛ fì ɛ̀ be nɛlo ɛ́ wvú efi ice kɛnɛɛ bwee dvú, ɛ nɛ ɛ gay ɛ̂ ice kɛnɛɛ ɛ̂ bwee lɛ fiɛɛ fidvu nu wase Koban,’ fì nu lɛ ɛ̀ nu wase fi Nyo' le,
41007012	tu ben baa bvuu bee lɛ wvú ejo fiɛɛ fidvu efi ice kɛnɛɛ bwee dvú kɛ.
41007013	Ben gee nonɛn, gee ɛ diɛw Nyo' tuu fiɛɛ fi ɛcici nje nce wene woŋ wvù ben yɛɛyi bonyii dvú. Ɛ mwɛɛm mvumew bvuu nu tɛn dvú nteen diɛwɛ mvun e mvù ben gee.”
41007014	Ɛ Jisos bvuu tee bonyii ɛ bó to, ɛ wvú gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben bocii eyekɛ eyuw fiɛɛ fì me njemyi, ekiɛɛ ntay.
41007015	Kɛ fiɛɛ fì wee diee ɛ fí bow ɛ̂ shem nulo ebefe bô wvú kɛ. Ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì buyte diuw wee le fì beete bô wvú. [
41007016	Wee wvù kɛŋke bitem keeyuw, ɛ wvú yuw.”]
41007017	Ɛ Jisos ke cinɛ bonyii bodvu le, ley yew, ɛ boom bew bo ŋgoo le bife ɛ̂ wvú ɛkumɛ ŋgan wvudvu.
41007018	Ɛ wvú tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Kɛ ben tɛn kee mwɛɛm e? Kɛ ben kee lɛ fiɛɛ ficii fì wee leese ɛ̂ wvú ɛmvu yaa nulo ebefe bô wvú kɛ le?
41007019	Fí nu nonɛn, njefo fí ké leyte saa gɛn ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô fitele fiew e kɛ, bow ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ shem, ke mum ghan buy lo.” (No Jisos to gayɛɛ nonɛn, ɛ fí mum no nu lɛ mwɛɛm mvudien mvunciim yuule lo.)
41007020	Ɛ wvú bvuu gɛn fwe gay lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì buyte yî wee le fì beete bô wee,
41007021	njefo mwɛɛm mvù befe mvù wee gee nɛn'yi fô fitele fiew e. Mwɛɛm diɛwɛ boŋkpwawcɛ bò befe, keejaŋ kenjaŋ, keecoŋ bvucoŋ, keeyu wee, keejo kpwɛɛ wee kɛnɛɛ dwee wee,
41007022	keedewkene ɛjisɛ yî mwɛɛm e, keebuwyi mwɛɛm, keelɛɛle kenlɛɛma, keegee nnyɛn, keebene kendoŋ, keebeete bô ɛdiee ɛ bonyii, keebense ye noo keeyuŋsene keyuŋsɛɛ.
41007023	Mwɛɛm mvù befe mvun mvunciim nɛn'yi ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô fitele fi wee le sɛ beete bô mwɛtɛn.”
41007024	Ɛ Jisos ke nɛ jó, gɛn keba ke bilaante bì Taya bô Sidon e. No wvú gɛn jó, ley yew dvumew faŋɛ yaa gomte lɛ wee ekiɛɛ lɛ wen nu jó kɛ. Geenɛn, ɛ bonyii kiɛɛ kɛ lo.
41007025	Kpwoon mvu to nu jó ɛ keyoy kè yiile nu yî waa we wvù kpwoon e. Kaŋ mwaaŋ no wvú yuw ɛkumɛ Jisos, mum to gbwe bikaa biew e.
41007026	Kpwoon wvudvu to nu wee Glek, kɛ ɛ̀ to nu wee Juu kɛ. Bó to boke wvú Fonishia woŋ wvù Silia le. No wvú gbwe nonɛn, mum lɛkɛ Jisos lɛ wvú ebvuse nceendaa dɛwle wvudvu yî waa wen e.
41007027	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Cinɛ ɛ́ bó eyaw enyaŋe boom, njefo kɛ fí nu lɛŋ keejo ŋgu boom elaŋ fô bwé le kɛ.”
41007028	Ɛ kpwoon wvudvu tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu kecɛɛy icɛm. Geenɛn, boom ké dioo diekene ɛ bwé no boŋyi kɛ tfúw yì gbwekene fokuse.”
41007029	Ɛ Jisos mum gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Nje fiɛɛ fì wo tfuse fin, wo nulo egɛne fiuw, nceendaa dɛwle wvudvu nu ɛ cinɛ wase waa wo le.”
41007030	Ɛ kpwoon wvudvu mum nɛ no gɛne fô yew e, dioo gɛn yɛn ɛ waa we jiime fontaw ɛ nceendaa dɛwle wvudvu ɛ buy wase.
41007031	Ɛ Jisos nɛ ɛ̂ keba kè Taya le, fey Sidon bvuu fey keba kè Bilaante bi Yuufe le, mum tu je fô Mamase yì Galilee le.
41007032	Ɛ bonyii bomew ke nɛ to bô wee mvu ɛ ɛ̀ nu kencife ɛ wvú yaa kee keejeme kɛ. Ɛ bó lɛkɛ Jisos lɛ wvú egɛɛ can ye yî ye le, efɛ wvú.
41007033	Ɛ Jisos mum jo wvú ɛ bô wvú buy ɛ̂ kebombom ɛnte no nu ɛbonɛbon. Ɛ wvú lese boom bew bo can e ɛ̂ bintuŋtuŋ bi wee wvudvu le, cuy ncɛŋ kum leme di wee wvudvu le dvú,
41007034	taa we, shom, jeme ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛfata,” fì nu lɛ, “Yene.”
41007035	Ɛ bintuŋtuŋ bi wee wvudvu le mum yene kaŋ mwaaŋ, ɛ leme diew yaatɛn, ɛ wvú mum no jemyi naa ntay.
41007036	Ɛ Jisos mum ciise lo ɛ̂ bonyii lɛ fô bó ke esee ɛ̂ wee kɛ. Geenɛn, no wvú to ciise, ɛ ɛ̀ kaa no nu kɛ no bó nu eseŋe gɛne dvú fwe fwe.
41007037	Ɛ diuw no yumte bonyii naa baay. Ɛ bó no ghayte, gayte lɛ, “Jisos kee keege mwɛɛm mvunciim naa ntay. Wvú gee ɛ bincife yuuke mwɛɛm, ɛ bindvumɛm jemyi.”
41008001	Kɛ ɛdiuw yoya le, ɛ kebombom ke bonyii le bvuu to tase nɛn ghemm. Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu ɛ bó yaa bvuu kɛŋke mwɛɛm mvudien kɛ, ɛ Jisos tee boom bew bo ŋgoo le gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ,
41008002	“Me ŋkɛŋke shen fô kebombom kin e, njefo bó nu wase bee bó ɛdiuw ɛta, ɛ fiɛɛ fì bó edie yaa bvuu nu kɛ.
41008003	Ɛ́ me ncine lo bó ɛ no gɛne ɛla ɛbole, ɛ́ bó egɛn egbwe jeŋ ɛ̂ je no bomew bó le nɛ ncejole.”
41008004	Ɛ boom bew bo ŋgoo le tfuse lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wee ejo fɛɛ mwɛɛm mvudien ŋkpwaante jan keenyaŋe kfuu ban bonyii dvú?”
41008005	Ɛ wvú bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben kɛŋke bontuw bo blɛɛd e bomɛɛ?” Ɛ bó tfuse lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu bosooshwiy.”
41008006	Ɛ Jisos mum gay lɛ kebombom ke bonyii le kedvu eshii fokuse. Ɛ bó shii, ɛ wvú jo bontuw bo blɛɛd e bo bosooshwiy ba, nya keyoone ɛ̂ Nyo', guushɛ, nya ɛ̂ boom bew bo ŋgoo le lɛ bó egawcɛ ɛ̂ bó. Ɛ bó mum gawcɛ.
41008007	Bó to kɛŋke tɛn mvubyetɛlɛ nɛn caan. Ɛ wvú bvuu jo, nya keyoone ɛ̂ Nyo', gay ɛ bó gawcɛ ɛ̂ bonyii bodvu.
41008008	Ɛ wee tfuu die ffuu. Ɛ bó baancɛ bimbɛke bì to shɛɛtɛɛ, ɛ bí yiŋsɛn ŋkáa yisooshwiy.
41008009	Bonyii bò to dieɛ to nu diɛwɛ bontfuke bonɛw e.
41008010	Ɛ wvú mum cinɛ bó le ɛ bó no kfuuyi. Ɛ wvú ley lo ɛ̂ kekoŋ e kaŋ mwaaŋ bô boom bew bo ŋgoo le mum nɛ gɛn keba kè Dalmanuta le.
41008011	Ɛ Bofalasii ke nɛ to fô Jisos e, kɛw mbew bô wvú, gay lɛ wvú ege fiɛɛ fì duŋci mvuŋgay mvù nɛ fowe. Ɛ bó to gayte nonɛn momte lo wvú.
41008012	Ɛ Jisos shom naa baay, gay lɛ, “Ɛŋgokɛ kin gomte fiɛɛ fì duŋci mvuŋgay mvù nɛ fowe keege la dvú? Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy lɛ kɛ ɛŋgokɛ kin nu eyɛn fiɛɛ le kɛ.”
41008013	Ɛ wvú mum cinɛ bó le, kase ley ɛ̂ kekoŋ e, no gɛne kewvu keki.
41008014	Jisos to gɛne ɛ boom bew bo ŋgoo le ɛ daayɛ keejo blɛɛd, kɛŋke kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu ntuw mwaaŋ ɛ̂ kekoŋ e.
41008015	Ɛ wvú no teete bó gayte lɛ, “Ben eyɛnè, bvuu joo kefew yî fintuŋlɛɛn fi Bofalasii noo fi 'Ɛlod e.”
41008016	Ɛ boom bew bo ŋgoo le mum kɛw no jemyi ɛbonɛbon ɛkumɛ fiɛɛ fidvu, gayte lɛ, “Wvú jemyi fintuŋlɛɛn fin nɛn njefo beene baa kɛŋke blɛɛd kɛ.”
41008017	Ɛ Jisos kiɛɛ fiɛɛ fì bó jemyi ɛkumɛ fí, mum bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben jemyi ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛkumɛ blɛɛd wvù ben baa kɛŋke kɛ nje la? Kɛ ben yɛne wase mwɛɛm e kɛnɛɛ kee mwɛɛm e? Fí nu lɛ bvufee bvunɛn baa yene wase le?
41008018	Ben kɛŋke ɛjisɛ yaa yɛne mwɛɛm e le? Ben kɛŋke bitem yaa yuuke mwɛɛm e? Kɛ ben kumyi mwɛɛm e?
41008019	Seke me nto ŋguushɛɛ bontuw bo blɛɛd e botin ɛ bonyii die bontfuke botin, ben to baanci bimbɛke bì to shɛɛtɛɛ ɛ bí yiŋsɛn ŋkáa yimiɛɛ?” Ɛ bó tfuse lɛ, “Yuufe ncow fiɛɛ.”
41008020	Ɛ wvú bvuu bife lɛ, “Ɛkumɛ bontuw bo bosooshwiy bò bonyii be die bontfuke bonɛw, ben be baanci bimbɛke bì be shɛke bí ɛ yiŋsɛn ŋkáa yimiɛɛ?” Ɛ bó tfuse lɛ, “Yisooshwiy.”
41008021	Ɛ wvú mum bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Kɛ ben kee wase mwɛɛm e?”
41008022	Ɛ Jisos bô boom bew bo ŋgoo le ke lente buy Bɛsayda, ɛ bonyii bomew to bô kenfefe kemew fô wvú le lɛkɛ lɛ wvú ekum wvú le efɛ wvú.
41008023	Ɛ Jisos jicɛ wvú le yî kebo le, jo ɛ bô wvú buysɛn ntɛw wvudvu. Ɛ wvú cuy ncɛŋ yî ɛjisɛ ɛye le, gɛɛ can yî ye le mum bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wo yɛne fiɛɛ le?”
41008024	Ɛ kenfefe kedvu cake ɛjisɛ we, taa gay lɛ, “Me n'yɛne bonyii le jiwejiwe ɛ bó lɛne nu diɛwɛ bite le.”
41008025	Ɛ Jisos bvuu gɛɛ can yî ɛjisɛ ɛ wee wvudvu le, ɛ wvú taa nɛn tuŋŋ, ɛ ɛjisɛ ɛye mum yuu, ɛ wvú no yɛne mwɛɛm mvunciim e ntay.
41008026	Ɛ Jisos mum gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ̀ gɛnè fô yew e, dioo gɛne fo wo ebvuu eley ntɛw e kɛ.”
41008027	Ɛ Jisos bô boom bew bo ŋgoo le nɛ fó no gɛne bontɛw bo keba kè Kaysalia Filibi le. Ɛ bó dioo gɛne, ɛ wvú bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Bonyii duu lɛ me nu yɛɛ?”
41008028	Ɛ bó tfuse lɛ, “Bonyii bomew duu lɛ wo nu Jon Nleseɛjoo, bomew lɛ Ɛlayja, ɛ bomew duu lɛ wo nu wee ntum Nyo' mvu.”
41008029	Ɛ wvú mum kase bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben duu finɛn lɛ me nu yɛɛ?” Ɛ Bita tfuse lɛ, “Wo nu Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ.”
41008030	Ɛ Jisos mum ciise lo ɛ̂ bó lɛ fo bó ke emom esee fifin ɛ̂ wee ɛkumɛ wen kɛ.
41008031	Ɛ wvú mum kɛw no yɛɛyi boom bew bo ŋgoo le jemyi ɛkumɛ ɛkolɛ kew lɛ, “Wee wvù diee nu Waawee kɛŋke keeke eyɛn boŋgɛw nteen, ɛ́ bonyii bò saake woŋ bô bocee ncese bo baay baay noo bonyii bò duŋci bonci bo Nyo' le ema lo wvú. Bó nu ke emum eyu wvú, ɛ́ ɛdiuw ke ebuy ɛta ɛ́ wvú ekase ebuy yî kpwe le.”
41008032	Wvú to jemyi mwɛɛm mvun ɛ̂ bó ɛndan. Ɛ Bita mum jo wvú ɛ bô wvú lɛwse ye, mum kɛw no saake wvú yî fiɛɛ fidvu le.
41008033	Ɛ Jisos baŋke ye, taa boom bew bo ŋgoo le, wam Bita gay lɛ, “Ja ɛ̂ me ɛjise Satan! Wo jewsee lo me njefo kɛ wo leeme ɛ̂ keba ke Nyo' le kɛ. Wo leeme ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ ke wee wvu wum e.”
41008034	Ɛ wvú mum tee kebombom ke bonyii le bô boom bew bo ŋgoo le, gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ɛ́ wee gomte keenu wee wɛm, tu wvú kɛŋke keetun ɛkolɛ kew, etuu kentam kew ebii me le.
41008035	Ben ekeè lɛ wee wvù bawci nshii we fo wvú elase, nu ke elase kɛ lo. Geenɛn, wee wvù lase nshii we nje me noo nje saaka wvù jee nu ɛ wvú ɛ bawcɛ lo nshii wvudvu.
41008036	Ɛ́ bó baanci naa woŋ wvun nɛn tfuu ɛ nya ɛ̂ wee wvú ɛ die, ɛ ke ɛ lase nshii we, ɛ́ sɛw wvudvu enu la?
41008037	Fiɛɛ fì ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wee esum keyoy kew dvú nu la?
41008038	Ben ekeè lɛ ɛ́ wee wuumene keebii me le noo diɛw yɛm e ɛnte jo ɛŋgokɛ kè buwyi mwɛɛm kin kè nu diɛwɛ kpwoon wvù nu ɛ cinɛ wase dweese le ɛ no gee ɛ ɛ̀ nu nsake le, ɛ́ wvú no keè lɛ wee wvù diee nu Waawee nu ke ewuumɛn tɛn mwɛtɛn seke wvú ɛ kase ɛ to ɛnte jo bvukukɛ bvu Ice bô bonceendaa bo Nyo' le bò yuule le.”
41009001	Ɛ Jisos bvuu gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy lɛ, bonyii bomew leeme fɛn ɛ bó yaa nu ke eyuw wvuŋ kpwe sɛ bó ɛ yɛn ɛ bvunfon bvu Nyo' le ɛ to bô mvuŋgay mvumwew kɛ.”
41009002	Ɛ ɛdiuw ke fey ɛsoocaan, ɛ Jisos jo Bita bô Jɛm noo Jon ɛ bô bó ben yî kum wvumew e ɛ wvú defe ɛwe, no nu fó ɛbonɛbon. Ɛ bó ke nɛ yɛn ɛ nfieesɛn ye ɛ kumɛn ɛ̂ bó ɛjise,
41009003	ɛ ndvú ye baa lawkene naa fele lo no ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wee ecukɛ fokuse fɛn ɛ́ yí ebaa.
41009004	Ɛ bó ke nɛ yɛn ɛ Ɛlayja bô Muses ɛ buynɛn fô bó le, ɛ no jemyi bô bo Jisos.
41009005	Ɛ Bita nɛ bvumtɛn gay ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Cee Ɛkolɛ, fí jee no beene nu fɛn. Cinɛ ɛ́ bese eyoo cún shɛ, ɛ́ yimi enu yo, yimi yi Muses, ɛ yimi nu yi Ɛlayja.”
41009006	Wvú to jeme nonɛn njefo kedvum to nu ɛ gbwo bó baay ɛ wvú faŋɛ yaa bvuu kiɛɛ fiɛɛ fì wvú ejeme kɛ.
41009007	Kɛ no wvú jeme nonɛn, ɛ kembɛw nɛ to baŋ bó, ɛ diɛw jeme ɛ̂ kembɛw kedvu le lɛ, “Wvun nu Waa wɛm, ɛ wvú nu fitele fiem. Ben eyuukè ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvú le.”
41009008	Ɛ bó nɛ sɛsɛ dioo taa faŋɛ yaa bvuu yɛn bonyii ba le kɛ, yɛn kɛ wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu Jisos e maaŋ.
41009009	Ɛ bó ke nɛ yî kum wvudvu le dioo booke, ɛ Jisos ciise ɛ̂ bó lɛ fo bó ke esee fiɛɛ fì bó be yɛn e ɛ̂ wee sɛ wee wvù diee nu Waawee ɛ buy wase yî kpwe le kɛ.
41009010	Ɛ bó yuw kɛ nonɛn gɛɛ ɛ̂ bó ɛshem, geenɛn no ghayte kɛ ɛbonɛbon lɛ laa mbuy wvu yî kpwe le wvun sɛ nu la lɛ.
41009011	Ɛ bó nɛ bife ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu nje la wvù bonyii bò duŋci bonci duu lɛ Ɛlayja kɛŋke keeke eyaw eto ɛ́ Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ sɛ to?”
41009012	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu kecɛɛy lɛ Ɛlayja nu ke eyaw eto ekene mwɛɛm mvunciim ɛ́ mvú etu no mvú to nu. Geenɛn, ɛ̀ no nu nje la wvù bó nu ɛ saŋ lɛ wee wvù diee nu Waawee kɛŋke keeke eyɛn boŋgɛw nteen, ɛ́ bonyii ema wvú?
41009013	Geenɛn ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben lɛ Ɛlayja nu ɛ to wase, bonyii ɛ ge fiɛɛ fì bó kooŋke bô wvú. Ɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ no bó to saŋɛɛ ɛkumɛ wvú.”
41009014	Ɛ Jisos bô boom bew bo ŋgoo le ke bow to buy fô boom bew bo ŋgoo le bomew to nu, yɛn ɛ kebombom ke bonyii le ke baay ɛ gem bó, ɛ bonyii bomew bò to duŋci bonci bo Nyo' le beeke mbew bô bó.
41009015	Kaŋ mwaaŋ no kebombom kecii yɛnɛɛ Jisos e, mum sɛsɛ wvú baay, lewtɛ gɛn gay wvú le.
41009016	Ɛ wvú bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben beeke mbew ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛkumɛ la?”
41009017	Ɛ wee tfuse ɛ̂ wvú ɛ̂ kebombom ɛnte lɛ, “Wee n'yɛɛyi, me mbe ntoo bô waa wɛm fô wo le njefo keyoy kemew nu yî ye le, ɛ ɛ̀ nu kè ké ge ɛ wee tu kencife.
41009018	Keyoy kedvu ké cuute wvú tufe fokuse, ɛ diffuw no buyte ɛ̂ wvú ɛmvu ɛ wvú ŋgeci bigew, nɛn'yi taame. Me ɛ ŋgay lɛ boom buw bo ŋgoo le ebvuse keyoy kedvu, bó ɛ mom ŋkuuŋ.”
41009019	Ɛ Jisos yuw nonɛn, gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “O oo! Ɛŋgokɛ kè baa lese fitele yî Nyo' le kin. Me nu ŋke enu beene eŋgɛn embuy nɛɛ? Me nu ŋke eŋkuu shém bô ben eŋgɛn embuy nɛɛ? Ben eto bô wan wvudvu fɛn enya ɛ̂ me.”
41009020	Ɛ bó mum jo wan wvudvu no too bô wvú fô Jisos e. No keyoy kedvu yɛnɛɛ Jisos e, mum cufe wan wvudvu kaŋ mwaaŋ ɛ wvú gbwe fokuse no biŋlene fó, ɛ diffuw buyte ɛmvu.
41009021	Ɛ Jisos bife ɛ̂ cee wan wvudvu lɛ, “Fiɛɛ fin to kɛw seke la?” Ɛ wvú tfuse lɛ, “Fí to kɛw ɛ wvú bɛɛ caan.
41009022	Keyoy kedvu nu ɛ tufe wase wvú bokaŋ e bokaŋ e ŋguy e noo ɛ̂ joo le gomte keeyu wvú. Ɛ́ wo nulo ege fiɛɛ, kee wo, ɛ́ wo cam kɛ shen fô bese le, fi bese.”
41009023	Ɛ Jisos bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Lɛ laa ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me ege fiɛɛ lɛ le? Nyo' nulo ege fiɛɛ ficii fô wee wvù nu ɛ lese fitele yî ye le.”
41009024	Kaŋ mwaaŋ ɛ cee wan wvudvu mum fuŋ foweɛwe lɛ, “Me nu ɛ nlese fitele yî Nyo' le. Geɛ ɛ́ me embvuu enlese enfey lo nonɛn.”
41009025	Ɛ Jisos dioo yɛn ɛ kebombom ke bonyii le lewte too taashi fô wvú to nu, ɛ wvú wam keyoy kè yiile kedvu gay lɛ, “Wo, keyoy kè yiile kin kè gee ɛ wan wvun yaa jemyi kɛ yaa yuuke tɛn mwɛɛm kɛ, me ŋgayte ɛ̂ wo, buyɛ yî wan wvun e, egɛn lo. Fo wo ke ebvuu eley yî ye le kɛ.”
41009026	Ɛ keyoy kedvu fuŋ foweɛwe, bvuu cufe wan wvudvu, tufe ɛ̂ je yì befe le, mum buy yî ye le. Ɛ wvú no jiime fokuse kɛ diɛwɛ keŋkpwe ke wee le. Ɛ wee nteen yɛn nonɛn, mum no duu lɛ, “Wvú nu ɛ kpwe wase.”
41009027	Ɛ Jisos jicɛ wvú le yî kebo le cake ɛ wvú leem we.
41009028	Ɛ Jisos bô boom bew bo ŋgoo le ke dioo gɛn ley yew, ɛ bó bife ɛ̂ wvú ɛjim ɛjim lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu nje la wvù bese be mom ŋkuuŋ keebvuse nceendaa dɛwle wvudvu?”
41009029	Ɛ wvú tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Fiɛɛ fì nulo ebvuse kfuu wvun nceendaa nu kɛ bunle yì tɛmyi maaŋ. Kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ fiɛɛ fimew jɛɛy ebvuse kɛ.”
41009030	Ɛ bó ke nɛ fó fey je yì Galilee le, ɛ Jisos yaa gomte lɛ wee ekiɛɛ kɛ,
41009031	njefo wvú to lɛne yɛɛyi boom bew bo ŋgoo le. Wvú to yɛɛyi bó lɛ bonyii nu ke enya wee wvù diee nu Waawee can bonyii le ɛ́ bó eyu wvú. Ɛ́ bó dioo ɛ yu wvú nonɛn, ɛ́ ke edioo enu ɛdiuw ɛta, ɛ́ wvú ebuy yî kpwe le.
41009032	No wvú gay nonɛn, ɛ bó faŋɛ yaa kiɛɛ fiɛɛ fì wvú jemyi kɛ, geenɛn, no fane keebife.
41009033	Ɛ bó ke gɛn buy Kafana'um, ke dioo ley nu yew ɛ Jisos bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben be beeke mbew ɛ̂ je ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛkumɛ la?”
41009034	Ɛ bó mɛy diuw tfu, njefo bó to lɛne ɛ̂ je beeke mbew ɛbonɛbon lɛ laa wee wvu baay sɛ nu yɛɛ lɛ.
41009035	Ɛ Jisos shii fokuse, tee bó bo yuufe ncow bofɛɛ gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ɛ́ wee gomte keenu wee wvu fwe, tu wvú kɛŋke keejo ɛkolɛ kew lɛ wen nu kencilɛjimɛ noo wee wvù lemte fô bonyii bocii le.”
41009036	No wvú gay nonɛn, mum jo wan caan leke ɛ̂ bó ɛntelɛŋ, mum kase jo koycɛ gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ,
41009037	“Ɛ́ wee fiisene wan diɛwɛ wvun e ɛ̂ diee diem e, tu wvú fiisene ɛ ɛ̀ nu me. Wee ɛ́ fiisɛn me, tu kɛ wvú fiisene ɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ me kɛ, tu wvú fiisene tɛn ɛ ɛ̀ nu wee wvù tum me.”
41009038	Ɛ Jon gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wee n'yɛɛyi, bese se nu ɛ yɛn wee mvu le ɛ wvú teŋe diee diuw sɛ bvuuse bonceendaa bo dɛwle le yî bonyii le, bese ɛ kan, njefo wvú baa nu wee wesebeene ŋgoo kɛ.”
41009039	Geenɛn ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Fo ben ecilè kfuu wvuwɛ wee kɛ. Ben ekeè lɛ ɛ́ wee gee keŋghaw ke fiɛɛ le teŋe diee diem, tu kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wvú ebvuu ejeme fiɛɛ fì befe ɛkumɛ me kɛ.
41009040	Ɛ́ wee baa kicine beene, tu wvú tomte beene.
41009041	Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy lɛ, ɛ́ wee nya kɛ naa fiko fi joo le ɛ̂ ben njefo bó teŋe ben lɛ bonyii bo Klistu le, tu kɛ ɛ̀ nu naa lo ɛ́ wvú ke efufe mmawcɛ we kɛ.”
41009042	Ɛ Jisos bvuu gay lɛ, “Ɛ́ ɛ̀ nu lɛ wee ege ɛ́ wan mwaaŋ ŋgoo boom bo caan ban bò nu ɛ lese fitele yî yɛm e ege kebefɛ, ɛ́ fí ejee fô wvuwɛ wee le lɛ bó eshɛŋke kebwee ke diene le ke baay ɛ̂ kendoŋ kew e, edomse wvú ɛ̂ joo yi baay e.
41009043	Fí ɛ bvuu ɛ̀ no nu lɛ, ɛ́ kebo kuw gee ɛ wo gee kebefɛ, ɛ́ wo sum kebo kedvu. Fí jee lɛ wo eley nshii wvù mɛy lo le bô keŋkfuyte ke kebo le, ɛfey keekɛŋke can yicii egɛn ŋguy wvu baay e wvù fiee sekecii sɛ njimɛ.
41009045	Ɛ́ ɛkalɛ kuw gee ɛ wo gee kebefɛ, ɛ́ wo sum ɛkalɛ kedvu. Fí jee lɛ wo eley nshii wvù mɛy lo le nu ntɛŋɛ, ɛfey keekɛŋke bikaa bicii ɛ́ bó elaŋ wo ŋguy wvu baay e wvù fiee sekecii sɛ njimɛ.
41009047	Ɛ́ jise diuw gee ɛ wo gee kebefɛ, ɛ́ wo min jise didvu. Fí jee lɛ wo eley bvunfon bvu Nyo' le bô jise dimwaaŋ, ɛfey keekɛŋke ɛjisɛ ɛcii, ɛ́ bó elaŋ wo ŋguy wvu baay e.
41009048	Bvudvuu bvun nu bvù yín yì diee bonyii fó yaa ké kpwekɛn kɛ, ɛ ŋguy yaa ké jimɛ fó kɛ.
41009049	Ben ekeè lɛ bó nu ke eseyse wee tfuu bô ŋguy lɛŋlɛŋ no bó ké seyse fiɛɛ bô ŋkauw.
41009050	Ŋkauw nu fiɛɛ fì jee, geenɛn ɛ́ yí nɛlo ɛ cife, ɛ́ wo ebvuu ege nɛɛ dvú ɛ́ yí sɛ ebvuu ekase eyeke? Ben enù diɛwɛ ŋkauw yì yeke le, ɛ́ wee noo wee enù yî nyɛkeey e.”
41010001	Ɛ Jisos ke nɛ jó, gɛn keba ke woŋ e kè Judea le, lente Joo Joodan gɛn wvuke. Ɛ bibombom bi bonyii le bvuu no taashi too fô wvú le, ɛ wvú no yɛɛyi bó kɛ no wvú to ké no yɛɛyi.
41010002	Ɛ Bofalasii ke nɛ to keemom wvú, mum bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Nci nu ɛ bee lɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wee ekuŋ kpwɛse?”
41010003	Ɛ Jisos kase bife tɛn ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Muses to nya nci lɛ ben egeè nɛɛ?”
41010004	Ɛ bó tfuse lɛ, “Muses to nu ɛ cinɛ lɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wee ekuŋ kpwɛse. Ɛ́ wvú dioo kuuŋke, saŋ ŋwa' wvù duŋci lɛ wen nu ɛ kuŋ wase wvú nya ɛ̂ wvú.”
41010005	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ɛ̀ to nu nje bikuu binɛn bì tɛmyɛɛn wvù Muses to saŋɛɛ nci wvun.
41010006	Geenɛn, ɛ̀ to nu foŋkɛw seke Nyo' to bomte mwɛɛm, ɛ wvú bom ɛ ɛ̀ nu diemsɛn bô kpwoon. No wvú bom nonɛn gay lɛ,
41010007	‘Ɛ̀ nu nje fifin wvù diemsɛn nu ke ecinɛ ice bô bwee le etaashɛ bô kpwɛse,
41010008	ɛ́ bó bofɛɛ emum etu wase wee mwaaŋ.’ Nonɛn, kɛ bó bɛɛ bonyii bofɛɛ kɛ, bó nu wase wee mwaaŋ.
41010009	Fí ɛ mum ɛ no nu lɛ, fiɛɛ fì Nyo' nu ɛ taashɛ wase, fo wee emom egawsɛn kɛ.”
41010010	Ɛ Jisos bô boom bew bo ŋgoo le ke dioo nu yew, ɛ bó bvuu bife ɛ̂ wvú ɛkumɛ fiɛɛ fidvu.
41010011	Ɛ wvú tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Naa yɛɛ wvù kuŋ kpwɛse ɛ jo wvumvu, nu ɛ wvú ɛ ge kebefɛ kɛ diɛwɛ keejaŋ kpwoon mvu.
41010012	Ɛ́ kpwoon buy dweese le, ɛ gɛn ɛ̂ diemsɛn mvu le, tu wvú nu ɛ ge kebefɛ fô dweese le keejiim bô diemsɛn mvu.”
41010013	Ɛ bonyii ke nɛ no too bô boom fô Jisos e lɛ wvú ekum bó le, ɛ boom bew bo ŋgoo le no saake lo bó.
41010014	Ɛ Jisos dioo yɛn nonɛn, ɛ shém ton'yɛ wvú, ɛ wvú gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben ecinɛ ɛ́ boom bodvu etoo fô me le, fo ben ejewsè bó kɛ, njefo bvunfon bvu Nyo' le nu ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô bonyii diɛwɛ boban e.
41010015	Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy lɛ ɛ́ wee baa efiisɛn bvunfon bvu Nyo' le kɛ diɛwɛ wan caan e, wvú saa ke eley bvunfon bvudvu le kɛ.”
41010016	No wvú gay nonɛn, mum no joo bó koyci, gɛɛle can yî bó le, laaŋke kembonɛn yî bó le.
41010017	Ɛ Jisos ke nɛ lɛ wen egɛne, ɛ wee mvu lewtɛ to tum ɛnvuw ɛ̂ wvú ɛjise bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wee n'yɛɛyi, wo wvù wee wvù jee, fiɛɛ fì me ŋkɛŋke keeŋge nsɛ ŋkɛŋkɛ nshii wvù mɛy lo nu la?”
41010018	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wo teŋe me lɛ wee wvù jee nje la? Kɛ wee nu dvú wvù jee kɛ. Ɛ̀ nu kɛ Nyo' maaŋ wvù jee.
41010019	Kɛ wo kee bonci bò lɛ, ‘Fo wo eyu wee, fo wo ejaŋ kpwɛɛ wee, fo wo ecoŋ bvucoŋ, fo wo eben jim nsaw mbiay, fo wo efiw kenfiw, noo lɛ ɛ̀ wvumtè ico bô bwoo?’”
41010020	Ɛ wee wvudvu tfuse ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Wee n'yɛɛyi, bonci ban bocii nu ɛ me nto ŋkɛw wase no ŋgɛɛle naa ɛ me mbɛɛ cuwee.”
41010021	Ɛ Jisos taa wvú nɛn tuŋŋ, koŋ wvú, mum gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Tu fiɛɛ nu ɛ shɛɛ fimwaaŋ fì wo bɛɛ ege. Gɛnɛ egese mwɛɛm mvù wo kɛŋke, egaw bigew bidvu ɛ̂ bonyii bo kefufe le, ɛ́ wo ke emum ekɛŋke ntfu ɛ ɛ̀ nu woŋ wvu we le. Ɛ́ wo dioo ɛ ge nonɛn, emum eto ebii me le.”
41010022	No Jisos jeme nonɛn, ɛ wee wvudvu yuw ɛ bvushiw tfuse lo wvú, ɛ wvú baŋke ye no gɛne nu lo shen shen, njefo wvú to kɛŋke kpwaw baay.
41010023	Ɛ Jisos nɛ baŋke ye taa boom bew bo ŋgoo le nɛn, gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Fí nu ke etɛmyi baay fô bonyii bo kpwaw e keeke eley bvunfon bvu Nyo' le.”
41010024	Ɛ njeme wvudvu ffumse boom bew bo ŋgoo le. Ɛ Jisos bvuu gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Boom bem, fí tɛmyi baay fô wee le keeley bvunfon bvu Nyo' le!
41010025	Fí nu cekey fô nyambala le keeley ɛ̂ jise di tase le fele fô wee kpwaw e keeley bvunfon bvu Nyo' le.”
41010026	Ɛ bó yuw nonɛn ɛ fí ghaw bó baay, ɛ bó no ghayte lɛ, “Ɛ́ ɛ̀ fɛn nu nonɛn, ɛ́ ke eyuu eboy yɛɛ?”
41010027	Ɛ Jisos kase taa bó nɛn, gay lɛ, “Fifin nulo eghaw wee wvu wum, geenɛn yaa nulo eghaw Nyo' kɛ, njefo Nyo' nulo ege fiɛɛ ficii.”
41010028	Ɛ Bita mum nɛ gay ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Taa eyɛn, bese nu ɛ cinɛ wase fiɛɛ ficii le ɛ no bii wo le.”
41010029	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ wo kecɛɛy lɛ, kɛ wee nu dvú wvù nu ɛ cinɛ yew e, kɛnɛɛ boom bo bwee le, kɛnɛɛ jɛ́me ye le, kɛnɛɛ bwee le, kɛnɛɛ ice le, kɛnɛɛ boom e, kɛnɛɛ ŋɛɛ le, ɛ wvú cin'yi nje yɛm noo saaka wvù jee wvù wvu Nyo',
41010030	wvù nu ke enu sɛ wvú ɛ kɛŋkɛ yéw noo boom bo bwee le, noo jɛ́me, noo bobwee, noo boom, noo ŋɛɛ yî nshii wvu keseen e bokaŋ gbwee kɛ. Ɛ bonyii nu ke ebone tɛn bikaa ɛ̂ wvú ɛjim, ɛ́ ke dioo enu kefew ke nshii wvù too le, ɛ́ wvú ekɛŋke nshii wvù mɛy lo.
41010031	Geenɛn, bonyii nteen bò nu fwe keseen nu ke enu ɛjim, ɛ́ nteen bò nu ɛjim keseen enu fwe.”
41010032	Ɛ Jisos bô boom bew bo ŋgoo le ke nɛ jo je, no bene Jɛlusalɛm ɛ wvú saa fwe. Ɛ boom bew bo ŋgoo le kɛŋke lo ŋghaw. Ɛ bonyii bò to bii tɛn no kɛŋke nfan. Ɛ Jisos bvuu jo boom bew bo ŋgoo le bo yuufe ncow bofɛɛ ɛ bô bó lɛwse ye ɛ wvú no seŋe ɛ̂ bó fiɛɛ fì nu ke ekooy bô wvú.
41010033	Ɛ wvú gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben eyekɛ eyuw, beene bene wase gɛne Jɛlusalɛm, ɛ bó nu egɛn enya wee wvù diee nu Waawee can bocee ncese bo baay baay noo bonyii bò duŋci bonci bo Nyo' le, ɛ́ bó esaw wvú esumtɛn lɛ bó eyu wvú, emum enya wvú can bitum e,
41010034	ɛ́ bó esɛwse wvú, cuyte ncɛŋ yî ye le, suuŋke wvú, emum eyu wvú, ɛ́ ke dioo enu ɛdiuw ɛta, ɛ́ wvú ebuy yî kpwe le.”
41010035	Ɛ Jɛm bô Jon bò to nu boom bo Sɛbɛdee le nɛ bencɛ to fwe dvu Jisos gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wee n'yɛɛyi, fiɛɛ nu dvú fì bese gomte lɛ wo ege fô bese le.”
41010036	Ɛ wvú bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben gomte lɛ me eŋge la fô ben e?”
41010037	Ɛ bó tfuse lɛ, “Bese gomte lɛ seke wo nu yî bvukukɛ bwuw e, ɛ́ bese eshii yî bintaw bi baay baay e, wee mvu ɛ̂ ɛbo kuw ke ɛcɛɛy e, wvumvu ɛ̂ ɛbo ke ɛŋkoŋko le.”
41010038	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Kɛ ben kee fiɛɛ fì ben biite kɛ. Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ ben ke ewu fiko fi ŋgɛw e fì me nu ŋke eŋ'wu, kɛnɛɛ eley kfuu ŋgɛw wvu baay wvù me nu ŋke enley wvú le?”
41010039	Ɛ bó tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Bese nulo ke ege.” Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben nulo ewu fiko fi ŋgɛw e fì me nu ŋke eŋ'wu, eley tɛn kfuu ŋgɛw wvu baay wvù me nu ŋke enley e,
41010040	geenɛn ɛ keeshii ɛ̂ ɛbo kem ke ɛcɛɛy e kɛnɛɛ ke ɛŋkoŋko le yaa nu bvudvuu bwem keenya ɛ̂ wee kɛ. Mondvuum modvu nu fô bonyii bò bó nu ɛ seyse wase fô bó le.”
41010041	Ɛ kebɛse ke boom bo ŋgoo le bo Jisos e bo yuufe dioo yuw ɛkumɛ fiɛɛ fidvu mum no ton'yi shém bô Jɛm noo Jon.
41010042	Ɛ Jisos tee bó bocii ɛ bó to, ɛ wvú gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Kɛ ben kee lɛ bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bò saake bitum ké no shiile lo yî bonyii bobole, ɛ bonyii bo baay baay bobole duŋci mvuŋgay mvubole ɛ̂ we jo bó?
41010043	Kɛ fifiɛ kɛŋke keenu ɛ̂ ben ɛntelɛŋ kɛ. Wee wvù gomte keenu wee wvu baay ɛ̂ ben ɛntelɛŋ kɛŋke keenu wvù lemte lo ben e.
41010044	Wee ɛ́ no gomte keenu wee wvu fwe ɛ̂ ben ɛntelɛŋ, tu wvú kɛŋke keenu nfwa wee tfuu.
41010045	Ben ekeè lɛ kɛ wee wvù diee nu Waawee to to lɛ bonyii elemte lo wvú le kɛ. Wvú to to keelem lo fô bonyii le, enya nshii we keesum wee nteen can kpwe le.”
41010046	Ɛ bó ke lɛn to buy ntɛw wvù Jɛliku le. Ɛ Jisos ke dioo nɛn'yi jó bô boom bew bo ŋgoo le noo kebombom ke bonyii le, ɛ kenfefe kemew ɛ shii diuw je le lɛke mwɛɛm ɛ diee nu lɛ Batimayus, wvù waa Timayus.
41010047	Ɛ wvú dioo yuw lɛ ɛ̀ nu Jisos wvu Nasalɛt, ɛ wvú mum kɛw no wamte foweɛwe lɛ, “Jisos, Waa Nfon Dawe, camɛ shen fô me le.”
41010048	Ɛ bonyii nteen nɛ kɛw no wamene wvú gayte lɛ wvú ebaŋ lo. Geenɛn ɛ wvú bvuu mɛse wam lo foweɛwe lɛ, “Waa Nfon Dawe, camɛ shen fô me le.”
41010049	Ɛ Jisos leem, gay lɛ bó etee wvú. Ɛ bó mum tee kenfefe kedvu gay lɛ, “Ɛkolɛ kuw ɛ joŋ wase, ja we, wvú teŋe wo.”
41010050	Ɛ kenfefe kedvu mum mwase ndvu ye fokuse, may we gɛn fô Jisos e.
41010051	Ɛ Jisos bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wo gomte lɛ me eŋge la fô wo le?” Ɛ kenfefe kedvu tfuse lɛ, “Wee N'yɛɛyi, me ŋgomte keen'yɛne mwɛɛm e.”
41010052	Ɛ Jisos mum gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ̀ gɛne fiuw. Fitele fì wo lese yî yɛm e nu ɛ ge wase wo ɛ bonɛn.” Kaŋ mwaaŋ nonɛn ɛ ɛjisɛ ɛye mum yuu ɛ wvú no yɛne mwɛɛm e, mum no bii Jisos e jò wvú to gɛne.
41011001	Ɛ Jisos bô boom bew bo ŋgoo le lɛn ke dioo feŋene Jɛlusalɛm, nu wase mbew ntɛw wvù Bɛtfaj bô wvù Bɛtani le bò nu mbew Kum Bite bi Olif e, ɛ wvú baa boom bew bo ŋgoo le bofɛɛ tum,
41011002	gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben egɛn ntɛw wvu fwe we le. Ben nu ke eleyte jó nɛn kaŋ mwaaŋ, eyɛn waa kembɛɛbey e ɛ bó ɛ suu, ɛ wee ke baa ben wase yî dvú le kɛ, ɛ́ ben efay eto dvú.
41011003	Ɛ́ wee bife ɛ̂ ben laa ben fayte nje la lɛ, ɛ́ ben tfuse lɛ Cee Ɛkolɛ kɛŋke shiee wvudvu, ɛ wvú nu ekase etfuse jim kɛ keseen keseen.”
41011004	Ɛ bó mum nɛ gɛn yɛn waa kembɛɛbey wvudvu le ɛ bó ɛ suu diuw fwese yew mi le diuw je le. Ɛ bó mum fay.
41011005	Ɛ bó dioo fayte ɛ bonyii bomew bò to leeme fó bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben gee ɛ ɛ̀ nu la? Ben fayte waa kembɛɛbey wɛ nje la?”
41011006	Ɛ bó mum see ɛ̂ bó fiɛɛ fì Jisos be gay. Ɛ bó mum cinɛ ɛ bó no gɛne dvú.
41011007	Ɛ bó to dvú fô Jisos e, yɛy ndvú yibo yî nyam yidvu le, ɛ Jisos mum ben.
41011008	Ɛ bonyii nteen no yɛyte ndvú ɛ̂ je, ɛ bomew faasshi tíɛw bite ŋkpwaante, yɛyte tɛn ɛ̂ je.
41011009	Ɛ bonyii bò to gɛne fwe dvu Jisos noo bò to bii ɛjim no wvuuyi lɛ, “Eeeee, mbense enù fô Nyo' le lɛɛɛ! Nyo' nu ɛ laŋ kembonɛn yî wee wvù too ɛ̂ diee di Tata le lɛɛɛ!
41011010	Nyo' nu ɛ laŋ kembonɛn yî bvunfon bvu icee wesebeene wvù Dawe le bvù too le! Eeeee, mbense enù fô Nyo' wvu fowe le lɛɛɛ!”
41011011	Ɛ Jisos gɛn fɛse Jɛlusalɛm, ley fô yew ncese le, taa no mwɛɛm mvunciim nu. Ɛ wvú dioo mɛse ɛ kefew ɛ gɛn wase ɛ bô boom bew bo ŋgoo le bo yuufe ncow bofɛɛ nɛ gɛn Bɛtani.
41011012	Ɛ ɛkfuŋ buy yuu ɛ Jisos bô boom bew bo ŋgoo le nɛ Bɛtani bvuu no gɛne Jɛlusalɛm, ɛ jeŋ no yuu wvú.
41011013	Ɛ wvú laŋ jise yɛn kete kemew e ncejole ɛ kí tɛɛke ɛ bó ké no diee. Ɛ wvú mum no gɛne fó keeyɛn laa ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wen ekoy fiɛɛ yî dvú le edie lɛ. Ɛ wvú dioo gɛn buy fó faŋɛ yaa yɛn fiɛɛ le yî dvú le kɛ, yɛn kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu bibɛ le maaŋ, njefo ɛ̀ to baa nu kefew kè kí ké no yumte kɛ.
41011014	Ɛ wvú mum gay ɛ̂ kete kedvu lɛ, “Fo wee bɛɛ ke ebvuu eyuu edie fiɛɛ yî yo le kɛ.” No wvú gay nonɛn ɛ boom bew bo ŋgoo le yuw.
41011015	Ɛ bó ke gɛn fɛse Jɛlusalɛm, ɛ Jisos gɛn fô yew ncese le kɛw no kuuŋke bonyii bò to kamene way fó. Ɛ wvú no kuuŋke nonɛn baashi bidaŋ bi bonyii bò to kumene bigew e, noo bintaw bi bonyii bò to geese bibembɛ le.
41011016	Ɛ wvú faŋɛ yaa bvuu bee tɛn lɛ wee etuu fiɛɛ elɛn edaŋsɛn dvú fô yew ncese le kɛ.
41011017	Ɛ wvú no yɛɛyi bó gayte lɛ, “Kɛ bó nu ɛ saŋ lɛ Nyo' gayte lɛ, ‘Yew wen nu ɛ bó nu ke eteŋe lɛ yew bunle fô bitum e bicii?’ Geenɛn ben ɛ baŋke ɛ tu tfum bocooŋ.”
41011018	Ɛ bocee ncese bo baay baay bô bonyii bò to duŋci bonci ke yuw mum no gomte je yì bó eyu wvú jó. Bó to kɛŋke nfan ɛkumɛ wvú njefo kebombom ke bonyii le to yuuke wase n'yɛɛyi we ɛ diuw yumte lo bó.
41011019	Ɛ ɛ̀ ke dioo nu fokiɛguu, ɛ Jisos bô boom bew bo ŋgoo le buy ɛ̂ kelaante kedvu le.
41011020	Ɛ Jisos bô boom bew bo ŋgoo le ke buy no fele fontaŋɛntaŋ, yɛn kete kiɛ le ɛ kí ɛ yowlɛn wase kecii ɛ shii ɛ buy yî gɛŋ e.
41011021	Ɛ Bita kume fiɛɛ fì se kooyɛɛ, jeme ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Wee N'yɛɛyi, yɛn no kete kiɛ kè wo se jiŋɛɛ ɛ yowlɛn wase.”
41011022	Ɛ Jisos jeme ɛ̂ bó bocii lɛ, “Ben elese fitele yî Nyo' le.
41011023	Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy lɛ, ɛ́ wee gay ɛ̂ kum wvun lɛ, ‘Mvuwɛ ye fɛn egɛn egbwe ɛ̂ joo yi baay e’, ɛ wvú gayte nonɛn yaa maŋene kɛ ɛ̂ fitele le, ɛ wvú ɛ bee lɛ fiɛɛ fì wvú gay nu ekooy, ɛ́ wvú emvuwɛ.
41011024	Nonɛn ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben lɛ, fiɛɛ ficii fì ben lɛke ɛ̂ bunle le, ɛ ben ɛ bee lɛ ben nu ɛ kɛŋkɛ wase, nu ɛ ben nu ekɛŋkɛ.
41011025	Ben dioo leem tɛn keebunle, ɛ́ ɛ̀ nu lɛ wee kɛŋke wee mvu fô fitele le, ɛ́ wvú lɛɛshɛ nya ɛ̂ wvú. Ben egeè nonɛn wvu lɛ Icee wene wvù nu fowe elɛɛshi tɛn binɛn bibefɛ. [
41011026	Ɛ́ ben baa elɛɛshi bibefɛ bi bonyii bomew e, Icee wene wvù nu fowe saa elɛɛshi tɛn binɛn kɛ.]”
41011027	Ɛ Jisos bô boom bew bo ŋgoo le bvuu gɛn ley Jɛlusalɛm. Ɛ wvú ke dioo ghanci fô yew ncese le, ɛ bocee ncese bo baay baay bô bonyii bò duŋci bonci bo Nyo' le noo bonyii bò saake woŋ nɛ to yɛn wvú le,
41011028	bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wo jo fɛɛ mvuŋgay ɛ sɛ no gee mwɛɛm mvun? Ɛ̀ nya yɛɛ mvuŋgay mvudvu ɛ̂ wo lɛ wo egeè mwɛɛm mvun?”
41011029	Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Me nu embife fiɛɛ ɛ̂ ben fimwaaŋ, ɛ́ ben dioo ɛ tfuse, ɛ́ me emum ensee ɛ̂ ben wee wvù nya mvuŋgay lɛ me eŋgeè mwɛɛm mvun.
41011030	Ɛ̀ to nya yɛɛ mvuŋgay ɛ Jon sɛ no leese bonyii ɛ̂ joo? Ɛ̀ to nya Nyo' nuu wee wvu wum ɛ? Ben kɛ tfuse ɛ́ me en'yuw!”
41011031	Ɛ bó nɛ no keŋene ɛbonɛbon lɛ, “Ɛ́ beene tfuse lɛ ɛ̀ to nya Nyo', ɛ́ wvú ebife ɛ̂ beene lɛ laa ɛ ɛ̀ ge la fo beene ebee Jon e lɛ?
41011032	Beene ɛ tfuse lɛ ɛ̀ to nya wee wvu wum, ɛ́ fí ecem jó?” Bó to fane bonyii njefo bonyii bocii to nu ɛ bee lɛ Jon to nu naa wee ntum Nyo'.
41011033	Nonɛn, ɛ bó mum tfuse ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Kɛ bese kee kɛ.” Ɛ Jisos mum gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Tu kɛ me nu ensee tɛn ɛ̂ ben wee wvù nya mvuŋgay ɛ̂ me lɛ me eŋgee mwɛɛm mvun kɛ.”
41012001	Ɛ Jisos mum nɛ no jemyi ɛ̂ bó ɛ̂ boŋgan e lɛ, “Wee mvu to nu ɛ lem wɛɛ mvuntam mvù bó keenci mbvuum dvú, gem bô ketaaŋ kɛɛkɛɛ, cim fò bó nu ke ekoyte mvuntam mvudvu somte ɛ mbvuum buyte, tum ketaale ke wee ncɛy e wɛne dvudvu, mum tɛse wɛɛ wvudvu ɛ̂ bonyii, mum nɛ gɛn ketum kemew e.
41012002	Ɛ kefew kè bó ké no koyte ke to kocɛn, ɛ wvú tum waa we lemme mvu fô bonyii bò wvú to tɛsɛɛ wɛɛ ɛ̂ bó le lɛ bó enya mvuwene mvuntam ɛ́ wvú eto dvú.
41012003	Ɛ wvú gɛn ɛ bó kaa koo lo suŋ, kuŋ ɛ wvú tu jim cancan.
41012004	Ɛ wee wɛɛ wɛ bvuu tum wvumvu waa lemme, ɛ wvú gɛn ɛ bó bvuu suŋ kay ɛkolɛ, shoose wvú.
41012005	Ɛ wvú bvuu tum wvumvu, ɛ bó yu wvuwɛ. Ɛ wvú bvuu tum bomew mwaaŋ mwaaŋ ɛ bó duule lo, ɛ bó suŋ bomew, yuwyɛ bomew.
41012006	Ɛ wvú ke tum, ɛ ɛ̀ to kɛ wase wee mwaaŋ shɛɛ, ɛ wee wvun nu waa we, ɛ ɛ̀ nu fitele fiew. Ɛ wvú mɛse tum wvú fô bó le kpwaake lɛ bó nu egɛn ewvum waa wen wvun.
41012007	Ɛ wvú gɛn, ɛ bonyii bodvu jeme ɛbonɛbon lɛ, ‘Wvun nu ndiela wee wɛɛ wvun, ben eto ɛ́ beene eyu wvú ɛ́ bvushɛw bvudvu enu wase bvusɛɛbeene.’
41012008	Ɛ bó mum koo wvú, yu, bvuse laŋ ɛkfuŋ jo ketaaŋ.”
41012009	No Jisos jeme nɛn, mum bife lɛ, “Fiɛɛ fì ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wee wɛɛ wvun ege nu la? Wvú nu ke eto elɛse lo bonyii bodvu, etɛse wɛɛ wvudvu ɛ ɛ̀ nu wase ɛ̂ bonyii bomew.
41012010	Ben ke baa taŋ wase bvudvuu bvun ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le le? Bó nu ɛ saŋ lɛ, ‘Tɛ didvu diɛ dì bonyii bo kembom e to tunɛɛ, to nu ɛ nɛ kase tu tɛ di buu di yew e.
41012011	Fifin nu ɛ ɛ̀ ge kɛ Tata, bonyii ɛ no taale kɛŋke ŋghaw.’”
41012012	Ɛ bonyii ba yuw ŋgan wvun, mum kiɛɛ lɛ Jisos ma ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ bó. Ɛ bó mum no gomte keekoo wvú, sɛ fan ɛ ɛ̀ nu kebombom ke bonyii le kè to nu fó. Ɛ bó mum cinɛ wvú le nɛ no gɛne.
41012013	Ɛ bikuu bi woŋ e ke nɛ tum Bofalasii noo bonyii bomew bo ŋgoo Nfon 'Ɛlod e lɛ bó egɛn etelɛ Jisos ekoo wvú yî njeme we le.
41012014	Ɛ bó to, gay ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Wee n'yɛɛyi, bese kee lɛ wo ké no jemyi kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu kecɛɛy, njefo kɛ wo fane jise di wee le kɛ, kɛnɛɛ mwɛtɛn nu naa la. Wo yɛɛyi kecɛɛy ɛ ɛ̀ nu je yì yi Nyo'. Kɛ see ɛ̂ bese laa nci nu ɛ bee lɛ bó elaaŋke shile ɛ̂ Kaysa, nuu wvú baa bee lɛ?
41012015	Beene elaaŋkè, nuu fo bó elaaŋkè lɛ?” Ɛ Jisos kiɛɛ fiɛɛ fì bó to wɛɛntene dvú, tfuse lɛ, “Ben teeyi me nje la? Ben kɛ eto bô danali ɛ́ me en'yɛn.”
41012016	Ɛ bó to dvú, ɛ wvú fi, bife lɛ, “Ɛkolɛ kin kè nu yî dvú le nu ke yɛɛ le, ɛ diee din nu di yɛɛ le?” Ɛ bó tfuse lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu ke Kaysa le, ɛ diee nu kɛ tɛn diew.”
41012017	Ɛ Jisos mum gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben enyaà fiɛɛ fì ɛ̀ nu fi Kaysa le ɛ̂ wvú, nyaà fi Nyo' le ɛ̂ Nyo'.” Ɛ bó yuw nonɛn, ɛ diuw yum lo bó ɛkumɛ wvú.
41012018	Ɛ Bosadusii bomew ke nɛ to keebife fiɛɛ ɛ̂ Jisos. Bosadusii to nu bonyii bò to duu lɛ kɛ bonyii nu ke ebuy yî kpwe le kɛ.
41012019	No bó to nonɛn, gay lɛ, “Wee n'yɛɛyi, Muses to nu ɛ saŋ ɛ̂ beene ɛ̂ bonci le lɛ, ‘Ɛ́ waa bwee wee kpwe ɛ gɛɛ kpwoon sɛ wan, tu wee wvudvu kɛŋke keegɛɛ kpwɛɛ ŋkfu ɛ́ bô wvú eboo boom ɛ̂ diee di ŋkfu waa bwee wvudvu le.’
41012020	Nonɛn, wee mvu to kɛŋke boom bolemsɛ bosooshwiy, ɛ wvu ŋgaywee ke jo kpwoon, ke kpwe sɛ bô wvú ɛ boo wan.
41012021	Ɛ ɛjimɛ kew gɛɛ kpwoon wvudvu, ke kpwe tɛn sɛ wan. Ɛ fí ke kooy kɛ tɛn lɛŋlɛŋ bô ɛjimɛ ke wvuwɛ le.
41012022	Ɛ bó ghan gɛɛ wvú bocii, ɛ wee faŋɛ yaa nu dvú ɛnte jo bonyii bo bosooshwiy bodvu wvù eboo wan bô kpwoon wvudvu kɛ. Ɛjim jodvu ɛ kpwoon wvudvu kpwe tɛn.
41012023	No bonyii bo bosooshwiy bodvu to nu ɛ jo kpwoon wvudvu bocii, ɛ̀ nu ke enu seke bonyii buyte yî kpwe le, ɛ́ wvú enu kpwɛɛ yɛɛ?”
41012024	Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben jemyi nɛn jayte lo njefo kɛ ben kee fiɛɛ fì bó saŋ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le kɛ, yaa kee tɛn mvuŋgay mvu Nyo' le kɛ.
41012025	Fiɛɛ fì nu, nu lɛ ɛ̀ nu ke enu seke bonyii ɛ buy wase yî kpwe le, kɛ bolemsɛ bô bokɛnɛ bɛɛ ke ebvuu etaashi bvujen kɛ, ɛ bonyii yaa bɛɛ ke ebvuu enyaa boom ɛ bó taashi bvujen kɛ. Bó nu ke enu wase kɛ diɛwɛ bonceendaa bo Nyo' le fowe.
41012026	Fiɛɛ fi ɛkumɛ lɛ bonyii nu ke ebuyte yî kpwe le, ben ke baa taŋ wase bvudvuu ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Muses e ɛkumɛ kete kè to bɛɛnci ɛ Nyo' jemyi ɛ̂ Muses gayte lɛ, ‘Ɛ̀ nu me Nyo' Abla'am bô Nyo' Aysik noo Nyo' Yakow e?’
41012027	Fì nu lɛ kɛ Nyo' nu Nyo' boŋkfu kɛ, ɛ̀ nu Nyo' bonyii bò nu dvú. Ben nu ɛ jay baay.”
41012028	Ɛ wee mvu wvù to duŋci bonci bo Nyo' le ke to, dioo yuw no Jisos bô bonyii ba beeke mbew, bvuu yɛn no wvú nu ɛ tfuse fiɛɛ fì bó bife ɛ̂ wvú ɛ̂ je yì jee le, ɛ wvú mum bife tɛn ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Nci wvù fele bonci bocii nu wvù la?”
41012029	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Nci wvù fele bonci bocii nu wvun wvù duu lɛ, ‘O bonyii bo Islael ben eyuw, Tata Nyo', wvù Nyo' wesebeene, Tata Nyo' wvudvu nu kɛ mwaaŋ.
41012030	Ɛ̀ kooŋkè Tata wvù Nyo' wo bô fitele fiuw ficii, enya ɛkolɛ kuw ɛ̂ wvú kecii, egɛɛ bvufee bwuw yî ye le bvucii, elemtè fô wvú le bô mvuŋgay mwuw mvunciim.’
41012031	Ɛ nci wvù bii wvun e nu lɛ, ‘Ɛ̀ kooŋkè waa bwoo no wo kooŋke ɛkolɛ kuw.’ Kɛ wvumvu nci bvuu nu dvú wvù fele boban kɛ.”
41012032	Ɛ wee wvù to duŋci bonci bo Nyo' le wɛ gay ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Wee N'yɛɛyi, wo nu ɛ tfuse naa lɛŋ. Wo jemyi ɛ ɛ̀ nu kecɛɛy lɛ Nyo' nu kɛ mwaaŋ ɛ wvumvu yaa bvuu nu dvú ɛfey wvú kɛ.
41012033	Ɛ keekooŋke wvú bô fitele ficii, gɛɛle bvufee yî ye le bvucii, lemte fô wvú le bô mvuŋgay mvunciim bô keekooŋke waa bwoo no wo kooŋke ɛkolɛ kuw, nu ɛ fí fele naa lo keegee boncese bô nyám yi tonɛɛn noo boncese bomew.”
41012034	Ɛ Jisos dioo yɛn no wvú tfuse diɛwɛ wee bvufee le, ɛ wvú mum gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Kɛ wo nu ncejole keeley bvunfon bvu Nyo' le kɛ.” Ɛjim jodvu, ɛ wee faŋɛ yaa ke ebvuu emom eto keebife fiɛɛ ɛ̂ wvú kɛ.
41012035	Ɛ Jisos ke no yɛɛyi bonyii fô yew ncese le, ke nɛ bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Bonyii bò duŋci bonci ghan nɛɛ le ɛ sɛ no duu lɛ Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ nu waa Nfon Dawe?
41012036	Ɛ Keyoy ke Yuule to ge wase ɛ Nfon Dawe wvun jeme ɛkumɛ Mboyse wvudvu gayte lɛ, ‘Tata Nyo' to nu ɛ gay ɛ̂ Tata wɛm lɛ wvú eshii ɛ̂ ɛbo kew ke ɛcɛɛy e, egɛn ebuy seke wen ke ejike bonyii bew bo bvuban e ɛ́ wvú etome bikaa biew yî bó le.’
41012037	Ɛ́ Dawe kebɛɛ teŋe wvú lɛ Tata wen, ɛ́ wvú ebvuu eghan nɛɛ sɛ no nu waa we?” No Jisos to jemyi mwɛɛm mvun nɛn ɛ kebombom ke bonyii le kè to nu fó, no yeke ɛ njoŋ yuu lo bó.
41012038	Ɛ wvú dioo yɛɛyi bonyii nɛ gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben ejoò wɛɛ ben ɛ bonyii bò duŋci bonci bo Nyo' le. Bó ké no kooŋke keetfumyi ndvú yi baay baay ghanci dvú mondvuum mò bó kamene diwaci le, lɛ bonyii egaytè bó le bô n'wvum.
41012039	Ɛ́ bó ké gɛn yéw bunle le, kɛnɛɛ fô ŋkaw e, caw kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu bintaw bi baay baay sɛ shii yî dvú le.
41012040	Bó shiwse lo mwɛɛm mvu bokɛ' bo boŋkfu le, mum buwse bó bô dibunle dì dewkene. Ŋgɛw wvubo nu ke eyuu ekuuke baay.”
41012041	Ɛ Jisos ke nɛ gɛn shii keba keki fô fiŋkuw fi nnya le fô yew ncese le, no taale no bonyii too gɛɛle bigew ɛ̂ fiŋkuw fidvu le. Ɛ bonyii bo kpwaw e nteen no too gɛɛle bigew jó ɛ bí duule.
41012042	Ɛ kpwɛɛ ŋkfu mvu ke nɛ to ɛ ɛ̀ nu wee kefufe, gɛɛ mvunyinyi jó mvunfɛɛm mvù gee jise di bigew e ɛ dí baa buy fiɛɛ le kɛ.
41012043	Ɛ Jisos bɛn boom bew bo ŋgoo le gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy lɛ kpwɛɛ ŋkfu wvun wvù nu wee kefufe nɛn, nu ɛ nya ɛ fey bonyii bocii bò gɛɛle fiɛɛ ɛ̂ fiŋkuw fi yew ncese le fin e.
41012044	Bonyii bocii bò be nyaa, be too ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô tfúw kpwaw wvubo wvù nu ɛ yiŋsɛn wase ɛ no fuci kuse. Geenɛn wvú ɛ to bô kefufe kew kecii ɛ nya fiɛɛ ficii fì wvú kɛŋke, ɛ ɛ̀ nu fí fì wvú bee keecee yî dvú le.”
41013001	Ɛ Jisos ke dioo nɛn'yi fô yew ncese le, ɛ waa we ŋgoo mvu ghay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wee N'yɛɛyi taa eyɛn bibwee bi ɛta le bì nu yî yéw yin e. Ɛ̀ nu naa lo biŋghaw bi yéw e!”
41013002	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wo yɛne biŋghaw bi yéw e bin e? Kɛ tɛ dimwaaŋ nu ke eshɛɛ yî dimew e sɛ bó ɛ base fokuse kɛ.”
41013003	Ɛ Jisos ke gɛn ben shii yî Kum Bite bi Olif e ɛ̂ keba kè taale yew ncese le, ɛ Bita bô Jɛm noo Jon noo Andulu gɛn ɛbonɛbon bife ɛ̂ wvu lɛ,
41013004	“Kɛ see ɛ̂ bese kefew kè fiɛɛ fidvu fin nu ke ekooy, ebvuu esee nciise wvù nu ke eduŋcɛ kefew kè mwɛɛm mvudvu mvun mvunciim nu ke ekooy.”
41013005	Ɛ Jisos mum gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben eyɛnè fo wee ke elɛɛ ben ɛ́ ben ejay je.
41013006	Bonyii nteen nu ke etoo joo diee diem tɛɛke fojise, ɛ wee duu lɛ, ‘Ɛ̀ nu me wvudvu.’ Ɛ́ bó dioo gee nonɛn emum elɛɛle bonyii nteen ɛ bó jayte je.
41013007	Ben ke dioo ɛ yuw lɛ bó tumte jem kɛnɛɛ lɛ jem nu enu, fo finteem ebuytè ben kɛ. Mvumvun nu mwɛɛm mvù kɛŋke keeke ekooy. Geenɛn ɛ mvú yaa mum duŋci lɛ woŋ kaa wase kɛ.
41013008	Ketum nu ke etumte jem bô kemew, ɛ nfon mvu tumte jem bô wvumvu. Nshɛ nu ke eshiike mondvuum e mondvuum e, ɛ jeŋ koole. Ɛ mvumvun mwɛɛm bɛɛ kɛ lo mvun'yaŋ kɛ diɛwɛ seke kpwoon ɛ kɛw lume.
41013009	Ben dioo nu no yɛnè. Ben ekeè lɛ bó nu ke enya ben can bonyii bò saake bonsaw e. Bó nu ke etamte ben yéw bunle le. Ben nu ke eleemɛn fwe dvu bonyii bò saake biba bi woŋ e, noo fwe dvu bonfon nje me, wvu lɛ ben ejeme ɛ̂ bó ɛkumɛ me.
41013010	Geenɛn ɛ bó kɛŋke kɛ keeyaw efewcɛ saaka wvù jee wvù wvu Nyo' ɛ̂ bitum bicii.
41013011	Seke bó ɛ koo ben ɛ no gɛne dvú keenya yew nsaw e, fo ɛkolɛ ekfumtè ben lɛ laa ben nu ke egɛn ejeme lɛ la lɛ. Seke ben ɛ gɛn, no jemyi kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì buyte diuw wene le kefew kekiɛ le, njefo kɛ ɛ̀ bɛɛ ke ejemyi ben kɛ. Ɛ̀ nu ke enya Keyoy ke Yuule njeme diuw wene le.
41013012	Wee nu ke enɛ ejo waa bwee enya ɛ́ bó eyu, ɛ́ cee wan ejo waa we enya ɛ́ bó eyu. Boom nu ke enɛ ebone bikaa ɛ̂ bo'icee bobole ɛjim, gee ɛ bó yuwyi bó.
41013013	Bonyii bocii nu ke ebane ben nje diee diem. Geenɛn, wee wvù nu ke ekuu shém egɛn ebuy fokemɛse nu wvù nu ke eboy.
41013014	(Wee wvù taaŋke ŋwa' wvun eyuw fin ntay,) seke ben ɛ yɛn ɛ kemaante ke fiɛɛ le kè nulo ejiŋ bvudvuu leeme wase fô kí yaa be kɛŋke keenu kɛ, ɛ bonyii bò nu Judea mum fɛɛ ben yî dikum e.
41013015	Fo wee wvù nu ɛ̂ yew we dioo ɛ shii bvuu ley yew lɛ wen ejo naa lo fiɛɛ elewte dvú kɛ.
41013016	Fo wee wvù nu wɛne ebvuu ekfulɛ lɛ wen too ejo ndvu ye yi bulɛɛn kɛ.
41013017	Ŋgɛw wvu baay ɛdiuw yoya le nu ke enu wvu bokɛnɛ bò nu bô difue, noo bò yamsee boom e.
41013018	Ben ebunleè lɛ fo fiɛɛ fin ke ekooy ɛ ɛ̀ nu kefew ke nffum e kɛ.
41013019	Bonyii nu ke eyɛn ŋgɛw ɛdiuw yoya le, ɛ kfuu wvuwɛ ŋgɛw ke baa nu wase dvú ɛ kɛw no Nyo' bomɛɛ woŋ ɛ to ɛ buy keseen e kɛ. Ɛ kɛ kfuu wvuwɛ bɛɛ ke ebvuu eyuu enu dvú kɛ.
41013020	Ɛ́ Tata to baa fafe ɛdiuw ɛ ŋgɛw wvudvu, tu kɛ wee wvu wum mwaaŋ bee ke eboy kɛ. Geenɛn, nje bonyii bew bò wvú to cawɛɛ wase gɛɛ, wvú nu ɛ fafe ɛdiuw yodvu.
41013021	Ɛ́ wee ke egay lo ɛ̂ ben ɛdiuw yoya le lɛ ‘Ben etaa eyɛn, Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ wvun fɛn!’ Kɛnɛɛ lɛ, ‘Ben eyɛn wvuwe fofe!’ Fo ben ebee kɛ.
41013022	Ben ekeè lɛ bonyii nu ke etoo mbiayte lɛ bowen nu bomboyse bò Nyo' to kawɛɛ, ɛ bomew duu lɛ bowen nu bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le, emum egee mwɛɛm mvù duŋci mvuŋgay mvubole, gee tɛn mwɛɛm mvu diuw wvù yumɛɛn e, momte fɛn ɛ́ je nu dvú, keelɛɛ bonyii bò Nyo' nu ɛ caw ɛ́ bó ejay je.
41013023	Ben eyɛnè. Me nu ɛ nsee wase mwɛɛm mvun mvunciim ɛ̂ ben ɛ́ mvú sɛ keeke ekooyi.
41013024	Ɛ̀ nu ke edioo enu ɛdiuw yoya le seke boŋgɛw bodvu ɛ fey wase, ɛ́ diuu enɛ esɛsɛ ejimɛ, ɛ́ kpwee saa bvuu baa tɛn kɛ,
41013025	ɛ́ jón enɛn'yi fowe gbwekene, ɛ́ mwɛɛm mvu fowe mvunciim mvù kɛŋke mvuŋgay eshiike.
41013026	Nonɛn ɛ́ bonyii emum eyɛn no wee wvù diee nu Waawee shiile too ɛ̂ kembɛw e kɛŋke mvuŋgay mvu baay noo bvukukɛ.
41013027	Ɛ́ wvú emum eciinse bonceendaa bew ɛ́ bó egɛn ɛbuw ɛ woŋ yo ɛna le yî nshɛ le noo fowe, ebaancɛ bonyii bew bò wvú nu ɛ caw.
41013028	Ben eyɛɛyi fiɛɛ yî keŋgvum e. Tíɛw ye ké boci, ɛ́ bibɛ ekɛw etɛɛke yî dvú le, ɛ́ ben mum kiɛɛ lɛ ɛkfuŋ kumene wase.
41013029	Ɛ̀ nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no ben nu ke edioo ɛ yɛn ɛ mwɛɛm mvun kooyi, ɛ́ ben emum ekiɛɛ lɛ wvú nu wase nceencee naa wase ɛ̂ yew fwese.
41013030	Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy lɛ kɛ ɛŋgokɛ ke keseen kin nu ke eka sɛ mwɛɛm mvun mvunciim ɛ kooy wase kɛ.
41013031	Ɛbulɛ bô nshɛ nu ke eka, geenɛn kɛ diɛw yɛm nu ke eyuu eshiw kɛ.
41013032	Geenɛn kɛ wee nu dvú wvù kee diuu didvu kɛnɛɛ kefew kedvu kɛ. Kɛ naa bonceendaa bo Nyo' le bo fowe kɛnɛɛ Waa Nyo' kee tɛn kɛ. Ɛ̀ kee kɛ Ice wvú ɛmbeŋ.
41013033	Nonɛn ben eyɛnè bvuu cɛytè, njefo kɛ ben kee kefew kedvu kɛ.
41013034	Fí nu ke enu diɛwɛ wee fò wvú gɛne ghane, ɛ dioo nɛn'yi, ɛ gɛɛ yew ye can boom bew bo lemme le, wee bô diew lemme, wee bô diew lemme, ɛ gay ɛ̂ wee wvù cɛyte diuw ketaaŋ lɛ wvú eshɛɛ ecɛytè ntay.
41013035	Nonɛn ben emum ecɛytè, njefo kɛ ben kee kefew kè cee yew nu ke ekase eto kɛ. Ɛ̀ nɛlo ɛ́ wvú ke eto ɛkiɛguu, kɛnɛɛ ɛntaŋ ɛntelɛŋ, kɛnɛɛ seke nyimshie yi fwe le, kɛnɛɛ ɛntaŋɛntaŋ.
41013036	Fo wvú ke enɛ esɛsɛ ebuynɛn eyɛn ɛ ben leete kɛ.
41013037	Fiɛɛ fì me njemyi ɛ̂ ben fin nu ɛ me njemyi tɛn ɛ̂ wee tfuu lɛ, ‘Wee wemɛn ecɛytè.’”
41014001	Ɛ̀ to shɛɛte wase ɛdiuw ɛfaa ɛ́ emum enu diuu di Ŋkaw Daŋɛfey noo Ŋkaw Blɛɛd wvù bó baa gɛɛ Fintuŋlɛɛn jó kɛ. Ɛ bocee ncese bo baay baay noo bonyii bò duŋci bonci bo Nyo' le no gomte je yì bó ekoo Jisos jó ɛ̂ kenyilɛ le, eyu.
41014002	Ɛ bó cu ntaŋ ɛbonɛbon lɛ, “Fo beene emom fiɛɛ fin kefew kè bó gee Ŋkaw e kɛ, njefo ɛ́ beene mom lo, ɛ́ fí eto bô diuw ɛ̂ bonyii ɛntelɛŋ.”
41014003	Ɛ Jisos ke no nu ntɛw wvù Bɛtani le, yew dvu Semon wvù wee ntun wvu baay, ɛ bó ke shii no diekene, ɛ kpwoon mvu nɛ ley bô fikaa fi nfiey mvu wvù shfuuŋkene le. Nfiey wvudvu to lumte naa ntay, ɛ bó kene bô naad ɛwvunɛwvun. No wvú ley, mum koy diuw fikaa fidvu fucɛ nfiey wvudvu yî ɛkolɛ ke Jisos e.
41014004	Ɛ bonyii bomew kaa nɛ no wvukene ɛbonɛbon gayte lɛ, “Wvú nyɛw bô nfiey wvun nɛn nje la?
41014005	Ɛ̀ be nɛlo ɛ́ bó egese nfiey wvun ɛ́ wvú efey lo bigew bodanali gee tɛ, enya bigew bidvu ɛ̂ bonyii bo kefufe le.” Ɛ bó mum no ŋasene lo yî ye le.
41014006	Geenɛn, ɛ Jisos jeme ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben ecinɛ wvú le nyɛkeey. Ben nyaa ŋgɛw ɛ̂ wvú nje la? Wvú nu ɛ ge ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì jee fô me le.
41014007	Ben ekeè lɛ bonyii bo kefufe le nu ke enu kɛ ben ɛ bó sekecii. Ɛ ben nulo efici bó seke ben kooŋke. Geenɛn, kɛ me nu ŋke enu beene sekecii kɛ.
41014008	Kpwoon wvun nu ɛ ge ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì wvú nulo ege. Wvú yefe me bô nfiey wvun nɛn seysee ɛ ɛ̀ nu no bó nu ke edwey me.
41014009	Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy lɛ, naa fɛɛ fô bó nu ke efewci saaka wvù jee yî ɛkolɛ ke nshɛ le kecii nu ɛ fiɛɛ fì kpwoon wvun ge nu ɛ bó nu ke eseŋe tɛn, keekumyi wvú.”
41014010	Ɛ Judas Iskaliot wvù to nu wee ŋgoo boom bo ŋgoo le bo Jisos e bo yuufe ncow bofɛɛ, mum nɛ gɛn fô bocee ncese bo baay baay e wvu lɛ wen egese Jisos ɛ̂ bó.
41014011	Ɛ bó dioo yuw nonɛn yuw njoŋ baay, mum kaw wvú lɛ bó nu enya bigew ɛ̂ wvú. Ɛ wvú mum kɛw no gomte je yì wvú nu enya Jisos jó can yibole.
41014012	Ɛ diuu di fwe di Ŋkaw Blɛɛd wvù bó baa gɛɛ Fintuŋlɛɛn jó dì bó to ké no sɛɛle waa keyaw wvu Ŋkaw Daŋɛfey ke to kocɛn, ɛ boom bo Jisos e bo ŋgoo le bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wo gomte lɛ bese egɛn eseyse ɛ ɛ̀ nu fɛɛ fò wo nu edie Ŋkaw Daŋɛfey?”
41014013	Ɛ wvú mum tum boom bew bo ŋgoo le bomew bofɛɛ, gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben egɛn ɛlaante, ben nu dioo gɛne, eyɛn wee le ɛ wvú ɛ tuu joo ɛ̂ nshaan e, ɛ́ ben ebi wvú le.
41014014	Seke wvú ɛ gɛn ɛ ley yew yì wvú ley dvú le, ɛ ben gay ɛ wee wvù kɛŋke yew yidvu lɛ Wee N'yɛɛyi biite lɛ laa kebuw ke bonyii bo ghane le kewene kè bô boom bowene bo ŋgoo le nu edie Ŋkaw Daŋɛfey dvú nu fɛɛ lɛ?
41014015	Wvú nu ke emum eduŋcɛ kebuw ke baay yew yi ɛwe le ɛ bó ɛ loocɛ wase ɛ seyse kí ɛ no nu lo, ɛ́ ben emum eseyse mwɛɛm mvudien dvú.”
41014016	Ɛ boom bo ŋgoo le bodvu mum nɛ gɛn ɛlaante, gɛn yɛn mwɛɛm e kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no Jisos to jemyɛɛ ɛ̂ bó. Ɛ bó mum seyse mwɛɛm mvudien mvu Ŋkaw Daŋɛfey e dvú.
41014017	Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu ɛkiɛguu, ɛ Jisos bô boom bew bo ŋgoo le bo yuufe ncow bofɛɛ taashɛ dvú.
41014018	Ɛ bó ke shii no diekene, ɛ Jisos nɛ gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy lɛ wee mvu ben e nu egese me, ɛ wee wvun nu wvù diekene bee wvú.”
41014019	Ɛ bó yuw nonɛn, nɛ no nu lo yii yii, mum no biite ɛ̂ wvú wee mwaaŋ mwaaŋ lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu me le?”
41014020	Ɛ wvú tfuse lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu kɛ wee mvu ben bo yuufe ncow bofɛɛ le wvù bee wvú cuwte blɛɛd ɛ̂ shuw e.
41014021	Wee wvù diee nu Waawee nu ke egɛn kɛ no bó to saŋɛɛ ɛkumɛ wvú. Geenɛn, ŋgɛw wvu baay nu fô wee wvù gese wee wvù diee nu Waawee le. Fí to bee ejee fô wvuwɛ wee le baay fɛn ɛ́ bó to baa eboo wvú kɛ.”
41014022	No bó to diekene, ɛ Jisos nɛ jo blɛɛd, nya keyoone ɛ̂ Nyo', guushɛ, nya ɛ̂ boom bew bo ŋgoo le gay lɛ, “Ben eko, fin nu ye yɛm.”
41014023	Ɛ wvú mum jo tɛn fiko, nya keyoone ɛ̂ Nyo', mum nya fiko fidvu ɛ̂ bó, ɛ bó wu bocii.
41014024	Ɛ wvú gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Fin nu ɛlɛmɛ kem kè Nyo' gbwo moŋkan dvú kí ɛ buy nje wee nteen.
41014025	Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy lɛ kɛ me mbɛɛ ŋke embvuu eŋ'wu mbvuum mo tweŋ kete kè lane le man kɛ ɛ gɛn ɛ buy diuu dì me nu ŋke eŋ'wu mó monfɛm ɛnte jo bvunfon bvu Nyo' le.”
41014026	Ɛ Jisos bô boom bew bo ŋgoo le ke mɛse, yem ŋkiee mbense, mum buy ben gɛn yî Kum Bite bi Olif e.
41014027	Ɛ Jisos ke nɛ gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben bocii nu ke etfuw bikaa ɛ̂ me ɛjim. Ɛ̀ nu no bó nu ɛ saŋ ɛ Nyo' gayte lɛ, ‘Me nu eŋke en'yu ncɛy njée ɛ́ njée esaaŋkɛn.’
41014028	Geenɛn, seke Nyo' ɛ bvuse me yî kpwe le, ɛ́ me ensa fwe jo ben Galilee.”
41014029	Ɛ Bita tfuse ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Ɛ́ bonyii bocii cim tfuw lo bikaa ɛ̂ wo ɛjim, tu kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me ŋke en'yuu entfuw kɛ.”
41014030	Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ wo kecɛɛy lɛ ɛntaŋ jo ɛbɛn jan, nu ɛ nyimshie nu ke enu lɛ yí etoŋ bokaŋ bofɛɛ, ɛ wo ɛ ma wase me bokaŋ botɛte.”
41014031	Ɛ Bita jeme tɛme lo gay lɛ, “Ɛ́ ɛ̀ cim nu lɛ me eŋkpwe lo bee wo, tu kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me en'yuu ema wo kɛ.” No wvú gay nonɛn, ɛ bó bocii gay kɛ tɛn lɛŋlɛŋ no wvú gay.
41014032	Ɛ bó ke gɛn ley fô wɛɛ ketaaŋ wvumew e, ɛ bó teŋe lɛ Gɛsɛmane, ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ boom bew bo ŋgoo le lɛ, “Ben eshii fɛn, ɛ́ me eŋgɛn embunle.”
41014033	Ɛ wvú mum jo Bita bô Jɛm noo Jon, ɛ bô bó nɛ fó. Ɛ wvú nɛ no kpwaake mwɛɛm ɛ monlum koole wvú.
41014034	Ɛ wvú gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Fitele fiem nu yii yii baay naa fì me eŋkpwe lo. Ben eshɛɛ enù fɛn cɛyte.”
41014035	Ɛ Jisos nɛ fó bencɛ gɛn fwe caan, gbwe fokuse, bunle lɛ ɛ́ je be nu dvú, ɛ́ kefew ke ŋgɛw e kedvu efey kɛ lo.
41014036	Ɛ wvú bunle lɛ, “Abba, Icɛm, wo nulo ege fiɛɛ ficii. Cake fiko fi ŋgɛw e fin fo me eŋ'wu. Geenɛn, geɛ kɛ no wo kooŋke. Fo wo ege no me ŋkooŋke kɛ.”
41014037	Ɛ Jisos kase tu jim fô bó le, yɛn ɛ bó leete. Ɛ wvú bife ɛ̂ Bita lɛ, “Semon, wo leete lo le? Kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wo ecɛy egɛn ebuy yî ntam kefew e kɛ mwaaŋ e?
41014038	Ben enù we bunleè fo mmom ke eto fô ben e eghaw ben. Ɛ̀ nu kecɛɛy lɛ fitele kooŋke lo, geenɛn ɛ nyam ye wɛɛyi.”
41014039	No wvú jeme nonɛn bvuu kase gɛn bunle kɛ no wvú be bunle wase.
41014040	Ɛ wvú dioo kase tu jim bvuu yɛn ɛ boom bew bo ŋgoo le leete njefo nyii to nu ɛ̂ bó ɛjise baay. Ɛ bó faŋɛ yaa kiɛɛ fiɛɛ fì bó etfuse ɛ̂ wvú kɛ.
41014041	Ɛ wvú kase tu jim yî bokaŋ bo botɛte le, bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben fɛn bɛɛ kɛ leete lɛɛtene finɛn e? Dí nu ɛ kocɛn. Ɛ̀ nu wase kefew. Bó nu ɛ gese wase wee wvù diee nu Waawee ɛ̂ bonyii bò befe.
41014042	Ben enɛ we ɛ́ beene egɛnè. Ben etaa eyɛn, wee wvù gese me wvun ɛ wvú too wase.”
41014043	Kɛ no Jisos to bɛɛ jemyi nonɛn, kaŋ mwaaŋ ɛ Judas wvù to nu wee ŋgoo boom bo Jisos e bo yuufe ncow bofɛɛ mum buynɛn. Wvú to too bô kebombom ke bonyii le ɛ bó kɛŋke nyó bô bibuse, ɛ ɛ̀ to tum bocee ncese bo baay baay bô bonyii bò duŋci bonci noo bonyii bò saake woŋ.
41014044	Ɛ̀ to nu ɛ wee wvù to gesɛɛ Jisos to seyse wase nciise bô bonyii bodvu gay lɛ, “Wee wvù me nu ŋke eŋgay wvú le, embam eŋocɛ, nu wvú, ɛ́ ben emum ekoo, ejo egɛne dvú eyɛnè fo wvú elewtɛ.”
41014045	No Judas to nonɛn, mum gɛn lo kaŋ mwaaŋ fô Jisos e, gay wvú le lɛ, “Wee N'yɛɛyi.” No wvú gay nonɛn, mum bam wvú ŋocɛ.
41014046	Ɛ bonyii ba mum koo Jisos, gheŋ wvú.
