41014047	Ɛ wee mvu wvù to leeme bô bo Jisos mum dvun nyo ye jem, cun kentuŋtuŋ ke nfwa ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le dvú, sum.
41014048	Ɛ Jisos bife ɛ̂ bonyii bodvu lɛ, “Ben to keekoo me ɛ no too bô nyó noo bibuse kɛ diɛwɛ ben to keekoo ɛ ɛ̀ nu cooŋ e?
41014049	Me nse nshee nu beene no diuu nu fô yew ncese le, n'yɛɛyi bonyii sɛ ben koo me nje la? Geenɛn, fifin kooyi keseen nɛn lɛ fiɛɛ fì bó to saŋɛɛ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le eto ekocɛn.”
41014050	Ɛ boom bo Jisos e bo ŋgoo le bocii mum laŋ wvú fó, fɛɛ lo.
41014051	Ɛ cuwee mvu no bii wvú le, ɛ wvú baa tfume fiɛɛ ye le kɛ, ɛ wvú bu kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu waa ndvu ye le. Ɛ bó gɛn lɛ bó koo tɛn wvú,
41014052	ɛ ndvu yidvu fɛyɛ, ɛ wvú cinɛ dvú lewtɛ kenyi kencimte.
41014053	Ɛ bó mum jo Jisos, gɛn bô wvú fô ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le. Ɛ bocee ncese bo baay baay bô bonyii bò saake woŋ noo bonyii bò duŋci bonci nu ɛ bó to tase wase fó.
41014054	Bó to gɛne bô Jisos ɛ Bita bii lo ɛjim ncejole. Ɛ wvú gɛn buy naa lakfulɛɛŋ yi ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le, mum shii bô bonyii bò to cɛyte la didvu no yosene ŋguy.
41014055	Ɛ bocee ncese bo baay baay bô bonyii bocii bò saake bonsaw mum no gomte fiɛɛ fì bó etey yî Jisos e, ege ɛ́ bó eyu wvú. Geenɛn, faŋɛ yaa yɛn fiɛɛ le kɛ.
41014056	Ɛ bonyii nteen mum ben jim nsaw mbiay ɛkumɛ Jisos. Geenɛn, ɛ wee no jemyi fiɛɛ ɛ fí yaa too kpwɛntene bô fi wee mvu le kɛ.
41014057	Ɛ bonyii bomew ke nɛ mum leem we, cu yibo mbiay yî ye le gay lɛ,
41014058	“Bese se nu ɛ yuw ɛ wvú gayte lɛ wen nu ke esâw yew ncese yin yì bó bom bô can, ejo ɛdiuw ɛta ekase bom yimi ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu bô can kɛ.”
41014059	Naa no bó to jemyi nonɛn, ɛ njeme wvubo faŋɛ yaa etoo kpwɛntene kɛ.
41014060	Ɛ ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le mum nɛ leem we fwe dvu bonyii, bife ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Kɛ wo kɛŋke fiɛɛ keetfuse le? Wo yuuke kɛ mwɛɛm mvù bonyii ban jemyi yî yo le?”
41014061	Ɛ Jisos mɛy diuw tfu, faŋɛ yaa tfuse fiɛɛ kɛ. Ɛ ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le bvuu bife ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu wo Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ wvù Waa Nyo', Nyo' wvù bó bensee?”
41014062	Ɛ Jisos tfuse lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu me. Ben nu ke eyɛn no wee wvù diee nu Waawee ɛ shii ɛ̂ ɛbo ke ɛcɛɛy ke Wee wvù kɛŋke Mvuŋgay e, ke ebvuu eyɛn no wvú shiile too we ɛ̂ kembɛw e.”
41014063	Ɛ ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le yuw nonɛn, mum saayɛ ndvú ye le, bife lɛ, “Shiee nu dvú wvù beene ebvuu egomte wee lɛ wvú eleem fɛn ejeme fiɛɛ le?
41014064	Kɛ ben nu ɛ yuw wase no wvú joo bvudvuu bvu Nyo' le? Ben ɛ gay lɛ la?” Ɛ bonyii bocii mum sumtɛn lɛ wvú nu wee wvù bó eyu lo.
41014065	Ɛ bonyii bomew mum kɛw no cuyte ncɛŋ yî Jisos e, kay ɛjisɛ ɛye, no kfune wvú bô mvuŋko, gayte lɛ, “Kɛ geɛ kewee ntum Nyo' kuw keseen.” Ɛ bonyii bo nci le ke nɛ jo Jisos mum kɛw no suuŋke.
41014066	No Bita to nu je ɛkuɛku lakfulɛɛŋ e, ɛ wan kpwoon mvu ŋgoo boom bokɛnɛ bò to lemte ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le nɛ to mbew ye le.
41014067	No wvú yɛn Bita le ɛ wvú yosene ŋguy, ɛ wvú taa wvú nɛn tuŋŋ, gay lɛ, “Wo tɛn be nu ben ɛ Jisos Wee wvu Nasalɛt wɛ.”
41014068	Ɛ Bita tun, gay lɛ, “Kɛ me ŋkee fiɛɛ fì wo jemyi fin kɛ. Kɛ me ŋkee kɛ.” No wvú gay nonɛn, mum nɛ fó gɛn fô diuw ketaaŋ e, ɛ nyimshie mum toŋ.
41014069	Ɛ wan kpwoon wɛ bvuu yɛn wvú le, gay ɛ̂ bonyii bò to leeme fó lɛ, “Wee wvun nu mvu bó le.”
41014070	Ɛ Bita bvuu tun. Ɛ kefew ke dioo gɛncɛ caan, ɛ bonyii bò to leemene fó ba bvuu gay ɛ̂ Bita lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu kecɛɛy lɛ wo nu mvu bó le, njefo wo nu tɛn wee wvu Galilee.”
41014071	Ɛ Bita mum kan, tee lon yî ɛkolɛ kew e gay lɛ, “Kɛ me ŋkee wee wvun wvù ben jemyi ɛkumɛ wvú kɛ.”
41014072	Kaŋ mwaaŋ ɛ nyimshie bvuu toŋ lɛ bokaŋ bofɛɛ. Ɛ wvú yuw mum kume njeme wvù Jisos be jeme ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Nyimshie ke enu lɛ yí etoŋ bokaŋ bofɛɛ, ɛ wo ɛ ma wase me bokaŋ botɛte.” Ɛ wvú mum kɛse kpwe no beele.
41015001	Ɛ ɛkfuŋ ke gɛn lɛ jó eyuule too nɛn, ɛ bocee ncese bo baay baay bô bonyii bò saake woŋ noo bonyii bò duŋci bonci bo Nyo' le, bò ɛ̀ nu bonyii bocii bò saake bonsaw mum shii jo ntaŋ, kay Jisos, jo wvú gɛn nya can Baylɛt e.
41015002	Ɛ Baylɛt bife ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu wo wvù Nfon Bojuu le?” Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu no wo gay.”
41015003	Ɛ bocee ncese bo baay baay mum kɛw no teyte mwɛɛm yî Jisos e nteen.
41015004	Nonɛn ɛ Baylɛt bvuu bife ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Kɛ wo kɛŋke fiɛɛ keetfuse le? Wo yuuke kɛ mwɛɛm mvù bó cuci yî yo le?”
41015005	Geenɛn ɛ Jisos faŋɛ yaa ebvuu etfuse lo fiɛɛ ɛ̂ wvú kɛ. Ɛ diuw yum Baylɛt.
41015006	Ɛ̀ to ké dioo nu kefew ke Ŋkaw Daŋɛfey wvun e, ɛ Baylɛt bvuse wee ncaw mwaaŋ yew ncaw e wvù bonyii nu ɛ lɛkɛ.
41015007	Ɛ̀ to nu kefew kedvu le, ɛ wee mvu nu yew ncaw e ɛ diee nu Balabas, ɛ wvú nu ŋgoo bonyii bò to nu yew ncaw e bò to kɛwɛɛ mvunlaa ɛlaante yuwyɛ bonyii le.
41015008	Ɛ kebombom ke bonyii le mum to kɛw no biite lɛ Baylɛt ege no wvú to ké no gee fô bowen e.
41015009	Ɛ Baylɛt bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben gomte lɛ me embvuse ɛ ɛ̀ nu Nfon Bojuu le?”
41015010	Wvú to biite nonɛn njefo wvú to nu ɛ kiɛɛ lɛ bocee ncese bo baay baay to nya Jisos can wen e ɛ ɛ̀ nu njefo bó to bene kendoŋ bô wvú.
41015011	Geenɛn, ɛ bocee ncese bo baay baay bɛyse kebombom ke bonyii le lɛ bó egay lɛ wvú ebvuse ɛ ɛ̀ nu Balabas.
41015012	Ɛ Baylɛt bvuu bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ɛ́ me ndioo ɛ mbvuse nonɛn, eŋge nɛɛ bô wee wvun wvù ben teŋe lɛ Nfon Bojuu?”
41015013	Ɛ bó mum wam lo foweɛwe lɛ, “Bó eta lo wvú yî kentam e.”
41015014	Ɛ Baylɛt bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Bó eta wvú nje la? Fiɛɛ fì befe fì wvú ge nu la?” Ɛ bó bvuu no wamte gɛne kɛ lo fwe lɛ, “Bó eta wvú yî kentam e.”
41015015	Nonɛn ɛ Baylɛt mum bvuse Balabas njefo wvú to gomte keege no kebombom shieele. Ɛ wvú gay ɛ bó tam Jisos, mum nya lɛ bó egɛn eta yî kentam e.
41015016	Ɛ bonyii bo nci le mum jo Jisos ley gɛn dvú ɛntow fò bó to teŋe lɛ Bletolium. No bó ley, mum kum kebɛse ke ŋgoo bonyii bo nci le kecii ɛ kí tase.
41015017	Ɛ bó mum jo ndvu bvunfon shfuse yî ye le, bvuu lu kefo ke bvunfon e ɛ kí nu bíay bíay bon ɛ̂ wvú ɛfa.
41015018	Ɛ bó mum kɛw no bune wvú gayte lɛ, “Biaa kembaan. Nfon Bojuu.”
41015019	No bó gee nonɛn mum no suuŋke wvú bô kembaŋ yî ɛkolɛ le, cuyte ncɛŋ yî ye le, too tumte ɛnvuw ɛ̂ wvú ɛjise, bune wvú.
41015020	Ɛ bó ke sɛwse wvú nonɛn mɛse, mum kase baa ndvu bvunfon yɛ yî ye le, jise ndvú ye yî ye le, mum jo wvú no gɛne dvú keegɛn eta yî kentam e.
41015021	Ɛ bó dioo gɛne, ɛ bô bo wee mvu tasɛn ɛ wvú kfuuyi ŋkpwaante ɛ diee nu Semon, ɛ ɛ̀ nu wee wvu Sɛlin. Wvú to nu icee Ɛlɛksanda bô Lufus. Ɛ bó mum kan wvú ɛ wvú tuu kentam ke Jisos e.
41015022	Ɛ bó no gɛne bô Jisos gɛn buy bvudvuu bvù bó teŋe lɛ Golgota le, (ɛ diee din nu lɛ Ŋgbwow Ɛkolɛ,)
41015023	mum nya mbvuum ɛ̂ wvú lɛ wvú ewu ɛ bó ɛ fiysɛn bô ɛfuwɛ kemew ɛ bó teŋe lɛ mɛɛl. Geenɛn ɛ Jisos faŋɛ yaa wu kɛ.
41015024	Ɛ bó mum ta wvú yî kentam e. Ɛ bó jo ndvú ye keegaw ɛ̂ bikuu bibole mum tum kaŋ bô ndvú yidvu keekiɛɛ no wee nu ejo.
41015025	Kefew kè bó to taɛ Jisos yî kentam e to nu didiuu bvuukɛ fontaŋɛntaŋ.
41015026	Ɛ bó saŋ fiɛɛ fì bó taɛ wvú yî kentam e nje fí ɛ fí nu lɛ, wvú nu, “Nfon Bojuu.”
41015027	Bó to nu ɛ ta tɛn bocooŋ bofɛɛ yî bintam e, wvumvu ɛ̂ ɛbo ke Jisos e ke ɛcɛɛy e, wvumvu ɛ̂ ɛbo kew ke ɛŋkoŋko le. [
41015028	Ɛ fí mum kocɛn no bó to saŋɛɛ wase ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le lɛ, “Bó to nu ɛ taŋ wvú ŋgoo bonyii bò nu ɛ buw mwɛɛm e.”]
41015029	Ɛ bonyii no fele yɛne Jisos e mɛɛke lo bikuu, baale wvú bô boncun gayte lɛ, “Eŋ'gheee! Wo wvù se nu keeke esâw yew ncese ekase eyoo yî ɛdiuw e ɛta,
41015030	kɛ fi lɛ ɛkolɛ kuw eshii yî kentam kiɛ le.”
41015031	Ɛ bocee ncese bo baay baay bô bonyii bò duŋci bonci bo Nyo' le no buu tɛn wvú ɛbonɛbon gayte lɛ, “Wvú se fii bonyii bomew sɛ wvú nulo efi kew ɛkolɛ ŋkuuŋ.
41015032	Wvú wvù Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ, wvú wvù nu Nfon bonyii bo Islael kɛ eshii lɛ yî kentam e keseen ɛ́ bese eyɛn emum ebee wvú le.” Ɛ bonyii ba bò bó to taɛ yî bintam e bô bo Jisos no baale tɛn wvú bô boncun.
41015033	Ɛ diuu ke dioo ben leke, ɛ ɛkfuŋ nɛ jiim woŋ tfuu gɛn buy didiuu ditɛte ɛmvunsheeŋ.
41015034	Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu didiuu ditɛte, ɛ Jisos nɛ fuŋ foweɛwe lɛ, “Ɛloy, Ɛloy lama sabaktani,” fì nu lɛ, “Nyo' wɛm, Nyo' wɛm, wo laŋ me nɛn nje la?”
41015035	Ɛ bonyii bomew bò to leeme fó dioo yuw, gay lɛ, “Ben eyekɛ eyuw, wvú teŋe Ɛlayja.”
41015036	Ɛ wee mvu bó le nɛ lewtɛ jo kusha, ffum ɛ̂ mbvuum mo ŋgbwayŋgbwayi le, bon yî fite le nɛke lɛ wvú ewu, mum gay lɛ, “Kɛ leem nɛn ɛ́ beene eyɛn laa Ɛlayja nu eto eshike wvú yî kentam kin e lɛ.”
41015037	Ɛ Jisos nɛ wam foweɛwe mum yoy n'yoy wvu fokemɛse.
41015038	Ɛ ndvu yì to gawsene yew ncese ɛnte sɛlɛ ɛntelɛŋ kɛw fowe bow buy fokuse biba bifɛɛ.
41015039	Ɛ cee ɛkolɛ bonyii bo nci le wvù to leeme fwe dvu Jisos dioo yɛn je yì Jisos kpwe jó le, mum gay lɛ, “Kecɛɛy, wee wvun se nu Waa Nyo'.”
41015040	Bokɛnɛ bomew to leeme fó ntamndwee taale. Ŋgoo bó le to nu Maalia Magdalen bô Maalia wvù bwee Jɛm wvu caan bô Yosɛs, ɛ wvumvu nu Salome.
41015041	Bokɛnɛ ban nu bò to bii Jisos e Galilee fici wvú. Bó to nu fó bô bokɛnɛ bomew tɛn nteen bò to biɛ Jisos e ɛ bô bó to Jɛlusalɛm.
41015042	Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu wase ɛkiɛguu ɛbvubwɛ, no ɛ̀ to nu Diuu di Nseyse le keeley yî diuu di mbam e,
41015043	ɛ wee mvu wvu Alimatia wvù bó to teŋe lɛ Yosɛw, kuu fitele gɛn yɛn Baylɛt e keelɛkɛ gvune di Jisos e egɛn edwey. Yosɛw wvun to nu ŋgoo bonyii bò saake woŋ e, ɛ bonyii to wvumte naa wvú ntay. Ɛ wvú kebɛɛ to cɛyte tɛn kefew kè bvunfon bvu Nyo' le nu ke eto.
41015044	Ɛ Baylɛt yuw, ɛ diuw yum lo wvú lɛ Jisos be ɛ kpwe wase. Ɛ wvú tee ɛkolɛ ke bonyii bo nci le kiɛ ɛ kí to, ɛ wvú bife ɛ̂ wvú laa Jisos be ɛ kpwe wase lɛ.
41015045	Ɛ wvú dioo yuw ɛ̂ ɛkolɛ ke bonyii bo nci le kedvu lɛ Jisos be ɛ kpwe wase, ɛ wvú mum nya gvune didvu ɛ Yosɛw.
41015046	Ɛ Yosɛw mum nɛ gɛn guy ndvu yì jee, gɛn shike gvune di Jisos e, baancɛ jó, gɛn jike ɛ̂ jem e ɛ bó cow yî kembaan e, mum biŋse kebwee ke tɛ le to baŋ diuw jem yidvu dvú.
41015047	Ɛ Maalia Magdalen bô Maalia wvù bwee Yosɛs yɛn bvudvuu bvù bó dwey Jisos fó le.
41016001	Ɛ diuu di mbam e ke dioo fey wase, ɛ Maalia Magdalen bô Maalia wvù bwee Jɛm, noo Salome guy bonfiey bò shfuuŋkene wvu lɛ bó egɛn eyefe gvune di Jisos e dvú.
41016002	Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu ɛ ɛ̀ bɛɛ naa lo fontaŋɛntaŋ kɛ no diuu bɛɛ san lo yî diuu di fwe yî kemaa le, ɛ bó nɛ no gɛne fô jem.
41016003	Ɛ bó dioo gɛne nonɛn no jemyi ɛbonɛbon lɛ laa ɛ̀ nu ke ebiŋse yɛɛ tɛ dì bó baŋ diuw jem dvú ɛ́ bó sɛ ley ɛ?
41016004	Geenɛn ɛ bó dioo laŋ jise, yɛn ɛ bó ɛ biŋse wase tɛ didvu. Tɛ din to nu naa lo kebwee ke tɛ le.
41016005	Ɛ bó dioo ley gɛn ɛ̂ jem, yɛn cuwee mvu le ɛ wvú ɛ shii ɛbo ɛcɛɛy ɛ tfume ndvu ɛ yí defe, baa. Ɛ ye kufe bó nɛn wuuu.
41016006	Ɛ cuwee wvudvu gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Fo diuw eyumtè ben kɛ. Me ŋkee lo lɛ ben gomte ɛ ɛ̀ nu Jisos wvu Nasalɛt wvù bó se taɛ yî kentam e. Kɛ wvú bɛɛ fɛn kɛ. Wvú nu ɛ buy wase yî kpwe le. Ben etaa eyɛn fô bó se jikɛɛ wvú.
41016007	Ben egɛn esee ɛ̂ boom bew bo ŋgoo le noo ɛ̂ Bita lɛ wvú nu ɛ sa wase fwe dvunɛn Galilee. Ben nu ke eyɛn wvú le jó no wvú to gayɛɛ ɛ̂ ben.”
41016008	Ɛ bokɛnɛ ba buy ɛ̂ jem ciiŋke nɛn kikikiki, nɛ fɛɛ lo, ɛ diuw ɛ loocɛ ɛ yum bó nɛn kaww. Ɛ bó faŋɛ yaa jeme fiɛɛ ɛ̂ wee kɛ, njefo bó to fane lo. [
41016009	Jisos to buy yî kpwe le diuu di fwe yî kemaa le ɛ ɛ̀ bɛɛ kebitele, yaw buynɛn ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô Maalia Magdalen wvù wvú to bvusɛɛ bonceendaa bo dɛwle le yî ye le bosooshwiy.
41016010	Ɛ Maalia mum gɛn see ɛ̂ bonyii bò bô bo Jisos to ké no nu. Bonyii ban to nu ɛ shii beele soo bikuu.
41016011	Ɛ bó dioo yuw no kpwoon wɛ gayte lɛ wen be ɛ yɛn Jisos e ɛ wvú nu dvú, ɛ bó faŋɛ yaa bee naa lo kɛ.
41016012	Ɛjim jodvu ɛ Jisos bvuu duŋcɛ ye ye ɛ̂ bonyii bew bomew bo ŋgoo le bofɛɛ ɛ bó gɛne ntɛw mvu le ɛ nfieesɛn ye ɛ kumɛn wase.
41016013	Ɛ bó tu jim, gɛn see ɛ̂ kebɛse ke bonyii bo ŋgoo le, ɛ bó faŋɛ yaa bee bó le kɛ.
41016014	Ɛjim jodvu ɛ Jisos duŋcɛ ye ye ɛ ɛ̀ nu wase ɛ̂ boom bew bo yuufe ncow mwaaŋ e kebɛɛ ɛ bó diekene. Ɛ wvú saw bó, njefo bó to baa kɛŋke mbee kɛ, tɛmyi bikuu keebee bonyii bò to yɛnɛɛ wvú le seke wvú to buyɛɛ yî kpwe le.
41016015	Ɛ wvú mum gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ “Ben egɛn woŋ e tfuu egɛn efewcì saaka wvù jee wvù wvu Nyo' ɛ̂ bonyii bocii.
41016016	Wee wvù ɛ́ bee saaka wvudvu le, bó ɛ lese wvú ɛ̂ joo, ɛ́ wvú ke eboy. Wee wvù ɛ faŋ keebee, nu ɛ wvú nu ke eley ŋgɛw e.
41016017	Bonyii bò nu ɛ bee nu ke egee mwɛɛm mvù duŋci mvuŋgay mvu Nyo' le diɛwɛ mvun e: bó nu ke ebvuuse bonceendaa bo dɛwle le yî bonyii le ɛ̂ diee diem e. Bó nu ke ejemyi díɛw yi fiɛ.
41016018	Bó nu ke ejici yó le bô can. Ɛ́ bó cim wu lo njiw, wvú saa ege fiɛɛ bô bó kɛ. Bó nu ke egɛɛle can yî bonyii bò cɛmkene le, ɛ bó bonene.”
41016019	Ɛ Tata Jisos jeme ɛ̂ bó nonɛn mɛse, ɛ Nyo' mum jo wvú ɛ wvú ben we shii ɛ̂ ɛbo ke ɛcɛɛy ke Nyo' le.
41016020	Ɛ boom bew bo ŋgoo le ke mum buy no ghane fewci saaka wvù jee mondvuum e monciim. Ɛ Tata lemte bô bó tomte fiɛɛ fì bó to fewci lɛ ɛ̀ nu kecɛɛy bô mwɛɛm mvù duŋci mvuŋgay mvu Nyo' le mvù bó to gee.]
42001001	Wee wvu baay wvù Teofilus, bonyii nteen nu ɛ mom wase keesaŋ ɛkumɛ mwɛɛm mvù to koyɛɛ ɛntelɛŋ jo bese.
42001002	Bó to saaŋke mwɛɛm kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ mvù bese to yuwɛɛ ɛ̂ bonyii bò to yɛnɛɛ bô ɛjisɛ ɛbo bvuu no fewci saaka wvudvu no mvú to kɛwɛɛ.
42001003	No me nu ɛ njo wase kefew ɛ ntasse mwɛɛm mvun mvunciim ɛ kɛw foŋkɛw, ɛ mum ɛ n'yɛn lɛ fí jee lɛ me embaancɛ ensaŋ tɛn ɛ̂ je yi lɛŋ e ɛ̂ wo.
42001004	Me ŋge fin lɛ wo ekiɛɛ kecɛɛy ke mwɛɛm mvù bó nu ɛ fewcɛ wase ɛ̂ wo le.
42001005	Seke Nfon 'Ɛlod to saake woŋ wvù Judea, cee ncese mvu to nu ɛ bó teŋe lɛ Sakalia. Wvú to lemte ɛ̂ ŋgoo bocee ncese bo Abija le, ɛ bwee yew we to buy tɛn ɛ̂ kfuu di Ɛlon e, ɛ bó teŋe wvú lɛ Ɛlisabɛn.
42001006	Bonyii bo bofɛɛ ban to nu bonyii bo teytey ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛjise, gɛɛle bonci bo Tata le bocii, yaa kɛŋke jay kɛ.
42001007	Geenɛn, bó to baa kɛŋke wan kɛ, njefo Ɛlisabɛn to nu kase, ɛ bó bocii to nu ɛ bó ɛ lunkɛn wase.
42001008	Ɛ kefew ke to kocɛn, ɛ ŋgoo Sakalia no lemte yew ncese Tata le. Ɛ̀ to nu wvú cee ncese ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛjise ɛbvubwɛ,
42001009	ɛ bó to baa wvú bii no bó to ké no baale bocee ncese ɛ̂ nce wvubole. Ɛ wvú mum ley yew ncese le keeton jiin.
42001010	Ɛ kefew ke kocɛn keeton jiin, ɛ bonyii bocii bò to nu ɛkfuŋ no bunlee.
42001011	Ɛ nceendaa Tata sɛsɛ buynɛn ɛ̂ wvú ɛjise leem ɛ̂ ɛbo ke ɛcɛɛy ke ketaŋ ke jiin e.
42001012	Seke Sakalia to yɛnɛɛ wvú le, ɛ kedvum gbwo wvú, ɛ wvú kɛŋkɛ nfan baay.
42001013	Geenɛn, ɛ nceendaa wvudvu gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Fo wo efanè kɛ. Nyo' nu ɛ yuw wase bunle yo. Bwee yew wo wvù Ɛlisabɛn nu ke eboo wan diemsɛn ɛ́ wo ecu diee lɛ Jon.
42001014	Wvú nu ke eto bô nlaŋlaŋ fô wo le, ɛ bonyii nteen nu ke eyuuke njoŋ nje boo diew.
42001015	Wvú nu ke enu wee wvu baay ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛjise. Fo wvú ke ewuù mbvuum kɛ, sɛ ge mò tɛmyi. Keyoy ke Yuule nu ke eyiŋsɛn yî ye le seke bó ɛ boo wvú.
42001016	Wvú nu ke ege ɛ́ bonyii bo Islael nteen ekumɛn mvuntelem mvubole ekase etu bô bo Tata wvù Nyo' wvubo.
42001017	Wvú nu ke egɛn fwe jo Tata bô fitele noo mvuŋgay mvu Ɛlayja le, keekumɛn mvuntelem mvu bocee boom e, ɛ́ mvú enu yî boom bobole. Wvú nu ke ege ɛ́ bonyii bò tɛmyi bikuu ecinɛ bikuu bì tɛmyɛɛn e, ekumɛn bonce bobole, ekɛŋke boŋkpwawcɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu bo bonyii bo lɛŋ e. Wvú nu ke ege nonɛn wvu lɛ bonyii enù ɛ bó ɛ seyse keecɛyte Tata.”
42001018	Ɛ Sakalia bife ɛ̂ nceendaa Nyo' lɛ, “Fiɛɛ fì nu ke ege ɛ́ me eŋkiɛɛ ɛ bee bwee yew wɛm nu ɛ bó ɛ lunkɛn wase nɛn nu la?”
42001019	Ɛ nceendaa Nyo' tfuse lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu me wvù Gabliya, ɛ me nleeme ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛjise sekecii, ɛ ɛ̀ tum wvú me lɛ me ento ensee saaka wvù jee wvun ɛ̂ wo.
42001020	Taa eyɛn, no wo baa ebee saaka wvun e, ɛ kefew nu ke eto ekocɛn ɛ́ fí ekɛŋke keekooy, wo nu etu kencife, saa ejemyi kɛ, egɛn ebuy seke fiɛɛ fin nu ke ekooy.”
42001021	No fí to kooyi nonɛn, ɛ bonyii bò to nu ɛkfuŋ cɛyte Sakalia no kɛŋke lo ŋghaw laa ɛ̀ sɛ kooyi la fì wvú she dvú baay nɛn ɛ.
42001022	Seke wvú to buyɛɛ dvú, wvú to baa kiɛɛ keejeme ɛ̂ bó kɛ. Ɛ bó mum kiɛɛ lɛ Nyo' nu ɛ duŋcɛ fiɛɛ fi ŋghaw e ɛ̂ wvú dvú. Ɛ wvú mum no feeke lo mwɛɛm ɛ̂ bó bô can, yaa jemyi kɛ.
42001023	Ɛ Sakalia ke mɛse lemme diew yew ncese le mum kase tu jim fô yew e fo wvú.
42001024	Ɛ ɛdiuw ke fey, ɛ kpwɛse wvù Ɛlisabɛn leem bô fue, mum no nu kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu yew yî kee le tin.
42001025	Ɛ Ɛlisabɛn mum gay lɛ, “Keseen Tata nu ɛ koo wase shen fô me le, ɛ cake keŋ'wuumɛn yî ɛkolɛ kem e.”
42001026	Ɛ fue di Ɛlisabɛn e ke buy kee soocaan, ɛ Nyo' tum nceendaa we wvù Gabliya ntɛw mvu wvu Galilee le ɛ bó teŋe lɛ Nasalɛt.
42001027	Wvú to gɛn bô ntum fô ŋgon kpwoon mvu le ɛ bó teŋe lɛ Maalia, ɛ ɛ̀ bɛɛ wan wvu tfu. Wvú to nu ɛ bó ɛ seyse wase lɛ wvú nu ke enu kpwɛɛ Yosɛw wvu ɛ̂ kfuu di Nfon Dawe le.
42001028	Ɛ nceendaa Nyo' wvudvu gɛn yɛn Maalia le gay wvú le lɛ, “Me ŋgayte wo le. Nyo' nu ɛ buw wase wo ɛ no nu ben ɛ wvú.”
42001029	Ɛ Maalia yuw ɛ fí ghaw wvú baay, ɛ wvú no maa laa kfuu wvun ŋgayma sɛ nu wvù nɛɛ lɛ.
42001030	Geenɛn, ɛ nceendaa Nyo' gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Maalia fo wo efanè kɛ. Nyo' nu ɛ buw wase wo.
42001031	Taa eyɛn, wo nu ke eleem bô fue, eboo wan diemsɛn, ecu diee lɛ Jisos.
42001032	Wvú nu ke enu wee wvu baay, ɛ bó nu ke eteŋe wvú lɛ Waa Nyo', Nyo' wvù nu Ɛkolɛ ke Mwɛɛm Mvunciim e. Tata wvù Nyo' nu ke eshike wvú yî kawla Nfon Dawe wvù icee kfuu dibole.
42001033	Wvú nu ke esaake kfuu di Yakow e sekecii, ɛ kɛ bvunfon bwew nu ke ekɛŋke kemɛse kɛ.”
42001034	Ɛ Maalia bife ɛ̂ nceendaa Nyo' lɛ, “Fifin nu ke eghan nɛɛ le, ɛ me mbɛɛ wan wvu tfu.”
42001035	Ɛ nceendaa Nyo' tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Keyoy ke Yuule nu ke eto yî yo le, ɛ́ mvuŋgay mvu Nyo' wvù nu Ɛkolɛ ke Mwɛɛm Mvunciim e eyiŋsɛn yî yo le. Nonɛn, wan wvù wo nu ke eboo nu ke enu wvù yuule, ɛ́ bó emum eteŋe wvú lɛ Waa Nyo'.
42001036	Taa eyɛn, wayco wvù Ɛlisabɛn wvù nu ɛ wvú ɛ loocɛ wase ɛ lun ɛ bó se teŋe wvú lɛ kase, nu keseen bô fue kee soocaan, ɛ wvú nu ke eboo wan diemsɛn.
42001037	Kɛ fiɛɛ nu dvú fì nulo eghaw Nyo' kɛ.”
42001038	Ɛ Maalia mum gay lɛ, “Me wvun fɛn wvù waa lemme Nyo'. Wvú ege ɛ́ fí ekooy bô me no wo gay.” No wvú jeme nonɛn, ɛ nceendaa Nyo' mum nɛ.
42001039	Kɛ ɛdiuw yodvu le, ɛ Maalia seyse nɛ no yaŋsene gɛne ntɛw mvu wvù woŋ kum wvu Judea le,
42001040	gɛn buy jó, ley yew dvu Sakalia gay bwee yew we wvù Ɛlisabɛn e.
42001041	No Ɛlisabɛn to yuwɛɛ ŋgayma wvu Maalia, ɛ wan sɛsɛ ɛ̂ wvú ɛshem baay. Ɛ Keyoy ke Yuule yiŋsɛn yî ye le.
42001042	Ɛ wvú mum wvule foweɛwe, gay lɛ, “Kembonɛn ke Nyo' le nu yî yo le fele bokɛnɛ bocii, ɛ kembonɛn kew nu yî wan wvù wo nu ke eboo le.
42001043	Fin fiɛɛ fi baay nɛn ghan nɛɛ le, lɛ bwee Tata wɛm nu ɛ laa ghane ɛ̂ me le?
42001044	Taa eyɛn, seke me mbe n'yuw ŋgayma wo, wan ɛ sɛsɛ ɛ̂ me ɛshem bô nlaŋlaŋ wvu baay.
42001045	Njoŋ wvu baay nu fô wo le, njefo wo nu ɛ bee lɛ ŋkawma wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ wo dvú nu ke eto ekocɛn.”
42001046	Ɛ Maalia gay lɛ, “Fitele fiem bensee Tata Nyo',
42001047	ɛ me n'yuuke njoŋ nje Nyo' wvù nu Mboyse wɛm.
42001048	Wvú nu ɛ kume me, ɛ me nu kɛ lo waa we lemme wvu ncɛw. Ɛ kɛw yî keseen e ɛ gɛn lo, ɛŋgokɛ kecii nu ke egayte lɛ, Nyo' nu ɛ laŋ kembonɛn yî yɛm e,
42001049	njefo Nyo' Mvuŋgay Mvunciim nu ɛ ge wase mwɛɛm mvu baay baay nteen fô me le. Kɛ diee diew kɛŋke kenfewsɛn kɛ.
42001050	Wvú camte shen fô bonyii bò wvumte wvú le. Ɛ shen yin nu yî ɛŋgokɛ kecii le.
42001051	Wvú nu ɛ duŋcɛ mvuŋgay mvu ɛbo kew e, ɛ tawse bonyii bò saale ye, bontaŋ bobole ɛ bvuŋ.
42001052	Wvú nu ɛ shwaw wase bonfon bo baay baay yî bokawla le, ɛ bense ɛ ɛ̀ nu bonyii bo ncɛw.
42001053	Wvú nu ɛ nyaŋe wase bonyii bò jeŋ yuu bó, bó ɛ ffuu bô mwɛɛm mvù jee, ɛ kuŋ bo kpwaw e cancan.
42001054	Wvú nu ɛ ficɛ wee we lemme wvù Islael, ɛ kume keecam shen fô Abla'am bô kfuu diew e, egɛn emɛse kɛ no wvú to kawɛɛ ɛ̂ bo'icee cee bosɛse.”
42001056	No Maalia jeme nonɛn, ce bô Ɛlisabɛn kee tɛ mum kase tu jim fô yew e.
42001057	Ɛ kefew kè Ɛlisabɛn ke eboo ke to kocɛn, ɛ wvú boo wan diemsɛn.
42001058	Ɛ kfuu diew noo bonyii bò to cee keleŋ kedvu le yuw lɛ Nyo' nu ɛ duŋcɛ shen fô wvú le naa baay, ɛ bó mum no laŋlaŋe.
42001059	Ɛ ɛdiuw ke to buy nyaŋ, ɛ bó to keetfuse wan yew, mum no gomte keecu diee lɛ Sakalia kɛ diɛwɛ di ice le,
42001060	geenɛn ɛ bwee ma lo, gay lɛ bó eteŋè wvú lɛ Jon.
42001061	Ɛ bó gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Kɛ wee nu dvú ɛ̂ kfuu dinɛn e bô diee din kɛ.”
42001062	Ɛ bó mum nɛ no feeke bô can ɛ̂ cee wan, keekiɛɛ laa wvú be gomte lɛ bó ecu diee di wan e lɛ yɛɛ lɛ.
42001063	Ɛ wvú mum few tɛn lɛ bó eto bô fiɛɛ ɛ́ wen esaŋ yî dvú le. Ɛ bó to dvú ɛ wvú mum saŋ lɛ, “Diee diew nu Jon.” Ɛ bó yɛn nonɛn ɛ dew yum bó.
42001064	Kaŋ mwaaŋ, ɛ diuw Sakalia mum yene ye, ɛ leme diew yaatɛn, ɛ wvú bvuu kase no jemyi. Ɛ wvú mum kɛw no tumte moŋkum mo Nyo' le.
42001065	Ɛ bonyii bo ntɛw wvudvu le kɛŋkɛ ŋghaw baay. Ɛ saaka mwɛɛm mvun mvunciim saaŋkɛn gɛn woŋ kum wvu Judea wvudvu le tfuu.
42001066	Ɛ bonyii bocii bò to yuwɛɛ mwɛɛm mvun mvunciim kɛŋkɛ ŋghaw mum no biite laa wvun wan nu ke enu wvù nɛɛ lɛ, njefo fí to looci duŋci lɛ kembonɛn ke Nyo' le nu yî ye le.
42001067	Ɛ Keyoy ke Yuule nɛ yiŋsɛn yî Sakalia wvù icee Jon e, ɛ wvú mum nɛ no jemyi kɛ diɛwɛ wee ntum Nyo' le, gayte lɛ,
42001068	“Beene ebenseè Tata wvù nu Nyo' bonyii bo Islael. Wvú nu ɛ to wase keesum bonyii bew yî ŋgɛw e.
42001069	Wvú nu ɛ gɛɛ wase ntɛmemvuŋgay wvù nu ke eboyse beene, ɛ wvú buy ɛ̂ kfuu di wee we lemme wvù Nfon Dawe le.
42001070	Fifin nu no wvú to kawɛɛ diuw bonyii bew bo ntum e bò yuule ɛ ɛ̀ bɛɛ lo bvuyvuum e bò wvú to gɛkɛɛ,
42001071	lɛ wen nu ke eboyse beene can bonyii bò gomte keefiwsɛ beene le, noo bonyii bosɛɛbeene bo bvuban e.
42001072	Wvú to nu ɛ kaw lɛ wen nu ke ecam shen fô bo'icee cee bosɛɛbeene le mum no shee kumyi kelew kew kè wvú wvù Nyo' to dieɛ.
42001073	Wvú to nu ɛ kaw ɛ̂ icee bo'icee bosɛɛbeene wvù Abla'am lew lɛ,
42001074	wen nu ke ebvuse beene can bonyii bosɛɛbeene bo bvuban e, wvu lɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ beene elemte wvú le sɛ nfan,
42001075	eceè nce wvù yuule bô wvu teytey ɛ̂ wvú ɛjise ɛdiuw ɛcii yî nshii wesebeene le.
42001076	Ɛ wo waa wɛm nu ɛ bó nu ke eteŋe wo lɛ wee ntum Nyo', Nyo' wvù nu Ɛkolɛ ke Mwɛɛm Mvunciim e, njefo wo nu ke esa fwe dvu Tata keeseyse je ye.
42001077	Wo nu ke efewci ɛ̂ bonyii bew je yì ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó ekɛŋkɛ mboyma jó, wvù ɛ̀ nu nlɛɛshɛ wvù Nyo' nu ke elɛɛshɛ bibefɛ bibole,
42001078	nje shen yi baay yì wvú koole fô bonyii le. Wvú nu ke eciinse Mboyse ɛ́ wvú eshiile too we kɛ diɛwɛ diuu fò dí ɛ san e.
42001079	Wvú nu ke enya n'yuu ɛ̂ bonyii bò nu yî ɛjiwɛ le noo bò nu diuw kpwe le, emum eleke beene ɛ̂ je kembonɛn e.”
42001080	Ɛ waa Sakalia wvudvu mum no kuu yî nyam ye le, kuu tɛn ɛ̂ keyoy e. Ke mum nɛ gɛn no cee ɛ ɛ̀ nu ŋkpwaante, gɛn buy diuu dì wvú to buyɛɛ keeduŋcɛ ɛkolɛ kew ɛ̂ bonyii bo Islael.
42002001	Ɛ̀ to nu kefew kekiɛ le, ɛ sa' buy lɛ bó etaŋ bonyii bocii bò nu yî bitum bi woŋ wvù Lum e. Yí to buy ɛ̂ Kaysa Augustus wvù to nu Nfon wvu baay wvu jó.
42002002	Kentaŋ kin to nu ke fwe seke Kpwilinus to nu wee sa' wvu Lum saake keba ke woŋ e kè Silia.
42002003	Nonɛn, ɛ bonyii bocii mum no tuu jim bontɛw bobole, lɛ bó esaŋ ɛdiee ɛbo ebvuu etaŋ bó.
42002004	Ɛ Yosɛw tɛn nɛ Nasalɛt ntɛw mvu wvu Galilee le, ben gɛn Bɛtelɛ'ɛm ɛ̂ keba ke woŋ wvù Judea le jò bó to bokɛɛ Nfon Dawe. Wvú to gɛn jó njefo wvú to nu wee kfuu di Nfon Dawe le.
42002005	Yosɛw to gɛne bô Maalia wvù wvú to leyte lɛ ɛ̀ nu ke enu kpwɛse, ɛ wvú nu bô fue.
42002006	No bó to gɛnɛɛ buy jó, ɛ kefew kè wvú eboo ke to kocɛn.
42002007	Ɛ wvú boo waa we bvucile ɛ ɛ̀ nu wan diemsɛn, kule ɛ̂ ndvu le, jike ɛ̂ kekoŋ ke nyám e, njefo bó to nu ɛ tan fô nce yew bonyii bo ghane le.
42002008	Ɛ̀ to nu kefew kedvu le, ɛ boncɛy njée bomew nu mbew ntɛw wvudvu le, cɛyte njée yibo ɛntaŋ.
42002009	Ɛ nceendaa Tata nɛ sɛsɛ buynɛn ɛ̂ bó ɛjise, ɛ n'yuu Nyo' ba fô bó to nu, ɛ bó kɛŋkɛ nfan baay.
42002010	Geenɛn, ɛ nceendaa Tata wvudvu gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Fo ben efanè kɛ. Ben eyuw, me ntoo ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô saaka wvù jee fô ben e, ɛ wvú nu ke enya njoŋ wvu baay ɛ̂ bonyii bocii.
42002011	Yî diuu di ɛbɛn e nu ɛ bó ɛ boo Mboyse ɛ̂ ntɛw Nfon Dawe le wvù ɛ̀ nu Klistu wvù Tata.
42002012	Fin nu ke enu nciise keeduŋcɛ wan wvudvu ɛ̂ ben. Ben nu ke egɛn eyɛn wvú le ɛ bó ɛ kule ɛ̂ ndvu le ɛ jike ɛ̂ kekoŋ ke nyám e.”
42002013	Kɛ nonɛn, ɛ bó nɛ sɛsɛ yɛn nceendaa Nyo' wɛ le bô ŋgoo bomew e nteen ɛ bó tumte moŋkum mo Nyo' le gayte lɛ,
42002014	“Mbense enù fô Nyo' wvù nu fowe le ɛ́ kembonɛn enu fokuse fɛn fô bonyii bò Nyo' yuuke njoŋ bô bó le.”
42002015	Seke bonceendaa bo Nyo' le ba to cin'yɛɛ bó le kase ben we, ɛ boncɛy njée bodvu jeme ɛ̂ bikuu bibole lɛ, “Beene egɛn keseen wvun Bɛtelɛ'ɛm, egɛn eyɛn fiɛɛ fin fì kooy le fì Nyo' nu ɛ ge beene ɛ kiɛɛ.”
42002016	Kaŋ mwaaŋ, ɛ bó mum nɛ yaŋsɛn gɛn, gɛn yɛn Yosɛw bô Maalia le noo wan e, ɛ wvú jiime ɛ̂ kekoŋ ke nyám e.
42002017	No bó yɛn nonɛn, mum kɛw no fɛle mwɛɛm mvunciim mvù nceendaa Nyo' be seŋe ɛ̂ bó ɛkumɛ wan wvudvu.
42002018	Ɛ dew yum bonyii bocii bò yuwɛɛ mwɛɛm mvù boncɛy njée ba jemyɛɛ ɛ̂ bó.
42002019	Geenɛn, ɛ Maalia yuw fiew gɛɛ fô fitele le no kpwawci sekecii.
42002020	Ɛ boncɛy njée ba kase no tuu jim bensee Nyo' tumte moŋkum mew njefo bó to nu ɛ gɛn yɛn mwɛɛm mvunciim e kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no nceendaa Nyo' to seŋɛɛ.
42002021	Ɛ wan wvudvu ke buy ɛdiuw nyaŋ, ɛ bó tfuse wvú yew, mum cu diee lɛ Jisos, ɛ diee din nu kɛ dí dì nceendaa Nyo' to seŋɛɛ ɛ̂ bwee ɛ wvú sɛ ke leem bô fue.
42002022	Ɛ kefew ke to kocɛn kè bó ege ncese keekfum bikuu bibole no nci Muses to gomte. Ɛ bó mum jo wan ben dvú Jɛlusalɛm keenya ɛ̂ Nyo'.
42002023	Fifin nu no bó to saŋɛɛ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' bonci bo Nyo' le lɛ, “Ɛ́ wee boke waa bvucile ɛ ɛ̀ nu wan diemsɛn, ɛ́ wvú nya ɛ ɛ̀ no nu wvu Nyo'.”
42002024	Bó to gɛn tɛn keege ncese wvun bô bibembɛ bifɛɛ, kɛnɛɛ bô boom bo nyiŋ e bofɛɛ bii no fí to nu ɛ̂ Ŋwa' bonci bo Nyo' le.
42002025	Ɛ̀ to nu kefew kedvu le, ɛ cee la mvu nu Jɛlusalɛm ɛ bó teŋe lɛ Semeon. Wvú to nu wee wvu teytey gee no Nyo' gomte, ɛ wvú to cɛyte wee wvù ke eto elɛɛse mvuntelem mvu bonyii bo Islael e. Keyoy ke Yuule to nu yî ye le,
42002026	ɛ kí to ge wase ɛ wvú kiɛɛ lɛ kɛ kpwe nu ke ejo wvú sɛ wvú ɛ yɛn Mboyse wvù wvu Tata wvù wvú to kawɛɛ le kɛ.
42002027	Ɛ Keyoy ke Yuule ke nɛ ge ɛ Semeon gɛn yew ncese le. Ɛ Yosɛw bô Maalia ke dioo to bô wan yew ncese le keege no nci gomte,
42002028	ɛ Semeon fi wan koycɛ mum kɛw no tumte moŋkum mo Nyo' le, gayte lɛ,
42002029	“Tata, no wo nu ɛ ge wase ŋkawma wo ɛ to ɛ kocɛn, joo lɛ wee wo lemme yî nyɛkeey e.
42002030	Ɛjisɛ ɛyɛm nu ɛ yɛn wase Mboyse
42002031	wvù wo ciinse le, ɛ bonyii bocii nu ke eyɛn wvú le.
42002032	Wvú nu ke enu ken'yeese fô bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ bo Islael e, wvu lɛ bó tɛn ekee wo, ege ɛ́ bó ecake diee di bonyii buw bo Islael e we.”
42002033	Ɛ cee wan bô bwee wan yuw mwɛɛm mvù Semeon jemyi ɛ̂ wan wvun we, ɛ dew yum bó.
42002034	Ɛ wvú mum laŋ kembonɛn yî bó le, gay ɛ̂ Maalia wvù bwee lɛ, “Nyo' nu ɛ caw wase waa wo wvun, ɛ nto we nu ke ege ɛ́ bonyii bo Islael nteen egbwekɛn, ɛ́ bomew enɛŋkɛn lo we. Wvú nu nciise fiɛɛ ɛ bonyii nu ke ejemyi mwɛɛm yî ye le.
42002035	Nonɛn, ɛ́ fifin emum eduŋci mwɛɛm mvù bonyii nyile ɛ̂ mvuntelem mvubole. Mwɛɛm mvun mvunciim nu ke ege ɛ́ fitele fiuw enu kɛ diɛwɛ bó bon bô finyo.”
42002036	Ɛ̀ to nu kɛ kefew kedvu le, ɛ kpwoon mvu nu ɛ bó teŋe lɛ Anna, ɛ ɛ̀ nu wee ntum Nyo'. Wvú to nu waa Fanuwɛl wvù wee kfuu di Ashɛl e. Kpwoon wvudvu to nu ɛ lun wase baay. Wvú to nu bô dweese kɛ bilum bisooshwiy mɛy, ɛ dweese mum kpwe.
42002037	Ɛ wvú mum no nu kɛ wase fiew kpwɛɛ ŋkfu, shee yew ncese le bensee Nyo' ɛntaŋ bô ɛmvunsheeŋ, bamte mwɛɛm mvudien, bunlee. Bilum biew to nu wase mbaŋ nyaŋ ncow binɛw (84).
42002038	Kɛ kefew kedvu kè bó to toɛ bô wan yew ncese le, ɛ kpwoon wvudvu to yɛn bó le, mum nya keyoone ɛ̂ Nyo', jeme ɛkumɛ wan wvun ɛ̂ bonyii bocii bò to cɛyte kefew kè Nyo' ke esum bonyii bo Jɛlusalɛm can ŋgɛw e.
42002039	Seke Yosɛw bô Maalia to mɛsɛɛ mwɛɛm mvunciim no nci Nyo' to gomte, mum kase tu jim ntɛw wvubo wvù Nasalɛt e ɛ̂ keba ke woŋ e kè Galilee le.
42002040	Ɛ wan mum no nu kuu kɛŋke mvuŋgay, ɛ wvú ɛ yiŋsɛn bô bvufee bvu baay, ɛ bonyii yɛne kembonɛn ke Nyo' le yî ye le.
42002041	Icee Jisos bô bwee to ké no bene Jɛlusalɛm bilum bicii fô Ŋkaw Daŋɛfey e.
42002042	Ɛ Jisos ke buy bilum yuufe ncow bifɛɛ, ɛ bó bvuu ben fô Ŋkaw wvudvu le kɛ no bó to ké no bene.
42002043	No bó to dieɛ wase Ŋkaw mɛse, dioo tuu jim, ɛ wan wvù Jisos shɛɛ ɛjim Jɛlusalɛm, geenɛn ɛ ice bô bwee faŋɛ yaa kiɛɛ kɛ.
42002044	Ɛ bó ke lɛn diuu dicile, kpwaake kɛ lɛ wvú nu ɛnte jo ŋgoo bonyii bò bô bó to lɛne le. Ɛ bó ke mum kɛw no gomte wvú ɛnte jo kfuu dibole bô nsán,
42002045	ke gom ŋkuuŋ, mum kase tu jim Jɛlusalɛm keegom wvú jó.
42002046	Ɛ ɛ̀ dioo nu ɛjim jo ɛdiuw ɛta no bó to kɛwɛɛ keegomte, ɛ bó yɛn wvú le ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô yew ncese le, ɛ wvú ɛ shii fó bô bonyii bo n'yɛɛyi le, yeke bon'yɛɛyi, biwci bombife.
42002047	Ɛ bonyii bocii bò to yeke no kɛŋke ŋghaw baay njefo wvú to kee mwɛɛm baay bvuu tfuuse bombife lɛŋ.
42002048	No bwee bô ice yɛnɛɛ wvú le, ɛ dew loocɛ yum bó. Ɛ bwee bɛn wvú gay lɛ, “Wan wo njiŋsene la bô bese nɛn? Taa eyɛn, bee ico nu ɛ gom wase wo ɛ no wɛwte lo.”
42002049	Ɛ wvú tfuse lɛ, “Ben be gomte me nje la? Kɛ ben be kee lɛ me ŋkɛŋke keenu yew dvu Icɛm fɛn e?”
42002050	Geenɛn, ɛ bó faŋɛ yaa kiɛɛ fiɛɛ fì wvú jeme kɛ.
42002051	Ɛ wvú mum nɛ ɛ bô bó no booke Nasalɛt. Ɛ wvú gɛn no yuuke bó le ntay. No mwɛɛm mvun to kooyi nɛn, ɛ bwee gɛɛ fô fitele fiew e no kpwawci sekecii.
42002052	Ɛ Jisos mum no kuu, kɛŋke bvufee bvu baay, ɛ Nyo' kooŋke wvú, ɛ bonyii tɛn kooŋke wvú.
42003001	Ɛ̀ to nu kefew kè Jon wvù waa Sakalia to nu ŋkpwaante, ɛ Nyo' tum wvú. Kelum kekiɛ to nu ɛ Tibɛlius ɛ saw wase diɛwɛ Nfon wvu baay wvu Lum e bilum yuufe ncow bitin. Ɛ Bontus Baylɛt saake keba ke woŋ e kè Judea, ɛ 'Ɛlod saake Galilee. Filew wvù waa bwee 'Ɛlod to saake keba kè Itulea bô kè Tɛlakoniti, ɛ Lisania saake Abilɛn. Ɛ̀ to nu tɛn kefew kè Annas bô Kayfas to nu bikuu bi bocee ncese le.
42003003	No Jon yuw ntum Nyo', mum nɛ gɛn biba bi woŋ e bicii bì mbew Joo Joodan e, no fewci ɛ̂ bonyii lɛ bó ekumɛn mvuntelem mvubole, ɛ́ wen elese bó ɛ̂ joo wvu lɛ Nyo' elɛɛshɛ bibefɛ bibole.
42003004	Fifin nu no Yɛsaya wvù wee ntum Nyo' to saŋɛɛ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' we le lɛ, “Diɛw wee fuuŋke ŋkpwaante lɛ, bó eseyse je Tata, enɛle ɛ́ yí enù teytey,
42003005	ekɛɛshɛ lɛ dikum di baay baay bô di caan caan dicii, eyiŋsɛn biloŋɛ bicii, enɛle jé yì ŋgooŋgoo ɛ́ yí enu teytey, eyiŋsɛn bintuke ɛ́ je enu nɛn fɛmm,
42003006	ɛ́ bonyii bocii emum eyɛn no Nyo' boyse bonyii.”
42003007	No Jon fewci nonɛn, ɛ bibombom bi bonyii le mum no too lɛ wvú elese bó ɛ̂ joo. Ɛ wvú mum nɛ gay ɛ̂ bo lɛ, “Ɛŋgokɛ ke yó le, ɛ̀ tefe yɛɛ ben lɛ ben elewtè shém Nyo' yì ffuuke yì wvú nu ke eduŋcɛ ɛ̂ ben, ɛ sɛ no too nɛn?
42003008	Ben egeè mwɛɛm mvù duŋci lɛ ben nu ɛ kumɛn wase mvuntelem mvunɛn. Fo ben emum ekɛw eduù kɛ lo ɛ̂ bikuu binɛn lɛ Abla'am nu icee wene kɛ. Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben lɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ Nyo' ebaŋke ɛta ɛyan ɛ́ yó etu boom bo Abla'am e.
42003009	Ben ekeè lɛ bó nu ɛ gɛɛ wase teme ɛ̂ binyi bi bite le. Kete kecii kè baa yumte mvuntam mvù jee, nu ɛ bó nu egbwo naa eley yî gɛŋ e, eton lo.”
42003010	Ɛ bibombom bi bonyii le biɛ yuw, bife ɛ̂ Jon lɛ, “Bese nu ege nɛɛ keseen?”
42003011	Ɛ wvú tfuse lɛ, “Wee wvù kɛŋke bikum bifɛɛ enya kemew ɛ̂ wee wvù yaa kɛŋke kɛ, ɛ́ wvù kɛŋke mwɛɛm mvudien egaw bô wee wvù yaa kɛŋke kɛ.”
42003012	Ɛ bonyii bomew bò to fii shile to fô wvú le lɛ wvú elese bó ɛ̂ joo, bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wee n'yɛɛyi, bese ege nɛɛ fisɛse?”
42003013	Ɛ wvú tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Fo ben efiì shile fesene no nci gomte kɛ.”
42003014	Ɛ bonyii bo nci le to fô wvú le bife lɛ, “Fisɛse nu ɛ bese nu ege nɛɛ?” Ɛ wvú tfuse lɛ, “Ben eyɛnè fo ben ebɛmseè bonyii lole bigew noo keegowtè mwɛɛm yî bonyii le ɛcici kɛ. Ben eyuukè njoŋ bô fiɛɛ fì bó laake ben dvú.”
42003015	No bonyii to nu kɛ wase cɛyte Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ, ɛ bó mum no ghayte mwɛɛm mvu Jon e, bvuu no kpwaake lɛ sekemew ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù Mboyse wvudvu.
42003016	Ɛ Jon mum kiɛɛ gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Me nleese ben ɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ ɛ̂ joo le maaŋ, geenɛn wee wvù kuuke fele me bɛɛ too ɛjim, ɛ me mbaa ncim ŋkpwɛntɛn keeŋgvuwcɛ nfay bolaba bew kɛ. Wvú nu ke elese fiew ben ɛ ɛ̀ nu can Keyoy ke Yuule le noo ŋguy e.
42003017	Wvú kɛŋke fiɛɛ fiew ɛbo fì wvú nu efɛɛtɛn ɛgiŋ dvú, eyɛse fò wvú fɛɛtene, ebaancɛ ɛgiŋ egɛɛ ɛ̂ ŋwaw e, emum ekuu nyiim eton ɛ̂ ŋguy wvù fiee sɛ njimɛ le.”
42003018	Ɛ̀ nɛɛ no Jon to fewci saaka wvù jee wvù wvu Nyo' ɛ̂ bonyii nɛn bvuu nyaa bó bô bontefe jé le nteen.
42003019	Geenɛn, ɛ wvú no jemyi ɛkumɛ 'Ɛlod wvù wee sa' kaci lo, njefo 'Ɛlod to nu ɛ jo 'Ɛlodia wvù kpwɛɛ waa bwee kpwɛse le, bvuu no jemyi ɛkumɛ mwɛɛm mvù befe nteen mvù 'Ɛlod to buwyɛɛ.
42003020	Ɛ 'Ɛlod ke mum mɛse foose lo gee diew gay lɛ bó ekoo Jon efen yew ncaw e.
42003021	Seke Jon to bɛɛ leese bonyii ɛ̂ joo, ke lese diuu dimew mɛse ɛ Jisos tɛn to ɛ wvú lese wvú ɛ̂ joo. Ɛ Jisos dioo bunlee, ɛ ɛbulɛ yene ye,
42003022	ɛ Keyoy ke Yuule shii to yî ye le fieesene ɛbembɛ. Ɛ diɛw jeme fowe lɛ, “Wo nu Waa wɛm, nu fitele fiem, ɛ me n'yuuke njoŋ bô wo baay.”
42003023	Jisos to nu diɛwɛ bilum mbaanshɛ le seke wvú to kɛwɛɛ lemme diew. Bonyii to kpwaake lɛ wvú nu waa Yosɛw wvù waa Ɛli.
42003024	Ɛli to nu waa Mata't, wvù waa Lɛwe, wvù to nu waa Nɛlki wvù waa Jannay, wvù to nu waa Yosɛw.
42003025	Yosɛw wvun to nu waa Matatia, wvù waa Amos, wvù to nu waa Na'um, wvù waa Ɛsli, wvù to nu waa Nagay.
42003026	Nagay to nu waa Maat wvù waa Matatia, wvù to nu waa Semein, wvù waa Yosek, wvù to nu waa Joda.
42003027	Joda to nu waa Joanan, wvù waa Lesa, wvù to nu waa Sɛlubabɛl, wvù waa Shiltia, wvù to nu waa Nɛli.
42003028	Nɛli to nu waa Nɛlki wvù waa Adi, wvù to nu waa Kosam, wvù waa Ɛlmadam, wvù to nu waa Ɛl.
42003029	Ɛl to nu waa Yoshua wvù waa Ɛliesa, wvù to nu waa Yolem wvù waa Mata't wvù to nu waa Lɛwe.
42003030	Lɛwe to nu waa Semeon wvù waa Juda, wvù to nu waa Yosɛw, wvù waa Yonam, wvù to nu waa Ɛliakim.
42003031	Ɛliakim to nu waa Mɛlia wvù waa Mena, wvù to nu waa Matata wvù waa Natan, wvù to nu waa Dawe.
42003032	Dawe to nu waa Jɛɛse, wvù waa Obɛd, wvù to nu waa Boas, wvù waa Sala wvù to nu waa Na'shon.
42003033	Na'shon to nu waa Aminada, wvù waa Admin, wvù to nu waa Alni, wvù waa Ɛslon, wvù to nu waa Bɛlɛs wvù waa Judas.
42003034	Juda to nu waa Yakow wvù waa Aysik, wvù to nu waa Abla'am, wvù waa Tɛla, wvù to nu waa Na'ol.
42003035	Na'ol to nu waa Sɛlug wvù waa Leu, wvù to nu waa Bɛlɛg wvù waa Ɛbɛ, wvù to nu waa Shɛla.
42003036	Shɛla to nu waa Kaynan wvù waa Alfasad, wvù to nu waa Shɛm wvù waa Noa', wvù to nu waa Lamek.
42003037	Lamek to nu waa Metusɛla wvù waa Ɛnok, wvù to nu waa Jalɛd wvù waa Ma'alalɛl, wvù to nu waa Kaynan.
42003038	Kaynan wvun to nu waa Ɛnosh wvù waa Sɛt wvù to nu waa Adam, ɛ Adam nu wvù Nyo' to bomɛɛ.
42004001	Jisos to nu ɛ nɛ fô Joo Joodan e, ɛ wvú ɛ yiŋsɛn bô Keyoy ke Yuule. Ɛ kí ge ɛ wvú nɛ gɛn no cee ŋkpwaante.
42004002	Ɛ wvú no nu jó yî ɛdiuw mbaanyɛ ɛ dɛwle momte wvú. Wvú to nu jó nonɛn yaa diekene kɛ. Ɛ ɛdiuw yodvu ke fey, ɛ jeŋ no yuu wvú.
42004003	Ɛ dɛwle mum to gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ́ wo fɛn nu Waa Nyo', ɛ́ wo gay ɛ tɛ din tu bvulɛm.”
42004004	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Fí nu ɛ bó ɛ saŋ lɛ, ‘Kɛ wee cee kɛ nje bvulɛm maaŋ kɛ.’”
42004005	Ɛ dɛwle jo wvú ben dvú bvudvuu bvumew e, duŋcɛ bitum bi yî ɛkolɛ ke nshɛ le bicii ɛ̂ wvú. Ɛ Jisos yɛn nɛn mwaŋŋ.
42004006	Ɛ dɛwle mum gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Bó nu ɛ nya wase ɛkolɛ ke nshɛ le kin ɛ̂ me kecii, ɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me nya ɛ̂ naa yɛɛ wvù me ŋkooŋke. Me nu nya ɛ́ wo esaake, kɛŋke bvukukɛ bô mvuŋgay mvudvu mvunciim.
42004007	Fí nu kɛ lɛ wo egbwe ɛ̂ me ɛjise ewvum me, ɛ́ me emum enya fiɛɛ ficii ɛ̂ wo.”
42004008	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Fí nu ɛ bó ɛ saŋ lɛ, ‘Ɛ̀ wvumtè Tata wvù Nyo' wo, elemtè kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvú le maaŋ.’”
42004009	Ɛ dɛwle mum jo wvú gɛn dvú ɛ̂ kelaante kè Jɛlusalɛm e, leke fô kegoy ke yew ncese le, gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ́ wo fɛn nu Waa Nyo', ɛ́ wo sele ɛkuse,
42004010	njefo fí nu ɛ bó ɛ saŋ lɛ, ‘Nyo' nu ke egay ɛ́ bonceendaa bew ecɛycɛy wo.’
42004011	Ɛ fí bvuu nu ɛ bó ɛ saŋ lɛ, ‘Bó nu ke eka wo fo wo ekfun ɛkalɛ yî tɛ le.’”
42004012	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ŋwa' Nyo' gayte tɛn lɛ, ‘Fo wo emomtè Tata wvù Nyo' wo kɛ.’”
42004013	Seke dɛwle to mɛsɛɛ wase jé yicii yì wvú to nulo emom Jisos jó, mum nɛ gɛn no cɛyte diuu dimew.
42004014	Jisos to nu ɛ nɛ tu jim Galilee, ɛ wvú ɛ yiŋsɛn bô mvuŋgay mvu Keyoy ke Yuule le. Ɛ saaka wvu ɛkumɛ wvú saaŋkɛn gɛn biba bi woŋ e bì jó le bicii.
42004015	Wvú to nu ɛ no yɛɛyi bonyii yéw bunle le, ɛ bonyii bocii bɛnsee wvú.
42004016	Ɛ Jisos ke mum nɛ gɛn ntɛw wvù Nasalɛt e jò wvú to kuɛ. Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu diuu dibole di mbam e, ɛ wvú gɛn yew bunle le kɛ no wvú to ké no gɛne. Ɛ wvú ke nɛ leem we keetaŋ Ŋwa' Nyo'.
42004017	Ɛ bó nya ŋwa' wvù Yɛsaya wvù wee ntum Nyo' to saŋɛɛ ɛ̂ wvú. Ɛ wvú fay taa bvudvuu bvumew bvù bó saŋɛɛ jó lɛ,
42004018	“Keyoy ke Tata Nyo' le nu yî yɛm e, njefo wvú nu ɛ yefe wase me lɛ me ento enfewcɛ saaka wvù jee ɛ̂ bonyii bo kefufe le. Wvú nu ɛ tum me lɛ me ento entefe ɛ̂ bonyii bò nu yî ncaw e lɛ bó nu ke ebvuse bó, embvuu entefe ɛ̂ binfefe lɛ bó nu ke eyene ɛjisɛ ɛbo. Wvú tum tɛn me lɛ me nto embvuse bonyii bò bó nyɛwle bô bó yî ncaw e,
42004019	embvuu enfewcɛ lɛ kelum kin, nu kè Tata Nyo' nu ke ebuw bonyii.”
42004020	No Jisos taŋ nɛn, kase kɛwe ŋwa' wvudvu nya ɛ̂ wee wvù to ké no gɛɛle mum shii fokuse. Ɛ bonyii bocii bò to nu yew bunle yidvu le luŋ ɛjisɛ yî ye le.
42004021	Ɛ wvú mum kɛw no nyɛyte ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Fiɛɛ fin fì ben yuw ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le nu ɛ fí to wase ɛ kocɛn ɛbɛn.”
42004022	Ɛ bonyii yekɛ ɛ fí joŋ bó le baay, ɛ bó kɛŋke ŋghaw yî njeme wvù jee wvù buyte diuw we le. Geenɛn, kaa nɛ no ghayte, biite lɛ, “Wvun nu kɛ waa Yosɛw nɛn e?”
42004023	Ɛ Jisos mum gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Kɛ ɛ̀ nu kemaŋɛn lɛ ben nu ema ŋgan ɛ̂ me lɛ, ‘Wee wvù fɛle bonyii, fɛlɛ ɛkolɛ kuw.’ Ben nu egay lɛ me eŋge tɛn mwɛɛm fɛn mvù ben se yuuke lɛ me ŋgee Kafana'um.”
42004024	Ɛ Jisos bvuu gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy lɛ, kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó ewvum wee ntum Nyo' woŋ we le kɛ.
42004025	Yî kecɛɛy e, ɛ́ me nsee ɛ̂ ben lɛ ɛ̀ to nu kefew ke wee ntum Nyo' wvù Ɛlayja le, jaŋ to nu ɛ mɛy we yî bilum e bitɛte bô kee soocaan, ɛ jeŋ koo woŋ tfuu. Bokɛ' bo boŋkfu le to nu woŋ wvù Islael e kefew kedvu le nteen.
42004026	Geenɛn, Nyo' to baa tum Ɛlayja fô mvu bó le kɛ, tum fiew ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô kpwɛɛ ŋkfu wvù to nu Salafat, woŋ wvù Sidon e.
42004027	Ben ekumyì tɛn lɛ, ɛ̀ to nu kefew ke wee ntum Nyo' wvù Ɛlisha le, ɛ bonyii nu Islael nteen kɛŋke ntun wvu baay, kɛ mvu bó le to nu ɛ bonɛn kɛ. Ɛ̀ to mɛy kɛ Naaman wvú ɛmbeŋ wvu woŋ wvù Silia le wvù bó to fɛlɛɛ.”
42004028	No Jisos jeme nonɛn, ɛ bonyii bocii bò to nu yew bunle le yuw, ɛ mvuntelem bɛnte lo bó.
42004029	Ɛ bó ja we, domtɛn wvú, buy dvú ɛlaante jodvu, ben buy yî diuw ŋkoŋ yì to nu yî kum ntɛw wvubole, njefo bó to gomte keedomse wvú ɛ́ wvú egbwe jó.
42004030	Geenɛn, ɛ wvú fey ɛ̂ bó ɛntelɛŋ no gɛne fiew.
42004031	Ɛ Jisos ke mum nɛ bow Kafana'um, ntɛw mvu wvu Galilee jodvu le. Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu diuu di mbam e, ɛ wvú gɛn no yɛɛyi bonyii yew bunle le.
42004032	Ɛ bonyii bodvu bocii no yuuke kɛŋke lo ŋghaw yî n'yɛɛyi we le, njefo n'yɛɛyi we to kɛŋke mvuŋgay.
42004033	Wee mvu to nu yew bunle yidvu le, ɛ keyoy kè yiile nu yî ye le. Ɛ wvú mum nɛ no wamte lɛ,
42004034	“Abaay Jisos wvu Nasalɛt, wo fii la ɛ̂ bese? Wo to keelɛse lo bese le? Me ŋkee naa wo. Ɛ̀ nu wo wvudvu wvù yuule wvù nɛ fô Nyo' le.”
42004035	Ɛ Jisos wam keyoy kè yiile kedvu, gay lɛ, “Baŋ lo, ebuy yî wee wvun e.” Ɛ kí mum shiŋɛn, bense wee wvudvu tum fokuse ɛ̂ bonyii ɛjise, mum buy yî ye le, geenɛn faŋɛ yaa lɛmse wvú kɛ.
42004036	Ɛ bonyii taa, ɛ diuw yum bó. Ɛ bó no ghayte, biite lɛ, “Wvun njeme nu wvù nɛɛ wvù wee wvun kɛŋke? Wvú kɛŋke mvuŋgay kane biyoy bì yiile e ɛ bí buyte yî bonyii le.”
42004037	Ɛ saaka wvu ɛkumɛ Jisos lɛn bontɛw bocii bo ɛ̂ keba ke jó le.
42004038	Ɛ Jisos buy yew bunle yidvu le, gɛn ley yew dvu Semon. Ɛ mwɛse Semon cɛmte bô ken'ya'. Ɛ bó lɛkɛ lɛ Jisos efi wvú.
42004039	Ɛ wvú gɛn fô wvú to jiime, leem ɛ̂ wvú ɛ̂ we, kan ken'ya' kedvu. Ɛ kí mum cinɛ wvú le ɛ wvú bonɛn. Kaŋ mwaaŋ, ɛ kpwoon wvudvu mum ja we taa fiɛɛ ɛ bó die.
42004040	Ɛ diuu ke dioo seeyi, ɛ bonyii bò to kɛŋke bonyii bò cɛmkene bô bincɛm jɛɛy jɛɛy mum no joo too dvú fô Jisos e. Ɛ wvú mum no kumte bó le bocii, ɛ bó bonene.
42004041	Bonceendaa bo dɛwle le tɛn to buyte yî bonyii bomew e nteen wamte lɛ, “Wo nu Waa Nyo'.” Geenɛn, ɛ Jisos kan lɛ fo bó ejemyi kɛ, njefo bó to kee Jisos lɛ ɛ̀ nu Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ.
42004042	Ɛ ɛkfuŋ ke buy yuu, ɛ Jisos buy gɛn bvudvuu bvumew e wvú ɛmbeŋ. Ɛ bonyii ke shɛɛ kɛw no gomte wvú. Ke dioo to yɛn wvú le, ɛ wvú gomte wase lɛ wen enɛ ntɛw wvudvu le. Ɛ bó mum no momte jé lɛ wvú emɛy bô bó.
42004043	Geenɛn, ɛ wvú tun gay lɛ, “Me ŋkɛŋke keenfewcɛ saaka wvù jee wvu ɛkumɛ bvunfon bvu Nyo' le bontɛw bomew e tɛn, njefo ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì Nyo' tum me lɛ me ento eŋge.”
42004044	Ɛ wvú mum nɛ gɛn no ghane fewci saaka wvudvu yéw bunle le, woŋ wvudvu le tfuu.
42005001	Ɛ̀ to nu diuu dimew, ɛ Jisos no leeme mbew Mamase yì Gɛnɛsalɛt e, ɛ bonyii ɛ gem wvú ɛ facɛ ɛ no yuuke diɛw Nyo'.
42005002	Ɛ wvú nɛ yɛn bikoŋ e bifɛɛ ŋgem joo le, ɛ bonyii bò to kɛŋke ɛ bucɛ wase jó ɛ no cuke binsaŋ bibole bi byé le.
42005003	Ɛ wvú gɛn ley ɛ̂ kemew e, ɛ ɛ̀ nu ke Semon e, gay lɛ wvú edomse ɛ́ kí eley egɛn ɛ̂ joo caan. Ɛ wvú domse, ɛ Jisos mum shii jó ɛ bonyii no nu ɛ̂ ŋkpwaante ɛ wvú yɛɛyi bó.
42005004	Ɛ wvú ke yɛɛyi mɛse, mum gay ɛ̂ Semon lɛ, “Keyɛ kekoŋ eley egɛn ɛ̂ joo fô shiiyine, ɛ́ ben etfume binsaŋ binɛn ekoo byé.”
42005005	Ɛ Semon tfuse lɛ, “Cee ɛkolɛ, bese se ce lo we tfumyi binsaŋ bvú ɛ yuu, ɛ faŋɛ yaa koo lo fiɛɛ kɛ. Geenɛn, no ɛ̀ gay wo, me nu entfume kɛ lo.”
42005006	Ɛ bó gɛn tfume, koo byé jó nteen, dioo bvuuse, ɛ binsaŋ no gomte keesemkɛn.
42005007	Nonɛn, ɛ bó lawcɛ bonyii bobole bo ŋgoo le ɛ̂ kekoŋ kemew e lɛ bó eto eficɛ bó. Ɛ bó to bvuse byé yidvu ɛ yí yiŋsɛn bikoŋ bibole, ɛ bí mum no gomte keeshiile ɛ̂ joo.
42005008	Ɛ Semon Bita yɛn fiɛɛ fì kooy le, mum gɛn tum ɛnvuw ɛ̂ Jisos ɛjise gay lɛ, “Kee wo Tata, nɛnɛ fiuw fɛn ecinɛ me le, me nu fiem wee wvù befe.”
42005009	Wvú to jeme nonɛn, njefo bô bonyii bew bo ŋgoo le to nu ɛ yɛn byé yì bó to koolɛɛ, ɛ ye bɛm bó.
42005010	Ɛ yí bɛm tɛn Jɛm bô Jon boom bo Sɛbɛdee le bò to nu tɛn ŋgoo Semon e. Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ Semon lɛ, “Fo wo efanè kɛ. Ɛ kɛw yî keseen e ɛ gɛn lo, wo nu ke ekoole wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu bonyii.”
42005011	No bó yuw nonɛn, mum bvuse bikoŋ bibole ɛ̂ ŋkpwaante, cinɛ mwɛɛm mvunciim e mum no bii Jisos e.
42005012	Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu kefew kemew e, ɛ Jisos nu ɛ̂ kelaante kemew e, ɛ wee mvu nu jó ɛ ntun wvu baay ɛ die wase lo wvú. Ɛ wee wvudvu yɛn Jisos e, to gbwe ɛ̂ wvú ɛjise, lɛkɛ wvú gay lɛ, “Tata, wo nulo efɛ me ɛ́ me en'yuule, ɛ́ wo fɛn kooŋke lo.”
42005013	Ɛ Jisos mum nɛke kebo kum wvú le gay lɛ, “Me ŋkooŋke lo, bonɛn lɛ eyuule.” Kaŋ mwaaŋ, ɛ ntun wvu baay wvudvu mum cinɛ wvú le.
42005014	Ɛ Jisos ciise lo ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ̀ yɛnè fo wo esee ɛ̂ wee. Geenɛn, gɛnɛ eduŋcɛ ɛkolɛ kuw ɛ̂ cee ncese, emum enya nnya yì Muses to gayɛɛ lɛ wee kɛŋke keenya keeduŋcɛ ɛ̂ bonyii lɛ wen nu ɛ bonɛn wase yî ntun wvun e ɛ no yuule.”
42005015	No Jisos ciisɛɛ ɛ̂ wee wvudvu nonɛn, ɛ saaka wvu ɛkumɛ Jisos kaa bvuu saaŋkɛn fey lo, ɛ bibombom bi bonyii le no baanci too keeyuuke n'yɛɛyi we, bô lɛ wvú efɛlè bincɛm bibole.
42005016	Geenɛn, ɛ́ Jisos ké ja cinɛ bó le gɛn no bunlee ŋkpwaante.
42005017	Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu diuu dimew ɛ Jisos yɛɛyi bonyii, ɛ mvuŋgay mvu Nyo' le nu yî ye le, ɛ wvú fɛle bincɛm. Ɛ Bofalasii noo bonyii bò to duŋci bonci bo Nyo' le ɛ shii fó, ɛ bó to buy bontɛw bocii bo Galilee le noo biba bi Judea bô Jɛlusalɛm e.
42005018	Ɛ fí kooy lɛ bonyii bomew to nu ɛ nɛ no too ɛ bó ɛ shfumɛ wee ɛ̂ fikɛɛy e, ɛ wvú ɛ kpwe wase keba kemwaaŋ. Bó to too keeley dvú yew ejike fwe dvu Jisos.
42005019	Geenɛn, faŋɛ yaa kɛŋkɛ je kɛ, njefo bonyii to faci baay. Ɛ bó mum ben ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ yew we, too keyɛy, shike wee wvudvu fwe dvu Jisos ɛ̂ fiɛɛ fì wvú to jiime jó le.
42005020	No Jisos to yɛnɛɛ lɛ bonyii bodvu nu ɛ lese mvuntelem mvubole yî ye le, ɛ wvú mum gay ɛ̂ wee wɛ lɛ, “Nsaa yɛm, me nu ɛ nlɛɛshɛ wase bibefɛ biuw.”
42005021	Ɛ bonyii bò to duŋci bonci bo Nyo' le bô bo ŋgoo Bofalasii le ba, mum kɛw no wvukene gayte lɛ, “Wvun sɛ nu yɛɛ wvù joo bvudvuu bvu Nyo' le? Ɛ̀ nu yɛɛ dvú wvù nulo elɛɛshɛ bibefɛ ɛfey Nyo' maaŋ?”
42005022	Ɛ Jisos kiɛɛ fiɛɛ fì bó wvukene, bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben sɛ kɛŋke kfuu ban boŋkpwawcɛ ɛ̂ mvuntelem mvunɛn e nɛn nje la?
42005023	Fi cekey nu fì la, keegay lɛ me nu ɛ nlɛɛshɛ wase bibefɛ bi wee wvun e, nuu lɛ wvú eja we elɛne lɛ?
42005024	Geenɛn, me nu enduŋcɛ ɛ̂ ben keseen lɛ wee wvù diee nu Waawee kɛŋke mvuŋgay fokuse fɛn keelɛɛshɛ bibefɛ.” Ɛ wvú mum gay ɛ̂ wee wvù to kpweɛ wase keba kemwaaŋ wɛ lɛ, “Ɛ̀ jemyi me ɛ̂ wo, ja we, ejo fikɛɛy fiuw egɛnè fô yew e.”
42005025	Kaŋ mwaaŋ, ɛ wvú mum ja we leem ɛ̂ bonyii ɛjise, mum jo fiɛɛ fì wvú to jiime yî dvú le no gɛne fô yew e fo wvú, tumte moŋkum mo Nyo' le.
42005026	Ɛ bonyii yɛn nonɛn, ɛ dew yum bó ɛ bó kɛŋkɛ ŋghaw, no tumte moŋkum mo Nyo' le gayte lɛ, “Bese nu ɛ yɛn biŋghaw bi mwɛɛm e ɛbɛn.”
42005027	Ɛ Jisos ke nɛ buy fó no ghane. Ɛ wvú dioo gɛne, yɛn wee mvu wvù to fii shile le ɛ bó teŋe lɛ Lɛwe, ɛ wvú ɛ shii fô bvudvuu bwew bvu lemme le. Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ̀ biì me le.”
42005028	Ɛ Lɛwe nɛ we, cinɛ fiɛɛ ficii le mum no bii Jisos e.
42005029	Nonɛn, ɛ Lɛwe ke mum ge ŋkaw wvu baay yew dvu wvú keekieekiee Jisos. Ɛ bonyii bò to fii shile ŋɛyte lo fó noo bonyii bomew ɛ bô bó diekene.
42005030	Ɛ Bofalasii noo bonyii bobole bo ŋgoo le bò to duŋci bonci bo Nyo' le kɛw no wvukene, bife ɛ̂ boom bo ŋgoo le bo Jisos e lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu nje la wvù ben diekene, wukene ben ɛ bonyii bò fii shile noo bò befe bomew.”
42005031	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Kɛ bonyii bò tɛmyi ké no gomte wee ɛfuwɛ kɛ. Ɛ̀ ké no gomte bonyii bò cɛmkene.
42005032	Kɛ me nto keetee bonyii bò nu teytey kɛ. Me nto keentee ɛ ɛ̀ nu bonyii bò befe lɛ bó ekumɛn mvuntelem mvubole.”
42005033	Ɛ bó ke nɛ ghay ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Boom bo ŋgoo le bo Jon e ké jaa no bamte mwɛɛm mvudien bvuu bunlee ɛfonɛfon, ɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ no bo Bofalasii le ké no gee, geenɛn ɛ buw nu kɛ fibole diekene lo wukene.”
42005034	Ɛ Jisos maw diɛw ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó ebe bonyii bô bvujen ɛ́ bó egɛn, ɛ́ wee ebvuu ege ɛ́ bó ebamte mwɛɛm mvudien ɛ cee bvujen nu bô bó?
42005035	Geenɛn, kefew nu ke eto kè bó nu ke eloo cee bvujen wvudvu ɛ̂ bó, ɛ́ bó emum ekɛw embamte mwɛɛm mvudien kefew kedvu le.”
42005036	Ɛ wvú bvuu ma ŋgan mvu ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Kɛ wee nu dvú wvù nulo esaa ndvu yi fiɛ etumcɛ yi yvum dvú kɛ. Ɛ́ wvú ge nonɛn, tu wvú ɛ befe wase bô ndvu yi fiɛ yidvu. Ɛ kɛ ɛ̀ cim nulo ɛ́ fincake fi fifɛ fidvu egɛn lɛŋlɛŋ bô ndvu yi yvum yidvu kɛ.
42005037	Kɛ ɛ̀ nulo tɛn ɛ́ wee ejo mbvuum mo monfɛm, egɛɛ ɛ̂ gham mbvuum e, ɛ wvù ɛ yvumɛn wase kɛ. Ɛ́ wvú ge nonɛn, ɛ́ mbvuum mo monfɛm modvu ke ekoo, esawyɛ gham wvu yvum wvudvu, ɛ́ mbvuum bô gham ela ɛcici.
42005038	Fi lɛŋ nu lɛ, bó kɛŋke keegɛɛ mbvuum mo monfɛm kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ gham wvu fwɛ le.
42005039	Ben kee tɛn lɛ kɛ wee nu dvú wvù ké no wuu mbvuum mò nu ɛ koo wase wvù nulo ebvuu ekooŋke mo monfɛm kɛ. Wvú ké no bɛnsee kɛ wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu mo koo wa ma.”
42006001	Ɛ̀ to nu diuu di mbam e dimew, ɛ Jisos bô boom bew bo ŋgoo le no lɛne fele wɛɛ ɛgiŋ wvumew e. Ɛ boom bew bo ŋgoo le nɛ kɛw no sumyi bicɛɛ diee.
42006002	Ɛ Bofalasii yɛn, bife lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu nje la wvù ben gee fiɛɛ fì nci baa bee lɛ wee ege diuu di mbam e?”
42006003	Ɛ Jisos bife tɛn ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Fí nu lɛ ben ke baa taŋ wase ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le no jeŋ to yuu Nfon Dawe bô ŋgoo ye ɛ wvú ge?
42006004	Wvú to nu ɛ ley yew Nyo' le jo blɛɛd wvù bó to geɛ ncese dvú fô Nyo' le, die bvuu nya tɛn ŋgoo ye dvú, ɛ ɛ̀ to nu nci fo wee edie blɛɛd wvudvu ɛfey bocee ncese.”
42006005	Ɛ Jisos mum mɛse gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Wee wvù diee nu Waawee nu Cee Ɛkolɛ wvu mbam.”
42006006	Ɛ ɛ̀ ke bvuu no nu diuu di mbam e dimew, ɛ Jisos gɛn ley yew bunle mi le no yɛɛyi bonyii. Ɛ wee mvu nu dvú ɛ kebo kew ke ɛcɛɛy ɛ kpwe wase.
42006007	Ɛ bonyii bò to duŋci bonci bo Nyo' le noo Bofalasii mum no gomte fiɛɛ fì bó etey yî Jisos e. Ɛ bó mum bon ɛjisɛ yî ye le no taale laa wvú nu efɛ wee diuu di mbam e lɛ.
42006008	Ɛ Jisos kiɛɛ fiɛɛ fì bó fiɛwsene bô fí, gay ɛ̂ wee wvù kebo to nu ɛ kpwe wɛ lɛ, “Ja we, eto eleem fɛn.” Ɛ wvú mum ja we leem.
42006009	Ɛ Jisos bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Me mbiite ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ ben, fiɛɛ fì nci nu ɛ bee lɛ wee ege diuu di mbam e nu fì la? Keege fiɛɛ fì jee, nuu fì befe lɛ? Keeboyse wee, nuu keeyu lo lɛ?”
42006010	Ɛ wvú taa bó ɛjise ɛjise kɛnɛn, mum gay ɛ̂ wee wɛ lɛ “Nɛke kebo kuw.” Ɛ wvú nɛke, ɛ kí mum bonɛn.
42006011	Geenɛn, ɛ fí kaa loocɛ ton'yɛ lo bonyii ba, ɛ bó mum kɛw no joo nsey no ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó ege bô Jisos.
42006012	Ɛ ɛ̀ no nu kɛ ɛdiuw yodvu le, ɛ Jisos nɛ ben yî kum e keegɛn bunle, ke ce bunlee Nyo' ɛntaŋ jocii.
42006013	Ɛ ɛkfuŋ buy yuu, ɛ wvú tee bonyii bò to bii wvú le, ɛ bó to. Ɛ wvú cawcɛ bomew yuufe ncow bofɛɛ tee bó lɛ boom bew bo ntum e.
42006014	Ɛdiee ɛ bonyii bodvu to nu: Semon, wvù wvú to nyaɛ diee diew dimew lɛ Bita, bô Andulu wvù waa bwee Semon wvudvu. Ɛ bomew nu Jɛm, Jon, Filew, Batolomu,
42006015	Matio, Toma noo Jɛm wvù waa Alfiyus, Semon wvù to nu wee ŋgoo Bosɛlot,
42006016	Judas wvù waa Jɛm noo Judas Iskaliot wvù to ghanɛɛ gese Jisos.
42006017	No wvú cawɛɛ bó nonɛn, ɛ bô bó bocii mum nɛ no booke. Ke bow, ɛ wvú leem yî bale le, ɛ bonyii bew bo ŋgoo le to nu wase fó nteen noo kebombom ke bonyii le ɛ kí ta lo ye fó kè nɛn'yɛɛ Judea bô Jɛlusalɛm. Bomew bonyii to nɛn'yi mondvuum mo mbew joo yi baay e kɛ diewɛ Taya bô Sidon e.
42006018	Bó to to keeyuw n'yɛɛyi wvu Jisos, ɛ́ wvú ebvuu efɛ bincɛm bibole. Bonyii bò biyoy bì yiile to jewsee bó to too tɛn ɛ wvú bvuuse biyoy bidvu.
42006019	Ɛ bonyii bocii mum no momte keekum wvú le, njefo mvuŋgay mvù to buyte yî ye le to fɛle bonyii bocii bò to kumte wvú le.
42006020	Ɛ Jisos ke nɛ taa bonyii bew bo ŋgoo le, gay lɛ, “Njoŋ wvu baay nu wene, ben bò fuute, njefo bvunfon bvu Nyo' le nu fô ben e.
42006021	Njoŋ wvu baay nu wene, ben bò beele jeŋ keseen, njefo Nyo' nu ke ege ɛ́ ben effuu. Njoŋ wvu baay nu wene, ben bò beele keseen, njefo ben nu ke ekpwaake dikie.
42006022	Njoŋ wvu baay nu wene, seke ben bii wee wvù diee nu Waawee le, ɛ bonyii bane ben, kuuŋke ben, nan'yi ben bvuu nyaa ben ɛdiee yò befe.
42006023	Fí ke dioo kooyi nonɛn, ɛ ben no laŋlaŋè, binè, yuukè njoŋ, njefo mmawcɛ wene wvù kuuke nu woŋ wvu we le. Ben ekeè lɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ no bo'icee cee bonyii boba to nyɛwle bô bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le bo fwele.
42006024	Geenɛn, ŋgɛw wvu baay nu wene, ben bonyii bo bvukukɛ le, njefo kensamɛn kenɛn ka kɛ wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu fɛn.
42006025	Ŋgɛw wvu baay nu wene, ben bò ɛtew nu ɛ yiŋsɛn keseen, njefo ben nu ke ebeele jeŋ. Ŋgɛw wvu baay nu wene, ben bò kieele keseen, njefo ben nu ke ebeele soo bikuu.
42006026	Ŋgɛw wvu baay nu wene, seke bonyii bocii bɛnsee ben. Ben ekeè lɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ no bo'icee cee bonyii boba to bɛnsee bonyii bo mbiay e bò to mbiayte lɛ bó nu bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le.
42006027	Geenɛn me ɛ no ŋgayte ɛ̂ ben ban bò yuuke fiɛɛ fì me njemyi le, lɛ ben ekooŋkè bonyii bonɛn bo bvuban e, egeè ɛ ɛ̀ nu mwɛɛm mvù jee fô bonyii bò bone bikaa ɛ̂ ben ɛjim e.
42006028	Ben elɛkè lɛ Nyo' elaŋ ɛ ɛ̀ nu kembonɛn yî bonyii bò bunlee lɛ lon eto fô ben e, ebvuu ebunleè fô bonyii bò nvuwse ben e.
42006029	Ɛ́ wee suŋ wo yî kediɛw e, ɛ́ wo baŋke kemew ɛ wvú mɛse suŋ. Wee ɛ́ baa kekum kuw ke ɛkfuŋ, ɛ́ wo cinɛ ɛ wvú jo ke ɛnte fó.
42006030	Ɛ́ wee lɛke fiɛɛ ɛ̂ wo, ɛ́ wo nya. Wee ɛ́ cim ɛ jo lo mwɛɛm mvuw, fo wo ebvuu eshe ebiite kɛ.
42006031	Naa la fì ben shieele lɛ bonyii egeè fô ben e, enù fí fì ben egeè tɛn fô bó le.
42006032	Ɛ́ ben kooŋke kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu bonyii bò kooŋke ben, ɛ́ fiɛɛ fì bó ebɛnsee ben yî dvú le enu la? Kɛ bonyii bò befe gee kɛ nonɛn e? Bó kooŋke kɛ tɛn ɛ ɛ̀ nu bonyii bò kooŋke bó.
42006033	Ɛ́ ben gee mwɛɛm mvù jee ɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ fô bonyii bò gee tɛn fô ben e, ɛ́ fiɛɛ fì bó ebɛnsee ben yî dvú le enu la? Kɛ bonyii bò befe gee kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ e?
42006034	Ɛ́ ben foose bonyii bô mwɛɛm ɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ ɛ̂ bò ben taale lɛ bó nulo ekase etfuse, ɛ́ fiɛɛ fì bó ebɛnsee ben yî dvú le enu la? Kɛ bonyii bò befe ké no foose kɛ mwɛɛm ɛ̂ nsáa yibo njefo bó kee lɛ bó nu ke ekase etfuse fiɛɛ ficii le?
42006035	Fí nu lɛŋ lɛ ben ekooŋkè bonyii bonɛn bo bvuban e, egeè ɛ ɛ̀ nu mwɛɛm mvù jee fô bó le, efoosè bonyii bô mwɛɛm yaa taale lɛ bó ke ekase etfuse kɛ. Nonɛn, ɛ́ ben ke emum ekɛŋkɛ nlawma wvù kuuke ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ Nyo' wvù nu Ɛkolɛ ke Mwɛɛm Mvunciim e, ebvuu enu boom bew, njefo ɛ̀ nu kɛ tɛn no Nyo' gee mwɛɛm mvù jee fô bonyii bocii bò yɛɛle ɛjisɛ noo bò mvuntelem yiile le.
42006036	Ben ecamtè shen fô bonyii le kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no Icee wene camte.
42006037	Fo ben elomtè gee di bonyii bomew e, nonɛn Nyo' saa ke elom tɛn dinɛn kɛ. Fo ben ebonè bikaa ɛ̂ bonyii ɛjim lɛ bó eley ŋgɛw e, nonɛn Nyo' saa ke ebon tɛn ɛ̂ ben ɛjim kɛ. Ben elɛɛshì bibefɛ bi bonyii bomew e, ɛ́ Nyo' ke elɛɛshɛ tɛn binɛn.
42006038	Ben enyaà nnya ɛ̂ bonyii ɛ́ Nyo' ke enya tɛn ɛ̂ ben. Wvú nu ke edioo enyaa eloocɛ efew ntay, eshiwsɛ, ecincɛ ɛ́ fí eyiŋsɛn efuci fokuse. Fiɛɛ fì wee feeke fiɛɛ jó sɛ nyaa ɛ̂ wee, ɛ̀ nu kɛ fí fì Nyo' nu ke efew jó sɛ nya ɛ̂ mwɛtɛn.”
42006039	Ɛ Jisos bvuu ma ŋgan mvu ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Kɛ kenfefe nulo eduŋci je ɛ̂ kemew kɛ. Ɛ́ wvú mom lo, bó saa gbwekɛn ɛ̂ kentuke le bocii le?
42006040	Ben ekee lɛ kɛ waa ŋwa' ké no fele wee wvù yɛɛyi wvú kɛ, geenɛn, ɛ ɛ̀ nu seke wvú ɛ yɛɛyi wase ɛ mɛse, ɛ́ wvú ekee kɛ diɛwɛ wee wvù yɛɛyi wvú le.
42006041	Ɛ̀ nu nje la wvù wo ké no taale ɛ ɛ̀ nu sheshe yì nu ɛ̂ waa bwoo jise, geenɛn yaa yɛne kekew kè nu ɛ̂ diuw jise le kɛ?
42006042	Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wo eghan nɛɛ sɛ no gayte ɛ̂ waa bwoo lɛ, ‘Waa bwɛɛm, kɛ leem ɛ́ me embvuse sheshe ɛ̂ wo jise,’ geenɛn yaa yɛne kɛ kekew kè nu ɛ̂ diuw jise le? Wo nu wee kenduŋcɛ ye! Yawɛ ebvuse kekew kè nu ɛ̂ diuw jise le sɛ loocɛ eyɛn sheshe yì nu ɛ̂ jise di waa bwoo le, emum ebvuse.”
42006043	Ɛ Jisos bvuu gay lɛ, “Kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ kete kè jee eyum mvuntam mvù befe kɛ. Ɛ kɛ ɛ̀ nulo tɛn ɛ́ kete kè befe eyum mvuntam mvù jee kɛ.
42006044	Bó ké kiɛɛ kete ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî mvuntam mvù yumte yî dvú le. Kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wee ekoy fimbi yî bisafe le kɛ, ɛ kɛ ɛ̀ nulo tɛn ɛ́ wee ekoy yoŋ yî ɛwantɛ le kɛ.
42006045	Wee dioo nu wee wvù kɛŋke ntfu mwɛɛm mvù jee ɛ̂ fitele fiew e, ɛ wvú mum no bvuuse ɛ ɛ̀ nu mwɛɛm mvù jee. Ɛ́ dioo nu wee wvù we ntfu nu mwɛɛm mvù befe ɛ̂ fitele fiew e, ɛ́ wvú no bvuuse kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu mwɛɛm mvù befe. Fí nu nonɛn njefo fiɛɛ fì nu ɛ yiŋsɛn fô fitele fi wee le nu kɛ fí fì ké no buyte diuw we le.”
42006046	Ɛ Jisos mum bife lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu nje la wvù ben teŋe me lɛ, ‘Tata, Tata’, yaa gee fiɛɛ fì me ŋgayte kɛ?
42006047	Wee wvù too, eyuw n'yɛɛyi mum gɛn no gee no wvú gayte, nu ɛ me nu enduŋcɛ ɛ̂ ben keseen no wvuwɛ wee nu.
42006048	Wvú nu kɛ diɛwɛ wee wvù to nu keebom yew, yaw cim shii, gɛn kum kembaan e sɛ lese kenffuy, mum bom. Ɛ joo ke yiŋsɛn, buy to kfun yew yidvu, ɛ yí faŋɛ yaa shiw kɛ, njefo wvú to nu ɛ loocɛ bom ntay.
42006049	Geenɛn, wee wvù too, yuw n'yɛɛyi dioo gɛn faŋɛ yaa egee no wvú gayte, nu kɛ diɛwɛ wee wvù to nu keebom yew, taashɛ lo bvudvuu mum bom sɛ kenffuy. Ɛ joo ke buy to kfun yew yidvu, kaŋ mwaaŋ ɛ yí shii nɛn wuuu, tawse lo.”
42007001	No Jisos to mɛsɛɛ wase yɛɛyi bonyii bô mwɛɛm mvun mvunciim, mum nɛ gɛn ɛ̂ kelaante kè Kafana'um e.
42007002	Ɛ ɛkolɛ ke ŋgoo mi bonyii bo nci le bo Lum nu jó kɛŋke nfwa we mvu, kooŋke wvú baay. Ɛ nfwa wvudvu cɛmte nu wase diuw kpwe le.
42007003	Ɛ ɛkolɛ kedvu dioo yuw ɛkumɛ Jisos, mum cooŋkɛn bonyii bò saake woŋ Bojuu tum lɛ bó egɛn elɛkɛ Jisos lɛ wvú eto efɛ nfwa wen.
42007004	Ɛ bó mum gɛn yɛn Jisos e ku can ɛ̂ wvú gay lɛ, “Kee wo gɛnɛ kɛ efi wee wese wvun, ɛ̀ nu wee wvù ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wo efi wvú.
42007005	Wvú kooŋke woŋ wesebeene baay, ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù to bomɛɛ yew yese bunle.”
42007006	Ɛ Jisos mum nɛ ɛ bô bó no gɛne. Ɛ bó ke dioo feŋene wase yew cee ɛkolɛ ke bonyii bo nci le, ɛ wvú tum nsáa ye yimew lɛ yí egɛn eci Jisos. Ɛ yí gɛn, ɛ bô bó tasɛn, ɛ yí tefe ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Tata, ɛkolɛ ke bonyii bo nci le gayte lɛ fo wo eshe yɛnè ŋgɛw too kɛ. Lɛ wen baa kocɛn wee wvù ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wo eley ɛ̂ wvú yew e kɛ.
42007007	Ɛ ɛ̀ nu lɛ fiɛɛ fì be ge tɛn lɛ fo wen eto bô bikaa biwene eyɛn wo le. Geenɛn, lɛ wo ebvuse kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu diɛw diuw wo le ɛ́ nfwa wen emum ebonɛn.
42007008	Lɛ wen tɛn nu wee ɛ̂ mvuŋgay mvu wee mvu le ɛkuse, ɛ bonyii bo nci le nu tɛn ɛ̂ wen ɛkuse. Ɛ́ wen ké egay ɛ̂ mvu lɛ, ‘Ɛ̀ gɛnè,’ ɛ́ wvú no gɛne lo, ké egay ɛ̂ mvu lɛ, ‘To,’ ɛ́ wvú no too lo. Ɛ́ wen ké egay tɛn ɛ̂ nfwa wen lɛ, ‘Geɛ nɛn,’ ɛ́ wvú no gee lo.”
42007009	Ɛ Jisos yuw ntum wvudvu nonɛn, ɛ diuw yum lo wvú, ɛ wvú baŋke ye gay ɛ̂ kebombom ke bonyii le kè to bii wvú le lɛ, “Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben lɛ me mbaa n'yɛn wase wee le kɛ naa Islael ɛ wvú ɛ lese kfuu fin fitele yî yɛm e nɛn kɛ.”
42007010	Ɛ bonyii ba bò cee ɛkolɛ ke bonyii bo nci le to tumɛɛ dioo kase tu yew, yɛn ɛ nfwa wvudvu ɛ bonɛn wase.
42007011	Ɛjim jodvu, ɛ Jisos bô boom bew bo ŋgoo le nɛ no gɛne ntɛw mvu le ɛ bó teŋe lɛ Nayin, ɛ kebombom ke bonyii le shfumte ɛ̂ wvú ɛjim.
42007012	No bó to gɛne, dioo buy diuw ketaaŋ wvù to leyte ntɛw wvudvu le, yɛn ɛ bó ɛ tuu gvune di wee le ɛ no buyte dvú. Wee wvudvu to ka kɛ wvú can bwee le. Ɛ bwee to nu kpwɛɛ ŋkfu. Ɛ bó to buyte dvú nonɛn, ɛ kebombom ke bonyii bo ntɛw wvudvu le shfumte bii bwee wan e.
42007013	Ɛ Tata dioo yɛn kpwoon wvudvu le, ɛ shen koo wvú, ɛ wvú gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Fo wo ebvuu bee kɛ.”
42007014	No wvú gay nonɛn, mum fey gɛn kum fikɛɛy fì bó to tulɛɛ gvune didvu jó. Ɛ bonyii bò to tulɛɛ mum leem. Ɛ wvú gay lɛ, “Cuwee, me njemyi ɛ̂ wo, nɛnɛ we!”
42007015	Ɛ wvú mum nɛ we shii, kɛw no jemyi. Ɛ Jisos jicɛ wvú le mum nya ɛ̂ bwee.
42007016	Ɛ bonyii bocii yɛn nonɛn, ɛ diuw yum bó. Ɛ bó no tumte moŋkum mo Nyo' le gayte lɛ, “Wee ntum Nyo' wvu baay nu ɛ buynɛn ɛ̂ beene ɛntelɛŋ. Nyo' nu ɛ to wase keefi bonyii bew.”
42007017	Ɛ saaka wvun wvu ɛkumɛ Jisos saaŋkɛn gɛn woŋ wvù Judea le tfuu noo bitum bi mbew jó le.
42007018	Ɛ boom bo ŋgoo le bo Jon e yuw tɛn mwɛɛm mvun mvunciim, gɛn see ɛ̂ wvú. Ɛ wvú tee bomew bofɛɛ,
42007019	tum fô Jisos e lɛ bó egɛn ebife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ laa ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù to nu keeke eto, nuu bó ecɛytè wee mvu lɛ.
42007020	Ɛ bó gɛn yɛn Jisos e, gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Jon Nleseɛjoo nu ɛ tum bese keebife ɛ̂ wo lɛ laa ɛ̀ nu wo wvù to nu keeke eto, nuu bó ecɛytè wee mvu lɛ?”
42007021	Bó to biite nonɛn, ɛ Jisos nu sekedvu fɛle bincɛm bô bontun, bvuu bvuuse biyoy bì befe yî bonyii le, yen'yi ɛjisɛ ɛ binfefe nteen.
42007022	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben ekase egɛn esee ɛ̂ Jon mwɛɛm mvù ben yɛn noo mvù ben yuw e. Binfefe yɛne wase mwɛɛm e, ɛ bontɛŋɛ lɛne teytey, ɛ bonyii bò cɛmkene bô ntun wvu baay bonene. Bincife yuuke wase mwɛɛm, ɛ bonyii bò kpwekɛn kaase tuu dvú, ɛ bó bvuu fewci tɛn saaka wvù jee wvù wvu Nyo' ɛ̂ bonyii bo kefufe le.
42007023	Njoŋ wvu baay nu wvu wee wvù baa maŋene me kɛ.”
42007024	Ɛ bonyii bò Jon to tumɛɛ ba ke nɛ, ɛ Jisos mum kɛw no jemyi ɛ̂ kebombom ke bonyii le ɛkumɛ Jon biite lɛ, “Ben se shee buyte gɛne ŋkpwaante keegɛn eyɛn ɛ ɛ̀ nu la le? Gayi dì fwefwe fele shiike?
42007025	No ɛ̀ baa nu nonɛn, tu ben se buyte gɛne yɛne ɛ ɛ̀ nu la le? Wee ɛ wvú ɛ sufe ye bô ndvú yì bonene? Ben eyekɛ eyuw, bonyii bò suute ye bô ndvú yì lumte bvuu diee bikuu bibole ké no nu ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ bontow e.
42007026	Ben ɛ se ɛ no gɛne nonɛn keeyɛn ɛ ɛ̀ nu la le? Wee ntum Nyo' nuu? 'Ɛɛ, tu ben se nu ɛ yɛn. Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben lɛ, wvú fele wee ntum Nyo'.
42007027	Ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù bó saŋɛɛ ɛkumɛ wvú ɛ Nyo' gayte lɛ, ‘Yekɛ eyuw, me nu ŋke enciinse wee wɛm ntum ɛ́ wvú esa fwe dvu wo, wvù nu egɛn eseyse je yo ɛ́ wo sɛ no too.’
42007028	Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben lɛ, ɛnte jo bonyii bò nu ɛ no nu wase yî ɛkolɛ ke nshɛ le ɛ to ɛ buy keseen e, nu ɛ kɛ wee nu dvú wvù kuuke fele Jon kɛ. Geenɛn, ɛ wee wvù nu naa wee wvu caan ɛnte jo bvunfon bvu Nyo' le nu ɛ wvú kuuke fele wvú.”
42007029	Ɛ bonyii bocii naa noo bonyii bò to fii shile yuw no Jisos jemyi lɛ Jon to nu wee ntum Nyo' bɛnse lɛ bvunfon bvu Nyo' le nu bvu teytey, njefo bó tɛn to nu ɛ bee ɛ Jon lese bó ɛ̂ joo.
42007030	Geenɛn, ɛ Bofalasii noo bonyii bò to looci kee bonci bo Nyo' le tun fibole ntaŋ wvù Nyo' to too dvú njefo bó to nu ɛ faŋ fo Jon lese bó tɛn ɛ̂ joo.
42007031	Ɛ Jisos nɛ ghay lɛ, “Fiɛɛ fì ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me nfewsɛn ɛŋgokɛ ke bonyii bo keseen e dvú nu la? Bó nu kɛ diɛwɛ la?
42007032	Me nu nsee ɛ̂ ben fiɛɛ fì bó nu diɛwɛ fí. Bó nu kɛ diɛwɛ boom bo caan caan bò nu ɛ shiiyɛn mondvuum mo way e, ɛ bomew teŋe bomew biite lɛ, ‘Bese tooŋke ndoŋ sɛ ben bine lo le? Nyaa ŋkiee kpwe sɛ ben beŋe lo le?’
42007033	Ɛ̀ nu kɛ no Jon Nleseɛjoo se toɛ, shee jeŋ yaa wuu kɛ tɛn mbvuum, ben lɛ wvú kɛŋke nceendaa dɛwle yî ye le.
42007034	Wee wvù diee nu Waawee ɛ dioo to, diekene bvuu wukene, ben lɛ bó etaa eyɛn, wvú ghane wuwte mwɛɛm mvudien wuwte mbvuum, bvuu nu nsaa bonyii bò fii shile noo bonyii bò befe bomew.
42007035	Geenɛn, bonyii bocii bò bɛnse bvufee bvù ɛ̀ nu bvu Nyo' le duŋci lɛ ɛ̀ nu bvu lɛŋ.”
42007036	Ɛ wee Falasii mvu ke nɛ tee Jisos lɛ wvú eto ediekɛn ɛ̂ wen yew. Ɛ Jisos bee gɛn ɛ bó no diekene.
42007037	Ɛ kpwoon nsake mvu to nu ntɛw wvudvu le. Ɛ wvú yuw lɛ Jisos diekene ɛ̂ wee Falasii wvudvu yew, mum jo fikaa fi nfiey mvu wvù shfuuŋkene le, gɛn dvú fó.
42007038	Ɛ wvú gɛn ley leem mbew Jisos e, nɛ kɛw no beele, ɛ misɛm cemceme yî bikaa bi Jisos e. Ɛ wvú mum ŋgvuwcɛ, ŋgvuse ɛkolɛ kew no shole bikaa bi Jisos e bô yvuw ɛkolɛ, ŋoci mum yeefe bô nfiey wɛ.
42007039	Ɛ wee Falasii wɛ wvù to teŋɛɛ Jisos lɛ wvú eto ediekɛn yɛn nonɛn, kpwawcɛ fô fitele fiew e lɛ, “Ɛ́ wee wvun fɛn be nu wee ntum Nyo', tu wvú be ɛ kiɛɛ fiɛɛ fì ɛ̀ nu kpwoon wvun wvù kumte wvú le, lɛ ɛ̀ nu kpwoon nsake.”
42007040	Ɛ Jisos nɛ gay ɛ̂ wee Falasii wvudvu lɛ, “Semon, me ŋkɛŋke fiɛɛ keenjeme ɛ̂ wo.” Ɛ wvú tfuse lɛ, “Wee n'yɛɛyi, jeme.”
42007041	Ɛ Jisos mum kɛw lɛ, “Wee mvu to nu ɛ foose bonyii bofɛɛ bô bigew, foose wee mvu bô bodanali gee tin, foose mvu bodanali mbaanshen.
42007042	Ɛ fí ke ghaw bó bocii keekase elaw, ɛ wvú mum cinɛ bigew bidvu le ɛ̂ bó. Keseen, wo yɛne lɛ ɛnte jo bonyii bo bofɛɛ ban, wee wvù nulo ekooŋke wvú baay nu wvù la?”
42007043	Ɛ Semon tfuse lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nulo enu wee wvù bó to cin'yɛɛ fioo ye le ɛ yí duule.” Ɛ Jisos bee lɛ, “Wo nu ɛ jeme lɛŋ.”
42007044	No wvú beŋe nonɛn, baŋke ye taa kpwoon wɛ, mum gay ɛ̂ Semon lɛ, “Wo nu ɛ yɛn kpwoon wvun e? No me mbe nto ɛ̂ wo yew, wo be baa cim nya me joo ncukɛ bikaa kɛ. Geenɛn, kpwoon wvun nu ɛ cukɛ wase bikaa biem ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô misɛm, ɛ sho bô yvuw ye ɛkolɛ.
42007045	Wo be baa gay me le ŋocɛ kɛ. Geenɛn, ɛ kɛw no me mbe nto fɛn, nu kɛ no kpwoon wvun ŋoci bikaa biem.
42007046	Ɛ wo be baa cim yefe ɛkolɛ kem kɛ naa bô mɛɛm kɛ. Geenɛn, kpwoon wvun nu ɛ yefe wase bikaa biem ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô nfiey wvù shfuuŋkene.
42007047	Nonɛn, ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ wo lɛ, kpwoon wvun nu ɛ duŋcɛ keŋkoŋɛn ke baay njefo bó nu ɛ lɛɛshɛ wase bibefɛ biew bì duule baay. Geenɛn, ɛ wee wvù bó lɛɛshi bibefɛ biew ɛ bí nu caan duŋci keŋkoŋɛn ke caan.”
42007048	Ɛ Jisos mum gay ɛ̂ kpwoon wɛ lɛ, “Bó nu ɛ lɛɛshɛ wase bibefɛ biuw.”
42007049	Ɛ bonyii bò bô bó to diekene mum kɛw no diomene gayte lɛ, “Ɛ̀ sɛ nu yɛɛ wvun wvù mum lɛɛshi lo bibefɛ bi bonyii le?”
42007050	Ɛ Jisos mum mɛse gay ɛ̂ kpwoon wvudvu lɛ, “Ɛ̀ gɛnè fiuw ntay, fitele fì wo lese yî yɛm e nu ɛ ge wase wo ɛ boy.”
42008001	Ɛjim jodvu, ɛ Jisos nɛ no ghane ɛ̂ bilaante bô ɛ̂ bontɛw e fewci saaka wvù jee wvu ɛkumɛ bvunfon bvu Nyo' le. Boom bew bo ŋgoo le bo yuufe ncow bofɛɛ to bii wvú le,
42008002	noo bokɛnɛ bomew bò wvú to fɛlɛɛ bontun bobole bô bomew bò wvú to bvusɛɛ biyoy bì befe yî bó le. Bokɛnɛ ban to nu Maalia wvù bó to teŋe tɛn lɛ Magdalen, wvù wvú to bvusɛɛ bonceendaa bo dɛwle le yî ye le bosooshwiy.
42008003	Ɛ ɛ̀ nu Joana wvù dweese to nu Cusa lemte 'Ɛlod e, noo Susana bô bokɛnɛ bomew nteen. Bó to ghane nonɛn, bvuuse mwɛɛm ɛ̂ bikele bibole, fici Jisos bô boom bew bo ŋgoo le dvú.
42008004	Ɛ bonyii ke nɛ bontɛw e bontɛw e no too fô Jisos e. Ɛ kebombom ke bonyii le ke yiŋsɛn fó, ɛ wvú ma ŋgan ɛ̂ bó lɛ,
42008005	“Wee to nu ɛ laa keegɛn etfume ŋgow. Ɛ wvú ke dioo etfumyi, ɛ yimi gbwekɛn ɛ̂ je, ɛ bonyii lɛɛncɛ bô bikaa, ɛ mvunyiim mvù bile we to tacɛ die.
42008006	Ɛ yimi gbwe fô bvudvuu bvu ɛta le, ke buy mum yowlɛn njefo bvudvuu bvudvu to nu bvuyeem.
42008007	Ɛ yimi ŋgow gbwekɛn ɛ̂ bisafe le, ke buy dioo kuu bô bisafe bidvu, ɛ bí mum baŋ ŋgow yidvu fo yí eku.
42008008	Ɛ yimi gbwekɛn ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî nshɛ yì jee le, ke buy, ku, ɛ bó ke gbwele ɛ yí buy bokaŋ gbwee fey no bó to tfumyɛɛ.” No Jisos ma nɛn, mum fuŋ lɛ, “Wee wvù kɛŋke bitem, ɛ wvú yuw.”
42008009	Ɛ boom bew bo ŋgoo le ke nɛ bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ laa ŋgan wvudvu duŋci lɛ la lɛ?
42008010	Ɛ wvú tfuse lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu ben ban bò Nyo' nu ɛ ge wase lɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ ben ekiɛɛ mwɛɛm mvu bvunfon bwew e mvù nu ɛ̂ nnyilɛ le. Geenɛn, ɛ bonyii bomew yuuke fibole kɛ lɛ me maa ɛ ɛ̀ nu boŋgan, wvu lɛ fí enù no fí to nu wase lɛ, ‘Bó nu ke etaale kɛ lo mwɛɛm yaa yɛne kɛ, ke eyeke kɛ lo yaa yuuke fiɛɛ kɛ.’
42008011	Ben eyuw lɛ fiɛɛ fì ŋgan wvudvu duŋci. Ŋgow yidvu nu diɛw Nyo'.
42008012	Ŋgow yì gbweɛ ɛ̂ je, nu bonyii bò yuuke diɛw Nyo' ɛ dɛwle mum to bvuse saaka wvudvu fô mvuntelem mvubole, wvu lɛ fo bó ebee ke eboy.
42008013	Ɛ ŋgow yì gbweɛ fô bvudvuu bvu ɛta le nu bonyii bò yuuke diɛw Nyo', mum fiisɛn bô njoŋ, geenɛn ɛ yí baa cime gɛŋ fô mvuntelem mvubole kɛ, ɛ bó beŋe kɛ fomvu fomvu. Ɛ́ mmom ke dioo ɛ to, ɛ bó mum tfuw bikaa.
42008014	Ŋgow yì gbweɛ ɛ̂ bisafe le nu bonyii bò yuuke diɛw Nyo', dioo gɛne, ɛ ken'yaŋyaŋ bô bvukukɛ noo njoŋ mwɛɛm mvu yî nshɛ le to yikɛ diɛw yidvu ɛ yí laayɛ lo saa ku kɛ.
42008015	Ŋgow yì gbweɛ yî nshɛ yì jee le, ɛ mum ɛ no nu bonyii bò kɛŋke mvuntelem mvù jee, bò yuuke diɛw Nyo', loocɛ lese mvuntelem yî dvú le, mum kuu shém, no gee no yí gomte gɛne lo fwe fwe.
42008016	Kɛ wee ké tfuuke ken'yeese bvuu jo ŋkaa kfukɛ dvú kɛ. Ɛ kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wvú elese tɛn ɛgaaku kɛ. Wvú ké tfuuke, tome ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî fiɛɛ fì bó tomyi ken'yeese yî dvú le, lɛ bonyii dioo leyte yew eyɛne n'yuu le.
42008017	Fiɛɛ ficii fì nu ɛ̂ nnyilɛ le nu ke eyenɛ, ɛ́ mwɛɛm mvu ɛjim ɛjim ebuy ɛmwa.
42008018	Nonɛn, ben dioo yeke diɛw Nyo' no yeke ntay, ekeè lɛ wee wvù kɛŋke fiɛɛ nu ɛ bó nu ke ebise. Ɛ wee wvù yaa kɛŋke kɛ fiɛɛ nu ɛ naa fi caan fì wvú kpwaake lɛ wen kɛŋke lo nu ɛ bó nu ke efi lo ɛ̂ wvú.”
42008019	No Jisos to yɛɛyi bonyii nonɛn, ɛ bwee Jisos bô boom bo bwee Jisos e nɛ to lɛ bó eyɛn wvú le. Ɛ fí ghaw keeley njefo bonyii to duule dvú baay.
42008020	Ɛ wee gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ “Bwoo bô boom bo bwoo le leeme ɛkfuŋ gomte keeyɛn wo le.”
42008021	Ɛ wvú tfuse fiew lɛ, “Bwɛɛm bô boom bo bwɛɛm e nu bonyii bò yuuke diɛw Nyo' gee no yí gomte.”
42008022	Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu diuu dimew, ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ boom bew bo ŋgoo le lɛ, “Beene elente mamase egɛn kewvu keki.” Ɛ bó mum ley ɛ̂ kekoŋ e no leenci.
42008023	No bó to leenci, ɛ Jisos nɛ no leete. Ɛ nffum nɛ sɛsɛ, shii no bvuyte joo bô mvuŋgay ɛ yí leyte ɛ̂ kekoŋ e gomte keeyiŋsɛn, ɛ bó nu wa lo diuw kpwe le.
42008024	Ɛ bó gɛn no kamsee Jisos gayte lɛ, “Cee ɛkolɛ, Cee ɛkolɛ, beene nu ekpwekɛn.” Ɛ Jisos kamse wam nffum bô joo yì to bvuyte yidvu. Ɛ nffum wvudvu lu, ɛ joo mum cife nɛn ndvumm.
42008025	Ɛ wvú bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben sɛ lese fitele ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî yɛɛ le?” Ɛ ye bɛm bó, ɛ bó kɛŋkɛ nfan no ghayte lɛ, “Wvun wee sɛ nu wee wvù nɛɛ wvù wamte naa nffum bô joo ɛ mvú yuuke wvú le?”
42008026	Ɛ bó lente mamase yidvu buy wvuke ɛ̂ keba ke Gɛlasen e, ɛ bó ɛ cinɛ wase keba ke woŋ e kè Galilee le.
42008027	Ɛ Jisos dioo buyte ɛ̂ kekoŋ e, kɛ lɛ wen efɛɛse ɛŋkpwaante, ɛ bô wee mvu wvu ɛ̂ kelaante ke jó le tasɛn ɛ bonceendaa bo dɛwle le njiŋsene bô wvú. Ɛ bó ɛ ce wase yî ye le baay ɛ wvú ghane kenyi kencimte, cee ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ ditfum e jò bó to dweyte bonyii. Kɛ wvú to bvuu cee fô yew e kɛ.
42008028	No wvú yɛnɛɛ Jisos e, mum san ɛtalɛ, gɛn gbwe ɛ̂ wvú ɛjise, wam bô mvuŋgay lɛ, “Jisos, Waa Nyo', Nyo' wvù nu Ɛkolɛ ke Mwɛɛm Mvunciim e, wo fii la ɛ̂ me? Kee wo fo wo enya ŋgɛw ɛ̂ me kɛ.”
42008029	Wvú to jemyi nonɛn njefo Jisos to nu ɛ wam wase keyoy kè yiile kedvu lɛ kí ebuy yî wee wvudvu le. Kí to ké no cuute wvú bokaŋ e bokaŋ e ɛ bó koole lo, ké koo kay can noo bikaa bô ncaw sɛ no cɛyte. Ɛ́ bó ké ekay nonɛn, ɛ wvú sumyɛ kɛ lo, ɛ keyoy kedvu mum cufe wvú ɛ wvú no lewte gɛne ŋkpwaante.
42008030	Ɛ Jisos mum bife ɛ̂ wee wvudvu lɛ, “Diee diuw nu yɛɛ?” Ɛ wvú tfuse lɛ, “Diee diem nu kebombom.” Wvú to tfuse nonɛn njefo bonceendaa bo dɛwle le to nu ɛ cin lo yî ye le.
42008031	Ɛ bonceendaa bodvu lɛkɛ Jisos lɛ fo wvú eciinse bowen ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ kentuke kè shiile nɛn ŋooŋŋ e kɛ.
42008032	Ɛ̀ to nu ɛ ŋgoo boŋkunyam diekene yî mbɛke le fó, ɛ bonceendaa bo dɛwle le bodvu mum lɛkɛ Jisos lɛ wvú ecinɛ ɛ́ bowen egɛn eley ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî boŋkunyam bodvu le. Ɛ wvú bee.
42008033	Ɛ bó mum buy yî wee wvudvu le, daŋsɛn gɛn ley yî boŋkunyam bodvu le. Ɛ bó sɛn, bow ɛ̂ ŋkoŋ e, shii ɛ̂ mamase yidvu le, lɛ jó.
42008034	Ɛ bonyii bò to cɛyte boŋkunyam bodvu yɛn fiɛɛ fì kooy le, ja fó, fɛɛ lo, gɛn see saaka wvudvu ɛlaante bô ɛ̂ bontɛw bo jó le.
42008035	Ɛ bonyii no yuuke, buci gɛne keeyɛn tɛn fiɛɛ fì kooy le. Ɛ bó to fô Jisos to nu, yɛn wee wɛ le, ɛ bonceendaa bo dɛwle le ba ɛ cinɛ wase wvú le, ɛ wvú ɛ shii mbew Jisos e, ɛ jise ndvú, ɛ bvufee bwew ɛ kase wase ɛ tu fó. Ɛ bó fan baay.
42008036	Ɛ bonyii bò to yɛnɛɛ fiɛɛ fì to kooyɛɛ le no seŋe ɛ̂ bó no fí to ghanɛɛ ɛ́ wee wɛ wvù to kɛŋke bonceendaa bo dɛwle le sɛ bonɛn.
42008037	Ɛ bonyii bocii bo ɛ̂ biba bì Gɛlasen e kɛŋkɛ nfan, mum lɛkɛ Jisos lɛ wvú enɛ egɛne. Ɛ Jisos mum nɛ fiew, ley ɛ̂ kekoŋ e lɛ wen egɛne,
42008038	ɛ wee wɛ wvù bonceendaa bo dɛwle le to buyɛɛ yî ye le mum no lɛke Jisos lɛ bô wvú egɛne. Ɛ Jisos tun, tfuse wvú jim gay lɛ,
42008039	“Ɛ̀ gɛnè ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô yew e, egɛn esee keŋghaw ke fiɛɛ le kè Nyo' nu ɛ ge fô wo le.” Nonɛn, ɛ wee wvudvu mum tu jim gɛn no ghane ɛ̂ kelaante kedvu le kecii, seŋe keŋghaw ke fiɛɛ le kè Jisos ge fô wvú le.
42008040	Ɛ Jisos lente mamase kase tu jim keba keki. Ɛ kebombom ke bonyii le kè be she cɛyte wase wvú fó fiisɛn wvú.
42008041	Ɛ cee la mvu to fó ɛ bó teŋe lɛ Jaylus, ɛ ɛ̀ nu cee ɛkolɛ yew bunle yi jó. No wvú to, fey gɛn tum ɛnvuw ɛ̂ Jisos ɛjise, kuu can lɛ wvú eto kɛ lɛ ɛ̂ wen yew,
42008042	lɛ waa wen kpwee lo. Wvú to kɛŋke wan ɛ ɛ̀ ka kɛ wvú, ɛ ɛ̀ nu wan kpwoon ɛ wvú nu bilum yuufe ncow bifɛɛ. Ɛ bô Jisos nɛ no gɛne ɛ kebombom ke bonyii le faci Jisos.
42008043	Ɛ kpwoon mvu nu ɛnte jodvu ɛ wvú ɛ cɛm wase bô kencɛm ke bokɛnɛ le bilum yuufe ncow bifɛɛ. Ɛ wvú ɛ jewse wase fiɛɛ ficii fì wvú to kɛŋke can bonyii bo bifuu le, kí ɛ ghaw bó keefɛ.
42008044	Ɛ wvú bencɛ to ɛjim jo Jisos, kum ŋgem ndvu Jisos e. Kaŋ mwaaŋ ɛ kencɛm kew mum semɛ.
42008045	Ɛ Jisos bife lɛ, “Ɛ̀ kum yɛɛ me le?” Ɛ bonyii bocii maŋɛn lo. Ɛ Bita nɛ bife lɛ, “Cee ɛkolɛ, kɛ wo yɛne lɛ kebombom ke bonyii le faci wo le?”
42008046	Ɛ Jisos no duu kɛ lɛ, “Wee nu ɛ kum me le. Me nu ɛ n'yuw no mvuŋgay nu ɛ buy yî yɛm e.”
42008047	Ɛ kpwoon wɛ yɛn lɛ kɛ je nu dvú yì ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wen enyiim kɛ, mum ciŋciŋ gɛn gbwe ɛ̂ Jisos ɛjise mum see ɛ̂ bonyii bocii yuw fiɛɛ fì be ge wvú ɛ sɛ kum Jisos e, bvuu see no wvú be kum nonɛn kencɛm kew ɛ semɛ lo kaŋ mwaaŋ.
42008048	Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Waa wɛm, fitele fiuw fì wo lese yî yɛm e nu ɛ ge wase wo ɛ bonɛn. Ɛ̀ gɛnè ntay.”
42008049	Kɛ no Jisos to bɛɛ jemyi ɛ̂ kpwoon wvudvu nonɛn, ɛ wee mvu fɛse fó nɛn'yi fô yew e fo Jaylus wvù cee ɛkolɛ yew bunle wɛ, gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Waa wo nu ɛ mɛse wase. Fo wo ebvuu eshe enyaa ŋgɛw ɛ̂ wee n'yɛɛyi kɛ.”
42008050	Ɛ wvú dioo jeme nonɛn, ɛ Jisos yuw, gay ɛ̂ Jaylus lɛ, “Fo wo efanè kɛ, lese kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu fitele yî yɛm e maaŋ, ɛ́ waa wo eluŋ.”
42008051	Ɛ bó mum nɛ no gɛne fô yew e fo Jaylus, ke gɛn fɛse fó, ɛ Jisos tun fo wee eley yew. Ɛ wvú jo kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu Bita bô Jɛm noo Jon noo cee wan bô bwee wan ɛ bô bó ley.
42008052	Ɛ̀ to nu ɛ bonyii toŋene, ɛ kpwe ghamte lo fó. Ɛ Jisos gay lɛ, “Ben elu bô kpwe, wan baa kpwe kɛ, wvú leete lo.”
42008053	Ɛ bonyii nɛ no kieele lo wvú fó, njefo bó to kee ntay lɛ wan wvudvu nu ɛ kpwe wase.
42008054	Ɛ wvú gɛn fô wan wvudvu to jiime, jicɛ yî kebo le tee lɛ, “Wan kpwoon, ja we!”
42008055	Ɛ wvú mum kase tu dvú, ja we kaŋ mwaaŋ. Ɛ Jisos gay lɛ bó etaa fiɛɛ ɛ́ wvú edie.
42008056	Ɛ bwee bô ice yɛn fiɛɛ fì kooy le, ɛ dew yum bó. Ɛ Jisos lew lo lɛ fo bó esee ɛ̂ wee fiɛɛ fì kooy kɛ.
42009001	Ɛ Jisos ke nɛ tee boom bew bo ŋgoo le bo yuufe ncow bofɛɛ, ɛ bó baancɛ to. Ɛ wvú nya mvuŋgay ɛ̂ bó mvù bó ebvuuse bonceendaa bo dɛwle le yî bonyii le bvuu fɛle bincɛm dvú,
42009002	mum tum bó lɛ bó egɛn efewcì ɛ̂ bonyii ɛkumɛ bvunfon bvu Nyo' le bvuu fɛle bonyii bo bincɛm e.
42009003	Ɛ wvú bvuu gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben dioo gɛne, fo wee ejo fiɛɛ kɛ. Fo wee ejo kembaŋ, kɛnɛɛ ɛkɛlɛ, kɛnɛɛ fiɛɛ fidien, kɛnɛɛ bigew kɛ. Fo wee ejo bikum bifɛɛ kɛ.
42009004	Ben dioo gɛn ɛ ley ntɛw e, yew yì bó ɛ gɛɛ ben dvú, ɛ ben no ceè kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu dvú gɛn buy seke ben ke nɛnɛ ntɛw wvudvu le.
42009005	Ɛ́ ntɛw mvu tun keefiisɛn ben, ɛ́ ben nɛnɛ jó, dioo nɛn'yi kucɛ kebvu ke yî bikaa binɛn e, ɛ́ ke enu nciise fiɛɛ fì bó mom e.”
42009006	Ɛ bó mum nɛ no gɛne, gɛn no ghane bontɛw e bontɛw e, fewci saaka wvù jee wvu ɛkumɛ bvunfon bvu Nyo' le, bvuu fɛle bonyii bo bincɛm e bocii.
42009007	Ɛ 'Ɛlod wvù to saake keba ke woŋ e kè Galilee yuw mwɛɛm mvunciim mvù to kooyi, ɛ mvú ffumse wvú njefo bonyii bomew to nɛn'yi duu lɛ Jisos wvun nu Jon Nleseɛjoo ɛ wvú ɛ kase ɛ buy.
42009008	Ɛ bomew duu lɛ ɛ̀ nu Ɛlayja ɛ wvú kase ɛ to. Ɛ bomew duu fibole lɛ ɛ̀ nu wee ntum Nyo' wvu fwele mvu ɛ wvú ɛ kase ɛ buy yî kpwe le.
42009009	Ɛ 'Ɛlod mum ghay lɛ, “Jon nu ɛ me se nu ɛ mbvuse wase ɛkolɛ kew. Wvun wee ɛ bvuu ɛ no nu yɛɛ keseen wvù me n'yuuke kfuu mvun mwɛɛm ɛkumɛ wvú?” Ɛ wvú mum no gomte lɛ wen bee keeyɛn Jisos wvudvu le.
42009010	Ɛ boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e ke ghan kase tu jim, see mwɛɛm mvunciim mvù bó geɛ ɛ̂ wvú. Ɛ wvú mum nɛ jo bó ɛ bô bó lɛwse ye, buy gɛn je ɛ̂ kelaante kè Bɛsayda le.
42009011	Geenɛn, ɛ bonyii kiɛɛ kɛ lo kuŋɛn bi wvú le, ɛ wvú fiisɛn bó mum kɛw no fewci ɛkumɛ bvunfon bvu Nyo' le bvuu fɛle bonyii bo bincɛm e.
42009012	Ɛ diuu ke dioo gɛn lɛ dí eseeyi, ɛ boom bo Jisos e bo ŋgoo le bo yuufe ncow bofɛɛ bencɛ to gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Gayɛ ɛ̂ bonyii ban lɛ bó egɛn bontɛw bô ɛla yo nceencee le, egom mwɛɛm mvubole mvudien bô fò bó nu ece, njefo fɛn nu ŋkpwaante.”
42009013	Ɛ Jisos tfuse fiew lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu enya ben fiɛɛ ɛ́ bó edie.” Ɛ bó gay lɛ, “Fiɛɛ fì bese kɛŋke mɛy kɛ bontuw bo blɛɛd e botin bô byé yifiɛɛ. Wo gomte lɛ bese egɛn eguy mwɛɛm mvudien to enya ɛ̂ bonyii ban bocii le?”
42009014	Bó to gayte nonɛn njefo bonyii to nu fó nteen, ɛ bolemsɛ maaŋ nu bontfuke botin. Ɛ Jisos mum gay ɛ̂ boom bew bo ŋgoo le lɛ, “Ben egay ɛ́ bonyii eshiiyɛn fokuse mondvuum e mondvuum e, mbaanshen mbaanshen.”
42009015	Ɛ bó gay, ɛ bó shiiyɛn.
42009016	Ɛ Jisos jo bontuw bo blɛɛd e bo botin ba bô byé yi yifiɛɛ yɛ, taa we, nya keyoone ɛ̂ Nyo', mum guushɛ nya ɛ̂ boom bew bo ŋgoo le lɛ bó egawcɛ ɛ̂ bonyii bodvu.
42009017	Ɛ bó gawcɛ, ɛ bonyii bocii die ffuu, ɛ boom bo Jisos e bo ŋgoo le baancɛ bimbɛke bi shɛɛtɛɛ, ɛ bí yiŋsɛn ŋkáa yuufe ncow fiɛɛ.
42009018	Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu diuu dimew, ɛ Jisos no bunlee wvú ɛmbeŋ, ɛ boom bew bo ŋgoo le nu mbew ye le. Ɛ wvú nɛ bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Bonyii duu lɛ me nu yɛɛ?”
42009019	Ɛ bó tfuse lɛ, “Bonyii bomew duu lɛ wo nu Jon Nleseɛjoo, bomew lɛ Ɛlayja, ɛ bomew duu lɛ wo nu wee ntum Nyo' wvu fwele mvu ɛ wvú ɛ kase ɛ buy yî kpwe le.”
42009020	Ɛ wvú mum bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben duu finɛn lɛ me nu yɛɛ?” Ɛ Bita tfuse lɛ, “Wo nu Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ.”
42009021	Ɛ Jisos mum loocɛ ciise lo ɛ̂ bó lɛ fo bó ke emom lo esee fifin ɛ̂ wee kɛ.
42009022	Ɛ wvú mum no jemyi ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Wee wvù diee nu Waawee kɛŋke keeke eyɛn boŋgɛw nteen, ɛ́ bonyii bò saake woŋ bô bocee ncese bo baay baay noo bonyii bò duŋci bonci bo Nyo' le ema lo wvú. Bó nu ke emum eyu wvú, ɛ́ ɛdiuw ke ebuy ɛta, ɛ́ Nyo' ekase ebvuse wvú yî kpwe le.”
42009023	Ɛ Jisos mum no jemyi wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ bonyii bocii lɛ, “Ɛ́ wee gomte keenu wee wɛm, tu wvú kɛŋke keetun ɛkolɛ kew, etuulè kentam kew ɛdiuw ɛcii bii me le.
42009024	Ben ekeè lɛ wee wvù bawci nshii we fo wvú elase, nu ke elase kɛ lo. Geenɛn, wee wvù lase nshii we nje me, nu ɛ wvú ɛ bawcɛ lo nshii wvudvu.
42009025	Ɛ́ bó baanci naa woŋ wvun tfuu ɛ nya ɛ̂ wee, wvú ɛ die, ɛ ke ɛ lase kɛnɛɛ ɛ jim nshii we, ɛ́ sɛw wvudvu enu la?
42009026	Ben ekeè lɛ ɛ́ wee wuumene keebii me le noo diɛw yɛm e, ɛ́ wvú no kee lɛ wee wvù diee nu Waawee nu ke ewuumɛn tɛn mwɛtɛn seke wvú ɛ kase ɛ to ɛnte jo bvukukɛ bwew bvuu nu tɛn bvu Nyo' Ice bô bonceendaa bew bò yuule le.
42009027	Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy lɛ, bonyii bomew leeme fɛn ɛ bó yaa nu ke eyuw wvuŋ kpwe sɛ bó ɛ yɛn no Nyo' saake bvunfon bwew kɛ.”
42009028	Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu kɛ diɛwɛ ɛdiuw nyaŋ e, no Jisos jemyɛɛ mwɛɛm mvun, ɛ wvú jo Bita bô Jon noo Jɛm ɛ bô bó ben yî kum wvumew e lɛ wen egɛn ebunle.
42009029	Ɛ wvú gɛn dioo bunlee, ɛ nfieesɛn ye nɛ kumɛn, ɛ ndvú ye tɛn kumɛn no baa lawkene nɛn mwawmwawmwaw.
42009030	Ɛ fí kooy lɛ bonyii bofɛɛ, ɛ ɛ̀ nu Muses bô Ɛlayja to nu ɛ nɛ buynɛn fó no jemyi bô bo Jisos.
42009031	Ɛ n'yuu Nyo' baa yî bó le. Ɛ bô bó jemyi ɛkumɛ kpwe yì Jisos to kɛŋke keegɛn ekpwe Jɛlusalɛm keege ɛ́ fí eto ekocɛn no Nyo' gɛkɛɛ.
42009032	Bó to jemyi nonɛn, ɛ Bita bô Jon noo Jɛm nu ɛ nyii gooke lo bó. Ɛ bó dioo kamse, yɛn no n'yuu Nyo' baa yî Jisos e, bvuu yɛn bonyii bo bofɛɛ ba le ɛ bó leeme bô wvú.
42009033	Ɛ bonyii bo bofɛɛ bodvu dioo baase ɛkalɛ, ɛ Bita nɛ bvumtɛn gay ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Cee Ɛkolɛ, fí jee no beene nu fɛn. Cinɛ ɛ́ bese eyoo cún shɛ, ɛ́ yimi enu yo, yimi yi Muses, ɛ yimi nu yi Ɛlayja.” Wvú to jemyi nonɛn, yaa cim kee fiɛɛ fì wvú jemyi kɛ.
42009034	Kɛ no wvú to bɛɛ jemyi nonɛn, ɛ kembɛw nɛ to ɛ̂ bó we baŋyɛ bó. Ɛ bó no kɛŋke nfan no bó nu ɛ̂ kembɛw e.
42009035	Ɛ diɛw jeme ɛ̂ kembɛw kedvu le lɛ, “Wvun nu Waa wɛm wvù me nu ɛ ncaw. Ben eyuukè ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvú le.”
42009036	No diɛw yidvu jeme nonɛn ɛ mɛse, ɛ bó nɛ yɛn ɛ Jisos leeme fó wvú ɛmbeŋ. Ɛ bó ke faŋɛ yaa see lo ɛ̂ wee kefew kedvu le fiɛɛ fì bó yɛnɛɛ yî kum wvudvu le kɛ.
42009037	Ɛ ɛkfuŋ ke buy yuu, ɛ bô bo Jisos nɛ yî kum e no booke. Ɛ bó dioo bow, tasɛn bô kebombom ke bonyii le ke baay.
42009038	Ɛ wee mvu mum nɛ no wamte ɛ̂ kebombom ɛnte lɛ, “Wee n'yɛɛyi, kee wo taa kɛ fô waa wɛm e. Ɛ ka kɛ waa wɛm nonɛn.
42009039	Keyoy kemew jaa cufe wvú tufe, ɛ wvú nu taake, dvûmte, ɛ diffuw buyte ɛmvu. Kí gɛne lo bô wvú, yaa beŋe lo lɛ wvú eyoy kɛ.
42009040	Me mbe ɛ nlɛkɛ wase lɛ boom buw bo ŋgoo le ebvuse keyoy kedvu bó ɛ mom ŋkuuŋ.”
42009041	Ɛ Jisos yuw nonɛn, gay lɛ, “O oo! Ɛŋgokɛ ke ɛcici kè baa lese fitele yî Nyo' le kin. Me nu ŋke enu beene eŋgɛn embuy nɛɛ, eŋkuu shém bô ben eŋgɛn embuy nɛɛ?” Ɛ wvú mum gay ɛ̂ cee wan wvudvu lɛ, “To bô waa wo fɛn.”
42009042	Ɛ wvú jo dioo too dvú, ɛ nceendaa dɛwle wvudvu bvuu cufe wan wvudvu tufe fokuse, ɛ wvú no taake. Ɛ Jisos kan keyoy kè yiile kedvu ɛ kí buy yî wan wvudvu le, ɛ wvú mum bonɛn. Ɛ Jisos mum nya wvú ɛ̂ ice.
42009043	Ɛ bonyii bocii yɛn mvuŋgay mvu ɛ̀ nu mvu Nyo' le, ɛ diuw yum bó. No bó to bɛɛ kɛŋke ŋghaw yî mwɛɛm mvunciim mvù Jisos to gee le, ɛ wvú nɛ gay ɛ̂ boom bew bo ŋgoo le lɛ,
42009044	“Ben eloocɛ enya bitem binɛn yî fiɛɛ fì me nu enjeme ɛ̂ ben e. Wee wvù diee nu Waawee nu ɛ bó nu ke elese wvú can bonyii le.”
42009045	Ɛ wvú jeme nonɛn, ɛ bó faŋɛ yaa kiɛɛ fiɛɛ fì wvú jeme kɛ, njefo fiɛɛ fimew to nu ɛ baŋyɛ fo bó ekiɛɛ, geenɛn ɛ bó no fane keebife ɛ̂ wvú ɛkumɛ njeme wvudvu.
42009046	Ɛ bó ke nɛ kɛw mbew ɛbonɛbon lɛ laa bó sɛ nu nɛn ɛ wee wvu baay ɛ̂ bó ɛntelɛŋ nu yɛɛ lɛ.
42009047	Ɛ Jisos kiɛɛ fiɛɛ fì bó kpwawci fô mvuntelem mvubole, mum jo wan wvu caan leke mbew ye le,
42009048	gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ɛ́ wee fiisene wan diɛwɛ wvun e ɛ̂ diee diem e, tu wvú fiisene ɛ ɛ̀ nu me. Wee ɛ́ fiisɛn me, tu wvú fiisene ɛ ɛ̀ nu wee wvù tum me. Fí ɛ mum ɛ no nu lɛ, wee wvù joo ɛkolɛ kew caan ɛ̂ ben ɛntelɛŋ nu wvú wvù nu wee wvu baay.”
42009049	Ɛ Jon mum nɛ tee Jisos, be wvú lɛ, “Cee ɛkolɛ, bese be ɛ yɛn wee mvu le ɛ wvú teŋe diee diuw sɛ bvuuse bonceendaa bo dɛwle le yî bonyii le, bese ɛ kan, njefo kɛ wvú yaa nu mvu ŋgoo yesebeene le kɛ.”
42009050	Ɛ Jisos tfuse lɛ, “Fo ben ecilè kfuu wvuwɛ wee kɛ, njefo ɛ́ wee baa ekicine ben, tu wvú tomte ben.”
42009051	Ɛ kefew kè Nyo' to nu ke ejo Jisos ɛ́ wvú eben we ke no too wase keekocɛn, ɛ Jisos lese lo keegɛn Jɛlusalɛm, mum nɛ no gɛne.
42009052	Ɛ wvú dioo nɛ, tum bonyii bomew fwe. Ɛ bó gɛn ley ntɛw mvu wvu Samalia le lɛ bó eseyse bvudvuu jó ɛ̂ wvú.
42009053	Ɛ bonyii bo jó ku wvú bô bvudvuu faŋɛ yaa fiisɛn wvú kɛ, njefo bó to kee lo lɛ wvú fele gɛne ɛ ɛ̀ nu Jɛlusalɛm.
42009054	Ɛ Jɛm bô Jon bò nu boom bo Jisos e bo ŋgoo le ke yuw fiɛɛ fidvu, bife ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Bese etee ŋguy we ɛ́ wvú eshii elɛse bonyii bodvu?”
42009055	Ɛ Jisos kaa baŋke ye wam lo bó,
42009056	mum nɛ ɛ bô boom bew bo ŋgoo le mum no gɛne wase je ntɛw mvu le jɛɛy.
42009057	Ɛ bô bó dioo gɛne, ɛ wee mvu to gay ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Me nu embii wo le naa fɛɛ fô wo gɛne.”
42009058	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Nyám yi ŋkpwaante kɛŋke bibuw bibole, ɛ mvunyiim mvù bile we kɛŋke yéw yibo, geenɛn kɛ wee wvù diee nu Waawee kɛŋke naa lo fô wvú ejike ɛkolɛ kew kɛ.”
42009059	Ɛ Jisos nɛ gay ɛ̂ wee mvu lɛ, “Ɛ̀ biì me le.” Ɛ wee wvudvu tfuse lɛ, “Tata, yawɛ ecinɛ ɛ́ me eŋgɛn endwey icɛm nsɛ no mbii.”
