42009060	Geenɛn ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Cinɛ ɛ́ bonyii bò nu lɛ bó nu ɛ kpwekɛn wase edweyte bonyii bò kpwekene, ɛ́ wo egɛn fiuw efewcì ɛkumɛ bvunfon bvu Nyo' le.”
42009061	Ɛ wee mvu bvuu gay lɛ, “Tata, me nu mbii wo le, geenɛn yawɛ ecinɛ ɛ́ me eŋgɛn eŋgay kfuu diem e nsɛ no mbii.”
42009062	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ wvuwɛ wee lɛ, “Ɛ́ wee ŋgvuume bô jiw keelem lemme, ɛ bvuu ɛ no lemte taale ɛjim, tu mwɛtɛn baa kpwɛntɛn keenu ɛnte jo bvunfon bvu Nyo' le kɛ.”
42010001	Ɛjim jodvu, ɛ Tata baayɛ bonyii bomew mbaŋsooshwiy ncow bofɛɛ tum fwe, bofɛɛ bofɛɛ lɛ bó egɛn bontɛw e, egɛn eghan mondvuum mò wen nu ke efey mó le monciim.
42010002	Ɛ wvú dioo tumte bó gay lɛ, “Ŋgbwele duule baay, ɛ bonyii bo ŋgbwele le nu caan. Nonɛn, ben ebunleè lɛ Tata wvù Cee wɛɛ eciinse bonyii bo ŋgbwele le wɛne dvu wvú.
42010003	Ben egɛnè lɛ. Ben dioo gɛne no kee lɛ me ntumte ben ɛ ben nu egɛn enu diɛwɛ boom bo njée le ɛnte jo bokuula.
42010004	Ben dioo gɛne, fo wee ejo bigew, kɛnɛɛ ɛkɛlɛ, kɛnɛɛ bolaba bomew kɛ. Ben dioo ɛ buy ɛ̂ je, fo ben eleemenè gayte bonyii le kɛ.
42010005	Ben dioo ɛ gɛn ɛ ley yew yì ben ley dvú le, yaw gay yew e lɛ, ‘Kembonɛn enù yew fɛn.’
42010006	Ɛ́ wee wvù kooŋke kembonɛn nu dvú, ɛ́ kembonɛn emɛy yî ye le. Ɛ́ wvú fɛn baa nu, ɛ́ kembonɛn kedvu ekase etu jim ɛ̂ ben.
42010007	Seke ben ɛ ley yew, mum no ceè kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu dvú. Fo ben ekumenè yéw kɛ. Fiɛɛ fidien ficii fì bó nya ɛ̂ ben, ɛ ben die, kɛnɛɛ ɛ̀ nu fiwuun, ɛ ben wu, njefo ɛ́ wee lemte lemme, tu wvú kɛŋke keekɛŋke nlawma we.
42010008	Ɛ́ ben ley ntɛw e, bó ɛ fiisɛn ben, ɛ nya naa la lɛ ben edie, ɛ́ ben no diee lo.
42010009	Ben dioo nu jó, no fɛlè bonyii bo bincɛm e, ebvuu efewcì ɛ̂ bonyii bocii lɛ bvunfon bvu Nyo' le nu wase nceencee fô bó le.
42010010	Geenɛn, ben ɛ́ ley ntɛw e, bó ɛ́ faŋ keefiisɛn ben, ɛ́ ben buy gɛn bifiaŋ bi jé le jaŋ lɛ,
42010011	‘Kebvu ke ntɛw wene le kè bese jo yî bikaa bisɛse le kin fɛn no bese kuci, ɛ fiɛɛ ficii kaase tuu yî bikuu binɛn e. Geenɛn, ben ekeè lɛ bvunfon bvu Nyo' le nu wase nceencee.’
42010012	Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben lɛ, ɛ̀ nu ke edioo enu diuu di nsaw wvu fokemɛse le, ɛ́ mwɛɛm ebonene fô kelaante kè Sodom efele kelaante kekiɛ.”
42010013	Ɛ Jisos nɛ gay lɛ, “Ŋgɛw wvu baay nu wene ben bonyii bo Kolasen, ɛ ŋgɛw wvu baay nu tɛn wene ben bonyii bo Bɛsayda. Ben ekeè lɛ, ɛ́ me nto ndioo ŋge biŋghaw bi mwɛɛm e bì me nto ŋgeɛ jo ben ɛ ɛ̀ nu Taya bô Sidon, tu bó to nu ɛ jise wase bimbamkpwe, kfum taan ye le ncekɛ keeduŋcɛ lɛ bó nu ɛ kumɛn wase mvuntelem mvubole.
42010014	Ben ekeè lɛ ɛ̀ nu ke edioo enu diuu di nsaw wvu fokemɛse le, ɛ́ mwɛɛm ebonene fô bonyii bo Taya noo bo Sidon e fele ben.
42010015	Noo ben bonyii bo Kafana'um, ben kpwaake lɛ bó nu ke ebense ben ɛ́ ben eben we? 'Aay. Bó nu ke eshike lo ben ɛ́ ben eshii egɛn woŋ boŋkfu le.”
42010016	Ɛ Jisos mum gay ɛ̂ bonyii bò wvú to tumɛɛ ba lɛ, “Ɛ́ wee yuw ben e, tu mwɛtɛn yuw ɛ ɛ̀ nu me le. Wee ɛ́ ma ben, tu wvú ma ɛ ɛ̀ nu me. Wee ɛ́ ma me, tu mwɛtɛn ma ɛ ɛ̀ nu wee wvù tum me.”
42010017	Ɛ bonyii bo mbaŋsooshwiy ncow bofɛɛ ba ke ghan tu jim yuuke njoŋ, mum gay ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Tata, bese se teŋe diee diuw, ɛ ɛ̀ cim nu naa bonceendaa bo dɛwle le, ɛ bó yuw kɛ bese le.”
42010018	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Me nse nu ɛ n'yɛn ɛ Satan ɛ gbwe kɛ diɛwɛ jaŋ fò yí ɛ law we ɛ ley fokuse.
42010019	Me nu ɛ nya wase mvuŋgay ɛ̂ ben mvù ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ ben elɛɛnci yó bô boŋgam dvú. Ɛ mbvuu ɛ nya mvuŋgay mvù ben eso mvuŋgay mvu Satan wvù wee bvuban e dvú mvunciim. Kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ fiɛɛ eshiw ben kɛ.
42010020	Geenɛn, fo ben eyuukè njoŋ lɛ bonceendaa bo dɛwle le yuuke ben e kɛ. Ben eyuukè njoŋ ɛ ɛ̀ nu lɛ ɛdiee ɛyene nu ɛ Nyo' ɛ saŋ wase ɛ̂ ŋwa' we le fowe.”
42010021	Kɛ sekedvu, ɛ Keyoy ke Yuule ge ɛ njoŋ no yuu lo Jisos. Ɛ wvú mum gay lɛ, “Me nyaa keyoone ɛ̂ wo Icɛm Nfon ɛbulɛ bô nshɛ lɛ wo nu ɛ nyilɛ mwɛɛm mvun ɛ̂ bogoyfee noo boŋkiɛɛfiɛɛ, ɛ duŋcɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ mvunlɛy mvu boom e. Ɛ̀ nu no fí nu Icɛm, njefo ɛ̀ nu no wo to shieele lɛ fí enù.”
42010022	Ɛ Jisos bvuu jeme lɛ, “Icɛm nu ɛ nya wase mwɛɛm mvunciim ɛ̂ me. Kɛ wee nu dvú wvù kee Wan wvù me kɛ, ɛ̀ mɛy kɛ Icɛm wvù kee. Ɛ wee yaa nu dvú wvù kee Icɛm kɛ, ɛ̀ mɛy kɛ me wvù Wan noo bonyii bò Wan nu ɛ caw keeduŋcɛ Ice ɛ̂ bó.”
42010023	Ɛ wvú nɛ baŋke ye jeme wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ boom bew bo ŋgoo le ɛbonɛbon lɛ, “Njoŋ wvu baay nu wene lɛ ɛjisɛ ɛyene yɛne mwɛɛm mvun e.
42010024	Ben ekeè lɛ bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le nteen bô bonfon to shee beele keeyɛn mwɛɛm mvù ben yɛne le, ke faŋɛ yaa eyɛn kɛ. No beele tɛn keeyuw mwɛɛm mvù ben yuuke, ke faŋɛ yaa eyuw kɛ.”
42010025	Ɛ wee mvu wvù to looci kee bonci bo Nyo' le, ke nɛ to keemom Jisos, mum bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wee n'yɛɛyi, fiɛɛ fì me ŋkɛŋke keeŋge nsɛ ŋkɛŋkɛ nshii wvù mɛy lo nu la?”
42010026	Ɛ Jisos bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Bó saŋ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le lɛ wee egeè nɛɛ? Wo taaŋke yuuke lɛ la?”
42010027	Ɛ wvú tfuse lɛ, “Bó saŋ lɛ, ‘Ɛ̀ kooŋkè Tata wvù Nyo' wo bô fitele fiuw ficii, enya ɛkolɛ kuw ɛ̂ wvú kecii, elemtè fô wvú le bô mvuŋgay mwuw mvunciim, egɛɛ bvufee bwuw bvucii yî ye le, ebvuu ekooŋkè waa bwoo no wo kooŋke ɛkolɛ kuw.’”
42010028	Ɛ Jisos gay lɛ, “Wo nu ɛ tfuse lɛŋ. Ɛ̀ geè nonɛn ke emum ekɛŋkɛ nshii wvù mɛy lo.”
42010029	Ɛ wee wvudvu mum nɛ wowlɛn bife ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Waa bwɛɛm nu yɛɛ?”
42010030	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ ŋgan e lɛ, “Wee mvu to nu ɛ nɛ Jɛlusalɛm no booke Jɛliku, dioo gɛne ley can bocooŋ e. Ɛ bó suŋ wvú, ɛ wvú citɛn, ɛ bó baayɛ ndvú ye jo bô mwɛɛm mwew mvunciim, mum laŋ wvú fó lewtɛ.
42010031	Ɛ fí ke nɛ kooy lɛ wee mvu to booke ɛ̂ je yidvu le ɛ ɛ̀ nu cee ncese, yɛn wee wvudvu le, wɛm lo fey.
42010032	Ɛ wee mvu tɛn ke nɛ no too, ɛ ɛ̀ nu wee wvu ɛ̂ kfuu di Lɛwe le, ke to buy fó, yɛn wvú le, wɛm lo tɛn fey.
42010033	Geenɛn, ɛ wvumvu wee ke no lɛne tɛn too, ɛ ɛ̀ nu wee wvu Samalia. Ɛ wvú ke to buy fó, yɛn wvú le ɛ shen koo wvú.
42010034	Ɛ wvú gɛn mbew ye le, gɛɛ mbvuum bô mɛɛm yî bilɛmte biew e, kuu bilɛmte bidvu bô ndvu, mum tuu wvú yî nyam yì wvú to lɛne yî dvú le, gɛn dvú yew bonyii bo ghane le no taale fô wvú le.
42010035	Ɛ bô wvú ce, ɛ bvú buy yuu, ɛ wvú bvuse bodanali bofɛɛ nya ɛ̂ wee yew yidvu gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, ‘Shɛɛ etaalè fô wee wvun e. Ɛ́ wo shɛke lo ɛ jewse bigew bí ɛ fesɛn, ɛ́ me ŋke endioo ɛ ŋkase entfuse.’”
42010036	No Jisos ma nonɛn, mum bife ɛ̂ wee wɛ wvù to looci kee nci lɛ, “Ɛnte jo bonyii bo botɛte ban, wo yɛn fiuw lɛ wee wvù to duŋcɛɛ lɛ wen nu waa bwee wee wvù bocooŋ to suŋɛɛ nu wvù la?”
42010037	Ɛ wvú tfuse lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu wee wvù to koolɛɛ shen fô wee wvudvu le.” Ɛ Jisos mum gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ̀ gɛnè, egɛn egeè tɛn nonɛn.”
42010038	Ɛ Jisos bô boom bew bo ŋgoo le ke nɛ no gɛne, gɛn ley ntɛw mvu le ɛ kpwoon mvu nu jó ɛ bó teŋe lɛ Maata. Ɛ wvú fiisɛn Jisos ɛ̂ wvú yew.
42010039	Wvú to kɛŋke waa bwee mvu ɛ bó teŋe lɛ Maalia. No Jisos to gɛnɛɛ ley dvú, ɛ Maalia mum gɛn shii mbew ye le no yeke fiɛɛ fì wvú yɛɛyi.
42010040	Ɛ Maata nu fiew buuke ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô ntɛ̂w. Ɛ wvú ke nɛ to bife ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Tata, wo yɛne lɛ waa bwɛɛm nu ɛ cinɛ me le me ɛ no ntawtene me ɛmbeŋ sɛ wo ghayte lo le? Gayɛ kɛ ɛ́ wvú eto eficɛ me.”
42010041	Ɛ Tata tfuse lɛ, “Maata, Maata, wo buuke, baysee ɛkolɛ kuw yî mwɛɛm e nteen,
42010042	ɛ fiɛɛ fì nu shiee le baay nu kɛ fimwaaŋ. Maalia nu ɛ caw wase fifiɛ, ɛ kɛ wee yaa nu ke efi ɛ̂ wvú kɛ.”
42011001	Ɛ̀ to nu diuu dimew, ɛ Jisos no bunlee bvudvuu bvumew e, ke bunle mɛse, ɛ wee we ŋgoo mvu to gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Tata, yɛɛyi bese no ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bese ebunlee, lɛŋlɛŋ no Jon to yɛɛyɛɛ bonyii bew bo ŋgoo le no bó ebunlee.”
42011002	Ɛ Jisos mum gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben dioo bunlee no gaytè lɛ, ‘Icee wese, geɛ ɛ́ bonyii ewvumtè diee diuw, ege ɛ́ bvunfon bwuw eto.
42011003	Ɛ̀ nyaà bese mwɛɛm mvudien ɛdiuw ɛcii,
42011004	Lɛɛshɛ bibefɛ bisɛse, no bese lɛɛshi bibefɛ bì bonyii bomew gee fô bese le. Fo wo ecinɛ ɛ́ bese eley mmom yì eghaw bese le kɛ.’”
42011005	No wvú gay nonɛn mum fewsɛn ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben ejo lɛ wee mvu ben e be nɛ ɛ gɛn ɛ kumcɛ yew nsaa ye ɛntaŋ ɛntelɛŋ ɛ gay lɛ, ‘Nsaa yɛm, nɛnɛ kɛ we efoose me bô bontuw bo bvulɛm e botɛte.
42011006	Nsaa yɛm yimi nu ɛ nɛ ɛ buynɛn gbwen ghane le, ɛ me n'yaa ŋkɛŋke fiɛɛ fì me nu entɛ̂w wvú dvú kɛ.’
42011007	Bó ejo lɛ nsaa yo yì wo be kumci yɛ ɛ kaa ɛ tfuse fiew yew lɛ, ‘Fo wo ejewseè me kɛ. Bee boom bem nu ɛ bó ɛ jiim wase ɛ fen kembuŋ. Kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me embvuu enɛ we lɛ me eŋgom fiɛɛ enya ɛ̂ wo kɛ.’”
42011008	No Jisos fewsene nonɛn, bvuu gay lɛ, “Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben lɛ ɛ́ wvú fɛn baa enɛ we enya bvulɛm bvù wo biite njefo wvú nu nsaa yo, tu wvú nu ke eghan kɛ enɛ we enya fiɛɛ ficii fì wo shieele seke wo ɛ mɛy kɛ fó ɛ no kumci.
42011009	Me ɛ no ŋgayte ɛ̂ ben lɛ, ben ebiitè, ɛ́ Nyo' ke enya ɛ̂ ben. Ben egomtè, ɛ́ Nyo' ke ege ɛ́ ben eyɛn. Ben ekumcì kembuŋ, ɛ́ Nyo' ke eyene ɛ̂ ben.
42011010	Ben ekeè lɛ wee tfuu wvù biite, nu ke ekɛŋkɛ, ɛ wee tfuu wvù gomte, nu ke eyɛn, ɛ wvù kumci kembuŋ nu ɛ bó nu ke eyene ɛ̂ wvú.
42011011	Ɛ̀ nu cee wan wvù la ɛ̂ ben ɛntelɛŋ wvù waa we bife bye, ɛ́ wvú enya ɛ ɛ̀ nu yo ɛ̂ wvú?
42011012	Nuu lɛ ɛ́ wan be bife gee, ɛ́ wo enya ɛ ɛ̀ nu ŋgam ɛ̂ wvú lɛ?
42011013	Ɛ́ ben fɛn bò ɛ̀ nu bonyii bò befe kee keenya mwɛɛm mvù jee ɛ̂ boom bonɛn, tu kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ Icee wene wvù nu fowe enya tɛn Keyoy ke Yuule ɛ̂ bonyii bò biite ɛ̂ wvú efey naa lo nonɛn e?”
42011014	Ɛ Jisos ke no bvuuse nceendaa dɛwle yî wee mvu le ɛ ɛ̀ nu kencife. No nceendaa dɛwle wvudvu to buyɛɛ, ɛ wee wvudvu mum kɛw no jemyi. Ɛ kebombom ke bonyii le yɛn no kɛŋke lo ŋghaw.
42011015	Ɛ bonyii bomew no duu lɛ, “Wvú bvuuse bonceendaa bo dɛwle le nɛn ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô mvuŋgay mvu Bɛlsebu wvù nfon bonceendaa bo dɛwle le.”
42011016	Ɛ bomew bonyii no teeyi keekoo wvú gayte lɛ wvú ege fiɛɛ fì duŋci mvuŋgay mvù nɛ fowe.
42011017	Ɛ Jisos kiɛɛ boŋkpwawcɛ bobole mum gay lɛ, “Ɛ́ ketum nɛ ɛ gawsɛn ɛ no diuu ɛkinɛkin, kí saa ke eleem kɛ. Kfuu ɛ́ nɛ ɛ gawsɛn ɛ no diuu ɛdinɛdin, tu dí ɛ bvuŋ wase.
42011018	Ɛ̀ nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no Satan bô ŋgoo ye nɛ ɛ gawsɛn ɛ no diuu ɛbonɛbon, bvunfon bwew saa ke eleem tɛn kɛ. Me ŋgayte nonɛn njefo ben duu lɛ me mbvuuse bonceendaa bo dɛwle le ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô mvuŋgay mvu Bɛlsebu le.
42011019	Ɛ́ ɛ̀ fɛn nu lɛ me mbvuuse bonceendaa bo dɛwle le ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô mvuŋgay mvu Bɛlsebu le, tu bonɛn boom bvuuse ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô mvu yɛɛ le? Fiɛɛ fì boom bonɛn bodvu gee nu eduŋcɛ lɛ ben nu ɛ gbwe wase nsaw.
42011020	Geenɛn ɛ́ me mbvuuse bonceendaa bodvu ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô kebo ke Nyo' le, tu bvunfon bvu Nyo' le nu ɛ to wase fô ben e.
42011021	Ben kee lɛ ɛ́ ntɛmemvuŋgay seyse mwɛɛm mwew mvu jem e ɛ shii ɛ no cɛyte la diew dvú, wee saa ke eshiw fiɛɛ fiew kɛ.
42011022	Geenɛn, ɛ́ ntɛmemvuŋgay mvu wvù fele wvú nɛ ɛ to ɛ diu ɛ so wvú, emum eloo mwɛɛm mwew mvu jem e mvù wvú se gɛɛle ɛkolɛ yî dvú le, ebvuu ekuu mwɛɛm mwew mvunciim egɛn dvú ɛ́ bô nsáa ye egaw.
42011023	Ben ekeè lɛ ɛ́ wee kicine me, tu mwɛtɛn bone ɛ ɛ̀ nu bikaa ɛ̂ me ɛjim. Wee wvù baa efici me keebaanci lo, tu wvú tawse lo.
42011024	Keyoy kè yiile ké buyte yî wee le mum gɛn ŋkpwaante no gomte fô kí ecee. Geenɛn ké dioo ɛ gom ŋkuuŋ, mum jeme ɛ̂ ɛkolɛ kew lɛ, ‘Me nu eŋkase entu ɛ̂ me yew fô me nse mbuyɛɛ.’
42011025	Seke kí ɛ kase ɛ to ɛ yɛn ɛ yew nu ɛ bó ɛ yɛse ɛ seyse yí ɛ no yuule,
42011026	nonɛn ɛ kí mum kase gɛn, to bô biyoy bimew bisooshwiy bì befe fele kí, ɛ bô bí mum to ley no cee dvú. Ɛ mwɛɛm mum mɛse fo yî mwɛtɛn e sekedvu fey no mvú se shee nu.”
42011027	No Jisos to bɛɛ jemyi mwɛɛm mvun nɛn, ɛ kpwoon mvu nɛ sɛsɛ ɛ̂ kebombom ke bonyii le ɛnte jeme lɛ, “Njoŋ wvu baay nu wvù kpwoon wvù to bokɛɛ wo, bvuu yamse le.”
42011028	Ɛ Jisos tfuse fiew lɛ, “Njoŋ wvu baay nu ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvu bonyii bò yuuke diɛw Nyo' gee no yí gomte.”
42011029	No bibombom bi bonyii le to taashi too mbew ye le, ɛ wvú nɛ gay lɛ, “Ɛŋgokɛ ke keseen kin nu kè befe. Kí gomte keeyɛn keŋghaw ke fiɛɛ le kè duŋci mvuŋgay mwem, ɛ bó yaa nu eduŋcɛ ɛ̂ kí kɛ. Geenɛn, ɛ keŋghaw ke fiɛɛ le baa fey ke wee ntum Nyo' wvù Jona le kɛ.
42011030	No fiɛɛ fì Jona to geɛ to nu keŋghaw ke fiɛɛ le fô bonyii bo Ninivɛ le, nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no fiɛɛ fì wee wvù diee nu Waawee gee nu ke enu keŋghaw ke fiɛɛ le fô ɛŋgokɛ ke keseen kin e.
42011031	Ɛ̀ nu ke enu diuu di nsaw wvu fokemɛse le, ɛ́ Yaa wvù to saake ketum kè Shɛba eleem bô ɛŋgokɛ ke keseen kin ege ɛ́ bó elese kí ŋgɛw e, njefo wvú to nu ɛ nɛ ketum kew e ɛ̂ kendvuse ke woŋ e keeto eyuw bvufee bvu Nfon Saamun e. Geenɛn ben eyekɛ eyuw, wee mvu nu fɛn bô fiɛɛ ɛ fí kuuke fele fi Saamun e.
42011032	Ɛ bonyii bo Ninivɛ nu ke elomte tɛn ɛŋgokɛ ke keseen kin ɛbvubwɛ lɛ kí to nu ɛ jay baay, njefo bó to nu ɛ yuw fiɛɛ fì Jona to fewcɛɛ, kumɛn mvuntelem mvubole. Wee mvu wvun fɛn bô fiɛɛ fì fele fi Jona le, ɛ ben yaa kumene mvuntelem mvunɛn kɛ.
42011033	Kɛ wee ké tfuuke ken'yeese lese ɛgaaku kɛ. Kɛ ɛ̀ yaa nulo tɛn ɛ́ wvú ebvuu ejo ŋkaa ekfukɛ dvú kɛ. Wvú ké tfuuke, tome ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî fiɛɛ fì bó tomyi ken'yeese yî dvú le, lɛ bonyii dioo leyte yew eyɛne n'yuu le.
42011034	Jise diuw nu ken'yeese ke ye yo le. Ɛ́ jise diuw yuule lo, ɛ́ ye yo yicii enu ɛ yí ɛ yiŋsɛn bô n'yuu. Geenɛn, ɛ́ jise diuw baa yuule, ɛ́ ye yo yicii enu ɛ yí ɛ yiŋsɛn lo bô ɛjiwɛ.
42011035	Fí mum ɛ̀ no nu lɛ, wee etaalè lɛ laa wen lɛne ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛnte jo n'yuu nuu ɛnte jo ɛjiwɛ lɛ.
42011036	Ɛ́ wo lɛne ɛnte jo n'yuu ɛ keba kemew yaa nu ɛ̂ ɛjiwɛ le kɛ, ɛ́ mwɛɛm mvunciim emum eyuule kɛ diɛwɛ no ken'yeese ké baa no nyaa n'yuu yî yo le.”
42011037	Ɛ Jisos ke mɛse njeme we, ɛ wee Falasii mvu tee wvú lɛ wvú eto ɛ́ bô wen egɛn ediekɛn. Ɛ Jisos mum gɛn, ley, shii ɛ bó no diekene,
42011038	ɛ wvú baa yaw ecukɛ can kɛ. Ɛ wee Falasii wɛ taa ɛ fí ghaw wvú.
42011039	Ɛ Tata kiɛɛ fiɛɛ fì wvú kpwawci mum jeme ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ben Bofalasii cuke mvuŋkom bô shúw ye le, geenɛn ɛ mwɛɛm mvù befe bô ken'yɛɛ ɛjisɛ ɛ cin lo fô mvuntelem mvunɛn e.
42011040	Biyuŋ bin! Kɛ Nyo' wvù to bomɛɛ ɛkfuŋ nu wvù to bomɛɛ ɛnte tɛn e?
42011041	Fì ben bee keegeè nu lɛ, ben enyaà mwɛɛm mvù ben kɛŋke ɛ̂ mwɛɛm mwɛ le ɛ̂ bonyii bo kefufe le, ɛ́ mwɛɛm mvunciim emum eyuule fô ben e.
42011042	Ŋgɛw wvu baay nu wene Bofalasii. Ben nyaa keba kemwaaŋ ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛnte jo biba yuufe bi mbáse yì ben keeke naa noo mwɛɛm mvù ben keeke gɛɛle ɛ̂ mbáse le lɛ yí eshumte, geenɛn kaa cin'yi keegee mwɛɛm mvu lɛŋ fô bonyii le bô keekooŋke Nyo'. Ben be kɛŋke keegeè mwɛɛm mvudvu mvunciim yaa cin'yi fimew e kɛ.
42011043	Ŋgɛw wvu baay nu wene Bofalasii. Ben ké no kooŋke kɛ keeshiile ɛ ɛ̀ nu fwe yéw bunle le, bvuu kooŋke lɛ bó egayte ben e ɛ̂ way bô n'wvum.
42011044	Ŋgɛw wvu baay nu wene, njefo ben nu kɛ diɛwɛ jém yì yaa yen'yi kɛ, ɛ bonyii lɛne yî dvú le yaa kee kɛ.”
42011045	No Jisos to jemyi nɛn, ɛ wee mvu wvù to looci kee bonci bo Nyo' le gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wee n'yɛɛyi, wo kee kɛ lɛ fiɛɛ fì wo jemyi nu ɛ kum bese le tɛn e.”
42011046	Ɛ Jisos tfuse lɛ, “Ŋgɛw wvu baay nu tɛn wene ben bonyii bò looci kee bonci bo Nyo' le. Ben nɛn'yi yikɛ bonyii bô bvujitɛ ɛ bvú fele mvuŋgay mvubole sɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ ben elaw kɛ naa lo kpwan ɛbo keeficɛ bó dvú ŋkuuŋ.
42011047	Ŋgɛw wvu baay nu wene. Ben bomte jém bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le bò bo'icee cee bonɛn to yuwyɛɛ.
42011048	Fifin duŋci lɛ ben tomte gee di bo'icee cee bonɛn e. Bó to nu ɛ yuwyɛ bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le, ben ɛ mum ɛ shɛɛ ɛ no seysee bomte jém yibo.
42011049	Ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì to geɛ ɛ Nyo' bô bvufee bwew sɛ jeme lɛ, ‘Me nu ŋke enciinse bonyii bem bo ntum e fô bó le, ɛ́ bó ke eyuwyɛ bomew ebvuu ekuŋ bomew.’
42011050	Nonɛn, Nyo' nu ke ebife ɛ̂ ɛŋgokɛ ke keseen kin ɛkumɛ ɛlɛmɛ ke bonyii bew bo ntum e bocii bò bó to yuwyɛɛ ɛ kɛw no woŋ to kɛwɛɛ.
42011051	Wvú nu ke bife ɛ kɛw yî ɛlɛmɛ ke Abɛl e egɛn ebuy yî ke Sakalia wvù bó to yuɛ ɛntelɛŋ jo ketaŋ ke ncese bô yew ncese le. Me nseŋe lo ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy lɛ Nyo' nu ke ebife ɛ̂ ɛŋgokɛ ke keseen kin ɛkumɛ kpwe bonyii bodvu ba bocii.
42011052	Ŋgɛw wvu baay nu wene ben bonyii bò looci kee bonci bo Nyo' le. Ben nu ɛ nyilɛ ken'yene ke diuw fwese wvù ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wee eley dvú sɛ kiɛɛ fiɛɛ fì nu lɛŋ e. Ben nu ɛ tun keeley, ɛ bvuu ɛ no baaŋke bonyii bò gomte keeley fo bó eley.”
42011053	Ɛ Jisos ke ja lɛ wen egɛne, ɛ Bofalasii bô bonyii bò to duŋci bonci bo Nyo' le kɛw no leeshi wvú bô díɛw biwci mwɛɛm ɛ̂ wvú nteen nteen,
42011054	ɛ bó to gee nonɛn teeyi lo wvú keeyuw fiɛɛ diuw we le emum ekoo wvú.
42012001	No Jisos to jemyi, ɛ bibombom bi bonyii le no taashi fó bontfuke le bontfuke le faanene. Ɛ bomew lɛɛnci bikaa bi bomew e. Ɛ Jisos nɛ kɛw no jemyi ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ boom bew bo ŋgoo le gayte lɛ, “Ben ejoò kefew yî fintuŋlɛɛn fi Bofalasii le fì ɛ̀ nu gee dibole dì bó jemyi jɛɛy, gee jɛɛy e.
42012002	Ben ekeè lɛ kɛ fiɛɛ nu dvú fì bó baŋyi fì nu ke enu sɛ fí ɛ buy ɛmwa kɛ. Ɛ kɛ fiɛɛ nu dvú tɛn fì bó nyile fì nu ke enu sɛ bó ɛ kiɛɛ kɛ.
42012003	Ben ekeè lɛ fiɛɛ ficii fì ben jemyi ɛntaŋ nu ɛ bó nu ke eyuŋɛn ɛmvunsheeŋ. Ɛ fiɛɛ ficii fì ben ké faale yew sɛ no tfumtfume nu ɛ bó nu ke ejaŋ ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô ɛkolɛ ke yew e.
42012004	Nsáa yɛm, me ɛ no njemyi ɛ̂ ben lɛ fo ben efanè bonyii bò nulo eyu kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu nyam ye maaŋ sɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó ebvuu ege fiɛɛ fimew kɛ.
42012005	Ben eyekɛ eyuw wee wvù ben efanè. Ben efanè ɛ ɛ̀ nu Nyo' njefo ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù kɛŋke mvuŋgay keeyu wee, ebvuu elese mwɛtɛn ŋguy wvu baay e. Me mbvuu ŋgayte ɛ̂ ben lɛ ben efanè ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvú.
42012006	Kɛ ben kee lɛ bó ké no geese mvunsha mvuntin kɛ yî mvunyinyi le mvunfɛɛm maaŋ? Geenɛn, kɛ finsha fimew nu dvú fimwaaŋ fì Nyo' ké daayɛ ɛ̂ fí le kɛ.
42012007	Finɛn nu ɛ Nyo' kee naa yvúw yicii yì nu ɛ̂ ben ɛfa. Fo ben efanè kɛ. Ben fele lo mvunsha fó nteen.
42012008	Ɛ́ me embvuu ensee ɛ̂ ben tɛn lɛ, ɛ́ wee beŋe ɛ̂ bonyii ɛjise lɛ wen kee me, tu wee wvù diee nu Waawee nu ke ebee tɛn mwɛtɛn ɛ̂ bonceendaa bo Nyo' le fwe.
42012009	Geenɛn, ɛ́ wee ma lo me ɛ̂ bonyii ɛjise, tu me nu ŋke ema tɛn mwɛtɛn ɛ̂ bonceendaa bo Nyo' le ɛjise.
42012010	Fí ɛ bvuu ɛ̀ no nu lɛ, Nyo' nu ke elɛɛshɛ díɛw yì befe yì wee jemyi ɛkumɛ wee wvù diee nu Waawee, geenɛn kɛ ɛ̀ nu naa lo ɛ́ Nyo' ke eyuu elɛɛshɛ díɛw yì befe yì wee jemyi ɛkumɛ Keyoy ke Yuule kɛ.
42012011	Seke bó ɛ koo ben ɛ gɛn dvú yéw bunle le, kɛnɛɛ fwe dvu bonyii bò saake woŋ kɛnɛɛ fwe dvu bonyii bò kɛŋke mvuŋgay mvu sa' le, lɛ bó egɛn esaw ben, fo ɛkolɛ ekfumtè ben lɛ laa ben nu ke egɛn etaŋe diuw egay lɛ la lɛ, kɛnɛɛ ejeme nɛɛ lɛ.
42012012	Ɛ̀ nu ke enu kefew kedvu le ɛ́ Keyoy ke Yuule esee fiɛɛ fì ben ejeme.”
42012013	No Jisos to teete boom bew bo ŋgoo le nonɛn, ɛ wee mvu nɛ jeme ɛnte jo kebombom ke bonyii le, gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wee n'yɛɛyi, gayɛ ɛ̂ waa bwɛɛm lɛ wvú egaw bvushɛw bvusɛɛbeewvu enya bwem.”
42012014	Ɛ Jisos bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Diemsɛn, ɛ̀ gɛke yɛɛ me lɛ me ensumtenè bonsaw bonɛn, mbvuu ŋgaakè bvushɛw bvunɛn?”
42012015	No wvú bife nonɛn mum gay ɛ̂ wee tfuu lɛ, “Ben eyɛnè fo ben eyɛɛlè ɛjisɛ yî mwɛɛm e, njefo kɛ nshii wee yaa nu nje mwɛɛm mvù wvú kɛŋke kɛ, wee ejo naa ɛ mwɛtɛn kɛŋke nɛɛ.”
42012016	No wvú jeme nonɛn, mum ma ŋgan lɛ, “Cee kpwaw mvu to kɛŋke wɛɛ we, ɛ mwɛɛm ke joŋ dvú baay.
42012017	Ɛ wvú mum kɛw no kpwawci lɛ laa wen nu ke ege nɛɛ lɛ? Wen nu ke egɛɛ ŋgu wen fɛɛ lɛ?
42012018	Ɛ wvú mum nɛ cu ntaŋ lɛ, ‘Fiɛɛ fì me nu eŋge nu fin. Me nu ensaw bigonɛ biem, eŋkase eŋkuwse, emum eŋgɛɛ ŋgu bô mwɛɛm mwem dvú mvunciim.
42012019	Ɛ́ me ŋke endioo ɛ ŋge nonɛn, emum eŋgay ɛ̂ ɛkolɛ kem lɛ me nu wee keshi. Me ŋkɛŋke mwɛɛm mvù me nu ŋke endie embuy bilum e nteen. Kɛ me mbɛɛ ebvuu embuuke kɛ. Me nu endiekene kɛ wase lo, mbvuu ŋ'wukene n'yuuke njoŋ.’
42012020	No wvú seyse nonɛn, ɛ Nyo' mum tee wvú lɛ, ‘Keyuŋ kin! Ɛntaŋ ɛbɛn nu ɛ me nu ŋke eŋkase enjo keyoy kuw. Mwɛɛm mvun mvunciim mvù wo seyse ɛ gɛɛ nu ke enu mvu yɛɛ le?’”
42012021	No Jisos jeme nɛn mum gay lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no fí nu ke enu fô wee wvù baanci bvukukɛ fô ɛkolɛ kew e yaa kɛŋke bvukukɛ ɛ̂ keba ke Nyo' le kɛ.”
42012022	Ɛ wvú bvuu nɛ no jemyi wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ boom bew bo ŋgoo le lɛ, “Fo ben eyaŋyaŋè ɛkumɛ nshii wene lɛ laa ben nu ke edie la lɛ, kɛnɛɛ ɛkumɛ ye yene laa ben nu ke ejise la lɛ.
42012023	Ben ekeè lɛ keyoy ke wee le fele mwɛɛm mvudien, ɛ ye wee fele ndvú.
42012024	Ben etaa eyɛn biŋaaŋa, kɛ bí ké no jewyi bvuu gbweci ŋgu kɛ. Kɛ bí yaa kɛŋke bigonɛ kɛ. Ɛ Nyo' nyaŋyi kɛ bí bicii. Kɛ ben kee lɛ ben fele mvunyiim e?
42012025	Ɛ̀ nu yɛɛ ɛ̂ ben ɛntelɛŋ wvù yaŋyaŋe, wvù nulo ebise kɛ naa kefew caan yî nshii we le?
42012026	No ɛ̀ nu sɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ ben ege naa fi caan fin ŋkuuŋ, ɛ̀ ge la wvù ben soo bikuu ɛkumɛ mwɛɛm mvumew?
42012027	Ben etaa yɛn no fow ké no kuu nu. Kɛ fow ké no lemte kɛnɛɛ shile ndvú kɛ. Geenɛn, ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben lɛ kɛ naa Nfon Saamun bô bvukukɛ bvucii bvù wvú to kɛŋke to ké suute ye no nu ɛ wvú ɛ buy fô fow mvu le kɛ.
42012028	Ɛ́ Nyo' suute ɛgay yo ŋkpwaante nɛn, ɛgay yò kuu ɛbɛn, buy ntfuu ɛ bó ɛ fwɛɛ wase fotaŋ, tu kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wvú esufe ben efey lo nonɛn e? O oo bonyii bo mbee wvù doose le!
42012029	Fí mum ɛ̀ no nu lɛ fo ben eyaŋyaŋè, bvuu kpwaake lɛ laa ben nu ke ediee la bvuu wuu la lɛ,
42012030	njefo mvumvun mwɛɛm ké no kpwawci kɛ bonyii bo yî nshɛ le bò yaa kee Nyo' kɛ. Ben ekeè lɛ Icee wene kee lo lɛ ben shieele mwɛɛm mvun mvunciim.
42012031	Ben elese bvufee bvunɛn ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî bvunfon bvu Nyo' le, ɛ́ wvú emum enyaa tɛn mwɛɛm mvun mvunciim ɛ̂ ben.
42012032	Ŋgoo yɛm, no ben nu caan nɛn, fo ben efanè kɛ, njefo Nyo' wvù Icee wene nu ɛ caw keenya bvunfon ɛ̂ ben.
42012033	Ben egese mwɛɛm mvù ben kɛŋke, egaw bigew bidvu ɛ̂ bonyii bo kefufe le, egomtè bobuuncuu ɛ ɛ̀ nu bò yaa nulo esɛɛkɛn kɛ. Ben egɛɛlè kpwaw wene ɛ ɛ̀ nu woŋ Nyo' le, fô ɛ̀ yaa nulo ɛ́ wvú eka kɛ, ɛ cooŋ yaa nulo efey fó kɛ, ɛ shéw yaa nulo ekan kɛ.
42012034	Ben ekeè lɛ fò wee gɛke kpwaw we nu kɛ fó fò fitele fiew nu enu.
42012035	Ben ekay bicaw binɛn, etfuw bin'yeese ecɛytè lemme,
42012036	kɛ diɛwɛ boom bo lemme le bò cɛyte cee ɛkolɛ wvubo ɛ wvú nu gbwen bvujen e. Ɛ wvú nu ke edioo ekaase ekumcɛ kembuŋ ɛ́ bó eyene lo ɛ́ wvú eley.
42012037	Njoŋ wvu baay nu ke enu wvu boom bo lemme le bò cee ɛkolɛ wvubo nu ke edioo efɛɛse eyɛn ɛ bó nu we cɛyte. Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy lɛ wvú nu ke eseŋ ndvu ye ɛ́ bó shiiyɛn fokuse ɛ́ wvú eto bô mwɛɛm mvudien egawcɛ ɛ̂ bó.
42012038	Njoŋ wvu baay nu ke enu wvu boom bo lemme le bò wvú nu ke edioo efɛɛse eyɛn ɛ bó nu cɛyte. Kɛnɛɛ wvú nu ke eto ɛntaŋ ɛntelɛŋ, kɛnɛɛ seke nyimshie ɛ toŋ.
42012039	Ben ekeè lɛ ɛ́ cee yew kee kefew kè cooŋ nu ke eto, ɛ́ wvú ecɛytè. Wvú saa ke ecinɛ ɛ́ bó eŋgoy yew ye kɛ.
42012040	Ben tɛn kɛŋke keecɛytè, njefo wee wvù diee nu Waawee nu ke ekase eto ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ kefew kè ben yaa kee kɛ le.”
42012041	Ɛ Bita mum nɛ bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Tata, wo ma ŋgan wvun ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ bese, nuu ɛ̂ bonyii bocii lɛ?”
42012042	Ɛ Tata tfuse lɛ, “Waa lemme wvù nu wvu kecɛɛy bvuu kɛŋke bvufee nu wvù la? Kɛ ɛ̀ nu wvuwɛ wvù cee ɛkolɛ we nu ɛ gɛɛ wvú lɛ wvú etaalè fô yew ye le, ɛ́ kefew ke dioo ɛ kocɛn ɛ wvú nya mwɛɛm mvudien mvu boom bo lemme le ɛ̂ bó le?
42012043	Njoŋ wvu baay nu ke enu wvu waa lemme wvuwɛ wvù cee ɛkolɛ we nu ke edioo etoo eyɛn ɛ wvú gee lemme lɛŋlɛŋ no wvú bee keegee.
42012044	Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy lɛ cee ɛkolɛ we nu ke ebense wvú ɛ́ wvú etaale fô mwɛɛm mwew e mvunciim.
42012045	Geenɛn, ɛ́ waa lemme wvudvu nɛ ɛ jeme ɛ̂ ɛkolɛ kew lɛ, ‘Kɛ cee ɛkolɛ wɛm nu ke eyaŋsɛn ekase eto kɛ’, ɛ mum ɛ kɛw ɛ no suuŋke boom bo lemme le bò bolemsɛ noo bò bokɛnɛ, diekene bvuu wuu mbvuum ɛ mó koole wvú,
42012046	tu cee ɛkolɛ we nu ke enɛ esɛsɛ ebuynɛn diuu dimew dì wvú yaa be kpwaake le kɛ noo ɛ̂ kefew kè wvú yaa be kee le kɛ. Wvú nu ke edioo ɛ buynɛn nonɛn, emum enya ŋgɛw ɛ̂ waa lemme wvudvu, eciinse wvú ɛ́ wvú egɛn enu bô bonyii bò yaa jemyi kecɛɛy kɛ.
42012047	Waa lemme wvù kee fiɛɛ fì cee ɛkolɛ we gomte lɛ wvú egeè, ɛ faŋɛ yaa eseyse egee, nu ɛ bó nu ke etam wvú boŋgbwan nteen.
42012048	Ɛ waa lemme wvù yaa kee kɛ fiɛɛ fì cee ɛkolɛ we gomte lɛ wvú egeè, ge fiɛɛ fì ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó etam wvú boŋgbwan nteen, nu ɛ bó nu ke ewewcɛ kɛ lo wvuwɛ caan. Wee wvù bó nu ɛ nya mwɛɛm ɛ̂ wvú nteen nu ɛ bó nu ke eshieele nteen ɛ̂ wvú. Ɛ wee wvù bó nu ɛ gɛɛ mwɛɛm can ye le nteen nu ɛ bó nu ke ebife ɛ̂ wvú nteen.”
42012049	Ɛ Jisos bvuu gay ɛ̂ boom bew bo ŋgoo le lɛ, “Me nto keenfwɛɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu ŋguy yî nshɛ le. Wee ejo ɛ wvú be bɛɛnci wase.
42012050	Me ŋkɛŋke kfuu ŋgɛw wvu baay keenley wvú le, ɛ fitele fiem nu ke elɛɛtɛn kɛ seke me ɛ nley wase wvú le.
42012051	Ben kpwaake lɛ me nto ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô nyɛkeey yî nshɛ le fɛn e? Naa lo. Ben ekeè lɛ me nto ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô keŋgawsɛn.
42012052	Ɛ kɛw yî keseen e, yew yì nu bonyii botin nu ke egawsɛn. Bonyii bo botɛte nu ke egawsɛn bô bo bofɛɛ, ɛ́ bo bofɛɛ egawsɛn bô bo botɛte.
42012053	Cee wan nu ke egawsɛn bô waa we wvù diemsɛn, ɛ́ wan wvù diemsɛn egawsɛn bô ice. Bwee wan nu ke egawsɛn bô waa we wvù kpwoon, ɛ́ wan wvù kpwoon egawsɛn bô bwee. Bwee diemsɛn nu ke egawsɛn bô kpwɛɛ waa we, ɛ́ kpwɛɛ wan egawsɛn bô bwee dweese.”
42012054	Ɛ Jisos gay wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ kebombom ke bonyii le lɛ, “Ben ké yɛne seke kembɛw bene je ɛkuɛku, ɛ ben mum no duu lɛ, ‘Jaŋ nu ke egbwe.’ Ɛ yí ke mum gbwe.
42012055	Ɛ́ ben ké yɛn tɛn ɛ fwefwe ɛ baŋke wase ye ɛ no booke lo je ɛweɛwe, ɛ́ ben mum no duu lɛ, ‘Keŋkfum ke baay nu ke enu.’ Ɛ kí mum ke no nu.
42012056	Ben bonyii bò jemyi jɛɛy, gee jɛɛy ban, no ben taale ɛbulɛ bô nshɛ mum kiɛɛ no ɛkfuŋ nu ke enu, kɛ ɛ̀ nulo tɛn ɛ́ ben ekiɛɛ mwɛɛm mvù Nyo' duŋci yî kefew kin e nje la?
42012057	Ɛ kɛ ɛ̀ nulo tɛn ɛ́ ben ekpwawcɛ fiɛɛ fi lɛŋ fì ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ ben egeè le?
42012058	Ɛ́ wee jo wo ɛ no gɛne dvú yew nsaw e, ɛ́ wo mom ɛ ben ɛ wvú seyse ɛ ɛ̀ bɛɛ ɛ̂ je, fo wvú ke egufe wo egɛn efese can wee wvù saake bonsaw e, ɛ́ wvú efese wo can nci le ɛ́ bó efen wo yew ncaw e.
42012059	Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ wo lɛ kɛ wo nu ke ebuy dvú sɛ wo ɛ mɛse ɛ law finyinyi ficii fì bó shieele kɛ.”
42013001	Ɛ̀ to nu kefew kedvu le, ɛ bonyii bomew ke nɛ be Jisos kumte bonyii bo Galilee bomew bò to gɛnɛɛ keege ncese fô Nyo' le, ɛ Baylɛt tum bonyii ɛ bó gɛn gbwocɛ bó, ɛ bilɛɛm bibole taashɛ bô bi nyám yì bó to gee ncese dvú.
42013002	Ɛ Jisos yekɛ nɛn, bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben kpwaake lɛ bonyii bodvu to kpwe kfuu yiyɛ kpwe nonɛn njefo bibefɛ bibole to fele bi bonyii bo Galilee bomew e nuu?
42013003	Kɛ ɛ̀ nu nonɛn kɛ. Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben lɛ, ɛ́ ben baa ekumɛn mvuntelem mvunɛn, ɛ́ ben bocii ke ekpwekɛn kɛ nonɛn.
42013004	Ben kumyi bonyii bo yuufe ncow nyaŋ bò yew yì defe ɛ̂ we to kesɛɛ Siloam yuwyɛ bó? Ben kpwaake lɛ bonyii bodvu to kpwekene nonɛn njefo bibefɛ bibole to fele bi bonyii bo Jɛlusalɛm bomew e nuu?
42013005	Kɛ ɛ̀ nu nonɛn kɛ. Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben lɛ, ɛ́ ben baa ekumɛn mvuntelem mvunɛn, ɛ́ ben bocii ke ekpwekɛn kɛ nonɛn.”
42013006	Ɛ Jisos mum ma ŋgan mvu ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ɛ̀ to nu kefew kemew e, ɛ wee mvu yee kete kemew ɛ̂ wvú wɛne. Ɛ kefew ke kocɛn, ɛ wvú to keekoy, faŋɛ yaa yɛn ɛ mvuntam ɛ yum yî dvú le kɛ.
42013007	Ɛ wvú mum gay ɛ̂ wee wvù to taale fô wɛɛ we le lɛ, ‘Taa eyɛn, ɛ̀ nu wase bilum bitɛte keseen no me ntoo keeŋkoy mvuntam yî kete kin e, n'yaa yɛne fiɛɛ le yî dvú le kɛ. Gbwolɛ lo. Kí baŋyi bvudvuu ɛcici.’
42013008	Ɛ wee we lemme wvudvu tfuse lɛ, ‘Cee ɛkolɛ, kɛ bvuu cinɛ kɛ dvú kelum kin, ɛ́ me encɛwcɛ kenyi kedvu eŋgɛɛ binfo fó.
42013009	Ɛ́ ɛ̀ ke edioo enu kelum kè too le kí ɛ yum, ɛ́ fí ejoŋ, kí ɛ faŋ keeyum ee, ɛ́ me emum egbwo.’”
42013010	Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu diuu di mbam e dimew, ɛ Jisos no yɛɛyi bonyii yew bunle mi le.
42013011	Ɛ kpwoon mvu nu dvú ɛ keyoy kemew nu yî ye le, ɛ ɛ̀ nu kè ké ge ɛ wee tu wee gon. Kí to nu ɛ ge wase wvú ɛ cɛm bilum yuufe ncow nyaŋ jim ɛ ŋgvuse, ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nulo ɛ́ wvú ebvuu eleem we teytey kɛ.
42013012	Ɛ Jisos yɛn kpwoon wvudvu le, tee wvú ɛ wvú to. Ɛ wvú gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Bwɛɛm, wo nu ɛ boy wase ɛbo jo ntun wo wvun.”
42013013	No wvú gay nonɛn, mum nɛke kebo kum wvú le. Kaŋ mwaaŋ, ɛ jim ye kase nɛle ye, ɛ wvú leem we teytey, mum no tumte moŋkum mo Nyo' le.
42013014	Ɛ cee ɛkolɛ yew bunle yidvu yɛn no Jisos fɛ kpwoon wvudvu ɛ ɛ̀ to nu diuu di mbam e, ɛ fiɛɛ fidvu ton'yɛ wvú baay. Ɛ wvú mum no saake bonyii gayte lɛ, “Ɛdiuw ɛ lemme nu ɛsoocaan. Ben etoò ɛ bó fɛle bincɛm binɛn ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛdiuw yoya le. Fo wee ebvuu emom eto diuu di mbam e kɛ.”
42013015	Ɛ Tata tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ben bonyii bò jemyi jɛɛy, gee jɛɛy ban. Ɛ̀ ké dioo nu diuu di mbam e, wee saa ejo na' we kɛnɛɛ kembɛɛbey kew egɛn enya joo dvú?
42013016	Kpwoon wvun ɛ no nu waa Abla'am, ɛ Satan ɛ lese wase yî ncaw e bilum yuufe ncow nyaŋ, tu kɛ fí baa jee lɛ bó ebvuse wvú yî ŋgɛw e diuu di mbam e?”
42013017	No Jisos jeme nonɛn, ɛ bonyii bew bo bvuban e wuumɛn, ɛ bonyii nteen no laŋlaŋe lo fibole nje biŋghaw bi mwɛɛm e bicii bì Jisos to gee.
42013018	Ɛ Jisos nɛ ghay lɛ “Bvunfon bvu Nyo' le nu kɛ diɛwɛ la? Fiɛɛ fì ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me enfewsɛn dvú nu la?
42013019	Bvú nu kɛ diɛwɛ ŋgow fintam fimew fì wee to tfumyɛɛ wɛne dvu wvú, ɛ yí ke buy, ku yiŋ tu kete ɛ mvunyiim mvù bile we no yoote yî dvú le.”
42013020	Ɛ wvú bvuu nɛ ghay lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me embvuu enfewsɛn bvunfon bvu Nyo' le bô la?
42013021	Bvú nu kɛ diɛwɛ fintuŋlɛɛn fì kpwoon to fewɛɛ mvuum ɛ̂ bintee bi baay baay e bitɛte jo fiysɛn dvú, tow gɛɛ, ɛ fí mum ge ɛ mvuum modvu ben.”
42013022	Ɛ Jisos ke mum nɛ no gɛne Jɛlusalɛm. No wvú to gɛne no fele ɛ̂ bilaante bô ɛ̂ bontɛw e yɛɛyi bonyii.
42013023	Ɛ wee mvu nɛ bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Tata, ɛ̀ nu kɛ bonyii caan bò nu ke eboy e?” Ɛ Jisos mum tfuse wase ɛ̂ bonyii bocii lɛ,
42013024	“Ben elumtè ntay keeley ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô diuw fwese wɛ wvù nu fiasaa le. Ben ekeè lɛ bonyii nteen nu ke egomte keeley yaa kɛŋke je kɛ.
42013025	Kefew nu ke ekocɛn, ɛ́ cee yew eja we efaa kembuŋ. Wvú nu ke edioo ɛ faa, ɛ́ ben emɛy ɛkfuŋ ekumci kembuŋ lɛke lɛ, ‘Cee ɛkolɛ, yene kɛ yew ɛ́ bese eley.’ Ɛ́ wvú emum etfuse ɛ̂ ben lɛ, ‘Kɛ me n'yaa ŋkee jò ben nɛ kɛ.’
42013026	Ɛ́ ben emum ekɛw etaŋyi lɛ, ‘Ɛ̀ nu bese bò beene se shee diekene bvuu wukene. Ɛ wo se ghane yɛɛyi bonyii bontɛw bosɛse le.’
42013027	Ɛ́ wvú ebvuu ekase etfuse kɛ lɛ, ‘Me nseŋe lo ɛ̂ ben lɛ kɛ me n'yaa ŋkee ben kɛ. Ben enɛnɛ lo ɛ̂ me ɛfwese ben bò ghane buwyi mwɛɛm ban.’
42013028	Ben nu ke eyɛn Abla'am bô Aysik noo Yakow noo bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le bocii ɛnte jo bvunfon bvu Nyo' le, ɛ ben nu ɛ bó ɛ baŋ ɛkfuŋ, ɛ́ ben emum ebeele ŋgeci bigew.
42013029	Bonyii nu ke enɛ biba bicii ɛ kɛw jò diuu sane ɛ gɛn ɛ buy jò dí seeyi noo ɛweɛwe bô ɛkuɛku jo woŋ, eto eshii ediekene ɛnte jo bvunfon bvu Nyo' le.
42013030	Ben ekeè lɛ bonyii bomew bò nu ɛjim keseen nu ke enu bo fwe, ɛ bomew bò nu fwe keseen nu ke enu bo ɛjim.”
42013031	Ɛ ɛ̀ no nu kɛ kefew kedvu le, ɛ Bofalasii to gay ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Buy fiuw jan egɛn keba kemew e njefo Nfon 'Ɛlod gomte keeyu wo.”
42013032	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben egɛn egay ɛ̂ dikfuu didvu lɛ me mbvuuse bonceendaa bo dɛwle le yî bonyii le ɛbɛn, mbvuu nfɛle bincɛm, ɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ no me nu embuy eŋgee ntfuu, ɛ́ ke edioo enu foɛshentfuu, ɛ́ me emum emɛse lemme diem.
42013033	Geenɛn, ɛ me nu eŋkɛw lɛne diem di Jɛlusalɛm ɛbɛn, embuy enlɛn ntfuu eŋgɛn embuy foɛshentfuu. Kɛ fí baa kocɛn lɛ bó eyu wee ntum Nyo' bvudvuu bvumew e sɛ ɛ̀ nu Jɛlusalɛm kɛ.”
42013034	No Jisos jeme nɛn, mum bɛm lɛ, “Ɛbɛɛy Jɛlusalɛm! Ɛbɛɛy Jɛlusalɛm! Wo wvù yuwyi bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le, bvuu tumyi bonyii bò Nyo' tumte fô wo le bô ɛta. Ɛ̀ nu wase bokaŋ bomɛɛ no me mom keembaancɛ boom buw kɛ diɛwɛ no bweeshie ké baancɛ boom bew kfukɛ, wo ɛ faŋ?
42013035	Taa eyɛn, yew yo nu ke etu binffuy. Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben lɛ kɛ ben nu ke ebvuu eyɛn me le kɛ, egɛn ebuy kefew kè ben ke egay lɛ, ‘Nyo' nu ɛ laŋ kembonɛn yî wee wvù too ɛ̂ diee di Tata le.’”
42014001	Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu diuu di mbam e dimew, ɛ Jisos gɛn keediekɛn yew dvu wee wvu baay mvu. Ɛ wee wvudvu to nu wee Falasii. Ɛ bonyii bò to nu fó no gbwetene Jisos keeyɛn fiɛɛ fì wvú nu ege.
42014002	Ɛ̀ to nu ɛ wee mvu leeme fó ɛ Jisos ɛjise cɛmte bô ntun ɛ wvú ɛ ge wase can bô bikaa ɛ mvuwkɛn.
42014003	Ɛ Jisos bife ɛ̂ Bofalasii noo bonyii bò to looci kee bonci bo Nyo' le, bò to nu fó lɛ, “Nci wesebeene nu ɛ bee lɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó efɛ wee diuu di mbam e?”
42014004	Ɛ bó faŋɛ yaa tfuse fiɛɛ kɛ. Ɛ Jisos jicɛ wee wvudvu le, fɛ wvú, mum gay lɛ wvú egɛne.
42014005	Ɛ Jisos mum kase bife ɛ̂ bonyii ba lɛ, “Ɛ́ wee mvu ben e kɛŋke wan kɛnɛɛ na', wvú ɛ gbwe ɛ̂ fwɛŋ diuu di mbam e, mwɛtɛn saa ebvuse lo kaŋ mwaaŋ e?”
42014006	Ɛ bó ma fiɛɛ fì bó etfuse.
42014007	Ɛ Jisos ke taa yɛn no bonyii too cawci ɛ ɛ̀ nu mondvuum mo fwe sɛ shiiyine fó, ɛ wvú maw díɛw ɛ̂ bó lɛ,
42014008	“Seke bó ɛ see wee bô ŋkaw bvujen, wvú ɛ gɛn, fo wvú eshii ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô bvudvuu bvu fwe le kɛ, njefo ɛ̀ nɛlo enu ɛ bó ɛ see tɛn wee mvu wvu baay wvù fele wvú dvú.
42014009	Ɛ́ cee bvujen wvù se seŋɛɛ bó dvú bocii ke enɛ eto emum egay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, ‘Nɛnɛ we enya bvudvuu bvun ɛ̂ wee wvu baay wvun.’ Ɛ́ wvú emum enɛ bô keŋ'wuumɛn egɛn shii wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛjim.
42014010	Seke bó ɛ see wee bô ŋkaw bvujen, wvú ɛ gɛn, shii ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛjim, wvu lɛ cee bvujen ke enɛ eto egay lo ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, ‘Nsaa yɛm, nɛnɛ we fɛn egɛn shii ɛ ɛ̀ nu fwe.’ Nonɛn, ɛ́ wvú emum ekɛŋke n'wvum fwe dvu bonyii bocii fó.
42014011	Ɛ̀ nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no wee tfuu wvù bensee ɛkolɛ kew nu ɛ bó nu ke eshike lo wvú. Ɛ wee wvù shiwse ɛkolɛ kew nu ɛ bó nu ke ebense lo wvú.”
42014012	Ɛ Jisos mum nɛ kase gay ɛ̂ cee yew wvù to teŋɛɛ wvú yew dvu wvú lɛ, “Seke wo gomte keetee bonyii lɛ bó eto ediekɛn, fo wo etee ɛ ɛ̀ nu nsáa yo bô boom bo bwoo le noo kfuu diuw kɛnɛɛ bonyii bo kpwaw e bo ntɛw wo le kɛ. Ɛ́ wo teŋe boba bonyii, ɛ́ bó ke ekase tɛn etee wo yéw yibole, ɛ́ fí emum enu lɛ bó nu ɛ tfuse wase kebo kuw.
42014013	Seke wo gee ŋkaw, tee ɛ ɛ̀ nu bonyii bo kefufe le, boŋkɛwlɛ bô bontɛŋɛ noo binfefe.
42014014	Ɛ́ wo ge nonɛn, ɛ́ wo emum ekɛŋke kembonɛn, njefo kɛ boba bonyii kɛŋke fiɛɛ fì ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó ekase etfuse ɛ̂ wo kɛ. Ɛ́ ke enu Nyo' wvù nu ke elaw wo diuu dì bonyii bew nu ke ebuyte yî kpwe le.”
42014015	No Jisos jeme nonɛn, ɛ wee mvu wvù bô bó to diekene mum gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Njoŋ wvu baay nu wvù wee wvù nu ke ediekɛn ɛnte jo bvunfon bvu Nyo' le.”
42014016	Ɛ Jisos mum fɛ ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ̀ to nu kefew kemew e, ɛ wee mvu seyse ŋkaw wvu baay, be bonyii nteen.
42014017	Ɛ diuu ke to kocɛn, ɛ wvú tum waa we lemme lɛ wvú eghan esee ɛ̂ bonyii bocii bò wvú to beɛ lɛ bó etoò, lɛ mwɛɛm mvunciim nu ɛ bó ɛ seyse wase.
42014018	Ɛ waa lemme wvudvu mum gɛn yɛn bó le, ɛ bó kɛw no camte ye mwaaŋ mwaaŋ. Ɛ wee wvu fwe wvù wvú to yɛnɛɛ gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, ‘Me nse nu ɛ ŋguy wɛɛ wɛm wvu fwɛ, ɛ me ŋkɛŋke keeŋgɛn etaa. Kee wo, fo ben ecɛytè me kɛ.’
42014019	Ɛ wvú bvuu yɛn wvumvu le, ɛ mwɛtɛn gay lɛ, ‘Me nse nu ɛ ŋguy bona' bem bo lemme le yuufe, ɛ me ŋgɛne keseen keemom bó. Kee wo, fo ben ecɛytè me kɛ.’
42014020	Ɛ wvú yɛn wee mvu le, ɛ wvú gay fiew lɛ, ‘Me nse nu ɛ ŋkooy bwee yew, ɛ kɛ kefew yaa nu dvú kè ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me ento kɛ.’
42014021	No bó tfuse nonɛn, ɛ waa lemme wɛ mum tu jim gɛn see fiɛɛ ficii ɛ̂ cee ɛkolɛ we. Ɛ cee ŋkaw wvudvu yuw, ɛ fitele bɛnte lo wvú. Ɛ wvú mum kase tum waa we lemme wɛ gay lɛ, ‘Buy cekey, egɛn ɛlaante eghan ntasɛn jé bô mvujetɛlɛ mvunciim e, ekum bonyii bo kefufe le, bontɛŋɛ, bô binfefe noo boŋkɛwlɛ eto dvú.’
42014022	Ɛ wvú gɛn kase to gay lɛ, ‘Cee ɛkolɛ, me nu ɛ ŋge wase no wo be gay, geenɛn, yew baa yiŋsɛn kɛ.’
42014023	Ɛ cee ɛkolɛ we gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, ‘Buyɛ keseen egɛn ghan jé le bô mvujetɛlɛ le mvunciim, ekan wa lo bonyii ɛ́ bó eto, ɛ́ yew yɛm eyiŋsɛn.
42014024	Ɛ̀ keè lɛ kɛ wee mwaaŋ ɛnte jo bonyii ba bò me nse n'yawɛɛ mbe nu ke emom lo fiɛɛ fiem fidien ɛ̂ wvú ɛmvu kɛ.’”
42014025	Ɛ Jisos bvuu nɛ no gɛne, ɛ bibombom bi bonyii le shfumte bii wvú le. Ɛ wvú ke nɛ baŋke ye gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ,
42014026	“Kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wee enu wee wɛm ŋgoo sɛ wvú kooŋke me fele bwee bô ice, bvuu kooŋke me fele kpwɛse bô boom noo boom bo bwee le bô jɛ́me ye kɛ. Ɛ wvú kɛŋke naa tɛn keekooŋke me fele no wvú kooŋke ɛkolɛ kew.
42014027	Kɛ ɛ̀ nulo tɛn ɛ́ wee enu wee wɛm ŋgoo sɛ wvú nu ɛ tuu kew kentam ɛ no bii me le kɛ.
42014028	Ɛ̀ nu yɛɛ ɛ̂ ben ɛntelɛŋ wvù gomte keebom yew yì defe ɛ̂ we, wvú saa eyaw eshii ekpwawcɛ lɛ laa wen kɛŋke bigew ɛ bí ɛ kocɛn bì wen nu ke ebom dvú emɛse lɛ?
42014029	Ɛ́ wvú baa eyaw ege nonɛn ŋkuuŋ ɛ́ wvù ke enɛ elese kenffuy ɛ́ yew eghaw wvú keebom. Ɛ́ bonyii edioo efele emum ebuu wvú gayte lɛ,
42014030	‘Kenɛnɛ kin se nu ɛ kɛw yew yí ɛ ghaw wvú keemɛse.’
42014031	Kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ tɛn, ɛ̀ nu nfon wvù la wvù gomte keetum jem bô nfon mvu, wvú saa eyaw eshii fokuse ekpwawcɛ lɛ laa ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wen bô bonyii bowene bo jem e bo bontfuke yuufe etum jem bô nfon wvumvu wɛ bô bew bonyii bo jem e bò nu bontfuke mbaanfiɛɛ lɛ?
42014032	Wvú ɛ kpwawcɛ ɛ yɛn lɛ fí nu ke eghaw, ɛ́ wvú emum etum bonyii bew bomew ɛ́ bó egɛn eyɛn nfon wvumvu wɛ le ɛ wvú bɛɛ ncejole, elɛkɛ wvú lɛ nyɛkeey enù ɛ̂ bô wen ɛntelɛŋ.
42014033	Fí mum ɛ̀ no nu lɛ, ɛ́ wee baa ecinɛ mwɛɛm mwew e mvunciim, wvú saa enu wee wɛm ŋgoo kɛ.
42014034	Ŋkauw nu fiɛɛ fì jee. Geenɛn, ɛ́ yí nɛlo ɛ cife, ɛ́ bó ebvuu ege nɛɛ dvú ɛ́ yí sɛ ebvuu ekase eyeke?
42014035	Kɛ tu yí ɛ la wase ɛcici. Ɛ kɛ shiee yaa bvuu nu dvú wvù bó elese wɛne, kɛnɛɛ yî binfo le kɛ. Yí nu kɛ wase lɛ bó elaŋ lo. Wee wvù kɛŋke bitem keeyuw ɛ wvú yuw.”
42015001	Bonyii bò to fii shile noo bonyii bò befe bomew to too fô Jisos e keeyekɛ fiɛɛ fì wvú to yɛɛyi.
42015002	Ɛ Bofalasii bô bonyii bò to duŋci bonci bo Nyo' le kɛw no wvukene, gayte lɛ, “Wee wvun fiisene bonyii bò befe bvuu diekene bô bó.”
42015003	Nonɛn, ɛ Jisos ma ŋgan wvun ɛ̂ bó lɛ,
42015004	“Ɛ̀ nu yɛɛ ɛ̂ ben ɛntelɛŋ wvù kɛŋke njée gbwee, yimiaaŋ ɛ la, ɛ́ wvú ke elaame? Wvú saa eyaw ecinɛ yi mbaŋ bvuukɛ ncow bvuukɛ le ŋkpwaante egɛn egomte yimiaaŋ yidvu egɛn ebuy seke wvú ke eyɛn yí le?
42015005	Wvú ɛ́ gom ɛ yɛn yí le, emum eyuuke njoŋ, etuu fô gbwew,
42015006	ekfuuyi dvú fô yew e. Ɛ́ wvú dioo ɛ kfulɛ dvú, emum ekum nsáa ye bô bonyii bò cee mbew ye le gay lɛ, ‘Ben eto ɛ́ beene elaŋlaŋ njee yɛm ɛ yí be ɛ la, me ɛ ŋkase ɛ n'yɛn yí le.’
42015007	Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben lɛ, ɛ̀ nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no nlaŋlaŋ wvu baay nu ke enu woŋ wvu we le, nje wee wvù befe mwaaŋ wvù nu ɛ kumɛn fitele fiew. Bó nu ke elaŋlaŋe wvuwɛ wee fele bonyii bo mbaŋ bvuukɛ ncow bvuukɛ bò nu teytey yaa shieele ŋkumɛn kɛ.
42015008	Nuu lɛ ɛ̀ nu kpwoon wvù la wvù kɛŋke bigew yuufe, jise ɛ la fó ɛ́ wvú ke elaame? Wvú saa etfuw ŋguy eyeese, eyɛse yew, eloocɛ etasse egɛn ebuy seke wvú ke eyɛn e?
42015009	Wvú ɛ́ tasse ɛ yɛn, emum ekum nsáa ye bô bonyii bò cee mbew ye le egay lɛ, ‘Ben eto ɛ́ beene elaŋlaŋ jise diem di bigew e, ɛ dí be ɛ la, me ɛ ŋkase ɛ n'yɛn.’
42015010	Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben lɛ, ɛ̀ nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no bonceendaa bo Nyo' le laŋlaŋe nje wee wvù befe mwaaŋ wvù nu ɛ kumɛn fitele fiew.”
42015011	Ɛ Jisos bvuu jeme lɛ, “Wee mvu to kɛŋke boom bolemsɛ bofɛɛ.
42015012	Ɛ wvu ɛjim ke mum nɛ gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, ‘Icɛm, gawɛ bwem bvushɛw enya ɛ̂ me keseen.’ Nonɛn, ɛ ice mum gaw bvushɛw bvudvu ɛ̂ bó.
42015013	Ɛ wan wvu ɛjim wvudvu fi bwew bvushɛw, ɛ ɛ̀ ke dioo nu ɛjim jo ɛdiuw caan, ɛ wvú baancɛ bvucii gese mum laa bala woŋ wvumew e ncejole, mum gɛn no gbwayte bvuuke bigew bidvu yî nce wvu ɛcici le.
42015014	Ɛ wvú ke dioo bvuw ɛ bi ka, ɛ jeŋ yì tɛmyi nɛ koo woŋ wvudvu le, ɛ wvú no tane fiɛɛ fidien.
42015015	Nonɛn, ɛ wvú mum gɛn gom lemme fô wee mvu wvu woŋ wvudvu le keelemte wvú le. Ɛ wee wvudvu mum ciinse wvú lɛ wvú egɛn ecɛyte boŋkunyam bew.
42015016	Ɛ wvú mum gɛn no cɛyte, ɛ wee yaa nu dvú wvù enya wvú bô fiɛɛ fì wvú edie kɛ. Ɛ wvú mum no kɛŋke shiee lɛ wen bee ediee mwɛɛm mvudien mvù boŋkunyam ké no diee.
42015017	Ɛ wvú ke nɛ kɛw no kpwawci mwɛɛm, tee bvufee bwew jim, mum gay lɛ, ‘Bonyii bo lemme le bo icɛm e kɛŋke mwɛɛm mvudien nteen ɛ mvú ghaake bó, ɛ me nu fɛn ŋkpwee jeŋ.
42015018	Me nu enɛ we, eŋgɛn fô icɛm e, eŋgay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Icɛm, me nu ɛ ŋge kebefɛ fô Nyo' le noo fô wo le.
42015019	Me mbaa mbvuu ŋkocɛn lɛ bó eteŋe me lɛ waa wo kɛ. Joo kɛ wase me diɛwɛ wee wo lemme le.”’
42015020	Nonɛn, ɛ wvú mum nɛ no tuu jim fô ice le. Ɛ wvú ke dioo too buyte wase mbew la le, ɛ ice laŋ jise yɛn wvú le. Ɛ shen koo wvú bô wan, ɛ wvú ja we, lewtɛ gɛn, bam wvú, bvuu ŋocɛ.
42015021	Ɛ wan wvudvu mum gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, ‘Icɛm, me nu ɛ ŋge kebefɛ fô Nyo' le noo fô wo le. Me mbaa mbvuu ŋkocɛn lɛ bó eteŋe me lɛ waa wo kɛ.’
42015022	Geenɛn, ɛ ice kaa tee lo bonyii bew bo lemme le gay lɛ, ‘Ben egɛn cekey, egom kekum naa kè jee ntay, eto etfume yî ye le, ebvuu elese fincaw yî ɛbo kew e noo bolaba yî bikaa biew e.
42015023	Ben egɛn ekoo waa na' wvù faŋ, sɛɛ ɛ́ beene ediee laŋlaŋe,
42015024	njefo waa wɛm wvun se nu ɛ kpwe wase ɛ kase ɛ tu dvú. Wvú se nu ɛ la, ɛ kase ɛ yenɛ.’ Nonɛn, ɛ bó mum kɛw no laŋlaŋe.
42015025	Fiɛɛ fin to kooyi, ɛ wan wvu ŋgaywee nu ŋkpwaante. Ɛ wvú ke dioo kfuuyi, ke to buy mbew yew e, yuw no bine gbwee.
42015026	Ɛ wvú tee wee lemme mvu bife laa bó sɛ bine ɛ ɛ̀ nu la lɛ.
42015027	Ɛ wvú tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, ‘Waa bwoo nu ɛ tu jim ɛbɛn. Nonɛn, icen ɛ sɛɛ waa na' wvù faŋ, njefo wvú be ɛ yɛn waa bwoo le ɛ wvú nu dvú bvuu tɛmyi.’
42015028	Ɛ wvú yuw nonɛn ɛ shém kaa ton'yɛ lo wvú, ɛ wvú mum faŋ keeley yew. Ɛ ice buy gɛn no booyi wvú lɛ wvú eley kɛ yew.
42015029	Geenɛn, ɛ wvú tfuse ɛ̂ ice lɛ, ‘Taa eyɛn, me nse nlemte fô wo le diɛwɛ nfwa le yî bilum bin e bicii, ɛ me ŋke mbaa nfaŋ wase keeŋge fiɛɛ fiuw fimew kɛ. Wo ke baa nya wase me kɛ naa bô waa bie lɛ me enlaŋlaŋ dvú bee nsáa yɛm kɛ.
42015030	Waa wo wvun wvù se gɛnɛɛ bvuw bvushɛw bô bokɛnɛ bo nsake le ɛ dioo to, wo mum ɛ koo lo waa na' wvù faŋ ɛ sɛɛ nje ye.’
42015031	Ɛ ice tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, ‘Waa wɛm, bee wo se nu fɛn sekecii, ɛ fiɛɛ ficii fì me ŋkɛŋke nu kɛ fiuw.
42015032	Geenɛn, fí be jee keelaŋlaŋe njefo waa bwoo wvun se nu ɛ kpwe wase, ɛ kase ɛ tu dvú, wvú se nu ɛ la, ɛ kase ɛ yenɛ.’”
42016001	Ɛ Jisos bvuu jeme ɛ̂ boom bew bo ŋgoo le lɛ, “Wee kpwaw mvu to kɛŋke waa we lemme wvù wvú to gɛkɛɛ lɛ wvú etaale fô kpwaw we le. Ɛ wvú ke nɛ yuw lɛ waa we lemme wɛ bvuuke lo bigew biew.
42016002	Ɛ wvú mum tee waa we lemme wvudvu bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, ‘Fin fì me n'yuuke ɛkumɛ wo nu la? Baancɛ boŋwa' bocii bò wo saaŋke kpwaw wɛm jó eto etfuse ɛ̂ me. Kɛ wo yaa bɛɛ ebvuu elemte me le kɛ.’
42016003	Ɛ waa lemme wɛ gɛn shii kpwawcɛ lɛ, ‘No cee ɛkolɛ wɛm kuuŋke wase me fô lemme le, me nu eŋge nɛɛ? No me nu sɛ me ŋkɛŋke mvuŋgay keenlem bô jiw, ɛ me mbvuu ŋ'wuumene keenlɛke ɛlɛkɛɛ.’
42016004	Ɛ wvú mum nɛ kpwawcɛ lɛ, ‘Me nu ɛ ŋkiɛɛ wase fiɛɛ fì me nu eŋge, wvu lɛ seke bó ɛ kuŋ me fô lemme le, ɛ́ me eŋkɛŋke nsán yì nulo efiisene me yéw yibole.’
42016005	Nonɛn, ɛ wvú mum tee bonyii bò to kɛŋke fioo cee ɛkolɛ we mwaaŋ mwaaŋ. Ɛ wvu fwe to ɛ wvú bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, ‘Wo laake cee ɛkolɛ wɛm nɛɛ?’
42016006	Ɛ wvú tfuse lɛ, ‘Ɛ̀ nu bokolo bo mɛɛm e bo baay baay gbwee.’ Ɛ wvú gay lɛ, ‘Ko ŋwa' wo fioo wvun eshii fokuse cekey, ekumɛn esaŋ lɛ mbaanshen.’
42016007	Ɛ wvú kase bife ɛ̂ wvumvu lɛ, ‘Wo laake yo nɛɛ?’ Ɛ wvú tfuse lɛ, ‘Ɛ̀ nu bikele bi ɛgiŋ e gbwee.’ Ɛ wvú gay lɛ, ‘Ko ŋwa' wo fioo wvun ekumɛn saŋ lɛ bikele mbaŋnyaŋ.’
42016008	Ɛ cee ɛkolɛ waa lemme wvun ke yɛn no wvú fiwse wvú nonɛn, kaa bɛnse lo wvú lɛ wvú nu ɛ feefɛn baay.” Ɛ Jisos mum mɛse lɛ, “Bonyii bo fokuse fɛn feefene yî mwɛɛm mvù bó gee le fele no bonyii bo n'yuu le feefene yî mvubole mvu n'yuu le.
42016009	Nonɛn, me ɛ no ŋgayte ɛ̂ ben lɛ, ben ejoò kpwaw wene wvu fokuse fɛn koole nsán dvú, wvu lɛ seke wvú ɛ ka, ɛ́ Nyo' efiisɛn ben ɛ̂ wvú yew fô ben nu ke enu sekecii.
42016010	Wee wvù nulo ekiɛɛ keetaa fô fiɛɛ fi caan e ntay, nulo ekiɛɛ keetaa tɛn fô fì kuuke le. Ɛ wee wvù fiike kenfiw yî fiɛɛ fi caan e, nulo efiw tɛn yî fì kuuke le.
42016011	Ɛ́ ben nu sɛ ben nulo ekiɛɛ keetaa fô kpwaw wvu fokuse fɛn e, ɛ́ ke enya yɛɛ ɛ̂ ben kpwaw wvù kpwaw?
42016012	Ɛ́ ben nu sɛ ben nulo ekiɛɛ keetaa fô fiɛɛ fi wee mvu le ntay, ɛ́ ke enya yɛɛ ɛ̂ ben finɛn?
42016013	Kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ waa lemme elemte bocee ɛkolɛ le bofɛɛ kɛ. Ɛ́ wvú lemte nonɛn, ɛ́ wvú ebane wvumvu, kooŋke wvumvu, kɛnɛɛ eyuuke wvumvu le ntay, joo wvumvu ɛkuse. Kɛ ben nulo elemte Nyo' le bvuu lemte bigew e kɛ.”
42016014	No Jisos jeme nonɛn, ɛ Bofalasii yuw nɛ no buu lo wvú, njefo bó to kooŋke bigew baay.
42016015	Ɛ Jisos mum gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu ben ban bò duŋci ye lɛ ben nu bonyii bò jee fwe dvu bonyii, geenɛn ɛ Nyo' kee mwɛɛm mvunciim mvù nu ɛ̂ mvuntelem mvunɛn e. Ben ekeè lɛ mwɛɛm mvù bonyii bɛnsee lɛ ɛ̀ nu mwɛɛm, nu mvù Nyo' taale ɛ mvú bɛmte lo fô wvú le.”
42016016	Ɛ Jisos bvuu gay lɛ, “Ɛ̀ to nu fwele ɛ bó fewci ɛ ɛ̀ nu bonci bo Muses e bô mwɛɛm mvù bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le to saaŋke. Geenɛn, ɛ kɛw no Jon to toɛ, nu ɛ bó fewci wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu saaka wvù jee wvu ɛkumɛ bvunfon bvu Nyo' le. Wee tfuu ɛ mum ɛ no taaŋke keeley ɛnte jo bvunfon bvu Nyo' le bvudvu le.
42016017	Fí nu cekey fô ɛbulɛ bô nshɛ le keeka, ɛfey fo fijise fi ŋwa' le ela ɛcici ɛ̂ Ŋwa' bonci le.
42016018	Fí ɛ no nu lɛ, ɛ́ wee kuŋ kpwɛse, ɛ jo wvumvu, tu wvú nu ɛ ge kebefɛ kɛ diɛwɛ keejaŋ kpwoon mvu. Wee ɛ́ jo kpwoon wvù buy wase ɛ̂ wee yew, tu mwɛtɛn nu ɛ jo kpwɛɛ wee.”
42016019	Ɛ Jisos ke bvuu nɛ gay lɛ, “Wee kpwaw mvu to nu dvú, suute ye bô ndvú yì jee, diee ɛkolɛ kew ɛdiuw ɛcii.
42016020	Ɛ wee kefufe mvu nu tɛn dvú, ɛ diee nu Laasalus. Ɛ biŋkokɛn ɛ kooyɛ wvú ye yicii. Ɛ bó to gɛɛ ɛ wvú no shee jiime diuw fwese wee kpwaw wɛ le,
42016021	cɛyte lɛ laa wvú nu ke edioo ediekene ɛ́ fiɛɛ eshɛɛte ɛ wen boŋci diee lɛ. No wvú to jiime fó nonɛn, ɛ bwé bvuu mɛɛse too laci biŋkokɛn biew.
42016022	Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu kefew kemew e, ɛ wee kefufe wvudvu kpwe, ɛ bonceendaa bo Nyo' le to tuu wvú gɛn gɛɛ bvudvuu bvu njoŋ e mbew Abla'am e. Ɛ wee kpwaw wɛ ke kpwe tɛn ɛ bó dwey wvú.
42016023	Ɛ wvú gɛn ɛ ɛ̀ nu woŋ boŋkfu le no nu fó yî ŋgɛw wvu baay e. Ɛ wvú ke nɛ laŋ jise, yɛn Abla'am e ncejole bô Laasalus mbew ye le.
42016024	Ɛ wvú tee lɛ, ‘Icɛm Abla'am, koo shen fô me le eciinse Laasalus ɛ́ wvú elese kpwan ɛbo kew ɛ̂ joo le eto lɛɛse leme diem dvú. Me nu lo yî monlum mo baay e ŋguy wvun e.’
42016025	Ɛ Abla'am tfuse fiew lɛ, ‘Waa wɛm, kume seke wo to bɛɛ cee yî nshɛ le. Wo to kɛŋke mwɛɛm mvù jee mvunciim sekekiɛ, ɛ Laasalus yɛne fiew ɛ ɛ̀ nu ŋgɛw. Keseen nu ɛ Laasalus nu yî njoŋ e ɛ wo nu yî monlum e.
42016026	Kɛ ɛ̀ mɛy kɛ fifin kɛ. Ɛ̀ keè tɛn lɛ kensɛɛn ke baay nu ɛ bó ɛ seyse wvu lɛ fo ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wee enɛ fɛn edaŋsɛn eto fò wo nu kɛ, ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nulo tɛn ɛ́ wee enɛ fò wo nu edaŋsɛn eto fɛn kɛ.’
42016027	Ɛ wee kpwaw wɛ bvuu lɛkɛ lɛ, ‘Kee wo icɛm, ciinse kɛ Laasalus fô yew e fosɛse.
42016028	Me ŋkɛŋke boom bo bwɛɛm e botin, ɛ́ wvú egɛn etefe bó lɛ bó eyɛnè fo bó ke eto tɛn fô bvudvuu bvu ŋgɛw e bvun e kɛ.’
42016029	Ɛ Abla'am tfuse fiew lɛ, ‘Boom bo bwoo le bodvu kɛŋke boŋwa' bò Muses bô bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le to saŋɛɛ, bó eyuukè mwɛɛm mvù bó gayte.’
42016030	Ɛ wee kpwaw wɛ tun gay lɛ, ‘'Aay icɛm Abla'am, ɛ́ ɛ̀ be buy wee mvu yî kpwe le ɛ gɛn ɛ fewcɛ ɛ̂ bó, ɛ́ bó sɛ yuw ekumɛn mvuntelem mvubole.’
42016031	Ɛ Abla'am tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, ‘Ɛ́ bó tun keeyuw fiɛɛ fì Muses bô bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le gayte, bó saa ke eyuw naa lo tɛn fì ɛ̀ gayte wee wvù buy yî kpwe le kɛ.’”
42017001	Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ boom bew bo ŋgoo le lɛ, “Kɛ mwɛɛm mvù teeyi bonyii ɛ bó gee bibefɛ nu ke eyuu enu sɛ mvú nu lo kɛ. Geenɛn, ŋgɛw nu dvú fô wee wvù teeyi bonyii lɛ bó egeè bibefɛ le.
42017002	Fí nu ke ejee fô wvuwɛ wee le lɛ bó eshɛŋke kebwee ke diene le ɛ̂ kendoŋ kew e, edomse wvú ɛ̂ joo yi baay e, ɛfey fo wvú egeè ɛ boom ban gee bibefɛ.
42017003	Ben edioo nu no yɛnè. Ɛ́ waa bwoo ge fiɛɛ fì befe, ɛ́ wo jeme ɛ̂ wvú. Wvú ɛ́ kumɛn, ɛ́ wo lɛɛshɛ nya ɛ̂ wvú.
42017004	Ɛ́ wvú cim ge mwɛɛm mvù befe fô wo le bokaŋ bosooshwiy yî diuu le, ké ge kase kɛ to ku can lɛ wen nu ɛ jay, tu wo kɛŋke kɛ keefoose wvú.”
42017005	Ɛ boom bo Tata le bo ntum e ke nɛ gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Geɛ ɛ́ mbee wese etɛmyi ntay.”
42017006	Ɛ Tata tfuse lɛ, “Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy lɛ, ɛ́ ben be kɛŋke mbee ɛ wvú nu kɛ naa diɛwɛ shem nsusu le, tu ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ ben egay ɛ̂ kete ke baay kin lɛ kí emvuw ye fɛn egɛn eleem ɛ̂ joo yi baay e, ɛ́ kí emum eyuw lo ben e.
42017007	Ben ejo lɛ wee ŋgoo yene le kɛŋke waa we lemme, wvú ɛ she lemte wɛne, kɛnɛɛ wvú be taale ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô njée le, ɛ́ wvú ke dioo ɛ kfulɛ, ɛ́ wvú emum egay lɛ waa we lemme wvudvu egɛn lo ejo mwɛɛm mvudien mwew eshii ediee le?
42017008	Kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ fí enu nonɛn kɛ. Fiɛɛ fì wvú nulo egay nu kɛ lɛ wvú egɛn ekumɛn ndvú, eseyse mwɛɛm mvudien mvuwene eto dvú, emum ecɛyte, ɛ́ wen dioo ɛ diekɛn, ɛ wukɛn, ɛ́ wvú ebaancɛ mwɛɛm sɛ gɛn ediekɛn.
42017009	Waa lemme wvudvu ɛ́ ge mwɛɛm mvun mvunciim, ɛ́ wvú ke eshe enyaa keyoone ɛ̂ wvú?
42017010	Ɛ̀ nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no finɛn nu. Ben ke dioo ɛ ge lemme dì bó nya ɛ̂ ben dí ɛ ka, ɛ́ ben egay kɛ lɛ, ‘Bese nu kɛ lo fisɛse boom bo lemme le, ɛ bese ge kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu lemme disɛse.’”
42017011	No Jisos to gɛne Jɛlusalɛm, no fele ɛ̂ kedwee ke woŋ wvù Samalia bô wvù Galilee le.
42017012	Ɛ wvú ke gɛn dioo eleyte ntɛw mvu le, ɛ bolemsɛ bomew yuufe bò to cɛmte bô ntun wvu baay yɛn wvú le ncejole,
42017013	mum tee bô diɛw yì tɛmyi lɛ, “Jisos cee bonyii, camɛ kɛ shen fô bese le.”
42017014	No Jisos yɛn bó le, gay lɛ, “Ben egɛn eduŋcɛ bikuu binɛn ɛ̂ bocee ncese.” No bó nɛ ɛ no gɛne mum bonɛn no yuule bɛɛ ɛ̂ je.
42017015	Ɛ wee mvu ɛnte jo bó yɛn lɛ wen nu ɛ bonɛn wase, mum kase no tuu jim fô Jisos e bensee Nyo' foweɛwe.
42017016	No wvú to, mum gbwe ɛ̂ Jisos ɛjise bɛɛle wvú. Ɛ wee wvudvu to nu wee wvu Samalia.
42017017	Ɛ Jisos gay lɛ, “Bonyii bee yuufe bò me mbe nfɛ bó ɛ no yuule, bo bvuukɛ ɛ fɛɛ?
42017018	Fí nu lɛ wee baa nu dvú wvù eyɛn lɛ wen ekase etu jim enya keyoone ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛfey kɛ tolo wvun e?”
42017019	Ɛ Jisos mum gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ja we egɛnè fiuw. Fitele fì wo lese yî yɛm e nu ɛ ge wase wo ɛ bonɛn.”
42017020	Ɛ Bofalasii ke nɛ bife ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ laa bvunfon bvu Nyo' le nu ke ekɛw seke la lɛ. Ɛ wvú tfuse lɛ, “Kɛ nciise yaa nu dvú wvù nu ke eduŋcɛ seke Nyo' nu ke ekɛw esaake bvunfon bwew kɛ.
42017021	Kɛ wee yaa nu dvú wvù nu ke eduu lɛ, ‘Ben etaa eyɛn, Nyo' wvun ɛ wvú saake fɛn’, kɛnɛɛ lɛ, ‘Wvuwe ɛ wvú saake fofe’ kɛ. Ben eyekɛ eyuw, bvunfon bvu Nyo' le nu ɛ̂ mvuntelem mvu bonyii le.”
42017022	Ɛ wvú mum kase jeme wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ boom bew bo ŋgoo le lɛ, “Kefew too lo kè ben nu ke egomte keeyɛn wee wvù diee nu Waawee le kɛ naa diuu dimwaaŋ, saa eyɛn kɛ.
42017023	Ɛ̀ nu ke enu kefew kekiɛ le ɛ́ bonyii bomew eduu lɛ, ‘Ben etaa yɛn, wvuwe fofe’, kɛnɛɛ lɛ, ‘Ben etaa yɛn, wvuwvun fɛn.’ Bó dioo jemyi nonɛn fo ben egɛnè keetaa kɛ.
42017024	Ben kee no jaŋ ké lawte we nɛn mwaww, ɛ ɛbuw ɛ woŋ yo ɛna ɛcii yuu nɛn mwaŋŋ, ɛ bonyii bocii yɛn. Ɛ̀ nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no bonyii bocii nu ke eyɛn wee wvù diee nu Waawee le diuu dì wvú kaase too.
42017025	Geenɛn, no wvú ke egɛn, sɛ kase eto, nu ɛ wvú kɛŋke keeyaw yɛn boŋgɛw nteen ɛ́ ɛŋgokɛ ke keseen kin ema lo wvú.
42017026	Kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no fí to nu kefew ke Noa' le nu kɛ no fí nu ke enu kefew ke Wee wvù diee nu Waawee le.
42017027	Bonyii to nu diekene, wukene, ɛ bokɛnɛ bô bolemsɛ taashi bvujen, ɛ bonyii nyaa boom ɛ bolemsɛ taashi bvujen bô bó, gɛn buy diuu dì Noa' to leyɛɛ ɛ̂ ŋguw e ɛ joo ke buy to lɛse bó bocii.
42017028	Fí nu ke enu tɛn lɛŋlɛŋ no fí to nu kefew ke Lot e. Bonyii to diekene, wukene, kamene way, lemte ŋɛɛ, bvuu bomte yéw.
42017029	Ɛ Lot ke dioo buy Sodom, ɛ Nyo' mum shike ŋguy we ɛ wvú no shiile bɛɛnci kɛ diɛwɛ mvuŋkaŋ e, shii mum lɛse bonyii bo Sodom bocii.
42017030	Ɛ̀ nu kɛ no fí nu ke enu diuu dì wee wvù diee nu Waawee nu ke esɛsɛ ebuynɛn e.
42017031	Ɛ̀ nu ke edioo enu ɛbvubwɛ, fo wee wvù nu ɛ̂ yew we ɛ mwɛɛm mwew nu yew, ebvuu eshii eley yew lɛ wen ejo sɛ no lewte kɛ. Lɛŋlɛŋ tɛn, fo wee wvù nu wɛne ebvuu ekfuuyi lɛ wen egɛn ejo fiɛɛ kɛ.
42017032	Ben ekume fiɛɛ fì to kooyɛɛ bô kpwɛɛ Lot.
42017033	Wee wvù gomte keebawci nshii we fo wvú elase nu ke elase kɛ lo. Ɛ wee wvù lase nshii we nu ɛ wvú bawcɛ lo nshii wvudvu.
42017034	Ɛ́ me eŋgay ɛ̂ ben lɛ, ɛ̀ nu ke enu ɛntaŋ jodvu, bonyii nu ke ejiime fontaw bofɛɛ, ɛ́ bó ejo mwaaŋ ɛ́ wvumvu eshɛɛ.
42017035	Bokɛnɛ bofɛɛ nu ke egooke bvulɛm fodien, ɛ́ bó ejo mwaaŋ ɛ́ wvumvu eshɛɛ.
42017036	[Bolemsɛ bofɛɛ nu ke enu wɛne, ɛ́ bó ejo mwaaŋ ɛ́ wvumvu eshɛɛ.]”
42017037	Ɛ boom bew bo ŋgoo le mum bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Tata, fiɛɛ fidvu nu ke ekooy ɛ ɛ̀ nu fɛɛ?” Ɛ wvú tfuse ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ ŋgan e lɛ, “Fô keŋkpwe ke fiɛɛ le nu, nu kɛ fó fò boŋguluŋ nu etaashi.”
42018001	Ɛ Jisos mum ma ŋgan mvu keeyɛɛyi boom bew bo ŋgoo le lɛ bó kɛŋke keebunlee sekecii yaa doose kɛ.
42018002	Ɛ wvú gay lɛ, “Wee wvù saake bonsaw mvu to nu ɛ̂ kelaante kemew e, ɛ wvú yaa fane Nyo', yaa yɛne tɛn jise di wee le kɛ.
42018003	Ɛ kpwɛɛ ŋkfu mvu nu tɛn ɛ̂ kelaante kedvu le. Ɛ́ wvú ké no gɛne sekecii kule can ɛ̂ wee wvù saake bonsaw wɛ lɛ wvú efi kɛ wen esumtɛn nsaw wen bô wee wen bvuban.
42018004	Ɛ wee wvudvu yaa leese gvune ɛntuŋtuŋ kɛ, ɛ kpwɛɛ ŋkfu wɛ mɛy kɛ no cine fó. Ɛ fí ke ghaw, ɛ wee wvudvu gay lɛ, ‘No me nu sɛ me nfane Nyo', sɛ me ncim n'yɛne jise di wee le,
42018005	geenɛn no kpwɛɛ ŋkfu wvun too kɛ jewsee me nɛn, me nu en'yɛn lɛ me nu ɛ nsumtɛn nsaw we no wvú gomte, ɛfuw kɛ nonɛn, ɛ́ wvú ke emɛy kɛ etoo jewsee me nɛn, ɛ́ wee ke enɛ ekpwe lo ɛ̂ wvú ɛbo.’”
42018006	No Tata ma nonɛn, mum gay lɛ, “Ben eyuw fiɛɛ fì wee keŋge ke ɛcici wvù saake bonsaw wvun to jemyɛɛ.
42018007	No wvú to ficɛɛ kpwɛɛ ŋkfu wɛ nɛn, tu kɛ Nyo' nulo efi tɛn bew bonyii bò wvú nu ɛ caw bò beele fô wvú le ɛntaŋ bô ɛmvunsheeŋ e? Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wvú ebvuu eguute lo ye?
42018008	Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben lɛ Nyo' nu ke esumtɛn nsaw wvubo naa cekey. Geenɛn wee wvù diee nu Waawee nu ke edioo kaase too eyɛn ɛ bonyii nu dvú bò nu ɛ lese fitele yî Nyo' le fokuse fɛn nonɛn e?”
42018009	Ɛ Jisos bvuu nɛ ma wvumvu ŋgan ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ bonyii bò to yɛne bikuu bibole lɛ bowen nu bonyii bo teytey, mum nyɛnsee lo bomew bonyii.
42018010	Ɛ wvú gay lɛ, “Bonyii bomew bofɛɛ to nu ɛ ben gɛn yew ncese le keebunle. Wvumvu to nu wee Falasii, ɛ wvumvu nu wee wvù fii shile.
42018011	Ɛ bó gɛn ley, ɛ wee Falasii wɛ gɛn leem fiew wvú ɛmbeŋ bunle lɛ, ‘Nyo', me nyaa keyoone ɛ̂ wo njefo kɛ me nu diɛwɛ bonyii bomew e kɛ. Kɛ me n'yɛɛle ɛjisɛ yî mwɛɛm e kɛ. Kɛ me nfiike kenfiw kɛ. Kɛ me njaaŋke bokɛnɛ bo bonyii le kɛ, ɛ kɛ me nu naa kɛ diɛwɛ wee wvù fii shile we le kɛ.
42018012	Me ŋké no mbamte mwɛɛm mvudien ɛdiuw ɛfaa yî kemaa le. Me ŋké no nyaa keba kemwaaŋ ɛ̂ wo ɛnte jo biba yuufe bi mwɛɛm mvunciim mvù me ŋkɛŋke le.’
42018013	Geenɛn, ɛ wee wvù to fii shile wɛ leem fiew ncejole, faŋɛ yaa cim taa we kɛ, so' ɛkolɛ, laŋ wɛm mum bunle lɛ, ‘O Nyo', me nu fiem wee wvù befe, camɛ kɛ shen fô me le.’”
42018014	No Jisos fɛ nɛn, mum gay lɛ, “Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben lɛ wee wvù to fii shile wɛ to buy no booke ɛ̂ wvú yew nu teytey ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛjise ɛfey wee Falasii wɛ. Ɛ̀ nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no wee tfuu wvù bensee ɛkolɛ kew nu ɛ bó nu ke eshike lo wvú, ɛ wee tfuu wvù shiwse ɛkolɛ kew, nu ɛ bó nu ke ebense lo wvú.”
42018015	Ɛ bonyii ke nɛ no too bô boom bo caan caan fô Jisos e lɛ wvú ekum bó le. Ɛ boom bew bo ŋgoo le yɛn nonɛn, no saake lo bó.
42018016	Geenɛn, ɛ Jisos tee boom bodvu lɛ bó etoò, mum jeme ɛ̂ boom bew bo ŋgoo le lɛ, “Ben ecinɛ ɛ́ boom bo caan caan etoo fô me le. Fo ben ejewsè bó kɛ, njefo bvunfon bvu Nyo' le nu ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô bonyii diɛwɛ boban e.
42018017	Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy lɛ, ɛ́ wee baa efiisɛn bvunfon bvu Nyo' le kɛ diɛwɛ wan wvu caan e, wvú saa ke eyuu eley bvunfon bvudvu le kɛ.”
42018018	Ɛ wee wvu baay mvu bife ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Wee n'yɛɛyi, wo wvù wee wvù jee, fiɛɛ fì me ŋkɛŋke keeŋge nsɛ ŋkɛŋkɛ nshii wvù mɛy lo nu la?”
42018019	Ɛ Jisos bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wo teŋe me lɛ wee wvù jee nje la? Kɛ wee nu dvú wvù jee kɛ. Ɛ̀ nu kɛ Nyo' maaŋ wvù jee.
42018020	Geenɛn, keetu jim yî fiɛɛ fì wo be bife le, wo kee kɛ bonci bò duu lɛ, ‘Fo wo ejaŋ kpwɛɛ wee, fo wo eyu wee, fo wo ecoŋ bvucoŋ, fo wo eben jim nsaw mbiay’, bô wvù lɛ, ‘Ɛ̀ wvumtè ico bô bwoo’ le?”
42018021	Ɛ wvú tfuse lɛ, “Bonci ban bocii nu ɛ me nto ŋkɛw wase no ŋgɛɛle naa ɛ me mbɛɛ cuwee.”
42018022	Ɛ Jisos yuw nonɛn, gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Tu fiɛɛ nu ɛ shɛɛ fimwaaŋ fì wo bɛɛ ege. Gɛnɛ egese mwɛɛm mwuw mvunciim, egaw bigew bidvu ɛ̂ bonyii bò fuute, ɛ́ wo ke emum ekɛŋke bvukukɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu woŋ Nyo' le. Ɛ́ wo dioo ɛ ge nonɛn, emum eto ebii me le.”
42018023	Ɛ wvú yuw nonɛn, ɛ ye keeshɛ lo wvú, njefo wvú to kɛŋke kpwaw baay.
42018024	Ɛ Jisos taa wvú nɛn, gay lɛ, “Fí tɛmyi baay fô wee kpwaw e keeley bvunfon bvu Nyo' le.
42018025	Ɛ fí tɛmyi naa baay fô wee kpwaw e keeley bvunfon bvu Nyo' le fele no fí tɛmyi fô nyambala le keeley ɛ̂ jise di tase le.”
42018026	Ɛ bonyii bò to nu fó yuw nonɛn, mum bife lɛ, “Ɛ́ ɛ̀ fɛn nu nonɛn, ɛ́ ke eyuu eboy yɛɛ?”
42018027	Ɛ Jisos tfuse lɛ, “Kɛ fiɛɛ fì ghaake bonyii keege nulo eghaw Nyo' keege kɛ.”
42018028	Ɛ Bita gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Taa eyɛn, bese nu ɛ cinɛ wase mwɛɛm mvusɛse le, ɛ no bii wo le.”
42018029	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy lɛ kɛ wee yaa nu dvú wvù nu ɛ cinɛ la diew e, kɛnɛɛ kpwese bô boom e, kɛnɛɛ boom bo bwee le, kɛnɛɛ ice bô bwee le nje bvunfon bvu Nyo' le,
42018030	wvù nu ke enu sɛ wvú ɛ kɛŋkɛ bonyii bô mwɛɛm nteen yî nshii wvun e mvù fele mvù wvú cine le kɛ. Ɛ ɛ̀ nu ke edioo enu kefew ke nshii wvù too le, ɛ́ wvú ekɛŋke nshii wvù mɛy lo.”
42018031	Ɛ Jisos ke nɛ jo boom bew bo ŋgoo le bo yuufe ncow bofɛɛ ɛ bô bó base ye. Ɛ wvú gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben eyekɛ eyuw, beene bene wase Jɛlusalɛm, ɛ beene nu eben ebuy jó ɛ́ fiɛɛ ficii fì bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le to saŋɛɛ ɛkumɛ wee wvù diee nu Waawee eto ekocɛn.
42018032	Fí ɛ mum ɛ no nu lɛ bó nu ke enya wvú can bitum e, ɛ́ bó ebuu wvú, nan'yi wvú, cuyte ncɛŋ yî ye le.
42018033	Bó nu ke etam wvú bô boŋgbwan, eyu wvú, ɛ́ ke edioo enu ɛdiuw ɛta, ɛ́ wvú ebuy yî kpwe le.”
42018034	Ɛ Jisos jeme nonɛn, ɛ fí ffumse bó, ɛ bó faŋɛ yaa cim kiɛɛ laa wvú jeme lɛ la lɛ, njefo fiɛɛ fimew to nu ɛ ge lɛ fo bó ekiɛɛ kɛ.
42018035	Ɛ Jisos ke dioo feŋene kelaante kè Jɛliku, ɛ kenfefe kemew ɛ shii diuw je le lɛke mwɛɛm.
42018036	Ɛ wvú yuw no kebombom ke bonyii le kfune fele, mum bife lɛ laa ɛ̀ sɛ nu la lɛ.
42018037	Ɛ bó tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ ɛ̀ nu Jisos wvu Nasalɛt ɛ wvú fele.
42018038	Ɛ wvú mum kɛw no wamte lɛ, “Jisos, Waa Nfon Dawe, camɛ kɛ shen fô me le.”
42018039	Ɛ bonyii bò to saa fwe wam lɛ wvú ebaŋ lo. Geenɛn ɛ wvú bvuu mɛse wam lo foweɛwe lɛ, “Waa Nfon Dawe, camɛ shen fô me le.”
42018040	Ɛ Jisos yuw, leem gay lɛ bó eto bô wvú. Ɛ bó to bô wvú, ɛ Jisos bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ,
42018041	“Wo gomte lɛ me eŋge la fô wo le?” Ɛ wvú tfuse lɛ, “Tata, geɛ ɛ́ me en'yɛne mwɛɛm e.”
42018042	Ɛ Jisos mum gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ̀ yɛnè lɛ mwɛɛm e. Fitele fiuw fì wo lese yî yɛm e nu ɛ ge wase ɛjisɛ ɛyo ɛ yene.”
42018043	Kaŋ mwaaŋ nonɛn, ɛ wvú mum kase kɛw no yɛne mwɛɛm e. Ɛ wvú mum nɛ no bii Jisos e tumte moŋkum mo Nyo' le. Ɛ bonyii bocii bò to nu fó yɛn, nya mbense ɛ̂ Nyo'.
42019001	Ɛ Jisos gɛn ley ɛ̂ kelaante kè Jɛliku le, no fele.
42019002	Ɛ wee mvu to nu jó ɛ diee nu lɛ Sakio, ɛ ɛ̀ nu cee ɛkolɛ bonyii bò to fii shile, nu tɛn cee kpwaw.
42019003	Ɛ wvú no gomte keeyɛn Jisos e no wvú to fele. Geenɛn, ɛ fí ghaw njefo wvú to kfufene lo, ɛ kebombom ke bonyii le baŋyi wvú.
42019004	Ɛ wvú mum lewtɛ gɛn fwe, gɛn ben yî kete kemew e lɛ Jisos ke edioo efele ɛ́ wen eyɛn wvú le.
42019005	Ɛ Jisos ke gɛn buy fó, laŋ jise yɛn wvú le fowe, tee lɛ, “Sakio, shiilɛ cekey eto, njefo me ŋkɛŋke keence ɛ̂ wo yew ɛbɛn.”
42019006	Ɛ wvú mum son shii yî kete kiɛ le, fiisɛn Jisos bô nlaŋlaŋ.
42019007	Ɛ bonyii bocii bò to yɛnɛɛ no Jisos to gɛne bô wvú mum kɛw no wvukene gayte lɛ, “Wee wvun gɛne wase keegɛn ce bô wee wvù befe.”
42019008	Ɛ bó gɛn dioo nu, ɛ Sakio ke nɛ leem we gay ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Tata, taa eyɛn, me nu eŋgaw mwɛɛm mwem ɛntelɛŋ enya ɛ̂ bonyii bò fuute. Ɛ́ ɛ̀ nu lɛ me ŋke nu ɛ nfiw wase wee, ɛ́ me eŋkase entfuse bokaŋ bonɛw ɛ̂ mwɛtɛn.”
42019009	Ɛ Jisos yuw nonɛn, gay lɛ, “Ɛbɛn nu ɛ bonyii bo yew fɛn ɛ boy wase, no cee la wvun nu tɛn waa Abla'am.
42019010	Wee wvù diee nu Waawee to to keegom bonyii bò nu ɛ lakɛn wase, eboyse bó.”
42019011	No bonyii to yeke no Jisos jemyi mwɛɛm mvun, ɛ wvú ke nɛ ma ŋgan mvu ɛ̂ bó, njefo ɛ̀ to shɛɛte wase caan ɛ́ wvú eley Jɛlusalɛm, ɛ bonyii kpwaake lɛ sekemew lɛ ɛ̀ shɛke wase caan ɛ́ Nyo' ekɛw esaake bvunfon bwew.
42019012	Ɛ wvú gay lɛ, “Ɛ̀ to nu kefew kemew e, ɛ waa nfon mvu nɛ woŋ wvubole no gɛne woŋ wvumew e ncejole lɛ bó egɛn eghaa wvú nfon e, ɛ́ wvú sɛ kase eto esaake bvunfon bwew.
42019013	Ɛ wvú ke dioo nɛn'yi, tee boom bew bo lemme le yuufe, gaw bigew ɛ̂ bó ɛkɛlɛ ɛkɛlɛ, gay lɛ, ‘Ben eko eshɛɛ egeè way dvú fô me ntoo.’
42019014	Ɛ wvú mum nɛ, ɛ bonyii bo woŋ we le to bane wvú baay. Ɛ bó mum shɛɛ tum bonyii ɛ̂ wvú ɛjim lɛ bó egɛn egay lɛ kɛ bowen kooŋke wee wvudvu lɛ wvú enu nfon bowen kɛ.
42019015	Ɛ bó ke gɛn kɛ ghaa wvú. Ɛ wvú ke tu jim, tee boom bew bo lemme le ba bò wvú to gawɛɛ bigew ɛ̂ bó lɛ wen eyɛn laa bó se nu ɛ shɛɛ ɛ ge way ɛ die sɛw ɛ.
42019016	Ɛ wvu fwe to gay lɛ, ‘Cee ɛkolɛ, ɛkɛlɛ kuw ke bigew e kè wo to nyaɛ ɛ̂ me nu ɛ me ɛ nshɛɛ ɛ ndie sɛw jó bikele yuufe.’
42019017	Ɛ wvú yuw njoŋ, bɛɛle wvú gay lɛ, ‘Wo nu waa lemme wvù jee. No wo se nu ɛ shɛɛ ɛ kiɛɛ keetaa fô fiɛɛ fi caan e ntay, me nu eŋgɛɛ wo ɛ́ wo esaakè bontɛw yuufe.’
42019018	Ɛ wvumvu tɛn to gay lɛ, ‘Cee ɛkolɛ, ɛkɛlɛ kuw ke bigew e kè wo to nyaɛ ɛ̂ me nu ɛ me ɛ nshɛɛ ɛ ndie sɛw jó bikele bitin.’
42019019	Ɛ wvú gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, ‘Me nu eŋgɛɛ wo ɛ́ wo esaakè bontɛw botin.’
42019020	Ɛ wvumvu waa lemme to gay fiew lɛ, ‘Cee ɛkolɛ, ɛkɛlɛ kuw ke bigew e kin fɛn ɛ me ɛ nshɛɛ ɛ ŋkule ɛ̂ njaw ndvu le ɛ ŋgɛɛ.
42019021	Me nse ŋgɛke njefo wo tɛmyi ɛjim, ɛ me nfane wo. Wo ké nu sɛ wo nu ɛ gɛɛ ŋkuuŋ, mum to no joo lo. Ɛ́ ké dioo nu sɛ wo nu ɛ jewe fiɛɛ, mum to no gbweci lo.’
42019022	Ɛ cee ɛkolɛ we gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, ‘Wo nu wan wvù befe. Njeme wvù buy diuw wo le nu wvù me nu enjo ensaw wo dvú. Wo se kee lɛ me ntɛmyi ɛjim, ɛ́ me ndioo nu sɛ me ɛ ŋgɛɛ fiɛɛ ŋkuuŋ, mum nto no joo lo, ŋké ndioo nu sɛ me nu ɛ njewe fiɛɛ mum nto no ŋgbweci lo.
42019023	Wo se kee nonɛn, ɛ se ɛ ge la fo wo ejo bigew biem egɛn egɛɛ ntfu, wvu lɛ seke me ɛ ŋkase enfi bô sɛw?’
42019024	Ɛ wvú mum gay ɛ̂ bonyii bò to leeme mbew ye le lɛ, ‘Ben efi ɛkɛlɛ ke bigew e kedvu ɛ̂ wvú, enya ɛ̂ wvù kɛŋke bikele bi bigew e yuufe.’
42019025	Ɛ bó kacɛ lo, gay lɛ, ‘Cee ɛkolɛ, wvú kɛŋke wase bikele bi bigew e yuufe.’
42019026	Ɛ wvú gay lɛ, ‘Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben lɛ wee wvù kɛŋke fiɛɛ nu ɛ bó nu ke ebise. Geenɛn ɛ wee wvù baa kɛŋke, nu ɛ naa fi caan fì wvú kɛŋke nu ɛ bó nu ke efi lo ɛ̂ wvú.
42019027	Yî keseen e, bonyii ba bò se bane me, tune lɛ fo me enu nfon wvubo kɛ, ben egɛn eto bô bó eyuwyɛ ɛ̂ me ɛjise.’”
42019028	Ɛjim jodvu no Jisos to jemyɛɛ mwɛɛm mvun, mum nɛ no saa fwe bene gɛne Jɛlusalɛm.
42019029	Ɛ wvú ke dioo feŋene ntɛw wvù Bɛtfaj bô wvù Bɛtani bò nu mbew Kum Bite bi Olif e, mum baa boom bew bo ŋgoo le bomew bofɛɛ tum,
42019030	gay lɛ, “Ben egɛn ntɛw wvu fwe we le. Ben nu ke edioo eleyte jó, eyɛn waa kembɛɛbey e ɛ bó ɛ suu ɛ wee ke baa ben wase yî dvú le kɛ, ɛ́ ben efay eto dvú fɛn.
42019031	Ɛ́ ben gɛn ɛ no fayte, wee ɛ no biite lɛ laa ben fayte nje la lɛ, ɛ́ ben tfuse lɛ Cee Ɛkolɛ kɛŋke shiee wvudvu.”
42019032	Ɛ boom bo ŋgoo le ba gɛn yɛn fiɛɛ ficii le kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no wvú to jemyɛɛ.
42019033	Ɛ bó ke dioo fayte waa kembɛɛbey wvudvu, ɛ bonyii bò to kɛŋke bife lɛ, “Ben fayte waa kembɛɛbey wɛ nje la?”
42019034	Ɛ bó tfuse lɛ, “Cee Ɛkolɛ kɛŋke shee wvudvu.”
42019035	Ɛ bó mum jo to dvú fô Jisos e, yɛy bikum bibole yî kembɛɛbey kedvu le, mum bense Jisos yî dvú le.
42019036	Ɛ wvú no gɛne, ɛ bonyii yɛyte bikum bibole ɛ̂ je, ɛ wvú fele yî dvú le.
42019037	Ɛ wvú ke gɛn lɛ wen efeŋene fò je booke yî Kum Bite bi Olif e, ɛ kebombom ke bonyii bew bo ŋgoo le sɛsɛ no wvuuyi bensee Nyo' foweɛwe nje biŋghaw bi mwɛɛm e bicii bì bó to yɛnɛɛ.
42019038	Ɛ bó no wvuuyi gayte lɛ, “Nyo' nu ɛ laŋ kembonɛn yî Nfon wvù too ɛ̂ diee di Tata le. Nyɛkeey nu fowe, ɛ bvukukɛ nu bvu Nyo' wvu fowe le.”
42019039	Ɛ Bofalasii bomew bò to nu ɛ̂ kebombom ɛnte mum nɛ gay ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Wee n'yɛɛyi, kanɛ bonyii buw bo ŋgoo le ban lɛ bó ebaŋ lo.”
42019040	Ɛ Jisos tfuse lɛ, “Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben lɛ, ɛ́ bó ecim ebaŋ lo, naa ɛ́ ɛta ɛyan ewvuuyi.”
42019041	Ɛ Jisos ke dioo buy mbew Jɛlusalɛm e, taa jo nɛn, kɛse bô kpwe,
42019042	no taaŋke lɛ, “O Jɛlusalɛm, ɛ́ ben ban be kee kɛ naa fiɛɛ fì nulo eto bô nyɛkeey fô ben e yî diuu di ɛbɛn e. Geenɛn keseen sɛ ben kee lo ŋkuuŋ.
42019043	Nonɛn, ben ekeè lɛ kefew too lo kè bonyii bonɛn bo bvuban e nu ke eto ebom ketaaŋ egem ben dvú ekɛɛkɛɛ, ebaŋ ben ɛnte.
42019044	Bó nu ke eley efiwsɛ lo ben naa noo boom bonɛn, ebvuw yéw yene, ɛ́ tɛ saa eshɛɛ yî dimew e kɛ. Ɛ fí nu ke ekooy nonɛn njefo ben to baa kiɛɛ kefew kè Nyo' to toɛ ɛ̂ ben e kɛ.”
42019045	Ɛ Jisos ke gɛn fô yew ncese le, no kuuŋke bonyii bò to geese mwɛɛm fó
42019046	gayte ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Fí nu ɛ bo ɛ saŋ ɛ Nyo' gayte lɛ, ‘Yew yɛm nu ke enu yew bunle.’ Geenɛn ben ɛ baŋke ɛ tu ‘Tfum bocooŋ.’”
42019047	Ɛ Jisos no shee yɛɛyi bonyii fô yew ncese le ɛdiuw ɛcii. Ɛ bocee ncese bo baay baay bô bonyii bò to duŋci bonci bo Nyo' le noo bonyii bo baay baay bo jó no wɛɛntene keeyu wvú.
42019048	Geenɛn faŋɛ yaa kɛŋkɛ je kɛ, njefo bonyii bocii to shee kɛ lo mbew Jisos e yaa gomte keesoy lo fiɛɛ fimwaaŋ fô mwɛɛm mvù wvú to yɛɛyi le kɛ.
42020001	Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu diuu dimew ɛ Jisos no yɛɛyi bonyii, bvuu fewci saaka wvù jee wvù wvu Nyo' ɛ̂ bó fô yew ncese le. Ɛ bocee ncese bo baay baay bô bonyii bò duŋci bonci bo Nyo' le noo bonyii bò saake woŋ to,
42020002	bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Kɛ see ɛ̂ bese wee wvù nya mvuŋgay lɛ wo egee mwɛɛm mvun? Ɛ̀ nya yɛɛ mvuŋgay mvudvu ɛ̂ wo?”
42020003	Ɛ Jisos tfuse lɛ, “Me tɛn nu embife fiɛɛ ɛ̂ ben. Ben esee ɛ̂ me keseen.
42020004	Mvuŋgay mvù Jon to leese bonyii dvú ɛ̂ joo to nya Nyo' nuu wee wvu wum ɛ?”
42020005	Ɛ bó mum koo ntfum ɛbonɛbon lɛ, “Ɛ́ beene tfuse lɛ ɛ̀ to nya Nyo', ɛ́ wvú ebife ɛ̂ beene lɛ laa ɛ ɛ̀ ge la fo beene ebee Jon e lɛ?
42020006	Ɛ́ beene tfuse lɛ ɛ̀ to nya wee wvu wum, ɛ́ bonyii etumyɛ beene bô ɛta, njefo bó nu ɛ bee cɛɛy cɛɛy lɛ Jon to nu wee ntum Nyo'.”
42020007	Nonɛn, ɛ bó mum tfuse lɛ, “Kɛ bese kee wee wvù to nyaɛ kɛ.”
42020008	Ɛ Jisos mum gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Tu kɛ me nu ensee tɛn ɛ̂ ben wee wvù nya mvuŋgay ɛ̂ me lɛ me eŋgee mwɛɛm mvun kɛ.”
42020009	Ɛ Jisos mum nɛ kɛw no maa ŋgan ɛ̂ bonyii lɛ, “Wee mvu to nu ɛ lem wɛɛ mvuntam mvù bó keenci mbvuum dvú. Ke tɛse wɛɛ wvudvu ɛ̂ bonyii, mum nɛ gɛn ketum kemew e, gɛn ce jó baay.
42020010	Ɛ kefew kè bó ké no kooyte ke to kocɛn, ɛ wvú tum waa we lemme lɛ wvú egɛn efi mvuwene mvuntam. Ɛ wvú gɛn, ɛ bonyii bò wvú to tɛsɛɛ wɛɛ ɛ̂ bó, kaa suŋ lo wvú kuŋ ɛ wvú tu jim cancan.
42020011	Ɛ wee wvudvu bvuu tum wvumvu waa lemme, ɛ bó bvuu suŋ wvuwɛ, shoose wvú, kuŋ ɛ wvú tu jim cancan.
42020012	Ɛ wvú bvuu tum wvumvu lɛ botɛte, ɛ bó lɛmse wvú, tfume ɛkfuŋ.
42020013	Ɛ wee wvudvu kpwawcɛ lɛ, ‘Me nu eŋge nɛɛ? Me nu ntum wase keseen ɛ ɛ̀ nu waa wɛm wvù nu fitele fiem. Sekemew ɛ́ bó egɛn ewvum wvú.’
42020014	Ɛ wan wɛ gɛn ley wɛne, ɛ bonyii ba bò bó to tɛsɛɛ wɛɛ ɛ̂ bó yɛn wvú le, tfumtfum ɛbonɛbon lɛ, ‘Wvun nu ndiela wee wɛɛ wvun. Beene eyu wvú emum eyow wɛɛ wvun.’
42020015	Ɛ bó mum koo wvú, bvuse wɛne, yu.” No Jisos fɛ nonɛn, mum bife lɛ, “Ben kpwaake lɛ wee wɛɛ wvudvu nu ke eto ege nɛɛ bô bonyii ba?
42020016	Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben lɛ wvú nu ke eto elɛse lo bonyii bodvu, etɛse wɛɛ wvudvu ɛ ɛ̀ nu wase ɛ̂ bonyii bomew.” No bonyii yuw nonɛn, kacɛ lo lɛ, “Nyo' elɛwsè.”
42020017	Ɛ Jisos taa bó nɛn, bife lɛ, “Tu fiɛɛ fin fì bó saŋ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le jemyi lɛ la, fì nu lɛ, ‘Tɛ didvu diɛ dì bonyii bo kembom e to tunɛɛ, to nu ɛ kase nɛ tu tɛ di buu di yew e?’
42020018	Ɛ tɛ didvu din nu, ɛ́ wee gbwe yî dvú le ecaafiɛ lo, ɛ́ dí gbwe yî wee le, ɛ́ mwɛtɛn efooncɛ lo.”
42020019	No Jisos ma ŋgan wvudvu nonɛn, ɛ bonyii bò to duŋci bonci bo Nyo' le bô bocee ncese bo baay baay mum no gomte lɛ bó ekoo wvú kɛ fó. Bó to gomte keekoo wvú njefo bó to nu ɛ kiɛɛ lɛ wvú ma ŋgan wvudvu ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ bó, geenɛn fan bonyii.
42020020	Ɛ bó mum no bii bikaa biew e, kew bonyii, tum ɛ bó gɛn no keele wvú buwse lɛ bó nu bonyii bò jee. Ɛ bó to gee nonɛn keeyuw fiɛɛ diuw we le emum ekoo wvú enya can wee wvu Lum wvù saake keba kekiɛ le.
42020021	Ɛ bonyii bodvu mum nɛ bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wee n'yɛɛyi, bese kee lɛ mwɛɛm mvù wo jemyi noo mvù wo yɛɛyi nu mvu lɛŋ, ɛ kɛ wo taale jise di wee le kɛ. Wo ké no yɛɛyi kecɛɛy ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì Nyo' gomte lɛ bonyii egeè.
42020022	Bese ɛ mum ɛ no biite lɛ laa nci nu ɛ bee lɛ beene elaaŋke shile ɛ̂ Kaysa Nfon wvu Lum ɛ?”
42020023	Ɛ Jisos kiɛɛ fiɛɛ fì bó wɛɛntene bô fí gay lɛ,
42020024	“Ben kɛ eto bô danali mwaaŋ ɛ́ me en'yɛn.” Ɛ bó to dvú ɛ wvú bife lɛ, “Ɛkolɛ kin kè nu yî dvú le nu ke yɛɛ le, ɛ diee din nu di yɛɛ le?” Ɛ bó tfuse lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu ke Kaysa le, ɛ diee nu kɛ tɛn diew.”
42020025	Ɛ Jisos mum gay lɛ, “Ben emum enyaà lɛ ɛ̂ Kaysa fiɛɛ fì ɛ̀ nu fi Kaysa le, enyaà ɛ̂ Nyo' fì ɛ̀ nu fi Nyo' le.”
42020026	Ɛ bonyii ba yuw ɛ fí ffumse bó, ɛ bó mɛy diuw tfu faŋɛ yaa kɛŋkɛ fiɛɛ fì bó ekoo wvú yî dvú le ɛ̂ bonyii ɛjise ɛnte jo mwɛɛm mvù wvú to jemyi le kɛ.
42020027	Ɛ bonyii bomew ŋgoo Bosadusii le ke nɛ to keebife fiɛɛ ɛ̂ Jisos. Bosadusii ban to nu bonyii bò to duu lɛ kɛ bonyii nu ke ekase ebuy yî kpwe le kɛ.
42020028	Ɛ bó to bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wee n'yɛɛyi, Muses to nu ɛ saŋ ɛ̂ nci wesebeene le lɛ, ‘Ɛ́ wee kɛŋke kpwoon ɛ ke ɛ kpwe sɛ bô wvú nu ɛ boo wan, tu waa bwee kɛŋke keegɛɛ kpwoon wvudvu ɛ́ bô wvú eboo boom ɛ̂ diee di ŋkfu waa bwee le.’
42020029	Keseen, boom bo wee mvu le to nu bosooshwiy, ɛ wvu ŋgaywee ke kɛŋkɛ kpwoon, ke kpwe sɛ bô wvú ɛ kɛŋkɛ wan.
42020030	Ɛ ɛjimɛ kew gɛɛ kpwoon wvudvu, ke kpwe tɛn sɛ wan.
42020031	Ɛ ɛjimɛ ke wvuwɛ le bvuu gɛɛ tɛn kpwoon wvudvu, ke kpwe tɛn sɛ wan. Ɛ fí ke kooy kɛ nonɛn bô boom bo bosooshwiy bodvu bocii, ɛ mvu bó le faŋɛ yaa boo wan bô kpwoon wvudvu kɛ.
42020032	Ɛjim jodvu ɛ kpwoon wvudvu kpwe tɛn.
42020033	No bonyii bo bosooshwiy bodvu to nu ɛ jo kpwoon wvudvu bocii, ɛ̀ nu ke enu seke bonyii kaase buyte yî kpwe le, ɛ́ wvú enu kpwɛɛ yɛɛ?”
42020034	Ɛ Jisos tfuse lɛ, “Yî woŋ wvu keseen e nu ɛ bolemsɛ bô bokɛnɛ taashi bvujen.
42020035	Geenɛn, ɛ bonyii bò nu ɛ kocɛn keeke ekɛŋke bvudvuu yî woŋ wvù too le seke bó ɛ kase ɛ buy yî kpwe le yaa nu ke etaashi bvujen kɛ, ɛ bonyii yaa bɛɛ ke enyaa boom ɛ bó taashi bvujen kɛ.
42020036	Kɛ bó bɛɛ ke ebvuu ekpwekɛn kɛ, njefo bó nu ke enu wase kɛ diɛwɛ bonceendaa bo Nyo' le. Bó nu ke enu wase boom bo Nyo' le, njefo bó nu ɛ kase wase ɛ buy yî kpwe le.
42020037	Kecɛɛy kedvu nu lɛ Muses kebɛɛ to nu ɛ yuuse lɛ bonyii nu ke ekase ebuy yî kpwe le no wvú to saŋɛɛ ɛkumɛ kete kè wvú to yɛnɛɛ ɛ kí bɛɛnci. Wvú teŋe Tata ɛ̂ bvudvuu bvu ŋwa' le bvudvu lɛ wvú nu Nyo' Abla'am, nu Nyo' Aysik bvuu nu Nyo' Yakow.
42020038	Ɛ́ wvú teŋe nonɛn, tu boŋkfu ban nu bonyii ɛ bó nu dvú, kɛ Nyo' nu Nyo' boŋkfu kɛ, ɛ̀ nu Nyo' bonyii bò nu dvú, njefo fô Nyo' le nu ɛ bonyii bocii nu boyuum.”
42020039	No Jisos jeme nonɛn ɛ bonyii bò to duŋci bonci bo Nyo' le bɛnse wvú gay lɛ, “Wee n'yɛɛyi, wo nu ɛ loocɛ ɛ tfuse lɛŋ.”
42020040	Kɛ nonɛn, ɛ wee faŋɛ yaa ebvuu emom lo ebife fiɛɛ ɛ̂ wvú kɛ.
42020041	Ɛ Jisos mum nɛ bife fiew ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Bonyii ghan nɛɛ ɛ sɛ no gayte lɛ Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ nu waa Nfon Dawe?
42020042	Kɛ ben kee lɛ Dawe kebɛɛ to nu ɛ saŋ ɛ Ŋwa' Mbense le lɛ, ‘Tata Nyo' to nu ɛ gay ɛ̂ Tata wɛm lɛ wvú eshii ɛ̂ ɛbo kew ke ɛcɛɛy e,
42020043	egɛn ebuy seke wen ke ejike bonyii bew bo bvuban e ɛ́ wvú etome bikaa biew yî bó le diɛwɛ kedvuushɛɛ ke bikaa biew e.’
42020044	Ɛ́ Dawe teŋe wvú lɛ Tata wen, ɛ́ wvú ebvuu eghan nɛɛ sɛ no nu waa we?”
42020045	Ɛ Jisos mum nɛ no jemyi wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ boom bew bo ŋgoo le ɛ bonyii bocii yuuke. Wvú to nu ɛ gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ,
42020046	“Ben eyɛnè ɛkumɛ bonyii bò duŋci bonci bo Nyo' le. Bó kooŋke keetfumyi bikum bì dewkene kale dvú, kooŋke lɛ bó egayte bó le ɛ̂ way bô n'wvum. Ɛ bó bvuu kooŋke keeshiile yî bintaw bi fwe le yéw bunle le. Ɛ́ bó ké egɛn fô ŋkaw e, no kooŋke kɛ keeshii ɛ ɛ̀ nu fwe.
42020047	Ɛ ɛ̀ bvuu nu kɛ bó bò shiwse bokɛ' bo boŋkfu le, lɛɛle bó fii mwɛɛm mvubole, mum gee dibunle dì dewkene keeduŋci ye. Bonyii bodvu ban nu ɛ wvubo ŋgɛw nu ke efo lo.”
42021001	Ɛ Jisos ke nɛ laŋ jise, yɛn no bonyii bo kpwaw e gɛɛle nnya yibo ɛ̂ fiŋkuw fi nnya le fô yew ncese le.
42021002	Ɛ wvú yɛn tɛn kpwɛɛ ŋkfu mvu le ɛ ɛ̀ nu wee kefufe, ɛ wvú ɛ to ɛ gɛɛ mvunyinyi mvunfɛɛm ɛ̂ fiŋkuw fidvu le.
42021003	Ɛ wvú mum gay lɛ, “Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy lɛ kpwɛɛ ŋkfu wvun wvù nu naa wee kefufe nɛn, nu ɛ nya ɛ fey bonyii bocii bò be nyaa.
42021004	Bonyii bocii bò be nyaa, be too ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô tfúw kpwaw wvubo wvù nu ɛ yiŋsɛn wase ɛ no fuci kuse. Geenɛn ɛ kpwoon wvun no wvú nu kefufe kefufe nɛn nu ɛ wvú ɛ nya naa fiɛɛ ficii fì wvú bee keecee yî dvú le.”
42021005	Ɛ boom bo Jisos e bo ŋgoo le bomew ke nɛ no kumte ɛtalɛ ɛkumɛ yew ncese, bɛnsee ɛta yò jee yò bó to bomɛɛ dvú bô mwɛɛm mvù bonyii to nyaa ɛ bó seyse dvú. Ɛ wvú gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ,
42021006	“Ben yɛne mwɛɛm mvun e? Diuu too lo dì kɛ tɛ dimwaaŋ nu ke eshɛɛ yî dimew e sɛ bó ɛ base fokuse kɛ.”
42021007	Ɛ bó bife lɛ, “Wee N'yɛɛyi, fifin fiɛɛ nu ke ekooy seke la? Ɛ nciise wvù nu ke eduŋcɛ lɛ fí nu wase keekooy nu la?”
42021008	Ɛ Jisos tfuse lɛ, “Ben eyɛnè fo wee ke elɛɛ ben ɛ́ ben ejay je. Ben ekeè lɛ bonyii nu ke etoo nteen, joo diee diem tɛɛke fojise, ɛ wee duu lɛ, ɛ̀ nu wen wvù Mboyse, ɛ kefew too wase ncee. Bó dioo duu nonɛn, fo ben eyekè kɛ.
42021009	Seke ben ɛ yuw ɛ bó tumte jem mondvuum e mondvuum e, ɛ boŋgɛw nu woŋ e, fo ben efanè kɛ. Mwɛɛm mvun kɛŋke kɛ keeyaw ekooy. Geenɛn, ɛ mvú yaa mum duŋci lɛ woŋ nu eka sekedvu kɛ.”
42021010	Ɛ Jisos bvuu gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ketum nu ke etumte jem bô kemew, ɛ nfon mvu tumte jem bô wvumvu.
42021011	Biŋghaw bi mwɛɛm e nu ke ekooyi mondvuum e mondvuum e. Nshɛ nu ke eshiike bô mvuŋgay. Jeŋ nu ke ekoole, ɛ bincɛm nu ke enu mondvuum e monciim. Bonciise bò bɛmte nu ke eduŋci ye yî ɛbulɛ le nyaa nfan ɛ̂ bonyii.
42021012	Ben ekeè lɛ ɛ́ mwɛɛm mvudvu sɛ keeke ekooyi nu ɛ bó nu ke ekooyɛ ben, enyɛwle dvú. Bó nu ke egɛn bô ben, esaw yéw bunle le, eciinse ben yéw ncaw e. Ɛ bó nu ke ebvuu ejo ben egɛn dvú fwe dvu bonfon bô bonyii bò saake woŋ nje diee diem,
42021013	ɛ́ sekekiɛ emum enu kefew fô ben e keejeme ɛ̂ bó ɛkumɛ me.
42021014	Seke bó ɛ jo ben nonɛn, ɛ ben lese lo lɛ kɛ ben nu ebuuke lɛ laa ben nu egɛn etaŋe diuw lɛ la lɛ,
42021015	njefo ɛ̀ nu me wvù nu ke enya njeme diuw wene le, noo bvufee ɛ̂ ben. Kɛ bonyii bonɛn bo bvuban e yaa nu ke eleem, ekicɛn ben kɛ.
42021016	Bonyii bò nu ke egese ben nu ke enu kɛ bo'icee bonɛn bô bo bwee bonɛn, noo boom bo bwee wene le, noo kfuu dinɛn bô nsáa yene. Ɛ̀ nu ke enya kɛ bó ben ɛ́ bó sɛ yuwyɛ ben bomew.
42021017	Bonyii bocii nu ke ebane ben, nje diee diem.
42021018	Geenɛn, naa kɛ yvuw yimiaaŋ nu ke ela ɛ̂ ben ɛfa kɛ.
42021019	Ben ekuu kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu shém, ɛ́ ben ke emum ekɛŋke nshii.
42021020	Seke ben ɛ yɛn ɛ bonyii bo jem e ɛ gem wase kelaante kè Jɛlusalɛm ɛ tase, ɛ ben mum no kee lɛ kefew nu ɛ kocɛn wase kè bó nu ke efiwsɛ kí.
42021021	Fí ke dioo ɛ kooy nonɛn, ɛ bonyii bò nu Judea mum fɛɛ ben yî dikum e, ɛ bò nu ɛlaante jodvu buy. Fo wee wvù nu ŋkpwaante ebvuu etoò keeley jó kɛ.
42021022	Ɛdiuw yoya nu yò Nyo' nu ke elaŋ ŋgɛw yî Jɛlusalɛm e nje gee dibole, keege ɛ́ fí eto ekocɛn no bó nu ɛ saŋ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' we le.
42021023	Ŋgɛw wvu baay ɛdiuw yoya le nu ke enu wvu bokɛnɛ bò nu bô difue, noo bò yamsee boom e. Nyo' nu ke eton'yɛ shém bô bonyii ban, elaŋ ŋgɛw wvu baay yî woŋ wvun e.
42021024	Bó nu ke egbwocɛ lo bonyii bomew, ekooyɛ bomew egawcɛ ɛ́ bó egɛn enu bonfaw bitum e. Bonyii bò yaa kee kɛ Nyo' nu ke eben lo yî Jɛlusalɛm e, egɛn ebuy no kefew kebole nu ke ekocɛn.
42021025	Bonciise bò bɛmte nu ke eduŋci ye yî diuu le bô yî kpwee le noo yî jón e. Fí yî nshɛ le nu ɛ bitum nu ke enu yî monlum e, ŋgɛmtene no joo yi baay nu ke ekfune yole.
42021026	Nfan nu ke ege ɛ́ bonyii egule, ciiŋke nɛn kikikiki. Bó nu ke ekpwaake mwɛɛm mvù bɛmte mvù nu ke ekooy yî nshɛ le, njefo mwɛɛm mvu fowe mvunciim mvù kɛŋke mvuŋgay nu ke eshiike.
42021027	Nonɛn ɛ́ bonyii emum eyɛn no wee wvù diee nu Waawee shiile too ɛ̂ kembɛw e kɛŋke mvuŋgay noo bvukukɛ bvu baay.
42021028	Seke mwɛɛm mvun ɛ kɛw ɛ no kooyi, ɛ ben leem we, cake bikuu we, njefo kefew kè Nyo' nu eboyse ben nu wase nceencee.”
42021029	No Jisos jeme nonɛn, mum fewsɛn lɛ, “Ben eyɛɛyi fiɛɛ yî keŋgvum bô bite bimew bì ké yɛlɛ le.
42021030	Bí ké kɛɛke keecomte, ɛ ben mum kiɛɛ lɛ ɛkfuŋ kumene wase.
42021031	Ɛ̀ nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no ben nu ke edioo ɛ yɛn ɛ mwɛɛm mvun kooyi, ɛ́ ben emum ekiɛɛ lɛ bvunfon bvu Nyo' le nu wase nceencee.
42021032	Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy lɛ kɛ ɛŋgokɛ ke keseen kin nu ke eka sɛ mwɛɛm mvun mvunciim ɛ jo bvudvuu kɛ.
42021033	Ɛbulɛ bô nshɛ nu ke eka, geenɛn kɛ diɛw yɛm nu ke eyuu eshiw kɛ.
42021034	Ben eyɛnè fo ben eghanè diee ɛ ɛ̀ nu bikuu binɛn, wukene jewte, leese bvufee ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî nshii wvu fokuse fɛn e, ɛ́ diuu didvu ke enɛ esɛsɛ ekoo ben kɛ diɛwɛ ketam e.
42021035	Fiɛɛ fi yî diuu didvu din e nu ke eto yî bonyii bocii bò nu yî ɛkolɛ ke nshɛ le.
42021036	Ben emum eleemè tɛmyi, ebunleè Nyo' sekecii, wvu lɛ mvumvun mwɛɛm ke edioo ekooyi, ɛ́ wvú enya ben bô je yì ben elɛw efey jó sɛ leem fwe dvu wee wvù diee nu Waawee.”
42021037	Ɛ Jisos mum no shee yɛɛyi bonyii yew ncese le ɛdiuw yoya le ɛcii. Ɛ́ ké dioo nu fokiɛguu, ɛ wvú ben gɛn ce yî Kum Bite bi Olif e.
42021038	Ɛ́ bonyii bocii ké buy saa bvutfuu mum gɛn fô yew ncese le no yuuke n'yɛɛyi we.
42022001	Ɛ kefew ke Ŋkaw Blɛɛd wvù bó baa gɛɛ Fintuŋlɛɛn jó, wvù bó teŋe lɛ Ŋkaw Daŋɛfey e, ke no too wase nceencee.
42022002	Ɛ bocee ncese bo baay baay bô bonyii bò to duŋci bonci bo Nyo' le, no gomte je yì bó eyu Jisos jó ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ nnyilɛ le, njefo bó to fane bonyii.
42022003	Ɛ Satan ley ɛ̂ fitele fi Judas wvù bó to teŋe lɛ Iskaliot e, ɛ ɛ̀ nu wee ŋgoo boom bo Jisos e bo yuufe ncow bofɛɛ.
42022004	Ɛ wvú mum gɛn fô bocee ncese bo baay baay e bô bikuu bi nci le bì to cɛyte yew ncese. Ɛ bô bó mum seyse no wvú nu ke eghan sɛ gese Jisos ɛ̂ bó.
42022005	Ɛ bó yuw njoŋ mum kaw keelaw wvú bô bigew.
42022006	Ɛ wvú bee, mum gɛn kɛw no gomte je yì wvú nu enya Jisos jó can yibole ɛ̂ nnyilɛ le seke bonyii yaa nu kɛ.
42022007	Ɛ diuu di Ŋkaw Blɛɛd wvù bó baa gɛɛ Fintuŋlɛɛn jó dì bó ké no sɛɛle waa keyaw wvu Ŋkaw Daŋɛfey wvun e ke to kocɛn,
42022008	ɛ Jisos mum tum Bita bô Jon gay lɛ, “Ben egɛn eseyse mwɛɛm mvù beene nu ke edie Ŋkaw wvun dvú.”
42022009	Ɛ bó bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wo gomte lɛ bese egɛn eseyse ɛ ɛ̀ nu fɛɛ?”
42022010	Ɛ wvú tfuse lɛ, “Ben eyuw, seke ben leyte gɛne ɛlaante, ben nu ke eyɛn wee le ɛ wvú ɛ tuu joo ɛ̂ nshaan e, ɛ́ ben ebi wvú le yew dvù wvú nu egɛn eley e.
42022011	Ben dioo ɛ bi, gay ɛ̂ cee yew wvudvu lɛ Wee N'yɛɛyi biite lɛ laa kebuw ke bonyii bo ghane le kè bô boom bowene bo ŋgoo le nu edie Ŋkaw Daŋɛfey dvú nu fɛɛ lɛ?
42022012	Wvú nu ke emum eduŋcɛ kebuw ke baay yew yi ɛwe le ɛ bó ɛ loocɛ wase ɛ seyse, ɛ́ ben emum eseyse mwɛɛm mvudien dvú.”
42022013	Nonɛn, ɛ bó ke gɛn yɛn mwɛɛm e kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no Jisos to jemyɛɛ ɛ̂ bó. Ɛ bó mum seyse mwɛɛm mvudien mvu Ŋkaw Daŋɛfey e dvú.
42022014	Ɛ kefew ke to kocɛn, ɛ Jisos to ɛ bô boom bew bo ntum e shii no diekene.
42022015	Ɛ wvú nɛ gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Me nse ŋkooŋke naa baay keendie Ŋkaw Daŋɛfey wvun beene nsɛ n'yɛn ŋgɛw wvù too le.
42022016	Ben ekeè lɛ kɛ me mbɛɛ ŋke endie Ŋkaw wvun kɛ eŋgɛn ebuy no fí nu ke ekocɛn seke Nyo' nu ke esaake bvunfon bwew.”
42022017	Ɛ wvú jo fiko, nya keyoone ɛ̂ Nyo' gay lɛ, “Ben eko ewu ben bocii ekɛnɛn.
42022018	Me nseŋe lo ɛ̂ ben lɛ ɛ kɛw keseen ɛ gɛn lo, nu ɛ kɛ me mbɛɛ ŋke embvuu eŋ'wu mbvuum mo tweŋ kete kè lane le man kɛ, egɛn ebuy seke bvunfon bvu Nyo' le nu ke eto.”
42022019	Ɛ wvú jo blɛɛd, nya keyoone ɛ̂ Nyo', guushɛ nya ɛ̂ bó gay lɛ, “Fin nu ye yɛm ɛ me ɛ nya nje ben. Ben egeè fifin keekumyi me.”
42022020	Kɛ lɛŋ nonɛn no bó mɛsɛɛ mwɛɛm mvudien, ɛ wvú jo fiko jeme lɛ, “Fiko fin nu fi moŋkan mo monfɛm mò Nyo' gbwo bô ɛlɛmɛ kem kí ɛ buy nje ben.
42022021	Geenɛn, ben eyekɛ eyuw wee wvù nu egese me diekene fɛn bee wvú.
42022022	Ben ekeè lɛ wee wvù diee nu Waawee nu ke egɛn kɛ no Nyo' to seysɛɛ. Geenɛn, ŋgɛw wvu baay nu fô wee wvù gese wvú le.”
42022023	Ɛ bó mum kɛw no biite ɛ̂ bikuu bibole lɛ laa wee wvù nulo ege nonɛn ɛ̂ bó ɛntelɛŋ nu yɛɛ lɛ.
42022024	Ɛ bó ke nɛ kɛw mbew ɛbonɛbon lɛ laa bó sɛ nu nɛn ɛ wee wvu baay ɛ̂ bó ɛntelɛŋ nu yɛɛ lɛ?
42022025	Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Bonfon bo fokuse fɛn kɛŋke mvuŋgay ɛ̂ we jo bonyii bobole, ɛ bonyii bò saake woŋ gayte lɛ bó eteŋè bowen lɛ bibaw bi bonyii le.
42022026	Geenɛn, kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ fí enu nonɛn bô ben kɛ. Wee wvu baay ɛ̂ ben ɛntelɛŋ ejoò lɛ wen nu wan wvu caan, ɛ wee wvù nu ɛkolɛ nu diɛwɛ wee wvù lemte fô ben bocii le.
42022027	Wee wvu baay nu wvù la, wee wvù yeeme diekene lo, nuu wee wvù dɛɛle lɛ? Kɛ ɛ̀ nu wee wvù yeeme diekene lo le? Geenɛn ɛ me nu ɛ̂ ben ɛntelɛŋ diɛwɛ wee wvù lemte fô ben e.
42022028	No me nshee n'yɛne boŋgɛw sekecii, ɛ̀ nu kɛ ben ban bò ké no nu beene.
42022029	Fí mum ɛ̀ no nu lɛ, kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no Icɛm nu ɛ nya me bô bvunfon lɛ me ensaake, nu ɛ me ɛ nya tɛn mvuŋgay ɛ̂ ben keesaake.
42022030	Me nya wvu lɛ beene ke ediekene, wukene bvudvuu bvumwaaŋ ɛ̂ ntow wɛm e, ɛ́ ben eshii yî bokawla le, esaake dikfuu di Islael dì yuufe ncow difɛɛ.”
42022031	Ɛ Jisos mum ja tee Bita lɛ, “Semon, Semon ɛ̀ keè lɛ Satan nu ɛ fi mvuŋgay keecɛkɛn ben bocii ebvuse bomew kɛ diɛwɛ no wee ké fɛɛtɛn ɛgiŋ bvuse nyiim.
42022032	Geenɛn me nu ɛ mbunle fô wo le, lɛ fo fitele fiuw emum ebuy lo yî yɛm e kɛ. Seke wo ɛ kase ɛ tee bvufee bvuw jim, ɛ wo nya mvuŋgay ɛ̂ boom bo bwoo le.”
