42022033	Ɛ Bita gay lɛ, “Tata, ɛ́ ɛ̀ cim nu keegɛn ncaw kɛnɛɛ keekpwe lo, tu me nu kɛ bee wo.”
42022034	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Bita, yuw ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ wo, nyimshie nu ke enu lɛ yí etoŋ ɛbɛn, ɛ wo ɛ ma wase bokaŋ botɛte lɛ kɛ wo kee me kɛ.”
42022035	Ɛ wvú nɛ bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben kumyi seke me nto ntumɛɛ ben sɛ bigew, sɛ bikele noo sɛ bolaba, no ben to ghane, ben to nu ɛ tan fiɛɛ le?” Ɛ bó tfuse lɛ, “'Aay, bese to baa tan fiɛɛ kɛ.”
42022036	Ɛ wvú mum gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Yî keseen e, ɛ́ wee kɛŋke bigew, kɛnɛɛ ɛkɛlɛ, ɛ́ wvú jo. Ɛ́ wee baa kɛŋke nyo jem, ɛ́ wvú gese kekum kew guy nyo.
42022037	Me njemyi fin njefo fiɛɛ fì bó to saŋɛɛ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le lɛ, ‘Bó to nu ɛ taŋ wvú bô bonyii bò befe’, kɛŋke keekooy bô me keseen. Ben ekeè lɛ mwɛɛm mvù bó to saŋɛɛ ɛkumɛ me nu ɛ mvú too wase keekocɛn mvunciim.”
42022038	Ɛ bó mum sɛsɛ lɛ, “Cee ɛkolɛ, bese kɛŋke nyó jem yifiɛɛ.” Ɛ wvú tfuse lɛ, “Ben elu dvú nonɛn.”
42022039	Ɛ Jisos ke nɛ buy ɛlaante bô boom bew bo ŋgoo le, mum kɛw no bene Kum Bite bi Olif e, ɛ ɛ̀ nu no wvú to ké no gee.
42022040	Ɛ bó ke ben buy fô bó to gɛne, ɛ wvú gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben ebunleè fo mmom ke eto fô ben e, eghaw ben.”
42022041	No wvú gay nonɛn, mum bencɛ gɛn buy kɛ no ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wee etfume tɛ ɛ́ dí egɛn ebuy, mum tum ɛnvuw fokuse bunle lɛ,
42022042	“Icɛm, ɛ́ fí fɛn nu ɛ kpwɛn wo le, ɛ́ wo cake fiko fi ŋgɛw e fin fo me eŋ'wu. Geenɛn geɛ kɛ no wo kooŋke, fo wo ege no me ŋkooŋke kɛ.” [
42022043	No wvú bunle nonɛn, ɛ nceendaa Nyo' shii we to fô wvú le, nya wvú bô mvuŋgay.
42022044	Ɛ Jisos nu, ɛ fitele fiew buuke baay. Ɛ wvú bvuu bunle lo shiee le jimtene, ɛ njimtɛn cemceme fokuse kɛ diɛwɛ bitewtew bi ɛlɛmɛ le.]
42022045	Ɛ wvú bunle mɛse, tu jim fô boom bew bo ŋgoo le, yɛn ɛ yii ɛ ge wase bó ɛ dose ɛ no leete.
42022046	Ɛ wvú bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben kaa leete lo le? Ben eja we ebunleè fo mmom ke eto fô ben e, eghaw ben.”
42022047	Kɛ no wvú to bɛɛ jemyi, ɛ ŋgoo bonyii buynɛn ɛ ɛ̀ kaa nu Judas wvù to nu wee ŋgoo boom bo Jisos e bo yuufe ncow bofɛɛ wvù to saa fwe wvudvu. Ɛ wvú gɛn mbew Jisos e keeŋocɛ wvú.
42022048	Geenɛn, ɛ Jisos bife ɛ̂ Judas lɛ, “Wo fɛn gomte keeŋocɛ wee wvù diee nu Waawee nɛn keeduŋcɛ lɛ bó ekoo le?”
42022049	Ɛ boom bew bo ŋgoo le bò to nu mbew ye le yɛn fiɛɛ fì to nu keekooy e, bife lɛ, “Cee ɛkolɛ, bese egbwocɛ bonyii ban e?”
42022050	Ɛ wee mvu bó le dioo gbwoo, mum cun kentuŋtuŋ ke ɛcɛɛy ke nfwa ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le.
42022051	Ɛ Jisos kan lɛ, “Fo wee ebvuu emom kɛ,” mum kum kentuŋtuŋ ke wee wvudvu le ɛ kí mum kase tu fó.
42022052	Bonyii bò to toɛ keekoo Jisos to nu bocee ncese bo baay baay bô bikuu bi nci le bì to cɛyte yew ncese noo bonyii bò saake woŋ. Ɛ wvú bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben to keekoo me ɛ no too bô nyó noo bibuse kɛ diɛwɛ ben to keekoo ɛ ɛ̀ nu cooŋ e?
42022053	Me nse nu beene no diuu nu fô yew ncese le sɛ ben ekum me le nje la? Geenɛn, keseen nu kefew ke mvuŋgay mvu ɛjiwɛ le kè Satan ké no saake, ɛ ɛ̀ nu kè ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ ben ege fiɛɛ.”
42022054	Ɛ bonyii bodvu mum koo Jisos no gɛne bô wvú fô la di ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le, ɛ Bita bii ɛjim ntamndwee.
42022055	Ɛ bó gɛn fwɛɛ ŋguy fontelɛŋ fo lakfulɛɛŋ shii no yosene. Ɛ Bita mum to shii bô bó.
42022056	No ŋguy to bɛɛnci, ɛ wan kpwoon mvu wvù to lemte fô la didvu le ja yɛn Bita le ɛ wvú ɛ shii. Ɛ wvú taa wvú fojise ntay gay lɛ, “Wee wvun bee bô wee wvudvu.”
42022057	Ɛ Bita mum kacɛ lo gay lɛ, “Kpwoon wvun, kɛ me n'yaa ŋkee wee wvun kɛ.”
42022058	Ɛ kefew dioo bencɛ caan, ɛ wee mvu bvuu yɛn wvú le, bvuu gay lɛ, “Wo tɛn nu mvu ŋgoo yibole.” Geenɛn ɛ Bita gay lɛ, “Diemsɛn, kɛ me nu mvu bó le kɛ.”
42022059	Ɛ kefew bvuu gɛn buy kɛ diɛwɛ ntam kefew mwaaŋ e, ɛ wee mvu bvuu taam lɛ, “Kecɛɛy, kecɛɛy wee wvun bee bô wee wvudvu, njefo wvú nu tɛn wee wvu Galilee.”
42022060	Ɛ Bita bvuu tun gay lɛ, “Diemsɛn wvun, kɛ me n'yaa ŋkee fiɛɛ fì wo jemyi kɛ.” Kɛ no wvú to bɛɛ jemyi nonɛn, kaŋ mwaaŋ ɛ nyimshie mum toŋ.
42022061	Ɛ Tata baŋke ye ɛ ɛjisɛ ɛye tasɛn bô yo Bita. Ɛ Bita kume njeme wvù Jisos be jeme lɛ, “Nyimshie ke enu lɛ yí etoŋ ɛbɛn, ɛ wo ɛ ma wase me bokaŋ botɛte.”
42022062	Ɛ wvú nɛ fó buy ɛkfuŋ, bee kpwe baay.
42022063	Ɛ bonyii bò to jici Jisos e mum kɛw no kɛɛŋke bvuu suuŋke wvú,
42022064	sûm bvushiw bwew bô ndvu, gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Kɛ geɛ kewee ntum Nyo' kuw. Kɛ see wee wvù suŋ wo.”
42022065	Ɛ bó bvuu no baale wvú bô boncun nteen.
42022066	Ɛ bvú buy yuu ɛ bonyii bò saake woŋ bocii bô bocee ncese bo baay baay bocii noo bonyii bò duŋci bonci bo Nyo' le baancɛ ye. No bó baancɛɛ, mum jo Jisos gɛn bô wvú fô bó to ké no saake bonsaw.
42022067	No bó gɛnɛɛ bô wvú nonɛn, ɛ bó bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ́ ɛ̀ nu wo Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ, ɛ́ wo see ɛ̂ bese?” Ɛ wvú tfuse lɛ, “Ɛ́ me nseŋe lo ɛ̂ ben, ben saa ebee kɛ.
42022068	Ɛ́ me mbife fiɛɛ ɛ̂ ben, ben saa etfuse kɛ.
42022069	Geenɛn, ɛ kɛw yî keseen e, wee wvù diee nu Waawee nu ke eshii ɛ̂ ɛbo ke ɛcɛɛy ke Nyo' mvuŋgay e.”
42022070	Ɛ bó mum sɛsɛ bocii lɛ, “Ɛ̀ fɛn nu wo wvù Waa Nyo'?” Ɛ wvú tfuse lɛ, “Fí nu no ben gayte.”
42022071	Ɛ bó mum gay lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó ebvuu egomte wee wvù esee lɛ la? Beene nu ɛ yuw wase fiɛɛ fì wvú jeme bô diuw we.”
42023001	No bonyii bò saake bonsaw jemyɛɛ nonɛn, mum ja bocii jo Jisos no gɛne dvú fô Baylɛt e.
42023002	No bó gɛnɛɛ buy fó, mum kɛw no cuci mwɛɛm yî ye le, gayte lɛ, “Wee wvun nɛn ghane bvuŋse woŋ wese, tune fo bonyii elaaŋke shile ɛ̂ Kaysa Nfon wvu Lum, bvuu jemyi lɛ wen nu Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ, fì duŋci lɛ wvú nu nfon mvu.”
42023003	Ɛ Baylɛt bife ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu wo wvù Nfon Bojuu le?” Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu no wo gay.”
42023004	Ɛ Baylɛt mum nɛ jeme ɛ̂ bocee ncese bo baay baay bô bonyii bò to nu fó lɛ, “Me mbaa n'yɛn fiɛɛ fì wee wvun jay e kɛ.”
42023005	Ɛ bó bocii mum no taame kɛ lɛ, “Wee wvun ghane yɛɛyi bonyii bocii, bɛyse lɛ bó etɛmyi bikuu. Wvú to kɛw Galilee, to ghan Judea jocii, ɛ no nu wase ɛ̂ ɛlaante jan keseen.”
42023006	No Baylɛt yuw fin nonɛn, mum bife lɛ, “Wee wvun nu wee wvu Galilee le?”
42023007	Ɛ bó bee, ɛ wvú mum ciinse Jisos fô Nfon 'Ɛlod e, njefo ɛ̀ to nu wvú wvù to saake keba ke woŋ e kedvu, ɛ wvú to nu tɛn Jɛlusalɛm kefew kedvu le.
42023008	Ɛ bó gɛn bô Jisos, ɛ Nfon 'Ɛlod yɛn wvú le yuw njoŋ, njefo wvú to shee yuuke wase ɛkumɛ wvú, mum no kɛŋke shiee keeyɛn wvú le, shieele tɛn lɛ sekemew ɛ́ Jisos ege fiɛɛ fì duŋci mvuŋgay mvu Nyo' le ɛ́ wen eyɛn.
42023009	Ɛ wvú she biwcɛ mwɛɛm ɛ̂ Jisos nteen, geenɛn ɛ wvú faŋɛ yaa etfuse fiɛɛ kɛ.
42023010	Wvú to biwci ɛ bocee ncese bo baay baay bô bonyii bò to duŋci bonci bo Nyo' le leeme fó cuci mwɛɛm mvù tɛmyi yî Jisos e.
42023011	Ɛ Nfon 'Ɛlod bô bonyii bew bo nci le ke ja mum kɛw no kɛɛŋke bvuu sɛwsee wvú, tfume ndvu woŋ yî ye le, tfuse wvú ɛ bó no tuu dvú jim fô Baylɛt e.
42023012	Ɛ̀ to nu ɛ Baylɛt bô Nfon 'Ɛlod banene. Ɛbvubwɛ, ɛ bó tu nsán.
42023013	No bó tfusɛɛ Jisos jim, ɛ Baylɛt kum bocee ncese bo baay baay noo bonyii bò to saake woŋ, bvuu kum bonyii bocii.
42023014	Ɛ bó tase, ɛ wvú gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben be to bô wee wvun fɛn lɛ wvú gee ɛ bonyii tɛmyi bikuu, me ɛ ndioo ntasse mwɛɛm mvù ben taame dvú ɛ̂ ben ɛjise, ben eyekɛ eyuw, ɛ ŋfaŋɛ n'yaa n'yɛn lɛ mwɛɛm mvù ben cuci yî ye le nu ɛ wvú ɛ ge fimew kɛ,
42023015	ɛ Nfon 'Ɛlod be baa yɛn tɛn kɛ. Ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì be ge wvú ɛ kase ɛ tfuse wee wvun jim ɛ̂ beene. Ben eyɛn tɛn lɛ wee wvun baa jay fiɛɛ fì ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó eyu lo wvú kɛ.
42023016	Me nu entam kɛ lo wvú, encinɛ wvú le, ɛ́ wvú egɛne.”
42023017	[Ɛ̀ to ké dioo nu kefew ke Ŋkaw Daŋɛfey wvun e, ɛ Baylɛt no kɛŋke keebvuse wee mwaaŋ yew ncaw e enya ɛ̂ bonyii.]
42023018	Ɛ bonyii bocii mum nɛ kɛw no wamte lo gɛne dvú lɛ, “Lɛse lo wee wvun, ebvuse Balabas yew ncaw e enya ɛ̂ bese.”
42023019	Balabas wvun to nu yew ncaw e njefo wvú to nu ɛ kɛw mvunlaa ɛlaante bvuu yu wee.
42023020	Ɛ Baylɛt yuw nonɛn bvuu jeme ɛ̂ bonyii bocii njefo wvú to gomte keecinɛ Jisos e.
42023021	Geenɛn, ɛ bó no wamte kɛ lɛ, “Bó eta lo wvú yî kentam e, bó eta lo wvú yî kentam e.”
42023022	Ɛ Baylɛt bvuu jeme ɛ̂ bonyii yî bokaŋ bo botɛte le lɛ, “Bó eta wvú nje la? Fiɛɛ fì befe fì wvú ge nu la? Me mbaa n'yɛn jay wvù wvú ge le wvù bó eyu lo wvú kɛ. Me nu entam lo wvú, encinɛ wvú le.”
42023023	Ɛ bó mum mɛy no wamte lo bô mvuŋgay lɛ “Bó eta lo wvú yî kentam e.” Ɛ n'wam wvubo ghaw Baylɛt.
42023024	Nonɛn, ɛ Baylɛt sumtɛn nsaw cinɛ wvú le, lɛ bó ege bô wvú no bó kooŋke.
42023025	Ɛ wvú mum bvuse wee wɛ yew ncaw e, ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvù bó to biite, wvù kɛwɛɛ mvunlaa ɛlaante bvuu yu wee. No wvú bvuse, mum nya Jisos no bó to gomte.
42023026	Ɛ bó mum jo Jisos no gɛne dvú. No bó to gɛne, ɛ bô bo wee mvu tasɛn ɛ wvú kfuuyi ŋkpwaante ɛ diee diew nu Semon, ɛ ɛ̀ nu wee wvu Sɛlin. Ɛ bó koo wvú mum gɛɛ kentam ke Jisos e fô wvú gbwew, ɛ wvú mum tuu no bii Jisos e.
42023027	Ɛ bô bó mum no gɛne, ɛ ŋgoo bonyii bii wvú le. Ɛ bomew nu bokɛnɛ bò to beele, taaŋke boŋgɛw bew.
42023028	Ɛ Jisos ke nɛ baŋke ye gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Bokɛnɛ bo Jɛlusalɛm, fo ben ebeelè fô me le kɛ. Ben ebeelè ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô bikuu binɛn e, noo fô boom bonɛn e.
42023029	Ben ekeè lɛ kefew too lo kè bó nu ke egayte lɛ, njoŋ wvu baay nu wvu bokɛnɛ bò nu bokase bò ke baa boo wase wan, ɛ bó ke baa yamse wase wan kɛ.
42023030	Ɛ̀ nu ke enu kefew kedvu le, ɛ́ bonyii efuuŋke ɛ̂ dikum di baay baay lɛ, ‘Ben egbwekɛn yî yese le,’ efuuŋke ɛ̂ dikum di caan caan lɛ, ‘Ben ebaŋyɛ bese’.
42023031	Bó nu ke efuuŋke nonɛn njefo ɛ́ bonyii ge kfuu fin fiɛɛ bô kete kè bɛɛ lɛɛ, ɛ́ bó ke ege nɛɛ bô kè nu ɛ yum wase.”
42023032	No bó to gɛne bô Jisos nonɛn, bó to kɛŋke bonyii bo ncaw e bofɛɛ bò bó to gɛne keeyu tɛn.
42023033	Ɛ bó gɛn buy bvudvuu bvù bó teŋe lɛ Ŋgbwow Ɛkolɛ le, mum ta Jisos fó yî kentam e, mum ta tɛn bonyii bo ncaw e bo bofɛɛ ba yî bintam e, wvù mwaaŋ ɛ̂ ɛbo ke Jisos e ke ɛcɛɛy e, wvumvu ɛ̂ ɛbo kew ke ɛŋkoŋko le.
42023034	Ɛ Jisos ke nɛ gay lɛ, “Icɛm, lɛɛshɛ kebefɛ ke bonyii ban e, njefo kɛ bó kee fiɛɛ fì bó gee kɛ.” Ɛ bonyii bodvu jo ndvú Jisos tum kaŋ dvú keegaw ɛ̂ bikuu bibole.
42023035	Mwɛɛm mvun mvunciim to kooyi bô Jisos nonɛn, ɛ bonyii leeme fó taale. Ɛ bonyii bò to saake woŋ kaa nɛ fibole no buu lo wvú duu lɛ, “Wvú se fii bonyii bomew, wvú efi lɛ ɛkolɛ kew keseen, ɛ́ wvú fɛn nu Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ, caw.”
42023036	Ɛ bonyii bo nci le tɛn no sɛwsee wvú, nya mbvuum mo ŋgbwayŋgbwayi ɛ̂ wvú,
42023037	gay lɛ, “Ɛ́ wo fɛn nu Nfon Bojuu, ɛ́ wo fi ɛkolɛ kuw.”
42023038	Bó to nu ɛ saŋ ŋwa' ta ɛ̂ we jo ɛkolɛ ke Jisos e lɛ, “Wvun nu Nfon Bojuu.”
42023039	Ɛ wee ncaw mvu ba le bò to njɛyte yî bintam e fó, nɛ no nan'yi Jisos, gayte lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu kɛ wo wvù Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ le? Fi ɛkolɛ kuw, efi tɛn bese.”
42023040	Ɛ wvumvu wɛ yuw fiɛɛ fì wvú jeme, wamɛn wvú, bife lɛ, “Kɛ wo fane Nyo' le? Wo nu yî ŋgɛw e diɛwɛ wvú le.
42023041	Bee wo kpwee cɛɛy cɛɛy fii ɛ ɛ̀ nu nlawma mwɛɛm mvù befe mvù bee wo ge, geenɛn ɛ wee wvun kpwee fiew ɛ wvú baa jay fiɛɛ kɛ.”
42023042	Ɛ wee ncaw wvun mum gay lɛ, “Jisos, ke ekumyì me seke wo nu ke esaake bvunfon bwuw.”
42023043	Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ wo kecɛɛy lɛ ɛbɛn nu ɛ bee wo nu ke enu bvudvuu bvu njoŋ e bvu Nyo' le.”
42023044	Ɛ diuu ke ben wase dioo lewse, ɛ ɛkfuŋ nɛ jiim woŋ tfuu gɛn buy didiuu ditɛte ɛmvunsheeŋ.
42023045	Ɛ ndvu yì to gawsene yew ncese ɛnte mum sɛlɛ ɛntelɛŋ buy biba bifɛɛ.
42023046	Ɛ Jisos no nu yî kentam e, ke ja wam foweɛwe lɛ, “Icɛm, me n'yaa keyoy kem can yo le.” No wvú gay nonɛn, mum yoy n'yoy wvu fokemɛse.
42023047	Ɛ cee ɛkolɛ bonyii bo nci le wvù to leeme fó, dioo yɛn fiɛɛ fì to kooyɛɛ le, nya mbense ɛ̂ Nyo' gay lɛ, “Kecɛɛy, kecɛɛy, wee wvun se nu sɛ jay.”
42023048	Ɛ bonyii bocii bò to nu ɛ tase fó keeyɛn fiɛɛ fì to kooyi le, mum ja kase no kfuuyi ɛla ɛbole ɛ bó ɛ laŋ wɛm.
42023049	Ɛ nsáa Jisos yicii to to fibole leem ɛ ɛ̀ nu ntamndwee no yɛne fiɛɛ fì kooyi le. Ɛ bomew to nu bokɛnɛ bò to nɛn'yɛɛ Galilee no bii wvú le.
42023050	Wee mvu to nu kefew kedvu le ɛ bó teŋe lɛ Yosɛw, ɛ ɛ̀ nu wee wvu ɛ̂ kelaante ke Bojuu le kemew kè bó teŋe lɛ Alimatia. Wvú to nu wee wvù jee bvuu nu wee wvu teytey ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛjise, bvuu cɛyte kefew kè Nyo' nu ke eto esaake bvunfon bwew. Wvú to nu tɛn wee ŋgoo bonyii bò to saake bonsaw e. Geenɛn, wvú to baa bee fiew fiɛɛ fì bó to seysɛɛ ege bô Jisos kɛ.
42023052	Ɛ wvú gɛn fô Baylɛt e, lɛkɛ keegɛn ejo gvune di Jisos e.
42023053	Ɛ Baylɛt bee, ɛ wvú gɛn shike gvune didvu, baancɛ ɛ̂ ndvu le, gɛn jike ɛ̂ jem e ɛ bó ɛ cow yî kembaan e, ɛ bó ke baa yuu lese wase wee jó kɛ.
42023054	Ɛ̀ to nu Diuu di Nseyse le keeley diuu di mbam e, ɛ ɛ̀ to shɛɛte wase caan ɛ́ mbam wvudvu ekɛw.
42023055	Ɛ bokɛnɛ ba bò to nɛn'yɛɛ Galilee bi Jisos e, bi Yosɛw e fô jem, gɛn yɛn no wvú jiwsee gvune di Jisos e ɛ̂ jem.
42023056	Ɛ bó ke nɛ fó, mum tu jim ɛla ɛbole, gɛn seyse bonfiey bò jee noo bò ké no shfuuŋkene bò bó to ké no yeefe digvune dvú. Ɛ ɛ̀ no nu diuu di mbam e, ɛ bó she mbam no nci wvubo to gomte.
42024001	Ɛ diuu di mbam e ke buy fey, ɛ bvú yuu diuu di fwe yî kemaa le. Ɛ bokɛnɛ bodvu buy saa lo bvutfuu, jo bonfiey bò bó to seysɛɛ mum no gɛne dvú fô jem.
42024002	Ɛ bó dioo gɛn buy fó, yɛn ɛ bó ɛ biŋse wase tɛ dì bó to baŋɛɛ diuw jem dvú.
42024003	Ɛ bó ley gɛn ɛ̂ jem faŋɛ yaa yɛn gvune di Tata Jisos e kɛ.
42024004	Ɛ bó mum leem fó ŋgɛmtɛn lo. Ɛ fí kooy lɛ bolemsɛ bofɛɛ to nu ɛ nɛ to leem mbew bó le, ɛ bó ɛ tfume ndvú ɛ yí baa lawkene.
42024005	Ɛ bokɛnɛ bodvu fan baay, mum tum bikuu fokuse. Ɛ bolemsɛ ba bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu nje la wvù ben gomte wee wvù bɛɛ dvú ɛnte jo boŋkfu?
42024006	Kɛ wvú yaa nu fɛn kɛ, wvú nu ɛ buy wase yî kpwe le. Ben ekume fiɛɛ fì wvú to gayɛɛ ɛ̂ ben seke ben ɛ bó to nu Galilee.
42024007	Wvú to nu ɛ gay lɛ, ‘Wee wvù diee nu Waawee nu ɛ bó nu ke enya wvú can bonyii bò befe le, ɛ́ bó ke eta wvú yî kentam e, ɛ́ ke dioo nu ɛdiuw ɛta, ɛ́ wvú ebuy yî kpwe le.’”
42024008	Ɛ bó mum kume fiɛɛ fì Jisos to jemyɛɛ ɛ̂ bó.
42024009	Ɛ bó ke nɛ fô jem, kase tu jim gɛn see mwɛɛm mvun mvunciim ɛ̂ boom bew bo ŋgoo le bo yuufe ncow mwaaŋ noo bonyii bocii bò to bii wvú le.
42024010	Bokɛnɛ bò to seŋɛɛ fiɛɛ fì to kooyɛɛ fidvu ɛ̂ boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e to nu Maalia Magdalen, Joana noo Maalia wvù bwee Jɛm bô bokɛnɛ bomew.
42024011	Ɛ bó yuw njeme wvudvu kɛ diɛwɛ ɛ̀ nu kenlamse, faŋɛ yaa bee naa lo kɛ.
42024012	Geenɛn, ɛ Bita nɛ kɛ we, lewtɛ gɛn buy fô jem, ŋgvuwcɛ taa ɛ̂ jem yɛn kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu ndvú yì bó to njimɛɛ Jisos dvú. Ɛ wvú mum nɛ no tuu jim fô yew e kɛŋke ŋghaw yî fiɛɛ fì kooyɛɛ le.
42024013	Ɛ fí ke nɛ kooy kɛ ɛbvubwɛ lɛ, bonyii bomew bofɛɛ bò to ké no bii Jisos e to nu ɛ nɛ Jɛlusalɛm no gɛne ntɛw wvù Ɛmayus e, wvù to nu diɛwɛ bomay bosooshwiy keegɛn buy jó le.
42024014	Ɛ bó no gɛne jemyi ɛbonɛbon ɛkumɛ mwɛɛm mvù to kooyi mvun mvunciim.
42024015	No bó to lɛne jemyi ghayte nonɛn, ɛ Jisos kebɛɛ bencɛ to mbew bó le no lɛne bô bó.
42024016	Ɛ fiɛɛ fimew ge lɛ fo bó ekiɛɛ wee wvudvu kɛ.
42024017	Ɛ Jisos mum ja bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ɛ̀ sɛ nu la fì ben lɛne jemyi ɛkumɛ fí nɛn?” No wvú bife nonɛn, ɛ bó leemɛn bô yii yî monshim mobole.
42024018	Ɛ wee mvu bó le wvù diee to nu Kleofas bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ̀ mɛy kɛ wo tolo Jɛlusalɛm wvù yaa kee kɛ mwɛɛm mvù se kooyi jó ɛdiuw ɛyan e?”
42024019	Ɛ wvú bife lɛ, “Mvù la?” Ɛ bó tfuse lɛ, “Mwɛɛm mvù se kooyi bô Jisos wvu Nasalɛt. Wee wvun se nu wee ntum Nyo', ɛ mwɛɛm mvù wvú se gee noo mvù wvú se jemyi se nu biŋghaw. Ɛ̀ se nu wee wvù kuuke baay fwe dvu Nyo' bô bonyii bocii.
42024020	Bocee ncese bo baay baay bô bonyii bò saake woŋ wese ɛ se ɛ nya wvú lɛ bó eyu. Bó se ɛ mum ɛ ta wvú yî kentam e.
42024021	Bese se leese fisɛse bvufee yî ye le lɛ ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù nu ke esum bonyii bo Islael can ŋgɛw e. Geenɛn, ɛ̀ nu wase ɛdiuw ɛta no mwɛɛm mvudvu se kooyɛɛ.
42024022	Fimew nu ɛ bokɛnɛ bomew ŋgoo yese le ɛ be ɛ jeme fí ɛ nya lo bese ŋghaw, lɛ bó buy ɛ gɛn fô jem ɛntaŋɛntaŋ,
42024023	ɛ faŋɛ yaa yɛn gvune diew e kɛ. Bó ɛ dioo kase tu jim, ɛ see lɛ bó be ɛ yɛn bonceendaa bo Nyo' le kɛ diɛwɛ bó yɛn ɛ̂ ɛfilɛ le, bó gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ Jisos nu dvú.
42024024	Bonyii bomew ŋgoo yese le ɛ gɛn fô jem fodvu ɛ yɛn yí le kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no bokɛnɛ bodvu be jemyi, geenɛn, ɛ faŋɛ yaa yɛn Jisos e kɛ.”
42024025	Ɛ Jisos jeme ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “O oo, biyuŋ bin, mvuntelem mvunɛn lɛɛ baay keebee mwɛɛm mvù bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le to saŋɛɛ.
42024026	Kɛ ben kee lɛ Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ to kɛŋke keeyɛn ŋgɛw sɛ ley yî bvukukɛ bwew e le?”
42024027	Ɛ Jisos mum kɛw nɛle ɛ̂ bó mwɛɛm mvunciim mvù bó to saŋɛɛ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le ɛkumɛ wvú ɛ kɛw yî mvù Muses to saŋɛɛ le, ɛ gɛn ɛ buy tɛn yî mvu bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le.
42024028	No bó toɛ wase buy mbew ntɛw wvù bó to gɛne jó le, ɛ Jisos nɛ no gee kɛ diɛwɛ wvú fele lo.
42024029	Ɛ bó lɛkɛ wvú shiee le gay lɛ, “Beene egɛn ece. Kefew nu ɛ kí ɛ gɛn wase baay, ɛ ɛkfuŋ ɛ kɛw wase ɛ no jiime.” Ɛ wvú bee keegɛn ce bô bó.
42024030	Ɛ bó gɛn, ke dioo diekene, ɛ wvú jo ntuw blɛɛd, nya keyoone ɛ̂ Nyo', guushɛ nya ɛ̂ bó.
42024031	Kaŋ mwaaŋ nonɛn, ɛ ɛjisɛ ɛbo yuu, ɛ bó mum kiɛɛ wvú. Ɛ wvú sɛsɛ la ɛ̂ bó ɛjise.
42024032	Ɛ bó shɛɛ no ghayte ɛbonɛbon lɛ, “Kɛ mvuntelem mvusɛɛbeewo be yvuwse seke wvú be nɛci mwɛɛm mvu ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le ɛ̂ bee wo ɛ̂ je le?”
42024033	Ɛ bó mum nɛnɛ kaŋ mwaaŋ ɛkiɛguu jodvu no tuu jim Jɛlusalɛm. Ɛ bó dioo gɛn, yɛn ɛ boom bo Jisos e bo ŋgoo le bo yuufe ncow mwaaŋ ɛ baancɛ ye bvudvuu bvumwaaŋ bô bonyii bomew bò to ké no bii wvú le.
42024034	Ɛ bó jemyi lɛ, “Kecɛɛy, Tata wesebeene nu ɛ buy yî kpwe le. Wvú be ɛ sɛsɛ ɛ buynɛn ɛ̂ Semon ɛjise.”
42024035	Ɛ bó mum see tɛn ɛ̂ bó fiɛɛ fì be kooy bô bó ɛ̂ je, bvuu nɛle no bó be kiɛnte wvú seke wvú be guushi blɛɛd.
42024036	Kɛ no bó to bɛɛ jemyi nonɛn, ɛ Jisos kebɛɛ mum ja nɛ sɛsɛ buynɛn ɛ̂ bó ɛntelɛŋ mum gay bó le lɛ, “Kembonɛn enù fô ben e.”
42024037	Ɛ kedvum gbwo bó, ɛ bó no fane, kpwaake lɛ bó yɛne ɛ ɛ̀ nu ŋkfusay e.
42024038	Ɛ wvú bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben fane la? Ɛ̀ ge la wvù ben maŋene me?
42024039	Ben etaa eyɛn can yɛm bô bikaa biem ɛ́ ben emum ekiɛɛ lɛ ɛ̀ nu naa me. Ben emomcɛ ye yɛm emum ekiɛɛ, njefo kɛ ŋkfusay ké no kɛŋke nyam ye bô bikufɛ no ben yɛne ɛ me ŋkɛŋke kɛ.”
42024040	No wvú gay nonɛn, mum duŋcɛ can ye bô bikaa biew ɛ̂ bó.
42024041	Ɛ bó taa Jisos, ɛ njoŋ yuwyɛ lo bó, ɛ bó mum ŋgɛmtɛn lo. Ɛ fí ghaw bó keebee lɛ ɛ̀ nu wvú. Ɛ wvú nɛ bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben kɛŋke fiɛɛ fidien fɛn e?”
42024042	Ɛ bó jo kencim ke bye le ɛ bó ɛ dɛɛ, nya ɛ̂ wvú.
42024043	Ɛ wvú fi die ɛ̂ bó ɛjise.
42024044	Ɛ wvú mum gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Mwɛɛm mvun mvù ben yɛn ɛbɛn nu mvù me nto njemyi ɛ̂ ben ɛkumɛ mvú ɛ me mbɛɛ beene. Me nto nduu lɛ mwɛɛm mvunciim mvù bó to saŋɛɛ ɛkumɛ me ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Muses e, bô ɛ̂ Boŋwa' bo bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le noo ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Mbense le, kɛŋke keeto ekocɛn.”
42024045	Ɛ wvú mum yene bvufee bvubole, ɛ bó kiɛɛ mwɛɛm mvù nu ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le.
42024046	Ɛ wvú jeme lɛ, “Bó nu ɛ saŋ lɛ Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ kɛŋke keeyɛn ŋgɛw ekpwe, ɛ́ ke edioo enu ɛdiuw ɛta, ɛ́ wvú ebuy yî kpwe le.
42024047	Ɛ fí bvuu nu lɛ bó nu ke ekɛw Jɛlusalɛm, efewci ɛ̂ bitum bicii ɛ̂ diee diew e lɛ bonyii bocii ekumɛn mvuntelem mvubole, ɛ́ Nyo' emum elɛɛshɛ bibefɛ bibole.
42024048	Ɛ̀ nu ke efewci ben ban bò nu ɛ yɛn mwɛɛm mvun e.
42024049	Ben eyekɛ eyuw, me nu ŋke enciinse nya yì Icɛm to kawɛɛ ben dvú. Nonɛn, ben emɛy ɛlaante jan ecɛyte mvuŋgay mvù nu ke eshii fowe eto fô ben e.”
42024050	Ɛ wvú jo bó buy bô bó ɛlaante jodvu, ɛ bô bó gɛn buy mbew ntɛw wvù Bɛtani le, ɛ wvú cake can ye we, laŋ kembonɛn yî bó le.
42024051	Kɛ no wvú to bɛɛ laaŋke kembonɛn yî bó le nonɛn, mum ja no bene we, mum ben la.
42024052	Ɛ bó nya mbense wvu baay ɛ̂ wvú, mum ja fó tu jim Jɛlusalɛm bô nlaŋlaŋ fô mvuntelem mvubole.
42024053	Ɛ bó gɛn no shee yew ncese le, bensee Nyo' sekecii.
43001001	Ɛ̀ to nu foŋkɛw ɛ Diɛw nu wase. Diɛw yidvu to nu bô Nyo', ɛ Diɛw yidvu to nu Nyo'.
43001002	Wvú to nu wase dvú foŋkɛw bô Nyo'.
43001003	Nyo' to bom mwɛɛm mvunciim fele can ye le. Kɛ fiɛɛ nu naa lo dvú fimwaaŋ fì Nyo' to bomɛɛ sɛ wvú kɛ.
43001004	Wvú kɛŋke nshii yî ye le, ɛ nshii wvudvu nu n'yuu fô bonyii le.
43001005	N'yuu wvudvu ɛ no baa ɛ̂ ɛjiwɛ le, ɛ ɛjiwɛ kedvu yaa nulo ejimse naa lo wvú kɛ.
43001006	Wee mvu nu dvú wvù Nyo' to tumɛɛ ɛ diee nu lɛ Jon.
43001007	Wvú to to keejeme ɛkumɛ N'yuu, eben jim nsaw we, wvu lɛ wen ege ɛ́ bonyii bocii elese fitele yî N'yuu wvudvu le.
43001008	Kɛ wvú wvù Jon to nu N'yuu wvudvu kɛ. Wvú to to kɛ keeben ɛ ɛ̀ nu jim nsaw wvu N'yuu wvudvu.
43001009	N'yuu wvu kecɛɛy wvù duŋci n'yuu ɛ̂ bonyii bocii to too yî woŋ wvun e.
43001010	Wvú to nu yî woŋ e, ɛ woŋ wvun nu ɛ Nyo' to bom fele can ye le, geenɛn ɛ bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo yî woŋ wvun e faŋɛ yaa ekiɛɛ wvú kɛ.
43001011	Wvú to nu ɛ to woŋ we le, ɛ bonyii bo bew faŋɛ yaa efiisɛn wvú kɛ.
43001012	Geenɛn, ɛ bonyii bocii bò to fiisɛnɛɛ wvú, lese fitele yî ye le, nu ɛ wvú to nya mvuŋgay ɛ̂ bó lɛ bó enù wase boom bo Nyo' le.
43001013	Ɛ kɛ boom bo Nyo' le ban nu ɛ bó boke bii ɛlɛmɛ ke kfuu le, kɛnɛɛ no wee shieele, kɛnɛɛ mboo wee wvu wum e kɛ. Bó boke bii ɛ ɛ̀ nu mboo wvù ɛ̀ nu wvu Nyo' le.
43001014	Diɛw yidvu to nu ɛ tu wee wvu wum no cee ɛ̂ bese ɛntelɛŋ, ɛ wvú ɛ yiŋsɛn bô mbuwma noo kecɛɛy. Ɛ bese yɛn bvukukɛ bwew e. Bvukukɛ bvù ɛ̀ nu bvu Wan wvù ɛ̀ mɛy kɛ wvú wvù nɛ fô Ice le.
43001015	Jon to nu ɛ ben jim nsaw ɛkumɛ wvú no fuuŋke gayte lɛ, “Wvun nu wee wvù me nto njemyi ɛkumɛ wvú ŋgayte lɛ, ‘Wee wvù too ɛ̂ me ɛjim kuuke fele me, njefo wvú to nu wase ɛ me nsɛ ŋke no nu dvú.’”
43001016	No wvú nu ɛ yiŋsɛn bô mbuwma, wvú ɛ mum ɛ no nyaa beene bocii mbuwma yî mbuwma le.
43001017	Beene kee lo lɛ Nyo' to nya bonci fele can Muses e. Geenɛn, mbuwma Nyo' bô kecɛɛy nu ɛ to fele can Jisos Klistu le.
43001018	Kɛ wee nu dvú wvù ke nu ɛ yuu wase yɛn Nyo' le kɛ. Ɛ̀ nu kɛ Waa we wvù ɛ̀ mɛy kɛ wvú wvù nu mbew wvú wvù Ice le wvù nu ɛ ge beene ɛ kiɛɛ wvú.
43001019	Fin nu fiɛɛ fì Jon to jemyɛɛ seke bikuu bi Bojuu le bi Jɛlusalɛm to tumɛɛ bocee ncese bô bonyii bo Lɛwe le lɛ bó ebife ɛ̂ Jon lɛ laa ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù yɛɛ lɛ.
43001020	Jon to baa tun keetfuse mbife wvubo kɛ. Wvú to nu ɛ jeme lo bô diuw we lɛ, “Kɛ ɛ̀ nu me wvù Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ kɛ.”
43001021	Ɛ bó bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Tu ɛ̀ nu wo wvù yɛɛ? Ɛ̀ nu wo wvù Ɛlayja le?” Ɛ wvú tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Kɛ me nu Ɛlayja kɛ.” Ɛ bó bvuu bife lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu wo wvù Wee Ntum Nyo' wɛ le?” Ɛ wvú tun.
43001022	Ɛ bó bvuu bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Tu ɛ̀ nu wo wvù yɛɛ? Wo gay lɛ la ɛkumɛ ɛkolɛ kuw? Kɛ see ɛ́ bese ekɛŋkɛ fiɛɛ fì bese ekase egɛn etfuse ɛ̂ bonyii bò tum bese?”
43001023	Ɛ Jon tfuse ɛ̂ bó no Yɛsaya wvù wee ntum Nyo' to jemyɛɛ lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu me diɛw yì fuuŋke ŋkpwaante lɛ, ‘Bó enɛle je Tata ɛ́ yí enù teytey.’”
43001024	Bonyii ban nu ɛ ɛ̀ to tum Bofalasii bó.
43001025	Ɛ bó bife ɛ̂ Jon lɛ, “Ɛ́ ɛ̀ baa nu wo wvù Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ kɛnɛɛ Ɛlayja, kɛnɛɛ Wee Ntum Nyo' wɛ, wo ɛ no leese bonyii ɛ̂ joo nje la?”
43001026	Ɛ Jon tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Me nleese kɛ fiem bonyii ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ joo, geenɛn wee mvu nu dvú ɛ̂ ben ɛnte ɛ ben yaa kee wvú kɛ.
43001027	Ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù too ɛ̂ me ɛjim, ɛ me mbaa ncim eŋkpwɛntɛn keenfay laba we kɛ.”
43001028	Fiɛɛ fin ficii to kooyi ɛ ɛ̀ nu Bɛtani Joo Joodan kewvu keki fò Jon to leese bonyii ɛ̂ joo.
43001029	Ɛ ɛkfuŋ buy yuu, ɛ Jon yɛn ɛ Jisos too, ɛ wvú mum gay lɛ, “Ben etaa eyɛn, wvun nu Waa Njee Nyo' wvù cawsee bibefɛ bi yî nshɛ le!
43001030	Ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù me nse njemyi ɛkumɛ wvú ŋgayte lɛ, ‘Wee mvu too ɛ̂ me ɛjim kuuke fele me, njefo wvú to nu wase, ɛ me nsɛ ŋke no nu.’
43001031	Kɛ me kebɛɛ nto ŋkee wvú kɛ. Geenɛn, ɛ me nto nto no nleese bonyii ɛ̂ joo wvu lɛ bonyii bo Islael ekiɛɛ wvú.”
43001032	Jon to nu ɛ bvuu jeme keeben jim nsaw we gay lɛ, “Me nto nu ɛ n'yɛn ɛ Keyoy shiile too fowe diɛwɛ ɛbembɛ le, to no nu yî ye le.
43001033	Kɛ me kebɛɛ nto ŋkee wvú kɛ. Geenɛn, wee wvù to tumɛɛ me lɛ me ento enleesè bonyii ɛ̂ joo to nu ɛ gay ɛ̂ me lɛ, ‘Wee wvù wo nu ke eyɛn ɛ Keyoy ɛ shii fowe ɛ to ɛ no nu yî ye le, nu wvù nu ke eleese bonyii ɛ ɛ̀ nu can Keyoy ke Yuule le.’
43001034	Fifin nu fiɛɛ ɛ me nto nu ɛ n'yɛn, ɛ no nleeme jim nsaw wvudvu ŋgayte lɛ wee wvun nu Waa Nyo'.”
43001035	Ɛ ɛkfuŋ buy yuu, ɛ Jon bvuu no leeme fɛ fò wvú to leeme bô boom bew bo ŋgoo le bofɛɛ.
43001036	Ɛ wvú nɛ yɛn no Jisos lɛne fele, mum gay lɛ, “Ben etaa eyɛn, wvun nu Waa Njee Nyo'.”
43001037	Ɛ boom bew bo ŋgoo le bo bofɛɛ ba dioo yuw no wvú gay nonɛn, mum nɛ no bii Jisos e.
43001038	Ɛ Jisos baŋke ye yɛn no bó bii, bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben gomte ɛ ɛ̀ nu la?” Ɛ bó bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Labay, wo cee fɛɛ?” (Diee dì Labay din nu lɛ, “Wee N'yɛɛyi wvu Baay.”)
43001039	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben eto eyɛn.” Ɛ bó mum gɛn yɛn fô wvú to cee. Ɛ bô bó mum no nu ɛ ɛkfuŋ ghan jiim. Kefew kè bó to biɛ wvú le to nu wase kɛ diɛwɛ didiuu dinɛw e fokiɛguu.
43001040	Wee mwaaŋ ŋgoo bonyii bo bofɛɛ bò to yuwɛɛ no Jon jemyɛɛ mum bi Jisos e to nu Andulu wvù waa bwee Semon Bita.
43001041	Ɛ Andulu wvudvu mum gɛn lo gom waa bwee wvù Semon, see ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Bese nu ɛ yɛn wase Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ le” (fì nu lɛ Klistu).
43001042	Nonɛn, ɛ wvú mum jo Semon gɛn bô wvú fô Jisos e. Ɛ Jisos taa wvú nɛn tuŋŋ, gay lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu wo wvù Semon wvù waa Jon. Bó nu ke eteŋe wase wo lɛ Sɛfas.” (Diee dì lɛ Sɛfas din nu Bita).
43001043	Ɛ ɛkfuŋ ke buy yuu, ɛ Jisos yɛn lɛ wen nu egɛn keba kè Galilee le. Ɛ wvú gɛn yɛn Filew e, gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ̀ biì me le.”
43001044	Filew wvun to nu wee wvu ɛ̂ kelaante kè Bɛsayda le. Ɛ kelaante kin nu ke bo Andulu bô Bita le.
43001045	Ɛ Filew gɛn gom Natanial gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Bese nu ɛ yɛn wase wee wvù Muses to saŋɛɛ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' bonci le ɛkumɛ wvú bô wvù bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le to saŋɛɛ tɛn ɛkumɛ wvú. Wee wvun nu Jisos wvu Nasalɛt wvù waa Yosɛw.”
43001046	Ɛ Natanial tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Fiɛɛ fì jee nulo ebuy Nasalɛt e?” Ɛ Filew gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “To eyɛn.”
43001047	Ɛ Jisos ke yɛn no Natanial too, jeme ɛkumɛ wvú lɛ, “Ben etaa eyɛn, wee wvun nu naa wee wvu Islael wvu kecɛɛy. Kɛ nce kenlɛɛma nu yî ye le kɛ.”
43001048	Ɛ Natanial bife ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Wo ghan nɛɛ ɛ sɛ kiɛɛ me?” Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ́ Filew sɛ keeke eto etee wo, nu ɛ me mbe ɛ n'yɛn wase wo le ɛ̂ kenyi ke kete ke fig e kiɛ le.”
43001049	Ɛ Natanial tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Labay, wo nu Waa Nyo'! Wo nu Nfon wvu Islael!”
43001050	Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wo fɛn nu ɛ bee me le keseen kɛ njefo me nu ɛ ŋgay ɛ̂ wo lɛ me mbe ɛ n'yɛn wase wo le ɛ̂ kenyi ke kete kiɛ le? Wo nu ke eyɛn mwɛɛm mvù kuuke fele mvun e.”
43001051	Ɛ Jisos bvuu gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ wo kecɛɛy kecɛɛy lɛ wo nu ke eyɛn ɛ ɛbulɛ ɛ yene, ɛ bonceendaa bo Nyo' le bene, booke yî wee wvù diee nu Waawee le.”
43002001	Ɛ ɛdiuw ke buy ɛta, ɛ bó no gee ŋkaw bvujen ɛ̂ kelaante kè Kana wvu ɛ̂ keba kè Galilee le, ɛ bwee Jisos nu fó.
43002002	Bó to nu ɛ be tɛn Jisos bô boom bew bo ŋgoo le bô ŋkaw wvudvu.
43002003	Ɛ mbvuum ke nɛ ka, ɛ bwee Jisos be wvú dvú gay lɛ, “Kɛ bó bɛɛ kɛŋke mbvuum kɛ.”
43002004	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Kpwoon, wo bee me dvú nje la? Kefew kem baa kocɛn wase kɛ.”
43002005	Ɛ bwee gay ɛ̂ bonyii bo gawe le lɛ, “Fiɛɛ ficii fì wvú ɛ gay lɛ ben ege, ɛ ben ge.”
43002006	Ɛ̀ to nu ɛ nsháan leeme fó yisoocaan ɛ bó kene bô ɛta. Nsháan yin nu yì Bojuu to ké no gɛɛle joo jó yì bó cuke ye dvú keeyuule ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛjise. Nshaan miaaŋ to joo bibɛɛŋ bi joo le diɛwɛ mbaanfiɛɛ kɛnɛɛ mbaanshɛ le.
43002007	Ɛ Jisos ke nɛ gay ɛ̂ bonyii bo gawe le bodvu lɛ, “Ben etukɛ joo eyiŋsɛn nsháan yin dvú.” Ɛ bó mum tukɛ joo gɛɛ ɛ̂ nsháan yidvu le ɛ yí yiŋsɛn.
43002008	Ɛ wvú mum gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben esɛfe yimi keseen egɛn dvú fô cee gawe le.” Ɛ bó sɛfe gɛn dvú.
43002009	Ɛ cee gawe fi, mom joo yidvu, yuw ɛ yí ɛ tu wase mbvuum. Ɛ wvú ma laa man mbvuum nɛ fɛɛ lɛ. (Geenɛn, bonyii bo gawe le bò to sɛfɛɛ joo yidvu to kee fô mó nɛn'yɛɛ.) Ɛ cee gawe mum tee cee bvujen,
43002010	bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Bonyii ké yaw gaw fibole ɛ ɛ̀ nu mbvuum mò jee fô ŋkaw e, ɛ́ bonyii ké dioo ɛ wu wase ɛ ffuu, ɛ bó sɛ gaw mo yaa jee kɛ. Wo ɛ kaa ɛ gɛɛ fiuw mbvuum mò jee ɛ no too dvú ɛ ɛ̀ nu keseen e?”
43002011	Fifin to nu fiɛɛ fi fwe fì duŋci bvukukɛ bvu Jisos e fì wvú to geɛ ɛnte jo mwɛɛm mvù duŋci bvukukɛ bwew e. Ɛ wvú to ge fiɛɛ fin ɛ̂ kelaante kè Kana wvu ɛ̂ keba kè Galilee le. No wvú ge nonɛn, ɛ fí mum duŋcɛ bvukukɛ bwew, ɛ boom bew bo ŋgoo le mum lese fitele yî ye le.
43002012	Ɛjim jodvu, ɛ Jisos nɛ bow Kafana'um bô bwee noo boom bo bwee le bò bolemsɛ noo boom bew bo ŋgoo le, ɛ bô bó ce jó ɛdiuw caan.
43002013	Ɛ ɛdiuw ɛ Ŋkaw Bojuu wvù bó teŋe lɛ Daŋɛfey ke no too wase nceencee, ɛ Jisos nɛ ben Jɛlusalɛm.
43002014	Ɛ wvú ke gɛn buy fô yew ncese le, yɛn bonyii bò to geese bona' bô njée noo bibembɛ noo bò to kumene bigew e ɛ bó ɛ shiiyɛn.
43002015	Ɛ wvú jo bokfuu kene ŋgbwan dvú, kuŋ bó bocii dvú, kuŋ noo njée bô bona' bvuse yew ncese le. Ɛ wvú bvuu tawse bigew bi bonyii bò to kumene bigew e, baashɛ bidaŋ bibole,
43002016	gay ɛ̂ bonyii bò to geese bibembɛ lɛ, “Ben ejo mwɛɛm mvun enɛ dvú fɛn. Fo ben ejo yew Icɛm etfuse ɛ́ yí etu yew way kɛ.”
43002017	No wvú gay nonɛn, ɛ boom bew bo ŋgoo le mum kume fiɛɛ fì bó saŋ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le ɛ wee mvu jemyi ɛ̂ Nyo' lɛ, “Shiee wvu baay wvù me ŋkɛŋke fô yew yo le nulo eyu lo me.”
43002018	Ɛ bikuu bi Bojuu le mum bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Fiɛɛ fì duŋci bvukukɛ bwuw fì wo nulo ege keeduŋcɛ ɛ̂ bese lɛ bó nu ɛ nya mvuŋgay ɛ̂ wo keege fin nu la.”
43002019	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben esâw yew ncese yin, ɛ́ me enjo ɛdiuw ɛta eŋkase enleke we.”
43002020	Ɛ Bojuu bodvu bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Fí to jo bilum mbaanyɛ ncow bisoocaan keebom yew ncese yin, ɛ wo nu ke ejo fiuw ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛdiuw ɛta eleke we?”
43002021	Geenɛn, Jisos to jemyi yew ncese yin ɛ ɛ̀ nu yì ɛ̀ nu ye ye.
43002022	Nonɛn, seke wvú to buyɛɛ wase yî kpwe le, ɛ boom bew bo ŋgoo le mum kume lɛ fin nu fiɛɛ fì wvú to gayɛɛ. Ɛ bó mum bee fiɛɛ fì nu ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le, bvuu bee njeme wvù Jisos to jemyɛɛ le.
43002023	No Jisos to nu Jɛlusalɛm fô Ŋkaw Daŋɛfey wvun e, bonyii nteen to nu ɛ lese fitele yî ye le nje mwɛɛm mvù duŋci bvukukɛ bwew mvù wvú to gee.
43002024	Geenɛn, Jisos to baa gɛɛ fiew bvufee bwew yî bó le kɛ, njefo wvú to kee bonyii bocii no bó nu.
43002025	Wvú to baa shieele wee mvu wvù eshe eseŋe lo ɛ̂ wvú ɛkumɛ wee wvu wum kɛ, njefo wvú kebɛɛ to kee fiɛɛ fì wee wvu wum kɛŋke ɛ̂ wvú ɛshem.
43003001	Wee ŋgoo Bofalasii mvu to nu ɛ bó teŋe lɛ Nikodɛmus, ɛ wvú nu wee ŋgoo bikuu bi woŋ Bojuu le.
43003002	Ɛ wee wvun ke nɛ to fô Jisos e ɛntaŋ gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Labay, bese kee lɛ wo nu wee n'yɛɛyi wvù nɛ fô Nyo' le, njefo kɛ wee nu dvú wvù nulo egee kfuu mvun mwɛɛm mvù duŋci bvukukɛ bvu Nyo' le mvù wo gee mvun sɛ Nyo' nu bô wvú kɛ.”
43003003	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ wo kecɛɛy kecɛɛy lɛ, ɛ́ bó nu sɛ bó ɛ boo wee mboo wvu fwɛ le, mwɛtɛn saa eyɛn bvunfon bvu Nyo' le kɛ.”
43003004	Ɛ Nikodɛmus bife ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó ege nɛɛ sɛ ebvuu eboo wee ɛ wvú ɛ taw wase? Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wvú ebvuu ekase etu ɛ̂ bwee ɛshem ɛ́ wvú ebvuu eboo wvú?”
43003005	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ wo kecɛɛy kecɛɛy lɛ, ɛ́ wee nu sɛ wvú ɛ kɛŋkɛ mboo wvù wvu joo noo Keyoy, tu kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wvú eley bvunfon bvu Nyo' le kɛ.
43003006	Wee wvu wum boote wee wvu wum, ɛ Keyoy boote keyoy.
43003007	Fo diuw eyumte wo lɛ me nu ɛ ŋgay ɛ̂ wo lɛ bó kɛŋke keeboo wee tfuu mboo wvu fwɛ le kɛ.
43003008	Fwefwe ké no fele no wvú kooŋke, ɛ wo yuuke no wvú fele, geenɛn ɛ wo yaa nulo esee laa wvú sɛ nɛ fɛɛ, gɛne fɛɛ lɛ. Ɛ̀ nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no fí nu fô wee wvù nu ɛ kɛŋkɛ mboo wvù wvu Keyoy e.”
43003009	Ɛ Nikodɛmus mum ghay lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ fifin eghan nɛɛ le?”
43003010	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wo nu wee n'yɛɛyi bonyii bo Islael, yaa kee fin e?
43003011	Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ wo kecɛɛy kecɛɛy lɛ, bese jemyi fiɛɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu fì bese kee, leeme jim nsaw fiɛɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu fì bese nu ɛ yɛn wase, geenɛn ɛ ben yaa beŋe fiɛɛ fì bese jemyi le kɛ.
43003012	Ɛ́ me nseŋe mwɛɛm ɛ̂ ben ɛ ɛ̀ nu mvu yî nshɛ le fɛn sɛ ben beŋe lo, ɛ́ ben ke eghan nɛɛ sɛ bee fɛn ɛ me ɛ nsee wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu mvu woŋ Nyo' le?
43003013	Kɛ wee nu dvú wvù ke nu ɛ ben wase woŋ Nyo' le kɛ. Ɛ̀ mɛy kɛ wee wvù to nɛn'yɛɛ fó to fokuse fɛn, ɛ wee wvun nu wee wvù diee nu Waawee.
43003014	No Muses to njɛysɛɛ yo yì bó fɛlɛɛ bô ketwaa yî kete le ŋkpwaante, nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no bó kɛŋke keeke enjɛyse wee wvù diee nu Waawee,
43003015	wvu lɛ naa yɛɛ wvù nu ɛ lese fitele yî ye le, ɛ́ wvú ekɛŋke nshii wvù mɛy lo.
43003016	Nyo' to nu ɛ loocɛ koŋ woŋ wvun baay, tum Waa we wvù mwaaŋ, wvu lɛ ɛ̀ nu naa yɛɛ wvù nu ɛ lese fitele yî ye le, mwɛtɛn saa ela kɛ, ɛ́ wvú ekɛŋke ɛ ɛ̀ nu nshii wvù mɛy lo.
43003017	Kɛ Nyo' to tum Waa we yî woŋ wvun e lɛ wvú eto elese bonyii yî ŋgɛw e kɛ. Wvú to tum lɛ wen eboyse lo bó fele yî ye le.
43003018	Wee wvù nu ɛ lese fitele yî ye le nu ɛ wvú yaa nu ke eley ŋgɛw e kɛ. Geenɛn wee wvù baa elese fitele yî ye le nu ɛ wvú ɛ ley wase ŋgɛw e, njefo wvú baa elese fitele yî Waa Nyo' wvù ɛ̀ mɛy kɛ wvú le kɛ.
43003019	Bó nu ke esumtɛn nsaw ɛ̂ yin je le, njefo n'yuu nu ɛ to yî woŋ e, bonyii ɛ kaa ɛ koŋ fibole ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛjiwɛ ɛfey n'yuu. Ɛ bó kooŋke nonɛn njefo gee dibole nu dì befe.
43003020	Wee tfuu wvù gee gee dì befe ké no bane n'yuu, yaa nulo ebuy fô n'yuu nu kɛ, wvu lɛ fo gee diwene ke eyenɛ ɛmwa kɛ.
43003021	Geenɛn ɛ wee wvù gee fiɛɛ fi lɛŋ ké no too fô n'yuu le, wvu lɛ diwene gee eyen'yi lɛ ɛ̀ nu di wee wvù nu bô Nyo' le.”
43003022	Ɛjim jodvu, ɛ Jisos bô boom bew bo ŋgoo le nɛ gɛn keba kemew ke Judea le. Ɛ bô bó gɛn no nu jó ɛ wvú leese bonyii ɛ̂ joo.
43003023	Jon tɛn to leese bonyii ɛ̂ joo ntɛw wvù Ɛnon e mbew wvù Salim e njefo joo to nu fó ntay. Ɛ bonyii too ɛ wvú leese bó ɛ̂ joo.
43003024	Fifin to nu ɛ bó baa lese wase wvú yew ncaw e kɛ.
43003025	Ɛ boom bo Jon e bo ŋgoo le bomew bô wee Juu mvu ke nɛ kɛw mbew ɛkumɛ ye yì bó cuke keeyuule ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛjise.
43003026	Ɛ boom bo ŋgoo le bo Jon e nɛ gɛn fô Jon e, gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Labay, wee wɛ wvù to nu ben ɛ wvú Joo Joodan kewvu keki wvù wo to jemyɛɛ naa baay ɛkumɛ wvú nɛn, yɛn lɛ wvuwɛ ɛ wvú leese bonyii ɛ̂ joo, ɛ bonyii bocii gɛne kɛ wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô wvú le.”
43003027	Ɛ Jon tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Kɛ wee nulo enu fiɛɛ sɛ ɛ̀ ge Nyo' lɛ wvú enù fí kɛ.
43003028	Ben kebɛɛ nulo eben jim nsaw wɛm lɛ me nto nu ɛ ŋgay lɛ kɛ ɛ̀ nu me wvù Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ kɛ. Geenɛn ɛ bó to tum me lɛ me ensa ɛ̂ wvú fwe.
43003029	Cee bvujen nu wee wvù kɛŋke jen. Ɛ nsaa cee bvujen wvù leeme mbew cee bvujen wvudvu le yuuke diɛw ye, ké no laŋlaŋe baay no wvú yuuke diɛw ye. Ɛ̀ nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no me nu keseen ɛ me ɛ n'yiŋsɛn bô nlaŋlaŋ.
43003030	Wvú kɛŋke kɛ keeku egɛn lo fwe, ɛ́ me entu lo jim.
43003031	Wee wvù nɛ fowe kuuke fele bonyii bocii. Ɛ wee wvu yî nshɛ le nu wee wvu yî nshɛ le, jemyi kɛ mwɛɛm ɛ ɛ̀ nu mvu yî nshɛ le. Wee wvù nɛ woŋ wvu we le kuuke fele bonyii bocii,
43003032	ɛ wvú leeme jim nsaw mwɛɛm ɛ ɛ̀ nu mvù wvú nu ɛ yɛn ɛ bvuu ɛ yuw e. Geenɛn, ɛ wee yaa nu dvú wvù beŋe fiɛɛ fì wvú jemyi le kɛ.
43003033	Wee wvù beŋe fiɛɛ fì wvú jemyi nu wvù duŋci lɛ wen tomte fiɛɛ fì lɛ Nyo' jemyi kecɛɛy.
43003034	Wee wvù Nyo' nu ɛ tum ké no jemyi kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu diɛw Nyo', njefo Nyo' nu ɛ nya Keyoy kew ɛ̂ wvú ɛ nfew yaa nu kɛ.
43003035	Icee Wan nu ɛ koŋ Wan, ɛ mum ɛ nya mwɛɛm mvunciim can ye le.
43003036	Wee wvù nu ɛ lese fitele yî Wan e nu ɛ wvú kɛŋke nshii wvù mɛy lo. Wee wvù baa yuuke wvú le nu ɛ wvú yaa nu ke ekɛŋkɛ nshii kɛ. Wvuwɛ wee nu ɛ shém Nyo' ffuuke wase bô wvú.”
43004001	Ɛ Jisos ke kiɛɛ lɛ Bofalasii nu ɛ yuw wase lɛ wen lemte ɛ bonyii bo ŋgoo le too ɛ wen leese ɛ̂ joo fele Jon.
43004002	Geenɛn kɛ ɛ̀ to cim leese wvú bó ɛ̂ joo kɛ, ɛ̀ to leese kɛ boom bew bo ŋgoo le maaŋ.
43004003	Ɛ wvú dioo kiɛɛ nonɛn, mum ja ɛ̂ keba ke woŋ e kè Judea kedvu le, no kaase tuu jim ɛ̂ kè Galilee le.
43004004	Wvú to kɛŋke keefey je keba kè Samalia le.
43004005	Ɛ wvú ke gɛn buy kelaante ke Samalia kemew e ɛ bó teŋe lɛ Sika, ɛ kí nu mbew wɛɛ wvù Yakow to nyaɛ ɛ̂ waa we wvù Yosɛw e.
43004006	Fwɛŋ joo wvù Yakow to cimɛɛ to nu fó. No Jisos to nu ɛ lɛn wase baay dose, ɛ wvú mum shii mbew fwɛŋ joo wvudvu le. Kefew to nu wase diɛwɛ didiuu ncow difɛɛ le ɛmvunsheeŋ.
43004007	Ɛ kpwoon mvu wvu Samalia jodvu ke nɛ to keetukɛ joo fó, ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Nya me bô joo ɛ́ me eŋ'wu.”
43004008	Ɛ̀ to nu ɛ boom bo ŋgoo le bo Jisos e ɛ gɛn ɛlaante keeguy mwɛɛm mvudien.
43004009	Ɛ kpwoon wvudvu bife ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Wo nu wee Juu, ɛ me nu wee wvu Samalia, wo ɛ ghan nɛɛ ɛ sɛ no lɛke joo ɛ̂ me?” Kpwoon wvudvu to gayte nonɛn, njefo Bojuu to ké no nyɛnsee lo bonyii bo Samalia.
43004010	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ́ wo be kee nnya yì ɛ̀ nu yi Nyo', noo wee wvù gayte ɛ̂ wo lɛ wo enya wen bô joo, tu wo be ɛ lɛkɛ ɛ̂ wvú, ɛ́ wvú enya wo bô joo yì booke sekecii.”
43004011	Ɛ kpwoon wvudvu kase bife ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Icɛm, wo nu sɛ wo kɛŋke fiɛɛ fì wo etukɛ joo dvú, ɛ fwɛŋ shiile nɛn, wo nu ke ejo fɛɛ yiyɛ joo yì booke sekecii?
43004012	Fí nu lɛ wo kuuke fele icee wese wvù Yakow wvù to cimɛɛ fwɛŋ wvun gɛɛ ɛ̂ bese, ɛ wvú kebɛɛ to nu ɛ wu joo jó, ɛ boom bew wu, ɛ nyám ye tɛn wu?”
43004013	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wee tfuu wvù wuu joo yin nu ɛ kendoŋ bɛɛ ke eyumte kɛ wvú.
43004014	Geenɛn, naa yɛɛ wvù nu ke ewu joo yì me nu ŋke enya, nu ɛ kɛ kendoŋ bɛɛ ke ebvuu eyuu eyum lo wvú kɛ. Joo yì me nu ŋke enya ɛ̂ wvú nu ke enɛ etu ntoŋ joo yì buyte yî ye le sekecii, ke eghan enya wvú nshii wvù mɛy lo.”
43004015	Ɛ kpwoon wvudvu mum gay ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Icɛm, nya me bô kfuu yiyin joo wvu lɛ fo kendoŋ ke ebvuu eyumte me ɛ me ntoo fɛn keentukɛ joo kɛ.”
43004016	Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Gɛnɛ etee dwee wo ɛ́ ben ɛ wvú eto.”
43004017	Ɛ kpwoon wvudvu tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Kɛ me ŋkɛŋke diemsɛn kɛ.” Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wo nu ɛ jeme lɛŋ no wo gay lɛ kɛ wo kɛŋke diemsɛn kɛ.
43004018	Wo nu ɛ kɛŋkɛ wase bolemsɛ botin, ɛ wvù ben ɛ wvú nu keseen yaa cim nu dwee wo kɛ. Fiɛɛ fì wo jeme nu kecɛɛy.”
43004019	Ɛ kpwoon wvudvu gay ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Icɛm, me nu ɛ n'yɛn keseen lɛ wo nu wee ntum Nyo'.
43004020	Bo'icee bosɛse to ké no bunlee Nyo' yî kum wvun e, ɛ ben Bojuu duu finɛn lɛ jò bonyii kɛŋke keebunlee Nyo' nu kɛ Jɛlusalɛm.”
43004021	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Kpwoon, bee fiɛɛ fì me ŋgayte fin. Kefew too lo kè ben nu ke ebunlee Nyo' Ice ɛ ɛ̀ yaa bvuu nu yî kum wvun e kɛnɛɛ Jɛlusalɛm kɛ.
43004022	Ben bonyii bo Samalia bunlee fiɛɛ yaa kee fí kɛ, ɛ bese Bojuu bunlee kee fiɛɛ fì bese bunlee, njefo mboyma fele ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî Bojuu le.
43004023	Geenɛn, kefew too lo, ɛ kí ɛ to wase kè bonyii bò bunlee Nyo' cɛɛy cɛɛy nu ke ebunlee Nyo' Ice ɛ̂ keyoy e bô yî kecɛɛy e. Ɛ̀ nɛɛ kfuu bonyii bò Nyo' Ice gomte lɛ bó ebunlee wen.
43004024	Nyo' nu Keyoy, ɛ bonyii bò bunlee wvú kɛŋke keebunlee ɛ̂ keyoy e bô yî kecɛɛy e.”
43004025	Ɛ kpwoon wvudvu gay ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Me ŋkee lo lɛ Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ too lo, wvù bó teŋe lɛ Klistu. Ɛ wvú nu ke edioo ɛ to, emum enyɛy mwɛɛm mvunciim ɛ̂ bese.”
43004026	Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Me wvun wvù jemyi ɛ̂ wo nu wvú wvudvu.”
43004027	Kɛ sekedvu, ɛ boom bo Jisos e bo ŋgoo le mum kase to. Ɛ diuw yum lo bó lɛ wvú jemyi bô kpwoon. Geenɛn, ɛ wee mvu bó le faŋɛ yaa bife lo ɛ̂ wvú lɛ laa wvú gomte la lɛ, kɛnɛɛ lɛ laa Jisos jemyi bô kpwoon wvudvu nje la lɛ.
43004028	Ɛ kpwoon wvudvu mum gɛɛ nshaan ye joo fó, gɛn ɛlaante, gɛn be bonyii lɛ,
43004029	“Ben kɛ eto eyɛn wee mvu wvù nu ɛ to ɛ see lo fiɛɛ ficii ɛ̂ me fì me ŋke nu ɛ n'yuu wase ŋge. Ɛ̀ nɛlo enu ɛ wee wvun nu Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ le?”
43004030	Ɛ bonyii buy ɛlaante mum no gɛne fô Jisos e.
43004031	Ɛ̀ to nu ɛ boom bo ŋgoo le bo Jisos e ɛ shɛɛ wase ɛ no lɛke Jisos gayte ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Labay, diekɛn.”
43004032	Geenɛn, ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Me ŋkɛŋke mwɛɛm mvudien keendie ɛ ben yaa kee mvú kɛ.”
43004033	Ɛ boom bew bo ŋgoo le mum ghay ɛbonɛbon lɛ, “Wee nu ɛ shɛɛ ɛ to bô mwɛɛm mvudien ɛ nya ɛ̂ wvú le?”
43004034	Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Mwɛɛm mvudien mwem nu lɛ me eŋge fiɛɛ fì wee wvù tum me shieele, emɛse lemme diew dicii.
43004035	Kɛ ben duu finɛn lɛ ɛ́ shɛɛte kee nɛ, ɛ́ emum enu kefew ke ŋgbwele le? Ɛ́ me eŋgay ɛ̂ ben lɛ, ben ecake ɛjisɛ we etaa eyɛn no mwɛɛm nu ɛ be wase ŋɛɛ le lɛ bó egbweci.
43004036	Wee wvù gbweci kɛŋke nlawma we, baanci ŋgu gɛɛle yî nshii wvù mɛy lo le, wvu lɛ wee njewe bô wee ŋgbwele ke elaŋlaŋe yî wee le mwaaŋ.
43004037	Fifin duŋci lɛ ŋgan wvun nu kecɛɛy wvù gayte lɛ, ‘Wee mvu ké jewyi, ɛ wee mvu gbwele.’
43004038	Me ntum ben lɛ ben egɛn egbwele mwɛɛm mvù ben to baa lem kɛ. Bonyii bomew nu ɛ lem, ben ɛ ley bvujoŋkɛ bvu lemme dibole.”
43004039	Bonyii bo Samalia nteen ɛ̂ kelaante kedvu le to nu ɛ lese fitele yî Jisos e nje fiɛɛ fì kpwoon wvudvu to jemyɛɛ ɛ̂ bó lɛ wvú be ɛ see lo fiɛɛ ficii ɛ̂ wen fì wen ke nu ɛ yuu wase ge.
43004040	Nonɛn ɛ bó ke dioo to yɛn Jisos e, lɛkɛ lɛ bô bowen ece. Ɛ wvú bee, ɛ bô bó ce ɛdiuw ɛfaa.
43004041	Ɛ bonyii nteen bvuu lese fitele yî Jisos e nje njeme we.
43004042	Ɛ bonyii bodvu gay ɛ̂ kpwoon wɛ lɛ, “Bese nu ɛ lese fitele yî ye le ɛ ɛ̀ yaa bvuu nu nje njeme wo kɛ. Bese nu ɛ yuw wase bô bitem bisɛse, ɛ kiɛɛ lo lɛ wee wvun nu Mboyse woŋ wvun kecɛɛy.”
43004043	Ɛ ɛdiuw yo ɛfaa yodvu ke fey, ɛ Jisos nɛ no gɛne Galilee.
43004044	Wvú kebɛɛ to nu ɛ yuu gay wase lɛ kɛ bó ké no wvumte wee ntum Nyo' woŋ we le kɛ.
43004045	Geenɛn, ɛ wvú ke dioo gɛn fɛse Galilee, ɛ bonyii bo jó fiisɛn lo wvú njefo bó to nu ɛ yɛn mwɛɛm mvù wvú to geɛ fô ŋkaw e Jɛlusalɛm, njefo bó tɛn to nu fô ŋkaw wvudvu le.
43004046	Ɛ Jisos ke bvuu kase gɛn Kana wvu ɛ̂ keba kè Galilee le jò wvú to baŋkɛɛ joo ɛ ɛ̀ tu mbvuum. Ɛ̀ to nu ɛ wee wvu baay mvu nu ɛ̂ kelaante kè Kafana'um e, ɛ waa we wvù diemsɛn cɛmte.
43004047	Ɛ wee wvu baay wvudvu dioo yuw lɛ Jisos nu ɛ nɛ wase Judea ɛ to Galilee, ɛ wvú gɛn fô wvú le, ku can lɛ wvú ebow kɛ eto efɛ waa wen, lɛ wvú nu wase diuw kpwe le.
43004048	Ɛ Jisos mum gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ́ ben nu sɛ ben ɛ yɛn mwɛɛm mvù duŋci bvukukɛ bvu Nyo' le, ɛ yɛn tɛn mwɛɛm mvu diuw wvù yumɛɛn e, ben saa ke elese fitele yî yɛm e kɛ.”
43004049	Ɛ wee wvu baay wvudvu gay ɛ̂ wvú le, “Icɛm, to kɛ ɛ́ bó ebooke lo, fo waa wɛm ekpwe.”
43004050	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ̀ gɛnè, waa wo nu ebonɛn.” Wee wvudvu to nu ɛ bee fiɛɛ fì Jisos jemyɛɛ ɛ̂ wvú, mum nɛ no gɛne.
43004051	No wvú to booke, ɛ bô boom bew bo lemme le tasɛn, ɛ bó see ɛ̂ wvú lɛ waa we nu ɛ bonɛn wase.
43004052	Ɛ wvú mum bife ɛ̂ bó kefew kè wvú se kɛwɛɛ ebonene. Ɛ bó gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ̀ se nu foguu kɛ diɛwɛ diuu dimwaaŋ e fomvunsheeŋ, ken'ya' kedvu ɛ mum ɛ cinɛ wvú le.”
43004053	Ɛ cee wan wvudvu mum kume lɛ ɛ̀ nu naa kefew kedvu kè Jisos to gayɛɛ ɛ̂ wen lɛ, “Waa wo nu ebonɛn.” Ɛ wvú bô ɛkolɛ kew naa noo yew ye yicii mum lese fitele yî Jisos e.
43004054	Fifin fiɛɛ fì duŋci bvukukɛ bvu Jisos e to nu fi bokaŋ bofɛɛ fì wvú to geɛ seke wvú to nɛn'yɛɛ Judea to Galilee.
43005001	Ɛjim jodvu ɛ ŋkaw Bojuu mvu no nu Jɛlusalɛm, ɛ Jisos ben jó.
43005002	Kentuke ke joo le kemew to nu jó ɛ bó teŋe ɛ̂ díɛw Ibulu le lɛ Bɛtɛsda, ɛ kí nu mbew Diuw Ketaaŋ wvu Njée le. Bó to nu ɛ bom dicile fó ditin,
43005003	ɛ bonyii bo bincɛm e to ké no lone lo fó, bò nu binfefe bô bò nu bontɛŋɛ noo bò nu ɛ kpwekɛn wase keba kemwaaŋ. [Bó to ké no jiimene fó cɛyte seke joo nu ke enɛ eshiike.
43005004	Nceendaa Tata mvu to ké no too ɛ̂ kefew e ɛ̂ kefew e, leyte shiike joo yidvu. Wee wvu fwe wvù ɛ yaw ɛ ley jó seke nceendaa wvudvu ɛ shiw joo yidvu, tu wvú nu ebonɛn yî kencɛm kew e naa ɛ kí cim nu nɛɛ.]
43005005	Wee mvu to nu fó ɛ wvú ɛ cɛm wase bilum mbaanshɛ ncow nyaŋ.
43005006	Ɛ Jisos ke dioo to fó yɛn wvú le, kiɛɛ lɛ wvú to jiime wase fó ncejole, ɛ wvú bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wo kooŋke keebonɛn e?”
43005007	Ɛ wee kencɛm wvudvu tfuse lɛ, “Icɛm, kɛ me ŋkɛŋke wee wvù nulo elese me ɛ̂ joo yin e seke yí ɛ shiw kɛ. Ɛ̀ nu seke yí ɛ shiw, ɛ me ndioo ŋgɛne keenley, ɛ ɛ̀ no nu ɛ wee mvu ɛ yaw wase ɛ ley ɛ̂ me le.”
43005008	Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Nɛnɛ we, ejo ghaam yo, egɛnè.”
43005009	Kaŋ mwaaŋ, ɛ wee wvudvu mum bonɛn, jo ghaam ye no gɛne. Ɛ̀ to nu ɛ ɛbvubwɛ nu diuu di mbam e.
43005010	Ɛ Bojuu mum gay ɛ̂ wee wvù bó to fɛlɛɛ wɛ lɛ, “Ɛbɛn nu diuu di mbam e ɛ nci baa bee lɛ wo etuu ghaam yo kɛ.”
43005011	Ɛ wvú tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Wee wvù be fɛ me be ɛ gay lɛ me enjo ghaam yɛm eŋgɛne.”
43005012	Ɛ bó bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu yɛɛ wvudvu wvù be gay ɛ̂ wo lɛ wo ejo ghaam yo egɛne?”
43005013	Kɛ wee wvù bó to fɛlɛɛ wvudvu to cim kee wee wvù fɛlɛɛ wvú kɛ, njefo Jisos to nu ɛ nɛ wase ley gɛn ɛnte jo kebombom ke bonyii le kè to nu fó le.
43005014	Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu ɛjim jodvu, ɛ Jisos yɛn wvú le fô yew ncese le, gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Taa eyɛn no wo nu ɛ bonɛn wase. Fo wo ebvuu egee bibefɛ kɛ. Ɛ́ wo gee lo, ɛ́ fiɛɛ ke egbwe yî yo le fì nu ɛ fo ɛ fey fin.”
43005015	Ɛ wee wvudvu nɛ gɛn see ɛ̂ Bojuu lɛ ɛ̀ nu Jisos wvù be fɛ wen.
43005016	Ɛ Bojuu mum kɛw no bone bikaa ɛ̂ Jisos ɛjim, njefo wvú to fɛ wee wvun ɛ ɛ̀ nu diuu di mbam e.
43005017	Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Icɛm ké no lemte sekecii, ɛ me tɛn nlemte nonɛn.”
43005018	Ɛ njeme wvun ge ɛ Bojuu mɛse lo no gomte baay keeyu wvú, njefo kɛ ɛ̀ to mɛy kɛ mbam wvù wvú to ŋgoyte maaŋ kɛ. Wvú to teŋe tɛn Nyo' lɛ Icee wen, fewsene ɛkolɛ kew lɛ wen nu lɛŋlɛŋ bô Nyo'.
43005019	Ɛ Jisos ke nɛ gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy kecɛɛy lɛ kɛ me wvù Wan nɛlo eŋge fiɛɛ yî mvuŋgay mwem e kɛ. Me ŋké no ŋgee kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì me n'yɛne ɛ Icɛm gee. Fiɛɛ fì Icee Wan gee, nu kɛ fí fì Wan nu egee tɛn,
43005020	njefo Icee Wan wvudvu kooŋke Wan mum duŋci ɛ̂ Wan mwɛɛm mvunciim mvù wvú wvù Icee Wan gee. Ɛ wvú bɛɛ ke ebvuu eduŋcɛ mwɛɛm mvù fele mvun ɛ̂ wvú, ɛ́ wvú egeè ɛ ben yɛne, ɛ dew yumte lo ben.
43005021	No Icee Wan bvuuse bonyii yî kpwe le nyaa nshii ɛ̂ bó, nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no Wan nyaa nshii ɛ̂ naa yɛɛ wvù wvú nu ɛ koŋ.
43005022	Keebise fó nu ɛ Icee Wan yaa saake naa lo wee mvu kɛ. Wvú nu ɛ nya nsaw wemɛn ɛ ɛ̀ nu can Wan e,
43005023	wvu lɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bonyii bocii ewvumte Wan kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no bó wvumte Ice. Ɛ́ wee nu sɛ wvú wvumte Wan, tu kɛ wvú wvumte Ice wvù tum wvú kɛ.
43005024	Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy kecɛɛy lɛ wee wvù nu ɛ yuw diɛw yɛm e, ɛ bee wee wvù tum me le, nu ɛ wvú kɛŋke nshii wvù mɛy lo. Kɛ mwɛtɛn bɛɛ ke ebvuu ekɛŋke nsaw kɛ. Wvuwɛ wee nu ɛ buy wase can kpwe le, ɛ ley nshii le.
43005025	Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy kecɛɛy lɛ kefew too lo, ɛ kí ɛ to wase, kè bonyii bò nu ɛ kpwekɛn wase nu ke eyuw diɛw Waa Nyo', ɛ́ bó bodvu bò nu ke eyuw, nu ke ekɛŋkɛ nshii.
43005026	Ɛ fí nu nonɛn, njefo no nshii nɛn'yi yî Icee Wan e, nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no wvú nu ɛ nya mvuŋgay mvudvu ɛ̂ Wan lɛ nshii enɛn'yi tɛn yî ye le.
43005027	Wvú nu ɛ nya tɛn mvuŋgay ɛ̂ Wan lɛ wvú esumtenè bonsaw, njefo ɛ̀ nu Wan wvù nu wee wvù diee nu Waawee.
43005028	Fo diuw eyumtè ben yî fin e kɛ. Kefew too lo kè bonyii bocii bò nu jém e nu ke eyuw diɛw ye,
43005029	ebucɛ jém e, ɛ́ bò se gee mwɛɛm mvù jee ebucɛ eley nshii wvù mɛy lo le, ɛ́ bò se gee mwɛɛm mvù befe ebucɛ ɛ́ bó esaw bó, ɛ́ bó eley ŋgɛw e.
43005030	Kɛ fiɛɛ nu dvú fì me nulo eŋge ɛ̂ mvuŋgay mwem e kɛ. Me nsaake nsaw mbii no me n'yuuke, ɛ je yì me nsumtene jó nu yi teytey, njefo kɛ me ŋgomte keeŋgee ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì ɛ̀ shieele me kɛ. Me ŋgee ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì wee wvù tum me shieele.
43005031	Ɛ́ me mbene jim nsaw wvu ɛkolɛ kem, tu fiɛɛ fì me njemyi yaa nu kecɛɛy kɛ.
43005032	Geenɛn, wee mvu nu dvú wvù bene jim nsaw wɛm, ɛ me ŋkee lo lɛ fiɛɛ fì wvú jemyi ɛkumɛ me nu kecɛɛy.
43005033	Ben to nu ɛ tum bonyii fô Jon e, ɛ wvú gɛn ben jim nsaw ɛkumɛ kecɛɛy.
43005034	Kɛ ɛ̀ nu lɛ me ŋgomte lɛ ejemyì wee wvu wum ɛkumɛ wee wvù ɛ̀ nu me kɛ. Geenɛn, ɛ me njemyi nɛn wvu lɛ ben nulo ke eboy.
43005035	Jon to nu diɛwɛ ken'yeese le ɛ bó ɛ tfuw kí ɛ no bɛɛnci nyaa n'yuu, ɛ ben no kooŋke keenu ɛ̂ n'yuu we le yî kefew e caan, laŋlaŋe.
43005036	Fiɛɛ fimew nu dvú fì duŋci wee wvù ɛ̀ nu me ɛ fí fele Jon. Fí nu lɛ, lemme dì Icɛm nu ɛ nya lɛ me enlem emɛse dì ɛ̀ nu mwɛɛm mvù me ŋgee mvun duŋci lɛ ɛ̀ tum Icɛm me.
43005037	Icɛm wvù tum me nu ɛ wvú kebɛɛ tɛn nu ɛ ben jim nsaw wɛm. Ben ke baa yuw wase naa lo diɛw ye kɛ, ɛ ben ke baa yɛn wa naa lo no wvú nu kɛ.
43005038	Kɛ ben kɛŋke tɛn diɛw ye ɛ̂ mvuntelem mvunɛn e kɛ, njefo ben baa lese fitele yî wee wvù wvú tum e kɛ.
43005039	Ben taasse Ŋwa' Nyo' njefo ben kpwaake lɛ ɛ̀ nu jó jò ben nu ke ekɛŋkɛ fiɛɛ fì nu ke ege ɛ́ ben ekɛŋkɛ nshii wvù mɛy lo. Fiɛɛ fì nu ɛ̂ Ŋwa' wvudvu wvun e jemyi ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛkumɛ me.
43005040	Geenɛn, ben ɛ bvuu ɛ no tune keeto fô me le ekɛŋkɛ nshii.
43005041	Kɛ me nshieele mbense ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvù nɛn'yi ɛ̂ wee wvu wum kɛ.
43005042	Geenɛn ɛ me ŋkee ben. Me ŋkee naa lo lɛ kɛ ben kɛŋke keŋkoŋɛn ke Nyo' le ɛ̂ mvuntelem mvunɛn e kɛ.
43005043	Me nu ɛ nto ɛ̂ diee di Icɛm e, ben baa fiisɛn me kɛ. Ɛ́ ɛ̀ be to wee mvu ɛ̂ diew diee le, tu wvuwɛ nu wvù ben nu emum efiisɛn.
43005044	Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ ben ege nɛɛ sɛ bee me le, ɛ ben nu bò gomte mbense ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvù nɛn'yi fô bikuu binɛn e, yaa gomte mbense wvù nɛn'yi ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô Nyo' wvù ɛ̀ mɛy kɛ wvú le kɛ.
43005045	Fo ben ekpwaake lɛ ɛ̀ nu me wvù nu ke elom gee dinɛn dì befe ɛ̂ Icɛm kɛ. Ɛ̀ nu Muses wvù ben leke bvufee yî ye le wvù lomte wase gee dinɛn ɛ̂ Icɛm.
43005046	Ɛ́ ben to nu ɛ bee Muses e kecɛɛy, tu ben be ɛ bee me le njefo wvú to saŋ ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛkumɛ me.
43005047	Geenɛn no ben baa cim bee mwɛɛm mvù wvú to saŋɛɛ le, ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ ben ke eghan nɛɛ sɛ bee fiɛɛ fì me njemyi le?”
43006001	Ɛjim jodvu, ɛ Jisos ke nɛ gɛn lente Mamase yì Galilee, gɛn kewvu keki. Mamase yin nu yì bó teŋe tɛn lɛ yì Tibɛlias.
43006002	Ɛ kebombom ke bonyii le shfum ɛ̂ wvú ɛjim njefo bó to nu ɛ yɛn mwɛɛm mvù duŋci bvukukɛ bwew e mvù wvú to gee fô bonyii bo bincɛm e no wvú to fɛle bó.
43006003	Ɛ Jisos bô boom bew bo ŋgoo le nɛ ben gɛn shii yî kum e.
43006004	Ɛ̀ to nu sekekiɛ, ɛ Ŋkaw Bojuu wvu Daŋɛfey nu wase nceencee.
43006005	Ɛ Jisos ke dioo laŋ jise, yɛn no kebombom ke bonyii le too fô wvú le, ɛ wvú mum bife ɛ̂ Filew lɛ, “Beene nu eghan nɛɛ sɛ guy mwɛɛm mvudien ɛ́ bonyii ban edie?”
43006006	Wvú to biite nonɛn, momte kɛ lo Filew njefo wvú kebɛɛ to kee wase fiɛɛ fì wvú nu ege.
43006007	Ɛ Filew tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Kɛ bodanali gee fɛɛ nu ɛ cim ɛ kocɛn bò nulo eguy mwɛɛm mvudien mvù wee mwaaŋ mwaaŋ bó le ekɛŋkɛ kɛ naa caan kɛ.”
43006008	Ɛ waa we ŋgoo mvu wvù diee to nu Andulu wvù ɛ̀ nu waa bwee Semon Bita mum gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ,
43006009	“Wan diemsɛn mvu nu fɛn kɛŋke bontuw bo blɛɛd e botin bô byé yifiɛɛ, geenɛn fifin nulo ege naa la fô kfuu ban bonyii le nteen nɛn?”
43006010	Ɛ Jisos gay lɛ, “Ben egay ɛ́ bonyii eshiiyɛn fokuse.” Ɛ̀ to nu ɛ ɛgay nu fó ntay, ɛ bó mum gay ɛ bó shiiyɛn, ɛ bolemsɛ maaŋ nu diɛwɛ bontfuke botin e.
43006011	Ɛ Jisos mum fi bontuw bo blɛɛd e ba, nya keyoone ɛ̂ Nyo', mum gawcɛ ɛ̂ bonyii bò to shiiyɛnɛɛ ba. Ɛ wvú ge kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ bô byé yɛ. Ɛ wee tfuu kɛŋkɛ naa no wvú to shieele.
43006012	Ɛ bó ke die ffuu, ɛ wvú gay ɛ̂ boom bew bo ŋgoo le lɛ, “Ben ebaancɛ bimbɛke wvu lɛ fo fiɛɛ ela ɛcici kɛ.”
43006013	Nonɛn, ɛ bó mum baancɛ bimbɛke bi bontuw bo blɛɛd e bo botin ba bì to shɛɛtɛɛ, ɛ bí yiŋsɛn ŋkáa yuufe ncow fiɛɛ.
43006014	Ɛ bonyii bodvu dioo yɛn fiɛɛ fì duŋci bvukukɛ bwew e fin fì wvú ge, mum gay lɛ, “Wee wvun nu naa kecɛɛy Wee Ntum Nyo' wɛ wvù to nu keeke eto yî woŋ wvun e.”
43006015	Ɛ Jisos ke dioo yɛn lɛ bonyii bodvu gomte keeto ekoo wen mvuŋgay e, eghaa Nfon wvubole, ɛ wvú mum lɛwse ye kase ben ɛ̂ kum no nu jó wvú ɛmbeŋ.
43006016	Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu ɛkiɛguu, ɛ boom bew bo ŋgoo le bow gɛn fô mamase le,
43006017	ley ɛ̂ kekoŋ e kɛw no leenci gɛne Kafana'um. Ɛ̀ to nu sekekiɛ ɛ ɛkfuŋ ɛ jiim wase ɛ Jisos baa to wase fò bó to nu kɛ.
43006018	Ɛ joo ke nɛ no bvuyte, njefo nffum wvu baay to fele lo.
43006019	Ɛ bó no keyte kekoŋ leenci, ke gɛn wase buy kɛ diɛwɛ bomay botɛte kɛnɛɛ bonɛw e, ke nɛ yɛn Jisos e ɛ wvú lɛne yî joo le too wase mbew kekoŋ e. Ɛ kedvum gbwo bó.
43006020	Geenɛn, ɛ wvú gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Fo ben efanè kɛ. Ɛ̀ nu me.”
43006021	Ɛ bó yuw nonɛn, mum no kooŋke keejo wvú ɛ̂ kekoŋ e. Lɛ bó sɛsɛ, ɛ kekoŋ ɛ fɛse wase ŋgem joo le fò bó to gɛne.
43006022	Ɛ ɛkfuŋ ke buy yuu, ɛ bonyii bò to shɛkɛɛ mamase kewvu keki kume lɛ kekoŋ kè to nu fó to nu kɛ kemwaaŋ, ɛ Jisos to baa ley ɛ̂ kekoŋ kedvu le bô boom bew bo ŋgoo le kɛ, lɛ boom bew bo ŋgoo le to nɛ gɛn kɛ bó ɛmbeŋ.
43006023	Geenɛn, bikoŋ bimew to nu ɛ nɛ je Tibɛlias, lente to mbew bvudvuu bvù Tata to joɛ blɛɛd nya keyoone ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛ bonyii die le.
43006024	No bonyii bodvu to yɛnɛɛ lɛ kɛ Jisos kɛnɛɛ boom bew bo ŋgoo le nu fó kɛ, ɛ bó mum lecɛ ɛ̂ bikoŋ bidvu le, lente gɛn Kafana'um keegom Jisos.
43006025	Ɛ bó dioo gɛn yɛn wvú le kewvu keki, bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Labay, wo to jan seke la?”
43006026	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy kecɛɛy lɛ kɛ ben gomte me ɛ ɛ̀ nu nje mwɛɛm mvù duŋci bvukukɛ bwem mvù ben yɛne ɛ me ŋgee kɛ. Ben gomte me ɛ ɛ̀ nu njefo ben se nu ɛ die bontuw bo blɛɛd e ba ɛ ffuu.
43006027	Fo ben elemtè kɛ keekɛŋkɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu mwɛɛm mvudien mvù nulo ebefe kɛ. Ben elemtè ɛ ɛ̀ nu keekɛŋkɛ mwɛɛm mvudien mvù nu ke emɛy enu dvú egɛn ebuy yî nshii wvù mɛy lo le. Mvumvun nu mvù wee wvù diee nu Waawee nu ke enya ɛ̂ ben. Ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù Nyo' Ice nu ɛ gɛɛ ɛbo kew yî ye le.”
43006028	Ɛ bó mum bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Mwɛɛm mvù bese kɛŋke keegee ɛ́ fí emum enu lɛ bese gee lemme di Nyo' le nu mvù la?”
43006029	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Lemme di Nyo' le nu din dì nu lɛ, ben elese fitele yî wee wvù wvú tum e.”
43006030	Nonɛn ɛ bó mum bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Fiɛɛ fì duŋci bvukukɛ bwuw fì wo nulo ege wvu lɛ bese eyɛn emum elese fitele yî yo le nu la? Fiɛɛ fì wo nulo ege nu la?
43006031	Bo'icee bosɛse to nu ɛ die mana ŋkpwaante, ɛ ɛ̀ nu no bó saŋ lɛ, ‘Wvú to nu ɛ nya bó bô mwɛɛm mvudien mvù nɛn'yi woŋ wvu we le ɛ bó die.’”
43006032	No bó gay nonɛn, ɛ Jisos mum tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy kecɛɛy lɛ kɛ ɛ̀ to nu Muses wvù to nyaɛ mwɛɛm mvudien mvù nɛn'yi woŋ wvu we le ɛ̂ ben kɛ. Ɛ̀ nu Icɛm wvù nyaa mwɛɛm mvudien mvù ɛ̀ nu mvu kecɛɛy mvù nɛn'yi fowe.
43006033	Ben ekeè lɛ mwɛɛm mvudien mvu Nyo' le nu mvumwɛ mvù nɛ fowe ɛ shii ɛ to ɛ no nyaa nshii ɛ̂ bonyii bo yî woŋ wvun e.”
43006034	Ɛ bó gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Tata, ɛ̀ nyaà bese bô mwɛɛm mvudien mvun sekecii.”
43006035	Ɛ Jisos mum gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu me mwɛɛm mvudien mvù nyaa nshii. Kɛ wee wvù too fô me le bɛɛ ke ebvuu eyuuke jeŋ kɛ. Ɛ wee wvù nu ɛ lese fitele yî yɛm e nu ɛ kendoŋ yaa bɛɛ ke ebvuu eyumte wvú kɛ.
43006036	Geenɛn me nu ɛ ŋgay wase ɛ̂ ben lɛ ben nu ɛ yɛn me le, ɛ faŋɛ yaa lese fitele yî yɛm e kɛ.
43006037	Bonyii bocii bò Icɛm nu ɛ nya ɛ̂ me nu ke etoo fô me le. Ɛ wee wvù too fô me le nu ɛ me n'yaa nu ŋke eŋkuŋ wvú kɛ.
43006038	Me nɛ fowe ɛ nto fokuse fɛn. Ɛ me n'yaa nto keeŋge ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì ɛ̀ shieele me kɛ. Me nto keeŋge ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì ɛ̀ shieele wee wvù tum me.
43006039	Ɛ fiɛɛ fì wee wvù tum me shieele nu fin fì lɛ, fo me enlase naa lo wee mwaaŋ fô bonyii bò wvú nu ɛ nya ɛ̂ me le kɛ, geenɛn lɛ me ŋke embvuse lo bó yî kpwe le diuu di fokemɛse.
43006040	Ben ekeè lɛ fiɛɛ fì Icɛm shieele nu fin fì lɛ wee tfuu wvù nu ɛ yɛn Waa we le, ɛ lese fitele yî ye le, nu ke ekɛŋkɛ nshii wvù mɛy lo, ɛ me nu ŋke embvuse mwɛtɛn yî kpwe le diuu di fokemɛse.”
43006041	Ɛ Bojuu mum kɛw no wvukene ɛkumɛ wvú njefo wvú to nu ɛ gay lɛ wen nu mwɛɛm mvudien mvù nɛ fowe ɛ to fokuse fɛn.
43006042	Ɛ bó no wvukene nonɛn biite lɛ, “Wvun nu kɛ Jisos wvù waa Yosɛw e? Kɛ ice bô bwee nu ɛ beene kee bó le? Fí ghan nɛɛ le keseen wvú ɛ sɛ no duu lɛ wen nɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu fowe?”
43006043	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Fo ben ewvukenè ɛbenɛben kɛ.
43006044	Kɛ wee nulo eto fô me le sɛ ɛ̀ gufe Icɛm wvù tum me lɛ wvú eto kɛ. Ɛ me nu ŋke embvuse mwɛtɛn yî kpwe le diuu di fokemɛse.
43006045	Bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le to nu ɛ saŋ lɛ, ‘Nyo' nu ke eyɛɛyi bó bocii.’ Nonɛn wee tfuu wvù nu ɛ yuw fiɛɛ fì Icɛm yɛɛyi ɛ kiɛɛ, nu ɛ wvú nu ke eto fô me le.
43006046	Kɛ me njemyi nɛn lɛ wee nu dvú wvù nu ɛ yɛn wase Icɛm e kɛ. Ɛ̀ mɛy kɛ wvú wvuwɛ wvù nɛ fô Nyo' le wvù nu ɛ yɛn wase Ice le.
43006047	Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy kecɛɛy lɛ, wee wvù nu ɛ bee nu ɛ wvú kɛŋke wase nshii wvù mɛy lo.
43006048	Me nu mwɛɛm mvudien mvù nyaa nshii ɛ̂ bonyii.
43006049	Bo'icee bonɛn to nu ɛ die mana ŋkpwaante, geenɛn ke kpwekɛn kɛ lo.
43006050	Mwɛɛm mvudien mvun nu mvù nɛ fowe ɛ to wvu lɛ ɛ́ wee die lo mvú wvú saa ebvuu ke ekpwe kɛ.
43006051	Ɛ̀ nu me mwɛɛm mvudien mvù nɛ fowe mvù nyaa nshii ɛ̂ bonyii. Ɛ́ wee die mwɛɛm mvudien mvudvu mvun, ɛ́ wvú ke emɛy enu dvú sekecii. Ɛ mwɛɛm mvudien mvudvu mvù me nu ŋke enya wvu lɛ bonyii bo yî woŋ wvun e ke ekɛŋke nshii nu ye yɛm.”
43006052	Ɛ Bojuu mum nɛ kɛw no waale lo ɛbonɛbon biite lɛ, “Wee wvun nulo eghan nɛɛ sɛ nya ye ye lɛ beene edie?”
43006053	Ɛ Jisos mum jeme ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy kecɛɛy lɛ ɛ́ ben nu sɛ ben ɛ die ye wee wvù diee nu Waawee, ɛ wu tɛn ɛlɛmɛ kew, ben saa ekɛŋke nshii yî yene le kɛ.
43006054	Wee wvù diee ye yɛm bvuu wuu ɛlɛmɛ kem kɛŋke nshii wvù mɛy lo. Ɛ me nu ŋke embvuse wvú yî kpwe le diuu di fokemɛse,
43006055	njefo ye yɛm looci nu naa mwɛɛm mvudien, ɛ ɛlɛmɛ kem looci nu naa fiɛɛ fiwuun.
43006056	Wee wvù diee ye yɛm bvuu wuu ɛlɛmɛ kem cee yî yɛm e ɛ me tɛn ncee yî ye le.
43006057	Icɛm wvù tum me kɛŋke nshii, ɛ me nu dvú nje Icɛm. Nonɛn wee wvù diee ye yɛm nu ke enu tɛn dvú nje yɛm.
43006058	Mvumvun mwɛɛm mvudien nu mvù nɛ fowe ɛ to. Kɛ mvú nu diɛwɛ mwɛ mvù bo'icen to dieɛ ke kpwekɛn kɛ lo kɛ. Wee wvù diee mvumvun mwɛɛm mvudien nu ke emɛy nu dvú sekecii.”
43006059	Mwɛɛm mvun nu ɛ Jisos to jemyi no wvú to yɛɛyi bonyii yew bunle le Kafana'um.
43006060	Ɛ bonyii bo Jisos e bo ŋgoo le nteen yuw n'yɛɛyi wvun nɛn gay lɛ, “Wvun njeme ɛ tɛme baay! Ɛ̀ nulo ebee yɛɛ wvuwvun njeme?”
43006061	Geenɛn, ɛ Jisos kiɛɛ lɛ bonyii bew bo ŋgoo le wvukene ɛbonɛbon ɛkumɛ njeme wvun, mum bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Fiɛɛ fì me njeme fin nu ɛ shiw mvuntelem mvunɛn e?
43006062	Ɛ́ ɛ̀ fɛn nu nonɛn, ɛ́ ben ke ege nɛɛ fɛn ɛ ben ɛ yɛn ɛ wee wvù diee nu Waawee kaase bene fô wvú to shee nu fwele?
43006063	Keyoy ke Nyo' le nu fiɛɛ fì nyaa nshii. Kɛ nyam ye kɛŋke naa lo fiɛɛ keege kɛ. Njeme wvù me njeme ɛ̂ ben nu wvu Keyoy, ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì nyaa nshii.
43006064	Geenɛn ben bomew nu dvú ɛ bó baa bee njeme wvudvu le kɛ.” Jisos to jemyi nɛn njefo wvú to kee wase foŋkɛw bonyii bò baa lese fitele yî ye le, kee tɛn wee wvù nu ke egese wvú.
43006065	Ɛ wvú bvuu gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nɛɛ fiɛɛ fì me mbe ɛ njeme wase ɛ̂ ben lɛ kɛ wee nulo eto fô me le sɛ Icɛm nu ɛ nya je ɛ̂ wvú kɛ.”
43006066	Ɛjim jodvu, ɛ bonyii bew bo ŋgoo le nteen mum tfuw bikaa ɛ̂ wvú ɛjim faŋɛ yaa bvuu lɛne bô wvú kɛ.
43006067	Ɛ Jisos nɛ bife ɛ̂ boom bew bo ŋgoo le bo yuufe ncow bofɛɛ lɛ, “Ben tɛn shieele keegɛn e?”
43006068	Ɛ Semon Bita tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Tata, bese gɛne ɛ̂ yɛɛ le. Ɛ̀ kɛŋke wo njeme wvù nyaa nshii wvù mɛy lo,
43006069	ɛ bese ɛ bee, bvuu kee lɛ ɛ̀ nu wo wvuwɛ wvù yuule wvù nɛ fô Nyo' le.”
43006070	Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Kɛ ɛ̀ caw me ben bo yuufe ncow bofɛɛ ban e? Geenɛn, ɛ wee mvu ben e nu dɛwle.”
43006071	Jisos to jemyi nonɛn ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛkumɛ Judas wvù waa Semon Iskaliot. Wvú to nu ŋgoo boom bo Jisos e bo yuufe ncow bofɛɛ, ɛ ɛ̀ to nu wvú wvù to nu keeke eghan egese Jisos.
43007001	Ɛjim jodvu ɛ Jisos mɛy no ghane kɛ wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu keba kè Galilee le. Wvú to baa bvuu gɛn ɛ̂ kè Judea le kɛ, njefo Bojuu to gomte keeyu wvú.
43007002	Ɛ kefew ke Ŋkaw Bojuu wvù bó to teŋe lɛ Ŋkaw Cún e ke no too wase nceencee.
43007003	Ɛ boom bo bwee Jisos e mum gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Nɛnɛ jan egɛn Judea wvu lɛ bonyii buw bo ŋgoo le eyɛn lemme dì wo lemte le.
43007004	Ɛ́ wee lemte lemme gomte lɛ bonyii ekiɛɛ wvú, wvú saa elemte nyiime lo kɛ. No wo gee mwɛɛm mvun, gɛnɛ eduŋcɛ ɛkolɛ kuw ɛ̂ woŋ.”
43007005	Boom bo bwee le bodvu to jemyi nonɛn njefo bó to baa cim lese fibole fitele yî ye le kɛ.
43007006	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Kefew kem baa to wase kɛ. Fô ben e nu ɛ kefew kenɛn ké no nu kɛ ɛ kí ɛ kocɛn wase.
43007007	Kɛ bonyii bo yî woŋ wvun e nulo ebane ben kɛ. Geenɛn, ɛ bó bane me njefo me njemyi ɛ̂ bó lɛ gee dibole nu dì befe.
43007008	Ben ebenè finɛn gɛne fô Ŋkaw e. Kɛ me nu emben jó kɛ. Kefew kem baa eto naa wase ekocɛn kɛ.”
43007009	No wvú gay nonɛn, mum mɛy Galilee.
43007010	Geenɛn seke boom bo bwee le to benɛɛ wase fô Ŋkaw wvudvu le, ɛ wvú ke shɛɛ ben tɛn jó. Ɛ wvú dioo bene faŋɛ yaa bene wvù bonyii eyɛne wvú le kɛ, ben fiew ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ kenyilɛ le.
43007011	Ɛ̀ to nu ɛ Bojuu to gomte wase wvú fô Ŋkaw wvudvu le biwci lɛ, “Wvú sɛ nu fɛɛ le?”
43007012	Ɛ bonyii ke nɛ no tfumtfume ɛkumɛ wvú baay. Ɛ bomew bɛnsee lɛ, “Wvú nu wee wvù jee.” Ɛ bomew kaci lo lɛ, “Wvú lɛɛle lo bonyii.”
43007013	Geenɛn wee to baa nu dvú wvù ejeme ɛkumɛ wvú ya le kɛ, njefo bó to fane bikuu bi Bojuu le.
43007014	Ɛ ɛdiuw ɛ ŋkaw ke gawnɛn wase ɛntelɛŋ, ɛ Jisos gɛn ley fô yew ncese le no yɛɛyi bonyii.
43007015	Ɛ bikuu bi Bojuu le no yuuke kɛŋke lo ŋghaw, ghayte lɛ, “Wee wvun ghan nɛɛ ɛ sɛ no kee mwɛɛm nɛn sɛ wvú ke nu ɛ gɛn wase ŋwa'.”
43007016	Ɛ Jisos mum nɛ gay lɛ, “Kɛ n'yɛɛyi wvù me n'yɛɛyi wvun nu wɛm kɛ. Ɛ̀ nu wvu wee wvù tum me.
43007017	Ɛ́ wee gomte keegee ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì Nyo' shieele, ɛ́ wvú emum ekiɛɛ lɛ laa n'yɛɛyi wvun nɛn'yi ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô Nyo' le, nuu me n'yɛɛyi ɛ̂ mvuŋgay mwem e lɛ.
43007018	Wee wvù jemyi ɛ̂ mvuŋgay mwew e ké no gomte diee dì kuuke ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô ɛkolɛ kew e. Geenɛn ɛ wee wvù gomte diee dì kuuke ɛ ɛ̀ nu di wee wvù tum wvú le ké no nu wee kecɛɛy ɛ kenlɛɛma yaa nu yî ye le kɛ.
43007019	Muses to nu ɛ nya kɛ bonci ɛ̂ ben e? Geenɛn kɛ wee mvu ben e gɛɛle bonci bodvu kɛ! Ben gomte keeyu me nje la?”
43007020	Ɛ bonyii bodvu tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wo kɛŋke nceendaa dɛwle yî yo le. Wee wvù gomte keeyu wo nu yɛɛ?”
43007021	Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Me nto nu ɛ ŋge lemme dimwaaŋ ɛ ben no kɛŋke lo ŋghaw ɛkumɛ dí.
43007022	Muses to nu ɛ nya nci lɛ ben etfuusè boom yew. Ɛ kɛ nci wvun yaa to cim buy ɛ̂ Muses kɛ. Wvú to buy ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ bo'icee bonɛn. Ben ɛ mum ɛ no tfuuse boom yew naa noo diuu di mbam e.
43007023	Ɛ́ bó tfuuse wee yew diuu di mbam e wvu lɛ fo bó ke ebefe bô nci Muses, ben ɛ no yuuke nsase bô me lɛ me nto nu ɛ nfɛ wee ɛ wvú bonɛn ye yicii diuu di mbam e nje la?
43007024	Fo ben esaakè nsaw sumtene sɛ ben ɛ yaw ɛ tasse ɛ yɛn kɛ. Ben esaakè ɛ̂ je yi lɛŋ e.”
43007025	Ɛ bonyii bo Jɛlusalɛm bomew mum nɛ bife lɛ, “Wvun nu kɛ wee wvù bó gomte lɛ bó eyu?
43007026	Ben etaa eyɛn wvuwvun fɛn ɛ wvú jemyi ɛndan nɛn sɛ wee jemyi fiɛɛ ɛ̂ wvú ŋkuuŋ. Ɛ̀ nɛlo enu lɛ bikuu bi woŋ e nu ɛ loocɛ wase ɛ kiɛɛ lɛ wee wvun nu Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ le?
43007027	Geenɛn, beene kee jò wee wvun nɛ. Ɛ seke Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ nu ke eto nu ɛ kɛ wee nu ke ekiɛɛ jò wvú nɛ kɛ.”
43007028	Nonɛn ɛ Jisos dioo yɛɛyi bonyii fô yew ncese le ke nɛ fuŋ foweɛwe lɛ, “Ben kee me, kee tɛn jò me nɛ. Geenɛn kɛ me nto fɛn ɛ̂ mvuŋgay mwem e kɛ. Wee wvù tum me nu wee kecɛɛy, ɛ ben yaa kee wvú kɛ.
43007029	Me ŋkee wvú njefo me nɛ fô wvú le, ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù tum me.”
43007030	No wvú jeme nonɛn, ɛ bonyii bomew mum no gomte keekoo wvú. Geenɛn ɛ wee faŋɛ yaa kum wvú le kɛ, njefo kefew kew to baa to wase ekocɛn kɛ.
43007031	Geenɛn ɛ bonyii nteen lese fitele yî ye le no gayte lɛ, “Seke Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ ɛ ke ɛ to, ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wvú ke ebvuu ege mwɛɛm mvù duŋci bvukukɛ bvu Nyo' le efey mvù wee wvun gee wase?”
43007032	Ɛ Bofalasii ke dioo yuw no kebombom ke bonyii le tfumtfume ɛkumɛ Jisos, ɛ bô bocee ncese bo baay baay mum tum bonyii bo nci le lɛ bó egɛn ekoo wvú.
43007033	No bó gɛn, ɛ Jisos gay lɛ, “Me nu enu beene kɛ yî kefew e nɛn caan, emum eŋkase entu jim fô wee wvù tum me le.
43007034	Ben nu ke eshɛɛ gom me nɛn, saa eyɛn me le kɛ. Fò me ŋgɛne nu ɛ kɛ ben nulo eto fó kɛ.”
43007035	Ɛ Bojuu jeme ɛ̂ bikuu bibole lɛ, “Wee wvun gomte keegɛn ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ nɛɛ fò beene nu ke egom wvú saa eyɛn wvú le kɛ? Wvú gomte keegɛn bitum bì bonyii bosɛɛbeene nu ɛ tawse ɛ no cee bí le egɛn eyɛɛyi bonyii bo bitum bidvu le le?
43007036	Fiɛɛ fì wvú gayte lɛ, ‘Ben nu ke egom me saa eyɛn me le kɛ, ɛ fò me ŋgɛne nu ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nulo ɛ́ ben eto fó kɛ,’ nu ɛ wvú gayte ɛ fí nu lɛ la?”
43007037	Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu wase diuu di Ŋkaw e di fokemɛse dì ɛ̀ to nu diuu di Ŋkaw wvudvu le di baay, ɛ Jisos ja leem we fuŋ lɛ, “Ɛ́ kendoŋ yumte wee, ɛ́ mwɛtɛn eto fô me le ewu fiɛɛ.
43007038	Wee wvù nu ɛ lese fitele yî yɛm e nu ɛ fí nu ke enu kɛ no Ŋwa' Nyo' jemyi lɛ, ‘Joo yì nyaa nshii nu ke ebuyte ɛ̂ fitele fiew e booke nɛn kokokoko.’”
43007039	Fifin nu ɛ Jisos to jemyi ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛkumɛ Keyoy kè bonyii bò to nu ɛ lese fitele yî ye le nu ke ekɛŋkɛ. Ɛ̀ to nu kefew kin e ɛ bó baa nya wase Keyoy kedvu ɛ̂ bó kɛ, njefo Jisos to nu ɛ bó baa bense wase wvú ɛ́ wvú eley bvukukɛ le kɛ.
43007040	Ɛ bonyii yuw fiɛɛ fin fì Jisos to jemyɛɛ, ɛ bomew gay lɛ, “Wee wvun nu naa Wee Ntum Nyo' wɛ.”
43007041	Ɛ bomew gay lɛ, “Wvun nu Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ.” Geenɛn, ɛ bomew bife fibole lɛ, “Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ to kɛŋke keebuy ɛ ɛ̀ nu Galilee le?
43007042	Kɛ Ŋwa' Nyo' jemyi lɛ Mboyse wvudvu nu ke ebuy ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ kfuu di Nfon Dawe le, ɛ̂ ntɛw wvù Bɛtelɛ'ɛm e, wvù ɛ̀ nu ntɛw wvu Dawe le le?”
43007043	No bonyii gay nonɛn, ɛ keŋgawsɛn mum to ɛntelɛŋ jo bó ɛkumɛ Jisos.
43007044	Ɛ bonyii bomew bó le no gomte keekoo wvú, geenɛn ɛ wee faŋɛ yaa kum wvú le kɛ.
43007045	Ɛ bonyii bo nci le ba mum nɛ kase tu jim fô bocee ncese bo baay baay bô Bofalasii le, ɛ bó bife ɛ̂ bonyii bo nci le bodvu lɛ, “Ben baa eto bô wvú nje la?”
43007046	Ɛ bonyii bo nci le bodvu tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Wee ke baa yuu jemyi wase diɛwɛ wee wvun e kɛ.”
43007047	Ɛ Bofalasii bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Wvú nu ɛ gɛn wase ɛ lɛɛ tɛn noo ben fó le?
43007048	Ben nu ɛ yɛn ɛ bikuu bi woŋ e kɛnɛɛ Bofalasii ɛ lese fitele yî ye le?
43007049	Ɛ̀ nu kɛ kebombom kin kè yaa kee kɛ nci Nyo'. Lon nu fô bó ɛfa.”
43007050	Nikodɛmus wvù to nu wee mvu ŋgoo Bofalasii le, wvù to gɛnɛɛ wase diuu dimew yɛn Jisos e to nu fó. Ɛ wvú bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ,
43007051	“Nci wesebeene nu ɛ bee lɛ bó esumtɛn nsaw wee sɛ bó ɛ yaw wase ɛ yekɛ ɛ yuw fiɛɛ fì wvú jeme?”
43007052	Ɛ bó mum bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wo nɛ tɛn Galilee le? Tasse Ŋwa' Nyo' ntay ɛ́ wo eyɛn lɛ kɛ wee ntum Nyo' mvu nulo ke ebuy Galilee kɛ.”
43007053	[Ɛ bó mum nɛ mwaaŋ mwaaŋ no gɛne yéw yibole.
43008001	Ɛ Jisos nɛ ben fiew ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî Kum Bite bi Olif e.
43008002	Ɛ ɛkfuŋ buy yuu, ɛ wvú bvuu kase gɛn fô yew ncese le. Ɛ bonyii bocii tase mbew ye le, ɛ wvú mum shii fokuse no yɛɛyi bó.
43008003	Ɛ bonyii bò to duŋci bonci bô Bofalasii nɛ to bô kpwoon mvu ɛ bó ɛ koo ɛ wvú jiime bô diemsɛn mvu. No bó to bô wvú, leke fwe dvu bó,
43008004	gay ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Wee N'yɛɛyi, kpwoon wvun nu ɛ bó ɛ koo ɛ wvú jiime bô diemsɛn mvu.
43008005	Ɛ̂ bonci le nu ɛ Muses to gay lɛ wvuwvun kpwoon nu wvù bó etumyɛ lo bô ɛta ɛ́ wvú ekpwe. Wo ɛ gay fiuw lɛ la?”
43008006	Bó to gee nonɛn teeyi lo Jisos wvu lɛ wvú elowsɛn enjeme ɛ́ bó emum ekɛŋkɛ fiɛɛ fì bó ecu yî ye le. Geenɛn, ɛ Jisos ŋgvuwcɛ no saaŋke fiɛɛ fokuse bô kpwan ɛbo.
43008007	Ɛ bó mɛy kɛ no leemene fó nyɛɛyi wvú. Ɛ wvú nɛ leem we gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ɛ́ wee nu dvú ɛ̂ ben ɛntelɛŋ wvù yaa kɛŋke kebefɛ kɛ, ɛ́ wvú no nu wee wvu fwe wvù eyaw etum wvú bô tɛ.”
43008008	No Jisos gay nonɛn, bvuu kase ŋgvuwcɛ no saaŋke fiɛɛ fokuse bô kpwan ɛbo.
43008009	Ɛ bó yuw fiɛɛ fì Jisos gay, mum kɛw no tawsee mwaaŋ mwaaŋ kɛɛke yî ŋgaybonyii le. Ɛ bó ke tawse, ɛ ɛ̀ shɛɛ kɛ wase kpwoon wɛ no leeme fó bô Jisos maaŋ.
43008010	Ɛ Jisos kase leem we, bife ɛ̂ kpwoon wɛ lɛ, “Kpwoon, bó ɛ fɛɛ? Wee baa nu dvú wvù egay lɛ wo kɛŋke kɛ keekpwe le?”
43008011	Ɛ wvú tfuse lɛ, “Wee baa nu kɛ, Tata.” Ɛ Jisos mum gay lɛ, “Kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me eŋgay tɛn lɛ wo kɛŋke keekpwe kɛ. Ɛ̀ gɛnè, geenɛn fo wo ke ebvuu ege kebefɛ kɛ.”]
43008012	Ɛ Jisos bvuu jeme ɛ̂ bonyii bodvu lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu me n'yuu wvu yî woŋ wvun e. Naa yɛɛ wvù bii me le nu ɛ kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wvú elɛne ɛ̂ kejiwɛ le kɛ. Wvú nu ekɛŋke n'yuu wvù nyaa nshii ɛ̂ bonyii.”
43008013	Ɛ Bofalasii mum gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wo bene jim nsaw fô ɛkolɛ kuw e. Fiɛɛ fì wo jemyi baa nu kecɛɛy kɛ.”
43008014	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ɛ́ me ncim mbene jim nsaw fô ɛkolɛ kem e, tu fiɛɛ fì me njemyi nu kecɛɛy, njefo me ŋkee fô me nɛ, ŋkee tɛn fô me ŋgɛne. Geenɛn, kɛ ben kee fô me nɛ kɛnɛɛ fô me ŋgɛne kɛ.
43008015	Ben saake bonyii diɛwɛ bonyii bo boyuum e. Kɛ me nsaake fiem wee kɛ.
43008016	Geenɛn, ɛ́ me ncim nsaake wee, tu me nsaake ɛ̂ je yi lɛŋ e, njefo kɛ me nsaake me ɛmbeŋ kɛ. Me nsaake bee Icɛm wvù tum me.
43008017	Ɛ̂ ŋwa' wene bonci le nu ɛ bó ɛ saŋ lɛ, ɛ́ bonyii ben jim nsaw yî fiɛɛ le bofɛɛ, tu ɛ̀ nu kecɛɛy.
43008018	Me mbene jim nsaw fô ɛkolɛ kem e, ɛ Icɛm wvù tum me bene tɛn jim nsaw wɛm.”
43008019	Ɛ bó mum bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ico ɛ fɛɛ?” Ɛ Jisos tfuse lɛ, “Kɛ ben kee me kɛnɛɛ Icɛm kɛ. Ɛ́ ben be kee me, tu ben be kee tɛn Icɛm.”
43008020	Jisos to jemyi mwɛɛm mvun no wvú to yɛɛyi bonyii fô yew ncese le mbew fô bó to ké no nyaa bigew bi yew ncese le. Geenɛn, ɛ wee faŋɛ yaa koo wvú kɛ, njefo kefew kew to baa kocɛn wase kɛ.
43008021	Ɛ Jisos bvuu gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Me nu ŋke eŋgɛn, ɛ́ ben eshɛɛ egom me eghan ekpwe ɛ̂ bibefɛ binɛn e. Fô me ŋgɛne nu ɛ kɛ ben nulo eto fó kɛ.”
43008022	Ɛ Bojuu mum bife lɛ, “Wvú nu ke eyu ɛkolɛ kew e, no wvú gayte lɛ fô wen gɛne nu ɛ kɛ beene nulo eto fó kɛ?”
43008023	Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben nɛ fokuse fɛn, ɛ me nɛ fiem fowe. Ben nu bonyii bo yî woŋ wvun e. Kɛ me nu wee wvu yî woŋ wvun e kɛ.
43008024	Me nu ɛ ŋgay wase lɛ ben nu ke ekpwekɛn ɛnte jo bibefɛ binɛn. Ben ekeè lɛ ben nu ke ekpwekɛn ɛnte jo bibefɛ binɛn fɛn ɛ́ ben baa ebee lɛ ɛ̀ nu me wvudvu kɛ.”
43008025	Ɛ bó bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu wo wvù yɛɛ?” Ɛ Jisos tfuse lɛ, “Me nu wee wvù me nse ŋké no nseŋe wase ɛkumɛ wvú ɛ̂ ben ɛ kɛw foŋkɛw.
43008026	Me ŋkɛŋke mwɛɛm nteen mvù ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me enjeme ɛkumɛ ben noo mwɛɛm nteen mvù ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me ensaw ben yî dvu le. Geenɛn kɛ me n'yaa nu eŋge nonɛn kɛ. Fiɛɛ fì me nseŋe ɛ̂ woŋ nu fì me n'yuw ɛ̂ wee wvù tum me, ɛ wvú nu wee kecɛɛy.”
43008027	No wvú gay nonɛn, ɛ bó faŋɛ yaa kiɛɛ lɛ wvú jemyi ɛ̂ bó ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛkumɛ Ice kɛ.
43008028	Nonɛn ɛ Jisos mum gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Seke ben ɛ ke ɛ njɛyse wase wee wvù diee nu Waawee fowe, ɛ́ ben emum ekiɛɛ lɛ ɛ̀ nu me wvudvu bô lɛ kɛ me ŋgee fiɛɛ fimew ɛ̂ mvuŋgay mwem e kɛ, lɛ me njemyi nɛn ɛ ɛ̀ nu no Icɛm yɛɛyi me.
43008029	Wee wvù tum me nu bee wvú. Kɛ wvú baa cinɛ me le lɛ me enu me ɛmbeŋ kɛ, njefo me ŋké no ŋgee fiɛɛ sekecii ɛ ɛ̀ nu fì jee wvú le.”
43008030	No Jisos jemyɛɛ mwɛɛm mvun nɛn, ɛ bonyii nteen lese fitele yî ye le.
43008031	Ɛ Jisos mum gay wase ɛ̂ Bojuu bò to lesɛɛ fitele yî ye le lɛ, “Ɛ́ ben mɛy ɛ no leeme kɛ yî diɛw yɛm e, ɛ́ ben enu naa kecɛɛy bonyii bem bo ŋgoo le,
43008032	ɛ́ ben ke emum ekiɛɛ kecɛɛy ɛ́ kecɛɛy kedvu ege ɛ́ ben ebuy bvunfaw e.”
43008033	Ɛ bó tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Bese nu kfuu di Abla'am e, ɛ bese ke baa eyuu enu wase bvunfaw e can wee mvu le kɛ. Fí ghan nɛɛ le wo ɛ sɛ no gayte lɛ bese nu ke ebuy bvunfaw e?”
43008034	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy kecɛɛy lɛ wee tfuu wvù gee kebefɛ nu nfwa kebefɛ.
43008035	Kɛ nfwa ké mɛy no nu wee yew yì wvú nu yí le sekecii kɛ. Ɛ̀ ké mɛy waa yew no nu wee yew yidvu sekecii.
43008036	Nonɛn, ɛ́ Waa Nyo' bvuse ben yî bvunfaw e, tu ben nu ɛ buy wase bvú le kecɛɛy.
43008037	Me ŋkee naa lɛ ben nu kfuu di Abla'am e, geenɛn ɛ ben gomte kɛ keeyu me njefo kɛ diɛw yɛm kɛŋke naa lo bvudvuu yî yene le kɛ.
43008038	Me njemyi ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì me n'yɛn ɛ̂ Icɛm, ɛ ben gee finɛn ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì ben yuw ɛ̂ icen.”
43008039	Ɛ bó tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Icee wese nu Abla'am.” Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ɛ́ ben be nu boom bo Abla'am e, tu ben bee keegee fiɛɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu fì Abla'am to gee.
43008040	Me nu wee ɛ me nsee kecɛɛy kè me n'yuw ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛ̂ ben. Geenɛn, keseen nu ɛ ben gomte keeyu lo me, ɛ kɛ fifin nu fiɛɛ fì Abla'am to gee kɛ.
43008041	Ben gee ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì icen gee.” Ɛ bó gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Kɛ bese nu boom bò bó boke kuse kɛ. Bese kɛŋke Icee wese mwaaŋ, ɛ ɛ̀ nu Nyo'.”
43008042	Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ɛ́ Nyo' be nu icee wene, tu ben bee keekooŋke me, njefo me nɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô Nyo' le ɛ nsɛ nto. Kɛ me nto yî mvuŋgay mwem e kɛ. Ɛ̀ tum wvú me.
43008043	Ɛ̀ nu nje la wvù ben baa eyuuke fiɛɛ fì me njemyi le kɛ? Kɛ ɛ̀ nu njefo ben tune keeyuw diɛw yɛm e le?
43008044	Ben nu boom bo icee wene wvù dɛwle le, ɛ fiɛɛ fì ben shieele nu keegee fiɛɛ fì icee wene gomte. Wvú to nu wase wee wvù yuwyi bonyii ɛ kɛw lo foŋkɛw. Kɛ wvú kɛŋke fiɛɛ keege bô kecɛɛy kɛ, njefo kɛ kecɛɛy nu naa lo yî ye le kɛ. Wvú ké dioo mbiayte mbiay no jemyi kɛ no gee diew nu, njefo wvú nu wee mbiay nu cee mbiay.
43008045	Geenɛn, me nseŋe fiem ɛ ɛ̀ nu kecɛɛy, ɛ̀ nɛɛ fiɛɛ fì ben baa bee me le kɛ.
43008046	Ɛ̀ nu yɛɛ ɛ̂ ben ɛntelɛŋ wvù nulo eduŋcɛ fiɛɛ fì befe fì me ŋge? No fiɛɛ fì me nseŋe ɛ̂ ben nu kecɛɛy, ɛ̀ ge la fo ben ebee me le?
43008047	Wee wvù ɛ̀ nu wee Nyo' ké no yuuke diɛw Nyo' le. Fiɛɛ fì ben yaa yuuke kɛ diɛw Nyo' le nu njefo kɛ ben nu bonyii bo Nyo' le kɛ.”
43008048	Ɛ Bojuu mum gay ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Kɛ bese be ɛ see kecɛɛy lɛ wo nu nɛn ɛ wo nu wee wvu Samalia ɛ nceendaa dɛwle nu yî yo le le?”
43008049	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Kɛ nceendaa dɛwle nu yî yɛm e kɛ. Me n'wvumte fiem Icɛm, geenɛn ɛ ben yaa wvumte me kɛ.
43008050	Geenɛn kɛ ɛ̀ nu lɛ me ŋgomte diee dì kuuke fô ɛkolɛ kem e kɛ. Wee nu dvú mwaaŋ wvù gomte fifiɛ, ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù sumtene bonsaw.
43008051	Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy kecɛɛy lɛ ɛ́ wee yuuke diɛw yɛm e, wvú saa ke eyuu eyuw wvuŋ kpwe kɛ.”
43008052	Ɛ Bojuu gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Bese nu ɛ kiɛɛ wase keseen lɛ nceendaa dɛwle nu yî yo le. Abla'am to nu ɛ kpwe, ɛ bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le kpwekɛn tɛn, wo ɛ no duu lɛ ɛ́ wee yuuke diɛw yo le, wvú saa ke eyuu eyuw wvuŋ kpwe kɛ.
43008053	Wo fele icee wese wvù Abla'am wvù to kpweɛ, fele tɛn bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le bò to kpwekɛnɛɛ le? Wo kpwaake naa lɛ wo nu la?”
43008054	Ɛ Jisos tfuse lɛ, “Ɛ́ me mbensee ɛkolɛ kem, tu fifiɛ nu ɛcici. Ɛ̀ nu Icɛm wvù bensee me, ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù ben duu lɛ ɛ̀ nu Nyo' wene.
43008055	Geenɛn ɛ ben yaa kee wvú kɛ. Ɛ̀ kee kɛ me wvú. Ɛ́ me nɛ ɛ ŋgay lɛ kɛ me ŋkee wvú kɛ, tu me nu wee mbiay diɛwɛ ben e. Geenɛn, no fí nu, nu ɛ me ŋkee wvú, n'yuuke diɛw ye le.
43008056	Icee wene wvù Abla'am to nu ɛ no laŋlaŋe lɛ wen nu ke eyɛn ɛdiuw ɛyɛm e. Ɛ wvú ke yɛn, no yuuke njoŋ.”
43008057	Ɛ Bojuu mum sɛsɛ lɛ, “Wo nu sɛ wo nu ɛ buy wase bilum mbaanshen ŋkuuŋ, ɛ no nu ɛ wo to yɛn wase Abla'am e le?”
43008058	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy kecɛɛy lɛ, ɛ́ Abla'am sɛ keeke enu, nu ɛ me nu wase.”
43008059	Ɛ bó yuw nonɛn, mum jo ɛta lɛ bó etumyɛ Jisos dvú. Ɛ Jisos nyiim mum buy yew ncese le.
43009001	Ɛ Jisos ke dioo lɛne, yɛn diemsɛn mvu le ɛ bó to boke wvú ɛ wvú ɛ fefe wase.
43009002	Ɛ boom bew bo ŋgoo le bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Labay, ɛ̀ to ge yɛɛ kebefɛ ɛ bó sɛ boo wee wvun ɛ wvú ɛ fefe wase? Ɛ̀ to ge wee wvudvu nuu bwee bô ice lɛ?”
43009003	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Kɛ ɛ̀ nu lɛ wee wvun kɛnɛɛ bwee bô ice to nu ɛ ge kebefɛ kɛ. Bó to boke wvú nonɛn wvu lɛ lemme di Nyo' le ke eduŋcɛ ye yî ye le.
43009004	Beene kɛŋke keelemtè lemme di wee wvù tumɛɛ me le ɛ ɛ̀ bɛɛ ɛmvunsheeŋ. Ɛntaŋ too lo ɛ ɛ̀ nu kefew kè wee yaa nulo elem fiɛɛ kɛ.
43009005	Ɛ gɛn ɛ buy naa seke la le no me nu yî woŋ wvun e, nu ɛ me nu n'yuu wvu yî woŋ wvun e.”
43009006	No Jisos jeme njeme wvun, mum cuy ncɛŋ fokuse, towcɛ nshɛ dvú mum yefe ɛjisɛ ɛ wee wvudvu dvú,
43009007	mum gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Gɛnɛ ecukɛ ɛ̂ Ketfum ke Siloam e.” (Diee dì Siloam nu lɛ, “Bó tum lo.”) Ɛ wvú mum gɛn cukɛ, kase no too yɛne wase mwɛɛm e.
43009008	Ɛ bonyii bò to cee mbew ye le noo bonyii bò to ké no yɛne wvú le diɛwɛ wee ɛlɛkɛɛ le no ghaynene lɛ, “Wvun nu kɛ wee wɛ wvù se ké no shiile lo lɛke ɛlɛkɛɛ le?”
43009009	Ɛ bomew no gayte lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu wvú.” Bomew lɛ, “'Aay wvú fieesene lo wvú.” Ɛ wee wvudvu gay lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu me wvudvu.”
43009010	Nonɛn ɛ bó mum bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛjisɛ ɛyo ghan nɛɛ le ɛ sɛ yene ye?”
43009011	Ɛ wvú tfuse lɛ, “Wee wvù bó teŋe lɛ Jisos be ɛ towcɛ nshɛ ɛ yefe ɛjisɛ ɛyɛm dvú, ɛ gay lɛ me eŋgɛn encukɛ Siloam. Me ɛ mum ɛ ŋgɛn ɛ ncukɛ, ɛjisɛ ɛyɛm ɛ mum ɛ yene ye.”
43009012	Ɛ bó bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wvú ɛ fɛɛ?” Ɛ wvú tfuse lɛ, “Kɛ me ŋkee kɛ.”
43009013	Ɛ bó mum nɛ jo wee wɛ wvù to shee nu ɛ wvú ɛ fefe gɛn bô wvú fô Bofalasii le.
43009014	Diuu dì Jisos to towcɛ nshɛ bvuu yene ɛjisɛ wee wvudvu to nu diuu di mbam e.
43009015	Ɛ Bofalasii bodvu bvuu bife tɛn ɛ̂ wvú no wvú ghan ɛjisɛ ɛye ɛ sɛ yene ye. Ɛ wvú tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Wvú be ɛ yefe ɛjisɛ ɛyɛm bô nshɛ, me ɛ ŋgɛn ɛ ncukɛ ɛ mum ɛ no n'yɛne mwɛɛm e.”
43009016	Ɛ Bofalasii mum gay lɛ, “Kɛ wee wvun nɛ fô Nyo' le kɛ, njefo wvú lemte diuu di mbam e.” Ɛ bomew gay fibole lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wee wvù gee bibefɛ eghan nɛɛ sɛ no gee kfuu mvun mwɛɛm mvù duŋci bvukukɛ bvu Nyo' le?” Ɛ keŋgawsɛn mum to ɛ̂ bó ɛntelɛŋ.
43009017	Ɛ bó bvuu kase bife ɛ̂ wee wɛ lɛ, “Wo gay fiuw lɛ la ɛkumɛ wee wvudvu no wvú be ɛ yene ɛjisɛ ɛyo?” Ɛ wvú tfuse lɛ, “Wee wvudvu nu wee ntum Nyo'.”
43009018	Kɛ Bojuu to nu ɛ bee lɛ wee wvudvu to shee nu ɛ wvú ɛ fefe ɛ bó sɛ yene ɛjisɛ ɛye kɛ. Ɛ bó ke ghan tee bwee bô ice ɛ bó to.
43009019	Ɛ bó bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Wvun nu kɛ waa wene wvù ben duu lɛ bó to boke wvú ɛ wvú ɛ fefe wase? Wvú ghan nɛɛ ɛ sɛ no yɛne mwɛɛm e keseen?”
43009020	Ɛ bwee bô ice tfuse lɛ, “Bese kee lo lɛ wvun nu waa wese ɛ bó to boke ɛ wvú ɛ fefe wase.
43009021	Geenɛn, no fí ghan wvú ɛ sɛ no yɛne mwɛɛm e keseen nu ɛ kɛ bese kee kɛ. Ɛ kɛ bese kee tɛn wee wvù yene ɛjisɛ ɛye kɛ. Ben ebife ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ wvú. Wvú nu wase wee ɛ ɛjise ɛ yuu. Wvú nulo ejeme fô ɛkolɛ kew e.”
43009022	Bwee bô ice to gay nonɛn njefo bó to fane Bojuu, ɛ fí nu ɛ Bojuu to leke wase lo lɛ ɛ́ wee mom lo ɛ jeme bô diuw we lɛ Jisos nu Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ, ɛ́ bó ekuŋ lo mwɛtɛn yew bunle le.
43009023	Ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì bwee bô ice to gayɛɛ lɛ wvú nu wase wee ɛ ɛjisɛ ɛ yuu, lɛ bó ebife ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ wvú.
43009024	Yî bokaŋ e bofɛɛ, ɛ bó bvuu tee wee wɛ wvù to shee nu ɛ wvú ɛ fefe, gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “See fiɛɛ fi kecɛɛy ɛ́ mbense egɛn ɛ̂ Nyo'. Bese kee fisɛse lɛ wee wvun nu wee wvù gee bibefɛ.”
43009025	Ɛ wvú tfuse lɛ, “Kɛnɛɛ wvú gee bibefɛ, tu kɛ me ŋkee kɛ. Fiɛɛ fimwaaŋ fì me ŋkee nu kɛ lɛ me nse nshee nu ɛ me ɛ nfefe, ɛ keseen nu ɛ me n'yɛne wase mwɛɛm e.”
43009026	Ɛ bó bvuu bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wvú be ge nɛɛ bô wo? Wvú be ge nɛɛ ɛ sɛ yene ɛjisɛ ɛyo?”
43009027	Ɛ wvú tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Me mbe ɛ nsee wase ɛ̂ ben, ben baa kooŋke keeyuw kɛ. Ben bvuu gomte keeyuw ege la dvú? Ben tɛn gomte keenu bonyii bew bo ŋgoo le le?”
43009028	Ɛ bó nan'yɛ lo wvú gay lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu wo wee we ŋgoo. Bese nu fisɛse bonyii bo ŋgoo le bo Muses e.
43009029	Bese kee lo lɛ Muses nu ɛ Nyo' to ké no jemyi bô wvú. Geenɛn wee wvun nu ɛ kɛ bese kee jò wvú buy kɛ.”
43009030	Ɛ wee wvudvu tfuse lɛ, “Abaay, fin nu lo keŋghaw ke fiɛɛ le! Ben duu lɛ kɛ ben kee jò wvú buy e? Geenɛn ɛ wvú ɛ yene ɛjisɛ ɛyɛm.
43009031	Beene kee lo lɛ kɛ Nyo' ké yuw bunle wee wvù gee bibefɛ kɛ. Geenɛn, ɛ́ wee wvumte Nyo', gee fiɛɛ fì wvú shieele, ɛ́ Nyo' eyuuke bunle ye.
43009032	Ɛ kɛw naa lo no woŋ to kɛwɛɛ nu ɛ bó ke baa eyuu eyuw wase lɛ wee nu ɛ yene ɛjisɛ ɛ wee ɛ bó to boke ɛ wvú ɛ fefe wase kɛ.
43009033	Ɛ́ ɛ̀ be baa nu lɛ wee wvun nɛ fô Nyo' le, tu kɛ ɛ̀ be nulo ɛ́ wvú ege fiɛɛ kɛ.”
43009034	Ɛ bó gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wo nu ɛ bó to boke wo wemɛn ɛ̂ kebefɛ ɛnte, wo ɛ no gomte keeyɛɛyi bese le?” No bó gay nonɛn, mum kuŋ wvú ɛ̂ bó ɛntelɛŋ.
43009035	Ɛ Jisos ke yuw lɛ bó nu ɛ kuŋ wase wee wɛ ɛ̂ bó ɛntelɛŋ, ɛ wvú gom yɛn wvú le, bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wo nu ɛ lese fitele yî wee wvù diee nu Waawee le?”
43009036	Ɛ wvú bife lɛ, “Wee wvudvu nu yɛɛ icɛm? Kɛ see ɛ̂ me, wvu lɛ me enlese fitele yî ye le.”
43009037	Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wo nu ɛ yɛn wase wvú le. Ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvú wee wvù ben ɛ wvú jemyi keseen.”
43009038	Ɛ wee wvudvu mum gay lɛ, “Tata me nu ɛ nlese.” No wvú gay nonɛn, mum tum ɛnvuw ɛ̂ wvú fwe nya n'wvum ɛ̂ wvú.
43009039	Ɛ Jisos gay lɛ, “Me nto yî woŋ wvun e wvu lɛ bó esaw bonyii, ɛ́ bò yaa yɛne kɛ mwɛɛm e eyɛnè, ɛ́ bò kpwaake lɛ bó yɛne mwɛɛm e, etu binfefe.”
43009040	No Jisos jeme nɛn, ɛ Bofalasii bò to nu mbew ye le yuw mum bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Bese tɛn nu binfefe le?”
43009041	Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ɛ́ ben be nu binfefe, tu can yene be nu bvuyɛw ɛ̂ keba ke kebefɛ le. Geenɛn keseen no ben duu lɛ ben yɛne mwɛɛm e, nu ɛ bibefɛ binɛn nu emɛy kɛ enu yî bikuu binɛn e.”
43010001	“Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy kecɛɛy lɛ, ɛ́ wee leyte ɛ̂ ketaaŋ ke njée le, ɛ faŋɛ yaa eley ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô diuw ketaaŋ e, ɛ ben lo yî ketaaŋ e ɛ sɛ ley, tu wvuwɛ wee nu cooŋ, nu wee wvù lole mwɛɛm mvuŋgay e.
43010002	Geenɛn wee wvù ɛ̀ cɛyte wvú njée ké no leyte fiew ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô diuw ketaaŋ e.
43010003	Wvuwɛ wee nu wvù wee wvù cɛyte diuw ketaaŋ ké yene diuw ketaaŋ ɛ̂ wvú, ɛ wvú ley mum tee njée yì ɛ̀ nu ye ɛ̂ diee le, ɛ yí yuw diɛw ye, ɛ wvú mum jo buy dvú.
43010004	Seke wvú ɛ bvuse wase njée ye yicii ɛkfuŋ, mum no saa fwe teŋe ɛ njée yidvu bii wvú le, njefo yí kee diɛw ye.
43010005	Ɛ̀ ké dioo nu wee wvu ncɛw, yí saa ebi wvú le kɛ. Ɛ yí no lewte lo wvú, njefo kɛ yí kee diɛw wee wvu ncɛw kɛ.”
43010006	Ɛ Jisos ma ŋgan wvun ɛ̂ bó nonɛn, ɛ bó faŋɛ yaa kiɛɛ fiɛɛ fì wvú jemyi ɛ̂ bó ɛ̂ ŋgan wvudvu le kɛ.
43010007	Nonɛn, ɛ Jisos bvuu gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy kecɛɛy lɛ ɛ̀ nu me diuw ketaaŋ fò njée fele.
43010008	Bonyii bocii bò to saɛ ɛ̂ me fwe to nu kɛ bocooŋ noo bonyii bò lole mwɛɛm mvuŋgay e. Nonɛn ɛ njée faŋɛ yaa eyeke fiɛɛ fì bó jemyi kɛ.
43010009	Ɛ̀ nu me diuw ketaaŋ. Ɛ́ wee fey yî yɛm e ɛ sɛ ley, ɛ́ wvú ke eboy. Wvú nu ke enu diɛwɛ njee yì buyte gɛne diekene kaase tuu jim ɛ̂ ketaaŋ e.
43010010	Cooŋ ké no too kɛ keecoŋ lo, bô keeyu lo, noo keebefe lo bô fiɛɛ. Me nto fiem lɛ bonyii ekɛŋkɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu nshii, nshii ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvù nu ɛ loocɛ ɛ yiŋsɛn.
43010011	Ɛ̀ nu me ncɛy njée wvù jee. Ncɛy njée wvù jee ké nya nshii we keekpwe nje njée ye.
