43010012	Wee wvù bó jo kɛ lo wvú lemme le, sɛ ɛ̀ nu wvú ncɛy njée, ɛ njée yaa nu kɛ ye, ké yɛne ɛ kuula too, ɛ wvú mum laŋ njée fɛɛ lo, ɛ kuula mum shɛɛ kooyɛ njée ɛ yimi tawse.
43010013	Wvú ké no lewte njefo bó jo kɛ lo wvú lemme le, ɛ wvú baa ekpwe fiɛɛ fô njée le kɛ.
43010014	Ɛ̀ nu me ncɛy njée wvù jee. Me ŋkee njée yì ɛ̀ nu yɛm, ɛ njée yɛm kee tɛn me,
43010015	lɛŋlɛŋ no Icɛm kee me, ɛ me ŋkee tɛn Icɛm, ɛ me nu ɛ nya nshii wɛm keeŋkpwe nje njée yɛm.
43010016	Me ŋkɛŋke tɛn njée yimi ɛ yí baa nu ŋgoo yin e kɛ. Ɛ me ŋkɛŋke keento bô yí tɛn ɛ́ yí eyuuke diɛw yɛm e, ɛ́ ŋgoo njée emum enù mwaaŋ ɛ ncɛy njée nu mwaaŋ.
43010017	Me nu ɛ nya nshii wɛm keeŋkpwe wvu lɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me eŋkase enfi nshii wɛm jim. Ɛ̀ nɛɛ fiɛɛ fì Icɛm kooŋke me.
43010018	Kɛ wee nu dvú wvù joo nshii wɛm kɛ. Ɛ̀ nyaa me nshii wɛm ɛ̂ ŋkoŋ wvu wɛm e. Me ŋkɛŋke mvuŋgay keenya nshii wɛm keeŋkpwe, ŋkɛŋke mvuŋgay keeŋkase enfi nshii wɛm jim. Fifin nu fiɛɛ ɛ ɛ̀ gay Icɛm lɛ me eŋge.”
43010019	Ɛ Jisos jeme mwɛɛm mvun nɛn, ɛ keŋgawsɛn bvuu to ɛntelɛŋ jo Bojuu.
43010020	Ɛ bonyii nteen bó le no gayte lɛ, “Wvú kɛŋke nceendaa dɛwle, wvú jewte lo. Ben yeke la ɛ̂ wvú le?”
43010021	Geenɛn ɛ bomew no gayte lɛ, “Kɛ ban bonjeme nu bo wee wvù kɛŋke nceendaa dɛwle le kɛ. Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ nceendaa dɛwle eyene ɛjisɛ ɛ kenfefe?”
43010022	Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu kefew ke Ŋkaw mvu keekume no bó to kasɛɛ yene yew ncese Jɛlusalɛm,
43010023	ɛ Jisos gɛn no ghanci fô yew ncese le, fô cile Saamun e. Sekekiɛ to nu kefew ke kenton e.
43010024	Ɛ Bojuu nɛ to gem wvú tase, bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wo nu ke ecinɛ ɛ́ bese emɛy eŋgɛmtene nɛn egɛn ebuy nɛɛ? Ɛ́ ɛ̀ fɛn nu wo Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ, ɛ́ wo see lo ɛ̂ bese teytey.”
43010025	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Me nu ɛ nsee wase ɛ̂ ben, ben ɛ faŋɛ yaa bee kɛ. Dilemme dì me ŋgee ɛ̂ diee di Icɛm e nu ɛ dí duŋci wee wvù ɛ̀ nu me.
43010026	Geenɛn ben baa bee, njefo kɛ ben nu ŋgoo njée yɛm e kɛ.
43010027	Njée yɛm ké no yuuke diɛw yɛm e. Me ŋkee yí, ɛ yí bii me le,
43010028	ɛ me nyaa nshii wvù mɛy lo ɛ̂ yí. Kɛ yí nu ke eyuu ela kɛ. Ɛ wee yaa nu dvú wvù nu ke eyuu elo yí can yɛm e kɛ.
43010029	Icɛm wvù nya njée yidvu ɛ̂ me fele wee tfuu, ɛ wee yaa nu dvú wvù nulo elo yí can ye le kɛ.
43010030	Ɛ bee Icɛm nu fiɛɛ fimwaaŋ.”
43010031	Ɛ Bojuu bvuu jo ɛta keetumyɛ wvú dvú.
43010032	Ɛ Jisos bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben nu ɛ yɛn wase dilemme dì jee nteen dì Icɛm gay lɛ me eŋgeè. Ɛ̀ nu dì la dì ben gomte keetumyɛ me nje dí?”
43010033	Ɛ bó tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Kɛ bese tumyi wo ɛ ɛ̀ nu nje lemme dì jee dì wo ge kɛ. Bese tumyi wo ɛ ɛ̀ nu njefo wo beete bô diee di Nyo' le. Wo nu kɛ lo wee wvu wum, duu lɛ wo nu Nyo'.”
43010034	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Kɛ fí nu ɛ bó ɛ saŋ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' wene bonci le ɛ Nyo' jemyi jó lɛ, ‘Me nu ɛ ŋgay lɛ ben nu bonyo'’ le?
43010035	Nyo' teŋe bonyii bodvu lɛ bonyo', ɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ bó bodvu bò diɛw ye to gɛne fô bó le, (ɛ beene kee lɛ kɛ fiɛɛ fì nu ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le nulo ekumɛn kɛ.)
43010036	No fí nu nonɛn, ɛ̀ no nu nje la wvù ben gayte ɛ̂ wee wvù Ice nu ɛ caw ɛ tum yî woŋ wvun e lɛ wvú beete bô diee di Nyo' le kɛ njefo wvú nu ɛ gay lɛ wen nu Waa Nyo'?
43010037	Ɛ́ me nu nsɛ me ŋgee ɛ ɛ̀ nu dilemme di Icɛm e, fo ben ebee me le kɛ.
43010038	Geenɛn ɛ ɛ̀ nu lɛ me ŋgee ɛ ɛ̀ nu dí, ɛ́ ben baa cim bee me le, ɛ́ ben bee dí le, ɛ́ ben emum eloocɛ ekiɛɛ ntay lɛ Icɛm nu yî yɛm e, ɛ me nu yî Icɛm e.”
43010039	Ɛ Bojuu bvuu no gomte keekoo wvú, geenɛn ɛ wvú lemtɛn can yibole.
43010040	Ɛ Jisos bvuu gɛn lente tu Joo Joodan kewvu keki fò Jon to yawɛɛ eleese bonyii ɛ̂ joo, no nu jó.
43010041	Ɛ bonyii nteen no too yɛne wvú le. Ɛ bó ke nɛ gay lɛ, “Jon to baa ge naa fiɛɛ fimew fì duŋci bvukukɛ bvu Nyo' le kɛ. Geenɛn fiɛɛ ficii fì wvú to jemyi ɛkumɛ wee wvun to nu naa kecɛɛy.”
43010042	Nonɛn ɛ bonyii nteen lese fitele yî Jisos e jó.
43011001	Wee mvu wvù diee to nu Laasalus to nu ɛ nɛ no cɛmte. Wvú to nu wee wvu ntɛw wvù Bɛtani le, cee jó bô jɛ́me ye yì ɛ̀ to nu Maalia bô Maata.
43011002	Maalia wvun wvù waa bwee wvù Laasalus to cɛmte, nu wvù to yefɛɛ bikaa bi Tata le bô nfiey wvù shfuuŋkene, sho bô yvuw ye ɛkolɛ.
43011003	No wvú to cɛmte nonɛn, ɛ jɛ́me ye yidvu mum ciinse ntum fô Jisos e lɛ, “Tata, wɛ wvù ɛ̀ nu fitele fiuw cɛmte lo.”
43011004	Ɛ Jisos dioo yuw ntum wvudvu, gay lɛ, “Kɛ kencɛm kin nu ke kpwe le kɛ. Kí nu ke eduŋcɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu bvukukɛ bvù ɛ̀ nu bvu Nyo' le, wvu lɛ Waa Nyo' nulo ekɛŋkɛ diee dì kuuke nje kí.”
43011005	Jisos to kooŋke Maata bô waa bwee wvù Maalia noo Laasalus baay.
43011006	Geenɛn, seke wvú to yuwɛɛ lɛ Laasalus cɛmte lo, ɛ wvú bvuu ce fò wvú to nu ɛdiuw ɛfaa.
43011007	Ɛjim jodvu, ɛ wvú gay ɛ̂ boom bew bo ŋgoo le lɛ, “Beene ekase etu jim Judea.”
43011008	Ɛ bó bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Labay, ɛ̀ nu kɛ foguu foguu nɛn wvù Bojuu se gomte keetumyɛ wo bô ɛta ɛ́ wo ekpwe, wo ɛ bvuu ɛ no tuu jó le?”
43011009	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Kɛ bontam bo kefew e nu kɛ yuufe ncow bofɛɛ yî diuu le le? Ɛ́ wee lɛne ɛmvunsheeŋ, tu kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wvú ebaytɛn yî fiɛɛ le kɛ, njefo n'yuu wvu yî woŋ wvun e yeese wvú.
43011010	Geenɛn, ɛ́ wee lɛne ɛntaŋ, tu ɛ̀ nɛlo ɛ́ wvú ebaytɛn, njefo kɛ wvú kɛŋke n'yuu kɛ.”
43011011	No wvú jeme nonɛn, mum gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Nsaa yesebeene wvù Laasalus nu ɛ lefe wase, geenɛn ɛ me nu eŋgɛn eŋkamse wvú yî nyii didvu le.”
43011012	Ɛ boom bew bo ŋgoo le gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Tata, ɛ́ ɛ̀ fɛn nu lɛ wvú nu ɛ lefe, tu wvú nu ke ebonɛn.”
43011013	Jisos to jemyi ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛkumɛ kpwe Laasalus, geenɛn ɛ bó no yuuke lɛ wvú jemyi ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛkumɛ nyii dì nyii.
43011014	Ɛ Jisos mum jeme lo ɛ̂ bó teytey lɛ, “Laasalus nu ɛ kpwe wase.
43011015	Geenɛn ɛ me n'yuuke njoŋ nje yene lɛ kɛ me nse nu fó kɛ, wvu lɛ ben elese fitele yî yɛm me. Beene egɛnè lɛ jó.”
43011016	Ɛ Toma wvù bó to teŋe diee diew dimew lɛ Ɛmam, gay ɛ̂ bomew boom bo ŋgoo le lɛ, “Beene egɛn tɛn wvu lɛ beene nulo ekpwekɛn beene ɛ bó.”
43011017	Ɛ Jisos ke fɛse fó, yuw lɛ Laasalus nu ɛ ce wase ɛ̂ jem ɛdiuw ɛna.
43011018	Bɛtani jan to nu mbew Jɛlusalɛm e kɛ diɛwɛ bomay bofɛɛ nɛn.
43011019	Ɛ Bojuu nteen to to fô Maata bô Maalia le keecam shen bô bó yî kpwe waa bwee bó le.
43011020	Ɛ Maata ke dioo yuw lɛ Jisos too lo, ɛ wvú mum buy keegɛn ɛ́ bô wvú etasɛn, geenɛn ɛ Maalia mɛy yew.
43011021	Ɛ Maata gɛn gay ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Tata, ɛ́ wo se bee enu fɛn, tu kɛ waa bwɛɛm se nu ɛ kpwe kɛ.
43011022	Geenɛn, ɛ me ŋkee lɛ keseen wvun nu ɛ naa la fì wo ɛ lɛkɛ ɛ̂ Nyo' nu ɛ wvú nulo enya ɛ̂ wo.”
43011023	Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Waa bwoo nu ke ebuy yî kpwe le.”
43011024	Ɛ Maata gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Me ŋkee naa lo lɛ wvú nu ke ekase ebuy diuu di fokemɛse dì bonyii nu ke ebuyte yî kpwe le.”
43011025	Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu me wvù bvuuse bonyii yî kpwe le, ɛ ɛ̀ nu me nshii. Wee wvù nu ɛ lese fitele yî yɛm e nu ɛ wvú cim kpwe lo, ɛ́ wvú ke enu dvú,
43011026	ɛ naa yɛɛ wvù nu dvú keseen ɛ wvú ɛ lese fitele yî yɛm e, yaa nu ke ekpwe kɛ. Wo nu ɛ bee nonɛn e?”
43011027	Ɛ wvú bee lɛ, “'Ɛɛ Tata, me nu ɛ mbee lɛ wo nu Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ. Wo nu Waa Nyo' wvù to nu keeke eto yî woŋ wvun e.”
43011028	No Maata gayɛɛ nonɛn, mum gɛn tee Maalia wvù waa bwee, jeme ɛ̂ wvú fokuɛku lɛ, “Wee N'yɛɛyi nu wase fɛn, ɛ wvú teŋe wo.”
43011029	No wvú yuwɛɛ nonɛn, mum cufe lo ye we keegɛn eyɛn wvú le.
43011030	Ɛ̀ to nu ɛ Jisos baa ley wase ntɛw e kɛ. Wvú to bɛɛ kɛ fó fò Maata to gɛnɛɛ yɛn wvú le.
43011031	Ɛ Bojuu bò to nu bô bo Maalia camte shen dioo yɛn no wvú cufe ye ɛ buy yew, ɛ bó mum no bii wvú le kpwaake lɛ wvú gɛne fô jem keegɛn ebeele fó.
43011032	Ɛ Maalia ke gɛn fɛse fò Jisos to nu, yɛn wvú le, mum gbwe bikaa biew e gay lɛ, “Tata, ɛ́ wo se bee enu fɛn, tu kɛ waa bwɛɛm se nu ɛ kpwe kɛ.”
43011033	Ɛ Jisos ke dioo yɛn no wvú beele, ɛ Bojuu bò to biɛ wvú le beele tɛn, ɛ fiɛɛ fidvu shiw fitele fiew baay, ɛ ye befe wvú.
43011034	Ɛ wvú nɛ bife lɛ, “Ben dwey wvú fɛɛ?” Ɛ bó gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Tata, to eyɛn.”
43011035	Ɛ Jisos bee kpwe.
43011036	Ɛ Bojuu yɛn nonɛn gay lɛ, “Ben etaa eyɛn no wvú se kooŋke wvú.”
43011037	Geenɛn ɛ bomew kaa gay lɛ, “Kɛ ɛ̀ se nulo ɛ́ wvú wvù to yen'yɛɛ ɛjisɛ kenfefe, etaŋ wee wvun fo wvú ekpwe le?”
43011038	Ɛ fitele fiew bvuu shiw baay. Ɛ wvú nɛ gɛn fɛse fô jem. Jem yin to nu tfum ɛ bó ɛ baŋ diuw wvudvu bô kebwee ke tɛ le.
43011039	Ɛ Jisos gay lɛ, “Ben ecake tɛ diɛ.” Ɛ Maata wvù jɛme wee kpwe gay ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Tata, keseen nu ɛ wvú samte wase. Ɛ̀ nu wase ɛdiuw ɛna no wvú se kpweɛ.”
43011040	Ɛ Jisos bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Me mbe ɛ ŋgay kɛ ɛ̂ wo lɛ ɛ́ wo nu ɛ lese fitele yî yɛm e, ɛ́ wo ke eyɛn bvukukɛ bvù ɛ̀ nu bvu Nyo' le?”
43011041	Nonɛn, ɛ bó mum cake tɛ didvu. Ɛ Jisos cake ɛjisɛ we gay lɛ, “Icɛm, me nyaa keyoone ɛ̂ wo no wo nu ɛ yuw bunle yɛm.
43011042	Me ŋkee naa lɛ wo ké no yuuke kɛ bunle yɛm sekecii. Geenɛn, me njemyi fin ɛ ɛ̀ nu nje bonyii ban bò leemene fɛn, wvu lɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó ebee lɛ ɛ̀ tum wo me.”
43011043	No wvú jeme nonɛn, fuŋ bô diɛw yì tɛmyi lɛ, “Laasalus, buyɛ!”
43011044	Ɛ wee wvù to kpweɛ wase wɛ mum buy, ɛ can ye bô bikaa nu ɛ bó ɛ njim bô njaw ndvú, ɛ njim tɛn bvushiw bwew bô njaw ndvú. Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben efay wvú, ecinɛ ɛ́ wvú egɛne.”
43011045	Ɛ Bojuu nteen bò to toɛ ɛ̂ Maalia le dioo yɛn fiɛɛ fì Jisos ge, mum lese fitele yî ye le.
43011046	Geenɛn, ɛ bomew kaa gɛn fibole yɛn ɛ ɛ̀ nu Bofalasii le, see ɛ̂ bó fiɛɛ fì Jisos ge.
43011047	Ɛ bocee ncese bo baay baay bô Bofalasii mum kum bikuu bi woŋ e jeme lɛ, “Beene nu ege nɛɛ? Wee wvun gee mwɛɛm nteen mvù duŋci bvukukɛ bvu Nyo' le.
43011048	Ɛ́ beene cine lo wvú ɛ no gɛne dvú fwe, tu bonyii bocii nu ke eghan elese fitele yî ye le, ɛ́ bonyii bo Lum ke enɛ eto ebvuw bvudvuu bvù yuule bvusɛɛbeene bô ketum kesɛɛbeene.”
43011049	Geenɛn, ɛ wee mvu bó le wvù diee to nu Kayfas, wvù to nu ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le kelum kekiɛ le nɛ gay fiew ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Kɛ ben kee naa lo fiɛɛ kɛ.
43011050	Kɛ ben kee lɛ fí jee fô ben e lɛ wee mwaaŋ ekpwe fô bonyii le bocii ɛfey fo ketum kecii ela lo le?”
43011051	Kɛ Kayfas to jemyi fiɛɛ fin bô bvufee bvù ɛ̀ nu bwew kɛ. Wvú diɛwɛ ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le kelum kekiɛ le to jemyi nɛn teete ɛ ɛ̀ nu ntum Nyo' lɛ Jisos to kɛŋke keekpwe fô ketum ke Bojuu le.
43011052	Ɛ ɛ̀ yaa mɛy kɛ fô ketum kedvu le mɛy kɛ, wvú to kɛŋke keekpwe keebaancɛ boom bò ɛ̀ nu bo Nyo' le bocii bò nu bitum bimew e, ɛ́ bó enù yî fiɛɛ le fimwaaŋ.
43011053	Ɛ kɛw ɛbvubwɛ le, ɛ bikuu bi woŋ e mum kɛw no joo nsey no bó nu ke eghan sɛ yu Jisos.
43011054	Nonɛn, ɛ Jisos faŋɛ yaa ebvuu eghane ya le ɛntelɛŋ jo Bojuu kɛ. Ɛ wvú nɛ fiew jó gɛn ketum kemew kè nu mbew woŋ monshɛɛm e ɛ bô boom bew bo ŋgoo le no cee jó kelaante kemew e ɛ bó teŋe lɛ Ɛfelɛm.
43011055	Ɛ Ŋkaw Bojuu wvu Daŋɛfey ke no too wase nceencee, ɛ bonyii no nɛn'yi biba le bene Jɛlusalɛm ɛ diuu din sɛ keetoo keekfum bikuu bibole.
43011056	Ɛ bó gɛn kɛw no gomte Jisos biwci ɛbonɛbon no bó to leemene fô yew ncese le gayte lɛ, “Ben kpwaake lɛ la? Kɛ wvú nu eto fô ŋkaw wvun e le?”
43011057	Ɛ̀ to nu ɛ bocee ncese bo baay baay noo Bofalasii ɛ nya wase nci lɛ ɛ́ wee nu dvú wvù kee fô Jisos nu, ɛ́ wvú ge ɛ bó kiɛɛ, wvu lɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó ekoo wvú.
43012001	Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no shɛɛte wase ɛdiuw ɛsoocaan ɛ́ emum enu kefew ke Ŋkaw Daŋɛfey e, ɛ Jisos nɛ gɛn ntɛw wvù Bɛtani le jò Laasalus wvù Jisos to bvusɛɛ yî kpwe le to nu.
43012002	No wvú gɛn jó, ɛ bó fɛ mwɛɛm mvudien keetɛw wvú dvú. Ɛ Maata no nu wee gawe ɛ Laasalus nu wee mvu ŋgoo bonyii bò to shiilɛɛ no diekene bô bo Jisos e.
43012003	Ɛ Maalia ke mum nɛ jo fikaa fi nfiey mvu wvù shfuuŋkene le, yefe bikaa bi Jisos e dvú, sho bô yvuw ye ɛkolɛ. Nfiey wvun to lumte naa baay, ɛ bó kene bô naad ɛwvunɛwvun. No wvú yefe nonɛn, ɛ yew yidvu nɛ no shfuuŋkene lo ɛnte yicii.
43012004	Ɛ Judas Iskaliot wvù to nu wee ŋgoo boom bo Jisos e, (wvù to ghanɛɛ egese wvú) kaa nɛ gay lɛ,
43012005	“Ɛ̀ be ge la fo bó egese lo nfiey wvun bodanali gee tɛ, enya bigew bidvu ɛ̂ bonyii bò fuute?”
43012006	Kɛ Judas to jemyi nɛn lɛ wen kɛŋke shiee fô bonyii bò fuute le kɛ. Wvú to nu cooŋ ɛ ɛ̀ to nu wvú wee wvubo ɛkɛlɛ, ɛ wvú to ké no leese kebo jó fici ɛkolɛ kew dvú.
43012007	Ɛ Jisos gay lɛ, “Cinɛ wvú le. Wvú be gɛke nfiey wvun nɛn keeseyse ɛ ɛ̀ nu ndwey wɛm dvú.
43012008	Bonyii bò fuute nu ke enu kɛ ben ɛ bó sekecii, geenɛn kɛ me nu ŋke enu beene sekecii kɛ.”
43012009	Ɛ kebombom ke Bojuu le ke yuw lɛ Jisos nu jó, ɛ bó mum to jó. Kɛ bó to to kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu nje Jisos maaŋ kɛ. Bó to to tɛn keeyɛn Laasalus wvù Jisos to bvusɛɛ yî kpwe le.
43012010	Nonɛn, ɛ bocee ncese bo baay baay no kaake lɛ bó nu eyu tɛn Laasalus,
43012011	njefo ɛ̀ to nu nje wvú wvù Bojuu nteen to cin'yi bó le leese wase fitele ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî Jisos e.
43012012	Ɛ ɛkfuŋ buy yuu, ɛ kebombom ke bonyii le kè to toɛ fô ŋkaw e yuw lɛ Jisos nu ɛ̂ je too Jɛlusalɛm.
43012013	Ɛ bó mum jo bidaayɛɛ buy keegɛn efiisɛn wvú ɛ̂ je. Ɛ bó gɛn no wvuuyi gayte lɛ, “Eeeee, mbense enù fô Nyo' le lɛɛɛ! Nyo' nu ɛ laŋ kembonɛn yî wee wvù too ɛ̂ diee di Tata le lɛɛɛ! Ɛ̀ nu wvú Nfon wvu Islael lɛɛɛ!”
43012014	Ɛ Jisos gom waa kembɛɛbey, ben. Ɛ fí mum no nu no bó to saŋɛɛ lɛ,
43012015	“Bonyii bo Sayon, fo ben efanè kɛ. Ben etaa eyɛn, Nfon wene too lo, ɛ wvú ɛ ben yî waa kembɛɛbey e.”
43012016	Kɛ boom bo Jisos e bo ŋgoo le to nu ɛ kiɛɛ fiɛɛ fì fiɛɛ fin duŋci foŋkɛw kɛ. Ɛ Jisos ke dioo ley wase bvukukɛ bwew e, ɛ bó mum kume lɛ bó to saŋ fiɛɛ fin ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛkumɛ wvú, ɛ fí ɛ kooy wase bô wvú kɛ no bó to saŋɛɛ.
43012017	Kebombom kè to nu bô bo Jisos diuu dì wvú to teŋɛɛ Laasalus ɛ̂ jem bvuse yî kpwe le to nu ɛ gɛn bô nsee no bó to yɛnɛɛ.
43012018	Ɛ shiee wvù kebombom kedvu to buyɛɛ keegɛn efiisɛn wvú ɛ̂ je to nu nje bó to nu ɛ yuw lɛ wvú to nu ɛ ge fiɛɛ fin fì duŋci bvukukɛ bvu Nyo' le.
43012019	Ɛ Bofalasii yɛn nɛn mum no jemyi ɛbonɛbon lɛ, “Kɛ ben nu ɛ yɛn? Kɛ fiɛɛ nu dvú fì ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ ben ebvuu ege kɛ. Woŋ tfuu nu ɛ shfum wase ɛ bi wvú le.”
43012020	Bonyii bomew to nu ŋgoo bonyii bò to benɛɛ Jɛlusalɛm keebunle Nyo' kefew ke ŋkaw e kin ɛ ɛ̀ nu Boglek.
43012021	Ɛ Boglek ban gɛn yɛn Filew wvù to nɛn'yɛɛ ɛ̂ kelaante kè Bɛsayda le ɛ̂ keba kè Galilee le, gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ŋgaywee, bese shieele keeyɛn Jisos e.”
43012022	Ɛ Filew mum gɛn be Andulu dvú, ɛ bô wvú mum gɛn see ɛ̂ Jisos.
43012023	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Kefew nu ɛ kocɛn wase kè wee wvù diee nu Waawee nu ekɛŋkɛ diee dì kuuke.
43012024	Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy kecɛɛy lɛ, ɛ́ ŋgow fiɛɛ baa egbwe yî nshɛ le ekpwe, ɛ́ yí emɛy kɛ enu yí ɛmbeŋ. Geenɛn ɛ́ yí kpwe lo, ɛ́ yí ke eyum mvuntam nteen.
43012025	Wee wvù kooŋke nshii we baay nu ke elase nshii wvudvu, ɛ wee wvù bane nshii we yî woŋ wvun e nu ɛ wvú gɛɛle lo keeke ekɛŋkɛ nshii wvù mɛy lo.
43012026	Ɛ́ wee lemte me le, tu wvú kɛŋke keebii me le, ɛ naa fɛɛ fò me nu, ɛ́ wee wɛm lemme enù tɛn fó. Ɛ́ wee lemte me le, tu Icɛm nu ke ebuw wvú.”
43012027	Ɛ Jisos nɛ gay lɛ, “Keseen nu ɛ fitele buuke lo me. Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me eŋgay lɛ la? Lɛ Icɛm ebvuse me ɛnte jo kefew ke ŋgɛw e kin e? 'Aay, ɛ̀ nu nje kefew kedvu kin wvù me nto ntoɛ.
43012028	Icɛm, geɛ ɛ́ diee diuw ekuuke.” No wvú jeme nonɛn, ɛ diɛw shii fowe lɛ, “Me nu ɛ ŋge wase dí ɛ no kuuke, ɛ me mbɛɛ ŋke embvuu eŋge.”
43012029	Ɛ kebombom kè to leeme fó dioo yuw diɛw yidvu, gay fibole lɛ, “Ɛ̀ baykene jaŋ.” Ɛ bomew gay lɛ, “Ɛ̀ jemyi nceendaa Nyo' ɛ̂ wvú.”
43012030	Ɛ Jisos tfuse lɛ, “Diɛw yin to nje yene. Kɛ yí to nje yɛm kɛ.
43012031	Keseen nu wase kefew kè bó nu esaw woŋ wvun. Keseen nu ɛ bó nu eshwaw nfon wvù saake woŋ wvun.
43012032	Geenɛn ɛ fiem nu ɛ seke bó ɛ ke ɛ njɛyse me fowe, ɛ́ me eŋgufe bonyii bocii ɛ́ bó eto yî yɛm e.”
43012033	Jisos to jemyi nonɛn duŋci ɛ ɛ̀ nu kfuu kpwe yì wvú nu ke ekpwe.
43012034	Ɛ kebombom ke bonyii le tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Bese yuuke ɛ̂ Ŋwa' bonci le lɛ Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ nu ke efele. Wo ɛ ghan nɛɛ ɛ sɛ no duu lɛ bó kɛŋke keeke njɛyse wee wvù diee nu Waawee fowe? Wee wvù diee nu Waawee wvudvu nu wvù la?”
43012035	Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “N'yuu nu enu ben ɛ bó kɛ yî kefew e caan. Ben emum elɛnè no ben kɛŋke n'yuu ben ɛ bó, fo kejiwɛ ke nɛ ebaŋ ben. Kɛ wee wvù lɛne ɛ̂ ɛjiwɛ le ké no kee fô wvú gɛne kɛ.
43012036	No ben kɛŋke n'yuu ben ɛ bó, ben ebee n'yuu wvun e, wvu lɛ ben emum enu boom bo n'yuu le.” No Jisos jemyɛɛ mwɛɛm mvun nɛn, mum nɛ gɛn nyiim.
43012037	Naa no wvú to nu ɛ cim ge mwɛɛm nteen mvù duŋci bvukukɛ bwew ɛ bó yɛn, bó to baa lese fitele yî ye le kɛ.
43012038	Ɛ fí to nu nonɛn wvu lɛ fí ekocɛn no Yɛsaya wvù wee ntum Nyo' to jemyɛɛ lɛ, “Tata, ɛ̀ nu yɛɛ dvú wvù nu ɛ bee fiɛɛ fì bese jemyi le? Ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ baa wvù Tata nu ɛ duŋcɛ mvuŋgay mvu kebo kew e?”
43012039	Nonɛn kɛ ɛ̀ to nulo ɛ́ bó elese fitele yî ye le kɛ, njefo Yɛsaya to nu ɛ bvuu jeme bvudvuu bvumew e lɛ,
43012040	“Wvú nu ɛ baŋ ɛjisɛ ɛbo, ɛ ge mvuntelem mvubole ɛ no lɛɛ, wvu lɛ fo bó eyɛnè mwɛɛm e bô ɛjisɛ ɛbo, ekeè mwɛɛm ɛ̂ mvuntelem mvubole, ekase etu jim ɛ́ me enfɛ bó.”
43012041	Yɛsaya to jemyi mwɛɛm mvun njefo wvú to nu ɛ yɛn wase bvukukɛ bvu Jisos e, mum no jemyi ɛkumɛ wvú.
43012042	Naa no bonyii to baa cim nu keelese fitele yî Jisos e, nu ɛ bonyii nteen bò to nu naa bikuu bi woŋ e to lese fitele yî ye le, geenɛn faŋɛ yaa nu keejeme bô dew yibo kɛ, njefo bó to fane Bofalasii lɛ fo bó ke ekuŋ bó yew bunle le.
43012043	Ɛ bó to fane nonɛn njefo bó to kooŋke keekɛŋke mbense ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvù nɛn'yi fô bonyii le ɛfey keekɛŋke ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvù nɛn'yi fô Nyo' le.
43012044	Ɛ Jisos nɛ fuŋ foweɛwe gay lɛ, “Wee wvù nu ɛ lese fitele yî yɛm e, nu ɛ wvú yaa lese ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî yɛm e kɛ. Wvú lese ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî wee wvù tum me le.
43012045	Ɛ́ wee yɛn me le, tu wvú yɛn ɛ ɛ̀ nu wee wvù tum me le.
43012046	Me nu ɛ nto ɛ̂ woŋ jan diɛwɛ n'yuu le wvu lɛ naa yɛɛ wvù nu ɛ lese fitele yî yɛm e wvú saa ebvuu emɛy enu ɛ̂ ɛjiwɛ le kɛ.
43012047	Ɛ́ wee yuw diɛw yɛm, ɛ faŋɛ yaa egɛɛ, me nsaa enlese wvú ŋgɛw e kɛ, njefo kɛ me nto nto keenlese bonyii bo yî woŋ wvun e ŋgɛw e kɛ. Me nto nto keemboyse lo bó.
43012048	Wee wvù nu ɛ ma me ɛ faŋ keefiisɛn diɛw yɛm kɛŋke fiɛɛ fì nu ke esaw wvú. Diɛw yì me nu ɛ njeme ɛ̂ wvú nu fiɛɛ fì nu ke elese wvú ŋgɛw e diuu di fokemɛse.
43012049	Fí nu nonɛn njefo kɛ me njemyi ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ mvuŋgay mwem e kɛ. Icɛm wvù tum me nu wvú wvù gay lɛ me enjemyì, ɛ ɛ̀ nya wvú fiɛɛ fì me enjemyì, ɛ see no me enjemyì.
43012050	Ɛ me ŋkee lɛ fiɛɛ fì wvú gay lɛ me enjemyì nu fì nyaa nshii wvù mɛy lo. Nonɛn fiɛɛ fì me njemyi nu fì Icɛm nu ɛ gay lɛ me enjemyì.”
43013001	Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu wase bvù ɛkfuŋ nu ebuy eyuu ɛ́ emum enu Ŋkaw Daŋɛfey, ɛ Jisos kiɛɛ lɛ kefew kè wen nu ecinɛ woŋ wvun e, ekase egɛn fô Icee wen e nu ɛ kocɛn wase. No wvú to kooŋke bonyii bò ɛ̀ to nu bew yî woŋ wvun e, ɛ wvú koŋ bó gɛn mɛse.
43013002	Ɛ bó ke no diekene fokiɛguu, ɛ dɛwle ɛ lese wase ŋkpwawcɛ ɛ̂ fitele fi Judas wvù waa Semon Iskaliot e lɛ wvú egese Jisos.
43013003	No Jisos to kee wase lɛ Icee wen nu ɛ nya wase mwɛɛm mvunciim can wen e, bô lɛ wen to nɛ fô Nyo' le ɛ wen kaase tuu jim fô Nyo' le,
43013004	ɛ wvú mum nɛ ɛ̂ we jo mwɛɛm mvudien, baayɛ bikum biew, jo ndvu yì bó shole ye dvú, seŋ yî mvuntem e,
43013005	mum tfuw joo ɛ̂ ŋkaa le, kɛw no cuke bikaa bi boom bew bo ŋgoo le dvú, shole bô ndvu yì wvú to seŋɛɛ yî mvuntem e yɛ.
43013006	Ɛ wvú ke cukɛ to buy fô Semon Bita le, ɛ wvú bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Tata, ɛ̀ nu ecukɛ wo bikaa biem e?”
43013007	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Kɛ fiɛɛ fì me ŋgee nu ɛ wo nulo ekiɛɛ keseen kɛ. Wo nu ke ekiɛɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛjim.”
43013008	Ɛ Bita gay ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wo ke eyuu ecukɛ bikaa biem kɛ.” Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ́ me mbaa encukɛ wo, wo saa ekɛŋke fiɛɛ bee wo kɛ.”
43013009	Ɛ Semon Bita mum gay ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Tata, ɛ́ ɛ̀ fɛn nu nonɛn, tu kɛ wo nu ecukɛ kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu bikaa biem maaŋ kɛ. Wo nu ecukɛ tɛn can yɛm bô ɛkolɛ kem fó.”
43013010	Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wee wvù nu ɛ cukɛ wase ye nu ɛ wvú yuule wase ye yicii, ɛ shiee yaa bvuu nu keebvuu ecukɛ ɛfey bikaa kɛ. Ben nu ɛ ben yuule wase, geenɛn kɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu ben bocii bò yuule kɛ.”
43013011	Jisos to jemyi nonɛn njefo wvú to kee wase wee wvù nu ke egese wvú. Ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì wvú to gayɛɛ lɛ, “Kɛ ben yuule bocii kɛ.”
43013012	Ɛ Jisos ke mɛse cukɛ bikaa bibole, tfume bikum biew, kase gɛn tu fô bvudvuu bwew e, mum bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben nu ɛ kiɛɛ fiɛɛ fì me ŋge fô ben e fin e?
43013013	Ben teŋe me lɛ Wee N'yɛɛyi bvuu teŋe lɛ Tata, ɛ ben teŋe ɛ ɛ̀ nu lɛŋ nonɛn njefo ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì me nu.
43013014	Ɛ́ me wvù nu Tata wene bvuu nu Wee wene N'yɛɛyi nu ɛ cukɛ bikaa binɛn, tu ben tɛn kɛŋke keecukè bikaa bi wee noo wee le.
43013015	Me ŋge nonɛn nduŋci lo ɛ̂ ben lɛ ben egeè tɛn no me ŋge fô ben e.
43013016	Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy kecɛɛy lɛ kɛ waa lemme ké no kuuke fele cee ɛkolɛ we kɛ, ɛ kɛ wee wvù bó tum lo ké no kuuke tɛn fele wee wvù tum wvú kɛ.
43013017	Ɛ́ ben kee mwɛɛm mvun, ɛ no gee mvú, ɛ́ njoŋ wvu baay enu wene.
43013018	Kɛ me njemyi ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛkumɛ ben bocii kɛ. Me ŋkee bonyii bò me nu ɛ ncaw. Geenɛn, ɛ fí nu lɛ fiɛɛ fì nu ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le kɛŋke keeke eto ekocɛn no bó to saŋɛɛ lɛ, ‘Wee wvù diee mwɛɛm mvudien mwem nu ɛ nɛ ɛ no bii bikaa biem e.’
43013019	Me nseŋe fiɛɛ fin ɛ̂ ben keseen ɛ́ fí sɛ keeke ekooyi, wvu lɛ fí ke dioo ɛ kooy, ɛ́ ben emum ebee lɛ ɛ̀ nu naa me wvudvu.
43013020	Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy kecɛɛy lɛ wee wvù nu ɛ fiisɛn naa wee wvù la wvù ɛ̀ tum me, nu ɛ wvú fiisene ɛ ɛ̀ nu me. Ɛ wee wvù fiisene me fiisene ɛ ɛ̀ nu wee wvù tum me.”
43013021	No Jisos jeme mwɛɛm mvun nɛn, ɛ fitele nɛ no buuke wvú. Ɛ wvú nɛ jeme lo teytey gay lɛ, “Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy kecɛɛy lɛ wee mvu ben e nu egese me.”
43013022	Ɛ boom bew bo ŋgoo le nɛ no taayine ye maa laa wvú jemyi ɛ ɛ̀ nu wee wvù la lɛ.
43013023	Wee mvu ŋgoo boom bo Jisos e wvù Jisos to kooŋke to yeeme diekene naa mbew ye le.
43013024	Ɛ Semon Bita kpwase wvú gay lɛ wvú ebife ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ laa wvú jemyi ɛ ɛ̀ nu yɛɛ lɛ.
43013025	Nonɛn ɛ wvú yeem gɛn yî Jisos e bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Tata, ɛ̀ nu yɛɛ?”
43013026	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu wee wvù me nu eŋguse blɛɛd encuw ɛ̂ nshɛw mbase le enya ɛ̂ wvú.” Nonɛn ɛ wvú mum cuw blɛɛd ɛ̂ nshɛw mbase le nya ɛ̂ Judas wvù waa Semon Iskaliot.
43013027	Kɛ no Judas fi blɛɛd wvudvu nɛn, ɛ Satan mum ley yî ye le. Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Yaŋsɛn ege fiɛɛ fì wo gomte keege.”
43013028	Wee mvu ŋgoo bó le to baa kiɛɛ fiɛɛ fì wvú jemyi ɛ̂ wvú nonɛn kɛ.
43013029	Bomew to kpwaake lɛ no Judas to nu wee wvù gɛɛle ɛkɛlɛ nu ɛ Jisos jemyi ɛ̂ wvú lɛ wvú egɛn eguy mwɛɛm mvù bó shieele keedie Ŋkaw dvú, kɛnɛɛ lɛ wvú egɛn enya fiɛɛ ɛ̂ bonyii bò fuute.
43013030	No Judas fi blɛɛd wvudvu nonɛn ɛ die, mum buy lo kaŋ mwaaŋ gɛn. Sekekiɛ to nu wase ɛntaŋ.
43013031	No Judas buyɛɛ wase gɛn nonɛn, ɛ Jisos shɛɛ gay lɛ, “Keseen nu ɛ bó nu ekɛw eyɛne bvukukɛ bvu wee wvù diee nu Waawee le, emum eyɛne tɛn bvukukɛ bvù ɛ̀ nu bvu Nyo' le yî ye le.
43013032	Ɛ́ bó yɛn bvukukɛ bvu Nyo' le yî ye le, tu Nyo' nu eduŋcɛ tɛn bvukukɛ bvu Waa we le yî wvú wvù Nyo' le. Ɛ wvú nu eduŋcɛ lo kaŋ mwaaŋ.
43013033	Boom bem, me nu enu beene kɛ wase yî kefew e nɛn caan. Ben nu ke eshɛɛ egom me saa eyɛn kɛ. No me nto ŋgayɛɛ ɛ̂ Bojuu, nu no me ŋgayte ɛ̂ ben keseen lɛ, ‘Fô me ŋgɛne nu ɛ kɛ ben nulo eto fó kɛ.’
43013034	Me nyaa nci ɛ̂ ben, ɛ ɛ̀ nu nci wvu fwɛ lɛ ben dioo ɛ shɛɛ no koŋenè. Ben ekoŋenè kɛ naa lɛŋlɛŋ no me nu ɛ ŋkoŋ ben.
43013035	Ɛ́ ben shɛke ɛ no koŋene nonɛn, ɛ́ fifin ege ɛ́ bonyii bocii emum ekiɛɛ lɛ ben nu boom bem bo ŋgoo le.”
43013036	Ɛ Semon Bita mum bife ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Tata, wo gɛne ɛ ɛ̀ nu fɛɛ?” Ɛ Jisos tfuse lɛ, “Fô me ŋgɛne nu ɛ kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wo ebi me le keseen kɛ. Wo nu ke eshɛɛ sɛ bi.”
43013037	Ɛ Bita kase bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Tata, kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me mbi wo le keseen nje la? Me nu ŋke enya nshii wɛm keeŋkpwe nje yo.”
43013038	Ɛ Jisos Bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wo nulo enya nshii wo keekpwe nje me? Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ wo kecɛɛy kecɛɛy lɛ kɛ nyimshie nu ke etoŋ sɛ wo ɛ ma wase me bokaŋ botɛte kɛ.”
43014001	Ɛ Jisos bvuu jeme ɛ̂ boom bew bo ŋgoo le lɛ, “Fo ben ecinɛ ɛ́ mvuntelem mvunɛn ebuuke kɛ. Ben elese fitele yî Nyo' le, elese tɛn fitele yî yɛm e.
43014002	Yew dvu Icɛm, nu ɛ bibuw nu dvú nteen. Ɛ́ fí be baa enu nonɛn, tu me mbaa ŋgayte lɛ me ŋgɛne nseyse bvudvuu ɛ̂ ben kɛ.
43014003	Ɛ me nu ndioo ɛ ŋgɛn ɛ nseyse bvudvuu ɛ̂ ben, eŋkase ento enjo ben ɛ́ beene enu, wvu lɛ fò me nu, ɛ́ ben enù tɛn fó.
43014004	Ɛ ben kee wase je yì gɛne fô me ŋgɛne.”
43014005	Ɛ Toma mum gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Tata, kɛ bese kee fô wo gɛne kɛ. Bese nu eghan nɛɛ sɛ kiɛɛ je yidvu?”
43014006	Ɛ Jisos tfuse lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu me je, ɛ ɛ̀ nu me kecɛɛy, ɛ ɛ̀ nu me nshii. Kɛ wee nulo egɛn fô Icɛm e sɛ wvú ɛ fey yî yɛm e kɛ.
43014007	Ɛ́ ben be kee me, tu ben bee kee tɛn Icɛm. Ɛ kɛw yî keseen e nu ɛ ben ɛ kiɛɛ wase wvú ɛ bvuu ɛ yɛn wvú le.”
43014008	Ɛ Filew gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Tata duŋcɛ Ico ɛ̂ bese, ɛ́ bese eyɛn emum effuu.”
43014009	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ wvú lɛ, “Filew, beene nu ɛ ce wase baay nɛn sɛ wo kee me le? Wee wvù nu ɛ yɛn me le, nu ɛ wvú ɛ yɛn wase Icɛm e. Wo nulo eghan nɛɛ le sɛ ebvuu egayte lɛ me enduŋcɛ Icɛm ɛ̂ ben?
43014010	Wo baa bee lɛ me nu yî Icɛm e, ɛ Icɛm nu yî yɛm le? Njeme wvù me njemyi ɛ̂ ben nu ɛ kɛ me njemyi yî mvuŋgay mwem e kɛ. Icɛm wvù nu yî yɛm e nu wvù gee dilemme diew.
43014011	Ben ebee me le lɛ me nu yî Icɛm e, ɛ Icɛm nu yî yɛm e. Ɛ́ ben baa bee me le nje fiɛɛ fì me ŋgayte, ɛ́ ben bee nje dilemme dì me ŋgee le.
43014012	Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy kecɛɛy lɛ wee wvù nu ɛ lese fitele yî yɛm e nu ke egee tɛn dilemme dì me ŋgee. Ɛ wvú nu ke ege dilemme efey naa dì me nu ɛ ŋge, njefo me ŋgɛne wase fô Icɛm e.
43014013	Naa la fì ben ɛ bife ɛ̂ diee diem e, ɛ́ me eŋge fí, wvu lɛ Icee Wan nulo ekɛŋke diee dì kuuke nje Wan.
43014014	Ɛ́ ben bife naa la ɛ̂ diee diem e, ɛ́ me eŋge fí.
43014015	Ɛ́ ben kooŋke me, ɛ́ ben egɛɛlè bonci bem,
43014016	ɛ́ me ŋke enlɛkɛ ɛ̂ Icɛm ɛ́ wvú enya ben bô wvumvu Wee Nfi ɛ́ wvú enu ben ɛ bó sekecii.
43014017	Wee wvun nu Keyoy ke kecɛɛy e. Kɛ wvú nu wee wvù ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo yî woŋ wvun e efiisɛn wvú kɛ, njefo kɛ bó yɛne wvú le kɛnɛɛ kee wvú kɛ. Ben nu finɛn ɛ ben kee wvú, njefo wvú cee ben ɛ bó, ɛ wvú nu ke enu yî yene le.
43014018	Kɛ me nu ŋke encinɛ ben e ɛ́ ben enu diɛwɛ boom bo boŋkfu le kɛ. Me nu ŋke eŋkase ento enu beene.
43014019	Ɛ̀ shɛɛte wase caan ɛ́ bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo yî woŋ wvun e saa ebvuu eyɛn me le kɛ. Geenɛn, ben nu ke eyɛn me le. No me nu ŋke enu dvú, nu ɛ ben tɛn nu ke enu dvú.
43014020	Ɛ̀ nu ke enu ɛbvubwɛ ɛ́ ben ekiɛɛ lɛ me nu yî Icɛm e, ɛ ben nu yî yɛm e, ɛ me nu yî yene le.
43014021	Wee wvù kee bonci bem gɛɛle, nu wvuwɛ wvù kooŋke me. Ɛ wee wvù kooŋke me nu ɛ Icɛm nu ke ekooŋke wvú. Ɛ me nu ŋke eŋkooŋke tɛn wvú, enduŋcɛ ɛkolɛ kem ɛ̂ wvú.”
43014022	Ɛ Judas wvumvu (ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu kɛ wɛ wvù bó teŋe lɛ Iskaliot kɛ) bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Tata, fí ghan nɛɛ le fì wo nu ke eduŋcɛ ɛkolɛ kuw ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ bese, ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu ɛ̂ bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo yî woŋ wvun e kɛ?”
43014023	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ́ wee kooŋke me, ɛ́ wvú egɛɛlè njeme wɛm, ɛ́ Icɛm ekooŋke wvú, ɛ́ bee Icɛm ke eto fô wvú le ecee bee bó.
43014024	Kɛ wee wvù baa kooŋke me ké no gɛɛle njeme wɛm kɛ. Kɛ njeme wvù ben yuuke nu wɛm kɛ. Ɛ̀ nu wvu Icɛm wvù tum me.
43014025	Mwɛɛm mvun nu ɛ me njemyi ɛ̂ ben mbɛɛ beene.
43014026	Geenɛn, Wee Nfi wvù ɛ̀ nu Keyoy ke Yuule wvù Icɛm nu ke eciinse ɛ̂ diee diem e nu ke eyɛɛyi ben bô mwɛɛm mvunciim ebvuu ege ɛ́ ben ekumyi mwɛɛm mvunciim mvù me nu ɛ njeme wase ɛ̂ ben.
43014027	Me nu ɛ ŋgɛɛ nyɛkeey lɛ wvú enu ben ɛ bó. Me nyaa nyɛkeey wvù ɛ̀ nu wvuwɛm ɛ̂ ben. Kɛ me nyaa nyɛkeey wvun ɛ̂ ben no bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo yî woŋ wvun e ké no nyaa kɛ. Fo ben ecinɛ ɛ́ mvuntelem mvunɛn ebuuke kɛnɛɛ kɛŋke jaŋ kɛ.
43014028	Ben nu ɛ yuw wase no me ŋgayte lɛ me ŋgɛne wa lo, ɛ me nu ŋke eŋkase ento enu beene. Ɛ́ ben be kooŋke me, tu ben bee elaŋlaŋe lo, njefo me ŋgɛne ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô Icɛm e, no Icɛm kuuke fele me.
43014029	Keseen nu ɛ me ɛ njeme wase fiɛɛ fin ɛ̂ ben ɛ́ fí sɛ keeke ekooy, wvu lɛ fí ke dioo ɛ kooy, ɛ́ ben emum ebee me le.
43014030	Kɛ me mbɛɛ embvuu enshe enjemyi beene baay kɛ, njefo nfon wvù saake woŋ wvun too wase. Kɛ ɛ̀ nu lɛ wvú kɛŋke mvuŋgay ɛ̂ me ɛ̂ we kɛ.
43014031	Geenɛn, me ŋgee ɛ ɛ̀ nu no Icɛm nu ɛ gay lɛ me eŋgeè wvu lɛ bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo yî woŋ wvun e nulo ekiɛɛ lɛ me ŋkooŋke Icɛm. Ben eja we ɛ́ bó enɛ.”
43015001	“Ɛ̀ nu me tweŋ kete ke mvuntam e ke cɛɛy cɛɛy, ɛ Icɛm nu wee wvù seysee tweŋ wvudvu.
43015002	Tíɛw yɛm yicii yì baa yumte mvuntam, nu ɛ wvú ke faashɛ bvuse, ɛ yì yumte mvuntam nu ɛ wvú ke seyse kpwɛcɛ wvu lɛ yí eyuule emum eyumte mvuntam nteen.
43015003	Njeme wvù me njeme wase ɛ̂ ben nu ɛ ge wase ben ɛ no yuule.
43015004	Ben emɛy enù yî yɛm e, ɛ́ me enu tɛn yî yene le. Kɛ tiɛw nulo eyum mvuntam ɛyinɛyin sɛ yí nu yî kete le kɛ. Ɛ̀ nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ ben ege fiɛɛ sɛ ben nu yî yɛm e kɛ.
43015005	Ɛ̀ nu me tweŋ kete ke mvuntam e, ɛ ben nu tíɛw yidvu. Wee wvù nu yî yɛm e ɛ me nu tɛn yî ye le, nu wvuwɛ wvù nu diɛwɛ tiɛw yì nulo eyumte mvuntam nteen e, njefo ɛ́ me mbaa enu, wee saa ege fiɛɛ kɛ.
43015006	Wee wvù nu sɛ wvú ɛ mɛy ɛ no nu yî yɛm e nu diɛwɛ tiɛw yì bó efasse elaŋ lo, ɛ́ yí eyumtɛn e. Kfuu yiyɛ tíɛw nu ɛ bó nu ke ebaancɛ elaŋ ɛ̂ ŋguy e ɛ́ yí efie lo.
43015007	Ɛ́ ben mɛy ɛ no nu yî yɛm e ɛ diɛw yɛm nu yî yene le, ben ɛ́ bife naa la fì ben shieele, ɛ́ bó ege fí fô ben e.
43015008	Ɛ́ ben nu diɛwɛ tíɛw yì yumte mvuntam nteen e, ɛ́ fifin enyaa diee dì kuuke ɛ̂ Icɛm, emum eduŋci lɛ ben nu bonyii bem bo ŋgoo le.
43015009	No Icɛm kooŋke me nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no me ŋkooŋke ben. Ben emum emɛy enù ɛnte jo keŋkoŋɛn kem.
43015010	Ɛ́ ben gɛɛle bonci bem, ɛ́ ben emɛy enu ɛnte jo keŋkoŋɛn kem, kɛ no me nu ɛ ŋgɛɛ bonci bo Icɛm e ɛ mɛy ɛ no nu ɛnte jo keŋkoŋɛn kew.
43015011	Mwɛɛm mvun nu ɛ me njemyi ɛ̂ ben wvu lɛ njoŋ wɛm nulo enu fô ben e, ɛ́ ben emum ekɛŋke njoŋ wvù nu ɛ yiŋsɛn.
43015012	Nci wɛm nu wvun wvù nu lɛ ben ekoŋenè kɛ no me ŋkooŋke ben.
43015013	Kɛ keŋkoŋɛn kemew bvuu nu dvú kè kuuke fele kè lɛ wee enya nshii we ekpwe nje nsáa ye kɛ.
43015014	Ɛ́ ben gee fiɛɛ fì me ŋgayte lɛ ben egeè, tu ben nu nsáa yɛm.
43015015	Kɛ me mbvuu nteŋe ben lɛ boom bo lemme le kɛ, njefo kɛ waa lemme ké no kee fiɛɛ ficii fì cee ɛkolɛ we gee kɛ. Me nteŋe wase ben lɛ nsáa yɛm njefo fiɛɛ ficii fì me n'yuw ɛ̂ Icɛm nu ɛ me ɛ ŋge wase ben ɛ kiɛɛ.
43015016	Kɛ ɛ̀ to caw ben me kɛ. Ɛ̀ to caw me ben, mbaa ŋgɛɛ lɛ ben egɛn enu diɛwɛ tíɛw yì yumte mvuntam e, mvuntam ɛ ɛ̀ nu mvù nu ke emɛy nu dvú le. Ɛ́ ben gee nonɛn, naa la fì ben ɛ bife ɛ̂ Icɛm ɛ̂ diee diem e ɛ́ wvú enya ɛ̂ ben.
43015017	Nci wvù me nyaa ɛ̂ ben nu kɛ wvun wvù lɛ, ben ekoŋenè.
43015018	Ɛ́ bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo yî woŋ wvun e bane ben, ɛ́ ben no kee lɛ bó to yaw kɛw no bane ɛ ɛ̀ nu me ɛ sɛ no bane ben.
43015019	Ɛ́ ben be nu bonyii bo yî woŋ wvun e, tu bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo yî woŋ wvun e be kooŋke ben diɛwɛ bonyii bobole. Geenɛn, kɛ ben baa nu bonyii bo yî woŋ wvun e kɛ. Me nu ɛ ncaw wase ben ɛ mbvuse ɛnte jo bonyii bo yî woŋ wvun e. Ɛ̀ nɛɛ fiɛɛ fì bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo yî woŋ wvun e bane ben.
43015020	Ben ekume njeme wvù me nto njemyɛɛ ɛ̂ ben lɛ kɛ waa lemme ké no kuuke fele cee ɛkolɛ we kɛ. Ɛ́ bó bone bikaa ɛ̂ me ɛjim, tu bó nu ke ebon tɛn ɛ̂ ben ɛjim. Ɛ́ ɛ̀ be nu lɛ bó yuuke njeme wɛm e, tu bó nu ke eyuw tɛn wene le.
43015021	Fin nu fiɛɛ fì bó nu ke ege bô ben nje me, njefo kɛ bó yaa kee wvú wvù to tumɛɛ me kɛ.
43015022	Ɛ́ ɛ̀ be baa nu lɛ me nu ɛ nto ɛ njeme ɛ̂ bó, tu bó be baa ekɛŋke jay kɛ. Geenɛn, keseen nu ɛ kɛ bó kɛŋke fiɛɛ keetaŋe diuw dvú yî bibefɛ bibole kɛ.
43015023	Wee wvù bane me nu ɛ wvú bane Icɛm tɛn.
43015024	Ɛ́ ɛ̀ be baa nu lɛ me nu ɛ ŋge kfuu dilemme dì wee ke baa yuu ge wase ɛntelɛŋ jo bó, tu bó be baa ekɛŋke jay kɛ. Geenɛn bó nu ɛ yɛn, ɛ no bane kɛ me noo Icɛm.
43015025	Fifin nu nonɛn keege ɛ́ diɛw eto ekocɛn no bó to saŋɛɛ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' bonci bobole lɛ, ‘Bó ban me ɛcici.’
43015026	Geenɛn, Wee Nfi wvù me nu ŋke enciinse nu ke eto ɛ wvú nɛ fô Icɛm e. Wee Nfi wvun nu wvù ɛ̀ nu naa Keyoy ke kecɛɛy e kè nɛn'yi fô Icɛm e. Seke wvú ɛ to, wvú nu ke eben jim nsaw wɛm.
43015027	Ben tɛn nu ke eben jim nsaw wɛm, njefo ben nu ɛ no nu beene ɛ kɛw foŋkɛw.”
43016001	“Me njemyi mwɛɛm mvun mvunciim ɛ̂ ben wvu lɛ fo ben ke egbwe yî mbee wene le kɛ.
43016002	Bó nu ke ekuŋ ben yéw bunle le. Yî kecɛɛy e, kefew too lo kè wee nu ke edioo yuu wee mvu ben e, eyuu kpwaake lɛ wen gee ɛ ɛ̀ nu lemme dì jee fô Nyo' le.
43016003	Ɛ bó nu ke egee nonɛn, njefo kɛ bó baa kiɛɛ wase Icɛm kɛnɛɛ me kɛ.
43016004	Me njemyi mwɛɛm mvun mvunciim ɛ̂ ben nɛn wvu lɛ seke kefew kedvu ɛ kocɛn, ɛ́ ben ekume lɛ me nto nu ɛ njeme wase ɛ̂ ben ɛkumɛ mvú. Me nto mbaa njeme mwɛɛm mvun ɛ̂ ben foŋkɛw kɛ, njefo me nto ŋké no nu kɛ beene.
43016005	Keseen nu ɛ me ntuu wase jim fô wvú wvù to tumɛɛ me le. Geenɛn, wee mvu ben e baa cim bife ɛ̂ me lɛ laa me ŋgɛne fɛɛ lɛ.
43016006	Ben nu yii yii njefo me nu ɛ njeme wase mwɛɛm mvun ɛ̂ ben.
43016007	Naa no fí cim nu nonɛn, ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy lɛ, ɛ̀ nu lo fiɛɛ fì jee fô ben e lɛ me eŋgɛn. Ɛ́ me nu sɛ me ɛ ŋgɛn, Wee Nfi wɛ saa eto fô ben e kɛ. Geenɛn, ɛ́ me ŋgɛn lo, emum enciinse wvú fô ben e.
43016008	Ɛ wvú nu ke edioo ɛ to, etooshɛ bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo yî woŋ wvun e, ege ɛ́ bó eyɛn kebefɛ kebole, ege ɛ́ bó eyɛn fiɛɛ fì ɛ̀ nu nce wvu teytey, ege tɛn ɛ́ bó eyɛn fì ɛ̀ nu nsaw Nyo'.
43016009	Wvú nu ke ege ɛ́ bó eyɛn kebefɛ kebole no bó baa lese fitele yî yɛm e kɛ,
43016010	ege ɛ́ bó eyɛn fiɛɛ fì ɛ̀ nu nce wvu teytey no me ŋgɛne wase fô Icɛm e, ɛ ben yaa bɛɛ ke ebvuu eyɛn me le kɛ.
43016011	Ɛ wvú nu ke ege ɛ́ bó eyɛn fiɛɛ fì ɛ̀ nu nsaw Nyo' njefo nfon wvù saake woŋ wvun nu ɛ nsaw ɛ koo wase wvú.
43016012	Me mbɛɛ ŋkɛŋke naa mwɛɛm nteen keenjeme ɛ̂ ben, geenɛn kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ mvú eley bitem binɛn e keseen ntay kɛ.
43016013	Seke wvú wvù Keyoy ke kecɛɛy e ɛ to, efi ben ɛ́ ben ekiɛɛ kecɛɛy kecii. Kɛ wvú yaa nu ke ejemyi ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî mvuŋgay mwew e kɛ. Fiɛɛ ficii fì wvú nu ɛ yuw nu fí fì wvú nu ke ejemyi, mum seŋe ɛ̂ ben mwɛɛm mvù nu ke eto.
43016014	Wvú nu ke eduŋcɛ bvukukɛ bwem, no wvú nu ke ejoo ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì ɛ̀ nu fiem seŋe ɛ̂ ben.
43016015	Fiɛɛ fi Icɛm e ficii nu fiem. Ɛ̀ nɛɛ fiɛɛ fì me ŋgayte lɛ wvú nu ke ejoo ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì ɛ̀ nu fiem seŋe ɛ̂ ben.
43016016	Ɛ̀ shɛɛte wase caan ben saa ebvuu eyɛn me le kɛ, dioo ɛ moocɛ caan ɛ́ ben ebvuu ekase eyɛn me le.”
43016017	No Jisos jeme nonɛn, ɛ boom bew bo ŋgoo le bomew ghay ɛbonɛbon lɛ, “Ɛ̀ sɛ nu la fì wvú gayte ɛ̂ beene lɛ, ɛ̀ shɛɛte wase caan beene saa ebvuu eyɛn wen e kɛ, ke dioo ɛ moocɛ caan ebvuu ekase eyɛn wen e, bô lɛ wen gɛne fô Icee wen e?
43016018	Fiɛɛ fì wvú sɛ duu lɛ ɛ̀ shɛɛte wase caan sɛ nu naa lɛ la? Kɛ beene baa kiɛɛ fiɛɛ fì wvú jemyi nonɛn kɛ.”
43016019	Ɛ Jisos dioo kiɛɛ lɛ bó gomte keebife ɛ̂ wen fiɛɛ fì wen jeme, mum bife lɛ, “Ben ghayte ɛbenɛben ɛkumɛ fiɛɛ fì me ŋgayte lɛ, ‘Ɛ̀ shɛɛte wase caan ben saa ebvuu eyɛn me le kɛ, ke dioo ɛ moocɛ caan ɛ́ ben ebvuu ekase eyɛn me le’ le?
43016020	Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy kecɛɛy lɛ, ben nu ke ebeele kpwe, fuuŋke ɛ bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo yî woŋ wvun laŋlaŋe lo fibole. Ben nu ke enu yî yii le, geenɛn ɛ yii yene yin nu ke enɛ etu nlaŋlaŋ.
43016021	Kpwoon ké dioo nu yî lume le, no yuuke nsase, njefo kefew kew keeboo nu ɛ kocɛn wase. Ɛ́ wvú ké dioo ɛ boo wase wan, wvú saa ebvuu ekumyi nsase wvudvu kɛ, njefo wvú yuuke wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu njoŋ lɛ wee wvu wum nu ɛ to yî woŋ e.
43016022	Ɛ̀ nu kɛ no fí nu fô ben e keseen. Ben nu yii yii, geenɛn ɛ me nu ŋke endioo ɛ ŋkase ɛ n'yɛn ben e, ɛ́ ben ekɛŋke wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu nlaŋlaŋ fô mvuntelem mvunɛn e, ɛ wvuwɛ nlaŋlaŋ nu ke enu wvù wee yaa nulo ke efi ɛ̂ ben kɛ.
43016023	Ɛ̀ nu ke enu kefew kekiɛ le, ben saa ebvuu ebife fiɛɛ ɛ̂ me kɛ. Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben kecɛɛy kecɛɛy lɛ, ɛ́ ben bife naa la ɛ̂ Icɛm, ɛ́ wvú enya fiɛɛ fidvu ɛ̂ ben ɛ̂ diee diem e.
43016024	Ɛ kɛw lo ɛ to ɛ buy keseen e, nu ɛ ben ke baa bife wase fiɛɛ ɛ̂ Icɛm ɛ̂ diee diem e kɛ. Ben ebife, ɛ́ ben ekɛŋkɛ, wvu lɛ nlaŋlaŋ wene eyiŋsɛn.
43016025	Me njemyi njeme wvun ɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ ɛ̂ boŋgan e, geenɛn kefew too lo kè me n'yaa mbɛɛ ŋke embvuu enjeme ɛ̂ ben ɛ̂ boŋgan e kɛ. Me nu ŋke enjemyi wase ɛ̂ ben ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛndan ɛkumɛ Icɛm.
43016026	Ɛ̀ nu ke enu kefew kekiɛ le, ɛ́ ben biite fiɛɛ ɛ̂ Icɛm ɛ̂ diee diem e. Kɛ me ŋgayte ɛ̂ ben lɛ me nu ŋke enlɛkɛ fiɛɛ ɛ̂ Icɛm ben e kɛ.
43016027	Icɛm kebɛɛ kooŋke ben, njefo ben nu ɛ koŋ me ɛ bvuu ɛ bee lɛ me nɛ fô wvú wvù Icɛm e.
43016028	Me nto nɛ fô Icɛm e nto yî woŋ wvun e, ɛ no nɛn'yi wase yî woŋ wvun e ntuu jim fô Icɛm e.”
43016029	No Jisos jeme nonɛn ɛ boom bew bo ŋgoo le bɛnse lo gay lɛ, “Aŋghaa! Wo jemyi naa keseen teytey ɛ ɛ̀ yaa bvuu nu ɛ̂ boŋgan e kɛ!
43016030	Keseen nu ɛ bese ɛ yɛn wase lɛ wo kee mwɛɛm mvunciim yaa cɛyte lɛ wee ke ebife kɛ lo fiɛɛ ɛ̂ wo kɛ. Fifin nu ɛ ge bese ɛ mum ɛ bee lɛ wo nɛ fô Nyo' le.”
43016031	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben fɛn nu ɛ bee keseen e?
43016032	Kefew too lo, ɛ kí ɛ to naa wase, kè ben nu ke etawse mwaaŋ mwaaŋ ɛ́ wee egɛne ɛ̂ wvú yew, cinɛ me le me ɛmbeŋ. Geenɛn kɛ me nu me ɛmbeŋ kɛ, njefo Icɛm nu bee wvú.
43016033	Me njemyi mwɛɛm mvun ɛ̂ ben wvu lɛ no ben nu yî yɛm e, ben emum ekɛŋkè nyɛkeey. Yî woŋ wvun e nu ɛ ben kɛŋke boŋgɛw, geenɛn ben esakenè. Me nu ɛ nso wase woŋ wvun.”
43017001	Ɛ Jisos ke jeme njeme wvun mɛse, mum nɛ cake ɛjisɛ taa we bunle lɛ, “Icɛm, kefew nu ɛ kocɛn wase. Duŋcɛ bvukukɛ bvu Waa wo le wvu lɛ Wan tɛn nulo eduŋcɛ bwuw bvukukɛ.
43017002	Wvú nulo eduŋcɛ njefo wo nu ɛ nya mvuŋgay ɛ̂ wvú ɛ̂ we jo wee wvu wum tfuu lɛ wvú enya nshii wvù mɛy lo ɛ̂ boba bocii bò wo nu ɛ nya ɛ̂ wvú.
43017003	Ɛ nshii wvù mɛy lo wvun nu fin fì lɛ bó ekeè wo wvù ɛ̀ nu kɛ wo Nyo' wvu kecɛɛy, ebvuu ekee tɛn me wvù Jisos Klistu wvù wo to tumɛɛ le.
43017004	Me nu ɛ nduŋcɛ wase bvukukɛ bwuw yî nshɛ le no me nu ɛ mɛse lemme dì wo to nyaɛ lɛ me enlem e.
43017005	Yî keseen e Icɛm, kase enya me bvukukɛ mbew yo le bvù me nto nshee ŋkɛŋke fwele ɛ woŋ sɛ ke kɛw e.
43017006	Me nu ɛ nduŋcɛ wase wo ɛ̂ bonyii bò wo to baayɛɛ ɛ̂ woŋ jan nya ɛ̂ me le. Bonyii ban to nu buw, ɛ wo mum nya bó ɛ̂ me. Ɛ bó nu ɛ yuw diɛw yo le.
43017007	Bó nu ɛ kiɛɛ wase keseen lɛ fiɛɛ ficii fì me ŋkɛŋke nu ɛ fí nɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô wo le.
43017008	Me njemyi nɛn njefo me nu ɛ nya wase diɛw yì wo to nyaɛ ɛ̂ me ɛ̂ bó, bó ɛ fiisɛn, ɛ mum ɛ kiɛɛ yî kecɛɛy e lɛ me nɛ fô wo le, ɛ bee tɛn lɛ ɛ̀ to tum wo me.
43017009	Me mbunlee nɛn ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô boban e. Kɛ me mbunlee ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô boba bò ɛ̀ nu bo yî woŋ wvun e kɛ. Me mbunlee ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô boban bò wo nu ɛ nya ɛ̂ me le, njefo ɛ̀ nu bonyii buw.
43017010	Bonyii bocii bò me ŋkɛŋke nu bonyii buw, ɛ bonyii bocii bò wo kɛŋke nu bem. Ɛ̀ nu yî bó le wvù bvukukɛ bwem yen'yi.
43017011	Keseen nu ɛ me n'yaa mbɛɛ ɛ̂ woŋ jan kɛ. Geenɛn bó bɛɛ ɛ̂ woŋ jan, ɛ me ŋkaase wase ntoo fô wo le. Icɛm wvù yuule, gɛɛlɛ bó ɛ̂ diee diuw dì wo nu ɛ nya ɛ̂ me le, wvu lɛ bó nulo enù yî wee le mwaaŋ kɛ naa no bee wo nu yî wee le mwaaŋ.
43017012	Seke me nto nu bee bó, me nto nu ɛ ŋgɛɛ bó ɛ̂ diee diuw dì wo nu ɛ nya ɛ̂ me le. Me nu ɛ ncɛycɛy bó wee mvu bó le baa la, ɛfey kɛ wvuwɛ wvù to nu wase wee wvù nu ke ela le. Ɛ fifin to nu wvu lɛ fiɛɛ fì bó saŋɛɛ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le eto ekocɛn.
43017013	Keseen nu ɛ me ŋkaase wase ntoo fô wo le, ɛ mwɛɛm mvun nu ɛ me njemyi mbɛɛ yî woŋ wvun e wvu lɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó ekɛŋke njoŋ wvu wɛm ɛ wvú ɛ yiŋsɛn yî bó le.
43017014	Me nu ɛ nya wase diɛw yo can yibole, bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo yî woŋ wvun e ɛ mum ɛ no bane bó njefo kɛ bó nu bonyii bo yî woŋ wvun e kɛ, lɛŋlɛŋ no kɛ me nu wee wvu yî woŋ wvun e kɛ.
43017015	Kɛ me mbunlee nɛn lɛ wo ebvuse lo bó yî woŋ wvun e kɛ. Me mbunlee ɛ ɛ̀ nu lɛ wo egemgem bó fo bó eley can wee kebefɛ wɛ le.
43017016	Kɛ bó nu bonyii bo yî woŋ wvun e kɛ, lɛŋlɛŋ no kɛ me nu wee wvu yî woŋ wvun e kɛ.
43017017	Seyse bó egɛɛ ɛ́ bó eyuulè ɛnte jo kecɛɛy. Diɛw yo nu kecɛɛy.
43017018	No wo to tumɛɛ me yî woŋ wvun e, nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no me nu ɛ ntum bó yî woŋ wvun e.
43017019	Me ɛ mum ɛ nseyse ɛkolɛ kem ɛ ŋgɛɛ nje bó, wvu lɛ ɛ̀ nulo tɛn ɛ́ bó eseyse bibole bikuu egɛɛ yî kecɛɛy.
43017020	Kɛ me mbunlee kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô bonyii ban e maaŋ kɛ. Me mbunlee tɛn fô bonyii bocii bò nu ke eyuw diɛw yibole elese fitele yî yɛm e.
43017021	Me mbunlee lɛ bó bocii ke enu yî wee le mwaaŋ kɛ naa no wo wvù Icɛm nu yî yɛm e ɛ me nu yî yo le. Me mbunlee lɛ bó tɛn ke enu yî yese bee wo le wvu lɛ bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo yî woŋ wvun e ebee lɛ ɛ̀ to tum wo me.
43017022	Bvukukɛ bvù wo to buwɛɛ me dvú nu ɛ me ɛ nya wase ɛ̂ bó wvu lɛ bó nulo enù yî wee le mwaaŋ, kɛ naa no bee wo nu yî wee le mwaaŋ,
43017023	ɛ me nu yî bó le, ɛ wo nu yî yɛm e. Lɛ bó elooci nù yî wee le mwaaŋ, nonɛn ɛ́ bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo yî woŋ wvun e emum ekiɛɛ lɛ ɛ̀ tum wo me, ɛ wo kooŋke bó kɛ naa no wo kooŋke me.
43017024	Icɛm, me nshieele lɛ boba bò wo nu ɛ nya ɛ̂ me ke enu tɛn bee bó fô me nu, wvu lɛ bó ke eyɛn bvukukɛ bvù wo to nyaɛ ɛ̂ me nje keŋkoŋɛn kuw fô me le ɛ woŋ wvun sɛ ke kɛw e.
43017025	Ɛɛy Icɛm wvu teytey, kɛ bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo yî woŋ wvun e kee wo kɛ, geenɛn ɛ me ŋkee wo, ɛ bonyii bem ban nu ɛ kiɛɛ lɛ ɛ̀ tum wo me.
43017026	Me nu ɛ ŋge wase bó ɛ kiɛɛ wo, ɛ me mbɛɛ ŋke eŋgee kɛ ɛ bó kee wo, wvu lɛ keŋkoŋɛn kè wo nu ɛ koŋ me dvú nulo enu yî bó le, ɛ me tɛn nu yî bó le.”
43018001	Ɛ Jisos ke bunle mɛse, ɛ bô boom bew bo ŋgoo le nɛ fó, gɛn lente keloŋɛ kè bó teŋe lɛ Kidlon, buy kewvu keki fô wɛɛ ketaaŋ wvumew e, mum ley jó.
43018002	Ɛ̀ to nu ɛ Judas wvù to gesɛɛ Jisos kee tɛn bvudvuu bvudvu, njefo Jisos bô boom bew bo ŋgoo le to ké no gɛne taashi fó ɛfonɛfon.
43018003	Nonɛn, ɛ Judas mum gɛn fó bô ŋgoo bonyii bo nci le noo bonyii bomew bò to cɛyte yew ncese. Bonyii ban nu ɛ ɛ̀ to tum bocee ncese bo baay baay noo Bofalasii bó. Bó to gɛne kɛŋke bin'yeese bô diŋguci ɛ bó ɛ tfuw noo mwɛɛm mvu jem e.
43018004	No Jisos to kee wase fiɛɛ fì to nu keeke ekooy bô wvú, ɛ wvú mum bencɛ to fwe, bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben gomte ɛ ɛ̀ nu yɛɛ?”
43018005	Ɛ bó tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Jisos wvu Nasalɛt.” Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu me wvudvu.” Ɛ̀ to nu ɛ Judas wvù to gesɛɛ wvú leeme bô bonyii bodvu.
43018006	No Jisos gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ ɛ̀ nu wen wvudvu, ɛ bó kaa tu lo jim jim, gbwekɛn fokuse.
43018007	Ɛ wvú bvuu bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben gomte ɛ ɛ̀ nu yɛɛ?” Ɛ bó tfuse lɛ, “Jisos wvu Nasalɛt.”
43018008	Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Me nu ɛ nsee wase ɛ̂ ben lɛ ɛ̀ nu me wvudvu. Ɛ́ ben fɛn gomte ɛ ɛ̀ nu me, ɛ́ ben cinɛ ɛ bonyii ban no gɛne.”
43018009	Wvú to gay nonɛn keege ɛ́ fí eto ekocɛn ɛ̂ diɛw yì wvú to jemyɛɛ wase ɛ̂ Nyo' lɛ wen to baa lase wee mwaaŋ fô bò wvú to nyaɛ ɛ̂ wen e kɛ.
43018010	Semon Bita to kɛŋke nyo jem. Ɛ wvú mum dvun ɛ̂ ŋku le, cun kentuŋtuŋ ke nfwa ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le ke ɛcɛɛy dvú, sum. Diee di nfwa wvudvu le to nu Malkus.
43018011	Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ Bita lɛ, “Kase etfuse nyo yo ɛ̂ ŋku le. Kɛ me nu eŋ'wu fiko fi ŋgɛw e fì Icɛm nu ɛ nya ɛ̂ me le?”
43018012	Ɛ ɛkolɛ ke bonyii bo nci le bô ŋgoo bonyii bo nci le noo bonyii bò to cɛyte yew ncese Bojuu mum gheŋ Jisos kay wvú bô bokfuu.
43018013	Ɛ bó yaw jo wvú gɛn dvú fô Annas e, njefo Annas to nu icee kpwɛɛ Kayfas wvù to nu ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le kelum kekiɛ le.
43018014	Kayfas wvun nu wvù to nyaɛ wase ntefe ɛ̂ Bojuu lɛ fí jee lɛ wee mwaaŋ ekpwe fô bonyii le bocii.
43018015	No bó to gɛne bô Jisos nonɛn, Semon Bita bô waa ŋgoo Jisos mvu to bii wvú le. No waa ŋgoo Jisos wvun to nu ɛ ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le kee wvú, ɛ wvú mum bi Jisos e gɛn ley fô lakfulɛɛŋ ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le.
43018016	Ɛ Bita shɛɛ no leeme ɛkfuŋ mbew diuw ketaaŋ e. Ɛ waa ŋgoo Jisos wvudvu wvù ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le to kee, kase buy to jeme bô wan kpwoon wvù to cɛyte diuw ketaaŋ, jo Bita ley bô wvú.
43018017	Ɛ wan kpwoon wvudvu bife ɛ̂ Bita lɛ, “Kɛ wo nu tɛn wee ŋgoo wee wvun?” Ɛ Bita tfuse lɛ, “Kɛ me nu kɛ.”
43018018	Ɛ̀ to nu ɛ ɛkfuŋ lɛɛ, ɛ boom bo lemme le bô bonyii bò to cɛyte yew ncese ɛ fwɛɛ ŋguy ɛ no leemene fó yosene. Ɛ Bita mum fey, gɛn no leeme bô bó yosene tɛn.
43018019	Ɛ ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le mum no biwci mwɛɛm ɛ̂ Jisos ɛkumɛ boom bew bo ŋgoo le noo ɛkumɛ n'yɛɛyi we.
43018020	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Me ŋké no njemyi ɛ̂ woŋ tfuu ɛndan. Me ŋké no n'yɛɛyi bonyii yéw bunle le noo yew ncese le fô Bojuu bocii nu ɛ tase. Kɛ me ŋke mbaa enjemyi wase fiɛɛ ɛ̂ nnyilɛ le kɛ.
43018021	Wo biwci mwɛɛm mvun ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ me nje la? Ɛ̀ biwcì ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ bonyii bò ké no yuuke no me n'yɛɛyi. Bó kee naa fiɛɛ fì me ŋké no njemyi.”
43018022	No Jisos jeme nonɛn, ɛ wee mvu ŋgoo bonyii bò to cɛyte yew ncese wvù to leeme fó nceencee tum ɛbo ɛ̂ wvú ɛntuŋtuŋ, bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ̀ yin nu je yì wo tfuuse fiɛɛ jó ɛ̂ ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le?”
43018023	Ɛ Jisos bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ́ me fɛn nu ɛ njeme ɛ njay, ɛ́ wo duŋcɛ jay wvudvu. Ɛ́ me fɛn njemyi ɛ ɛ̀ nu kecɛɛy, wo ɛ kaa ɛ suŋ lo me nje la?”
43018024	Ɛ Annas mum nɛ ciinse Jisos fô Kayfas wvù ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le. Ɛ Jisos to bɛɛ kɛ ɛ bó ɛ kay bô bokfuu.
43018025	No Semon Bita to bɛɛ leeme yosene ŋguy, ɛ bonyii bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Kɛ wo nu mvu ŋgoo bonyii bew e?” Geenɛn ɛ Bita tun gay lɛ, “Kɛ me nu mvu kɛ.”
43018026	Ɛ waa lemme ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le mvu bvuu bife ɛ̂ Bita lɛ, “Me mbe mbaa n'yɛn wo le ben ɛ wvú ɛ̂ wɛɛ ketaaŋ wɛ le?” Waa lemme wvudvu to nu wee kfuu di wee wɛ wvù Bita to sumɛɛ kentuŋtuŋ kew e.
43018027	Ɛ Bita bvuu tun. Kɛ sekedvu, ɛ nyimshie mum toŋ.
43018028	Ɛ bonyii mum jo Jisos fô yew e fo Kayfas no gɛne dvú ɛ̂ ntow wee wvu Lum wvù to saake jó le. Ɛ̀ to nu ɛ ɛ̀ bɛɛ lo ɛntaŋɛntaŋ. Ɛ bó dioo gɛn faŋɛ yaa ley fibole gɛn ɛ̂ ntow wee wvudvu le kɛ, njefo ɛ́ bó to ley lo, emum etuu ŋkfum, saa ebvuu edie Ŋkaw Daŋɛfey kɛ.
43018029	Nonɛn ɛ Baylɛt mum buy to yɛn bó le bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Fiɛɛ fì ben yɛn ɛ wee wvun ɛ jay nu la?”
43018030	Ɛ bó tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ́ wee wvun be baa buw fiɛɛ, tu bese baa too bô wvú keenya ɛ̂ wo kɛ.”
43018031	Ɛ Baylɛt tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben ejo wvú esaw bii no wene nci gomte.” Ɛ Bojuu gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Kɛ bese kɛŋke mvuŋgay keeyu wee kɛ.”
43018032	Ɛ njeme wvun mum to kocɛn ɛ̂ diɛw yì Jisos to jemyɛɛ wase duŋci kfuu kpwe yì wvú to nu keeke ekpwe le.
43018033	Ɛ Baylɛt kase ley gɛn ɛ̂ ntow we le, tee ɛ bó to bô Jisos, ɛ wvú bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu wo wvù Nfon Bojuu le?”
43018034	Ɛ Jisos bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wo jemyi fin ɛ ɛ̀ nu ŋkpwawcɛ wvuwo, nuu ɛ̀ jeme wee ɛ̂ wo ɛkumɛ me lɛ?”
43018035	Ɛ Baylɛt bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Me nu wee Juu lɛ? Ɛ̀ nu bonyii buw bo woŋ e bô bocee ncese bo baay baay bò to bô wo ɛ nya ɛ̂ me. Wo jay ɛ ɛ̀ nu la?”
43018036	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Kɛ bvunfon bwem nu diɛwɛ bvu yî woŋ wvun e kɛ. Ɛ́ bvunfon bwem be nu diɛwɛ bvu yî woŋ wvun e, tu bonyii bem bo lemme le be ɛ diu wvu lɛ fo bó enya me can Bojuu le kɛ. Geenɛn kɛ bvunfon bwem nu bvù nɛ yî woŋ wvun e kɛ.”
43018037	Ɛ Baylɛt mum bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Kɛ tu wo nu Nfon?” Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu no wo gay lɛ me nu Nfon. Bó to boke me, ɛ me nto yî woŋ wvun e nje fin fì lɛ me ento enjeme ɛkumɛ kecɛɛy. Wee tfuu wvù bii kecɛɛy e ké no yuuke diɛw yɛm e.”
43018038	Ɛ Baylɛt ghay lɛ, “Kecɛɛy nu la?” No wvú ghay nonɛn mum kase buy gɛn yɛn Bojuu ba le gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Me mbaa n'yɛn fiɛɛ fì wvú jay e kɛ.
43018039	Geenɛn ben kɛŋke nce wene mvu lɛ ɛ̀ ké dioo nu kefew ke Ŋkaw Daŋɛfey e, ɛ me mbvuse wee ncaw mwaaŋ yew. Ben gomte lɛ me embvuse ɛ ɛ̀ nu Nfon wene Bojuu le?”
43018040	Ɛ Bojuu bodvu wam lo foweɛwe lɛ, “'Aay, kɛ bese gomte wee wvun kɛ, bvuse ɛ ɛ̀ nu Balabas!” Balabas wvun to nu ɛkufɛ ke cooŋ e.
43019001	Ɛ Baylɛt mum jo Jisos nya ɛ bó njin bô boŋgbwan.
43019002	Ɛ bonyii bo nci le lu kefo ke bvunfon e ɛ kí nu bíay bíay bon ɛ̂ wvú ɛfa, jo ndvu bvunfon ɛ yí yɛɛle lo, shfuse yî ye le.
43019003	Ɛ bó mum no too fô wvú le bune wvú gayte lɛ, “Biaa kembaan! Nfon Bojuu!” No bó gee nonɛn no njine wvú bô can.
43019004	Ɛ Baylɛt bvuu buy ɛkfuŋ gay ɛ̂ bonyii lɛ, “Ben eyɛn, me nu embvuse wee wvun enya ɛ̂ ben, wvu lɛ ben ekiɛɛ lɛ me mbaa en'yɛn fiɛɛ fì wvú jay e kɛ.”
43019005	Ɛ Jisos mum buy no too bô kefo ke bíay e ɛfa noo ndvu bvunfon ye le. Ɛ Baylɛt mum gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben etaa eyɛn wee wvudvu wvun!”
43019006	Ɛ bocee ncese bo baay baay bô bonyii bò to cɛyte yew ncese dioo yɛn wvú le nonɛn, mum no wamte lo lɛ, “Ta lo wvú yî kentam e, ta lo wvú yî kentam e!” Ɛ Baylɛt gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben ejo wvú bô can yene eta yî kentam e, njefo me mbaa en'yɛn jay we le kɛ.”
43019007	Ɛ Bojuu bodvu tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Bese kɛŋke nci wese, ɛ nci wvudvu duŋci lɛ wvú kɛŋke keekpwe, njefo wvú nu ɛ ge ɛkolɛ kew lɛ wen nu Waa Nyo'.”
43019008	Ɛ Baylɛt dioo yuw njeme wvun bvuu kɛŋkɛ lo nfan baay.
43019009	Ɛ bô Jisos bvuu tu jim ɛ̂ kebuw e, ɛ wvú bife ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Wo nɛ fɛɛ?” Geenɛn ɛ Jisos faŋɛ yaa tfuse fiɛɛ kɛ.
43019010	Ɛ Baylɛt bife ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Kɛ wo nu ejeme ɛ̂ me le? Kɛ wo kee lɛ me ŋkɛŋke mvuŋgay keencinɛ wo le mbvuu ŋkɛŋke mvuŋgay keeŋgay ɛ́ bó eta wo yî kentam e le?”
43019011	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Kɛ wo bee ekɛŋke mvuŋgay ɛ̂ me we sɛ bó to nya mvuŋgay mvudvu ɛ̂ wo fowe kɛ. Nonɛn nje fifin, wee wvù nya me can yo le nu ɛ wvú kɛŋke kebefɛ ɛ kí kuuke fele kuw.”
43019012	Ɛ Baylɛt dioo yuw njeme wvun, mum kɛw no gomte je keecinɛ wvú le. Geenɛn ɛ Bojuu wam lo foweɛwe lɛ, “Ɛ́ wo mom lo ɛ cinɛ wee wvun e, tu kɛ wo nu nsaa Kaysa wvù Nfon wvu baay wvu Lum kɛ. Wee tfuu wvù bense ɛkolɛ kew lɛ wen nu nfon nu wee bvuban wvu Kaysa.”
43019013	Ɛ Baylɛt dioo bvuu yuw wvun njeme, mum buy bô Jisos, shii yî kentaw ke nsaw e fò bó to teŋe lɛ Bvudvuu bvù bó bom bô Ɛta, teŋe ɛ̂ díɛw Ibulu le lɛ Gabata.
43019014	Ɛ̀ to nu wase Diuu di Nseyse wvu Ŋkaw Daŋɛfey e, ɛ kefew to nu wase diɛwɛ didiuu yuufe ncow difɛɛ le. Ɛ Baylɛt jeme ɛ̂ Bojuu lɛ, “Ben etaa eyɛn Nfon wene wvun!”
43019015	Ɛ Bojuu bodvu no wamte lo lɛ, “Gɛnɛ lo bô wvú, gɛnɛ lo bô wvú, ta lo wvú yî kentam e!” Ɛ Baylɛt bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Me enta Nfon wene yî kentam e le?” Ɛ bocee ncese bo baay baay tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Kɛ bese kɛŋke Nfon mvu ɛfey Kaysa kɛ.”
43019016	Ɛ Baylɛt mum nya Jisos ɛ̂ bó lɛ bó egɛn eta yî kentam e.
43019017	Ɛ bó mum jo Jisos, buy bô wvú. Ɛ wvú tuu kentam kew no gɛne fô bó teŋe lɛ Ŋgbwow Ɛkolɛ, teŋe ɛ̂ díɛw Ibulu le lɛ Golgota.
43019018	Ɛ bó mum gɛn ta wvú fó yî kentam e, ta tɛn bonyii bomew bofɛɛ yî bintam e, wvumvu ɛcɛɛy, wvumvu ɛŋkoŋko, ɛ Jisos no nu ɛntelɛŋ.
43019019	Ɛ Baylɛt tɛn saŋ fiɛɛ fimew ɛ bó ta yî kentam ke Jisos e. Fiɛɛ fì wvú to saŋɛɛ fidvu to nu lɛ, “Jisos wvu Nasalɛt, Nfon Bojuu.”
43019020	Bojuu nteen to nu ɛ taŋ fiɛɛ fì wvú to saŋɛɛ fidvu, njefo fò bó to taɛ Jisos yî kentam e to nu nceencee mbew kelaante le, ɛ wvú to saŋ fiɛɛ fin ɛ̂ díɛw Ibulu bô yi Latin noo yi Glek e.
43019021	Ɛ bocee ncese bo baay baay bo Bojuu le gɛn gay ɛ̂ Baylɛt lɛ, “Fo wo esaŋ lɛ, ‘Nfon Bojuu’ kɛ. Saŋɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu lɛ, ‘Wee wvun duu lɛ wen nu Nfon Bojuu.’”
43019022	Ɛ Baylɛt tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Fiɛɛ fì me nsaŋ nu ɛ me ɛ nsaŋ wase.”
43019023	No bonyii bo nci le to taɛ wase Jisos yî kentam e, mum jo ndvú ye gaw ɛ̂ bikuu bibole mondvuum monɛm no bó to nu. Bó to nu ɛ jo naa noo kekum kew. Geenɛn ɛ kekum kin nu ɛ bó to tum kɛ lo kenlaatɛn e ɛ kɛw yî kendoŋ e ɛ bow ɛ buy yî bikaa le.
43019024	Nonɛn ɛ bó mum jeme ɛbonɛbon lɛ, “Fo beene esaa kekum kin kɛ. Beene etum kaŋ, eyɛn wee wvù nu ekɛŋkɛ.” Fifin to kooyi keege ɛ́ fí eto ekocɛn no bó to saŋɛɛ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le lɛ, “Bó to nu ɛ gaw ndvú yɛm fô bikuu bibole, tum kaŋ bô kekum kem.” Nonɛn bonyii bo nci le bodvu to nu ɛ ge kɛ naa fiɛɛ fidvu fin.
43019025	Geenɛn, bokɛnɛ bomew to leeme fó mbew kentam ke Jisos e. Bokɛnɛ ban to nu bwee Jisos bô waa bwee bwee Jisos wvù kpwoon noo Maalia wvù kpwɛɛ Klobas noo Maalia Magdalen.
43019026	Ɛ Jisos ke dioo enɛ eyɛn bwee le noo waa we ŋgoo wɛ wvù wvú to kooŋke ɛ bó leeme mbew ye le, ɛ wvú gay ɛ̂ bwee lɛ, “Kpwoon, taa eyɛn, wvun nu wase waa wo.”
43019027	No wvú gay nonɛn kase gay tɛn ɛ̂ waa we ŋgoo wɛ lɛ, “Taa eyɛn, wvun nu wase bwoo.” Ɛ kɛw sekekiɛ le ɛ waa we ŋgoo wvudvu mum jo bwee Jisos ɛ wvú gɛn no cee wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu yew dvu wvú.
43019028	Ɛjim jodvu no Jisos to kee wase lɛ fiɛɛ ficii nu ɛ ka wase, ɛ wvú mum nɛ jeme keege ɛ́ fí eto ekocɛn no bó saŋɛɛ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le lɛ, “Kendoŋ yumte me.”
43019029	Nsɛfe mvu to leeme fó bô mbvuum mo ŋgbwayŋgbwayi jó ɛ mó ɛ yiŋsɛn. Ɛ bonyii bo nci le bodvu mum ffum kusha jó bon yî fite fi isob e nɛke diuw we le.
43019030	Ɛ Jisos dioo fi mbvuum modvu mum gay lɛ, “Fí ɛ ka wase.” No wvú gay nonɛn, ŋgvuke ɛkolɛ, ɛ keyoy kew mum buy.
43019031	No ɛbvubwɛ to nu wase Diuu di Nseyse le keeley diuu di mbam e, ɛ Bojuu no gomte keege lɛ fo ɛgvun yodvu ke emɛy enu yî bintam e diuu di mbam e kɛ, (tete ɛ mbam wvudvu to nu wvu baay). Ɛ bó mum gɛn yɛn Baylɛt e lɛkɛ lɛ wvú egay ɛ́ bó eŋgocɛ bikaa bi bonyii bò to nu yî bintam e bodvu wvu lɛ bó eyaŋsɛn ekpwekɛn ɛ́ bó eshike, ecake.
43019032	Nonɛn ɛ bonyii bo nci le mum to ŋgocɛ bikaa bi wee wvu fwe le, ŋgocɛ tɛn bi wvumvu wɛ wvù bó to taɛ bô wvú le.
43019033	Geenɛn, ɛ bó ke dioo to buy fô Jisos e, yɛn lɛ wvú be ɛ kpwe wase, ɛ bó faŋɛ yaa bvuu ŋgocɛ bikaa biew kɛ.
43019034	Ɛ wee mvu ŋgoo bonyii bo nci le bon dita di Jisos e bô goo. No wvú bon nonɛn, kaŋ mwaaŋ ɛ ɛlɛmɛ bô joo ta buy fó.
43019035	Wee wvù to yɛnɛɛ mwɛɛm mvun e nu ɛ wvú ɛ ben jim nsaw wvudvu, ɛ njeme we nu kecɛɛy, ɛ wvú kee lo lɛ wen jemyi ɛ ɛ̀ nu kecɛɛy wvu lɛ ben nulo ebee.
43019036	Mwɛɛm mvun to kooyi wvu lɛ fiɛɛ fì bó to saŋɛɛ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le eto ekocɛn no bó saŋɛɛ lɛ, “Kɛ ɛkufɛ kew kemwaaŋ nu ɛ bó nu ke eŋgoy kɛ.”
43019037	Ɛ fí bvuu nu ɛ bó ɛ saŋ bvudvuu bvumew e ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le lɛ, “Bonyii nu ke etaale wee wvudvu wɛ wvù bó nu ɛ bon bô goo.”
43019038	Ɛjim jodvu ɛ Yosɛw wvu Alimatia nɛ gɛn yɛn Baylɛt e lɛkɛ lɛ wvú ebee ɛ́ wen ecake gvune di Jisos e. Yosɛw wvun to nu wee ŋgoo Jisos geenɛn ɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ ɛjim ɛjim njefo wvú to fane Bojuu. Ɛ Baylɛt bee, ɛ wvú mum gɛn keecake gvune didvu.
43019039	Nikodɛmus wvù to yawɛɛ gɛn yɛn Jisos e ɛntaŋ jomew to nu ɛ to tɛn bô bifuu bimew bì shfuuŋkene ɛ bó taashɛ ɛ kene bô mɛɛl noo alos ɛ bvujitɛ bvudvu nu kɛ diɛwɛ bokilu mbaanshɛ ncow botɛte le.
43019040	Ɛ bô wvú mum shike gvune di Jisos e njime bô ndvú ɛ bó ɛ yefe bô nfiey wɛ no ndwey wee to ké no nu ɛ̂ nce woŋ Bojuu le.
43019041	Ɛ̀ to nu ɛ wɛɛ kentaaŋ wvumew nu mbew fò bó to taɛ Jisos yî kentam e. Ɛ wɛɛ wvudvu nu ɛ jem yi fiɛ mi nu dvú ɛ bó ke baa edwey wase wee jó kɛ.
43019042	Nonɛn no ɛbvubwɛ to nu wase Diuu di Bojuu le di Nseyse wvu diuu di Mbam e, ɛ jem yidvu nu tɛn nceencee, ɛ bó mum lese Jisos jó.
43020001	Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu diuu di fwe yî kemaa le, ɛ Maalia Magdalen buy ja lo kebitele, gɛn fô jem, yɛn ɛ bó ɛ cake wase tɛ dì bó to baŋɛɛ diuw jem dvú.
43020002	Nonɛn ɛ wvú mum lewtɛ gɛn yɛn Semon Bita le bô waa ŋgoo Jisos mvu wɛ wvù Jisos to kooŋke le, gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Bó nu ɛ bvuse wase Tata ɛ̂ jem, ɛ bese yaa kee laa bó gɛke fɛɛ wvú lɛ.”
43020003	Ɛ Bita bô waa ŋgoo Jisos wɛ mum buy no gɛne fô jem.
43020004	Bó to gɛne lewte lo, geenɛn ɛ waa ŋgoo Jisos wɛ lewtɛ fey Bita yaw fɛse fô jem.
43020005	No wvú fɛse, ŋgvuwcɛ taa, yɛn ɛ ndvú yì bó njimɛɛ yî Jisos e jiime jó. Ɛ wvú taa nonɛn faŋɛ yaa ley jó kɛ.
43020006	Ɛ Semon Bita bi wvú le fɛse fó, mum ley lo gɛn ɛ̂ jem. No wvú ley, yɛn kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu ndvú yɛ le ɛ yí jiime,
43020007	noo fincake fi ndvu le fì bó to njimɛɛ ɛkolɛ ke Jisos e dvú, ɛ fí yaa jiime bô yimi ndvú yɛ kɛ. Geenɛn ɛ bó kɛwe ɛ gɛɛ bwew bvudvuu le ɛfinɛfin.
43020008	Ɛ waa ŋgoo Jisos mvu wɛ wvù to yawɛɛ efɛse fô jem mum ley tɛn gɛn ɛ̂ jem yɛn fiɛɛ fin e mum bee.
43020009	Ɛ̀ to nu ɛ bó baa cim kiɛɛ wase kenyi ke fiɛɛ fì nu ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le lɛ Jisos to kɛŋke keeke ebuy yî kpwe le kɛ.
43020010	Ɛ boom bo ŋgoo le bo Jisos e ba kase kfulɛ fô yew e.
43020011	Geenɛn ɛ Maalia shɛɛ no leeme beele fô jem. No wvú to beele ke nɛ ŋgvuwcɛ taa ɛ̂ jem,
43020012	yɛn bonceendaa bo Nyo' le bofɛɛ ɛ bó ɛ tfume ndvú yì baa ɛ shii fò bó to jikɛɛ gvune di Jisos e, wvumvu fô ɛkolɛ ke Jisos e to jiime, wvumvu fô bikaa biew to jiime.
43020013	Ɛ bonceendaa bo Nyo' le bodvu bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Kpwoon, wo beele la?” Ɛ wvú tfuse lɛ, “Me mbeele njefo bó nu ɛ cake Tata wɛm ɛ nɛ dvú ɛ me n'yaa ŋkee fò bó gɛke wvú kɛ.”
43020014	No wvú gay nonɛn, dioo baŋke ye yɛn ɛ Jisos leeme. Geenɛn ɛ wvú faŋɛ yaa kiɛɛ lɛ ɛ̀ nu Jisos kɛ.
43020015	Ɛ Jisos bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Kpwoon, wo beele la? Wo gomte ɛ ɛ̀ nu yɛɛ?” Ɛ Maalia mum no kpwaake lɛ ɛ̀ nu wee wvù taale fô wɛɛ ketaaŋ wvudvu le. Ɛ wvú mum gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Icɛm, ɛ́ wo fɛn nu ɛ tuu wvú ɛ nɛ dvú, ɛ́ wo see fò wo gɛke wvú ɛ́ me eŋgɛn enjo enɛ dvú.”
43020016	Ɛ Jisos nɛ bɛn wvú lɛ, “Maalia.” Ɛ wvú baŋke ye tee wvú ɛ̂ díɛw yibo Ibulu le lɛ, “Laboni,” fì nu lɛ, “Wee n'yɛɛyi.”
43020017	Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Fo wo ejicì me le kɛ, njefo me mbaa mben wase fô Icɛm e kɛ. Gɛnɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô boom bo bwɛɛm e esee ɛ̂ bó lɛ me mbene wase fô Icɛm wvù ɛ̀ nu tɛn Icen e noo fô Nyo' wɛm wvù ɛ̀ nu tɛn Nyo' wene le.”
43020018	Ɛ Maalia Magdalen mum gɛn see ɛ̂ boom bo Jisos e bo ŋgoo le lɛ wen nu ɛ yɛn Tata le, bvuu see ɛ̂ bó lɛ wvú nu ɛ jeme mwɛɛm mvun ɛ̂ wen.
43020019	Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu fokiɛguu ɛbvubwɛ bvù ɛ̀ to nu diuu di fwe yî kemaa le, ɛ boom bo ŋgoo le bo Jisos e nu yew ɛ bó ɛ fen'yɛ bimbuŋ, njefo bó to fane Bojuu. Ɛ Jisos ke nɛ buynɛn leem ɛ̂ bó ɛntelɛŋ, gay bó le lɛ, “Kembonɛn enù fô ben e.”
43020020	No wvú gay bó le nonɛn, mum duŋcɛ can ye bô dita diew ɛ̂ bó. Ɛ boom bo Jisos e bo ŋgoo le yuw njoŋ baay no bó yɛnɛɛ Tata le.
43020021	Ɛ Jisos bvuu kase gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Kembonɛn enù fô ben e. No Icɛm to tumɛɛ me, nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no me ntumte ben keseen.”
43020022	No wvú gay nonɛn, mum yoy yî bó le gay lɛ, “Ben efiisɛn Keyoy ke Yuule.
43020023	Ɛ́ ben lɛɛshi bibefɛ bi wee le, tu Nyo' nu ɛ lɛɛshɛ wase. Ben ɛ́ cinɛ sɛ ben ɛ lɛɛshɛ, tu bí ɛ mɛy wase.”
43020024	Ɛ̀ to nu seke Jisos to toɛ fô boom bew bo ŋgoo le, kɛ Toma wvù to nu ŋgoo boom bo yuufe ncow bofɛɛ le wvù bó to teŋe diee diew dimew lɛ Ɛmam to nu bô bó kɛ.
43020025	Ɛ kebɛse ke boom bo ŋgoo le bo Jisos e ke mum gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Bese be ɛ yɛn Tata le.” Geenɛn, ɛ wvú gay fiew ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ɛ́ me nu sɛ me ɛ ŋke ɛ n'yɛn dew bíɛn yɛ le yî can ye le, ɛ nlese kpwan ɛbo ɛ̂ dew bíɛn yidvu le, ɛ nlese tɛn kebo kem yî dita diew e, me nsaa mbee naa lo kɛ.”
43020026	Ɛ kemaa kum, ɛ boom bo Jisos e bo ŋgoo le bvuu no nu yew ɛ Toma nu tɛn bô bó, ɛ dew fwese nu ɛ bó ɛ fen'yɛ. Geenɛn, ɛ Jisos nɛ buynɛn ɛ̂ bó ɛntelɛŋ, gay bó le lɛ, “Kembonɛn enù fô ben e.”
43020027	No wvú gay nonɛn, mum gay ɛ̂ Toma lɛ, “Lese kpwan wo ɛbo yî can yɛm e, eyɛn no yí nu, ebvuu elese tɛn ɛbo kuw yî dita diem e. Fo wo ekɛŋkè kemaŋɛn kɛ, bee.”
43020028	Ɛ Toma mum tfuse lo lɛ, “Tata wɛm, noo Nyo' wɛm.”
43020029	Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wo fɛn nu ɛ bee keseen njefo wo nu ɛ yɛn me le? Njoŋ wvu baay nu fô bonyii bò baa yɛn me le kɛ, geenɛn ɛ bee le.”
43020030	Jisos to nu ɛ ge mwɛɛm nteen mvù duŋci mvuŋgay mvu Nyo' le ɛ boom bew bo ŋgoo le yɛn, ɛ bó baa saŋ ɛ̂ ŋwa' wvun e kɛ.
43020031	Geenɛn ɛ mvun mvù bó nu ɛ saŋ nu keege lɛ ben ebee lɛ Jisos nu Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ, nu Waa Nyo'. Ɛ́ ben beŋe nonɛn, ɛ́ ben ke ekɛŋkɛ nshii wvù mɛy lo nje diee diew.
43021001	Ɛjim jodvu ɛ Jisos ke bvuu duŋcɛ ɛkolɛ kew ɛ̂ boom bew bo ŋgoo le mbew Mamase yì Tibɛlias e. Fí to kooy ɛ̂ yin je le:
43021002	Semon Bita bô Toma wvù bó to teŋe lɛ Ɛmam, noo Natanial wvu Kana keba kè Galilee le, noo boom bo Sɛbɛdee le, noo boom bo ŋgoo le bo Jisos e bomew bofɛɛ to nu bvudvuu bvumwaaŋ.
43021003	Ɛ Semon Bita nɛ gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Me nu enlaa byé.” Ɛ bó gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Beene nu elaa.” Ɛ bô bó mum buy gɛn ley ɛ̂ kekoŋ e. Geenɛn ke ghan ce ɛ̂ joo ɛ bó baa koo lo fiɛɛ kɛ.
43021004	Ɛ ɛkfuŋ ke no yuule too, ɛ Jisos to leem ŋgem joo le, ɛ boom bew bo ŋgoo le faŋɛ yaa kiɛɛ lɛ ɛ̀ nu wvú kɛ.
43021005	Ɛ Jisos bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Boom bem, ben nu ɛ koo kɛ byé?” Ɛ bó tfuse lɛ, “'Aay.”
43021006	Ɛ wvú gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben elaŋ kensaŋ je ɛbo ɛcɛɛy jo kekoŋ ɛ́ ben ekoo fiɛɛ.” Ɛ bó mum laŋ, ɛ kí mum nɛ no ghaake bó keegufe, njefo bó to nu ɛ koo byé jó nteen.
43021007	Ɛ waa ŋgoo Jisos wɛ wvù Jisos to kooŋke dioo yɛn nonɛn mum gay ɛ̂ Bita lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu Tata.” No Semon Bita yuw lɛ ɛ̀ nu Tata, mum jise ndvú ye njefo wvú to nu ye yɛ. No wvú jise nonɛn mum sele ɛ̂ joo no gɛne fô Jisos e.
43021008	Geenɛn ɛ bomew boom bo ŋgoo le ba no bii ɛ̂ kekoŋ e guute kensaŋ kiɛ ɛ kí ɛ yiŋsɛn bô byé. Kɛ bó to bɛɛ ncejole keebuy ɛŋkpwaante kɛ. Bontam to shɛke kɛ wase diɛwɛ ŋkeŋkeŋ mbaanshen e.
43021009	Ɛ bó gɛn fɛse ɛŋkpwaante yɛn ŋguy e ɛ wvú keyte lo yî bika le, ɛ byé nu yî dvú le, ɛ blɛɛd nu tɛn fó.
43021010	Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben eto bô byé yimi yì ben konte.”
43021011	Nonɛn ɛ Semon Bita gɛn ben ɛ̂ kekoŋ e gufe kensaŋ buy dvú ɛŋkpwaante ɛ kí ɛ yiŋsɛn bô byé yì faŋkɛn gbwee kecow mbaanshen ncow shɛ (153). Naa no yí to cim nu nteen nɛn, kensaŋ to baa semkɛn kɛ.
43021012	Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben eto ediekɛn.” Wee mwaaŋ boom bew bo ŋgoo le to baa cim mom naa lo ebife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ laa ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù yɛɛ lɛ. Bó to nu ɛ kiɛɛ lo lɛ ɛ̀ nu Tata.
43021013	Ɛ Jisos mum gɛn jo blɛɛd wɛ nya ɛ̂ bó noo byé yɛ fó.
43021014	Fin to nu wase bokaŋ botɛte no Jisos to duŋcɛɛ ɛkolɛ kew ɛ̂ boom bew bo ŋgoo le ɛ kɛw no wvú to buyɛɛ yî kpwe le.
43021015	Ɛ bó ke diekɛn mɛse, ɛ Jisos bɛn Bita bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Semon waa Jon, wo kooŋke me fele bomew ban e?” Ɛ wvú tfuse lɛ, “'Ɛɛ Tata, wo kee lo lɛ me ŋkooŋke wo.” Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nyaŋyì boom bem bo njée le.”
43021016	Ɛ Jisos bvuu bɛn wvú yî bokaŋ e bofɛɛ bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Semon waa Jon, wo kooŋke me?” Ɛ wvú tfuse lɛ, “'Ɛɛ Tata, wo kee lo lɛ me ŋkooŋke wo.” Ɛ wvú gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ̀ taalè fô njée yɛm e.”
43021017	Ɛ Jisos bvuu bɛn wvú yî bokaŋ e botɛte bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Semon waa Jon, wo kooŋke me?” Ɛ Bita yuw no Jisos bife ɛ̂ wvú yî bokaŋ e botɛte lɛ laa wvú kooŋke wen ɛ, ɛ fí ffumse lo wvú. Ɛ wvú gay ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Tata, wo kee fiɛɛ ficii, wo kee lo lɛ me ŋkooŋke wo.” Ɛ Jisos gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nyaŋyi njée yɛm.
43021018	Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ wo kecɛɛy kecɛɛy lɛ, seke wo to bɛɛ cuwee, ɛ̀ to ké kay wo kecaw kuw no gɛne fô wo kooŋke. Geenɛn seke wo ɛ lun wase nu ɛ wo nu ke ecake can we ɛ́ ekay wee mvu kecaw yî yo le, ejo wo egɛn dvú fô wo yaa kooŋke keegɛn kɛ.”
43021019	Jisos to jemyi fin duŋci ɛ ɛ̀ nu kfuu kpwe yì Bita to nu keeke ekpwe eto bô diee dì kuuke dvú fô Nyo' le. No Jisos jeme nonɛn mum gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ̀ biì me le.”
43021020	Ɛ Bita dioo baŋke ye yɛn ɛ waa ŋgoo wɛ wvù Jisos to kooŋke bii bó le. Waa ŋgoo wvun nu wvù to yeemɛɛ gɛn yî Jisos e seke bô bó to diekene ɛkiɛguu yî kemɛse le bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Tata, ɛ̀ nu yɛɛ wvudvu wvù nu ke egese wo?”
43021021	No Bita yɛnɛɛ ɛ waa ŋgoo wvudvu bii bó le, ɛ wvú bife ɛ̂ Jisos lɛ, “Tata, fi wee wvun e nu lɛ la?”
43021022	Ɛ Jisos tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ́ me ncim mbe nshieele lɛ wvú emɛy enu egɛn ebuy no me ŋke eŋkase ento, ɛ́ fifiɛ ekɛŋke la keege bô wo? Ɛ̀ biì me le.”
43021023	No Jisos gayɛɛ nonɛn, ɛ njeme ke mum no gɛne ɛntelɛŋ jo bonyii bo mbee le lɛ kɛ waa ŋgoo Jisos wvun nu ke ekpwe kɛ. Geenɛn ɛ Jisos to baa gayte lɛ kɛ wvú nu ke ekpwe kɛ. Wvú to gay kɛ lɛ, “Ɛ́ me ncim mbe nshieele lɛ wvú emɛy enu egɛn ebuy no me ŋke eŋkase ento, ɛ́ fifiɛ ekɛŋke la keege bô wo.”
43021024	Waa ŋgoo wvudvu wvun nu wvù jemyi ɛkumɛ mwɛɛm mvun, ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù nu ɛ saŋ mwɛɛm mvudvu, ɛ bese kee lo lɛ fiɛɛ fì wvú jemyi ɛkumɛ fí nu kecɛɛy.
43021025	Mwɛɛm mvumew nu tɛn dvú nteen mvù Jisos to geɛ, ɛ ɛ̀ be nu lɛ bó esaŋ mvunciim, ɛ́ me en'yɛne lɛ kɛ ɛkolɛ ke nshɛ le kecii nulo ekɛŋke fò bó egɛɛ boŋwa' bodvu kɛ.
44001001	Cee la Teofilus, ɛ̂ ŋwa' wvu fwe wvù me nto nsaŋɛɛ fô wo le, me nto nu ɛ nsaŋ jó ɛkumɛ mwɛɛm mvunciim mvù Jisos to gee noo mvù wvú to yɛɛyi bonyii dvú, ɛ kɛw no wvú to kɛwɛɛ lemme diew,
44001002	gɛn buy diuu dì Nyo' to joɛ wvú ɛ wvú ben we. Ɛ́ Nyo' sɛ jo wvú ɛ́ wvú eben we, wvú to nu ɛ bɛɛ Keyoy ke Yuule tefe boom bew bo ntum e bò wvú to cawɛɛ.
44001003	Seke wvú to buyɛɛ yî kpwe le, wvú to nu ɛ duŋcɛ ɛkolɛ kew ɛ̂ bó yî ɛdiuw e mbaanyɛ ɛ̂ jé le nteen nteen yì duŋci lɛ wvú nu dvú. Ɛ wvú bvuu no jemyi ɛ̂ bó ɛkumɛ bvunfon bvu Nyo' le.
44001004	No bô bó to nu nonɛn, ɛ wvú gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Fo ben ke enɛ Jɛlusalɛm kɛ. Ben ecɛytè nnya yì Icɛm to kawɛɛ ben dvú yì ben to yuwɛɛ ɛ me njemyi ɛkumɛ yí.
44001005	Ben ekeè lɛ Jon to leese bonyii ɛ̂ joo, geenɛn ɛjim jo ɛdiuw caan nu ɛ Nyo' nu ke elese ben ɛ ɛ̀ nu can Keyoy ke Yuule le.”
44001006	Ɛ Jisos bô boom bew bo ntum e ke no nu kefew kemew e, ɛ bó bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Tata, kefew nu ɛ kocɛn wase kè wo nu ege ɛ́ bonyii bosɛɛbeene bo Islael ekase esaake bvunfon bvubole le?”
44001007	Ɛ wvú tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Kefew kè fí nu ke ekooy nu ɛ ɛ̀ seyse Icɛm bô mvuŋgay mwew, ɛ kɛ ɛ̀ nu bvudvuu bvunɛn keekiɛɛ kɛ.
44001008	Fì ben ekeè nu lɛ Keyoy ke Yuule nu ke eto eyiŋsɛn yî yene le, ɛ́ ben emum ekɛŋkɛ mvuŋgay, ekɛw eseŋe ɛkumɛ me Jɛlusalɛm noo biba bì Judea bô Samalia le bicii, egɛn ebuy ɛbuw ɛ woŋ yo ɛna le.”
44001009	Kɛ no wvú jeme nonɛn, ɛ Nyo' jo wvú ɛ wvú no bene we ɛ bó taale no wvú bene, ben ɛ kembɛw baŋ wvú, ɛ wvú la ɛ̂ bó ɛjise.
44001010	No bó luŋɛɛ ɛjisɛ we etaale no wvú bene, ɛ fí kooy lɛ bolemsɛ bofɛɛ to nu ɛ ja sɛsɛ buynɛn ɛ bó ɛ tfume ndvú ɛ yí baa, leem mbew bó le,
44001011	bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Bolemsɛ bo Galilee, ben leeme taale la we? Jisos wvun wvù Nyo' jo ɛ̂ ben ɛntelɛŋ wvú ɛ ben we nu ke ekase eto kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no ben be yɛn ɛ wvú bene we.”
44001012	Ɛ boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e mum nɛ fô Kum Bite bi Olif e no tuu jim Jɛlusalɛm, ɛ ɛ̀ to nu kɛ diɛwɛ keŋgawtɛn ke may e keegɛn buy jó.
44001013	No bó ley jó, mum ben gɛn ɛ̂ kebuw ke yew e ke ɛwe fò bó to ké no gɛne bɛɛle. Bonyii ban to nu Bita, Jon, Jɛm noo Andulu, Filew bô Toma, Batolomu bô Matio, Jɛm wvù waa Alfiyus, Semon wvù to nu wee ŋgoo Bosɛlot noo Judas wvù waa Jɛm.
44001014	Ɛ́ bô bokɛnɛ bomew noo Maalia wvù bwee Jisos bô boom bo bwee Jisos e ké no taashi yî fiɛɛ le fimwaaŋ keebunlee sekecii.
44001015	Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu ɛdiuw yoya le, ɛ boom bo ŋgoo le bo Jisos e taashɛ. Bó to nu fó wee diɛwɛ gbwee kecow mbaanfiɛɛ le (120). Ɛ Bita ja we jeme ɛ̂ bó lɛ,
44001016	“Boom bo bwɛɛm e, fiɛɛ fì Ŋwa' Nyo' jemyi to kɛŋke kɛ keekooy. Ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì Keyoy ke Yuule to geɛ ɛ Dawe jeme ɛ ɛ̀ bɛɛ lo ɛkumɛ Judas wvù to joɛ fwe ɛ bó sɛ koo Jisos.
44001017	Ben kee lɛ Judas wvun to nu wee mvu ŋgoo yesebeene le, kɛŋke diew lemme ɛ̂ beene ɛnte.”
44001018	(Ɛ́ Bita sɛ no jemyi nonɛn nu ɛ Judas to jo wase bigew bì bó to nyaɛ ɛ̂ wvú yî fiɛɛ fì wvú to buwɛɛ le, guy bvudvuu dvú. Bvudvuu bvun nu fò wvú to gbweɛ ncine ɛ tee bvuyɛ, ɛ bvulɛw buy bvucii.
44001019	Ɛ bonyii bo Jɛlusalɛm bocii yuw, mum no teŋe bvudvuu bvudvu ɛ̂ díɛw yibole lɛ Akɛldema, fì nu lɛ, “Gbwen Ɛlɛmɛ.”)
44001020	Ɛ Bita bvuu gay lɛ, “Dawe to nu ɛ saŋ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Mbense le lɛ, ‘Bó ecinɛ ɛ́ la diew etu binffuy, ɛ́ wee saa ebvuu eceè fó kɛ.’ Fí bvuu nu ɛ wvú ɛ saŋ lɛ, ‘Wee mvu kɛŋke keejo bvudvuu bwew bvu lemme le.’
44001021	No fí nu nonɛn, wee mvu kɛŋke keebɛne bese le, ɛ́ bee bó efewcì lɛ Tata Jisos to nu ɛ buy yî kpwe le. Wvuwɛ wee kɛŋke keenu wee wvù to lɛne bee bó sekecii kè Jisos to ghane bee bó ɛ kɛw yî kefew kè Jon to leese bonyii ɛ̂ joo le, ɛ gɛn ɛ buy diuu dì Nyo' to joɛ Jisos ɛ̂ bese ɛnte ɛ wvú ben we le.”
44001023	No wvú jeme nonɛn, ɛ bó cu bonyii bofɛɛ. Wvumvu to nu Yosɛw wvù bó to teŋe lɛ Basabas bvuu teŋe lɛ Justus, ɛ wvumvu nu Matiaa.
44001024	No bó cu nonɛn, mum bunle lɛ, “Tata, wo kee mvuntelem mvu bonyii bocii le. Nonɛn, duŋcɛ ɛ̂ bese wee wvù wo nu ɛ caw ɛntelɛŋ jo bonyii bo bofɛɛ ban,
44001025	lɛ wvú enù waa ntum Jisos wvù ejo bvudvuu bvu Judas e bvu lemme le, bvù wvú to cin'yɛɛ gɛn fô wvú nu fó le.”
44001026	No bó bunle nonɛn, mum saŋ ɛdiee ɛbo, jɛm, ɛ di Matiaa le buy gbwe. Ɛ bó mum bise wvú ŋgoo boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e bo yuufe ncow mwaaŋ e.
44002001	Ɛ diuu di Ŋkaw mvu wvù bó to teŋe lɛ Bɛntekos e ke to kocɛn, ɛ bonyii bocii bò to nu ɛ lese fitele yî Jisos e ɛ taashɛ bvudvu bvumwaaŋ.
44002002	Ɛ bó ke nɛ sɛsɛ yuw ɛ fiɛɛ dvûmte shiile we kɛ diɛwɛ keekee le. Ɛ fí shii, ley yiŋsɛn yew yì bó to nu dvú le.
44002003	Ɛ bó dioo taa, yɛn fiɛɛ fimew e ɛ fí nu kɛ diɛwɛ leme di ŋguy e, ɛ fí mum saaŋkɛn gɛn yî bó le wee mwaaŋ mwaaŋ.
44002004	Ɛ Keyoy ke Yuule mum yiŋsɛn yî bó le bocii, ge ɛ bó no jemyi díɛw bitum jɛɛy jɛɛy.
44002005	Ɛ̀ to nu kefew kekiɛ le, ɛ Bojuu bò to nu ɛ loocɛ ɛ lese fitele yî Nyo' le nu Jɛlusalɛm, ɛ bó ja bitum bicii bi yî ɛkolɛ ke nshɛ le.
44002006	No bó yuw nonɛn, mum tase to nteen fô bonyii bò to nu ɛ lese fitele yî Jisos e to nu. Ɛ bonyii bò to lesɛɛ fitele yî Jisos e bodvu no jemyi, ɛ wee mwaaŋ mwaaŋ yuuke ɛ̂ díɛw yibole. Ɛ fí ffumse bó.
44002007	Ɛ diuw yum bó, ɛ bó no ghayte, gayte lɛ, “Kɛ bonyii bò jemyi ban bocii nu bonyii bo Galilee le?
44002008	Fí ghan nɛɛ le beene ɛ sɛ no yuuke ɛ bó jemyi ɛ̂ díɛw bitum bisɛɛbeene le?
44002009	Beene bomew nɛ Baatia, bomew ɛ nɛ Medes bô Ɛlam, bomew ɛ nɛ Misobotɛmia bô Judea noo Kafadosia, bomew ɛ nɛ Bontus bô Ɛsia.
44002010	Beene bomew ɛ nɛ Fligia bô Bamfilia, bomew Ijiw bô biba bi Libia le, bì nu mbew kelaante kè Sɛlin e. Beene bomew ɛ nɛ Lum, ɛ ɛ̀ nu Bojuu bô bonyii bò baŋke lo ɛ tu bonyii bo mbee Bojuu le.
44002011	Beene bomew ɛ nɛ Klɛt bô Alɛbia. Beene ɛ no yuuke ɛ̂ díɛw bitum bisɛɛbeene le jɛɛy jɛɛy no bonyii ban jemyi biŋghaw bi mwɛɛm e bì Nyo' ge.”
44002012	Ɛ diuw yum bó, ɛ bó no ghayte ɛbonɛbon lɛ laa fifin fiɛɛ lo sɛ duŋci lɛ la lɛ.
44002013	Ɛ bomew bonyii no sɛwsee lo fibole gayte lɛ, “Bonyii ban nu ɛ mbvuum ɛ koo bó.”
44002014	Nonɛn, ɛ Bita bô kebɛse ke boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e bo yuufe ncow mwaaŋ mum leem fó. Ɛ Bita mum kɛw no jemyi ɛ̂ kebombom ke bonyii le foweɛwe lɛ, “Ben Bojuu noo bonyii bocii bò cee Jɛlusalɛm, ben enya bitem ntay ɛ̂ fiɛɛ fì me nu enjeme ɛ̂ ben.
44002015	Mbvuum baa koo bonyii ban no ben kpwaake kɛ. Keseen bɛɛ kɛ lo didiuu bvuukɛ fontaŋɛntaŋ.
44002016	Fiɛɛ fì kooyi fin keseen nu fì Juɛl wvù wee ntum Nyo' to jemyɛɛ wase lɛ,
44002017	‘Nyo' gayte lɛ, ɛ̀ nu ke edioo enu yî ɛdiuw yo fokemɛse le, ɛ́ wen etfuw Keyoy kewene yî bonyii bocii le. Nonɛn, ɛ́ boom bonɛn bò bolemsɛ noo bò bokɛnɛ eyuuke mwɛɛm mvù wen jemyi, seŋe ɛ̂ bonyii, ɛ́ mwɛɛm diɛwɛ bifilɛ le etoo fô cubonyii bonɛn e, ɛ́ bifilɛ elamte ŋgaybonyii bonɛn.
44002018	Ɛ̀ nu ke edioo enu ɛdiuw yoya le, ɛ́ wen etfuw Keyoy kewene yî bonyii bo lemme le bowene bocii, bò bolemsɛ noo bò bokɛnɛ, ɛ́ bó eyuuke mwɛɛm mvù wen jemyi, seŋe ɛ̂ bonyii.
44002019	Wen nu ke ege mwɛɛm mvu diuw wvù yumɛɛn e we, ebvuu ege mwɛɛm mvù duŋci mvuŋgay mvuwene yî nshɛ le. Ɛlɛmɛ bô ŋguy noo njiim yì bɛmte nu ke enu.
44002020	Diuu nu ke ejiim, ɛ́ kpwee enɛ eyɛɛle diɛwɛ ɛlɛmɛ le, ɛ́ diuu di baay di Tata le di keŋghaw e sɛ keeke eto.
44002021	Nonɛn, ɛ́ naa yɛɛ wvù nu ke elɛke Tata, ke eboy.’”
44002022	Ɛ Bita bvuu gay lɛ, “Bonyii bo Islael, ben eyekɛ eyuw ntay fiɛɛ fì me njemyi. Jisos wvu Nasalɛt to nu wee ɛ Nyo' to loocɛ duŋcɛ ɛ̂ ben lɛ ɛ̀ tum wen wvú no wvú to geɛ ɛ́ Jisos egee mwɛɛm mvù duŋci mvuŋgay mvu Nyo' le bô mvu diuw wvù yumɛɛn e noo biŋghaw bi mwɛɛm e ɛ̂ ben ɛntelɛŋ. Ben kee naa mwɛɛm mvun ntay.
44002023	Jisos wvun nu wee wvù bó to nyaɛ ɛ̂ ben, ɛ ɛ̀ to seyse kɛ Nyo' ɛ fí ke no kooyi ɛ wvú to kee wase. Ɛ ben mum yu wvú no ben to nyaɛ wvú can bonyii bò befe le, ɛ bó ta yî kentam e.
44002024	Geenɛn, ɛ Nyo' kase bvuse wvú yî kpwe le, ɛ wvú boy can kpwe le njefo kɛ ɛ̀ to nulo ɛ́ kpwe emɛy ejici wvú le kɛ.
44002025	Dawe to nu ɛ jeme ɛkumɛ Jisos wvun gayte lɛ, ‘Me n'yɛne Tata Nyo' le ɛ wvú nu bee wvú sekecii ɛ̂ ɛbo kem ke ɛcɛɛy e, ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nulo ɛ́ fiɛɛ eshiw me kɛ.
44002026	Nonɛn, fitele fiem ɛ mum ɛ no yuuke njoŋ, ɛ me njemyi bô nlaŋlaŋ. Me nu wee ɛ me nu ŋke eŋkpwe kɛ lo, geenɛn ɛ me ntaale kɛ fwe,
44002027	njefo kɛ wo wvù Nyo' nu ke ecinɛ keyoy kem e woŋ boŋkfu le kɛ. Ɛ kɛ wo nu ke ecinɛ Waa wo lemme wvù Yuule le ɛ́ wvú efo ɛ̂ jem kɛ.
44002028	Wo nu ɛ duŋcɛ wase me je yì ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me enfey jó nsɛ mboy. Me nu ŋke enlaŋlaŋe no me nu ŋke enu ɛ̂ wo fwe.’”
44002029	Ɛ Bita bvuu gay lɛ, “Boom bo bwɛɛm e, ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me enjeme ɛ̂ ben sɛ kemaŋɛn lɛ icee cee wesebeene wvù Nfon Dawe to nu ɛ kpwe, ɛ bó dwey wvú, ɛ jem ye nu fɛn ɛ to ɛ buy ɛbɛn e.
44002030	Wvú to nu wee ntum Nyo' bvuu kiɛɛ ŋkawma wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ wvú dvú lew lɛ wen nu ke egɛɛ wan wvu ɛ̂ kfuu diew e yî kawla we le.
44002031	Ɛ wvú mum yaŋsɛn yɛn fiɛɛ fì Nyo' to nu keeke ege le, mum jeme lɛ Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ nu ke ebuy yî kpwe le. Ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì wvú to gayɛɛ lɛ, ‘Wvú to baa emɛy woŋ boŋkfu le kɛ, ɛ ye ye to baa efo ɛ̂ jem kɛ.’
44002032	Jisos wvun nu ɛ Nyo' to bvuse wvú yî kpwe le, ɛ bese bocii bò nu bonyii bew bo ŋgoo le to nu ɛ yɛn wvú le.
44002033	Nyo' nu ɛ bense wase wvú ɛ shike ɛ̂ ɛbo kew ke ɛcɛɛy e, ɛ nya Keyoy ke Yuule ɛ̂ wvú no wvú to kawɛɛ. Fiɛɛ fì ben yɛne bvuu yuuke keseen nu Keyoy kedvu ɛ Jisos ɛ nya ɛ̂ bese.
44002034	Kɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu Dawe wvù to benɛɛ we kɛ. Dawe kebɛɛ to nu ɛ gay fiew lɛ, ‘Tata Nyo' to nu ɛ gay ɛ̂ Tata wɛm lɛ, shiilɛ ɛ̂ ɛbo kem ke ɛcɛɛy e,
44002035	egɛn ebuy seke me nu ŋke enshike bonyii buw bo bvuban e ɛ̂ wo ɛjise, ɛ́ wo etome bikaa biuw yî bó le diɛwɛ kedvuushɛɛ ke bikaa biuw e.’
44002036	Nonɛn, bonyii bocii bo Islael emum ekeè lo ntay lɛ Jisos wvun wvù ben to taɛ yî kentam e nu wvú wvù Nyo' nu ɛ gɛɛ wase lɛ ɛ̀ nu Tata bvuu nu Mboyse wvù wvú to kawɛɛ.”
44002037	No bonyii bodvu yuwɛɛ nonɛn, ɛ njeme wvudvu koo bó. Ɛ bó mum bife ɛ̂ Bita bô kebɛse ke boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e lɛ, “Boom bo bwee wese le, bese nu ege nɛɛ keseen?”
44002038	Ɛ Bita tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Wee mwaaŋ mwaaŋ ekumɛn fitele fiew, ɛ́ bó elese wvú ɛ̂ joo ɛ̂ diee di Jisos Klistu le wvu lɛ Nyo' elɛɛshɛ bibefɛ biew ebvuu enya wvú bô nnya ye yì ɛ̀ nu Keyoy ke Yuule.
44002039	Ŋkawma wvudvu wvun nu fô ben e, noo fô boom bonɛn e, bvuu nu fô bonyii bocii bò nu fonfwan e. Wvú nu fô bonyii bocii bò Tata wvù Nyo' wesebeene teŋe ɛ bó too fô wvú le.”
44002040	Ɛ Bita bvuu jeme mwɛɛm nteen, tefe bó, lɛkɛ lɛ bó efi bikuu bibole yî ŋgɛw wvù nu keeke eto yî ɛŋgokɛ kè befe kin e.
44002041	Ɛ bonyii yuw njeme Bita wvun, ɛ nteen bee, ɛ bó mum lese bó ɛ̂ joo. Ɛbvubwɛ ɛ bonyii bise ŋgoo bonyii bo Jisos e diɛwɛ bontfuke botɛte (3,000) le.
44002042	Ɛ bó mum nya bikuu bibole no yuuke mwɛɛm ɛ ɛ̀ nu mvù boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e to yɛɛyi. Ɛ bô bó no nu yî kentaashɛ le, guutene blɛɛd, bvuu bunlee yî kentaashɛ le.
44002043	Ɛ boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e no gee mwɛɛm mvu diuw wvù yumɛɛn e bô mwɛɛm nteen mvù duŋci mvuŋgay mvu Nyo' le, ɛ bonyii yɛne, ɛ fí ghaake lo bó.
44002044	Ɛ ŋgoo bonyii bo mbee le bocii no nu yî wee le mwaaŋ, kɛŋke fiɛɛ fibole fimwaaŋ.
44002045	Ɛ́ bó ké nɛ gese mondvuum mobole bô mwɛɛm mvubole, gaw bigew bidvu ɛbonɛbon no ŋgɛw wee nu.
44002046	Ɛ bó no shee taashi yew ncese le ɛdiuw ɛcii, diekene yî kentaashɛ le ɛla le bô nlaŋlaŋ fô mvuntelem mvubole, yaa yɛɛle ɛjisɛ kɛ,
44002047	bensee Nyo'. Ɛ bonyii no yɛne nonɛn, bɛnsee bó. Ɛ Tata no boysee bonyii ɛdiuw ɛcii, biise ŋgoo yibole.
44003001	Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu diuu dimew, ɛ Bita bô Jon nɛ no bene fô yew ncese le kɛ diɛwɛ didiuu ditɛte le fomvunsheeŋ, ɛ ɛ̀ to nu kefew ke bunle le.
44003002	Kɛ kefew kedvu le, ɛ bonyii ɛ tuu wee mvu ɛ no too dvú, to shike diuw ketaaŋ wvù bó to teŋe lɛ wvù Jee le wvù to leyte fô yew ncese le. Wee wvudvu nu ɛ bó to boke wvú ɛ ɛ̀ nu ŋkɛwlɛ, ɛ́ bonyii ké no tuule wvú ɛdiuw ɛcii too shiwse fó ɛ wvú lɛke bigew ɛ̂ bonyii bò fele leyte yew ncese le.
44003003	Ɛ wvú yɛn Bita bô Jon e ɛ bó fele keeley fó, mum no lɛke bigew ɛ̂ bó.
44003004	Ɛ bó luŋ ɛjisɛ yî ye le. Ɛ Bita gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Taa bese!”
44003005	Ɛ wvú mum taa bó, kpwaake lɛ bó nu enya fiɛɛ ɛ̂ wen.
44003006	Ɛ Bita gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Kɛ me ŋkɛŋke naa lo bigew kɛ, geenɛn fiɛɛ fì me ŋkɛŋke nu ɛ me nu enya ɛ̂ wo. Me ŋgayte ɛ̂ wo ɛ̂ diee di Jisos Klistu wvu Nasalɛt e, ja we elɛnè!”
44003007	No wvú gay nonɛn, mum jicɛ wvú le yî kebo ke ɛcɛɛy e, cake we. Kaŋ mwaaŋ, ɛ bikaa bô mvuŋkoko mvu wee wvudvu le mum tɛme.
44003008	Ɛ wvú sele we leem, mum kɛw no lɛne. Ɛ bô bó gɛn ley fô yew ncese le, ɛ wvú no ghane fó maymayi, bensee Nyo'.
44003009	Ɛ bonyii bocii bò to yɛnɛɛ no wvú ghane bensee Nyo',
44003010	kiɛɛ lɛ ɛ̀ nu wee wvù se shee lɛke ɛlɛkɛɛ diuw ketaaŋ wɛ wvù bó teŋe lɛ wvù Jee le wvù leyte fô yew ncese le. Ɛ ɛjisɛ jiim bó, ɛ bó no kɛŋke ŋghaw yî fiɛɛ fì kooy bô wvú le.
44003011	Ɛ wee wvudvu ŋɛɛm lo yî Bita bô Jon e. Ɛ bonyii yɛn ɛ diuw yum bó, ɛ bó no lewte gɛne bɛwse bó le fô bvudvuu bvù bó to teŋe lɛ cile Saamun e.
44003012	Ɛ Bita yɛn no bonyii tase ɛ to, mum jeme ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Bonyii bo Islael, ɛ̀ nu nje la wvù diuw yumte ben ɛkumɛ fiɛɛ fin ɛ ben taale bese nɛn? Ben kpwaake finɛn lɛ ɛ̀ ge mvuŋgay mvusɛse wee wvun ɛ sɛ no lɛne le? Nuu ben kpwaake tɛn lɛ ɛ̀ ge nce wese wvù yuule lɛ? Kɛ ɛ̀ nu nonɛn kɛ.
44003013	Fí nu lɛ Nyo' Abla'am bô Aysik noo Yakow, wvù nu Nyo' bo'icee cee bosɛɛbeene bocii to nu ɛ bense wase Jisos wvù wee we lemme gɛɛ mbew ye le. Jisos wvun nu wvù ben to tunɛɛ jo nya ɛ̂ bonyii bo nsaw e, ɛ Baylɛt no gomte keecinɛ wvú le, ɛ ben faŋ.
44003014	Jisos to nu wee wvù yuule, nu teytey, ɛ ben tun wvú, gay lɛ bó ebvuse ɛ ɛ̀ nu wee wvù to yuwyɛɛ bonyii, enya ɛ̂ ben.
44003015	Ɛ ben ge nonɛn mum yu wee wvù nyaa nshii ɛ̂ bonyii, geenɛn, ɛ Nyo' kase bvuse wvú yî kpwe le, ɛ bese yɛn wvú le ɛ mum ɛ no seŋe.
44003016	Ɛ̀ ge mvuŋgay mvu diee di Jisos wvudvu le ŋkɛwlɛ wvun wvù ben yɛne, kee, ɛ sɛ no lɛne. Fí kooyi nonɛn njefo bese nu ɛ lese fitele yî Jisos e, fitele fì bese lese yî ye le ɛ mum ɛ ge wee wvun ɛ no tɛmyi ntay nɛn no ben yɛne.
44003017	Keseen boom bo bwɛɛm e, me ŋkee lɛ fiɛɛ fì ben ɛ bikuu bi woŋ e to geɛ bô Jisos nu ɛ ben ɛ bó to ge yaa kee kɛ.
44003018	Fí to kooyi ɛ̂ yiyin je le keege ɛ́ fí eto ekocɛn no Nyo' to geɛ wase ɛ bonyii bew bo ntum e jeme ɛ ɛ̀ bɛɛ lo lɛ Mboyse we wvù wvú to kawɛɛ nu ke eyɛn ŋgɛw.
44003019	Nonɛn, ben ekumɛn mvuntelem mvunɛn ekase etu jim fô wvú le, wvu lɛ wvú elɛɛshɛ bibefɛ binɛn,
44003020	emum ege ɛ́ shém elɛɛtɛn ben, eciinse Jisos wvù Mboyse wvù wvú to balɛɛ fô ben e.
44003021	Jisos wvun kɛŋke keeke emɛy fowe egɛn ebuy kefew kè Nyo' ke eseyse mwɛɛm mvunciim ɛ́ mvú ekase etu mvunfɛm, no wvú to jemyɛɛ diuw bonyii bew bo ntum e bò yuule le ɛ ɛ̀ bɛɛ lo bvuyvuum e.
44003022	Muses to nu ɛ yuu gay lɛ, ‘Tata Nyo' nu ke ebvuse wee we ntum mvu ɛ̂ boom bo bwee wene le ɛnte, eciinse fô ben e kɛ no wvú to bvusɛɛ me, ɛ ben kɛŋke keeke eyuukè fiɛɛ fì wvú jemyi ɛ̂ ben e.
44003023	Wee wvù nu ke enu sɛ wvú yuuke wee ntum wvudvu le, nu ɛ bó nu ke ebvuse wvú ŋgoo bonyii bo Nyo' le, elɛse lo.’
44003024	Ɛ̀ nu kɛ tɛn no bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le bocii ɛ kɛw yî Samwɛl e noo bò to toɛ ɛjim jo wvú to jemyɛɛ wase ɛkumɛ mwɛɛm mvù kooyi ɛdiuw ɛyan e.
44003025	Mwɛɛm mvunciim mvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ dew bonyii bew bo ntum e ban nu mvunɛn, ɛ kelew kè Nyo' to dieɛ bô bo'icee cee bonɛn nu tɛn fô ben e. Ɛ̀ nu no Nyo' to jemyɛɛ ɛ̂ Abla'am lɛ, ‘Me nu ŋke embuw bonyii bocii yî ɛkolɛ ke nshɛ le nfele yî kfuu diuw e.’
44003026	Ɛ Nyo' mum caw wee we lemme yaw tum ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô ben e lɛ wvú eto elaŋ kembonɛn yî yene le, ege ɛ́ ben ecinɛ jé yene yì befe le.”
44004001	Kɛ no Bita bô Jon to bɛɛ jemyi ɛ̂ bonyii nonɛn, ɛ bocee ncese bomew bô ɛkolɛ ke bonyii bo nci le bò to cɛyte yew ncese noo Bosadusii bomew sele fó.
44004002	Bó to ton'yi shém njefo Bita bô Jon to yɛɛyi bonyii, fewci lɛ no Jisos to buyɛɛ yî kpwe le nu ɛ boŋkfu nu ke ebuy tɛn yî kpwe le.
44004003	Ɛ bó mum koo bó gɛn fen no ɛ̀ to nu wase fokiɛguu, lɛ bvú ke edioo ɛ yuu, ɛ́ bó sɛ no yuuke.
44004004	Geenɛn, bonyii nteen bò to yuwɛɛ n'yɛɛyi Bita bô Jon, to nu ɛ bee, ɛ ŋgoo yibo bise, ɛ bolemsɛ no nu wase diɛwɛ bontfuke botin e (5,000).
44004005	Ɛ bvú ke buy yuu, ɛ bocee woŋ bô bonyii bò saake woŋ noo bonyii bò to duŋci bonci bo Nyo' le, tase bvudvuu bvumwaaŋ Jɛlusalɛm.
44004006	Ɛ Annas wvù ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le bô Kayfas noo Jon bô Alɛksanda noo bonyii bomew bò to nu tɛn kfuu di ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le nu fó.
44004007	Ɛ bó mum leke Bita bô Jon ɛ̂ bó ɛjise, bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben se jo fɛɛ mvuŋgay ɛ sɛ fɛ wee wvun? Ben se fɛ ɛ̂ diee di yɛɛ le?”
44004008	Ɛ Keyoy ke Yuule yiŋsɛn yî Bita le, ge ɛ wvú tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Bocee woŋ bô bonyii bò saake woŋ,
44004009	bese leeme fɛn ɛbɛn keetaŋe diuw ɛkumɛ lemme dì jee dì bese se geɛ fô ŋkɛwlɛ le, wvú ɛ sɛ no lɛne. No ben gomte keekiɛɛ no fí se ghanɛɛ,
44004010	ben noo bonyii bocii bo Islael ekeè lɛ wee wvun leeme ɛ̂ ben ɛjise keseen tɛmyi nɛn, ɛ ɛ̀ nu nje mvuŋgay mvu diee di Jisos Klistu wvu Nasalɛt e. Jisos wvudvu wvun nu wvù ben to joɛ ta yî kentam e ɛ wvú kpwe, geenɛn ɛ Nyo' kase bvuse wvú yî kpwe le.
44004011	Wvú nu tɛ dì Ŋwa' Nyo' jemyi ɛkumɛ dí lɛ, ‘Tɛ dì ben bonyii bo kembom e to tunɛɛ nu ɛ dí nɛ wase ɛ tu tɛ di buu di yew e.’
44004012	Ɛ̀ mɛy kɛ Jisos maaŋ wvù boysee bonyii. Kɛ diee di wee mvu le bvuu nu dvú fokuse fɛn dì Nyo' nu ɛ gɛɛ lɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ dí eboyse beene kɛ.”
44004013	Ɛ bonyii bò to saake ba, yuw no Bita bô Jon jemyi yaa fane kɛ, bvuu yɛn lɛ ɛ̀ nu bonyii bo ncɛw, ɛ bó baa kee ŋwa' ntay kɛ, ɛ diuw yum lo bó. Ɛ bó mum kiɛɛ lɛ fí nu nonɛn, njefo ɛ̀ nu bonyii bò to ghane bô bo Jisos.
44004014	Ɛ bó faŋɛ yaa bvuu kɛŋkɛ fiɛɛ fì bó ekicɛn Bita bô Jon yî dvú le kɛ, njefo bó to yɛne wee wvù bó to fɛlɛɛ le, ɛ wvú leeme bô bó.
44004015	Ɛ bonyii bò to saake bodvu nɛ yaw bvuse bó ɛkfuŋ, mum shɛɛ no cuu bontaŋ ɛbonɛbon gayte lɛ,
44004016	“Beene nu ege nɛɛ bô bonyii ban? Bonyii bocii bo Jɛlusalɛm nu ɛ bó ɛ kiɛɛ wase ɛkumɛ fiɛɛ fì duŋci mvuŋgay mvu Nyo' le ɛndan fin fì bó ge, ɛ kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ beene etun kɛ.
44004017	Geenɛn, keege lɛ fo saaka wvudvu wvun ebvuu esaaŋkenè gɛnè fwe, beene ekan bonyii ban lɛ fo bó ebvuu emom lo ejeme fiɛɛ ɛ̂ wee ɛkumɛ diee di Jisos wvun e kɛ.”
