44004018	Ɛ bó tee Bita bô Jon ɛ bó kase ley. Ɛ bó mum lew lo ɛ̂ bó lɛ fo bó ke ebvuu emom lo ejeme, kɛnɛɛ eyɛɛyi wee ɛkumɛ diee di Jisos e kɛ.
44004019	Ɛ Bita bô Jon tfuse fibole lɛ, “Ben kɛ kpwawcɛ lɛ laa fiɛɛ fì nu lɛŋ fô Nyo' le nu lɛ bese eyuw ɛ ɛ̀ nu ben e, nuu wvú wvù Nyo' le lɛ?
44004020	Kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bese elu keejemyi ɛkumɛ mwɛɛm mvù bese nu ɛ yɛn ɛ bvuu ɛ yuw e kɛ.”
44004021	Ɛ bonyii bò to saake bodvu bvuu loocɛ lew lo tɛme, mum cinɛ bó le ɛ bó no gɛne. Ɛ bó to tan ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì bó elese bó dvú yî ŋgɛw e, njefo bonyii bocii to bensee Nyo' yî fiɛɛ fì to kooyɛɛ le,
44004022	sɛ bvuu ge ɛ wee wvudvu wvù bó to geɛ fiɛɛ fì duŋci mvuŋgay mvu Nyo' le fin keefɛ wvú to nu ɛ wvú ɛ fey wase bilum mbaanyɛ.
44004023	No bó cin'yɛɛ Bita bô Jon e nonɛn, ɛ bó kase tu jim fô bonyii bobole bo ŋgoo le, see ɛ̂ bó fiɛɛ fì bocee ncese bo baay baay bô bonyii bò saake woŋ be jeme.
44004024	Ɛ bó yuw, mum baancɛ ye lɛkɛ ɛ̂ Nyo' yî wee le mwaaŋ lɛ, “Tata wvù Cee Ɛkolɛ, ɛ̀ to bom wo ɛbulɛ bô nshɛ bô jóo noo mwɛɛm mvunciim mvù nu mondvuum man e.
44004025	Wo to nu ɛ ge ɛ icee bo'icee bosɛse wvù Dawe, wvù to nu waa wo lemme jeme yî mvuŋgay mvu Keyoy ke Yuule le lɛ, ‘Ɛ̀ nu nje la wvù bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu ffuuke bô fiɛɛ shém e, ɛ bonyii cuu bontaŋ sɛ bó nu ke elem ŋkuuŋ?
44004026	Bonfon bo fokuse fɛn seysee jem, ɛ bonyii bò saake woŋ taashi keediu Tata bô wee we wvù wvú nu ɛ yefe lɛ ɛ̀ nu Mboyse.’
44004027	Ɛ̀ nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ fiɛɛ fì to kooyɛɛ ɛlaante jan. Nfon 'Ɛlod bô Bontus Baylɛt to nu ɛ taashɛ bô bitum noo bonyii bo Islael die mvunaŋ ɛjim jo Jisos wvù Waa wo lemme wvù yuule wvù wo to yefɛɛ lɛ ɛ̀ nu Mboyse.
44004028	Bó to taashi keege ɛ ɛ̀ nu mwɛɛm mvù wo to nu ɛ seyse wase ncejole bô mvuŋgay mwuw lɛ wo kooŋke lɛ mvú ke ekooy.
44004029	Nonɛn, yî keseen e Tata, taa eyɛn je yì bonyii ban bɛmsee bese jó. Nya bese bonyii buw bo lemme le bô mvuntelem mvù tɛmyi keefewci diɛw yo yaa fane naa lo kɛ.
44004030	Nya bese bô mvuŋgay mwuw keefɛle bonyii bvuu gee mwɛɛm mvù duŋci mvuŋgay mwuw bô mwɛɛm mvu diuw wvù yumɛɛn e dvú ɛ̂ diee di Jisos wvù Waa wo lemme wvù yuule le.”
44004031	No bó mɛse ɛ bunle, ɛ nshɛ shiw fò bó to nu. Ɛ Keyoy ke Yuule yiŋsɛn yî bó le, ɛ bó mum no fewci diɛw Nyo' yaa fane kɛ.
44004032	Ɛ ŋgoo bonyii bo mbee le no nu fitele fimwaaŋ, nu yî wee le mwaaŋ, ɛ wee yaa teŋe fiɛɛ fimew lɛ ɛ̀ nu fiwene wen ɛmbeŋ kɛ. Ɛ fiɛɛ fi wee le nu fi bonyii bocii le.
44004033	Ɛ Nyo' nya mvuŋgay mvu baay ɛ̂ boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e, ɛ bó bvuu no fewci kɛ ɛ̂ bonyii tɛmyi lo lɛ Tata Jisos to nu ɛ buy yî kpwe le. Ɛ bó no nu ɛ Nyo' ɛ buw bó bô nfi we baay.
44004034	Kɛ wee yaa to nu dvú wvù fuute ɛ̂ bó ɛntelɛŋ kɛ, njefo bonyii bò to kɛŋke ŋɛɛ kɛnɛɛ yéw to ké gese, to bô bigew bidvu,
44004035	nya can boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e, ɛ bó mum gaw ɛ̂ bonyii bocii no ŋgɛw wee to nu.
44004036	Wee mvu to nu ɛ bó teŋe lɛ Yosɛw, ɛ boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e ɛ cu diee diew dimew lɛ Banaban, (dì nu lɛ, Wee N'yvuwsɛ Mvuntelem). Wvú to nu wee wvu ɛ̂ kfuu di Lɛwe le, ɛ bó to boke wvú Sayblus.
44004037	Ɛ wvú mum gɛn tɛn gese we wɛɛ, to nya bigew bidvu can boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e.
44005001	Ɛ wee mvu wvù bó to teŋe lɛ Ananias bô kpwɛse wvù Safilia gese tɛn kecɛw ke wɛɛ le.
44005002	Ɛ bô kpwɛse seyse kaa fafe lo bigew bidvu, ɛ wvú mum jo kebɛse gɛn nya can boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e.
44005003	No wvú nya nonɛn, ɛ Bita bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ananias, ɛ̀ ge la fì wo cine Satan ɛ ley ɛ̂ fitele fiuw e ɛ ge lɛ wo embiay mbiay ɛ̂ Keyoy ke Yuule, wo ɛ mum ɛ fafe bigew bì wo gese wɛɛ dvú?
44005004	Wo dioo gese wɛɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu wo, ɛ bigew nu kɛ biuw, wo ɛ ghan nɛɛ ɛ sɛ ge kfuu fin fiɛɛ? Wo baa mbiay ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ bonyii kɛ, wo mbiay ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ Nyo'.”
44005005	Kaŋ mwaaŋ no Ananias yuw njeme wvun nonɛn, mum gbwe kpwe. Ɛ bonyii bocii bò yuwɛɛ saaka wvudvu fan baay.
44005006	Ɛ cubonyii ley baancɛ wvú ɛ̂ ndvu le, jo buy dvú gɛn dwey.
44005007	Ɛjim jo bontam bo kefew e diɛwɛ botɛte, ɛ kpwɛse ley, yaa kee fiɛɛ fì be kooy bô dweese kɛ.
44005008	Ɛ Bita bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Kɛ see ɛ̂ me, bin nu bigew bicii bì ben ɛ dwee wo gese wɛɛ dvú?” Ɛ wvú tfuse lɛ, “'Ɛɛ, ɛ̀ nu bí nɛn bicii.”
44005009	Ɛ Bita bvuu bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ben ɛ dwee wo ghan nɛɛ ɛ sɛ seyse keemom Keyoy ke Tata le? Yekɛ eyuw, ncin bonyii bò be gɛn ɛ dwey dwee wo nu wase ɛ̂ yew fwese, ɛ bó nu eley etuu tɛn wo ebuy dvú egɛn edwey.”
44005010	No Bita jeme nonɛn, kaŋ mwaaŋ ɛ Safilia mum gbwe ɛ̂ wvú ɛjise kpwe. Ɛ cubonyii ba dioo ley yɛn ɛ wvú ɛ kpwe wase, ɛ bó mum tuu wvú buy dvú gɛn dwey mbew dweese le.
44005011	Ɛ kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le kecii noo bonyii bomew bò to yuwɛɛ saaka wvudvu fan baay.
44005012	Ɛ boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e no gee mwɛɛm mvù duŋci mvuŋgay mvu Nyo' le bô mwɛɛm mvu diuw wvù yumɛɛn e nteen ɛ̂ bonyii ɛnte. Ɛ́ bonyii bo mbee le bocii ké no taashi fô kebuw ke Saamun e yew ncese le.
44005013	Kɛ wee wvu ncɛw to ké mum taashɛ lo bô bó kɛ. Geenɛn ɛ bonyii to ké no bɛnsee naa bó ntay.
44005014	Ɛ bolemsɛ bô bokɛnɛ nteen bò to leese fitele yî Tata le no biise ŋgoo bó le.
44005015	Ɛ mwɛɛm mvù boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e to gee, ge ɛ bonyii no tuule bonyii bo bincɛm e jiwse mbew jé le yî bintaw e noo yî dighaam e wvu lɛ Bita ké dioo fele, ɛ ɛ̀ cim nu kenjiŋjiŋ kew ɛ́ kí egbwe yî wee le.
44005016	Ɛ bibombom bi bonyii le no nɛn'yi bilaante bi mbew Jɛlusalɛm e too bô bonyii bo bincɛm e noo bò kɛŋke biyoy bì yiile yî bó le, ɛ bó fɛle bó bocii.
44005017	Ɛ ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le bô ŋgoo ye yì ɛ̀ to nu Bosadusii ke ja kɛw no ghɛɛke boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e,
44005018	mum tum bonyii ɛ bó gɛn koo bó fen yew ncaw e.
44005019	Geenɛn, ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu ɛntaŋ ɛ nceendaa Tata to yene dew fwese yew ncaw bvuse bó. No wvú bvuse bó, mum gay lɛ,
44005020	“Ben egɛn yew ncese le, egɛn efewcì fiɛɛ ficii ɛ̂ bonyii ɛkumɛ nce wvu fwɛ wvun.”
44005021	No bó yuw nonɛn, mum gɛn. Ɛ ɛkfuŋ ke dioo eyuule, ɛ bó ley fô yew ncese le, mum kɛw no yɛɛyi bonyii. Kɛ kefew kedvu le, ɛ ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le bô bonyii bew bo ŋgoo le, kum bonyii bo Islael bò saake woŋ bocii ɛ bô bó shii, mum tum bonyii bo nci le lɛ bó egɛn yew ncaw e, eto bô boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e.
44005022	Ɛ bó gɛn buy fó gom bó ŋkuuŋ mum tu jim to see lɛ,
44005023	“Bese gɛn ɛ buy yew ncaw e, ɛ yɛn ɛ dew fwese nu ɛ bó ɛ loocɛ ɛ fen, ɛ bonyii bo nci le leeme fó cɛyte. Bese ɛ dioo yene yew ley ɛ faŋɛ yaa eyɛn wee le dvú kɛ.”
44005024	Ɛ ɛkolɛ ke bonyii bo nci le bò to cɛyte yew ncese bô bocee ncese bo baay baay, yuw nonɛn, ɛ fí ffumse bó, ɛ bó no ghayte laa bó nu ke etu fɛɛ bô fin fiɛɛ lɛ.
44005025	Ɛ wee nɛ ley gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben eyuw, bonyii ba bò ben se fenɛɛ yew ncaw e, boba wase fô yew ncese le yɛɛyi bonyii.”
44005026	No bó yuw nonɛn, ɛ ɛkolɛ ke bonyii bo nci le bô ŋgoo ye mum buy gɛn jo bó, no too bô bó. Geenɛn, bó to baa joo bó kane lo bó kɛ, njefo bó, bonyii bo nci le bodvu to fane fo bonyii etumyɛ bó bô ɛta.
44005027	Ɛ bó to bô boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e, ley bô bó leke fwe dvu bonyii bò saake woŋ. Ɛ ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le no biwci mwɛɛm ɛ̂ bó gayte lɛ,
44005028	“Bese nu ɛ loocɛ wase ɛ lew lo lɛ fo ben ebvuu emom eyɛɛyi wee ɛkumɛ diee di wee wvun e kɛ. Geenɛn, ben eyɛn fiɛɛ fì ben mom! Ben nu ɛ ge wase n'yɛɛyi wene ɛ saaŋkɛn Jɛlusalɛm jocii. Ɛ ben gomte keege ɛ́ fí eduŋci lɛ bese kee fiɛɛ fô kpwe ye le.”
44005029	Ɛ Bita bô ŋgoo boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e tfuse lɛ, “Bese kɛŋke keeyuw ɛ ɛ̀ nu Nyo' le, ɛfey keeyuw wee le.
44005030	Ben to nu ɛ ta Jisos yî kentam e ɛ wvú kpwe. Ɛ Nyo' bo'icee cee bosɛɛbeene bvuse wvú yî kpwe le,
44005031	bense wvú, shike ɛ̂ ɛbo kew ke ɛcɛɛy e lɛ wvú enù Cee Ɛkolɛ noo Mboyse, wvu lɛ bonyii bo Islael ekumɛn mvuntelem mvubole, ɛ́ wvú wvù Nyo' elɛɛshɛ bibefɛ bibole.
44005032	Bee bo Keyoy ke Yuule kè Nyo' nyaa ɛ̂ bonyii bò yuuke wvú le ɛ mum ɛ no fewci mwɛɛm mvun.”
44005033	No bonyii bò to saake woŋ yuw njeme wvun nonɛn, ɛ mvuntelem bɛnte lo bó. Ɛ bó mum no gomte keeyuwyɛ boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e.
44005034	Geenɛn, ɛ wee mvu ŋgoo bonyii bò to saake woŋ e wvù diee to nu Gamalia, ɛ ɛ̀ nu wee Falasii bvuu nu wee wvù duŋci bonci bo Nyo' le, ɛ bonyii bocii wvumte wvú ntay, nɛ we. No wvú nɛ we, gay ɛ bó yaw bvuse boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e ɛkfuŋ.
44005035	Ɛ wvú shɛɛ jeme ɛ̂ bonyii bò to saake woŋ lɛ, “Bonyii bo Islael, ben ejo wɛɛ bô fiɛɛ fì ben gomte keege bô bonyii ban.
44005036	Ben ekume lɛ ɛ̀ to nu kefew kemew e, ɛ wee mvu ja fɛn ɛ bó teŋe lɛ Teodas no duŋci lɛ wen nu wee wvu baay. Ɛ bonyii shfum ɛ̂ wvú ɛjim kɛ diɛwɛ gee nɛ le. Ɛ bó ke yu wvú ɛ ŋgoo ye tawse, ɛ fiɛɛ fì wvú to too dvú laayɛ ɛcici.
44005037	Ɛ wvumvu wee ke bvuu ja kefew kè bó to taaŋke bonyii le ɛ bó teŋe lɛ Judas, ɛ ɛ̀ nu wee wvu Galilee. Ɛ wvú gufe bonyii nteen ɛ̂ wvú ɛjim. Ɛ bó ke yu tɛn wvú, ɛ ŋgoo ye saaŋkɛn.
44005038	Yî fin e, me ɛ no nteete ben lɛ fo ben ege fiɛɛ bô bonyii ban kɛ. Ben ecinɛ je yibole. Ɛ́ ɛ̀ fɛn nu lɛ fiɛɛ fì bó too dvú bvuu yɛɛyi bonyii dvú fin kɛw wee wvu wum, tu fí nu ke elaayɛ ɛcici.
44005039	Ɛ̀ no nu lɛ fiɛɛ fidvu kɛw Nyo', tu kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ ben ke eso bó kɛ. Ɛ́ ben baa eyɛne, ɛ́ fí ke enɛ ebuy lɛ ben diuu ɛ ɛ̀ nu ben ɛ bo Nyo'.”
44005040	No Gamalia jeme nonɛn, ɛ bonyii bò to saake woŋ yuw ntefe we, kase tee boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e ɛ bó ley. No bó ley nonɛn, ɛ bó tam bó, ciise lo lɛ fo bó ke ebvuu emom lo eyɛɛyi wee ɛkumɛ diee di Jisos e kɛ, mum cinɛ bó le ɛ bó no gɛne.
44005041	No bó buyɛɛ dvú no gɛne fibole yuuke ɛ ɛ̀ nu njoŋ lɛ bowen nu ɛ bó ɛ kocɛn bonyii bò bó eshoose bó nje diee di Jisos e.
44005042	Ɛ bó gɛn nonɛn, bvuu no yɛɛyi kɛ bonyii ɛdiuw ɛcii fô yew ncese le noo ɛla le, fewci saaka wvù jee wvù lɛ Jisos nu Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ.
44006001	Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu kefew kemew e, no ŋgoo bonyii bo mbee le to kuu gɛne fwe, ɛ Bojuu bò to jemyi kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu díɛw Glek nɛ kɛw no wvukene Bojuu bò to jemyi díɛw woŋ lɛ bó gawte mwɛɛm ɛ̂ bokɛ' bo boŋkfu le ɛdiuw ɛcii nyaa mvu bo bowen e caan.
44006002	Nonɛn, ɛ boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e bo yuufe ncow bofɛɛ mum kum ŋgoo bonyii bo mbee le bocii gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Kɛ fí jee lɛ bese ecinɛ keefewci diɛw Nyo' egɛn shii ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî kecɛyte le kɛ.
44006003	Boom bo bwee wese le, fí jee lɛ ben ebaayɛ bonyii bosooshwiy ɛ̂ ben ɛnte, ɛ́ bese enya lemme din can yibole. Ben dioo baayi taa ɛ ɛ̀ nu bonyii bò kɛŋke nce wvù jee, ɛ bó ɛ yiŋsɛn bô Keyoy ke Yuule bvuu kɛŋke bvufee.
44006004	Nonɛn, ɛ́ bese emum enya wase bikuu bisɛse ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî bunle bô yî lemme di diɛw Nyo' le.”
44006005	Ɛ bonyii bocii yuw ntaŋ wvudvu, ɛ wvú joŋ bó le. Ɛ bó mum baa Tɛfan ɛ ɛ̀ nu wee ɛ mbee we ɛ loocɛ ɛ yiŋsɛn, ɛ wvú ɛ yiŋsɛn tɛn bô Keyoy ke Yuule. Ɛ bomew no nu Filew bô Blukolus, Nikano bô Timon, Balmɛnas bô Nikolaus wvù to nu wee wvu Antiok ɛ wvú to baŋke lo tu wee mbee Bojuu.
44006006	Ɛ bó mum jo bonyii ban leke fwe dvu boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e, ɛ bó bunle fô bó le, mum gɛɛ can yî bó le.
44006007	Ɛ diɛw Nyo' mum no saaŋkene gɛne. Ɛ ŋgoo bonyii bo mbee le yi Jɛlusalɛm no kuu gɛne fwe. Ɛ bocee ncese nteen lese tɛn fitele yî Jisos e.
44006008	Ɛ Nyo' buw Tɛfan ntay, ɛ wvú no kɛŋke mvuŋgay, gee mwɛɛm mvu diuw wvù yumɛɛn e bô mwɛɛm mvù duŋci mvuŋgay mvu Nyo' le ɛ̂ bonyii ɛnte.
44006009	Ɛ bonyii bomew ke nɛ kɛw mbew bô bo Tɛfan. Bonyii bodvu to nu Bojuu bò to nɛn'yɛɛ Sɛlin bô Alɛksandia noo Silishia bô Ɛsia. Ɛ ɛ̀ to nu bonyii bo yew bunle yì bó to teŋe lɛ yi Bonfaw bò Boy wase le.
44006010	No bó to bewci nonɛn, ɛ Keyoy ke Yuule nya Tɛfan bô bvufee ɛ wee faŋɛ yaa nu dvú wvù eso wvú kɛ.
44006011	Ɛ bó mum nɛ bɛyse bonyii bomew ɛjim ɛjim lɛ bó embiaytè lɛ bó nu ɛ yuw ɛ Tɛfan jemyi díɛw yì befe ɛkumɛ Muses bô Nyo'.
44006012	No bó ge nonɛn, mum shiw mvuntelem mvu bonyii le, bô mvu bonyii bò saake woŋ e, noo mvu bonyii bò duŋci bonci bo Nyo' le. Ɛ bó mum ley yî Tɛfan e, jo wvú gɛn bô wvú fwe dvu bonyii bo woŋ e bò saake bonsaw.
44006013	Ɛ bonyii ba bvuu to bô bonyii bomew bò eben jim nsaw mbiay, ɛ bó no teyte mwɛɛm yî Tɛfan e gayte lɛ, “Kɛ wee wvun ké no nu sɛ wvú jemyi díɛw yì befe ɛkumɛ yew ncese yin bô bonci bo Muses e kɛ.
44006014	Bese nu ɛ yuw wase ɛ wvú jemyi lɛ Jisos wvu Nasalɛt wɛ nu ke ebvuw yew ncese yin, ebvuu ekumɛn nce wesebeene woŋ wvù Muses to yɛɛyɛɛ beene dvú.”
44006015	Ɛ bonyii bocii bò to nu yew nsaw e luŋ ɛjisɛ yî Tɛfan e, nɛ yɛn ɛ bvushiw bwew ɛ baŋke wase ye ɛ no fieesene bvu nceendaa Nyo' le.
44007001	Ɛ ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le bife ɛ̂ Tɛfan lɛ, “Mwɛɛm mvù bó jemyi mvun nu kecɛɛy e?”
44007002	Ɛ Tɛfan tfuse lɛ, “Bo'icɛm bô boom bo bwɛɛm e, ben eyekɛ eyuw. Nyo' bvukukɛ to nu ɛ buynɛn fô icee wesebeene wvù Abla'am e ɛ wvú bɛɛ cee Misobotɛmia, ɛ wvú sɛ ke nɛ gɛn no cee 'Alan,
44007003	gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, ‘Cinɛ kfuu diuw e, ebuy woŋ wene le, egɛn woŋ wvù me nu ŋke enduŋcɛ ɛ̂ wo le.’
44007004	Nonɛn, ɛ wvú mum nɛ Kaldia jodvu, gɛn no cee 'Alan. Ɛ ice ke dioo kpwe, ɛ Nyo' ge ɛ wvú nɛ to jan jò beene cee keseen.
44007005	Ɛ wvú no nu jan ɛ Nyo' faŋɛ yaa ecim enya wvú kɛ naa bô kpweŋ kɛ, geenɛn, kaw lɛ wen nu ke enya woŋ wvun ɛ́ enu we bô ɛŋgokɛ kew. Ɛ Nyo' to kaake nonɛn ɛ Abla'am baa cim kɛŋke wase wan kɛ.
44007006	Ɛ Nyo' bvuu gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, ‘Ɛŋgokɛ kuw nu ke enu botolo woŋ mvu le, ke elemte bvunfaw jó, ɛ bó nvuwse bó yî bilum e gee nɛ (400).
44007007	Ɛ me nu ŋke enlaŋ ŋgɛw yî woŋ wvudvu le, ɛ́ ɛŋgokɛ kuw ke ebuy jó eto ebunlee me jan.’
44007008	Ɛ Nyo' bvuu die kelew bô Abla'am, ɛ nciise kelew kedvu nu lɛ Abla'am nu ke etfuuse boom bew yew. Ɛ Abla'am ke boo Aysik, ɛ ɛ̀ ke dioo nu ɛdiuw nyaŋ ɛ wvú tfuse wvú yew. Ɛ Aysik ke boo Yakow tfuse tɛn wvú yew. Ɛ Yakow ke tfuse tɛn boom bew bo yuufe ncow bofɛɛ yew bò ɛ̀ nu bo'icee cee bosɛɛbeene fô kfuu disɛɛbeene to sanɛɛ.
44007009	Ɛ bo'icee cee bosɛɛbeene bodvu ke nɛ no bene kendoŋ bô Yosɛw wvù waa bwee bó mum gese wvú, ɛ wvú gɛn no nu nfwa woŋ wvù Ijiw e. Geenɛn, ɛ Nyo' no taale kɛ fô wvú le,
44007010	fii wvú yî boŋgɛw bew e bocii. Ɛ Nyo' bvuu nya wvú bô bvufee, ɛ Fɛlo, Nfon wvu Ijiw no kooŋke wvú, mum gɛɛ wvú ɛ wvú no nu wee we kebay bvuu nu wee wvù taale fô kfuu diew e.
44007011	Ɛ jeŋ ke nɛ koo Ijiw jocii noo Kanaan, ɛ bonyii yɛn ŋgɛw baay. Ɛ bo'icee cee bosɛɛbeene faŋɛ yaa kɛŋke fiɛɛ fidien kɛ.
44007012	Ɛ Yakow ke yuw lɛ mwɛɛm mvudien nu Ijiw, mum tum boom bew bò ɛ̀ nu bo'icee cee bosɛɛbeene ɛ bó gɛn jó yî kaŋ wvu fwe le.
44007013	Ɛ bó ke dioo kase gɛn jó yî bokaŋ bo bofɛɛ le, ɛ Yosɛw mum ge ɛ boom bo bwee le kiɛɛ wvú. Ɛ wvú mum duŋcɛ tɛn bó ɛ̂ Fɛlo.
44007014	Ɛ Yosɛw mum ciinse ntum fô Yakow wvù ice le, lɛ wvú bô kfuu dicii eto Ijiw. Kfuu di Yakow e to nu sekedvu wee mbaŋsooshwiy ncow botin (75).
44007015	Ɛ Yakow yuw nonɛn, mum jo kfuu diew dicii bow dvú Ijiw. Ɛ wvú bô bo'icee cee bosɛɛbeene ke kpwekɛn jó bocii.
44007016	Ɛ bó ke tuu ɛgvun ɛbo kase to dvú jan, to dwey Shɛkɛm ɛ̂ jem yì Abla'am to guyɛɛ ɛ̂ boom bo Amol e.
44007017	Ɛ kefew ke dioo kocine kè Nyo' to nu keeke ege fiɛɛ fì wvú to kawɛɛ Abla'am dvú, ɛ bonyii bosɛɛbeene duule wase Ijiw baay.
44007018	Ɛ bonyii bo jó ke ghaa nfon mvu ɛ wvú yaa kee Yosɛw kɛ.
44007019	Ɛ Nfon wvudvu mum no wɛɛntene, sɛne bonyii bosɛɛbeene, kane lɛ bo'icee cee bosɛɛbeene elaaŋke mvunlɛy mvu boom e ɛkfuŋ ɛ bó kpwekene.
44007020	Ɛ̀ nu kefew kekin e kè bó to bokɛɛ Muses, ɛ ɛ̀ to nu wan ɛ wvú jee baay fô Nyo' le. Ɛ bó kɛŋkɛ wvú yew kee tɛ,
44007021	mum jo gɛn gɛɛ ɛkfuŋ. Ɛ waa Nfon Fɛlo wvù kpwoon ke gɛn boŋyɛ wvú, lɛy diɛwɛ waa we le.
44007022	Ɛ bó mum yɛɛyi Muses bô bvufee bvu bonyii bo Ijiw e bvucii, ɛ wvú no nu wee wvù kee njeme bô keege fiɛɛ ntay.
44007023	Ɛ wvú ke dioo nu kɛ diɛwɛ bilum mbaanyɛ le, ke nɛ kpwawcɛ lɛ wen nu egɛn eyɛn no boom bo bwee wen e bò ɛ̀ nu bonyii bo Islael nu.
44007024	Ɛ wvú dioo gɛne, yɛn ɛ wee wvu Ijiw nvuwse wee wvu Islael mvu. Ɛ wvú ley fó lɛ wen etfuse ɛnvukɛ, mum yu lo wee wvu Ijiw wvudvu.
44007025	Wvú to kpwaake lɛ boom bo bwee wen e nu ekiɛɛ lɛ ɛ̀ tum Nyo' wen lɛ wen eto ebvuse bó yî ŋgɛw e. Geenɛn, ɛ bó faŋɛ yaa kiɛɛ kɛ.
44007026	Ɛ bvú ke buy yuu, ɛ Muses bvuu no gɛne, buynɛn yî bonyii bo Islael e bofɛɛ ɛ bó nɛ ɛ no diuu. Ɛ wvú ley fó keegawsɛn bvudiuw bvudvu, bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, ‘Boom bo bwɛɛm e, ben nu wee bô waa bwee, ɛ̀ ge la ben ɛ sɛ no diuu ɛbenɛben?’
44007027	Ɛ wee wvù to nvuwse waa bwee kaa domse lo Muses, bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, ‘Ɛ̀ gɛke yɛɛ wo lɛ wo esaakè bese, sumtene bonsaw bosɛse?
44007028	Wo fɛn bvuu gomte keeyu me no wo se yuɛ wee wvu Ijiw wɛ foguu le?’
44007029	Ɛ Muses yuw nonɛn, mum fan nɛ woŋ wvù Ijiw e, fɛɛ gɛn no nu woŋ wvù Midian e, ke boo boom bolemsɛ bofɛɛ jó.
44007030	Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu ɛjim jo bilum mbaanyɛ, ɛ nceendaa Nyo' buynɛn fô Muses e ɛ̂ ŋguy e, ɛ wvú bɛɛnci yî kete le ŋkpwaante mbew kum wvù Sinay e.
44007031	Ɛ Muses yɛn ɛ fí ghaw wvú, ɛ wvú bencɛ nceencee keetaa ntay. No wvú benci, yuw ɛ Tata Nyo' jeme ɛ̂ wvú lɛ,
44007032	‘Ɛ̀ nu me wvù Nyo' bo'icee cee wene, Nyo' Abla'am bô wvu Aysik noo wvu Yakow.’ Ɛ Muses yuw nonɛn, no ciiŋke bô nfan, faŋɛ yaa ebvuu emom lo etaa kɛ.
44007033	Ɛ Tata Nyo' bvuu jeme ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, ‘Baayɛ bolaba buw, njefo fɛn fò wo leeme fó nu bvudvuu bvù yuule.
44007034	Me nu ɛ nloocɛ wase ɛ n'yɛn no bó nvuwse bonyii bem Ijiw, ɛ mbvuu ɛ n'yuw no bó cone, ɛ mum ɛ nshii ɛ nto keembvuse bó yî ŋgɛw wvudvu le. Yekɛ eyuw, me nu entum wo Ijiw keseen.’
44007035	Muses wvun nu wvù bó to yawɛɛ wase tun, bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, ‘Ɛ̀ gɛke yɛɛ wo lɛ wo esaakè bese, sumtene bonsaw bosɛse?’ Ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù Nyo' to tumɛɛ lɛ wvú egɛn enu wee sa' wvubo, ebvuse bó yî ŋgɛw e. Ɛ Nyo' to tum ɛ ɛ̀ nu nceendaa we ɛ wvú to yî kete kè to bɛɛnci kiɛ le tefe ntum wvudvu ɛ̂ wvú.
44007036	Ɛ Muses mum gɛn Ijiw, ge mwɛɛm mvu diuw wvù yumɛɛn e bô biŋghaw bi mwɛɛm e, bvuse bó jó. Ɛ wvú ge mvumew fô Joo yi Baay yì Yɛɛle le, bvuu ge mvumew ŋkpwaante jò bó to lɛnɛɛ yî bilum e mbaanyɛ.
44007037	Ɛ ɛ̀ nu Muses wvudvu wvù to gayɛɛ ɛ̂ bonyii bo Islael lɛ, ‘Nyo' nu ke ebvuse wee we ntum mvu ɛ̂ boom bo bwee wene le ɛnte, eciinse fô ben e kɛ no wvú to bvusɛɛ me.’
44007038	Ɛ ɛ̀ bvuu nu kɛ wvú wvù Muses wvù nceendaa Nyo' to jemyɛɛ ɛ̂ wvú yî kum wvù Sinay e, kefew kè kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo Islael e to nu ŋkpwaante bô bo'icee cee bosɛɛbeene, ɛ Nyo' nya díɛw yì nyaa nshii lɛ wvú efese ɛ̂ beene.
44007039	Geenɛn, ɛ bo'icee cee bosɛɛbeene kaa faŋ keeyuw Muses e, baŋke jim ɛ̂ wvú le, mum no kooŋke lɛ bowen bee ekase etu jim Ijiw.
44007040	Ɛ bó mum gay ɛ̂ Ɛlon lɛ, ‘Bomɛ bonyo' ɛ̂ bese bò nu esaa fwe dvusɛɛbeene, njefo bese baa bvuu kiɛɛ fiɛɛ fì kooyi bô Muses wɛ wvù bvusɛɛ beene woŋ wvù Ijiw e kɛ.’
44007041	Ɛ bó mum kene fimooso ɛ fí fieesene waa na', sɛɛyɛ nyám ge ncese dvú ɛ̂ fí, mum no laŋlaŋe yî fiɛɛ le ɛ ɛ̀ kene bó bô can yibo.
44007042	No bó ge nonɛn, ɛ Nyo' mum baŋke jim ɛ̂ bó le, ɛ bó mum no bunlee wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu diuu bô kpwee noo jón. Ɛ ɛ̀ nu no bó to saŋɛɛ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le ɛ Nyo' jemyi lɛ, ‘Bonyii bo Islael, ben to sɛɛle nyám ŋkpwaante yî bilum e mbaanyɛ, ceese ɛ ɛ̀ nu me dvú le?
44007043	Ben to ghane tuule cun ɛ ɛ̀ nu yì nyo' wvù bó teŋe lɛ Molok, bvuu tuule jon ɛ bó ɛ kene lɛ ɛ̀ nu yì nyo' wvù diee nu Lefan, ɛ ɛ̀ nu mvumooso mvù ben to keencɛɛ keebunlee mvú. Nje fifin, me nu ŋke ebvuse ben ɛ́ ben ebuy egɛn efey lo Babilon.’
44007044	Bo'icee cee bosɛɛbeene to lɛne ŋkpwaante kɛŋke cun yì duŋci lɛ Nyo' nu bô bó, ɛ ɛ̀ to fɛ Muses cun yidvu, bii kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no yì Nyo' to duŋcɛɛ ɛ̂ wvú to nu.
44007045	Ɛ boom bo bo'icee cee bosɛɛbeene le ke fi, ke tuu to dvú jan kefew kè bô bo Yoshua to lole nshɛ ɛ̂ bitum bì to nu jan e, ɛ ɛ̀ to gɛne Nyo' fwe kuuŋke bitum bidvu. Ɛ cun yidvu no nu jan to buy kefew kè Nfon Dawe to saake woŋ wvun e.
44007046	Ɛ Nyo' no kooŋke wvú ntay, ɛ wvú mum lɛkɛ lɛ Nyo' ebee ɛ́ wen ebom yew enya ɛ́ wvú wvù Nyo' Yakow eceè dvú.
44007047	Ɛ ɛ̀ ke kaa ghan Saamun bom yew Nyo' yidvu.
44007048	Geenɛn, ɛ Tata Nyo' wvù nu Ɛkolɛ ke Mwɛɛm Mvunciim e yaa ké no cee yéw yì ɛ̀ bom bonyii le kɛ. Ɛ̀ nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no wee ntum Nyo' mvu to saŋɛɛ wase ɛ Nyo' gayte lɛ,
44007049	‘Fowe nu kawla wɛm, ɛ nshɛ yin nu kedvuushɛɛ ke bikaa biem e. Yew yì ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wee ebom lɛ ɛ̀ nu yɛm nulo enu nɛɛ? Nuu lɛ bvudvuu nu dvú bvù ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me enshii fó lɛ?
44007050	Kɛ ɛ̀ fɛ me mwɛɛm mvun mvunciim e?’”
44007051	Ɛ Tɛfan mum nɛ gay lɛ, “Ben tɛmyi bikuu baay, ɛ mvuntelem mvunɛn bô bitem nu naa lo ntffuse. Ben ɛ bo'icee cee bonɛn nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ. Ben tune sekecii keeyuuke Keyoy ke Yuule le.
44007052	Wee ntum Nyo' mvu nu dvú wvù bo'icee cee bonɛn to baa ebone bikaa ɛ̂ wvú ɛjim e? Bó to nu ɛ yuwyɛ bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le bò to jemyɛɛ wase lɛ Wee Lemme Nyo' wvu Teytey nu ke eto. Ɛ wvú ke to, ɛ ben gese wvú bvuu yu wvú.
44007053	Ɛ ɛ̀ bvuu nu kɛ ben bò Nyo' to tumɛɛ bonceendaa bew ɛ bó nya bonci bew ɛ̂ ben, ɛ ben tun keebii bó le.”
44007054	No bonyii bò to saake woŋ yuw fiɛɛ fì Tɛfan jeme, ɛ mvuntelem bɛnte lo bó, ɛ bó no ŋgeci bigew.
44007055	Ɛ Keyoy ke Yuule yiŋsɛn yî Tɛfan e, ɛ wvú no taale fiew ɛ ɛ̀ nu we, nɛ yɛn n'yuu wvù ɛ̀ nu wvu Nyo' le, bvuu yɛn Jisos e ɛ wvú leeme ɛ̂ ɛbo ke ɛcɛɛy ke Nyo' le.
44007056	Ɛ Tɛfan nɛ gay lɛ, “Ben etaa eyɛn, me nu ɛ n'yɛn ɛ fowe ɛ yene, ɛ wee wvù diee nu Waawee leeme ɛ̂ ɛbo ke ɛcɛɛy ke Nyo' le.”
44007057	Ɛ bó yuw fifiɛ, mum jinɛ bintuŋtuŋ bô can, no wamte foweɛwe, mum sɛn bocii ley yî Tɛfan e,
44007058	gufe wvú buy dvú ɛlaante, gɛn no tumte bô ɛta. Ɛ bonyii bò benɛɛ jim nsaw baayɛ bikum bibole, nya ɛ̂ cuwee mvu ɛ bó teŋe lɛ Saul, sɛ no tumte.
44007059	No bó to tumte Tɛfan bô ɛta nonɛn, ɛ wvú bunle lɛ, “Tata Jisos, fiisɛn keyoy kem.”
44007060	Ɛ wvú mum nɛ tum ɛnvuw fokuse, fuŋ foweɛwe lɛ, “Tata, fo wo etaa ɛ̂ fiɛɛ fì befe fin fì bonyii ban gee le kɛ.” No wvú gay nonɛn, mum kpwe.
44008001	No bó yu Tɛfan, ɛ Saul tom. Kɛ ɛbvubwɛ, ɛ bó kɛw no nyaa ŋgɛw wvù tɛmyi ɛ̂ kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le ke Jɛlusalɛm. Ɛ kí saaŋkɛn kecii buy jó, gɛn biba bi Judea bô Samalia le, ɛ ɛ̀ shɛɛ kɛ boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e.
44008002	Ɛ bolemsɛ bomew bò to nu ɛ loocɛ lese fitele yî Nyo' le, to jo gvune di Tɛfan e dwey, bee wvú baay.
44008003	Ɛ Saul nu fiew looci gɛne lo bô kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le, daŋsene yéw e kooyi bonyii bo mbee le bò bolemsɛ noo bò bokɛnɛ ciinse yew ncaw e.
44008004	Ɛ bonyii bò to saaŋkɛnɛɛ ba no gɛne mondvuum e monciim fewci diɛw Nyo'.
44008005	Ɛ Filew bow fiew gɛn ɛ̂ kelaante kè Samalia le, no fewci saaka jó wvu ɛkumɛ Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ.
44008006	Ɛ bonyii nteen yuw bvuu yɛn mwɛɛm mvù duŋci mvuŋgay mvu Nyo' le mvù wvú to gee, mum nya bitem ɛ̂ wvú ntay.
44008007	Biyoy bì yiile to buyte yî bonyii le, wamte foweɛwe, ɛ bonyii nteen bò to nu ɛ kpwekɛn keba kemwaaŋ noo bontɛŋɛ bonene tɛn.
44008008	Nonɛn, ɛ nlaŋlaŋ wvu baay no nu ɛlaante jodvu.
44008009	Wee mvu to nu ɛlaante jodvu ɛ diee nu Semon, ɛ wvú to shee wase duŋci nfim ye ɛ kɛw lo, ɛ bonyii bo Samalia bocii yɛne ɛ diuw yumte bó. Ɛ wvú to bvuu duu lɛ wen nu wee mvu wvu baay.
44008010	Ɛ bonyii bocii bo ɛlaante jodvu naa noo bo baay baay nya bitem ɛ̂ wvú no gayte lɛ, “Wee wvun nu mvuŋgay mvu Nyo' le mvù bó teŋe lɛ Mvuŋgay mvu Baay.”
44008011	Bó to nya bitem ɛ̂ wvú nonɛn, njefo wvú to shee wase duŋci nfim ye ɛ kɛw lo ncejole ɛ bonyii yɛne ɛ diuw yumte bó.
44008012	Geenɛn, ɛ Filew ke dioo eto efewci saaka wvù jee wvu ɛkumɛ bvunfon bvu Nyo' le noo ɛkumɛ diee di Jisos Klistu le, ɛ bokɛnɛ bô bolemsɛ bee ɛ wvú lese bó ɛ̂ joo.
44008013	Ɛ Semon wɛ kebɛɛ bee tɛn ɛ bó lese wvú ɛ̂ joo. Ɛ wvú mum mɛy kɛ wase no nu mbew Filew e yɛne biŋghaw bi mwɛɛm e bi baay baay bô mwɛɛm mvù duŋci mvuŋgay mvu Nyo' le mvù wvú to gee, ɛ diuw yumte wvú.
44008014	Ɛ boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e ke yuw Jɛlusalɛm lɛ bonyii bo Samalia nu ɛ fiisɛn wase diɛw Nyo', ɛ bó mum tum Bita bô Jon fô bó le.
44008015	Ɛ bó gɛn buy jó, bunle fô bonyii bo mbee le bodvu le lɛ bó ekɛŋkɛ Keyoy ke Yuule,
44008016	njefo Keyoy ke Yuule to baa to wase yî mvu bó le kɛ. Bó to bɛɛ lese kɛ lo bó ɛ̂ joo maaŋ ɛ̂ diee di Tata Jisos e.
44008017	Ɛ Bita bô Jon bunle, gɛɛ can yî bó le, ɛ bó mum kɛŋkɛ Keyoy ke Yuule.
44008018	Ɛ Semon dioo yɛn lɛ boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e gɛɛle can yî bonyii le ɛ Keyoy ke Yuule too yî bó le, ɛ wvú mum no nyaa bigew ɛ̂ Bita bô Jon,
44008019	gayte lɛ, “Ben enya me bô mvuŋgay mvun tɛn, wvu lɛ naa yɛɛ wvù me ɛ ŋgɛɛ can yɛm yî ye le, ɛ́ wvú ekɛŋkɛ Keyoy ke Yuule.”
44008020	Ɛ Bita tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ben ɛ bigew biuw bidvu egɛn lo ŋguy e. Wo ghan nɛɛ ɛ sɛ no kpwaake lɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó eguy nnya yì ɛ̀ nu yi Nyo' bô bigew?
44008021	Kɛ wo yaa kɛŋke naa lo keleŋ ɛnte jo lemme din kɛ, njefo kɛ fitele fiuw yuule fô Nyo' le kɛ.
44008022	Kumɛn fitele fiuw yî fiɛɛ fì befe fì wo gomte keege fin e, ebunlee laa ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ Tata Nyo' elɛɛshɛ boŋkpwawcɛ bò befe ban bò wo kɛŋke fô fitele le lɛ.
44008023	Me n'yɛne lɛ wo nu ɛ yiŋsɛn wase bô ken'yɛɛ ɛjisɛ, ɛ tu nfwa kebefɛ.”
44008024	Ɛ Semon lɛkɛ Bita bô Jon lɛ, “Kee, ben ebunle ɛ̂ Tata lɛ fo fiɛɛ fimew ɛnte jo mwɛɛm mvù ben jemyi mvun e ekooy bô me kɛ.”
44008025	Ɛ Bita bô Jon ke mɛse fewcɛ diɛw Nyo', see mwɛɛm mvù bó kee ɛkumɛ Jisos, mum nɛ no tuu jim Jɛlusalɛm. No bó to tuu jim, no fele bontɛw bo Samalia bomew e, fewci saaka wvù jee wvù wvu Nyo' jó.
44008026	Ɛ nceendaa Tata ke nɛ gay ɛ̂ Filew lɛ, “Nɛnɛ ebow je ɛkuɛku, egɛn ɛ̂ je yì nɛn'yi Jɛlusalɛm fele ŋkpwaante gɛne Gasa le.”
44008027	Ɛ Filew mum nɛ no booke. Ɛ wee wvu baay mvu wvu Itofia nu ɛ̂ je yidvu le. Wvú to nu wee ɛ bó ɛ bvuushɛ, ɛ ɛ̀ nu wee wvù to taale fô kpwaw Yaa Kanda wvù to saake woŋ wvù Itofia le. Wee wvudvu to nɛ Jɛlusalɛm jò wvú to gɛnɛɛ keebunle Nyo',
44008028	no tuu jim woŋ e ɛ̂ kekoto kemew kè ɛ̀ guute nyám e, ɛ wvú ɛ shii jó, taaŋke fiɛɛ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' wvù Yɛsaya wvù wee ntum Nyo' to saŋɛɛ le.
44008029	Ɛ Keyoy ke Yuule gay ɛ̂ Filew lɛ, “Bencɛ egɛn mbew kekoto keki le.”
44008030	Ɛ Filew lewtɛ gɛn mbew yî dvú le, yuw ɛ wee wvudvu taaŋke ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Yɛsaya le. Ɛ wvú bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wo taaŋke nɛn yuuke fiɛɛ fì wvú gayte?”
44008031	Ɛ wvú tfuse lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me en'yuw nɛɛ le sɛ wee ɛ nɛle ɛ̂ me?” Ɛ wvú mum gay lɛ Filew eben ɛ́ bô wvú eshii ɛ̂ kekoto le.
44008032	Bvudvuu bvù wvú to taaŋke ɛ̂ Ŋwa' wvudvu le to jemyi lɛ, “Wvú to nu diɛwɛ njee yì bó gɛne keesɛɛ le, bvuu nu diɛwɛ waa njee wvù bó ké dioo mvuu yvúw ye, wvú saa beele kɛ. Ɛ̀ nu kɛ tɛn no wvú to nu diuw tfu.
44008033	Bó to nu ɛ shoose wvú, tun keesaw nsaw we lɛŋ. Ɛ̀ nu ke eyuu ejemyi yɛɛ ɛkumɛ boom bew, ɛ bó ɛ sum wase nshii we fokuse fɛn?”
44008034	Ɛ wee wvu baay wvudvu mum lɛkɛ Filew gay lɛ, “Kee wo, kɛ see ɛ̂ me, wee ntum Nyo' wvun jemyi ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛkumɛ yɛɛ? Wvú jemyi ɛkumɛ ɛkolɛ kew nuu ɛkumɛ wee mvu lɛ?”
44008035	Ɛ Filew mum kɛw kɛ bô bvudvuu bvu Ŋwa' le bvudvu, no nɛci saaka wvù jee wvu ɛkumɛ Jisos ɛ̂ wvú.
44008036	Ɛ bô wvú no gɛne kɛ ɛ̂ je, ke gɛn buy bvudvuu bvumew e ɛ joo nu fó. Ɛ wee wvu baay wvudvu gay lɛ, “Taa eyɛn, joo nu fɛn, ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ ebvuu etun la fo wo elese me ɛ̂ joo?” [
44008037	Ɛ Filew tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ́ wo fɛn nu ɛ bee Jisos Klistu le bô fitele fiuw ficii, ɛ́ me enlese wo ɛ̂ joo.” Ɛ wvú tfuse lɛ, “Me nu ɛ mbee lɛ Jisos Klistu nu Waa Nyo'.”]
44008038	Ɛ wee wvu baay wvudvu mum gay ɛ bó leke kekoto. Ɛ bô Filew shii, ley gɛn ɛ̂ joo, ɛ Filew lese wvú ɛ̂ joo.
44008039	No bó buyɛɛ ɛ̂ joo, ɛ Keyoy ke Tata le cun Filew fó, ɛ wee wvu baay wɛ faŋɛ yaa ebvuu eyɛn wvú le kɛ. Geenɛn, no gɛne kɛ fiew laŋlaŋe.
44008040	Ɛ Filew nɛ buynɛn ɛ ɛ̀ nu wase Asotus, mum nɛ no gɛne, fele ɛ̂ bilaante bicii le, fewci saaka wvù jee wvù wvu Nyo', gɛn buy ɛ̂ kelaante kè Kaysalia le.
44009001	Ɛ̀ to nu kefew kekiɛ le, ɛ Saul bɛɛ kɛ ffuuke, bɛmsee bonyii bo ŋgoo le bo Tata le lɛ wen nu eyuwyɛ bó. Ɛ wvú mum gɛn fô ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le,
44009002	lɛkɛ lɛ wvú enya boŋwa' ɛ́ wen egɛn dvú yéw bunle yi Damaskus e, bò duŋci lɛ ɛ́ wen yɛn ɛ bonyii nu jó bò bii Je Tata le kɛnɛɛ ɛ̀ nu bokɛnɛ, kɛnɛɛ bolemsɛ, ɛ́ wen ekooyɛ bó ekay, eto bô bó Jɛlusalɛm.
44009003	Ɛ wvú nya, ɛ Saul mum nɛ no gɛne Damaskus, ke dioo feŋene kelaante kedvu, ɛ n'yuu mvu nɛ sɛsɛ law fowe, shii to yî ye le.
44009004	Ɛ wvú gbwe fokuse, yuw ɛ diɛw jeme ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Saul, Saul, wo bone bikaa ɛ̂ me ɛjim nɛn nje la?”
44009005	Ɛ wvú bife lɛ, “Tata, ɛ̀ nu wo wvù yɛɛ?” Ɛ diɛw yidvu tfuse lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu me wvù Jisos, ɛ ɛ̀ nu me wvù wo bone bikaa ɛjim jodvu.
44009006	Yî keseen e, ja we, eley egɛn ɛlaante, ɛ́ bó esee ɛ̂ wo fiɛɛ fì wo kɛŋke keege.”
44009007	Ɛ bonyii bò to lɛne bô bo Saul leem fó ŋgɛmtɛn, no bó to yuuke diɛw yidvu yaa yɛne wee le kɛ.
44009008	Ɛ Saul ke ja we fokuse, dioo yene ɛjisɛ, faŋɛ yaa ebvuu eyɛne mwɛɛm e kɛ. Ɛ bó mum jicɛ wvú yî kebo le, no cɛŋse gɛne bô wvú Damaskus.
44009009	Ɛ wvú gɛn no nu yî ɛdiuw e ɛta yaa yɛne mwɛɛm e kɛ. Ɛ wvú nu nonɛn, yaa diee fiɛɛ kɛ, yaa wuu tɛn fiɛɛ kɛ.
44009010	Wee mbee mvu to nu Damaskus jodvu ɛ diee diew nu Ananias. Ɛ Tata Jisos nɛ tee wvú ɛ̂ fiɛɛ diɛwɛ ɛfilɛ le lɛ, “Ananias.” Ɛ wvú bee lɛ, “Tata, me wvun fɛn.”
44009011	Ɛ Tata gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Nɛnɛ, egɛnè ɛ̂ je yì bó teŋe lɛ Teytey e, dioo buy fô yew e fo Judas, bife wee mvu wvu Taasus ɛ bó teŋe lɛ Saul. Yekɛ eyuw, wvú nu fó bunlee,
44009012	ɛ wvú be ɛ yɛn wase wee le ɛ̂ fiɛɛ diɛwɛ ɛfilɛ le ɛ bó teŋe lɛ Ananias, ɛ wvú ɛ to ɛ gɛɛ can yî ye le, lɛ wvú ekase eyɛne mwɛɛm e.”
44009013	Geenɛn, ɛ Ananias gay lɛ, “Tata, me nu ɛ n'yuw wase ɛ̂ bonyii nteen ɛkumɛ wee wvun no wvú gee mwɛɛm mvù befe fô bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo Nyo' le Jɛlusalɛm.
44009014	Ɛ wvú too nɛn, ɛ wvú ɛ fi mvuŋgay ɛ̂ bocee ncese bo baay baay, lɛ wen eto ekooyɛ bonyii bocii jan bò bunle teŋe diee diuw.”
44009015	Ɛ Tata tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Gɛnɛ kɛ lo. Me nu ɛ ncaw wase wee wvudvu wee wɛm lemme le, lɛ wvú efewcì diee diem ɛ̂ bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu bô bonfon bobole, noo ɛ̂ bonyii bo Islael.
44009016	Me kebɛɛ nu ŋke enduŋcɛ ɛ̂ wvú no wvú kɛŋke keeke eyɛn ŋgɛw nje diee diem.”
44009017	Nonɛn, ɛ Ananias mum gɛn, ley yew dvudvu, gɛɛ can ye yî Saul e, tee lɛ, “Saul waa bwɛɛm, ɛ̀ tum Tata Jisos me. Ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù Jisos wvù wo se yɛnɛɛ ɛ̂ je seke wo se too jan. Wvú tum me nɛn, lɛ me ento eŋge ɛ́ wo ekase eyɛnè mwɛɛm e, ɛ́ Keyoy ke Yuule eto eyiŋsɛn yî yo le.”
44009018	Kɛ no wvú jeme nonɛn, ɛ fiɛɛ fimew diɛwɛ ŋgáw e nɛ yî ɛjisɛ Saul e gbwe fokuse, ɛ wvú mum kase no yɛne mwɛɛm e. Ɛ wvú ja we, ɛ bó mum lese wvú ɛ̂ joo.
44009019	Ɛ wvú ke diekɛn, ɛ mvuŋgay kase tu yî ye le. Ɛ Saul ce Damaskus bô ŋgoo bonyii bo mbee le yî ɛdiuw e caan,
44009020	mum kɛw lo kaŋ mwaaŋ no ghane yéw bunle le, fewci lɛ, “Jisos nu Waa Nyo'.”
44009021	Ɛ bonyii bocii bò to yuuke no ghayte lɛ, “Wvun nu kɛ wee wvù se ghane gɛne lo bô bonyii bò bunlee teŋe diee din Jɛlusalɛm e? Ɛ kɛ wvú to jan nɛn ɛ ɛ̀ nu keekooyɛ bò nu jan ekase egɛn dvú, enya can bocee ncese bo baay baay e le?”
44009022	Ɛ Saul no fewci kɛ fiew ɛkumɛ Jisos tɛmyi lo, duŋci lɛ Jisos nu Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ. Ɛ Bojuu bò to nu Damaskus ma lo fiɛɛ fì ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó etfuse ɛ̂ wvú.
44009023	Ɛ ɛdiuw ke dioo fey nteen, ɛ Bojuu bodvu shii, cu ntaŋ keeyu Saul.
44009024	Ɛ bó mum no shee, cɛyte wvú diuw ketaaŋ ke Damaskus e, lɛ wvú ke dioo fele, kɛnɛɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛntaŋ kɛnɛɛ ɛmvunsheeŋ, ɛ́ bó eyu wvú. Geenɛn, ɛ Saul kiɛɛ ntaŋ wvubo.
44009025	Ɛ bonyii bew bo ŋgoo le ke jo wvú ɛntaŋ, lese ɛ̂ ŋkaa le, bvuse fô ntoo ketaaŋ e, shike wvú fokuse wase ɛkfuŋ.
44009026	Ɛ Saul tu jim Jɛlusalɛm, dioo gomte keetaashɛ bô ŋgoo bonyii bo mbee le, ɛ bó no fane lo wvú, njefo kɛ bó to beŋe lɛ wvú looci nu wee wvubo ŋgoo kɛ.
44009027	Geenɛn, ɛ Banaban jo wvú, ɛ bô wvú gɛn fô boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e. Ɛ wvú see ɛ̂ bó no Saul to yɛnɛɛ Tata le ɛ̂ je ɛ bô wvú jeme, bvuu see ɛ̂ bó no wvú to fewci ɛkumɛ Jisos Damaskus yaa fane kɛ.
44009028	Nonɛn, ɛ Saul mum no nu bô bó ghane mondvuum monciim Jɛlusalɛm, fewci ɛkumɛ Jisos, yaa fane kɛ.
44009029	Ɛ wvú ke no jemyi tɛn ɛ̂ Bojuu bò to jemyi díɛw Glek, beeke mbew bô bó, ɛ bó mum nɛ no gomte keeyu wvú.
44009030	Ɛ bonyii bo mbee le kiɛɛ lɛ bó gomte keeyu wvú, mum jo wvú bow dvú ɛ̂ kelaante kè Kaysalia le, ciinse wvú ɛ wvú gɛn Taasus.
44009031	Yî kefew kekin e, ɛ kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le lɛɛtɛn yî ŋgɛw e ɛ̂ biba bi woŋ e bì Judea bô Galilee noo Samalia le. Ɛ Keyoy ke Yuule ge ɛ kentaashɛ kedvu ciim, bvuu no tomte ŋgoo ɛ yí kuu. Ɛ bó no cee, wvumte kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu Tata.
44009032	Ɛ Bita no ghane, gɛne fô bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo Nyo' le mondvuum e monciim, ke ghan gɛn buy fô bó Lida le.
44009033	No wvú to nu jó, yɛn wee mvu le ɛ wvú ɛ kpwe keba kemwaaŋ, ɛ diee nu Ɛnias ɛ wvú ɛ ŋgɛy wase ɛntaw bilum nyaŋ.
44009034	No Bita yɛn wvú le, tee lɛ, “Ɛnias, Jisos Klistu fɛle wase wo. Ja we eseyse kentaw kuw.” Kaŋ mwaaŋ ɛ Ɛnias mum ja we.
44009035	Ɛ bonyii bo Lida noo bo yî bale di Shalon e bocii yɛn no wee wvudvu nu ɛ bonɛn wase, ɛ bó lese fitele yî Tata Jisos e.
44009036	Ɛ̀ to nu ɛ kpwoon mvu nu ɛ̂ kelaante kè Jofa le, ɛ ɛ̀ nu wee mbee, ɛ diee nu Tabita, dì nu ɛ̂ díɛw Glek e lɛ Dokas. Wvú to ké no gee mwɛɛm mvù jee sekecii, fii bonyii bò fuute.
44009037	Ɛ ɛ̀ no nu ɛdiuw yoya le, ɛ kpwoon wvudvu gbwe kencɛm, mum kpwe. Ɛ bó cukɛ gvune diew, ben gɛɛ ɛ̂ kebuw ke yew e ke ɛwe le.
44009038	No Jofa to nu mbew Lida le, ɛ ŋgoo bonyii bo mbee le ke yuw lɛ Bita nu Lida, mum tum bolemsɛ bofɛɛ fô wvú le. Ɛ bó gɛn lɛkɛ wvú, lɛ kee wvú, lɛ wvú eto kɛ ncin e.
44009039	Ɛ Bita mum nɛ kɛ nonɛn ɛ bô bó no gɛne. Ɛ wvú gɛn buy fó, ɛ bó jo wvú ben bô wvú ɛ̂ kebuw ke yew e ke ɛwe kiɛ le. Ɛ bokɛ' bo boŋkfu le bo jó bocii gem wvú tase no beele, duŋci ndvú yì Dokas to gee seke wvú to bɛɛ dvú.
44009040	Ɛ Bita bvuse bó ɛkfuŋ bocii, tum ɛnvuw fokuse bunle, nɛ baŋke ye gay ɛ̂ gvune didvu lɛ, “Tabita ja we.” Ɛ wvú mum yene ɛjisɛ, taa Bita, mum ja shii we.
44009041	Ɛ Bita jicɛ wvú le yî kebo le, ɛ wvú leem we. Ɛ wvú kase tee bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo Nyo' le bô bokɛ' bo boŋkfu le ba, duŋcɛ wvú ɛ̂ bó, ɛ wvú ɛ kase wase ɛ tu dvú.
44009042	Ɛ saaka wvudvu saaŋkɛn gɛn Jofa jocii. Ɛ bonyii nteen lese fitele yî Tata le.
44009043	Ɛ Bita no nu Jofa yî ɛdiuw e nteen, cee bô wee mvu wvù to seysee jéw ɛ diee nu Semon.
44010001	Wee mvu to nu ɛ̂ kelaante kè Kaysalia le ɛ bó teŋe lɛ Konɛyu, ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛkolɛ ke ŋgoo mi bonyii bo nci le bo Lum, yì bó to teŋe lɛ yi Itali.
44010002	Ɛ wvú to nu wee ɛ bô bonyii bocii bo ɛ̂ wvú yew ɛ loocɛ ɛ lese fitele yî Nyo' le. Ɛ wvú wvumte bvuu bunlee Nyo' sekecii, nyaa nnya ntay ɛ̂ Bojuu bò to fuute.
44010003	Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu diuu dimew kɛ diɛwɛ didiuu ditɛte le fomvunsheeŋ, ɛ fiɛɛ diɛwɛ ɛfilɛ le nɛ to fô wvú le, ɛ wvú loocɛ yɛn nceendaa Nyo' le ɛ̂ fiɛɛ fidvu le. Ɛ nceendaa wvudvu to ley tee wvú lɛ, “Konɛyu”.
44010004	Ɛ Konɛyu fan, luŋ ɛjisɛ yî ye le bife lɛ, “Cee ɛkolɛ, ɛ̀ nu la?” Ɛ nceendaa wvudvu tfuse lɛ, “Nyo' nu ɛ yuw wase bunle yo, ɛ bvuu ɛ yɛn nnya yì wo nyaa ɛ̂ bonyii bò fuute, ɛ kume wo.
44010005	Yî keseen e, tumɛ bonyii Jofa ɛ́ bó egɛn etee wee mvu wvù diee nu Semon, ɛ dimew nu Bita.
44010006	Wvú nu ɛ to ɛ no cee bô Semon mvu wvù ké no seysee jéw wvù la diew nu mbew joo yi baay e.”
44010007	No nceendaa Nyo' wvudvu jeme nonɛn mum nɛ. Ɛ Konɛyu shɛɛ tee bonyii bew bo lemme le bofɛɛ, bvuu tee tɛn wee nci mvu wvù to ké no cɛyte wvú, ɛ ɛ̀ to nu wee ɛ wvú tɛn ɛ loocɛ ɛ lese fitele yî Nyo' le.
44010008	Ɛ bó to, ɛ wvú see fiɛɛ ficii fì be kooy ɛ̂ bó, mum tum bó Jofa.
44010009	Ɛ ɛkfuŋ buy yuu, ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu kɛ diɛwɛ ɛmvunsheeŋ ɛntelɛŋ e, ɛ bó fɛɛse wase ɛ̂ kelaante kedvu le. Ɛ Bita nɛ ben ɛ̂ yew we keebunle.
44010010	Ɛ jeŋ ke nɛ no yuu wvú, ɛ wvú no shieele keediekɛn, ɛ bó bɛɛ dɛɛle lo mwɛɛm mvudien. Ɛ fiɛɛ diɛwɛ ɛfilɛ le nɛ to fô wvú le.
44010011	Ɛ wvú yɛn ɛ̂ fiɛɛ fidvu le, ɛ ɛbulɛ ɛ yene, ɛ fiɛɛ fimew shiile fowe nu diɛwɛ ɛkolɛ ke ndvu le, ɛ bó jici yî ɛbuw yo ɛna le.
44010012	Ɛ dikfuu di nyám e dicii, yì lɛne, bô yì sone lo, noo mvunyiim mvù bile we, nu ɛ̂ ndvu yidvu le.
44010013	Ɛ diɛw nɛ gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Bita, nɛnɛ we esɛɛyɛ edie.”
44010014	Ɛ Bita tfuse lɛ, “Tata, kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me emom kɛ, njefo me ŋke mbaa ndie wase fiɛɛ fi ncɛwncɛw kɛnɛɛ fì nu sɛ fí yuule lo kɛ.”
44010015	Ɛ diɛw yidvu bvuu jeme ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Fo wo enyɛnsè fiɛɛ ɛ Nyo' ɛ ge wase fí ɛ no yuule kɛ.”
44010016	Ɛ fí kooy nonɛn buy bokaŋ botɛte, ɛ bó mum kase bense fiɛɛ fidvu we.
44010017	Ɛ fiɛɛ fidvu fì toɛ diɛwɛ ɛfilɛ le ffumse Bita ɛ wvú no maa laa fí duŋci lɛ la lɛ. Kɛ sekedvu ɛ bonyii bò Konɛyu to tumɛɛ ba ɛ to wase ɛ biwcɛ fò la di Semon wvù seysee jéw e nu, ɛ no leeme diuw ketaaŋ e,
44010018	teŋe, biite lɛ, “Wee ghane mvu nu fɛn ɛ diee nu Semon Bita le?”
44010019	No Bita to bɛɛ kpwawci ɛkumɛ fiɛɛ fidvu fì toɛ fô wvú le, ɛ Keyoy ke Yuule nɛ gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Taa eyɛn, bonyii botɛte gomte wo.
44010020	Nɛnɛ we ebow ɛ́ ben ɛ bó egɛne ɛkalɛ kemwaaŋ. Fo wo ecimcim kɛ, ɛ̀ tum me bó.”
44010021	Nonɛn, ɛ Bita mum nɛ bow, gay ɛ̂ bonyii bodvu lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu me wvù ben gomte. Ben to lɛ la?”
44010022	Ɛ bó tfuse lɛ, “Konɛyu wvù nu ɛkolɛ ke ŋgoo mi bonyii bo nci le bo Lum nu ɛ tum bese. Wvú nu wee wvu teytey, fane Nyo', ɛ Bojuu bocii bɛnsee wvú. Nceendaa Nyo' wvù yuule mvu se nu ɛ gay lɛ wvú eciinse ntum ɛ́ wo eto ɛ̂ wvú yew, ɛ́ wvú eyuw fiɛɛ fì wo nu ejeme ɛ̂ wvú.”
44010023	No bó tfuse nonɛn, ɛ Bita mum gay ɛ bó ley ɛ bô bó ce. Ɛ ɛkfuŋ buy yuu, ɛ wvú nɛ ɛ bô bó no gɛne. Ɛ bonyii bo mbee le bomew bo Jofa bi wvú le.
44010024	Ɛ bó lɛn ce, ɛ bvú buy yuu ɛ bó fɛse Kaysalia. Ɛ Konɛyu bô bonyii bew bo kfuu le noo nsáa ye shém yì wvú to beɛ to cɛyte wase bó.
44010025	No Bita to leyte gɛne yew, ɛ bô Konɛyu tasɛn. Ɛ Konɛyu gbwe ɛ̂ wvú ɛjise wvum wvú.
44010026	Geenɛn, ɛ Bita cake wvú we gay lɛ, “Nɛnɛ we, me nu kɛ tɛn fiem wee wvu wum diɛwɛ wo le.”
44010027	Ɛ wvú no jemyi bô Konɛyu leyte gɛne yew, ke dioo ley, yɛn ɛ bonyii ɛ njim lo yew.
44010028	Ɛ wvú jeme ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben kee ntay lɛ nci wese baa bee lɛ wee Juu elaa ghane kɛnɛɛ etase nsan bô wee wvù yaa nu kɛ wee Juu. Geenɛn, Nyo' nu ɛ duŋcɛ ɛ̂ me lɛ kɛ me ŋkɛŋke keenteŋe wee mvu nduu lɛ wvú nu wee wvu ncɛw kɛnɛɛ lɛ kɛ wvú yuule kɛ.
44010029	Nonɛn, ben ɛ dioo ciinse ntum lɛ me ento, me ɛ mum ɛ nto, me mbaa ŋkicine kɛ. Me ɛ mum ɛ no mbiite ɛ̂ ben lɛ laa ben teŋe me lɛ la lɛ?”
44010030	Ɛ Konɛyu tfuse lɛ, “Ɛbɛn nu wase ɛdiuw ɛna no me nto nu yew dvu me kɛ diɛwɛ kefew ke keseen e didiuu ditɛte fomvunsheeŋ mbunlee. Ɛ wee mvu nɛ sɛsɛ buynɛn fwe dvu me ɛ wvú ɛ tfume ndvú ɛ yí lawkene.
44010031	Ɛ wvú gay ɛ̂ me lɛ, ‘Konɛyu, Nyo' nu ɛ yuw wase bunle yo ɛ bvuu ɛ yɛn nnyá yì wo nyaa ɛ̂ bonyii bo kefufe le, ɛ kume wo.
44010032	Nonɛn, tumɛ bonyii Jofa ɛ́ bó egɛn etee wee mvu ɛ diee diew nu Semon, ɛ dimew nu Bita. Wvú nu ɛ to ɛ no cee bô Semon wvù seysee jéw wvù la diew nu mbew joo yi baay e.’
44010033	Kaŋ mwaaŋ nonɛn, ɛ me mum nciinse ntum lɛ wo eto. Wo ɛ to nɛn, fí ɛ joŋ baay. Bese ɛ mum ɛ no nu fɛn ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛjise keeyuw fiɛɛ fì Tata tum wo lɛ wo eto ejeme ɛ̂ bese.”
44010034	Ɛ Bita mum kɛw no jemyi gayte lɛ, “Yî kecɛɛy e, me nu ɛ n'yɛn lɛ kɛ Nyo' duŋci kejɛɛy jɛɛy kɛ.
44010035	Wee tfuu wvù fane wvú bvuu gee fiɛɛ fì nu lɛŋ nu ɛ wvú fiisene wvú yaa taale laa mwɛtɛn buy fɛɛ lɛ.
44010036	Ben kee ntum wvù Nyo' to ciinsɛɛ fô bonyii bo Islael e, fewci saaka wvù jee lɛ Jisos Klistu to to wvu lɛ nyɛkeey nulo enu ɛntelɛŋ jo Nyo' bô bonyii. Ɛ Jisos Klistu wvun nu Cee Ɛkolɛ bonyii bocii.
44010037	Ben kee fiɛɛ fì to kooyɛɛ woŋ wvù Judea le tfuu, ɛ fí to kɛw Galilee ɛjim jo kefew kè Jon to fewci leese bonyii ɛ̂ joo.
44010038	Ɛ ben kee tɛn no Nyo' to tfuwɛɛ lo Keyoy ke Yuule yî Jisos wvu Nasalɛt e, bvuu nya mvuŋgay ɛ̂ wvú, no nu bô wvú. No Nyo' to nu bô wvú, ɛ wvú mum no lɛne mondvuum monciim gee lemme dì jee bvuu fɛle bonyii bò dɛwle nvuwse.
44010039	Ɛ̀ nu bese bò to yɛnɛɛ mwɛɛm mvù wvú to gee woŋ Bojuu le tfuu, noo mvù wvú to gee ɛ̂ kelaante kè Jɛlusalɛm e. Bó to nu ɛ ta wvú yî kentam e ɛ wvú kpwe.
44010040	Geenɛn, ɛ ɛ̀ ke dioo nu ɛdiuw ɛta, ɛ Nyo' bvuse wvú yî kpwe le, ge ɛ bonyii yɛn wvú le.
44010041	Ɛ kɛ ɛ yaa nu bonyii bocii bò to nu ɛ yɛn wvú le kɛ. Ɛ̀ to yɛn kɛ bese bò wvú wvù Nyo' to cawɛɛ lɛ bese efewcì ɛkumɛ Jisos. Ɛ bese to nu ɛ diɛkɛn bvuu wukɛn bee bo Jisos seke wvú to buyɛɛ yî kpwe le.
44010042	Ɛ wvú gay lɛ bese ke efewcì diɛw Nyo' ɛ̂ bonyii, bvuu seŋe ɛ̂ bó lɛ ɛ̀ nu wen wvù Nyo' nu ɛ baa lɛ wen ke esaw bonyii bò bɛɛ dvú noo bò kpwekɛn wase.
44010043	Jisos wvun nu wvù bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le bocii to jemyi ɛkumɛ wvú lɛ ɛ̀ nu naa yɛɛ wvù nu ɛ lese fitele yî ye le, ɛ́ Nyo' elɛɛshɛ bibefɛ biew fele yî diee diew e.”
44010044	Kɛ no Bita to bɛɛ jemyi mwɛɛm mvun nɛn, ɛ Keyoy ke Yuule nɛ shii, to yî wee tfuu wvù to yeke njeme wvudvu le.
44010045	Ɛ diuw yum bonyii bo mbee le bò ɛ̀ nu Bojuu bò to biɛ Bita le, no bó yɛnɛɛ ɛ Nyo' ɛ nya tɛn nnya ye yì ɛ̀ nu Keyoy ke Yuule ɛ̂ bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu.
44010046	Ɛ Bojuu ba no yuuke ɛ bó jemyi díɛw yì bó yaa kee kɛ, bensee Nyo'. Ɛ Bita mum bife lɛ,
44010047	“No Keyoy ke Yuule nu ɛ to wase yî bonyii ban e lɛŋlɛŋ no kí to toɛ yî yese beene le, ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wee ebvuu etun fo bó elese bó ɛ̂ joo le?”
44010048	No Bita bife nonɛn, mum gay lɛ bó elese bó ɛ̂ joo ɛ̂ diee di Jisos Klistu le. Ɛjim jodvu, ɛ bonyii bodvu lɛkɛ lɛ wvú ece bô bó yî ɛdiuw e caan sɛ nɛnɛ.
44011001	Ɛ boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e noo bonyii bo mbee le Judea jocii ke yuw lɛ bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu nu ɛ fiisɛn wase tɛn diɛw Nyo'.
44011002	Ɛ Bita ke dioo kase ben Jɛlusalɛm, ɛ bonyii bo mbee le bomew mum no saake wvú. Bonyii ban nu bò to ké no leeme kɛ lɛ bó kɛŋke keetfuse wee wvù yaa nu kɛ wee Juu yew, ɛ́ mwɛtɛn sɛ no nu wee Nyo'.
44011003	Ɛ bó no saake wvú biite lɛ, “Wo se ghan nɛɛ ɛ sɛ laa ghane ɛ̂ bonyii bò bɛɛ ntffuse le, ɛ bvuu ɛ mɛse ɛ diɛkɛn ben ɛ bó?”
44011004	Ɛ Bita mum loocɛ nyɛy fiɛɛ ficii fì to kooyɛɛ, gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ,
44011005	“Me nto nu ɛ̂ kelaante kè Jofa le mbunlee, ɛ fiɛɛ diɛwɛ ɛfilɛ le nɛ to fô me le. Ɛ me n'yɛn ɛ̂ fiɛɛ fidvu le, ɛ fiɛɛ fimew shiile fowe nu diɛwɛ ɛkolɛ ke ndvu le, ɛ bó jici yî ɛbuw yo ɛna le. Ɛ fí shii, leem ɛ̂ me ɛjise.
44011006	Ɛ me ndioo ntaa jó, n'yɛn nyám e dikfuu le dikfuu le, ɛ yimi nu yi fô yew e, yimi yi ŋkpwaante bô yì sone, noo mvunyiim mvù bile we.
44011007	Ɛ me nɛ n'yuw ɛ diɛw gay ɛ̂ me lɛ, ‘Bita, nɛnɛ we esɛɛyɛ edie.’
44011008	Ɛ me ntfuse lɛ, ‘Tata, kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me emom kɛ. Kɛ fiɛɛ fi ncɛwncɛw kɛnɛɛ fì nu sɛ fí yuule lo ke nu ɛ ley wase ɛ̂ me ɛmvu kɛ.’
44011009	Ɛ diɛw yidvu bvuu jeme we lɛ, ‘Fo wo enyɛnsè fiɛɛ ɛ Nyo' ɛ ge wase fí ɛ no yuule kɛ.’
44011010	Ɛ fí kooy nonɛn buy bokaŋ botɛte ɛ bó mum kase gufe fiɛɛ fidvu ficii ɛ fí ben we.
44011011	Kɛ sekedvu, ɛ bonyii botɛte fɛse fô yew e fò me nto ncee, ɛ bó nɛ Kaysalia, ɛ bó tum lɛ bó eto etee me.
44011012	Ɛ Keyoy ke Yuule gay ɛ̂ me lɛ fo me enyaw keeŋgɛn bee bonyii bodvu kɛ. Ɛ boom bo bwee wesebeene le bo Jofa bo bosoocaan ban bi me le, ɛ bee bó bocii gɛn ley yew dvu wee wvudvu.
44011013	No bese ley, ɛ wvú see ɛ̂ bese no wvú to yɛnɛɛ nceendaa Nyo' le ɛ̂ wvú yew, ɛ wvú gay lɛ wen etum wee Jofa ɛ́ wvú egɛn etee wee mvu ɛ bó teŋe lɛ Semon Bita.
44011014	Wee wvudvu nu ke eto bô saaka wvù bô bonyii bocii bo ɛ̂ wen yew nu ke eboy yî dvú le.
44011015	Ɛ me ŋke ndioo ŋkɛw keenjemyi, ɛ Keyoy ke Yuule nɛ shii to yî bonyii bodvu le kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no kí to toɛ yî yese beene le foŋkɛw.
44011016	Ɛ me n'yɛn nonɛn, mum ŋkume fiɛɛ fì Tata to jemyɛɛ lɛ, ‘Jon to leese bonyii ɛ̂ joo, geenɛn, Nyo' nu ke elese ben ɛ ɛ̀ nu can Keyoy ke Yuule le.’
44011017	No Nyo' to nu ɛ nya bonyii bodvu bô nnya ɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ yí yì wvú to nyaɛ ɛ̂ beene seke beene to lesɛɛ fitele yî Tata Jisos Klistu le, ɛ́ me enu yɛɛ wvù etunè fiɛɛ fì ɛ̀ gee Nyo'?”
44011018	Ɛ bonyii bodvu yuw no Bita jeme nonɛn, faŋɛ yaa ebvuu esaake wvú kɛ. Ɛ bó mum nɛ no tumte ɛ ɛ̀ nu moŋkum mo Nyo' le gayte lɛ, “Ɛ́ ɛ̀ fɛn nu nonɛn, kɛ tu Nyo' nu ɛ nya wase tɛn je ɛ̂ bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu, lɛ bó ekumɛn mvuntelem mvubole ke ekɛŋkɛ nshii wvù mɛy lo.”
44011019	Bonyii bò to saaŋkɛnɛɛ no ŋgɛw to kɛwɛɛ seke bó to yuɛ Tɛfan to nu ɛ gɛn mondvuum e mondvuum e, gɛn buy Fonishia, ɛ bomew gɛn Sayblus, bomew Antiok. No bó gɛnɛɛ nonɛn, no fewci diɛw Nyo' ɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ ɛ̂ Bojuu maaŋ.
44011020	Geenɛn, ɛ bomew bonyii bo mbee le bò to nɛn'yɛɛ Sayblus noo Sɛlin, gɛn Antiok no fewci tɛn saaka wvù jee wvu ɛkumɛ Tata Jisos ɛ̂ bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu.
44011021	Ɛ̂ mvuŋgay mvu Tata Nyo' le, ɛ bó ge ɛ bonyii nteen lese fitele yî Tata Jisos e, kumɛn tu bô wvú.
44011022	Ɛ saaka wvudvu wvun ley bitem bi kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le Jɛlusalɛm. Ɛ bó mum tum Banaban Antiok jodvu.
44011023	Ɛ wvú gɛn buy jó, yɛn no Nyo' nu ɛ buw bó bô mboyma, ɛ wvú yuw njoŋ, mum no teete bó lɛ bó ebiì Tata le bô mvuntelem mvubole mvunciim.
44011024	Banaban wvun to nu wee wvù jee, ɛ wvú ɛ yiŋsɛn bô Keyoy ke Yuule bvuu kɛŋke mbee ntay. Nonɛn, ɛ wvú ge ɛ bonyii nteen jó lese fitele yî Tata le.
44011025	Ɛ Banaban ke mum nɛ gɛn Taasus keegom Saul.
44011026	Ɛ wvú ke gom yɛn wvú le, jo ɛ bô wvú tu jim Antiok. Ɛ bô wvú no nu jó yî kelum e kecile bô kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le, yɛɛyi bonyii nteen. Ɛ̀ nu Antiok jodvu jò bó to kɛwɛɛ keeteŋe ŋgoo bonyii bo mbee le lɛ bonyii bo Klistu le.
44011027	Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu kɛ kefew kedvu le, ɛ bonyii bomew bò ké no seŋe mwɛɛm mvù bó yuuke ɛ Nyo' jemyi, nɛ Jɛlusalɛm bow gɛn Antiok jodvu.
44011028	Ɛ Keyoy ke Yuule ge ɛ mvu bó le wvù diee to nu Agabus ke nɛ leem we, tefe lɛ jeŋ yì tɛmyi nu ke ekoo woŋ tfuu. Jeŋ yidvu to nu ɛ ghan koo kefew kè Klawdius to nu Nfon wvu Lum.
44011029	Ɛ ŋgoo bonyii bo mbee le bo Antiok yuw nonɛn, seyse lɛ wee tfuu esuw bigew no wvú kɛŋke, ɛ́ bó efi boom bo bwee bó le bò nu Judea dvú.
44011030	Ɛ bó mum suw, tum Banaban bô Saul dvú lɛ bó egɛn enya ɛ̂ bocee kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le.
44012001	Ɛ ɛ̀ no nu kefew kedvu le, ɛ Nfon 'Ɛlod kɛw no nyaa ŋgɛw ɛ̂ bonyii bomew bo kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le.
44012002	Ɛ wvú gay ɛ bó gbwo Jɛm wvù waa bwee Jon ɛ wvú kpwe.
44012003	Ɛ wvú ke dioo yɛn lɛ fí nu ɛ joŋ Bojuu le, ɛ wvú mum gɛn fwe gay ɛ bó koo tɛn Bita. Bó to kole wvú ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛdiuw ɛ Ŋkaw Blɛɛd wvù bó baa gɛɛ Fintuŋlɛɛn jó le kɛ.
44012004	No bó koolɛɛ wvú, mum fen yew ncaw e, gɛɛ ŋgóo bonyii bo nci le nyɛ lɛ bó ecɛyte wvú bonɛw bonɛw. Ɛ 'Ɛlod to gɛke Bita nonɛn lɛ Ŋkaw Daŋɛfey ke dioo ɛ fey, ɛ́ wen ebvuse wvú eleke ɛ̂ bonyii fwe ɛ́ bó esaw wvú.
44012005	Ɛ Bita mum no nu kɛ yew ncaw e. Geenɛn, ɛ kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le no bunlee Nyo' fô wvú le shiee le.
44012006	Ɛ ɛ̀ ke dioo nu ɛntaŋ wvù ɛkfuŋ nu ebuy eyuu ɛ́ 'Ɛlod ebvuse Bita ɛ́ bó esaw wvú, ɛ Bita no leete ɛntelɛŋ jo bonyii bo nci le bofɛɛ ɛ bó ɛ kay wvú bô boncaw bofɛɛ, ɛ no cɛyte. Ɛ bonyii bo nci le bomew cɛyte yew ncaw ɛ̂ fwese.
44012007	Ɛ fí kooy lɛ nceendaa Tata to nu ɛ nɛ sɛsɛ buynɛn, ɛ n'yuu ba yew ncaw yidvu le. Ɛ nceendaa wvudvu kum Bita yî kebɛnɛ le, ɛ wvú kamse. Ɛ wvú gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ja we cekey.” No wvú gay nonɛn, ɛ boncaw ba mum fɛykɛn can Bita le gbwekɛn fokuse.
44012008	Ɛ wvú bvuu gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Temɛ ndvu yo, elese bolaba buw.” Ɛ Bita ge nonɛn. Ɛ nceendaa wvudvu bvuu gay lɛ, “Bulɛ ndvu yo ebiì me le.”
44012009	Ɛ Bita bu, mum no bii wvú le ɛkfuŋ. Kɛ wvú to cim kee lɛ fiɛɛ fì nceendaa wvudvu gee nu kecɛɛy kɛ. Wvú to kpwaake lɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ diɛwɛ ɛfilɛ le ɛ fí too fô wen e.
44012010	Ɛ bô wvú lɛn fey bvudvuu bvu fwe fô bonyii bo nci le to cɛyte, bvuu fey bvu ɛjim, mum fɛse diuw ketaaŋ wvù buyte gɛne ɛlaante le, ɛ bó ɛ fɛ bô ketfu. Ɛ diuw ketaaŋ wvudvu yene kɛ ɛwvunɛwvun, ɛ bó buy. No bó buy nonɛn, no lɛne booke kɛ ɛ̂ je, ɛ nceendaa Tata Nyo' wvudvu mum nɛ la ɛ̂ wvú ɛjise.
44012011	Ɛ Bita shɛɛ, ɛ bvufee tu wvú fó, ɛ wvú gay lɛ, “Keseen nu ɛ me ɛ ŋkiɛɛ wase lɛ ɛ̀ nu kecɛɛy lɛ ɛ̀ be tum Tata nceendaa we lɛ wvú eto ebvuse me can 'Ɛlod e, ɛ́ me emboy yî ŋgɛw wvù Bojuu se cɛyte lɛ bó nu ke enya ɛ̂ me le.”
44012012	No wvú kiɛnte nonɛn, mum nɛ no gɛne fô yew e fo Maalia wvù bwee Jon Maaku, ɛ bonyii nu ɛ bó ɛ tase fó nteen ɛ no bunlee.
44012013	Ɛ wvú gɛn buy fó, kumcɛ diuw ketaaŋ, ɛ wan kpwoon mvu ɛ diee nu Loda wvù to lemte fô yew e fodvu to keeyene.
44012014	Ɛ wvú dioo yuw ɛ ɛ̀ nu diɛw Bita, ɛ njoŋ yu wvú, ɛ wvú faŋɛ yaa yene ketaaŋ kɛ, kaa nɛ lewtɛ kase ley gɛn yew, see ɛ̂ bonyii lɛ, “Bita nu diuw ketaaŋ e.”
44012015	Ɛ bó tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wo jewte lo.” Ɛ wvú no taame kɛ lɛ ɛ̀ nu Bita. Ɛ bó mum nɛ gay lɛ “Ɛ̀ nulo enu nceendaa Nyo' we.”
44012016	No bó to jemyi nonɛn, ɛ Bita mɛy kɛ no kumci. Ɛ bó dioo yene, yɛn kecɛɛy ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvú, ɛ diuw yum bó.
44012017	Ɛ wvú few bô can ɛ bó lu bô diuw, mum see ɛ̂ bó no Tata be bvuse wvú yew ncaw e, bvuu gay lɛ bó esee ɛ̂ Jɛm noo bonyii bo mbee le bocii. No wvú gay nonɛn, mum nɛ gɛn keba kemew e.
44012018	Ɛ ɛkfuŋ buy yuu, ɛ bvufee no bvuuŋke lo bonyii bo nci le lɛ laa ɛ̀ sɛ kooy la bô Bita lɛ.
44012019	Ɛ 'Ɛlod bvuse bonyii lɛ bó eghan egom wvú. Ɛ bó gom, gom ŋkuuŋ. Ɛ wvú mum tee bonyii bo nci le bò to cɛyte Bita ba, biwcɛ mwɛɛm ɛ̂ bó, mum nɛ gay lɛ bó jo bó gɛn lɛse. Ɛjim jodvu, ɛ 'Ɛlod nɛ ɛ̂ keba ke woŋ e kè Judea le, bow gɛn no nu ɛ̂ kelaante kè Kaysalia le.
44012020	Ɛ̀ to nu kefew kedvu le ɛ Nfon 'Ɛlod ton'yi shém bô bonyii bo Taya noo bo Sidon. Ɛ bonyii bodvu ke mum baancɛ ye keegɛn eku can lɛ nyɛkeey enu dvú, njefo woŋ wvubo to kɛŋke mwɛɛm mvudien ɛ ɛ̀ nu woŋ we le. Ɛ bó gɛn, yaw koo nsan bô Blastus wvù to nu cee ntow.
44012021	Ɛ diuu ke to kocɛn, ɛ Nfon 'Ɛlod tfume ndvú woŋ, shii yî kawla le, mum no nyaa sa' ɛ̂ bonyii bodvu.
44012022	Ɛ bó nɛ no wvuuyi lo, bensee wvú gayte lɛ, “Wvun njeme nu wvu nyo', kɛ ɛ̀ nu wvu wee wvu wum kɛ.”
44012023	Kaŋ mwaaŋ, ɛ nceendaa Tata mum tum kencɛm yî Nfon 'Ɛlod e, njefo wvú to baa efese mbense wvudvu ɛ̂ Nyo' kɛ. Ɛ ŋgeŋse mum die wvú, ɛ wvú kpwe.
44012024	Geenɛn, ɛ diɛw Nyo' no leyte ɛ̂ mvuntelem mvu bonyii le, saaŋkene gɛne lo fwe fwe.
44012025	Ɛ Banaban bô Saul ke mɛse fiɛɛ fì bó to tumɛɛ bó Jɛlusalɛm dvú, mum kase tu jim Antiok. Ɛ bó dioo etuu jim, jo Jon Maaku.
44013001	Bonyii bomew to nu ɛ̂ kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le Antiok, ɛ ɛ̀ nu bò seŋe mwɛɛm mvù bó yuuke ɛ Nyo' jemyi, bvuu yɛɛyi bonyii. Bonyii bodvu to nu Banaban bô Semeon wvù bó to teŋe lɛ Wvù Yiile, noo Lushus wvu Sɛlin bô Saul noo Manɛɛn wvù bó to lɛyɛɛ wvú bô 'Ɛlod wvù wee sa'.
44013002	Ɛ ɛ̀ ke dioo nu ɛ bó bamte mwɛɛm mvudien bunlee Nyo', ɛ Keyoy ke Yuule nɛ gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben ebaa Banaban bô Saul egɛɛ, ɛ́ bó elemtè lemme dì me nu ɛ ntee bó lɛ bó elemtè.”
44013003	Ɛ bó yuw nonɛn, bvuu no bamte kɛ mwɛɛm mvudien bunlee, ke nɛ gɛɛ can yî bó le, mum ciinse bó ɛ bó no gɛne.
44013004	Ɛ Banaban bô Saul mum no gɛne no Keyoy ke Yuule to tumɛɛ bó. Ɛ bó nɛ bow ɛ̂ kelaante kè Sɛlusia le, ley ɛ̂ ŋguw wvu ɛ̂ joo le, no leenci, gɛne woŋ wvù Sayblus e.
44013005	No bó lente, buy ɛ̂ kelaante kè Salamis e, mum no ghane fewci diɛw Nyo' yéw bunle Bojuu le, ɛ Jon Maaku ghane bô bó, fici bó.
44013006	Ɛ bó ke lɛn woŋ wvu ɛ̂ joo ɛntelɛŋ wvudvu le, daŋsɛn gɛn buy naa ɛ̂ kelaante kè Bafos e. No bó gɛn buynɛn yî wee Juu mvu le jó, ɛ ɛ̀ nu wee nfim ɛ diee nu Bal Jisos, ɛ wvú to ké no mbiayte lɛ wen nu wee wvù seŋe mwɛɛm mvù wen yuuke ɛ Nyo' jemyi.
44013007	Wvú to ké no shee bô Sɛgus Baulus wvù wee sa' wvu woŋ wvudvu le. Wee sa' wvudvu to kɛŋke bvufee baay. Ɛ wvú ke tee Banaban bô Saul njefo wvú to gomte keeyuw diɛw Nyo'.
44013008	Ɛ bó to, geenɛn ɛ Ɛlimas wvù wee nfim wɛ no diee diew nu ɛ̂ díɛw Glek e, mum no kicine bó, momte keege lɛ fo wee sa' wvudvu elese fitele yî Jisos e kɛ.
44013009	Ɛ Keyoy ke Yuule yiŋsɛn yî Saul e, wvù diee diew dimew to nu lɛ Baul, ɛ wvú luŋ ɛjisɛ yî wee nfim wvudvu le,
44013010	gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wo nu waa dɛwle, ɛ wo nu wee wvù bane fiɛɛ ficii fì nu lɛŋ. Kenlɛɛma bô mbiay nu ɛ cin fô fitele fiuw e. Kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wo enu nɛn sɛ wo kumene kecɛɛy ke Nyo' le lɛ kí etuù mbiay e?
44013011	Yekɛ eyuw, keseen nu ɛ kebo ke Nyo' le nu egbwe yî yo le ɛ́ wo efefe, ɛ́ fí ke ejo kefew ɛ́ wo sɛ ebvuu eyɛn kɛ naa diuu le.” Kaŋ mwaaŋ nonɛn, ɛ fiɛɛ fimew shii kɛ diɛwɛ kembɛw e, baŋ ɛjisɛ Ɛlima. Ɛ wvú mum nɛ no ghaale lo mondvuum, gomte wee wvù ecɛŋseè wvú.
44013012	Ɛ wee sa' wɛ yɛn nonɛn, mum lese fitele yî Jisos e, no wvú to kɛŋke ŋghaw yî mwɛɛm mvù bó to yɛɛyi ɛkumɛ Tata Jisos e.
44013013	Ɛ Baul bô ŋgoo ye ley ɛ̂ ŋguw e Bafos, lente joo yi baay buy ɛ̂ kelaante kè Bɛlga le woŋ wvù Bamfilia le. No bó buy jó, ɛ Jon Maaku cinɛ bó le, tu jim Jɛlusalɛm.
44013014	Ɛ bó nɛ jó, fey gɛn ɛ̂ kelaante kè Antiok wvu Bisidia le. Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu diuu di mbam e, ɛ bó gɛn ley shii yew bunle le.
44013015	Ɛ bonyii ke nɛ taŋ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' bonci bo Muses e noo ɛ̂ wvu bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le mɛse, ɛ bocee ɛkolɛ yew bunle yidvu mum tum ntum fô bo Baul e lɛ, “Boom bo bwee wese le, ɛ́ ben kɛŋke fiɛɛ keetefe bonyii dvú, ɛ́ ben jeme.”
44013016	Ɛ Baul mum nɛ we, ci bonyii bô kebo mum kɛw no jemyi lɛ, “Bonyii bo Islael noo bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu bò wvumte tɛn Nyo', ben eyekɛ eyuw.
44013017	Nyo' bonyii bo Islael to nu ɛ caw bo'icee cee bosɛse, ge ɛ kfuu dibole no kuuke seke bó to nu botolo woŋ wvù Ijiw e. Ɛ wvú ke mum bvuse bó jó bô mvuŋgay mwew,
44013018	kuu shém bô bó, no taale kɛ fô bó le ŋkpwaante yî bilum e mbaanyɛ.
44013019	Ɛ wvú ke ge ɛ bó shike bitum bisooshwiy woŋ wvù Kanaan e, mum nya woŋ wvudvu ɛ ɛ̀ no nu wvubo.
44013020	Mwɛɛm mvun mvunciim to nu ɛ jo diɛwɛ bilum gee nɛ kecow mbaanshen e (450). No wvú nyaɛ woŋ wvudvu ɛ̂ bó, mum gɛɛ bonyii bò esaakè bó. Ɛ bó saw gɛn buy yî kefew kè wee ntum we wvù Samwɛl to saake le.
44013021	Kɛ yî kefew kekiɛ le ɛ bó ke nɛ lɛkɛ keekɛŋke ɛ ɛ̀ nu nfon, ɛ Nyo' mum nya Saul, waa Kish wvu ɛ̂ kfuu di Bɛnjamen e. Ɛ wvú saw bvunfon yî bilum e mbaanyɛ.
44013022	Ɛ Nyo' ke shwaw wvú, gɛɛ Dawe Nfon wvubole. Nyo' to nu ɛ jeme ɛkumɛ Dawe wvun lɛ, ‘Me nu ɛ n'yɛn ɛ Dawe wvù waa Jɛɛse nu fitele fiem. Wvú nu ke egee fiɛɛ ficii fì me ŋgomte.’
44013023	Ɛ̀ to nu ɛ̂ kfuu di Nfon Dawe wvun e dì Nyo' to bvusɛɛ Mboyse, nya ɛ̂ bonyii bo Islael no wvú to kawɛɛ. Ɛ Mboyse wvun nu Jisos.
44013024	Ɛ́ Jisos wvun sɛ keeke ekɛw lemme diew nu ɛ Jon to fewci wase ɛ̂ bonyii bocii bo Islael lɛ bó ekumɛn mvuntelem mvubole ɛ́ wen elese bó ɛ̂ joo.
44013025	Ɛ Jon ke no nu wase keemɛɛse lemme diew, ke nɛ bife ɛ̂ bonyii lɛ, ‘Ben kpwaake lɛ me nu yɛɛ? Kɛ me n'yaa nu wee wvù ben cɛyte kɛ. Wee wvudvu too ɛjim jo me, ɛ me mbaa encim eŋkocɛn keeŋgvuwcɛ mbaayɛ bolaba bew kɛ.’”
44013026	Ɛ Baul gɛn fwe jeme lɛ, “Boom bo bwɛɛm e bò ɛ̀ nu kfuu di Abla'am e noo ben bonyii bocii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu bò wvumte tɛn Nyo', Nyo' to ciinse ntum wvun wvù ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bonyii eboy yî dvú le ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ beene.
44013027	Geenɛn, ɛ bonyii bo Jɛlusalɛm bô bonyii bobole bò saake woŋ, faŋɛ yaa jo Jisos diɛwɛ Mboyse le kɛ. Ɛ bó bvuu faŋɛ yaa kiɛɛ kenyi ke mwɛɛm mvù bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le to saŋɛɛ ɛkumɛ wvú kɛ. Ɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ mvú mvù bó to shee taaŋke ɛdiuw ɛ mbam e ɛcii. Ɛ bó ke dioo gay lɛ bó eyu wvú nonɛn, ɛ fifin mum ge ɛ fí to kocɛn no bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le to jemyɛɛ.
44013028	Naa no bó to baa cim yɛn jay wvù ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó eyu wvú yî dvú le kɛ, ɛ bó gɛn kɛ fwe gay ɛ̂ Baylɛt lɛ bó eyu wvú.
44013029	Ɛ bó ke ge fiɛɛ ficii no Ŋwa' Nyo' to jemyɛɛ ɛkumɛ Jisos, ɛ bó shike wvú yî kentam e gɛn lese wvú ɛ̂ jem.
44013030	Geenɛn, ɛ Nyo' kase bvuse wvú yî kpwe le.
44013031	Ɛ wvú ghan yî ɛdiuw e nteen duŋcɛ ɛkolɛ kew ɛ̂ bonyii bò bô bó to nɛn'yɛɛ Galilee gɛn Jɛlusalɛm. Ɛ̀ nu bó bò fewci ɛkumɛ wvú keseen ɛ̂ bonyii bo Islael.
44013032	Nonɛn, bese ɛ no nu tɛn fɛn keseen keefewcɛ saaka wvù jee wvudvu ɛ̂ ben. Saaka wvudvu nu lɛ, fiɛɛ fì Nyo' to kawɛɛ bo'icee cee bonyii bo Islael dvú,
44013033	nu ɛ wvú ɛ ge wase fí ɛ to ɛ kocɛn keseen kefew kesɛɛbeene le, beene bò nu boom bobole. Fifin kocine no Nyo' to bvusɛɛ Jisos yî kpwe le. Bó to nu ɛ saŋ wase ɛkumɛ fiɛɛ fin ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Mbense le biba bifɛɛ, ɛ Nyo' jemyi lɛ, ‘Wo nu Waa wɛm, ɛ me nu wase Ico ɛbɛn.’
44013034	Ɛkumɛ mbvuse wvù Nyo' to bvusɛɛ Jisos yî kpwe le lɛ fo wvú efo kɛ, Nyo' to nu ɛ jeme ɛ̂ yin je le lɛ, ‘Me nu ŋke enya ɛ̂ ben kembonɛn kè ɛ̀ nu kem, kè me nto ŋkawɛɛ Dawe dvú, nlew.’
44013035	Fí nu ɛ bó ɛ bvuu ɛ saŋ bvudvuu bvumew e ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Mbense le ɛ Dawe gayte lɛ, ‘Kɛ wo nu ke ecinɛ Waa wo lemme wvù Yuule le, ɛ́ wvú efo ɛ̂ jem kɛ.’
44013036	Fi ɛkumɛ Dawe nu ɛ wvú to lem lemme diew dì Nyo' to nyaɛ ɛ̂ wvú yî kefew kew e, ke kpwe ɛ bó dwey wvú mbew bo ice le, ɛ wvú fo.
44013037	Geenɛn, ɛ wee wvun wvù Nyo' to bvusɛɛ yî kpwe le to baa fo ɛ̂ jem kɛ.
44013038	Nonɛn, boom bo bwɛɛm e, ben emum ekeè ntay lɛ saaka wvun wvù bó fewci lɛ Nyo' lɛɛshi bibefɛ bi bonyii le nu ɛ wvú lɛɛshi nje Jisos wvun.
44013039	Wee wvù nu ɛ lese fitele fiew yî Jisos e, nu ɛ wvú ɛ boy wase yî bibefɛ biew e bicii, ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì ɛ̀ nulo nci Muses saa ege kɛ.
44013040	Nonɛn, ben eyɛnè fo fiɛɛ fì bó saŋɛɛ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le ke ekoo ben. Bó jemyi jó lɛ,
44013041	‘Ben eyekɛ eyuw ben bò wɛysee Nyo'. Diuw nu ke eyum ben, ɛ́ ben ekpwekɛn. Me nu ŋke emom fiɛɛ yî kefew kenɛn e, ɛ ɛ̀ nu fì wee be jeme lo ɛ̂ ben, ben saa ebee kɛ.’”
44013042	Ɛ Baul bô Banaban ke dioo ebuyte yew bunle yidvu le, ɛ bonyii bodvu no lɛke lɛ bó ke ebvuu eto kɛ bvu mbam wvù too le ejeme mwɛɛm mvun.
44013043	Ɛ bonyii ke dioo buy yew bunle le, ɛ bonyii nteen bò to nu Bojuu bô bonyii bò to baŋkɛɛ lo tu bo mbee Bojuu le, no bii Baul bô Banaban e. Ɛ bó no jemyi teete bonyii bodvu lɛ bó eyuukè kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu Nyo' le wvù nu ɛ buw bó bô nfi we.
44013044	Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu bvu mbam wvù biɛ wvuwɛ le, ɛ kelaante no gomte keebuy lo kecii keeto eyuw diɛw Nyo'.
44013045	Ɛ Bojuu yɛn no kebombom ke bonyii le tase nonɛn, mum no bene kendoŋ, kicine fiɛɛ fì Baul jemyi, nan'yi wvú.
44013046	Ɛ Baul bô Banaban no jemyi lo yaa fane kɛ, gayte lɛ, “Fí nu lɛŋ lɛ bese bee keeyaw efewcɛ diɛw Nyo' ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ ben Bojuu. No ben nu ɛ ŋwase lo, ɛ jo bikuu binɛn lɛ ben baa kocɛn keeke ekɛŋkɛ nshii wvù mɛy lo, tu bese nu ebaŋke fisɛse efewci ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu.
44013047	Ɛ̀ nu no Nyo' nu ɛ gay ɛ̂ bese, no wvú to jemyɛɛ lɛ, ‘Me nu ɛ ntome wo lɛ wo enu ken'yeese ke bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu le, ɛ́ wo ege ɛ́ bonyii bo ɛbuw ɛ woŋ e ɛcii ke eboy.’”
44013048	Ɛ bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu yuw nonɛn, mum no yuuke njoŋ, bɛnsee diɛw yì yi Tata. Ɛ bonyii nteen bee saaka wvudvu le, ɛ ɛ̀ nu bò Nyo' to nu ɛ baa wase lɛ bó nu ke ekɛŋkɛ nshii wvù mɛy lo.
44013049	Ɛ diɛw yì yi Tata mum lɛn woŋ wvudvu le tfuu.
44013050	Geenɛn, ɛ Bojuu mum nɛ bɛyse bocee ntɛw bô bokɛ' bo bonyii bo baay baay e, ɛ bokɛnɛ ban nu bò to ké no too yew bunle le, ɛ bó no bane Baul bô Banaban, mum kuŋ bó lɛ bó enɛ jó.
44013051	Ɛ bó dioo nɛn'yi nonɛn, kucɛ kebvu ke yî bikaa bibole lɛ ɛ̀ nu nciise fiɛɛ fì bó mom, mum gɛn ɛ̂ kelaante kè Ikonium e.
44013052	Ɛ ŋgoo bonyii bo mbee le shɛɛ no nu fibole yuuke njoŋ baay, ɛ Keyoy ke Yuule ɛ yiŋsɛn yî bó le.
44014001	No Baul bô Banaban gɛnɛɛ Ikonium, bvuu ge kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no bó to geɛ Antiok, keeley yew bunle Bojuu yi jó le, efewci saaka wvù jee dvú. Ɛ bó loocɛ fewcɛ, ɛ Bojuu noo bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu bee nteen.
44014002	Geenɛn, ɛ Bojuu bò to faŋɛɛ keebee nɛ bɛyse bonyii bomew bò to yaa nu kɛ Bojuu, befe bô mvuntelem mvubole lɛ bó eton'yì shém bô bonyii bo mbee le.
44014003	Ɛ Baul bô Banaban mɛy kɛ jó ɛ kefew defɛ, no fewci yaa fane kɛ ɛkumɛ Tata. Ɛ Tata nya bó bô mvuŋgay keegee mwɛɛm mvù duŋci mvuŋgay mvu Nyo' le bô mwɛɛm mvu diuw wvù yumɛɛn e mvù duŋci lɛ fiɛɛ fì bó fewci ɛkumɛ Tata no wvú nu ɛ buw bonyii bô mboyma nu kecɛɛy.
44014004	Ɛ bonyii bo ɛ̂ kelaante kedvu le gawsɛn. Ɛ bomew tu ɛ̂ keba ke Bojuu bò to faŋɛɛ keebee ba le, ɛ bomew tu ɛ̂ keba ke boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e.
44014005	Ɛ Bojuu ba bô bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu noo bikuu bi woŋ e tase, cu ntaŋ keenyɛwle bô boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e, etumyɛ bó bô ɛta ɛ́ bó ekpwekɛn.
44014006	Ɛ bó kiɛɛ ntaŋ wvudvu, mum lewtɛ gɛn woŋ wvù Likonia le, no ghane ɛ̂ bilaante bì Lista bô Dɛlbi le noo ɛ̂ bontɛw bò mbew jó le,
44014007	fewci saaka wvù jee jó.
44014008	Wee mvu to nu Lista, ɛ wvú to ké no shee kɛ fokuse, ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nulo ɛ́ wvú elɛn kɛ, njefo bó to boke wvú ɛ ɛ̀ nu ŋkɛwlɛ. Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu diuu dimew,
44014009	ɛ wvú shii no yeke fiɛɛ fì Baul to yɛɛyi. Ɛ Baul luŋ ɛjisɛ yî ye le, yɛn ɛ wee wvudvu kɛŋke mbee lɛ Nyo' nulo efɛ wen,
44014010	mum gay ɛ̂ wvú foweɛwe lɛ, “Ja eleem we.” Ɛ wvú mum sele we, kɛw no lɛne.
44014011	Ɛ kebombom ke bonyii le yɛn fiɛɛ fì Baul ge, mum no sane ɛtalɛ, jemyi ɛ̂ díɛw yi Likonia le lɛ, “Bonyo' nu ɛ tu bonyii ɛ shii ɛ to ɛ̂ beene le.”
44014012	Ɛ bó mum no teŋe Banaban lɛ Siyus, mum teŋe Baul lɛ Ɛmis no ɛ̀ to ké no yamte kɛ wvú jemyi.
44014013	Ɛ̀ to nu ɛ yew ncese nyo' wvù bó teŋe lɛ Siyus wvun nu mbew kelaante kedvu le. Ɛ cee ncese wvu fó mum jo bona' bò bolemsɛ noo fow no too dvú diuw ketaaŋ e lɛ bô bonyii ege ncese dvú ɛ̂ Banaban bô Baul.
44014014	Ɛ boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e ban kiɛɛ fiɛɛ fì bô bonyii bodvu to gomte keege, saayɛ ndvú ye le, lewtɛ ley ɛ̂ bonyii bodvu ɛnte, no kayte lɛ,
44014015	“Bonyii ban, ben gee ɛ ɛ̀ nu la fin? Bese nu kɛ bonyii lɛŋlɛŋ diɛwɛ ben e, ɛ bese to fɛn keefewcɛ saaka wvù jee wvù nɛn'yi fô Nyo' le lɛ ben ecinɛ bonyo' bo ɛcici ban e, ebiì ɛ ɛ̀ nu Nyo' wvù Nyo' le. Nyo' wvun nu wvù to bomɛɛ ɛbulɛ bô nshɛ noo jóo yi baay baay bô mwɛɛm mvunciim mvù nu mondvuum man e.
44014016	Ɛ̀ to nu fwele, ɛ wvú cinɛ bonyii le bitum e bicii, ɛ bó no gee no bó kooŋke.
44014017	Geenɛn, ɛ wvú no gee kɛ mwɛɛm mvù jee fô bonyii le keeduŋci lɛ wen nu dvú. Ɛ wvú no nyaa bó bô jaŋ, ɛ bó kɛŋke ŋgu ɛ̂ kefew ke lɛŋ e, diee yuuke njoŋ.”
44014018	Naa no Banaban bô Baul jemyɛɛ mwɛɛm mvun ɛ̂ bó nɛn, ke ge lo lɛ ce', ɛ bó sɛ lu keege ncese ɛ̂ bó.
44014019	Ɛ Bojuu bomew ke nɛ to jó, ɛ bó nɛ Antiok bô Ikonium, bɛyse bonyii nteen ɛ bó tumyɛ Baul bô ɛta. No bó tumyɛɛ, mum gufe buy bô wvú ɛlaante kpwaake lɛ wvú nu ɛ kpwe wase.
44014020	Geenɛn, ɛ ŋgoo bonyii bo mbee le ke to tase ɛ̂ wvú we, ɛ wvú kase nɛ we, tu ɛlaante jodvu. Ɛ bvú ke buy yuu, ɛ bô Banaban mum nɛ jó, no gɛne ɛ̂ kelaante kè Dɛlbi le.
44014021	No Baul bô Banaban ley Dɛlbi, fewcɛ saaka wvù jee ɛkumɛ Jisos, kɛŋkɛ bonyii bo mbee le jó nteen. Ɛ bó ke nɛ jó kase no tuu jim, fele ɛ̂ bilaante bì Lista bô Ikonium noo Antiok wvu Bisidia le.
44014022	Ɛ bó no fele nonɛn, yvuwse mvuntelem mvu bonyii bo mbee le, teete bó lɛ bó emɛy kɛ eleemè ntay yî mbee wvubole, keè lɛ bô bowen kɛŋke keeke eyɛn boŋgɛw nteen sɛ keeke eley bvunfon bvu Nyo' le.
44014023	Ɛ bó bvuu no baayi bocee bintaashɛ bi bonyii bo mbee le, gɛɛle ɛ̂ bintaashɛ bi bonyii bo mbee le bicii. Ɛ́ bó dioo gɛɛle no bamte mwɛɛm mvudien bunlee mum nya bó can Tata Jisos wvù bó beŋe wvú le.
44014024	Ɛ Baul bô Banaban ke fey woŋ wvù Bisidia le, daŋsɛn gɛn wvù Bamfilia le,
44014025	fewcɛ diɛw Nyo' ɛ̂ kelaante kè Bɛlga le, mum bow gɛn ɛ̂ kelaante kè Atalia le.
44014026	No bó bow jó, ley ɛ̂ ŋguw wvu ɛ̂ joo le, mum kase no tuu jim Antiok. Ɛ Antiok jan nu jò bó to nyaɛ bó can Nyo' le ɛ wvú buw bó bô nfi we ɛ bó sɛ mum no ghane gee lemme din dì bó to mɛsɛɛ.
44014027	No bó fɛse jó, baancɛ kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le, see fiɛɛ ficii ɛ̂ bó no Nyo' se lemɛɛ bô bó, bô no wvú se yen'yɛɛ mvuntelem mvu bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu le, ɛ́ bó elese fitele yî Jisos e.
44014028	Ɛ Baul bô Banaban ce bô ŋgoo bonyii bo mbee le bodvu ɛ kefew defɛ.
44015001	Ɛ bonyii bomew ke nɛ Judea, bow to Antiok, mum no yɛɛyi bonyii bo mbee le lɛ kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ Nyo' eboyse wee sɛ bó nu ɛ tfuse mwɛtɛn yew no nci Muses duŋci kɛ.
44015002	Ɛ Baul bô Banaban ma lo n'yɛɛyi wvudvu, ɛ bô bonyii bodvu she bew mbew yî dvú le ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu wvu wɛɛ kɛ. Ɛ fí ke ghaw, ɛ kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le ke Antiok baa Baul bô Banaban noo bonyii bo mbee le bomew, tum lɛ bó eben Jɛlusalɛm eyɛn boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e bô bocee kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le ke jó le, lɛ bó elese diuw fô fiɛɛ fidvu le.
44015003	Nonɛn, ɛ kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le ke Antiok mum ciinse bó, ɛ bó no gɛne fele biba bì Fonishia bô bì Samalia le seŋe ɛ̂ bonyii bo mbee le bo jó lɛ bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu nu ɛ kumɛn wase. Ɛ bonyii bocii no yuuke nonɛn, laŋlaŋe baay.
44015004	Ɛ bó ke ben gɛn fɛse Jɛlusalɛm, ɛ kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le bô boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e noo bocee kentaashɛ ke jó fiisɛn bó. Ɛ bó see fiɛɛ ficii ɛ̂ bó no Nyo' se lemɛɛ can yibole.
44015005	Geenɛn, ɛ bonyii bo mbee le bomew bò to nu tɛn ɛ̂ ŋgoo Bofalasii le, ja we gay lɛ, “Bó kɛŋke kɛ keetfuusè bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu yew, gaytè ɛ bó gɛɛle bonci bo Muses e.”
44015006	No bó gay nonɛn, ɛ boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e bô bocee kentaashɛ bvuu shii keeley ɛnte jo fiɛɛ fidvu.
44015007	Ɛ bó ke she jeme gɛn ncejole, ɛ Bita nɛ leem we gay lɛ, “Boom bo bwɛɛm e, ben kee lɛ ɛ̀ to nu fwele ɛ Nyo' baa me ɛ̂ ben ɛnte lɛ ɛ̀ nu diuw wɛm e wvù bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu nu ke eyuuke saaka we wvù jee, beŋe wvú le.
44015008	Ɛ Nyo' wvù kee mvuntelem mvu bonyii le, duŋcɛ lɛ wen nu ɛ fiisɛn bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu, nya bó bô Keyoy ke Yuule lɛŋlɛŋ no wvú to nyaɛ ɛ̂ beene.
44015009	Wvú to baa duŋci kejɛɛy jɛɛy beene ɛ bonyii bodvu kɛ. Wvú to nu ɛ ge ɛ mvuntelem mvubole no yuule njefo bó to nu ɛ lese fitele yî Jisos e.
44015010	No fí nu nonɛn, ben ɛ ghan nɛɛ ɛ sɛ no gomte keeshiike fitele fi Nyo' le, joo bvujitɛ gɛɛle yî ŋgoo bonyii bo mbee le, ɛ bvujitɛ bvun to ghaw wase beene noo bo'icee cee bosɛɛbeene?
44015011	Fí baa nu lɛŋ kɛ. Beene nu ɛ bee lɛ Nyo' boysee beene ɛ ɛ̀ nu nje mboyma wvù Tata Jisos nu ɛ buw beene dvú. Ɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ tɛn lɛŋlɛŋ no wvú boysee bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu.”
44015012	No Bita jeme ɛ mɛse, ɛ bonyii bocii cife, mum no yeke no Banaban bô Baul fɛle no bó se ghane gɛne fô bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu le, ɛ Nyo' nyaa bó bô mvuŋgay lɛ bó egeè mwɛɛm mvù duŋci mvuŋgay mvu Nyo' le bô mwɛɛm mvu diuw wvù yumɛɛn e dvú.
44015013	Ɛ bó jeme mɛse, ɛ Jɛm mum gay lɛ, “Boom bo bwɛɛm e, ben eyekɛ eyuw.
44015014	Semon be ɛ see wase ɛ̂ beene no Nyo' to kɛwɛɛ duŋcɛ tɛn shiee we fô bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu le, caw bomew ɛ̂ bó ɛnte lɛ ɛ̀ nu bew bonyii.
44015015	Ɛ fiɛɛ fì bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le to saŋɛɛ lɛne kɛ ɛkalɛ kemwaaŋ bô fì Nyo' to geɛ. Bó to saŋ lɛ,
44015016	‘Kefew too lo kè me nu ŋke eŋkase ento, enseyse yew Dawe yì nu ɛ gbwe wase. Me nu ŋke en'yoo binffuy bidvu, ɛ́ yí ekase eleem we.
44015017	Nonɛn, ɛ́ kebɛse ke bonyii le emum egomte Tata, ɛ bonyii ban bocii nu bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu bò me nu ɛ ncaw lɛ ɛ̀ nu bem bonyii.
44015018	Fifin nu ɛ ɛ̀ jemyi Nyo', ɛ wvú to ge wase ɛ bonyii kiɛɛ ɛ ɛ̀ bɛɛ lo bvuyvuum e.’
44015019	Me ɛ no n'yɛne fiem lɛ fo beene enyaà ŋgɛw ɛ̂ bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu bò nu ɛ lese fitele yî Nyo' le kɛ.
44015020	Beene esaŋ kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu ŋwa' fô bó le, egay lɛ fo bó edieè mwɛɛm mvù bonyii nu ɛ ge bintaŋe dvú fô bonyo' le kɛ, njefo ɛ̀ nu mwɛɛm mvu nnyɛn e. Fo bó ekɛŋkè fiɛɛ keege bô kenjaŋ kɛ. Fo bó edieè nyam yì nu sɛ bó sɛle lo ɛlɛmɛ ɛ buy kɛ. Fo bó edieè ɛlɛmɛ ke nyam e kɛ.
44015021	Bó saŋ nonɛn, njefo bonci bo Muses e ban nu ɛ bó to yɛɛyi wase ncejole mondvuum monciim ɛ bonyii yuuke, ɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ bó bò bó taaŋke ɛbɛn yéw bunle le ɛdiuw ɛ mbam e ɛcii.”
44015022	Nonɛn, ɛ boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e bô bocee kentaashɛ noo kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le kecii bee fifiɛ, mum yɛn lɛ fí jee lɛ bó ebaa bonyii ɛ̂ bó ɛnte etum ɛ́ bô bo Banaban noo Baul egɛn Antiok. Ɛ bó mum baa Judas wvù diee diew dimew to nu lɛ Basabas, bvuu baa tɛn Silas. Bonyii bo bofɛɛ ban to nu bikuu ɛnte jo bonyii bo mbee le.
44015023	Ɛ bó saŋ ŋwa' wvù bó nu etum bó dvú ɛ wvú nu lɛ: “Bese boom bo bwee wene le bò nu boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e bô bocee kentaashɛ gayte ben e bonyii bo mbee le bocii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu, bò nu ɛ̂ kelaante kè Antiok e bô bò nu keba kè Silia le noo bò nu ɛ̂ kè Silishia le.
44015024	Bese nu ɛ yuw lɛ bonyii bomew nu ɛ buy ɛ̂ bese ɛnte ɛ to ɛ no nyaa ŋgɛw, bvuŋse bvufee bvunɛn bô n'yɛɛyi mvu sɛ ɛ̀ tum bese bó ŋkuuŋ.
44015025	Nonɛn, bese ɛ mum ɛ shii bocii ɛ bee lɛ bó ebaa bonyii bomew etum fô ben e, ɛ́ bó etoò bô bo Banaban noo Baul bò nu nsáa yese shém.
44015026	Bonyii ban nu ɛ bó ɛ yefe wase kpwe ye le nje lemme di Tata wesebeene wvù Jisos Klistu le.
44015027	Bese ɛ mum ɛ tum Judas bô Silas lɛ bó eto ebvuu ejeme tɛn bô diuw fiɛɛ fì nu ɛ̂ ŋwa' wvun e.
44015028	Bee bo Keyoy ke Yuule nu ɛ yɛn lɛ fí baa jee keeyikɛ ben bô bvujitɛ bvumew ɛfey bonci bo shiee le ban bò nu lɛ:
44015029	Fo ben edieè mwɛɛm mvudien mvù bó nu ɛ ge bintaŋe dvú fô bonyo' le kɛ. Fo ben edieè ɛlɛmɛ ke nyam e kɛ. Fo ben edieè nyam yì nu sɛ bó sɛle lo ɛlɛmɛ ɛ buy kɛ. Fo ben ekɛŋkè fiɛɛ keege bô kenjaŋ kɛ. Ɛ́ ben lewte mwɛɛm mvun, tu ben gee lɛŋ. Bó ɛ shɛɛ wase.”
44015030	Ɛ bó saŋ nonɛn mum tum bonyii ba dvú ɛ bó bow dvú Antiok. Ɛ bó gɛn, kum kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le ke jó kecii, nya ŋwa' wvudvu ɛ̂ bó.
44015031	Ɛ bó taŋ ŋwa' wvudvu, ɛ saaka wvudvu lɛɛse mvuntelem mvubole, ɛ bó yuw njoŋ baay.
44015032	Ɛ Judas bô Silas bò to nu bonyii bò seŋe mwɛɛm mvù bó yuuke ɛ Nyo' jemyi, nya bontefe nteen ɛ̂ bonyii bo mbee le, ge ɛ bó no kɛŋke mvuŋgay ɛ̂ mvuntelem e.
44015033	Ɛ bó bosɛn ce jó ntay. Ɛ bonyii bo mbee le ke ciinse bó ɛ bó no kaase bô nyɛkeey tuu jim fô bonyii bò to tumɛɛ bó le.
44015035	Ɛ Baul bô Banaban bosɛn ce Antiok ntay, ɛ bô bonyii bomew yɛɛyi bvuu fewci diɛw Tata.
44015036	Ɛ kefew ke dioo gɛncɛ, ɛ Baul gay ɛ̂ Banaban lɛ, “Bee wo ekase etu jim eghan bilaante bì bee wo se fewci diɛw Tata bí le, eyɛn laa bonyii bo mbee le bo jó gee nɛɛ lɛ.”
44015037	Ɛ Banaban mum no gomte keejo Jon Maaku lɛ bô bó eghane.
44015038	Geenɛn, ɛ Baul faŋɛ yaa ekooŋke lɛ bó ejo wvú kɛ, njefo wvú to nu ɛ cinɛ bó le Bamfilia faŋɛ yaa mɛse lɛne dì bô bó to kɛŋke kɛ.
44015039	Ɛ Baul bô Banaban ke she kicɛn baay, mum gawsɛn. Ɛ Banaban jo Maaku, ɛ bô wvú ley ŋguw wvu ɛ̂ joo, gɛn Sayblus.
44015040	Ɛ Baul caw fiew ɛ ɛ̀ nu Silas. Ɛ bô wvú dioo nɛn'yi, ɛ bonyii bo mbee le nya bó can Tata le ɛ wvú buw bó bô nfi we.
44015041	Ɛ bó gɛn je biba bì Silia bô bì Silishia le, no ghane yvuwse mvuntelem mvu bintaashɛ bi bonyii bo mbee le.
44016001	Ɛ Baul ghan gɛn buy ɛ̂ kelaante kè Dɛlbi le, ke nɛ gɛn ɛ̂ ke Lista le. Wee ŋgoo Jisos mvu to nu Lista jodvu ɛ diee nu Timatio, ɛ bwee nu wee Juu, nu tɛn wee mbee, geenɛn ɛ ice to nu wee Glek.
44016002	Timatio wvun to nu wee ɛ bonyii bo mbee le bocii bo Lista noo bo Ikonium bɛnsee wvú.
44016003	Ɛ Baul no gomte keejo wvú lɛ bô wvú eghanè, mum tfuse wvú yew. Ɛ wvú to tfuse wvú yew nonɛn, njefo Bojuu bocii bò to cee biba bidvu le to kee lo lɛ icee Timatio to nu wee Glek.
44016004	Ɛ bó mum no ghane, gɛne ɛ̂ bilaante le, dioo gɛne no seŋe ɛ̂ bonyii bo mbee le bonci bò boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e noo bocee kentaashɛ ke Jɛlusalɛm to shilɛɛ bee lɛ bó egɛɛlè.
44016005	Nonɛn, ɛ bintaashɛ bi bonyii bo mbee le bidvu mum no tɛmyi gɛne fwe fwe yî mbee le. Ɛ bonyii no biise bó le ɛdiuw ɛcii.
44016006	Ɛ Baul bô ŋgoo ye nɛ lɛ bó egɛn efewcɛ diɛw Nyo' woŋ wvù Ɛsia le, ɛ Keyoy ke Yuule tun. Ɛ bó mum lɛn wase fey ɛ ɛ̀ nu je keba kè Fligia bô kè Galɛshia le.
44016007	Ɛ bó ke dioo gɛn buy mbew woŋ wvù Misia le no gomte keeley gɛn keba kè Bitinia le, ɛ Keyoy ke Jisos e bvuu tun.
44016008	Nonɛn, ɛ bó mum fey woŋ wvù Misia le, daŋsɛn gɛn ɛ̂ kelaante kè Towas e.
44016009	Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu ɛntaŋ, ɛ fiɛɛ diɛwɛ ɛfilɛ le nɛ to fô Baul e. Ɛ wvú yɛn ɛ̂ fiɛɛ fidvu le ɛ wee mvu wvu Masedonia leeme lɛke wvú lɛ, “Kee wo, lente kɛ eto Masedonia jan efi bese.”
44016010	No fiɛɛ fidvu to fô Baul e nonɛn, ɛ bee bó mum yɛn lɛ Nyo' nu ɛ duŋcɛ ɛ̂ bese lɛ bese egɛn efewcɛ saaka we wvù jee woŋ wvù Masedonia le. Kaŋ mwaaŋ, ɛ bese mum seyse keegɛn jó.
44016011	Ɛ bese nɛ Towas, lente teytey ɛ̂ ŋguw wvu ɛ̂ joo le, buysɛn Samotɛs. Ɛ bvú buy yuu ɛ bese gɛn fwe buy Niabolis.
44016012	Ɛ bese ke nɛ fó lɛn gɛn Filibi, ɛ ɛ̀ nu kelaante ke ɛ̂ keba ke fwe le Masedonia. Kelaante kedvu to nu wase ke bala bo Lum e. Ɛ bese ce jó yî ɛdiuw e.
44016013	Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu diuu di mbam e, ɛ bese buy ɛlaante jodvu, gɛn diuw joo le fô bese to kpwawci lɛ bvudvuu bvu Bojuu le bvu bunle le nu enu. No bese gɛn, ɛ bokɛnɛ bomew to tase wase fó, ɛ bese mum shii no jemyi ɛ̂ bó.
44016014	Kpwoon mvu to nu fó yuuke tɛn ɛ diee nu Lidia, ɛ wvú to ké no wvumte Nyo'. Wvú to buy ɛ̂ kelaante kè Tayatila le, ɛ wvú to ké no geese kfuu ndvú yimi, ɛ yí nu kɛ yí yɛɛle lo, lumte. Ɛ Tata yene fitele fiew, ɛ wvú bee fiɛɛ fì Baul to jemyi le.
44016015	Ɛ bó ke lese wvú bô bonyii bo ɛ̂ wvú yew ɛ̂ joo, ɛ wvú mum lɛkɛ bese gay lɛ, “Kee ben, ɛ́ ben fɛn nu ɛ yɛn lɛ me nu ɛ nlese fitele fiem ficii yî Tata le, ɛ́ ben to kɛ gɛn ce ɛ̂ me yew.” Ɛ wvú mɛy kɛ no nyɛɛyi nonɛn, ɛ bese ke ghan bee gɛn.
44016016	Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu diuu dimew ɛ bese dioo egɛne fô bvudvuu bvu bunle le, tasɛn bee bo wan kpwoon mvu ɛ ɛ̀ nu nfwa. Wvú to kɛŋke keyoy kemew yî ye le, ɛ ɛ̀ nu kè ké ge ɛ wee no nu wee diam. Bonyii bò to kɛŋke wan kpwoon wvudvu to kawte bigew yî ye le naa ntay nje wvú to ké no seŋe mwɛɛm mvù nu ke ekooy.
44016017	Ɛ wan kpwoon wvudvu dioo yɛn bee bo Baul e, mum no bii bese le wamte, gayte lɛ, “Bonyii ban nu bonyii bo lemme le bo Nyo' wvù nu Ɛkolɛ ke Mwɛɛm Mvunciim e, ɛ bó duŋci je yì ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ ben eghan jó sɛ boy.”
44016018	Ɛ wvú ke ge nonɛn buy ɛdiuw nteen, ɛ fí ke nɛ ton'yɛ Baul, ɛ wvú baŋke ye wam keyoy kedvu gay lɛ, “Me ŋgayte ɛ̂ wo ɛ̂ diee di Jisos Klistu le, buyɛ yî wan wvun e.” Ɛ kí mum buy yî ye le kɛ sekedvu.
44016019	Ɛ bonyii bò to kɛŋke nfwa wvudvu yɛn lɛ je bowen yi bigew nu ɛ yí ɛ ka wase, ɛ bó mum koo Baul bô Silas gufe gɛn bô bó fwe dvu bocee woŋ ya le fô bó to ké no saake bonsaw.
44016020	No bó gɛn bô bó, leke fwe dvu bala bo Lum bò to saake bonsaw gay lɛ, “Bonyii ban nu Bojuu, ɛ bó nyaa ŋgɛw ɛ̂ kelaante kesɛse le.
44016021	Bó yɛɛyi bonyii bô nce wvù nci wese baa bee kɛ. Bese nu bonyii bo Lum, ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nulo ɛ́ bese ebiì nce wvudvu le kɛ.”
44016022	Ɛ kebombom ke bonyii le kè to nu fó mum tom bó, fɛnte yî Baul bô Silas e. Ɛ bonyii bò to saake bonsaw ba mum saayɛ ndvú yî Baul bô Silas e, gay lɛ bó etam bó.
44016023	Ɛ bó loocɛ tam bó ntay, jo bó gɛn lese yew ncaw e, gay ɛ̂ wee wvù to cɛyte yew ncaw lɛ wvú ecɛytè bó ntay.
44016024	No wvú yuw nonɛn, mum jo bó gɛn fen naa ɛ̂ kebuw ke ɛnte le yew ncaw e, fen bikaa bibole ɛ̂ difwaŋ e.
44016025	Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu kɛ diɛwɛ ɛntaŋ ɛntelɛŋ e, ɛ Baul bô Silas bunlee yemte bensee Nyo', ɛ bonyii bo ncaw e yeke,
44016026	ɛ nshɛ nɛ sɛsɛ shiw bô mvuŋgay, ɛ yew ncaw shiw gɛn buy yî kenffuy e. Kaŋ mwaaŋ, ɛ dew fwese yicii yene ye, ɛ boncaw fɛykɛn yî bonyii bo ncaw e bocii.
44016027	Ɛ wee wvù to cɛyte yew ncaw yidvu kamse, dioo yɛn ɛ dew fwese nu yɛ, ɛ wvú mum no kpwaake lɛ bonyii bo ncaw e nu ɛ bó ɛ lewtɛ wase. Ɛ wvú mum baa nyo ɛ̂ ŋku le lɛ wen eyu ɛkolɛ kew dvú.
44016028	Ɛ Baul wam foweɛwe gay lɛ, “Fo wo eyu ɛkolɛ kuw kɛ. Bese nu fɛn bocii.”
44016029	Ɛ wee wvù to cɛyte yew ncaw wvudvu tee ɛ wee to bô ken'yeese, ɛ wvú lewtɛ ley yew, gɛn tum ɛnvuw fwe dvu Baul bô Silas ciiŋke bô nfan.
44016030	Ɛ wvú nɛ jo bó, buy bô bó ɛkfuŋ, bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Bo'icɛm, ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me eŋge nɛɛ nsɛ mboy.”
44016031	Ɛ bó tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Lese fitele yî Tata Jisos e, ɛ́ ben ɛ bonyii bo ɛ̂ wo yew ke emum eboy.”
44016032	Ɛ bó mum fewcɛ saaka wvu ɛkumɛ Tata ɛ̂ bô bonyii bo ɛ̂ wvú yew.
44016033	Ɛ wvú ke jo bó kɛ ɛntaŋ jodvu, cukɛ bilɛmte bibole. Kaŋ mwaaŋ, ɛ bó mum lese wvú bô bonyii bocii bo ɛ̂ wvú yew ɛ̂ joo.
44016034	Ɛ wvú mum jo bó, ɛ bô bó ben ɛ̂ wvú yew, ɛ wvú nya mwɛɛm mvudien ɛ bó die. Ɛ bô bonyii bocii bo ɛ̂ wvú yew mum no laŋlaŋe lɛ bó nu ɛ lese wase fitele yî Nyo' le.
44016035	Ɛ ɛkfuŋ ke buy yuu, ɛ bala bo Lum ba bò to saake bonsaw tum bonyii bo nci le lɛ bó egɛn egay ɛ̂ wee wvù cɛyte yew ncaw wɛ lɛ wvú ebvuse bonyii ba ɛ́ bó egɛnè.
44016036	Ɛ wee wvù to cɛyte yew ncaw wvudvu mum gɛn yɛn Baul e, gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Bala nu ɛ ciinse ntum lɛ me embvuse ben, ɛ́ ben egɛnè yî nyɛkeey e.”
44016037	Geenɛn, ɛ Baul gay ɛ̂ bonyii bo nci le ba lɛ, “Bó se nu ɛ tam bese ya le sɛ bó nu ɛ yaw wase ɛ saw nsaw wese ŋkuuŋ, ɛ bese nu kɛ tɛn bonyii bo Lum, ɛ bvuu ɛ fen bese yew, ɛ no duu keseen lɛ bó ebvuse bese ɛjim ɛjim nɛɛ le? Kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ fí ekooy kɛ. Ɛ̀ nu ke eto kɛ bala bodvu fɛn sɛ bvuse bese.”
44016038	Ɛ bonyii bo nci le ba kase tu jim see ɛ̂ bala bo Lum ba no Baul jeme. Ɛ bó yuw lɛ Baul bô Silas nu tɛn bonyii bo Lum, mum no fane.
44016039	Ɛ bó mum to ku can ɛ̂ bó, bvuse bó yew ncaw e, ciinse bó, lɛkɛ lɛ bó enɛ ɛlaante jodvu.
44016040	Ɛ Baul bô Silas buy yew ncaw e, gɛn yew dvu Lidia ɛ bonyii bo mbee le nu dvú, ɛ bó tefe bó mum nɛnɛ jó.
44017001	Ɛ Baul bô Silas mum no gɛne, fey ɛ̂ bilaante bì Amfibolis bô Abolonia le, daŋsɛn gɛn buy Tɛsalonika. Ɛ yew bunle Bojuu to nu jó.
44017002	Ɛ Baul mum gɛn ley yew bunle le kɛ no nce we to ké no nu, no too jemyi ɛ̂ bonyii dvú yî ɛdiuw ɛ mbam e ɛta, duŋci fiɛɛ ficii ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le.
44017003	Ɛ wvú no duŋci jó, cɛɛyi lɛ Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ to kɛŋke keeke eyɛn ŋgɛw, ekase ebuy yî kpwe le. Ɛ Jisos wvun wvù wen fewci ɛkumɛ wvú nu Mboyse wvudvu.
44017004	Ɛ bonyii bomew yuw nonɛn, bee bɛne Baul bô Silas e. Ɛ Boglek bomew bò to wvumte Nyo' noo bokɛnɛ bo baay baay bomew bee tɛn nteen.
44017005	Geenɛn, ɛ Bojuu bomew mum no bene kendoŋ bô Baul noo Silas, kum bonyii bomew bò to gbwayte ɛcici ɛ bô bó taashɛ kebombom e, kɛw diuw ɛlaante. Ɛ bó mum nɛ gɛn ŋgoy yew Jason lɛ bó gomte Baul bô Silas keebvuse enya ɛ̂ bonyii ɛkfuŋ.
44017006	Ɛ bó dioo gom ŋkuuŋ, mum gufe Jason bô bonyii bo mbee le bomew gɛn bô bó fwe dvu bocee ntɛw, no wamte gayte lɛ, “Bonyii ban nu bò ghane baŋse woŋ ɛ wvú tuu ncine, ɛ bó ɛ to wase ɛ buy jan,
44017007	Jason ɛ fiisɛn bó ɛ gɛɛ yew dvu wvú. Bó bocii ŋgoyte bonci bo Nfon wvu Lum e, duu lɛ Nfon wvumvu nu dvú ɛ diee nu lɛ Jisos.”
44017008	Ɛ bocee ntɛw bô bonyii yuw nonɛn, nɛ no wɛwte lo.
44017009	Ɛ bó mum kan ɛ Jason bô bonyii bo mbee le nya bigew lɛ ɛ́ fí ke bvuu kooy lo, bó saa etfuse bigew bidvu ɛ̂ bó kɛ. Ɛ bó mum cinɛ bó le ɛ bó no gɛne.
44017010	Ɛ ɛkfuŋ ke dioo jiim, ɛ bonyii bo mbee le jo Baul bô Silas ciinse ɛ bó no gɛne ɛ̂ kelaante kè Bɛlia le. No bó ley jó, gɛn yew bunle Bojuu le.
44017011	Bojuu bo jó to nu bonyii ɛ bó kee fiɛɛ fele bo Tɛsalonika, njefo bó to nu ɛ loocɛ fiisɛn n'yɛɛyi bô shiee, no taasse Ŋwa' Nyo' ɛdiuw ɛcii keeyɛn laa mwɛɛm mvù Baul yɛɛyi bó dvú nu kecɛɛy ɛ.
44017012	Ɛ bó mum bee diɛw Nyo' le nteen. Ɛ bokɛnɛ bo baay baay nteen bò to nu Boglek noo bolemsɛ nteen bò to nu tɛn Boglek bee tɛn.
44017013	Geenɛn, ɛ Bojuu bo Tɛsalonika ke yuw lɛ Baul nu ɛ gɛn wase ɛ no fewci diɛw Nyo' Bɛlia, ɛ bó mum gɛn tɛn jó, bɛyse kebombom ke bonyii le ɛ bó kɛw mvunlaa.
44017014	Ɛ bonyii bo mbee le mum gay lo ɛ̂ Baul kaŋ mwaaŋ ɛ wvú gɛn diuw joo yi baay e. Geenɛn, ɛ Silas bô Timatio shɛɛ Bɛlia.
44017015	Ɛ bonyii bò to gɛnɛɛ keeciinse Baul, gɛn buy Atɛn mum cinɛ wvú le. Ɛ bó dioo tuu jim, ɛ Baul tum bó lɛ bó egɛn tefe ɛ̂ Silas bô Timatio lɛ bó emom kɛ lɛ ebi wen e cekey.
44017016	Ɛ Baul mum no cɛyte Silas bô Timatio Atɛn. Ɛ wvú ke dioo ghane jó, yɛn ɛ kelaante kedvu ɛ yiŋsɛn lo bô mvumooso. Ɛ fí shiw fitele fiew.
44017017	Ɛ wvú mum gɛn yew bunle Bojuu le, jeme bô bó noo bonyii bò to yaa nu kɛ Bojuu bò to bunlee tɛn Nyo' dvú. Ɛ wvú bvuu no jemyi tɛn ɛdiuw ɛcii ya le bô bonyii bò to ké nɛ to fó.
44017018	Ɛ bonyii bo n'yɛɛyi le bomew bò bó to teŋe lɛ Ɛbikolian noo bò bó to teŋe lɛ Sitoyik ke nɛ to keebew tɛn mbew bô bo Baul. No Baul to fewci ɛkumɛ Jisos noo mbuy wvu yî kpwe le, ɛ bomew mum no biite lɛ, “Keyuŋ kin sɛ kumte diuw lɛ la le?” Ɛ bomew no duu fibole lɛ, “Fí yen'yi nɛn kɛ diɛwɛ wvú fewci ɛkumɛ bonyo' bo bonyii bomew e.”
44017019	Nonɛn, ɛ bó mum jo Baul ɛ bô bó gɛn fô nshii wvù bó teŋe lɛ Aleobagus e, gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Bese gomte keebvuu eyuw ɛkumɛ n'yɛɛyi wvu fwɛ wvun wvù wo too dvú laa wvú nu lɛ la lɛ.
44017020	Wo jemyi mwɛɛm mvumew ɛ bese ke baa yuw wase kɛ. Nonɛn, bese ɛ no gomte keekiɛɛ kenyi kedvu.”
44017021	(Bonyii bo Atɛn noo botolo bo jó to ké no nu kɛ fibole keeshee yuuke ɛ ɛ̀ nu mwɛɛm mvu mvunfɛm, jemyi ɛkumɛ mvú.)
44017022	Ɛ Baul mum leem fwe dvu nshii Aleobagus wvudvu, gay lɛ, “Bonyii bo Atɛn, me n'yɛne lɛ ɛ̂ jé le yicii nu ɛ ben wvumte bonyo' baay.
44017023	Me njemyi nɛn, njefo me nse ŋghane ɛlaante jonɛn, ɛ ndioo ntaale mondvuum mò ben bunlee bonyo' mó le, ɛ n'yɛn ketaŋ ke ncese le kemew e ɛ bó ɛ saŋ yî dvú le lɛ, ‘Fô nyo' wvù bó baa kee le kɛ.’ Nyo' wvudvu wvù ben bunlee, wvù bó baa kee kɛ, nu wvú wvù me nu enfewcɛ ɛ̂ ben keseen.
44017024	Nyo' wvudvu wvun nu wvù to bomɛɛ woŋ wvun bô mwɛɛm mvunciim mvù nu yî dvú le. Ɛ̀ nu wvú Nfon ɛbulɛ bô nshɛ, ɛ kɛ wvú ké no cee yéw ncese yì ɛ̀ bom bonyii le kɛ.
44017025	Kɛ wvú tane fiɛɛ fimew fì wvú taale lɛ wee elem fô wvú le kɛ, njefo ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù gee ɛ bonyii bocii yoyte, nu dvú, kɛŋke fiɛɛ ficii fì bó shieele.
44017026	Wvú to nu ɛ ge ɛ dikfuu di bonyii le dicii buy yî wee mwaaŋ e no nu yî ɛkolɛ ke nshɛ le. Ɛ́ wvú sɛ ge nonɛn, nu ɛ wvú to seyse wase kefew kè bó nu ke enu dvú, noo bidwee bi mondvuum mò bó nu ke eceè mó le.
44017027	Wvú to ge nonɛn, wvu lɛ bonyii ke eghaale, gomte wvú laa bó nu ke eyuu eyɛn wvú le lɛ. Geenɛn, ɛ kɛ Nyo' yaa cim nu ncejole fô wee mvu beene le kɛ.
44017028	Fifin nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no wee mvu to jemyɛɛ wase lɛ, ‘Ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù gee ɛ beene sɛ cee, lɛne, bvuu nu no beene nu.’ Ɛ wee wene binfɛ mvu to jeme wase tɛn lɛ, ‘Beene nu naa boom bew’.
44017029	No beene nu boom bo Nyo' le nonɛn, fo beene ekpwaakè lɛ Nyo' fieesene fiɛɛ fì ɛ̀ seyse wee bô bvufee bwew, ɛ tfuy bô ketwaa ke bigew e, kɛnɛɛ ɛ kene lo bô tɛ kɛ.
44017030	Ɛ̀ to nu kefew kè bonyii to bɛɛ kenjiwe le, gee mwɛɛm mvù befe mvun, ɛ Nyo' cin'yi dvú. Geenɛn, keseen nu ɛ wvú gayte lɛ bonyii bocii ekumɛn mvuntelem mvubole.
