44017031	Bó ekumɛn njefo wvú nu ɛ gɛɛ diuu dì wvú nu ke esaw woŋ tfuu bii kecɛɛy e. Wvú nu ɛ baa wase wee we wvù nu ke esaake. Fifin nu ɛ wvú duŋcɛ wase ɛ̂ bonyii bocii lɛ ɛ̀ nu kecɛɛy no wvú to bvusɛɛ wee wvudvu yî kpwe le.”
44017032	No Baul jeme nonɛn, ɛ bó yuw ɛ wvú ɛ bɛn ɛkumɛ mbuy wvu yî kpwe le, ɛ bonyii bomew nɛ no kieele lo wvú. Ɛ bomew gay fibole lɛ, “Bese gomte keeke ebvuu eyuw ɛkumɛ fiɛɛ fì wo jemyi fin.”
44017033	Nonɛn, ɛ Baul mum buy cinɛ bó le.
44017034	Geenɛn, ɛ bonyii bomew bee fiɛɛ fì wvú to jemyi le, bɛne wvú le. Wee mvu bó le to nu Dionisius wvù to nu wee nshii Aleobagus, ɛ mvu nu kpwoon ɛ diee nu Damalis noo bonyii bomew tɛn.
44018001	Ɛjim jodvu, ɛ Baul nɛ Atɛn gɛn ɛ̂ kelaante kè Kolɛn e.
44018002	No wvú gɛn jó, ɛ bô wee Juu mvu tasɛn ɛ diee nu Akpwila, ɛ bó to boke wvú Bontus. Akpwila bô Blisilia wvù kpwɛse to bɛɛ nɛ kɛ lo Itali, njefo Klawdius wvù Nfon wvu Lum to nu ɛ bvuse sa' lɛ Bojuu bocii ebuy jó. Ɛ Baul ke laa ghane ɛ̂ bó le,
44018003	dioo yɛn lɛ bó seysee jéw yì bó saaŋke cún dvú, ɛ ɛ̀ to nu kɛ tɛn lemme dì wvú wvù Baul to cee nje dí, ɛ wvú mum no cee fó, ɛ bô bó lemte.
44018004	Ɛ́ ké dioo nu ɛdiuw ɛ mbam e ɛcii, ɛ wvú no gɛne yew bunle le, jemyi bô Bojuu noo Boglek dvú, momte keege lɛ bó ebee fiɛɛ fì wvú to yɛɛyi le.
44018005	Ɛ Silas bô Timatio ke dioo nɛ Masedonia to, ɛ Baul mum jo kefew kew kecii no fewci ɛ ɛ̀ nu diɛw Nyo', duŋci ɛ̂ Bojuu lɛ Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ nu Jisos.
44018006	Geenɛn, ɛ Bojuu bodvu ke nɛ no kicine fiɛɛ fì wvú to jemyi, nan'yi wvú. Ɛ wvú mum yɛwse ndvú ye gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Kpwe yene enù can yene le. Kɛ me ŋkɛŋke ɛbo fó kɛ. Ɛ kɛw yî keseen e, me nu eŋgɛnè wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu le.”
44018007	Ɛ wvú mum cinɛ bó le, buy gɛn no cee wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô wee mvu ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu wee Juu kɛ, ɛ wee wvudvu to ké no wvumte Nyo'. Diee diew to nu Titius Justus, ɛ la diew nu mbew yew bunle le.
44018008	Ɛ Klisbus wvù cee ɛkolɛ yew bunle bô bonyii bocii bo ɛ̂ wvú yew ke lese fitele yî Tata le. Ɛ bonyii bo Kolɛn nteen no yuuke no Baul fewci ɛkumɛ Jisos, beŋe, ɛ bó mum leese bó ɛ̂ joo.
44018009	Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu ɛntaŋ jomew, ɛ Tata jeme ɛ̂ Baul ɛ̂ fiɛɛ diɛwɛ ɛfilɛ le lɛ, “Fo wo efanè kɛ, ɛ̀ fewcì kɛ diɛw yɛm gɛne dvú. Fo wo ke elu dvú kɛ,
44018010	njefo me nu bee wo, ɛ kɛ wee yaa nu naa dvú wvù nulo ege fiɛɛ bô wo kɛ. Bonyii bem nu ɛ̂ kelaante kin e nteen.”
44018011	Nonɛn, ɛ Baul mum no nu jó yî kelum e kecile bô keŋgawtɛn, yɛɛyi bonyii bô diɛw Nyo'.
44018012	No Baul to nu jó, ɛ Galio ke dioo nu wee sa' wvu ɛ̂ keba kè Akɛya le, ɛ Bojuu baancɛ ye koo wvú gɛn bô wvú yew nsaw e,
44018013	jeme ɛ̂ Galio lɛ, “Wee wvun momte keebaŋse bonyii ɛ bó bunlee Nyo' ɛ̂ je mi le jɛɛy sɛ ɛ̀ nu no nci gomte.”
44018014	Ɛ Baul ke nɛ lɛ wen ejemyi, ɛ Galio nɛ jeme ɛ̂ Bojuu ba lɛ, “Bojuu ben eyuw, ɛ́ fiɛɛ fin be nu fiɛɛ fimew fì befe ɛ wee wvun ɛ ge, kɛnɛɛ nci mvu ɛ wvú ɛ ŋgoy, tu me mbe ɛ ŋkuu shém ɛ n'yekɛ fiɛɛ fì ben jemyi.
44018015	Geenɛn, no fiɛɛ fin nu kɛ mbew ɛkumɛ díɛw bô ɛdiee noo bonci bonɛn, ben eseyse ɛbenɛben. Kɛ ɛ̀ yaa nulo ɛ́ me ensaw fifin fiɛɛ kɛ.”
44018016	No wvú jeme nonɛn, mum kuŋ bó ɛ bó buy yew nsaw e.
44018017	Ɛ bó bocii mum nɛ ley yî Sostɛnes wvù to nu cee ɛkolɛ yew bunle le, mum suŋ wvú fwe dvu yew nsaw. Ɛ Galio faŋɛ yaa kpwe lo fiɛɛ fó kɛ.
44018018	Ɛjim jodvu, ɛ Baul bvuu ce Kolɛn bô bonyii bo mbee le yî ɛdiuw e nteen, ke mum nɛ cinɛ bó le ɛ bô bo Blisilia noo Akpwila ley ɛ̂ ŋguw wvu ɛ̂ joo le keegɛne Silia. Ɛ́ bó sɛ nɛ Sɛŋklia fò bó to leyɛɛ ɛ̂ ŋguw e, ɛ Baul mvu ɛkolɛ nje ŋkawma wvù wvú to geɛ fô Nyo' le.
44018019	Ɛ bó no gɛne, ke gɛn buy Ɛfɛsus, ɛ Baul cinɛ Blisilia bô Akpwila le jó, yaw gɛn fiew ɛ ɛ̀ nu yew bunle Bojuu le, jeme ɛ̂ Bojuu dvú.
44018020	Ɛ bó ke lɛkɛ lɛ wvú ebvuu ece kɛ bô bó ɛdiuw nteen, ɛ wvú tun.
44018021	Geenɛn, ɛ wvú ke dioo nɛn'yi, gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Me nu ŋke eŋkase ento ɛ̂ ben e ɛ́ Nyo' fɛn ɛ bee.” No wvú gay nonɛn, mum ley ɛ̂ ŋguw e nɛ Ɛfɛsus.
44018022	Ɛ ŋguw ke gɛn buy Kaysalia, ɛ Baul buy, ben gɛn gay kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le Jɛlusalɛm, mum nɛ bow Antiok.
44018023	Ɛ wvú ke ce jó ɛ kefew gɛncɛ, mum kase nɛ no lɛne fele ɛ̂ biba bì Galɛshia bô Fligia le, yvuwse mvuntelem mvu bonyii bo mbee le bo jó.
44018024	Ɛ wee Juu mvu ke nɛ to Ɛfɛsus ɛ diee diew nu Abolos, ɛ bó to boke wvú Alɛksandia. Ɛ̀ to nu wee ɛ wvú kee njeme, bvuu kee Ŋwa' Nyo' ntay.
44018025	Bó to nu ɛ yɛɛyi wase wvú bô Je yì Tata duŋci, ɛ wvú mum no fiee lo bô n'yɛɛyi wvu ɛkumɛ Jisos, yɛɛyi bonyii lɛŋ. Geenɛn, wvú to kee kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì Jon to fewci leese bonyii ɛ̂ joo.
44018026	No wvú to toɛ Ɛfɛsus, mum kɛw no yɛɛyi bonyii yew bunle le yaa fane kɛ. Ɛ Blisilia bô Akpwila ke yuw no wvú yɛɛyi nonɛn, mum jo wvú, gɛn bvuu yuuse wvú ntay ɛkumɛ Je yì Nyo' duŋci.
44018027	Ɛ Abolos ke nɛ kpwawcɛ lɛ wen enu elente egɛn keba kè Akɛya le. Ɛ bonyii bo mbee le bo Ɛfɛsus mum ficɛ wvú, saŋ ŋwa' ɛ̂ ŋgoo bonyii bo mbee le bo Akɛya, tomte lɛ wvú ke dioo ɛ fɛse ɛ bó fiisɛn wvú. Ɛ wvú ke gɛn jó, fi bonyii bo mbee le ntay, ɛ bonyii ban nu bò Nyo' to nu ɛ buw bó bô mboyma, ɛ bó lese fitele yî Jisos e.
44018028	Ɛ wvú no beeke mbew bô Bojuu ya le ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu wvu wɛɛ kɛ, soo bó, duŋci ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le lɛ Jisos nu Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ.
44019001	Ɛ̀ to nu seke Abolos to nu Kolɛn, ɛ Baul ke jo je yi ɛnte ɛnte ɛ̂ biba bì wvú to lɛne jó le, fɛse Ɛfɛsus. No wvú fɛse jó, yɛn ŋgoo bonyii bo mbee le bomew e,
44019002	bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Keyoy ke Yuule to nu ɛ to yî yene le seke ben to lesɛɛ fitele yî Jisos e?” Ɛ bó tfuse lɛ, “Bese ke baa yuw wase lɛ fiɛɛ fimew nu Keyoy ke Yuule kɛ.”
44019003	Ɛ Baul bife lɛ, “Ɛ́ ɛ̀ fɛn nu nonɛn, tu bó to lese ben ɛ̂ joo nje la?” Ɛ bó tfuse lɛ, “Bó to lese bese ɛ̂ joo bii no Jon to fewci.”
44019004	Ɛ Baul mum gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Jon to leese bonyii ɛ̂ joo, keeduŋcɛ lɛ bó nu ɛ kumɛn mvuntelem mvubole, ɛ wvú to gayte lɛ bó ebee ɛ ɛ̀ nu wee wvù too ɛ̂ wen ɛjim e, ɛ wee wvù wvú to gayte nu Jisos.”
44019005	Ɛ bonyii bodvu yuw no Baul gay nonɛn, ɛ bó mum lese bó ɛ̂ joo ɛ ɛ̀ nu wase ɛ̂ diee di Tata Jisos e.
44019006	Ɛ Baul gɛɛ can yî bó le, ɛ Keyoy ke Yuule mum to yî bó le. Ɛ bó mum nɛ no jemyi díɛw yì bó yaa kee kɛ, bvuu seŋe ɛ̂ bonyii mwɛɛm mvù bó yuuke ɛ Nyo' jemyi.
44019007	Bonyii bodvu to nu wee diɛwɛ yuufe ncow bofɛɛ le.
44019008	Ɛ Baul mum no nu kɛ Ɛfɛsus, gɛne yew bunle le yî kee le tɛ, jemyi ɛ̂ bonyii dvú yaa fane kɛ. Ɛ bô bó no beeke mbew, ɛ wvú momte keege lɛ bó ebee fiɛɛ fì wvú jemyi ɛkumɛ bvunfon bvu Nyo' le.
44019009	Ɛ bonyii bomew tɛme bikuu faŋ keebee, mum no jemyi díɛw yì befe ɛ̂ bonyii ɛjise ɛkumɛ Je Tata. Ɛ Baul mum cinɛ bó le, jo ŋgoo bonyii bo mbee le, ɛ bô bó gɛn wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu yew n'yɛɛyi yi Taylanus e, no jemyi ɛ̂ bó dvú ɛdiuw ɛcii.
44019010	Ɛ Baul ge nonɛn yî bilum e bifɛɛ. Nonɛn, ɛ Bojuu noo Boglek bocii bo woŋ wvù Ɛsia jodvu le yuw diɛw Tata.
44019011	Ɛ Baul no nu, ɛ Nyo' gee, ɛ wvú gee biŋghaw bi mwɛɛm e ɛ ɛ̀ nu lo bi diuw wvù yumɛɛn e.
44019012	Bó to ké joo kɛ naa fiɛɛ fiew fi ye le diɛwɛ fincake fi ndvu le, kɛnɛɛ ndvu ye lemme, egɛn ekum wee kencɛm e dvú, ɛ wvú mum bonɛn lo, ɛ́ ɛ̀ nu wvù kɛŋke keyoy kè befe yî ye le, ɛ kí buy.
44019013	Ɛ Bojuu bomew bò to ké no ghane bvuuse biyoy bì befe yî bonyii le, ke mum nɛ no momte keeteŋe diee di Tata Jisos e sɛ bvuuse biyoy bidvu. Ɛ́ wee ké nɛ mum gay ɛ̂ keyoy kè befe lɛ, “Me mbvuuse wo ɛ̂ diee di Jisos wvù Baul fewci le.”
44019014	Bonyii bò to momte fiɛɛ fidvu to nu bosooshwiy, ɛ ɛ̀ to nu boom bo Sikɛfa wvù ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese Bojuu le.
44019015	Ɛ keyoy kè befe ke bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Me ŋkee Jisos, ŋkee tɛn Baul, ben nu finɛn baa?”
44019016	Ɛ wee wvù keyoy kè befe kedvu to nu yî ye le mum fɛnte lo yî bonyii bodvu le, gowsɛ bó kuse, ɛ bó fɛɛ lo buy yew dvu wee wvudvu nu wase binyi bincimte bô bilɛmte ye le.
44019017	Ɛ Bojuu bô Boglek bocii bò to cee Ɛfɛsus yuw ɛkumɛ fiɛɛ fidvu, no fane. Ɛ bonyii mum no wvumte diee di Tata Jisos e fesene lo.
44019018	Ɛ bonyii nteen bò to nu wase bonyii bo mbee le no too seŋe bvuu bwaashi mwɛɛm mvu ɛjiwɛ le mvù bó to gee.
44019019	Ɛ bomew nteen bò to gee nfim, baancɛ boŋwa' bobole bo nfim e, to dvú, ton ɛ̂ bonyii ɛjise. Ɛ bó taŋ kpwaw boŋwa' bodvu bocii, ɛ wvú buy ɛjisɛ bigew bontfuke mbaanshen (50,000).
44019020	Nonɛn, ɛ mwɛɛm mvun ge ɛ diɛw Tata no leyte ɛ̂ mvuntelem mvu bonyii le bô mvungay, saaŋkene gɛne lo fwe fwe.
44019021	Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu ɛjim jodvu, ɛ Baul yɛn lɛ wen nu egɛn Jɛlusalɛm, ɛ wen nu dioo gɛne, efey je biba bì Masedonia bô Akɛya le. Ɛ wvú bvuu no gayte lɛ, “Me nu ŋke endioo ɛ ŋgɛn ɛ mbuy Jɛlusalɛm, eŋkɛŋke keeŋgɛn tɛn embuy Lum.”
44019022	Ɛ wvú mum yaw tum bonyii bofɛɛ, Timatio bô Ɛlastus bò to fici wvú, ɛ bó gɛn fwe Masedonia. Ɛ wvú shɛɛ bvuu ce Ɛsia caan.
44019023	Ɛ ɛ̀ no nu kɛ kefew kedvu le, ɛ mvunlaa nɛ kɛw Ɛfɛsus ɛkumɛ Je Tata ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu mvu wɛɛ kɛ.
44019024	Cee ɛlamɛ mvu to nu jó, ɛ diee nu Dɛmitiyus, ɛ wvú to ké no tfuyte mwɛɛm mvù fieesene yew ncese nyo' wvù bó teŋe lɛ Atɛmis. Lemme didvu din to ké no too bô bigew fô bonyii bò tone ɛlamɛ le ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu bi wɛɛ kɛ.
44019025	Ɛ Dɛmitiyus mum kum bonyii bò to tone ɛlamɛ bocii noo bonyii bò to lemte kfuu didiɛ lemme, ɛ bó tase. Ɛ wvú gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Boom bo bwɛɛm e, ben kee lo lɛ lemme din nu ɛ beene ŋole bigew yî dvú le.
44019026	Ben ɛ no yɛne bvuu yuuke fiɛɛ fì fimbwɛ fì Baul fin gee. Wvú ghane gayte lɛ kɛ bonyo' bò bó kene lo bô can yaa nu bonyo' kɛ. Wvú nu ɛ ge wase nonɛn, ɛ baŋke bvufee bvu bonyii le nteen Ɛfɛsus jan, ɛ no baŋse wase tɛn bvu bonyii bo Ɛsia le bocii ɛ bó beŋe wvú le.
44019027	Me n'yɛne lɛ lemme disɛɛbeene din nu ekɛŋkɛ diee dì befe. Ɛ kɛ ɛ̀ mɛy nonɛn kɛ, yew ncese nyo' wvu baay wvù kpwoon wvù Atɛmis nu ke etu fiɛɛ fi ɛcici. Ɛ́ fí kooy lo nonɛn, tu bó ɛ shoose wase nyo' wvu baay wvun wvù nu ɛ bó wvumte Ɛsia jocii, ɛ ɛkolɛ ke nshɛ le kecii wvumte tɛn.”
44019028	No bonyii bodvu yuw nonɛn, ɛ mvuntelem bɛnte lo bó. Ɛ bó mum kɛw no wamte, gayte lɛ, “Atɛmis wvu Ɛfɛsus nu nyo' wvu baay.”
44019029	Ɛ kelaante kedvu kecii mum bvuŋ. Ɛ kebombom ke bonyii le kè to tasɛɛ mum ley yî Gayus bô Alistakus e, ɛ ɛ̀ to nu bonyii bo Masedonia bò to lɛne bô bo Baul, gufe gɛn bô bó yew nshii noo bondvum e.
44019030	Ɛ Baul no gomte keeley gɛn fwe dvu kebombom kedvu, ɛ bonyii bo mbee le tun.
44019031	Ɛ bonyii bomew bo baay baay bo jó bò kɛŋke woŋ bò to nu nsáa ye, bvuu ciinse ntum fô wvú le lɛkɛ lɛ fo wvú emom lo etome ɛkalɛ dvú kɛ.
44019032	Ɛ kebombom kè to tasɛɛ kedvu mum nɛ bvuŋ no wamte kɛ lo ncɛw ncɛw. Ɛ bomew wamte fin fiɛɛ, ɛ bomew wamte fifi. Kɛ bonyii nteen to cim kee fiɛɛ fì bó to tasɛɛ fó nje fí kɛ.
44019033	Ɛ Bojuu mum jo Ɛlɛksanda fese fwe dvu kebombom ke bonyii le, ɛ bonyii bomew yɛn mum no kpwaake lɛ wvú kee fiɛɛ fó. Ɛ wvú mum no cici bonyii bô kebo keetaŋe diuw we.
44019034	Ɛ bonyii bodvu ke dioo kiɛɛ lɛ Ɛlɛksanda nu wee Juu, ɛ bó bvuu mɛse no wamte lo gɛne fwe yî wee le mwaaŋ, gayte lɛ, “Atɛmis wvu Ɛfɛsus nu nyo' wvu baay.” Ɛ bó ke wam nonɛn, gɛn buy bontam bo kefew e bofɛɛ.
44019035	Ɛ wee nsaŋ wvu ɛlaante jodvu ke nɛ ci bó, ɛ bó lu bô diuw. Ɛ wvú bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Bonyii bo Ɛfɛsus, wee nu dvú wvù maa lɛ kɛ ɛ̀ kɛŋke beene bo Ɛfɛsus jan yew ncese nyo' wvù Atɛmis noo tɛ di nyo' le dì to gbweɛ fowe le?
44019036	No wee nu sɛ wvú nu dvú wvù nulo ekicɛn fifin, tu ben bee keelaame, saa eyuŋsene nɛn kɛ.
44019037	Ben ɛ to bô bonyii ban fɛn sɛ bó nu ɛ coŋ fiɛɛ yéw bonyo' le, kɛnɛɛ ɛ jeme díɛw yì befe ɛkumɛ nyo' wesebeene wvù kpwoon wvun ŋkuuŋ.
44019038	Ɛ́ Dɛmitiyus bô bonyii bew fɛn kɛŋke nsaw bô wee, tu ɛdiuw ɛ nsaw nu dvú yò ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó egɛn eyɛn bonyii bò saake bonsaw e, ɛ́ bô bó esaw.
44019039	Ɛ́ fiɛɛ fimew fɛn bvuu nu dvú fele fin fì ben gomte, tu bó nu ke etaa ɛnte jodvu fô nshii bocee ntɛw e.
44019040	Me njemyi nɛn, njefo me n'yɛne lɛ fiɛɛ fi ɛbɛn fin nu elese beene diuw e lɛ beene nu ɛ kɛw mvunlaa. Ɛ fí kooy nonɛn, beene saa ekɛŋke fiɛɛ fi lɛŋ fì bó etfuse kɛ.”
44019041	No wvú jeme nonɛn, mum gay ɛ kebombom kedvu tawse.
44020001	Ɛ mvunlaa mvù to nu Ɛfɛsus ke lɛɛtɛn, ɛ Baul tee ŋgoo bonyii bo mbee le, tefe bó mum gay bó le no gɛne Masedonia.
44020002	Ɛ wvú gɛn, ghan biba bi jó le, yvuwsɛ mvuntelem mvu bonyii bo mbee le ntay, mum daŋsɛn gɛn Glees,
44020003	ce jó kee tɛ. Ɛ wvú ke nɛ no nu lɛ wen nu egɛn eley ŋguw wvu ɛ̂ joo egɛn Silia, mum yuw lɛ Bojuu nu ɛ gbwe wvú ɛ̂ je. Ɛ wvú mum yɛn lɛ ɛ̀ jee lɛ wen ekase etu jim je Masedonia.
44020004	Wvú to lɛne bô bò Sobata wvù waa Bilus wvu Bɛlia, noo Alistakus bô Sɛkundus bo Tɛsalonika, noo Gayus wvu Dɛlbi, noo Timatio, noo Tikikus bô Toofimus bò to nu bonyii bo Ɛsia.
44020005	Ɛ bonyii ban mum gɛn fwe no cɛyte bee bo Baul Towas.
44020006	Ɛ Ŋkaw Blɛɛd wvù bó baa gɛɛ Fintuŋlɛɛn jó ke fey, ɛ bese ley ŋguw Filibi, jo ɛdiuw ɛtin bɛne bó le Towas, ɛ bee bó ce jó ɛdiuw ɛsooshwiy.
44020007	Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu diuu di fwe yî kemaa le, ɛ bee bo kentaashɛ tase fokiɛguu keeguutɛn blɛɛd. No Baul to nu keebuy nɛ fò bvú ɛ yuu, ɛ wvú mum kɛw no jemyi ɛ̂ bó, ke jeme gɛn buy ɛntaŋ ɛntelɛŋ.
44020008	Bee bó to nu ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ kebuw ke yew e ke ɛwe le, ɛ bin'yeese baa dvú nteen.
44020009	Ɛ cuwee mvu wvù diee to nu Yutikus ɛ shii yî ntoo yew e. Ɛ wvú ke nɛ kɛw no leete no Baul to jemyi kɛ gɛne lo. Ɛ nyii ke dioo gooke wase lo wvú, ɛ wvú mum nɛ fó gbwe ɛkuse, ɛ fó to nu biŋkente bi yew e bitɛte ɛ kɛw fokuse. Ɛ bó gɛn jo ɛ wvú ɛ kpwe wase.
44020010	Ɛ Baul shii gɛn ŋgvuum ɛ̂ wvú ɛwe, bam wvú gay ɛ̂ bonyii lɛ, “Wvú bɛɛ dvú, fo ben ebuukè kɛ.”
44020011	Ɛ Baul ke kase ben ɛ̂ kebuw ke ɛwe kiɛ le, guse blɛɛd die, sɛ bvuu kɛw no jemyi, ke jeme ɛ bvutfuu ghan yuu ɛ wvú mum nɛ.
44020012	Ɛ bonyii ke jo cuwee wɛ kfulɛ bô wvú fô yew e ɛ wvú nu wum, ɛ mvuntelem lɛɛtɛn bó baay.
44020013	Ɛ bese ke ley ŋguw wvu ɛ̂ joo, gɛn Asos, no Baul to seysɛɛ wase lɛ ɛ̀ nu jó jò bese nu ke ejo wen. Wvú to gay nonɛn, njefo wvú to gomte keelɛn fokuse.
44020014	Ɛ wvú ke koocɛ bese le Asos, ɛ bese mum jo wvú ɛ̂ ŋguw e, ɛ bee bó gɛn buy Mitilin.
44020015	Ɛ bese ke nɛ fó ɛ̂ ŋguw e, ɛ bvú buy yuu, ɛ bese fɛse mbew Kios e, fey, ɛ bvú bvuu buy yuu, ɛ bese fɛse Samos, bvuu fey, ɛ bvú bvuu buy yuu, ɛ bese ley Miletus.
44020016	Bese to lɛne nonɛn, wɛmte lo Ɛfɛsus njefo kɛ Baul to gomte keejewse kefew Ɛsia kɛ. Wvú to gɛne cekey cekey laa ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wen ke enu Jɛlusalɛm diuu di Ŋkaw Bɛntekos e lɛ.
44020017	No bese ley Miletus, ɛ Baul ciinse ntum fô bocee kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le ke Ɛfɛsus e lɛ bó eto eyɛn wen e.
44020018	Ɛ bó ke to, ɛ wvú jeme ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Ben kee no nce wɛm to nu beene ɛ kɛw yî diuu di fwe dì me nto ntomyɛɛ ɛkalɛ yî nshɛ yi Ɛsia le.
44020019	Me nto nu ɛ nshike ɛkolɛ kem, no nlemte fô Nyo' le bô misɛm ɛjise. Ɛ me mbvuu n'yɛn boŋgɛw ɛ̂ jé le nteen no Bojuu to bone bikaa ɛ̂ me ɛjim.
44020020	Ɛ ben bvuu kee no me nto n'yɛɛyi ben ya le, mbvuu ŋghane n'yɛɛyi yéw e. Me nto mbaa nyilɛ fiɛɛ fimew fì ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ fí efi ben kɛ.
44020021	Me nto nfewci kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fimwaaŋ ɛ̂ Bojuu noo ɛ̂ bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu, ŋgayte lɛ bó ekumɛn mvuntelem mvubole, etu bô bo Nyo', elese fitele yî Tata wesebeene wvù Jisos Klistu le.
44020022	Keseen, ben eyekɛ eyuw, me ŋgɛne Jɛlusalɛm ɛ ɛ̀ nu no Keyoy ke Yuule gay ɛ̂ me, ɛ me n'yaa ŋkee lɛ laa ɛ̀ nu egɛn ekooy la bô me jó lɛ.
44020023	Fiɛɛ fì me ŋkee nu kɛ lɛ mondvuum monciim mò me nfele mó le, nu ɛ Keyoy ke Yuule seŋe kɛ ɛ̂ me lɛ ncaw bô ŋgɛw cɛyte me fwe.
44020024	Geenɛn, kɛ me n'yɛne nshii wɛm e lɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ kɛ, ɛfey lɛ me emɛse lemme dì Tata Jisos nu ɛ nya ɛ̂ me dì nu lɛ me enfewcì saaka wvù jee wvu ɛkumɛ no Nyo' nu ɛ buw bonyii bô mboyma.
44020025	Yî keseen e, ben eyekɛ eyuw, me ŋkee lɛ kɛ wee mvu ben e wvù beene ɛ bó se nu, ɛ me nfewci ɛkumɛ bvunfon bvu Nyo' le bɛɛ ke ebvuu eyɛn bvushiw bwem e kɛ.
44020026	Me ɛ mum ɛ no nlooci njemyi ɛ̂ ben ɛbɛn lɛ ɛ́ wee mvu ben e la lo keseen, tu kɛ me ŋkɛŋke ɛbo fó kɛ,
44020027	njefo me nse mbaa nyilɛ keensee fiɛɛ ficii ɛ̂ ben fì Nyo' shieele kɛ.
44020028	Ben dioo ɛ shɛɛ, no taalè fô bikuu binɛn e noo fô ŋgoo bonyii bo mbee le bò nu diɛwɛ njée le, bò Keyoy ke Yuule nu ɛ gɛɛ ben ɛ̂ bó we le. Ben enù boncɛy njée bo kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo Nyo' le kè wvú to sumɛɛ bô ɛlɛmɛ ke Waa we le.
44020029	Me ŋkee lo lɛ me nu ŋke endioo ɛ mbase ɛkalɛ, ɛ́ bokuula eto eley ŋgoo yene le, saa ecawte wee wvù bó ekoo kɛ.
44020030	Bonyii bomew nu ke ebuy kɛ naa ɛ̂ ben ɛnte, elɛɛle ŋgoo bonyii bo mbee le, guute ɛ bó tuu ɛ̂ ŋgoo yibole.
44020031	Nonɛn, ben eyɛnè, kumyì lɛ yî bilum e bitɛte nu ɛ me ɛ n'yɛɛyi ben bocii ɛntaŋ bô ɛmvunsheeŋ bô misɛm ɛjisɛ.
44020032	Me ɛ mum ɛ no nyaa ben keseen can Nyo' le noo yî diɛw ye yì nu ɛkumɛ nfi wvù Nyo' nu ɛ buw bonyii dvú. Diɛw yin nu yì nulo ege ɛ́ ben ekuu, wvu lɛ ben ke ekɛŋkɛ keleŋ fô bvudvuu bvù Nyo' nu ɛ gɛɛ ɛ̂ bonyii bò wvú nu ɛ ge lɛ ɛ̀ nu naa bew e.
44020033	Me nto mbaa njeeŋke bigew bi wee le kɛnɛɛ ndvú wee kɛ.
44020034	Ben kee ntay lɛ ɛ̀ nu can yɛm yin yì to lemte fiɛɛ ficii fì bee ŋgoo yɛm to shieele.
44020035	Yî mwɛɛm mvunciim e nu ɛ me nto nduŋci ɛ̂ ben lɛ wee kɛŋke keelemtè ntay emum efii bonyii bo ŋgɛw e, kumyì no Tata Jisos to jemyɛɛ lɛ, ‘Njoŋ wvu baay nu wvu wee wvù nyaa lo, fele wee wvù fii lo le.’”
44020036	No Baul mɛse ɛ jeme nonɛn, ɛ bô bó mum tum ɛnvuw fokuse bocii, bunle.
44020037	Ɛ bó nɛ kɛse bô kpwe no beele, bamte Baul ŋoci lɛ bó ɛ shɛɛ wase.
44020038	Fiɛɛ fì to geɛ ɛ́ bó sɛ no beele baay nɛn, nu diɛw yì Baul to jemyɛɛ lɛ kɛ bó bɛɛ ke ebvuu eyɛn bvushiw bvuwene kɛ. Ɛ bó mum ciinse wvú gɛn buy fô wvú nu eley ŋguw wvu ɛ̂ joo.
44021001	Ɛ bee bo Baul gay bó le, mum nɛ fó lente ɛ̂ ŋguw e teytey, fɛse Kos. Ɛ bvú buy yuu, ɛ bese gɛn Lodɛs, ke nɛ fó, gɛn Batala.
44021002	No bese buy jó, yɛn wvumvu ŋguw wvu ɛ̂ joo wvù to gɛne Fonishia le, mum ley jó no gɛne.
44021003	Ɛ bese ke yɛn Sayblus e, cinɛ ɛbo ɛŋkoŋko, mum fey gɛn buy Taya, woŋ wvù Silia le fô ŋguw to nu keebvuse mwɛɛm.
44021004	Ɛ bese gom bonyii bo mbee le, ɛ bee bó ce ɛdiuw ɛsooshwiy. Ɛ Keyoy ke Yuule ge ɛ bó tefe Baul lɛ fo wvú emom egɛn Jɛlusalɛm kɛ.
44021005	Ɛ bee bó ke ce, ɛ diuu ke to kocɛn dì bese enɛ, ɛ bese mum jo je. Ɛ bó bocii bô bokɛ' bobole noo boom, ciinse bese buysɛn kelaante kedvu gɛn buy diuw joo yi baay e, ɛ bee bó tum ɛnvuw fokuse, bunle mum gaynɛn.
44021006	Ɛ bese ley ɛ̂ ŋguw e, ɛ bó no tuu jim fô yew e.
44021007	Ɛ bese mum nɛ Taya, jo je, gɛn buy Tolɛmay. Ɛ bee bo boom bo bwee wese le bo mbee le gaynɛn, ce diuu dimwaaŋ.
44021008	Ɛ bvú buy yuu, ɛ bese nɛ, gɛn fɛse Kaysalia, gɛn yew dvu Filew wvù to ghane fewci diɛw Nyo', ɛ bee bó ce. Filew wvun to nu wee mwaaŋ ŋgoo bonyii bo bosooshwiy bò bó to baayɛɛ ba le.
44021009	Wvú to kɛŋke boom bokɛnɛ bonɛw, ɛ bó baa kee wase bolemsɛ kɛ, ɛ bó to ké no seŋe ɛ̂ bonyii mwɛɛm mvù bó yuuke ɛ Nyo' jemyi.
44021010	Ɛ bese no nu jó yî ɛdiuw e nteen, ɛ wee mvu wvù to ké no seŋe mwɛɛm mvù wvú yuuke ɛ Nyo' jemyi ke nɛ Judea bow to jó ɛ diee nu Agabus.
44021011	Ɛ wvú ke to yɛn bese le, jo kecaw ke Baul e, kay bikaa biew bi wvú wvù Agabus e noo can ye dvú, mum tefe lɛ, “Keyoy ke Yuule gayte lɛ ɛ̀ nɛɛ no Bojuu bo Jɛlusalɛm nu ke ekay wee wvù kɛŋke kecaw kin nɛn, enya wvú can bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu le.”
44021012	Ɛ bese yuw nonɛn, ɛ bee bo bonyii bocii bò to nu fó no lɛke Baul lɛ fo wvú egɛn Jɛlusalɛm kɛ.
44021013	Ɛ wvú tfuse lɛ, “Ben gee ɛ ɛ̀ nu la fin nɛn? Ben kee kɛ lɛ ben beele nɛn shiike fitele fiem e? Me nu ɛ nseyse ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu kɛ keenley ncaw Jɛlusalɛm maaŋ kɛ. Me nu ɛ nseyse tɛn naa keeŋkpwe lo jó nje diee di Tata Jisos e.”
44021014	No je to baa nu dvú keege ɛ́ wvú ekumɛn ŋkpwawcɛ we, ɛ bese mum lu, gay kɛ wase lɛ, “Fí enù kɛ no Tata gomte.”
44021015	Ɛ ɛdiuw fey, ɛ bese baancɛ mwɛɛm mvusɛse, mum no bene Jɛlusalɛm.
44021016	Ɛ bonyii bo mbee le bomew bo Kaysalia ben bee bó, ke jo bese ɛ bee bó gɛn yew dvu Mɛnason dvù bese to nu keeke ecee. Ɛ Mɛnason wvun to nu wee wvu Sayblus, ɛ ɛ̀ to nu wee mvu ɛnte jo bonyii bò to yawɛɛ lese fitele yî Jisos e.
44021017	No bese to fɛsɛɛ Jɛlusalɛm, ɛ bonyii bo mbee le bo jó fiisɛn bese ntay.
44021018	Ɛ ɛkfuŋ buy yuu, ɛ bee bo Baul laa ghane ɛ̂ Jɛm e, ɛ bocee kentaashɛ to nu tɛn fó bocii.
44021019	Ɛ Baul gay bó le, mum nyɛy fiɛɛ ficii ɛ̂ bó fì Nyo' to geɛ fô bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu le fele yî lemme dì wvú to lemte le.
44021020	Ɛ bó yuw nonɛn, mum kɛw no tumte moŋkum mo Nyo' le. Geenɛn, ke nɛ gay ɛ̂ Baul lɛ, “Waa bwee wese, taa eyɛn no Bojuu nu ɛ bó ɛ lese wase fitele yî Jisos e bontfuke le bontfuke le. Geenɛn, bó nu nonɛn bɛɛ kɛ leeme yî bonci bo Muses e tɛmyi,
44021021	ɛ bó ɛ see wase ɛ̂ bó ɛkumɛ wo lɛ wo ghane yɛɛyi Bojuu bò cee bitum bimew e lɛ bó ecinɛ bonci bo Muses e, jemyi lɛ fo bó etfuusè boom yew kɛ, bô lɛ fo bó ebiì nce woŋ e kɛ.
44021022	No fí nu ɛ bó nu ke ekiɛɛ kɛ lɛ wo nu ɛ to, ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ beene ege nɛɛ keseen?
44021023	Bese nu esee fiɛɛ fì wo nu ege. Bese kɛŋke bonyii fɛn bonɛw ɛ bó ɛ ge ŋkawma fô Nyo' le.
44021024	Joo bó, ɛ́ ben ɛ bó egɛn ekfum bikuu binɛn, ɛ́ wo elaw fiɛɛ ficii fì bó kɛŋke keelaw wvu lɛ bó egɛn emvu bikuu bibole. Ɛ́ wo ge nonɛn, ɛ́ bonyii bocii emum ekiɛɛ lɛ wo gɛɛle tɛn bonci bo Muses e, ɛ mwɛɛm mvunciim mvù bó jemyi ɛkumɛ wo yaa nu kecɛɛy kɛ.
44021025	Fi ɛkumɛ bonyii bo mbee le bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu nu ɛ bese to jo ntaŋ saŋ ŋwa' ciinse fô bó le lɛ fo bó edieè mwɛɛm mvudien mvù bó nu ɛ ge bintaŋe dvú fô bonyo' le kɛ. Fo bó edieè ɛlɛmɛ ke nyam e kɛ. Fo bó edieè nyam yì nu sɛ bó sɛle lo ɛlɛmɛ ɛ buy kɛ. Fo bó ekɛŋkè fiɛɛ keege bô kenjaŋ kɛ.”
44021026	Nonɛn, ɛ Baul mum jo bonyii bodvu, ɛ ɛkfuŋ ke buy yuu ɛ bô bó gɛn kfum bikuu bibole. Ɛ Baul mum gɛn yew ncese le, see diuu dì ɛdiuw ɛ ŋkfum nu ke edioo ɛ ka, ɛ́ bó emum ege ncese fô bó le wee mwaaŋ mwaaŋ.
44021027	Ɛ ɛdiuw yodvu ke dioo ekaa, ɛ yó to nu ɛsooshwiy, ɛ Bojuu bomew bò to nɛn'yɛɛ Ɛsia yɛn Baul e fô yew ncese le, mum bɛyse kebombom ke bonyii le, koo wvú,
44021028	no sane ɛtalɛ gayte lɛ, “Bonyii bo Islael, ben efi bese. Ɛ̀ nu wee wvun wvù ghane yɛɛyi mwɛɛm mvù befe ɛ̂ bonyii mondvuum monciim ɛkumɛ woŋ wesebeene bô bonci bo Muses e noo ɛkumɛ yew ncese yin. Wvú nu ɛ mɛse ɛ jo bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu, ɛ to bô bó yew ncese le fɛn, ɛ befe bô bvudvuu bvù yuule bvun.”
44021029	Bó to jemyi nonɛn, njefo bó to nu ɛ yɛn ɛ Baul ghane ɛlaante bô Toofimus wvù wee wvu Ɛfɛsus. Ɛ bó mum no kpwaake lɛ Baul nu ɛ ley bô wvú fô yew ncese le.
44021030	Ɛ ɛtalɛ kedvu ge ɛ̂ kelaante kecii shiw, ɛ bonyii no lewte too fó. Ɛ bó gheŋ Baul, gufe buy bô wvú yew ncese le, kaŋ mwaaŋ, ɛ bó mum faayɛ dew fwese.
44021031	Ɛ bó mum no gomte keeyu Baul, ɛ saaka ley bitem bi cee ɛkolɛ bikuu bi bonyii bo nci le bo Lum e lɛ Jɛlusalɛm jocii bvuuŋke lo.
44021032	Ɛ wvú mum nɛ lo kaŋ mwaaŋ, jo bonyii bo nci le bô bikuu bimew bi ŋgóo bonyii bo nci le, ɛ bô bó lewtɛ bow fó. Ɛ bonyii dioo yɛn nci le, ɛ cee ɛkolɛ bikuu bi nci le nu fó, ɛ bó mum lu keesuuŋke Baul.
44021033	Ɛ cee ɛkolɛ nci wvudvu mum to koo Baul, gay ɛ bó kay wvú bô boncaw bofɛɛ. Ɛ wvú bife ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Wvun nu yɛɛ? Wvú jay ɛ ɛ̀ nu la?”
44021034	Ɛ fó nɛ no yole lo, ɛ ban wamte fin, ɛ boba wamte fifi. Ɛ wvú faŋɛ yaa eloocɛ eyuw laa ɛ̀ sɛ be kooy la lɛ. Ɛ wvú mum nɛ gay lɛ bó ejo Baul eben bô wvú fô la di bonyii bo nci le.
44021035	Ɛ bonyii bo nci le mum jo wvú, ke dioo bene fô je nu ɛ bó ɛ sɛwyɛ lo, mum nɛ wa tuu lo Baul no kebombom to ffuuke kɛ ɛ̂ wvú ɛjim.
44021036	Ɛ kí to bii nonɛn wamte, gayte lɛ, “Bó elɛse lo wvú.”
44021037	Ɛ bó ke dioo leyte wase bô Baul fô la di bonyii bo nci le, ɛ wvú lɛkɛ ɛ̂ cee ɛkolɛ bikuu bi nci le lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me enjeme fiɛɛ ɛ̂ wo?” Ɛ wvú yuw nonɛn, bife ɛ̂ Baul lɛ, “Fí nu lɛ wo kee díɛw Glek e?
44021038	Ɛ̀ baa nu wo wee wvu Ijiw wɛ wvù to kɛwɛɛ mvunlaa bô bikuu bi woŋ e kefew kemew e, gufe ŋgoo bonyii bontfuke bonɛw (4,000) bò to yuwyi bonyii, ɛ bô bó gɛn no nu ŋkpwaante le?”
44021039	Ɛ Baul tfuse lɛ, “Me nu wee Juu, ɛ bó to boke me Taasus woŋ wvù Silishia le, ɛ kɛ Taasus nu kelaante ke ncɛw kɛ. Kee wo, nya kɛ me bô je ɛ́ me enjeme ɛ̂ bonyii ban.”
44021040	Ɛ cee ɛkolɛ bikuu bi bonyii bo nci le wvudvu mum nya je lɛ wvú ejeme. Ɛ Baul mum leem fô bó to sɛwyɛɛ fɛ, ci bonyii bô kebo. Ɛ bó lu bô diuw, ɛ wvú gay ɛ̂ bó ɛ díɛw Ibulu le lɛ,
44022001	“Bo'icɛm bô boom bo bwɛɛm e, ben eyekɛ ɛ́ me entaŋe diuw wɛm fwe dvunɛn.”
44022002	Ɛ bó dioo yuw no wvú jemyi ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ díɛw yibo Ibulu le, ɛ bó mɛse cife nɛn ndvumm. Ɛ Baul gay lɛ,
44022003	“Me nu wee Juu, ɛ bó to boke me Taasus woŋ wvù Silishia le, geenɛn lɛy me Jɛlusalɛm jan, ɛ me n'yɛɛyi ŋwa' can Gamalia le. Ɛ wvú loocɛ yɛɛyi me bô bonci bo bo'icee bosɛɛbeene le, ɛ me mum no nleeme yî fiɛɛ fi Nyo' le ntɛmyi ntay kɛ diɛwɛ ben bocii bò nu fɛn ɛbɛn e.
44022004	Me nto ŋké no mbone bikaa ɛjim jo bonyii bò bii Je Tata le, ŋgee ɛ bó yuwyi bó, ŋkoole bokɛnɛ bô bolemsɛ nciinse yew ncaw e.
44022005	Fin nu fiɛɛ ɛ ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le bô bonyii bò saake woŋ kee baaŋŋ. Ɛ̀ to nya bó boŋwa' lɛ me eŋgɛn dvú fô boom bo bwee wesebeene bò nu Damaskus e. Ɛ me mum no ŋgɛne keeŋkooyɛ bonyii bò bii Je Tata le, eŋkay, ento bô bó Jɛlusalɛm ɛ́ bó enya ŋgɛw ɛ̂ bó.
44022006	Ɛ me ŋke ndioo nfeŋene Damaskus kɛ diɛwɛ ɛmvunsheeŋ ɛntelɛŋ e, ɛ n'yuu mvu wvu baay nɛ sɛsɛ law fowe, shii yî yɛm e.
44022007	Ɛ me ŋgbwe fokuse, n'yuw ɛ diɛw jeme ɛ̂ me lɛ, ‘Saul, Saul, wo bone bikaa ɛ̂ me ɛjim nɛn nje la?’
44022008	Ɛ me mbife lɛ, ‘Tata, ɛ̀ nu wo wvù yɛɛ?’ Ɛ diɛw yidvu tfuse lɛ, ‘Ɛ̀ nu me wvù Jisos wvu Nasalɛt, ɛ ɛ̀ nu me wvù wo bone bikaa ɛjim jodvu.’
44022009	Bonyii bò to nu bee bó to nu ɛ yɛn n'yuu wvudvu le, geenɛn faŋɛ yaa yuw diɛw wee wvù to jemyi bee wvú le kɛ.
44022010	Ɛ me mbvuu mbife lɛ, ‘Tata, ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me eŋge nɛɛ?’ Ɛ wvú tfuse ɛ̂ me lɛ, ‘Ja we, eley gɛn Damaskus, ɛ́ bó esee ɛ̂ wo jó lemme dicii dì Nyo' nu ɛ seyse lɛ wo elem.’
44022011	Ɛ me ŋke nja fó, ɛ n'yuu wɛ ɛ ge wase me ɛ nfefe, ɛ bonyii bò bee bó to lɛne mum cɛŋse wa lo me, ley gɛn bô me Damaskus.
44022012	Wee mvu to nu Damaskus jodvu, ɛ diee nu Ananias, ɛ wvú to looci wvumte Nyo', gɛɛle bonci bosɛɛbeene, ɛ Bojuu bocii bò to nu jó bɛnsee wvú.
44022013	Ɛ wvú ke to yɛn me le, leem mbew yɛm e gay ɛ̂ me lɛ, ‘Saul waa bwɛɛm, kase eyɛnè mwɛɛm e.’ Kɛ sekedvu nonɛn, ɛ me mum ŋkase no n'yɛne mwɛɛm e, mum n'yɛn tɛn wvú wvù Ananias e.
44022014	Ɛ wvú gay ɛ̂ me lɛ, ‘Nyo' bo'icee bosɛɛbeene nu ɛ baa wase wo lɛ wo ekiɛɛ fiɛɛ fì wvú shieele, bô lɛ wo eyɛn Wee we Lemme wvu Teytey e, eyuw njeme wvù buyte diuw we le.
44022015	Wo nu ke enu wee wvù efewcì ɛkumɛ wvú, seŋè ɛ̂ bonyii bocii fiɛɛ fì wo yɛn bô fì wo yuw e.
44022016	No fí nu nonɛn keseen, wo bvuu cɛyte la? Nɛnɛ we ɛ́ bó elese wo ɛ̂ joo, ecukɛ bibefɛ biuw, no wo lɛke ɛ̂ Tata.’
44022017	Ɛ me ŋke ntu jim Jɛlusalɛm, ŋke ndioo mbunlee yew ncese le, ɛ fiɛɛ diɛwɛ ɛfilɛ le nɛ to fô me le.
44022018	Ɛ me n'yɛn Tata le ɛ fiɛɛ fidvu le, ɛ wvú gay ɛ̂ me lɛ, ‘Yaŋsɛn nɛ Jɛlusalɛm jan cekey njefo kɛ bonyii bo jan nu ke ebee fiɛɛ fì wo fewci ɛkumɛ me kɛ.’
44022019	Ɛ me ntfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, ‘Tata, bó kee naa ntay lɛ me nto ŋké no nleyte yéw bunle le, ŋkooyi bonyii bò nu ɛ lese fitele yî yo le, nsuuŋke.
44022020	Seke bó to yuu Tɛfan wvù to fewci ɛ̂ bonyii ɛkumɛ wo, nu ɛ me nto nu naa fó ntomte. Ɛ ɛ̀ nu me wvù bonyii bò to yuu wvú to baayɛɛ ndvú yibo, nya ɛ me no ŋkɛŋke.’
44022021	Ɛ Tata bvuu gay ɛ̂ me lɛ, ‘Nɛnɛ jan, njefo me nu entum wo naa ncejole fô bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu le.’”
44022022	No Baul to jemyi ɛ bonyii yeke, ɛ wvun njeme ke dioo buy diuw we le, ɛ bó kɛw no wamte lo foweɛwe, gayte lɛ, “Bó elɛse lo kfuu wvun wee yî nshɛ le. Kɛ ɛ̀ nu wee wvù enu dvú kɛ.”
44022023	Ɛ bó no wamte nonɛn, yɛwsee ndvú yibo we, tfumyi kebvu we.
44022024	Ɛ cee ɛkolɛ bikuu bi bonyii bo nci le mum nɛ gay lɛ nci ejo Baul egɛn bô wvú fô la dibole, lɛ bó dioo ɛ gɛn tam wvú, biwcɛ mwɛɛm ɛ̂ wvú, ɛ́ wvú esee fiɛɛ fì ge Bojuu ɛ sɛ no wamte wvú nɛn.
44022025	Ɛ bó mum gɛn bô wvú kay, nɛ lɛ bó etamte, ɛ Baul bife ɛ̂ ɛkolɛ ke ŋgoo bonyii bo nci le kemew kè to leeme fó lɛ, “Nci nu ɛ bee lɛ bó etam wee wvu Lum sɛ bó ɛ saw nsaw we le?”
44022026	Ɛ ɛkolɛ ke ŋgoo bonyii bo nci le kedvu yuw nonɛn, mum gɛn yɛn cee ɛkolɛ wvubole, gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wo gomte keemom ɛ ɛ̀ nu la? Ɛ̀ keè lɛ wee wvun nu wee wvu Lum.”
44022027	Ɛ cee ɛkolɛ wvudvu yuw nonɛn, mum gɛn yɛn Baul e bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Kɛ see ɛ̂ me, wo nu wee wvu Lum e?” Ɛ wvú bee.
44022028	Ɛ cee ɛkolɛ wvudvu gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Me nto ŋguy bigew nteen, nsɛ no nu wee wvu Lum.” Ɛ Baul tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Me nu fiem wee wvu Lum bootɛɛn.”
44022029	Ɛ bonyii ba bò to nu keebiwcɛ mwɛɛm ɛ̂ wvú mum tfuw bikaa. Ɛ cee ɛkolɛ wvubo no fane tɛn, njefo wvú to nu ɛ gay ɛ bó kay Baul ɛ ɛ̀ nu wee wvu Lum.
44022030	Ɛ cee ɛkolɛ wvudvu no gomte kɛ keeloocɛ kiɛɛ fiɛɛ fì Bojuu to teyte yî Baul e. Ɛ bvú buy yuu, ɛ wvú gay ɛ bó fay Baul, tee bocee ncese bo baay baay noo bonyii bocii bò saake woŋ, ɛ bó to, ɛ wvú leke Baul ɛ̂ bó fwe.
44023001	Ɛ Baul luŋ ɛjisɛ yî bonyii bò saake woŋ e, gay lɛ, “Boom bo bwɛɛm e, yî nce wɛm e ɛ to ɛ buy ɛbɛn e, nu ɛ me ŋké no ŋgee kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu mwɛɛm mvù me ŋkee lɛ mvú nu lɛŋ ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛjise, ɛ kɛ fiɛɛ yaa nu dvú fì saake me fô fitele fiem e kɛ.”
44023002	Ɛ Ananias wvù to nu ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le gay ɛ̂ bonyii bò to leeme mbew Baul e lɛ bó ekfun lo diuw we.
44023003	Ɛ Baul tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Nyo' nu ke ekfun tɛn wo. Wo fieesene kembew kè bó nu ɛ yefe kí ɛ no baa. Wo shile fɛ lɛ wo saake me bii nci le, ɛ bvuu ɛ no ŋgoyte nci wvudvu gayte lɛ bó ekfun me le?”
44023004	Ɛ bonyii bò to leeme mbew Baul e bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wo nan'yi ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese Nyo' le le?”
44023005	Ɛ wvú tfuse lɛ, “Boom bo bwɛɛm e, kɛ me mbe ŋkee lɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le kɛ. Bó nu ɛ saŋ lɛ, ‘Fo wee ejeme diɛw yì befe ɛ̂ wee wvù saake bonyii kɛ.’”
44023006	Ɛ Baul ke dioo taa yɛn lɛ bonyii bò to nu fó nu ɛ bomew nu Bosadusii ɛ bomew nu Bofalasii, ɛ wvú mum jeme bô diɛw yì tɛmyi ɛntelɛŋ jo bonyii bò saake woŋ ba lɛ, “Boom bo bwɛɛm e, me nu wee Falasii, nu waa Bofalasii. Me nu fɛn yî nsaw e njefo me ntaale fwe, ŋkee lɛ boŋkfu nu ke ebuy yî kpwe le.”
44023007	No wvú jeme nonɛn, ɛ Bosadusii bô Bofalasii mum nɛ kɛw waa, ɛ nshii wvudvu mum bvuŋ.
44023008	Bó to waale nonɛn, njefo Bosadusii to ké no duu lɛ kɛ boŋkfu nu ke ebuy yî kpwe le kɛ, bvuu duu lɛ kɛ fiɛɛ fimew nu dvú diɛwɛ bonceendaa bo Nyo' le kɛnɛɛ biyoy kɛ. Geenɛn, ɛ Bofalasii beŋe lɛ mvumvun mvunciim nu lo.
44023009	Ɛ waa nɛ tɛme lo fó, ɛ bonyii bomew bò to duŋci bonci bò to nu ŋgoo Bofalasii le, leem fó jeme tɛme lo, gay lɛ, “Bese baa yɛn fiɛɛ fì wee wvun jay e kɛ. Ɛ̀ nɛlo enu ɛ keyoy kemew kɛnɛɛ nceendaa Nyo' ɛ jeme ɛ̂ wvú.”
44023010	Ɛ waa wvudvu ke mum nɛ no gomte wase keetu bvudiuw, ɛ cee ɛkolɛ bikuu bi bonyii bo nci le no fane lɛ sekemew ɛ́ bó enɛ esaayɛ lo Baul fó biba le. Ɛ wvú mum gay lɛ nci ebow fó, eloo Baul can yibole, ekase eben bô wvú fô la di nci le.
44023011	Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu ɛntaŋ, ɛ Tata to leem mbew Baul e, gay ɛ̂ wvù lɛ, “Kuu shém. No wo nu ɛ see wase ɛ̂ bonyii ɛkumɛ me Jɛlusalɛm, ɛ̀ nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no wo nu ke esee tɛn Lum.”
44023012	Ɛ ɛkfuŋ buy yuu, ɛ Bojuu bomew koo ntfum, die kelew lɛ kɛ bó nu ke edie fiɛɛ kɛnɛɛ ewu fiɛɛ sɛ bó ɛ yu Baul kɛ.
44023013	Bonyii bodvu bò to koolɛɛ ntfum, die kelew to fele wee mbaanyɛ.
44023014	Ɛ bó mum gɛn fô bocee ncese bo baay baay e, noo bonyii bò saake woŋ, gay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Bese nu ɛ loocɛ ɛ die kelew lɛ kɛ bese nu ke elese lo fiɛɛ ɛmvu sɛ bese ɛ yu Baul kɛ.
44023015	Yî keseen e, ben ɛ bo bonyii bocii bò saake woŋ eciinse ntum fô cee ɛkolɛ bikuu bi bonyii bo nci le, ebuwse wvú lɛ wvú ebvuu ebowse Baul ɛ́ wvú eto ɛ̂ ben fwe, lɛ ben gomte keebvuu etasse nsaw we ntay. Nonɛn, ɛ́ bese emum egbwe wvú ɛ̂ je, ɛ́ bó dioo booke bô wvú, ɛ́ bese emum eyu ɛ ɛ̀ bɛɛ ɛ̂ je.”
44023016	No bó to koolɛɛ ntfum yidvu nonɛn, ɛ waa jɛme Baul wvù diemsɛn yuw, mum gɛn fô la di bonyii bo nci le, see ɛ̂ Baul.
44023017	Ɛ wvú mum tee ɛkolɛ ke ŋgoo bonyii bo nci le kemew gay ɛ̂ kí lɛ, “Joo cuwee wvun egɛn bô wvú fô cee ɛkolɛ bikuu bi bonyii bo nci le, wvú kɛŋke fiɛɛ keesee ɛ̂ wvú.”
44023018	Ɛ wvú mum jo, gɛn bô wvú fô cee ɛkolɛ bikuu bi nci le, gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Baul wvù wee ncaw nu ɛ tee me, ɛ gay lɛ me enjo cuwee wvun ento bô wvú fô wo le, lɛ wvú kɛŋke fiɛɛ keesee ɛ̂ wo.”
44023019	Ɛ cee ɛkolɛ wvudvu mum jicɛ wvú le yî kebo le, ɛ bô wvú lɛwse ye, ɛ wvú bife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu la fì wo gomte keesee ɛ̂ me?”
44023020	Ɛ cuwee wvudvu tfuse lɛ, “Bojuu bomew nu ɛ jo ntaŋ lɛ bó nu egay ɛ́ wo ebowse Baul ɛ́ wvú eto fwe dvu bonyii bò saake woŋ ntfuu, lɛ bó gomte keetasse nsaw we ntay, ɛ bó gee nonɛn buwsee lo wo.
44023021	Fo wo ke ebee kɛ, njefo bonyii nu dvú fele wee mbaanyɛ bò nu egbwe wvú ɛ̂ je, ɛ bó die kelew lɛ kɛ bó nu ke edie fiɛɛ kɛnɛɛ ewu fiɛɛ sɛ bó ɛ yu Baul kɛ. Bó nu keseen ɛ bó ɛ seyse wase ye, ɛ no cɛyte kɛ wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì wo nu jeme.”
44023022	Ɛ cee ɛkolɛ bikuu bi bonyii bo nci le wvudvu mum gay lɛ cuwee wvudvu egɛnè, ciise ɛ̂ wvú lɛ fo wvú dioo gɛne ge ɛ wee kiɛɛ lɛ wvú nu ɛ see fiɛɛ fidvu ɛ̂ wen kɛ.
44023023	Ɛ cee ɛkolɛ bikuu bi bonyii bo nci le wvudvu mum tee bikuu bi ŋgóo bonyii bo nci le bifɛɛ gay ɛ̂ bí lɛ, “Ben eseyse bonyii bo nci le gee fɛɛ (200) bô bo nyámbala le mbaŋsooshwiy (70) noo bo ɛgoŋ e gee fɛɛ (200), ɛ́ ke edioo enu didiuu bvuukɛ ɛntaŋ, ɛ́ bó egɛn Kaysalia.
44023024	Ben eseyse tɛn nyámbala ɛ̂ Baul, ejo wvú egɛn bô wvú fô Fɛlew wvù wee sa' le ɛ fiɛɛ baa kooy bô wvú ɛ̂ je kɛ.”
44023025	No wvú gay nonɛn, mum saŋ ŋwa' ɛ wvú jemyi lɛ,
44023026	“Ɛ̀ nu me wvù Klawdius Lisias. Me nsaaŋke ŋwa' wvun fô wo le wee wvu baay wvù Fɛlew wvù wee sa'. Me ŋgayte wo le.
44023027	Bojuu se nu ɛ koo wee wvun ɛ no gomte keeyu. Me ɛ n'yuw lɛ ɛ̀ nu wee wvu Lum, bee bonyii bem bo nci le ɛ se ɛ mum ɛ ley fó ɛ loo wvú can yibole.
44023028	Me ɛ nse ɛ no ŋgomte keen'yuw fiɛɛ fì bó teyte yî ye le, ɛ mum ɛ mbow bô wvú fô bonyii bobole bò saake woŋ e.
44023029	Bó ɛ se ɛ dioo tasse, me ɛ n'yɛn lɛ mwɛɛm mvù bó teyte yî ye le nu kɛ mbew wvu ɛkumɛ bonci bobole, ɛ wvú baa ge fiɛɛ fì bó eyu lo wvú kɛnɛɛ elese wvú yew ncaw e kɛ.
44023030	Wee ɛ se ɛ dioo see ɛ̂ me lɛ Bojuu bomew nu ɛ koo ntfum keeyu wee wvun, me ɛ mum ɛ nciinse wvú fô wo le kaŋ mwaaŋ. Me nu ɛ ŋgay tɛn ɛ̂ bonyii bò teyte mwɛɛm yî ye le lɛ bó eto eyɛn ɛ ɛ̀ nu wo le, esee fiɛɛ fì bô bó kɛŋke.”
44023031	Ɛ bonyii bo nci le ke mum ge kɛ no cee ɛkolɛ wvubo to gayɛɛ, jo Baul ɛntaŋ, ɛ bô bó gɛn buy Antibati.
44023032	Ɛ ɛkfuŋ ke buy yuu, ɛ bonyii bo nci le bò to lɛne bô bikaa cinɛ Baul e can bò to lɛne yî nyámbala le lɛ bó egɛnè bô wvú fwe, mum kase tu jim fô la dibole.
44023033	Ɛ bó ke gɛn fɛse Kaysalia, mum nya ŋwa' wɛ ɛ̂ wee sa' bvuu nya tɛn Baul can ye le.
44023034	Ɛ wvú fi ŋwa' wvudvu taŋ, bife laa Baul buy ɛ̂ keba ke la le lɛ. Ɛ wvú dioo yuw lɛ Baul nu wee wvu Silishia,
44023035	mum gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Me nu ŋke en'yekɛ nsaw wo seke bonyii bò ben ɛ bó kɛŋke nsaw ɛ fɛse fɛn.” Ɛ wvú mum gay lɛ bó ejo Baul egɛn egɛɛ wvú ɛ̂ ntow 'Ɛlod e, ecɛytè wvú.
44024001	Ɛ ɛdiuw ke buy ɛtin, ɛ Ananias wvù ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le, bô bonyii bomew bò saake woŋ, noo Tɛtulus wvù to nu ɛ wvú ɛ loocɛ ɛ yɛɛyi nci, bow gɛn Kaysalia. Ɛ bó mum gɛn yɛn Fɛlew wvù wee sa' le, jike nsaw wvubo wvu ɛkumɛ Baul fwe dvu wvú.
44024002	Ɛ bó tee Baul, ɛ Tɛtulus mum kɛw keeteyte mwɛɛm yî ye le, gay ɛ̂ Fɛlew lɛ, “Wee wvu baay, nyɛkeey nu ɛ no nu dvú woŋ wvun e ɛ to ɛ buy yî keseen e, ɛ ɛ̀ nu nje sa' yo yì jee, ɛ boŋkumɛn bò jee nu dvú nteen woŋ wvun e can yo le.
44024003	Bonyii bocii yuuke njoŋ baay bvuu fiisene sa' yo mondvuum monciim sekecii.
44024004	Kɛ me ŋgomte keenjewsee kefew kuw baay kɛ, me nlɛke lɛ wo eyekɛ kɛ caan, eyuw fiɛɛ fì bese nu ejeme.
44024005	Bese nu ɛ yɛn lɛ wee wvun nu wee fiɛɛ. Wvú ghane shiike mvunlaa ɛntelɛŋ jo Bojuu yî ɛkolɛ ke nshɛ le kecii. Ɛ ɛ̀ bvuu nu wvú cee ɛkolɛ ŋgoo yì bó teŋe lɛ yi Nasalɛt.
44024006	Wvú to gomte tɛn keebefe bô yew ncese ɛ bese koo wvú.
44024008	Ɛ́ wo biwci lo mwɛɛm ɛ̂ wee wvun, ɛ́ wo eyuw ɛ̂ wvú mwɛɛm mvun mvunciim mvù bese jemyi ɛkumɛ wvú.”
44024009	No Tɛtulus jeme nonɛn, ɛ Bojuu tom, bɛnse lɛ mwɛɛm mvun mvunciim nu kecɛɛy.
44024010	Ɛ wee sa' wɛ few ɛ̂ Baul lɛ wvú ejeme. Ɛ wvú mum jeme lɛ, “Me ŋkee lɛ wo nu ɛ saw wase bonsaw woŋ wvun e yî bilum e nteen. Me ɛ mum ɛ no n'yuuke njoŋ keenleem ntaŋe diuw wɛm ɛ̂ wo ɛjise.
44024011	Ɛ́ wo nɛ lo ɛ no biwci, ɛ́ wo eyuw lɛ ɛdiuw baa efey wase yuufe ncow ɛfaa no me nto mbenɛɛ Jɛlusalɛm keebunle Nyo' kɛ.
44024012	Bojuu to baa eyɛn ɛ me mbeeke mbew bee wee kɛ, ɛ bó to baa eyɛn tɛn ɛ me mbɛysee bonyii yew ncese le kɛnɛɛ yéw bunle le, kɛnɛɛ bvudvuu bvumew e ɛlaante kɛ.
44024013	Kɛ bó yaa kɛŋke naa lo fiɛɛ fì duŋci lɛ me nto nu ɛ ŋge mwɛɛm mvun mvù bó teyte yî yɛm e kɛ.
44024014	Me nu ɛ mbee fin fwe dvu wo, lɛ me mbunlee Nyo' bo'icee bosɛse mbii Je le yì bó teŋe lɛ ɛ̀ nu yì befe. Ɛ me mbeŋe ɛ ɛ̀ nu mwɛɛm mvunciim mvù nu ɛ̂ Ŋwa' bonci bo Muses e noo mvù nu ɛ̂ Boŋwa' bo bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le.
44024015	Me ntaale kɛ fwe yî Nyo' le lɛŋlɛŋ no bó tɛn taale, lɛ bonyii bocii bò jee bô bò befe nu ke ebuy yî kpwe le.
44024016	Nonɛn, me ɛ mum ɛ no momte ntay sekecii keencee nce wvu lɛŋ fwe dvu Nyo' noo bonyii, wvu lɛ fo fiɛɛ enu dvú fì esaakè me fô fitele le kɛ.
44024017	Ɛ̀ nu wase bilum nteen no me nɛn'yɛɛ Jɛlusalɛm, ɛ me nse ŋkase ɛ ŋgɛn jó keenya bigew ɛ̂ bonyii bem bo woŋ e, noo keeŋge ncese.
44024018	Ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fin fì bó se yɛnɛɛ me le yew ncese le ɛ me ŋgee, ɛ me ɛ ŋkfum wase ɛkolɛ kem. Ɛ kɛ bonyii kɛnɛɛ diuw wvu kumɛɛn se nu fó kɛ.
44024019	Bojuu bomew bo Ɛsia se nu fó, ɛ bó be kɛŋke keenu fɛn ejeme ɛ̂ wo fiɛɛ fì bó kɛŋke ɛkumɛ me, ɛ ɛ̀ fɛn nu lɛ fiɛɛ nu dvú.
44024020	Ɛ́ ɛ̀ baa nu nonɛn, ɛ́ ban bonyii see lɛ fiɛɛ fì bó se yɛnɛɛ lɛ me nu ɛ njay seke me nse nleemɛɛ fwe dvu bonyii bò saake woŋ,
44024021	ɛfey fiɛɛ fì me nse njemyɛɛ bô diɛw yì tɛmyi ɛ̂ bó lɛ, me nu ɛ̂ bó fwe yî kefew kekiɛ le yî nsaw e njefo me nu ɛ mbee lɛ boŋkfu nu ke ebuy yî kpwe le.”
44024022	No Baul jeme nonɛn, ɛ Fɛlew yekɛ nɛn, ɛ ɛ̀ to nu wee ɛ wvú looci kee wase ɛkumɛ Je Tata, mum leke nsaw gay lɛ, “Seke Lisias wvù cee ɛkolɛ bikuu bi bonyii bo nci le ɛ bow ɛ to, ɛ me nsɛ nsumtɛn nsaw wene.”
44024023	Ɛ wvú mum gay lɛ ɛkolɛ ke ŋgoo mi bonyii bo nci le ejo Baul egɛn elese yew, ecɛytè. Geenɛn, lɛ bó enya kɛ naa wvú bô je, ecinɛ ɛ́ nsáa ye etoo fici wvú.
44024024	Ɛ ɛdiuw ke dioo gɛncɛ, ɛ Fɛlew bô Dusila wvù kpwɛse wvù to nu wee Juu gɛn tee Baul ɛ wvú to, ɛ bó no yeke fiɛɛ fì wvú jemyi ɛkumɛ keelese fitele yî Klistu Jisos e.
44024025	Ɛ wvú ke dioo jemyi ɛkumɛ no ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wee enù wee wvù jee, bô no ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wee ekemsenè bô ɛkolɛ kew, noo no Nyo' nu ke esaw bonyii, ɛ Fɛlew yuw nonɛn, ɛ fí bɛmse wvú. Ɛ wvú mum gay ɛ̂ Baul lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wo egɛne keseen, ɛ́ me ŋke endioo ɛ ŋkɛŋkɛ kefew nsɛ mbvuu entee wo.”
44024026	Wvú to jeme nonɛn, kɛŋke ŋkpwawcɛ lɛ sekemew ɛ́ Baul ekew wen. Ɛ wvú ké mum no teŋe Baul ɛfonɛfon ɛ bô wvú fɛle kenfɛ.
44024027	Kɛ nonɛn, kɛ nonɛn, ɛ bilum kum bifɛɛ. Ɛ bó dioo gɛɛ Bolsius Fɛstus yî kentaw ke Fɛlew e, ɛ Fɛlew no gomte lɛ wen ege ɛ́ Bojuu ekooŋke wen, mum cinɛ Baul e yew ncaw e.
44025001	Ɛ ɛ̀ ke dioo nu ɛdiuw ɛta no Fɛstus kɛwɛɛ keesaake keba ke woŋ e kè Judea, ɛ wvú nɛ Kaysalia ben Jɛlusalɛm.
44025002	Ɛ bocee ncese bo baay baay bô bikuu bi Bojuu le bi woŋ e mum to yɛn wvú le, jike nsaw wvù bó kɛŋke bô Baul ɛ̂ wvú ɛjise, no lɛke wvú lɛ,
44025003	wvú efi kɛ lɛ bowen, ege ɛ́ bó eciinse Baul ɛ́ wvú eto Jɛlusalɛm. Ɛ bó to gee nonɛn, ɛ bó ɛ seyse wase lɛ bó nu ke egbwe wvú ɛ̂ je, eyu.
44025004	Ɛ Fɛstus tfuse ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Baul nu yew ncaw e Kaysalia, ɛ me kebɛɛ nu eŋkaase ntuu jó ɛdiuw ɛyan.
44025005	Bonyii bò kɛŋke mvuŋgay mvu sa' le bomew ebi me le Kaysalia, ejeme fiɛɛ fì wvú jay ɛ ɛ̀ nu jó ɛ ɛ̀ fɛn nu lɛ fiɛɛ nu dvú.”
44025006	Ɛ Fɛstus ke ce bô bó gɛn buy kɛ diɛwɛ ɛdiuw nyaŋ kenɛɛ yuufe le, mum kase tu jim Kaysalia. Ɛ ɛkfuŋ buy yuu, ɛ wvú gɛn shii yew nsaw e, gay lɛ bó eto bô Baul.
44025007	No Baul fɛse, ɛ Bojuu bò to nɛn'yɛɛ Jɛlusalɛm bow jó, mum leemɛn gem wvú, no teyte mwɛɛm yî ye le nteen ɛ fì wɛɛ yaa nu kɛ. Geenɛn, ɛ fiɛɛ yaa nu dvú fì bó nulo esee fì duŋci lɛ wvú nu ɛ ge fimew kɛ.
44025008	Ɛ Baul taŋe diuw we gay lɛ, “Me mbaa njay naa lo nci Bojuu, kɛnɛɛ wvu yew ncese, kɛnɛɛ wvu Nfon wvu Lum kɛ.”
44025009	Geenɛn, ɛ Fɛstus no gomte lɛ wen ege ɛ́ Bojuu ekooŋke wen, mum bife ɛ̂ Baul lɛ, “Wo kooŋke keeben Jɛlusalɛm ɛ́ me kebɛɛ ensaw nsaw wo jó yî mwɛɛm mvun e?”
44025010	Ɛ Baul tfuse lɛ, “Me nleeme wase fɛn ɛ̂ kebɛŋ ke nsaw e, ɛ ɛ̀ nu ke Nfon wvu Lum e. Ɛ ɛ̀ nu fɛn fò bó bee keesaw nsaw wɛm. Wo kebɛɛ kee naa ntay lɛ me mbaa njay fiɛɛ bee Bojuu kɛ.
44025011	Ɛ́ ɛ̀ fɛn nu lɛ me nu ɛ ŋgoy nci, ɛ njay fiɛɛ fì ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó eyu lo me, me nsaa entune keeŋkpwe kɛ. Geenɛn, ɛ́ ɛ̀ nu lɛ mwɛɛm mvù bó teyte yî yɛm e nu mbiay, tu kɛ wee nu dvú wvù nulo enya me can Bojuu ban e kɛ. Me nu nlɛkɛ lɛ nsaw wɛm egɛn fwe fô Nfon wvu Lum e.”
44025012	Ɛ Fɛstus yuw nonɛn, ɛ bô bonyii bew bò bô bó to saake bonsaw tfumtfum. Ɛ wvú mum gay ɛ̂ Baul lɛ, “No wo nu ɛ lɛkɛ wase lɛ nsaw wo nu egɛn fô Nfon wvu Lum e, tu wvú nu egɛn fó.”
44025013	Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu kefew kemew e ɛjim jodvu, ɛ Nfon Aglifa bô Bɛnis laa ghane ɛ̂ Fɛstus e Kaysalia keegay wvú le.
44025014	Ɛ bó ke dioo nu wase jó yî ɛdiuw e nteen, ɛ Fɛstus nɛ be Nfon bô nsaw Baul gay lɛ, “Wee mvu nu fɛn wvù Fɛlew to cin'yɛɛ yew ncaw e,
44025015	ɛ me ŋke ndioo ŋgɛn Jɛlusalɛm, ɛ bocee ncese bo baay baay bô bonyii bò saake woŋ Bojuu jike nsaw we ɛ̂ me ɛjise lɛ me eŋgay lɛ wvú nu ɛ gbwe nsaw.
44025016	Ɛ me ŋgay ɛ̂ bó lɛ, kɛ nce bonyii bo Lum nu ɛ bee lɛ bó esumtɛn lɛ wee nu ɛ gbwe nsaw sɛ bó nu ɛ nya wase je wee wvudvu ɛ leem ɛ̂ kebɛŋ ke nsaw e fwe dvu bonyii bò bô bó kɛŋke nsaw ɛ taŋe diuw we yî mwɛɛm mvù bó teyte yî ye le kɛ.
44025017	Ɛ bó ke dioo to fɛn, ɛ me ŋfaŋɛ n'yaa moocɛ lo kɛ. Ɛ ɛkfuŋ buy yuu, ɛ me ŋgɛn nshii yew nsaw e ŋgay ɛ bó to bô wee wvudvu.
44025018	Ɛ bonyii bò bô bó to kɛŋke nsaw ke dioo leem we, faŋɛ yaa duŋcɛ jay wvù me nto ŋkpwaake lɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó esee yî ye le kɛ.
44025019	Ɛ bó kaa no jemyi ɛ ɛ̀ nu mwɛɛm mvu mbew e yî ye le ɛkumɛ je yì bó bunlee Nyo' jó, noo ɛkumɛ wee mvu wvú bó teŋe lɛ Jisos ɛ wvú to kpwe wase, geenɛn ɛ Baul leeme kɛ lɛ wvú nu dvú.
44025020	No me nto mbaa ŋkiɛɛ no ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me enley ɛnte jo mwɛɛm mvun, ɛ me mum mbife ɛ̂ Baul laa wvú kooŋke keeben Jɛlusalɛm ɛ́ bó esaw nsaw we jó ɛkumɛ mwɛɛm mvun ɛ.
44025021	Ɛ wvú tfuse lɛ wen nu emɛy yew ncaw e, ɛ́ ke esumtɛn Nfon wvu Lum nsaw wen. Ɛ me mum ŋgay lɛ bó egɛɛ wvú yew, ecɛytè egɛn ebuy no me ŋke enciinse wvú ɛ̂ Nfon wvu Lum.”
44025022	Ɛ Aglifa yekɛ nɛn, gay ɛ̂ Fɛstus lɛ, “Me kebɛɛ ŋkooŋke keen'yuw mwɛɛm mvun diuw wee wvudvu le.” Ɛ Fɛstus tfuse lɛ, “Wo nu ebuy eyuw ntfuu.”
44025023	Ɛ ɛkfuŋ buy yuu, ɛ Aglifa bô Bɛnis no lɛne too bô bvuwee bvu baay. Ɛ bô bocee bikuu bi bonyii bo nci le noo bonyii bo baay baay bo ɛlaante, lɛn to ley ŋgay. Ɛ Fɛstus mum gay ɛ bó to bô Baul.
44025024	No bó toɛ bô wvú, ɛ Fɛstus gay lɛ, “Nfon Aglifa bô bonyii bocii bò nu fɛn, ben eyɛn wee wvun. Ɛ̀ nu wee wvù Bojuu bocii too nyɛɛyi me jan noo Jɛlusalɛm ɛkumɛ wvú, wamte, gayte lɛ kɛ ɛ̀ nu wee wvù enu dvú kɛ.
44025025	Ɛ me mbaa n'yɛn lɛ wvú nu ɛ ge fiɛɛ fì bó eyu wvú kɛ. No wvú se lɛkɛɛ wase lɛ nsaw we egɛn fwe ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô Nfon wvu Lum e, me ɛ mum ɛ n'yɛn lɛ me nu enciinse wvú fô wvú le.
44025026	Geenɛn, kɛ me n'yaa nlooci ŋkee fiɛɛ fì ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me ensaŋ fô Nfon wvù cee ɛkolɛ wɛm e ɛkumɛ wvú kɛ. Nonɛn, me ɛ mum ɛ nleke wvú ɛ̂ ben ɛjise keseen ɛfey mvunciim ɛ̂ wo Nfon Aglifa ɛjise, lɛ ben etasse nsaw we, wvu lɛ me eŋkɛŋkɛ fiɛɛ fì ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me ensaŋ.
44025027	Me n'yɛne lɛ fí baa nu lɛŋ lɛ me enciinse wee ncaw fô Nfon e sɛ me nu ɛ nduŋcɛ fiɛɛ fì bó gayte lɛ wvú nu ɛ jay e kɛ.”
44026001	Ɛ Nfon Aglifa mum gay ɛ̂ Baul lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu bvudvuu bvuw keseen keejeme bô diuw wo.” Ɛ Baul mum cake kebo we, kɛw keetaŋe diuw we, gay lɛ,
44026002	“Nyaa', me n'yɛne lɛ keshi kem nu ɛ joŋ lɛ baay keenleem etaŋe diuw wɛm fwe dvu bó ɛbɛn yî mwɛɛm mvunciim mvù Bojuu teytey yî yɛm e.
44026003	Me njemyi lɛ nɛn, njefo bó looci lɛ kee nce woŋ Bojuu noo bombew bò bó ké no kɛŋke. Nonɛn, me ɛ no nlɛke lɛ bó eyekɛ kɛ lɛ nyɛkeey eyuw fiɛɛ fì me nu enjeme.
44026004	Bojuu bocii kee nce wɛm ɛ kɛw naa ɛ me mbɛɛ lo. Bó kee no me nto ncee woŋ wese le noo Jɛlusalɛm.
44026005	Ɛ bó kee naa ntay lɛ ɛ kɛw lo ncejole nu ɛ me nu wee ŋgoo Bofalasii ɛ ɛ̀ nu ŋgoo yì looci tɛmyi yî fiɛɛ fi Nyo' le fele yimi yicii. Fin nu fiɛɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu lɛ bó kooŋke keejeme, ɛ́ bó ebee lɛ ɛ̀ nu kecɛɛy.
44026006	Me ɛ no nleeme lɛ fɛn keseen yî nsaw e njefo me ntaale fwe, ŋkee ŋkawma wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ bo'icee bosɛse dvú.
44026007	Ŋkawma wvun nu lɛ wvù dikfuu disɛse di yuufe ncow difɛɛ cɛyte no bó bunlee Nyo' shiee le ɛntaŋ bô ɛmvunsheeŋ. Nyaa', ɛ̀ nu lɛ nje ŋkawma wvudvu wvun wvù Bojuu kɛŋke lɛ nsaw dvú bee bó.
44026008	Me ɛ no mbiite ɛ̂ bó noo ɛ̂ bonyii bocii lɛ laa ɛ̀ ge la wvù ben yɛne ɛ fí tɛmyi keebee lɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ Nyo' ebvuse wee yî kpwe le lɛ?
44026009	Me kebɛɛ nto ŋkpwawci naa lɛ me ŋkɛŋke keeŋge fiɛɛ ficii keenfiwsɛ diee di Jisos wvu Nasalɛt e.
44026010	Ɛ fifin nu naa fiɛɛ fì me nto ŋgeɛ Jɛlusalɛm. Me nto nu ɛ nfi mvuŋgay ɛ̂ bocee ncese bo baay baay ŋkooyɛ bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo Nyo' le nteen, nfen yew ncaw e. Kɛ ɛ̀ to mɛy kɛ fin kɛ. Bó to ké dioo nu lɛ bó nu eyuwyɛ bó, ɛ me tɛn ntom.
44026011	Me nto nyaa ŋgɛw ɛ̂ bó ɛfonɛfon yéw bunle le yicii, ŋkane lɛ bó ejemyi díɛw yì befe ɛkumɛ wee wvù Jisos. Ɛ shém ffuuke me bô bó baay, ɛ me mbone bikaa ɛ̂ bó ɛjim, ŋgɛne mbuyte bilaante bi bitum bimew e.
44026012	Ɛ me ŋke mum nɛ no ŋgɛne Damaskus, ɛ bocee ncese bo baay baay ɛ saŋ ŋwa', ɛ nya me mvuŋgay.
44026013	Nyaa', ɛ me ndioo ŋgɛne ɛ ɛ̀ nu lɛ ɛmvunsheeŋ ɛntelɛŋ, ɛ me nɛ n'yɛn ɛ n'yuu mvu nɛ law fowe baa fele diuu, shii to yî bee bonyii bò bee bó to lɛne le.
44026014	Ɛ bese bocii nɛ gbwekɛn fokuse, ɛ me n'yuw ɛ diɛw bife ɛ̂ me ɛ̂ díɛw Ibulu le lɛ, ‘Saul, Saul, wo bone bikaa ɛ̂ me ɛjim nɛn nje la? Wo gee nɛn, kfune ɛ ɛ̀ nu ye yo, diɛwɛ na' lemme fô wvú bone ye yî kembaŋ ke ice le.’
44026015	Ɛ me mbife lɛ, ‘Ɛ̀ nu wo wvù yɛɛ Tata?’ Ɛ wvú tfuse lɛ, ‘Ɛ̀ nu me wvù Jisos, ɛ ɛ̀ nu me wvù wo bone bikaa ɛjim jodvu.
44026016	Ja leem we. Fiɛɛ fì ge me ɛ mbuynɛn fô wo le nu lɛ me embaa wo wee wɛm lemme le, ɛ́ wo efewcì mwɛɛm mvù wo yɛn ɛbɛn bô mvù me mbɛɛ ŋke enduŋcɛ ɛ̂ wo le.
44026017	Me nu ŋke enfi wo can Bojuu noo bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu le, ɛ ɛ̀ nu bó bò me nu entum wo fô bó le.
44026018	Wo nu ke egɛn eyene ɛjisɛ ɛbo, ebvuse bó ɛ̂ ɛjiwɛ le, eleke bó ɛ̂ n'yuu le, ɛ́ bó ebuy can Satan e, enu bô bo Nyo', ɛ́ bó elese fitele yî yɛm e, ɛ́ Nyo' elɛɛshɛ bibefɛ bibole. Ɛ́ bó ke emum ekɛŋkɛ keleŋ fô bvudvuu bvù bonyii bò wvú nu ɛ ge lɛ ɛ̀ nu naa bew e.’
44026019	Nyaa', no fí to kooyɛɛ lɛ nonɛn, ɛ me mum ŋge kɛ lɛ no wvú jemyɛɛ ɛ̂ me fowe.
44026020	Ɛ me mum n'yaw ŋkɛw no nfewci Damaskus, nsɛ ŋke ŋgɛn Jɛlusalɛm. Ɛ me no ŋghane woŋ wvù Judea le tfuu noo bitum e bicii bì yaa nu kɛ bi Bojuu le, nfewci ɛ̂ bó lɛ bó ekumɛn mvuntelem mvubole, etu bô bo Nyo', egeè ɛ ɛ̀ nu mwɛɛm mvù duŋci lɛ bó nu ɛ kumɛn wase.
44026021	Ɛ̀ nɛɛ lɛ fiɛɛ fì to geɛ ɛ́ Bojuu sɛ koo me yew ncese le egomte keeyu.
44026022	Geenɛn, Nyo' ɛ se ɛ no fii me ɛ to ɛ buy ɛbɛn e. Me ɛ mum ɛ no nleeme fɛn nfewci tɛn ɛ̂ bonyii bo baay baay noo bo caan caan. Ɛ fiɛɛ fì me nfewci nu kɛ fí fì Muses bô bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le to teete lɛ fí nu ke ekooy.
44026023	Bó to gayte lɛ Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ kɛŋke keeke eyɛn ŋgɛw, enu wee wvu fwe keebuy yî kpwe le, eduŋcɛ n'yuu ɛ̂ Bojuu noo bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu.”
44026024	No Baul to taŋyi kɛ diuw we gɛne, ɛ Fɛstus nɛ kay lo wvú gay lɛ, “Baul wo jewte wase lo. N'yɛɛyi wo wvu baay nu ɛ ge wase wo ɛ nɛ ɛ no jewte lo.”
44026025	Ɛ Baul tfuse ɛ̂ Fɛstus lɛ, “Kɛ me n'yaa njewte kɛ wee wvu baay. Fiɛɛ fì me njemyi nu kecɛɛy, ɛ me njemyi bô bvufee bwem fó.
44026026	Me njemyi ɛ̂ Nfon ɛndan nɛn, njefo bó kee mwɛɛm mvun ɛ kɛ mvú to kooyi ɛ̂ kenyilɛ le kɛ, ɛ kɛ fimew yaa nu dvú fì bó nu sɛ bó kee lo kɛ.
44026027	Nyaa', bó nu ɛ bee kɛ fiɛɛ fì Boŋwa' bo bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le jemyi lɛ? Me ŋkee lɛ bó nu lɛ ɛ bee.”
44026028	Ɛ Nfon Aglifa bife ɛ̂ Baul lɛ, “Wo kpwaake lɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wo ebaŋke me ɛ́ me entu wee Klistu kɛ yî kefew e caan nɛn e?”
44026029	Ɛ Baul tfuse lɛ, “Kɛnɛɛ kí nu caan, kɛnɛɛ kí nu baay, tu bunle yɛm fô Nyo' le nu kɛ lɛ fo emɛy kɛ wo kɛ. Wee tfuu wvù nu fɛn ɛbɛn yuuke no me njemyi ebaŋke tɛn enu diɛwɛ me le, geenɛn, efufe kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu boncaw ban.”
44026030	Ɛ Nfon nɛ ja we, ɛ wee sa' bô Bɛnis noo bonyii bò bô bó to shilɛɛ bi.
44026031	Ɛ bó buy, no jemyi ɛbonɛbon lɛ, “Wee wvun baa ge fiɛɛ fì bó eyu lo wvú kɛnɛɛ elese wvú yew ncaw e kɛ.”
44026032	Ɛ Nfon Aglifa gay ɛ̂ Fɛstus lɛ, “Ɛ́ ɛ̀ be baa nu lɛ wee wvun nu ɛ lɛkɛ wase lɛ nsaw we egɛn fô Nfon wvu Lum e, tu bó be ɛ cinɛ wvú le.”
44027001	Ɛ bó ke dioo seyse lɛ bee bo Baul eley ŋguw wvu ɛ̂ joo egɛn woŋ wvù Itali le, ɛ bó mum nya Baul bô bonyii bo ncaw e bomew can Julius wvù to nu ɛkolɛ ke ŋgoo mi bonyii bo nci le bo Nfon wvu Lum e.
44027002	Ɛ bee bó ley ɛ̂ ŋguw wvù nɛn'yɛɛ Adamitium e wvù to nu keegɛne leemene mondvuum mo ŋgem joo le, keba kè Ɛsia le. Ɛ Alistakus wvù wee wvu Tɛsalonika, woŋ wvù Masedonia le to nu tɛn bee bó. Ɛ bee bó mum no gɛne.
44027003	Ɛ ɛkfuŋ buy yuu, ɛ bese fɛse Sidon, ɛ Julius duŋcɛ keŋkoŋɛn fô Baul e, cinɛ wvú le lɛ wvú egɛn fô nsáa ye le ɛlaante ɛ́ bó efi wvú bô fiɛɛ fì wvú shieele.
44027004	Ɛ bese ke kase ley ɛ̂ ŋguw e fó, dioo egɛne, ɛ fwefwe no too cile bese fwe, ɛ bese mum no wɛmte wase woŋ wvù Sayblus wvu ɛ̂ joo ɛntelɛŋ e, ɛ wvú cile fwefwe.
44027005	Ɛ bese ke gɛn lente joo yi baay yì nu mbew woŋ wvù Silishia bô yì nu mbew woŋ wvù Bamfilia le, mum fɛse ɛ̂ kelaante kè Mila le, woŋ wvù Lisia le.
44027006	Ɛ ɛkolɛ ke ŋgoo bonyii bo nci le kiɛ yɛn ŋguw wvu ɛ̂ joo le jó wvù to nɛn'yɛɛ Alɛksandia gɛne Itali le, mum bvuse bese, lese ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ wvuwɛ le.
44027007	Ɛ bese ke ja fó, lɛn kɛ wase nɛn wɛɛ wɛɛ yî ɛdiuw e nteen, ke jɛɛnɛn lo sɛ fɛse mbew kelaante kè Sinidus e. No fwefwe to baa bee lɛ bese egɛn fwe teytey, ɛ bese mum bɛɛ no wɛmte wase lo Klɛt woŋ wvu ɛ̂ joo ɛntelɛŋ e, ɛ wvú cile fwefwe, mum fey Salmoni bvudvuu ɛ bvú ley ɛ gɛn ɛ̂ joo woŋ wvudvu le.
44027008	Ɛ bese mɛy kɛ no wɛmte tuu ŋgem joo le, ke jɛɛnɛn lo sɛ gɛn buy bvudvuu bvù bó teŋe lɛ Diuw Joo wvù Nyɛkeey e, ɛ wvú to nu nceencee mbew kelaante kè Lasia le.
44027009	No bese to nu ɛ jewse wase kefew ɛ̂ je baay, ɛ Diuu di Baay di Nlɛɛshɛ Bibefɛ le to fey wase, ɛ ɛ̀ nu wase kefew ke nffum wvù tɛmyi le, ɛ Baul mum nya ntefe ɛ̂ bonyii bo ɛ̂ ŋguw e lɛ,
44027010	“Bo'icɛm, me n'yɛne lɛ ɛ kɛw fɛn ɛ gɛn fwe nu ɛ lɛne disɛɛbeene nu ke ebefe, ɛ́ kenla enu dvú ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu kɛ ke mwɛɛm bô ŋguw e maaŋ kɛ, bonyii nu ke ekpwekɛn tɛn.”
44027011	Geenɛn, ɛ ɛkolɛ ke bonyii bo nci le faŋɛ yaa yuw njeme Baul e kɛ, yuw fiew ɛ ɛ̀ nu cee ɛkolɛ ŋguw bô cee ŋguw e.
44027012	No diuw joo wvudvu to baa jee keenu fó yî kefew ke nffum wvù tɛmyi le, ɛ wee nteen mum no tomte lɛ ɛ̀ jee lɛ bó egɛnè fwe, momtè laa ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó efɛse diuw joo wvu Foniks e, wvù nu woŋ wvù Klɛt jodvu le, efese kefew kedvu fó lɛ. Diuw joo wvudvu wvun to taale je ɛweɛwe bvuu taale tɛn je ɛkuɛku jò diuu seeyi.
44027013	Ɛ fwefwe wvumew ke nɛ no bene je ɛkuɛku nɛn wɛɛ, ɛ bonyii bo ŋguw e mum no kpwaake lɛ bó ɛ kɛŋkɛ wase fiɛɛ fì bó be gomte. Ɛ bó mum baa keŋ'wow ke ŋguw e, mum no gɛne ɛ̂ joo, tuu kɛ ŋgem e ŋgem e Klɛt jodvu.
44027014	Ɛ nffum wvù tɛmyi wvù bó teŋe lɛ, “Wvù je ɛbo ɛŋkoŋko jò diuu sane”, ke nɛ sɛsɛ woŋ wvudvu le, shii ɛ̂ joo.
44027015	No wvú shiile, kfun ŋguw ɛ je faŋɛ yaa bvuu nu dvú keegɛne yî dvú le kɛ, ɛ bó mum cinɛ ŋguw e, ɛ nffum no tuule gɛne dvú.
44027016	Ɛ bese mum no gɛne kɛ lo, gɛn fey ɛkuɛku jo woŋ wvumvu wvu caan ɛ̂ joo ɛntelɛŋ ɛ bó teŋe lɛ Kawda. Ɛ woŋ wvudvu no cile fwefwe, ɛ bese mum no katene keebense kekoŋ ɛ̂ ŋguw e.
44027017	Ɛ bese ke bense, mum yilɛ ŋguw bô bokfuu fo wvú esawyɛ, dioo gɛne no fane lɛ ŋguw nu ke egɛn kfun ye mbew woŋ wvù Libia le yî bijiw bi monshɛɛm e bì nu ɛ̂ joo. Ɛ bó mum shike ndvu fwefwe, cinɛ ɛ ŋguw no gɛne ɛwvunɛwvun.
44027018	No nffum wvudvu to tɛmyi kɛ gɛne lo, ɛ ɛkfuŋ buy yuu, ɛ bó mum kɛw no bvuuse mwɛɛm ɛ̂ ŋguw e, laaŋke ɛ̂ joo.
44027019	Ɛ bvú ke bvuu buy yuu, ɛ bonyii bo ŋguw e bvuse mwɛɛm mvu ŋguw e laŋ ɛ̂ joo bô can yibo.
44027020	Ɛ ɛdiuw ke fey nteen ɛ bese baa yɛn diuu le kɛnɛɛ jón e kɛ, ɛ nffum kfune kɛ lo ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu wvu wɛɛ kɛ, ɛ bese mum kiɛɛ lɛ fisɛse nu ɛ ka wase.
44027021	No bonyii to nu ɛ ce wase ɛdiuw nteen ɛ bó baa die fiɛɛ, ɛ Baul nɛ bencɛ leem fwe gay lɛ, “Bo'icɛm, ɛ́ ben se bee eyuw me le ɛ́ bó emɛy Klɛt, tu beene baa ekɛŋkɛ ŋgɛw wvun bô kenla kin nɛn kɛ.
44027022	Geenɛn, me nlɛke lɛ ben ekuu shém, njefo kɛ naa wee mvu ben e nu ela kɛ, ɛ̀ nu ela kɛ ŋguw mɛy.
44027023	Me njemyi nɛn njefo Nyo' wvù kɛŋke me, wvù me mbunlee, se nu ɛ tum nceendaa we ɛntaŋ ɛbɛn wvú ɛ to ɛ leem mbew yɛm e,
44027024	ɛ gay ɛ̂ me lɛ, ‘Baul, fo wo efanè kɛ. Wo kɛŋke keeke eleem fwe dvu Nfon wvu Lum. Taa eyɛn, Nyo' nu ɛ duŋcɛ wase keŋkoŋɛn fô wo le ɛ ge lɛ kɛ wee mvu ŋgoo bonyii bò ben ɛ bó nu ɛ̂ ŋguw e nu ke ela kɛ.’
44027025	Nonɛn, bo'icɛm, ben ekuu shém. Me nu ɛ nlese fitele yî Nyo' le lɛ fiɛɛ fì wvú jeme ɛ̂ me nu ke ekooy kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no wvú jeme.
44027026	No fí nu nonɛn, ŋguw kɛŋke keeke ekfun ye yî woŋ wvumew e ɛ̂ joo ɛntelɛŋ.”
44027027	Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu ɛdiuw ncow ɛna yuufe le ɛ nffum bɛɛ kɛ kale bô bese ɛ̂ joo yi baay yi Adia le. Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu kɛ diɛwɛ ɛntaŋ ɛntelɛŋ e, ɛ bonyii bò lemte ɛ̂ ŋguw e nɛ kpwawcɛ lɛ sekemew ɛ bó buyte wase mbew nshɛ le.
44027028	Ɛ bó mum few joo no yí shiiyine bô kfuu ɛ bó ɛ shɛŋke fiɛɛ yî dvú le, yɛn lɛ yí nu ŋkeŋkeŋ mbaanfiɛɛ. Ɛ bó gɛncɛ fwe, bvuu few, yɛn ɛ yí nu wase ŋkeŋkeŋ yuufe ncow tin.
44027029	Ɛ bó no fane lɛ ɛ̀ nɛlo ɛ́ ŋguw ekfun ye yî bimbaan e, mum shike biŋwow binɛw ɛ̂ joo ɛjim jo ŋguw, no bunlee lɛ ɛkfuŋ eyuu kɛ lo.
44027030	Ɛ bonyii bò lemte ɛ̂ ŋguw e ke nɛ no gomte keelewtɛ buy ɛ̂ ŋguw e, mum shike kekoŋ ɛ̂ joo, no buwsee lɛ bó gomte keeshike biŋwow bi fwe dvu ŋguw ɛ̂ joo.
44027031	Ɛ Baul gay ɛ̂ ɛkolɛ ke bonyii bo nci le bô bonyii bew lɛ, “Ɛ́ bonyii ban mom lo ɛ buy ɛ̂ ŋguw e, naa ɛ́ wee mvu ben e saa ke eluŋ kɛ.”
44027032	Ɛ bonyii bo nci le mum sumyɛ bokfuu bò bó to suuyɛɛ kekoŋ dvú yî ŋguw e, mum cinɛ ɛ kí no lɛyte gɛne.
44027033	Ɛ bvutfuu ke dioo sam, ɛ Baul lɛkɛ bonyii bocii lɛ bó ediekɛn, gayte lɛ, “Ɛbɛn nu wase ɛdiuw yuufe ncow ɛna no ben nu yî nfan e, ɛ fiɛɛ baa eley ɛ̂ ben ɛmvu kɛ.
44027034	Me ɛ mum ɛ no nlɛke lɛ ben edie kɛ fiɛɛ, ɛ́ ye yene etu fó. Kɛ naa yvuw miaaŋ nu ke ela ɛ̂ wee ɛfa kɛ.”
44027035	No wvú jeme nonɛn, mum jo blɛɛd, nya keyoone ɛ̂ Nyo', guse no diee ɛ̂ bonyii bocii ɛjise.
44027036	Ɛ bó mum kuu shém bocii diekɛn.
44027037	Bese bocii bò to nu ɛ̂ ŋguw e to nu wee gee fɛɛ kecow mbaŋsooshwiy ncow bosoocaan (276).
44027038	Ɛ bonyii bocii ke diekɛn ffuu, ɛ bó mum bvuse ɛgiŋ yò to nu ɛ̂ ŋguw e, laŋ ɛ̂ joo keege lɛ wvú eyaatɛn.
44027039	Ɛ ɛkfuŋ ke yuu, ɛ ɛŋkpwaante yenɛ, ɛ bonyii bò lemte ɛ̂ ŋguw e faŋɛ yaa kiɛɛ bvudvuu bvudvu kɛ. Geenɛn, ɛ bó yɛn kendvuy e, ɛ kí ɛ gɛn ɛ buy yî monshɛɛm e, mum yɛn lɛ bó emom ɛ́ ŋguw eley egɛn ece yî dvú le ŋgem joo le.
44027040	Ɛ bó mum sumyɛ biŋwow ɛ bí shii gɛn ɛ̂ joo, bvuu kase fay bokfuu bò bó to suuyɛɛ bite bì bó baŋse ŋguw dvú, mum bense tɛn ndvu fwefwe yi fwe ɛ fwefwe ley jó no domsee ŋguw ɛ wvú gɛne ɛ̂ kendvuy kedvu le.
44027041	Geenɛn, ɛ wvú dioo gɛne, kfun ye yî kejiw ke monshɛɛm e ɛ̂ joo. Ɛ keba ke ŋguw e ke fwe ley ce yî dvú le faŋɛ yaa ebvuu eshiike kɛ. Ɛ joo mum no kfune keba ke ɛjim ɛ kí sawyi.
44027042	Ɛ bonyii bo nci le mum nɛ no gomte lɛ bó eyuwyɛ bonyii bo ncaw e bocii wvu lɛ fo mvu bó le ke enɛ esam joo ebuy elewtɛ.
44027043	Geenɛn, ɛ ɛkolɛ ke bonyii bo nci le no gomte keeboyse Baul, mum kan lɛ fo bó ege nonɛn kɛ, gay fiew lɛ bonyii bò kee keesam joo eyaw esele ɛ̂ joo, esam ebuy ɛŋkpwaante,
44027044	ɛ́ kebɛse ke bonyii le ebiì yî biwaŋ e noo yî binsawyɛ bi ŋguw e. Ɛ̀ nɛɛ no bese to ghanɛɛ sɛ fɛse ɛŋkpwaante yuleyule.
44028001	No bese to fɛsɛɛ ɛŋkpwaante yuleyule nonɛn, mum yuw lɛ bó teŋe bvudvuu bvudvu lɛ Malta, ɛ ɛ̀ to nu woŋ ɛ̂ joo ɛntelɛŋ.
44028002	Ɛ bonyii bo woŋ wvudvu le duŋcɛ keŋkoŋɛn fô bese le ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu ke wɛɛ kɛ, fiisɛn bese, fwɛɛ ŋguy ɛ bese no yosene, njefo jaŋ to nu ɛ kɛw wase no too ɛ kenton gule.
44028003	Ɛ Baul ke baancɛ ŋgay, gɛn lɛ wen efwɛɛ, ɛ kefe to nu ɛ̂ ŋgay yidvu le, ɛ ŋguy yvuwsɛ ge ɛ kí mum buy, lum kebo kew no njɛɛŋkene yî dvú le.
44028004	Ɛ bonyii bo woŋ wvudvu le dioo yɛn no kí njɛɛŋkene yî kebo kew e, mum no jemyi ɛbonɛbon lɛ, “Wee wvun ke nu ɛ yu wase wee. Wvú be ɛ boy ɛ̂ joo, geenɛn lon nu ɛ koo wvú ɛ wvú nu ekpwe.”
44028005	Geenɛn, ɛ Baul yɛwse kɛ lo kefe kedvu ɛ kí gbwe ɛ̂ ŋguy e, ɛ fiɛɛ faŋɛ yaa ge wvú kɛ.
44028006	Ɛ bonyii bodvu mum no cɛyte, kpwaake lɛ ye Baul nu ekɛw ebene, kɛnɛɛ lɛ wvú nu enɛ esɛsɛ egbwe ekpwe. Ɛ bó ke cɛy nɛn cɛy ŋkuuŋ, ke dioo yɛn ɛ fiɛɛ baa ge wvú, ɛ bó mum kumɛn ŋkpwawcɛ wvubo nɛ wase no duu lɛ, “Wee wvun nu nyo' mvu.”
44028007	Wee sa' wvu jó to kɛŋke ŋɛɛ ye kɛ nceencee mbew fô bese to nu le. Diee di wee wvudvu le to nu Bublius. Ɛ wvú fiisɛn bese, ɛ bee bó ce ɛdiuw ɛta ɛ wvú taale fô bese le ntay.
44028008	Ɛ fí kooy lɛ icee Bublius to jiime cɛmte bô ken'ya' noo ntoombun. Ɛ Baul mum gɛn fô wvú to jiime, bunle, gɛɛ can yî ye le, fɛ wvú.
44028009	No fí to kooyɛɛ nonɛn, ɛ bonyii bo woŋ wvudvu le bocii bò to kɛŋke bincɛm mum no too ɛ Baul fɛle tɛn bó.
44028010	Ɛ bó mum no nyaa bese bô mwɛɛm nteen. Ɛ bese ke dioo nɛn'yi jó, ɛ bó bvuu to bô mwɛɛm mvunciim mvù bese to shieele gɛɛ ɛ̂ ŋguw e.
44028011	Ɛ bese ley ɛ̂ ŋguw e no gɛne ɛ bó ɛ ce wase Malta woŋ wvu ɛ̂ joo ɛntelɛŋ wvudvu le kee tɛ. Ŋguw wvudvu to nu wvu Alɛksandia ɛ bó teŋe lɛ Bonyo' bo Ɛmam e, ɛ wvú to nu woŋ wvudvu le cɛyte lɛ kefew ke nffum wvù tɛmyi le efey.
44028012	Ɛ bese ke gɛn buy diuw joo wvu ɛ̂ kelaante kè Silakus e, ce jó ɛdiuw ɛta,
44028013	ke nɛ jó, gɛn fɛse diuw joo wvu ɛ̂ kelaante kè Lɛgium e ce jó. Ɛ ɛkfuŋ buy yuu, ɛ fwefwe kɛw no bene je ɛkuɛku, ɛ bese mum no gɛne, ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu ɛdiuw ɛfaa, ɛ bese fɛse diuw joo wvù Butioli le.
44028014	No bese fɛse jó, yɛn bonyii bo mbee le bo jó le, ɛ bó lɛkɛ lɛ bese egɛn kɛ lɛ ɛ́ bee bó ece ɛdiuw ɛsooshwiy. Ɛ bee bó ke ce, ɛ bese sɛ ke gɛn fɛse Lum.
44028015	No bese to gɛne, ɛ bonyii bo mbee le bo Lum ke dioo yuw lɛ bese too lo, ɛ bó buy no lɛne too lɛ bee bó etasɛn. Ɛ bó to naa buy fô Way wvu Abiyus e, bô fô Yéw Bonyii bo Ghane le yi Shɛ le. Ɛ Baul yɛn bó le, ɛ fitele fiew lɛɛtɛn, ɛ wvú nya keyoone ɛ̂ Nyo'.
44028016	Ɛ bese ke fɛse Lum, ɛ bó cinɛ Baul e ɛ wvú no cee fiew wvú ɛmbeŋ, ɛ wee nci cɛyte wvú.
44028017	Ɛ ɛdiuw ke fey ɛta, ɛ Baul tee bikuu bi Bojuu le bi jó. Ɛ bí to, ɛ wvú gay ɛ̂ bí lɛ, “Boom bo bwɛɛm e, me nu yî ncaw e nɛn ɛ bó to koo me Jɛlusalɛm, nya can bonyii bo Lum e ɛ me mbaa ncim njay naa lo fiɛɛ bô bonyii bosɛɛbeene kɛnɛɛ nce bo'icee bosɛɛbeene mvu kɛ.
44028018	Ɛ bonyii bo Lum bodvu ke dioo tasse nsaw wɛm, faŋɛ yaa yɛn fiɛɛ fì ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó eyu me yî dvú le kɛ. Ɛ bó mum no gomte keecinɛ me le,
44028019	geenɛn, ɛ Bojuu ma lo. Ɛ me mum no ŋkɛŋke keenlɛkɛ lɛ nsaw wɛm egɛn fwe fô Nfon wvu Lum e. Ɛ kɛ me nto ŋgee nonɛn, lɛ me ŋkɛŋke fiɛɛ keentey yî bonyii bem e kɛ.
44028020	Ɛ̀ nɛɛ fiɛɛ fì ge me ɛ nsɛ ntee ben lɛ beene ejeme. Me nu yî boncaw ban e nɛn ɛ ɛ̀ nu nje wee wvù beene bonyii bo Islael se cɛyte.”
44028021	Ɛ bonyii bodvu tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Bese baa kɛŋkɛ ŋwa' wvù ja Judea ɛkumɛ wo kɛ, ɛ wee mvu boom bo bwee wesebeene le bò nɛn'yi jó too jan baa eshomse wo kɛnɛɛ ejeme fiɛɛ fì befe ɛkumɛ wo kɛ.
44028022	Geenɛn, ɛ bese nu ke ekooŋke keeyuw wo ŋkpwawcɛ. Fì bese kee nu kɛ lɛ ŋgoo yin yì wo nu jó nu ɛ bonyii bɛmte kɛ lo yí mondvuum monciim.”
44028023	Ɛ bó mum gɛɛ diuu dì bó nu ke eto ɛ́ Baul ejeme ɛ̂ bó. Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu ɛbvubwɛ, ɛ bonyii nteen tase fô wvú to cee, ɛ wvú kɛw fontaŋɛntaŋ gɛn buy fokiɛguu, nyɛyte fiɛɛ ficii ɛ̂ bó, fewci ɛkumɛ bvunfon bvu Nyo' le. Ɛ wvú bvuu no jemyi duŋci mwɛɛm mvù nu ɛ̂ Ŋwa' bonci bo Muses e bô ɛ̂ Boŋwa' bo bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le ɛkumɛ Jisos, momte keege ɛ́ bó ebee lɛ fiɛɛ fì wen jemyi nu kecɛɛy.
44028024	Ɛ bonyii bomew bee fiɛɛ fì wvú to jemyi le, ɛ bomew faŋɛ yaa bee kɛ.
44028025	Ɛ bó nɛ bvuŋ ɛbonɛbon mum no buci no Baul laŋ diɛw lɛ, “Fiɛɛ fì Keyoy ke Yuule to jemyɛɛ ɛ̂ bo'icee bonɛn diuw wee ntum Nyo' wvù Yɛsaya le nu naa kecɛɛy.
44028026	Kí to nu ɛ jeme lɛ, ‘Gɛnɛ egay ɛ̂ bonyii bodvu lɛ, ben nu ke eyeke naa mwɛɛm ntay geenɛn yaa yuuke kɛ, ke etaale naa mwɛɛm ntay geenɛn yaa yɛne kɛ.
44028027	Ɛ fí nu nonɛn njefo mvuntelem mvu bonyii bodvu le nu ɛ mvú ɛ lɛ wase. Bó nu ɛ jinɛ bintuŋtuŋ bibole, ɛ kfukɛ ɛjisɛ ɛbo. Ɛ bó ge nonɛn lɛ fo ɛjisɛ ɛbo eyɛnè mwɛɛm e, ɛ bintuŋtuŋ bibole yuuke mwɛɛm, ɛ mvuntelem mvubole yvuwse, ɛ́ bó etu jim fô me le, ɛ́ me enfɛ bó.’”
44028028	Ɛ Baul mum mɛse lɛ, “Ben ekeè lɛ bó nu ɛ tum wase bonyii bô saaka wvun wvu ɛkumɛ no Nyo' boysee bonyii fô bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu le, ɛ bó nu eyuw.”
44028029	[No wvú jeme nonɛn, ɛ Bojuu bodvu mum nɛ no buci, beeke mbew yî jeme wvudvu le ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu wvu wɛɛ kɛ.]
44028030	Ɛ Baul no cee kɛ yew yì wvú to laake lo le yî bilum e bifɛɛ, fiisene bonyii bocii bò to too ɛ̂ wvú le.
44028031	Ɛ wvú no fewci ɛkumɛ bvunfon bvu Nyo' le, bvuu yɛɛyi bonyii ɛkumɛ Tata Jisos Klistu, jemyi yaa fane kɛ, ɛ wee yaa jewsee wvú kɛ.
45001001	Ɛ̀ nu me wvù Baul wvù waa lemme Klistu Jisos. Nyo' to nu ɛ tee me lɛ me enù waa ntum Jisos, gɛɛ lɛ me enfewcì saaka wvù jee wvu wvuwen.
45001002	Saaka wvù jee wvun nu wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ bonyii dvú fele yî bonyii bew bo ntum e, no fí nu ɛ bó ɛ saŋ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' we wvù yuule le.
45001003	Wvú nu ɛkumɛ Waa we wvù to joɛ ye wee wvu wum, ɛ bó boo wvú ɛ̂ kfuu di Nfon Dawe le.
45001004	Tata wesebeene wvù Jisos Klistu nu ɛ Nyo' to duŋcɛ fele yî Keyoy ke Yuule le lɛ ɛ̀ nu Waa wen wvù kɛŋke mvuŋgay no wvú to bvusɛɛ wvú yî kpwe le.
45001005	Ɛ̀ ge Jisos Klistu Nyo' ɛ sɛ buw me lɛ me enù waa we ntum, wvu lɛ me eŋge ɛ́ bonyii bocii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu elese fitele yî ye le, eyuukè ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvú le bensee diee diew.
45001006	Ben tɛn nu ŋgoo bonyii bò Nyo' nu ɛ tee wase lɛ bó enù bonyii bo Jisos Klistu le.
45001007	Me ɛ no nsaaŋke ŋwa' wvun fô ben e bocii bò nu Lum, bò nu fitele fi Nyo' le, ɛ wvú ɛ tee lɛ bó enù bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bew. Nyo' Icee wesebeene bô Tata Jisos Klistu ebuw ben bô kembonɛn ebvuu enya ben bô mvuntelem mvù lɛɛtene.
45001008	Me ŋgomte keen'yaw enya keyoone ɛ̂ Nyo' wɛm nje ben bocii nfele yî Jisos Klistu le, njefo woŋ tfuu jemyi ɛkumɛ fitele fì ben nu ɛ lese yî ye le.
45001009	Nyo' wvù me nlemte wvú le bô fitele fiem ficii yî saaka wvù jee wvu ɛkumɛ Waa we le leeme fwe wɛm lɛ me ŋké no ŋkumyi ben sekecii ɛ̂ bunle yɛm e.
45001010	Me ŋké ndioo mbunlee no nlɛke lɛ ɛ́ je nɛlo ɛ yenɛ, ɛ́ me ento ɛ̂ ben e keseen fɛn ɛ́ Nyo' ɛ bee,
45001011	njefo me ŋkooŋke naa baay keen'yɛn ben e wvu lɛ me eŋgaw nnya yì Keyoy ke Yuule nu ɛ nya ɛ̂ me beene, ɛ́ yí ege ɛ́ ben etɛmyi.
45001012	Fì nu lɛ, ɛ́ beene eyvuwsɛ mvuntelem mvusɛɛbeene, ɛ́ fitele fì ben lese yî Nyo' le eyvuwsɛ fiem, ɛ́ fiem eyvuwsɛ finɛn.
45001013	Boom bo bwɛɛm e, me ŋgomte lɛ ben ekiɛɛ lɛ me nu ɛ ŋkaw wase bokaŋ e bokaŋ e lɛ me nu ento ɛ̂ ben e, ŋké ŋkaw ɛ fiɛɛ jewse kɛ me. Ɛ me ŋgomte lɛ me ento wvu lɛ me eŋkɛŋkɛ ŋgbwele jo ben lɛŋlɛŋ no me nu ɛ ŋkɛŋkɛ wase jo bonyii bomew bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu.
45001014	Lemme din fô bonyii bocii le nu ɛ̂ kendoŋ kem e, kɛnɛɛ ɛ̀ nu bonyii bò nu woŋ wvù yuu wase le, kɛnɛɛ ɛ̀ nu bò bɛɛ ɛntfun, kɛnɛɛ bonyii bò kɛŋke bvufee, kɛnɛɛ bò bɛɛ biyuŋ.
45001015	Ɛ̀ nɛɛ fiɛɛ fì fitele bɛɛnci naa me baay keenfewcɛ saaka wvù jee ɛ̂ ben tɛn bò nu Lum.
45001016	Ben ekeè lɛ kɛ me ŋ'wuumene fiɛɛ fi ɛkumɛ saaka wvù jee wvù wvu Nyo' kɛ. Me ŋkee lo lɛ ɛ̀ nu fô mvuŋgay mvu Nyo' le keeboyse wee tfuu wvù nu ɛ lese fitele yî ye le nu. Ɛ saaka wvun yaake gɛne ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô Bojuu le sɛ gɛne tɛn fô bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu le.
45001017	Fì nu lɛ saaka wvù jee wvun duŋci je yì Nyo' joo lɛ wee nu teytey ɛ̂ wvú ɛjise le. Ɛ fifin kɛw ɛ gɛn ɛ mɛse yî fitele fì mwɛtɛn lese yî ye le. Ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì bó nu ɛ saŋ lɛ, “Wee wvu teytey nu ke ecee nje fitele fì wvú lese yî Nyo' le.”
45001018	Me njemyi nɛn njefo shém Nyo' ké no ffuuke fowe bô bonyii bò maa lo wvú buwyi mwɛɛm, ɛ gee dibole dì befe yike kecɛɛy ke diɛw Nyo' le.
45001019	Yí ffuuke nonɛn njefo fiɛɛ fì bonyii nulo ekiɛɛ ɛkumɛ Nyo' yen'yi ɛndan, njefo wvú wvù Nyo' nu ɛ duŋcɛ wase ɛ̂ bó.
45001020	Ɛ kɛw naa lo foŋkɛw no Nyo' to bomɛɛ woŋ nu ɛ mvuŋgay mwew mvù mɛy lo, bô no wvú wvù Nyo' nu, nu ɛ bonyii ɛ yɛn wase ɛ bvuu ɛ kiɛɛ yî mwɛɛm mvù wvú bom e, naa no bonyii yaa cim yɛne wvú le kɛ. Nonɛn kɛ je bvuu nu dvú yì bó ke enɛ ewowlene duu lɛ kɛ bó kee Nyo' kɛ.
45001021	Naa no bó cim kee Nyo' nonɛn, kɛ bó wvumte wvú diɛwɛ Nyo' le kɛnɛɛ nyaa keyoone ɛ̂ wvú kɛ. Boŋkpwawcɛ bobole nu ɛ nɛ ɛ tu bo ɛcici. Bikuu bibole bi biyɛ nu ɛ yiŋsɛn kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô ɛjiwɛ.
45001022	Bó duu lɛ bó kɛŋke bvufee, ɛ kaa ɛ nɛ ɛ tu biyuŋ.
45001023	Bó nu ɛ shɛɛ keebunlee Nyo' bvukukɛ wvù yaa nulo ekpwe kɛ, ɛ fey ɛ no bunlee ɛ ɛ̀ nu mvumooso mvù bó kene bô can mvú ɛ no fieesene bonyii bò nulo ekpwekɛn, bô mvunyiim noo nyám yì lɛne we, bô yì sone kuse.
45001024	No fí nu nonɛn Nyo' ɛ mum ɛ cinɛ bó le bó ɛ no gee wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu mwɛɛm mvù mvuntelem mvubole shieele mvù ɛ̀ nu mwɛɛm mvu nnyɛn e, ɛ bó gee nonɛn bô ye yibo wee bô wee, mum shoose bikuu bibole.
45001025	Bó nu ɛ kumɛn kecɛɛy ke ɛkumɛ Nyo' ɛ tu mbiay, ɛ no bunlee bvuu lemte ɛ ɛ̀ nu mwɛɛm mvù Nyo' bom e ɛfey keebunlee bvuu lemte ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù Bomɛɛn e. Ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù bó kɛŋke keebensee sekecii sɛ ŋka. Fí enù nonɛn.
45001026	No bó gee nonɛn, Nyo' ɛ mum ɛ cinɛ bó le, ye ɛ no yvuwse bó keegee mwɛɛm mvu kenshoose le. Ɛ bokɛnɛ jiime fô bokɛnɛ le, ɛ Nyo' to baa bom wee lɛ wvú egeè nonɛn kɛ.
45001027	Ɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no bolemsɛ cin'yi je yì Nyo' to geɛ keejiime bô bokɛnɛ le, ɛ ye yvuwse bó keejiime ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô bolemsɛ bomew e. Ɛ bolemsɛ gee mwɛɛm mvu kenshoose le bô bolemsɛ bomew. No bó gee nonɛn mum joo ŋgɛw yî bikuu bibole wvù ɛ̀ nu nlawma gee dibole dì befe.
45001028	No bonyii bodvu baa eyɛne lɛ fí nu lɛŋ keekiɛɛ Nyo', Nyo' ɛ mum ɛ cinɛ bó le lɛ bó ekɛŋke bvufee ɛ ɛ̀ nu bvu keyuŋ e, mum gee mwɛɛm mvù bó yaa kɛŋke keegee kɛ.
45001029	Mvuntelem mvubole ɛ mum ɛ no nu ɛ mvú ɛ yiŋsɛn bô mwɛɛm mvù befe jɛɛy jɛɛy. Bó buwyi mwɛɛm, dewkene ɛjisɛ, kɛŋke mvuntelem mvù befe, bene bindoŋ bô bonyii, yuwyi bonyii, diuu bvudiuw, lɛɛle kenlɛɛma, ŋgomgome bô mwɛɛm, kunsene mvuŋkunsɛn,
45001030	beete bô ɛdiee ɛ bonyii, bane Nyo', sɛɛnene kensɛɛnɛn, tɛmyi bikuu, saale ye, momte kuw, tɛmyi bikuu bô bo'icee bobole noo bobwee bobole.
45001031	Bó nu biyuŋ yaa leeme yî diɛw yibole kɛ. Bó nyɛwle bô bonyii bomew, yaa camte shen fô bonyii le kɛ.
45001032	Bó gee nonɛn kee kɛ naa lɛ Nyo' nu ɛ leke wase lɛ wee wvù gee mvumvun mwɛɛm nu ɛ wvú kɛŋke keekpwe. Geenɛn, bó ɛ no gee kɛ gɛne dvú, bvuu bɛnsee bonyii bò gee kfuu mvumwɛ mwɛɛm.
45002001	Nonɛn wo wvù lomte gee di wee mvu le kɛnɛɛ ɛ̀ nu wo wvù yɛɛ, ekeè lɛ kɛ wo tɛn nu sɛ jay kɛ. Ɛ̀ keè lɛ no wo lomte gee diew nu ɛ wo leese ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛkolɛ kuw ŋgɛw e, njefo wo wvù lomte wɛ gee kɛ naa tɛn fiɛɛ fì wvú gee.
45002002	Beene kee lo lɛ, ɛ́ Nyo' laŋ ŋgɛw yî bonyii bò gee mvumvun mwɛɛm e, tu wvú laaŋke bii kecɛɛy e.
45002003	Nonɛn wo wɛ wvù lomte gee di bonyii bò gee kfuu mvumwɛ mwɛɛm e, geenɛn ɛ wo kebɛɛ gee kɛ tɛn mvú, kpwaake lɛ wo nu ke eboy can nsaw Nyo' le?
45002004	Nuu lɛ kɛ wo yɛne lɛ Nyo' kɛŋke fitele fì jee fô bonyii le baay, kuule shém baay, nu tɛn nyɛkeey baay ɛ? Ɛ̀ keè lɛ fitele fì jee fi Nyo' le fô wo le duŋci lɛ wo ekumɛn fitele fiuw.
45002005	Geenɛn no wo nu ɛ tun keekumɛn fitele fiuw, ɛ no gee ɛ fí tɛmyi kɛ gɛne lo, nu ɛ wo biise ɛ ɛ̀ nu ŋgɛw fô ɛkolɛ kuw e, wvù nu ke enu diuu dì Nyo' nu ke eduŋcɛ shém yì ffuuke seke wvú saake bonyii bocii ɛ̂ je yi lɛŋ e.
45002006	Nyo' nu ke elaw wee mwaaŋ mwaaŋ bii gee di mwɛtɛn e.
45002007	Bonyii bò nu nyɛkeey, lemte lemme dì jee, gomte ɛ ɛ̀ nu bvukukɛ bô n'wvum noo nshii wvù yaa kaa kɛ, nu ɛ wvú nu ke enya nshii wvù mɛy lo ɛ̂ bó.
45002008	Geenɛn ɛ bonyii bò taale kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu bikuu bibole, tune keeyuw kecɛɛy e, gee ɛ ɛ̀ nu mwɛɛm mvù befe, nu ɛ Nyo' nu ke eduŋcɛ shém yì ton'yɛɛn bô ŋgɛw ɛ̂ bó.
45002009	Monlum mo baay bô nsase nu ke enu fô wee tfuu wvù gee kebefɛ le ɛ kɛw yî Bojuu le ɛ gɛn yî bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu le.
45002010	Geenɛn, ɛ bvukukɛ bô n'wvum noo nlɛɛtɛn nu ke enu fô bonyii bò gee gee dì jee le ɛ kɛw yî Bojuu le ɛ gɛn yî bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu le.
45002011	Fí nu ke enu nonɛn njefo kɛ Nyo' ké no duŋci kejɛɛy jɛɛy kɛ.
45002012	Bonyii bocii bò gee kebefɛ sɛ bó cim kɛŋke bonci bo Muses e, nu ɛ bó nu ke eley kɛ ŋgɛw e naa no bó yaa cim kɛŋke bonci kɛ. Ɛ bonyii bocii bò gee kebefɛ ɛ bó nu ɛkuse jo bonci, nu ɛ bó nu ke esaw bó bii bonci bodvu le.
45002013	Fí nu nonɛn njefo kɛ Nyo' nu ke ejo wee lɛ wvú nu teytey ɛ̂ wvú ɛjisɛ njefo wvú yuuke fiɛɛ fì bonci jemyi kɛ. Wvú nu ke ejo wee lɛ wvú nu teytey ɛ ɛ̀ nu seke mwɛtɛn gee fiɛɛ fì bonci gomte.
45002014	Ɛ́ bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu bò nu sɛ bonci nɛ ɛ no gee mwɛɛm bô boŋkpwawcɛ bobole ɛ ɛ̀ nu mwɛɛm mvù bonci gomte, tu bó nu wase bonci fô bikuu bibole naa no bó baa cim kɛŋke bonci bò Nyo' nu ɛ nya ɛ̂ Bojuu kɛ.
45002015	Fifiɛ duŋci lɛ fiɛɛ fì bonci gomte nu ɛ Nyo' ɛ saŋ fô mvuntelem mvubole. Ɛ mvuntelem mvubole seŋe tɛn ɛ̂ bó nonɛn. Ɛ́ bó dioo gee fiɛɛ fì befe, ɛ́ fitele no saake bó. Ɛ́ bó dioo gee fì jee, ɛ́ fí no tomte bó.
45002016	Mwɛɛm mvun nu ke ekooy diuu dì Nyo' nu ke esaw boŋkpwawcɛ bò bonyii bocii kɛŋke ɛ̂ nnyilɛ le fele yî Klistu Jisos e, no saaka wvù jee wvù me nfewci duŋci.
45002017	Wo wvù teŋe ɛkolɛ kuw lɛ wee Juu, wo gɛɛle ɛkolɛ yî bonci bo Muses e, yuuke ye lɛ wo nu wee Nyo',
45002018	ɛ bó ɛ yɛɛyi wase ben bô bonci ben ɛ kiɛɛ fiɛɛ fì Nyo' shieele, kee tɛn fiɛɛ fì looci jee naa ntay.
45002019	Ben kee naa ntay lɛ ɛ̀ nu ben bò duŋci je ɛ̂ binfefe, nu tɛn bin'yeese fô bonyii bò nu kenjiwe le,
45002020	ɛ ben nu bò teete biyuŋ, ɛ ɛ̀ nu ben bò yɛɛyi bonyii bò maa mwɛɛm diɛwɛ mvunlɛy mvu boom e njefo bonci nu ɛ nya wase ben bô bvufee bvucii noo kecɛɛy.
45002021	Wo wvù yɛɛyi bonyii nonɛn, wo yɛɛyi kɛ tɛn kuw ɛkolɛ? Wo wvù fewci lɛ fo wee ecoŋ bvucoŋ, wo gee nɛɛ fiuw?
45002022	Wo wvù kayte lɛ fo dwee wee kɛnɛɛ kpwɛɛ wee ejiim bô wee mvu, wo nu sɛ wo gee nonɛn e? Wo wvù kaci lo fiɛɛ fi ɛkumɛ mvumooso, wo nu sɛ wo cooŋke mwɛɛm yéw ncese yi mvumooso le?
45002023	Wo wvù saale ye bô bonci bo Nyo' le, kɛ wo yaa shoose Nyo' no wo ŋgoyte bonci bodvu?
45002024	Ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì bó nu ɛ saŋ lɛ, “Bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu ké no beete bô diee di Nyo' le ɛ ɛ̀ ge gee dinɛn ben Bojuu.”
45002025	Keetfuse wee yew kɛŋke naa sɛw, ɛ́ ɛ̀ fɛn nu lɛ wee wvudvu gee fiɛɛ fì bonci gayte. Geenɛn, ɛ́ wo ŋgoyte bonci, tu ntfuse yew wvù bó tfuse wo yew wvudvu nu kɛ diɛwɛ wo bɛɛ ntffuse.
45002026	Wee ɛ́ no bɛɛ ntffuse, gee fiɛɛ fi lɛŋ fì bonci gomte, bó saa ejo lɛ bó nu ɛ tfuse wase wvú yew, naa no wvú cim bɛɛ ntffuse?
45002027	Nonɛn, bonyii bò bɛɛ ntffuse yî nyam ye le geenɛn gɛɛle bonci nu ke ege ɛ́ bó elese ben Bojuu ŋgɛw e bò kɛŋke bonci bò bó to saŋɛɛ, ɛ ben bvuu tfuuse bonyii yew geenɛn ŋgoyte bonci bodvu.
45002028	Ben ekeè lɛ kɛ wee Juu wvu lɛŋ nu wvù yen'yi ye le kɛ. Ɛ kɛ ntfuse yew wvu lɛŋ nu fiɛɛ fì bó yɛne fí le ɛkfuŋ yî nyam ye le kɛ.
45002029	Wee Juu wvu lɛŋ nu wvu ɛ̂ fitele le. Ɛ ntfuse yew wvu lɛŋ nu wvu ɛ̂ fitele le, wvù ɛ seyse Keyoy ke Yuule, ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu fiɛɛ fì bó yɛne ɛjise kɛ. Wvuwɛ wee nu ɛ ɛ̀ ké no bɛnsee Nyo' wvú. Kɛ ɛ̀ ké no bɛnsee bonyii wvú kɛ.
45003001	No fí nu nonɛn, Bojuu fele bonyii bomew yî fiɛɛ le? Ɛ sɛw nu dvú yî ntfuse wvù bó tfuuse bonyii yew e?
45003002	'Ɛɛ, Bojuu fele naa bonyii bomew ɛ̂ jé le nteen. Fi baay nu lɛ Nyo' to nu ɛ nya diɛw ye ɛ ɛ̀ nu can yibole.
45003003	Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó emum egay lɛ no bonyii bomew bó le to baa eleeme yî diɛw yidvu le, tu fifiɛ nu ege ɛ́ Nyo' saa ebvuu eleeme yî diɛw ye le?
45003004	Kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ fí ekooy nonɛn kɛ! Naa no bonyii bocii cim nu naa bo mbiay e, nu ɛ Nyo' leeme kɛ yî kecɛɛy e, no bó nu ɛ saŋ lɛ, “Nyo', wo dioo jemyi, ɛ njeme wo no nu kɛ wvu lɛŋ. Ɛ wo ké no soo kɛ lo nsaw wo.”
45003005	Geenɛn ɛ́ gee disɛɛbeene dì yaa nu kɛ teytey fici keegee lɛ gee di Nyo' le di teytey eyen'yi ntay, tu ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ beene egay lɛ la? Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ beene egay lɛ Nyo' baa gee lɛŋ keelaaŋke ŋgɛw yî yese beene le? Me mbiite nɛn ɛ ɛ̀ nu no wee wvu wum ké no biite.
45003006	Kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ fí enu nonɛn kɛ! Ɛ́ fí nu nonɛn, ɛ́ Nyo' ke eghan nɛɛ sɛ saw woŋ?
45003007	Geenɛn ɛ́ me mbiayte mbiay ɛ yí gee ɛ kecɛɛy ke Nyo' le yen'yi gɛne lo fwe fwe too bô mbense fô diee diew e, ɛ́ bó ebvuu esaake me lɛ me nu wee kebefɛ nje la?
45003008	Ɛ́ ɛ̀ fɛn nu nonɛn ɛ́ bese saa egay lɛ, “Fí jee lɛ beene egeè bibefɛ wvu lɛ mwɛɛm mvù jee etoò le?” Njeme wvun nu wvù bonyii beete diee disɛse dvú duu lɛ ɛ̀ gayte bese. Boba bonyii nu ɛ bó nu ke ekɛŋkɛ ŋgɛw wvù bó kɛŋke keekɛŋkɛ.
45003009	Beene nu jeme naa lɛ la keseen? Bese Bojuu fele bonyii bomew e? Naa fɛɛ ghɛɛy! Beene nu ɛ yɛn wase lɛ Bojuu noo bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu nu can mvuŋgay mvu kebefɛ le.
45003010	Fifin nu no bó nu ɛ saŋ lɛ, “Kɛ wee wvu teytey nu dvú kɛ, naa lo mwaaŋ.
45003011	Kɛ wee nu dvú wvù kɛŋke bvufee kɛ, ɛ kɛ wee nu dvú wvù gomte Nyo' kɛ.
45003012	Bonyii bocii nu ɛ baŋke wase jim ɛ̂ Nyo' le. Bó bocii nu ɛ tu wase mwɛɛm mvu ɛcici. Kɛ wee wvù kɛŋke fitele fì jee nu dvú kɛ, naa lo mwaaŋ.
45003013	Bó nu ɛ yan bosew ɛ gɛɛ boyɛ diɛwɛ jém e. Bó nu bonyii bo leme le. Njeme wvù buyte dew yibole nulo eyu wee diɛwɛ ɛdien ɛ fimbuw e.
45003014	Boncun bô njeme wvù cewcewe nu ɛ yiŋsɛn dew yibole.
45003015	Bó ké no nu cekey keeyu lo wee.
45003016	Bó ké no beete bô mwɛɛm, too bô ŋgɛw mondvuum monciim mò bó gɛne mó le.
45003017	Kɛ bó kee lo fiɛɛ ɛkumɛ nce wvu nyɛkeey kɛ.
45003018	Kɛ bó kɛŋke naa lo nfan wvù wvu Nyo' fô mvuntelem mvubole kɛ.”
45003019	Beene nu ɛ kiɛɛ keseen lɛ fiɛɛ fì bonci jemyi, nu ɛ bó jemyi ɛ̂ bonyii bò nu ɛkuse jo bonci bodvu, wvu lɛ fo wee ke ekɛŋke naa lo fiɛɛ fì wvú ewowlɛn jeme kɛ. Wee tfuu yî woŋ wvun e nu ke eleem ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛjise etaŋe diuw we.
45003020	Ben ekeè lɛ, kɛ wee wvu wum nu dvú wvù Nyo' nu ke ejo lɛ wvú nu teytey ɛ̂ wvú ɛjise njefo wvú gee fiɛɛ fì bonci gomte kɛ, njefo bonci gee ɛ bonyii kee lo mwɛɛm mvù befe mvù bó gee.
45003021	Geenɛn, keseen nu ɛ Nyo' ɛ duŋcɛ wase je yì wvú joo wee lɛ wvú nu teytey jó ɛ̂ wvú ɛjise. Ɛ je yidvu yaa kɛŋke fiɛɛ keege bô bonci kɛ. Je yidvu yin nu ɛ Ŋwa' bonci bo Muses e noo Boŋwa' bo bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le to tomte wase.
45003022	Je yì Nyo' joo lɛ wee nu teytey jó, nu ɛ yì bii fitele fì wee wvudvu lese yî Jisos Klistu le. Ɛ Nyo' gee fifin fô wee tfuu wvù nu ɛ lese fitele yî Klistu le, njefo fô Nyo' le nu ɛ wee mvu yaa nu jɛɛy kɛ,
45003023	no wee tfuu nu ɛ ge wase kebefɛ ɛ mum ɛ no nu ncejole fô bvukukɛ bvu Nyo' le.
45003024	Geenɛn, ɛ keseen nu ɛ Nyo' ɛ jo wase bonyii lɛ bó nu sɛ jay. Ɛ ɛ̀ ge mbuwma we wvù wvú to buwɛɛ bonyii dvú diɛwɛ nnya le fele yî Klistu Jisos wvù to sumɛɛ bonyii can ŋgɛw e.
45003025	Nyo' to nu ɛ nya wvú diɛwɛ ncese le keege keman bô ɛlɛmɛ kew. Ɛ keman kin nu fô bonyii bocii bò nu ɛ lese fitele yî ye le. Wvú to ge keman kin keeduŋcɛ lɛ wen wvù Nyo' nu wee wvu teytey, njefo wvú wvù Nyo' to kuule lo shém bô bibefɛ bibole bì bó to shee gee fwele.
45003026	Fifin to nu keeduŋcɛ yî kefew ke keseen e lɛ wen wvù Nyo' kebɛɛ nu wee wvù gee mwɛɛm teytey, ɛ ɛ̀ bvuu nu wen wvù joo wee wvù nu ɛ lese fitele yî Jisos e lɛ mwɛtɛn nu sɛ jay.
45003027	No fí nu nonɛn, tu fiɛɛ bɛɛ dvú fì ɛ̀ nɛlo ɛ́ beene ebensee ye yî dvú le? Kɛ fiɛɛ nu dvú kɛ! Ɛ̀ nɛlo ɛ́ bó ebvuu ebensee ye yî nci wvù la le? Nuu lɛ ebensee yî mwɛɛm mvù beene lemte le lɛ? Naa lo shikeey! Fí leeme ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî nci wvù lɛ beene nu ɛ lese fitele yî Jisos e.
45003028	Ɛ̀ nɛɛ no fí nu. Beene nu ɛ leke lɛ Nyo' joo wee lɛ mwɛtɛn nu sɛ jay ɛ ɛ̀ nu nje fitele fì wvú lese yî Jisos e, ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu nje wvú gee fiɛɛ fì bonci gomte kɛ.
45003029	Nuu lɛ Nyo' nu kɛ Nyo' Bojuu maaŋ ɛ? Kɛ ɛ̀ nu tɛn Nyo' bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu le? 'Ɛɛ, wvú nu tɛn Nyo' bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu,
45003030	no Nyo' mɛy kɛ mwaaŋ, ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù nu ke ejo bonyii bò bó nu ɛ tfuse yew lɛ bó nu sɛ jay, ɛ ɛ̀ mɛy kɛ nje fitele fì bó lese yî Klistu le kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no wvú nu ke ejo bò nu ntffuse lɛ bó nu sɛ jay kɛ tɛn nje fitele fì bó lese yî Klistu le.
45003031	Fí fɛn nu lɛ beene emwase bonci nje fitele fì beene lese yî Klistu le? Naa lo, kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ fí enù nonɛn kɛ! Fí nu lɛ beene kɛŋke keeleeme lo yî bonci le.
45004001	Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ beene egay lɛ Abla'am wvù icee kfuu disɛɛbeene to yɛn lɛ la ɛkumɛ saaka wvun?
45004002	Ɛ́ Nyo' fɛn to jo Abla'am lɛ wvú nu sɛ jay ɛ ɛ̀ nu nje lemme dì jee dì wvú to geɛ, kɛ tu wvú nulo ekfune gvuw ɛkumɛ fí. Geenɛn, kɛ wvú kɛŋke naa lo fiɛɛ fì wvú nulo ekfune gvuw dvú ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛjise kɛ,
45004003	njefo Ŋwa' Nyo' gayte lɛ, “Abla'am to nu ɛ lese fitele yî Nyo' le, ɛ Nyo' mum jo wvú lɛ wvú nu wee wvu teytey.”
45004004	Wee wvù lemte ɛ bó laake wvú, ké lemte ɛ́ bó elaw wvú, bó saa ejo lɛ nlawma we nu kɛ lo nnya ɛ bó ɛ nya ɛ̂ wvú kɛ. Ɛ bó jo lɛ ɛ̀ nu nlawma wvù wvú kɛŋke keekɛŋkɛ.
45004005	Geenɛn, ɛ́ wee nu sɛ wvú ɛ lem fiɛɛ, ɛ lese ɛ ɛ̀ nu fitele yî Nyo' wvù joo bonyii bò befe lɛ bó nu sɛ jay ɛ̂ wvú ɛjise, tu Nyo' nu ejo mwɛtɛn lɛ wvú nu teytey ɛ̂ wvú ɛjise nje fitele fì wvú lese yî ye le.
45004006	Dawe tɛn to nu ɛ jeme lɛ njoŋ wvu baay nu wvu bonyii bò Nyo' joo lɛ bó nu teytey ɛ̂ wvú ɛjise ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu nje lemme dì bó nu ɛ lem kɛ.
45004007	Wvú to nu ɛ jeme lɛ, “Njoŋ wvu baay nu fô bonyii bò Nyo' nu ɛ lɛɛshɛ wase bojay bobole, ɛ baŋyɛ bibefɛ bibole.
45004008	Ɛ njoŋ wvu baay nu fô wee wvù Nyo' yaa bɛɛ ŋgoyte fite fi kebefɛ kew e kɛ.”
45004009	No fí nu nonɛn, tu njoŋ wvu baay wvun nu kɛ fô bonyii bò bó nu ɛ tfuse bó yew maaŋ e? Nuu lɛ wvú nu tɛn fô bò bɛɛ ntffuse le lɛ? Beene be ɛ gay wase lɛ, “Fitele fì Abla'am to lesɛɛ yî Nyo' le to nu ɛ ge ɛ Nyo' jo wvú lɛ wvú nu wee wvu teytey.”
45004010	Nyo' to jo Abla'am lɛ wvú nu wee wvu teytey ɛ ɛ̀ nu seke la? Ɛ̀ to nu ɛ bó ɛ tfuse wase wvú yew, nuu ɛ wvú bɛɛ ntffuse lɛ? Ɛ̀ to nu ɛ wvú bɛɛ ntffuse. Kɛ bó to baa tfuse wase wvú yew kɛ.
45004011	Bó to tfuse wvú yew diɛwɛ nciise le keeduŋcɛ lɛ wvú nu wase wee wvu teytey nje fitele fì wvú to lesɛɛ yî Nyo' le seke wvú to bɛɛ ntffuse. Nonɛn Abla'am ɛ mum ɛ no nu icee bonyii bocii bò nu ɛ lese fitele yî Nyo' le ɛ bó baa tfuse bó yew kɛ, wvu lɛ Nyo' ejo tɛn bó lɛ bó nu bonyii bo teytey ɛ̂ wvú ɛjise.
45004012	Ɛ wvú nu tɛn icee bonyii bò bó nu ɛ tfuse wase bó yew, ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu kɛ nje bó nu ɛ tfuse bó yew kɛ. Ɛ̀ nu nje bó nu ɛ jo ɛkalɛ kew yî fitele fì wvú to lesɛɛ yî Nyo' le ɛ bó sɛ ke tfuse wvú yew.
45004013	Ŋkawma wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ Abla'am lɛ wvú bô boom bew nu ke eyow ɛkolɛ ke nshɛ le to baa nu nje Abla'am to gɛɛle bonci kɛ. Ɛ̀ to nu nje fitele fì wvú to lesɛɛ yî Nyo' le, ɛ Nyo' jo wvú lɛ wvú nu teytey ɛ̂ wvú ɛjise.
45004014	Ɛ́ ɛ̀ to nu lɛ bonyii bò nu ke ekɛŋkɛ fiɛɛ fì Nyo' to kawɛɛ nu kɛ bonyii bò gee no bonci gomte, kɛ tu fitele fì bó leese yî Nyo' le yaa kɛŋke sɛw kɛ, ɛ ŋkawma wvù Nyo' kawɛɛ wvudvu nu tɛn ɛcici.
45004015	Fiɛɛ fì nu, nu lɛ bonci ké no gee kɛ ɛ shém ffuuke lo Nyo', njefo ɛ́ nci baa enu, fiɛɛ fimew saa enu lɛ wee nu ɛ ŋgoy nci kɛ.
45004016	Fí ɛ mum ɛ no nu lɛ, ŋkawma wvudvu bii ɛ ɛ̀ nu fitele fì wvú lesɛɛ yî Nyo' le wvu lɛ ɛ́ enu mbuwma ɛ wvú ɛ to fô wvú le, ɛ fiɛɛ fì wvú kawɛɛ fidvu kɛŋke keekooy fô kfuu diew e dicii, ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu kɛ fô bonyii bò leeme yî bonci le maaŋ kɛ. Ɛ̀ nu tɛn fô bonyii bò nu ɛ lese fitele yî Nyo' le lɛŋlɛŋ no Abla'am to lesɛɛ, njefo Abla'am nu icee wesebeene bocii bò nu bonyii bo Nyo' le.
45004017	Fifin nu no bó nu ɛ saŋ ɛ Nyo' gayte ɛ̂ Abla'am lɛ, “Me nu ɛ ŋge lɛ wo enù icee bitum nteen.” Wvú nu icee wesebeene ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛjise. Ɛ̀ nu Nyo' wvù Abla'am to lesɛɛ fitele yî ye le. Ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù gee ɛ bonyii bò nu ɛ kpwekɛn wase kaase tuu dvú. Ɛ ɛ̀ bvuu nu wvú wvù gee ɛ mwɛɛm mvù ke baa nu wase dvú sɛ nu dvú.
45004018	Abla'am to nu ɛ no taale kɛ fwe kee lɛ wen nu ke ekɛŋkɛ fiɛɛ fì Nyo' kawɛɛ naa no wvú to nu wase ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nulo ɛ́ wvú ebvuu etaale fwe yî fiɛɛ le kɛ. Geenɛn, ɛ wvú lese kɛ fitele yî Nyo' le ke ghan no nu, “Icee bitum nteen”, kɛ no Nyo' to kawɛɛ ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Boom buw nu ke elone lo.”
45004019	Ɛ̀ to nu ɛ Abla'am gɛne wase bilum gbwee, geenɛn ɛ wvú faŋɛ yaa ewɛɛ yî fitele fì wvú to lesɛɛ yî Nyo' le kɛ, naa no wvú to yɛne ɛkolɛ kew e lɛ wen nu wase diɛwɛ wee wvù nu ɛ kpwe wase le, yɛne tɛn lɛ kpwɛse wvù Sɛla nu kase ɛ tee diew ɛ lɛ wase.
45004020	Wvú to baa ekɛw ekɛŋke kemaŋɛn wvu lɛ wvú enɛ ekɛŋke mvuntelem mvunfɛɛm ɛkumɛ ŋkawma wvù Nyo' kawɛɛ wvú dvú kɛ. Fitele fì wvú to lesɛɛ yî Nyo' le to nu ɛ tɛme gɛn lo fwe, ɛ wvú no tumte kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu moŋkum mo Nyo' le.
45004021	Wvú to nu ɛ mum bee naa bô fitele fiew ficii lɛ Nyo' kɛŋke mvuŋgay keege fiɛɛ fì wvú to kawɛɛ.
45004022	Ɛ̀ nɛɛ fiɛɛ fì fitele fì wvú to lesɛɛ yî Nyo' le to nu ɛ ge ɛ Nyo' jo lɛ wvú nu wee wvu teytey ɛ̂ wvú ɛjise.
