45004023	Geenɛn, njeme wvu lɛ, “Nyo' to nu ɛ jo wvú nonɛn,” nu ɛ bó yaa saŋ kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô Abla'am e maaŋ kɛ.
45004024	Wvú nu tɛn fô beene le. Nyo' wvù beene lese fitele yî ye le nu ke ejo tɛn beene nonɛn. Ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù to bvusɛɛ Jisos wvù Tata wesebeene yî kpwe le.
45004025	Jisos nu wvù bó to nyaɛ ɛ wvú kpwe nje bibefɛ bisɛɛbeene. Ɛ Nyo' kase bvuse wvú yî kpwe le wvu lɛ wen ejo lɛ beene nu sɛ jay.
45005001	Keseen no Nyo' nu ɛ jo wase beene lɛ beene nu sɛ jay nje fitele fì beene lese yî ye le, beene ɛ mum ɛ no nu yî nyɛkeey e beene ɛ bó nje fiɛɛ fì Tata wesebeene wvù Jisos Klistu ge.
45005002	Ɛ̀ ge wvú beene ɛ sɛ kɛŋkɛ je keeley mbuwma wvù beene nu yî dvú le keseen nje fitele fì beene lese yî ye le. Beene ɛ no laŋlaŋe no beene taale fwe kee lɛ beene nu ke ekɛŋkɛ fô bvukukɛ bvu Nyo' le.
45005003	Ɛ kɛ ɛ̀ mɛy kɛ nonɛn kɛ, beene laŋlaŋe tɛn yî boŋgɛw bò beene yɛne le, njefo beene kee lo lɛ boŋgɛw gee ɛ wee no kee keekuu shém.
45005004	Ɛ shém yì kuulɛɛn gee ɛ Nyo' bɛnsee wee lɛ wvú nu ɛ kocɛn. Ɛ́ Nyo' dioo bɛnsee wee lɛ wvú nu ɛ kocɛn, ɛ́ wvú no taale kɛ wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu fwe yî fiɛɛ le, kee lɛ wen nu ke ekɛŋkɛ.
45005005	Ɛ fiɛɛ fì beene taale fwe yî dvú le yaa nulo ke eyuu efey kuse kɛ, njefo Nyo' nu ɛ yiŋsɛn mvuntelem mvusɛɛbeene bô keŋkoŋɛn kew fele yî Keyoy ke Yuule kè wvú nu ɛ nya ɛ̂ beene le.
45005006	Fì nu lɛ seke beene to bɛɛ sɛ beene nulo efi bikuu bisɛɛbeene, ɛ Klistu to ɛ ɛ̀ nu kefew ke lɛŋ e, kpwe nje yese beene bonyii bò maa Nyo'.
45005007	Ɛ̀ nu kecɛɛy lɛ fí tɛmyi fô wee le keekpwe nje wee mvu wvù nu sɛ jay, ɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ naa lo ɛ́ wee mvu emom keekpwe nje wee mvu wvù jee.
45005008	Geenɛn, Nyo' to duŋci keŋkoŋɛn kew fô beene le ɛ̂ je yì lɛ, ɛ̀ to nu seke beene to bɛɛ bonyii bò befe, ɛ Klistu kpwe nje yese beene.
45005009	Keseen no beene nu ɛ ɛlɛmɛ kew ɛ ge wase Nyo' ɛ jo beene lɛ beene nu sɛ jay, tu wvú nu ke egɛn fwe eboyse beene can shém yì ffuuke Nyo' bô bonyii le.
45005010	Fì nu lɛ, ɛ́ ɛ̀ to nu seke beene to bɛɛ bonyii bo bvuban e bo Nyo' le, ɛ kpwe Waa we mancɛ mwɛɛm beene ɛ bo Nyo', tu wvú nu egɛn fwe keseen eboyse beene bô nshii we no wvú nu ɛ mancɛ wase mwɛɛm beene ɛ bo Nyo'.
45005011	Kɛ ɛ̀ mɛy kɛ fifin maaŋ fì beene laŋlaŋe nje fí kɛ. Beene laŋlaŋe tɛn beene ɛ bo Nyo' nje Tata wesebeene wvù Jisos Klistu wvù nu ɛ mancɛ mwɛɛm beene ɛ bo Nyo'.
45005012	No kebefɛ to feyɛɛ yî wee mwaaŋ e sɛ to yî nshɛ le, ɛ kpwe fey yî kebefɛ le sɛ to, kpwe ɛ mum ɛ lam kɛ nonɛn ɛ gɛn yî wee tfuu le, njefo wee tfuu nu ɛ ge kebefɛ.
45005013	Kebefɛ to nu naa wase dvú yî nshɛ le ɛ Nyo' sɛ ke nya bonci. Geenɛn ɛ́ bonci nu sɛ bó nu dvú, bó saa eŋgoyte fite fi bibefɛ bì bonyii gee le kɛ.
45005014	Ɛ kɛw yî kefew ke Adam e ɛ to ɛ buy yî ke Muses e nu ɛ kpwe to kɛŋke mvuŋgay ɛ̂ we jo bonyii bocii naa noo bò to gee bibefɛ ɛ bó yaa gee kɛ diɛwɛ Adam wvù to ŋgoyɛɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu nci kɛ. Adam to nu ɛ̂ je mi le diɛwɛ Klistu wvù to nu keeke eto le.
45005015	Geenɛn kɛ nnya Nyo' yì wvú nya ɛ̂ bonyii ɛcici nu diɛwɛ kebefɛ kè Adam to geɛ kɛ. Ɛ́ bonyii nteen to nu ɛ kpwekɛn nje kebefɛ ke wee mwaaŋ e, tu ɛ̀ nu kecɛɛy lɛ mbuwma Nyo' noo nnya ye yì to toɛ nje fitele fì jee fi wee mwaaŋ e wvù ɛ̀ nu Jisos Klistu, nu ke eto fô bonyii le nteen eduu efesɛn lo.
45005016	Kɛ fiɛɛ fì nnya Nyo' yin yì Nyo' to nyaɛ ɛcici to dvú nu lɛŋlɛŋ diɛwɛ fiɛɛ fì kebefɛ ke wee mwaaŋ wɛ le nu ɛ to dvú kɛ. Kebefɛ ke wee mwaaŋ e nu ɛ to bô nsaw fô bonyii le bocii ɛ lese bó ŋgɛw e. Geenɛn nnya Nyo' yin yì to toɛ ɛjim jo bibefɛ bi bonyii le nteen nu ɛ ge Nyo' ɛ jo bó lɛ bó nu sɛ jay.
45005017	Ɛ́ kebefɛ ke wee mwaaŋ e to nu ɛ ge ɛ kpwe no kɛŋke mvuŋgay ɛ̂ we jo wee tfuu nje wee mwaaŋ wvudvu, tu bonyii bò nu ɛ fiisɛn mbuwma wvu baay wvun, noo nnya yì ɛ̀ nu njo wvù Nyo' nu ɛ jo bonyii ɛcici lɛ bó nu teytey, nu ke ekɛŋkɛ nshii naa baay nje wee mwaaŋ wvù ɛ̀ nu Jisos Klistu.
45005018	Nonɛn, no kebefɛ ke wee mwaaŋ e to nu ɛ to bô ŋgɛw fô bonyii bocii le, nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no gee di wee mwaaŋ e di teytey nu ɛ ge Nyo' ɛ jo bonyii lɛ bó nu sɛ jay, ɛ bó bocii nu ke ekɛŋkɛ nshii.
45005019	Fì nu lɛ kɛ no wee mwaaŋ to nu ɛ tɛme ɛkolɛ bô Nyo' ɛ fifin ge ɛ bonyii nteen mum no nu wase bonyii bò befe, nu kɛ no wee mwaaŋ to nu ɛ yuw Nyo' le ɛ fí ge ɛ Nyo' nu ke ejo bonyii nteen lɛ bó nu teytey ɛ̂ wvú ɛjisɛ.
45005020	Nyo' to nya bonci keege lɛ ɛ̀ nɛlo ɛ́ bibefɛ eduule. Geenɛn no bibefɛ duule nu no shen Nyo' yì ɛ̀ nu mbuwma fô bonyii le duule tɛn fesene lo.
45005021	Ɛ fí nu nonɛn wvu lɛ, no kebefɛ kɛŋke mvuŋgay ɛ̂ bonyii we ɛ bó kpwee, nu kɛ tɛn no mbuwma Nyo' kɛŋke mvuŋgay ɛ̂ bonyii we fele yî njo wvù Nyo' joo bonyii lɛ bó nu teytey ɛ̂ wvú ɛjise le keeke enya bó bô nshii wvù mɛy lo nje Jisos Klistu wvù Tata wesebeene.
45006001	No fí nu nonɛn, ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ beene egay lɛ la? Ɛ̀ fɛn nu lɛ beene emɛy egee bibefɛ gɛne dvú fwe fwe wvu lɛ shen Nyo' yì ɛ̀ nu mbuwma fô bonyii le eduule tɛn fesene lo?
45006002	Kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ fí enù nonɛn kɛ! Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ beene bò nu ɛ kpwe wase fô kebefɛ le ebvuu eghan nɛɛ le sɛ ebvuu ecee yî kebefɛ le?
45006003	Kɛ ben kee lɛ beene bocii bò bó nu ɛ lese wase ɛ̂ joo ɛ taashɛ bô Klistu Jisos nu ɛ bó lese nonɛn ɛ taashɛ beene ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô kpwe ye le?
45006004	Bó to lese beene ɛ̂ joo nonɛn ɛ fí mum no nu lɛ bó nu ɛ taashɛ wase beene ɛ bó yî kpwe ye le ɛ dwey, wvu lɛ no Klistu to kasɛɛ buy yî kpwe le yî mvuŋgay mvu Ice le mvù kuuke, nu ɛ beene nɛlo emum ecee wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî nshii wvu fwɛ le.
45006005	Fí nu nonɛn njefo ɛ́ beene nu ɛ bó ɛ taashɛ wase beene ɛ bo Klistu yî kpwe yì ɛ̀ nu ye le, tu kɛ ɛ̀ nu kemaŋɛn lɛ beene nu ke etaashɛ tɛn beene ɛ bó yî mbuy wvu yî kpwe le wvù ɛ̀ nu we le kɛ.
45006006	Beene kee lɛ ye yesebeene yì ɛ̀ nu nce wvu yvum nu ɛ bó to ta wase yî kentam e beene ɛ bo Klistu, wvu lɛ bó efiwsɛ lo ye yidvu yì ɛ̀ nu yi kebefɛ, lɛ ɛ̀ nɛlo ɛ́ beene saa ebvuu enu bonfaw can kebefɛ le kɛ,
45006007	njefo wee ke kpwee tu wvú nu ɛ buy wase can kebefɛ le.
45006008	No beene nu ɛ kpwe wase beene ɛ bo Klistu, tu beene nu ɛ bee lɛ beene nu ke ecee tɛn beene ɛ bó,
45006009	njefo beene kee lo lɛ no Nyo' to bvusɛɛ Klistu yî kpwe le, nu ɛ kɛ Klistu nɛlo ke ebvuu ekpwe kɛ. Kɛ kpwe bvuu kɛŋke mvuŋgay ɛ̂ wvú we kɛ.
45006010	Kpwe yì wvú to kpweɛ nu ɛ wvú to kpwe fô bibefɛ le kaŋ mwaaŋ ɛ fí ka lo nonɛn. Ɛ nshii wvù wvú kɛŋke keseen nu ɛ wvú nu wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô Nyo' le.
45006011	Nonɛn ben tɛn kɛŋke keeyɛn fô bikuu binɛn e lɛ ben nu ɛ kpwe wase fô bibefɛ le, ɛ no cee wase keseen bii ɛ ɛ̀ nu no Nyo' gomte, no ben nu ɛ taashɛ ben ɛ bo Klistu Jisos.
45006012	Nonɛn fo ben ebvuu ebee ɛ́ kebefɛ ekɛŋke mvuŋgay ɛ̂ we jo kencaa kenɛn ke ye le gee ɛ ben yuuke ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì ɛlɛmɛ kenɛn gomte lɛ ben egeè le kɛ.
45006013	Fo ben ebvuu ecinɛ ɛ́ kebefɛ ejoo biba binɛn bi ye le diɛwɛ mwɛɛm mwew mvu lemme le gee mwɛɛm mvù befe dvú kɛ. Ben enya bikuu binɛn ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ Nyo' diɛwɛ bonyii bò bó nu ɛ bvuse wase bó yî kpwe le ɛ nya bó bô nshii. Ben enya tɛn biba binɛn bi ye le ɛ̂ Nyo' diɛwɛ mwɛɛm mwew mvu lemme le keegee mwɛɛm mvu teytey dvú.
45006014	Kɛ kebefɛ bvuu kɛŋke keekɛŋke mvuŋgay ɛ̂ ben we kɛ, njefo kɛ ben nu ɛ̂ bonci kuse kɛ. Ben nu wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ mbuwma Nyo' kuse.
45006015	No fí nu nonɛn, ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ beene egay lɛ la? Beene fɛn emum egeè bibefɛ njefo beene nu ɛkuse jo mbuwma Nyo', yaa nu kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ bonci kuse? Naa lo!
45006016	Kɛ ben kee lɛ ɛ́ wee jo ɛkolɛ kew ɛ nya ɛ̂ wee mvu keeyuuke wvú le diɛwɛ nfwa le, tu wvú nu enu kɛ wase nfwa wee wvudvu wvù wvú yuuke wvú le le? Ɛ́ wee nya ɛkolɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ kebefɛ, tu wvú nu nfwa kebefɛ. Ɛ kí nu ke eto ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô kpwe. Wee ɛ́ nya ɛkolɛ kew keeyuuke Nyo' le, tu wvú nu enu nfwa ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvu Nyo'. Ɛ fí nu ke ege ɛ́ wvú ekɛŋke nce wvu teytey.
45006017	Geenɛn keyoone ke Nyo' le lɛ no ben to shee nu bonfaw bo kebefɛ le, nu ɛ keseen nu ɛ ben ɛ bee wase bô mvuntelem mvunɛn mvunciim fiɛɛ fì n'yɛɛyi wvù bó to nyaɛ ɛ̂ ben duŋci le,
45006018	ben ɛ mum ɛ no nu ɛ bó ɛ bvuse wase ben can kebefɛ le, ben ɛ tu wase bonfaw ɛ ɛ̀ nu bo nce wvu teytey e.
45006019	Me njemyi fin diɛwɛ wee wvu wum e, njefo kɛ ben diɛwɛ bonyii bo boyuum e nulo ekiɛɛ mwɛɛm egɛn ebuy keleŋ kemew e kɛ. Ben ekeè lɛ ɛ̀ to nu fwele ɛ ben nyaa biba binɛn bi ye le ɛ̂ mwɛɛm mvu nnyɛn e bô bibefɛ bí le bí le diɛwɛ bonfaw e. Ben emum enyaà wase biba binɛn bi ye le keseen ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ mwɛɛm mvu teytey keenu bonyii bò yuule.
45006020	Seke ben to nu bonfaw bo kebefɛ le, kɛ nce wvu teytey to kɛŋke fiɛɛ keege bô ben kɛ.
45006021	No ben to nu nonɛn, sɛw wvù ben to kɛŋkɛɛ fô mwɛɛm mvun e mvù ben nu wase keseen wuumene lo yî mvú le nu la? Mwɛɛm mvudvu mvunciim mɛɛse kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô kpwe.
45006022	Geenɛn keseen no bó nu ɛ bvuse wase ben can kebefɛ le ben ɛ tu wase bonfaw ɛ ɛ̀ nu bo Nyo' le, nu ɛ sɛw wvudvu nu lɛ ben tuu wase bonyii bò yuule, ɛ kemɛse kedvu nu ke enu nshii wvù mɛy lo.
45006023	Ben ekeè lɛ nlawma kebefɛ nu kpwe, geenɛn ɛ nshii wvù mɛy lo nu nnya yì Nyo' nyaa ɛcici ɛ̂ bonyii bò nu ɛ taashɛ bô bo Klistu Jisos wvù Tata wesebeene.
45007001	Boom bo bwɛɛm e, me ŋgomte keenjeme fin ɛ̂ ben diɛwɛ bonyii bò kee nci le. Kɛ ben kee lɛ nci ké no kɛŋke mvuŋgay ɛ̂ wee we kɛ seke mwɛtɛn bɛɛ dvú?
45007002	Beene ejo kenfewsɛn yî kentaashɛ ke kpwoon bô diemsɛn e. Nci ké no suule kpwoon yî dweese le kɛ seke dweese bɛɛ dvú. Geenɛn ɛ́ dweese nɛlo ɛ kpwe, tu wvú nu ɛ buy wase ɛkuse jo nci wvù suule wvú bô dweese.
45007003	Nonɛn ɛ́ wvú nɛ ɛ gɛn ɛ̂ diemsɛn mvu le ɛ dweese bɛɛ dvú, ɛ́ bó etee wvú lɛ kpwoon nsake. Geenɛn ɛ́ dweese nɛlo ɛ kpwe, tu wvú nu ɛ buy wase ɛ̂ nci wvudvu kuse. Ɛ́ wvú gɛn lo ɛ taashɛ ɛ no nu bô diemsɛn mvu, wvú saa enu kpwoon nsake kɛ.
45007004	Ɛ̀ nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ boom bo bwɛɛm e no ben nu ɛ kpwe wase fô bonci le fele yî ye Klistu yì bó to taɛ yî kentam e. Ben nu ɛ kpwe nonɛn wvu lɛ ben enù wase bonyii bo wee mvu le jɛɛy. Ɛ wee wvudvu wvun nu wvù bó to bvusɛɛ yî kpwe le, wvu lɛ beene ecee wase gee ɛ ɛ̀ nu mwɛɛm mvù jee fô Nyo' le.
45007005	Seke beene to bɛɛ cee bii no nyam ye yesebeene gomte, bonci to ké no kamsee ye yesebeene yì fuu gee ɛ biba bisɛɛbeene bi ye le lemte mwɛɛm mvù too ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô kpwe fô beene le.
45007006	Geenɛn, keseen nu ɛ beene ɛ buy wase ɛkuse jo bonci ɛ kpwe fô bonci bodvu le bò to nu ɛ jicɛ beene le diɛwɛ bonyii bo ncaw e. Beene nu ɛ buy wvu lɛ beene elemtè ɛnte jo nshii wvu fwɛ wvù ɛ̀ nu wvu Keyoy ke Yuule, ɛ ɛ̀ yaa bvuu nu ɛ̂ je yi yvum yì bonci bò bó saŋɛɛ le kɛ.
45007007	Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ beene egay lɛ la? Ɛ̀ fɛn nu lɛ nci nu fiɛɛ fì befe? Kɛ ɛ̀ nu nonɛn kɛ! Ɛ́ ɛ̀ to baa nu nje bonci, tu kɛ me mbe ŋkee fiɛɛ fì befe kɛ. Ɛ́ nci to baa gay lɛ, “Fo wee edewkenè ɛjisɛ yî fiɛɛ fi wee mvu le”, tu me mbaa ŋkee lɛ keedewkene ɛjisɛ nu fiɛɛ fì befe kɛ.
45007008	Geenɛn kebefɛ ɛ mum ɛ bɛɛ ɛkuse jo nci wvun ɛ shiw ɛjisɛ yò dewkene yî yɛm e jé le jé le. Ɛ́ nci be baa nu, kebefɛ saa ekɛŋke mvuŋgay kɛ.
45007009	Me nto nshee ncee ŋgee no me ŋgomte ɛ me mbaa ŋkee wase bonci kɛ. Geenɛn, ɛ me ke ndioo eŋkiɛɛ bonci, ɛ kebefɛ mum ŋaay, ɛ me mum kpwe.
45007010	Bonci bodvu kebɛɛ bò fí to nu lɛ bó nu ke eto bô nshii, nu ɛ kaa ɛ to ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô kpwe fô me le.
45007011	Fì nu lɛ kebefɛ to nu ɛ mum kɛŋkɛ je yî bonci ban e, lɛɛ me, bɛɛ ɛkuse jodvu yu me.
45007012	Nonɛn bonci nu fiɛɛ fì yuule, ɛ fiɛɛ fì bonci gayte nu fiɛɛ fì yuule, nu teytey bvuu jee.
45007013	Fí fɛn nu lɛ fiɛɛ fì jee to nu ɛ kaa to ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô kpwe fô me le? Naa kɛ ɛ̀ nu nonɛn kɛ! Ɛ̀ to nu kebefɛ kè to bɛkɛɛ ɛkuse jo fiɛɛ fì jee fin keeto bô kpwe fô me le, wvu lɛ beene eyɛn lɛ kebefɛ nu kebefɛ, ɛ fí duŋci ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî fiɛɛ fì bonci gayte le lɛ kebefɛ looci naa befe baay.
45007014	Beene kee lɛ bonci nu fiɛɛ ɛ fí nɛ fô Nyo' le. Geenɛn ɛ me nu fiem wee wvu wum ŋkɛŋke nyam ye, ɛ bó gese me diɛwɛ nfwa le ɛ̂ kebefɛ.
45007015	Kɛ me ŋgee fiɛɛ no ŋkee fiɛɛ fì me ŋgee kɛ, njefo kɛ fiɛɛ fì me ŋgomte keeŋge nu fí fì me ŋgee kɛ. Me ŋkaa nɛn'yi ŋge fiɛɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ naa fí fì me mbane.
45007016	No me nɛn'yi no ŋgee fiɛɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ fí fì me n'yaa ŋgomte kɛ, tu me nu ɛ mbee kecɛɛy lɛ nci nu fiɛɛ fì jee.
45007017	No fí nu nonɛn, tu ɛ̀ nu kecɛɛy lɛ kɛ ɛ̀ bvuu gee me fiɛɛ fidvu kɛ. Ɛ̀ gee wase kebefɛ kè nu yî yɛm e.
45007018	Me ŋkee naa lo lɛ kɛ fiɛɛ fì jee nu yî yɛm e kɛ. Fì nu lɛ kɛ fiɛɛ fì jee nu yî ɛlɛmɛ kem e kɛ. Me nɛn'yi no ŋkɛŋke shiee keŋge fiɛɛ fi lɛŋ, geenɛn ɛ me n'yaa nulo eŋge kɛ.
45007019	Kɛ fiɛɛ fì jee fì me ŋgomte keeŋge nu fí fì me ŋgee kɛ. Fiɛɛ fì befe fì me n'yaa eŋgomte keeŋge kɛ, nu fí fì me ŋkaa ŋgee.
45007020	No me nɛn'yi no ŋgee fiɛɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu fí fì me n'yaa ŋgomte kɛ, tu kɛ ɛ̀ bvuu nu me wvù gee fiɛɛ fidvu kɛ. Ɛ̀ gee wase kebefɛ kè nu yî yɛm e.
45007021	No fí nu nonɛn, me ɛ mum ɛ n'yɛn lɛ ɛ̀ nu wase lo nci lɛ seke me ŋgomte keeŋge fiɛɛ fì jee, ɛ fi cekey keege no nu kɛ fì befe.
45007022	Ɛ̂ fitele fiem e nu ɛ me n'yuuke njoŋ bô nci Nyo' baay.
45007023	Geenɛn ɛ me nɛn'yi n'yɛne wvumvu nci le ɛ wvú nu yî yɛm e. Ɛ wvuwɛ tumte jem bô nci wvù kɛŋke ŋkpwawcɛ wɛm, gee ɛ me ntuu nfwa wvuwɛ nci wvu kebefɛ wvù nu yî yɛm e.
45007024	Fiŋkfusay fi fiɛɛ le kɛ diɛwɛ me! Ɛ̀ nu ebvuse yɛɛ me yî nyam ye yin yì too bô kpwe le?
45007025	Keyoone ke Nyo' le wvù nulo efi me fele yî Jisos Klistu wvù Tata wesebeene le! No fí nu nonɛn me ɛ mum ɛ no nu wase keseen nfwa bonci bo Nyo' le ɛ̂ ŋkpwawcɛ wɛm e. Geenɛn nu nfwa bonci bo kebefɛ le yî nyam ye le.
45008001	Fí ɛ mum ɛ no nu lɛ, keseen nu ɛ kɛ wee wvù nu ɛ taashɛ wase bô Klistu Jisos bɛɛ ke ebvuu eley ŋgɛw e kɛ.
45008002	Kɛ wvú bɛɛ ke ebvuu eley njefo nci Keyoy ke Yuule kè nyaa nshii ɛ̂ bonyii bò nu ɛ taashɛ wase bô bo Klistu Jisos, nu ɛ bvuse wase beene can nci wvù ɛ̀ nu wvu kebefɛ bô kpwe le.
45008003	Nyo' nu ɛ ge wase fiɛɛ fì nci to baa kɛŋke mvuŋgay keege kɛ. Nci to baa kɛŋke mvuŋgay ɛ ɛ̀ ge kewɛɛyɛ ke nyam ye wee wvu wum e. Fiɛɛ fì Nyo' ge nu lɛ wvú to nu ɛ ciinse Wan wvu we ɛ wvú to diɛwɛ wee wvu wum wvù gee bibefɛ le keeŋgoy kebefɛ. Ɛ Nyo' mum ŋgoy mvuŋgay mvu kebefɛ le bô ye Waa we.
45008004	Wvú to ge nonɛn wvu lɛ mwɛɛm mvu lɛŋ mvù nci gomte enù ɛ bó ɛ ge wase fô beene bò cee bii no Keyoy ke Yuule gomte le, ɛ ɛ̀ yaa bvuu nu no nyam ye gomte kɛ.
45008005	Bonyii bò cee bii no nyam ye gomte nu ɛ bó ké no lewse bvufee ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî mwɛɛm mvù nyam ye gomte le, ɛ bò cee bii no Keyoy ke Yuule gomte ké no lewse bvubole bvufee ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî mwɛɛm mvù Keyoy ke Yuule gomte le.
45008006	Ɛ́ wee leke bvufee ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî nyam ye le, tu wvú nu ke ekpwe. Geenɛn ɛ́ wee leke bvufee yî Keyoy ke Yuule le, tu wvú nu ke ekɛŋkɛ nshii noo nyɛkeey.
45008007	No fí nu nonɛn wee wvù leke bvufee ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî mwɛɛm mvù nyam ye gomte le ké no bane Nyo'. Kɛ wvuwɛ wee ké no yuuke nci Nyo' le kɛ. Ɛ ɛ̀ nu kecɛɛy lɛ kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wvú eyuuke kɛ.
45008008	Ɛ kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wee wvù cee no nyam ye gomte egee fiɛɛ fì Nyo' eyuuke njoŋ kɛ.
45008009	Geenɛn kɛ ben nu finɛn bonyii bò cee bii no nyam ye gomte kɛ. Ben bii ɛ ɛ̀ nu no Keyoy gomte, ɛ́ ɛ̀ fɛn nu lɛ Keyoy ke Nyo' le cee yî yene le. Ɛ́ wee nu dvú wvù baa kɛŋke Keyoy ke Klistu le, tu kɛ wvú nu wee Klistu kɛ.
45008010	Ɛ́ Klistu fɛn nu yî yene le, naa no ye yene nu ke ekpwe nje kebefɛ, tu Keyoy ke Nyo' le nu enyaa nshii ɛ̂ ben njefo Nyo' nu ɛ ge wase ben ɛ no nu teytey ɛ̂ wvú ɛjise.
45008011	Ɛ́ Keyoy ke wvú wvù to bvusɛɛ Jisos yî kpwe le cee yî yene le, tu wvú wvuwɛ wvù to bvusɛɛ Klistu Jisos yî kpwe le nu ke enya tɛn nshii ɛ̂ ye yene yì nu ke ekpwe le. Wvú nu ke enya fele yî Keyoy kew kedvu kè cee yî yene le.
45008012	Nonɛn boom bo bwɛɛm e, beene kɛŋke fiɛɛ keege, ɛ fiɛɛ fin yaa nu keecee bii no nyam ye yesebeene gomte kɛ.
45008013	Ɛ́ ben cee bii no nyam ye gomte, tu ben nu ke ekpwekɛn. Geenɛn ɛ́ ben cine Keyoy ke Yuule ɛ lɛse gee dì befe dì nyam ye gomte, tu ben nu ke ekɛŋkɛ nshii.
45008014	Bonyii bocii bò cee bii no Keyoy ke Nyo' le duŋci nu boom bo Nyo' le.
45008015	Nyo' to baa enya ɛ ɛ̀ nu keyoy ke bvunfaw e kè nu ege ɛ́ ben ekaase ecee yî nfan e kɛ. Wvú to nya Keyoy ɛ̂ ben ɛ ɛ̀ nu kè gee ɛ ben nu boom bew. Ɛ kí mum gee ɛ beene teŋe wvú lɛ, “Abba, Icee wese.”
45008016	Keyoy kedvu kin kebɛɛ bô keyoy kesɛɛbeene leeme tomte lɛ beene nu boom bo Nyo' le.
45008017	Ɛ́ beene fɛn nu wase boom bo Nyo' le, tu beene nu ke edie bvushɛw, bvushɛw bvù ɛ̀ nu bvu Nyo' le. Beene ɛ bo Klistu nu ke etaashɛ edie bvú ɛ́ beene fɛn yɛne ŋgɛw no Klistu to yɛnɛɛ wvu lɛ beene tɛn ke ekɛŋkɛ bvukukɛ beene ɛ bó.
45008018	Me ŋkee naa ntay lɛ kɛ ŋgɛw wvù beene yɛne keseen nu ɛ wvú ɛ buy naa lo wvù bó efewsene bô bvujoŋkɛ bvù ɛ̀ nu ke enu bvusɛɛbeene kɛ.
45008019	Mwɛɛm mvunciim mvù Nyo' to bomɛɛ cɛyte naa lo shiee le kefew kè Nyo' nu ke eduŋcɛ boom bò ɛ̀ nu naa bew.
45008020	Fí nu lɛ mwɛɛm mvù Nyo' bomɛɛ to nu ɛ nɛ tu mwɛɛm mvu ɛcici. Kɛ mvú to tu mvu ɛcici lɛ mvú kooŋke lo nonɛn kɛ. Ɛ̀ to koŋ Nyo' wvù to geɛ lɛ mvú enu nonɛn. Geenɛn ɛ bó taale kɛ fwe kee lɛ,
45008021	diuu dimew nu ke enu ɛ́ Nyo' ebvuse mvú ɛ́ mvú eboy yî ncaw wvù nu lɛ mvú mvunciim kɛŋke keeke efo le. Ɛ wvú nu ke edioo ɛ bvuse nonɛn, ɛ́ mvú ekɛŋke wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu bvujoŋkɛ bvu boom bo Nyo' le.
45008022	Beene kee lɛ mwɛɛm mvunciim mvù Nyo' bomɛɛ cone bô monlum diɛwɛ kpwoon lume le ɛ kɛw lo ɛ to ɛ buy keseen e.
45008023	Kɛ ɛ̀ mɛy kɛ mwɛɛm mvù Nyo' bomɛɛ maaŋ mvù nu yî monlum e kɛ. Beene bò kɛŋke sâ' Keyoy ke Yuule kè Nyo' nu ɛ nya ɛ̂ beene cone tɛn ɛ̂ shem ɛ̂ shem no beene cɛyte lɛ Nyo' ege ɛ́ beene enù boom bew, fì ɛ̀ nu nsum wvù wvú nu ke esum ye yesebeene yicii can ŋgɛw e.
45008024	Ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fidvu fin fì beene taale fwe kee lɛ beene nu ke ekɛŋkɛ fì Nyo' to boysɛɛ beene nje fí. Geenɛn fiɛɛ fì wee taale fwe yî dvú le lɛ wen nu ke ekɛŋkɛ ɛ fí nu wase ɛ̂ wvú ɛjise yaa nulo bvuu nu lɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ ɛ wvú bɛɛ cɛyte lo kɛ. Ɛ̀ nu yɛɛ wvù nulo ebvuu etaale fwe yî fiɛɛ le keeke ekɛŋkɛ ɛ fí nu wase ɛ̂ wvú ɛjise?
45008025	Geenɛn ɛ́ beene taale fwe yî fiɛɛ le kee lɛ beene nu ke ekɛŋkɛ sɛ beene cim yɛne wase fí le, ɛ́ beene ekuu shém ecɛyte.
45008026	Keyoy ke Yuule tɛn ɛ mum ɛ no fici beene yî kewɛɛyɛ kesɛɛbeene le, no beene yaa kee keebunlee no beene kɛŋke keebunlee kɛ. Keyoy kedvu kebɛɛ ké no lɛke Nyo' fô beene bonyii bo Nyo' le beele ɛ̂ wvú ɛ̂ je yì ɛ̀ nulo wee saa esee le kɛ.
45008027	Nyo' wvù ké no taasse mvuntelem mvu bonyii le ké no kee ŋkpwawcɛ wvu Keyoy ke Yuule, njefo Keyoy ké no lɛke Nyo' fô bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo Nyo' le ɛ̂ je yì Nyo' kooŋke le.
45008028	Beene kee lɛ Nyo' lemte yî mwɛɛm mvunciim e gee ɛ mvú gɛne ɛ̂ je yì jee le fô bonyii bò kooŋke wvú le bò wvú nu ɛ tee bii fiɛɛ fì wvú gomte fô bó le.
45008029	Bonyii bò Nyo' to kee wase ɛ ɛ̀ bɛɛ lo nu ɛ wvú to seyse wase gɛɛ lɛ bó nu ke ekumɛn enu diɛwɛ Waa we le, wvu lɛ Waa we wvun nɛlo enu nsafwe boom bo bwee le, ɛ bó nu nteen.
45008030	Ɛ bonyii bò wvú to seysɛɛ wase gɛɛ nonɛn, ɛ wvú mum ke tee bó. Ɛ bonyii bodvu bò wvú to teŋɛɛ nu ɛ wvú to jo wase bó lɛ bó nu sɛ jay. Ɛ bó bodvu bò wvú to joɛ lɛ bó nu sɛ jay, nu ɛ wvú to ge lɛ bó eley bvukukɛ bwew e.
45008031	No mwɛɛm mvun nu nɛn mvunciim, ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ beene ebvuu egay lɛ la? No Nyo' nu wase ɛ̂ keba kesɛɛbeene le, wee wvù nulo ebvuu ege beene bô fiɛɛ nu yɛɛ?
45008032	Ɛ́ wvú wvù Nyo' to nu sɛ wvú ɛ yɛɛ ɛjisɛ bô Waa we, geenɛn nya ɛ wvú kpwe fô beene le bocii, tu kɛ wvú nu ke enya mwɛɛm mvunciim ebise fó ɛ̂ beene?
45008033	Ɛ̀ nu yɛɛ dvú wvù nulo ebvuu egomte nsaw bô bonyii bò Nyo' nu ɛ caw wase? Nyo' nu wvù joo bonyii lɛ bó nu sɛ jay.
45008034	Wee nu dvú wvù nulo ebvuu elese beene ŋgɛw e? Klistu Jisos to nu ɛ kpwe, kase buy tɛn yî kpwe le, ɛ no nu keseen ɛ̂ ɛbo ke Nyo' le ke ɛcɛɛy e, looci lɛke Nyo' fô beene le.
45008035	Wee wvù nulo ebvuu egawsɛn naa beene bo Klistu fo wvú ebvuu ekooŋke beene nu yɛɛ? Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ ŋgɛw, kɛnɛɛ monlum, kɛnɛɛ bikaa bì bonyii bone ɛ̂ beene ɛjim, kɛnɛɛ jeŋ, kɛnɛɛ kencimte, kɛnɛɛ kembɛmse, kɛnɛɛ kpwe, egawsɛn e?
45008036	Fí nu kɛ no bó nu ɛ saŋ ɛ bonyii bomew gayte ɛ̂ Nyo' lɛ, “Bese nu diuw kpwe le ɛdiuw ɛcii nje yo. Bonyii joo lɛ bese nu njée yì bó esɛɛyɛ lo.”
45008037	Naa lo yî mwɛɛm mvun e mvunciim nu ɛ beene nu bonyii bò looci soo lo yî mvuŋgay mvu Klistu wvù to koŋɛɛ beene le.
45008038	Me ŋkee naa ntay lɛ kɛ kpwe kɛnɛɛ nshii, kɛnɛɛ kfuu bonceendaa bò la, kɛnɛɛ biyoy bì saake, kɛnɛɛ mwɛɛm mvù nu keseen, kɛnɛɛ mvù nu ke eyuu enu, kɛnɛɛ mwɛɛm mvù kɛŋke mvuŋgay,
45008039	kɛnɛɛ mvù nu ɛ̂ we, kɛnɛɛ mvù nu ɛkuse, kɛnɛɛ naa la fifiɛ fì nu ŋgoo mwɛɛm mvù Nyo' fɛlɛɛ le mvunciim, nu ɛ fimew nu dvú fì nulo egawsɛn beene ɛ bo keŋkoŋɛn ke Nyo' le kè wvú kɛŋke fô beene le nje Klistu Jisos wvù Tata wesebeene kɛ.
45009001	Fiɛɛ fì me njemyi fin nu kecɛɛy diɛwɛ wee Klistu le. Kɛ me mbiayte lo kɛ. Keyoy ke Yuule kè nu yî yɛm e tomte lɛ kɛ me mbiayte lo kɛ.
45009002	Me ŋkɛŋke yii baay bô nsase wvù yaa kaa kɛ fô fitele fiem e,
45009003	nje boom bo bwɛɛm e bo woŋ e bò bee bó nu ɛlɛmɛ kemwaaŋ. Me nɛlo enshieele naa baay lɛ lon eto fô me le ɛ́ me eŋgawsɛn lo bee Klistu kɛ nje bó.
45009004	Bonyii ban nu bonyii bo Islael, ɛ Nyo' to jo bó ge lɛ bó enu boom bew, duŋcɛ n'yuu we ɛ̂ bó, gbwo moŋkan bô bó, nya bonci bew can yibole, duŋcɛ bó no bó ebunleè Nyo', ge boŋkawma bô bó.
45009005	Ɛ̀ nu bonyii ɛ bo'icee bobole bò to sanɛɛ kfuu dibole to nu bonyii bo Nyo' le bò bó kee bó, ɛ Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ to dioo to diɛwɛ wee wvu wum e ɛ bó boo wvú ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ kfuu di bonyii ban e. Beene enyaà mbense sekecii sɛ ŋka ɛ̂ Mboyse wvun wvù nu Nyo' wvù kɛŋkɛ mvuŋgay ɛ̂ we jo mwɛɛm mvunciim. Fí enù nonɛn.
45009006	Kɛ fí nu lɛ fiɛɛ fì Nyo' to kawɛɛ nu ɛ la ɛcici kɛ, njefo kɛ bonyii bocii bo Islael mum nu kecɛɛy boom bò ɛ̀ nu bo Islael e kɛ.
45009007	Ɛ kɛ ɛ̀ nu tɛn boom bò buy yî Abla'am e bocii bò ɛ̀ nu boom bew kɛ. Geenɛn fí nu no Nyo' to jemyɛɛ ɛ̂ Abla'am lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu Aysik wvù nu ke eboo boom bò nu egɛɛ diee diuw.”
45009008	Fifin duŋci lɛ kɛ ɛ̀ nu boom bò buy yî Abla'am e bocii bò ɛ̀ nu boom bo Nyo' le kɛ. Ɛ̀ nu boom bò Nyo' to kawɛɛ Abla'am dvú bò bó joo lɛ ɛ̀ nu boom bo Abla'am e.
45009009	Nyo' to dioo ge ŋkawma wvun gay lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu ke edioo enu diɛwɛ keseen e kelum kè too le, ɛ́ me eŋkase ento, ɛ́ Sɛla ekɛŋkɛ wan diemsɛn.”
45009010	Kɛ ɛ̀ mɛy kɛ fifin kɛ. Fiɛɛ diɛwɛ fin e to nu ɛ kooy tɛn bô Lɛbɛka wvù icee boom bew to mɛy kɛ Aysik wvù icee bo'icee bosɛɛbeene.
45009011	Naa ɛ́ bó sɛ keeke eboo boom ban, ɛ́ bó sɛ keeke ege fiɛɛ fì jee kɛnɛɛ fì befe, nu ɛ Nyo' to jeme ɛ̂ bwee bó lɛ, “Ŋgaywee nu ke elemte wan caan e.” Nyo' to jeme nonɛn keeduŋcɛ lɛ wvú cawte wee bii ŋkoŋ wvuwe le, ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu nje lemme dimew dì wee nu ɛ ge kɛ. Wvú cawte bii fiɛɛ fì wvú gomte lɛ wee ege le.
45009013	Ɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ no bó saŋ lɛ, “Yakow nu ɛ me ŋkooŋke wvú, mbane Ɛsau.”
45009014	No fí nu nonɛn, ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ beene ebvuu ejeme lɛ la? Fí fɛn nu lɛ kɛ Nyo' yaa gee gee di lɛŋ e? Kɛ ɛ̀ nu nonɛn kɛ!
45009015	Nyo' to nu ɛ jeme ɛ̂ Muses lɛ, “Me nu ŋke encam shen fô wee wvù me ɛ ŋkoŋ e, eŋkoo yii fô wee wvù me ɛ ŋkoŋ e.”
45009016	Nonɛn kɛ Nyo' cawte wee bii no wee wvu wum kooŋke, kɛnɛɛ yî lemme dì wee lem e kɛ. Wvú cawte ɛ ɛ̀ nu nje wvú kɛŋke shen fô bonyii le.
45009017	Fifin nu kɛ no bó nu ɛ saŋ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le no Nyo' jemyɛɛ ɛ̂ Fɛlo Nfon wvu Ijiw lɛ, “Me nto mbense wo diɛwɛ Nfon e kɛ naa shiee wvù lɛ me ŋke enduŋcɛ mvuŋgay mwem yî yo le, ɛ́ bonyii egɛn bô diee diem yî ɛkolɛ ke nshɛ le kecii.”
45009018	Fifin ɛ mum ɛ no duŋci lɛ Nyo' camte shen fô wee wvù wvú kooŋke le, nyaa ɛkolɛ kè tɛmyɛɛn ɛ̂ wee wvù wvú kooŋke lɛ wvú etɛmyì ɛkolɛ le.
45009019	Wee nɛlo emum ebife ɛ̂ me lɛ, “Ɛ́ ɛ̀ fɛn nu no fí nu, Nyo' ɛ bvuu ɛ no baci bonyii nje la lɛ? Wee wvù nulo etun fiɛɛ fì Nyo' kooŋke lɛ fí enù, nu yɛɛ lɛ?”
45009020	Fo wee ebiite nonɛn kɛ. Ɛ̀ nu naa wee wvu wum wvù la wvù nulo ebeeke mbew bô Nyo'? Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wee ebom fiɛɛ bô mbom ɛ́ fí ekase ebife ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wo bom me nɛn nje la lɛ?”
45009021	Wee wvù bomte nsháan kɛŋke mvuŋgay ɛ̂ we jo mbom keejo ntuw mbom mwaaŋ ebom mwɛɛm dvú jɛɛy jɛɛy, ɛ́ fimew enu fì kɛŋke lemme dì kuuke, ɛ fimew kɛŋke lemme di ncɛw.
45009022	Ɛ̀ nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no Nyo' gee. Wvú to gomte keeduŋcɛ shém ye yì ffuuke bô bonyii, ebvuu ege ɛ́ bonyii ekiɛɛ mvuŋgay mwew. Geenɛn ɛ wvú loocɛ kuu shém bô bonyii boba bò to gee ɛ shém ffuuke wvú bò bó to nu keeke efiwsɛ lo bó.
45009023	Ɛ wvú to ge nonɛn keeduŋcɛ bvukukɛ bwew bvu baay bvù nu fô bonyii bò wvú camte shen fô bó le. Ɛ bonyii ban nu bò wvú to seysɛɛ wase ɛ ɛ̀ bɛɛ lo lɛ bó nu ke ekɛŋkɛ bvukukɛ bvudvu.
45009024	Ɛ̀ nu naa beene bonyii bodvu bò wvú nu ɛ tee. Ɛ ɛ̀ yaa mɛy kɛ bò nu Bojuu maaŋ kɛ. Bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu nu tɛn fó.
45009025	Ɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ naa fí fì Nyo' jemyi ɛ̂ Ŋwa' wee ntum we wvù Osia le lɛ, “Bonyii bò se yaa nu kɛ bonyii bem, nu ɛ me nu ŋke enteŋe bó lɛ ‘Bonyii bem.’ Ɛ boba bò me nse mbaa eŋkooŋke bó kɛ, ɛ́ me enteŋe bó lɛ ‘Fitele fiem.’”
45009026	“Ɛ fô bvudvuu bwɛ bvù Nyo' se ké no gayte ɛ̂ bonyii bodvu lɛ, ‘Kɛ ben nu bonyii bem kɛ’, nu ɛ bó nu ke eteŋe wase bó lɛ, ‘Boom bo Nyo' wvù kɛŋke nshii le.’”
45009027	Yɛsaya wvù wee ntum Nyo' to nu ɛ no beele tɛn ɛkumɛ bonyii bo Islael gayte lɛ, “Naa no bonyii bo Islael cim duule naa diɛwɛ monshɛɛm mo ɛ̂ joo yi baay e, nu ɛ bò nu ke eboy nu kɛ nɛn caan.
45009028	Fì nu lɛ Nyo' nu ke enɛ esɛsɛ elaŋ ŋgɛw yî ɛkolɛ ke nshɛ le kecii kaŋ mwaaŋ emɛse lo fiɛɛ ficii.”
45009029	Ɛ wvú wvù Yɛsaya to yuu wase jeme lɛ, “Ɛ́ ɛ̀ to baa nu lɛ Tata Nyo' wvù kɛŋke Mvuŋgay Mvunciim ebawcɛ boom ɛ̂ kfuu disɛɛbeene le, tu beene be ɛ tu wase diɛwɛ kelaante kè Sodom e, noo diɛwɛ kè Gomola le.”
45009030	No fí nu nonɛn, ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ beene emum egay lɛ la? Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ beene egay lɛ bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu bò to baa momte keenu teytey ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛjise nu wase keseen teytey ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛjise nje fitele fì bó lese yî ye le.
45009031	Geenɛn, ɛ bonyii bo Islael bò to momte keenu teytey ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛjise bii ɛ̂ je yì bonci gomte le to baa eghan enu teytey ɛ̂ wvú ɛjise kɛ.
45009032	Ɛ ɛ̀ to nu nje la? Ɛ̀ to nu njefo kɛ bó yaa to momte bii ɛ̂ je yì lɛ bó elese ɛ ɛ̀ nu fitele yî Nyo' le kɛ. Bó to kpwaake lɛ fiɛɛ fì gee ɛ wee nu teytey ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛjise nu lemme dimew dì mwɛtɛn gee. Ɛ bó ge nonɛn mum baytɛn yî tɛ le.
45009033	Tɛ din nu dì bó saŋ ɛkumɛ dí lɛ, “Ben etaa eyɛn, me ŋgɛɛle tɛ ɛ̂ kelaante kè Sayon e, ɛ ɛ̀ nu tɛ dì bonyii nu ke ebaytene yî dvú le. Ɛ̀ nu kembaan kè bonyii nu ke egbwekene yî dvú le. Geenɛn, ɛ́ wee lese fitele yî ye le, wvú saa ke ewuumɛn kɛ.”
45010001	Boom bo bwɛɛm e, fiɛɛ fì me nshieele bô fitele fiem ficii, noo bunle yɛm ɛ̂ Nyo', nu lɛ bonyii bem bo Islael ban ke eboy.
45010002	Fiɛɛ fì me ŋkee, ɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me enjeme nu lɛ, bó kɛŋke naa shiee wvu baay fô Nyo' le. Geenɛn ɛ bó yaa kee kɛ je yi lɛŋ yì bó ebiì wvú le jó kɛ.
45010003	No bó baa kee je yì Nyo' joo lɛ wee ké no nu teytey ɛ̂ wvú ɛjise jó, bó ɛ mum ɛ no gomte wase keegɛɛ yibo je, ɛ faŋɛ yaa bvuu nya bikuu bibole keebii yiyɛ je yì Nyo' joo lɛ wee nu teytey ɛ̂ wvú ɛjisɛ jó le kɛ.
45010004	No Klistu to toɛ wase, ɛ je yi bonci yì bonyii to bii dvú keenu teytey ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛjise mum ka, wvu lɛ keenu teytey ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛjise keseen enù wase keelese fitele yî Klistu le.
45010005	Muses to nu ɛ saŋ ɛkumɛ je keenu teytey ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛjise yì bii ɛ ɛ̀ nu bonci le lɛ, “Wee wvù gee no bonci gayte nu ke ecee nje wvú gɛɛle bonci bodvu bocii.”
45010006	Fi ɛkumɛ je yi lɛ wee nu teytey ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛjise bii fitele fì wvú lese yî ye le nu ɛ bó ɛ saŋ lɛ, “Fo wo ebiitè ɛ̂ fitele fiew e lɛ laa ɛ̀ nu eben yɛɛ fowe lɛ?” Fì nu lɛ laa ɛ̀ nu eben yɛɛ eto bô Klistu lɛ.
45010007	Kɛnɛɛ lɛ, “Fo wo ebiite lɛ laa ɛ̀ nu ebow yɛɛ woŋ boŋkfu le lɛ?” Fì nu lɛ laa ɛ̀ nu ebow yɛɛ eto bô Klistu lɛ.
45010008	Geenɛn fí jemyi lɛ la? Fí jemyi lɛ, “Diɛw Nyo' nu naa mbew yo le. Yí nu diuw wo le, noo ɛ̂ fitele fiuw e.” Ɛ ɛ̀ nu yí yì bese fewci ɛkumɛ keelese fitele yî Klistu le.
45010009	Ɛ́ wo jeme bô diuw wo lɛ Jisos nu Tata, ɛ bee fô fitele fiuw e lɛ Nyo' to nu ɛ bvuse wvú yî kpwe le, ɛ́ wo ke eboy.
45010010	Fí nu nonɛn njefo wee beŋe ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô fitele fiew ɛ Nyo' sɛ jo wvú lɛ wvú nu sɛ jay. Ɛ wee jemyi ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô diuw we ɛ Nyo' sɛ boyse wvú.
45010011	Ŋwa' Nyo' jemyi lɛ, “Kɛ wee wvù nu ɛ bee wvú le nu ke ekɛŋkɛ ken'wuumɛn kɛ.”
45010012	Ben ekeè lɛ kɛ kejɛɛy jɛɛy nu dvú ɛntelɛŋ jo wee Juu bô wee wvù yaa nu kɛ wee Juu kɛ. Tata wvù nu Tata bonyii bocii nu kɛ mwaaŋ. Ɛ wvú ké no yen'yi can ye nyaa mwɛɛm ɛ̂ wee tfuu wvù beele fô wvú le.
45010013	Fí nu no bó saŋ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le lɛ, “Wee tfuu wvù beele teŋe diee di Tata le, nu ɛ wvú nu ke eboyse wvú.”
45010014	Geenɛn ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bonyii eghan nɛɛ sɛ no beele teŋe wvú sɛ bó nu ɛ lese fitele yî ye le? Ɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó eghan nɛɛ sɛ lese fitele yî ye le sɛ bó ke nu ɛ yuw wase ɛkumɛ wvú? Ɛ bó nulo eghan nɛɛ sɛ keeyuw sɛ wee nfewcɛ wvù efewcɛ ɛkumɛ wvú ɛ̂ bó.
45010015	Ɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bonyii eghan nɛɛ sɛ gɛn efewci sɛ bó nu ɛ tum bó? Fí nu ɛ bó ɛ saŋ lɛ, “Bonyii ké yuuke ncín bikaa bi wee wvù too bô saaka wvù jee, no yuuke njoŋ baay.”
45010016	Geenɛn, kɛ bonyii bo Islael bocii nu ɛ bee wase saaka wvù jee wvun e kɛ. Kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no Ŋwa' wee ntum Nyo' wvù Yɛsaya jemyi lɛ, “Tata, ɛ̀ nu yɛɛ dvú wvù nu ɛ bee saaka wvù bese fewci le?”
45010017	Fí ɛ mum ɛ no nu lɛ keelese fitele yî Klistu le nɛn'yi yî fiɛɛ fì wee nu ɛ yuw e. Ɛ fiɛɛ fì wee yuw nɛn'yi fô fì bó fewci ɛkumɛ Klistu le.
45010018	Me ɛ mum ɛ no mbiite lɛ laa bó to baa yuw ɛ? Kecɛɛy bó to nu ɛ yuw. Ŋwa' Nyo' gayte lɛ, “Diɛw yibo to nu ɛ gɛn yî ɛkolɛ ke nshɛ le kecii, ɛ njeme wvubo gɛn buy yî ɛbuw ɛ woŋ e ɛcii.”
45010019	Me ɛ mbvuu ɛ no mbiite lɛ laa fí nu lɛ bonyii bo Islael to dioo yuw, faŋɛ yaa yuw ntay ɛ? Muses to nu ɛ yaw gay lɛ Nyo' gayte lɛ, “Me nu ŋke eŋge ɛ́ kendoŋ ebene ben bô ketum ke bonyii bo ɛcici le, eŋge ɛ́ shém eton'yì ben bô ketum ke bonyii bò nu biyuŋ e.”
45010020	Ɛ Yɛsaya bvuu jeme lo sɛ nfan lɛ Nyo' gayte lɛ, “Bonyii bò se baa egomte me nu bò nu ɛ yɛn me le. Ɛ me ɛ nduŋcɛ ɛkolɛ kem ɛ̂ bonyii bò se baa ebiite me kɛ.”
45010021	Geenɛn fi ɛkumɛ bonyii bo Islael nu ɛ Nyo' to gay lɛ, “Ɛdiuw ɛcii nu kɛ no me nshee ɛ me ɛ nɛke can keenfiisɛn bonyii, geenɛn ɛ bó tɛmyi kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu bikuu gɛne ɛ̂ yibo je le.”
45011001	Me ɛ mbvuu ɛ no mbiite lɛ laa Nyo' nu ɛ ma wa lo bonyii bew ɛ? Kɛ ɛ̀ nu nonɛn kɛ! Me kebɛɛ nu ɛ me nu wee wvu Islael. Me nu waa yew Abla'am, ɛ me mbuy ɛ̂ kfuu di Bɛnjamen e.
45011002	Kɛ Nyo' baa ma wa lo bonyii bew bò wvú to cawɛɛ wase ɛ ɛ̀ bɛɛ lo kɛ. Kɛ ben kee fiɛɛ fì Ŋwa' Nyo' jemyi ɛkumɛ Ɛlayja no wvú to beele fô Nyo' le ɛkumɛ fiɛɛ fì bonyii bo Islael to gee le?
45011003	Wvú to beele gayte ɛ̂ Nyo' lɛ, “Tata, bó nu ɛ yuwyɛ wase bonyii buw bo ntum e, ɛ sâw bitaŋ biuw bi ncese le. Ɛ̀ shɛke kɛ wase me maaŋ, ɛ bó bii wase tɛn me le keemɛse.”
45011004	Wvú to beele nonɛn ɛ Nyo' tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ la? Wvú to nu ɛ tfuse ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Me nu ɛ ŋgɛɛ bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bem ɛ bó nu bontfuke bosooshwiy (6,000), ɛ bó ke baa tum wase nvuu fwe dvu Baal keebunle fó kɛ.”
45011005	Ɛ̀ nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no fí nu kefew ke keseen kin e. Bonyii bomew nu kɛ naa dvú Islael caan bò nu ɛ shɛɛ bò ɛ̀ nu bo Nyo' le. Ɛ boban nu ɛ wvú caw nje fitele fiew fì jee fô bó le.
45011006	Ɛ́ ɛ̀ fɛn nu lɛ wvú to caw nje fitele fiew fì jee, tu kɛ ɛ̀ bvuu nu nje lemme dimew ɛ bó to ge kɛ. Ɛ́ ɛ̀ to nu nje lemme dimew ɛ bó ɛ ge, tu kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ ebvuu enu lɛ ɛ̀ nu fitele fì jee kɛ.
45011007	Fiɛɛ fì me ŋgayte nu lɛ la? Fí nu lɛ bonyii bo Islael nteen to baa ghan enu teytey ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛjise no bó to gomte kɛ. Ɛ̀ to nu kɛ bonyii bò Nyo' to cawɛɛ bò to nu ɛ ghan kɛŋkɛ je keenu teytey ɛ̂ wvú ɛjise. Geenɛn, ɛ Nyo' ge ɛ mvuntelem mvu kebɛse ke bonyii le tɛme ghaw mɛy nonɛn.
45011008	Fifin nu no bó to saŋɛɛ lɛ, “Nyo' to nu ɛ ge ɛ bó no fuŋfuŋe, ɛ ɛjisɛ ɛbo faŋɛ yaa ebvuu eyɛne mwɛɛm e kɛ, ɛ bitem bibole yaa yuuke mwɛɛm kɛ. Bó ɛ no nu kɛ nonɛn ɛ to ɛ buy ɛbɛn e.”
45011009	Ɛ Dawe to nu ɛ jeme tɛn lɛ, “Nyo' ege ɛ́ mwɛɛm mvudien mvù bó diee yuuke njoŋ enjim bó diɛwɛ lawe le, ebvuu ekoo bó diɛwɛ ketam e. Mvú etu fiɛɛ fì nu esɛn lo bó etufe, ɛ́ emum enu nlawma gee dibole.
45011010	Nyo' ege ɛ́ ɛjisɛ ɛbo ejiim wvu lɛ fo bó eyɛnè lo mwɛɛm e kɛ. Wvú ege tɛn ɛ́ jím yibo eŋgvuushɛ emɛy lo nonɛn.”
45011011	Me ɛ no mbiite lɛ laa ɛ̀ fɛn nu lɛ bonyii bo Islael to baytene nɛn keegbwe emɛy lo fokuse lɛ? Kɛ ɛ̀ nu nonɛn kɛ. Kebefɛ kè bó to geɛ to nu ɛ kaa to lo bô mboyma fô bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ bo Islael e, wvu lɛ bonyii bo Islael ebenè kendoŋ.
45011012	Ɛ́ ɛ̀ fɛn nu lɛ kebefɛ kè bó to geɛ to nu ɛ kaa to ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô bvujonkɛ yî nshɛ le, ɛ ŋgbwe wvù bó to gbweɛ to ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô bvujoŋkɛ fô bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ bo Islael e, tu bvujoŋkɛ bvù nu ke enu seke bonyii bo Islael bocii ɛ bee Klistu le nu ke enu nɛɛ?
45011013	Me ŋgomte keenjeme keseen ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ ben bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ bo Islael. No me nu waa ntum Jisos fô bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ bo Islael e, me ɛ mum ɛ no njoo lemme diem lɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ ɛ fí kuuke.
45011014	Ɛ me ŋgee nonɛn wvu lɛ me eŋge ɛ́ Bojuu bosɛse ebenè kendoŋ, ɛ́ fí ekum bó le, ɛ́ bomew bó le ke eboy.
45011015	Ɛ́ ɛ̀ fɛn nu lɛ Nyo' to dioo ma bonyii bo Islael ɛ fifin ge ɛ bonyii bomew yî woŋ e kase tu fiɛɛ fimwaaŋ bô bo Nyo', tu ɛ̀ nu ke enu seke wvú ɛ kase ɛ fiisɛn bó, ɛ fí nu nɛɛ? Fí nu ke enu lo diɛwɛ seke wee ɛ kpwe ɛ kase ɛ buy yî kpwe le.
45011016	Ɛ́ wee guse bvulɛm ɛ baa sâ' dvú ɛ̂ Nyo', tu bvulɛm bvudvu bvucii nu enu wase bvu Nyo' le. Kete ɛ no nu ɛ gɛŋ yidvu nu yi Nyo', tu tíɛw kete kedvu nu enu tɛn yi Nyo'.
45011017	Geenɛn, ɛ́ ɛ̀ fɛn nu lɛ tíɛw kete yimew nu ɛ bó to faashɛ laŋyɛ mum jo wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu ben bò nu kete ke Olif e ke ɛkow, to shfuwyɛ yî kete ke Olif kè bó yele lo le fò tíɛw yimew yɛ to nɛn'yɛɛ, wvu lɛ ben ekɛŋke tɛn joo yì nɛn'yi yî kete kedvu le,
45011018	tu kɛ ben kɛŋke keekfune gvuw ben ɛ bo tíɛw yidvu yɛ kɛ. Ɛ́ ben kfune gvuw ben ɛ bó, ɛ́ ben no kumyì lɛ ben nu kɛ lo tíɛw. Ɛ ɛ̀ yaa gee ben ɛ gɛŋ sɛ nu dvú kɛ. Ɛ̀ gee gɛŋ ɛ ben sɛ nu dvú.
45011019	Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wee mvu ben e enɛ ejemyi lɛ, “Kɛ bó to faashi tíɛw keeshfuw ɛ ɛ̀ nu me fó.”
45011020	Ɛ̀ nu kecɛɛy. Bó to faashi bó laŋyi njefo kɛ bó to kɛŋke mbee kɛ. Ben ɛ no nu fó tɛmyi nje fitele fì ben lese yî Klistu le. Nonɛn, fo ben emum ebensee ye kɛ. Ben enù nfan nfan.
45011021	Ben ekeè lɛ ɛ́ Nyo' nu sɛ wvú to nu ɛ bawcɛ tíɛw kete kè bó yele lo kiɛ, tu kɛ ɛ̀ nulo tɛn ɛ́ wvú ke ebawcɛ ben kɛ.
45011022	Ben etaa lɛ eyɛn lɛ Nyo' kɛŋke fitele fì jee baay bvuu kɛŋke tɛn fitele fi cewcew e. Wvú ké no cewcewe bô bonyii bò nu ɛ gbwe, geenɛn duŋci fitele fì jee fô ben e fɛn ɛ́ ben nu ɛ mɛy ɛ no bii ɛ̂ je ye le. Ɛ́ fuw kɛ nonɛn, tu wvú nu ke efaashɛ tɛn ben elaŋ.
45011023	Ɛ dioo tu fô bonyii bo Islael e, ɛ́ bó kumene lo ɛ no kɛŋke mbee, ɛ́ Nyo' ekase ejo bó eshfuwyɛ yî kete kiɛ le, njefo ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ ɛ Nyo' kɛŋke mvuŋgay keekase ege.
45011024	Ben ekeè lɛ, ɛ́ ben nu tíɛw ɛ bó to faashɛ yî kete ke Olif e kè kuu ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛkow, to shfuwyɛ yî kè bó yele lo le, ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ ɛ fí yaa kɛŋke keenu nonɛn kɛ, tu kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó ekase ejo tíɛw yì ɛ̀ nu yi kete kè bó yele lo yì bó to faashɛɛ wase ekase etfuushɛ yî kete kedvu le efey lo nonɛn e?
45011025	Boom bo bwɛɛm e, me ŋgomte lɛ ben ekiɛɛ kecɛɛy kin kè nu ɛ̂ nnyilɛ le, wvu lɛ fo ben ke enɛ ebensee ye lɛ ben feefene baay kɛ. Fí nu lɛ ɛkolɛ kè tɛmyɛɛn nu ɛ to fô bonyii bo Islael e nteen. Ɛ bó nu ke etɛmyi kɛ bikuu nonɛn egɛn ebuy seke bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ bo Islael bocii bò nu keeley ŋgoo bonyii bo Klistu le ɛ ley wase.
45011026	Fí nu ke edioo ɛ kooy nonɛn, ɛ́ bonyii bo Islael bocii emum eboy. Ɛ̀ nu fí fì bó to saŋɛɛ ɛ Nyo' gayte lɛ, “Wee wvù nu ke ebvuse bonyii ŋgɛw e nu ke ebuy Sayon. Wvú nu ke ebvuse gee dì befe ɛ̂ kfuu di Yakow e.
45011027	Ɛ fifin nu moŋkan mò me nu ŋke eŋgbwo bee bó seke me ɛ ncake bibefɛ bibole.”
45011028	Ɛ̂ keba ke saaka wvù jee wvu Nyo' le nu ɛ bonyii bo Islael nu bonyii bo bvuban e fô Nyo' le nje yene. Ɛ dioo etu ɛ̂ keba ke ncaw wvù Nyo' to cawɛɛ wase bó le, nu ɛ bonyii bo Islael nu lo fitele fiew nje moŋkan mò wvú to gbwolɛɛ bô bo'icee cee bó.
45011029	Fí nu nonɛn njefo ɛ́ Nyo' nya wase nnya ɛ̂ wee, wvú saa ebvuu ekase efi kɛ, ɛ́ wvú teŋe wase wee, wvú saa ebvuu ekase ecinɛ wvú le kɛ.
45011030	No ben bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ bo Islael to shee nu yaa yuuke Nyo' le kɛ, geenɛn ɛ no nu keseen ɛ wvú ɛ cam wase shen fô ben e njefo bonyii bo Islael baa eyuuke wvú le kɛ,
45011031	ɛ̀ nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no bó tɛn baa eyuuke Nyo' le keseen wvu lɛ shen yì wvú cam fô ben e ege ɛ́ wvú ke ecam tɛn shen fô bó le.
45011032	Fiɛɛ fì nu nu lɛ, Nyo' nu ɛ lese bonyii bocii yî ncaw ɛkolɛ kè tɛmyɛɛn e, wvu lɛ ɛ̀ nɛlo ɛ́ wen ecam shen fô bó le bocii.
45011033	O, ben etaa eyɛn, bvukukɛ bvù ɛ̀ nu bvu Nyo' le nu naa lo bvu baay, ɛ bvufee bwew nu naa lo tɛn bvu baay, ɛ mwɛɛm mvù wvú kee nu ɛ wvú kee naa lo tɛn baay! Kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wee ekiɛɛ je yì wvú kpwaŋsene mwɛɛm jó kɛ. Kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wee ekiɛɛ je yì wvú gee mwɛɛm mwew jó kɛ.
45011034	Fifin nu no bó saŋɛɛ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu yɛɛ dvú wvù kee ŋkpwawcɛ Tata? Ɛ ɛ̀ nu yɛɛ wvù nulo etefe wvú?
45011035	Ɛ̀ nu yɛɛ dvú wvù ke nu ɛ nya wase Nyo' bô fiɛɛ wvu lɛ Nyo' ke ekase elaw wvú?”
45011036	Mwɛɛm mvunciim nɛ fô wvú le. Mwɛɛm mvunciim fey can ye le, ɛ mwɛɛm mvunciim nu nje ye. Mbense enù fô wvú le sekecii sɛ ŋka. Fí enù nonɛn.
45012001	Boom bo bwɛɛm e, no Nyo' nu ɛ cam wase shen fô beene le, me ɛ mum ɛ no ŋkule can lɛ ben enya bikuu binɛn ɛ̂ Nyo' diɛwɛ mwɛɛm mvu ncese le mvù bɛɛ mvuyuum yuule ɛ Nyo' ɛ bee le. Fifin nu je yi lɛŋ fô ben e keebunlee Nyo' jó le.
45012002	Fo ben ebiì mwɛɛm mvù bonyii bo yî nshɛ le fɛn gee kɛ. Ben ecinɛ ɛ́ Nyo' enyaa ben bô boŋkpwawcɛ bò bofɛ, ɛ́ bó ekumene ben. Ɛ́ ben gee nonɛn, ɛ́ ben emum ekiɛɛ keeyeese kee fiɛɛ fì Nyo' shieele, fì ɛ̀ nu fì jee, ɛ Nyo' ɛ bee dvú, ɛ fí ɛ joŋ wvú le ɛ gɛn ɛ mɛse.
45012003	Me diɛwɛ wee wvù Nyo' nu ɛ buw e, nu ɛ me ŋgomte keeŋgay ɛ̂ ben bocii lɛ, fo wee ekpwawcì ɛkumɛ ɛkolɛ kew lɛ wen nu fiɛɛ fimew fele fiɛɛ fì wvú nu kɛ. Wee ekpwaakè ɛkumɛ ɛkolɛ kew ɛ̂ je yi lɛŋ e. Ɛ́ wee ekpwawcì biì nfew mbee wvù Nyo' nu ɛ nya ɛ̂ wvú le.
45012004	Beene kee lɛ ye wee nu yimiaaŋ, kɛŋke biba jɛɛy jɛɛy, ɛ biba bidvu kɛŋke lemme jɛɛy jɛɛy.
45012005	Ɛ̀ nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no beene nu. Naa no beene cim nu nteen, nu ɛ beene nu ye miaaŋ yî Klistu le. Ɛ wee mvu yaa nu fô ɛkolɛ kew e maaŋ kɛ.
45012006	Beene kɛŋke nnya jɛɛy jɛɛy bii je yì Nyo' nu ɛ buw beene jó le. Beene emum elemtè dvú. Ɛ́ nnya wee nu keeteete ntum Nyo', ɛ́ wvú no teetè bii nfew mbee wvù Nyo' nu ɛ nya ɛ̂ wvú le.
45012007	Ɛ́ nnya wee nu keelemte fô bonyii le, ɛ́ wvú no lemtè fô bó le. Ɛ́ yi wee nu keeyɛɛyi bonyii, ɛ́ wvú no yɛɛyì.
45012008	Ɛ́ nnya wee nu keeyvuwse mvuntelem mvu bonyii le, ɛ́ wvú no yvuwsè. Ɛ́ yi wee nnya nu keenyaa mwɛɛm ɛ̂ bonyii, ɛ́ wvú yene can ye. Ɛ́ yi wee nu keetaale fô bonyii le, ɛ́ wvú no taalè fô bó le bô fitele fiew ficii. Ɛ́ wee nu ɛ ye nnya nu keecamte shen fô bonyii le, ɛ́ wvú no camtè yuuke njoŋ.
45012009	Ŋkoŋɛn wene kɛŋke keenù wvu kecɛɛy. Ben ebanè fiɛɛ fì befe, leemè ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî fiɛɛ fì jee le.
45012010	Ben ekoŋenè bikuu binɛn bô fitele ficii diɛwɛ boom bo bwee wan e. Ben efelè naa lo bonyii bocii yî n'wvum wvù ben nyaa ɛ̂ bonyii le.
45012011	Fo ben egeè ŋgoy kɛ. Mvuntelem mvunɛn eyvuwsè sekecii ɛ ben lemte lemme di Nyo' le.
45012012	Ben elaŋlaŋè yî fiɛɛ fì ben taale fwe yî dvú le kee lɛ ben nu ke ekɛŋkɛ le. Ben ekuulè shém yî boŋgɛw e. Ben enù yî bunle le sekecii.
45012013	Ben eficì bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo Nyo' le bò fuute. Ben efiisenè botolo yéw yene le taale fô bó le ntay.
45012014	Ben elɛkè lɛ Nyo' elaŋ ɛ ɛ̀ nu kembonɛn yî bonyii bò bone bikaa ɛ̂ ben ɛjim e. Ben elɛkè ɛ ɛ̀ nu kembonɛn fô bó le. Fo ben elɛkè lɛ eto lon fô bó le kɛ.
45012015	Ben elaŋlaŋè ben ɛ bonyii bò laŋlaŋe, enù yî yii le ben ɛ bonyii bò nu yî yii le.
45012016	Ben eceè yî fiɛɛ le fimwaaŋ. Fo ben ebenseè ye kɛ. Ben ekoolè nsán ben ɛ bonyii bo ncɛw ncɛw. Fo ben ejoò lɛ ben kee mwɛɛm fele no ben kee kɛ.
45012017	Fo ben etfuusè kebefɛ bô kebefɛ kɛ. Ben ekɛŋkè ŋkpwawcɛ keegee ɛ ɛ̀ nu mwɛɛm mvù bonyii bocii yɛne lɛ ɛ̀ nu mvù jee.
45012018	Ɛ́ je nu dvú, no ben yɛne, ɛ́ ben no momtè keecee yî nyɛkeey e ben ɛ bonyii bocii.
45012019	Nsáa yɛm shém, fo ben eyuu emomtè naa lo keetfuuse ɛnvukɛ kɛ. Ben ecinɛ dvú ɛ́ Nyo' ke eduŋcɛ shém ye yì ffuuke ɛ̂ bó. Ɛ̀ nu fí fì bó nu ɛ saŋ lɛ, “Ɛnvukɛ nu ɛ ɛ̀ kɛŋke me keentfuse. Ɛ̀ nu me wvù nu ŋke enlaw bó. Fifin gayte Tata Nyo'.”
45012020	Fì ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ ben egeè nu fin fì bó saŋ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le lɛ, “Ɛ́ jeŋ yuu wee wo bvuban, ɛ́ wo nya fiɛɛ ɛ wvú die. Kendoŋ ɛ́ no yumte wvú, ɛ́ wo nya fiɛɛ ɛ wvú wu. Ɛ́ wo ge nonɛn, ɛ́ ken'wuumɛn enu fô wvú ɛfa.”
45012021	Fo ben ecinɛ ɛ́ kebefɛ eso ben kɛ. Ben esoò lo kebefɛ bô mwɛɛm mvù jee.
45013001	Wee tfuu kɛŋke keeyuukè bonyii bò kɛŋke mvuŋgay mvu sa' le, njefo kɛ mvuŋgay nu dvú sɛ mvú nɛ fô Nyo' le kɛ. Boba bò saake nu ɛ ɛ̀ gɛke Nyo'.
45013002	Fí ɛ mum ɛ no nu lɛ ɛ́ wee duŋci ɛkolɛ kè tɛmyɛɛn ɛ̂ bonyii bò kɛŋke mvuŋgay mvu sa' le, tu mwɛtɛn duŋci ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ bonyii bò ɛ̀ gɛke Nyo'. Ɛ bonyii bò duŋci ɛkolɛ kè tɛmyɛɛn teŋe ɛ ɛ̀ nu ŋgɛw yî bikuu bibole.
45013003	Ben ekeè lɛ bonyii bò saake woŋ nu ɛ bonyii bò kɛŋke keŋge kè jee yaa ké no fane bó kɛ. Ɛ̀ ké no fane bò befe keŋge. Ɛ́ wo shieele lɛ kɛ wo nu efane bonyii bò kɛŋke mvuŋgay mvu sa' le, ɛ́ wo mum no geè lɛ fiɛɛ fì jee, ɛ́ bó emum ebɛnsee wo.
45013004	Wee wvù saake bonyii nu ɛ wvú lemte ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô Nyo' le lɛ bonyii eceè ntay. Geenɛn, ɛ́ wo nɛ ɛ no gee fiɛɛ fì befe, ɛ́ wo mum no fane wvú, njefo kɛ mvuŋgay mvù bó nya ɛ̂ wvú keeleese bonyii yî ŋgɛw e nu mvu ɛcici kɛ. Ɛ̀ nu wee lemme wvu Nyo' wvù duŋci shém Nyo' yì ffuuke fô bonyii bò gee mwɛɛm mvù befe le.
45013005	Nonɛn ben kɛŋke keeyuukè bonyii bò saake woŋ e, ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu kɛ lɛ njefo ben fane shém Nyo' yì ffuuke kɛ. Ben eyuukè tɛn wvu lɛ fo fiɛɛ enu dvú fì esaake ben fô fitele le kɛ.
45013006	Ɛ̀ nɛɛ fiɛɛ fì gee ɛ ben sɛ laaŋke tɛn shile, njefo bonyii bò kɛŋke mvuŋgay mvu sa' le lemte ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô Nyo' le, ɛ bó ɛ nya kefew kebole kecii yî lemme didvu le.
45013007	Ben enyaà fiɛɛ ficii fì ben kɛŋke keenya ɛ̂ wee tfuu. Ɛ́ ɛ̀ nu shile keelaŋ, ɛ́ ben laŋ. Ɛ́ ɛ̀ nu keelaw mwɛɛm mvù ben kɛŋke keelaw, ɛ́ ben law. Ɛ́ ɛ̀ nu wee wvù ben kɛŋke keefane wvú, ɛ́ ben no fanè. Ɛ́ ɛ̀ nu wvù ben nu enya ɛ ɛ̀ nu n'wvum ɛ̂ wvú, ɛ́ ben nya.
45013008	Fo wee ekɛŋkè naa lo fioo bô wee mvu ɛfey fioo yì ɛ̀ nu keŋkoŋɛn kɛ. Ben ekeè lɛ, ɛ́ wee kooŋke wee mvu, tu wvú nu ɛ gɛɛ wase bonci bocii.
45013009	Bonci bo Nyo' le bò gayte lɛ, “Fo wo ejaŋ kpwɛɛ wee, fo wo eyu wee, fo wo ecoŋ bvucoŋ, fo wo edewkenè ɛjisɛ kɛ,” naa noo nci wvù la, nu ɛ bó ɛ taashɛ yî nci wvù gayte lɛ, “Ɛ̀ kooŋkè waa bwoo no wo kooŋke ɛkolɛ kuw” e.
45013010	Ɛ́ wee kooŋke wee mvu, wvú saa ebvuu ege naa lo fiɛɛ fì befe bô wvú kɛ. Nonɛn ɛ́ wee kooŋke wee mvu, tu wvú nu ɛ gɛɛ wase bonci bocii.
45013011	Ben egeè mwɛɛm mvun nonɛn kee no kefew nu wase keseen. Kefew nu ɛ kí ɛ kocɛn wase fô ben e keekamse. Ben ekamse njefo kefew kè Nyo' nu eboyse beene nu wase nceencee fele no kí to shee nu seke beene to lesɛɛ fitele yî Jisos Klistu le.
45013012	Ɛntaŋ kaa wase, ɛ ɛkfuŋ yuule wase too. Beene emum elaŋ gee di ɛjiwɛ le, ejo wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu gee di n'yuu le diɛwɛ mwɛɛm mvu jem e.
45013013	Beene eceè nce wvù kɛŋke n'wvum diɛwɛ bonyii bò lɛne ɛmvunsheeŋ e. Fo ben ediekenè, wukene gee diɛwɛ bwé le kɛ. Fo ben ewuù mbvuum ɛ mó koole kɛ. Fo ben eceè nce nnyɛn kenjaŋ noo nce nsake kɛ. Fo ben ewaalè waa bvuu kɛŋke keŋghɛw kɛ.
45013014	Ben ejo ɛ ɛ̀ nu nce Tata Jisos Klistu yî yene le. Fo ben enya naa lo bvudvuu ɛ̂ nyam ye wvu lɛ ben egee mwɛɛm mvù befe mvù yí shieele kɛ.
45014001	Ben efiisenè bonyii bo wɛɛyi yî mbee le ɛ̂ ben ɛnte. Fo ben ɛ boba bonyii ebeeke ɛ ɛ̀ nu mbew yî mwɛɛm mvù bó kpwawci lɛ ɛ̀ nu mvu lɛŋ keegee le kɛ.
45014002	Wee mvu nu ɛ wvú beŋe lɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wen ediee fiɛɛ ficii. Geenɛn ɛ wee mvu wvù mbee we wɛɛyi nu ɛ wvú diee kɛ fiew ɛ ɛ̀ nu mbáse yì bó keeke lo.
45014003	Fo wee wvù diee fiɛɛ ficii yaa nyaake, enyɛnsè wee wvù nyaake kɛ. Fo wee wvù nyaake, esaakè wee wvù diee fiɛɛ ficii yaa nyaake mum sumtene lo nsaw we kɛ, njefo bó bocii nu ɛ Nyo' ɛ fiisɛn bó.
45014004	Ɛ̀ nu wo wvù yɛɛ keesaake wee lemme wee mvu mum sumtene lo nsaw we? Ɛ̀ kɛŋke cee ɛkolɛ we keeke eyɛn laa waa we lemme leeme ntay nuu wvú gbwee lo lɛ. Ɛ wvú nu ke eleem we, njefo Tata nulo eleke wvú we ɛ́ wvú eleem ntay.
45014005	Wee mvu nu tɛn dvú wvù joo lɛ ɛdiuw yomew nu yo baay baay ɛ̂ yomew e. Ɛ wee mvu joo fiew lɛ ɛdiuw ɛcii nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ. Fiɛɛ fì nu, nu kɛ lɛ fo wee ekɛŋkè kemaŋɛn ɛ̂ ŋkpwawcɛ we le yî fiɛɛ fì wvú leeme yî dvú le kɛ.
45014006	Wee wvù joo lɛ ɛdiuw yomew nu yo baay baay gee nonɛn keenya n'wvum ɛ̂ Tata. Ɛ wee wvù diee fiɛɛ ficii diee tɛn keenya n'wvum ɛ̂ Tata, no wvú gee nonɛn no nyaa keyoone ɛ̂ Nyo'. Ɛ wee wvú nyɛnsee keediee fiɛɛ ficii nyɛnsee kɛ tɛn keenya n'wvum ɛ̂ Tata, no wvú nyaa tɛn keyoone ɛ̂ Nyo'.
45014007	Beene ekeè lɛ ɛ́ wee nu dvú, tu kɛ ɛ̀ kɛŋke wvú ɛkolɛ kew kɛ. Ɛ́ wvú kpwe lo, ɛ́ saa ekɛŋke wvú ɛkolɛ kew kɛ.
45014008	Ɛ́ beene nu dvú, tu beene nu kɛ beene ɛ bo Tata, beene ɛ́ kpwe, tu beene nu kɛ beene ɛ bo Tata. Nonɛn, kɛnɛɛ beene nu dvú, kɛnɛɛ beene ɛ kpwe, tu ɛ̀ kɛŋke kɛ Tata beene.
45014009	Ɛ̀ nu shiee wvù Klistu to kpweɛ kase buy yî kpwe le no nu dvú. Wvú to ge nonɛn wvu lɛ wen enù Tata bonyii bocii bò bɛɛ dvú bô bò kpwekɛn wase.
45014010	Nonɛn, ɛ̀ nu nje la wvù wo saake waa bwoo mum sumtene lo nsaw we? Ɛ ɛ̀ nu tɛn nje la wvù wo nyɛnsee waa bwoo? Ben ekeè lɛ beene bocii nu ke eleem fwe dvu Nyo' ɛ́ wvú esaw beene.
45014011	Ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì bó nu ɛ saŋ lɛ, “Me wvù Tata ŋgayte lɛ, no me nu dvú, wee tfuu nu ke etum ɛnvuw ɛ̂ me ɛjise, ɛ́ wee tfuu ejemyi bô diuw we lɛ me nu Nyo'.”
45014012	Fí ɛ mum ɛ no nu lɛ wee mwaaŋ mwaaŋ beene le kɛŋke keeke eleem ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛjise see no gee diew to nu.
45014013	Nonɛn, fo beene ebvuu esaake wee noo wee mum sumtene lo nsaw kɛ. Fiɛɛ fì beene kɛŋke keegeè nu lɛ wee dioo gee fiɛɛ no yɛne fo enu fiɛɛ fì ege ɛ́ waa bwee ebaytɛn yî dvú le kɛnɛɛ egbwe lo kɛ.
45014014	Me ŋkee naa lo, ɛ me ɛ mbee diɛwɛ wee Tata Jisos e lɛ kɛ fiɛɛ fidien fimew nu dvú ɛfinɛfin fì nu sɛ fí yuule lo kɛ. Geenɛn, ɛ́ wee mvu nɛ ɛ no yɛne lɛ fiɛɛ fidien fimew nu ɛ fí yaa yuule kɛ, tu fí nu enu kɛ nonɛn fô wvú le.
45014015	Ɛ́ wo diee fiɛɛ ɛ fí beete bô waa bwoo, tu kɛ wo bvuu duŋci keŋkoŋɛn fô wvú le kɛ. Fo wo ecinɛ ɛ́ fiɛɛ fì wo diee ege ɛ́ waa bwoo wvù Klistu to kpweɛ nje ye, egbwe lo kɛ.
45014016	Nonɛn, fo wo ege ɛ́ fiɛɛ fì jee fì wo gee ke enɛ etu fì bó ejemyi wase lɛ ɛ̀ nu fì befe kɛ.
45014017	Ben ekeè lɛ kɛ bvunfon bvu Nyo' le nu fiɛɛ fi ɛkumɛ mwɛɛm mvudien bô mwɛɛm mvuwuun kɛ. Ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fi ɛkumɛ keekɛŋke nce wvu teytey bô wvu nyɛkeey noo keekɛŋke nlaŋlaŋ wvù nɛn'yi fô Keyoy ke Yuule le.
45014018	Ɛ́ wee lemte Klistu le ɛ̂ yiyɛ je le, tu Nyo' nu eyuuke njoŋ bô wvú, ɛ bonyii bɛnsee tɛn wvú.
45014019	Beene emum ebiì mwɛɛm mvù too ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô nyɛkeey noo mvù fici beene keeyoote lo wee noo wee le.
45014020	Fo ben ebefe bô lemme di Nyo' le nje mwɛɛm mvudien kɛ. Ɛ̀ nu kecɛɛy lɛ mwɛɛm mvudien mvunciim yuule lo, geenɛn ɛ́ wo diee fiɛɛ fì nulo ege ɛ́ wee mvu egbwe lo, tu ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì befe ɛ wo gee.
45014021	Ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì jee keetun keedie nyam, kɛnɛɛ keewu mbvuum, kɛnɛɛ keege naa la fì nulo ege ɛ́ waa bwoo egbwe lo.
45014022	Ɛ́ fitele fiuw beŋe fiɛɛ fimew e, ɛ́ wo gɛɛ ɛ ɛ̀ no kee kɛ ben ɛ Nyo' bofɛɛ. Njoŋ wvu baay nu fô wee wvù shiee baa enu dvú fô wvú le keesaake ɛkolɛ kew kɛ, njefo wvú gee fiɛɛ fì wvú tomte lɛ fí nu lɛŋ e.
45014023	Geenɛn, wee wvù diee fiɛɛ kɛŋke kemaŋɛn fô fitele fiew e nu wase ŋgɛw e, njefo wvú gee fiɛɛ ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu fì fitele fiew beŋe dvú kɛ. Ben ekeè lɛ fiɛɛ ficii fì wee gee sɛ fitele fiew nu ɛ bee, nu ɛ ɛ̀ nu kebefɛ.
45015001	Beene bò tɛmyi kɛŋke keekuulè shém bô gbwee dì bonyii bo wɛɛyi gbwee. Fo beene egeè fiɛɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ fì ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ ye ejee kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu beene kɛ.
45015002	Wee mwaaŋ mwaaŋ beene le kɛŋke keemomte keegeè fiɛɛ fì ejeè waa bwee le keefici wvú ɛ mbee we kuu.
45015003	Ben keè tɛn lɛ kɛ Jisos Klistu to gee mwɛɛm mvù ye ejeè kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvú kɛ. Wvú to gee fiew ɛ fí kooyi no bó saŋ ɛ wee jemyi ɛ̂ Nyo' lɛ, “Boncun bò bonyii nan'yi wo dvú nu ɛ tu yî yɛm e.”
45015004	Beene kee lo lɛ mwɛɛm mvunciim mvù bó to saŋɛɛ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le fwele to nu keetefe beene dvú, wvu lɛ mvú ege ɛ́ beene eleemè tɛmyi, ɛ́ mvuntelem mvusɛɛbeene eyvuwsè yî fiɛɛ fì beene taale fwe yî dvú le.
45015005	Me nlɛke lɛ Nyo' wvù gee ɛ bonyii leeme tɛmyi bvuu gee ɛ mvuntelem mvu bonyii le yvuwse, ege ɛ́ ben eceè yî fiɛɛ le fimwaaŋ ben ɛ bonyii bocii bii no Klistu Jisos duŋci,
45015006	wvu lɛ yî kentaashɛ le, ɛ́ ben ebenseè Nyo' wvù nu Icee Tata wesebeene wvù Jisos Klistu yî diɛw e miaaŋ.
45015007	Ben emum efiisɛn wee tfuu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no Klistu nu ɛ fiisɛn ben, ɛ́ mbense egɛnè ɛ̂ Nyo'.
45015008	Ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben lɛ Klistu to nu ɛ jo ɛkolɛ kew diɛwɛ waa lemme le fô Bojuu le keeduŋcɛ ɛ̂ bó lɛ Nyo' ké no jemyi kecɛɛy. Wvú to ge nonɛn keetom ŋkawma wvù Nyo' to nyaɛ ɛ̂ bo'icee cee bó.
45015009	Ɛ wvú to bvuu ge nonɛn wvu lɛ bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu nɛlo ebenseè tɛn Nyo' nje shen yì Nyo' kɛŋke fô bó le. Fifin nu no bó saŋɛɛ lɛ, “No fí nu nonɛn, me nu ŋke embensee wo ɛnte jo bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu. Ɛ me nu ŋke en'yemte mbensee diee diuw.”
45015010	Ɛ fí bvuu nu ɛ bó ɛ saŋ lɛ, “Ben bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu, ben elaŋlaŋè ben ɛ bonyii bo Nyo' le.”
45015011	Ɛ fí bvuu nu tɛn ɛ bó ɛ saŋ lɛ, “Bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu, ben ebenseè Tata. Bitum bicii, ben ebenseè Tata.”
45015012	Ɛ Yɛsaya to bvuu jeme tɛn lɛ, “Biay mi nu ke esan ɛ̂ kfuu di Jɛɛse le. Ɛ ɛ̀ nu wee wvù nu ke ebuy esaake bitum bi bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu le. Ɛ̀ nu yî ye le wvù bitum nu ke egɛɛ bvufee bvubole.”
45015013	Me nlɛke lɛ Nyo' wvù beene taale fwe yî ye le, eyiŋsɛn mvuntelem mvunɛn bô njoŋ noo nyɛkeey no ben nu ɛ lese fitele yî ye le, wvu lɛ ɛ̂ mvuŋgay mvu Keyoy ke Yuule le, ɛ́ ben etaale kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu fwe sekecii yî fiɛɛ fì ben kee lɛ ben nu ke ekɛŋkɛ le.
45015014	Boom bo bwɛɛm e, me kebɛɛ ŋkee ntay lɛ ben kɛŋke naa keŋge kè jee baay, ɛ ben ɛ yiŋsɛn bô bvufee, kee tɛn keetefe bikuu binɛn.
45015015	Geenɛn, yî mwɛɛm mvumew e nu ɛ me ɛ nsaŋ ɛ nloocɛ ɛ ntooshɛ lo ben. Ɛ me ŋge nonɛn keeŋkume lo ben, ɛ ɛ̀ nu nje mbuwma wvù Nyo' nu ɛ buw me dvú,
45015016	lɛ me enù wee lemme Klistu Jisos fô bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu le. Me ŋgee lemme din diɛwɛ cee ncese le, nlemte yî saaka wvù jee wvù wvu Nyo' le, wvu lɛ bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu enù diɛwɛ ncese wvù Nyo' nu ɛ bee le, ɛ Keyoy ke Yuule ɛ seyse bó ɛ gɛɛ bó ɛ no yuule.
45015017	Nje Klistu Jisos, nu ɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me embensee ye yî lemme dì me nlemte fô Nyo' le.
45015018	Kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me emom lo enjeme ɛkumɛ fiɛɛ fimew jɛɛy, ɛfey fì Klistu nu ɛ ge wase fele yî yɛm e, lɛ bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu elese fitele yî ye le kɛ. Bó to lese fitele bii mwɛɛm mvù me nto njemyi bô mvù me nto ŋgee le.
45015019	Ɛ ɛ̀ to nu tɛn bii mvuŋgay mvu mwɛɛm mvù duŋci mvuŋgay mvu Nyo' le bô mwɛɛm mvu diuw wvù yumɛɛn e mvù me nto ŋgee le, noo yî mvuŋgay mvu Keyoy ke Yuule le. Nonɛn, keekɛw Jɛlusalɛm ekɛnɛn egɛn ebuy keba kè Illilikum e, nu ɛ me ɛ nloocɛ wase ɛ nfewcɛ saaka wvù jee ɛkumɛ Klistu jó.
45015020	Me nto gee nonɛn, ɛ shiee wɛm wvu baay nu lɛ me enfewcì saaka wvù jee wvun ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô bó ke baa yuw wase ɛkumɛ Klistu kɛ, wvu lɛ fo me ŋke enɛ eŋgɛn en'yoote yî kenffuy ke wee mvu le kɛ.
45015021	Me nto ŋgee fifin mbii ɛ ɛ̀ nu no bó to saŋɛɛ lɛ, “Bonyii bò bó ke baa see wase ɛ̂ bó ɛkumɛ wvú, nu ke eyɛn kecɛɛy kew e, ɛ bonyii bò ke baa yuw wase ɛkumɛ wvú, nu ke ekiɛɛ wvú.”
45015022	Ɛ̀ se jewse lɛne din me bokaŋ e nteen fo me ento ɛ́ beene eyɛnɛn.
45015023	Geenɛn, keseen kɛ bvudvuu bvu lemme le bvuu bɛɛ dvú biba bin e kɛ. Nonɛn no me nse nshee nshieele wase bilum e keento ɛ́ beene eyɛnɛn,
45015024	nu ɛ me ŋkpwaake, ŋkee naa lɛ beene nu ke eyɛnɛn seke me nfele ŋgɛne Sbɛɛn. Me ŋkpwaake tɛn lɛ ben nu ke eficɛ me yî lɛne diem e keeŋgɛn embuy jó, seke beene ɛ moocɛ caan, me ɛ n'yuw njoŋ ɛ̂ ben ɛntelɛŋ.
45015025	Geenɛn, keseen nu ɛ me nu eŋgɛn Jɛlusalɛm yî lemme le fô bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo Nyo' le bo jó le.
45015026	Me ŋgɛne jó njefo bonyii bo mbee le bo Masedonia noo bo Akɛya se nu ɛ no kooŋke keege kensuw efi bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo Nyo' le bò fuute dvú Jɛlusalɛm.
45015027	Ɛ̀ to koŋ bó keege nonɛn, ɛ ɛ̀ nu lo kecɛɛy lɛ bó kɛŋke keege fiɛɛ fô bó le nonɛn, njefo ɛ́ bó bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu nu ɛ kɛŋkɛ wase fô mbuwma wvù fici biyoy bibole wvù ɛ̀ nu wvu Bojuu, tu bó kɛŋke tɛn keefi Bojuu bô mwɛɛm mvu yî nshɛ le fɛn mvù Nyo' nu ɛ buw bó dvú.
45015028	Nonɛn, seke me ɛ mɛse lemme din, ɛ n'yɛn lɛ fiɛɛ fì bó suw nu ɛ ley can Bojuu le, ɛ́ me emum enɛ jó, enfey jo ben, ɛ́ beene eyɛnɛn, ɛ́ me emum eŋgɛn Sbɛɛn.
45015029	Ɛ me ŋkee lo lɛ me nu ŋke endioo entoo ɛ̂ ben e, entoo bô kembonɛn ke Klistu le fô ben e ɛ kí ɛ yiŋsɛn.
45015030	Boom bo bwɛɛm e, me ŋkule lo can ɛ̂ ben ɛ̂ diee di Tata wesebeene wvù Jisos Klistu le noo yî keŋkoŋɛn ke Keyoy ke Yuule le, lɛ ben ebɛne me le ɛ́ beene etaashɛ ebunlee shiee le ɛ̂ Nyo' fô me le,
45015031	lɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me ŋke embuy can bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ bo mbee le Judea. Beene ebunleè tɛn lɛ bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo Nyo' le ke ebee lemme dì me ŋgɛne keeŋge Jɛlusalɛm e,
45015032	wvu lɛ ɛ́ Nyo' fɛn nu ɛ bee, ɛ́ me ŋke entoo ɛ̂ ben e n'yuuke njoŋ, ɛ́ fitele fiem elɛɛtene ɛ̂ ben ɛntelɛŋ.
45015033	Nyo' wvù nu Nyo' nyɛkeey enù ben ɛ bó bocii. Fí enù nonɛn.
45016001	Me ŋgomte keenduŋcɛ jɛme yesebeene mi yì diee nu Fuɛbɛ ɛ́ ben ekiɛɛ wvú. Wvú fici yî lemme di Nyo' le ɛ̂ kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le ke Sɛŋklia le.
45016002	Seke wvú ɛ to, ɛ ben fiisɛn wvú diɛwɛ wee Tata le ɛ̂ je yì ɛ̀ nu yì bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo Nyo' le. Ɛ́ fiɛɛ nu dvú fì wvú shieele lɛ ben efi wvú dvú, ɛ́ ben fi, ekeè lɛ wvú nu ɛ fi wase bonyii nteen, ɛ fi tɛn noo me.
45016003	Ben egay Blisilia bô Akpwila le enya ɛ̂ me. Ɛ̀ nu bonyii ɛ bó ɛ taashɛ bee bó yî lemme di Klistu Jisos e.
45016004	Bó nu ɛ kpwe to soy wase bó nje yɛm. Ɛ̀ nu bonyii ɛ ɛ̀ yaa mɛy kɛ me maaŋ wvù nyaa keyoone ɛ̂ bó kɛ. Bintaashɛ bi bonyii bo mbee le bi bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu le bicii nyaa tɛn keyoone ɛ̂ bó.
45016005	Ben egay tɛn kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le kè taashi ɛ̂ bó yew e enya ɛ̂ me. Ben egay Abɛnɛtus wvù nsaa yɛm shém e. Wvú to nu wee wvu fwe keenu wee Klistu woŋ wvù Ɛsia le.
45016006	Ben egay tɛn Maalia wvù nu ɛ lem wase baay ɛ̂ ben ɛntelɛŋ e.
45016007	Ben egay Andulnikus bô Junias e bò nu bonyii bem bo woŋ e, ɛ bó ɛ lem wase ncaw bee bó. Ɛ̀ nu bonyii bò bó kee bó ŋgoo boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e. Ɛ̀ to yaw bó lese fitele yî Klistu le ɛ̂ me le.
45016008	Ben egay tɛn Ambliyatus wvù nsaa yɛm shém wvù bee wvú nu ɛ taashɛ yî Tata le.
45016009	Ben egay Ubanus wvù nu ɛ taashɛ bee bó yî lemme di Klistu le, egay tɛn Stacis wvù nu nsaa yɛm shém e.
45016010	Ben egay Ɛbɛlɛs e. Ɛ̀ nu wee ɛ wvú duŋcɛ wase lɛ wen leeme bô Klistu tɛmyi. Ben egay tɛn bonyii bo yew dvu Alistobulus e.
45016011	Ben egay 'Ɛlodion wvù wee wɛm woŋ e, egay tɛn bonyii bò nu ɛ taashɛ yî Tata le bò nu yew dvu Nasisus e.
45016012	Ben egay tɛn Tilfena bô Tilfosa le. Ɛ̀ nu bokɛnɛ ɛ bó lemte lemme di Tata le. Ben egay Bɛsis e wvù nu fitele fiem. Ɛ̀ nu tɛn kpwoon ɛ wvú ɛ lem wase lemme di Tata le naa baay.
45016013	Ben egay Lufus wvù Tata nu ɛ caw wee we le, egay tɛn bwee wvù me njoo lɛ ɛ̀ nu tɛn bwɛɛm e.
45016014	Ben egay Asinklitus bô Fligon noo Ɛmis noo Batlobas noo Ɛmas, noo boom bo bwee wesebeene le bò nu bô bó le.
45016015	Ben egay Filologus bô Julia le, egay Nelius bô jɛme ye le. Ben egay tɛn Olimbas bô bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo Nyo' le bò nu bô bó le.
45016016	Ben egaynɛn bikuu binɛn e, eŋocɛ ɛ̂ ŋŋocɛ bonyii bo Nyo' le. Bintaashɛ bi bonyii bo mbee le bi Klistu le bicii gayte ben e.
45016017	Boom bo bwɛɛm e, me nlɛke lo ben lɛ ben eyɛnè ɛkumɛ bonyii bò too bô keŋgawsɛn jewsee ben bô n'yɛɛyi wvù kicine wvù bó to yɛɛyɛɛ ben dvú le. Ben elewtè lo boba bonyii.
45016018	Ben ekeè lɛ kɛ boba bonyii yaa lemte ɛ ɛ̀ nu Tata wesebeene wvù Klistu le kɛ. Bó lemte ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô ɛtew ɛbole. Bó joo njeme wvù yeke wvù ɛ̀ nu wvu kenlɛɛma lɛɛle bonyii bò nu sɛ bó kee fiɛɛ dvú.
45016019	No bonyii bocii nu ɛ yuw wase ɛkumɛ ben lɛ ben nu bonyii bò yuuke fiɛɛ gee, me ɛ mum ɛ no n'yuuke njoŋ bô ben. Geenɛn me ŋgomte lɛ ben efeefenè, ebii ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì jee le, yaa kɛŋke kebo fô fiɛɛ fì befe le kɛ.
45016020	Ɛ̀ shɛɛte wase caan ɛ́ Nyo' wvù ɛ̀ nu Nyo' nyɛkeey etufe Satan ɛ́ ben eben yî dvú le bô bikaa. Me nlɛke lɛ Tata wesebeene wvù Jisos Klistu ebuw ben bô kembonɛn kew ɛ́ kí enù ben ɛ bó.
45016021	Timatio wvù lemte bee wvú yî fiɛɛ le fimwaaŋ gayte ben e. Ɛ Lushus bô Jason noo Sosibata bò nu bonyii bem bo woŋ e gayte tɛn ben e.
45016022	Me wvù Tɛtius wvù Baul jemyi ɛ me nsaaŋke ŋwa' wvun, ŋgayte tɛn ben e ɛ̂ diee di Tata le.
45016023	Gayus wvù me wvù Baul cee ɛ̂ wvú yew, ɛ kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le kecii ke fɛn taashi dvú gayte ben e. Ɛ Ɛlastus wvù nu wee ntfu wvu ɛ̂ kelaante kin e, bô waa bwee wesebeene wvù diee nu Kpwatus gayte tɛn ben e.
45016024	[Tata wesebeene wvù Jisos Klistu ebuw ben bocii bô kembonɛn kew ɛ́ kí enù ben ɛ bó. Fí enù nonɛn.]
45016025	Mbense enù fô Nyo' le. Ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù nulo ege ɛ́ ben etɛmyi ntay bii no saaka wɛm wvù jee jemyi. Saaka wvù jee wvun nu wvù me nfewci ɛkumɛ Jisos Klistu. Wvú to shee nu kenyilɛ ke fiɛɛ le ɛ bó to nyilɛ ɛ ɛ̀ bɛɛ naa lo bvuyvuum e, ɛ keseen nu ɛ bó ɛ duŋcɛ wase ɛ̂ beene.
45016026	Kinyilɛ kin nu ɛ bó ɛ duŋcɛ wase. Mwɛɛm mvù bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le to saŋɛɛ nu ɛ ge wase kí ɛ buy ɛmwa fô bitum bicii le. Nyo' wvù mɛy lo nu wvù gayɛɛ lɛ bó eduŋcɛ ɛ̂ bitum bicii wvu lɛ bó elese fitele yî ye le eyuuke wvú le.
45016027	Mbense enù sekecii fô Nyo' wvun wvù ɛ̀ mɛy kɛ wvú wvù feefene le, fele yî Jisos Klistu le. Fí enù nonɛn.
46001001	Ɛ̀ nu me wvù Baul wvù Nyo' to cawɛɛ no wvú shieele lɛ me enù waa ntum Klistu Jisos. Me nu bee Sostɛnes wvù waa bwee wesebeene.
46001002	Ŋwa' wvun gɛne fô kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo Nyo' le bo Kolɛn bò wvú nu ɛ taashɛ bô bo Klistu Jisos, ɛ baa ɛ gɛɛ le. Nyo' to caw ben lɛ ben enù bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bew, no bonyii bocii bò teŋe diee di Tata Jisos Klistu le mondvuum monciim e nu. Wvú nu Tata wesebeene lɛŋlɛŋ no wvú nu wvubo.
46001003	Nyo' Icee wesebeene bô Tata Jisos Klistu ebuw ben bô kembonɛn, ebvuu enya ben bô mvuntelem mvù lɛɛtene.
46001004	Me ŋké no nyaa keyoone ɛ̂ Nyo' sekecii nje ben, njefo wvú nu ɛ buw ben, no ben nu ɛ taashɛ ben ɛ bo Klistu Jisos.
46001005	No ben nu ɛ taashɛ ben ɛ bo Klistu Jisos nonɛn, Nyo' ɛ mum ɛ tfuw lo nnya yî yene le jé le jé le, ɛfey mvunciim keekee fiɛɛ ficii, bvuu kee keejeme fiɛɛ ficii ntay.
46001006	Nnya yin fô ben e tomte lɛ saaka wvù ben to yuwɛɛ ɛkumɛ Klistu nu ɛ ben ɛ fiisɛn.
46001007	Ben ɛ no nu keseen yaa bvuu tane nnya Nyo' mi kɛ, no ben cɛyte kefew kè Tata wesebeene wvù Jisos Klistu nu ke ekase eto ɛ́ ben eyɛn wvú le.
46001008	Wvú wvù Tata wesebeene wvù Jisos Klistu nu ege ɛ́ ben eleeme tɛmyi egɛn emɛse, saa ke ekɛŋke naa jay yî diuu diew didvu le kɛ.
46001009	Nyo' nu Nyo' kecɛɛy. Ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù to cawɛɛ ben, ɛ ben ɛ bo Waa we wvù Jisos Klistu wvù nu Tata wesebeene taashɛ no nu yî fiɛɛ le fimwaaŋ.
46001010	Boom bo bwɛɛm e, me nlɛke ben ɛ̂ diee di Tata wesebeene wvù Jisos Klistu le lɛ ben bocii etaashɛ enù diuw mwaaŋ. Fo keŋgawsɛn enù ɛ̂ ben ɛntelɛŋ kɛ. Ben enù yî wee le mwaaŋ, kɛŋkè ŋkpwawcɛ mwaaŋ, lemtè yî fiɛɛ le fimwaaŋ.
46001011	Me ŋgayte nɛn boom bo bwɛɛm e, njefo bonyii bo yew dvu Kloy nu ɛ see ɛ̂ me lɛ ben shee kɛ lo waa le.
46001012	Wee nɛn'yi no duu lɛ wen bii fiwene ɛ ɛ̀ nu Baul e, ɛ wee mvu duu lɛ wen bii ɛ ɛ̀ nu Abolos e, wee mvu lɛ wen bii Sɛfas e, wee mvu lɛ wen bii kɛ fiwene ɛ ɛ̀ nu Klistu le.
46001013	Fí nu lɛ bó nu ɛ gaw wase Klistu biba le biba le? Ɛ̀ nu Baul wvù bó to taɛ yî kentam e nje ben e? Nuu lɛ bó to lese ben ɛ̂ joo ɛ̂ diee diem e lɛ?
46001014	Keyoone baay lɛ me nto mbaa enlese wee mvu ben e ɛ̂ joo ɛfey Klisbus bô Gayus kɛ,
46001015	wvu lɛ fo wee eduu lɛ bó to lese wen ɛ̂ joo ɛ̂ diee diem e kɛ.
46001016	Geenɛn, me nto nu ɛ nlese tɛn Tɛfanas bô bonyii bo yew dvu wvú ɛ̂ joo. Ɛfey nonɛn, me mbaa embvuu eŋkee wee mvu wvù me to nlesɛɛ ɛ̂ joo kɛ.
46001017	Ben ekeè lɛ kɛ Klistu to tum me lɛ me ento enleese bonyii ɛ̂ joo kɛ. Wvú to tum lɛ me ento enfewci ɛ ɛ̀ nu saaka wvù jee wvù wvu Nyo'. Ɛ me n'yaa nfewci bô bvufee bvu wee wvu wum e kɛ, wvu lɛ fo mvuŋgay mvu kpwe yì Klistu to kpweɛ yî kentam e ke etu fiɛɛ fi ɛcici kɛ.
46001018	Fí nu lɛ saaka wvù lɛ Klistu to nu ɛ kpwe yî kentam e nu keyuŋsɛɛ fô bonyii bò laa wase ɛcici le. Geenɛn, ɛ saaka wvun nu mvuŋgay mvu Nyo' le fô beene bò wvú boysee le.
46001019	Fí nu ɛ bó ɛ saŋ lɛ, “Me nu ŋke enfiwsɛ bvufee bvu bonyii bò duŋci bvufee le, embvuŋse boŋkpwawcɛ bo bonyii bò feefene le.”
46001020	No fí nu nonɛn, bonyii bò nulo ebvuu eduŋci bvufee keseen nu fɛɛ? Bonyii bò duŋci bonci bo Nyo' le nu fɛɛ? Ɛ bonyii bò beeke bombew kefew kin e nu fɛɛ? Kɛ Nyo' nu ɛ duŋcɛ wase lɛ bvufee bvu fokuse fɛn nu keyuŋ e?
46001021	Ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì Nyo' wvù kee mwɛɛm mvunciim ntay to nu ɛ ge lɛ kɛ bonyii bo yî woŋ wvun e nulo ekiɛɛ wvú bô bvubole bvufee kɛ. Wvú to seyse lɛ wen nulo eboyse ɛ ɛ̀ nu bonyii bò nu ɛ bee saaka wvù bese fewci wvun ɛ bonyii yɛne lɛ ɛ̀ nu keyuŋsɛɛ le.
46001022	Bojuu gomte keeyɛn fiɛɛ fì duŋci mvuŋgay mvu Nyo' le sɛ bee, ɛ Boglek gomte bvufee bvu fiɛɛ le sɛ bee.
46001023	Geenɛn, ɛ bese fewci fisɛse ɛkumɛ no bó to taɛ Klistu yî kentam e. Fí ɛ no saase lo Bojuu. Ɛ bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu yɛne lɛ ɛ̀ nu keyuŋsɛɛ.
46001024	Geenɛn, fô bonyii bò Nyo' nu ɛ caw e, kɛnɛɛ ɛ̀ nu Bojuu, kɛnɛɛ ɛ̀ nu Boglek nu ɛ saaka wvu ɛkumɛ Klistu wvun nu mvuŋgay mvu Nyo' le bô bvufee bvu Nyo' le bvu baay.
46001025	Fí nu nonɛn, njefo fiɛɛ fì yen'yi lɛ ɛ̀ nu keyuŋ ke Nyo' le nu ɛ ɛ̀ nu bvufee ɛ bvú fele naa lo bvu wee wvu wum e bvucii. Ɛ fiɛɛ fì yen'yi lɛ ɛ̀ nu kewɛɛyɛ ke Nyo' le nu ɛ ɛ̀ nu mvuŋgay mvu fele naa lo mvu wee wvu wum e mvunciim.
46001026	Boom bo bwɛɛm e, ben ebvuu ekpwawcɛ bonyii bò ɛ̀ to shee nu ben seke Nyo' to cawɛɛ ben. Kɛ ben nteen to nu bonyii bo bvufee le no bonyii bo fokuse fɛn gomte kɛ. Kɛ ben nteen to nu bontɛmemvuŋgay kɛ. Ɛ kɛ ben nteen to buy ɛ̂ dikfuu di bonyii bo baay baay e kɛ.
46001027	Geenɛn, ɛ Nyo' caw kɛ biyuŋ bi yî nshɛ le fɛn keege lɛ bo bvufee le ewuumɛn, caw bo wɛɛyi yî nshɛ le fɛn keege lɛ bò tɛmyi ewuumɛn.
46001028	Nyo' to nu ɛ caw mwɛɛm mvù bonyii joo ɛkuse yî woŋ wvun e, noo mwɛɛm mvù bonyii nyɛnsee, caw naa noo mwɛɛm mvù yaa nu kɛ mwɛɛm, keege lɛ mwɛɛm mvù bonyii yɛne lɛ ɛ̀ nu mwɛɛm ke etu mvu ɛcici.
46001029	Wvú to ge nonɛn, wvu lɛ fo ɛ̀ nɛlo ɛ́ wee wvu wum esaale ye ɛ̂ wvú ɛjise kɛ.
46001030	Ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù Nyo' wvù to taashɛɛ ben ɛ bo Klistu Jisos. Wvú nu ɛ ge Klistu ɛ no nu je bvufee bvu baay fô beene le, ɛ ge tɛn wvú ɛ leke beene teytey ɛ̂ wvú ɛjise, ɛ seyse beene ɛ gɛɛ bonyii bew e, ɛ sum beene can ŋgɛw e.
46001031	Fí ɛ mum ɛ no nu no bó saŋ lɛ, “Wee edioo esaale ye, no saale ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî fiɛɛ fì ɛ̀ ge Tata le.”
46002001	Boom bo bwɛɛm e, ben ekume seke me nto ntoɛ ɛ̂ ben e keenfewcɛ saaka Nyo' ɛ̂ ben wvù to shee nu ɛ̂ kenyilɛ le. Me nto mbaa ento fiem enfewci bô leme dì yeke kɛnɛɛ bvufee bwem kɛ,
46002002	njefo me nto nu ɛ nlese lo lɛ kɛ me nu eŋgɛɛ bvufee yî fiɛɛ fimew e ɛfey keenfewci kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛkumɛ Jisos Klistu maaŋ, ɛfey mvunciim, no bó to taɛ wvú yî kentam e kɛ.
46002003	No me nto nu beene, me nto n'wɛɛyi lo, nfane, nciiŋke.
46002004	Seke me nto njemyi nfewci saaka wvù jee ɛ̂ ben, me nto mbaa njemyi ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô díɛw bvufee yì yeke kɛ. Me nto njemyi ɛ ɛ̀ duŋci mvuŋgay mvu Keyoy ke Yuule le kecɛɛy kedvu.
46002005	Me nto ŋgee nonɛn, wvu lɛ fo ben elese fitele yî bvufee bvu wee wvu wum e kɛ, geenɛn lɛ ben elese ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî mvuŋgay mvu Nyo' le.
46002006	Bonyii bò nu ɛ bó leeme wase bô bo Nyo' tɛmyi, nu ɛ bese ké no nyaa bvufee ɛ̂ bó. Ɛ kɛ bvufee bvun nu bvu fokuse fɛn kɛnɛɛ naa bvu yɛɛ le wvù saake fokuse fɛn keseen kɛ. Mvuŋgay mvubole nu ke eka ela ɛcici.
46002007	Bvufee bvu Nyo' le bvu baay bvù bese fewci bvun nu fiɛɛ ɛ fí to shee nu ɛ̂ kenyilɛ le ɛ bonyii yaa kee kɛ. Bvufee bvudvu to seyse Nyo' ɛ ɛ̀ bɛɛ lo ɛ woŋ sɛ ke kɛw, keeyuu eto ege ɛ́ beene enu ɛnte jo bvukukɛ bwew.
46002008	Kɛ bvufee bvun nu ɛ wee mvu ŋgoo bonyii bò saake fokuse fɛn e to kee kenyi kedvu kɛ, njefo ɛ́ bó to bee keekee, tu bó to baa eta Tata wvù nu Nfon bvukukɛ yî kentam e kɛ.
46002009	Geenɛn, no bó to saŋɛɛ lɛ, “Mwɛɛm mvù wee ke baa yuu yɛn wase, ɛ wee ke baa yuu yuw wase, ɛ wee ke baa yuu kpwawci wase, nu mvú mvù Nyo' to seysɛɛ fô bonyii bò kooŋke wvú le.”
46002010	Nyo' nu ɛ ge Keyoy kew ɛ duŋcɛ mwɛɛm mvun ɛ̂ beene. Keyoy ke Nyo' le ké no taasse mwɛɛm mvunciim, taasse naa noo kenyilɛ ke Nyo' le,
46002011	njefo kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wee mvu ekiɛɛ fiɛɛ fì wee mvu kpwawci fô fitele fiew e ɛfey keyoy ke mwɛtɛn e kè nu yî ye le kɛ. Ɛ̀ nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wee ekiɛɛ fiɛɛ fì Nyo' kpwawci ɛfey Keyoy ke Nyo' le kɛ.
46002012	Kɛ keyoy kè Nyo' to nyaɛ ɛ̂ beene nu ke yî woŋ wvun e kɛ. Keyoy kin to nɛ fô Nyo' le keege ɛ́ beene ekeè bombuwma bocii bò Nyo' nu ɛ buw beene dvú.
46002013	Bese ɛ mum ɛ no fewci mwɛɛm mvun ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu bô díɛw yì bó yɛɛyi bô bvufee bvu wee wvu wum e kɛ. Bese fewci ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô díɛw yì ɛ̀ yɛɛyi Keyoy ke Yuule bese dvú, mum yuuse mwɛɛm mvu kecɛɛy mvu Keyoy ke Yuule le ɛ̂ bonyii bò kɛŋke Keyoy ke Yuule.
46002014	Kɛ wee wvù baa kɛŋke Keyoy ke Yuule yî ye le ké fiisɛn mwɛɛm mvu Keyoy ke Nyo' le kɛ. Wvú nɛn'yi fiew no yɛne lɛ ɛ̀ nu mwɛɛm mvu keyuŋsɛɛ le. Ɛ kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wvú ekiɛɛ no mvú nu kɛ, njefo ɛ̀ nu mwɛɛm ɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ ege kɛ Keyoy ke Nyo' le ɛ́ wee sɛ kiɛɛ.
46002015	Geenɛn, wee wvù Keyoy ke Yuule nu yî ye le nulo etasse fiɛɛ ficii ntay ekiɛɛ kenyi kedvu, ɛ kɛ wee nu dvú wvù nulo etasse mwɛɛm mvu wvuwɛ wee le kɛ.
46002016	Fí nu ɛ bó ɛ saŋ lɛ, “Kɛ wee nu dvú wvù kee fiɛɛ fì Nyo' kpwawci wvu lɛ wvú etefe Nyo' kɛ.” Geenɛn, beene kɛŋke boŋkpwawcɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu bò Klistu kɛŋke.
46003001	Boom bo bwɛɛm e, seke beene to nu, kɛ ɛ̀ to nulo ɛ́ me enjemyi ɛ̂ ben diɛwɛ ɛ̂ bonyii bò yuuke wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ Keyoy ke Yuule kɛ. Ɛ me mum no njemyi ɛ̂ ben diɛwɛ ɛ̂ bonyii bò bɛɛ bii ɛ ɛ̀ nu mwɛɛm mvù nyam ye shieele le, noo ɛ̂ bò bɛɛ diɛwɛ mvunlɛy mvu boom e yî Klistu le.
46003002	Me nto nyaa ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛmben ɛ̂ ben. Me nto mbaa nyaa mwɛɛm mvudien mvù tɛmyi kɛ, njefo ben to baa taw wase kɛ. Ɛ naa ɛ to ɛ buy keseen e nu ɛ ben baa taw wase kɛ.
46003003	Ben bɛɛ bii kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu mwɛɛm mvù nyam ye shieele le. No ben bɛɛ ghɛɛke keŋghɛw, waale diwaa, tu kɛ fifin duŋci lɛ ben bii ɛ ɛ̀ nu nyam ye le? Kɛ fifin duŋci lɛ ben bɛɛ kɛŋke gee di bonyii bo fokuse fɛn e?
46003004	Wee nɛn'yi no duu lɛ wen bii fiwene ɛ ɛ̀ nu Baul e, wee mvu lɛ wen bii ɛ ɛ̀ nu Abolos e. Kɛ fifin duŋci lɛ ben gee ɛ ɛ̀ nu gee di bonyii bo fokuse fɛn e?
46003005	Abolos nu yɛɛ, ɛ Baul nu yɛɛ? Bee wvú bocii nu kɛ lo boom bo lemme le bo Tata le bò to geɛ ɛ ben sɛ lese fitele yî ye le, ɛ wee lemte diew lemme no Tata nya ɛ̂ wvú.
46003006	Diem lemme to nu keejewe ɛ ɛ̀ nu ŋgow, ɛ di Abolos e nu keefuci joo, geenɛn ɛ ɛ̀ gee Nyo' ɛ yí sɛ kuu.
46003007	Nonɛn, kɛ wee wvù jewyi ŋgow bô wee wvù fuci joo koole fiɛɛ le kɛ. Ɛ̀ mɛy Nyo' maaŋ wvù gee ɛ yí sɛ kuu.
46003008	Wee wvù jewyi bô wvù fuci joo nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ, ɛ Nyo' nu ke emawcɛ wee tfuu bii lemme diew e.
46003009	Bese nu ɛ taashɛ ɛ no lemte lemme di Nyo' le. Ben ɛ mum ɛ no nu wɛɛ Nyo' bvuu nu yew ye.
46003010	Ɛ Nyo' mum buw me bô bvufee ɛ me nlese kenffuy ke yew yidvu le diɛwɛ wee n'yoo wvù looci kee lemme diew e. No me nto nlesɛɛ nonɛn, wee mvu ɛ mum ɛ no yoote yew yidvu. Wee edioo eyoote yî kenffuy kin e, no keè no wvú yoote.
46003011	Ben ekeè lɛ kenffuy mɛy kɛ kè bó to nu ɛ lese wase kè ɛ̀ nu Jisos Klistu, ɛ kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wee ebvuu elese kemew kɛ.
46003012	Bonyii ɛ mum ɛ no yoote yî dvú le bô mwɛɛm jɛɛy jɛɛy. Wee mvu jaa jo ɛ ɛ̀ nu ketwaa ke bigew e kè yɛɛle, ɛ wee mvu jo kè baa, ɛ wee mvu jo ɛta yò lumte sɛ no yoote dvú. Ɛ wee mvu jo ɛ ɛ̀ nu bite, wee mvu yun, wee mvu shá sɛ no yoote dvú.
46003013	Ɛ́ bó cim yoote nɛɛ, tu diuu too lo dì bó nu ke eyɛn no lemme di wee le nu seke dí ɛ buy ɛmwa Diuu dì Klistu nu ke etoo bô ŋguy, ɛ ŋguy wvudvu nu ke emomte lemme di wee le ɛ bó yɛne no dí nu.
46003014	Ɛ́ fiɛɛ fì wee yoke yî kenffuy kedvu le ke emɛy sɛ fí ɛ fie, ɛ́ mwɛtɛn emum ekɛŋkɛ mmawcɛ.
46003015	Fí ɛ fie, ɛ́ mwɛtɛn elase mmawcɛ we, ɛ́ wvú bô ɛkolɛ kew eboy, geenɛn kɛ diɛwɛ wee wvù fey ŋguy e.
46003016	Kɛ ben kee lɛ ben nu yew Nyo' ɛ Keyoy kew ke wvú wvù Nyo' le cee yî yene le le?
46003017	Ɛ́ wee befe bô yew yidvu, tu Nyo' nu ke elɛse lo mwɛtɛn, njefo ɛ̀ nu yew ɛ ɛ̀ nu yi Nyo', ɛ ben nu yew yidvu.
46003018	Fo wee elɛɛle ɛkolɛ kew kɛ. Ɛ́ wee mvu ben e kpwaake lɛ wen kɛŋke bvufee yî woŋ wvun e, ɛ́ wvú tu keyuŋ wvu lɛ wvú ekɛŋke bvufee bvu bvufee.
46003019	Me njemyi nɛn njefo mwɛɛm mvù bonyii bo fokuse fɛn yɛne lɛ ɛ̀ nu bvufee nu ɛ Nyo' yɛne ɛ ɛ̀ nu keyuŋsɛɛ. Ɛ̀ nu fí fì bó to saŋɛɛ lɛ, “Nyo' joo kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu bvufee bvu bonyii bò feefene le koole bó dvú.”
46003020	Ɛ fí bvuu nu ɛ bó ɛ saŋ lɛ, “Tata kee lɛ mwɛɛm mvù bonyii bo bvufee le kpwawci nu naa lo mvu ɛcici.”
46003021	Fí ɛ mum ɛ no nu lɛ, fo wee esaalè ye lɛ wee mvu nu wvuwen kɛ, njefo mwɛɛm mvunciim nu mvunɛn.
46003022	Baul kɛnɛɛ Abolos kɛnɛɛ Sɛfas kɛnɛɛ woŋ wvun kɛnɛɛ nshii kɛnɛɛ kpwe kɛnɛɛ mwɛɛm mvu keseen kɛnɛɛ mvu bɛɛ sɛ keeke eto, nu mvunɛn mvunciim,
46003023	ɛ ben nu bo Klistu le, ɛ Klistu nu wvu Nyo'.
46004001	Fí be jee lɛ ben ejoò lɛ bese nu boom bo lemme le bo Klistu le bò Nyo' nu ɛ nya lemme diew di saaka wvù to shee nu ɛ̂ kenyilɛ le can yibole.
46004002	Fí ɛ mum ɛ no nu lɛ, wee wvù bó nu ɛ nya lemme can ye le kɛŋke keegee no cee ɛkolɛ we gomte.
46004003	Fô me le, kɛ ben, kɛnɛɛ yew nsaw mi saake me ɛ́ me en'yɛne lɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ kɛ. Kɛ ɛ̀ cim nulo ɛ́ me ensaw ɛkolɛ kem kɛ.
46004004	Kɛ fiɛɛ nu dvú fô fitele fiem e fì saake me kɛ. Geenɛn, kɛ fifiɛ mum duŋci lɛ me n'yuule lo kɛ. Ɛ̀ nu kɛ Tata wvù nu ke esaw me.
46004005	Nonɛn, fo ben emum esumtene nsaw sɛ kefew ɛ kocɛn kɛ. Ben ecɛy Tata ɛ́ wvú ke eto. Ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù nu ke ebvuse ɛmwa mwɛɛm mvù nu keseen ɛ bó ɛ nyilɛ ɛ̂ ɛjiwɛ le, ebwaashɛ mwɛɛm mvù bonyii kɛŋke shém yibole. Nonɛn, ɛ́ Nyo' emum ke ebɛnse wee tfuu wvù bó kɛŋke keebɛnse.
46004006	Boom bo bwɛɛm e, mwɛɛm mvun mvù me njemyi ɛkumɛ bee Abolos nu keefi ben, wvu lɛ ben eyɛɛyi fô bese le keegee fiɛɛ bii kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì bó nu ɛ saŋ e. Nonɛn, ɛ́ ben saa ebvuu esaale ye bô wee mvu joo wee mvu ɛkuse kɛ.
46004007	Ɛ̀ ge yɛɛ lɛ wo enu jɛɛy fô wee mvu le? Ɛ̀ nu la fì wo kɛŋke fì nu sɛ bó nya lo ɛ̂ wo? No fí nu nonɛn, wo ɛ ghan nɛɛ ɛ sɛ no saale ye kɛ diɛwɛ kɛ bó nya lo ɛ̂ wo kɛ?
46004008	Kɛ ben fɛn joo lɛ ben kɛŋke wase fiɛɛ ficii, nu wase bonyii bo bvukukɛ le, saake wase diɛwɛ bonfon e sɛ bese? Wee ejo ɛ ben be nu wase bonfon wvu lɛ bese eboŋ fô ben e ɛ́ beene esaake bocii.
46004009	Me n'yɛne lɛ Nyo' nu ɛ kaa ɛ gɛɛ bese bò nu boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e bincilɛjimɛ le. Bese nu diɛwɛ bonyii bò bó gɛne keeyuwyɛ ya le. Bese nu ɛ tu wase kenjiŋjiŋ yî woŋ wvun e kè bonyii bô bonceendaa bo Nyo' le etaalè.
46004010	Bese nu ɛ tu wase biyuŋ nje Klistu, geenɛn ɛ ben nu bonyii bo Klistu le bò feefene. Bese nu bonyii bò wɛɛyi, ɛ ben nu bò tɛmyi. Bonyii wvumte ben, joo bese ɛkuse.
46004011	Ɛ kɛw lo ɛ to ɛ buy keseen e, nu ɛ bese nu jeŋ, ɛ kendoŋ yumte bese. Bese jiise ɛ ɛ̀ nu bincaanca bi ndvú le, ɛ bonyii nyɛwle bô bese, ɛ bese yaa kɛŋke fo nce kɛ.
46004012	Ɛ̀ katene bese lemte bô can yese sɛ diee fiɛɛ. Bonyii dioo nan'yi bese, ɛ bese no lɛke ɛ ɛ̀ nu kembonɛn fô bó le. Ɛ́ bó dioo bone bikaa ɛ̂ bese ɛjim, ɛ́ bese kuu kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu shém.
46004013	Ɛ́ bó dioo jemyi díɛw yì befe ɛ̂ bese, ɛ́ bese no tfuuse ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô yì lɛɛtene. Ɛ to ɛ buy keseen e, bese nu diɛwɛ mwɛɛm mvù bó laŋ ɛŋkoŋ. Bese nu ɛ tu wase binfo bi mwɛɛm e yî woŋ wvun e.
46004014	Kɛ me nsaaŋke mwɛɛm mvun ɛ̂ ben nɛn lɛ me ŋgomte lɛ ben ewuumene kɛ. Me nteete lo ben diɛwɛ boom bem bò nu fitele fiem e.
46004015	Ɛ́ ben cim kɛŋke naa bonyii nteen bò yɛɛyi ben ɛkumɛ Klistu, tu kɛ ɛ̀ mum nu lɛ ben kɛŋke bo'icen nteen kɛ. Ɛ̀ nu me wvù icee wene, njefo ɛ̀ to ge me ɛ ben sɛ taashɛ ben ɛ bo Klistu Jisos seke me nto nfewcɛɛ saaka we wvù jee ɛ̂ ben.
46004016	Nonɛn, me ɛ mum ɛ no nlɛke lɛ ben etomyì ɛkalɛ kenɛn kɛ naa no me ntomyi kem.
46004017	Ɛ̀ nu shiee wvù me ntum Timatio fô ben e wvù nu waa wɛm yî Tata le. Wvú nu fitele fiem, ɛ wvú leeme tɛn yî saaka wvun e bô fitele fimwaaŋ. Wvú nu ke eto ebvuu etamcɛ ben no nce wɛm diɛwɛ wee Klistu le nu. Fiɛɛ fì wvú nu ke esee nu kɛ fí fì me ŋghane n'yɛɛyi bintaashɛ bi bonyii bo mbee le bicii dvú mondvuum e monciim.
46004018	Bonyii bomew nu ɛ kɛw wase ɛ no bensee ye njefo bó kpwaake lɛ kɛ me mbɛɛ ŋke ento ɛ̂ ben e kɛ.
46004019	Geenɛn, ɛ́ Tata beŋe lo, tu ɛ̀ shɛke caan ɛ́ me embvuu ento. Ɛ́ me nu ndioo ɛ nto, nsɛ n'yɛn lɛ laa bonyii bò bensee ye bodvu kumte kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu diuw nuu bó kɛŋke mvuŋgay mvù nɛ fô Nyo' le lɛ,
46004020	njefo kɛ bvunfon bvu Nyo' le nu fiɛɛ fi diuw wvù kumɛn e kɛ. Ɛ̀ nu fi mvuŋgay mwew e.
46004021	Ben shieele lɛ me ŋke entoo nɛɛ? Ben shieele lɛ me ŋke entoo bô ŋgbwan nuu bô fitele fi keŋkoŋɛn e noo nyɛkeey ɛ?
46005001	Me ŋkɛŋke lo ŋghaw keen'yuw lɛ wee mvu ɛ̂ ben ɛnte nu ɛ kɛw wase nce nnyɛn kenjaŋ. Ɛ nnyɛn kenjaŋ yin nu naa yì ɛ̀ yaa nulo ɛ́ wee wvù yaa kee kɛ Nyo' emom kɛ. Me n'yuuke lɛ wee mvu ɛ̂ ben ɛnte joo kpwɛɛ ice.
46005002	Ben yɛn kfuu yin nnyɛn e nɛn, ɛ faŋɛ yaa ebeele lo, ɛ no bensee ɛ ɛ̀ nu ye le? Ben kɛŋke keebvuse lo kfuu wvuwɛ wee wvù mom fifiɛ fiɛɛ ɛ̂ ben ɛnte.
46005003	Naa no me mbaa enu beene ɛjise, nu ɛ me nu kɛ beene ɛ̂ keyoy e lɛŋlɛŋ diɛwɛ me nu beene. Me nu ɛ nsumtɛn wase nsaw
46005004	ɛ̂ diee di Tata wesebeene wvù Jisos e ɛkumɛ wee wvù mom kfuu fifiɛ fiɛɛ. Ben ke dioo ɛ shii, ɛ me nu beene ɛ̂ keyoy e, ɛ mvuŋgay mvu Tata wesebeene wvù Jisos e nu tɛn fó,
46005005	ɛ ben jo wee wvudvu, nya can Satan e, ɛ́ wvú ebefe bô nyam ye ye, ɛ́ keyoy kew ke eboy diuu dì Tata wesebeene wvù Jisos nu ke ekase eto le.
46005006	Ben saale ye nɛn ɛ fí yaa jee kɛ. Kɛ ben kee lɛ bó ke joo fintuŋlɛɛn nɛn caan tow ɛ̂ mvuum e, ɛ fí mum ge ɛ mvuum modvu monciim ben e?
46005007	Ben ebvuse fintuŋlɛɛn fì ɛ̀ nu nce wvu yvum ɛ̂ ben ɛnte, ɛ́ ben emum enu bonyii bò bofɛ diɛwɛ mvuum mò bó baa gɛɛ fintuŋlɛɛn jó le kɛ, ɛ ɛ̀ nu naa no ben nu. Kɛ ben kee lɛ Klistu nu Waa Njee wvù Nyo' to geɛ ncese dvú fô beene le kɛ diɛwɛ wvù bó ké no sɛɛle seke Ŋkaw Daŋɛfey e le?
46005008	Nonɛn, beene nu diɛwɛ bonyii bò diee Ŋkaw Daŋɛfey e ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô blɛɛd wvù bó baa gɛɛ fintuŋlɛɛn jó wvù ɛ̀ nu mvuntelem mvù yuule noo kecɛɛy. Fo beene enù diɛwɛ bonyii bò diee Ŋkaw wvun ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô blɛɛd wvu bvuyvuum e wvù bó nu ɛ gɛɛ fintuŋlɛɛn jó wvù ɛ̀ nu nce wvù befe noo keŋge kè befe kɛ.
46005009	Ɛ̂ ŋwa' wvù me nto saŋɛɛ fô ben e, nu ɛ me nto nsaŋ lɛ fo ben etaashì ben ɛ bonyii bò jaaŋke kenjaŋ kɛ.
46005010	Kɛ me nto njemyi ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛkumɛ bonyii bo ɛ̂ woŋ jan bò jaaŋke kenjaŋ, kɛnɛɛ bò yɛɛle ɛjisɛ yî mwɛɛm e, kɛnɛɛ bò ŋgoyte mondvuum joo mwɛɛm mvu bonyii le, kɛnɛɛ bò bunlee bonyo' bo ɛcici kɛ. Ɛ́ ɛ̀ nu boba, ɛ́ ben ekɛŋke keenɛ lo yî woŋ wvun e.
46005011	Me nto njemyi ɛ ɛ̀ nu lɛ fo ben etaashì ben ɛ bo wee wvù teŋe ɛkolɛ kew lɛ wen nu waa bwee wesebeene yî Klistu le, bvuu jaaŋke kenjaŋ, kɛnɛɛ yɛɛle ɛjisɛ yî mwɛɛm e, kɛnɛɛ bunlee bonyo' bo ɛcici, kɛnɛɛ nan'yi bonyii, kɛnɛɛ wuu mbvuum ɛ mó koole, kɛnɛɛ ŋgoyte mondvuum joo mwɛɛm mvu bonyii le kɛ. Fo wee emom naa lo ediekɛn bô kfuu wvuwɛ wee kɛ.
46005012	Kɛ ɛ̀ nu bvudvuu bvusɛɛbeene keesaake bonyii bò yaa nu ɛ̂ kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le ɛnte kɛ. Bonyii bò ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ beene esaake nu bò nu ɛ̂ kentaashɛ ɛnte.
46005013	Ɛ̀ nu fí fì Ŋwa' Nyo' gayte lɛ, “Ben ebvuse wee wvù kɛŋke keŋge kè befe ɛ̂ ben ɛnte.” Ɛ̀ nu ke esaw Nyo' bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ ɛ̂ kentaashɛ le.
46006001	Kɛ fí baa enu lɛŋ lɛ ɛ́ wee ɛ̂ ben ɛnte kɛŋke fiɛɛ bô waa bwee, ɛ́ wvú fey keegɛn shomse fwe dvu bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo Nyo' le, kaa gɛn dvú ɛ ɛ̀ nu fwe dvu bonyii bò yaa gee mwɛɛm teytey kɛ.
46006002	Kɛ ben kee lɛ bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo Nyo' le nu ke esaw bonyii bo yî woŋ wvun e le? No ɛ̀ nu ke esaw ben bó, tu kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ ben esaw mwɛɛm mvu wɛmewɛme ɛ̂ ben ɛnte?
46006003	Kɛ ben kee lɛ beene nu ke esaw bonceendaa bo Nyo' le le? No fí nu nonɛn, tu ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ ben ekee naa ntay keesaw mwɛɛm mvù kooyi yî nshii wvu keseen e.
46006004	Mwɛɛm diɛwɛ mvumwɛ le ɛ dioo kooyi, ben ɛ ghan nɛɛ ɛ sɛ no joo gɛne dvú ɛ ɛ̀ nu fwe dvu bonyii bò baa kɛŋke naa lo bvudvuu ɛnte jo kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le?
46006005	Ben ewuumɛn. Ɛ̀ fɛn nu lɛ kɛ wee nu naa lo dvú ɛ̂ ben ɛnte wvù kɛŋke bvufee keesumtɛn nsaw wee bô wee le?
46006006	Ben kaa nɛn'yi ɛ wee jo waa bwee gɛn shomse, shomse ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ bo mbee le.
46006007	Ben keenu bvuu kɛŋke bonsaw ɛ̂ ben ɛnte duŋci lɛ ben nu ɛ gbwe wase. Kɛ ben nulo ecinɛ ɛ́ egee bonyii bomew mwɛɛm mvù befe fô ben e le? Ɛ kɛ ɛ̀ nulo tɛn ɛ́ ben ecinɛ ɛ́ efiike bonyii bomew ben e?
46006008	Geenɛn, ɛ̀ kaa nɛn'yi ben gee mwɛɛm mvù befe bvuu fiike kenfiw, ɛfey mvunciim, ɛ wee no gee mvumvun mwɛɛm ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô waa bwee.
46006009	Kɛ ben kee lɛ kɛ bonyii bò gee mwɛɛm mvù befe yaa nu ke ekɛŋkɛ bvudvuu ɛnte jo bvunfon bvu Nyo' le le? Fo ben elɛɛlè bikuu binɛn kɛ. Kɛ bonyii bò jaaŋke kenjaŋ, kɛnɛɛ bò bunlee bonyo' bo ɛcici, kɛnɛɛ bò jaaŋke bokɛ' bo bonyii bomew e, kɛnɛɛ bolemsɛ bò kaase joo bomew, kɛnɛɛ bokɛnɛ bò kaase joo bomew,
46006010	kɛnɛɛ bocooŋ, kɛnɛɛ bonyii bò yɛɛle ɛjisɛ yî mwɛɛm e, kɛnɛɛ bò wuu mbvuum ɛ mó koole, kɛnɛɛ bò nan'yi bonyii, kɛnɛɛ bò ŋgoyte mondvuum joo mwɛɛm mvu bonyii le, nu ke ekɛŋkɛ bvudvuu ɛnte jo bvunfon bvu Nyo' le kɛ.
46006011	Mwɛɛm mvun nu mvù ben bomew to gee fwele. Geenɛn, ɛ Nyo' ke cukɛ ben, caw gɛɛ, ɛ ben no nu teytey ɛ̂ wvú ɛjise. Wvú to ge mwɛɛm mvun bô mvuŋgay mvu diee di Tata Jisos Klistu le bô mvu Keyoy kew ke wvú wvù Nyo' wesebeene le.
46006012	Wee nulo eduu lɛ wen kɛŋke mvuŋgay keege fiɛɛ ficii fì wen kooŋke. Geenɛn, me ɛ no ŋgayte lɛ kɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ ficii fì nulo efi wee kɛ. Ɛ wee nulo eduu kɛ lɛ wen kɛŋke mvuŋgay keege fiɛɛ ficii fì wen kooŋke. Geenɛn me ɛ no ŋgayte kɛ lɛ, kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me encinɛ ɛ́ fiɛɛ fimew ejo me etfuse ɛ́ me entu nfwa fí kɛ.
46006013	Wee mvu tɛn nulo eduu lɛ, “Mwɛɛm mvudien nu nje tee, ɛ tee nu nje mwɛɛm mvudien.” Geenɛn ben ekeè lɛ Nyo' nu ke ebefe bô mvú mvunciim. Kɛ ye wee nu yì bó ejaaŋke kenjaŋ dvú kɛ. Ye wee nu ɛ ɛ̀ nu keelemte dvú fô Tata le, ɛ ɛ̀ kɛŋke wvú wvù Tata ye yidvu.
46006014	No Nyo' to bvusɛɛ Tata wesebeene yî kpwe le, nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no wvú nu ke ebvuse beene bô mvuŋgay mwew mvudvu yî kpwe le.
46006015	Kɛ ben kee lɛ ye yene nu biba bi ye Klistu le le? Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wee ebvuu ege nɛɛ sɛ jo keba ke ye Klistu le egɛn etaashɛ bô kpwoon nsake? Kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ fí enù nonɛn kɛ.
46006016	Kɛ ben kee lɛ ɛ́ wee taashi wase ye ye bô kpwoon nsake tu bô wvú nu wase ye miaaŋ e? Ɛ̀ nu fí fì bó to saŋɛɛ lɛ, “Kpwoon bô diemsɛn ké taashi, mum tu wase wee mwaaŋ.”
46006017	Geenɛn, wee wvù taashi bô Tata nu ɛ bô wvú nu wase fiɛɛ fimwaaŋ ɛ̂ keyoy e.
46006018	Ben elewtè nce nnyɛn kenjaŋ. Mwɛɛm mvù befe mvumew mvù wee gee nu ɛ kɛ wvú gee ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî ye ye le kɛ. Geenɛn, wee wvù jaaŋke kenjaŋ gee kebefɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô ye ye.
46006019	Kɛ ben kee lɛ ye yene nu yew yì Keyoy ke Yuule kè Nyo' nya ɛ̂ ben cee dvú le? Kɛ ɛ̀ kɛŋke ben bikuu binɛn kɛ.
46006020	Bó to guy lo ben kenlum e. Nonɛn, ben egeè mwɛɛm bô ye yene ɛ ɛ̀ nu mvù etoò bô mbense fô Nyo' le.
46007001	Me nu enya ntfuse keseen ɛkumɛ mwɛɛm mvù ben to saŋɛɛ fô me le. Fí jee lɛ fo wee ekum kpwoon e kɛ.
46007002	Geenɛn, no mmom yì ɛkumɛ kenjaŋ nu ɛkfuŋ, fí jee lɛ diemsɛn ekɛŋkè we kpwoon ɛ kpwoon kɛŋke we diemsɛn.
46007003	Ɛ diemsɛn kɛŋke keegee diew lemme di diemsɛn e fô kpwɛse le, ɛ kpwɛse kɛŋke keegee tɛn diew lemme di kpwoon e fô dweese le.
46007004	Kɛ ɛ̀ bvuu kɛŋke kpwoon mvuŋgay fô ɛkolɛ kew e kɛ, ɛ̀ kɛŋke dweese. Ɛ̀ nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no kɛ ɛ̀ bvuu kɛŋke diemsɛn mvuŋgay fô ɛkolɛ kew e kɛ, ɛ̀ kɛŋke kpwɛse.
46007005	Fo wee ebase jim ɛ̂ wee le ɛ ɛ̀ baa nu lɛ ɛ̀ seyse ben bocii ɛ bee, ɛ ben nu ege nonɛn kɛ yî kefew e, wvu lɛ ben nulo emum enya bikuu binɛn sekekiɛ yî bunle le kɛ. Ɛ́ ben dioo ɛ ge nonɛn, mum kase no nu yî kentaashɛ kenɛn e no ben se shee nu, wvu lɛ fo Satan ke enɛ eteeyi ben njefo kɛ ben yaa kee keekemsɛn bô bikuu binɛn kɛ.
46007006	Me njemyi fin kɛ diɛwɛ ntefe le, kɛ ɛ̀ nu nci ɛ me nyaa ɛ̂ ben kɛ.
46007007	Ɛ́ ɛ̀ be nu diɛwɛ me, ɛ́ me enshieele lɛ wee tfuu enu sɛ kpwoon kɛ diɛwɛ no me nu. Geenɛn, etu ege nɛɛ ɛ wee tfuu kɛŋke kɛ ye nnya yì Nyo' nu ɛ nya ɛ̂ wvú. Wee mvu kɛŋke yin nnya ɛ wee mvu kɛŋke ye.
46007008	Keseen, fô bonyii bò bɛɛ bó ɛmbeŋ e noo bò nu bokɛ' bo boŋkfu le, me ɛ no ŋgayte lɛ, fí jee lɛ bó emɛy nu bó ɛmbeŋ kɛ diɛwɛ me le.
46007009	Geenɛn, ɛ́ bó nu sɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó ewensɛn bô ye, ɛ́ wee gom kpwoon kɛnɛɛ diemsɛn ɛ bô wvú taashɛ no nu, njefo fí jee keetaashɛ enu nonɛn, ɛfey keekpwee bô ye yì ŋɛyɛɛn.
46007010	Fô bonyii bò nu wase yéw e, me ɛ no ŋgayte lɛ kpwoon eyɛnè fô wvú egawsɛn bô dweese. Kɛ wvun nu nci ɛ wvú buy ɛ̂ me kɛ. Wvú buy ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ Tata.
