46007011	Geenɛn, ɛ́ wvú gawsɛn lo, tu wvú kɛŋke keemɛy enu wvú ɛmbeŋ. Ɛ́ ɛ̀ baa nu nonɛn, ɛ́ wvú kase tu yew dvu dweese ɛ bô wvú mancɛ mwɛɛm mum no nu. Ɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ tɛn fí fì me ŋgayte ɛ̂ bolemsɛ lɛ kɛ diemsɛn kɛŋke keekuŋ kpwɛse kɛ.
46007012	Fô bomew bonyii le nu ɛ me ŋgayte ɛ̂ bó lɛ, ɛ́ wee wvù nu wee mbee kɛŋke kpwoon ɛ kpwoon wvudvu yaa nu kɛ wee mbee, ɛ kpwoon wvudvu kooŋke lɛ bô wvú enu, fo diemsɛn wvudvu ebvuse wvú kɛ. Fifin nu ɛ ɛ̀ gayte me. Kɛ ɛ̀ gayte Tata kɛ.
46007013	Kpwoon ɛ́ no kɛŋke dweese ɛ diemsɛn wvudvu yaa nu kɛ wee mbee, ɛ wvú kooŋke lɛ bô wvú enu, fo kpwoon wvudvu ebuy tɛn kɛ.
46007014	Me njemyi nonɛn, njefo ɛ́ diemsɛn wvù yaa nu kɛ wee mbee kɛŋke kpwɛse ɛ ɛ̀ nu wee mbee, tu Nyo' joo kɛ wase wvú diɛwɛ wee we le nje kpwɛse. Kpwoon tɛn wvù yaa nu kɛ wee mbee ɛ́ no kɛŋke dweese ɛ ɛ̀ nu wee mbee, tu Nyo' joo kɛ wase wvú diɛwɛ wee we le nje dweese. Ɛ́ ɛ̀ baa nu nonɛn, tu kɛ boom bobole yuule kɛ. Geenɛn, no fí nu, nu ɛ bó yuule.
46007015	Ɛ́ wee wvù yaa nu kɛ wee mbee nɛ ɛ no shieele keegawsɛn, ɛ́ bó cinɛ dvú. Ɛ́ fí kooy nonɛn fo diemsɛn kɛnɛɛ kpwoon wvù nu wee mbee ekpwaake lɛ wen kɛŋke kɛ keenu bô wvú kɛ. Nyo' to teŋe beene lɛ beene eceè ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî nyɛkeey e.
46007016	Wo wvù kpwoon, wo kee fɛɛ lɛ kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wo ke ege ɛ́ Nyo' eboyse dwee wo? Ɛ wo wvù diemsɛn kee tɛn fɛɛ lɛ kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wo ke ege ɛ́ Nyo' eboyse kpwɛɛ wo?
46007017	Fiɛɛ fì nu, nu kɛ lɛ wee eceè nce ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvù Tata nu ɛ nya ɛ̂ wvú. Wvú enù kɛ no Nyo' to teŋɛɛ wvú ɛ wvú nu. Fin nu fiɛɛ fì me nteete bintaashɛ bi bonyii bo mbee le dvú mondvuum e monciim.
46007018	Ɛ́ wee nu ɛ bó to teŋe wvú ɛ bó ɛ tfuse wase wvú yew, fo wvú egomtè keenu diɛwɛ wee wvù bɛɛ ntffuse le kɛ. Ɛ́ wee nu dvú wvù bó to teŋɛɛ wvú ɛ wvú bɛɛ ntffuse, fo wvú egomtè lɛ bó etfuse wvú yew keseen kɛ,
46007019	njefo ɛ́ wee nu ɛ bó ɛ tfuse wvú yew kɛnɛɛ bó baa tfuse kɛ, tu kɛ fifiɛ kɛŋke fiɛɛ keege kɛ. Fiɛɛ fì nu shiee le nu lɛ wee egɛɛlè bonci bo Nyo' le.
46007020	Wee tfuu emɛy kɛ enù no Nyo' to teŋɛɛ wvú ɛ wvú nu.
46007021	Ɛ́ bó to teŋe wo ɛ wo nu nfwa, fo wo ebuukè kɛ. Geenɛn, ɛ́ wo kɛŋke je keebuy bvunfaw e, ɛ́ wo buy fiuw.
46007022	Ben ekeè lɛ wee wvù Tata to teŋɛɛ ɛ wvú nu nfwa nu ɛ wvú buy wase bvunfaw e fô Tata le. Ɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ tɛn no wee wvù bó to teŋɛɛ ɛ wvú yaa nu kɛ nfwa, nu wase keseen nfwa fô Klistu le.
46007023	Bó to guy lo ben kenlum e. Fo ben enù bonfaw bo bonyii le kɛ.
46007024	Nonɛn, boom bo bwɛɛm e, wee emɛy kɛ enù bô Nyo' ɛ̂ je yì wvú to teŋɛɛ wvú ɛ wvú nu jó le.
46007025	Keseen, ɛkumɛ fi bokɛnɛ kɛnɛɛ bolemsɛ bò bɛɛ bokpwɛɛ le, nu ɛ kɛ Tata nu ɛ see fiɛɛ fì me eŋgay kɛ. Geenɛn, ɛ me nu enya wɛm ŋkpwawcɛ diɛwɛ wee wvù Tata nu ɛ koo shen fô wvú le ɛ wee nɛlo ebee fiɛɛ fì wvú gayte le.
46007026	Me ŋkpwaake lɛ nje ŋgɛw wvù nu keseen, nu ɛ fí jee lɛ wee emɛy kɛ enù no wvú nu.
46007027	Ɛ́ wee kɛŋke wase kpwoon, fo wvú ebvuu egomtè keekuŋ wvú kɛ. Wee ɛ́ no nu sɛ kpwoon, fo wvú ebvuu egomtè kpwoon kɛ.
46007028	Geenɛn, ɛ́ diemsɛn yɛn lɛ wen nu etaashɛ bô kpwoon ɛ́ bô wvú enu, tu wvú baa ge kebefɛ kɛ. Ŋgon kpwoon ɛ gɛn ɛ̂ diemsɛn e, tu wvú baa ge tɛn kebefɛ kɛ. Geenɛn, ben ekeè lɛ bonyii bò nu ɛ taashɛ nu ɛ bó nu ke ekɛŋke boŋgɛw yî woŋ wvun e, ɛ fô me le nu ɛ me ŋgomte keeŋgemŋgem ben yî fifin e.
46007029	Boom bo bwɛɛm e, fiɛɛ fì me njemyi nu lɛ kefew kfufe wase baay keejewsee yî mwɛɛm mvu yî nshɛ le fɛn e. Ɛ kɛw yî keseen e ɛ gɛn lo, bonyii bò kɛŋke wase bokɛnɛ enù diɛwɛ kɛ bó kɛŋke kɛ.
46007030	Ɛ́ bonyii bò beele kpwe enù diɛwɛ kɛ bó beele kɛ, ɛ́ bò laŋlaŋe enù diɛwɛ kɛ fiɛɛ jee bó le kɛ, ɛ́ bò guyte mwɛɛm enù diɛwɛ bó baa kɛŋke naa lo fiɛɛ kɛ.
46007031	Ɛ́ bonyii bò gee mwɛɛm yî woŋ wvun e enù diɛwɛ kɛ bó kɛŋke naa lo fiɛɛ keege bô woŋ wvun kɛ. Me njemyi nɛn, njefo woŋ wvun no wvú nu keseen nɛn, nu ɛ wvú fele lo.
46007032	Me ŋgomte lɛ ben enù ɛ fiɛɛ yaa jewsee ben kɛ. Wee wvù nu sɛ kpwoon ké no gɛɛle bvufee yî saaka wvu ɛkumɛ Tata le no ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wvú egeè kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì Tata eyuuke njoŋ bô wvú.
46007033	Ɛ wee wvù kɛŋke kpwoon ké no gɛɛle bvufee ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî mwɛɛm mvu yî woŋ wvun e no ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wvú egee fiɛɛ fì ye ejee kpwɛse.
46007034	Ɛ wvú mum no nu ɛ bvufee bwew ɛ gawsɛn. Ɛ̀ nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no fi kpwoon kɛnɛɛ ŋgon kpwoon wvù baa kɛŋke diemsɛn e nu. Wvú ké no gɛɛle bvufee yî saaka wvu ɛkumɛ Tata le no ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wvú enya ɛkolɛ kew bô fitele fiew ficii ɛ̂ wvú. Ɛ wvù kɛŋke diemsɛn ké no gɛɛle bvufee ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî mwɛɛm mvu yî woŋ wvun e no ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wvú egeè fiɛɛ fì ye ejee dweese.
46007035	Me njemyi nɛn kɛ keenfi lo ben. Kɛ ɛ̀ nu lɛ me ŋgomte keembaŋ je fô wee mvu le kɛ. Me ŋgomte ɛ ɛ̀ nu lɛ wee ekiɛɛ fiɛɛ fì nu lɛŋ, wvu lɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wvú elemte fô Tata le bô fitele fimwaaŋ ɛ bvufee bwew baa gawsɛn kɛ.
46007036	Ɛ́ diemsɛn leyte wan kpwoon, ɛ nɛ ɛ no yɛne lɛ gee diwene fô wan kpwoon wvudvu le baa nu lɛŋ kɛ, ɛ ye ŋɛyte wase wvú baay, ɛ fí nu kɛ lɛ bó etaashɛ enu, ɛ́ wvú ge no wvú shieele, taashɛ bô kpwoon wvudvu. Tu wvú baa ge kebefɛ kɛ.
46007037	Geenɛn, diemsɛn wvù nu ɛ lese lo fô fitele fiew e lɛ kɛ wen nu etaashɛ enu bô kpwoon wvù wvú leyte kɛ, ɛ wee yaa kane wvú lɛ bó etaashɛ kɛ, ɛ wvú wensene tɛn bô ye ye, ɛ lese lo fô fitele fiew e lɛ kɛ bô wvù nu etaashɛ kɛ, tu wvú nu ɛ ge lɛŋ.
46007038	Fí mum ɛ̀ no nu lɛ, wee wvù nu ɛ taashɛ ɛ no nu bô kpwɛse wvù wvú leyte nu ɛ ge kɛ lɛŋ. Geenɛn, wee wvù baa taashɛ bô we kpwɛse nu ɛ ge naa lɛŋ baay.
46007039	Kpwoon ké no nu kpwɛɛ wee seke dweese bɛɛ dvú. Geenɛn, ɛ́ dweese nɛlo ɛ kpwe, tu ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wvú egɛn ɛ̂ diemsɛn mvu le wvù wvú shieele ɛ́ bô wvú etaashɛ enu, ɛ wvuwɛ wee kɛŋke keenu wee Tata.
46007040	Geenɛn, no me n'yɛne fiem nu ɛ́ kpwoon wvudvu mɛy lo nonɛn, ɛ́ wvú eyuuke lo njoŋ baay. Me njemyi nɛn, ɛ me ŋkee lɛ me ŋkɛŋke tɛn Keyoy ke Nyo' le.
46008001	Me nu njeme keseen ɛkumɛ mwɛɛm mvudien mvù bonyii gee bintaŋe dvú fô bonyo' le. Ɛ̀ nu kecɛɛy no bó duu lɛ beene bocii kɛŋke bvufee. Bvubvun bvufee nulo ege ɛ́ wee ebensee ɛ ɛ̀ nu ye. Geenɛn, ɛ keŋkoŋɛn ké no yoote lo.
46008002	Ɛ́ wee nɛ ɛ no kpwaake lɛ wen kee mwɛɛm, ɛ́ wvú no kee lɛ wvú baa looci wase kee no wvú kɛŋke keekee kɛ.
46008003	Geenɛn, ɛ́ wee kooŋke Nyo', ɛ́ Nyo' no kee mwɛtɛn.
46008004	Nonɛn, fi ɛkumɛ keediee mwɛɛm mvudien mvù bó nu ɛ ge kentaŋe dvú fô bonyo' le nu ɛ beene kee lo lɛ kɛ bonyo' ban nu naa lo fiɛɛ kɛ. Nyo' mɛy kɛ mwaaŋ ɛ wvumvu yaa bvuu nu dvú kɛ.
46008005	Bonyii bomew joo lɛ bonyo' bomew nu dvú fowe kɛnɛɛ fokuse fɛn. Ɛ ɛ̀ nu kecɛɛy lɛ bonyii joo lɛ bonyo' nu nteen, ɛ bocee ɛkolɛ nu tɛn nteen.
46008006	No bó cim joo nonɛn nu ɛ fô beene le nu ɛ Nyo' mɛy kɛ mwaaŋ. Ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù nu Icee wesebeene wvù to bomɛɛ mwɛɛm mvunciim. Ɛ beene cee ɛ ɛ̀ nu nje ye. Ɛ Cee Ɛkolɛ mɛy kɛ tɛn mwaaŋ wvù ɛ̀ nu Jisos Klistu. Ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù bó to bomɛɛ mwɛɛm mvunciim fele can ye le, ɛ beene kɛŋke tɛn nshii fele yî ye le.
46008007	Fifin nu fiɛɛ ɛ ɛ̀ baa nu bonyii bocii ɛ̂ beene ɛnte bò kee kɛ. Bonyii bomew bò to shee gee bintaŋe fô bonyo' bodvu le nɛn'yi dioo diee kfuu mvumwɛ mwɛɛm mvudien keseen no kpwaake kɛ lɛ bó bɛɛ diee ɛ ɛ̀ nu naa mwɛɛm mvù bó nu ɛ ge kentaŋe dvu fô bonyo' bodvu le. Ɛ mvuntelem mvubole mvu wɛɛyi mum no saake bó lɛ mwɛɛm mvudien mvudvu nu ɛ befe bô bó.
46008008	Ben ekeè lɛ kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ mwɛɛm mvudien ege ɛ́ beene enu jɛɛy ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛjise kɛ. Kɛ beene nu sɛ bó ɛ die ɛ́ fifiɛ ekɛŋke fiɛɛ keege kɛ. Beene ɛ die, jɛɛy jɛɛy saa enu kɛ.
46008009	Fiɛɛ fì nu, nu kɛ lɛ ben bò kee mwɛɛm mvun eyɛnè fo wee ke nɛ ejo mvuŋgay mvù wee kɛŋke keege fiɛɛ fì wvú kooŋke dvú, ege ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì waa bwee wvù wɛɛyi egbwe lo kɛ.
46008010	Ɛ́ wvuwɛ wee wvù fitele wɛɛyi yɛn ɛ wo wvù kee mwɛɛm, diekene bvudvuu bvù bó gee bintaŋe fô bonyo' le, wvú saa ekooŋke tɛn keediee mwɛɛm mvudien mvù bó gee bintaŋe dvú fô bonyo' le?
46008011	Ɛ́ wvú ge nonɛn, kɛ tu wo wvù kee mwɛɛm nu ɛ befe wase bô waa bwoo wvù wɛɛyi wvun wvù Klistu to kpweɛ nje ye.
46008012	Ɛ́ fiɛɛ fì wo ge fin emum enu kebefe ɛ wo ɛ ge ɛ befe bô fitele fi waa bwoo wvù wɛɛyi le, ɛ kebefɛ kedvu nu ɛ wo ge ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô Klistu le.
46008013	Nonɛn, ɛ ɛ̀ nu lɛ fiɛɛ fì me ndiee, ebeete bô waa bwɛɛm, me nsaa embvuu en'yuu eŋkum dvú kɛ, wvu lɛ fo wvú ke egbwe kɛ.
46009001	Kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me eŋgee fiɛɛ fì me ŋkooŋke le? Kɛ me nu waa ntum Jisos e? Kɛ me nto nu ɛ n'yɛn Tata wesebeene wvù Jisos e le? Ɛ kɛ ben ban nu sɛw lemme diem fô Tata le le?
46009002	Ɛ́ bonyii bomew cim kicine lɛ kɛ me nu waa ntum Jisos, tu kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ ben tɛn ekicine kɛ. Ben nu nciise wvù duŋci kecɛɛy lɛ me nu waa ntum Tata Jisos.
46009003	Me ŋgayte fin ɛ̂ bonyii bò sowte kenyi kem.
46009004	Kɛ bese kɛŋke keediekene bvuu wukene nje lemme din e?
46009005	Ɛ kɛ bese tɛn koŋ lo ejo bosɛse bokɛnɛ bò ɛ̀ nu bonyii bo mbee le elɛne bô bó kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ diɛwɛ Bita bô boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e bomew noo boom bo bwee Tata Jisos e le?
46009006	Fí nu lɛ ɛ̀ mɛy kɛ bee Banaban bò kɛŋke keelemte bô can yese sɛ diekene le?
46009007	Ɛ̀ nu wee nci wvù la wvù lemte ɛ ɛ̀ taale kɛ wvú fô ɛkolɛ kew e? Ɛ́ wee lem wɛɛ, ɛ́ wvú enu sɛ wvú ɛ die mwɛɛm mvù buyte wɛne dvudvu le? Ɛ́ wee cɛyte tɛn nyám, ɛ́ wvú enu sɛ wvú kamte ɛmben yodvu wuu le?
46009008	Mwɛɛm mvun mvù me njemyi mvun nu ɛ ɛ̀ nu ŋkpwawcɛ wee wvu wum maaŋ e? Kɛ fí nu kɛ tɛn ɛ̂ bonci bo Nyo' le le?
46009009	Muses to nu ɛ saŋ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' bonci le lɛ, “Ɛ́ wee jo nyam lɛ yí elɛ ɛgiŋ, fo wvú esûm diuw nyam yidvu kɛ.” Ben kpwaake lɛ Nyo' to jemyi nonɛn, ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛkumɛ nyám e?
46009010	Wvú to jemyi ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛkumɛ beene, ɛ bó to saŋ fô beene le njefo wee wvù lemte wɛɛ kɛnɛɛ ɛ̀ nu wvù gbweci lo, kɛŋke keetaale fwe kee lɛ wen nu ke ekooy fiɛɛ wɛne fodvu.
46009011	Ɛ́ bese fɛn nu ɛ jewe ŋgow yi ɛ̂ keyoy e ɛ̂ mvuntelem mvunɛn e, ɛ́ fí enu baay fô bese le keekɛŋkɛ mwɛɛm mvu yî nshɛ le ɛ̂ ben e?
46009012	Ɛ́ bonyii bomew kɛŋke mvuŋgay keegay lɛ ben enya mwɛɛm ɛ̂ bó, tu kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ ben enya ɛ̂ bese fesɛn lo? Geenɛn, bese baa jo mvumvun mvuŋgay kɛ. Bese nu ɛ kuu ɛ ɛ̀ nu shém yî fiɛɛ ficii le, ɛfey fo fiɛɛ enu dvú keejewsee lɛ fo saaka wvù jee wvu ɛkumɛ Klistu egɛne fwe.
46009013	Kɛ ben kee lɛ bonyii bò lemte yew ncese le nu ɛ mwɛɛm mvudien mvubole ké no buyte ɛ ɛ̀ nu dvú, ɛ bonyii bò lemte fô ketaŋ ke ncese le ké no booŋke tɛn fô mwɛɛm mvù bó too dvú fó le?
46009014	Ɛ̀ nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no Tata nu ɛ gay lɛ bonyii bò fewci saaka wvù jee kɛŋke keecee ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî dvú le.
46009015	Naa no fí nu nonɛn, me mbaa njo mvumvun mvuŋgay kɛ, ɛ kɛ me nsaaŋke nɛn lɛ ben ekɛw egee fimew fô me le kɛ. Ɛ́ ɛ̀ fɛn nu lɛ wee ege ɛ́ ye yin yì me nsaale nje diɛw Nyo' yì me nfewci ɛcici enu lɛ me nfii mwɛɛm ɛ̂ bó, ɛ́ fí ejee lɛ me ŋkpwe lo.
46009016	Kɛ me ŋkɛŋke keensaale ye lɛ me nfewci saaka wvù jee wvu ɛkumɛ Jisos Klistu kɛ. Ɛ̀ ge Nyo' lɛ me enfewcì. Ɛ́ me ntun lo keenfewci, ɛ́ Nyo' elaŋ ŋgɛw yî yɛm e.
46009017	Ɛ́ ɛ̀ fɛn nu lɛ me ŋgee lemme din ɛ ɛ̀ nu ŋkpwawcɛ wɛm, ɛ́ me enshieele mmawcɛ. Geenɛn, kɛ ɛ̀ to seyse me kɛ. Ɛ̀ to seyse Nyo' nya can yɛm e.
46009018	Kfuu sɛw wvù ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me eŋkɛŋkɛ nje lemme din nu naa la? Sɛw wɛm nu kɛ lɛ me enfewci saaka wvù jee ɛcici, n'yaa nleeme lɛ ben elaake me no me nfewci saaka wvudvu kɛ.
46009019	Ben ekeè lɛ kɛ me nu ɛ̂ wee ɛkuse kɛ. Geenɛn, me nu ɛ ntfuse ɛkolɛ kem lɛ me enù nfwa bonyii bocii wvu lɛ me enso bó nteen, ɛ́ bó enu bo Klistu le.
46009020	Me ndioo nu bee Bojuu, no ŋgee ɛ ɛ̀ nu no bó ké no gee, wvu lɛ me enso bó ɛ́ bó etu bonyii bo Klistu le. Me ndioo nu bee bó no bó bii bonci bo Muses e, no ŋgee kɛ diɛwɛ bó le. Geenɛn, n'yaa nu ɛkuse jo bonci kɛ, wvu lɛ me enso bonyii ɛ̂ bó ɛnte.
46009021	Ɛ́ me ndioo nu bee bonyii bò yaa nu ɛ̂ boba bonci kuse, no ŋgee kɛ tɛn diɛwɛ wee wvù yaa nu kɛ ɛ̂ bonci kuse. Me ŋgee nonɛn, wvu lɛ me enso tɛn bonyii boba ɛ́ bó enu bo Klistu le. Kɛ ɛ̀ nu lɛ me mbaa nu ɛ̂ nci Nyo' kuse kɛ. Me nu ɛ̂ nci Klistu kuse.
46009022	Ɛ́ me ndioo nu tɛn bee bonyii bò wɛɛyi yî mbee le, ɛ me ntu tɛn diɛwɛ bó le wvu lɛ me enso tɛn bó. Me nu ɛ ntu wase lo fiɛɛ ficii fô bonyii bocii le, wvu lɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me eŋge naa la fì ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me eŋge ɛ́ bomew ɛ̂ bó ɛnte ke eboy.
46009023	Me ŋgee mwɛɛm mvun mvunciim nɛn nje saaka wvù jee wvu ɛkumɛ Klistu, wvu lɛ me ŋke eŋkɛŋkɛ tɛn bvujoŋkɛ bvù saaka wvudvu nyaa ɛ̂ bonyii.
46009024	Kɛ ben kee lɛ yî kenlewtɛ le nu ɛ bonyii ké no lewte nteen ɛ ɛ̀ ke so kɛ wee mwaaŋ kɛŋkɛ mmawcɛ? Nonɛn, ben tɛn elewtè ɛ̂ je yì ben ke ekɛŋkɛ mmawcɛ le.
46009025	Bonyii bo kensɛwcɛ le bocii kɛnɛɛ ɛ̀ nu kensɛwcɛ ke kenlewtɛ le, kɛnɛɛ ɛ̀ nu kfuu kè nɛɛ, ké no yɛɛyi naa ntay. Bó ké no yɛɛyi nonɛn, keeke ekɛŋkɛ mmawcɛ, ɛ mmawcɛ wvun yaa nu wvù mɛy lo kɛ. Geenɛn, ɛ wesebeene mmawcɛ nu wvù mɛy lo.
46009026	Me nlewte kem kenlewtɛ ŋgɛne teytey ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô bó koole. Kɛ me nu diɛwɛ wee mvuŋko wvù tfumyi kɛ lo mvuŋko ncɛw ncɛw kɛ.
46009027	Me nyɛwle bô ye yɛm, momte lɛ yí ebiì ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fi lɛŋ e, wvu lɛ fo me ŋke endioo ɛ nfewcɛ wase diɛw Nyo' ɛ̂ bonyii bomew, ɛ́ Nyo' ekaa ebvuse lo me ŋgoo le kɛ.
46010001	Boom bo bwɛɛm e, me ŋgomte lɛ ben ekume ntay fiɛɛ fì to kooyɛɛ bô bo'icee cee bosɛɛbeene seke bó to lɛne ŋkpwaante. Bó bocii to lɛne ɛkuse jo kembɛw, gɛn lente joo yi baay kuse,
46010002	ɛ bó mum no nu kɛ diɛwɛ bó nu ɛ taashɛ bó bô bo Muses ɛ̂ kembɛw kedvu noo ɛ̂ joo yidvu le.
46010003	Bó bocii to diee mwɛɛm mvudien ɛ ɛ̀ to nyaa Nyo',
46010004	wuu tɛn joo ɛ ɛ̀ nyaa Nyo', ɛ wvú to gee ɛ yí buyte yî kembaan e. Kembaan kedvu to nu Klistu wvù to lɛne bô bó.
46010005	Naa no bó to yɛne mwɛɛm mvun e nɛn, ɛ nteen bó le no gee kɛ mwɛɛm mvù fitele ebeete Nyo'. Ɛ wvú mum yuwyɛ boba bonyii, ɛ digvune dibole jiimɛn ŋkpwaante jodvu.
46010006	Mwɛɛm mvun mvù to kooyɛɛ bô bó nu ntefe fô beene le lɛ fo beene ekɛŋke shiee mwɛɛm mvù befe diɛwɛ bó le kɛ.
46010007	Fo beene ebunleè bonyo' bo ɛcici no bó bomew to bunlee kɛ. Bó nu ɛ saŋ ɛkumɛ bó lɛ, “Bonyii to nu ɛ shii, diekɛn, wukɛn, ja we mum ley bine le no bine fô fimooso le.”
46010008	Fo beene ejaaŋkè kenjaŋ no bó bomew to jaaŋke, ɛ Nyo' ge ɛ bó kpwekɛn bontfuke mbaanfiɛɛ ncow botɛte (23,000) yî diuu dimwaaŋ e kɛ.
46010009	Fo beene emomtè Tata no bó bomew to momte, ɛ Nyo' ge ɛ yó tawyɛ bonyii bodvu ɛ bó kpwekɛn kɛ.
46010010	Fo beene ewvukenè no bó bomew to wvukene, ɛ Nceendaa Kpwe yuwyɛ bó kɛ.
46010011	Mwɛɛm mvun mvunciim mvù to kooyɛɛ bô bó nu ntefe fô bonyii le. Ɛ bó to saŋ nɛn lɛ beene ban bò cee ɛ ɛ̀ nu kefew kè woŋ kaa wase le, ejoò wɛɛ.
46010012	Nonɛn, wee wvù kpwaake lɛ wen leeme tɛmyi ntay, eyɛnè fo wvú ke egbwe.
46010013	Ben ekeè lɛ mmom yicii yì too fô ben e nu kɛ yì ké no too tɛn fô bonyii bomew e. Nyo' nu Nyo' kecɛɛy, ɛ kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wvú ecinɛ ɛ́ mmom eto fô ben e fey mvuŋgay mvunɛn kɛ. Ɛ́ mmom too fô ben e, ɛ́ wvú eduŋcɛ kɛ je yì ben efey jó eso mmom yidvu.
46010014	Nonɛn nsáa yɛm shém, me ɛ no nteete ben lɛ ben elewtè mwɛɛm mvu ɛkumɛ bonyo' bo ɛcici.
46010015	Me njemyi ɛ̂ ben nɛn diɛwɛ ɛ̂ bonyii bò kɛŋke bvufee le. Ben ekpwawcɛ ntay lɛ laa kɛ fiɛɛ fì me njemyi ɛ̂ ben fin nu kecɛɛy ɛ?
46010016	Kɛ beene ké joo fiko fi ntaashɛ le, nya keyoone ɛ̂ Nyo', wu yî kentaashɛ le, tu beene nu ɛ taashɛ yî ɛlɛmɛ ke Klistu le? Ɛ́ beene ké dioo ɛ jo blɛɛd wvu yî kefew kekiɛ le ɛ guutɛn ɛ die yî kentaashɛ le, kɛ tu beene taashi ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî ye Klistu le?
46010017	No beene diee blɛɛd wvun nɛn nu bonyii nteen ɛ ntuw nu kɛ mwaaŋ, tu fí duŋci lɛ beene nu ye yimiaaŋ, njefo beene diee kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu ntuw mwaaŋ.
46010018	Ben ejo kenfewsɛn fô bonyii bo Islael e. Wee tfuu wvù diee fiɛɛ fô ketaŋ ke ncese le nu ɛ taashɛ wase bô Nyo' yî ncese wvudvu le.
46010019	Fiɛɛ fì me ŋgayte fɛn nu lɛ la? Ɛ̀ fɛn nu lɛ mwɛɛm mvù bó gee bintaŋe dvú fô bonyo' le kɛŋke fiɛɛ keege kɛnɛɛ lɛ bonyo' bodvu tɛn kɛŋke fiɛɛ keege?
46010020	Kɛ ɛ̀ nu nonɛn kɛ. Fiɛɛ fì me ŋgayte nu lɛ boncese bò bonyii bò yaa kee kɛ Nyo' gee nu ɛ bó gee ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô bonceendaa bo dɛwle le. Kɛ bó gee ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô Nyo' le kɛ. Me ɛ no ŋgayte lɛ fo ben etaashì ben ɛ bonceendaa bo dɛwle le kɛ.
46010021	Kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ ben ewuu ɛ̂ fiko fi ntaashɛ le fì ɛ̀ nu fi Tata le, bvuu wuu ɛ̂ fiko fi Satan e kɛ. Kɛ ɛ̀ nulo tɛn ɛ́ ben ediee mwɛɛm mvudien mvu Tata le bvuu diee mvu Satan e kɛ.
46010022	Fo beene egeè fiɛɛ fì shém eton'yi Tata kɛ. Kɛ beene tɛmyi fele wvú kɛ.
46010023	Beene bomew nɛn'yi no duu lɛ bó kɛŋke mvuŋgay keege naa fiɛɛ ficii. Geenɛn, bó ekeè lɛ kɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ ficii fì nulo efi wee kɛ. Ɛ beene bomew nɛn'yi no duu kɛ lɛ bó kɛŋke mvuŋgay keege naa fiɛɛ ficii. Ɛ kɛ ɛ̀ nu tɛn fiɛɛ ficii fì nulo ege ɛ́ wee eleeme tɛmyi yî mbee we le kɛ.
46010024	Fo wee egeè fiɛɛ kpwaake kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛkolɛ kew kɛ. Wee ekpwaakè tɛn ɛkumɛ waa bwee.
46010025	Ben edieè nyam yicii yì bó geese fô way yaa sowte laa yí nɛ fɛɛ lɛ, wvu lɛ fo mvuntelem mvunɛn esaakè ben yî fifiɛ le kɛ.
46010026	Me njemyi nonɛn, njefo bó nu ɛ saŋ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le lɛ, “Ɛ̀ kɛŋke Tata woŋ wvun noo mwɛɛm mvunciim mvù nu yî dvú le.”
46010027	Ɛ́ wee wvù yaa nu kɛ wee mbee teŋe ben lɛ ben eto ediekɛn, ben ɛ́ bee ɛ gɛn, ɛ́ ben no diee fiɛɛ ficii fì bó nya ɛ̂ ben yaa sowte kɛ. Fo fitele esaakè ben yî fifiɛ le kɛ.
46010028	Geenɛn, ɛ́ wee mvu nɛ lo ɛ see ɛ̂ ben lɛ mwɛɛm mvudien mvudvu nu ɛ bó ɛ ge kentaŋe dvú fô bonyo' le, fo ben edie kɛ wvu lɛ fo wee wvù be seŋe ɛ̂ ben eyɛnè lɛ ben gee fiɛɛ fì befe, bô fo fitele esaakè wee.
46010029	Me ŋgayte fitele fin ɛ ɛ̀ nu fi wee wvù be seŋe ɛ̂ ben e. Kɛ me ŋgayte ɛ ɛ̀ nu finɛn kɛ. Geenɛn, ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wee mvu ebife lɛ laa ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wen elu keegee fiɛɛ fì wen kooŋke nje fí nu esaake fitele fi wee mvu le lɛ?
46010030	Ɛ́ me ndiee fiɛɛ ɛ me ɛ nya keyoone kedvu ɛ̂ Nyo', ɛ́ wee ebvuu esaake me nje la?
46010031	Me ɛ mum ɛ no nduu fiem lɛ fiɛɛ ficii fì wee gee, kɛnɛɛ wvú diee ɛ ɛ̀ nu fidien, kɛnɛɛ wvú wuu ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiwuun, ɛ wvú no gee ɛ̂ je yì wee mvu yɛn lo, enyaà mbense ɛ̂ Nyo' le.
46010032	Fo ben egeè fiɛɛ fì nulo ebefe bô mvuntelem mvu bonyii le kɛ, kɛnɛɛ ɛ̀ nu Bojuu, kɛnɛɛ ɛ̀ nu bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu, kɛnɛɛ kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le bo Nyo' le.
46010033	Me momte fiem keeŋgee fiɛɛ ficii ɛ ɛ̀ nu fì wee tfuu eyuukè njoŋ. Kɛ me ŋkpwaake kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛkumɛ ɛkolɛ kem maaŋ kɛ. Me ŋkpwaake ɛkumɛ bonyii bocii lɛ me eŋge ɛ́ bó ke eboy.
46011001	Ben ebeŋenè me kɛ no me mbeŋene Klistu.
46011002	Me mbɛnsee ben no ben kumyi me yî fiɛɛ ficii le bvuu bii mwɛɛm mvù me nto n'yɛɛyɛɛ ben dvú.
46011003	Geenɛn, me ŋgomte lɛ ben ekiɛɛ ntay lɛ ɛkolɛ ke diemsɛn tfuu le nu Klistu, ɛ ɛkolɛ ke kpwoon e nu dweese, ɛ ɛkolɛ ke Klistu le nu Nyo'.
46011004	Ɛ́ diemsɛn bunlee lo, kɛnɛɛ wvú teete ntum Nyo' ɛ wvú ɛ baŋ ɛkolɛ, tu wvú shoose ɛkolɛ kew.
46011005	Geenɛn, ɛ́ kpwoon bunlee, kɛnɛɛ wvú teete ɛ ɛ̀ nu ntum Nyo' sɛ wvú nu ɛ baŋ ɛkolɛ ŋkuuŋ, tu wvú shoose ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛkolɛ kew. Kɛ jɛɛy jɛɛy wvuwɛ kpwoon bô wvù nu ɛ kpwaa ɛkolɛ nu dvú kɛ.
46011006	Ɛ́ wvú yɛn lɛ kɛ wen nu ebaŋ ɛkolɛ kew kɛ, ɛ́ wvú mum kpwaa lo. Geenɛn, no ɛ̀ nu keŋ'wuumɛn fô kpwoon e keenu bô ɛkolɛ ɛ bó ɛ kpwaa, ɛ wvú mum baŋ lɛ ɛkolɛ kedvu.
46011007	Kɛ diemsɛn kɛŋke keebaŋ ɛkolɛ kew seke wvú bunlee kɛ, njefo wvú nu nfieesɛn Nyo' bvuu nu bvujoŋkɛ bvu Nyo' le. Geenɛn, ɛ kpwoon nu bvujoŋkɛ bvu dweese le.
46011008	Kɛ ɛ̀ to buy diemsɛn yî kpwoon e kɛ, ɛ̀ to buy kpwoon yî diemsɛn e.
46011009	Kɛ Nyo' to bom tɛn diemsɛn nje kpwoon kɛ. Wvú to bom ɛ ɛ̀ nu kpwoon nje diemsɛn.
46011010	Ɛ̀ nu nje fifiɛ bô nje bonceendaa bo Nyo' le wvù kpwoon kɛŋke keebaŋ ɛkolɛ kew.
46011011	Naa no fí nu nonɛn, fô beene bò nu ɛ taashɛ wase beene bo Tata le, nu ɛ kpwoon yaa nu kɛ bô ɛkolɛ kew maaŋ kɛ, ɛ diemsɛn yaa nu kɛ tɛn bô ɛkolɛ kew maaŋ kɛ.
46011012	Fí nu nonɛn, njefo no Nyo' to bomɛɛ kpwoon yî diemsɛn e nu ɛ keseen nu ɛ ɛ̀ boote kpwoon diemsɛn. Ɛ fiɛɛ ficii nɛn'yi fô Nyo' le.
46011013	Ben tɛn kɛ taa ɛnte jodvu eyɛn lɛ laa fí nu lɛŋ fô kpwoon e keebunlee Nyo' sɛ wvú nu ɛ baŋ ɛkolɛ lɛ.
46011014	Naa no ben yɛne mwɛɛm e, bonyii bocii kee lo lɛ fô diemsɛn e keegɛɛ ɛkolɛ ɛ kí ci baay nu ɛ ɛ̀ nu kenshoose fô wvú le.
46011015	Geenɛn, ɛ fô kpwoon e nu ɛ keekɛŋke yvuw yì defe nu lo ŋgone fô wvú le. Nyo' to nu ɛ nya yvuw yì defe ɛ̂ kpwoon lɛ yí ebaŋyi ɛkolɛ kew.
46011016	Ɛ́ wee nu dvú wvù gomte keekicine fiɛɛ fin, ɛ́ wvú no kee lɛ kɛ beene kɛnɛɛ bintaashɛ bi bonyii bo mbee le bo Nyo' le bvuu kɛŋke yimi je kɛ.
46011017	Geenɛn, fiɛɛ fimew nu dvú fì me ŋgomte keentefe ben yî dvú le, ɛ ɛ̀ nu fì ben gee ɛ me n'yaa nu embɛnse lo ben yî dvú le kɛ. Ben ké too shii yî kentaashɛ le ɛ ɛ̀ buy kɛ fiɛɛ fì befe ɛfey fì jee.
46011018	Fiɛɛ fì me ŋgomte keen'yaw eŋgay nu lɛ, me n'yuuke lɛ ben ké taashi diɛwɛ kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le, no nu dew jɛɛy jɛɛy. Me ɛ no n'yɛne lɛ ɛ̀ nulo enu kecɛɛy.
46011019	Fí lo jee kɛ lɛ keŋgawsɛn enu ɛ̂ ben ɛntelɛŋ wvu lɛ bó emum eloocɛ ekiɛɛ bonyii bo lɛŋ ɛ̂ ben ɛnte.
46011020	Me n'yɛne lɛ ben ké too yî kentaashɛ le keedie mwɛɛm mvudien mvu Tata wesebeene wvù Jisos e, saa die ɛ ɛ̀ nu mvú kɛ.
46011021	Me njemyi nɛn njefo ben ké dioo diekene, ɛ wee no diee kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu mwew mwɛɛm mvudien gɛne fwe, ɛ bomew mum mɛy jeŋ, ɛ bomew wu mbvuum ɛ mó koo lo bó.
46011022	Ɛ̀ nu la fi nonɛn? Kɛ ben kɛŋke yéw keediekene, wukene dvú le? Nuu lɛ ben gomte keejoo kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le ke Nyo' le ɛkuse, gee ɛ bonyii bò fuute wuumene lɛ? Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me njeme ɛ̂ ben lɛ la? Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me embɛnsee ben e? Naa lo, kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me embɛnsee kɛ.
46011023	Me nto nu ɛ n'yɛɛyi ben ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô fiɛɛ fì Tata to yɛɛyɛɛ me dvú, lɛ ɛ̀ to nu ɛntaŋ jò bó to nu keegese Tata wesebeene wvù Jisos, ɛ wvú jo ntuw blɛɛd,
46011024	nya keyoone ɛ̂ Nyo', guushɛ gay lɛ, “Fin nu ye yɛm ɛ me ɛ nya nje ben. Ben egeè fifin keekumyi me.”
46011025	Ɛ bó diekɛn mɛse, ɛ wvú jo fiko ge kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ diɛwɛ fwe le, gay lɛ, “Fiko fin nu fi moŋkan mo monfɛm mò Nyo' gbwo bô ɛlɛmɛ kem. Ben egeè fifin sekecii wuu keekumyi me.”
46011026	Fí ɛ mum ɛ no nu lɛ ɛ gɛn naa ɛ buy seke Tata nu ke ekase eto le, nu ɛ sekecii kè ben diee blɛɛd wvun bvuu wuu fiko fin nu ɛ ben fewci ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛkumɛ kpwe Tata.
46011027	Nonɛn, ɛ ɛ̀ nu naa yɛɛ wvù diee blɛɛd wvudvu kɛnɛɛ wuu fiko fi Tata le fidvu ɛ̂ je yì baa jee le kɛ, tu mwɛtɛn gee ɛ ɛ̀ nu kebefɛ njefo wvú baa wvumte ye bô ɛlɛmɛ ke Tata le kɛ.
46011028	Wee dioo nu keedie blɛɛd wvun ebvuu ewu fiko fin, ɛ wvú yaw jiŋe ɛkolɛ kew ntay sɛ no gee nonɛn,
46011029	njefo ɛ́ wee diee blɛɛd wvun, wuu fiko fin yaa kee fiɛɛ fì ɛ̀ nu ye Tata, tu mwɛtɛn diee bvuu wuu, joo ɛ ɛ̀ nu nsaw fô ɛkolɛ kew e.
46011030	Ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì bonyii nteen ɛ̂ ben ɛntelɛŋ wɛɛyi ɛ bomew cɛmkene ɛ bomew ɛ kpwekɛn wase.
46011031	Geenɛn, ɛ́ beene jiŋe bikuu bisɛɛbeene ntay ɛ sɛ no diee bvuu wuu, Tata saa ebvuu esaw beene kɛ.
46011032	Ɛ́ Tata saake beene, tu wvú nɛci lo beene wvu lɛ fo wvú ke etaashɛ beene bô bonyii bo yî woŋ wvun e lɛ beene nu ɛ gbwe nsaw kɛ.
46011033	Boom bo bwɛɛm e, fí ɛ mum ɛ no nu lɛ seke ben ɛ taashɛ keedie mwɛɛm mvudien mvu Tata le, ɛ ben cɛy ɛ wee tfuu to.
46011034	Ɛ́ jeŋ yuu wee, ɛ́ mwɛtɛn diekɛn fô yew e sɛ no too wvu lɛ fo wvú ke eto ege fiɛɛ ejo ɛ ɛ̀ nu nsaw fô ɛkolɛ kew e kɛ. Fi ɛkumɛ mwɛɛm mvumew nu ɛ me nu ŋke entefe ben yî dvú le ɛ ɛ̀ nu seke me ɛ nto.
46012001	Boom bo bwɛɛm e, me nu enjeme keseen ɛkumɛ nnyá yì Keyoy ke Yuule nyaa ɛ̂ bonyii. Kɛ me ŋgomte lɛ ben enu kenjiwe le kɛ.
46012002	Ben ekeè lɛ seke ben to bɛɛ bonyii bò yaa kee kɛ Nyo', nu ɛ bó to lɛɛ ben ɛ ben no njimte, mum wvumte bonyo' bo ɛcici bò nu sɛ bó nulo ejeme ŋkuuŋ.
46012003	Me ɛ mum ɛ no ŋgayte lɛ ben ekiɛɛ ntay lɛ ɛ́ wee nu ɛ Keyoy ke Nyo' le nu yî ye le, wvú saa ebvuu egay lɛ, “Lon ekoo Jisos” kɛ. Ɛ wee yaa nulo egay lɛ, “Jisos nu Tata” sɛ ɛ̀ fici Keyoy ke Yuule wvú kɛ.
46012004	Ɛ dioo tu fô nnyá le nu ɛ bonyii kɛŋke nnyá jɛɛy jɛɛy ɛ ɛ̀ nyaa kɛ Keyoy kemwaaŋ ɛ̂ bó.
46012005	Bonyii lemte dilemme jɛɛy jɛɛy ɛ̂ kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le ɛnte, geenɛn ɛ cee ɛkolɛ wvubo nu kɛ mwaaŋ.
46012006	Ɛ jé nu jɛɛy jɛɛy yì bonyii lemte jó, ɛ ɛ̀ gee kɛ Nyo' mwaaŋ lɛ bonyii egeè dilemme didvu ɛ̂ yiyɛ jé le.
46012007	Bó nu ɛ nya kɛ wee mwaaŋ mwaaŋ bô ye nnya yi Keyoy ke Yuule keelemte fici kentaashɛ kecii dvú.
46012008	Ɛ wee mvu no kɛŋke ye nnya yì Keyoy ke Yuule nya ɛ̂ wvú ɛ ɛ̀ nu keejemyi diɛwɛ wee wvù kɛŋke bvufee le, nya yi wee mvu nnya ɛ ɛ̀ nu keejemyi diɛwɛ wee wvù kee fiɛɛ le. Ɛ Keyoy kin nu kɛ kemwaaŋ.
46012009	Ɛ́ Keyoy ké nya yi wee mvu nnya ɛ ɛ̀ nu fitele fì wvú elese yî Nyo' le ntay, nya yi wee mvu ɛ ɛ̀ nu keefɛle bincɛm. Ɛ Keyoy kin nu kɛ kemwaaŋ.
46012010	Ɛ́ Keyoy ké nya yi wee mvu nnya ɛ ɛ̀ nu keegee biŋghaw bi mwɛɛm e, nya yi wee mvu ɛ ɛ̀ nu keeteete bontum bo Nyo' le, nya yi wee mvu ɛ ɛ̀ nu bvufee keekee jɛɛy jɛɛy mwɛɛm mvù nɛn'yi fô Keyoy ke Nyo' le bô mvù yaa nɛn'yi kɛ fô Keyoy ke Nyo' le, nya yi wee mvu ɛ ɛ̀ nu mvuŋgay keejemyi díɛw yì bó yaa kee kɛ, nya yi wee mvu ɛ ɛ̀ nu keecɛɛyi mwɛɛm mvù wee wvudvu jemyi ɛ̂ bonyii.
46012011	Bó gee mwɛɛm mvun mvunciim ɛ ɛ̀ nyaa kɛ Keyoy kemwaaŋ nnya yidvu ɛ̂ bó. Ɛ kí gawci ɛ̂ wee tfuu no kí shieele.
46012012	Beene kee lɛ ye wee nu kɛ yimiaaŋ, geenɛn ɛ yí kɛŋke biba nteen. Ɛ naa no biba bidvu cim nu nteen nɛn nu ɛ bí taashi gee ye yimiaaŋ. Ɛ̀ nu kɛ tɛn no Klistu bô bonyii bew nu.
46012013	Beene nu bonyii jɛɛy jɛɛy, ɛ bomew nu Bojuu, bomew Boglek, ɛ bomew nu bonfaw, ɛ bomew yaa nu kɛ bonfaw. Ɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ Keyoy kemwaaŋ kè to taashɛɛ beene bocii keenu ye yimiaaŋ. Ɛ Nyo' to gɛke kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu Keyoy kedvu kemwaaŋ fô mvuntelem mvusɛɛbeene le.
46012014	Kɛ ye wee nu kɛ keba ke ye le kemwaaŋ kɛ. Ɛ̀ nu biba nteen.
46012015	Ɛ́ ɛkalɛ cim nɛ ɛ gay lɛ, “No me mbaa nu kebo kɛ, tu kɛ me mbɛɛ keba ke ye le kɛ”, fifiɛ saa ege ɛ́ kí emum enu sɛ ɛ̀ nu keba ke ye le kɛ.
46012016	Kentuŋtuŋ ɛ nɛ tɛn ɛ gay lɛ, “No me mbaa nu jise kɛ, tu kɛ me mbɛɛ keba ke ye le kɛ”, fifiɛ saa ege ɛ́ kí emum enu sɛ ɛ̀ nu keba ke ye le kɛ.
46012017	Ɛ́ ye wee yicii be mɛy kɛ jise, ɛ́ wvú eyuuke mwɛɛm bô la? Ɛ́ yí be mɛy kɛ kentuŋtuŋ, ɛ́ wvú eyuuke nsam fiɛɛ bô la?
46012018	Fiɛɛ fì nu, nu lɛ Nyo' to nu ɛ bom wee seyse biba biew bi ye le jɛɛy jɛɛy no wvú kooŋke.
46012019	Ɛ́ ye wee be nu kɛ keba kemwaaŋ, ɛ́ yí enu nɛɛ le?
46012020	No fí nu, biba bi ye le nu nteen. Geenɛn ɛ bí ɛ taashɛ ɛ ge ye yimiaaŋ.
46012021	Kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ jise egay ɛ̂ kebo lɛ, “Kɛ me nshieele wo kɛ.” Ɛ kɛ ɛkolɛ nulo egay tɛn ɛ̂ bikaa lɛ, “Kɛ me nshieele ben kɛ.”
46012022	Fiɛɛ fì kaa nu, nu lɛ biba bi ye le bì yen'yi lɛ bí wɛɛyi lo nu bì kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ ye wee enu sɛ bí kɛ.
46012023	Ɛ biba bi ye le bì beene joo lɛ bí nu ncɛw, nu bì beene taale fó ntay. Ɛ biba bì beene ké no wuumene keeduŋci ɛ̂ bonyii nu bì beene ké no baŋyi.
46012024	Ɛ biba bì bonyii yɛne, nu bì yaa shieele lɛ bó etaalè fó nonɛn kɛ. Nyo' nu ɛ seyse ye wee ɛ̂ je yì lɛ bó ewvumtè biba bì yen'yi lɛ bí nu ncɛw e.
46012025	Wvú to ge nonɛn wvu lɛ fo keŋgawsɛn enu yî ye le kɛ, lɛ keba etomtè kemew, ɛ kemew tomte kemew.
46012026	Ɛ́ keba ke ye le kemew nɛ ɛ no yuuke nsase, tu biba bidvu bicii nu eyuuke nsase. Ɛ́ bó seyse keba ke ye le kemwaaŋ, tu bí bicii nu elaŋlaŋe bô kí.
46012027	Ɛ dioo tu fô Klistu le nu ɛ ben bocii nu ye ye, ɛ wee mwaaŋ mwaaŋ ben e nu keba ke ye yidvu le.
46012028	Nyo' nu ɛ gɛɛ bonyii bò elemtè dilemme jɛɛy jɛɛy ɛ̂ kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le. Ɛ bo fwe nu boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e, ɛ bò bii bó le nu bonyii bò teete bontum bo Nyo' le, ɛ bò bii bó le nu bonyii bò yɛɛyi bonyii. Ɛ gɛɛ bomew ɛ ɛ̀ nu bonyii bò egeè biŋghaw bi mwɛɛm e, bomew bò efɛlè bincɛm, bomew bò eficì bonyii. Ɛ gɛɛ bomew ɛ ɛ̀ nu bò eseyseè no dilemme egɛne, ɛ bomew nu bò kee keejemyi díɛw yì bó baa kee yí kɛ.
46012029	Kɛ ɛ̀ nu bonyii bocii bò nu boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e kɛ. Kɛ ɛ̀ nu bocii bò teete bontum bo Nyo' le kɛ. Kɛ ɛ̀ nu bonyii bocii bò yɛɛyi bonyii kɛ, ɛ kɛ ɛ̀ nu bocii bò gee biŋghaw bi mwɛɛm e kɛ.
46012030	Kɛ ɛ̀ nu bonyii bocii bò kɛŋke nnya keefɛle bincɛm kɛ. Kɛ ɛ̀ nu bocii bò nulo ejemyi díɛw yì bó baa kee kɛ. Ɛ kɛ ɛ̀ nu tɛn bonyii bocii bò nulo ecɛɛyi mwɛɛm mvù bonyii jemyi ɛ̂ díɛw yimi le ɛ̂ bonyii kɛ.
46012031	No nnyá yin yicii nu nɛn, ben eshieelè ntay keekɛŋke nnyá ɛ ɛ̀ nu yì kuuke fele yicii. Geenɛn, me nu nduŋcɛ ɛ̂ ben fiɛɛ fì fele mwɛɛm mvun mvunciim.
46013001	Ɛ́ me ncim ŋkee keenjeme díɛw bitum bicii naa noo díɛw bonceendaa bo Nyo' le, sɛ me ŋkɛŋke keŋkoŋɛn fô bonyii le ŋkuuŋ, tu me ŋkumte kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu diuw diɛwɛ ŋgɛm wvù caake, kɛnɛɛ bikaŋkaŋ e ɛ wee kpwaake.
46013002	Ɛ́ me ncim ŋkɛŋke naa mvuŋgay keenteete bontum bo Nyo' le, ŋkee mwɛɛm mvunciim naa noo mvù nu ɛ̂ kenyilɛ le, ɛ nlese fitele yî Nyo' le naa ntay wvù ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me emvuwyi dikum, geenɛn sɛ me ŋkɛŋke keŋkoŋɛn fô bonyii le, tu me nu kɛ lo fiɛɛ fi ɛcici.
46013003	Ɛ́ me ncim njo mwɛɛm mwem mvunciim ɛ ŋgaw ɛ̂ bonyii, ɛ nya tɛn ye yɛm lɛ bó eton, geenɛn sɛ me ŋkɛŋke keŋkoŋɛn fô bonyii le ŋkuuŋ, sɛw wvudvu saa enu kɛ.
46013004	Wee wvù kɛŋke keŋkoŋɛn fô bonyii le ké no kuule shém, bvuu gee gee dì jee fô bonyii le. Kɛ wvuwɛ wee ké no bene kendoŋ kɛ. Kɛ wvú ké no saale ye kɛnɛɛ bensee ye kɛ.
46013005	Kɛ wvú ké no ŋasene yî bonyii le kɛ. Kɛ wvú ké no kpwaake kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛkolɛ kew kɛ. Kɛ wvú ké ton'yɛ shém cekey kɛ. Ɛ kɛ wvú ké no gɛɛle wee fô fitele le kɛ.
46013006	Kɛ wvú ké no yuuke njoŋ bô fiɛɛ fì befe kɛ. Wvú ké no yuuke njoŋ ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô fiɛɛ fì nu kecɛɛy.
46013007	Kɛ wee wvù kɛŋke keŋkoŋɛn ké no yɛne jay wee mvu le kɛ. Wvú ké no fiisene mwɛɛm mvunciim, taale kɛ fwe yî fiɛɛ le ficii, bvuu suule shém yî fiɛɛ le ficii.
46013008	Kɛ keŋkoŋɛn ké ka kɛ. Geenɛn ɛ kefew nu eyuu eto kè mvuŋgay mvù Nyo' to nyaɛ lɛ bonyii eteete bontum bew dvú nu ke eka, ɛ́ díɛw yì bonyii jemyi yì bó baa kee yí ke eka, ɛ́ mvuŋgay keekee mwɛɛm ntay ke eka tɛn.
46013009	Mvú nu ke eka nonɛn njefo beene kee mwɛɛm keseen kɛ lo kebɛse kebɛse, teete bontum bo Nyo' le kɛ kebɛse kebɛse.
46013010	Geenɛn ɛ ɛ̀ nu ke enu seke beene ɛ loocɛ wase ɛ kocɛn ɛ́ mwɛɛm mvu kebɛse kebɛse emum eka.
46013011	Ɛ̀ to nu seke me nto nu wan caan, ɛ me no njemyi diɛwɛ wan e, ŋkpwawci mwɛɛm diɛwɛ wan e, n'yɛne mwɛɛm diɛwɛ wan e. Me ɛ ndioo ntaw wase ɛ mum ɛ ncinɛ nce boom e.
46013012	Keseen nu ɛ beene yɛne mwɛɛm e jiwejiwe diɛwɛ ɛ̂ kenlɛɛy e. Geenɛn ɛ̀ nu ke enu kefew kekiɛ le ɛ́ mvú eyuu ɛ̂ beene ɛjise. Keseen nu ɛ me ŋkee mwɛɛm kebɛse kebɛse, ɛ ɛ̀ nu ke enu sekekiɛ, ɛ́ me emum emɛse eŋkiɛɛ mwɛɛm mvunciim kɛ no Nyo' kee me.
46013013	Mwɛɛm nu mvuntɛntem mvù nu ke emɛy eleeme fó. Mwɛɛm mvudvu mvun nu: keelese fitele yî Nyo' le, bô keetaale fwe yî ŋkawma Nyo' le, noo keekɛŋke keŋkoŋɛn. Ɛ keŋkoŋɛn nu fiɛɛ fì kuuke ɛnte jo mvú fele mvú mvunciim.
46014001	Ben egɛɛlè keŋkoŋɛn fwe dvu mwɛɛm mvunciim, geenɛn ekɛŋkè tɛn shiee ntay fô nnyá yì Keyoy ke Yuule nyaa ɛ̂ bonyii le, ɛfey mvunciim, nnya keeteete bontum bo Nyo' le.
46014002	Ɛ́ wee jemyi ɛ ɛ̀ nu díɛw yì bó baa kee yí kɛ, tu kɛ wvú jemyi ɛ̂ bonyii kɛ, tu wvú jemyi ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ Nyo', njefo kɛ wee yaa yuuke fiɛɛ fì wvú jemyi kɛ. Wvú jemyi ɛ ɛ̀ nu mwɛɛm mvu ɛ̂ kinyilɛ le ɛ̂ mvuŋgay mvu Keyoy ke Yuule le.
46014003	Geenɛn, wee wvù teete bontum bo Nyo' le ké no jemyi ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ bonyii, gee ɛ bonyii kuu yî mbee le, bvuu yvuwse mvuntelem mvubole, bvuu gee tɛn ɛ mvuntelem mvu bonyii le lɛɛtene.
46014004	Ɛ wee wvù jemyi díɛw yì bó baa kee yí kɛ ké no fici kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛkolɛ kew maaŋ. Geenɛn, ɛ wee wvù teete bontum bo Nyo' le ké no fici ɛ ɛ̀ nu kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le kecii.
46014005	Me ɛ no ŋkooŋke lɛ ben ejemyì díɛw yì bonyii baa kee yí kɛ. Geenɛn, ɛ fiɛɛ fì me ŋkooŋke baay nu lɛ ben eteetè ɛ ɛ̀ nu bontum bo Nyo' le ɛ̂ bonyii. Wee wvù teete bontum bo Nyo' le nu shiee le fele wee wvù jemyi díɛw yì bó baa kee yí kɛ. Ɛ́ ɛ̀ fɛn baa nu lɛ wee mvu ebaŋke díɛw yidvu wvu lɛ kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le eyuw ntay ɛ́ fí efi bó.
46014006	Boom bo bwɛɛm e, ɛ́ me nɛ keseen ɛ nto fô ben e, ɛ no njemyi ɛ̂ díɛw yì bó baa kee yí le kɛ, ɛ́ fifiɛ efi ben yî la le? Fiɛɛ fì nulo efi ben nu kɛ seke me nu ɛ nto bô fiɛɛ fi fifɛ fì Nyo' nu ɛ duŋcɛ ɛ̂ me, kɛnɛɛ fiɛɛ fimew fì wvú gomte lɛ me eŋge ɛ́ ben ekiɛɛ, kɛnɛɛ ntum we mvu lɛ me entefe ɛ̂ ben, kɛnɛɛ fiɛɛ fimew lɛ me en'yɛɛyi ben dvú.
46014007	Bó ejo kɛ fiɛɛ diɛwɛ ndoŋ kɛnɛɛ kome le mvù yaa kɛŋke kɛ keyoy. Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wee ege nɛɛ sɛ kiɛɛ fiɛɛ fì mvú jemyi sɛ bó ɛ toŋ kɛnɛɛ ɛ kum ɛ̂ je yi lɛŋ e?
46014008	Ɛ́ wee nɛ lɛ wen etoŋ soŋ jem, ɛ faŋɛ toŋ ɛ̂ je yi lɛŋ e, ɛ́ bonyii ege nɛɛ sɛ buy jem?
46014009	Ɛ̀ nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no ɛ́ ben jemyi díɛw ɛ̂ bonyii sɛ bó yuuke lo, ɛ́ bó ke ege nɛɛ sɛ kiɛɛ fiɛɛ fì ben jemyi? Kɛ tu njeme wene nu laayi kɛ lo yî fwefwe le.
46014010	Kɛ ɛ̀ nu kemaŋɛn lɛ dikfuu di díɛw e nu yî nshɛ le fɛn dí le dí le kɛ. Ɛ kɛ yimi nu dvú yì nu sɛ bó kee kenyi kedvu kɛ.
46014011	Geenɛn, ɛ́ wee nɛ ɛ no jemyi ɛ̂ me ɛ̂ díɛw e sɛ me n'yuuke yí ŋkuuŋ, tu wvú nu enu diɛwɛ wee ketum e fô me le, ɛ me nu tɛn diɛwɛ wee ketum e fô wvú le.
46014012	Me ɛ no ŋgayte ɛ̂ ben lɛ no ben gomte lɛ mvuŋgay mvu Keyoy ke Yuule le eyen'yi ɛ̂ ben ɛnte, ben emum emom ntay keekɛŋke ɛ ɛ̀ nu nnyá yiyɛ yì nulo ege ɛ́ kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le ekuù lo.
46014013	Fí ɛ mum ɛ no nu lɛ, ɛ́ wee jemyi díɛw yì bó baa kee yí kɛ, ɛ́ wvú no bunlee lɛ Keyoy ke Nyo' le enya wen bô bvufee keecɛɛyi fiɛɛ fì wvú jemyi ɛ̂ bonyii.
46014014	Ɛ́ me nɛ ɛ no mbunlee ɛ̂ díɛw yì bó baa kee yí le kɛ, tu me nu mbunlee ɛ̂ keyoy kem e, geenɛn ɛ me n'yaa mbunlee bô bvufee bwem kɛ.
46014015	No fí nu nonɛn, me nu eŋge nɛɛ? Me nu embunlee ɛ̂ keyoy kem e, mbunlee tɛn bô bvufee bwem, en'yemte ɛ̂ keyoy kem e, n'yemte tɛn bô bvufee bwem.
46014016	Ɛ̀ fuw kɛ nonɛn, wo ɛ nɛ ɛ no bensee Nyo' ɛ̂ keyoy kuw e, ɛ́ wee mvu wvù be nu fó yeke kɛ lo ke ege nɛɛ sɛ bee lɛ, “Fí enù nonɛn” yî keyoone kè wo be nyaa le sɛ wvú be yuuke díɛw yì wo jemyi?
46014017	Ɛ́ wo nya keyoone nonɛn, ɛ cim ɛ nya naa ntay nɛɛ, tu kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ fí efi wee mvu wɛ kɛ.
46014018	Me nyaa keyoone ɛ̂ Nyo' lɛ me njemyi díɛw yì bó baa kee yí kɛ nfele naa lo ben bocii.
46014019	Geenɛn, no me ncim njemyi nonɛn ɛ́ me ndioo nu ɛnte jo kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le, ɛ me no ŋkooŋke keenjemyi bô bvufee bwem ɛ ɛ̀ cim nu naa kɛ díɛw shen, wvu lɛ me n'yɛɛyi bó, ɛfey keejemyi díɛw bontfuke yuufe (10,000) sɛ bó kee yí ŋkuuŋ.
46014020	Boom bo bwɛɛm e, fò ben ekɛŋkè boŋkpwawcɛ bo boom bo caan e kɛ. Ben enù kɛ diɛwɛ mvunlɛy mvu boom e mvù yaa kee kɛ wase fiɛɛ ɛkumɛ kebefɛ. Geenɛn, ekɛŋkè boŋkpwawcɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu bo ŋgaybonyii le.
46014021	Bó nu ɛ saŋ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' bonci le lɛ, “Me wvù Tata Nyo' ŋgayte lɛ me nu ŋke enjemyi ɛ̂ bonyii ban dew botolo le, ɛ̂ díɛw yì bó baa kee yí le kɛ. Geenɛn, kɛ fifiɛ nu ke ege ɛ́ bonyii ban emum eyuw me le kɛ.”
46014022	Fí ɛ mum ɛ no nu lɛ, keejemyi díɛw yì bó baa kee yí kɛ, nu nciise wvù duŋci mvuŋgay mvu Keyoy ke Yuule le ɛ̂ bonyii bò yaa nu bo mbee le kɛ. Kɛ ɛ̀ nu nciise ɛ̂ bò nu bo mbee le kɛ. Geenɛn, ɛ nnya keeteete bontum bo Nyo' le nu nciise wvù duŋci mvuŋgay mvu Keyoy ke Yuule le ɛ̂ bonyii bò nu bo mbee le, ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu kɛ ɛ̂ bò baa nu bo mbee le kɛ.
46014023	Ɛ́ ben, kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le bocii nɛ ɛ to yî kentaashɛ le, wee tfuu ɛ mum ɛ kɛw ɛ no jemyi kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu díɛw yì bó baa kee yí kɛ, bonyii bo ncɛw kɛnɛɛ bonyii bò baa nu bo mbee le, ɛ nɛ ɛ ley, ɛ yuw no ben jemyi, bó saa ekpwaake lɛ ben ghaanene lo?
46014024	Geenɛn, ɛ́ wee tfuu teete ɛ ɛ̀ nu ntum Nyo', wee wvu ncɛw kɛnɛɛ wvù baa nu wee mbee ɛ ley, ɛ́ fiɛɛ fì ben jemyi ege ɛ́ wvú ekiɛɛ lɛ wen nu wee wvù befe, ɛ́ fí esaake wvú fô fitele le,
46014025	ɛ́ mwɛɛm mvù nyiime fô fitele fiew e, eyenɛ ɛmwa. Nonɛn, ɛ́ wvú emum etum ɛnvuw fokuse, enyaa mbense wvu baay ɛ̂ Nyo' gayte lɛ, “Nyo' nu naa ben ɛ bó.”
46014026	Boom bo bwɛɛm e, fiɛɛ ficii fì me njemyi nu lɛ la? Fí nu lɛ, seke ben ɛ to yî kentaashɛ le, ɛ wee wvù kɛŋke ŋkiee keeyem no nu, ɛ wee n'yɛɛyi nu, ɛ wvù kɛŋke fiɛɛ fì Nyo' nu ɛ duŋcɛ ɛ̂ wvú nu, ɛ wvù kee keejeme díɛw yì bó baa kee yí kɛ nu, ɛ wvù kee keecɛɛyɛ díɛw yidvu ɛ́ bonyii eyuw enù tɛn. Ben egeè mwɛɛm mvunciim ɛ̂ je yì ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ mvú efiì lo kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le.
46014027	Ɛ́ bonyii nu keejeme díɛw yì bó baa kee yí kɛ, ɛ́ bó jeme kɛ bofɛɛ kɛnɛɛ botɛte maaŋ. Ɛ́ bó dioo jemyi no jemyi wee mwaaŋ mwaaŋ ɛ wee mvu cɛɛyi fiɛɛ fì bó jemyi ɛ̂ bonyii.
46014028	Ɛ́ wee baa nu dvú wvù ecɛɛyi fiɛɛ fì bó jemyi, ɛ́ bó no nu diuw tfu ɛ̂ kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le ɛnte, ɛ wee jemyi kɛ wase ɛ̂ shem ɛ̂ shem fô ɛkolɛ kew e bô Nyo'.
46014029	Ɛ́ bonyii bò teete bontum bo Nyo' le nu dvú, ɛ́ bofɛɛ kɛnɛɛ botɛte jeme ɛ̂ bonyii. Ɛ́ bó dioo jemyi ɛ bomew no yeese fiɛɛ fì bó jemyi ntay.
46014030	Ɛ́ Nyo' fɛn nu ɛ duŋcɛ fiɛɛ ɛ̂ wee mvu wvù be ɛ shii dvú, ɛ́ wee wvù be jemyi wase wɛ cife, nya je ɛ̂ wvuwɛ wee jeme.
46014031	Ben ekeè lɛ ben bocii nulo etefe bontum bo Nyo' le. Ɛ́ ben dioo teete, no teete wee mwaaŋ mwaaŋ wvu lɛ bonyii bocii eyɛɛyi mwɛɛm ɛ̂ ben, ɛ́ ben ebvuu ege ɛ́ mvuntelem mvubole bocii eyvuwsè.
46014032	Bonyii bò Nyo' nu ɛ nya yibo nnya keeteete bontum bew kɛŋke mvuŋgay ɛ̂ we jo nnya yidvu,
46014033	njefo kɛ Nyo' nu Nyo' kembvuŋse kɛ, Nyo' nu Nyo' kenlɛɛtɛn. No fí nu ɛ̂ bintaashɛ bi bonyii bo mbee le bò ɛ̀ nu bo Nyo' le bicii,
46014034	seke bokɛnɛ nu ɛ̂ kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le ɛnte, no nu diuw tfu. Kɛ bó baa nya bó bô mvuŋgay keejemyi kɛ. Bó kɛŋke keeyuuke lo bolemsɛ le, ɛ ɛ̀ nu no nci jemyi.
46014035	Ɛ́ fiɛɛ nu dvú fì bó gomte keekiɛɛ, ɛ́ bó bife ɛ̂ bole' bobole seke bó ɛ tu jim yew, njefo ɛ̀ nu kenshoose fô kpwoon ejemyi ɛ̂ kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le ɛnte.
46014036	Ben ekeè lɛ kɛ ɛ̀ to kɛw ben diɛw Nyo' kɛ. Nuu lɛ ɛ̀ to kɛw ben ɛ? Ɛ kɛ ɛ̀ mɛy kɛ ben bò diɛw Nyo' nu ɛ gɛn wase fó kɛ. Nuu lɛ ɛ̀ mɛy ben ɛ?
46014037	Wee wvù kee naa lɛ wen nu wee wvù teete bontum bo Nyo' le, kɛnɛɛ wvù kee lɛ Nyo' nu ɛ nya wen bô nnya ye yi Keyoy ke Yuule, wvú kɛŋke keebee lɛ fiɛɛ fin fì me nsaŋ fô ben e nu ɛ ɛ̀ gay Tata lɛ me ensaŋ.
46014038	Ɛ́ wee baa ebee fí, tu bó nu ema lo tɛn wvú bô fiew fiɛɛ.
46014039	Boom bo bwɛɛm e, fí ɛ mum ɛ no nu lɛ, ben ekɛŋkè shiee baay ɛ ɛ̀ nu keeteete bontum bo Nyo' le. Geenɛn, fo ben etun fo bonyii ejemyì díɛw yì bó baa kee yí kɛ.
46014040	Ben dioo gee mwɛɛm mvun mvunciim, no seysee ntay, gee ɛ̂ je yì jee le.
46015001	Boom bo bwɛɛm e, me ŋgomte keseen keeŋkume ben ɛkumɛ saaka wvù jee wvù me nto nfewcɛɛ ɛ̂ ben ɛ ben fiisɛn, ɛ no leeme yî dvú le keseen.
46015002	Ɛ̀ nu saaka wvudvu wvun wvù boysee ben ɛ́ ben fɛn jici dvú ntay. Ɛ̀ fuw kɛ nonɛn, tu ben to beŋe kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛcici.
46015003	Ben ekeè lɛ me nto nu ɛ nya fiɛɛ ɛ̂ ben ɛ fí kuuke baay fele lo mwɛɛm mvunciim. Ɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ fí fì bó to nyaɛ ɛ̂ me. Fiɛɛ fidvu nu lɛ Klistu to nu ɛ kpwe fô bibefɛ bisɛɛbeene le kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no bó to saŋɛɛ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le,
46015004	bô lɛ bó to nu ɛ dwey wvú, ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu ɛdiuw ɛta ɛ Nyo' bvuse wvú yî kpwe le kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no bó to saŋɛɛ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le,
46015005	noo lɛ wvú to nu ɛ duŋcɛ ɛkolɛ kew ɛ̂ Bita, bvuu duŋcɛ tɛn ɛ̂ boom bew bo ntum e bo yuufe ncow bofɛɛ.
46015006	Ɛ wvú ke duŋcɛ tɛn ɛkolɛ kew ɛ̂ bonyii bo mbee le ɛ bó nu bvudvuu bvumwaaŋ fele wee gee tin. Bonyii nteen ŋgoo yin e bɛɛ kɛ naa dvú ɛbɛn, ɛ bomew ɛ kpwekɛn wase.
46015007	Ɛ wvú ke bvuu duŋcɛ ɛkolɛ kew ɛ̂ Jɛm, bvuu duŋcɛ ɛ̂ boom bew bo ntum e bocii.
46015008	Ɛ ɛ̀ ke dioo nu ɛjim, ɛ wvú duŋcɛ tɛn ɛkolɛ kew ɛ̂ me wvun wvù nu ɛnte jo boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e diɛwɛ wan wvù bó to bokɛɛ kente le.
46015009	Me njemyi nonɛn njefo me nu lo diɛwɛ wee wvu caan e ɛnte jo boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e bocii. Ɛ me mbaa encim eŋkpwɛntɛn wvù bó eteŋe me lɛ waa ntum Jisos kɛ, njefo me nto mbone bikaa ɛjim jo kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le ke Nyo' le.
46015010	Geenɛn, ɛ Nyo' buw me, ge ɛ me no nu fiɛɛ fì me nu fí keseen. Kɛ nfi wvun wvù Nyo' to nyaɛ ɛ̂ me to nu ɛ la ɛcici kɛ. Me nto nu ɛ ŋkaa nlem naa nfey lo boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e bocii. Geenɛn, ɛ kɛ ɛ to lemte me bô mvuŋgay mwem kɛ. Ɛ̀ to nu nfi wvun wvù Nyo' to buwɛɛ me dvú wvù to lemte yî yɛm e.
46015011	Fí ɛ mum ɛ no nu lɛ kɛnɛɛ ɛ̀ to nu me wvù to fewcɛɛ saaka wvun ɛ̂ ben, kɛnɛɛ ɛ̀ to fewci bó, tu ɛ̀ nu kɛ fiɛɛ fimwaaŋ fì bee bó fewci, ɛ ben to bee fí le.
46015012	Keseen no bese fewci lɛ Klistu to nu ɛ buy yî kpwe le, ben bomew ɛ ge nɛɛ ɛ sɛ no duu lɛ kɛ bonyii bò kpwekɛn wase nu ke ebuy yî kpwe le kɛ?
46015013	Ɛ́ ɛ̀ fɛn nu kecɛɛy lɛ kɛ bonyii bò kpwekɛn wase nu ke ebuy yî kpwe le, tu kɛ Klistu to nu ɛ buy tɛn yî kpwe le kɛ.
46015014	Ɛ́ ɛ̀ nu lɛ Klistu to baa buy yî kpwe le, tu fiɛɛ fì bese fewci nu ɛcici, ɛ mbee wene nu tɛn ɛcici.
46015015	Ɛ́ ɛ̀ fɛn nu nonɛn, tu bese teyte fiɛɛ yî Nyo' le ɛcici, njefo bese ghane fewci lɛ wvú to nu ɛ bvuse Klistu yî kpwe le sɛ wvú to nu ɛ bvuse ŋkuuŋ, ɛ́ ɛ̀ fɛn nu kecɛɛy lɛ kɛ bonyii bò kpwekɛn wase nu ke ebuy yî kpwe le kɛ.
46015016	Ɛ́ ɛ̀ fɛn nu kecɛɛy lɛ kɛ bonyii nu ke ebuy yî kpwe le, tu kɛ Klistu to nu ɛ buy tɛn yî kpwe le kɛ.
46015017	Fí ɛ no nu lɛ ɛ́ ɛ̀ fɛn nu lɛ Klistu to baa buy yî kpwe le, tu mbee wene nu ɛcici, ɛ bibefɛ binɛn bɛɛ kɛ yî yene le.
46015018	Ɛ́ fí emum enu tɛn lɛ bonyii bò nu ɛ kpwekɛn wase ɛ bó to taashɛ bô bo Klistu nu ɛ la wase ɛcici.
46015019	Ɛ́ beene gɛɛle bvufee yî Klistu le, taale lɛ wvú efiì beene ɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ yî nshii wvun e maaŋ, tu beene nu bonyii bò shen ekoole bonyii dvú yî woŋ wvun e fele lo bonyii bocii.
46015020	Geenɛn, kecɛɛy kedvu nu lɛ Nyo' to nu ɛ bvuse Klistu yî kpwe le. Ɛ ɛ̀ nu Klistu wee wvu fwe wvù cɛɛlɛɛ je fô bonyii bò nu ɛ kpwekɛn wase le.
46015021	No wee mwaaŋ to geɛ ɛ kpwe to fô bonyii le bocii, nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no wee mwaaŋ nu ɛ ge lɛ bonyii nu ke ebuy yî kpwe le.
46015022	Fí ɛ no nu lɛ no bonyii bocii kpwee njefo bó nu kfuu di Adam e, nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no bonyii bocii nu ke ebuy yî kpwe le njefo bó nu bonyii bo Klistu le.
46015023	Geenɛn, ɛ wee nu ke ebuyte kɛ ɛ̂ kew kefew e. Ɛ Klistu nu wee wvù to yawɛɛ cɛɛ je buy. Ɛ wvú nu ke dioo ɛ kase ɛ to, ɛ́ bonyii bò nu bew emum ebuy tɛn.
46015024	Fí nu ke dioo ɛ kooy nonɛn, ɛ́ emum enu kefew kè woŋ nu eka. Klistu nu ke efiwsɛ bvunfon bô mvuŋgay noo bvukukɛ bvucii bvù saake keseen, emum etfuse bvunfon bwew ɛ̂ Nyo' Ice.
46015025	Ɛ wvú wvù Klistu kɛŋke kɛ keesaake egɛn ebuy seke Nyo' nu ke egɛɛ bonyii bew bo bvuban e bocii ɛ̂ wvú ɛkuse ɛ́ wvú etome bikaa yî bó le.
46015026	Ɛ wee bvuban wvu ɛjim wvù wvú nu ke emɛse efiwsɛ nu kpwe.
46015027	Ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì bó to saŋɛɛ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le lɛ, “Nyo' nu ɛ gɛɛ wase mwɛɛm mvunciim ɛ̂ wvú ɛkuse wvú ɛ no saake.” Geenɛn, keegay lɛ mwɛɛm mvunciim nu ɛ̂ wvú ɛkuse yaa mum nu lɛ Nyo' wvù gɛke mwɛɛm mvunciim ɛ̂ wvú ɛkuse nu tɛn ɛ̂ wvú ɛkuse kɛ.
46015028	Ɛ̀ nu ke enu seke mwɛɛm mvunciim nu wase ɛ̂ Klistu ɛkuse ɛ wvú saake, ɛ́ wvú wvù Waa Nyo' emum egɛɛ ɛkolɛ kew ɛkuse jo Ice wvù gɛke mwɛɛm mvunciim ɛ̂ wvú ɛkuse, wvu lɛ Nyo' emum enu ɛwe jo fiɛɛ ficii mondvuum monciim saake.
46015029	Ɛ́ ɛ̀ baa nu lɛ bonyii bò nu ɛ kpwekɛn wase nu ke ekase buy yî kpwe le, bó ɛ no leese bonyii ɛ̂ joo yî bvudvuu bvu bonyii bò kpwekɛn wase le nje la? Bó leese bó ɛ̂ joo nonɛn lɛ sɛw wvudvu nu la?
46015030	Bese tɛn ɛ no ghane yuu ye nɛn nje la?
46015031	Boom bo bwɛɛm e, me nu diuw kpwe le ɛdiuw ɛcii. Me njemyi mwɛɛm mvun nɛn njefo me n'yuuke ye yî fiɛɛ fì Klistu Jisos wvù Tata wesebeene nu ɛ ge fô ben e fele can yɛm e.
46015032	Ɛ́ ɛ̀ baa nu lɛ bonyii bò kpwekɛn wase nu ke ebuy yî kpwe le, no bonyii ké no jemyi mwɛɛm, ɛ me ŋke ŋgɛn Ɛfɛsus, ɛ bonyii ɛ bó ŋale diɛwɛ nyám yi ŋkpwaante le no diuu bee bó gomte keesaayɛ lo me, lɛ sɛw wvudvu nu la? Ɛ́ me eŋfaŋɛ nlu lo eŋgay lɛ fí enù no bó ké no duu lɛ, “Beene ediekenè, wukenè njefo ntfuu nu ɛ bó nu ebuy ekpwekɛn” e?
46015033	Fo wee elɛɛlè ben kɛ. Ben ekeè lɛ, “Ɛ́ wee wvù keŋge kew jee lɛne bô ŋgoo yì befe, ɛ́ ŋgoo yidvu ebefe bô wvú.”
46015034	Ben etee bvufee bvunɛn jim, ecinɛ kebefɛ le. Me n'yɛne lɛ kɛ ben bomew kee Nyo' kɛ. Ɛ me njemyi nɛn keeŋge lɛ ben ewuumenè.
46015035	Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wee mvu enɛ ebiite lɛ laa bonyii nu ke ebuyte yî kpwe le nɛɛ le lɛ? Bó nu ke ekɛŋke ɛ ɛ̀ nu kfuu ye yì nɛɛ lɛ?
46015036	Wvuwɛ wee wvù biite nonɛn nu keyuŋ. Kɛ wvú kee lɛ bó ké jewyi fiɛɛ fí saa ke ebuy sɛ fí ɛ yaw ɛ kpwe le?
46015037	Kɛ ye fiɛɛ fì bó ké jewe nu yí yì ké buy no kuu kɛ. Bó ké jewe kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu ŋgow ɛyinɛyin, kɛnɛɛ ɛ̀ nu ŋgow ɛgiŋ, kɛnɛɛ ɛ̀ nu yi la,
46015038	ɛ Nyo' mum nya ŋgow yidvu bô ye yì wvú shieele. Ɛ wvú nyaa ye jɛɛy jɛɛy ɛ̂ ŋgow no ŋgow yidvu nu.
46015039	Kɛ mwɛɛm mvunciim kɛŋke nyam ye lɛŋlɛŋ kɛ. Bonyii kɛŋke yibo nyam ye jɛɛy, ɛ nyám kɛŋke yibo, ɛ mvunyiim kɛŋke yibo, ɛ byé kɛŋke tɛn yibo ye.
46015040	Mwɛɛm mvu we nu ɛ̂ yibo je le, ɛ mvu fokuse nu ɛ̂ yibo je le. Mwɛɛm mvu we kɛŋke bvubole bvujoŋkɛ, ɛ mvu fokuse kɛŋke bvubole bvujoŋkɛ.
46015041	Diuu kɛŋke bwew bvujoŋkɛ, ɛ kpwee kɛŋke bwew bvujoŋkɛ, ɛ jón kɛŋke tɛn bvubole bvujoŋkɛ. Ɛ kɛ jon yimi bô yimi cim kɛŋke bvujoŋkɛ lɛŋlɛŋ kɛ.
46015042	Ɛ̀ nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no ye bonyii nu ke enu seke bó buyte yî kpwe le. Bó ké dweyte wee ɛ ye ye fo, geenɛn kɛ ye yì wvú nu ke ebuy dvú yî kpwe le bɛɛ ke efo kɛ.
46015043	Bó dweyte wee bô ye ɛ yí yaa yen'yi jee kɛ, yaa kɛŋke mvuŋgay kɛ. Geenɛn, ɛ wvú nu ke ebuyte yî kpwe le bô ye ɛ yí kɛŋke bvujoŋkɛ, kɛŋke mvuŋgay.
46015044	Bó dweyte wee ɛ ye ye nu yî wee wvu wum. Geenɛn, wvú nu ke ebuyte yî kpwe le bô ye ɛ ɛ̀ nu wase yî keyoy. Ɛ́ ye wee wvu wum nu lo, tu ye keyoy nu lo tɛn.
46015045	Bó nu ɛ saŋ lɛ, “Adam wvu fwe to nu ɛ no nu dvú, yoyte.” Ɛ̀ dioo tu fô Adam wvu ɛjim e, ɛ wvú no nu fiew keyoy kè nyaa nshii ɛ̂ bonyii.
46015046	Kɛ wee ké yaw no kɛŋke ye ɛ ɛ̀ nu yi keyoy kɛ. Wvú ké yaw kɛŋkɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu ye wee wvu wum sɛ ké kɛŋkɛ yi keyoy.
46015047	Adam wvu fwe nu ɛ bó to bom bô kebvu ke yî nshɛ le. Ɛ Adam wvu ɛjim to nɛ fiew fowe.
46015048	Bonyii bo fokuse fɛn nu diɛwɛ wee wvu fwe wvù bó to bomɛɛ bô nshɛ le, ɛ bonyii bo fowe nu diɛwɛ wee wvù to nɛn'yɛɛ fowe le.
46015049	No beene nu ɛ jo nfieesɛn yi wee wvù bó to bomɛɛ bô nshɛ, nu kɛ no beene nu ke ejo yi wee wvù to nɛn'yɛɛ fowe le.
46015050	Boom bo bwɛɛm e, ɛ́ me ensee ɛ̂ ben lɛ kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ ye yin yì ɛ̀ nu nyam bô ɛlɛmɛ ke ekɛŋkɛ bvudvuu ɛnte jo bvunfon bvu Nyo' le kɛ. Ɛ kɛ ɛ̀ nulo tɛn ɛ́ fiɛɛ fì nulo efo ke ekɛŋkɛ bvudvuu fô fiɛɛ yaa foo fó le kɛ.
46015051	Ben eyekɛ eyuw ɛ́ me ensee ben kenyilɛ ke fiɛɛ le. Kɛ beene bocii nu ke ekpwekɛn kɛ. Geenɛn ɛ ye yesebeene bocii nu ke esɛsɛ ekumɛn.
46015052	Bó nu ke edioo ɛ toŋ soŋ yi fokemɛse, ɛ́ ye yesebeene emum ekumɛn kɛ nɛn mwaŋŋ no wee ke bɛwbɛw jise. Soŋ nu ke dioo ɛ jeme ɛ́ bonyii bò nu ɛ kpwekɛn wase emum ebuy yî kpwe le bô ye yì yaa bɛɛ ke efo kɛ, ɛ́ beene bò bɛɛ dvú emum ekumɛn lo.
46015053	Ye yin yì nulo efo kɛŋke keeke ekumɛn etu wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu yì yaa nulo efo kɛ. Ɛ ye yì nulo ekpwe kɛŋke keeke ekumɛn etu wase yì yaa nulo ekpwe kɛ.
46015054	Seke ye yì nulo ekpwe ebvuu efo ɛ kumɛn wase ɛ tu yì yaa nulo ekpwe ebvuu efo kɛ, ɛ́ fiɛɛ ficii emum ekocɛn no bó saŋ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le lɛ, “Bó nu ɛ so wase kpwe ɛ ŋgoy mvuŋgay mwew.
46015055	O kpwe, mvuŋgay mwuw ɛ fɛɛ? O kpwe, gbwɛɛŋ wo wvù wo taa bonyii dvú ɛ fɛɛ?”
46015056	Gbwɛɛŋ kpwe nu kebefɛ, ɛ mvuŋgay mvu kebefɛ le nu nci Nyo'.
46015057	Beene enyaà keyoone ɛ̂ Nyo' wvù nu ɛ taashɛ beene bo Tata wesebeene wvù Jisos Klistu beene ɛ no soo kebefɛ noo kpwe.
46015058	Nonɛn boom bo bwɛɛm e bò nu shém yɛm, ben eleemè tɛmyì. Fo fiɛɛ eshiikè naa lo ben kɛ. Ben elemtè lemme di Tata le sekecii, ekeè lɛ kɛ lemme dì wee gee nje Tata nu ke ela ɛcici kɛ.
46016001	Me nu enjeme keseen ɛkumɛ nnya yì bó nyaa keefi bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo Nyo' le dvú. Ben egeè kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no me nto ŋgayɛɛ lɛ bintaashɛ bi bonyii bo mbee le bi Galɛshia egeè.
46016002	Seke ɛ̀ nu diuu di fwe yî kemaa le kecii, ɛ wee mwaaŋ mwaaŋ baa fiɛɛ seyse gɛɛ. Wee dioo baale, baa kɛ no Nyo' nu ɛ buw wvú. Ɛ́ me ŋke endioo ɛ nto ben saa ebvuu eshe esuuke lo kensuw kɛ.
46016003	Me nu ŋke endioo ɛ nfɛse, emum ensaŋ ŋwa' embɛne fô nnya yene le, ɛ́ bonyii bò ben nu ɛ baa emum ejo egɛn dvú Jɛlusalɛm.
46016004	Ɛ́ fí fɛn nu ɛ kocɛn ben e lɛ me eŋgɛn tɛn, ɛ́ bee bó emum egɛn.
46016005	Me nu ŋke en'yaw enfey je Masedonia seke me ntoo ɛ̂ ben e, njefo me ŋgomte keenfey je jó.
46016006	Ɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ beene ke ece, ce naa ɛ kefew ke nffum wvù tɛmyi le ke eghan efey, wvu lɛ ben ke eficɛ me yî lɛne diem e, ɛ́ me emum eŋgɛne jò me ŋgɛne.
46016007	Kɛ me ŋgomte lɛ me ŋke endioo ɛ nto ɛ̂ ben e keseen ɛ́ beene eyɛnɛn kɛ lo we we kɛ. Me ntaale fwe, ŋkee lɛ me nu ŋke ento ɛ́ beene ebosɛn ece, ɛ́ Tata fɛn ɛ bee.
46016008	Geenɛn me embɛɛ ence Ɛfɛsus jan eŋgɛn embuy diuu di Ŋkaw Bɛntekos e.
46016009	Kembuŋ ke baay nu ɛ yene fô me le jan keeŋgee lemme di Nyo' le, naa no bonyii bomew cim nu dvú bane lemme didvu din nɛn.
46016010	Ɛ́ Timatio ke eto lo, ɛ́ ben yɛn lɛ ben nu ɛ ge wvú ɛ no yuuke njoŋ ɛ̂ ben ɛnte, njefo wvú gee lemme ɛ ɛ̀ nu di Nyo' le lɛŋlɛŋ kɛ diɛwɛ me.
46016011	Fo wee ejo wvú ɛkuse kɛ. Ben ke eficɛ wvú ɛ́ wvú elɛn nyɛkeey etu jim fô me le, njefo bee boom bo bwee wesebeene le cɛyte wvú.
46016012	Fi ɛkumɛ waa bwee wesebeene wvù Abolos nu ɛ me nse nu ɛ no nlɛke wvú lɛ wvú elaa ghane ɛ̂ ben e bô boom bo bwee wesebeene le bomew ba, geenɛn wvú se baa kooŋke naa lo keeto keseen kɛ. Wvú nu ke edioo ɛ kɛŋke je, emum eto.
46016013	Ben dioo nu no yɛnè. Ben eleemè tɛmyi yî mbee wene le, enù bonyii bò kɛŋke mvuntelem. Ben eleemè tɛmyi.
46016014	Ben dioo gee fiɛɛ ficii no gee bô keŋkoŋɛn.
46016015	Boom bo bwɛɛm e, ben ekeè lɛ Tɛfanas bô yew ye nu bonyii bo fwe ɛ̂ keba kè Akɛya le bò to yawɛɛ lese fitele yî Tata le, nya bikuu bibole keefici bonyii bo Nyo' le.
46016016	Me ɛ no ŋkule can lɛ ben eyuukè bonyii kɛ diɛwɛ ban e, ebvuu eyuukè tɛn bonyii bò lemte yî fiɛɛ le fimwaaŋ bô bó le.
46016017	Me ɛ no n'yuuke njoŋ no wvú wvù Tɛfanas bô Fotunatus noo Akaykus nu ɛ to keeyɛn me le. Me nu ɛ n'yɛn bó le fí ɛ mum ɛ no nu lɛ me nu ɛ n'yɛn wase ben e.
46016018	Bó nu ɛ lɛɛse fitele fiem kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no bó lɛɛse mvunɛn. Bonyii diɛwɛ ban e nu bò ben ewvumtè bó.
46016019	Bintaashɛ bi bonyii bo mbee le bi Ɛsia jan gayte ben e. Akpwila bô Blisilia noo kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le kè shiile ɛ̂ bó yew gayte ben e ɛ̂ diee di Tata le.
46016020	Boom bo bwee wesebeene le bo mbee le ciinse tɛn ŋgayma. Ben egay wee tfuu le eŋocɛ diɛwɛ bonyii bo Nyo' le.
46016021	Wvun ŋgayma saaŋke me wvù Baul bô kebo kem.
46016022	Lon ekoo wee wvù baa ekooŋke Tata kɛ. Kee Tata, kase kɛ eto.
46016023	Tata Jisos ebuw ben bô kembonɛn kew sekecii.
46016024	Keŋkoŋɛn kem enù fô ben e sekecii njefo beene nu ɛ taashɛ yî Klistu Jisos e. Fí enù nonɛn.
47001001	Ɛ̀ nu me wvù Baul, ɛ me nu waa ntum Klistu Jisos yî ŋkoŋ wvù wvu Nyo' le. Ɛ̀ nu bee waa bwee wesebeene wvù Timatio. Me nsaaŋke ŋwa' wvun fô kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le bo Nyo' le bo Kolɛn, noo fô bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo Nyo' le bocii bo keba kè Akɛya le kecii.
47001002	Nyo' Icee wesebeene bô Tata Jisos Klistu ebuw ben, ebvuu enya ben bô mvuntelem mvù lɛɛtene.
47001003	Mbense enù fô Nyo' wvù ɛ̀ nu Nyo' wvu Tata wesebeene wvù Jisos Klistu, bvuu nu Ice le. Wvú nu Icee shen, nu Nyo' wvù lɛɛse mvuntelem mvu bonyii le yî mwɛɛm e mvunciim.
47001004	Ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù ké no lɛɛsee mvuntelem mvusɛɛbeene yî boŋgɛw bosɛɛbeene le bocii wvu lɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ beene emum ekee tɛn keelɛɛsee mvuntelem mvu bonyii bomew e seke bó nu yî boŋgɛw e. Beene nulo ekee keelɛɛsee nonɛn ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô nlɛɛse wvù Nyo' nu ɛ lɛɛse mvusɛɛbeene mvuntelem dvú.
47001005	Bese kee lo lɛ kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no boŋgɛw bo Klistu le nu fô bese le baay, nu kɛ no Nyo' nu efele yî Klistu le lɛɛsee mvuntelem mvusɛse kɛ tɛn baay.
47001006	Ɛ́ bese nu yî monlum e, tu ɛ̀ nu keelɛɛse mvuntelem mvunɛn noo keeboyse ben. Ɛ́ bó lɛɛse mvuntelem mvusɛse, tu ɛ̀ nu keege ɛ́ mvuntelem mvunɛn elɛɛtene, ɛ́ ben ekuu shém enu nyɛkeey yî boŋgɛw bò ben yɛne diɛwɛ no bese yɛne le.
47001007	Fiɛɛ fì bese taale fwe kee ɛkumɛ ben nu ɛ kɛ fiɛɛ nulo eshiw bese kɛ, njefo bese kee lo lɛ no ben yɛne ŋgɛw diɛwɛ bese le, nu ɛ ben tɛn nu ekɛŋke mvuntelem mvù lɛɛtene diɛwɛ bese le.
47001008	Boom bo bwee wese le, kɛ bese gomte lɛ ben enù sɛ ben kee kfuu ŋgɛw wvù bese to wuɛ woŋ wvù Ɛsia le kɛ. Wvuwɛ ŋgɛw to tɛmyi baay fele mvuŋgay, ɛ bese no yɛne lɛ kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bese ebvuu eluŋ kɛ.
47001009	Yî kecɛɛy e, bese to kee lɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ wase kpwe fô bese le. Geenɛn fifin to kooyi nonɛn keege lɛ fo bese eyeemè yî bikuu bisɛse le kɛ, lɛ bese eyeemè ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî Nyo' le. Ɛ̀ nu wvú wee wvù bvuuse bonyii yî kpwe le.
47001010	Wvú wvudvu wvù to bvusɛɛ bese yî kfuu wvuwɛ ŋgɛw wvù ɛ̀ to yen'yi wase kpwe le, nu ɛ wvú nu ke emɛy kɛ ebvuuse. Bese nu ɛ gɛɛ bvufee ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî ye le lɛ wvú bɛɛ kɛ ke ebvuu ebvuuse bese sekecii,
47001011	no ben nu etomte bese bô bunle yene. Nonɛn ɛ́ bonyii emum ke enyaa keyoone ɛ̂ Nyo' fô bese le nje fiɛɛ fì jee fì wvú nu ɛ buw bese dvú nje bunle bonyii nteen.
47001012	Fiɛɛ nu dvú fì bese saale ye yî dvú le, ɛ fitele fisɛse tomte bese ɛkumɛ fí. Fí nu lɛ, gee disɛse ɛ̂ woŋ jan, ɛfey mvunciim fô ben e, nu dì yuule, nu kecɛɛy no Nyo' gomte. Kɛ bese gee gee dì bii bvufee bvu yî woŋ wvun e kɛ. Bese gee bii ɛ ɛ̀ nu no Nyo' nu ɛ buw bese lɛ bese egeè.
47001013	Kɛ bese saaŋke fiɛɛ fimew fô ben e jɛɛy ɛfey fì ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ ben etaŋ ekiɛɛ fí kɛ. Me ŋkpwaake lɛ ben nu ke etaŋ ekiɛɛ fí ficii,
47001014	kɛ no ben nu ɛ kiɛɛ wase bese keseen caan, wvu lɛ ɛ́ ke edioo enu diuu dì Tata wesebeene wvù Jisos ɛ to, ɛ́ ben esaale ye bô bese kɛ naa no bese saale ye bô ben.
47001015	No me nto ŋkee naa fifin nonɛn, ɛ me mum no ŋgomte keen'yaw nto ɛ̂ ben e, wvu lɛ ben ekɛŋkɛ sɛw wɛm bokaŋ bofɛɛ.
47001016	Me nto ŋkaake lɛ me nu ŋke endioo eŋgɛne Masedonia enfey je jo ben, bô lɛ me nu ŋke endioo eŋkaase embvuu enfey je jo ben ɛ́ ben eficɛ me yî lɛne diem di Judea le.
47001017	Ben kpwaake lɛ no me nto mbaa eŋghan enfey kɛ, nu ɛ me nto ŋkaake nonɛn ŋgee ɛ ɛ̀ nu ndvum e? Nuu lɛ me ndioo ŋkaake fiɛɛ no ŋkaake ɛ̂ je wee wvu fokuse fɛn wvù beŋe fiɛɛ lɛ “'Ɛɛ” mum kase tun kɛ sekedvu lɛ “'Aay” e?
47001018	Yî kecɛɛy e, no Nyo' ké no leeme kɛ yî diɛw ye le, kɛ fiɛɛ fì bese jemyi ɛ̂ ben ké no nu fì bese ebee lɛ, “'Ɛɛ” kase tun lɛ, “'Aay” kɛ.
47001019	Ɛ fí nu nonɛn njefo kɛ Jisos Klistu wvù Waa Nyo' wvù bee bo Silas noo Timatio to fewci ɛ̂ ben ɛnte nu wvù beŋe fiɛɛ lɛ, “'Ɛɛ” kase tun lɛ, “'Aay” kɛ. Ɛ̀ ké no nu kɛ lɛ, “'Ɛɛ” sekecii.
47001020	Ben ekeè lɛ yî Klistu le nu ɛ boŋkawma bò Nyo' geɛ bocii nu ɛ wvú ɛ bee dvú lɛ “'Ɛɛ”. Ɛ̀ nu nje fifin wvù beene fele yî Klistu le gayte ɛ̂ Nyo' lɛ “Fí enù nonɛn.” Ɛ̀ nɛɛ no beene ké no tumte moŋkum mew nɛn.
47001021	Ɛ̀ nu Nyo' wvù nu ɛ leke bese ɛ leke tɛn ben, beene ɛ no tɛmyi yî Klistu le. Wvú nu ɛ caw beene.
47001022	Wvú nu ɛ gɛɛ nciise we yî yese beene le wvù ɛ̀ nu Keyoy kew kè nu fô mvuntelem mvusɛɛbeene le diɛwɛ sâ' fiɛɛ ficii fì beene nu ke ekɛŋkɛ le.
47001023	Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me mbe Nyo' ɛ́ wvú eben jim nsaw wɛm lɛ me nto mbaa nto Kolɛn ɛ ɛ̀ nu njefo me nto ŋgomte keembawcɛ lo ben.
47001024	Ɛ kɛ ɛ̀ nu lɛ bese gomte keeleeme kɛ lɛ ɛ̀ nɛɛ no mbee wene kɛŋke keenu kɛ. Bese kaa lemte lo beene keeto bô njoŋ fô ben e. Bese kee lɛ ben leeme tɛmyi yî mbee wene le.
47002001	Nonɛn ɛ me mum ŋkpwawcɛ lɛ kɛ me mbɛɛ mbvuu nlaa ghane dì eto bô nsase kɛ.
47002002	Ɛ́ me embvuu enɛ ɛ ŋge ben ɛ yuw nsase, ɛ́ ebvuu enu yɛɛ dvú wvù nulo ege ɛ́ me en'yuw njoŋ ɛfey ben boba bò me nu ɛ ŋge wase bó ɛ yuw nsase?
47002003	Ɛ̀ nɛɛ fiɛɛ fì to geɛ ɛ me nsɛ nsaŋ ŋwa' wɛ ɛ̂ je yì me nto nsaŋɛɛ le. Ɛ̀ to nu wvu lɛ me ŋke ndioo ɛ nto ɛ̂ ben e, me nsaa ŋke eŋkɛŋkɛ nsase wvumvu wvù nɛ fô ben bò bee ege ɛ́ me en'yuw ɛ ɛ̀ nu njoŋ e kɛ, njefo me ŋkee naa ntay ɛkumɛ ben bocii lɛ njoŋ wɛm nu kɛ njoŋ wene bocii.
47002004	Ben ekeè lɛ ŋwa' wvudvu wɛ nu ɛ me nto nsaaŋke bô nsase wvu baay, ɛ fitele tone me, ɛ misɛm ɛ yiŋsɛn ɛ̂ me ɛjise. Ɛ kɛ me nto nsaŋ nonɛn keeŋge ɛ́ ben eyuw ɛ ɛ̀ nu nsase kɛ. Ɛ̀ to nu keege ɛ́ ben ekiɛɛ keŋkoŋɛn ke baay kè me ŋkɛŋke fô ben e.
47002005	Ɛ́ wee to nu ɛ ge ɛ me n'yuw nsase, tu kɛ nsase wvun to mɛy kɛ fô me le kɛ. Wvú to nu tɛn fô ben e bocii. (Kɛ fifin nu fiɛɛ fì me enjemyì eŋgɛne yî dvú le baay kɛ).
47002006	Ŋgɛw wvun wvù wee nteen ben e nu ɛ nya wase ɛ̂ wvuwɛ wee nu ɛ wvú ɛ kocɛn nonɛn.
47002007	Keseen nu ɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ ben elɛɛshɛ jay we, ege ɛ́ fitele fiew elɛɛtene, wvu lɛ fo wvú emɛy kɛ wase enu shen shen baay kɛ.
47002008	Nonɛn me ɛ no ŋkule can ɛ̂ ben lɛ ben ekase eduŋcɛ ɛ̂ wvú lɛ ben bɛɛ kɛ kooŋke wvú.
47002009	Ɛ̀ nɛɛ fiɛɛ fì to geɛ ɛ me nsɛ nsaŋ ŋwa' wɛ fô ben e keemom ben eŋkiɛɛ lɛ laa ben yuuke kɛ me le yî fiɛɛ le ficii lɛ.
47002010	Ɛ́ ben lɛɛshi jay wee, tu me tɛn nu ɛ nlɛɛshɛ. Ɛ́ me nlɛɛshi fiɛɛ, fɛn ɛ́ fiɛɛ nu dvú keelɛɛshɛ, tu me nlɛɛshi ɛ̂ Klistu ɛjise nje yene.
47002011	Beene gee nonɛn wvu lɛ fo Satan ke enɛ eley jó ekɛŋke mvuŋgay ɛ̂ beene we. Kɛ beene maa no wvú ké no wɛɛntene kɛ.
47002012	Ɛ̀ to nu seke me nto ŋgɛnɛɛ mbuy kelaante kè Towas e keenfewcɛ saaka wvù jee wvu ɛkumɛ Klistu jó, ɛ Tata yene kembuŋ fô me le keenlem lemme diew jó.
47002013	Geenɛn bvufee bwem to baa nu fó kɛ, njefo me nto mbaa n'yɛn waa bwɛɛm wvù Taytus e jó kɛ. Nonɛn ɛ me mum ŋgay bó le lɛ bó ɛ shɛɛ wase, mum nto Masedonia.
47002014	Geenɛn, keyoone nu fô Nyo' le wvù ké no saa fwe dvusɛse yî Klistu le nyaa mbɛɛtɛ, ɛ bese bii diɛwɛ bonyii bò wvú nu ɛ kɛŋkɛ gbwen jem e. Ɛ wvú mum fele yî yese le saŋse Klistu mondvuum e monciim ɛ bó kee wvú yuuke nsam we diɛwɛ jiin fò bó ɛ ton e.
47002015	Ben ekeè lɛ bese nu diɛwɛ nsam jiin di Klistu le fô Nyo' le ɛntelɛŋ jo bonyii bò bó boysee bó noo fô bò laa wase le.
47002016	Fô bonyii bò laa wase le nu ɛ nsam wvun too ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô kpwe fô bó le. Ɛ bonyii bò bó boyse bó nu ɛ nsam wvun too ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô nshii fô bó le. No fí nu nonɛn, tu ɛ̀ nu yɛɛ dvú wvù nu ɛ kocɛn keege didin lemme?
47002017	Kɛ bese nu diɛwɛ bonyii nteen e bò nu ɛ jo diɛw Nyo' yí ɛ tu fiɛɛ fi way e fì bó ghane geese lo kɛ. Bese nu fisɛse bonyii bò nu ɛ taashɛ yî Klistu le. Ɛ bese fewci diɛw Nyo' bô mvuntelem mvù yuule diɛwɛ bonyii bò Nyo' nu ɛ tum bó, ɛ bó leeme ɛ̂ wvú ɛjise le.
47003001	Me nfɛn ŋgayte nɛn ɛ fí nu lɛ bese bvuu kaase duŋci lo bikuu bisɛse ɛ̂ ben e? Nuu lɛ bese shieele boŋwa' diɛwɛ no bonyii bomew shieele boban boŋwa' bò nɛ fô bese le kɛnɛɛ fô ben e bò duŋci bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bese lɛ?
47003002	Ben kebɛɛ nu wase ŋwa' wese wvù bó nu ɛ saŋ ɛ̂ mvuntelem mvusɛse le lɛ wee tfuu nulo ekiɛɛ ebvuu etaaŋke.
47003003	Ben yen'yi lɛ ben nu ŋwa' Klistu ɛ bese ɛ seyse. Ŋwa' wvun nu ɛ kɛ bó saŋ ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô kete ke ŋwa' le kɛ. Bó saŋ ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô Keyoy ke Nyo' wvù kɛŋke nshii le. Ɛ kɛ bó saŋ ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî biwaŋ bi ɛta yo ɛta le kɛ. Bó saŋ ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî biwaŋ bì ɛ̀ nu mvuntelem mvu bonyii le.
47003004	Fifin nu fiɛɛ ɛ bese jemyi ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛjise sɛ kemaŋɛn nje Klistu.
47003005	Kɛ ɛ̀ nu lɛ bese nu ɛ kocɛn bô bikuu bisɛse keege fiɛɛ fimew wvù bese ke nɛ eduu lɛ fiɛɛ fimew nɛ fô bese le kɛ. Ɛ̀ ge Nyo' bese ɛ sɛ kocɛn.
47003006	Wvú nu ɛ ge bese ɛ kocɛn keelemte yî saaka moŋkan mo monfɛm e. Kɛ moŋkan man yaa nu mò bii ɛ ɛ̀ nu bonci bò bó saŋɛɛ lo bô can kɛ. Ɛ̀ nu mo Keyoy ke Yuule le. Bonci to too ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô kpwe. Geenɛn ɛ Keyoy nyaa ɛ ɛ̀ nu nshii ɛ̂ bonyii.
47003007	Je yi yvum yì bó to gee mwɛɛm jó nu ɛ bó to cow bonci bodvu yî biwaŋ bi ɛta le. Seke Muses to too bô bonci bodvu nu ɛ kɛ bonyii bo Islael to kee keebvuu etaa bvushiw bwew kɛ, nje n'yuu Nyo' wvù to baa yî bvushiw bwew e. Ɛ́ yiyɛ je yi yvum yì to too ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô kpwe to too kɛŋke n'yuu Nyo', ɛ n'yuu wvun nu wvù to baa nonɛn jimte wase kaa gɛne lo,
47003008	ɛ́ n'yuu je yì bó gee mwɛɛm jó yì ɛ̀ nu yi Keyoy ke Yuule saa efey naa lo wvuwɛ n'yuu le?
47003009	Ɛ́ je yì bó to gee mwɛɛm jó yì to too bô fiɛɛ fì leese lo bonyii ŋgɛw e, to too bô n'yuu Nyo', kɛ tu je yì bó gee mwɛɛm jó yì ɛ̀ nu yì Nyo' joo bonyii lɛ bó nu teytey ɛ̂ wvú ɛjise nulo ekɛŋke n'yuu ɛ wvú fele lo wvuwɛ!
47003010	Kecɛɛy kedvu nu lɛ fiɛɛ fì to too kɛŋke n'yuu Nyo' fidvu nu ɛ lase wase n'yuu we njefo n'yuu wvù kuuke fele wvuwɛ nu ɛ to wase.
47003011	Ɛ́ fiɛɛ fì to kaa wase gɛne lo to too bô n'yuu Nyo', kɛ tu n'yuu fiɛɛ fì too keenu wase kemakaa nu ekuuke fele naa lo wvuwɛ!
47003012	No bese kee nonɛn sɛ kemaŋɛn, bese ɛ mum ɛ no fewci yaa fane kɛ.
47003013	Kɛ bese nu diɛwɛ Muses wvù to ké baŋ bvushiw bwew bô ndvu keege lɛ fo bonyii bo Islael etaale no n'yuu wvù to baa yî bvushiw bwew e jimte kaa gɛne kɛ.
47003014	Geenɛn bonyii bodvu nu ɛ bvufee bvubole to jiime. Ɛ naa ɛ to ɛ buy ɛbɛn wvun e, nu ɛ bó dioo taaŋke fiɛɛ ɛ̂ ŋwa' moŋkan mo moyvuum e, ɛ́ bó eyuw, ɛ fiɛɛ no nu ɛ fí ɛ baŋ kɛ bvufee bvubole. Ɛ̀ nu kɛ yî Klistu le wvù ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó ecake fiɛɛ fì baaŋke fidvu.
47003015	Yî kecɛɛy e, ɛ to ɛ buy naa ɛbɛn wvun e, nu ɛ bó taaŋke fiɛɛ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Muses e, ɛ fiɛɛ no nu kɛ ɛ fí ɛ baŋ bvufee bvubole.
47003016	Geenɛn ɛ́ wee ke etu wase bô Tata, ɛ́ bó mum cake fiɛɛ fì baaŋke fidvu.
47003017	Tata wvun nu Keyoy, ɛ naa fɛɛ fô Keyoy kin nu, nu ɛ bonyii ke buy kɛ yî bvunfaw e.
47003018	Fí nu lɛ beene bocii bò nu sɛ fiɛɛ bɛɛ baaŋke monshim mosɛɛbeene nu ɛ n'yuu Tata baa yî yese beene le, gee ɛ beene baa mum kumene gɛne fwe fwe fieesene wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvú. Ŋkumɛn wvun nu ɛ ɛ̀ gee Tata wvù ɛ̀ nu Keyoy ke Yuule.
47004001	Nonɛn no bese kɛŋke lemme din ɛ ɛ̀ cam Nyo' shen ɛ nya ɛ̂ bese, tu kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ shem ekpwee bese dvú kɛ.
47004002	Bese nu ɛ base jim ɛ̂ mwɛɛm mvù bonyii gee ɛ̂ kenyilɛ le mvù ɛ̀ nu mvu kenshoose le. Bese nu ɛ tun je kenlɛɛma. Kɛ bese leese mbiay ɛ̂ diɛw Nyo' le kɛ. Bese ké no jemyi kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu kecɛɛy ɛndan ɛndan, duŋci bikuu bisɛse ɛ̂ wee tfuu ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛjise, wvu lɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó ekpwawcɛ ekiɛɛ bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bese.
47004003	Ɛ́ ɛ̀ cim nu lɛ saaka wvù jee wvù bese fewci wvun nu ɛ fiɛɛ baŋyi, tu fí baŋyi kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô bonyii bò laa lo le.
47004004	Fô boba bonyii bò baa bee saaka wvun e nu ɛ Satan wvù ɛ̀ nu nyo' wvu yî woŋ wvun e ɛ sûm bvufee bvubole bvú ɛ no jiime keege lɛ fo bó eyɛnè n'yuu saaka wvù jee wvù nu ɛkumɛ bvukukɛ bvu Klistu wvù nu wunte Nyo' le kɛ.
47004005	Ben ekeè lɛ kɛ bese fewci ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛkumɛ bikuu bisɛse kɛ. Bese fewci ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛkumɛ Klistu Jisos lɛ wvú nu Tata. Ɛ bese nu kɛ lo fisɛse bonyii bò lemte ben e nje Jisos.
47004006	Nyo' wvù to gayɛɛ lɛ, “N'yuu ebuy ɛ̂ ɛjiwɛ le ebaa”, ɛ̀ nu Nyo' wvudvu wvun wvù nu ɛ ge n'yuu we ɛ no baa fô mvuntelem mvusɛse le keeyuuse bese ɛ bese kee bvukukɛ bvu Nyo' le bvù nu yî bvushiw bvu Jisos Klistu le.
47004007	Geenɛn, ntfu saaka wvun nu yî yese le, ɛ bese nu kɛ lo fisɛse nsháan mbom. Ɛ bese nu nonɛn wvu lɛ fí eduŋcì lɛ mvuŋgay mvu baay mvun yî yese le nu mvu Nyo' le ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu mvusɛse kɛ.
47004008	Boŋgɛw yike bese biba bicii, geenɛn yaa bvuwci bese kɛ. Bese nɛn'yi ɛ bvufee no bvuuŋke lo bese, geenɛn shem saa ekpwee bese kɛ.
47004009	Bó ké no bone bikaa ɛ̂ bese ɛjim, geenɛn ɛ Nyo' yaa daayi ɛ̂ bese le kɛ. Bó ké no kfune bese ɛ bese gbwee fokuse, geenɛn yaa kpwee kɛ.
47004010	Bese ké no ghane kpwee kɛ kfuu kpwe Jisos sekecii, wvu lɛ nshii Jisos nulo eyen'yi tɛn yî ye yese le.
47004011	No bese cee, nu ɛ bese ké no nu kɛ diuw kpwe le sekecii nje Jisos, wvu lɛ nshii Jisos eyen'yi yî biŋkpwe bisɛse bi ye le.
47004012	Nonɛn bese ɛ mum ɛ no kpwee kpwe, geenɛn ɛ kpwe yese yin too ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô nshii fô ben e.
47004013	No bese nu ɛ lese fitele yî Nyo' le diɛwɛ wee mvu wvù to jemyɛɛ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' le lɛ, “Me nu ɛ mbee ɛ nsɛ no njemyi”, nu ɛ bese tɛn ɛ bee ɛ sɛ no jemyi.
47004014	Bese kee lo lɛ wvú wvuwɛ wvù to bvusɛɛ Tata wesebeene wvù Jisos yî kpwe le, nu ke ebvuse tɛn beene bò nu bô bo Jisos yî kpwe le, ejo bese noo ben tɛn egɛn egɛɛ ɛ̂ wvú fwe.
47004015	Mwɛɛm mvun mvunciim kooyi nje yene, wvu lɛ no mbuwma Nyo' saaŋkene gɛne fô bonyii le nteen nteen, ɛ́ keyoone kè bonyii nyaa ɛ̂ Nyo' ebiisè, ɛ mbense gɛne fô Nyo' le.
47004016	Ɛ̀ nɛɛ fiɛɛ fì kɛ shem kpwee bese kɛ. Naa no ye yese yin cim bvuuke gɛne kaa nɛn, nu ɛ mvuntelem mvusɛse kumene tuu kɛ lo mvunfɛm ɛdiuw ɛcii.
47004017	Boŋgɛw bo caan ban bò bese yɛne yî kefew kin e, nu ɛ bó seysee ɛ ɛ̀ nu bvujoŋkɛ bvu baay bvù mɛy lo fô bese le bvù ɛ̀ nulo wee saa efewsɛn kɛ.
47004018	Nonɛn, bese baa leke fisɛse bvufee yî mwɛɛm mvù bó yɛne mvú le kɛ. Bese leke ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî mvù bó yaa yɛne le kɛ, njefo mwɛɛm mvù beene yɛne mvú le nu ɛ mvú fele lo, geenɛn ɛ mvù beene yaa yɛne kɛ, nu mvù mɛy lo.
47005001	Beene kee lɛ ɛ́ bó sâw lo cun yin yì ɛ̀ nu ye yesebeene yì beene cee dvú fokuse fɛn, tu beene kɛŋke yew fô Nyo' le ɛ bó yaa bom bô can kɛ. Yiyɛ nu yew yi fowe, ɛ ɛ̀ nu yì mɛy lo.
47005002	No beene nu fɛn keseen nu ɛ beene looci naa shomkene, njefo beene beele baay lɛ bó etfume yew yi fowe yɛ yî yese beene le diɛwɛ ndvu le.
47005003	Ɛ̀ nu ke enu seke bó ɛ tfume wase yiyɛ yî yese beene le, beene saa ebvuu enu ye yɛ kɛ.
47005004	No beene bɛɛ cee cun yin e, nu ɛ boŋgɛw bò beene joo gee ɛ beene shomkene baay. Kɛ ɛ̀ nu lɛ beene gomte lɛ bó baayɛ ndvú yì ɛ̀ nu ye yesebeene yidvu yî yese beene le kɛ. Beene gomte lɛ bó etfume lo yimi yî yese beene le wvu lɛ nshii wvù mɛy lo emi lo biŋkpwe bi ye le bidvu.
47005005	Nyo' nu wvù nu ɛ seyse beene keekɛŋkɛ fiɛɛ fin. Wvú nu ɛ nya beene sâ' wvudvu ɛ ɛ̀ nu Keyoy ke Yuule.
47005006	Nonɛn, bese ɛ mum ɛ no nu sekecii kee fifin sɛ kemaŋɛn. Bese kee lɛ no bese cee yî ye yin e yî woŋ wvun e, nu ɛ bese nu ncejole fô Tata le.
47005007	Bese gee mwɛɛm ɛ ɛ̀ nu nje fitele fì bese lese yî Nyo' le, kɛ ɛ̀ nu nje bese yɛne wvú le kɛ.
47005008	Bese nu naa sɛ kemaŋɛn yî fifin e, ɛ fí jee naa lo lɛ bese ecinɛ lo ye yin e, egɛn enu wase bee bo Tata fô la diew e.
47005009	Fí ɛ no nu lɛ kɛnɛɛ bese nu bee bó fô la diew e, kɛnɛɛ bese bɛɛ fɛn, tu fiɛɛ fì bese taale yî dvú le, nu kɛ keegee ɛ wvú yuuke njoŋ.
47005010	Ben ekeè lɛ beene bocii kɛŋke keeke eleem fwe dvu Klistu ɛ́ wvú esaw beene, wvu lɛ wee mwaaŋ mwaaŋ ekɛŋkɛ nlawma fiɛɛ fì wvú to gee yî ye yin e, kɛnɛɛ ɛ̀ nu fì jee kɛnɛɛ fì befe.
47005011	No bese kee fiɛɛ fì nu keefane Tata, bese ɛ mum ɛ no momte keege ɛ́ bonyii ekumɛn. Nyo' looci naa kee bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bese naa ntay. Ɛ me ŋkpwaake lɛ ben tɛn kee ntay ɛ̂ mvuntelem mvunɛn e bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bese.
47005012	No bese jemyi nɛn nu ɛ kɛ bese gomte keebvuu ekase eduŋci lo bikuu bisɛse ɛ̂ ben kɛ. Bese nyaa kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu je ɛ̂ ben keesaale ye bô bese, wvu lɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ ben ekɛŋke fiɛɛ fì ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ ben etfuse ɛ̂ bonyii bò bensee bibɛɛn bô mwɛɛm mvù bó yɛne yî bonyii le ɛjise, ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu mvu fô mvuntelem mvubole kɛ.
47005013	Ɛ́ ɛ̀ nu lɛ bikuu ghane bese, tu bí ghane nje Nyo'. Ɛ̀ no nu lɛ bí leeme fó, tu bí leeme kɛ nje yene.
47005014	Fiɛɛ fì gee ɛ bese gɛne fwe bô fiɛɛ fì bese gee nu keŋkoŋɛn kè Klistu kɛŋke fô beene le. Bese gee nonɛn njefo bese nu ɛ loocɛ ɛ bee lɛ wee mwaaŋ to nu ɛ kpwe fô bonyii le bocii, ɛ fí mum nu lɛ bonyii bodvu bocii nu ɛ kpwe wase tɛn.
47005015	Wvú to kpwe fô bonyii bocii le wvu lɛ fo boba bò cee, ebvuu ecee fô bikuu bibole kɛ. Geenɛn lɛ bó eceè wase fô wvuwɛ wee wvù to kpweɛ kase buy yî kpwe le nje bó le.
47005016	Nonɛn, ɛ kɛw lo nu ɛ kɛ bese bvuu taale wee bô bvufee bvu wee wvu wum e kɛ. Naa no bese to cim shee taale Klistu ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô bvufee bvu wee wvu wum e, nu ɛ bese yaa bvuu taale wvú keseen ɛ̂ yiyɛ je le kɛ.
47005017	Fiɛɛ fì nu nu lɛ, ɛ́ wee nu ɛ taashɛ wase bô Klistu, tu wvú nu wase wee wvu fwɛ. Mwɛɛm mvu mvuyvuum mvunciim nu ɛ fey wase, ɛ mwɛɛm mvunciim ɛ tu wase mvu mvunfɛm.
47005018	Fin ficii nu ɛ ɛ̀ gee Nyo' wvù to kasɛɛ jo beene yî ye le no wvú to mancɛɛ mwɛɛm beene ɛ bó fele yî Klistu le. Ɛ wvú ɛ nya ɛ̂ bese lemme keegee ɛ bonyii manci mwɛɛm bô bo Nyo'.
47005019	Fì nu lɛ, ɛ̀ to nu yî Klistu le wvù Nyo' to manci mwɛɛm bô bonyii bo yî woŋ wvun e lɛ bó etu bô wvú. Ɛ wvú faŋɛ yaa ebvuu eŋgoyte fite fi kebefɛ kebole kɛ, mum nya ntum keman wvun can yese le lɛ bese eteete ɛ̂ bonyii.
47005020	Bese ɛ mum ɛ no nu fɛn yî bvudvuu bvu Klistu le, ɛ Nyo' fele yî yese le lɛke bonyii. Nonɛn bese kule can ɛ̂ ben ɛ̂ diee di Klistu le lɛ ben ekase emancɛ mwɛɛm ben ɛ bo Nyo'.
47005021	Ɛ̀ nu nje yese beene wvù wvú wvù Nyo' to geɛ ɛ Klistu wvù to baa kee kebefɛ, nɛ tu kebefɛ, wvu lɛ beene etu teytey ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛjise nje ye.
47006001	No bese lemte yî kentaashɛ le bee bo Nyo', bese ɛ mum ɛ no kule tɛn can ɛ̂ ben lɛ fo ben efiisɛn mbuwma Nyo' wvun ege ɛ́ wvú ela ɛcici kɛ.
47006002	Nyo' to nu ɛ jeme ɛ̂ Ŋwa' we le lɛ, “Kefew ke lɛŋ to nu ɛ to kocɛn, ɛ me nya bitem ɛ̂ wo. Diuu di mboyma le to nu ɛ kocɛn ɛ me nfi wo.” Ben etaa eyɛn, keseen nu kefew ke lɛŋ, ɛ din nu diuu di mboyma le.
47006003	Kɛ bese yaa gee naa lo fiɛɛ fì nulo ebaaŋke je wee mvu kɛ. Bese gee nonɛn wvu lɛ fo bó ke eyɛn jay mvu le yî lemme disɛse le kɛ.
47006004	Geenɛn, bese nu ɛ duŋcɛ fisɛse bikuu bisɛse ɛ̂ jé le yicii lɛ bese nu bonyii bo lemme le bo Nyo' le. Bese nu ɛ duŋcɛ ɛ̂ je yì bese kuule fitele naa baay yî boŋgɛw bò bese yɛne le bô seke mwɛɛm tɛmyi noo seke je yaa nu naa dvú kɛ le.
47006005	Bonyii ké no suuŋke bese, ké nɛ sekemew lese bese yew ncaw e, ɛ bonyii nɛn'yi no shiike mvunlaa bee bó. Bese ké no kfune ye yî lemme le, ké nɛ ce ɛntaŋ saa lefe kɛ, ké nɛ kefew kemew e no kpwee jeŋ.
47006006	Bese duŋci tɛn lɛ bese nu bonyii bo lemme le bo Nyo' le ɛ̂ je nce wese wvù yuule le bô no bese kee fiɛɛ fi ɛkumɛ Nyo', noo no bese kuule shém, bô no bese kɛŋke mvuntelem mvù jee fô bonyii le. Bese cee bii no Keyoy ke Yuule duŋci, ɛ bese kooŋke bonyii bô ŋkoŋɛn wvu kecɛɛy.
47006007	Bese ké no jemyi kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu njeme wvu kecɛɛy, gee mwɛɛm ɛ̂ mvuŋgay mvu Nyo' le. Bese ké no jici nce wvu teytey e diɛwɛ mwɛɛm mvu jem e mvu ɛbo ɛcɛɛy bô mvu ɛbo ɛŋkoŋko le.
47006008	Bese ké no lemte kɛ lo, kɛnɛɛ bonyii wvumte bese, kɛnɛɛ bó yaa wvumte kɛ, kɛnɛɛ bó jemyi mwɛɛm mvù befe ɛkumɛ bese kɛnɛɛ bó jemyi mvù jee. Bonyii ké no joo bese lɛ bese nu bonyii bo kenlɛɛma le, geenɛn ɛ bese nu bonyii bo kecɛɛy e.
47006009	Ɛ́ bonyii ké nɛ no nu nɛn diɛwɛ kɛ bó kee bese kɛ, geenɛn ɛ bonyii kee naa bese ntay. Bó ké nɛn'yi no yɛne lɛ bese nu wase boŋkfusay, geenɛn ben etaa eyɛn, bese nu kɛ dvú. Ɛ́ bonyii ké nɛ no nyaa ŋgɛw ɛ̂ bese, geenɛn yaa yuwyi bese kɛ.
47006010	Bese ké no nu nɛn diɛwɛ bonyii bò nu yî yii le, geenɛn laŋlaŋe kɛ sekecii, nu diɛwɛ bonyii bò fuute le, geenɛn gee kɛ ɛ bonyii nteen nu bonyii bo kpwaw e. Bese ké no nu nɛn diɛwɛ kɛ bese kɛŋke naa lo fiɛɛ kɛ, geenɛn ɛ bese kɛŋke mwɛɛm mvunciim.
47006011	Bonyii bo Kolɛn, bese nu ɛ jeme wase ɛ̂ ben yaa nyile fiɛɛ kɛ. Bese nu ɛ yene mvuntelem mvusɛse ɛ gɛɛ mvuyɛm ɛ̂ ben.
47006012	Kɛ bese baa baŋ mvuntelem mvusɛse fô ben e kɛ. Ɛ̀ baŋ ben mvunɛn fô bese le.
47006013	Me ɛ no njemyi ɛ̂ ben kɛ diɛwɛ ɛ̂ boom bem e lɛ, ben ege lɛŋlɛŋ no bese nu ɛ ge fô ben e, eyene tɛn mvunɛn mvuntelem fô bese le.
47006014	Fo ben elɛnè ɛkalɛ kemwaaŋ ben ɛ bonyii bò yaa nu bo mbee le kɛ. Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ fiɛɛ fi teytey bô fì befe eghan nɛɛ sɛ no nu yî fiɛɛ le fimwaaŋ? N'yuu bô ɛjiwɛ nulo ekɛŋke kentaashɛ?
47006015	Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ Klistu bô Bɛlial enu diuw mwaaŋ e? Fiɛɛ fì taashi wee mbee bô wee wvù baa nu wee mbee nu la?
47006016	Yew ncese Nyo' nulo ekɛŋke la keege bô mvunyo' mvu yî woŋ wvun e? Ben ekeè lɛ beene nu yew ncese yì yi Nyo' wvù kɛŋke nshii. Fifin nu no Nyo' to gayɛɛ lɛ, “Me nu ŋke encee yî bó le, nlɛne ɛ̂ bó ɛntelɛŋ. Me nu ŋke enu Nyo' wvubo, ɛ bó nu bonyii bem.”
47006017	Nonɛn, Tata Nyo' gayte lɛ, “Ben ebuy ɛ̂ bó ɛnte, enù jɛɛy fô bó le. Fo ben ekum fiɛɛ fi nnyɛn e kɛ, ɛ́ me emum enfiisɛn ben.
47006018	Me nu ŋke enu Icen, ɛ ben nu boom bem bò bolemsɛ noo bò bokɛnɛ. Fifin nu ɛ ɛ̀ jemyi Tata Nyo' wvù Kɛŋke Mvuŋgay Mvunciim.”
47007001	Nsáa yɛm shém, no Nyo' nu ɛ nya boŋkawma ban ɛ̂ beene nɛn, beene emum ecukɛ fiɛɛ ficii fì beete bô ye yesebeene noo keyoy kesɛɛbeene. Beene eyuulè gɛne mɛɛse no beene cee yî nfan wvù wvu Nyo' le.
47007002	Ben egɛɛ bvudvuu ɛ̂ mvuntelem mvunɛn e fô bese le. Kɛ bese nu ɛ jay fiɛɛ fô wee le kɛ. Kɛ bese nu ɛ lɛɛ wee kɛ, ɛ kɛ bese nu ɛ fiw wee mvu kɛ.
47007003	Kɛ me njemyi nɛn lɛ me nsaake lo ben kɛ. Me nu ɛ ŋgay wase ɛ̂ ben lɛ ben nu naa lo fitele fisɛse, ɛ́ ɛ̀ cim nu keekpwe kɛnɛɛ keenu dvú, tu beene nu enu kɛ yî kentaashɛ le.
47007004	Me nu ɛ ŋgɛɛ fitele fiem yî yene le baay. Me ŋkɛŋke kembense ye ke baay ɛkumɛ ben. Fitele fiem lɛɛtene baay ɛkumɛ ben. Ɛnte jo boŋgɛw bocii bò bese yɛne nu ɛ me n'yuuke kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu njoŋ.
47007005	Naa no bese to leyɛɛ woŋ wvù Masedonia le, bese to baa kɛŋke nlɛɛtɛn kɛ. Bese to kɛŋke boŋgɛw biba bicii. Bonyii to gomte diuw bee bó, ɛ bese bvuu kɛŋke nfan ɛ̂ mvuntelem mvusɛse le.
47007006	Geenɛn, ɛ Nyo' wvù lɛɛsee mvuntelem mvu bonyii bò nu yî yii le ke lɛɛse mvuntelem mvusɛse bô nto wvù Taytus to toɛ.
47007007	Ɛ kɛ ɛ̀ to mɛy kɛ nto we maaŋ wvù to lɛɛsɛɛ mvuntelem mvusɛse kɛ. Ɛ̀ to nu tɛn je yì ben to lɛɛsɛɛ fiew fitele jó. Wvú to nu ɛ see ɛ̂ bese lɛ ben shieele baay keeyɛn me le, bô no ben kɛŋke yii fô bikuu binɛn e, noo no ben kɛŋke shiee fô me le. No me n'yuwɛɛ nonɛn, mbvuu n'yuw naa lo njoŋ baay.
47007008	Ɛ́ ɛ̀ cim nu naa lɛ ŋwa' wvù me nto nsaŋɛɛ fô ben e wɛ to nu ɛ ge ɛ ben no nu yii yii, tu kɛ me ncim ŋkumyi ye kɛ. Geenɛn, ɛ me nto ŋkume kɛ ye, njefo me n'yɛne lɛ ŋwa' wɛm wvudvu to nu ɛ ge ɛ ben no nu yii yii. Geenɛn, ben to nu yii yii kɛ yî kefew e nɛn caan.
47007009	Me ɛ no n'yuuke njoŋ keseen, ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu njefo ben to nu ɛ no nu yii yii kɛ. Ɛ̀ nu njefo yii yin to nu ɛ ge ɛ ben kumɛn mvuntelem mvunɛn. Ben to kɛŋke yii ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ je yì Nyo' gomte le. Nonɛn bese to baa ge fiɛɛ fimew fì befe fô ben e kɛ.
47007010	Ɛ́ wee kɛŋke yii ɛ̂ je yì Nyo' gomte le, tu fí nu ege ɛ́ wvú ekumɛn fitele fiew. Ɛ́ fifin eto ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô mboyma fô wvú le, saa eto ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô fiɛɛ fì wvú ekumyi ye yî dvú le kɛ. Geenɛn, ɛ́ wee kɛŋke yii ɛ̂ je bonyii bo yî woŋ wvun e, tu yí nu ke eto ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô kpwe.
47007011	Ben eyɛn lɛ fiɛɛ fì yii yì ɛ̀ nu yì Nyo' gomte nu ɛ to dvú fô ben e. Ben eyɛn no ben nu ɛ jo mwɛɛm naa shiee le. Ben eyɛn tɛn no ben nu ɛ ge fiɛɛ ficii keeduŋcɛ lɛ kɛ ben kɛŋke ɛbo fô fiɛɛ fì befe fidvu le kɛ. Ben eyɛn no fiɛɛ fidvu nu ɛ ton'yɛ ben. Ben eyɛn nfan wvù ben nu ɛ kɛŋkɛ. Ben eyɛn shiee wvu baay wvù ben kɛŋke keeyɛn me le. Ben eyɛn shiee wvù ben kɛŋke keege fiɛɛ fi lɛŋ. Ben eyɛn tɛn kfuu ŋgɛw wvù ben nu ɛ nya ɛ̂ wee wvudvu wvù geɛ jay. Yî fiɛɛ le ficii nu ɛ ben ɛ duŋcɛ lo lɛ kɛ ben kɛŋke naa lo ɛbo fô fiɛɛ fidvu le kɛ.
47007012	Nonɛn, naa no me nto ncim nsaŋɛɛ ŋwa' wɛ fô ben e nu ɛ kɛ me nto nsaŋ nje wee wvù to geɛ jay, kɛnɛɛ wee wvù bó to geɛ jay fô wvú le kɛ. Me nto nsaŋ wvu lɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ ben eduŋcɛ fô bikuu binɛn e ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛjise lɛ ben kɛŋke shiee fô bese le.
47007013	Nonɛn fifin nu ɛ ge shém ɛ no lɛɛtene bese. Keebise yî shém yese yì nu ɛ lɛɛtɛn e, nu ɛ bese bvuu yuuke njoŋ baay nje njoŋ wvù Taytus yuuke njefo ben bocii nu ɛ ge fitele fiew ɛ no nu yî nyɛkeey e.
47007014	Naa me nto ŋké no nsaale wase ye bô ben ɛ̂ Taytus, ben to baa shoose me kɛ. Kensaa ye kè bese to ké no saale bô ben ɛ̂ Taytus nu ɛ duŋcɛ lɛ ɛ̀ nu ke kecɛɛy. Ɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no fiɛɛ ficii fì bese to ké no jemyi ɛ̂ ben nu tɛn kecɛɛy.
47007015	Wvú wvù Taytus ké kumyi no ben bocii to yuwɛɛ wvú le, bô no ben to fiisɛnɛɛ wvú fane, ciiŋke, ɛ wvú bvuu koŋ ben naa fesɛn lo.
47007016	Me tɛn n'yuuke njoŋ njefo me nu ɛ ŋgɛɛ bvufee bwem yî yene le ɛ ŋgɛn ɛ mɛse.
47008001	Boom bo bwee wese le, bese gomte lɛ ben ekiɛɛ fiɛɛ fì mbuwma Nyo' nu ɛ ge fô bintaashɛ bi bonyii bo mbee le bi ɛ̂ keba kè Masedonia le.
47008002	Boŋgɛw bò tɛmyi nu ɛ mom wase bó baay. Geenɛn ɛ njoŋ wvu baay wvù bó kɛŋke ɛ ge bó ɛ loocɛ ɛ yene can yibo yicii ɛ̂ bonyii bomew naa no bó cim nu ɛ̂ kefufe ke baay ɛnte.
47008003	Fiɛɛ fì ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me ensee nu lɛ ɛ̀ to kpwaw kɛ bó lɛ bó enya nnya no mvuŋgay mvubole nu. Ɛ bó dioo nyaa, nya naa fesɛn lo.
47008004	Bó to nu ɛ lɛkɛ bese naa shiee le lɛ bese enya kɛ bó je keelese ɛbo fô lemme din e keetom bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo Nyo' le.
47008005	Bó to nu ɛ ge fiɛɛ ɛ̂ je yì bese to baa kpwaake lɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó ege le kɛ. Bó to nu ɛ yaw nya bikuu bibole ɛ̂ Tata, mum nya tɛn ɛ̂ bese no Nyo' gomte.
47008006	Nonɛn, ɛ bese mum lɛkɛ Taytus lɛ no wvú to nu ɛ kɛw wase lemme din ɛ̂ ben ɛntelɛŋ, lɛ wvú emum egɛn dvú fwe eficɛ ben keemɛse lemme dì jee din.
47008007	No ben looci kee mwɛɛm mvunciim naa ntay, mwɛɛm mvu ɛ̂ keba ke mbee le, mvu ɛ̂ keba ke njeme le, mvu ɛ̂ keba ke bvufee le, mvu ɛ̂ keba ke shiee keege fiɛɛ le, noo mvu ɛ̂ keba ke keŋkoŋɛn kenɛn e fô bese le, bese ɛ mum ɛ no gomte lɛ ben eloocɛ ekiɛɛ tɛn keeyene can yene yî lemme dì jee din e ntay.
47008008	Kɛ me njemyi nɛn nyaa ɛ ɛ̀ nu nci kɛ. Me momte lo mbii shiee wvù bonyii bomew kɛŋke keege fiɛɛ le keen'yɛn lɛ keŋkoŋɛn kenɛn tɛn nu ke kecɛɛy.
47008009	Ben kee wase fitele fì jee fì Tata wesebeene wvù Jisos Klistu to kɛŋke. Naa no wvú to nu wee bvukukɛ nu ɛ wvú to nɛ tu wee kefufe nje yene, wvu lɛ kefufe kew ege ɛ́ ben etu bonyii bo bvukukɛ le.
47008010	Yî saaka wvudvu wvun e nu ɛ me ŋgomte keenya wɛm ntefe. Fí nu lɛŋ lɛ ben bò to kɛwɛɛ lumbee keegee fiɛɛ, ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu kɛ keege fiɛɛ maaŋ kɛ, ben to nu tɛn bonyii bò to kɛwɛɛ keekɛŋke shiee keege fiɛɛ,
47008011	ben emum egɛn dvú fwe emɛse, wvu lɛ ben ke dioo ɛ mɛse bii no mvuŋgay mvunɛn nu, ɛ́ fí elɛn ɛkalɛ kemwaaŋ bô shiee wene wvù ben kɛŋke keege fiɛɛ.
47008012	Ben ekeè lɛ ɛ́ wee kɛŋke shiee keenya, tu Nyo' nu efiisɛn nnya ye bii fiɛɛ fì mwɛtɛn kɛŋke keenya le, wvú saa ebii fiɛɛ fì wee baa kɛŋke le kɛ.
47008013	Kɛ me ŋgayte nɛn lɛ ben nu dioo nyaa keefi bonyii bomew kaa kpwe lo kɛ. Ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ keege ɛ́ biba bicii ekɛŋke lɛŋlɛŋ.
47008014	No ben kɛŋke mwɛɛm keseen ɛ mvú ffuyte lo, ɛ bonyii bomew tane, nu ɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ ben efi bó. Ɛ́ bó dioo kɛŋke tɛn ɛ mvú ffuyte lo sekekiɛ, ɛ ben tane, ɛ́ bó efi ben. Nonɛn ɛ́ biba bicii emum ekɛŋke lɛŋlɛŋ.
47008015	Ɛ̀ nu no bó nu ɛ saŋ lɛ, “Wee wvù to baancɛɛ baay, to baa emum ekɛŋke baay kɛ. Ɛ wee wvù to baancɛɛ kɛ caan, to baa emum ekɛŋke kɛ lo caan kɛ.”
47008016	Me nyaa keyoone ɛ̂ Nyo' wvù nu ɛ gɛɛ shiee wene fô fitele fi Taytus e kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ diɛwɛ wvù me ŋkɛŋke fô ben e.
47008017	Kɛ wvú to baa emum ebee keeto ɛ̂ ben e nje bese to nu ɛ lɛkɛ wvú kɛ. Wvú too ɛ̂ ben e yî ŋkpwawcɛ wvuwe le no wvú to kɛŋke wase shiee naa baay fô ben e.
47008018	Bese tumte wvú bô waa bwee wesebeene wvù bó kee wvú ɛntelɛŋ jo bintaashɛ bi bonyii bo mbee le bicii yî saaka wvù jee wvù wvú ghane fewci le.
47008019	Ɛ kɛ ɛ̀ mɛy kɛ fifiɛ ɛkumɛ wvú kɛ. Wvú nu tɛn wee wvù bintaashɛ bi bonyii bo mbee le nu ɛ baa lɛ wvú eghanè bee bó no bese ghane gee lemme dì jee di ɛkumɛ nnya yin. Lemme din nu keege ɛ́ bonyii enyaà mbense ɛ̂ Tata kebɛɛ, bô keeduŋcɛ lɛ bese kɛŋke shiee keeficɛ bonyii bomew.
47008020	Bese gomte lɛ fo fiɛɛ ke enu dvú fì wee mvu ke ebacɛ bese yî dvú le ɛkumɛ nnya yi baay yin yì bese lemte yî dvú le kɛ.
47008021	Bese momte naa ntay keege ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì nu lɛŋ ɛ ɛ̀ yaa mɛy kɛ ɛ̂ Tata ɛjise maaŋ kɛ. Bese momte keege fì nu tɛn lɛŋ ɛjise jo bonyii.
47008022	Bese tumte tɛn waa bwee wesebeene mvu bô bó wvù bese nu ɛ mom wase wvú bokaŋ nteen yî mwɛɛm e nteen, ɛ yɛn lɛ wvú kɛŋke shiee keegee mwɛɛm. Ɛ wvú nu keseen kɛŋke naa shiee wvu baay fô ben e, njefo wvú nu ɛ gɛɛ fitele yî yene le naa baay.
47008023	Wee diɛwɛ Taytus e nu ɛ wvú nu wee wvù bee wvú lɛne yî ɛkalɛ le kemwaaŋ, nu tɛn wee wvù bee wvú lemte yî fiɛɛ le fimwaaŋ fô ben e. Ɛ dioo tu fô boom bo bwee wesebeene le bomew ba, nu ɛ bó nu bonyii bo ntum e bo bintaashɛ bi bonyii bo mbee le. Ɛ̀ nu bonyii ɛ bó gee ɛ mbense gɛne fô Klistu le.
47008024	Nonɛn, ben emum eduŋcɛ keŋkoŋɛn kenɛn fô bó le ɛndan, wvu lɛ bintaashɛ bi bonyii bo mbee le eyɛn lɛ ye yì bese ké no saale ɛkumɛ ben nu yi lɛŋ.
47009001	Kɛ shiee cim nu dvú wvù me ensaaŋke lo ɛ̂ ben ɛkumɛ lemme din keetom bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo Nyo' le kɛ.
47009002	Me ŋkee lo lɛ ben kɛŋke wase shiee keetom bó. Ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fidvu fì me nsaale ye dvú ɛ̂ bonyii bo Masedonia ɛkumɛ ben, njemyi lɛ ben bo Akɛya nu ɛ ben to seyse wase ɛ ɛ̀ bɛɛ lo lumbee keetom. Shiee wvù ben kɛŋke keenya ɛ mum ɛ ge tɛn mvuntelem mvu bonyii le nteen ɛ̂ bó ɛnte ɛ ja we.
47009003	Geenɛn, me ntumte boom bo bwee wesebeene le ban fô ben e wvu lɛ fo ye yì bese saale ɛkumɛ ben yî saaka wvun e ke ebuy lɛ ɛ̀ nu yi ɛcici kɛ. Me ɛ no ntumte bó wvu lɛ ben enù ɛ ben ɛ seyse no me nto ŋgayɛɛ lɛ ben nu ke enu.
47009004	Ɛfuw kɛ nonɛn, fí ɛ kooy lɛ bee bonyii bo Masedonia bomew ɛ nɛ ɛ to ɛ yɛn ɛ ben nu sɛ ben nu ɛ seyse, ɛ́ kenshoose kedvu enu nɛɛ fô bese le, ɛfey mvunciim fô ben e bò bese se gɛɛle bvufee yî yene le?
47009005	Ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì geɛ ɛ me ŋkpwawcɛ lɛ fí nu shiee le lɛ me enlɛkɛ boom bo bwee wesebeene le ban lɛ bó esa kɛ fwe eto ɛ̂ ben e eseyse nnya yi baay yin ɛ kefew bɛɛ yì ben to kawɛɛ keenya. Nonɛn ɛ́ nnya yidvu emum enu ɛ ben ɛ seyse wase lɛ ɛ̀ nu nnya ɛ ben nyaa yî ŋkoŋ wvu wene le, ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu lɛ bó kamte lo ben kɛ.
47009006	Ben ekumyì lɛ wee wvù jewyi caan, nu ke egbwele kɛ caan, ɛ wee wvù jewyi nteen, nu ke egbwele tɛn nteen.
47009007	Wee mwaaŋ mwaaŋ ben e kɛŋke keenya no wvú nu ɛ kpwawcɛ fô fitele fiew e, yaa nyaa guute lo ye kɛnɛɛ nyaa diɛwɛ bó kane lo wvú kɛ. Ben ekeè lɛ Nyo' kooŋke wee wvù nyaa bô nlaŋlaŋ.
47009008	Nyo' nulo ebuw ben bô mwɛɛm mvunciim ege ɛ́ mvú effuyte lo, wvu lɛ ben ekɛŋke fiɛɛ ficii sekecii ɛ fí kocine ben e bocii, ɛ́ ben emum egeè dilemme dì jee dicii dvú ntay.
47009009	Fí nu no bó nu ɛ saŋ lɛ, “Wee wvù nyaa nnya nu ɛ tfuw lo nnya ɛ̂ bonyii bo kefufe le, lemme diew dì jee nu ke emɛy nu sekecii.”
47009010	Nyo' wvù nyaa ŋgow ɛ̂ wee wɛɛ bô mwɛɛm mvudien ɛ bó diee, nu ke enya tɛn ebvuu ebise ŋgow mwɛɛm mvunɛn, ege ɛ́ nce wene wvù jee eto bô ŋgbwele ɛ wvú duule lo.
