47009011	Nyo' nu ke enya tɛn ben bô bvukukɛ ɛ̂ jé le yicii keege ɛ́ ben eyen'yi can yene ntay ɛ̂ bonyii bomew, wvu lɛ bonyii enyaà mbense ɛ̂ Nyo' seke bó ɛ kɛŋkɛ nnya yin can yese le.
47009012	Kɛ lemme dinɛn dì jee din dì ben lemte too kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô mwɛɛm mvù bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo Nyo' le shieele maaŋ kɛ, dí too tɛn bô mbense fô Nyo' le jé le nteen.
47009013	Lemme dì ben gee din nu eduŋcɛ bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu ben, ɛ́ bonyii emum etumte moŋkum mo Nyo' le yî n'yuw wvù ben yuuke saaka wvù jee wvu ɛkumɛ Klistu wvù ben tomte le. Bó nu ke etumte tɛn moŋkum mo Nyo' le no ben nu ɛ yene can yene fô bó le noo fô bonyii bomew e bocii.
47009014	Bó nu ke ebunlee fô ben e, ɛ mvuntelem mvubole nu yî yene le naa baay nje mbuwma Nyo' wvun wvù nu yî yene le wvù kuuke naa fele lo.
47009015	Beene enyaà keyoone ɛ̂ Nyo' yî nnya ye yi baay yì ɛ̀ nulo wee saa esee no yí nu le kɛ.
47010001	Me wvù Baul kebɛɛ, ŋkule lo can ɛ̂ ben ɛ̂ je kembonɛn bô nyɛkeey wvù wvu Klistu le. Ɛ̀ nu me wvù bó duu lɛ me ŋké ndioo nu keba kemew no ncewcewe lo bô ben, ŋké nto wase ɛ̂ ben ɛjise, mum mbo.
47010002	Me nlɛke lo ben lɛ seke me ɛ ŋke ɛ nto, fo ben ege ɛ́ me enɛ encewcewe beene no me nulo ŋke encewcewe bee bonyii bò kpwaake lɛ bese gee mwɛɛm bii ɛ ɛ̀ nu ŋkpwawcɛ bonyii bo yî woŋ wvun e kɛ.
47010003	Ɛ̀ nu kecɛɛy lɛ bese cee yî woŋ wvun e, geenɛn kɛ bese yaa tumte jem yese bii no bonyii bo yî woŋ wvun e tumte kɛ.
47010004	Kɛ mwɛɛm mvù bese tumte jem yese dvú nu mvu yî woŋ wvun e kɛ. Mwɛɛm mvù bese tumte jem yese dvú kɛŋke mvuŋgay mvù nɛn'yi fô Nyo' le, keebvuuke mondvuum mò tɛmyi dvú.
47010005	Bese ké no joo mwɛɛm mvu jem e mvun bvuuke bombew bò bonyii beeke dvú, shiwse kembense ye kecii kè baaŋke fo bonyii ekee Nyo', soo tɛn boŋkpwawcɛ bo bonyii le dvú, gee ɛ bó yuuke wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu Klistu le.
47010006	Seke ben ɛ duŋcɛ lɛ ben yuuke wase Klistu le bô mvuntelem mvunɛn mvunciim, ɛ́ bese emum enya ŋgɛw ɛ̂ wee tfuu wvù bɛɛ tɛmyi ɛkolɛ bô Klistu.
47010007	Ben etaa eyɛn fiɛɛ fì nu ɛ̂ ben ɛjise! Ɛ́ wee kee naa kecɛɛy lɛ wen nu wee Klistu, ɛ́ wvú no kumyì lɛ no wvú nu wee Klistu, nu kɛ tɛn no bese nu.
47010008	Ɛ́ me ncim nɛ naa ɛ no nsaale ye nfesene caan nje mvuŋgay mvù bese kɛŋke mvù Tata nyaɛ keeyoo lo ben dvú, ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu keesâw lo ben dvú kɛ, ken'wuumɛn saa ekoole me kɛ.
47010009	Kɛ me ŋgomte lɛ fí eyen'yi nɛn kɛ diɛwɛ me mbɛmsee lo ben bô boŋwa' bem kɛ.
47010010	Me ŋgayte nɛn njefo bonyii bomew nɛn'yi no jemyi ɛkumɛ me gayte lɛ, “Wvú ké no saaŋke boŋwa' ɛ bó tɛmyi bvuu cewcewe, geenɛn seke wvú ɛ to ɛ̂ bonyii ɛjise mum tu wɛɛ. Ɛ kɛ njeme we ké no koole fiɛɛ le kɛ.”
47010011	Boba bonyii ekeè lɛ fiɛɛ fì bese jemyi ɛ̂ boŋwa' le seke bese yaa nu fó kɛ, nu ɛ bese nu ke ege fí seke bese ɛ to.
47010012	Kɛ bese momte naa keebewsene ye, kɛnɛɛ efewsene bikuu bisɛse bô bonyii bomew ba bò seŋe bô dew yibo fiɛɛ fì ɛ̀ nu bó kɛ. No bó fewsene bikuu bibole ɛbonɛbon, bewsene tɛn ye yibo ɛbonɛbon, nu ɛ fí duŋci lɛ kɛ bó kee fiɛɛ kɛ.
47010013	Fisɛse nu ɛ kɛ bese cim saale ye fesene keleŋ kɛ. Bese saale ye ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî keleŋ kè Nyo' nu ɛ nya can yese le keelem eto ebuy naa ɛ̂ ben e.
47010014	Kɛ bese daŋsene ɛ ɛ̀ nu kedwee no bese too buyte ɛ̂ ben e kɛ. Bese to nu bonyii bo fwe keelɛn bô saaka wvù jee wvu ɛkumɛ Klistu to naa buy ɛ̂ ben e.
47010015	Kɛ bese saale ye fesene kɛ, fì nu lɛ kɛ bese saale ye yî lemme dì ɛ̀ ge bonyii bomew kɛ. Geenɛn fiɛɛ fì bese taale fwe kee nu lɛ no mbee wene kuu gɛne fwe, nu no keleŋ ke lemme disɛse le ɛ̂ ben ɛntelɛŋ nu ekuuke tɛn gɛne naa ntay.
47010016	Nonɛn ɛ́ bese emum efey lo jo ben efewci saaka wvù jee gɛne biba bimew e, saa nu lɛ bese saale ye bô lemme dì bó nu ɛ lem wase bvudvuu bvu wee mvu le kɛ.
47010017	Fí ɛ mum ɛ no nu no bó saŋ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le lɛ, “Wee edioo esaale ye, no saale ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî fiɛɛ fì ɛ̀ ge Tata le.”
47010018	Kɛ ɛ̀ nu wee wvù duŋci ɛkolɛ kew lɛ wen nu wee wvu lɛŋ wvù mum nu wee wvu lɛŋ ɛ̂ Tata jise kɛ. Ɛ̀ nu wee wvù Tata yɛne lɛ wvú nu lɛŋ wvù nu wee wvu lɛŋ ɛ̂ wvú ɛjise.
47011001	Me nlɛke lɛ ben ecinɛ kɛ ɛ́ me enjeme njeme keyuŋsɛɛ nɛn caan. Kee, ben ecinɛ kɛ lo!
47011002	Me ŋkɛŋke ken'yɛɛ ɛjisɛ bô ben kè ɛ̀ nu ke Nyo' le. Ben nu fô me le diɛwɛ ŋgon kpwoon wvù bɛɛ tfu le, wvù me nu ɛ ŋkaw keeŋke enya wvú ɛ̂ diemsɛn mwaaŋ wvù ɛ̀ nu Klistu.
47011003	Geenɛn ɛ me nfane lɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no yo to wɛɛntɛnɛɛ lɛɛ Iff, nu ɛ bó nu ke ebvuŋse tɛn bvufee bvunɛn ɛ́ ben ecinɛ je yì nu kecɛɛy bvuu yuule yì ben bii Klistu le jó.
47011004	Me njemyi nɛn njefo ben kaantene kɛ lo fiɛɛ ficii. Ɛ́ wee nɛ ɛ no fewci ɛkumɛ Jisos mvu jɛɛy sɛ ɛ̀ nu wvù bese to fewcɛɛ ɛ̂ ben, kɛnɛɛ keyoy kemew jɛɛy sɛ ɛ̀ nu kè ben to fiisɛnɛɛ ɛ̂ Nyo', kɛnɛɛ ɛkumɛ saaka wvù jee mvu jɛɛy sɛ ɛ̀ nu wvù ben to fiisɛnɛɛ ɛ̂ bese, tu ben nu emum ekaantɛn kɛ lo.
47011005	Kɛ me ŋkpwaake lɛ bonyii ba bò ben teŋe lɛ bokow bo boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e mum kuuke lo fele me kɛ.
47011006	Ɛ́ ɛ̀ cim nu naa lɛ kɛ me ŋkee njeme, tu kɛ ɛ̀ mum nu lɛ kɛ me ŋkee fiɛɛ fi ɛkumɛ Nyo' kɛ. Fin nu fiɛɛ ɛ bese ɛ duŋcɛ wase ɛ̂ ben ɛ̂ jé le yicii noo yî mwɛɛm e mvunciim.
47011007	No me nto nfewcɛɛ saaka wvù jee wvù wvu Nyo' ɛ̂ ben ɛcici sɛ nlawma, ɛ fɛn ghane lɛ me nto ŋge ɛ ɛ̀ nu kebefɛ keenshike ɛkolɛ kem nonɛn wvu lɛ me embense ben e?
47011008	Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me eŋgay lɛ me nto nsooŋke ɛ ɛ̀ nu kensoŋ ɛntelɛŋ jo bintaashɛ bi bonyii bo mbee le bimew, no me nto nfii nfi ɛ̂ bó, nlemte ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô ben e.
47011009	Seke me nto nu beene, me nto mbaa ŋgɛɛ bvujitɛ bvumew yî wee mvu ben e seke me nto ŋkɛŋke shiee fiɛɛ kɛ. Boom bo bwee wesebeene le bo Masedonia to nyaa fiɛɛ ficii fì me nto nshieele. Nonɛn yî fiɛɛ le ficii nu ɛ me nto ntun keeŋgɛɛ bvujitɛ yî yene le. Ɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ no me nu ŋke entune nonɛn.
47011010	No kecɛɛy ke Klistu le nu yî yɛm e, kɛ wee nu dvú ɛ̂ biba binɛn bì Akɛya le wvù nulo ebaŋ diuw wɛm yî fiɛɛ fì me nsaale ye yî dvú le kɛ.
47011011	Me ntune nfi ɛ̂ ben nonɛn nje la? Ɛ̀ nu njefo kɛ me ŋkooŋke ben e? Me ŋkooŋke naa ben ɛ Nyo' kee nonɛn.
47011012	Fiɛɛ fì me ŋgee nu ɛ me nu ŋke emɛy kɛ ŋgee, wvu lɛ me embaaŋke je fô bonyii ba bò gomte keeyɛne lɛ bó nu lɛŋlɛŋ bee bó yî fiɛɛ fì bó saale ye yî dvú le.
47011013	Kɛ bonyii bodvu ba yaa nu boom bo ntum e bo Klistu le bo kecɛɛy kɛ. Bó nu bonyii bo lemme le bo kenlɛɛma le. Bó tɛɛke lo Klistu fô jise lɛ bowen nu boom bew bo ntum e.
47011014	Ɛ kɛ fifin yaa nu fiɛɛ fi ŋghaw e kɛ. Naa Satan bô ɛkolɛ kew ke tɛw kɛ Nyo' fô jise lɛ wen nu nceendaa we wvu n'yuu.
47011015	Nonɛn kɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fi diuw wvù yumɛɛn e seke bonyii bew bo lemme le baŋse tɛn ye yen'yi diɛwɛ bonyii bò yɛɛyi bonyii no nce wvu teytey kɛŋke keenu le kɛ. Kemɛse kebole nu ke enu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no gee dibole nu.
47011016	Me ɛ mbvuu ɛ no njemyi lɛ fo wee ejo me lɛ me nu keyuŋ kɛ. Geenɛn ɛ́ ben jo me lɛ me nu keyuŋ, ɛ́ ben cinɛ lɛ me le ɛ me njeme tɛn njeme kensaa ye caan.
47011017	Fiɛɛ fì me njemyi ɛkumɛ fí fì me nsaale ye yî dvú le sɛ nfan, nu ɛ kɛ me n'yaa njemyi bô mvuŋgay mvu Tata le kɛ. Me njemyi ɛ ɛ̀ nu diɛwɛ keyuŋ e.
47011018	No bonyii nteen saale ye ɛ̂ je bonyii bo yî woŋ wvun e, tu me nu ensaalè tɛn yɛm ye.
47011019	Me njemyi nɛn njefo ben fiisene biyuŋ duu lɛ ben kɛŋke bvufee!
47011020	Ben nu ɛ cinɛ lɛ bonyii ejoò ben ɛ ben tuu bonfaw bobole, ɛ bó diekene yî yene le, bene yî yene le, bensee ye, tumyi can ɛ̂ ben jise.
47011021	Ken'wuumɛn koole me lɛ bese to kaa nu fisɛse biwɛlɛncoy faŋɛ yaa gee nonɛn kɛ! Geenɛn ɛ́ fiɛɛ nu dvú fì wee momte keesaale ye dvú, tu me tɛn nu emomte keensaale tɛn ye yî fifiɛ fiɛɛ le. Me mbɛɛ kɛ njemyi fin diɛwɛ keyuŋ e.
47011022	Ɛ́ bonyii bodvu nu Bo'ibulu, tu me tɛn nu kɛ mvu. Bó ɛ́ no nu bonyii bo Islael, tu me tɛn nu kɛ mvu. Bó ɛ́ no nu bonyii bo ɛ̂ kfuu di Abla'am e, tu me tɛn nu kɛ mvu.
47011023	Ɛ́ bó fɛn nu bonyii bò lemte Klistu le, tu me nfele naa lo bó yî fifiɛ le. (Me njemyi wase fin diɛwɛ wee jewte le.) Me nu ɛ nlem naa wase ɛ nfey lo bó, ɛ ŋgɛn ncaw ɛ nfey bó, ɛ bó suŋ wase me bokaŋ ŋkuuŋ, ɛ kpwe ɛ soy wase me bokaŋ e bokaŋ e.
47011024	Me nu ɛ nfi wase boŋgbwan can Bojuu le bokaŋ botin, ɛ bó tamte kaŋ mwaaŋ ɛ ɛ̀ fuute ŋgbwan mwaaŋ fô mbaanyɛ.
47011025	Bó nu ɛ suŋ wase me bokaŋ botɛte bô bimbaŋ, ɛ tumyɛ me bô ɛta kaŋ mwaaŋ. Ŋguw wvu ɛ̂ joo nu ɛ sawyɛ wase bô me bokaŋ botɛte, ɛ me ɛ nce wase ɛ̂ joo ɛ mbuy ɛ nshe jó.
47011026	Me nu ɛ ŋghan wase baay, ɛ mboy fo me enlɛ joo bokaŋ nteen, ɛ mboy fo me eŋkpwe can bocooŋ e, ɛ mboy tɛn fo me eŋkpwe can bonyii bem bo woŋ e, ɛ mbvuu ɛ mboy fo me eŋkpwe can bitum e, ɛ mboy fo me eŋkpwe ɛlaante, ɛ mbvuu ɛ mboy fo me eŋkpwe ŋkpwaante, ɛ mboy fo me eŋkpwe ɛ̂ joo yi baay e, ɛ mboy tɛn fo me eŋkpwe can bonyii bò mbiayte lɛ bó nu boom bo bwɛɛm e yî Klistu le.
47011027	Me nu ɛ nlem wase baay ɛ njimtɛn. Me nu ɛ nce wase sɛ nyii bokaŋ nteen. Ɛ me nu ɛ no nu wase jeŋ noo sɛ joo yì me ŋ'wu. Me nu ɛ nce wase bokaŋ nteen sɛ fiɛɛ fidien, ɛ nce kenton e sɛ ndvu.
47011028	Ɛ keebvuu bise yî mwɛɛm mvumew e nu ɛ me nu kɛ ɛkuse jo bvujitɛ ɛdiuw ɛcii nje boŋkpwawcɛ bò me ŋkɛŋke fô bintaashɛ bi bonyii bo mbee le bicii.
47011029	Ɛ́ wee dioo wɛɛyi, tu me nu en'yuuke tɛn ɛ me ŋ'wɛɛyi. Ɛ́ wee ké ege ɛ́ wee mvu ege kebefɛ, tu fí nu esase me baay.
47011030	Ɛ́ ɛ̀ nu lɛ me ensaale ye, ɛ́ me ensaalè ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî mwɛɛm mvù duŋci lɛ me n'wɛɛyi lo le.
47011031	Nyo' wvù nu Nyo' noo Icee Tata wesebeene wvù Jisos wvù mbense nu fô wvú le sekecii sɛ ŋka, kee lo lɛ kɛ me mbiayte lo kɛ.
47011032	Ɛ̀ to nu seke me nto nu Damaskus, ɛ wee sa' wvù to nu ɛkuse jo Nfon Alɛtas ke gay ɛ bonyii no cɛyte kelaante kedvu wvu lɛ bó ekoo me.
47011033	Geenɛn ɛ bonyii ke jo me lese ɛ̂ ŋkaa le, bvuse fô ntoo ketaaŋ e shike ɛkfuŋ, ɛ me nsɛ nlemtɛn can ye le.
47012001	Me nu ensaale kɛ ye ŋgɛne dvú fwe naa no sɛw yaa cim nu fó kɛ. Me nu eŋgɛn fwe yî mwɛɛm diɛwɛ bifilɛ le mvù to too fô me le noo mvù Tata to duŋci ɛ̂ me le.
47012002	Me ŋkee wee Klistu mvu wvù Nyo' to cunɛɛ ben dvú fey lo ɛbulɛ gɛn ɛ̂ we ɛke. Ɛbɛn nu wase bilum yuufe ncow binɛw no fí to kooyɛɛ. (Kɛnɛɛ wvú to ben fó bô ye, kɛnɛɛ sɛ ye, tu kɛ me ŋkee kɛ. Ɛ̀ kee kɛ Nyo' maaŋ.)
47012003	Me ŋgomte keembvuu mbiinɛn lɛ, me ŋkee wvuwɛ wee, (kɛnɛɛ wvú to ben fó bô ye, kɛnɛɛ sɛ ye, tu kɛ me ŋkee kɛ. Ɛ̀ kee kɛ Nyo' maaŋ.)
47012004	Nyo' to nu ɛ cun wvú ben dvú fô bvudvuu bvu njoŋ e bvu Nyo' le, ɛ wvú yuw mwɛɛm fó ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu mvù ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wee esee kɛ. Ɛ mvumwɛ nu mwɛɛm mvù bó baa enya mvuŋgay lɛ wee wvu wum ejeme kɛ.
47012005	Ɛ̀ nu wee diɛwɛ wvuwɛ le wvù me nu ensaalè ye bô wvú. Kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me ensaale ye bô ɛkolɛ kem kɛ, ɛfey kɛ lɛ me ensaalè ye ɛkumɛ kewɛɛyɛ kem.
47012006	Ɛ́ ɛ̀ cim nu lɛ me ŋgomte keensaale ye ɛkumɛ ɛkolɛ kem, me nsaa nu keyuŋ kɛ, njefo fiɛɛ fì me nu enjemyi nu kecɛɛy. Geenɛn me nu ɛ ntun keeŋge fifiɛ, wvu lɛ fo wee mvu ke enɛ ekpwaake jɛɛy ɛkumɛ me fele fiɛɛ fì wvú yɛne yî yɛm e bô fì wvú yuuke ɛ̂ me kɛ.
47012007	Geenɛn, keege lɛ fo me ŋke enɛ embense ye baay ɛkumɛ mwɛɛm mvu keŋghaw e mvun mvù Nyo' to duŋcɛɛ ɛ̂ me, wvú to nu ɛ tum kfuu biay mi ɛ yí no bon'yi ye yɛm. Biay yin to nu nceendaa Satan ɛ wvú njiŋsene bô me, wvu lɛ fo me ŋke enɛ embense ye baay kɛ.
47012008	Ɛ me ŋke mbunle ɛkumɛ fiɛɛ fidvu ɛ̂ Tata mbuy bokaŋ botɛte nlɛke lɛ wvú ecake kɛ fiɛɛ fidvu yî yɛm e.
47012009	Geenɛn ɛ wvú tfuse ɛ̂ me lɛ, “Mvuŋgay mwem mvù me nu ɛ mbuw wo dvú nu ɛ kocɛn fô wo le keefii wo, njefo mvuŋgay mwem ké no lemte yî wee le gɛne mɛɛse seke wvú wɛɛyi.” Nonɛn me nu en'yuuke njoŋ mbvuu nsaale ye ɛkumɛ kewɛɛyɛ kem nfesene lo wvu lɛ mvuŋgay mvu Klistu le nulo elemtè yî yɛm e.
47012010	Fí ɛ mum ɛ no nu lɛ me n'yuuke njoŋ bô kewɛɛyɛ kem noo boncun bò bó nan'yi me dvú noo boŋgɛw bò me n'yɛne noo bikaa bì bonyii bone ɛ̂ me ɛjim bô boŋgɛw bò bii me le nje Klistu. Me n'yuuke njoŋ nonɛn njefo ɛ̀ nu seke me ŋ'wɛɛyi, tu sekekiɛ nu ɛ me nu emum entɛmyi.
47012011	Me nu ɛ nɛ wase ɛ ntu keyuŋ! Geenɛn ɛ ɛ̀ ge ben me ɛ nsɛ ntu nonɛn. Ɛ̀ nu ben bò be kɛŋke keeduŋci wee wvù ɛ̀ nu me. Naa no me mbaa ncim mbuy fiɛɛ le nu ɛ kɛ fí mum nu lɛ bonyii ba bò teŋe bikuu bibole lɛ bokow bo boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e mum kuuke fele me kɛ.
47012012	Mwɛɛm mvù duŋci mvuŋgay mvu Nyo' le bô biŋghaw bi mwɛɛm e noo mwɛɛm mvu diuw wvù yumɛɛn e nu ɛ me nto ŋkuu shém baay no ŋgee ɛ̂ ben ɛntelɛŋ. Ɛ mvumvun nu bonciise bò duŋci lɛ wee nu cɛɛy cɛɛy waa ntum Klistu.
47012013	Fiɛɛ fì me nto ŋgee fô bintaashɛ bi bonyii bo mbee le bimew e nshɛɛte ben ɛfey lɛ me nto mbaa ŋgɛɛle bvujitɛ bvumew yî yene le, nu la? Ben elɛɛshɛ jay wɛm fofɛ!
47012014	Ɛ̀ nɛɛ me wvun, ɛ me ɛ nseyse wase keento ɛ̂ ben e yî bokaŋ e botɛte. Ɛ kɛ me nu ŋke ento enu bvujitɛ bvumew fô ben e kɛ, njefo kɛ me ŋgomte ɛ ɛ̀ nu mwɛɛm mvunɛn kɛ. Me ŋgomte ɛ ɛ̀ nu ben. Me ŋgomte ɛ ɛ̀ nu ben njefo kɛ ɛ̀ nu boom bò kɛŋke keegɛɛle mwɛɛm ɛ̂ bo'icee bobole bô bobwee bobole kɛ. Ɛ̀ ké no gɛɛle bocee boom bô bobwee boom mwɛɛm ɛ̂ boom bobole.
47012015	Me nu ŋke en'yuuke naa njoŋ baay keenjewse fiɛɛ ficii fì me ŋkɛŋke fô ben e bô keenya noo ɛkolɛ kem nje ben. Ɛ́ me ŋkooŋke ben baay, ɛ́ ben kaa ekooŋke me caan e?
47012016	Ben nu ɛ yɛn kecɛɛy lɛ kɛ me nto mbaa eŋgɛɛ bvujitɛ yî yene le kɛ. Geenɛn bonyii ɛ no duu lɛ me nto nu ɛ n'wɛɛntɛn nlɛɛ ben bô mbiay.
47012017	Nuu lɛ wee mvu bonyii bò me nto ntumɛɛ fô ben e to nu ɛ lɛɛ ben ɛ̂ diee diem e lɛ?
47012018	Me nto nu ɛ nlɛkɛ Taytus lɛ wvú eto ɛ̂ ben e, mbvuu ntum waa bwee wesebeene wɛ lɛ bô wvú eto. Taytus to nu ɛ lɛɛ ben seke wvú to toɛ le? Bee wvú to baa gee kɛ mwɛɛm yî ŋkpwawcɛ le mwaaŋ bô yî ɛkalɛ le kemwaaŋ e?
47012019	Sekemew ɛ ben kpwaake lɛ no bese mɛy ɛ no jemyi nɛn nu ɛ bese gomte keetaŋyi lo diuw wese fwe dvunɛn. Bese jemyi ɛ ɛ̀ nu diɛwɛ bonyii bo Klistu le fwe dvu Nyo'. Nsáa yese shém, fiɛɛ ficii fì bese gee fô ben e nu keege ɛ́ ben ekuu lo.
47012020	Ɛ me nfane lɛ ɛ̀ nɛlo ɛ́ me ŋke enɛ ento en'yɛn ɛ ben yaa nu no me nshieele lɛ ben enù kɛ, ɛ́ ben tɛn eyɛn ɛ me n'yaa nu tɛn no ben shieele lɛ me enù kɛ. Me nfane lɛ ɛ̀ nɛlo ɛ́ me ŋke enɛ ento en'yɛn ɛ bonyii waale diwaa, ghɛɛke keŋghɛw, kɛŋke shém yì ton'yɛɛn, beele kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu dew yibo, beete bô ɛdiee ɛ bonyii, kunsene mvuŋkunsɛn, bensee ye yi ɛcici, kɛŋke kembvuŋse.
47012021	Me nfane lɛ me nu ŋke endioo ɛ mbvuu ɛ nto, ɛ́ Nyo' wɛm ege ɛ́ ken'wuumɛn ekoole me, noo lɛ me nu ŋke enu yî yii le nje bonyii bò se gee bibefɛ diɛwɛ nnyɛn e bô nce nnyɛn kenjaŋ noo nsake, ɛ bó nu ɛ bó baa cinɛ wase dvú kɛ.
47013001	Fin nu wase bokaŋ bem botɛte bò me nu ento ɛ̂ ben e. Ŋwa' Nyo' gayte lɛ, “Ɛ́ bó lese nsaw wee, tu bó nu eshieele bonyii bofɛɛ kɛnɛɛ botɛte, bò eleem jim nsaw wvudvu.”
47013002	Ɛ̀ to nu seke me nto ntoɛ ɛ̂ ben e yî nto wɛm wvu bokaŋ bofɛɛ le, me nto nu ɛ ŋgay ɛ̂ bonyii bò to cee nce kebefɛ lɛ, bó eyɛnè. Me ɛ mbvuu ɛ no ŋgayte ɛ̂ bó noo ɛ̂ bonyii bocii naa no me mbaa nu ɛ̂ ben ɛjise lɛ, ben eyɛnè, njefo kefew kè me nu ŋke embvuu ento nu ɛ me n'yaa nu ŋke encam naa lo shen fô wee le kɛ.
47013003	No ben gomte lɛ me ŋge fiɛɛ fì duŋci lɛ ɛ̀ jemyi Klistu ɛ̂ ben fele yî yɛm e, tu me nu eŋge. Kɛ ɛ̀ nu lɛ wvú wɛɛyi lo keenya ŋgɛw ɛ̂ ben kɛ. Wvú kɛŋke naa mvuŋgay ɛ̂ ben ɛntelɛŋ.
47013004	Ɛ̀ nu kecɛɛy lɛ bó to taa wvú yî kentam e ɛ wvú wɛɛyi. Geenɛn keseen nu ɛ wvú nu dvú ɛ̂ mvuŋgay mvu Nyo' le. Bese wɛɛyi kɛ tɛn diɛwɛ no wvú to wɛɛyi. Geenɛn yî mvuŋgay mvu Nyo' le nu ɛ bese nu ke ecee bee bó lemte ben e.
47013005	Ben etaa bikuu binɛn eyɛn lɛ laa ben nu yî mbee le lɛ. Ben emom ɛ ɛ̀ nu bikuu binɛn. Kɛ ben yɛne lɛ Jisos Klistu nu yî yene le? Wvú nu naa yî yene le, ɛ́ ɛ̀ fɛn baa nu lɛ ben nu ɛ mom bikuu binɛn ɛ yɛn ɛ ben ɛ gbwe.
47013006	Me ŋkee naa lɛ ben nu ke eyɛn lɛ bese baa egbwe kɛ.
47013007	Bese bunlee Nyo' lɛ fo ben ke enɛ ege fiɛɛ sɛ ɛ̀ nu fi lɛŋ kɛ. Kɛ bese yaa gomte lɛ bonyii eyɛne lɛ bese nu ɛ fey mmom wvudvu kɛ. Geenɛn bese bunlee ɛ ɛ̀ nu lɛ ben egeè ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fi lɛŋ naa no bese cim yen'yi kɛ diɛwɛ bese nu ɛ gbwe wase mmom wvudvu.
47013008	Kɛ bese yaa nulo egee naa lo fiɛɛ fì kicine kecɛɛy kɛ. Bese nulo egee kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu fì tomte lo kecɛɛy.
47013009	Ɛ̀ dioo nu seke bese wɛɛyi ɛ ben tɛmyi, ɛ bese no yuuke njoŋ baay. Bunle yese nu kɛ lɛ ben eku egɛn emɛse.
47013010	Ɛ̀ nɛɛ fiɛɛ fì me nsaaŋke mwɛɛm mvun ɛ̂ ben ɛ me mbɛɛ sɛ me ɛ nto, wvu lɛ seke me ɛ nto, me nsaa eŋkɛŋke keenjo mvuŋgay mvù Tata nu ɛ nya ɛ̂ me encewcewe lo dvú yî yene le kɛ. Mvuŋgay mvun nu mvù wvú nya lɛ me en'yoo lo ben dvú, ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu lɛ me ensâw lo ben dvú kɛ.
47013011	Keemɛɛse boom bo bwɛɛm e, me ŋgayte ben e lɛ beene ɛ shɛɛ wase. Ben eseyse bikuu binɛn, eyuw ntefe wɛm, enù diuw mwaaŋ, eceè yî nyɛkeey e, nonɛn ɛ́ Nyo' keŋkoŋɛn bô nyɛkeey emum enù ben ɛ bó.
47013012	Ben egaynɛn bikuu binɛn e, eŋocɛ ɛ̂ ŋŋocɛ bonyii bo Nyo' le.
47013013	Bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo Nyo' le bocii gayte ben e.
47013014	Mbuwma Tata wesebeene wvù Jisos Klistu, bô keŋkoŋɛn ke Nyo' le, noo kentaashɛ ke Keyoy ke Yuule le enù ben ɛ bó bocii.
48001001	Ŋwa' wvun saŋ me wvù Baul, waa ntum Jisos Klistu. Kɛ me nu waa ntum ɛ ɛ̀ to tum wee wvu wum me kɛnɛɛ nya mvuŋgay ɛ̂ me kɛ. Ɛ̀ to tum Jisos Klistu bô Nyo' Ice wvù to bvusɛɛ wvú yî kpwe le.
48001002	Bee boom bo bwee wene le bo mbee le bocii bò nu fɛn bee bó gayte ben bintaashɛ bi bonyii bo mbee le bi woŋ wvù Galɛshia le.
48001003	Nyo' Ice bô Tata wesebeene wvù Jisos Klistu ebuw ben bô kembonɛn, ebvuu enya ben bô mvuntelem mvù lɛɛtene.
48001004	Jisos Klistu nu wvù to nyaɛ ɛkolɛ kew nje bibefɛ bisɛɛbeene wvu lɛ wen ebvuse beene can woŋ kebefɛ wvu keseen wvun e. Fifin nu no Nyo' wvù Icee wesebeene to seysɛɛ.
48001005	Bvukukɛ bvucii nu ɛ ɛ̀ kɛŋke wvú sekecii sɛ ŋka. Fí enù nonɛn.
48001006	Diuw yumte lo me lɛ kɛ keseen keseen nɛn ben nu ɛ nɛ wase ɛ no baŋsee jim ɛ̂ Nyo' wvù to teŋɛɛ ben nje fitele fì jee fì Klistu kɛŋke fô ben e, ɛ no bii ɛ ɛ̀ nu saaka wvù jee wvumvu le jɛɛy.
48001007	Kɛ ɛ̀ nu lɛ saaka wvù jee wvumvu bvuu nu lo dvú jɛɛy kɛ. Fí nu kɛ lo lɛ bonyii bomew gomte keebvuŋsee bvufee bvunɛn, beete bô saaka wvù jee wvu ɛkumɛ Klistu.
48001008	Me ɛ no ŋgayte lɛ ɛ́ ɛ̀ cim to naa bese kɛnɛɛ nceendaa Nyo' mvu fowe ɛ no fewci saaka wvumvu jɛɛy ɛ̂ ben sɛ ɛ̀ nu wvuwɛ wvù bese to fewcɛɛ ɛ̂ ben, ɛ́ mwɛtɛn tuu lon!
48001009	No bese to gayɛɛ wase nu ɛ me mbvuu ntuu kɛ fó ŋgayte lɛ, ɛ́ wee nɛ ɛ no fewci saaka Nyo' wvumvu jɛɛy sɛ ɛ̀ nu wvuwɛ wvù bese to fewcɛɛ ɛ̂ ben, ɛ́ mwɛtɛn tuu lɛ lon!
48001010	Ben kpwaake lɛ me ŋgomte lɛ ɛ́ ebɛnseè bonyii me nuu lɛ ɛ́ ebɛnseè Nyo' lɛ? Nuu lɛ ben kpwaake lɛ me ŋgomte keeŋgee lɛ bonyii eyuukè njoŋ e? Ɛ́ ɛ̀ be nu lɛ me ŋgomte keeŋgee lɛ bonyii eyuukè njoŋ, me nsaa enu wee lemme wvu Klistu kɛ.
48001011	Boom bo bwɛɛm e, me ŋgomte lɛ ben ekiɛɛ lɛ kɛ saaka wvù jee wvù wvu Nyo' wvù me nto nfewcɛɛ ɛ̂ ben nu fiɛɛ ɛ fí to buy ɛ̂ wee wvu wum kɛ.
48001012	Kɛ me nto n'yuw diuw wee mvu le, ɛ kɛ ɛ̀ to yɛɛyi wee me dvú kɛ. Ɛ̀ to duŋci Jisos Klistu ɛ̂ me.
48001013	Me njemyi nɛn ɛ ben to yuw wase no keŋge kem to shee nu seke me nto mbɛɛ yî nce woŋ wese Bojuu le. Me nto ŋké no mbone bikaa ɛjim jo bintaashɛ bi bonyii bo mbee le bo Nyo' le baay ŋgomte keenfiwsɛ naa lo bí.
48001014	Me nto njici mbee wese Bojuu le ntɛmyi nfele lo keghan kem ɛntelɛŋ jo bonyii bosɛse, nlooci nleeme ntɛmyi naa ntay yî nce woŋ bo'icee bosɛse le.
48001015	Geenɛn ɛ Nyo' to baa wase me gɛɛ ɛ me mbɛɛ ɛ̂ bwɛɛm ɛshem. Ɛ fitele fiew fì jee ke ge ɛ wvú tee me.
48001016	Ɛ wvú ke duŋcɛ Waa we ɛ̂ me no wvú to shieele, wvu lɛ me eŋghanè nfewcì ɛkumɛ wvú ɛ̂ bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu. No wvú to duŋcɛɛ nonɛn, ɛ me nfaŋɛ n'yaa embvuu enu lo keembife fiɛɛ ɛ̂ wee wvu wum kɛ.
48001017	Kɛ me nto mbaa emben tɛn Jɛlusalɛm keen'yɛn bonyii bò to nu wase boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e ɛ̂ me fwe kɛ. Me nto nɛ ŋgɛn fiem ɛ ɛ̀ nu Alɛbia, ŋke nɛ jó ŋkase ntu jim Damaskus.
48001018	Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu ɛjim jo bilum bitɛte ɛ me mben Jɛlusalɛm lɛ bee Bita kiɛɛnɛn bikuu. No me mbenɛɛ, ɛ bee wvú ce ɛdiuw yuufe ncow ɛtin.
48001019	Me nto mbaa embvuu en'yɛn wee mvu ŋgoo boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e ɛfey Jɛm wvù waa bwee Tata wesebeene wvù Jisos e kɛ.
48001020	Fiɛɛ fì me nsaaŋke fin nu kecɛɛy, ɛ Nyo' kee lɛ kɛ me mbiayte lo kɛ.
48001021	Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu kefew kemew e, ɛ me nɛ ŋgɛn ɛ̂ biba bì Silia bô Silishia le.
48001022	Sekekiɛ to nu ɛ bintaashɛ bi bonyii bo mbee le bi Klistu le bi ɛ̂ keba kè Judea le yaa kee wase me ɛjise kɛ.
48001023	Bó to yuuke kɛ lo ɛ bonyii jemyi lɛ, “Wee wɛ wvù se bone bikaa ɛ̂ beene ɛjim ghane wase keseen fewci lɛ bonyii elese fitele yî Klistu le, ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì wvú se shee gomte lɛ wen efiwsɛ lo.”
48001024	Ɛ bó yuw nonɛn no tumte moŋkum mo Nyo' le yî fiɛɛ fì wvú geɛ fô me le.
48002001	Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu ɛjim jo bilum yuufe ncow binɛw, ɛ me mbvuu mben Jɛlusalɛm bee Banaban. Me nto ndioo mbene, njo Taytus.
48002002	Me nto mben kefew kin e ɛ ɛ̀ duŋci Nyo' lɛ me emben. No me mbenɛɛ, n'yɛn bonyii bò bó to kee bó lɛ ɛ̀ nu bikuu le, ɛ bee bó lɛwse ye, ɛ me njike saaka wvù jee wvù wvu Nyo' wvù me nto nfewci ɛ̂ bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu ɛ̂ bó ɛjise. Ɛ me nto ŋge nonɛn wvu lɛ fo lemme dì me nu ɛ nlem wase bô dì me mbɛɛ nlemte ke ela ɛcici kɛ.
48002003	Ɛ bó yuw nonɛn, faŋɛ yaa eleeme lɛ bó etfuse Taytus yew wvù bee wvú to nu ɛ ɛ̀ nu naa wee Glek kɛ.
48002004	Ɛ́ ɛ̀ to baa nu nje bonyii bomew bò to mbiayte lɛ bó nu bonyii bo mbee le, bò to wɛɛntɛnɛɛ ley fô bese to nu, tu kɛ bó to bee ejemyi leyte ɛ̂ fifiɛ fiɛɛ le kɛ. Bó to to diɛwɛ boŋkee le keeyɛn no bese gee wase mwɛɛm wasewase nje bese nu ɛ taashɛ bee bo Klistu Jisos. Ɛ bó mum no gomte keekase tfuse bese bvunfaw e.
48002005	Ɛ bese faŋɛ yaa bee naa lo fiɛɛ fì bó to too dvú caan kɛ. Ɛ bese to ge nonɛn wvu lɛ bese gomte keegɛɛ kecɛɛy kè ɛ̀ nu ke saaka wvù jee wvù wvu Nyo' le wvun fô ben e.
48002006	Ɛ bonyii ba bò bó to kee bó lɛ ɛ̀ nu bikuu, (kɛnɛɛ bó to nu la, kɛnɛɛ la, tu kɛ fifiɛ kɛŋke fiɛɛ fô me le kɛ, njefo kɛ Nyo' duŋci kejɛɛy jɛɛy kɛ.) Boba bonyii bò me ŋgayte, bò bó to kee lɛ ɛ̀ nu bikuu to baa ebise fiɛɛ yî fì me nto nfewci le kɛ.
48002007	Geenɛn, ɛ bó kaa yɛn lɛ bó nu ɛ nya saaka wvù jee wvù wvu Nyo' can yɛm e lɛ me enfewcì ɛ̂ bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu, lɛŋlɛŋ no bó nu ɛ nya ɛ̂ Bita lɛ wvú efewcì ɛ̂ Bojuu.
48002008	(Nyo' wvù to nyaɛ mvuŋgay ɛ̂ Bita lɛ wvú elemtè lemme din fô Bojuu le, nu kɛ wvú wvù to nyaɛ ɛ̂ me lɛ me enlemtè fô bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu le.)
48002009	Ɛ bó dioo yɛn je yì Nyo' nu ɛ buw me jó, ɛ Jɛm bô Bita noo Jon bò bó to kee lɛ ɛ̀ nu dikfuy di bonyii bo mbee le mum nya ɛbo ɛ̂ bee Banaban keeduŋcɛ lɛ bee bó lemte yî fiɛɛ le fimwaaŋ, lɛ bese egɛn lɛ elemtè fô bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu le, ɛ́ bó elemtè fô Bojuu le.
48002010	Fiɛɛ fì bó to gayɛɛ to nu kɛ lɛ bese ekumyì Bojuu bo kefufe le. Ɛ fifin nu fiɛɛ ɛ me nto ŋkooŋke naa baay keeŋgee.
48002011	Geenɛn ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu kefew kemew e, ɛ Bita ke nɛ to Antiok, ɛ me nsaw wvú ɛ̂ bonyii ɛjise njefo wvú to nu ɛ jay baay.
48002012	Fí nu lɛ wvú to yaw to no diekene bô bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu, yaa nyaake kɛ. Ɛ bonyii bomew bò Jɛm to tumɛɛ ke dioo to, ɛ wvú mum kɛw no guute ye jim, ke nɛ gawsɛn, faŋɛ yaa bvuu diekene bô bó kɛ. Ɛ wvú to gawsene nonɛn njefo wvú to fane ŋgoo yì to ké no leeme kɛ lɛ bó kɛŋke keetfuse wee wvù yaa nu kɛ wee Juu yew ɛ́ mwɛtɛn sɛ no nu wee Klistu.
48002013	No wvú ge nonɛn ɛ bonyii bo mbee le bomew bò to nu Bojuu mum beŋɛn gee diew didvu le. Ɛ naa Banaban kebɛɛ mum bi tɛn gee dibole didvu le.
48002014	Ɛ me ndioo n'yɛn lɛ kɛ gee dibole bii cɛɛy cɛɛy no saaka wvù jee wvu ɛkumɛ Klistu duŋci kɛ, ɛ me mum ŋgay ɛ̂ Bita ɛ̂ bó bocii ɛjise lɛ, “Wo nu wee Juu, cee wase diɛwɛ wee wvù yaa nu kɛ wee Juu le, ɛ no gomte keekane bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu lɛ bó eceè diɛwɛ Bojuu le nɛɛ le?”
48002015	Me nto njemyi ɛ̂ Bita nonɛn ɛ ɛ̀ nu kecɛɛy lɛ bee bó nu boom bo Bojuu le bo woŋ e. Kɛ bese nu bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu bò bó yɛne lɛ ɛ̀ nu bonyii bò befe kɛ.
48002016	Geenɛn ɛ bese kee kɛ lɛ kɛ Nyo' joo wee lɛ wvú nu teytey njefo wvú gɛɛle bonci bo Bojuu le kɛ. Wvú joo njefo wvú nu ɛ lese fitele yî Jisos Klistu le. Ɛ bese kebɛɛ ɛ lese tɛn fitele yî Klistu Jisos e wvu lɛ bese enù teytey ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛjise nje fitele fì bese lese yî ye le, ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu nje bese gɛɛle bonci kɛ, njefo kɛ wee gɛɛle bonci ɛ́ Nyo' ke eyuu ejo wvú lɛ wvú nu teytey kɛ.
48002017	Ɛ́ bese momte keenu teytey ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛjise nje bese nu bonyii bo Klistu le, bonyii ɛ bvuu ɛ no yɛne kɛ lɛ bese nu bonyii bò befe njefo kɛ bese gɛɛle bonci bo Bojuu le, tu fí fɛn nu lɛ Klistu tomte kebefɛ? Kɛ fí nu naa lo nonɛn kɛ!
48002018	Ɛ́ me nɛ ɛ mbvuu ɛ no n'yoote fiɛɛ ɛ me nto nsâw wase, tu fifiɛ duŋci lɛ me njayte lo.
48002019	Fiɛɛ fì nu, nu lɛ ɛ̂ keba ke bonci le nu ɛ me nu wase ŋkfusay, ɛ ɛ̀ yu bonci me, me ɛ ŋkpwe wvu lɛ me enceè wase no Nyo' gomte.
48002020	Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me eŋgay lɛ bó to nu ɛ ta wase me yî kentam e ɛ me ŋkpwe bee Klistu. Kɛ nshii wvù me ŋkɛŋke keseen bvuu nu wɛm kɛ. Ɛ̀ cee wase Klistu yî yɛm e. Ɛ nshii wvù me ŋkɛŋke keseen yî yɛm e nu wvù fitele fì me nlese yî Waa Nyo' le wvù to nu ɛ duŋcɛ keŋkoŋɛn fô me le nya ɛkolɛ kew keekpwe nje yɛm.
48002021	Kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me ntune mbuwma Nyo' kɛ. Ɛ́ ɛ̀ nu lɛ ɛ̀ nɛlo ɛ́ wee enu teytey ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛjise njefo wvú gɛɛle bonci, kɛ tu kpwe Klistu to nu ɛcici.
48003001	O oo bonyii bo Galɛshia, ben nu la biyuŋ nɛn? Wee nu ɛ low ben e? Ɛ̀ nu kɛ ben bò bó nu ɛ nɛle wase baaŋŋ no bó to taɛ Jisos Klistu yî kentam e ben ɛ yɛn lo ɛndan e?
48003002	Me ŋgomte keembife fiɛɛ fimwaaŋ ɛ̂ ben. Keyoy ke Nyo' le to to yî yene le njefo ben to gee no bonci gayte nuu njefo ben to nu ɛ bee fiɛɛ fì ben to yuwɛɛ, lese fitele yî dvú le lɛ?
48003003	Ben yuŋsene la nɛn? Ben kɛw fiɛɛ bô Keyoy ke Nyo' le, ɛ no nu wase keseen lɛ ben nu ke emɛse ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô mvuŋgay mvunɛn e?
48003004	Ben to yɛn ŋgɛw ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvu ɛcici le? Kecɛɛy, kɛ ɛ̀ to nu wvu ɛcici kɛ.
48003005	Nyo' wvù nyaa Keyoy kew ɛ̂ ben bvuu gee biŋghaw bi mwɛɛm e ɛ̂ ben ɛntelɛŋ, gee nonɛn njefo ben gɛɛle bonci nuu njefo ben nu ɛ yuw saaka wvu ɛkumɛ Klistu ɛ lese fitele yî ye le lɛ?
48003006	Ɛ̀ nu no bó saŋ ɛkumɛ Abla'am ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le lɛ, “Wvú to nu ɛ lese fitele yî Nyo' le, ɛ Nyo' mum jo wvú lɛ wvú nu wee wvu teytey.”
48003007	Ben eyɛn lɛ lɛ ɛ̀ nu bonyii bò nu ɛ lese fitele yî Nyo' le bò looci nu kfuu di Abla'am e.
48003008	Ŋwa' Nyo' to nu ɛ yuu wase duŋcɛ lɛ Nyo' nu ke ejo bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu lɛ bó enù teytey ɛ̂ wvú ɛjise nje fitele fì bó nu ɛ lese yî ye le. Ɛ wvú mum fewcɛ saaka wvù jee wvun ɛ̂ Abla'am ɛ ɛ̀ bɛɛ lo gayte lɛ, “Me nu ŋke embuw bitum bicii bi yî ɛkolɛ ke nshɛ le nje yo.”
48003009	Nonɛn, fí ɛ no nu lɛ bonyii bò nu ɛ lese fitele yî Nyo' le nu ɛ Nyo' ɛ buw tɛn bó no wvú to buwɛɛ Abla'am wvù to nu ɛ lese fitele yî ye le.
48003010	Bonyii bocii bò yɛne lɛ bó nulo enu teytey ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛjise njefo bó gɛɛle bonci nu ɛ bó tuule lon yî bikuu bibole, njefo bó nu ɛ saŋ lɛ, “Wee tfuu wvù baa ecee no bó saŋ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' bonci le gee no bonci bocii gomte, nu ɛ wvú tuule lon yî ɛkolɛ kew e.”
48003011	Fí ɛ mum ɛ no duŋci naa ɛndan lɛ kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ Nyo' ejo wee lɛ wvú nu teytey nje mwɛtɛn gɛɛle bonci kɛ. Ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì bó nu ɛ saŋ lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu kɛ wee wvù Nyo' nu ɛ jo lɛ wvú nu teytey nje fitele fì wvú lese yî ye le wvù nu ke ekɛŋke nshii.”
48003012	Kɛ bonci kɛŋke fiɛɛ keege bô nlese fitele yî Nyo' le kɛ, njefo “Wee wvù gɛɛle bonci nu ke ecee bii kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu bó le.”
48003013	Klistu to nu ɛ sum beene can lon wvù bonci too dvú le. Wvú to nu ɛ tuu bolon bosɛɛbeene yî ɛkolɛ kew e, ɛ ɛ̀ nu no bó saŋ lɛ, “Lon nu yî wee wvù bó nu ɛ njɛyse yî kete le.”
48003014	Wvú to ge nonɛn, wvu lɛ mbuwma wvù Nyo' to nyaɛ ɛ̂ Abla'am eto tɛn fô bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu le nje Klistu Jisos, ɛ́ beene bò nu ɛ lese fitele yî ye le ekɛŋkɛ tɛn Keyoy ke Nyo' le kè wvú to kawɛɛ.
48003015	Boom bo bwɛɛm e, beene ejo kenfewsɛn yî mwɛɛm mvù bonyii ké no gee le. Ɛ́ bonyii seyse wase fiɛɛ ɛ die kelew, tu kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wee ebvuu ekose kɛnɛɛ ebise fiɛɛ yî dvú le kɛ.
48003016	Ɛkumɛ ŋkawma wvu Nyo', nu ɛ wvú to kaw ɛ̂ Abla'am bô wan wvù nu ke ebuy ɛ̂ kfuu diew e. Bó baa saŋ lɛ, “Wvú nu fô boom bò nu ke ebuy ɛ̂ kfuu diew e kɛ”, fì duŋci lɛ bó nu nteen kɛ. Fí duŋci lɛ fó jemyi ɛkumɛ wan mwaaŋ. Ɛ wan wvun nu Klistu.
48003017	Fiɛɛ fì me ŋgomte keeŋgay nu lɛ, Nyo' to nu ɛ ge ŋkawma wvun, ɛ bilum ke fey gee nɛ bô kecow mbaanshɛ (430) ɛ wvú sɛ nya bonci. No fí nu nonɛn, kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bonci bò to toɛ wase ɛjim ebvuu eto ekose moŋkan mò Nyo' to gbwolɛɛ fwele, ege ɛ́ fiɛɛ fì wvú to kawɛɛ ela ɛcici kɛ.
48003018	Ɛ́ fí fɛn nu lɛ wee nulo ekɛŋkɛ nnya yin ɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ seke wvú gɛɛle bonci, kɛ tu kɛ ɛ bvuu bɛɛ lɛ Nyo' to kaw lo bonyii dvú kɛ. Geenɛn, Nyo' to nya nnya yin ɛ̂ Abla'am bii no wvú to kawɛɛ wvú dvú.
48003019	Shiee bonci ɛ̀ no nu la? Bó to bise bonci keeduŋci mwɛɛm mvù bonyii jayte ɛ kɛw nonɛn gɛn buy naa seke wan wvun wvù Nyo' to geɛ ŋkawma wvun ɛkumɛ wvú nu ke eto. Ɛ Nyo' mum nya bonci ban ɛ̂ bonceendaa bew mum nya can wee mvu le lɛ wvú efese ɛ̂ bonyii.
48003020	Kɛ ben kee lɛ ɛ́ bonyii nɛ ɛ no seysee fiɛɛ ɛ wee mvu nu ɛ̂ bó ɛntelɛŋ, tu wvú nu fô bó le bocii. Geenɛn, Nyo' nu kɛ mwaaŋ.
48003021	No fí nu nonɛn, tu ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ nci Nyo' ebvuu ekose fiɛɛ fì wvú to kawɛɛ le? Kɛ ɛ̀ nu naa lo ɛ́ fí enu nonɛn kɛ! Ɛ́ nci mvu to nu dvú wvù nulo enya nshii, tu ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wee enu teytey ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛjise nje wvú gɛɛle bonci cɛɛy cɛɛy.
48003022	Geenɛn, Ŋwa' Nyo' gayte lɛ wee tfuu nu nfwa ɛkuse jo bibefɛ. Fí ɛ mum ɛ no nu lɛ ŋkawma wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ fô wee wvù nu ɛ lese fitele yî Jisos Klistu le, nu ɛ ɛ̀ nu ke ekɛŋkɛ kɛ wvuwɛ wee wvù nu ɛ lese fitele yî ye le.
48003023	Ɛ̀ to nu fwele ɛ Jisos baa to wase wvu lɛ bonyii eleese fitele yî ye le, ɛ bonyii nu ɛ̂ bonci kuse ɛ bó ɛ kay bó diɛwɛ bonyii bo ncaw e ɛ no cɛyte, gɛn buy seke Nyo' ke eduŋcɛ Jisos ɛ́ bó eleese fitele yî ye le.
48003024	Bonci to nu diɛwɛ ndɛ wan wvù to shee bô bonyii nɛci gɛn buy seke Klistu to toɛ wvu lɛ bonyii elese fitele ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî ye le ɛ́ Nyo' sɛ jo bó lɛ bó nu teytey ɛ̂ wvú ɛjise.
48003025	No Klistu nu ɛ to wase bonyii ɛ no leese fitele yî ye le, tu kɛ beene bɛɛ can ndɛ wan wvun e kɛ.
48003026	Ben bò nu ɛ taashɛ ben ɛ bo Klistu Jisos nu wase boom bo Nyo' le nje fitele fì ben nu ɛ lese yî Klistu le.
48003027	Ben ekeè lɛ wee tfuu wvù bó nu ɛ lese wase ɛ̂ joo ɛ taashɛ wvú bô Klistu nu ɛ wvú ɛ tu wase bô Klistu fiɛɛ fimwaaŋ.
48003028	Kɛ wee mvu bvuu nu jɛɛy lɛ wen nu wee Juu kɛnɛɛ wee ketum kɛ. Kɛ wee mvu bvuu nu jɛɛy lɛ wen nu nfwa kɛnɛɛ waa yew kɛ, ɛ kɛ wee mvu bvuu nu jɛɛy lɛ wen nu diemsɛn kɛnɛɛ kpwoon kɛ. Ben bocii nu wase fiɛɛ fimwaaŋ yî Klistu Jisos e.
48003029	No ben nu wase bonyii bo Klistu le nonɛn, tu ben nu wase boom bo Abla'am e, ɛ ben nu ke ekɛŋkɛ mwɛɛm mvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ Abla'am dvú.
48004001	Fiɛɛ fì me ŋgayte nu lɛ, ɛ́ wee nu keeke edie bvushɛw bvu ice le, geenɛn bɛɛ wan caan, tu kɛ jɛɛy jɛɛy nu dvú bô nfwa ice naa no ɛ̀ cim kɛŋke wvú bvushɛw bvudvu kɛ.
48004002	Wvú nu eyaw kɛ enu ɛ̂ bonyii bomew taale fô wvú le ɛ bvushɛw bvudvu nu can bonyii bomew e ɛ bó taale fó, egɛn ebuy kefew kè ice seyse le.
48004003	Ɛ̀ nu kɛ no fí nu fô beene le. Ɛ̀ to nu seke beene to nu diɛwɛ boom bo caan e, ɛ beene no nu bonfaw bo mwɛɛm mvù saake yî woŋ wvun e.
48004004	Ɛ kefew ke dioo loocɛ kocɛn, ɛ Nyo' tum waa we ɛ wvú to, ɛ kpwoon boo wvú, ɛ wvú no nu tɛn ɛ̂ bonci kuse.
48004005	Wvú to to wvu lɛ wen esum bonyii bò nu ɛ̂ bonci kuse ɛ́ Nyo' emum ejo beene diɛwɛ boom bew e.
48004006	No Nyo' jo wase beene diɛwɛ boom bew e nonɛn, ɛ mum ɛ ciinse Keyoy ke Waa we le kí ɛ to yî yese beene le, ɛ ge beene ɛ no teŋe wvú lɛ. “Abba, Icee wese!”
48004007	Fí nu lɛ Nyo' nu ɛ ge wase ben ɛ faŋɛ yaa bvuu nu bonfaw kɛ. Ben nu wase boom bo yew e. No ben nu wase boom, tu fí nu lɛ ben nu ke ekɛŋkɛ mwɛɛm mvù wvú gɛke fô boom bew e.
48004008	Ɛ̀ to nu fwele seke ben to baa kee wase Nyo' kɛ, ɛ ben no lemte bvunfaw can mwɛɛm mvù ben to joo lɛ ɛ̀ nu bonyo' sɛ ɛ̀ nu bonyo' ŋkuuŋ.
48004009	Geenɛn, keseen no ben nu ɛ kiɛɛ wase Nyo', kɛnɛɛ lɛ keseen no Nyo' nu ɛ kiɛɛ wase ben no me mbee keeŋgay, ben ɛ ghan nɛɛ ɛ sɛ no gomte keetuu jim fô bonyo' bo ɛcici ban e bò nu sɛ bó kɛŋke mvuŋgay ŋkuuŋ. Ben gomte keebvuu etuu bonfaw bo bonyo' bodvu ban e nje la?
48004010	Ben gɛɛle mbam ɛdiuw yomew lɛ ɛ̀ nu yo baay baay, bamte kee yimi, bamte bifew bimew yî kelum e, bamte bilum nje la?
48004011	Ben gee nɛn ɛ me nfane baay lɛ lemme diem dì me nlem ɛ̂ ben ɛntelɛŋ nu ɛ la ɛcici.
48004012	Boom bo bwɛɛm e, me ŋkule lo can ɛ̂ ben lɛ ben ekumɛn enù kɛ diɛwɛ no me nu ɛkumɛ bonci, kɛ no me nto ŋkumɛnɛɛ no nu diɛwɛ ben e seke ben to nu sɛ bonci. Ben to ke baa ege wase fiɛɛ fì befe fô me le kɛ.
48004013	Ben kee lɛ seke fwele wvù me nto nfewci saaka wvù jee wvù wvu Nyo' ɛ̂ ben nu njefo me nto nu beene ncɛmte.
48004014	Ɛ naa no me nto nu yî kencɛm e nɛn, ɛ kí nu diɛwɛ mmom e ɛ yí ɛ to fô ben e, ben to baa elewte, kɛnɛɛ nyɛnsee me kɛ. Ɛ ben kaa fiisɛn lo me naa kɛ diɛwɛ nceendaa Nyo' mvu kɛnɛɛ diɛwɛ Klistu Jisos e kebɛɛ.
48004015	Ben to yuuke njoŋ bô me sekekiɛ, ɛ̀ kooyi la keseen? Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me eŋgay lɛ ɛ́ bó to gay lo lɛ ben ebaayɛ ɛjisɛ ɛyene enya ɛ̂ me, ɛ́ ben ebaayɛ lo ɛ́ je fɛn nu dvú.
48004016	Me nu ɛ ntu wase wee bvuban fô ben e no me nseŋe kecɛɛy ɛ̂ ben e?
48004017	Bonyii ba gomte keeduŋci lɛ bó kɛŋke shiee fô ben e baay, geenɛn ɛ bó gomte ben yî fiɛɛ le ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu fì jee kɛ. Bó kooŋke lɛ beene egawsɛn ɛ́ ben ekɛŋke wase shiee ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô bó le.
48004018	Fí jee lɛ wee ekɛŋkè shiee fô wee le yî fiɛɛ fì jee le. Fifin nu lɛŋ sekecii ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu kɛ seke me nu beene maaŋ kɛ.
48004019	Boom bem bò nu shém yɛm, ɛ̀ nu kɛ diɛwɛ me mbɛɛ embvuu eŋkɛw lo lume dinɛn, en'yɛn ŋgɛw eŋgɛn embuy no nce Klistu nu ke enu yî yene le!
48004020	Wee ejo ɛ me mbe nu beene keseen, ɛ́ me nsɛ ŋkiɛɛ je yì me enjeme jó ɛ̂ ben. Fiɛɛ fì ben ge fin nu ɛ bvufee ɛ la lo me.
48004021	Ben bò gomte keenu ɛ̂ bonci kuse, ben kɛ see ɛ̂ me, ben yuuke kɛ fiɛɛ fì bonci jemyi?
48004022	Bó nu ɛ saŋ lɛ Abla'am to kɛŋke boom bolemsɛ bofɛɛ, ɛ wvú to boke mvu bô nfwa, boo wvumvu bô kpwɛse wvù leyɛɛn.
48004023	Nfwa wvun to boke wan kɛ no bó ké no boote boom bocii. Geenɛn ɛ kpwoon wvù leyɛɛn boo we bii ŋkawma wvù Nyo' to geɛ le.
48004024	Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ beene ejo fiɛɛ fin diɛwɛ kenfewsɛn ke fiɛɛ le. Bokɛnɛ bo bofɛɛ ban duŋci moŋkan monfɛɛm. 'Aga wvù to nu nfwa joo bvudvuu bvu moŋkan mò Nyo' to gbwolɛɛ bô bonyii bo Islael yî kum wvù Sinay e. Bonyii bocii bò nu ɛkuse jo moŋkan modvu nu bonfaw.
48004025	No 'Aga joo bvudvuu bvu moŋkan mo yî kum wvù Sinay wvù nu woŋ wvù Alɛbia le, wvú bvuu joo tɛn bvudvuu bvu kelaante kè Jɛlusalɛm wvu keseen e, njefo bonyii bo ɛ̂ kelaante kedvu le bocii nu bvunfaw e ɛ̂ bonci kuse.
48004026	Geenɛn ɛ bonyii bo Jɛlusalɛm wvù nu wvu fowe le yaa nu bonfaw kɛ. Wvuwɛ Jɛlusalɛm nu bwee wesebeene.
48004027	Ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì bó to saŋɛɛ lɛ, “Wo wvù kpwoon wvù nu kase yaa boote kɛ, ɛ̀ laŋlaŋè. Wo wvù ke baa lum wase wan, ɛ̀ kpwaakè dikie. Ɛ̀ keè lɛ boom bo kpwoon wvù bó nu ɛ base jim ɛ̂ wvú le nu ke eduule fele bo kpwoon wvù nu bô dweese le.”
48004028	Nonɛn boom bo bwɛɛm e, ben nu boom bo Nyo' le bii no Nyo' to kawɛɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no Abla'am to bokɛɛ Aysik bii no Nyo' to kawɛɛ.
48004029	Ɛ̀ to nu kefew kedvu le ɛ wan wvù bó to bokɛɛ no bó boote boom bocii no bone bikaa ɛjim jo wvù ɛ̀ to nyaɛ Keyoy ke Nyo' le mvuŋgay ɛ bó sɛ boo wvú. Ɛ̀ nu kɛ tɛn lɛŋlɛŋ fiɛɛ fì kooyi keseen.
48004030	Bó saŋ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le ɛkumɛ fiɛɛ fin lɛ la? Bó nu ɛ saŋ lɛ, “Kuŋɛ kpwoon wvù nu nfwa bô waa we bocii, njefo kɛ waa nfwa nulo ke egaw bvushɛw bô waa kpwoon wvù leyɛɛn e kɛ.”
48004031	No fí nu nonɛn boom bo bwɛɛm e, fiɛɛ fì me njemyi ficii duŋci lɛ kɛ beene nu boom bo kpwoon wvù nu nfwa le kɛ. Beene nu ɛ ɛ̀ nu boom bo kpwoon wvù leyɛɛn e.
48005001	Klistu to nu ɛ bvuse wase beene yî bvunfaw e. Wvú to bvuse nɛn, wvu lɛ fo beene ebvuu enù yî bvunfaw e ɛkuse jo bonci kɛ. Nonɛn ben emum eleemè tɛmyi. Fo ben ebvuu ebee eley ɛkuse jo kemmbuŋ ke bvunfaw e kɛ.
48005002	Ben eyekɛ eyuw fiɛɛ fì me wvù Baul nu enjeme. Ɛ́ ben beŋe lo lɛ bó etfuse ben yew ɛ́ ben sɛ no nu teytey ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛjise, tu fiɛɛ fì Klistu to geɛ fô ben e nu ɛcici.
48005003	Me mbvuu njemyi nciise lɛ wee wemɛn wvù nu ɛ bee lɛ bó etfuse wvú yew ekeè lɛ wvú kɛŋke keegɛɛlè bonci bo Bojuu le bocii no bó nu.
48005004	Ben bocii bò gomte keenu teytey ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛjise ɛ ɛ̀ nu nje ben gɛɛle bonci, ekeè lɛ ben nu ɛ gawsɛn wase bikuu binɛn ben ɛ bo Klistu. Ben nu ɛ laŋ wase mbuwma Nyo'.
48005005	Fô beene le nu ɛ fiɛɛ fì beene taale fwe yî dvú le nu lɛ Nyo' nu ke ejo beene diɛwɛ bonyii bò nu teytey ɛ̂ wvú ɛjise le. Fifin nu fiɛɛ fì Keyoy ke Nyo' le kè lemte yî yese beene le fele yî fitele fì beene lese yî Klistu le nu ɛ ge lɛ beene ecɛyte.
48005006	Ben ekeè lɛ ɛ́ wee nu ɛ wvú ɛ taashɛ wase bô Klistu Jisos, ɛ wvú nu ɛ bó ɛ tfuse wvú yew kɛnɛɛ bó baa tfuse wvú yew kɛ, tu kɛ fifiɛ kɛŋke fiɛɛ keege kɛ. Fiɛɛ fì nu shiee le nu fitele fì wvú lese yî Klistu le ɛ no duŋci yî keŋkoŋɛn e.
48005007	Ɛ̀ to nu fwele ɛ ben gee naa lɛŋ. Ɛ̀ ge yɛɛ ben ɛ sɛ lu keebii kecɛɛy e?
48005008	Kɛ ɛ̀ ge Nyo' wvù to teŋɛɛ ben fifin fiɛɛ kɛ.
48005009	Kɛ ben kumyi ŋgan wvù bó ké no maa lɛ, “Kekuu kemwaaŋ ɛ befe bô ntwaw?”
48005010	Me ŋgɛɛle bvufee yî yene le nje Tata lɛ kɛ ben nu ebi fiɛɛ fì bonyii bomew gayte le ɛfey fì ɛ̀ gayte me kɛ. Ɛ wee wɛ wvù bvuŋsee bvufee bvunɛn, kɛnɛɛ ɛ̀ nu yɛɛ, nu ɛ Nyo' nu ke elaŋ ŋgɛw yî ye le.
48005011	Boom bo bwɛɛm e, ɛ́ ɛ̀ be nu lɛ me mbɛɛ nfewci lɛ bó etfuuse bonyii yew ɛ bó sɛ nu teytey ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛjise, ɛ́ bonyii ebvuu ebone bikaa ɛ̂ me ɛjim nje la? Kɛ tu fiɛɛ fì me nfewci lɛ Klistu to nu ɛ kpwe yî kentam e fin ɛ bonyii yuuke ɛ fí kaa saase lo bó yaa be bɛɛ dvú kɛ.
48005012	Fo bonyii ba bò jewsee ben lɛ bó etfuuse bonyii yew e, nu ɛ me ŋgomte lɛ bó emɛse esoŋ lo bikuu bibole.
48005013	Boom bo bwɛɛm e, Nyo' to nu ɛ tee wase ben wvu lɛ fo ben ebvuu elemtè bvunfaw ɛ̂ bonci kuse kɛ. Geenɛn, no ben yaa bɛɛ bvunfaw e ɛ̂ bonci kuse nonɛn, fo ben emum ejo lɛ ben nulo egee no nyam ye yene gomte kɛ. Ben elemtè ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô boom bo bwee wene le yî keŋkoŋɛn e.
48005014	Ben egeè nonɛn njefo bonci bocii nu ɛ taashɛ yî wvun wvu mwaaŋ e lɛ, “Ɛ̀ kooŋkè waa bwoo no wo kooŋke ɛkolɛ kuw.”
48005015	Geenɛn, ɛ́ ben nɛ ɛ no ŋasene ɛbenɛben diɛwɛ bwé le, ɛ wee gomte keedie lo waa bwee, ɛ ben no yɛnè fô ben ke enɛ eyuwyɛ bikuu binɛn.
48005016	Fiɛɛ fì me njemyi nu lɛ, ben eceè biì ɛ ɛ̀ nu no Keyoy ke Nyo' le duŋci ɛ̂ ben, nonɛn ben saa ebvuu egeè ɛ ɛ̀ nu no nyam ye yene shieele lɛ ben egeè kɛ.
48005017	Me njemyi nɛn njefo kɛ fiɛɛ fì nyam ye shieele nu fì Keyoy ke Nyo' le shieele kɛ. Ɛ kɛ fì Keyoy ke Nyo' le shieele nu fì nyam ye shieele kɛ. Kɛ mwɛɛm mvu mvunfɛɛm mvun nu yî fiɛɛ le fimwaaŋ kɛ. Ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ ben egeè fiɛɛ fì ben gomte kɛ.
48005018	Ɛ́ ben cee bii ɛ ɛ̀ nu no Keyoy ke Nyo' le duŋci ɛ̂ ben, ben saa ebvuu enù ɛkuse jo bonci kɛ.
48005019	Mwɛɛm mvù nyam ye ké no shieele nu ɛ bonyii yaa maa mvú kɛ. Ɛ̀ nu keejaaŋke kenjaŋ bô keekpwawci mwɛɛm ɛkumɛ kenjaŋ noo keecee nce nnyɛn kenjaŋ.
48005020	Ɛ ɛ̀ bvuu nu keebunlee bonyo' bo ɛcici bô keelaale kɛnɛɛ fiɛɛŋke diam. Ɛ ɛ̀ bvuu nu keebanene, nyamte kenyam, ghɛɛke keŋghɛw, kɛŋke shém yì ton'yɛɛn bô fô wee le keekpwawci kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛkolɛ kew. Ɛ ɛ̀ bvuu nu keegawsene bonyii noo fô wee le keegaw bonyii ekɛŋkɛ ye ŋgoo.
48005021	Ɛ ɛ̀ nu tɛn keebene kendoŋ, wuu mbvuum ɛ mó koole bô keewukene yole noo keegee mvumew mwɛɛm diɛwɛ mvumvun e. Me ɛ no njemyi nciise lo no me nto njemyɛɛ wase fwele ɛ̂ ben lɛ, kɛ bonyii bò gee mvumvun mwɛɛm yaa nu ke ekɛŋkɛ bvudvuu ɛnte jo bvunfon bvu Nyo' le kɛ.
48005022	Geenɛn, ɛ mwɛɛm mvù nɛn'yi fô Keyoy ke Nyo' le nu mvun, keŋkoŋɛn, nlaŋlaŋ, nyɛkeey, shém yì kuulɛɛn, fitele fì jee, keŋge kè jee, keeleeme yî kecɛɛy e,
48005023	keebonene keŋge, noo keekemsene bô ɛkolɛ. Kɛ nci mvu nu dvú wvù kicine mwɛɛm mvun kɛ.
48005024	Bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo Klistu Jisos e nu ɛ ta wase nyam ye yibo bô mwɛɛm mvù befe mvù nyam ye yì ŋɛyte shieele yî kentam ke Jisos e.
48005025	No beene cee keseen yî mvuŋgay mvu Keyoy ke Nyo' le, beene emum egeè mwɛɛm bii kɛ no Keyoy kedvu duŋci.
48005026	Fo beene ebenseè ye yi ɛcici kɛ. Fo beene egeè ɛ mvuntelem beete bonyii bomew kɛ. Fo beene ebenè kendoŋ bô bonyii bomew kɛ.
48006001	Boom bo bwɛɛm e, ɛ́ ben nɛ ɛ yɛn ɛ wee mvù ben e ɛ ge fiɛɛ fì befe, ɛ́ ben bò cee nce no Keyoy ke Nyo' le duŋci mom keetefe wvú ɛ́ wvú ebuy ɛ̂ kebefɛ kedvu ɛnte. Geenɛn, wee dioo teete no teete wɛɛ eyɛnè fo wvú tɛn eley mmom e egbwe.
48006002	Ben eficì boom bo bwee wene le bô boŋgɛw bobole. Ɛ́ ben gee nonɛn tu ben gɛɛle nci Klistu.
48006003	Ɛ́ wee joo ɛkolɛ kew lɛ wen nu fiɛɛ, sɛ wvú nu fimwɛtɛn ŋkuuŋ, tu wvú lɛɛle kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛkolɛ kew.
48006004	Wee tfuu etaa mwɛɛm mvù wvú gee, eyɛn laa wen gee lɛŋ ɛ. Ɛ́ wvú fɛn gee lɛŋ, ɛ́ wvú sɛ no saale ye fô ɛkolɛ kew e. Geenɛn fo wvú esaalè ye fewsene ɛkolɛ kew bô wee mvu kɛ.
48006005	Ben ekeè lɛ wee tfuu kɛŋke keetuule bwew bvujitɛ.
48006006	Ɛ́ wee yɛɛyi wee bô diɛw Nyo', ɛ́ wee wvù bó yɛɛyi wvú gaw mwɛɛm mwew mvù Nyo' nya wvú dvú nya wee wvù yɛɛyi wvú wvudvu dvú.
48006007	Fo ben elɛɛlè bikuu binɛn joo lɛ Nyo' nu keyuŋ kɛ. Ben ekeè lɛ fiɛɛ fì wee jewyi nu kɛ fí fì wvú nu ke egbwele.
48006008	Ɛ́ wee jewe ye ŋgow ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì nyam ye ye gomte, tu wvú nu ke egbwele kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì nyam ye ye nyaa fì ɛ̀ nu kpwe. Ɛ́ wee jewe ye ŋgow ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì Keyoy ke Nyo' le gomte, tu wvú nu ke egbwele nshii wvù mɛy lo wvù Keyoy ke Nyo' le nyaa.
48006009	Fo beene ke ewɛle keegee mwɛɛm mvù jee kɛ, njefo kefew nu ke eto ekocɛn ɛ́ beene ekɛŋkɛ sɛw wvudvu fɛn ɛ́ beene baa edose kɛ.
48006010	Nonɛn yî kefew e kecii kè beene kɛŋke je, ɛ beene no geè kɛ mwɛɛm mvù jee fô bonyii bocii le ɛfey mvunciim fô boba bò nu ɛ̂ kfuu di bonyii bo mbee le.
48006011	Ben nu ɛ yɛn no ɛjisɛ ŋwa' yo fɛn nu ɛ faŋkɛn e? Ɛ̀ saŋ me bô kebo kem.
48006012	Bonyii ba bò kane lɛ bó etfuuse ben yew nu bò gomte keesaale ye yî mwɛɛm mvu yî nyam ye le, ɛ bó gee nonɛn wvu lɛ fo bonyii ke ebone bikaa ɛ̂ bó ɛjim nje bó fewci lɛ Klistu to nu ɛ kpwe yî kentam e.
48006013	Naa kɛ bonyii bò bó nu ɛ tfuse wase bó yew yaa cim gɛɛle bonci bocii kɛ. Geenɛn ɛ bó gomte kɛ lɛ bó dioo ɛ tfuse ben yew emum ekfune gvuw lɛ ben nu ɛ ge fiɛɛ fì bó shieele yî yene le.
48006014	Geenɛn fô me le, kɛ ɛ̀ nu naa lo ɛ́ me ŋke en'yuu eŋkfune gvuw yî fiɛɛ fimew e ɛfey yî saaka wvù lɛ Tata wesebeene wvù Jisos Klistu to nu ɛ kpwe yî kentam e kɛ. Ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì mwɛɛm mvu yî nshɛ le nu ɛ kpwe wase fô me le, me ɛ ŋkpwe tɛn fô mvú le.
48006015	Ɛ́ wee nu ɛ bó ɛ tfuse wvú yew kɛnɛɛ bó baa etfuse, tu kɛ fifiɛ kɛŋke fiɛɛ keege kɛ. Fiɛɛ fì kuuke nu lɛ Nyo' eseyse wee ɛ́ wvú enù wee wvu fwɛ.
48006016	Kembonɛn ke Nyo' le bô shen ye eto fô bonyii bocii bò bii je yin e, bò nu wase bonyii bo Islael bo Nyo' le.
48006017	Ɛ kɛw keseen e ɛ gɛn lo, fo wee ebvuu eshiike me kɛ, njefo bolulɛ bò nu yî yɛm e duŋci lɛ me nu wee Jisos.
48006018	Boom bo bwɛɛm e, me mbunlee lɛ Tata wesebeene wvù Jisos Klistu ebuw ben bocii bô kembonɛn kew ɛ́ kí efici biyoy binɛn. Fí enù nonɛn.
49001001	Ɛ̀ nu me wvù Baul, waa ntum Klistu Jisos yî ŋkoŋ wvù wvu Nyo' le. Me nsaaŋke ŋwa' wvun fô bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo Nyo' le bo Ɛfɛsus bò leeme yî fiɛɛ le fimwaaŋ yî Klistu Jisos e.
49001002	Nyo' Icee wesebeene bô Tata Jisos Klistu ebuw ben, ebvuu enya ben bô nyɛkeey.
49001003	Mbense enù fô Nyo' wvù ɛ̀ nu Nyo' wvu Tata wesebeene wvù Jisos Klistu, bvuu nu Ice le. Wvú nu ɛ buw beene bô mbuwma tfuu wvu woŋ wvu we le wvù fici biyoy bisɛɛbeene njefo beene nu ɛ taashɛ yî Klistu le.
49001004	Ɛ́ Nyo' sɛ keenu keebom woŋ nu ɛ wvú to caw wase beene lɛ beene etaashɛ beene bo Klistu, eyuule, nu sɛ nlom ɛ̂ wvú ɛjise. Yî keŋkoŋɛn kew e,
49001005	nu ɛ wvú to seyse wase keeke ejo beene lɛ ɛ̀ nu boom bew fele yî Jisos Klistu le. Wvú to ge nonɛn, bii fiɛɛ fì wvú to gomte lɛ fí enù le.
49001006	Ɛ ɛ̀ to nu wvu lɛ mbense egɛnè ɛ̂ wvú yî mbuwma we wvu baay wvù wvú nu ɛ nya ɛ̂ beene ɛcici fele yî Waa we wvù nu fitele fiew e.
49001007	Wvú to sum beene can ŋgɛw e ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô ɛlɛmɛ ke Waa we wvun e. Fì nu lɛ, wvú nu ɛ lɛɛshɛ bibefɛ bisɛɛbeene, bii mbuwma we wvù kuuke naa baay e,
49001008	wvù wvú tfuwɛɛ lo yî yese beene le. Wvú to ge nonɛn bô bvufee bvucii noo ŋkpwawcɛ we tfuu.
49001009	Nyo' nu ɛ ge wase beene ɛ kiɛɛ fiɛɛ fì wvú gomte fì to shee nu ɛ̂ kenyilɛ le. Wvú ge bii fiɛɛ fì jee wvú le no wvú to seysɛɛ keeke ege fele yî Klistu le.
49001010	Wvú to seyse lɛ kefew nu ke edioo ɛ to wase ɛ kocɛn ɛ́ wen ebaancɛ mwɛɛm mvunciim kɛnɛɛ ɛ̀ nu mvu fowe, kɛnɛɛ mvu fokuse, egɛɛ ɛ̂ Jisos ɛkuse.
49001011	Ɛ̀ nu tɛn nje Klistu wvù Nyo' to cawɛɛ bese keenu bonyii bew. Wvú to caw no wvú to seysɛɛ wase ɛ ɛ̀ bɛɛ lo bii ŋkpwawcɛ wvuwe le kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no wvú ké no gee mwɛɛm mwew mvunciim bii ntaŋ wvuwe bô ŋkoŋ wvuwe le.
49001012	Fí to nu nonɛn, wvu lɛ bese bò to nu bonyii bo fwe keegɛɛ bvufee yî Klistu le ke eceè nce wvù egeè ɛ bvukukɛ bvu Nyo' le yen'yi, ɛ mbense gɛne ɛ̂ wvú.
49001013	Ben tɛn to nu ɛ taashɛ yî Klistu le seke ben to yuwɛɛ diɛw yi kecɛɛy yì ɛ̀ nu saaka wvù jee wvù to toɛ bô mboyma fô ben e. No ben yuwɛɛ nonɛn, mum lese fitele yî Klistu le, ɛ Nyo' ge nciise we yî yene le wvù ɛ̀ nu Keyoy ke Yuule kè wvú to kawɛɛ bonyii dvú.
49001014	Keyoy ke Yuule kin nu ketfuŋ ke bvushɛw bvù beene nu ke ekɛŋkɛ le. Ɛ beene nu ke ekɛŋke seke Nyo' ɛ mɛse ɛ sum bonyii bò ɛ̀ kɛŋke wvú yî ŋgɛw kebefɛ le. Nonɛn, ɛ́ bvukukɛ bwew eyen'yi ɛ mbense gɛne ɛ̂ wvú.
49001015	Me nu ɛ n'yuw wase ɛkumɛ fitele fì ben nu ɛ lese yî Tata Jisos e, noo keŋkoŋɛn kè ben kɛŋke fô bonyii bocii bò ɛ̀ nu bo Nyo' le. Ɛ̀ nɛɛ fiɛɛ fì ge,
49001016	ɛ́ me ŋké ndioo mbunlee no ŋkumyi ben ɛ̂ bunle yɛm e. Me ŋke mbaa enlu wase keenyaa keyoone ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛkumɛ ben kɛ.
49001017	Me mbunlee lɛ Nyo' wvù nu wvu Tata wesebeene wvù Jisos Klistu, Nyo' wvù nu Icee bvukukɛ, enya ben bô keyoy ke bvufee le, eyene ɛjisɛ ɛyene ɛ́ ben ekiɛɛ wvú ntay.
49001018	Me mbvuu mbunlee lɛ wvú eyuuse bvufee bvunɛn ɛ́ ben ekiɛɛ fiɛɛ fì ben taale fwe yî dvú le, fì ɛ̀ nu fì bó to teŋɛɛ ben nje fí, ebvuu ekiɛɛ bvukukɛ bvu baay bvu bvushɛw bvu bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo Nyo' le.
49001019	Ɛ me mbvuu mbunlee lɛ Nyo' eyene bvufee bvunɛn ɛ́ ben ekiɛɛ mvuŋgay mwew mvù fele mvuŋgay mvunciim. Ɛ̀ nu mvuŋgay mvun mvù wvú lemte dvú fô beene bò nu ɛ lese fitele yî ye le, ɛ ɛ̀ nu mvuŋgay mvu baay.
49001020	Ɛ ɛ̀ nu mvuŋgay mvudvu mvun mvù wvú to lemɛɛ dvú bvuse Klistu yî kpwe le, bense wvú shike ɛ̂ ɛbo kew ke ɛcɛɛy e woŋ wvu we le.
49001021	Klistu kuuke fele naa lo mwɛɛm mvù saake fowe mvunciim noo bvunfon noo mvuŋgay noo bvukukɛ bvucii. Wvú bvuu kɛŋke diee dì kuuke fele naa lo ɛdiee ɛcii yò bó teŋe bonyii dvú. Kɛ wvú nu nonɛn ɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ yî kefew kin e maaŋ kɛ. Wvú nu ke enu kɛ nonɛn kefew kè too le.
49001022	Nyo' nu ɛ gɛɛ mwɛɛm mvunciim ɛ̂ wvú ɛkuse, ɛ bvuu ɛ gɛɛ wvú lɛ wvú enù ɛkolɛ ke fiɛɛ ficii fi kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le.
49001023	Kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le kin nu ye Klistu. Klistu ɛ mum ɛ yiŋsɛn yî kentaashɛ kin e kí ɛ kocɛn, ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù gee ɛ mwɛɛm mvunciim yiŋsene kocine ɛ̂ jé le yicii.
49002001	Ɛ̀ to nu fwele, ɛ ben nu bonyii bò nu ɛ kpwe wase ɛ̂ keyoy e nje bojay bonɛn bô bibefɛ,
49002002	bì ben to cee gee le. Ben to cee bii ɛ ɛ̀ nu je yì bonyii bo yî woŋ wvun e cee, bvuu bii nfon mvuŋgay mvu yî fwefwe le. Ɛ̀ nu wvú keyoy kekiɛ kè lemte keseen yî bonyii bò tɛmyi bikuu bô bo Nyo' le.
49002003	Ɛ̀ nu kɛ tɛn no beene bocii to shee cee. Beene to cee gee mwɛɛm mvù nyam ye yì ŋɛyte shieele, bii mwɛɛm mvù nyam ye bô boŋkpwawcɛ bosɛɛbeene gomte lɛ beene egeè. Beene diɛwɛ bonyii bo boyuum to nu wase lo bonyii bò shém effuuke Nyo' bô bó, kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ diɛwɛ no wee wvu wum tfuu nu.
49002004	Geenɛn Nyo' wvù nu ɛ yiŋsɛn bô shen fô beene le to nu ɛ koŋ beene baay,
49002005	taashɛ beene bo Klistu bvuse yî kpwe le no beene to nu ɛ kpwekɛn wase nje bojay bosɛɛbeene. Nyo' to boyse ben ɛ ɛ̀ nu nje fitele fiew fì jee.
49002006	No wvú to taashɛɛ beene ɛ bo Klistu Jisos bvuse yî kpwe le nonɛn, mum bense beene shike beene ɛ bó woŋ wvu we le.
49002007	Wvú to ge nonɛn wvu lɛ ɛ́ ke edioo enu yî kefew kè too le, ɛ́ wvú eduŋcɛ mbuwma we wvu baay wvù ɛ̀ nulo wee saa efewsɛn kɛ. Mbuwma wvun nu ɛ wvú ɛ duŋcɛ wase ɛ̂ beene nje fitele fiew fì jee fele yî Klistu Jisos e.
49002008	Ben ekeè lɛ Nyo' to boyse ben ɛ ɛ̀ nu nje fitele fiew fì jee fele yî fitele fì ben to lesɛɛ yî Klistu le. Kɛ fifin nu ɛ ɛ̀ to ge ben kɛ. Ɛ̀ nu nnya Nyo'.
49002009	Kɛ ɛ̀ to nu nje lemme dimew dì wee to lemɛɛ sɛ kɛŋkɛ wvu lɛ wee mvu ke enɛ esaale ye kɛ.
49002010	Fiɛɛ fì nu, nu lɛ beene nu no bó nu nɛn, ɛ ɛ̀ lem Nyo' bô ɛbo kew. Wvú nu ɛ taashɛ beene bo Klistu Jisos ɛ ge beene ɛ no nu bonyii bo bofɛ, wvu lɛ beene elemtè dilemme dì jee dì wvú to seysɛɛ wase ɛ ɛ̀ bɛɛ lo lɛ ɛ̀ nu dì beene nu ke ecee lemte le.
49002011	Ben bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ kfuu di Bojuu le, ben ekumyì fiɛɛ fì ben to shee nu fwele. Bojuu bò teŋe bikuu bibole lɛ bowen nu bonyii bò bó nu ɛ tfuse yew, to teŋe ben lɛ ben nu bonyii bò nu ntffuse. Ɛ ntfuse wvu yew wvun nu fiɛɛ ɛ bó gee kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî ye wee le bô can.
49002012	Ben ekumyì lɛ ɛ̀ to nu sekekiɛ, ɛ ben yaa kɛŋke fiɛɛ keege bô Klistu kɛ. Kɛ ben to nu ɛnte jo ɛŋgokɛ ke bonyii bo Nyo' le bò ɛ̀ nu bo Islael kɛ. Kɛ ben to kɛŋke fiɛɛ keege bô moŋkan mo ŋkawma le mò Nyo' to gbwole bô bó kɛ. Ben to nu kɛ lo finɛn yî nshɛ le fɛn yaa kɛŋke fiɛɛ fimew fì ben taale fwe yî dvú le kɛ, yaa kee tɛn Nyo' kɛ.
49002013	Geenɛn, yî keseen e no ben nu ɛ taashɛ wase ben ɛ bo Klistu Jisos, ben bò to shee nu ncejole fô Nyo' le, nu ɛ wvú ɛ jo wase ben ɛ to dvú nceencee fô wvú le fele yî ɛlɛmɛ ke Klistu le.
49002014	Ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù Klistu kebɛɛ wvù nu ɛ to bô nyɛkeey fô beene le. Wvú nu ɛ ge wase Bojuu bô bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu ɛ tu wee mwaaŋ. Wvú nu ɛ bvusse kembew ke keŋgawsɛn e kè ɛ̀ nu kembanɛn kè se shee nu ɛ̂ beene ɛntelɛŋ.
49002015	Wvú nu ɛ nya ye ye ɛ kpwe keefiwsɛ nci bô mwɛɛm mvù nci duu lɛ bó egeè keenu bonyii bo Nyo' le. Wvú ge nonɛn wvu lɛ wen etaashɛ wee tfuu yî ye le ɛ́ bó etu wase wee mwaaŋ wvu fwɛ yî bvudvuu bvu bonyii bo bofɛɛ le. No wvú ge nonɛn, ɛ mum ɛ to bô nyɛkeey.
49002016	Kpwe ye yî kentam e nu ɛ taashɛ dikfuu di difɛɛ ɛ to dvú fô Nyo' le yî ye le yimiaaŋ, ɛ mum ɛ yu kembanɛn kebole yî kentam e kí ɛ ka.
49002017	Wvú to nu ɛ to fewcɛ saaka wvù too bô nyɛkeey ɛ̂ ben bò to nu ncejole, fewcɛ tɛn saaka wvudvu wvun ɛ̂ bonyii bò to nu nceencee.
49002018	Ɛ̀ ge wvú beene bocii ɛ sɛ kɛŋkɛ je keeto fô Nyo' Ice le fele yî Keyoy e kemwaaŋ.
49002019	Nonɛn, kɛ ben bɛɛ botolo kɛnɛɛ bonyii bò bɛke lo kɛ. Ben nu wase boom bo woŋ e ben ɛ bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo Nyo' le, nu tɛn bonyii bo yew e bo Nyo' le.
49002020	Ɛ yew yin nu ɛ bó bom yî kenffuy kè ɛ̀ nu boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e bô bonyii bò teete bontum bo Nyo' le, ɛ Klistu Jisos kebɛɛ nu tɛ di buu di yew yidvu le.
49002021	Ɛ̀ nu yî ye le wvù yew yidvu nu ɛ taashɛ ɛ no kuu keeke eto enu yew yì yuule fô Tata le.
49002022	Ben tɛn nu ɛ taashɛ ɛ yoo yî Klistu le, ɛ no nu bvudvuu bvù Nyo' cee fó ɛ̂ Keyoy kew e.
49003001	No Nyo' nu ɛ ge wase mwɛɛm mvun fô ben e nonɛn, me ɛ mum ɛ no mbunlee fô ben e. Me wvù Baul nu yî ncaw e nje saaka wvu ɛkumɛ Klistu Jisos. Ɛ me nlemte ncaw wvun nje yene ben bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu.
49003002	Me ŋkpwaake lɛ ben nu ɛ yuw wase no Nyo' to nu ɛ caw me nya lemme lɛ me ensee ɛ̂ ben ɛkumɛ mbuwma we fô ben e.
49003003	Fiɛɛ fidvu fin nu fì to shee nu ɛ̂ kenyilɛ le ɛ Nyo' ɛ yene wase ɛjisɛ ɛyɛm me ɛ n'yɛn. Me nu ɛ nsaŋ wase caan ɛkumɛ fí fô ben e.
49003004	Ɛ́ ben taŋ lo, ɛ́ ben eyɛn fiɛɛ fì me ŋkee ɛkumɛ kenyilɛ kin kè to nu ɛkumɛ Klistu le.
49003005	Ɛ̀ to nu fwele ɛ bó faŋɛ yaa ege ɛ́ ɛŋgokɛ ke bonyii le ke sekekiɛ ekiɛɛ kenyilɛ kedvu kɛ. Keseen nu ɛ Keyoy ke Yuule ɛ duŋcɛ wase ɛ̂ boom bo ntum e bo Jisos e bò wvú to balɛɛ lɛ ɛ̀ nu bew noo ɛ̂ bonyii bò teete bontum bo Nyo' le, bó ɛ kiɛɛ.
49003006	Fiɛɛ fidvu fin nu lɛ bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu nulo ebee saaka wvù jee le, ɛ́ Nyo' enya tɛn bó bô bvushɛw bvù wvú nu ɛ gɛɛ ɛ̂ bonyii bew. Bó nu wase ye yimiaaŋ bô bó, ɛ ŋkawma wvù Nyo' to geɛ fô Bojuu le nu wase tɛn fô bó le no bó nu ɛ taashɛ bô bo Klistu Jisos.
49003007	Nyo' to nu ɛ baa me lɛ me enfewcì saaka we wvù jee wvun. Wvú to bale nje fitele fiew fì jee fì wvú kɛŋke fô me le. Wvú to nu ɛ jo mvuŋgay mwew lem dvú yî yɛm e mum nya lemme din lɛ me enlemtè.
49003008	Me mbaa ncim mbuy naa lo wee wvu caan ŋgoo bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo Nyo' le kɛ. Geenɛn Nyo' to nu ɛ nya kɛ mbuwma wvun ɛ̂ me lɛ me eŋgɛn enfewcɛ saaka wvu ɛkumɛ bvukukɛ bvu Klistu le bvù yaa kɛŋke kɛ kenfewsɛn ɛ̂ bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu le.
49003009	Wvú to nya tɛn mbuwma wvun lɛ me eŋge ɛ́ bonyii bocii ekiɛɛ ntaŋ kenyilɛ ke fiɛɛ le kè Nyo' wvù bomɛɛ mwɛɛm mvunciim to shee nyile yî ye le bilum e bilum e.
49003010	Ntaŋ wvun to nu lɛ ɛ̀ nu ke enu kefew ke keseen e, ɛ́ Nyo' ege fele yî kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le, ɛ́ bonceendaa bo Nyo' le bô biyoy bì kɛŋke mvuŋgay saake mondvuum mo fowe le, eyɛn bvufee bvu Nyo' le bvù nu lo jé le jé le.
49003011	Wvú to ge fiɛɛ fin bii no wvú to seysɛɛ wase foŋkɛw. Ɛ wvú ɛ ge wase fiɛɛ fidvu fele yî Klistu Jisos wvù Tata wesebeene le.
49003012	Ɛ̀ nu nje ye wvù beene nu ɛ kɛŋkɛ je keetoo mbew Nyo' le yaa kɛŋke kɛ nfan kɛnɛɛ kemaŋɛn nje fitele fì beene lese yî ye le.
49003013	No fí nu nonɛn, me ɛ mum ɛ no ŋkule lo can lɛ fo shem kpwe ben nje ŋgɛw wvù me n'yɛne fô ben e kɛ. Ben nu ke ekɛŋkɛ bvujoŋkɛ bvudvu.
49003014	Ɛ̀ nu nje mwɛɛm mvun wvù me ntumte ɛnvuw ɛ̂ Icee wesebeene fwe,
49003015	wvù ɛdiee ɛ dikfuu dicii di fowe noo di fokuse nɛn'yi fô wvú le.
49003016	Me ntumte ɛnvuw nlɛke lɛ, bii bvukukɛ bwew bvù ɛ̀ nu bvu baay e, lɛ wvú enya ben bô mvuŋgay fele yî Keyoy kew e, ɛ́ mvú ege ɛ́ mvuntelem mvunɛn etɛmyi.
49003017	Nonɛn, ɛ́ Klistu emum ecee ɛ̂ mvuntelem mvunɛn e no ben leese fitele yî ye le. Me mbunlee tɛn lɛ keŋkoŋɛn kenɛn etɛmyì diɛwɛ kete kè cime gɛŋ e noo diɛwɛ yew yì bó bom yî kenffuy kè tɛmyi le,
49003018	wvu lɛ ben ɛ bonyii bocii bò ɛ̀ nu bo Nyo' le ekɛŋke bvufee bvù ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ ben ekiɛɛ keŋkoŋɛn ke Klistu le kè nu fô beene le. Keŋkoŋɛn kew fô beene le nu ɛ kí kɛŋke mbvuw baay, kɛŋke bvundee bô bvudefɛ baay, ɛ kí ɛ ley tɛn fokuse baay.
49003019	Me mbunlee lɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ ben ekiɛɛ keŋkoŋɛn kew kedvu kè ghaake bonyii keekiɛɛ le, wvu lɛ ben nulo enu ɛ ben ɛ yiŋsɛn bô fiɛɛ fì Nyo' nu fí ficii.
49003020	Beene emum ebenseè Nyo'. Ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù nulo ege fiɛɛ ficii bô mvuŋgay mvù lemte yî yese beene le. Ɛ wvú nulo ege naa efey lo no beene biite kɛnɛɛ no beene nulo ekpwawcɛ.
49003021	Mbense enù fô wvú le nje kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le noo nje Klistu Jisos yî kefew e kecii noo sekecii sɛ ŋka. Fí enù nonɛn.
49004001	Nonɛn, me wvù Baul wvù nu wee ncaw nje saaka wvu ɛkumɛ Tata Jisos, me nlɛke lo ben lɛ ben eceè nce wvù nu ɛ kocɛn wvù Nyo' teŋɛɛ ben lɛ ben eceè yî dvú le.
49004002	Ben eshiwsè bikuu binɛn, nù wɛɛ, kuulè shém. Ben enù yî keŋkoŋɛn e, yaa kɛŋke fitele fì sɛsene kɛ.
49004003	Ben emomtè naa ntay keenu kɛ yî kentaashɛ kè Keyoy ke Yuule nu ɛ to dvú fô ben e no ben cee yî nyɛkeey wvù taashi bonyii le.
49004004	Ye Klistu nu yimiaaŋ, ɛ Keyoy ke Yuule nu kemwaaŋ. Ɛ̀ nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no fiɛɛ fì Nyo' to teŋɛɛ beene lɛ beene etaalè fwe yî dvú le nu tɛn fimwaaŋ.
49004005	Tata nu kɛ mwaaŋ, ɛ mbee nu kɛ mwaaŋ, ɛ nlese wvù bó leese bonyii ɛ̂ joo nu kɛ mwaaŋ.
49004006	Nyo' nu kɛ mwaaŋ wvù nu Icee wesebeene bocii. Wvú nu ɛ̂ we jo mwɛɛm mvunciim, lemte yî beene le bocii, nu tɛn ɛnte jo beene bocii.
49004007	Fí nu tɛn lɛ Klistu nu ɛ buw kɛ wee mwaaŋ mwaaŋ beene le ɛ nya wvú bô ye nnya bii nfew we le ɛ̂ mwɛtɛn.
49004008	Ɛ̀ nɛɛ fiɛɛ fì bó nu ɛ saŋ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le lɛ, “Seke wvú to benɛɛ gɛn we, wvú to nu ɛ ge ɛ bonyii bò wvú to kooyɛɛ no bii wvú le. Wvú to nu ɛ nya nnya ɛ̂ bonyii.”
49004009	Keegay lɛ, “Wvú to nu ɛ ben gɛn we” nu lɛ la? Fí duŋci lɛ wvú to nu ɛ yaw shii gɛn ɛkuse jo nshɛ.
49004010	Nonɛn, wvú wvudvu wvù to shiilɛɛ to fokuse nu kɛ tɛn wvú wvù to benɛɛ fey naa lo ɛbulɛ kecii gɛn ɛ̂ we, wvu lɛ wen eyiŋsɛn mwɛɛm mvunciim ɛ́ mvú eyiŋsɛn ekocɛn.
49004011	Ɛ̀ nu kɛ wvú wvù to nyaɛ nnyá ɛ̂ bonyii. Wvú to nu ɛ nya ɛ̂ bomew lɛ bó enù boom bew bo ntum e, nya ɛ̂ bomew bò eseŋè mwɛɛm mvù bó yuuke ɛ Nyo' jemyi, bomew bò eghanè fewci saaka wvù jee wvù wvu Nyo', bomew bò etaalè fô kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le bvuu yɛɛyi bonyii.
49004012	Wvú to nya nnyá yidvu yin keeseyse bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo Nyo' le dvú ɛ́ bó ekpwɛntɛn bò elemte lemme diew, yoote ye Klistu yì ɛ̀ nu kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le,
49004013	ke egɛn ebuy kefew kè beene bocii ke enu wase wee mwaaŋ yî mbee wesebeene le bô yî fiɛɛ fì beene kee ɛkumɛ Waa Nyo' le. Ɛ́ beene cee nonɛn, ɛ́ fí ege ɛ́ beene enu ɛ bó ɛ taw ɛ kocɛn ɛ mɛse ɛ no nu wase no Klistu nu kebɛɛ.
49004014	Nonɛn, beene saa ebvuu enu kɛ diɛwɛ boom bo caan e, bò kfuu n'yɛɛyi wvù la dioo fele no njiŋsene bô bó ɛ bó gɛne fwe tuu jim kɛ diɛwɛ fiɛɛ fò fwefwe kale le kɛ. Beene saa ebvuu enu tɛn diɛwɛ bonyii bò bonyii bò ghane wɛɛntene lo elɛɛle bó bô mbiay yì bó seyse le kɛ.
49004015	Beene kɛŋke keeseŋe fisɛɛbeene ɛ ɛ̀ nu kecɛɛy yî keŋkoŋɛn e, emum ekuu ɛ̂ jé le yicii keeto enu diɛwɛ Klistu le wvù nu ɛkolɛ kesɛɛbeene.
49004016	Ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù gee ɛ biba bi ye ye le bicii bì nu ɛ shfuwyɛ ɛ taashɛ yî ye le sɛ kuu, yoote ye ye yî keŋkoŋɛn e no keba lemte diew lemme ɛ keba lemte diew ntay.
49004017	Yî keseen e, ɛ̂ diee di Tata le nu ɛ me ŋgomte keeŋgay embvuu enciise lo ɛ̂ ben lɛ fo ben ebvuu eceè kɛ diɛwɛ bonyii bò maa Nyo' le kɛ. Boŋkpwawcɛ bobole ké no nu kɛ bo ɛcici.
49004018	Bvufee bvubole nu bvu binjiwe le. Bó nu ncejole fô nce wvù Nyo' duŋci le, njefo bó nu ɛ ma lo Nyo', ɛ ɛ̀ nu nje bó tɛmyi bikuu.
49004019	Bó nu ɛ yum bikuu baay. Bó nu ɛ lese bikuu bibole ɛnte jo nnyɛn kenjaŋ, ɛ ye yibo yvuwse kɛ keegee dikfuu di nnyɛn e dicii.
49004020	Kɛ fifin nu fiɛɛ fì bó to yɛɛyɛɛ ben dvú ɛkumɛ Klistu kɛ.
49004021	Me ŋkee naa ntay lɛ ben nu ɛ yuw wase ɛkumɛ wvú, ɛ bó ɛ yɛɛyi wase ben bò nu ɛ taashɛ bô wvú bô kecɛɛy ke ɛkumɛ Jisos.
49004022	Ben emum ebaa ye yi yvum yì ben to cee nce wvu yvum dvú yì nu ɛ befe wase nje mwɛɛm mvu nnyɛn e mvù ben to shee gee.
49004023	Ben ecinɛ ɛ́ Nyo' eseyse boŋkpwawcɛ bonɛn ɛ́ bó enu boŋkpwawcɛ bo bofɛ,
49004024	emum etfume ɛ ɛ̀ nu ye yi fiɛ yî yene le yì Nyo' nu ɛ ge yí ɛ no fieesene wvú. Yiyin nu ye nce wvù looci nu kecɛɛy wvu teytey bô wvù yuule.
49004025	Fí ɛ mum ɛ no nu lɛ, ben ecinɛ mbiay e, ɛ́ wee ejemyì ɛ ɛ̀ nu kecɛɛy ɛ̂ waa bwee njefo beene bocii nu biba bi ye yimiaaŋ e.
49004026	Ɛ́ wee ton'yi shém, ɛ́ wvú no yɛne fo wvú enɛ ege kebefɛ. Fo wvú ecinɛ ɛ́ diuu esele ɛ wvú bɛɛ ton'yi shém kɛ.
49004027	Fo wvú enya je ɛ́ dɛwle eley jó kɛ.
49004028	Ɛ́ wee se cooŋke bvucoŋ, ɛ́ wvú cinɛ dvú no lemte ɛ ɛ̀ nu lemme dì jee bô can ye, wvu lɛ wvú nulo ekɛŋkɛ fiɛɛ fì wvú efi tɛn bonyii bò fuute dvú.
49004029	Ben eyɛnè fo njeme wvù samte ebuyte dew yene le. Wee ejemyì fiɛɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu fì jee fì nulo eyoo lo bonyii naa fɛɛ fò bó nu, wvu lɛ njeme we etoo ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô nfi fô bonyii bò yuuke le.
49004030	Fo ben egeè fiɛɛ fì Keyoy ke Yuule ke Nyo' le eyuuke ŋkuuŋ kɛ. Keyoy ke Yuule kin nu nciise Nyo' yî yene le keeduŋcɛ lɛ diuu nu ke edioo ɛ to ɛ kocɛn ɛ́ wen emɛse esum ben can ŋgɛw e.
49004031	Ben elaŋ naa lo mvuntelem mvù cɛwkene bô shém yì ffuuke noo shém yì ton'yɛɛn noo waa noo keebeete bô ɛdiee ɛ bonyii noo mvuntelem mvù befe.
49004032	Ben ekɛŋkè ɛ ɛ̀ nu keŋge kè jee bô mvuntelem mvù jee fô wee noo wee le. Wee ɛ́ ge kebefɛ bô wee, ɛ́ wvú lɛɛshɛ enya ɛ̂ wvú kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no Nyo' to feyɛɛ yî Klistu le lɛɛshɛ binɛn bibefɛ.
49005001	No ben nu boom bo Nyo' le bò wvú kooŋke naa ntay, ben emum ebeŋenè wvú.
49005002	Ben eceè yî keŋkoŋɛn e lɛŋlɛŋ no Klistu to koŋɛɛ beene nya ɛkolɛ kew fô beene le. Nnya ye yin to nu ncese ɛ wvú samte shfuuŋkene fô Nyo' le.
49005003	Mwɛɛm kɛ diɛwɛ kenjaŋ bô nce nnyɛn tfuu noo ken'yɛɛ ɛjisɛ yaa nu mvù bó eyuuke ɛkumɛ mvú ɛ̂ ben ɛntelɛŋ kɛ, njefo kɛ mvumvun nu mwɛɛm mvù enù ɛ̂ bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo Nyo' le ɛnte kɛ.
49005004	Kɛ fí baa ekocɛn naa lo lɛ njeme wvù nyɛne bô njeme keyuŋ, noo yɛle di ɛcici ebuytè dew yene le kɛ. Ben enyaà kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu keyoone ɛ̂ Nyo'.
49005005	Ben ekeè lo kecɛɛy lɛ kɛ wee wvù jaaŋke kenjaŋ, kɛnɛɛ wee wvù gee nnyɛn, kɛnɛɛ wee wvù yɛɛle ɛjisɛ, kɛŋke keleŋ ɛnte jo bvunfon bvu Klistu le noo bvu Nyo' le kɛ. Wee ken'yɛɛ ɛjisɛ ké no joo mwɛɛm diɛwɛ nyo' we le.
49005006	Fo ben ebee ɛ́ wee elɛɛ ben bô njeme wvu ɛcici ɛkumɛ mwɛɛm mvun kɛ. Ben ekeè lɛ ɛ̀ nu mwɛɛm mvudvu mvun mvù ké ge ɛ shém Nyo' no ffuuke bô bonyii bò yaa yuuke wvú le kɛ.
49005007	Nonɛn fo ben etaashì ŋgoo ben ɛ boba bonyii kɛ.
49005008	Ɛ̀ to shee nu fwele ɛ ben nu bonyii bo ɛjiwe le. Geenɛn keseen no ben nu ɛ taashɛ ben ɛ bo Tata, nu ɛ ben nu wase bonyii bo n'yuu le. Ben emum eceè diɛwɛ bonyii bo n'yuu le.
49005009	Fiɛɛ fì n'yuu ké no too dvú nu nce wvù jee bô wvu teytey noo wvù duŋci kecɛɛy.
49005010	Ben emom keekiɛɛ fiɛɛ fì jee Tata le.
49005011	Fo ben eleesè ɛbo fô mwɛɛm mvu ɛjiwɛ le kɛ. Ben ebvuusè lo mvú ɛmwa.
49005012	Ɛ̀ nu naa lo fiɛɛ fi keŋ'wuumɛn e keejemyi ɛkumɛ mwɛɛm mvun mvù bonyii gee ɛ̂ kenyilɛ le.
49005013	Geenɛn ɛ fiɛɛ ficii fì n'yuu baa yî dvú le ké no yen'yi ɛ bó yɛne fí le,
49005014	njefo fiɛɛ ficii fì yen'yi ké no nu n'yuu. Ɛ̀ nɛɛ fiɛɛ fì geɛ ɛ bó sɛ no gayte fiɛɛ fimew lɛ, “Wo wvù leete, kamse! Buyɛ yî kpwe le, ɛ́ n'yuu Klistu ebaa yî yo le.”
49005015	Nonɛn ben emum elɛnè tomyi ɛkalɛ yî kemew e. Fo ben eceè diɛwɛ biyuŋ e kɛ. Ben eceè ɛ ɛ̀ nu diɛwɛ bonyii bò kɛŋke bvufee le.
49005016	Seke ben kɛŋke je keege fiɛɛ, ɛ ben yɛn lɛ fo kefew kedvu efey ɛcici kɛ, njefo ɛdiuw yo keseen nu ɛ kebefɛ nu ɛkfuŋ baay.
49005017	Nonɛn fo ben enù biyuŋ kɛ. Ben emomtè keekiɛɛ fiɛɛ fì Tata kooŋke lɛ ben egeè.
49005018	Fo ben ewuù mbvuum ɛ mó koole ben kɛ. Fifin nu fiɛɛ fì beete lo bô bonyii. Ben enù ɛ ben ɛ yiŋsɛn ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô Keyoy ke Yuule.
49005019	Ben eyemtè boŋkiee fô bikuu binɛn e bò buyte ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Mbense le, noo boŋkiee bomew bo Mbense le, noo bò Keyoy ke Yuule nyaa ɛ̂ ben e. Ben eyemtè nonɛn bensee Tata ɛ̂ mvuntelem mvunɛn e.
49005020	Ben enyaà keyoone ɛ̂ Nyo' Ice kefew e kecii bô yî fiɛɛ le ficii fele yî diee di Tata wesebeene wvù Jisos Klistu le.
49005021	Ben enya bikuu binɛn ɛ̂ wee noo wee bii n'wvum wvù ben kɛŋke fô Klistu le.
49005022	Ben bokɛ' bo bonyii le, ben enya bikuu binɛn ɛ̂ bole' bonɛn no ben nu ɛ nya ɛ̂ Tata,
49005023	njefo diemsɛn nu ɛkolɛ ke kpwoon e, kɛ no Klistu nu ɛkolɛ ke kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le. Kentaashɛ kedvu nu ye ye, ɛ wvú kebɛɛ nu wvù boysee kí.
49005024	Nonɛn bokɛ' bo bonyii le kɛŋke keenya bikuu bibole ɛ̂ bole' bobole yî fiɛɛ ficii le kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le nu ɛ nya kew ɛkolɛ ɛ̂ Klistu.
49005025	Ben bolemsɛ, ben ekooŋkè bokɛ' bonɛn kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no Klistu to koŋɛɛ kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le nya ɛkolɛ kew, kpwe nje kí.
49005026	Wvú to nya ɛkolɛ kew keege ɛ́ kentaashɛ kedvu eyuule no wvú to cukɛɛ kí bô joo noo diɛw ye.
49005027	Wvú to seyse kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le kedvu nonɛn wvu lɛ wvú ejo kí yî ye le diɛwɛ kpwoon wvù fomte nu sɛ nlom, nu lemeleme yaa kɛŋke fiɛɛ fimew fì befe kɛ, ɛ wvú yuule nu naa sɛ fijay yî ye le.
49005028	Ɛ̀ nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no bolemsɛ tɛn kɛŋke keekooŋkè bokɛ' bobole kɛ no bó kooŋke yibo ye. Ɛ́ wee kooŋke kpwɛse, tu wvú kooŋke ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛkolɛ kew.
49005029	Kɛ wee nu dvú wvù ké no bane ye ye kɛ. Wvú ké no nyaŋyi lo yí, bosene taale fô yí le ntay. Ɛ̀ nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no Klistu gee fô beene bò ɛ̀ nu kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le,
49005030	njefo beene nu biba bi ye ye le.
49005031	Ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì bó to saŋɛɛ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu nje fifin wvù diemsɛn nu ke ecinɛ ice bô bwee le, emum etaashɛ bô kpwɛse, ɛ́ bó bofɛɛ emum etu wase wee mwaaŋ.”
49005032	Fiɛɛ nyiime ɛnte jo njeme wvun ɛ fí kuuke baay, ɛ me n'yɛne fiem lɛ fí jemyi ɛkumɛ Klistu bô kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le.
49005033	Naa no me ncim njemyi nɛn, wee mwaaŋ mwaaŋ ben e kɛŋke keekooŋkè kpwɛse no wvú kooŋke ɛkolɛ kew, ɛ́ kpwoon tɛn eyɛn lɛ wen enyaà n'wvum ɛ̂ dweese.
49006001	Boom, ben eyuukè bo'icee bonɛn bô bobwee bonɛn e, njefo fifin nu fiɛɛ fi lɛŋ fì boom bò nu ɛ taashɛ wase bô bo Tata kɛŋke keegee.
49006002	Nci Nyo' wvù gayte lɛ, “Ɛ̀ wvumtè ico bô bwoo”, nu nci wvu fwe wvù kɛŋke ŋkawma fó.
49006003	Ɛ ŋkawma wvudvu wvun nu lɛ, “Wee wvù gɛɛle nci wvun nu ke eyuw njoŋ, ebvuu ece egɛn ncejole yî nshɛ le fɛn.”
49006004	Bocee boom, fo ben egeè mwɛɛm mvù mvuntelem esaase boom bonɛn kɛ. Ben ekuusè lo bó ɛ bó kuu bô n'yɛɛyi noo ntefe wvù wvu Tata.
49006005	Ben bò nu bonfaw, ben eyuukè bonyii bò kɛŋke ben yî nshɛ le fɛn e, ben efanè bó bvuu wvumtè bó. Ben eyuukè bó le bô mvuntelem mvunɛn mvunciim no ben yuuke Klistu le.
49006006	Fo ben egeè nonɛn kɛ seke jise dibole nu yî yene le wvu lɛ ye ejeè bó kɛ. Ben egeè ɛ ɛ̀ nu diɛwɛ bonfaw bo Klistu le bò gee ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì Nyo' gomte bô mvuntelem mvubole mvunciim.
49006007	Ben dioo lemte bó le, no lemtè bô njoŋ kɛ diɛwɛ ben lemte ɛ ɛ̀ nu Tata le, ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu kɛ wee wvu wum e kɛ.
49006008	Ben elemtè, kumyi lɛ fiɛɛ fì jee ficii fì wee gee nu ɛ wvú nu ke ekɛŋkɛ tɛn fiɛɛ fì jee ɛ̂ Tata, kɛnɛɛ wvú nu nfwa kɛnɛɛ wvú yaa nu kɛ.
49006009	Ben bonyii bò kɛŋke bonfaw, ben ekɛŋkè tɛn bó ɛ̂ je yì jee le, yɛne fo ben ebɛmseè bó. Ben ekumyì lɛ ben ɛ bó bocii kɛŋke Cee Ɛkolɛ mwaaŋ fowe, ɛ fô wvú le nu ɛ jɛɛy jɛɛy yaa nu kɛ.
49006010	Keemɛɛse, me ɛ no ŋgayte ɛ̂ ben lɛ ben eleemè tɛmyi yî Tata le, eyeemè ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî mvuŋgay mwew mvu baay e.
49006011	Ben etfume mwɛɛm mvu jem e mvunciim ye le mvù Nyo' nya ɛ̂ ben, wvu lɛ ben nulo eleem etum jem ben ɛ bo dɛwle ɛ̂ jé yicii yì wvú wɛɛntene jó le.
49006012	Ben ekeè lɛ kɛ beene diuu ɛ ɛ̀ nu beene ɛ bo bonyii bo boyuum kɛ. Beene diuu ɛ ɛ̀ nu beene ɛ bo mwɛɛm mvunciim mvù kɛŋke mvuŋgay bô bvukukɛ, saake woŋ ɛjiwɛ wvun e, mvù ɛ̀ nu biyoy bì befe bicii bì nu mondvuum mo fowe le.
49006013	Nonɛn ben emum etfume mwɛɛm mvu jem e mvunciim mvù Nyo' nya ɛ̂ ben, wvu lɛ ɛ́ ke edioo enu ɛdiuw yò befe le, ɛ́ ben eleem etɛme no ben nu ɛ ge wase fiɛɛ ficii keeke eleeme tɛmyi.
49006014	Nonɛn, ben emum eleemè tɛmyi. Ben ejo kecɛɛy ɛ́ kí enu diɛwɛ kecaw e ɛ ben ɛ suu cin, ejo nce wvu teytey ɛ́ wvú enu diɛwɛ ketwaa le ɛ ben ɛ jise ɛ baŋ gvúw yene dvú.
49006015	Ben enù ɛ ben ɛ seyse keefewci saaka wvù jee wvù too bô nyɛkeey fô bonyii le, ɛ́ fifin enu diɛwɛ bolaba bo jem e ɛ ben ɛ lese yî bikaa le.
49006016	Keebise fó, ben eleesè kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu fitele yî Klistu le, ɛ́ fifin enu diɛwɛ ŋkɛɛ jem e ɛ ben kɛŋke ɛbo. Ɛ̀ nu fí fì ben nu ekoole bomvuun bò wee kebefɛ tfumyi ɛ ŋguy bɛɛnci yî dvú le.
49006017	Ben ejo tɛn mboyma wvù Nyo' nu ɛ boyse ben ɛ́ wvú enu diɛwɛ kefo ke jem e ɛ ben ɛ bon, emum ejo tɛn nyo jem yì Keyoy ke Yuule nyaa yì ɛ̀ nu diɛw Nyo'.
49006018	Yî fiɛɛ le ficii, ɛ́ ben ebunleè sekecii bii no Keyoy ke Yuule duŋci. Ben dioo bunlee no biite fiɛɛ ficii fì ben shieele ɛ̂ Nyo'. Yî fifiɛ le ɛ́ ben etaalè ntay, ebvuu ekuulè shém sekecii keebunlee lɛke Nyo' fô bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo Nyo' le bocii.
49006019	Ben ebunleè tɛn fô me le lɛ seke me ɛ ŋake diuw wɛm keenjeme, ɛ Nyo' nya kɛ me bô fiɛɛ fì me njeme, ɛ me no njemyi sɛ nfan ɛkumɛ kenyilɛ ke saaka wvù jee wvù wvu Nyo' le.
49006020	Ɛ̀ nu saaka wvudvu wvun wvù me nu yî ncaw e nje wvú diɛwɛ wee wvù nu jise di Klistu le. Ben ebunleè wvu lɛ me ndioo enu keenjeme, ɛ me njeme no me ŋkɛŋke keenjeme, sɛ nfan.
49006021	Tikikus wvù waa bwee wesebeene shém wvù lemte tɛn Tata le bô fitele fiew ficii nu esee fiɛɛ ficii ɛ̂ ben ɛkumɛ me, wvu lɛ ben tɛn ekiɛɛ no me nu, noo fiɛɛ fì me eŋgee.
49006022	Fifin nu naa fiɛɛ fì me ntumte wvú fô ben e nje fí, wvu lɛ wvú eto ege ɛ́ ben ekiɛɛ no bese nu, ebvuu eyvuwsɛ mvuntelem mvunɛn.
49006023	Nyo' Icee wesebeene bô Tata Jisos Klistu enya ben nyɛkeey bô keŋkoŋɛn noo mbee.
49006024	Nyo' ebuw ben bocii bò kɛŋke keŋkoŋɛn kè yaa kaa kɛ fô Tata wesebeene wvù Jisos Klistu le.
50001001	Ŋwa' wvun saŋ me wvù Baul bee Timatio bò nu boom bo lemme le bo Klistu Jisos e. Ŋwa' wvun gɛne fô ben e, bonyii bò nu bo Klistu Jisos e bocii Filibi bô bocee bikuu bi kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le noo bonyii bò fici gee dilemme ɛ̂ kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le ɛnte.
50001002	Nyo' Icee wesebeene bô Tata Jisos Klistu ebuw ben bô kembonɛn, ebvuu enya ben bô mvuntelem mvù lɛɛtene.
50001003	Me ŋke ŋkpwawci ɛkumɛ ben sekecii, no nyaa kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu keyoone ɛ̂ Nyo' wɛm.
50001004	Ɛ́ me ndioo mbunlee bunle yɛm yicii fô ben e bocii, no mbunlee n'yuuke njoŋ,
50001005	njefo ɛ kɛw yî diuu di fwe le ɛ to ɛ buy ɛbɛn e, nu ɛ ben ɛ taashɛ beene keelemte lɛ saaka wvù jee wvu ɛkumɛ Jisos Klistu egɛne fwe.
50001006	Me ŋkee naa ntay lɛ Nyo' wvù kɛwɛɛ lemme dì jee din yî yene le nu ke egɛn dvú fwe egɛn emɛse diuu dì Jisos Klistu nu ke ekase eto le.
50001007	Fí nu lɛŋ lɛ me eŋkpwawcì ɛkumɛ ben nonɛn, njefo ben nu fitele fiem, ɛ beene leeme yî fiɛɛ le fimwaaŋ ɛ ɛ̀ nu fí fì Nyo' nu ɛ buw beene dvú. Beene leeme yî dvú le keseen wvù me nu yî ncaw e, kɛ no beene to leeme seke me nto mbɛɛ ŋghane ntaŋyi diuw saaka wvù jee wvu ɛkumɛ Jisos Klistu ŋgee ɛ wvú ciime ntay.
50001008	Me njemyi nɛn ɛ Nyo' kee naa ntay lɛ me ŋkɛŋke shiee wene, ŋkooŋke ben bocii kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no Klistu Jisos kooŋke.
50001009	Me mbunlee lɛ keŋkoŋɛn kenɛn ekuù gɛne fwe fwe, ɛ́ ben ekɛŋke bvufee, taasse mwɛɛm ntay.
50001010	Ben nu dioo taasse nonɛn, emum ecawte mvù looci nu lɛŋ. Nonɛn, ɛ́ ke edioo enu diuu dì Jisos Klistu kaase too, ɛ́ ben enu yuule, nu sɛ nlom.
50001011	Ben nu ke enu nonɛn njefo Jisos Klistu nu ɛ ge ben ɛ no kɛŋke nce wvu teytey, bonyii ɛ no yɛne bensee Nyo', tumte moŋkum mew.
50001012	Boom bo bwɛɛm e, me ŋgomte lɛ ben ekiɛɛ lɛ mwɛɛm mvun mvunciim mvù nu ɛ kooy bô me nu ɛ loocɛ ɛ ge saaka wvù jee wvu ɛkumɛ Jisos ɛ ku ɛ gɛn lo fwe fwe.
50001013	Mwɛɛm mvudvu nu ɛ ge bonyii bò cɛyte ntow wvun fô me nu, noo bonyii bocii ɛ kiɛɛ lɛ me nu yî ncaw e fɛn nɛn, nje me nu wee Klistu.
50001014	Ncaw wvù me nlemte wvun nu ɛ bvuu ɛ ge boom bo bwee wesebeene le nteen ɛ mɛse ɛ lese fitele yî Tata le ɛ no fewci diɛw Nyo' tɛmyi lo, yaa fane kɛ.
50001015	Me ŋkee lɛ bó bomew fewci naa ɛkumɛ Klistu nɛn bene ɛ ɛ̀ nu kendoŋ bee bó, taaŋke lemme diem. Geenɛn ɛ bomew fewci fibole bô mvuntelem mvù yuule.
50001016	Boban fewci nonɛn, njefo bó kooŋke me, ɛ bó kee lo lɛ me nu yî ncaw e fɛn ɛ ɛ̀ gɛke Nyo' me lɛ me entomtè saaka wvù jee wvu ɛkumɛ Jisos Klistu.
50001017	Ɛ bomew ba fewci ɛkumɛ Klistu kɛ fomvu fomvu bô mvuntelem mvù yiile wvu lɛ bó egeè nonɛn biise ŋgɛw yî ŋgɛw wvù me n'yɛne wase yî ncaw e fɛn.
50001018	Fifiɛ kɛŋke la keege? Kɛnɛɛ bó fewci nonɛn bvulle lo, kɛnɛɛ bó fewci bô kecɛɛy, tu me n'yuuke kɛ fiem ɛ ɛ̀ nu njoŋ njefo ficii nu ɛ bó fewci kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛkumɛ Klistu.
50001019	Ɛ̀ nu kɛ no me nu ŋke en'yuuke njoŋ nonɛn, njefo me ŋkee lo lɛ no ben bunlee fô me le, ɛ Keyoy ke Jisos Klistu le bvuu fii me, nu ɛ me nu ŋke emboy yî ŋgɛw e.
50001020	Fiɛɛ fì me nlooci ntaale fwe ɛ me ɛ nlese bvufee yî dvú le nu lɛ fo me ŋke eŋge naa lo fiɛɛ fì ege ɛ́ me eŋ'wuumene kɛ. Me nu eŋkuu kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu shém, enleeme ntɛmyi sekecii, sɛ ge keseen wvu lɛ kɛnɛɛ me ɛ ŋkpwe, kɛnɛɛ me nu dvú, ɛ́ fiɛɛ ficii fì me ŋgee, ecawsè kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu diee di Klistu le we.
50001021	Me njemyi nonɛn nje, fô me le, ɛ́ me nu dvú, tu me nu kɛ bee Klistu, me ɛ́ ŋkpwe, ɛ́ enu sɛw fô me le.
50001022	Geenɛn, ɛ́ ɛ̀ nu lɛ me nu enu dvú, ɛ́ me eŋgeè lemme dì efii bonyii ntay. No mwɛɛm mvun nu mvunfɛɛm nɛn, me mbaa embvuu eŋkiɛɛ laa me nu encaw fì la lɛ.
50001023	Me ntuwtene lo ɛntelɛŋ jodvu. Me ŋgomte lɛ ɛ̀ be nulo ɛ́ me eŋgɛne fiem eŋgɛn enu bee Klistu. Fifiɛ jee fele keenu dvú.
50001024	Geenɛn, ɛ fí jee baay lɛ me enu dvú nje yene.
50001025	No fí nu nonɛn, me nlooci naa ŋkee lɛ me nu enu dvú nlemte beene bocii wvu lɛ ben ekuù gɛne fwe bvuu yuuke njoŋ no ben nu ɛ lese fitele yî Klistu le.
50001026	Nonɛn, ɛ́ me ndioo ɛ ŋkase ɛ nto ɛ no nu beene, ɛ́ ben ebvuu ebensee lo ye ntay ɛkumɛ Klistu Jisos nje yɛm.
50001027	Fiɛɛ fì me ŋgomte keeŋgay nu kɛ lɛ ben eceè nce ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvù saaka wvù jee wvu ɛkumɛ Klistu gomte. Ben eceè nonɛn, wvu lɛ kɛnɛɛ me ɛ ŋkase ɛ nto ɛ n'yɛn ben e, kɛnɛɛ me mbaa nto, ɛ́ me en'yuuke kɛ lɛ ben leeme tɛmyi, kɛŋke fitele fimwaaŋ, nu yî wee le mwaaŋ, diuu yî fiɛɛ le fimwaaŋ, wvu lɛ saaka wvù jee wvun egɛnè fwe, ɛ bonyii beŋe dvú.
50001028	Fo ben efanè naa lo bonyii bò bane ben yî saaka wvun e kɛ. Ɛ́ ben nu sɛ ben fane bó, ɛ́ fifin eduŋci ɛ̂ bó lɛ Nyo' nu ke eboyse ben, geenɛn elɛse lo bó.
50001029	Ben ekeè lɛ Nyo' baa buw ben lɛ ben enù bonyii bo Klistu le kɛ lɛ ben elese ɛ ɛ̀ nu fitele yî ye le maaŋ kɛ. Wvú nu ɛ buw tɛn lɛ ben eyɛnè ŋgɛw nje Klistu.
50001030	Ben nu ɛ bɛne wase me le beene ɛ no diuu yî saaka wvun e bocii wvù ben to yɛnɛɛ ɛ me ndiuu yî dvú le, ɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ wvú wvù ben yuuke lɛ me mbɛɛ yî dvú le keseen.
50002001	Kɛ ben nu ɛ taashɛ wase ben ɛ bo Klistu wvú ɛ ge ben ɛ no kɛŋke mvuntelem? Kɛ keŋkoŋɛn kew fô ben e nu ɛ ge wase mvuntelem mvunɛn ɛ no yvuwse? Kɛ ben ɛ bo Keyoy ke Yuule nu ɛ taashɛ wase, ɛ Klistu kɛŋke fitele fì jee fô ben e bvuu camte shen fô ben e?
50002002	No fí nu nonɛn, ben ege lɛ ɛ́ me emɛse en'yuw njoŋ. Ben enù diuw mwaaŋ, kooŋkè bikuu binɛn, kɛŋkè fitele fimwaaŋ bvuu kɛŋkè ŋkpwawcɛ mwaaŋ.
50002003	Fo ben dioo nu ɛ wee no kpwaake kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛkumɛ ɛkolɛ kew kɛnɛɛ bensee ye yi ɛcici kɛ. Wee tfuu eshike ɛkolɛ kew, eyɛnè wee mvu le fele ɛkolɛ kew.
50002004	Fo wee ekpwaakè kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛkumɛ ɛkolɛ kew kɛ. Wvú ekpwaakè tɛn ɛkumɛ bonyii bomew.
50002005	Keŋge kenɛn kɛŋke keenu lɛŋlɛŋ kɛ diɛwɛ ke Klistu Jisos e.
50002006	Wvú to nu Nyo', faŋɛ yaa ejo fifiɛ lɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì wvú emɛy eghemte yî dvú le kɛ,
50002007	geenɛn, cinɛ bvudvuu bvudvu le, jo ɛ ɛ̀ nu bvu nfwa le. Ɛ bó boo wvú, ɛ wvú no nu lɛŋlɛŋ kɛ diɛwɛ wee wvu wum e.
50002008	Seke wvú to nu wee wvu wum, ɛ wvú shike ɛkolɛ kew no yuuke Nyo' le, ke bee keekpwe kpwe, ɛfey mvunciim, kpwe yi yî kentam e.
50002009	No wvú to geɛ nonɛn, ɛ Nyo' bense wvú gɛɛ bvudvuu le bvù fele bvu wee tfuu le, buw wvú bô diee dì fele ɛdiee ɛcii,
50002010	wvu lɛ wee tfuu wvù nu woŋ wvu we le bô wvù nu yî nshɛ le noo wvù nu ɛkuse jo nshɛ, ke dioo ɛ yuw diee di Jisos e didvu, ŋgvuum,
50002011	ɛ́ wee tfuu ejemyi bô diuw we lɛ Jisos Klistu nu Cee Ɛkolɛ. Ɛ́ bó edioo egee nonɛn ɛ́ mbense egɛne ɛ̂ Nyo' Ice.
50002012	Nonɛn nsáa yɛm shém, ben eyuukè kɛ tɛn Nyo' le nonɛn no ben to yuuke seke me nto nu beene. Ben eyuukè keseen fele lo wvù me n'yaa nu kɛ beene, egɛne fwe gee mwɛɛm mvu ɛkumɛ mboyma wene. Ben egeè nonɛn, fane ciiŋke.
50002013	Ben ekeè lɛ ɛ̀ lemte Nyo' yî yene le, gee lɛ ben eshieelè keegee mwɛɛm mvù wvú kooŋke. Ɛ ɛ̀ bvuu nyaa wvú mvuŋgay keegee mwɛɛm mvudvu dvú.
50002014	Ben dioo gee fiɛɛ ficii fì ben gee, fo ben ewvukenè, kɛnɛɛ beekè mbew kɛ,
50002015	wvu lɛ ben eyuule, nu sɛ nlom. Nonɛn, ɛ́ ben emum enu boom bo Nyo' le bò nu sɛ jay ɛntelɛŋ jo ɛŋgokɛ kin kè kɛŋke mvuntelem mvù yiile, buuke mwɛɛm. Ben ebaà ɛ̂ woŋ jan diɛwɛ jón e,
50002016	no ben jici saaka wvù nyaa nshii wvù mɛy lo ɛ̂ bonyii le. Ɛ́ ben gee nonɛn, ɛ́ ke edioo enu diuu dì Jisos Klistu kaase too, ɛ́ me embensee ye lɛ me mbaa nlem lemme di ɛcici kɛ.
50002017	No ben nu ɛ lese fitele yî Nyo' le, tu ɛ̀ nu ncese ɛ ben ɛ ge fô wvú le. Ɛ́ ɛ̀ cim nu naa lɛ bó nu emɛse enya me diɛwɛ no bó ké fuu mbvuum, ebise yî wene ncese le, ɛ́ me en'yuuke kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu njoŋ, nlaŋlaŋe beene bocii.
50002018	Ɛ me ŋgomte lɛ ben ebɛne me le ɛ́ beene eyuuke njoŋ, laŋlaŋe.
50002019	Ɛ́ Tata Jisos beŋe lo, tu me n'yɛne lɛ ɛ̀ shɛke caan ɛ́ me entum Timatio fô ben e. Wvú nu ke edioo ɛ to ɛ kase ɛ tu jim, esee ɛ̂ me no ben nu, ɛ́ fitele fiem elɛɛtɛn.
50002020	Kɛ me ŋkɛŋke wee mvu diɛwɛ wvú le wvù looci naa kɛŋke tɛn shiee fô ben e diɛwɛ no me ŋkɛŋke kɛ.
50002021	Me njemyi nɛn, njefo wee nteen kɛŋke shiee ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô ɛkolɛ kew e, yaa taale kɛ ɛkumɛ fiɛɛ fì Jisos Klistu gomte le kɛ.
50002022	Geenɛn, Timatio nu ɛ ben kee wase wee wvù ɛ̀ nu wvú, no wvú nu ɛ lem wase bee wvú keefewcɛ saaka wvù jee, ɛ wvú lemte bee wvú lɛŋlɛŋ diɛwɛ no wan ké no lemte bô ice.
50002023	Ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì me n'yɛne lɛ ɛ̀ shɛke caan ɛ́ me entum ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvú. Fiɛɛ fì me mbɛɛ ntaale nu keen'yɛn laa mwɛɛm nu etu nɛɛ le yî yɛm e lɛ.
50002024	Me ŋgɛɛle bvufee yî Tata le lɛ ɛ̀ shɛke caan, ɛ́ me kebɛɛ ento tɛn en'yɛn ben e.
50002025	Me n'yɛne lɛ fí nu shiee le lɛ me eŋkase enciinse Ɛbaflodaytus ɛ̂ ben. Wvú nu waa bwee wesebeene, ɛ bee wvú lemte bvuu diuu yî diɛw Nyo' le. Ɛ̀ nu wee wene ntum wvù ben to tumɛɛ lɛ wvú eto etaale fô me le.
50002026	Wvú se kɛŋke wase shiee keeyɛn ben e bocii, ɛ fitele buuke wvú no wvú se yuwɛɛ lɛ ben nu ɛ yuw lɛ wen cɛmte lo.
50002027	Ɛ̀ nu kecɛɛy, wvú se nu ɛ loocɛ ɛ cɛm ɛ shɛɛ kɛ caan keekpwe. Geenɛn, Nyo' se nu ɛ cam shen fô wvú le, ɛ kɛ wvú se cam kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô wvú le maaŋ kɛ. Wvú nu ɛ cam tɛn fô me le lɛ fo wvú ekpwe ebvuu ebise ŋgɛw yî wvù me n'yɛne wase le kɛ.
50002028	Nonɛn, me ɛ mum ɛ no nshieele naa baay lɛ me enciinse wvú, wvu lɛ ben ebvuu eyɛn wvú le eyuuke njoŋ, ɛ́ fitele fiem tɛn elɛɛtene.
50002029	Ben efiisɛn wvú diɛwɛ bonyii bo Tata le bô njoŋ. Bonyii diɛwɛ wvú le nu bò ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ ben ewvumte.
50002030	Me njemyi nɛn njefo ɛ̀ to shɛke caan tu wvú to kpwe nje lemme di Jisos Klistu le no wvú to nyaɛ ɛkolɛ kew keetaale fô me le yî bvudvuu bvunɛn e.
50003001	Boom bo bwɛɛm e, keemɛɛse, ben eyuukè njoŋ lɛ ben nu bonyii bo Tata le. Me nu ɛ nsaŋ wase mwɛɛm fô ben e, ɛ kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me endose keenjemyi ŋkaase ntuu fó kɛ. Me ŋgee nonɛn keeŋgemŋgeme lo ben.
50003002	Ben dioo nu, no yɛnè ben ɛ bonyii ba bò gee mwɛɛm mvù befe, leeme kɛ lɛ bó kɛŋke kɛ keesɛɛyi ye bonyii lɛ bó tfuuse bó yew. Bonyii bodvu ba nu lo bwé.
50003003	Ɛ̀ nu beene ban bò nu ɛ kɛŋkɛ ntfuse yew wvu lɛŋ, beene ban bò bunlee Nyo' no Keyoy kew duŋci. Beene bensee ye ɛ ɛ̀ nu nje Klistu Jisos, kɛ beene leese bvufee yî mwɛɛm mvù ɛ̀ gee bonyii le kɛ.
50003004	Geenɛn, ɛ̀ nɛlo ɛ́ me ŋkɛŋke tɛn shiee keenleese bvufee yî mvumwɛ mwɛɛm e. Ɛ́ wee fɛn nu dvú wvù kpwaake lɛ wen nulo ekɛŋke shiee keeleese bvufee yî mvumwɛ mwɛɛm e, tu me ŋkɛŋke wvù fele wvu mwɛtɛn.
50003005	Me nu wee wvu Islael, ɛ̂ kfuu di Bɛnjamen e, nu wee Ibulu, ɛ ɛ̀ to boke Bo'ibulu me, ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu ɛdiuw nyaŋ ɛ bó tfuse me yew. Ɛ̀ dioo tu ɛ̂ keba ke bonci bosɛse le, nu ɛ me nto nu wee Falasii,
50003006	ntɛmyi naa ntay yî fiɛɛ fi Nyo' le, mbone bikaa ɛ̂ kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le ɛjim. Ɛ̂ keba ke bonci bosɛse le no ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wee enu teytey, me nto mbaa eŋkɛŋke jay kɛ.
50003007	Geenɛn mwɛɛm mvù me nto nshee n'yɛne lɛ ɛ̀ nu mwɛɛm mvu sɛw e fô me le, nu ɛ me n'yɛne wase keseen lɛ ɛ̀ nu mwɛɛm mvu ɛcici, nje fiɛɛ fì Klistu ge fô me le.
50003008	Kɛ ɛ̀ mɛy kɛ fifiɛ kɛ, kecɛɛy, me n'yɛne mwɛɛm mvunciim e ɛ mvú nu lo mwɛɛm mvu ɛcici fô me le, njefo fiɛɛ fì kuuke fele mwɛɛm mvunciim nu keekiɛɛ Tata wɛm wvù Klistu Jisos ntay. Me nu ɛ nlaŋ mwɛɛm mvun mvunciim nje ye. Me n'yɛne wase mvú le ɛ ɛ̀ nu mwɛɛm mvu nnyɛn e, wvu lɛ me enù bee Klistu,
50003009	ɛ́ bee wvú emɛse eleynɛn, enu yî wee le mwaaŋ. Me nu ɛ Nyo' ɛ jo wase me lɛ me nu teytey fô wvú le. Wvú jo nonɛn njefo me nu ɛ nlese fitele yî Klistu le. Me ɛ mum ɛ no nu teytey no wvú joo bonyii bò nu ɛ lese fitele yî Klistu le. Kɛ me mbvuu njoo naa lo lɛ me nu teytey mbii no me nto ŋkpwawci lɛ wee ké no nu seke wvú bii bonci bosɛse le kɛ.
50003010	Fiɛɛ fì me ŋgomte keseen nu lɛ me eŋkiɛɛ Klistu ntay, eŋkɛŋke mvuŋgay mvù wvú kɛŋke no wvú to kasɛɛ ebuy yî kpwe le. Me ŋgomte tɛn keen'yɛn ŋgɛw no wvú to yɛnɛɛ, bô keenya ɛkolɛ kem ɛ̂ kpwe no wvú to nyaɛ,
50003011	wvu lɛ Nyo' ke ebvuse tɛn me yî kpwe le.
50003012	Kɛ me ŋgayte nɛn lɛ me nu ɛ ŋge wase mwɛɛm mvun kɛnɛɛ lɛ me nu ɛ nfɛse wase kɛ. Me mbɛɛ mbone kɛ ŋaŋ lɛ me ŋke enlaŋ kebo enjicɛ mwɛɛm mvudvu le ɛ̂ me ɛbo, njefo Klistu Jisos nu ɛ jo wase me wee we le.
50003013	Boom bo bwɛɛm e, kɛ me n'yɛne lɛ me nu ɛ njicɛ wase mwɛɛm mvudvu le ɛ̂ me ɛbo kɛ. Geenɛn fiɛɛ fì me ŋgee nu lɛ me ndaayi ɛ̂ mwɛɛm mvù nu ɛ fey wase le, mbone ŋaŋ lɛ me enjicɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu mvù nu fwe le.
50003014	Me mbone ŋaŋ ntaale kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu fó fô me ŋgɛne, keeŋkɛŋkɛ mmawcɛ wvù ɛ̀ nu ntee wvù Nyo' nu ɛ tee me lɛ me emben ento we no me nu ɛ ntaashɛ bee Klistu Jisos.
50003015	Beene bocii bò nu ɛ cime wase gɛŋ yî Jisos Klistu le kɛŋke keekpwawci mwɛɛm mvun. Geenɛn, ɛ́ ben bomew kpwawci mvunɛn mwɛɛm jɛɛy, tu ɛ̀ nu ke eyuuse wase Nyo' ɛ̂ ben.
50003016	Fiɛɛ fi baay nu kɛ lɛ beene ejicì ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì beene nu ɛ yɛɛyi wase le ntay.
50003017	Boom bo bwɛɛm e, ben ejoò kenfewsɛn fô me le, ebvuu etaalè tɛn nce wvù bonyii bomew cee bò nu ɛ jo kenfewsɛn fô bese le.
50003018	Me njemyi nɛn njefo no me nto ŋké no njemyi wase ɛ̂ ben bokaŋ e bokaŋ e, ɛ mbvuu ɛ no njemyi keseen bô misɛm ɛ̂ jise lɛ bonyii bomew nu dvú bò cee nce wvù duŋci lɛ bó bane lo saaka wvù lɛ Klistu to nu ɛ kpwe yî kentam e.
50003019	Boba bonyii nu ɛ bó nu ke elɛse lo bó. Wvubo nyo' nu diuwdiee. Bó bensee ye yî mwɛɛm mvù bó bee keewuumene lo yî dvú le. Ŋkpwawcɛ wvubo nu kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî mwɛɛm mvu fokuse fɛn e.
50003020	Beene nu fisɛɛbeene bonyii bo woŋ wvu we le. Ɛ ɛ̀ nu fó fô beene looci cɛyte lɛ Mboyse wesebeene wvù Tata Jisos Klistu nu ke enɛ sɛ to.
