50003021	Wvú nu ke edioo ɛ to, ekumɛn ye yesebeene yi ncɛwncɛw yin ɛ́ yí etu diɛwɛ ye ye yì kɛŋke bvujoŋkɛ le. Wvú nu ke ekumɛn ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô mvuŋgay mwew mvù wvú nu ke ebaancɛ mwɛɛm mvunciim dvú enu ɛwe jodvu.
50004001	Nonɛn boom bo bwɛɛm e, me ŋkooŋke ben baay mbvuu ŋkɛŋke shiee keen'yɛn ben e. Ɛ̀ nu ben bò gee ɛ me n'yuuke njoŋ, ɛ ben bvuu nu kefo kem ke bvunfon e. Nsáa yɛm, ben emum eleemè kɛ tɛmyi ben ɛ bo Tata nonɛn.
50004002	Me nlɛke lɛ Ɛwodia bô Sintiki emɛɛshɛ fiɛɛ fì bó kɛŋke etu diuw mwaaŋ no bó nu wee bô waa bwee nje Tata.
50004003	Me ɛ no ŋgayte tɛn ɛ̂ wo wɛ wvù looci nu naa wee wɛm ŋgoo lɛ wo efi kɛ bokɛnɛ ban ɛ́ bó etu diuw mwaaŋ. Ɛ̀ nu bonyii ɛ bó ɛ katɛn wase bee bó yî lemme di saaka wvù jee wvu ɛkumɛ Jisos Klistu le bô bo Kelɛmɛn noo bonyii bomew bò bee bó to lemte. Bonyii ban bocii nu ɛ ɛdiee ɛbo nu wase ɛ̂ ŋwa' bonyii bò kɛŋke nshii wvù mɛy lo le.
50004004	Ben eyuukè njoŋ sekecii no ben nu bonyii bo Tata le. No me ŋgay nu ɛ me mbvuu ŋkaase ntuu fó lɛ ben eyuukè njoŋ.
50004005	Ben eduŋcì gee di nyɛkeey ɛ̂ wee tfuu, ekumyì lɛ kefew kè Tata nu ke ekase eto nu wase nceencee.
50004006	Fo ben ebuukè naa lo ɛkumɛ fiɛɛ fimew kɛ. Ben ebunleè lo fô fiɛɛ ficii le gɛɛle fwe dvu Nyo'. Ben dioo bunlee no biite mwɛɛm mvù ben shieele ɛ̂ wvú, enyaà keyoone yî mvù wvú gee le.
50004007	Ɛ́ ben gee nonɛn, ɛ́ Nyo' emum enya ben nyɛkeey we ɛ́ wvú ecɛyte mvuntelem bô bvufee bvunɛn no ben nu bonyii bo Klistu Jisos e. Nyɛkeey wvun wvù Nyo' nyaa nu ɛ kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wee ekiɛɛ kenfewsɛn kedvu kɛ.
50004008	Boom bo bwɛɛm e keemɛse, mwɛɛm mvù ben kɛŋke keekpwawcì nu mwɛɛm mvù nu mvu kecɛɛy bô mwɛɛm mvù kɛŋke n'wvum, noo mwɛɛm mvù nu lɛŋ. Ben ekpwawcì mwɛɛm ɛ ɛ̀ nu mvù yuule bô mwɛɛm mvù bonyii ké no kooŋke noo mwɛɛm mvù sem nulo eta wee dvú. Ɛ́ mwɛɛm nu dvú mvù looci jee, ɛ́ mwɛɛm nu dvú mvù ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bonyii ebɛnsee, ɛ́ ben no kpwawcì ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛkumɛ mvumwɛ.
50004009	Ben egeè mwɛɛm biì kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu n'yɛɛyi wvù me nto nyaɛ ɛ̂ ben e, kɛnɛɛ ɛ̀ nu mwɛɛm mvù ben to yuuke lo ɛ̂ me, kɛnɛɛ ɛ̀ nu mvù ben to yɛne lo. Ben nu dioo gee no nɛn, ɛ́ Nyo' wvù gee ɛ mvuntelem mvu bonyii le nu nyɛkeey emum enu ben ɛ bó.
50004010	Tata nu ɛ ge me ɛ no n'yuuke njoŋ baay no ben nu ɛ bvuu ɛ duŋcɛ shiee wene fô me le kɛ no ben to shee duŋci. Me ŋkee naa ntay lɛ ben se kɛŋke kɛ shiee fô me le, geenɛn tane ɛ ɛ̀ nu je.
50004011	Kɛ me njemyi nɛn lɛ me nse ntane fiɛɛ kɛ. Me nu ɛ n'yɛɛyi wase ɛ ŋkiɛɛ keenfiisene mwɛɛm mvunciim.
50004012	Me ŋkee no wee ké no nu seke wvú tane, ŋkee no wee ké no nu seke wvú kɛŋke baay. Me ɛ mum ɛ n'yɛɛyi fifin ɛ ŋkiɛɛ no ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me enu sekecii yî mwɛɛm e mvunciim kɛnɛɛ me nu ɛ ndie, kɛnɛɛ me mbaa endie, kɛnɛɛ me ŋkɛŋke baay kɛnɛɛ me ntane lo.
50004013	Me ŋkee keeŋge mwɛɛm mvun mvunciim nɛn, ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô mvuŋgay mvù Klistu nyaa ɛ̂ me le.
50004014	Geenɛn, no me ncim ŋgayte nɛn, ben nu ɛ ge naa ntay keefi me yî kefew ke ŋgɛw wɛm e kin e.
50004015	Ben bonyii bo Filibi kee lo lɛ ɛ̀ to nu seke me nto nɛn'yɛɛ woŋ wene le Masedonia no me nto ŋkɛwɛɛ keenfewci saaka wvù jee wvun ɛ̂ ben, kɛ kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le kemew to nu ɛ taashɛ bee bó keetasene can kɛ. Ɛ̀ to mɛy kɛ ben.
50004016	Ɛ̀ to nu naa seke me nto nu Tɛsalonika, ɛ ben ciinse nfi ɛ̂ me, bvuu ciinse.
50004017	Kɛ me njemyi nɛn lɛ me ntaale lɛ ben eciinseè mwɛɛm ɛ̂ me kɛ. Me ntaale baay ɛ ɛ̀ nu mmawcɛ wvù Nyo' nu ke enya ɛ̂ ben yî fiɛɛ fì ben gee fô me le.
50004018	Ben to nu ɛ tum Ɛbaflodaytus bô nnya ɛ wvú to nya ɛ̂ me. Me ɛ no nu keseen n'yaa mbvuu ntane fiɛɛ kɛ. Me nto nu ɛ nfiisɛn nnya yidvu yicii, n'yɛn ɛ yí duule fele lo no me nshieele. Nnya yin nu ncese ɛ ben ɛ ge fô Nyo' le, ɛ wvú ɛ fiisɛn, yí ɛ no samte shfuuŋkene ɛ wvú kooŋke.
50004019	Nyo' wɛm wvù me mbunlee kɛŋke ntfu bvukukɛ bvucii bvù beene shieele, ɛ wvú nu ke enya ɛ̂ ben fiɛɛ ficii fì ben shieele, njefo beene nu bonyii bo Klistu Jisos e.
50004020	Mbense enù fô Nyo' Icee wesebeene wvun e sekecii sɛ ŋka. Fí enù nonɛn.
50004021	Ben egay bonyii bocii bò ɛ̀ nu bo Klistu Jisos e enya ɛ̂ me. Boom bo bwee wesebeene le bò nu bee bó fɛn gayte tɛn ben e.
50004022	Ɛ bonyii bocii bò ɛ̀ nu bo Nyo' le jan gayte ben e, ɛfey mvunciim bò nu ɛ̂ ntow Kaysa le fɛn.
50004023	Tata Jisos Klistu ebuw ben bô kembonɛn kew ɛ́ kí efici biyoy binɛn. Fí enù nonɛn.
51001001	Ɛ̀ nu me wvù Baul, waa ntum Klistu Jisos yî ŋkoŋ wvù wvu Nyo' le. Me nu bee Timatio wvù waa bwee wesebeene.
51001002	Ŋwa' wvun gɛne fô ben e boom bo bwee wese le bò nu fitele fimwaaŋ bô bo Klistu, nu bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo Nyo' le Kolose. Nyo' Icee wesebeene ebuw ben bô kembonɛn kew ebvuu enya ben bô mvuntelem mvù lɛɛtene.
51001003	Bese dioo bunlee fô ben e sekecii no nyaa kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu keyoone ɛ̂ Nyo' wvù Icee Tata wesebeene wvù Jisos Klistu,
51001004	njefo bese nu ɛ yuw wase ɛkumɛ fitele finɛn fì ben lese yî Klistu Jisos e, bô keŋkoŋɛn kè ben kɛŋke fô bonyii bocii bò ɛ̀ nu bo Nyo' le.
51001005	Bese kee lɛ ben gee nonɛn njefo ben taale fwe ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî fiɛɛ fì Nyo' nu ɛ seyse ɛ gɛɛ ɛ̂ ben fowe le. Ɛ fiɛɛ fin nu fì ben to yuwɛɛ wase ɛ̂ diɛw Nyo' le yì nu kecɛɛy, nu saaka wvù jee.
51001006	Saaka wvun to to fô ben e lɛŋlɛŋ no wvú to toɛ fô bonyii le yî ɛkolɛ ke nshɛ le kecii no kumene nce bonyii bvuu saaŋkene gɛne fwe fwe. Ɛ̀ nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no fí to kooyɛɛ bô ben ɛ kɛw diuu dì ben yuwɛɛ saaka wvudvu bvuu kiɛɛ kecɛɛy lɛ Nyo' nu ɛ buw bonyii bô keŋkoŋɛn kew.
51001007	Ben to yuw saaka wvudvu wvun ɛ̂ Ɛbaflas wvù nu fitele fisɛse, ɛ bee bó lemte yî fiɛɛ le fimwaaŋ. Wvú nu wee lemme Klistu, ɛ wvú ɛ jo bvudvuu bvusɛse ɛ no lemte bô fitele fiew ficii,
51001008	ɛ wvú ɛ see wase ɛ̂ bese ɛkumɛ keŋkoŋɛn kè Keyoy ke Nyo' le nu ɛ nya ben ɛ no kɛŋke fô bonyii le.
51001009	Ɛ kɛw diuu dì bese yuwɛɛ ɛkumɛ ben nonɛn, bese ɛ mum ɛ no bunlee fô ben e sekecii. Bese bunlee lɛke lɛ Nyo' ege ɛ́ ben ekiɛɛ fiɛɛ fì wvú gomte. Ɛ fifin nu ke efey yî bvufee bô mwɛɛm mvù Keyoy kew nu ɛ ge ben ɛ no kee le.
51001010	Nonɛn ɛ́ ben emum ecee nce ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvù nu ɛ kpwɛntɛn wvu bonyii bo Tata le. Ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvú, wvù wvú looci kooŋke. Ɛ́ ben dioo cee nonɛn emum egee dilemme dì jee jé le jé le, ekeè Nyo' gɛne fwe fwe.
51001011	Bese bunlee tɛn lɛ Nyo' wvù mvuŋgay mvu baay mvunciim nu mwew enya ben bô mvuŋgay mvunciim ɛ́ ben etɛmyi sekecii, kuule shém gɛne fwe yî fiɛɛ le ficii, laŋlaŋe,
51001012	nyaa keyoone ɛ̂ Nyo' Ice. Ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù nu ɛ ge beene ɛ kocɛn keeke ekɛŋkɛ fiɛɛ fì wvú nu ɛ seyse ɛ gɛɛ ɛ̂ bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bew fô bvudvuu bvu n'yuu le.
51001013	Wvú nu ɛ bvuse wase beene can mvuŋgay mvu ɛjiwɛ le, ɛ gɛɛ ɛnte jo bvunfon bvu Waa we wvù nu fitele fiew e.
51001014	Ɛ̀ nu Waa we wvun wvù nu ɛ ge Nyo' ɛ lɛɛshɛ bibefɛ bisɛɛbeene, ɛ sum beene can ŋgɛw e.
51001015	Waa we wvun nu naa lo wunte Nyo' kebɛɛ wvù beene yaa yɛne kɛ. Ɛ̀ nu wvú nsafwe mwɛɛm mvunciim mvù bó bomɛɛ.
51001016	Nyo' to bom mwɛɛm mvunciim can ye le, mwɛɛm mvu fowe bô mvu fokuse, mvù bó yɛne mvú le, bô mvù bó yaa yɛne kɛ, kɛnɛɛ ɛ̀ nu naa bonceendaa bò la, bò lɛne ɛ̂ fwefwe le, kɛnɛɛ bò kɛŋke mvuŋgay, kɛnɛɛ bo baay baay, kɛnɛɛ bò saake. Mwɛɛm mvun mvunciim nu ɛ Nyo' to bom can ye le, ɛ mvú nu keewvumte wvú.
51001017	Wvú to nu wase dvú ɛ mwɛɛm mvunciim sɛ ke no nu. Mwɛɛm mvunciim nu can ye le, ɛ ɛ̀ jici wvú dvú ɛ mvú sɛ nu.
51001018	Wvú nu ɛkolɛ ke kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le kè ɛ̀ nu ye ye. Ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù to kɛwɛɛ kentaashɛ kin. Ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvú wee wvu fwe keebuy yî kpwe le wvù yaa bɛɛ ke ekpwe kɛ, wvu lɛ yî fiɛɛ ficii le ɛ́ wvú enù nsafwe.
51001019	Mwɛɛm mvun nu nonɛn njefo Nyo' to nu ɛ koŋ lɛ fiɛɛ fì wen nu fí ficii enù yî Waa we le,
51001020	ɛ́ wvú ege ɛ́ mwɛɛm mvunciim ekase etaashɛ bô Nyo', kɛnɛɛ ɛ̀ nu mvu fowe kɛnɛɛ mvu fokuse. Ɛ Nyo' mum ge keman bô ɛlɛmɛ ke Waa we le seke wvú to kpweɛ yî kentam e.
51001021	Ben tɛn to shee nu ɛ ben ɛ gawsɛn ben ɛ bo Nyo', kɛŋke boŋkpwawcɛ bò befe ɛkumɛ wvú, gee mwɛɛm mvù befe.
51001022	Geenɛn, keseen nu ɛ Nyo' ɛ kase wase ɛ taashɛ ben ɛ bó. Wvú to ge fifin fele yî Waa we le wvù to tuɛ wee wvu wum, to kpwe fô ben e, wvu lɛ ben enù ɛ̂ wvú fwe yuule yaa kɛŋke nlom kɛ, nu sɛ jay.
51001023	Ben kɛŋke keemum egɛnè fwe yî fitele fì ben lese yî ye le, ecime gɛŋ eleemè tɛmyi ɛ fiɛɛ yaa shiike kɛ ben yî fiɛɛ fì ben taale fwe yî dvú le fì ben to yuwɛɛ ɛ̂ saaka wvù jee le. Saaka wvù jee wvudvu wvun nu wvù bó nu ɛ fewcɛ wase ɛ̂ wee tfuu yî nshɛ le fɛn. Ɛ saaka wvudvu wvun nu wvù me wvù Baul nfewci ɛ̂ bonyii diɛwɛ wee lemme Nyo' le.
51001024	Me nlaŋlaŋe keseen yî ŋgɛw wɛm wvù me n'yɛne nje yene le. Ɛ me njoo ŋgɛw wvun yî ɛkolɛ kem e nɛn keemɛse ŋgɛw wvù Klistu to yɛnɛɛ nje kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le kè ɛ̀ nu ye ye.
51001025	Nyo' nu ɛ gɛɛ me lɛ me enlemtè fô kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le, enfewcì diɛw ye ɛ̂ ben no yí nu yicii.
51001026	Diɛw yin nu yì to shee nu ɛ bó ɛ nyilɛ ɛ̂ ɛŋgokɛ ke bonyii le kecii bilum ŋkuuŋ, ɛ keseen nu ɛ Nyo' ɛ duŋcɛ wase ɛ̂ bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bew.
51001027	Nyo' to nu ɛ caw keege ɛ́ bonyii bew ban ekiɛɛ lɛ bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu nu ke ekɛŋkɛ bvukukɛ bvu saaka wvù bó to shee nyile wvun e naa ntay. Ɛ saaka wvudvu wvun nu lɛ Klistu nu yî yene le. Nonɛn ben ɛ mum ɛ no taale fwe keekɛŋkɛ bvukukɛ.
51001028	Ɛ̀ nu Klistu wvudvu wvun wvù bese fewci ɛkumɛ wvú ɛ̂ bonyii bocii. Bese yɛɛyi bó bô bvufee bvucii bvù Nyo' nyaa ɛ̂ bese, bvuu teete bó, wvu lɛ bó enù ɛ bó ɛ taw ɛ kocɛn ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛjise no bonyii bo Klistu le kɛŋke keenu.
51001029	Ɛ̀ nɛɛ fiɛɛ fì me mbone ŋaŋ, nlemte bô mvuŋgay mvunciim mvù Klistu lemte dvú yî yɛm e.
51002001	Me ɛ mum ɛ no ŋgomte lɛ me eŋge ɛ́ ben bo Kolose ekiɛɛ no me nlumte naa ntay nje yene, bô nje bonyii bo Lawdɛsia noo bonyii bo mbee le bocii bò ke baa yɛn wase me le ɛjisɛ kɛ.
51002002	Me ŋgee nonɛn lɛ mvuntelem mvu ben ɛ bó le eyvuwsè, ɛ́ ben etaashɛ enu yî keŋkoŋɛn e, wvu lɛ ben elooci kee naa ntay mwɛɛm mvunciim no wee kɛŋke keekee, emum ekeè tɛn kenyilɛ ke Nyo' le, kè ɛ̀ nu Klistu.
51002003	Nyo' nu ɛ nyilɛ ntfu bvufee bvucii bô mwɛɛm mvù bonyii kɛŋke keekeè ɛkumɛ wvú ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî Klistu le.
51002004	Me njemyi fin wvu lɛ fo wee mvu ke enɛ eto bô njeme wvù yeke wvu fomvu fomvu elɛɛ ben dvú.
51002005	Ben ekeè lɛ naa no me ncim nu ncejole nɛn nu ɛ me nu beene ɛ̂ keyoy e. Ɛ me laŋlaŋe no me n'yuuke no ben gee mwɛɛm ɛ̂ je yi lɛŋ e, ɛ ben ɛ lese fitele yî Klistu le ɛ fí tɛmyi ntay.
51002006	No ben nu ɛ fiisɛn wase Klistu Jisos wvù Tata, ben emum eleemè kɛ yî ye le nonɛn.
51002007	Ben ecime gɛŋ ekuù yî ye le, eleemè tɛmyi yî mbee wene le kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no bó to yɛɛyɛɛ ben, enyaà keyoone ɛ̂ Nyo' sekecii.
51002008	Ben eyɛnè fo wee ke ejo bvufee bvu ɛcici bvu fokuse fɛn bvu kenlɛɛma le enjim ben dvú ɛ́ ben etu bonfaw kɛ. Bvufee bvun nu bvù bii boŋkpwawcɛ bo wee wvu wum bô bo mwɛɛm mvù saake yî woŋ wvun e. Kɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu bvù bii boŋkpwawcɛ bo Klistu le kɛ.
51002009	Ben ekeè lɛ no Klistu to tuɛ wee wvu wum, nu ɛ fiɛɛ fì Nyo' nu fí ficii nu yî ye le.
51002010	Ben nu ɛ kɛŋkɛ wase mwɛɛm mvunciim no ben nu ɛ taashɛ ben ɛ bo Klistu. Ɛ̀ nu wvú ɛkolɛ ke mwɛɛm mvunciim mvù kɛŋke mvuŋgay saake le.
51002011	No ben ɛ bó to taashɛɛ nonɛn, ɛ wvú tfuse ben yew. Ɛ kɛ ntfuse yew wvun nu wvù bó tfuuse bô can seke bó ɛ sum kejewlɛɛ ke ye wee le kɛ. Wvuwvun nu wvù ɛ̀ gee Klistu keesum nyam yene ye kebefɛ.
51002012	Seke bó to lesɛɛ ben ɛ̂ joo nu ɛ bó to taashɛ ben ɛ bo Klistu dwey. Ɛ Nyo' kase bvuse tɛn ben nje fitele fì ben to lesɛɛ yî ye le lɛ wvú nulo ebvuse tɛn ben yî kpwe le bô mvuŋgay mvù wvú to bvusɛɛ Klistu dvú yî kpwe le.
51002013	Ben to shee nu ɛ ben ɛ kpwe wase ɛ̂ keyoy e nje bonci bo Nyo' le bò ben to ŋgoyte ɛ Klistu baa tfuse wase tɛn ben yew keesum mwɛɛm mvù nyam ye yene gomte le kɛ. Keseen, Nyo' nu ɛ ge wase ben ɛ kase ɛ tu dvú, ɛ taashɛ ben ɛ bo Klistu. Wvú nu ɛ lɛɛshɛ wase bibefɛ bisɛɛbeene bicii.
51002014	Wvú nu ɛ fiwsɛ wase mwɛɛm mvù to koole beene ɛ̂ Ŋwa' bonci le ɛ bó saaŋke ɛkumɛ beene. Wvú nu ɛ jo mwɛɛm mvudvu mvun ɛ tfuse yî Klistu le, bó ɛ mum ɛ ta wvú yî kentam e,
51002015	wvú ɛ mum ɛ ŋgoy mvuŋgay mvu mwɛɛm mvunciim mvù kɛŋke mvuŋgay saake le, ɛ bvuse mvú ya le, ɛ shoose, ɛ mum ɛ so mvú yî kentam e.
51002016	Nonɛn, fo ben ebvuu ebee ɛ́ wee mvu esaake ben ɛkumɛ mwɛɛm mvù ben diee kɛnɛɛ mvù ben wuu kɛnɛɛ lɛ ben baa egɛɛle boŋkaw, kɛnɛɛ ɛ̀ nu ŋkaw kpwee wvu fwɛ, kɛnɛɛ lɛ ben baa eshee mbam kɛ.
51002017	Bó to shee gee mwɛɛm mvun fwele ɛ mvú nu kɛ lo diɛwɛ kenjiŋjiŋ ke fiɛɛ fì to nu keeke to le, ɛ fiɛɛ fidvu kebɛɛ nu Klistu.
51002018	Fo ben ebee ɛ́ bonyii bomew esaake ben duu lɛ ben nu ɛ jay je kɛ. Bonyii ban nu bò duu lɛ ben ejoò bikuu binɛn ɛkuse no bó joo, duu lɛ ben ebunleè tɛn bonceendaa bo Nyo' le no bó bunlee. Bó duu lɛ bó kee mwɛɛm njefo bó yɛne mwɛɛm e ɛ̂ bifilɛ le. Ɛ bó bensee kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu ye yî mwɛɛm mvù too ɛfa jobo le, ɛ kenyi kedvu yaa nu kɛ.
51002019	Boba bonyii nu ɛ gawsɛn wase bô bo ɛkolɛ kè ɛ̀ nu Klistu. Klistu nu wvù nyaa mvuŋgay ɛ̂ ye ye ɛ yí sɛ kuu no Nyo' seyse lɛ yí ekuù. Beene nu ɛ taashɛ kɛ diɛwɛ no ye wee nu ɛ taashɛ yî biyuŋ bô boŋgeŋsee le ɛ sɛ no lemte lɛŋ.
51002020	No ben nu ɛ kpwe wase ben ɛ bo Klistu ɛ̂ keba ke mwɛɛm mvù saake yî woŋ wvun e, ɛ no nu nje la wvù ben bvuu cee kɛ diɛwɛ ben nu bonyii bo yî woŋ wvun e? Ben bvuu beŋe keebii ban bonci le nje la?
51002021	Bó nɛn'yi cew lo lɛ, “Fo wee ejicɛ fin fiɛɛ le kɛ. Fo wee emom fifi ɛmvu kɛ. Fo wee ekum fin e kɛ.”
51002022	Ɛ mwɛɛm mvun mvunciim nu ɛ bonyii gee ɛ mvú fele lo, ɛ bonci ban nu ɛ ɛ̀ gɛke bonyii bii bvufee bvubole.
51002023	Bonyii nɛn'yi no yɛne naa lɛ bvufee nu ɛ̂ bonci bodvu ban e, no bó gee lɛ bonyii ekeè keebunlee ɛ̂ je yi lɛŋ e, bô keeshiwse ɛkolɛ noo keenyɛwle bô ye. Geenɛn, ɛ mwɛɛm mvun yaa nulo eficɛ keebvuse wee ɛ̂ mwɛɛm mvù nyam ye ye shieele le kɛ.
51003001	No Nyo' to nu ɛ bvuse wase ben ɛ bo Klistu yî kpwe le, ben emum egomte mwɛɛm ɛ ɛ̀ nu mvu fowe fô Klistu nu ɛ Nyo' ɛ shike wvú ɛ̂ ɛbo kew ke ɛcɛɛy e.
51003002	Ben egɛɛ bvufee bvunɛn yî mwɛɛm mvu fowe le. Fo ben egɛɛ yî mvu fokuse le kɛ,
51003003	njefo ben to nu ɛ kpwe wase, ɛ nshii wene nu keseen ɛ Nyo' ɛ nyilɛ yî Klistu le wvù nu bô wvú.
51003004	Seke Klistu wvù nu nshii wene ɛ ke ɛ buynɛn bô bvukukɛ bwew, ɛ́ ben tɛn emum ebuynɛn ɛnte jo bvukukɛ bvudvu.
51003005	Fí ɛ mum ɛ no nu lɛ, ben elɛse lo mwɛɛm diɛwɛ mvun e mvù nyam ye shieele. Ɛ̀ nu keejaaŋke kenjaŋ bô keekpwawci mwɛɛm ɛkumɛ kenjaŋ, noo ye yì ŋɛyɛɛn, noo keeshieele keegee mwɛɛm mvù befe, noo keebvuushi ɛjisɛ yî mwɛɛm e. Wee wvù bvuushi ɛjisɛ yî mwɛɛm e nu ɛ mwɛɛm mvun ɛ tu wase nyo' mvu fô wvú le.
51003006	Ɛ̀ nu kfuu mvumvun mwɛɛm mvù nu ke ege ɛ́ Nyo' eton'yɛ shém elaŋ ŋgɛw yî bonyii bò gee mvú le.
51003007	Ɛ̀ to nu fwele ɛ ben gee kfuu mvumwɛ mwɛɛm seke ben to bɛɛ cee nce bii no nyam ye shieele.
51003008	Geenɛn keseen, ben kɛŋke keecinɛ mvú le mvunciim. Ben ecinɛ shém yì ton'yɛɛn bô mvuntelem mvù sɛsene noo mvuntelem mvù befe le. Fo wee ebeetè bô diee di wee le kɛ. Fo njeme wvù samte ebuytè diuw wee le kɛ.
51003009	Fo wee elɛɛlè waa bwee kɛ. Ben ekeè lɛ ben nu ɛ baa wase ye yi yvum bô gee diew,
51003010	ɛ jo wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu yi fiɛ. Yiyin nu ɛ Nyo' seysee sekecii kumene ɛ yí tuu diɛwɛ ye le, wvu lɛ ben elooci kee wvú.
51003011	Fofɛn nu ɛ wee mvu yaa bvuu nu jɛɛy fô mvu le kɛ. Kɛ wee mvu bvuu nu dvú lɛ ɛ̀ nu wee Juu ɛ mvu nu wee Glek kɛ. Kɛ wee mvu nu dvú lɛ bó nu ɛ tfuse yew ɛ mvu nu ntffuse kɛ. Kɛ wee mvu nu dvú lɛ ɛ̀ nu wvu ɛntfun kɛ. Ɛ kɛ wee mvu nu dvú lɛ ɛ̀ nu nyam yi ŋkpwaante kɛ. Kɛ wee mvu nu dvú lɛ ɛ̀ nu nfwa ɛ mvu nu waa yew kɛ. Klistu nu fiɛɛ ficii fô bó le, ɛ wvú nu yî bó le bocii.
51003012	No Nyo' nu ɛ caw wase ben, ben ɛ no nu bonyii bew, ɛ wvú kooŋke ben, ben emum ejo keŋge ke lɛŋ kè lɛ: wee ecamtè shen fô waa bwee le, geè mwɛɛm mvù jee fô bonyii le, shiwsè bikuu binɛn, nù wɛɛ, kuulè shém,
51003013	yaa kɛŋke fitele fì sɛsene kɛ. Ɛ́ wee cim ge naa la fí ɛ lucɛ wee, ɛ́ wvú lɛɛshɛ nya ɛ̂ wvú. No Tata nu ɛ lɛɛshɛ wase binɛn bibefɛ, ben tɛn elɛɛshì bi bonyii bomew e.
51003014	Ben dioo gee mwɛɛm mvun mvunciim, no tomyi keŋkoŋɛn fwe. Keŋkoŋɛn nu fiɛɛ fì taashi mwɛɛm mvunciim ɛ mvú sɛ nu yî fiɛɛ le fimwaaŋ.
51003015	Ben ecinɛ ɛ́ nyɛkeey wvù nɛn'yi fô Klistu le enu ɛ̂ mvuntelem mvunɛn e duŋci ben je. Nyɛkeey wvun nu naa wvù Nyo' to teŋɛɛ ben lɛ ben ekɛŋkè no ben nu ye yimiaaŋ. Ben enyaà tɛn keyoone ɛ̂ Nyo' sekecii.
51003016	Ben egɛɛ ɛ́ saaka wvu ɛkumɛ Klistu enù ɛ̂ mvuntelem mvunɛn e naa ntay, ɛ́ ben eyɛɛyi bvuu teete bikuu binɛn bô bvufee bvucii. Ben eyemtè benseè Nyo' bô njoŋ fô mvuntelem mvunɛn e bô boŋkiee bò buyte ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Mbense le noo boŋkiee bomew bo mbense le, noo bò Keyoy kew nyaa ɛ̂ bonyii.
51003017	Ben dioo gee fiɛɛ ficii fì ben gee, kɛnɛɛ ben jemyi lo, ɛ ben no gee diɛwɛ bonyii bo Tata Jisos e, nyaà keyoone ɛ̂ Nyo' Ice fele yî ye le.
51003018	Bokɛnɛ, ben enyaà bikuu binɛn ɛ̂ bole' bonɛn no bonyii bo Tata Jisos e ké no gee.
51003019	Bolemsɛ, ben ekooŋkè bokɛ' bonɛn. Fo ben eŋasene yî bó le kɛ.
51003020	Boom, ben eyuukè bobwee bonɛn bô bo'icee bonɛn e yî fiɛɛ ficii le. Ɛ́ ben gee nonɛn, ɛ́ fí ejee Tata le.
51003021	Bocee boom, fo ben egee mwɛɛm mvù mvuntelem mvu boom bonɛn e esaase kɛ. Ɛ́ ben gee lo, ɛ́ shem ekpwee bó.
51003022	Bonfaw ben eyuukè bonyii bò kɛŋke ben fokuse fɛn e yî fiɛɛ le ficii. Fo ben elemtè bó le kɛ seke jise dibole nu yî yene le keegee lɛ ye ejee bó kɛ. Geenɛn, ben elemtè bô fitele fimwaaŋ, fanè ɛ ɛ̀ nu Tata.
51003023	Wee dioo lemte fiɛɛ ficii fì wvú lemte, no lemte bô fitele fiew ficii lɛ wen lemte ɛ ɛ̀ nu Tata le ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu wee le kɛ.
51003024	Ben ekeè lɛ wee nu ke ekɛŋkɛ fiɛɛ fì bó nu ɛ seyse ɛ gɛɛ fì ɛ̀ nu mmawcɛ we ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ Tata. Ɛ̀ nu Tata Klistu wvù ben lemte wvú le.
51003025	Geenɛn, fô bonyii bò gee kebefɛ le nu ɛ Nyo' nu ke elaw bó yî kebefɛ kè bó gee le. Ben ekeè lɛ kɛ Nyo' ké no duŋci kejɛɛy jɛɛy ɛ̂ bonyii kɛ.
51004001	Ben bò kɛŋke bonfaw, ben egeè mwɛɛm bô bó ɛ ɛ̀ nu mvu lɛŋ bô mvù jee, ekumyì lɛ ben kɛŋke tɛn Cee Ɛkolɛ fowe.
51004002	Ben bocii ebunleè gɛne fwe yaa doose kɛ. Ben dioo bunlee no leesè bvufee yî dvú le, nyaà keyoone ɛ̂ Nyo'.
51004003	Ben ebunleè fô bese le tɛn lɛ Nyo' eyene kembuŋ fô diɛw ye le ɛ́ bese efewci diɛw yin yì ɛ̀ nu kenyilɛ ke ɛkumɛ Klistu kè me nu yî ncaw e nje kí.
51004004	Ben ebunleè lɛ me enlooci nfewci ɛ wvú yuule ntay no me ŋkɛŋke keenfewci.
51004005	Ben dioo nu ben ɛ bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ bo mbee le no gee mwɛɛm bô bvufee. Seke ben ɛ kɛŋke je keege fiɛɛ, ɛ ben mom lɛ fo kefew kedvu efey ɛcici kɛ.
51004006	Njeme wene sekecii enù wvù bonene, yeke diɛwɛ ŋkauw e, ɛ́ ben emum ekee keetfuuse fiɛɛ ɛ̂ wee tfuu ɛ̂ je yi lɛŋ e.
51004007	Tikikus nu esee fiɛɛ ficii fi ɛkumɛ me ɛ̂ ben. Wvú nu waa bwee wesebeene, nu tɛn fitele fisɛɛbeene. Bee bó lemte Tata le yî wee le mwaaŋ ɛ wvú nu wee lemme wvù lemte bô fitele fiew ficii.
51004008	Me ntumte wvú fô ben e bô shiee wvu lɛ wvú eto ege ɛ́ ben ekiɛɛ no bese nu, ebvuu eyvuwsɛ mvuntelem mvunɛn.
51004009	Me ntumte bô Onesimus wvù nu wee mvu wvu jo ben, ɛ wvú nu tɛn waa bwee wesebeene wvù nu fitele fisɛɛbeene ɛ wvú leeme yî fiɛɛ fì Klistu le tɛmyi. Bó nu ke esee ɛ̂ ben fiɛɛ ficii fì kooyi fɛn.
51004010	Alistakus wvù bee wvú nu fɛn yew ncaw e gayte ben e. Ɛ Maaku wvù waycee Banaban gayte tɛn ben e. Ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù ben nu ɛ kɛŋkɛ wase ntum ɛkumɛ wvú. Seke wvú ɛ to, ɛ ben fiisɛn wvú.
51004011	Jisos wvù bó teŋe lɛ Justus gayte tɛn ben e. Ɛ̀ mɛy kɛ bonyii bo botɛte ban bò ɛ̀ nu Bojuu bò bee bó lemte yî fiɛɛ le fimwaaŋ yî bvunfon bvu Nyo' le. Bó fici naa me baay, gee ɛ fitele fiem lɛɛtene.
51004012	Ɛbaflas wvù nu tɛn wee mvu wvu jo ben, wvù lemte Klistu Jisos e gayte tɛn ben e. Wvú dioo bunlee sekecii no kumyi ben naa baay, lɛke lɛ Nyo' ege ɛ́ ben eleemè tɛmyi diɛwɛ bonyii bò nu ɛ taw wase, looci kee fiɛɛ ficii fì Nyo' gomte le.
51004013	Me nu ɛ n'yɛn wase bô ɛjisɛ ɛyɛm lɛ wvú lemte fô ben e baay noo fô bonyii bo Lawdɛsia bô bo 'Iliabolis e.
51004014	Luka wvù cuuke bonyii wvù nu nsaa yɛm shém bô Dɛmas gayte tɛn ben e.
51004015	Ben egay boom bo bwee wesebeene le bo mbee le bo Lawdɛsia le, egay tɛn Nimfa bô kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le kè taashi ɛ̂ wvú yew e, enya ɛ̂ me.
51004016	Ben dioo ɛ taŋ ŋwa' wvun, ciinse ɛ̂ kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le ke Lawdɛsia ɛ bó taŋ tɛn, mum yɛn tɛn lɛ bó nu ɛ ciinse ŋwa' wvù nu ɛ̂ bó ben ɛ taŋ.
51004017	Ben egay ɛ̂ Alkibus lɛ wvú eyɛn lɛ wvú nu ɛ mɛse lemme dì Tata nu ɛ nya can ye le.
51004018	Wvun ŋgayma saaŋke me wvù Baul bô kebo kem. Ben ekumyì lɛ me nu yî ncaw e. Nyo' ebuw ben bô kembonɛn.
52001001	Ɛ̀ nu me wvù Baul, ɛ me nu bee Silas noo Timatio. Me nsaaŋke ŋwa' wvun fô kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le ke Tɛsalonika le kè nu ɛ taashɛ ɛ no nu yî Nyo' Ice bô Tata Jisos Klistu le. Mbuwma Nyo' bô nyɛkeey enù fô ben e.
52001002	Bese ké no nyaa keyoone ɛ̂ Nyo' sekecii ɛkumɛ ben bocii, bɛne ben sekecii ɛ̂ bunle yese le.
52001003	Seke bese nu ɛ̂ Nyo' Icee wesebeene fwe, bese ké no kumyi gee dinɛn dì buyte yî fitele fì ben lese yî Klistu le bô lemme dinɛn dì buyte yî keŋkoŋɛn kenɛn e noo shém yì ben kuule yî buyte yî ntaa wvù ben taale fwe yî Tata wesebeene wvù Jisos Klistu le.
52001004	Boom bo bwee wese le bò Nyo' kooŋke, bese kee lo lɛ Nyo' nu ɛ caw wase ben.
52001005	Bese kee nonɛn njefo kɛ saaka wvù jee wvù bese to toɛ dvú fô ben e to to kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô njeme maaŋ kɛ. Wvú to to tɛn bô mvuŋgay mvù nɛn'yi fô Keyoy ke Yuule le, ɛ bese looci kee lo lɛ saaka wvudvu nu kecɛɛy. Ben kee kfuu bonyii bò ɛ̀ to nu bese seke bese to cee ɛ̂ ben ɛntelɛŋ nje ben.
52001006	Ben to nu ɛ no beŋene bese noo Tata njefo ben to nu ɛ fiisɛn saaka wvudvu bô nlaŋlaŋ wvù nɛn'yi fô Keyoy ke Yuule le naa no ben cim to nu yî ŋgɛw wvu baay e.
52001007	Nonɛn ɛ ben mum tu bonyii bò bonyii bo mbee le bocii bo ɛ̂ keba kè Masedonia le noo kè Akɛya le ejoò kenfewsɛn fô bó le.
52001008	Me njemyi nɛn njefo kɛ ɛ̀ mɛy kɛ diɛw yì yi Tata yì nu ɛ san jo ben ɛ ghan keba kè Masedonia bô kè Akɛya le kɛ. Saaka wvu ɛkumɛ fitele finɛn fì ben lese yî Nyo' le nu ɛ ghan wase tɛn mondvuum e monciim. Nonɛn kɛ shiee bvuu nu dvú wvù bese ejemyi fiɛɛ ɛkumɛ fifiɛ kɛ.
52001009	Ben ekeè lɛ bonyii bodvu kebɛɛ nu ɛ no seŋe ɛkumɛ no ben to fiisɛnɛɛ bese ɛ̂ ben ɛntelɛŋ, noo no ben to cin'yɛɛ mvunyo' le tu wase ben ɛ bo Nyo' keelemte wase Nyo' wvu kecɛɛy wvù kɛŋke nshii le.
52001010	Bó seŋe tɛn no ben cɛyte Waa we wvù nu ke enɛ fowe eto le. Waa we wvun nu wvù wvú to bvusɛɛ yî kpwe le, ɛ ɛ̀ nu Jisos wvù bvuuse beene can shém Nyo' yì ffuuke yì wvú nu ke eduŋcɛ ɛ̂ bonyii le.
52002001	Boom bo bwee wese le, ben kebɛɛ kee lo lɛ kɛ ghane dì bese to laalɛɛ ɛ̂ ben e to nu ɛ la ɛcici kɛ.
52002002	Naa no ben kee lɛ bonyii to nu ɛ nya ŋgɛw ɛ̂ bese bvuu nvuwsɛ bese ɛ̂ kelaante kè Filibi le, nu ɛ bese to kuu kɛ shém ɛ̂ mvuŋgay mvu Nyo' wese le keefewcɛ saaka wvù jee wvù wvu Nyo' ɛ̂ ben naa no bonyii cim to cile bese naa baay nɛn.
52002003	Kɛ saaka wvù bese to fewci lɛke ben dvú to nu bô jay kɛ, ɛ kɛ bese to fewci bô ŋkpwawcɛ mvu wvù befe kɛnɛɛ gomte keelɛɛ lo ben kɛ.
52002004	Geenɛn no Nyo' nu ɛ yɛn lɛ bese nu ɛ kocɛn bonyii bò wvú enya saaka wvù jee wvun can yibole, nonɛn bese ɛ mum ɛ no fewci. Ɛ bese yaa fewci lɛ ye ejeè ɛ ɛ̀ nu bonyii kɛ. Bese fewci lɛ ye ejeè ɛ ɛ̀ nu Nyo' wvù taasse mvuntelem mvusɛse.
52002005	No ben kee nu ɛ bese to baa ke yuu wase etoo bô díɛw ken'yem kɛnɛɛ tɛw fiɛɛ fojise keedie fiɛɛ can yene le kɛ. Ɛ fin nu fiɛɛ ɛ Nyo' leeme fwe wese.
52002006	Kɛ bese to baa egomte keekɛŋkɛ mbense mvu ɛ̂ wee kɛnɛɛ wvù nɛn'yi fô ben e kɛnɛɛ fô bonyii bomew e kɛ. Naa ɛ ɛ̀ to nu bvudvuu bvusɛse diɛwɛ boom bo ntum e bo Klistu le keebiite mwɛɛm lɛ ben egeè fô bese le.
52002007	Bese to nu fisɛse nyɛkeey ɛ̂ ben ɛntelɛŋ diɛwɛ bwee wan wvù taale fô boom bew e.
52002008	Nonɛn ɛ bese mum jo ben ye le naa ntay bô keŋkoŋɛn, nya ben ɛ ɛ̀ yaa mɛy kɛ bô saaka wvù jee wvù wvu Nyo' maaŋ kɛ, geenɛn nya tɛn bikuu bisɛse ɛ̂ ben njefo ben to nu wa lo mvuntelem mvusɛse naa baay.
52002009	Boom bo bwee wese le, kɛ ben kumyi tɛn lemme disɛse bô njimtɛn wese. Bese to lemte ɛntaŋ bô ɛmvunsheeŋ wvu lɛ fo bese egɛɛ bvujitɛ yî wee mvu ben e no bese to fewci saaka wvù jee wvù wvu Nyo' ɛ̂ ben kɛ.
52002010	Ben kebɛɛ naa noo Nyo' nulo eben jim nsaw wese lɛ nce wese fô ben bonyii bo mbee le to nu wvù yuule nu teytey yaa kɛŋke nlom yimi kɛ.
52002011	Ben kee tɛn no bese to gee bô ben diɛwɛ no cee wan ké no gee bô boom bew.
52002012	Bese to yvuwse mvuntelem mvunɛn, lowci ben, tomsee lɛ ben eceè nce ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvù Nyo' gomte. Ɛ̀ nu Nyo' wvù teŋe ben lɛ ben eley bvunfon bwew bô bvukukɛ bwew e.
52002013	Bese shee kɛ tɛn nyaa keyoone ɛ̂ Nyo' nje fin fì lɛ seke bese to toɛ bô diɛw Nyo' fô ben e, ben to nu ɛ fiisɛn diɛw yidvu no yí looci nu lɛ ɛ̀ nu diɛw Nyo' ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu diɛw wee kɛ. Ɛ ɛ̀ nu yí yì lemte yî yene le, ben bò nu bonyii bo mbee le.
52002014	Ben kee boom bo bwee wese le lɛ fiɛɛ fì to kooyɛɛ bô bintaashɛ bi bonyii bo mbee le bi Nyo' le bì nu ɛ bee Klistu Jisos e ɛ̂ keba kè Judea le to nu ɛ kooy tɛn bô ben. Ben to nu ɛ yɛn tɛn boŋgɛw can bonyii bonɛn bo woŋ e lɛŋlɛŋ no bó to yɛnɛɛ can Bojuu bobole.
52002015	Bojuu ban nu bò to yuɛ Tata Jisos. Ɛ ɛ̀ nu bó bò to yuwyi bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le. Ɛ̀ nu bó bò to kuŋɛɛ bese jo bó. Bó gee nonɛn ɛ Nyo' yaa yuuke njoŋ bô bó kɛ. Bó bane lo bonyii bocii,
52002016	no bó baaŋke je fô bese le keejemyi ɛ̂ bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu wvu lɛ bó eboy e. Bó gee nonɛn sekecii ɛ bibefɛ bibole yiŋsene bene. Shém Nyo' yì ffuuke nu ɛ to wase yî bó le keseen.
52002017	Boom bo bwee wese le, no beene se gawsenɛɛ nu ɛ bese ɛ mom wase naa baay kɛŋke shiee lɛ bese bee eyɛn ben e ɛjise naa no ɛ̀ cim bɛɛ kɛ kefew caan no beene se gawsenɛɛ. Beene nu ɛ gawsɛn kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛjise. Beene baa gawsɛn ɛ̂ fitele le kɛ.
52002018	Bese gomte keekase eto ɛ̂ ben e. Me wvù Baul kebɛɛ nu ɛ mom wase naa bokaŋ e bokaŋ e, geenɛn ɛ Satan jewsee kɛ bese.
52002019	Bese kɛŋke shiee nonɛn njefo fiɛɛ fì ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bese etaale fwe yî dvú le, kɛnɛɛ bvujoŋkɛ bvusɛse bô kefo kesɛse ke bvunfon e kè bese nu ke esaale ye dvú fwe dvu Tata wesebeene wvù Jisos seke wvú ɛ kase ɛ to bvuu nu la? Kɛ ɛ̀ nu ben e?
52002020	Ɛ̀ nu naa ben bvuwee bvusɛse bô bvujoŋkɛ bvusɛse.
52003001	Nonɛn no bese to yɛnɛɛ lɛ fí nu ɛ ghaw wase, ɛ bese cu ntaŋ keeshɛɛ ɛjim Atɛn bese ɛmbeŋ,
52003002	mum tum Timatio wvù waa bwee wesebeene wvù bee bó lemte Nyo' le yî saaka wvù jee wvu ɛkumɛ Klistu le. Bese to tum lɛ wvú eto eleke ben yî mbee wene le ntay, ebvuu etefe ben,
52003003	lɛ fo boŋgɛw ban ke eshiw wee mvu ben e kɛ. Ben kebɛɛ kee lo lɛ boŋgɛw nu wase fiɛɛ fisɛɛbeene.
52003004	Ben kee lo lɛ seke bese to nu beene nu ɛ bese to see ɛ̂ ben ɛ ɛ̀ bɛɛ lo lɛ beene nu ke eyɛne boŋgɛw. Ɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ naa lɛŋlɛŋ no fí nu ɛ kooy wase ɛ ben kee.
52003005	Ɛ̀ nɛɛ fiɛɛ fì to geɛ ɛ me ŋke ndioo n'yɛn lɛ fí nu ɛ ghaw wase, ɛ me mum ntum Timatio keeŋkiɛɛ no mbee wene nu, njefo me nto ŋkɛŋke nfan lɛ ɛ̀ nɛlo enu ɛ wee wɛ wvù momte bonyii ɛ mom wase ben ɛ ge lemme dicii dì bese lem fô ben e ɛ tu di ɛcici.
52003006	Geenɛn keseen nu ɛ Timatio ɛ to wase ɛ̂ ben e ɛ kase ɛ tu jim fô bese le, ɛ see saaka wvù jee wvu ɛkumɛ fitele fì ben lese yî Klistu le bô no ben duŋci keŋkoŋɛn fô bonyii le. Wvú nu ɛ see tɛn no ben kumyi bese naa ntay bvuu kɛŋke shiee keeyɛn bese le no bese kɛŋke tɛn shiee keeyɛn ben e.
52003007	Nje fifin boom bo bwee wese le, yî nsase bô boŋgɛw bò bese kɛŋke le nu ɛ shém ɛ lɛɛtɛn bese ɛkumɛ ben baay nje fitele fì ben lese yî Klistu le.
52003008	Keseen nu ɛ bese ɛ yoy nje ben leeme kɛ tɛmyi ben ɛ bo Tata.
52003009	Nonɛn bese ɛ no nyaa keyoone ɛ̂ Nyo' baay nje ben. Bese nyaa keyoone ɛ̂ Nyo' nje njoŋ wvù bese yuuke fwe dvu wvú nje ben.
52003010	Bese bunlee shiee le ɛntaŋ bô ɛmvunsheeŋ lɛ ɛ̀ nɛlo ɛ́ bese ebvuu eyɛn ben e ɛjise wvu lɛ bese enya ben bô fiɛɛ fì bɛɛ fuute yî mbee wene le.
52003011	Bese bunlee lɛ Nyo' Icee wesebeene kebɛɛ bô Tata wesebeene wvù Jisos eyene je ɛ́ bese eto ɛ̂ ben e.
52003012	Bese bunlee tɛn lɛ Tata ege ɛ́ keŋkoŋɛn kenɛn eku egɛn fwe ɛ́ ben ekoŋenè bikuu binɛn bô bonyii bocii lɛŋlɛŋ no bese kooŋke ben.
52003013	Bese bunlee nonɛn wvu lɛ wvú ege ɛ́ mvuntelem mvunɛn etɛmyi, ɛ́ ben ke enu sɛ jay, yuule fwe dvu Nyo' Icee wesebeene seke Tata wesebeene wvù Jisos too bô ŋgoo ye yicii.
52004001	Keemɛɛse boom bo bwee wese le, bese lɛke ben kule lo can diɛwɛ bonyii bò nu ɛ taashɛ yî Tata Jisos e, lɛ no ben to yɛɛyɛɛ ɛ̂ bese no ben kɛŋke keecee no Nyo' kooŋke, ɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ naa wase no ben cee keseen, ben egeè kɛ nonɛn gɛne lo fwe fwe.
52004002	Ben kee wase bontefe bò bese to nyaɛ ɛ̂ ben ɛ̂ mvuŋgay mvu Tata Jisos e.
52004003	Fiɛɛ fì Nyo' kooŋke nu lɛ ben eceè diɛwɛ bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo Nyo' le. Fo ben ejaaŋkè kenjaŋ kɛ.
52004004	Wee mwaaŋ mwaaŋ ben e kɛŋke keekee keejici ye ye le ɛ̂ je yì yuule kɛŋke n'wvum e.
52004005	Fo ye wee enù kɛ lo yvuwse, ŋɛyte diɛwɛ yi wee ketum kè yaa kee kɛ Nyo' kɛ le.
52004006	Fo wee ege kebefɛ kɛnɛɛ ege jay mvu bô waa bwee yî saaka wvudvu wvun e kɛ. Bese to nu ɛ jeme wase ciise lo ɛ̂ ben ɛ ɛ̀ bɛɛ lo lɛ Tata nu ke elaŋ ŋgɛw yî bonyii bò gee mwɛɛm mvun mvunciim e.
52004007	Ben ekeè lɛ kɛ Nyo' to teŋe beene lɛ beene eceè ɛ ɛ̀ nu nce nnyɛn kɛ. Wvú to teŋe lɛ beene eceè nce wvù yuule.
52004008	Fí ɛ mum ɛ no nu lɛ naa yɛɛ wvù tun keeyuw ntefe wvun e nu ɛ kɛ wvú tun keeyuw ɛ ɛ̀ nu wee wvu wum e kɛ. Wvú tun keeyuw ɛ ɛ̀ nu Nyo' wvù nyaa Keyoy kew ke Yuule ɛ̂ ben e.
52004009	Fi ɛkumɛ keŋkoŋɛn kè ben ekɛŋkè fô boom bo bwee wene le bo mbee le nu ɛ kɛ shiee nu dvú fô ben e wvù bó ebvuu esaaŋke ɛkumɛ fifiɛ ɛ̂ ben kɛ. Fifin nu fiɛɛ ɛ ben kebɛɛ nu ɛ Nyo' to yɛɛyi wase ben no ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ ben ekoŋenè bikuu binɛn.
52004010	Yî kecɛɛy e, ben kooŋke naa wase boom bo bwee wene le bocii bo ɛ̂ keba kè Masedonia le. Geenɛn boom bo bwee wese le, bese bvuu teete kɛ ben lɛ ben egeè kɛ nonɛn gɛne lo fwe fwe.
52004011	Shiee wene baay enù ɛ ɛ̀ nu keecee nce wvu nyɛkeey, yaa leese kɛ diuw fô mwɛɛm mvu bonyii le kɛ. Ben elemtè bô can yene no bese to teetɛɛ ben.
52004012	Nonɛn ɛ́ bonyii bo ɛkfuŋ emum enyaa n'wvum ɛ̂ ben, ben saa ebvuu etaale wee mvu yî fiɛɛ le kɛ.
52004013	Boom bo bwee wese le, kɛ bese gomte lɛ ben enu kenjiwe le ɛkumɛ bonyii bò nu ɛ kpwekɛn wase kɛ. Bese gomte lɛ ben ekiɛɛ wvu lɛ fo ben enu yii yii diɛwɛ bonyii bò yaa taale kɛ fwe yî fiɛɛ le kɛ.
52004014	Beene nu ɛ bee lɛ Jisos to nu ɛ kpwe kase buy yî kpwe le, ɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no Nyo' nu ke ekase etfuse jim bonyii bò to kpwekene ɛ bó ɛ taashɛ bô bo Jisos, ɛ́ bó ke enu bô wvú.
52004015	Bese jemyi fin bii ɛ ɛ̀ nu diɛw Tata le, lɛ kɛ beene bò nu ɛ shɛɛ ɛjim bò nu ke ebɛɛ dvú yî kefew kè Tata nu ke etoo le nu ke esa fwe dvu bonyii bò nu ɛ kpwekɛn wase kɛ.
52004016	Ben ekeè lɛ Tata kebɛɛ nu ke enɛ fowe eshiile too wamte foweɛwe bô diɛw yì tɛmyi, ɛ ɛkolɛ ke bonceendaa bo Nyo' le fuuŋke tɛn, ɛ soŋ Nyo' jemyi. Ɛ́ bonyii bò to kpwekene ɛ bó ɛ taashɛ wase bô bo Klistu emum eyaw ebuy.
52004017	Nonɛn ɛ́ Nyo' emum ecun beene bò nu ɛ shɛɛ bò bɛɛ dvú noo bó ntaashɛ le ɛ̂ kembɛw e keegɛn etasɛn beene bo Tata ɛ̂ kebulɛ le. Ɛ́ beene bo Tata ke emum enu sekecii.
52004018	Nonɛn ben emum elɛɛsè fitele fi wee noo wee le bô njeme wvun.
52005001	Boom bo bwee wese le, ɛkumɛ kefew bô diuu di nto Tata le nu ɛ kɛ shiee nu dvú fô ben e wvù bó esaaŋkè fifiɛ ɛ̂ ben kɛ.
52005002	Ben kebɛɛ kee lo lɛ diuu di nto Tata le nu ke enu diɛwɛ di cooŋ e ɛntaŋ.
52005003	Bonyii nu ke edioo duu lɛ, “Nyɛkeey nu dvú, ɛ fiɛɛ fì wee efanè yaa nu kɛ”, ɛ́ ŋgɛw emum enɛ esɛsɛ egbwe yî bó le diɛwɛ no lume ke nɛ to yî kpwoon wvù nu bô fue le, je saa enu dvú keelewtɛ kɛ.
52005004	Geenɛn boom bo bwee wese le, kɛ ben nu finɛn kenjiwe le wvù diuu didvu ke enɛ esɛsɛ eto fô ben e diɛwɛ cooŋ e kɛ.
52005005	Me njemyi nɛn njefo ben bocii nu bonyii bo n'yuu le, nu bonyii bo ɛmvunsheeŋ. Kɛ beene nu bonyii bo ɛntaŋ kɛnɛɛ bo kenjiwe le kɛ.
52005006	Nonɛn fo beene eleetè no bonyii bomew leete kɛ. Beene enù we bô bvufee bvusɛɛbeene fó bvucii.
52005007	Bonyii bò leete ké no leete ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛntaŋ, ɛ bonyii bò mbvuum koole bó nu ɛ mó ké no koole ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛntaŋ.
52005008	Geenɛn no beene nu fisɛɛbeene ɛ ɛ̀ nu bonyii bo ɛmvunsheeŋ, beene emum enù bô bvufee bvusɛɛbeene fó bvucii. Beene ejo mbee bô keŋkoŋɛn ɛ́ mvú enù diɛwɛ ketwaa ke jem e ɛ beene ɛ jise ɛ baŋ gvúw yesebeene dvú, ejo tɛn mboyma wvù beene taale fwe yî dvú le ɛ́ wvú enù diɛwɛ kefo ke jem e ɛ beene ɛ bon.
52005009	Ben ekeè lɛ kɛ Nyo' to caw beene gɛɛ lɛ wen ke eduŋcɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu shém ye yì ffuuke ɛ̂ beene kɛ. Wvú to caw lɛ beene ke ekɛŋkɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu mboyma fele yî Tata wesebeene wvù Jisos Klistu le.
52005010	Jisos Klistu nu wvù to kpweɛ nje yese beene, wvu lɛ kɛnɛɛ beene nu dvú, kɛnɛɛ beene ɛ kpwekɛn, ɛ́ beene enu kɛ beene ɛ bó.
52005011	Nonɛn ben emum eyvuwsè mvuntelem mvu wee noo wee le, eyootè tɛn wee noo wee ɛ wvú kuu kɛ no ben gee wase.
52005012	Boom bo bwee wese le, bese lɛke lo ben lɛ ben ewvumtè bonyii bò lemte ɛ̂ ben ɛntelɛŋ taale fô ben e yî saaka Tata le bvuu teete ben e.
52005013	Ben eduŋcì n'wvum ɛ̂ bó naa ntay yî keŋkoŋɛn e nje lemme dibole. Ben ekɛŋkè tɛn nshii wvu nyɛkeey fô bikuu binɛn e.
52005014	Bese bvuu lɛke tɛn ben boom bo bwee wese le lɛ ben etefe bonyii bò nu laame kɛ lo, eyvuwsɛ mvuntelem mvu bonyii bò kɛŋke jaŋ e, eficɛ tɛn bonyii bò wɛɛyi. Ben ekuulè shém ben ɛ bonyii bocii.
52005015	Ben eyɛnè fo wee etfuusè kebefɛ bô kebefɛ. Ben egomtè sekecii keegee ɛ ɛ̀ nu mwɛɛm mvù jee fô bikuu binɛn e noo fô bonyii bocii le.
52005016	Ben elaŋlaŋè sekecii,
52005017	bunleè kefew kecii,
52005018	nyaà keyoone ɛ̂ Nyo' yî fiɛɛ ficii fì kooyi le. Fin nu fiɛɛ fì Nyo' shieele fô ben bò nu yî Klistu Jisos e.
52005019	Fo ben ecilè lemme di Keyoy ke Yuule le kɛ.
52005020	Fo ben emwaasè bontum bo Nyo' le bò bonyii teete kɛ.
52005021	Ben etaassè mwɛɛm mvunciim, joò mvù jee leeme yî dvú le,
52005022	ebvuusè can fô mwɛɛm mvù befe le mvunciim.
52005023	Me nlɛke lɛ Nyo' kebɛɛ wvù nu Nyo' kembonɛn eloocɛ ege ɛ́ ben eyuule yî fiɛɛ le ficii. Wvú egɛɛ keyoy kenɛn bô mvuntelem mvunɛn noo ye yene ɛ́ yí ke enu sɛ nlom kefew kè Tata wesebeene wvù Jisos Klistu nu ke eto le.
52005024	Wvú wvù Nyo' wvù to teŋɛɛ ben nu ɛ wvú ké no leeme kɛ yî diɛw ye le, ɛ wvú nu ke ege mwɛɛm mvudvu.
52005025	Boom bo bwee wese le, ben ebunleè fô bese le.
52005026	Ben egay boom bo bwee wesebeene le bocii eŋocɛ ɛ̂ ŋŋocɛ bonyii bo Nyo' le.
52005027	Me njemyi nciise lo ɛ̂ ben yî mvuŋgay mvu Tata le lɛ ben etaŋ ŋwa' wvun ɛ́ boom bo bwee wesebeene le bocii eyuw.
52005028	Tata wesebeene wvù Jisos Klistu ebuw ben bô kembonɛn kew ɛ́ kí enù ben ɛ bó.
53001001	Ɛ̀ nu me wvù Baul, ɛ me nu bee Silas noo Timatio. Me nsaaŋke ŋwa' wvun fô kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le ke Tɛsalonika le kè nu ɛ taashɛ ɛ no nu yî Nyo' Icee wesebeene bô Tata Jisos Klistu le.
53001002	Nyo' Icee wesebeene bô Tata Jisos Klistu ebuw ben bô kembonɛn ebvuu enya ben bô nyɛkeey.
53001003	Boom bo bwee wese le, bese kɛŋke keenyaa keyoone ɛ̂ Nyo' sekecii ɛkumɛ ben. Ɛ fí nu lɛŋ nonɛn, njefo mbee wene kuu kɛ gɛne lo fwe fwe, ɛ keŋkoŋɛn kè wee mwaaŋ mwaaŋ kɛŋke fô wee noo wee le gɛne kɛ lo tɛn fwe fwe.
53001004	Nonɛn, bese kebɛɛ ké no saale ye bô ben ɛ̂ bintaashɛ bi bonyii bo mbee le bi Nyo' le bimew e. Bese ké no saale ɛkumɛ no ben leeme tɛmyi bô ɛkumɛ no bonyii bone bikaa ɛ̂ ben ɛjim ɛ ben jici kɛ mbee wene le, noo ɛkumɛ boŋgɛw bò ben yɛne kuule kɛ shém e.
53001005	Fifin nu fiɛɛ fì duŋci lɛ Nyo' nu ke esaw bonyii ɛ̂ je yi teytey e, wvu lɛ ben ke enu ɛ ben ɛ kocɛn bonyii bo bvunfon bvu Nyo' le bvù ben yɛne boŋgɛw ban nje bvú le.
53001006	No Nyo' nu wee wvu teytey, wvú nu ke etfuse naa ŋgɛw wvù bonyii nyaa ɛ̂ ben bô ŋgɛw,
53001007	enya nlɛɛtɛn ɛ̂ ben bò yɛne ŋgɛw noo ɛ̂ bese tɛn. Fifin nu ke ekooy seke Tata Jisos nu ke ebuynɛn fowe etoo ɛ̂ leme di ŋguy e dì saasaa le. Wvú nu ke etoo nonɛn bô bonceendaa bew bò tɛmyi.
53001008	Wvú nu ke etfuse ɛnvukɛ ɛ̂ bonyii bò maa lo Nyo' noo bò baa bee saaka wvù jee wvu ɛkumɛ Tata Jisos e kɛ.
53001009	Bó nu ke elɛse bó ɛ́ bó ekɛŋke ŋgɛw wvù mɛy lo, ɛ́ bó egawsɛn bó bô bo Tata fo bó eto fwe dvu wvú noo fô bvukukɛ bwew bvu baay e.
53001010	Fifin nu ke ekooy ɛbvubwɛ bvù wvú nu ke eto wvu lɛ bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bew etumte moŋkum mew, ɛ́ bonyii bocii bò nu ɛ lese fitele yî ye le ekɛŋke lo ŋghaw bô wvú. Ɛ ben tɛn nu ke enu bó le njefo ben to nu ɛ bee saaka we wvù bese to jemyɛɛ ɛ̂ ben e.
53001011	Ɛ̀ nɛɛ fiɛɛ fì bese bunlee kɛ fô ben e sekecii lɛ Nyo' wese ege ɛ́ ben enù ɛ ben ɛ kocɛn kfuu bonyii bò wvú teŋe lɛ ben enù le. Bese bunlee tɛn lɛ wvú efi ben yî mvuŋgay mwew e, ɛ́ ben ege fiɛɛ fì jee ficii fì ben shieele noo lemme dicii dì ben gee nje fitele fì ben nu ɛ lese yî Klistu le.
53001012	Bese bunlee tɛn nonɛn wvu lɛ diee di Tata wesebeene wvù Jisos e, ekɛŋkè mbense ɛ̂ ben ɛntelɛŋ, ɛ ben tɛn kɛŋke mbense yî ye le. Fifin nu nje fitele fì jee fì Nyo' wesebeene bô Tata Jisos Klistu kɛŋke fô ben e.
53002001	Boom bo bwee wese le, fi ɛkumɛ nto Tata wesebeene wvù Jisos Klistu bô no beene nu ke etaashɛ keegɛn enu beene ɛ bó, nu ɛ me nlɛke lɛ,
53002002	fo ben ke enɛ ɛ́ bvufee emum ebvuŋ kɛ lo ben nɛn ncɛw, kɛnɛɛ enɛ emum etuwtene lɛ ben nu ɛ yuw njeme mvu lɛ wvú nɛn'yi fô Keyoy ke Yuule le, kɛnɛɛ lɛ bese nu ɛ jeme, kɛnɛɛ lɛ bese nu ɛ saŋ ŋwa' lɛ diuu di nto Tata le nu ɛ to wase kɛ.
53002003	Fo ben ecinɛ ɛ́ wee ke elɛɛ ben ɛ ɛ̀ cim nu naa ɛ̂ je yì nɛɛ le kɛ. Ben ekeè lɛ kɛ diuu di nto Tata le didvu nu ke ekocɛn sɛ kefew kiɛ kè bonyii nu ke enɛ ebewci bô bo Nyo' ɛ yaw wase ɛ to, noo sɛ wee wɛ wvù ŋgoyte nci Nyo' ɛ buynɛn tɛn kɛ. Ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù bó nu ke elɛse lo.
53002004	Ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù nu ke ebense ɛkolɛ kew emum ekicine lo fiɛɛ ficii fì bó teŋe lɛ nyo' kɛnɛɛ fì bó bunlee fí. Nonɛn, emum egɛn eley eshii yew ncese Nyo' le emum eteŋe ɛkolɛ kew lɛ ɛ̀ nu wen Nyo'.
53002005	Kɛ ben kumyi lɛ seke me nto nu beene, nu ɛ me nto nsee fiɛɛ fin ɛ̂ ben?
53002006	Ben kee wase keseen fiɛɛ fì jici wvú le wvu lɛ wvú ke ebuynɛn kɛ wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ kefew kè bó nu ɛ ŋgɛɛ ɛ̂ wvú le.
53002007	Ben ekeè lɛ mvuŋgay mwew mvù wvú ŋgoyte nci Nyo' dvú lemte wase keseen ɛjim ɛjim, ɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ lɛ wee wvù baaŋke mvú nu ke ebaaŋke kɛ nonɛn egɛn ebuy seke bó ke ecake wvú ɛ̂ je.
53002008	Bó nu ke dioo ɛ cake, ɛ́ wee wvù ŋgoyte nci Nyo' wɛ emum ebuynɛn, ɛ́ Tata Jisos emum efɛfe lo wvú bô keyoy ke ɛ̂ wvú ɛmvu, efiwsɛ lo bô nlawkɛn wvù wvú nu ke etoo dvú.
53002009	Wee wvudvu wvù ŋgoyte nci nu ke etoo ɛ̂ mvuŋgay mvu Satan e, kɛŋke mvuŋgay mvunciim, gee mwɛɛm mvù duŋci mvuŋgay mwew bô mwɛɛm mvu diuw wvù yumɛɛn e mvù ɛ̀ nu mvu kenlɛɛma le mvunciim.
53002010	Ɛ wvú nu ke etoo tɛn bô kfuu mwɛɛm mvù befe mvunciim keelɛɛle bonyii bò laa wase dvú. Ɛ bó laa njefo bó nu ɛ faŋ keekooŋke kecɛɛy wvu lɛ bó ke eboy.
53002011	No bó baa kooŋke kecɛɛy nonɛn, Nyo' ɛ mum ɛ ge bó ɛ no looci jeeŋke lo wvu lɛ bó ebeŋe kɛ wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì nu fi mbiay e.
53002012	Ɛ Nyo' to ge nonɛn wvu lɛ wen ke elese bó bocii yî ŋgɛw e bò baa bee kecɛɛy e, yuuke njoŋ keegee mwɛɛm ɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ mvù yaa nu kɛ teytey e.
53002013	Geenɛn boom bo bwee wese le bò Tata kooŋke naa ntay, bese kɛŋke kɛ keenyaa keyoone ɛ̂ Nyo' sekecii ɛkumɛ ben, njefo Nyo' to nu ɛ caw wase ben foŋkɛw keeke eboyse ben fele yî lemme dì Keyoy ke Yuule gee lɛ ben eyuule le, bô yî mbee wvù ben nu ɛ bee kecɛɛy e.
53002014	Wvú to teŋe ben yî fifin e fele yî saaka wvù jee wvù bese to fewci le, wvu lɛ ben ke ekɛŋkɛ fô bvukukɛ bvu Tata wesebeene wvù Jisos Klistu le.
53002015	Nonɛn boom bo bwee wese le, ben eleemè tɛmyi, jicì nce wvù bese to nyaɛ ɛ̂ ben e, kɛnɛɛ ɛ̀ nu wvù bese to yɛɛyɛɛ lo ben dvú bô diuw, kɛnɛɛ ɛ̀ nu wvù bese to saŋɛɛ lo ɛ̂ ben.
53002016	Bese lɛke lɛ Tata wesebeene wvù Jisos Klistu kebɛɛ noo Nyo' Icee wesebeene wvù to koŋɛɛ beene no lɛɛse shém yesebeene sekecii sɛ ŋka, ebvuu enya beene bô fiɛɛ fì jee fì beene taale fwe yî dvú le nje fitele fiew fì jee.
53002017	Wvú eyvuwsɛ mvuntelem mvunɛn, ege ɛ́ mvú etɛmyi yî lemme dì jee le dicii dì ben gee bô yî fiɛɛ ficii fì ben jemyi le.
53003001	Keemɛɛse, boom bo bwee wese le, ben ebunleè tɛn fô bese le. Ben ebunleè lɛ diɛw Tata elewtè gɛne lo fwe ɛ bonyii wvumte diɛw yidvu kɛ no ben to geɛ.
53003002	Ben ebunleè tɛn lɛ bese ke eboy can bonyii bò kɛŋke mvuntelem mvù befe gee mwɛɛm mvù befe le, njefo kɛ ɛ̀ nu bonyii bocii bò kɛŋke mbee kɛ.
53003003	Geenɛn Tata ké no leeme kɛ yî diɛw ye le. Wvú nu ke enya ben bô mvuŋgay, ebvuu egemgeme ben fo ben ke eley can wee kebefɛ le.
53003004	Bese nu ɛ gɛɛ bvufee bvusɛse yî Tata le ɛkumɛ ben lɛ ben gee wase fiɛɛ fì bese gayte, ɛ ben nu ke emɛy kɛ egee.
53003005	Bese lɛke lɛ Tata eleke mvuntelem mvunɛn ɛ́ mvú enu yî keŋkoŋɛn kè ke Nyo' le ebvuu ege ɛ́ ben ekuulè shém no Klistu to kule.
53003006	Boom bo bwee wese le, bese gayte lo ɛ̂ ben ɛ̂ diee di Tata wesebeene wvù Jisos Klistu le lɛ, ben enjɛmkesè ye ben ɛ boom bo bwee wesebeene le bò laame kɛ lo yaa cee kɛ bii nce wvù bese to duŋcɛɛ ɛ̂ ben e kɛ.
53003007	Me njemyi nɛn, njefo ben kebɛɛ kee no ben kɛŋke keebeŋene bese. Kɛ bese to ké no laame seke bese to nu beene kɛ.
53003008	Kɛ bese to diee fiɛɛ fi wee le sɛ bese ɛ law kɛ. Bese to lemte jimtene ɛntaŋ bô ɛmvunsheeŋ wvu lɛ fo bese ke egɛɛ bvujitɛ yî wee mvu ben e kɛ.
53003009	Kɛ bese to gee nonɛn lɛ kɛ ɛ̀ nu bvudvuu bvusɛse keebiite mwɛɛm ɛ̂ ben kɛ. Ɛ̀ to nu wvu lɛ bese eduŋcì yî gee disɛse le wvu lɛ ben ebeŋenè bese.
53003010	Ben ekeè lɛ naa seke bese to nu beene nu ɛ bese to nya nci wvun ɛ̂ ben lɛ, “Ɛ́ wee nu lɛ kɛ wen nu elemtè, fo bó enya wvú bô fiɛɛ fidien kɛ.”
53003011	Me njemyi nɛn njefo bese yuuke lɛ ben bomew shee laame kɛ lo yaa lemte kɛ, lɛne kɛ lo leese dew fô mwɛɛm mvu bonyii bomew e.
53003012	Boba bonyii nu ɛ bese gayte bvuu ciise lo ɛ̂ bó ɛ̂ diee di Tata Jisos Klistu le lɛ bó eshii fokuse elemtè keekɛŋke fiɛɛ fì bó edieè.
53003013	Fô ben e, boom bo bwee wese le, fo ben ke ewɛle keegee gee dì jee kɛ.
53003014	Ɛ́ wee tun keeyuw fiɛɛ fì bese jemyi ɛ̂ ŋwa' wvun e, ɛ́ ben ciise wvú. Fo ben ebvuu ekɛŋke lo fiɛɛ keege bô wvuwɛ wee kɛ, wvu lɛ wvú ewuumɛn.
53003015	Geenɛn, fo ben ejoò wvú diɛwɛ wee bvuban e kɛ. Ben etefe lo wvú diɛwɛ waa bwee wene le.
53003016	Tata wvù nu wvu nyɛkeey enyaà ben bô nyɛkeey sekecii ɛ̂ jé le yicii. Tata enù ben ɛ bó bocii.
53003017	Me wvù Baul nsaaŋke ŋgayma wvun bô kebo kem. Fin nu nciise wɛm wvù me ŋgee ɛ̂ boŋwa' bem e bocii. Ɛ ɛ̀ nu no me ŋké no nsaaŋke.
53003018	Tata wesebeene wvù Jisos Klistu ebuw ben bocii bô kembonɛn kew ɛ́ kí enù ben ɛ bó.
54001001	Ɛ̀ nu me wvù Baul, ɛ me nu waa ntum Klistu Jisos no Nyo' wvù Mboyse wesebeene bô Klistu Jisos wvù beene gɛke bvufee yî ye le to gayɛɛ lɛ me enù.
54001002	Me nsaaŋke ŋwa' wvun fô wo le Timatio wvù ɛ̀ nu waa wɛm wvu kecɛɛy yî mbee le. Nyo' Ice bô Klistu Jisos wvù Tata wesebeene ebuw wo, ecam shen fô wo le, enya wo bô nyɛkeey.
54001003	No me nto ŋgayɛɛ ɛ̂ wo seke me nto ŋgɛne Masedonia lɛ wo eshɛɛ enù Ɛfɛsus, nu ɛ me mbvuu ŋgayte lɛ wo enù kɛ jó wvu lɛ wo ecilè bonyii ba bò yɛɛyi kfuu n'yɛɛyi mvu wvu jɛɛy.
54001004	Ɛ̀ cilè tɛn lɛ fo bó ejoò kefew kebole jewsee yî mvumaŋgaan e noo yî ɛdiee ɛ bo'icee dikfuu di bonyii le yò bó ké no taaŋke gɛne dvú sɛ yó kaa lo ŋkuuŋ. Mvumvun nu mwɛɛm mvù too kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô bombew, ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu kɛ bô ntaŋ wvù wvu Nyo' wvù bii mbee le kɛ.
54001005	Shiee ntefe wvun nu keege lɛ bonyii ekɛŋkè keŋkoŋɛn kè nɛn'yi fô mvuntelem mvù yuule le bô kè nɛn'yi fô mvuntelem mvù wee gee fiɛɛ ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu fì fitele esaake wvú le noo kè nɛn'yi fô fitele fi kecɛɛy fì wee lese yî Nyo' le.
54001006	Bonyii bomew nu ɛ cinɛ wase yiyin je le ɛ no bvuyte gɛne wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî bonjeme bo ɛcici le.
54001007	Bó gomte keenu bonyii bò yɛɛyi bonyii bô bonci bo Nyo' le, geenɛn yaa cim kee naa fiɛɛ fì bó jemyi ɛkumɛ fí kɛnɛɛ kenyi ke fiɛɛ fì bó tɛɛncine yî dvú le sɛ nfan e kɛ.
54001008	Beene kee lɛ nci Nyo' nu fiɛɛ fì jee fɛn ɛ́ wee joo nci wvudvu ɛ̂ je yi lɛŋ no wvú kɛŋke keejoo le.
54001009	Beene kee tɛn lɛ nci nu ɛ bó yaa to gɛke fô bonyii bò nu teytey e kɛ. Bó to gɛke ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô bonyii bò ŋgoyte bonci le bô bò tɛmyi bikuu le, noo bò maa lo Nyo' le, noo bò gee bibefɛ le, noo bò yaa yuule kɛ le, noo bò beete bô diee di Nyo' le, noo bò yuwyi bo'icee bobole noo bobwee bobole, noo bò yuwyi bonyii bomew e.
54001010	Ɛ̀ nu tɛn fô bokɛnɛ bô bolemsɛ bò jaaŋke kenjaŋ e, noo fô bolemsɛ bò jiime fô bomew e. Ɛ̀ nu tɛn fô bonyii bò cooŋke bonyii gɛne bô bó le, noo fô bò mbiayte mbiay e, noo bò kane keesee kecɛɛy kane mbiayte lo le. Ɛ ɛ̀ nu tɛn fô bò gee naa la fì yaa bii kɛ n'yɛɛyi wvu lɛŋ e.
54001011	N'yɛɛyi wvun bii saaka wvù jee wvù kuuke wvù ɛ̀ nu wvu Nyo' wvù bó bensee le, ɛ saaka wvudvu nu wvù bó to nyaɛ can yɛm e.
54001012	Me nyaa keyoone ɛ̂ Klistu Jisos wvù Tata wesebeene wvù nu ɛ nya me mvuŋgay keelemte lemme diew dì wvú to jiŋyɛɛ me yɛn lɛ me nu ɛ ŋkocɛn, mum baa me lɛ me enlemte le.
54001013	Naa no me ncim nto nu fwele njemyi díɛw yì befe ɛkumɛ wvú, mbone bikaa ɛ̂ wvú ɛjim, nan'yi wvú, geenɛn ɛ wvú cam kɛ shen fô me le, njefo me nto ŋgee kenjiwe le n'yaa ŋkɛŋke wase mbee kɛ.
54001014	Tata to nu ɛ tfuw lo mbuwma we keŋkoŋɛn yî yɛm e, ge ɛ me no ŋkɛŋke mbee bô keŋkoŋɛn no wee wvù nu ɛ taashɛ bô Klistu Jisos ké no kɛŋke.
54001015	Njeme wvù lɛ Klistu Jisos to to yî nshɛ le keeboyse bonyii bò befe nu naa kecɛɛy, ɛ ɛ̀ nu njeme wvù nu ɛ kocɛn wvù wee ebee wvú le sɛ kemaŋɛn. Me kebɛɛ nto nu naa lo nfon bonyii bò befe.
54001016	Geenɛn, ɛ Tata ke cam shen fô me le, wvu lɛ Jisos Klistu eduŋcɛ yî yɛm e, me wvù nu nfon bonyii bò befe, shém ye yì wvú kuule gɛne mɛɛse bô bonyii. Ɛ me nto nu nonɛn diɛwɛ kenfewsɛn e fô bonyii bò nu ke ebee wvú le ke ekɛŋkɛ nshii wvù mɛy lo le.
54001017	Nyo' nu Nfon wvu bvuyvuum e sɛ ŋka, ɛ kɛ wvù yaa nulo ekpwe kɛ, ɛ kɛ bó nulo eyɛn wvú le kɛ. Ɛ̀ mɛy kɛ wvú maaŋ wvù ɛ̀ nu Nyo'. Beene etumtè moŋkum mew, nyaà n'wvum ɛ̂ wvú sekecii sɛ ŋka. Fí enù nonɛn.
54001018	Timatio waa wɛm, me nyaa lemme di fiɛɛ fì me njeme fin e can yo le, ɛ fí bii ɛ ɛ̀ nu mwɛɛm mvù bonyii to jemyɛɛ wase ɛkumɛ wo diɛwɛ bonyii bò teete bontum bo Nyo' le, wvu lɛ mvú ke efi wo ɛ́ wo etum jem yì jee.
54001019	Ɛ̀ leemè kɛ yî fitele fì wo lese yî Klistu le, eyekè fiɛɛ fì fitele fiuw jemyi ɛ̂ wo ntay. Bonyii bomew nu ɛ cinɛ wase keeyeke fiɛɛ fì fitele fibole jemyi ɛ̂ bó, ɛ mum ɛ gbwe yî mbee wvubole diɛwɛ ŋguw wvu ɛ̂ joo fò wvú ɛ bvuŋ e.
54001020	Ŋgoo bó le nu 'Imenayus bô Alɛksanda. Me nu ɛ nya wase boban can Satan e, wvu lɛ bó ekɛŋkɛ bvufee, elu bô diee di Nyo' le dì bó beete dvú.
54002001	Fiɛɛ fi fwe fì me nlɛke nu lɛ, bonyii bo Nyo' le ebunleè fô bonyii le bocii. Bó ebunleè beelè fô Nyo' le bvuu lɛkè Nyo' fô bonyii bomew e, nyaà tɛn keyoone ɛ̂ wvú.
54002002	Bó ebunleè fô bonfon e, bô fô bonyii le bocii bò nu yî bintaw bi baay baay e. Bó ebunleè nonɛn wvu lɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ beene eceè nce kenlɛɛtɛn bô wvu nyɛkeey noo wvu bonyii bo Nyo' le noo wvù kɛŋke n'wvum.
54002003	Keebunlee nonɛn nu fiɛɛ fì jee, ɛ fí ɛ kocɛn ɛjise jo Nyo' wvù Mboyse wesebeene,
54002004	wvù shieele lɛ wee tfuu ke eboy noo lɛ wee tfuu ekeè kecɛɛy e.
54002005	Nyo' nu kɛ mwaaŋ maaŋ, ɛ wee wvù nu ɛntelɛŋ jo Nyo' bô bonyii nu kɛ tɛn mwaaŋ. Ɛ wee wvun nu Klistu Jisos.
54002006	Ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù to nyaɛ ɛkolɛ kew keesum bonyii bocii yî ŋgɛw e. Fifin nu fiɛɛ fì Nyo' to duŋcɛɛ seke kefew ke lɛŋ to kocɛnɛɛ.
54002007	Ɛ̀ nɛɛ fiɛɛ fì Nyo' to balɛɛ me lɛ me enù wee nfewcɛ noo waa ntum Jisos bô lɛ me enù wee n'yɛɛyi bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu keen'yɛɛyi bó ɛ́ bó elese fitele yî Klistu le, eyɛɛyi tɛn bó bô kecɛɛy. Kɛ fiɛɛ fì me njemyi fin nu ɛ me mbiayte lo kɛ. Me njemyi ɛ ɛ̀ nu kecɛɛy.
54002008	Me ɛ mum ɛ no nshieele lɛ bolemsɛ ebunleè mondvuum e monciim, cawse ɛ ɛ̀ nu can yì yuule we yaa ton'yi shém kɛnɛɛ cɛwkene kɛ.
54002009	Me nshieele tɛn lɛ bokɛnɛ ejiisè ndvú ɛ̂ je yi lɛŋ e yì duŋci n'wvum e, noo ɛ̂ yì bonyii yɛne lɛ ɛ̀ nu yi lɛŋ e. Fo bó etuwcì bikuu kɛnɛɛ leese mwɛɛm mvù bó kene bô ketwaa ke bigew e kè yɛɛle kɛnɛɛ ɛjisɛ ɛ baŋ, kɛnɛɛ ndvú yi kenlum e kɛ.
54002010	Bó esuutè ye yibo ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô gee dì jee diɛwɛ bokɛnɛ bò nu ɛ kocɛn keebunlee Nyo' le.
54002011	Kpwoon kɛŋke keenya ɛkolɛ kew keeyeke lo n'yɛɛyi, nu diuw tfu.
54002012	Me mbaa nya je lɛ kpwoon eyɛɛyì bolemsɛ kɛnɛɛ ekɛŋke mvuŋgay ɛ̂ we jo bolemsɛ kɛ. Wvú kɛŋke keenu diuw tfu.
54002013	Fí nu nonɛn njefo ɛ̀ nu Adam wvù Nyo' to yawɛɛ bom, sɛ bom Iff.
54002014	Ɛ kɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu Adam wvù Satan to lɛlɛɛ kɛ. Ɛ̀ nu kpwoon wvù bó to lɛlɛɛ ɛ wvú ŋgoy nci Nyo'.
54002015	Naa no fí cim nu nonɛn, nu ɛ Nyo' nu ke eboyse kpwoon fele yî boom bò wvú boote le, fɛn ɛ́ wvú ɛ mɛy ɛ no leeme yî fitele fì wvú lese yî Nyo' le, kɛŋke keŋkoŋɛn, cee nce wvù yuule noo wvù kɛŋke n'wvum e.
54003001	Njeme mvu nu dvú ɛ wvú nu naa lo kecɛɛy. Njeme wvun nu lɛ: Ɛ́ wee shieele kentaw keenu cee ɛkolɛ ke kentaashɛ le, tu wvú shieele lemme ɛ ɛ̀ nu dì jee.
54003002	Cee ɛkolɛ kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le kɛŋke keenu wee wvù yaa kɛŋke fiɛɛ fì bó ebaci wvú yî dvú le kɛ. Wvú kɛŋke keenu dwee kpwoon mwaaŋ, yaa gee mwɛɛm kenduun e kɛ, kpwawci mwɛɛm ntay, kɛŋke n'wvum, fiisene bonyii bo ghane le, kee keeyɛɛyi bonyii.
54003003	Wvú kɛŋke keenu wee wvù yaa wuu kɛ mbvuum ɛ mó koole kɛ. Wvú kɛŋke keenu nyɛkeey bô bonyii yaa cɛwkene kɛ, yaa waale waa kɛ, yaa kɛŋke shiee yî bigew e kɛ.
54003004	Wvú kɛŋke keenu wee wvù kee keetaa fô yew ye le ntay, gee ɛ boom bew yuuke wvú le yî fiɛɛ le ficii, wvumte wvú.
54003005	Ɛ́ wee nu sɛ wvú kee keetaa fô ye yew e ntay, ɛ́ wvú ke eghan nɛɛ sɛ keetaa fô kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le ke Nyo' le?
54003006	Kɛ wvú kɛŋke keenu wee wvù bɛɛ baŋke lo ɛ̀ no nu wee mbee kɛ. Ɛ́ wvú nu wvuwɛ wee, ɛ́ wvú ke enɛ sekemew emum ebensee ye, ke enɛ eley ŋgɛw diɛwɛ wvu dɛwle le.
54003007	Wvú kɛŋke tɛn keenu wee wvù bonyii bo ɛkfuŋ yɛne tɛn lɛ ɛ̀ nu wee wvu lɛŋ. Ɛfuw kɛ nonɛn, ɛ́ wvú ke enɛ ejo ɛ̂ ketam ke dɛwle le eshoose ɛkolɛ kew.
54003008	Bonyii bò fici gee dilemme ɛ̂ kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le ɛnte kɛŋke tɛn keenu bò kɛŋke keŋge ke lɛŋ. Kɛ bó kɛŋke keejemyi díɛw fiɛɛ kɛ, yaa nu bò nu ɛ nya bikuu bibole ɛ̂ mbvuum kɛ, yaa nu bonyii bò kuuŋke kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu sɛw kɛ.
54003009	Bó kɛŋke keejicì kenyilɛ ke fiɛɛ fì Nyo' nu ɛ duŋcɛ wase ɛ̂ beene ɛkumɛ mbee le, leeme yî dvú le ɛ fiɛɛ yaa saake bó fô fitele le kɛ.
54003010	Ɛ́ bo sɛ gɛɛ bó yî lemme le, nu ɛ bó kɛŋke keeyaw emom bó. Ɛ́ bó dioo ɛ duŋcɛ lɛ kɛ bó kɛŋke jay kɛ, ɛ́ bó emum egɛɛ bó ɛ́ bó elemte diɛwɛ bonyii bò fici gee dilemme ɛ̂ kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le ɛnte.
54003011	Bokɛ' bobole kɛŋke tɛn keenu bò kɛŋke keŋge ke lɛŋ, yaa kunsene mvuŋkunsɛn kɛ. Kɛ bó kɛŋke keegeè mwɛɛm kenduun e kɛ. Bó kɛŋke tɛn keeleemè yî kecɛɛy e yî fiɛɛ le ficii.
54003012	Wee wvù fici lemte lemme ɛ̂ kentaashɛ ɛnte kɛŋke keenu dwee kpwoon mwaaŋ. Ɛ wvú kɛŋke tɛn keekee keetaa fô boom bew bô fô yew ye le ntay.
54003013	Bonyii bò fici lemte ɛ̂ kentaashɛ ɛnte ké lemte ntay, kɛŋkɛ diee di baay fô bikuu bibole, no nu tɛn sɛ nfan ɛkumɛ fitele fì bó lese yî Klistu Jisos e.
54003014	Me n'yɛne lɛ ɛ̀ shɛɛte wase caan ɛ́ me ento en'yɛn wo le. Geenɛn ɛ me saaŋke mwɛɛm mvun fô wo le wvu lɛ,
54003015	ɛ́ me nɛ lo ɛ̀ no ndvuyte, ɛ́ wo ekee no bonyii kɛŋke keegee mwɛɛm ɛnte jo yew yì yi Nyo' yì ɛ̀ nu kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le bo Nyo' wvù kɛŋke nshii le. Kentaashɛ kin nu kfuy bô kenffuy kè jici kecɛɛy e.
54003016	Fiɛɛ nu dvú ɛ fí kuuke naa baay. Ɛ fiɛɛ fin nu fì to shee nu ɛ̂ kenyilɛ le ɛkumɛ mbee wesebeene wvù beene jemyi, ɛ Nyo' ɛ ge wase beene ɛ kiɛɛ. Fiɛɛ fin nu lɛ: Wvú to nu ɛ duŋcɛ ɛkolɛ kew yî nyam ye wee wvu wum e. Keyoy ke Yuule to nu ɛ bɛnse wvú. Bonceendaa bo Nyo' le to nu ɛ yɛn wvú le. Bó to nu ɛ fewcɛ ɛkumɛ wvú ɛ̂ bitum bicii. Bonyii to nu ɛ lese fitele yî ye le woŋ tfuu. Bó to nu ɛ jo wvú ɛ wvú ben we ley bvukukɛ le.
54004001	Keyoy ke Yuule jemyi lo teytey lɛ ɛ̀ nu ke enu kefew kemew e, ɛ́ bonyii bomew ecinɛ mbee le eyuuke wase mwɛɛm ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ biyoy bì lɛɛle bonyii noo bon'yɛɛyi bo bonceendaa bo dɛwle le.
54004002	Ɛ bon'yɛɛyi ban nu ke etoo can bonyii bò ghane buwsee bonyii mbiayte mbiay, ɛ mvuntelem mvubole ɛ cife wase kɛ diɛwɛ bó ton ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô kento.
54004003	Bó nu ke ekane lɛ fo bonyii etaashì bvujen, bô lɛ fo wee edieè kfuu mwɛɛm mvumew kɛ. Ɛ mwɛɛm mvun nu ɛ Nyo' to fɛ lɛ bonyii edieè, ɛ bonyii bò kɛŋke mbee bvuu kee kecɛɛy dioo diee no nyaa keyoone ɛ̂ Nyo'.
54004004	Fiɛɛ ficii fì Nyo' to fɛlɛɛ nu ɛ fí jee, ɛ fimew yaa nu dvú fì wee etune ɛ́ wvú fɛn ɛ fiisɛn bô keyoone ɛ̂ Nyo' kɛ,
54004005	njefo njeme wvù wvu Nyo' bô bunle nu ɛ ge wase fí ɛ no yuule.
54004006	Ɛ́ wo duŋci mwɛɛm mvun ɛ̂ boom bo bwee wesebeene le, ɛ́ wo enù wee lemme wvu Klistu Jisos wvù jee wvù nu ɛ bó ɛ kuuse bô diɛw Nyo' yì nu ɛkumɛ mbee bô n'yɛɛyi wvù jee wvù wo bii wvú le.
54004007	Fo wo ekɛŋke naa lo fiɛɛ keege bô mvumaŋgaan mvu ɛcici mvù nu sɛ mvú kɛŋke fiɛɛ keege bô Nyo' kɛ. Yɛɛyɛ ɛkolɛ kuw keecee nce ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvù Nyo' gomte.
54004008	Keedvumte ndvum yaci ye kɛŋke kɛ sɛw fô wee le. Geenɛn ɛ keecee ɛ ɛ̀ nu nce wvù Nyo' gomte kɛŋke sɛw fô wee le ɛ̂ jé le yicii, njefo fifin kɛŋke sɛw yî nshii wvu keseen e, bvuu kɛŋke yî nshii wvù too le.
54004009	Njeme wvun nu naa kecɛɛy, ɛ ɛ̀ nu njeme wvù nu ɛ kocɛn wvù wee ebee wvú le sɛ kemaŋɛn.
54004010	Ɛ̀ nɛɛ fiɛɛ fì bese famte ɛdien yî lemme din e njefo bese nu ɛ leke bvufee bvusɛse bvucii yî Nyo' wvù kɛŋke nshii le. Nyo' nu Mboyse bonyii bocii, ɛfey mvunciim bonyii bò nu ɛ bee wvú le.
54004011	Ɛ̀ yɛɛyì bonyii bô mwɛɛm mvun gayte ɛ bó gee mvú.
54004012	Fo wo ecinɛ ɛ́ wee ejoò wo ɛkuse lɛ njefo wo bɛɛ wan caan kɛ. Ɛ̀ nù kenfewsɛn fô bonyii bo mbee le ɛ̂ je yì wo jemyi jó bô yî nce wo le, noo keŋkoŋɛn kè wo kɛŋke le, noo fitele fì wo lese yî Nyo' le, noo je yì wo gɛɛle ye yo jó ɛ yí yuule le.
54004013	Nya ɛkolɛ kuw keetaaŋke Ŋwa' Nyo' ɛ̂ bonyii ya le, ebvuu efewci diɛw Nyo', eyɛɛyi tɛn bó egɛn ebuy seke me ŋke ento.
54004014	Fo wo elaŋ nnya yo kɛ. Nnya yin nu yì bó to nyaɛ ɛ̂ wo seke ŋgoo bocee bikuu bi kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le to gɛɛlɛɛ can yibo yî yo le jemyi ɛ̂ wo we diɛwɛ bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le.
54004015	Nya ɛkolɛ kuw ɛ̂ mwɛɛm mvun, egeè mvú mvunciim ɛ bonyii bocii yɛne ŋgɛnfwe wo le.
54004016	Ɛ̀ yɛnè bô ɛkolɛ kuw noo bô n'yɛɛyi wo. Ɛ̀ jici dvú ntay wvu lɛ no wo gee nonɛn, ɛ́ wo ke eboyse ɛkolɛ kuw, eboyse tɛn noo bonyii bò yuuke fiɛɛ fì wo jemyi.
54005001	Fo wo ke dioo jemyi fiɛɛ ɛ̂ wee wvu ŋgaywee no wamene lo wvú kɛ. Geenɛn tefe lo wvú kɛ diɛwɛ ico le. Ɛ̀ joò cubonyii diɛwɛ boom bo bwoo le.
54005002	Ɛ̀ joò tɛn bokɛnɛ bo ŋgaybonyii diɛwɛ bobwoo le, ejoò ŋgon bokɛnɛ diɛwɛ jɛ́me yo le, etaalè bó ɛ̂ je yì yuule le.
54005003	Ɛ̀ taalè fô bokɛ' bo boŋkfu le bò ɛ̀ looci nu bò yaa kɛŋke kɛ wee wvù taale fô bó le kɛ.
54005004	Geenɛn, ɛ́ kpwɛɛ ŋkfu kɛŋke boom, kɛnɛɛ boom bo boom e, ɛ́ wo cinɛ ɛ bó yaw yɛɛyi keegee lemme dibole di mbee le, wvu lɛ bó etaale tɛn fô bobwee bobole kɛnɛɛ fô bo'icee bobole no bó to taale fô bó le. Fifin nu fiɛɛ ɛ fí ɛ kocɛn ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛjise.
54005005	Kpwɛɛ ŋkfu wvù looci nu kpwɛɛ ŋkfu wvù yaa bvuu kɛŋke wee wvù taale fô wvú le, nu ɛ wvú taale kɛ wase fwe ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî Nyo' le, bunlee sekecii beele fô Nyo' le ɛntaŋ bô ɛmvunsheeŋ.
54005006	Geenɛn, ɛ kpwɛɛ ŋkfu wvù ghane fiew diee ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛkolɛ kew, nu ɛ wvú ɛ kpwe kɛ wase naa no wvú cim bɛɛ lɛne ɛ̂ we.
54005007	Ɛ̀ jemyì mwɛɛm mvun ɛ̂ bó, wvu lɛ fo bonyii ke enɛ ebaci bó.
54005008	Ɛ́ wee nu sɛ wvú taale fô kfuu diew e, ɛfey mvunciim fô ye yew e, tu wvú nu ɛ tun wase nce wvù ɛ̀ nu wvu mbee. Ɛ didiɛ gee nu ɛ dí ɛ fo ɛ fey naa lo di wee wvù yaa nu kɛ wee mbee le.
54005009	Kpwɛɛ ŋkfu wvù ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó elese diee diew ŋgoo bokɛ' bo boŋkfu le bò bó eficì bó kɛŋke keenu wvù nu ɛ buy wase bilum mbaŋsoocaan, wvù to nu kɛ kpwɛɛ diemsɛn mwaaŋ,
54005010	ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvù bó kee lo lɛ wvú kɛŋke gee dì jee. Fì nu lɛ: Wvú kuuse boom bew ɛ̂ je yì jee le, fiisene botolo ɛ̂ wvú yew, ɛ wvú ɛ cukɛ wase tɛn bikaa bi bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo Nyo' le, ɛ ficɛ bonyii bo ŋgɛw e, ɛ wvú ɛ nya ɛkolɛ kew keegee lemme dì jee ɛ̂ jé le yicii.
54005011	Geenɛn, fo wo ebee keelese bokɛ' bo boŋkfu le bò bɛɛ boom bo caan ŋgoo bò bó eficì le kɛ, njefo ɛ́ ye yibo ja ɛ kɛw ɛ no ŋɛyte, ɛ́ bó emum edaayɛ ŋkawma wvù bó to geɛ ɛ̂ Klistu, emum egomte keekase egɛn ɛ̂ bolemsɛ bomew e.
54005012	Ɛ́ bó ge nonɛn, tu bó ɛ jo wase ŋgɛw yî bikuu bibole njefo bó nu ɛ ŋgoy wase ŋkawma wvubo wvu fwe.
54005013	Ɛ keebvuu ebise fó nu, ɛ́ wo lese bó ŋgoo le, ɛ́ bó enɛ enu wase bonyii bò shee laame lo, gbwayte yew bonyii le daŋsene. Ɛ ɛ̀ yaa mɛy kɛ lɛ bó nu eshee laame lo kɛ, bó nu ekunsene tɛn mvuŋkunsɛn, leese dew fô mwɛɛm mvu bonyii le, jemyi mwɛɛm mvù bó yaa kɛŋke keejemyi kɛ.
54005014	Nonɛn me ɛ no nteete bokɛ' bo boŋkfu le bò bɛɛ boom bo caan lɛ bó ekase egɛn etaashɛ bvujen bô bolemsɛ bomew, eboo boom, etaalè fô yéw yibole, fo wee bvuban ke enɛ ebɛɛ ɛjim jodvu ebeete bô diee disɛɛbeene.
54005015	Me ŋgayte nɛn njefo bonyii bomew bó le nu ɛ jay wase je ɛ tu ɛ̂ keba ke Satan e.
54005016	Ɛ́ kpwoon wvù ɛ̀ nu wee mbee kɛŋke bokɛ' bo boŋkfu le ɛ̂ kfuu dibole, ɛ́ wvú nu fici bó, wvu lɛ fo kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le etuule bvujitɛ kɛ. Ɛ́ kí efici wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu bokɛ' bo boŋkfu le bò looci nu ɛbonɛbon.
54005017	Bocee bikuu bi kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le bò lemte ntay nu ɛ bó kɛŋke keenyaà n'wvum bô mmawcɛ ɛ̂ bó ntay, ɛfey mvunciiim bò fewci tɛn diɛw Nyo' bvuu yɛɛyi bonyii.
54005018	Bó kɛŋke keenyaà nonɛn njefo Ŋwa' Nyo' gayte lɛ, “Fo wo esûm diuw nyam seke yí lɛɛ ɛgiŋ kɛ.” Ɛ fí bvuu nu tɛn lɛ, “Wee lemme kɛŋke keekɛŋke nlawma we.”
54005019	Fo wee ke eyuu eshomse cee ɛkolɛ ke kentaashɛ le kemew ɛ̂ wo, ɛ́ wo emum ebee wvú le sɛ bonyii ɛ leem bofɛɛ kɛnɛɛ botɛte ɛ ben jim nsaw wvudvu kɛ.
54005020	Ɛ́ ɛ̀ nu wee wvù nu ɛ mɛy kɛ ɛ no gee kebefɛ gɛne dvú, ɛ́ wo wamɛn wvú ɛjise jo bonyii bocii, wvu lɛ kebɛse efan.
54005021	Me njemyi fin ɛ̂ wo fwe dvu Nyo' bô Klistu Jisos noo bonceendaa bò Nyo' nu ɛ baa lɛ, wo egeè fiɛɛ fì me ŋgayte fin yaa tuu dwen wee mvu kɛ, egeè fiɛɛ yaa duŋci kejɛɛy jɛɛy kɛ.
54005022	Fo wo ebuwbuwè keegɛɛ can yî wee le lɛ wvú enù cee ɛkolɛ ke kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le kɛ. Fo wo elese fiuw can fô kebefɛ ke wee mvu le kɛ. Gɛɛlɛ ɛkolɛ kuw ɛ kí eyuulè.
54005023	Fo wo ebvuu ewuu kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu joo maaŋ kɛ. Ɛ̀ wuù tɛn fimmbvuum caan nje tee diuw bô no wo mooci kɛ cɛmcɛme baay nɛn.
54005024	Bibefɛ bi bonyii bomew e ké no yen'yi naa baay duŋci lɛ bó nu ɛ gbwe wase nsaw, ɛ bi bomew e ké jo naa kefew sɛ yenɛ.
54005025	Ɛ̀ nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no gee dì jee di bonyii bomew e ké no yen'yi. Ɛ́ dí cim baa yaŋsɛn eyenɛ, tu kɛ dí nu ke emɛy nyiime kɛ.
54006001	Bonyii bocii bò nu ɛkuse jo kemmbuŋ ke bvunfaw e kɛŋke keenyaa n'wvum ɛ̂ jé le yicii ɛ̂ bonyii bò kɛŋke bó. Bó egeè nonɛn, wvu lɛ fo bonyii ejemyi díɛw yì befe ɛkumɛ diee di Nyo' le noo n'yɛɛyi wesebeene kɛ.
54006002	Fo bonfaw bò bonyii bò kɛŋke bó nu bonyii bo mbee le emum ejoò bó ɛkuse lɛ njefo bó bocii nu boom bo bwee wan e yî Klistu le kɛ. Bó kɛŋke keelemte lo fô bó le ntay fesene lo, njefo bonyii bò kɛŋke sɛw lemme dibole nu ɛ ɛ̀ nu bonyii bo mbee le ɛ bó kooŋke bó naa ntay. Ɛ̀ yɛɛyì bonyii bô mwɛɛm mvun, teete bó lɛ bó egeè mvú.
54006003	Ɛ́ wee yɛɛyi n'yɛɛyi mvu jɛɛy yaa beŋe n'yɛɛyi wvu lɛŋ wvù wvu Tata wesebeene wvù Jisos Klistu le noo n'yɛɛyi wvù kocine bô nce wvù Nyo' gomte,
54006004	tu mwɛtɛn bensee ɛ ɛ̀ nu ye yi ɛcici yaa kee fiɛɛ kɛ. Wvuwɛ wee cɛmte bô kencɛm ke bombew bô mvuŋkicɛn mvu díɛw e mvù too bô kendoŋ ke benɛɛn noo diwaa noo díɛw yì befe noo keebiinene bonyii kɛŋke ŋkpwawcɛ wvù befe,
54006005	noo diuw wvu kumɛɛn ɛntelɛŋ jo bonyii bò nu ɛ bvufee bvubole ɛ lɛmlɛm wase ɛ bó ɛ lase wase kecɛɛy e. Bó gee nonɛn kpwaake lɛ fiɛɛ fi Nyo' le nu je mi yì bó nu ke ekuw jó.
54006006	Geenɛn ɛ́ wee cee nce wvù Nyo' gomte bvuu yuuke njoŋ bô fiɛɛ fì wvú kɛŋke, tu ɛ̀ nu naa bvukukɛ bvu baay,
54006007	njefo beene to to ɛ̂ woŋ jan cancan, ɛ beene nu ke etu kɛ jim cancan.
54006008	Nonɛn ɛ́ beene kɛŋke mwɛɛm mvudien bô ndvú, tu mvumvun nu ɛ kocɛn fô beene le.
54006009	Geenɛn bonyii bò gomte ɛ ɛ̀ nu bvukukɛ ké ley mmom e, jo ɛ̂ ketam e, mum ley shiee mwɛɛm e nteen mvu keyuŋ e mvù too bô boŋgɛw. Ɛ mwɛɛm mvun nu mvù ffûmte bonyii ŋgɛw e ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu wvu wɛɛ kɛ.
54006010	Dikfuu di mwɛɛm mvù befe le mvunciim san ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî keŋkoŋɛn ke bigew e. Ɛ̀ nu nje shiee wvu baay wvun wvù bonyii kɛŋke fô bigew e wvù bonyii nteen nu ɛ jay wase je yî mbee wvubole, ɛ bon'yɛ mvuntelem mvubole bô mwɛɛm mvu nsase le nteen.
54006011	Fô wo le Timatio, wo nu fiuw wee Nyo'. Ɛ̀ lewtè lo fiuw mvumvun mwɛɛm. Ɛ̀ taalè ɛ ɛ̀ nu keekɛŋke nce wvu teytey noo nce wvù Nyo' gomte. Ɛ̀ jicì mbee wo le, kɛŋke keŋkoŋɛn, kuule shém, kɛŋke tɛn nce wvu nyɛkeey.
54006012	Ɛ̀ diuù bvudiuw bvu mbee le bvù jee, jicì nshii wvù mɛy lo wvù bó to teŋɛɛ wo keeley wvú le, ɛ wo leem ɛ̂ bonyii nteen fwe bò eben jim nsaw wo, ɛ wo jeme lɛŋ ɛkumɛ mbee wo.
54006013	Me ɛ mum ɛ no njemyi ɛ̂ wo ɛjise jo Nyo' wvù nyaa nshii ɛ̂ mwɛɛm mvunciim, noo ɛ̂ ɛjise jo Klistu Jisos wvù to leemɛɛ fwe dvu Bontus Baylɛt jeme fiɛɛ fi lɛŋ bô diuw we ɛkumɛ ɛkolɛ kew,
54006014	ŋgayte lɛ wo egɛɛlè bonci ban, nù sɛ nlom ɛ fiɛɛ yaa nu dvú fì wee ebaci wo yî dvú le egɛn ebuy kefew kè Tata wesebeene wvù Jisos Klistu nu ke ebuynɛn e.
54006015	Ɛ wvú nu ke ebuynɛn ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ kefew ke lɛŋ e, kè ɛ̀ nu ke eduŋcɛ Nyo' wvù bó bensee, wvù ɛ̀ mɛy kɛ wvú wvù saake mwɛɛm mvunciim, nu Nfon bonfon noo Tata botata bocii.
54006016	Ɛ̀ mɛy kɛ wvú maaŋ wvù yaa nulo ekpwe kɛ, ɛ wvú nu ɛ̂ n'yuu wvù ɛ̀ nulo wee saa ebencɛ nceencee fó le kɛ. Wee ke baa yuu yɛn wase wvú le, ɛ kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wee eyɛn wvú le kɛ. N'wvum nu ɛ̂ wvú, ɛ sa' ye nu yì mɛy lo. Fí enù nonɛn.
54006017	Ɛ̀ dioo tu ɛ̂ keba ke bonyii bo kpwaw e yî woŋ wvun e, ɛ̀ jemyì ɛ̂ bó lɛ fo bó ebenseè ye kɛ. Fo bó eleke bvufee bvubole yî kpwaw e wvù nulo ke enɛ eka le kɛ. Bó eleke bvufee ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî Nyo' wvù looci tfuuke lo mwɛɛm mvunciim ɛ̂ beene lɛ beene eyuuke njoŋ dvú le.
54006018	Bó egeè ɛ ɛ̀ nu mwɛɛm mvù jee, ɛ́ kpwaw wvubo enù mwɛɛm mvù jee mvù bó gee. Bó eyene can yibo enyaa nnya yaa taale kɛ.
54006019	Yiyin nu je yì ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó egɛɛle ntfu fô bikuu bibole yî ntfuu le diɛwɛ kenffuy kè tɛmyi le, wvu lɛ bó ejici nshii wvù looci nu nshii le.
54006020	Timatio, ɛ̀ jicì kɛ fiɛɛ fì bó nu ɛ gɛɛ can yo le. Ɛ̀ wɛmte lo bonjeme bò yaa kɛŋke kɛ fiɛɛ keege bô Nyo' noo bonjeme bo mvuŋkicɛn e bò bonyii kpwaake lɛ ɛ̀ nu bo bvufee le.
54006021	Bonyii bomew nu ɛ nɛ wase ɛ no kuŋene mvumvun mwɛɛm, ɛ nɛ ɛ jay je ɛ̂ keba ke mbee wvubole. Tata ebuw ben bocii.
55001001	Ɛ̀ nu me wvù Baul, ɛ me nu waa ntum Klistu Jisos yî ŋkoŋ wvù wvu Nyo' le bii ŋkawma wvu ɛkumɛ nshii wvù mɛy lo wvù nu yî Klistu Jisos e.
55001002	Me nsaaŋke ŋwa' wvun fô wo le Timatio waa wɛm. Wo nu fitele fiem. Nyo' Ice bô Klistu Jisos wvù Tata wesebeene ebuw wo, ecam shen fô wo le, enya wo bô nyɛkeey.
55001003	Me ŋké ŋkumyi wo sekecii ɛ̂ bunle yɛm e no nyaa kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu keyoone ɛ̂ Nyo' wvù me nlemte wvú le ɛ fiɛɛ yaa saake me fô fitele le kɛ no bo'icɛm to lemte.
55001004	Me ŋké ŋkumyi tɛn misɛm yì wo to shiwse seke bee wo to gawsene, ɛ jeŋ no yuu me ɛntaŋ bô ɛmvunsheeŋ lɛ me mbee en'yɛn wo le, wvu lɛ fitele fiem eyiŋsɛn bô njoŋ.
55001005	Me ŋké no ŋkumyi tɛn mbee wo wvu kecɛɛy wvù wo kɛŋke. Mbee wvun to yaw bwee bwoo wvù Loys bô bwoo wvù Yunis no kɛŋke, ɛ me ŋkee sɛ kemaŋɛn lɛ ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù wo kɛŋke keseen.
55001006	Ɛ̀ nɛɛ fiɛɛ fì me ŋgomte keentamcɛ wo lɛ wo ekase ekamse yî nnya Nyo' yì nu yî yo le, efieè yî dvú le diɛwɛ ŋguy e. Nnya yin nu yì wo to kɛŋkɛɛ seke me nto ŋgɛlɛɛ can yɛm yî yo le.
55001007	Ɛ̀ keè lɛ Nyo' to baa nya keyoy ɛ̂ beene ɛ ɛ̀ nu kè egee ɛ beene kɛŋke nfan kɛ. Wvú to nya ɛ ɛ̀ nu keyoy ke mvuŋgay e bô ke keŋkoŋɛn e noo kè nulo ege ɛ́ beene ekeè keekemsene bô bikuu bisɛɛbeene.
55001008	Nonɛn, fo wo ewuumenè keejemyi ɛ̂ bonyii bomew ɛkumɛ Tata wesebeene kɛnɛɛ ɛkumɛ me wvù lemte ncaw nje ye kɛ. Geenɛn ɛ̀ joò tɛn wo ŋgɛw yî saaka wvù jee wvun e bô mvuŋgay mvù Nyo' nya ɛ̂ wo le.
55001009	Nyo' nu wvù to boysɛɛ beene, tee beene lɛ beene enu bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bew. Kɛ wvú to ge fifin ɛ ɛ̀ nu nje lemme dimew dì beene to geɛ kɛ. Ɛ̀ to nu nje kenseyse kew fô beene le, bô mbuwma we wvù wvú to buwɛɛ beene dvú fele yî Klistu Jisos e ɛ ɛ̀ bɛɛ naa lo ɛ woŋ sɛ ke kɛw.
55001010	Keseen nu ɛ bó ɛ duŋcɛ wase mbuwma wvudvu ɛ̂ beene no Mboyse wesebeene wvù Klistu Jisos nu ɛ to wase. Wvú nu ɛ ŋgoy mvuŋgay mvu kpwe le, ɛ duŋcɛ nshii wvù mɛy lo ɛndan, bô lɛ kɛ wee bɛɛ ke ebvuu ekpwe kɛ. Ɛ wvú ge mvú ɛ buy ɛndan ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô saaka wvù jee.
55001011	Ɛ̀ nu saaka wvù jee wvudvu wvun wvù Nyo' nu ɛ baa me lɛ me enù wee nfewcɛ bô waa ntum Klistu noo wee n'yɛɛyi wvudvu.
55001012	Ɛ̀ nu nje fifin wvù me n'yɛne ŋgɛw wvù me n'yɛne wvun nɛn. Geenɛn kɛ me ŋ'wuumene kɛ, njefo me ŋkee wee wvù me nu ɛ nlese fitele yî ye le. Ɛ me ŋkee lo sɛ kemaŋɛn lɛ wvú nulo etaale kɛ fô fiɛɛ fì me nu ɛ nya can ye le fin e, egɛn buy diuu di fokemɛse le.
55001013	Ɛ̀ biì kɛ tweŋ n'yɛɛyi wvù ɛ̀ nu wvu lɛŋ wvù me nto n'yɛɛyɛɛ wo dvú. No wo bii dvú nonɛn eleesè kɛ fitele ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî Klistu le, kɛŋke keŋkoŋɛn fô bonyii le kè ɛ̀ nu ke Klistu Jisos e.
55001014	Ɛ̀ jicì n'yɛɛyi wvu kecɛɛy e wvù bó to nyaɛ can yo le. Ɛ̀ jicì bô mvuŋgay mvu Keyoy ke Yuule le kè nu yî yese beene le.
55001015	Wo kee lo lɛ bonyii bocii bo ɛ̂ keba kè Ɛsia le to nu ɛ laŋ wase me. Ɛ̂ ŋgoo yibole nu Figelus bô 'Ɛmogenes.
55001016	Me nlɛke lɛ Tata ecam shen fô yew Onesifolus e. Wvú to ké no gee naa bokaŋ e bokaŋ e ɛ shém yɛm lɛɛtene. Wvú to baa wuumene me nje ncaw wvù me nu wvú le kɛ.
55001017	Ɛ̀ nu seke wvú to fɛsɛɛ Lum jan, wvú to nu ɛ loocɛ gom lo me ke ghan yɛn me le.
55001018	Me mbunlee lɛ Tata ege ɛ́ ke edioo enu diuu di fokemɛse, ɛ́ Tata ecam shen fô wvú le. Wo looci kee naa lemme dicii dì wvú to lemɛɛ fô me le ɛ̂ kelaante kè Ɛfɛsus e.
55002001	Timatio waa wɛm, ɛ̀ dioo tu fô wo, ɛ̀ leemè kɛ tɛmyi bô mvuŋgay mvù Klistu Jisos nu ɛ buw wo dvú.
55002002	Ɛ̀ joò tɛn fiɛɛ fì wo ké no yuuke ɛ me njemyi fwe dvu bonyii nteen leesè can bonyii bo lɛŋ e bò nulo ke eyɛɛyi tɛn bonyii bomew dvú.
55002003	Ɛ̀ joò tɛn wo ŋgɛw diɛwɛ wee jem wvu lɛŋ wvù wvu Klistu Jisos e.
55002004	Kɛ wee jem ke dioo nu yî lemme diew e bvuu no leese ɛkolɛ fô mwɛɛm mvu bonyii bo ncɛw e kɛ, njefo fiɛɛ fì wvú taale yî dvú le nu keegee fiɛɛ fì cee ɛkolɛ we shieele.
55002005	Ɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no kɛ wee wvù lewte kenlewtɛ nulo ke elewtɛ eso fiɛɛ, sɛ wvú lewte bii bonci bo kenlewtɛ le kɛ.
55002006	Wee wɛɛ wvù lemte tɛn ntay nu wvù kɛŋke keeyaw emom fiɛɛ ŋgoo mwɛɛm mvù wvú to jewyɛɛ le.
55002007	Ɛ̀ kpwawcì ɛkumɛ mwɛɛm mvù me njemyi mvun ɛ́ Tata ege ɛ́ wo ekiɛɛ mvú mvunciim.
55002008	Ɛ̀ kumyì Jisos Klistu. Wvú to nu ɛ buy yî kpwe le. Wvú to nu wee wvu ɛ̂ kfuu di Nfon Dawe le. Ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù me nfewci ɛkumɛ wvú ɛ̂ saaka wɛm wvù jee le.
55002009	Ɛ̀ nu nje saaka wvù jee wvun wvù me n'yɛne ŋgɛw, nu yî boncaw e diɛwɛ cooŋ e. Geenɛn, naa no me ncim nu yî boncaw e nonɛn nu ɛ kɛ diɛw Nyo' nu yî boncaw e kɛ.
55002010	No fí nu nonɛn, me ɛ mum ɛ no ŋkuule shém yî fiɛɛ ficii le nje bonyii bò Nyo' nu ɛ caw, wvu lɛ bó tɛn ke ekɛŋkɛ mboyma yî Klistu Jisos e bô bvukukɛ bvù mɛy lo.
55002011	Njeme wvun nu naa kecɛɛy, wvù nu lɛ: Ɛ́ beene nu ɛ taashɛ ɛ kpwe beene ɛ bó, ɛ́ beene ke ecee tɛn beene ɛ bó.
55002012	Ɛ́ beene kuule shém, ɛ́ beene ke esaake bvunfon beene ɛ bó. Ɛ́ beene ma lo wvú, ɛ́ wvú ke ema tɛn beene.
55002013	Ɛ́ beene nu sɛ beene leeme yî diɛw yesebeene le, ɛ́ wvú emɛy kɛ leeme yî diɛw ye le, njefo kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wvú etun ɛkolɛ kew kɛ.
55002014	Tamcɛ bó bô mwɛɛm mvun, ebvuu ejeme ɛ̂ bó fwe dvu Nyo' lɛ bó elu bô mvuŋkicɛn mvu ɛkumɛ díɛw. Kɛ mvú yaa fii wee kɛ. Mvú beete kɛ lo bô bonyii bò yeke mvú.
55002015	Ɛ̀ momtè ntay keeduŋci ɛkolɛ kuw ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛjise diɛwɛ wee wvù Nyo' yɛne lɛ ɛ̀ nu wvu lɛŋ e. Ɛ̀ nù wee lemme wvù yaa kɛŋke kɛ fiɛɛ fì wvú ewuumene yî dvú le, noo wvù jici kecɛɛy ke diɛw Nyo' le ɛ̂ je yi lɛŋ e.
55002016	Ɛ̀ wɛmtè lo bonjeme bò yaa kɛŋke kɛ fiɛɛ keege bô Nyo', njefo bonjeme bodvu nu ege ɛ́ bonyii ecee kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu nce wvù yaa nu kɛ wvù Nyo' gomte gɛne dvú fwe.
55002017	Bon'yɛɛyi bobole bodvu nɛn'yi no nu kɛ diɛwɛ keŋkokɛn kè diee ye wee ghɛɛŋke gɛne dvú le. Ŋgoo bonyii bò yɛɛyi n'yɛɛyi wvudvu wvun nu 'Imenayus bô Filitus.
55002018	Bó nu ɛ cinɛ wase je kecɛɛy e no bó leeme lɛ mbuy wvu yî kpwe le nu ɛ jo wase bvudvuu. Ɛ dioo ge nonɛn, ɛ befe bô mbee bonyii bomew.
55002019	Geenɛn, kenffuy kè ɛ̀ lese Nyo' nu kè tɛmyi, ɛ kí leeme kɛ fó. Kenffuy kin nu ɛ Nyo' ɛ saŋ nciise we yî dvú le ɛ wvú nu lɛ, “Tata kee bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bew,” noo lɛ, “Wee tfuu wvù bɛne diee di Tata le, kɛŋke keecinɛ gee dì befe le.”
55002020	Yew wee wvu baay ké dioo nu ɛ shúw bô ŋkáa noo mvuŋkom mvù nu dvú saa nu kɛ mwɛɛm mvù bó kene bô ketwaa ke bigew e kè yɛɛle kɛnɛɛ kè baa kɛ. Mvumew ké no nu tɛn mvù bó kene bô bite noo mvù bó kene bô mbom. Mwɛɛm mvun ké no nu ɛ mvumew nu mvù kɛŋke lemme dì kuuke, ɛ mvumew nu mvù kɛŋke kɛ lo lemme di ncɛw.
55002021	Nonɛn, ɛ́ wee bvuushi can ye fô mwɛɛm mvù kɛŋke kɛ lo lemme di ncɛw e, tu wvú nu enu wase diɛwɛ fiɛɛ fi yew fì ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó ejoo gee lemme dì kuuke dvú. Wvú nu enu wase wee wvù Nyo' nu ɛ ge lɛ ɛ̀ nu wee wen. Ɛ wvú nu wase wee wvù cɛyte lo cee ɛkolɛ we lɛ wvú ejoo wen gee lemme diew dì jee dvú sekecii.
55002022	Nonɛn, ɛ̀ lewtè lo fiuw nce nnyɛn wvù keghan ké no kɛŋke le. Ɛ̀ taalè fiuw ɛ ɛ̀ nu keecee nce wvu teytey bô keekɛŋke mbee noo keŋkoŋɛn bô nce wvu nyɛkeey no bonyii bò teŋe tɛn diee di Tata le bô mvuntelem mvubole mvù yuule gee.
55002023	Fo wo ekɛŋkè naa lo fiɛɛ keege bô bombew bo keyuŋ e bo ɛcici kɛ, njefo bó ké no too kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô diwaa.
55002024	Ɛ wee lemme wvù wvu Tata yaa kɛŋke keewaale bô bonyii kɛ. Wvú kɛŋke keekɛŋke ɛ ɛ̀ nu fitele fì jee fô wee le tfuu, nù wee wvù kee keeyɛɛyi bonyii, kee tɛn keekuu shém bô bonyii.
55002025	Wvú ké no nɛci fiɛɛ bô nyɛkeey ɛ̂ bonyii bò kicine wvú. Wvú ké no nɛci nonɛn bô ŋkpwawcɛ wvu lɛ ɛ̀ nɛlo ɛ́ Nyo' efi bó ɛ́ bó ekumɛn mvuntelem mvubole ekase ekee fiɛɛ fi kecɛɛy,
55002026	emum etee bvufee bvubole jim, elewtɛ ebuy ɛ̂ ketam ke dɛwle le kè wvú nu ɛ koo bó jó lɛ bó egeè ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì wvú kooŋke le.
55003001	Ɛ̀ keè lɛ, ɛ̀ nu ke edioo enu ɛdiuw yo fokemɛse le, ɛ́ mwɛɛm mvù tɛmyi ekooyi baay.
55003002	Bonyii nu ke enɛ ekooŋke kɛ wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu bikuu bibole, kooŋke bigew, bensee ye, duŋci ye, jemyi díɛw yì befe ɛkumɛ bonyii bomew. Kɛ bó yaa nu ke ebvuu eyuuke bobwee bobole bô bo'icee bobole kɛ, yaa nyaa kɛ lo keyoone yî fiɛɛ le, yaa kɛŋke lo gee dì yuule kɛ.
55003003	Kɛ bó nu ke ekɛŋke shen fô bonyii le kɛ, yaa lɛɛshi tɛn bojay bo bonyii le kɛ. Bó nu ke ebeete bô ɛdiee ɛ bonyii, yaa nu kɛ lo ɛ́ bó ejicɛ ye yibole kɛ. Bó nu ke ekɛŋke gee dì bɛmte, yaa kooŋke fiɛɛ fì jee kɛ.
55003004	Bó nu ke ekuule mvunaŋ yî bonyii le, cee nce wvu ncɛwncɛw, nu ɛ bó ɛ yiŋsɛn bô kencake ye. Bó nu ke ekooŋke kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu keediee bikuu bibole ɛfey keekooŋke ɛ ɛ̀ nu Nyo'.
55003005	Bó nu ke eduŋci lɛ bó leeme yî fiɛɛ fi Nyo' le, geenɛn bvuu tune mvuŋgay mvu fiɛɛ fi Nyo' le fidvu. Ɛ̀ wɛmtè lo kfuu boba bonyii.
55003006	Bonyii ban bomew nu bò ghane leyte yéw bonyii le soo bokɛnɛ bò wɛɛyi bò bibefɛ nu ɛ yikɛ wase bó, bó ɛ no jeeŋke bii kɛ wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu shiee mwɛɛm mvumew e.
55003007	Boban bokɛnɛ nu bò ké no shee kɛ yeke n'yɛɛyi sekecii, geenɛn yaa nulo ke eyuu ekiɛɛ fiɛɛ fì ɛ̀ nu fi kecɛɛy kɛ.
55003008	No Janis bô Jambles to kicine Muses, nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no bonyii ban kicine kecɛɛy ke Nyo' le. Ɛ̀ nu bonyii ɛ bvufee bvubole ɛ lɛmlɛm wase, ɛ fitele fì bó duu lɛ bó nu ɛ lese yî Klistu le nu mbiay.
55003009	Geenɛn kɛ bó nu ke ege nonɛn egɛn ebuy ncejole kɛ, njefo keyuŋ kebole nu ke ebuy kɛ tɛn ɛndan fô bonyii bocii le no ke Janis bô Jambles e to buyɛɛ.
55003010	Geenɛn Timatio, wo kee wase ɛkumɛ n'yɛɛyi wɛm bô nce wɛm noo fiɛɛ fì me nleke bvufee yî dvú le. Wo kee tɛn ɛkumɛ fitele fì me nlese yî Nyo' le bô shém yì me ŋké no ŋkuule, noo keŋkoŋɛn kè me ŋkɛŋke fô bonyii le, bô no me ŋké no momte yî fiɛɛ ficii le ŋgɛne fwe.
55003011	Wo kee tɛn bikaa bì bonyii to bone ɛ̂ me ɛjim noo boŋgɛw bem. Wo kee mwɛɛm mvù to kooyɛɛ bô me Antiok bô Ikonium noo Lista. Wo kee kfuu bikaa bì bonyii to bone ɛ̂ me ɛjim. Geenɛn yî boŋgɛw ban e bocii nu ɛ Tata to boyse kɛ me.
55003012	Fí nu lo kecɛɛy lɛ wee tfuu wvù gomte keecee nce wvù Nyo' gomte diɛwɛ wee wvù nu ɛ taashɛ wase bô Klistu Jisos nu ɛ bó nu ke ebone kɛ bikaa ɛ̂ wvú ɛjim.
55003013	Ɛ bonyii bò buwyi mwɛɛm bô bonyii bo kenlɛɛma le, nu ɛ gee dibole nu ke efoo kɛ gɛne lo no bó lɛɛle bonyii bomew lɛɛle tɛn bikuu bibole.
55003014	Geenɛn, fô wo le, ɛ̀ leemè kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî fiɛɛ fì bó nu ɛ yɛɛyi wo dvú wo ɛ bee fí le bô fitele fiuw ficii. Ɛ̀ leemè yî dvú le njefo wo kee bonyii bò yɛɛyɛɛ wo dvú.
55003015	Wo to kɛw no kee mwɛɛm mvù bó saŋ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le bɛɛ naa wan caan e. Mwɛɛm mvun nu mvù nulo etefe wo ɛ́ wo ke ekɛŋkɛ mboyma fele yî fitele fì wo lese yî Klistu Jisos e.
55003016	Fiɛɛ ficii fì bó saŋ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le nu ɛ bvufee bvudvu nɛ fô Nyo' le. Ɛ fí fici keeyɛɛyi bonyii dvú, duŋci bojay, nɛci bonyii, yɛɛyi bonyii bô nce wvu teytey,
55003017	wvu lɛ wee wvù ɛ̀ nu wee Nyo' enù ɛ wvú ɛ kpwɛntɛn, kɛŋke fiɛɛ ficii keegee lemme dì jee dicii dvú.
55004001	Me njemyi fin ɛ̂ wo fwe dvu Nyo' bô Klistu Jisos wvù nu ke esaw bonyii bò bɛɛ dvú bô bò kpwekɛn wase. Ɛ me njemyi nje mbuynɛn we wvù wvú nu ke ebuynɛn noo nje bvunfon bwew ŋgayte lɛ,
55004002	ɛ̀ fewcì diɛw Nyo'. Ɛ̀ fewcì kɛ gɛne dvú, kɛnɛɛ ɛ̀ nu kefew ke lɛŋ kɛnɛɛ ɛ̀ baa nu ke lɛŋ. Ɛ̀ duŋcì bojay bo bonyii le, saakè bó, yvuwsè mvuntelem mvubole bô nyɛkeey noo n'yɛɛyi wo.
55004003	Ɛ̀ keè lɛ kefew too lo kè bonyii yaa bɛɛ ke eleeme yî n'yɛɛyi wvu lɛŋ e kɛ. Bitem bibole nu ke efuu keeyuuke wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fimew jɛɛy. Ɛ́ bó emum egom ɛ ɛ̀ nu bonyii bo n'yɛɛyi le bò nu eyɛɛyi wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì bó kooŋke keeyuuke.
55004004	Bó nu ke ecinɛ keeyuuke fiɛɛ fi kecɛɛy e, ebvuyte wase gɛne ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ mvumaŋgaan e.
55004005	Geenɛn, fô wo le, ɛ̀ lewsè ɛkolɛ kuw teytey sekecii, kuulè shém yî boŋgɛw e, egeè lemme di wee wvù ghane lo fewci diɛw Nyo' le. Ɛ̀ geè lemme diuw dicii ntay.
55004006	Fô me le nu ɛ me nu wase keseen diɛwɛ mbvuum e, ɛ kefew kocine wase kè bó nu ejo me ege dvú diɛwɛ no bó ke fuu mbvuum yî ketaŋ ke ncese le. Kefew kè me nu eŋkfulɛ nu ɛ kocɛn wase.
55004007	Me nu ɛ ndiu wase bvudiuw bvù jee yî fiɛɛ fi Nyo' le, ɛ nlewtɛ kenlewtɛ ɛ mɛse, ɛ njicɛ mbee wɛm e ɛ mɛy yî dvú le.
55004008	Ɛ kɛw yî keseen e nu ɛ bó ɛ gɛɛ wase kefo kem ke bvunfon e kè ɛ̀ nu ke nce wvu teytey e. Kefo kin nu kè Tata wvù nu wee wvù saake bonsaw teytey nu ke ebon ɛ̂ me ɛfa yî diuu di fokemɛse le. Kɛ wvú nu ke ebon kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu kem maaŋ kɛ. Wvú nu ke ebon tɛn ke bonyii bocii bò kooŋke lɛ wvú ekase eto le.
55004009	Timatio, momɛ naa ntay keeyaŋsɛn eto cekey ɛ̂ me le.
55004010	Ɛ̀ keè lɛ Dɛmas nu ɛ koŋ wase woŋ wvu keseen wvun, ɛ laŋ me ɛ gɛn Tɛsalonika. Klesɛns nu ɛ gɛn Galɛshia, Taytus ɛ gɛn Dalmatia.
55004011	Ɛ̀ mɛy kɛ Luka wvú ɛmbeŋ wvù nu bee wvú. Seke wo too, jo Maaku ɛ ben ɛ wvú no too. Wvú nulo efici me baay yî lemme le.
55004012	Tikikus nu ɛ me ɛ ntum wvú Ɛfɛsus.
55004013	Seke wo too, jo kekum kem ke baay kè me nto ŋgɛkɛɛ yew dvu Kabus ɛ̂ kelaante kè Towas e. Ɛ̀ toò tɛn bô boŋwa' bem, ɛfey mvunciim bò bó fɛ bô jéw nyam.
55004014	Alɛksanda wvù tfuyte ɛlamɛ nu ɛ ge ŋgɛw bô me ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu wvu wɛɛ kɛ. Tata nu ke elaw wvú yî gee diew e.
55004015	Ɛ̀ yɛnè tɛn ben ɛ wvú. Wvú kicine saaka wvù beene fewci naa lo baay.
55004016	Yî nsaw wɛm e nu ɛ diuu di fwe dì me nto nleemɛɛ ɛ̂ kebɛŋ ke nsaw e nu ɛ wee to baa leem lo ɛ̂ me ɛjim kɛ. Bonyii bocii to nu ɛ lewtɛ me. Fo Nyo' esaw bó yî fifiɛ le kɛ.
55004017	Geenɛn, Tata to nu ɛ leem ɛ̂ me ɛjim, nya me bô mvuŋgay keenfewcɛ saaka wvù jee ntay wvu lɛ bonyii bò yaa nu kɛ Bojuu eyuw saaka wvudvu. Nonɛn wvú to nu ɛ bvuse me diuw bvule le.
55004018	Tata nu ke ebvuuse kɛ me can fiɛɛ fì befe le ficii, ke eghan elese me bvunfon bwew bvu fowe le yî nyɛkeey e. Beene etumtè moŋkum mew sekecii sɛ ŋka. Fí enù nonɛn.
55004019	Gayɛ Blisilia bô Akpwila le enya ɛ̂ me. Gayɛ tɛn yew Onesifolus e.
55004020	Ɛlastus to nu ɛ shɛɛ Kolɛn, ɛ Toofimus nu ɛ me nto ncinɛ wvú le Miletus ɛ wvú cɛmte.
55004021	Momɛ naa ntay keeto ɛ́ kefew ke nffum wvù tɛmyi le sɛ kɛw. Yubulus ciinse ŋgayma ɛ̂ wo. Budens bô Linus noo Klawdia bô boom bo bwee wesebeene le bocii yî Klistu le ciinse tɛn ŋgayma.
55004022	Me nlɛke lɛ Tata etaalè fô keyoy kuw e. Wvú ebuw ben bocii.
56001001	Ɛ̀ nu me wvù Baul, ɛ me nu waa lemme Nyo' noo waa ntum Jisos Klistu. Lemme diem nu keeŋgee ɛ mbee bonyii bò Nyo' nu ɛ caw gɛne fwe, bô lɛ bó ekeè fiɛɛ fi kecɛɛy fì bii nce wvù ɛ̀ nu wvù Nyo' gomte le,
56001002	emum etaalè fwe yî nshii wvù mɛy lo wvù Nyo' wvù nulo saa mbiay mbiay to kawɛɛ ɛ woŋ sɛ ke kɛw e.
56001003	Kefew ke lɛŋ to nu ɛ dioo kocɛn, ɛ wvú mum duŋcɛ diɛw ye ɛndan fele yî diɛw ye yì me nfewci le, ɛ ɛ̀ to nya Nyo' wvù Mboyse wesebeene mvuŋgay mvudvu ɛ̂ me lɛ me enfewcì.
56001004	Me nsaaŋke ŋwa' wvun fô wo le Taytus. Wo nu waa wɛm wvu kecɛɛy yî mbee wvù ɛ̀ nu wesebeene bocii le. Nyo' Ice bô Klistu Jisos wvù Mboyse wesebeene ebuw wo, enya wo bô nyɛkeey.
56001005	Shiee wvù me nto ncin'yɛɛ wo le Klɛt to nu lɛ wo eshɛɛ enɛle mwɛɛm mvù nu ɛ lɛmlɛm, ebvuu egɛɛ bocee bintaashɛ bi bonyii bo mbee le bilaante le bicii ɛ̂ je yì me nto nduŋcɛɛ ɛ̂ wo le.
56001006	Wee keenu cee kentaashɛ nu ɛ wvú kɛŋke keenu wee wvù yaa kɛŋke kɛ fiɛɛ fì bó ebaci wvú yî dvú le kɛ. Wvú kɛŋke keenu dwee kpwoon mwaaŋ, ɛ boom bew nu bonyii bo mbee le, ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu bò bonyii yɛne lɛ bó ghaŋghaŋe lo kɛnɛɛ tɛmyi bikuu kɛ.
56001007	No cee ɛkolɛ ke kentaashɛ le nu wee lemme Nyo', tu kɛ wvú kɛŋke keekɛŋke fiɛɛ fì bó ebaci wvú yî dvú le kɛ. Kɛ wvú kɛŋke keeduŋci ye kɛnɛɛ kɛŋke shém yì ton'yɛɛn kɛnɛɛ nu wvù wuu mbvuum ɛ mó koole kɛ. Kɛ wvú kɛŋke keenu wvù wamene bonyii kɛnɛɛ wvù kuuŋke kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu sɛw kɛ.
56001008	Wvú kɛŋke keenu wvù fiisene bonyii bo ghane le, kooŋke fiɛɛ fì ɛ̀ nu fì jee, gee mwɛɛm bô bvufee, kɛŋke nce wvu teytey, kɛŋke nce wvù yuule, kee keejicɛ ye ye le.
56001009	Wvú kɛŋke keenu wvù jici n'yɛɛyi wvù ɛ̀ nu wvu lɛŋ wvù bó yɛɛyi wvú dvú ntay, wvu lɛ wvú enyaa ntefe ɛ̂ bonyii bii ɛ ɛ̀ nu n'yɛɛyi wvù ɛ̀ nu wvu lɛŋ e, ebvuu etooshi tɛn bonyii bò kicine n'yɛɛyi wvudvu.
56001010	Me njemyi nɛn njefo bonyii nu dvú nteen bò tɛmyi bikuu, bò jemyi díɛw yi ɛcici, lɛɛle bonyii, ɛfey mvunciim ŋgoo bonyii ba bò leeme kɛ lɛ bó kɛŋke keetfuuse bonyii yew.
56001011	Boban nu bonyii bò bó ebaŋ lo dew yibo, njefo bó ghane bvuŋse yéw bonyii yicii no bó yɛɛyi mwɛɛm mvù bó yaa kɛŋke keeyɛɛyi kɛ. Ɛ bó gee nonɛn ɛ ɛ̀ nu nje bigew bi ɛcici bì bó kuuŋke.
56001012	Bonyii ban nu ɛ wee wvubo mvu kebɛɛ wvù bó duu lɛ ɛ̀ nu wee ntum Nyo' wvubo to jeme wase ɛkumɛ bó gayte lɛ, “Bonyii bo Klɛt ké no nu bonyii bo mbiay e sekecii. Bó nu lo nyám yi ŋkpwaante yì befe, nu biwɛlɛncoy bì wuwte kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu mwɛɛm mvudien.”
56001013	Njeme wvudvu wvun ɛkumɛ bó nu lo kecɛɛy. Nonɛn ɛ̀ looci tooshi lo bó dew yibole, wvu lɛ bó ekɛŋke mbee ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvu lɛŋ,
56001014	ɛfey fo bó enya bikuu bibole eyuuke ɛ ɛ̀ nu mvumaŋgaan mvu Bojuu le, kɛnɛɛ mwɛɛm mvù bonyii bò nu ɛ tun mwɛɛm mvu kecɛɛy mvù Nyo' gayte lɛ bonyii ebiì dvú le.
56001015	Bonyii dioo kɛŋke mvuntelem mvù yuule, ɛ mwɛɛm mvunciim no yuule fô bó le. Geenɛn, bó dioo kɛŋke mvuntelem mvù yiile sɛ bó kɛŋke mbee, fiɛɛ saa enu dvú fì yuule fô bó le kɛ, njefo boŋkpwawcɛ bobole bô je yì mvuntelem mvubole nu jó, nu ɛ befe wase.
56001016	Boba bonyii duu lɛ bó kee Nyo', geenɛn ɛ gee dibole kaa duŋci lɛ bó nu ɛ ma lo Nyo'. Nce wvubo nyɛne baay, ɛ bó tɛmyi bikuu. Kɛ bó nu bonyii bò nulo ege naa lo fiɛɛ fì jee kɛ.
56002001	Fô wo le Taytus, fiuw nu ɛ wo kɛŋke keeyɛɛyi bonyii ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô mwɛɛm mvù cemsene ɛ̂ n'yɛɛyi wvu lɛŋ e.
56002002	Ɛ̀ teetè bolemsɛ bò nu wase ŋgaybonyii lɛ bó ejicì ye yibole yî fiɛɛ le ficii, kɛŋkè n'wvum fô bikuu bibole, geè mwɛɛm diɛwɛ bonyii bò kɛŋke bvufee le, kɛŋkè mbee ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvu lɛŋ, kɛŋkè keŋkoŋɛn ɛ ɛ̀ nu ke lɛŋ, kuulè shém yî boŋgɛw e bocii.
56002003	Ɛ̀ teetè tɛn bokɛnɛ bò nu wase ŋgaybonyii lɛ bó ekɛŋkè keŋge ɛ ɛ̀ nu kè duŋci n'wvum fô Nyo' le. Fo bó ekunsenè mvuŋkunsɛn kɛ. Fo bó enù bonfaw bo mbvuum e kɛ. Bó eyɛɛyì bonyii ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô mwɛɛm mvù jee.
56002004	Nonɛn, ɛ́ bó emum eteete ŋgon bokɛnɛ no ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó ekooŋke bole' bobole noo boom bobole,
56002005	bvuu geè mwɛɛm diɛwɛ bonyii bò kɛŋke bvufee le, ceè nce wvù yuule, tawtenè yéw yibole, kɛŋkè mvuntelem mvù jee fô bonyii le, yuukè bole' bobole. Nonɛn, wee saa ebvuu enu dvú wvù nulo ejeme diɛw yì befe ɛkumɛ diɛw Nyo' kɛ.
56002006	Ɛ̀ nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no wo nu ejemyi ɛ̂ cubonyii lɛ bó kɛŋke keegeè mwɛɛm diɛwɛ bonyii bò kɛŋke bvufee le.
56002007	Ɛ̀ duŋcì keŋge kè jee yî fiɛɛ ficii fì wo gee le, wvu lɛ bonyii eyɛnè beŋene. Seke wo yɛɛyi bonyii bô fiɛɛ, ɛ wo lese fitele fiuw ficii yî dvú le, no yɛɛyi bô shiee,
