56002008	ɛ njeme wo nu wvu lɛŋ wvù ɛ̀ nulo wee saa ekɛŋke fiɛɛ fì befe keejeme ɛnte jodvu kɛ. Nonɛn, ɛ́ bonyii bò kicine beene ewuumɛn njefo kɛ bó kɛŋke fiɛɛ fì befe keejeme ɛkumɛ beene kɛ.
56002009	Ɛ̀ teetè bonfaw lɛ bó enya bikuu bibole ɛ̂ bonyii bò kɛŋke bó, egeè fiɛɛ ficii no bó gomte lɛ bó egeè. Fo bó etfuusè fiɛɛ dew yibole kɛ.
56002010	Fo bó esooŋkè mwɛɛm mvubole kɛ. Bó kɛŋke keeduŋcì lo ɛ̂ jé le yicii lɛ bó nu bonyii bo kecɛɛy e. Ɛ́ bó gee nonɛn yî fiɛɛ ficii le, ɛ́ bonyii emum eyɛne n'yɛɛyi wvu ɛkumɛ Nyo' wvù Mboyse wesebeene le, lɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ ɛ fí kɛŋke njoŋ.
56002011	Ɛ̀ yɛɛyì bó nonɛn, njefo mbuwma Nyo' keeboyse bonyii nu ɛ to wase wvu lɛ ɛ̀ nɛlo ɛ́ bonyii bocii ke eboy.
56002012	Mbuwma wvun yɛɛyi beene lɛ beene ecinɛ nce wvù yaa nu kɛ wvù Nyo' gomte le, bô lɛ fo beene ekɛŋke shiee wvu baay yî mwɛɛm mvu yî nshɛ le kɛ. Lɛ beene eceè bô bvufee bvusɛɛbeene fó bvucii, ceè nce wvu teytey noo nce wvù Nyo' gomte yî woŋ wvun e.
56002013	Beene eceè nonɛn, cɛyte bvujoŋkɛ bvù beene taale fwe yî dvú le bvù nu ke ebuynɛn, bvù ɛ̀ nu bvukukɛ bvu Nyo' wesebeene wvu baay wvù ɛ̀ nu Mboyse wvù Jisos Klistu le.
56002014	Wvú to nu ɛ nya ɛkolɛ kew nje yese beene keesum beene yî bibefɛ le bicii, keege ɛ́ beene eyuule, nu bonyii bew bò kɛŋke shiee wvu baay keegee gee dì jee.
56002015	Mvun nu mwɛɛm mvù wo kɛŋke keeyɛɛyi bonyii dvú. Ɛ̀ teetè bó, duŋcì bojay bobole bô mvuŋgay mvunciim mvù wo kɛŋke. Fo wo ebee ɛ́ wee ejin wo kɛ.
56003001	Ɛ̀ tamcì bonyii bo mbee le lɛ bó eyuukè bonyii bò saake woŋ bô bò kɛŋke mvuŋgay ɛ̂ bó we le. Bó egeè fiɛɛ fì bó gayte, enù ɛ bó ɛ seyse keegee fiɛɛ ficii fì ɛ̀ nu fi lɛŋ.
56003002	Fo bó ejemyì fiɛɛ fì befe ɛkumɛ wee kɛ. Fo bó ewaalè diwaa kɛ. Bó enù wɛɛ, joo bikuu bibole fokuse fwe dvu bonyii bocii.
56003003	Ɛ̀ kumyì lɛ beene tɛn to shee gee keyuŋ, tɛmyi bikuu, jayte je. Beene to nu bonfaw bo mwɛɛm e jɛɛy jɛɛy mvù ye yesebeene to kooŋke, bvuu diee bikuu bisɛɛbeene. Beene to cee nce wesebeene kɛŋke kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu mvuntelem mvù befe bô kendoŋ ke benɛɛn, ɛ bonyii bane beene ɛ beene bane tɛn bonyii.
56003004	Geenɛn, ɛ Nyo' wvù Mboyse wesebeene ke dioo duŋcɛ fitele fiew fì jee bô keŋkoŋɛn kew fô beene le,
56003005	mum boyse beene. Kɛ wvú to boyse beene nje fiɛɛ fimew fi lɛŋ fì beene to geɛ kɛ. Wvú to boyse nje shen ye fele yî ncukɛ wvù wvú to cukɛɛ beene ɛ beene kɛŋkɛ mboo wvu fwɛ le, ɛ Keyoy ke Yuule kumɛn beene ɛ beene no nu bonyii bo bofɛ kɛŋke nshii wvu fwɛ.
56003006	Keyoy ke Yuule kin nu ɛ wvú to loocɛ tfuw lo yî yese beene le fele yî Jisos Klistu wvù Mboyse wesebeene le.
56003007	Wvú to ge nonɛn wvu lɛ wen ebuw lo beene, ejo beene lɛ beene nu sɛ jay, emum enu bondiela bew taale fwe keeke ekɛŋkɛ nshii wvù mɛy lo.
56003008	Njeme wvù me njeme wvun nu naa lo kecɛɛy. Me nshieele naa lɛ wo ejemyì ciise lo mwɛɛm mvun ɛ̂ bonyii, wvu lɛ bonyii bò nu ɛ bee Nyo' le eyɛn lɛ bó enya bikuu bibole keegee gee dì jee. Mvun nu naa mwɛɛm mvù jee baay, ɛ mvú too bô sɛw fô bonyii le bocii.
56003009	Geenɛn, ɛ̀ wɛmtè bombew bo keyuŋ e, bô ɛdiee ɛ bo'icee dikfuu yò bonyii ke she taaŋke. Ɛ̀ wɛmtè tɛn mvuŋkicɛn bô diwaa di ɛkumɛ bonci bo Bojuu le. Kɛ mvumvun mwɛɛm kɛŋke naa lo sɛw kɛ. Ɛ̀ nu mwɛɛm mvu ɛcici.
56003010	Ɛ́ wee nu dvú wvù too bô keŋgawsɛn, ɛ́ wo jeme ɛ̂ wvú. Ɛ́ wo jeme ɛ̂ wvú kaŋ mwaaŋ ɛ buy bokaŋ bofɛɛ sɛ wvú lu, ɛ́ wo cinɛ je ye le.
56003011	Ɛ̀ keè lɛ wvuwɛ wee nu ɛ wvú ɛ cinɛ wase je yi lɛŋ e ɛ no bvuyte lo, ɛ nce we nu wvu kebefɛ, ɛ wvú ɛ lese wase ɛkolɛ kew ŋgɛw e.
56003012	Me nu ŋke enciinse Atɛmas kɛnɛɛ Tikikus fô wo le. Wvú ke dioo ɛ to, ɛ wo mom naa ntay keeto fô me le Nikobolis. Ɛ̀ nu jó jò me nu ɛ nseyse lɛ me nu ŋke enu yî kefew ke nffum wvù tɛmyi le.
56003013	Momɛ naa ntay keeficɛ Senas wvù wee wvù looci kee bonci, bô Abolos yî lɛne dibole. Momɛ eyɛn lɛ bó nu ɛ kɛŋkɛ fiɛɛ ficii fì bó shieele.
56003014	Bonyii bosɛɛbeene tɛn kɛŋke keeyɛɛyi keenya bikuu bibole keegee dilemme dì jee, wvu lɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó efici yî mwɛɛm mvù nu shiee le lɛ bó eficɛ le. Fo bó enù kɛ lo ɛcici kɛ.
56003015	Bonyii bocii bò nu fɛn bee bó ciinse ŋgayma ɛ̂ wo. Gayɛ bonyii bo mbee le bocii bò kooŋke beene. Nyo' ebuw ben bocii.
57001001	Ɛ̀ nu me wvù Baul, ɛ me nu yî ncaw e nje me nu wee Klistu Jisos. Ɛ̀ nu bee waa bwee wesebeene wvù Timatio. Me nsaaŋke ŋwa' wvun fô Filemun wvù nsaa yesebeene shém wvù bee bó lemte yî fiɛɛ le fimwaaŋ,
57001002	noo fô Afia wvù jɛme yesebeene le, bô Alkibus wvù beene ɛ bó diuu yî fiɛɛ le fimwaaŋ diɛwɛ bonyii bo jem e, noo fô kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo mbee le kè taashi ɛ̂ wo yew e.
57001003	Nyo' Icee wesebeene bô Tata Jisos Klistu ebuw ben bô kembonɛn, ebvuu enya ben bô mvuntelem mvù lɛɛtene.
57001004	Filemun, me ŋke ndioo mbunlee sekecii eŋkume wo, no nyaa kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu keyoone ɛ̂ Nyo' wɛm ɛkumɛ wo,
57001005	njefo me n'yuuke no wo nu ɛ lese fitele yî Tata Jisos e, ɛ no kooŋke bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo Nyo' le bocii.
57001006	Me ɛ no mbunlee lɛ no wo nu ɛ lese wase fitele yî Jisos e, ben ɛ bonyii bo Nyo' le ɛ no nu yî kentaashɛ le, fifin ege ɛ́ wo emɛse ekiɛɛ mwɛɛm mvù jee mvunciim mvù ɛ̀ nu mvusɛɛbeene bò nu ɛ taashɛ bô bo Klistu.
57001007	Waa bwɛɛm, kfuu keŋkoŋɛn kè wo kɛŋke fô bonyii bo Nyo' le, gee ɛ mvuntelem mvubole lɛɛtene, nu ɛ ge me ɛ no n'yuuke njoŋ baay, ɛ fitele fiem tɛn yvuwse.
57001008	Fiɛɛ fimew ɛ mum ɛ no nu dvú fì me nshieele lɛ wo ege, ɛ ɛ̀ be nulo ɛ́ me eŋgay lo bô mvuŋgay mvù me ŋkɛŋke diɛwɛ wee Klistu le lɛ wo ege.
57001009	Geenɛn, nje keŋkoŋɛn, me nu eŋku lo can ɛ̂ wo. Me wvù Baul nu wase ŋgaywee, ɛ me mbvuu nu yî ncaw e keseen nje saaka wvu ɛkumɛ Klistu Jisos.
57001010	Me ɛ no ŋkule can ɛ̂ wo ɛkumɛ waa wɛm wvù Onesimus wvun. Me nto njo wvú waa wɛm e yî mbee le nu yew ncaw e fɛn.
57001011	Fwele to nu ɛ wvú nu fiɛɛ fi ɛcici fô wo le. Keseen wvú ɛ no looci wase nu naa wee fô bee wo le bocii.
57001012	Me ɛ no ntfuuse wvú jim fô wo le keseen. Wvú looci nu fitele fiem.
57001013	Me ŋkooŋke lɛ ɛ̀ be nulo ɛ́ me eŋgɛɛ wvú mbew yɛm e ɛ́ wvú etaale fô me le fô bvudvuu bwuw e no me nu yî ncaw e fɛn nje saaka wvù jee wvu ɛkumɛ Jisos.
57001014	Geenɛn, me ɛ n'yɛn lɛ kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me eŋge fiɛɛ diɛwɛ fifin e sɛ wo kee fó kɛ, njefo kɛ me ŋgomte lɛ lemme diuw dì jee dì wo gee fô me le enù kɛ diɛwɛ me ŋkane lo wo kɛ. Me ŋgomte lɛ fí enù no fitele fiuw nu ɛ bee.
57001015	Sekemew ɛ Onesimus to nɛ ɛ̂ wo ɛjise yî kefew e caan nɛn, lɛ wvú ke dioo ɛ tu jim, ɛ́ ben ɛ wvú emum enù wase kemakaa,
57001016	ɛ wvú yaa bvuu nu nfwa kɛ, ɛ wvú fele wase nfwa. Wvú nu wase waa bwoo shém yî Klistu le, ɛ wvú nu tɛn fô me le baay sɛ ge fô wo le, no wvú nu wee wo lemme bvuu nu wee Tata.
57001017	Nonɛn, ɛ́ wo fɛn nu ɛ yɛn lɛ bee wo nu yî kentaashɛ le, ɛ́ wo fiisɛn wvú no ɛ̀ be nu me ɛ́ wo efiisɛn.
57001018	Ɛ́ ɛ̀ nu lɛ wvú to nu ɛ jay fiɛɛ fô wo le, kɛnɛɛ lɛ, wvú kɛŋke fioo ben ɛ wvú, ɛ́ wo gɛɛ ɛ̂ diee diem e.
57001019	Me nsaaŋke fin ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô kebo kem lɛ, “Me wvù Baul nu ŋke enlaw.” Me njemyi nɛn ɛ kɛ shiee nu dvú wvù me nshe nseŋe lo lɛ, wo tɛn kɛŋke fioo bee wo kɛ. Nshii wvù wo kɛŋke keseen nu nje me.
57001020	Nonɛn waa bwɛɛm, ficɛ kɛ me njefo bee wo nu bonyii bo Tata le. Geɛ nonɛn nje kentaashɛ ke bee wo le yî Klistu le ɛ́ ye ejoŋ me.
57001021	Me nsaaŋke ɛ̂ wo nɛn, ŋkee naa ntay lɛ wo nu ebee keege fiɛɛ fì me ŋgayte, ɛ wo nu dioo gee, ege naa efesɛn lo.
57001022	Keebvuu bise fó, seyse bvudvuu bvu nce le ɛ̂ me, njefo me ntaale fwe ŋkee lɛ Nyo' nu eyuw bunle yene eciinse me fô ben e.
57001023	Ɛbaflas wvù nu bee bó yî ncaw e fɛn nje saaka wvu ɛkumɛ Klistu Jisos, gayte wo le.
57001024	Maaku, Alistakus, Dɛmas noo Luka bò bee bó lemte yî kentaashɛ le, gayte tɛn wo le.
57001025	Tata Jisos Klistu ebuw ben bô kembonɛn kew ɛ́ kí eficì biyoy binɛn.
58001001	Ɛ̀ to shee nu fwele, ɛ Nyo' jemyi ɛ̂ bo'icee bosɛɛbeene dew bonyii bew bo ntum e bokaŋ e nteen bô ɛ̂ jé le jɛɛy jɛɛy.
58001002	Geenɛn, ɛ̀ dioo nu ɛdiuw ɛyan yo fokemɛse le, wvú ɛ jeme wase ɛ̂ beene ɛ ɛ̀ nu diuw Waa we le. Ɛ̀ nu Waa we wvun wvù wvú nu ɛ gɛɛ lɛ wen nu ke enya fiɛɛ ficii can ye le ɛ́ wvú esaakè. Ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù Nyo' to bomɛɛ woŋ bô fiɛɛ ficii can ye le.
58001003	N'yuu Nyo' lawkene yî ye le, ɛ wvú nu wunte Nyo' kebɛɛ. Ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù gee ɛ ɛbulɛ bô nshɛ sɛ nu dvú. Ɛ wvú gee ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô diɛw ye yì kɛŋke mvuŋgay e. Wvú to nu ɛ man bibefɛ bisɛɛbeene. No wvú man nonɛn mum ben we shii ɛ̂ ɛbo ke ɛcɛɛy ke Nyo' Bvukukɛ le.
58001004	Fí ɛ mum ɛ no nu lɛ Waa Nyo' kuuke naa baay fele bonceendaa bo Nyo' le, kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no diee dì Nyo' teŋe wvú dvú kuuke naa tɛn baay fele dibole.
58001005	Beene kee lɛ wvú kuuke lo njefo kɛ nceendaa Nyo' mvu nu dvú wvù Nyo' ke nu ɛ yuu wase gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Wo nu Waa wɛm, ɛ ɛbɛn nu ɛ me ɛ ŋgay wase lɛ me nu Ico” kɛ. Ɛ kɛ mvu nu dvú wvù wvú ke nu ɛ yuu wase jeme ɛkumɛ wvú lɛ, “Me nu ŋke enu Ice, ɛ wvú nu Waa wɛm” kɛ.
58001006	Ɛ̀ to nu kefew kè Nyo' to nu keetum Waa we wvu fwe wvun yî woŋ wvun e, ɛ wvú gay lɛ, bonceendaa bowene bocii ewvumtè wvú.
58001007	Ɛ fiɛɛ fì Nyo' to jemyɛɛ ɛkumɛ bonceendaa bew nu lɛ, wen gee ɛ bó nu diɛwɛ fwefwe le, gee tɛn ɛ bó bò nu bonyii bowene bo lemme le nu diɛwɛ ɛlem ɛ ŋguy e.
58001008	Ɛ dioo tu fô Waa we, ɛ wvú gay lɛ, “O Nyo', wo nu ke eshii yî kawla wo le esaake sekecii sɛ ŋka. Nce wvu teytey nu ke enu ketoome ke bvunfon bwuw e.
58001009	Wo kooŋke ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fi teytey, bane fì befe. Nonɛn me wvù Nyo' wvù nu Nyo' wo ɛ mum ɛ mbense wo ɛ nfey ŋgoo yo, no me nu ɛ n'yefe wo bô nsusu bonfon yì ɛ̀ nu yi bvujoŋkɛ.”
58001010	Ɛ wvú bvuu jeme tɛn ɛ̂ Waa we lɛ, “Tata, ɛ̀ nu wo wvù to bomɛɛ nshɛ foŋkɛw, ɛ mwɛɛm mvunciim mvù nu we nu lemme di ɛbo kuw e.
58001011	Mwɛɛm mvun nu ke eka, geenɛn ɛ́ eshɛɛ kɛ wo. Mvú nu ke eyvumɛn diɛwɛ ndvú le.
58001012	Wo nu ke ekɛwe mvú diɛwɛ kekum e. Mvú nu ke ekumɛn diɛwɛ no ndvu ké kpwe ncom. Geenɛn wo nu ke emɛy kɛ nu no wo nu. Kɛ bilum biuw nu ke eyuu eka kɛ.”
58001013	Ɛ̀ nu nceendaa Nyo' mvu wvù la wvù Nyo' ke nu ɛ yuu wase gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Shiilɛ ɛ̂ ɛbo kem ke ɛcɛɛy e, egɛn ebuy kefew kè me nu ŋke enjike bonyii buw bo bvuban e ɛ̂ wo ɛjise diɛwɛ kedvuushɛɛ ke bikaa biuw e, ɛ́ wo etome bikaa yî bó le?”
58001014	Bonceendaa bo Nyo' le ban nu kɛ lo biyoy bì lemte Nyo' le, ɛ wvú tumte ɛ bí ghane fici bonyii bò nu ke ekɛŋkɛ mboyma.
58002001	Fí ɛ mum ɛ no nu lɛ beene kɛŋke keegɛɛ bvufee naa ntay yî fiɛɛ fì beene to yuwɛɛ le, wvu lɛ fo beene ke enɛ ebvuyte lo kɛ.
58002002	Beene kpwaake lɛ, ɛ́ bontum bò bonceendaa bo Nyo' le to teete fwele to nu fiɛɛ ɛ fí tɛmyi naa baay, ɛ́ wee ké eŋgoy mvu kɛnɛɛ etun keege no bó gayte, ɛ́ mwɛtɛn kɛŋkɛ nlawma wvudvu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ,
58002003	ɛ́ ke ege la ɛ́ beene enu sɛ bó ɛ yɛn ŋgɛw fɛn ɛ beene ɛ jo mboyma wvù kuuke wvun kɛ lo ncɛw? Mboyma wvun to yaw Tata Jisos no fewci ɛkumɛ wvú, ɛ bonyii bò to yuwɛɛ no wvú fewci ke mum tom tɛn kecɛɛy kedvu no bó to fewci ɛ̂ beene.
58002004	Ɛ Nyo' tɛn to nu ɛ tom bô mwɛɛm mvù duŋci mvuŋgay mvu mwew noo biŋghaw bi mwɛɛm e noo mwɛɛm mvu diuw wvù yumɛɛn e mvù bó to gee. Ɛ wvú bvuu gawcɛ nnyá Keyoy ke Yuule no wvú to shieele keetom dvú.
58002005	Nyo' to baa gɛɛ woŋ wvu fwɛ wvù bese fewci ɛkumɛ wvú wvun lɛ ɛ̀ nu ke esaake bonceendaa bew kɛ.
58002006	Bó nu ɛ saŋ bvudvuu bvumew e ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le ɛkumɛ saaka wvun lɛ, “Wee wvu wum nu naa la wvù wo kpwaake ɛkumɛ wvú? Waa wee wvu wum nu naa la wvù wo kɛŋke shiee we?
58002007	Yî kefew e nɛn caan nu ɛ wo to ge ɛ wvú no nu yî bvudvuu le ɛ bvú nu ɛkuse jo bvu bonceendaa buw e. Ɛ wo ke ghaa wvú ɛ wvú no kɛŋke bvukukɛ bô n'wvum.
58002008	Wo nu ɛ gɛɛ mwɛɛm mvunciim ɛkuse jo wvú, wvú ɛ no saake.” No Nyo' to gɛkɛɛ mwɛɛm mvunciim ɛkuse jo wee wvu wum, fiɛɛ fimew baa bvuu nu dvú fì nu sɛ fí nu ɛ̂ wvú ɛkuse kɛ. Naa no fí cim nu nonɛn, nu ɛ kɛ beene yɛne wase lɛ mwɛɛm mvunciim nu ɛ̂ wee wvu wum ɛkuse kɛ.
58002009	Geenɛn Jisos nu wee wvù beene yɛne lɛ yî kefew e nɛn caan nu ɛ Nyo' to ge ɛ bvudvuu bwew no nu ɛkuse jo bvu bonceendaa bew e. Ɛ Nyo' ke bense wvú ɛ wvú no kɛŋke bvukukɛ bô n'wvum njefo wvú to nu ɛ yɛn ŋgɛw kpwe, wvu lɛ wvú ekpwe kpwe wee tfuu nje mbuwma wvu Nyo' fô bonyii le.
58002010	Ɛ̀ nu Nyo' wvù ge mwɛɛm mvunciim, ɛ mwɛɛm mvunciim nu mwew. No wvú to gomte lɛ wen nu ke ejo bonyii bocii bò ɛ̀ nu boom bew ɛ́ bó eley bvukukɛ bwew e, ɛ fí mum no nu naa lɛŋ lɛ wvú ege ɛ́ Jisos eyɛn ŋgɛw wvu lɛ wvú enù ɛ wvú ɛ kpwɛntɛn ɛ gɛn ɛ mɛse wee wvù ecɛɛ je mboyma fô bó le.
58002011	Wvú wvù Jisos wvù gee ɛ bonyii sɛ yuule ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛjise, nu ɛ bô bonyii bodvu bò wvú gee ɛ bó yuule, kɛŋke Icee bó mwaaŋ. Ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì kɛ wvú wuumene keeteŋe bó lɛ boom bo bwee wen e kɛ.
58002012	Wvú to nu ɛ gay ɛ̂ Nyo' kefew kemew e lɛ, “Me nu ŋke encawsee diee diuw we ɛ̂ boom bo bwɛɛm e ɛnte. Me nu ŋke en'yemte mbensee wo ɛ̂ kentaashɛ kebole ɛnte.”
58002013	Ɛ wvú bvuu gay lɛ, “Me nu ŋke eŋgɛɛ bvufee bwem yî Nyo' le.” Bvuu kase gay lɛ, “Me wvun fɛn bee boom bò Nyo' nu ɛ nya ɛ̂ me bocii.”
58002014	No boom bò wvú gayte ban nu bonyii ɛ bó kɛŋke nyam ye bô ɛlɛmɛ, ɛ wvú wvù Jisos mum jo tɛn nyam ye wee wvu wum, wvu lɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wvú ke ekpwe keeŋgoy dɛwle wvù kɛŋke mvuŋgay mvu kpwe le.
58002015	Ɛ wvú ke ge nonɛn mum bvuse bonyii bò to cee bvunfaw e yî nshii wvubole tfuu njefo bó to fane kpwe.
58002016	Fí looci yuule naa ntay lɛ kɛ wvú to kɛŋke shiee ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô bonceendaa bo Nyo' le kɛ. Wvú to kɛŋke ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô kfuu di Abla'am e.
58002017	Ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì to geɛ ɛ Jisos sɛ tu diɛwɛ boom bo bwee le yî fiɛɛ le ficii, wvu lɛ wvú enù ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le kebole wvù camte shen fô bó le, ɛ wvú ɛ lese tɛn fitele yî lemme di Nyo' le keege keman ɛ́ Nyo' elɛɛshɛ bibefɛ bibole.
58002018	No wvú to yɛnɛɛ ŋgɛw, ɛ mmom to fô wvú le, wvú ɛ mum ɛ no kee no ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wvú efii bonyii bò mmom too tɛn fô bó le.
58003001	Nonɛn boom bo bwɛɛm e bò ɛ̀ nu bonyii bo Nyo' le, ɛ bó ɛ tee tɛn bó lɛ bó ke eley woŋ wvu we le, ben egɛɛ bvufee yî Jisos e. Wvú nu waa ntum Nyo' bvuu nu ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le ke mbee wvù beene ké no seŋe ɛ̂ bonyii le.
58003002	Wvú to lemte bô fitele fiew ficii fô Nyo' wvù to gɛkɛɛ wvú lɛ wvú elemtè wvú le kɛ no Muses tɛn to lemte bô fiew fitele ficii yew dvu Nyo'.
58003003	Geenɛn, Jisos nu wee wvù bó ebɛnseè ntay fele Muses kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no wee ké bomte yew ɛ bó no bɛnsee wvú fele yew yidvu.
58003004	Kɛ yew mi nu dvú yì nu sɛ ɛ̀ bom wee kɛ. Geenɛn, Nyo' nu wvù bom mwɛɛm mvunciim.
58003005	Muses to lemte naa ntay bô fitele fiew yew Nyo' le yicii diɛwɛ waa lemme le. Ɛ mwɛɛm mvunciim mvù wvú to gee to tomte ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì Nyo' to nu keeke eyuu ejeme.
58003006	Ɛ Klistu ke lem tɛn yew dvu Nyo' bô fitele fiew ficii ɛ ɛ̀ nu diɛwɛ waa yew e. Yew Nyo' yin nu beene fɛn ɛ́ beene leeme tɛmyi yî fiɛɛ fì beene nu ɛ kuu shém ɛ no taale fwe yî dvú le bô kembense ye.
58003007	Beene eyuw lɛ fiɛɛ fì Keyoy ke Yuule to gayɛɛ. Kí to nu ɛ gay lɛ, “Ɛ́ ben yuw lo ɛ Nyo' ɛ jeme ɛ̂ ben ɛbɛn,
58003008	fo ben etɛme bikuu diɛwɛ no bo'icee bonɛn to sɛɛnene bô bo Nyo' diuu dì bó to momte Nyo' ŋkpwaante kɛ.
58003009	Ɛ̀ nu jó jò bo'icee bonɛn to momɛɛ me wvù Nyo', yɛn biŋghaw bi mwɛɛm e bì me nto ŋgeɛ fô bó le yî bilum e mbaanyɛ.
58003010	Nonɛn ɛ me nton'yɛ shém bee ɛngokɛ ke bonyii le kedvu, mum ŋgay lɛ, ‘Kɛ mvuntelem mvubole ké no nu naa lo yî yɛm e kɛ. Bó baa kee wase je yɛm kɛ.’
58003011	Ɛ shém ton'yɛ me ɛ me nlew lo lɛ, ‘Kɛ ɛ̀ nu naa lo ɛ́ bó ke eyuu eley bvudvuu bwem bvu nlɛɛtɛn e kɛ.’”
58003012	Boom bo bwɛɛm e, ben emum eyɛnè fo wee mvu ben e enù dvú wvù kɛŋke fitele fì befe, fì tune keebee Nyo' le, nulo ege ɛ́ ben enɛ ebase jim ɛ̂ Nyo' wvù kɛŋke nshii le kɛ.
58003013	Fiɛɛ fì ben kɛŋke keegee nu lɛ ben eteetè bikuu binɛn ɛdiuw ɛcii, no kefew kin nu kí kè bó teŋe ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le lɛ, “Ɛbɛn.” Ben egeè nonɛn fo fiɛɛ fì befe fimew ke enɛ elɛwcɛ wee ɛ́ wvú enɛ etɛmyi ɛkolɛ.
58003014	Ben ekeè lɛ beene nu wase fiɛɛ fimwaaŋ beene ɛ bo Klistu fɛn ɛ́ beene ɛ mɛy ɛ no jici fiɛɛ fì beene to leeme wase yî dvú le fwele ɛ gɛn ɛ mɛse.
58003015	Ben ekumyì fiɛɛ fì lɛ, “Ɛ́ ben yuw lo ɛ Nyo' ɛ jeme ɛ̂ ben ɛbɛn, fo ben etɛme bikuu diɛwɛ no bo'icee bonɛn to sɛɛnene bô bo Nyo' kɛ.”
58003016	Ɛ̀ nu baa bò to yuwɛɛ ɛ Nyo' ɛ jeme ɛ̂ bó ɛ bó mwase lo no sɛɛnene bô wvú? Kɛ ɛ̀ nu bonyii bocii bò Muses to joɛ Ijiw buy bô bó le?
58003017	Ɛ ɛ̀ nu baa bodvu bò Nyo' to ton'yɛɛ shém bô bó yî bilum e mbaanyɛ? Kɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ bó bò to geɛ bibefɛ, ke kpwekɛn ŋkpwaante jodvu le?
58003018	Ɛ ɛ̀ bvuu nu baa bò Nyo' to lewɛɛ lɛ kɛ ɛ̀ nu naa lo ɛ́ bó ke eyuu eley bvudvuu bvuwene bvu nlɛɛtɛn e kɛ? Ɛ̀ nu kɛ bó bodvu bò to tɛmyi bikuu le?
58003019	Nonɛn beene nu ɛ yɛn lɛ kɛ bonyii bodvu to nulo egɛn eley bvudvuu bvudvu le kɛ, njefo bó to baa lese fitele yî Nyo' le kɛ.
58004001	Fí ɛ mum ɛ no nu lɛ ŋkawma wvù Nyo' to gɛkɛɛ lɛ bonyii nu ke eley nlɛɛtɛn e bɛɛ leeme kɛ fó. Nonɛn beene emum eyɛnè fo bó ke dioo etaa eyɛn ɛ wee mvu ben e baa ekocɛn keeley wvú le kɛ.
58004002	Saaka wvù jee wvun nu ɛ to wase fô beene le kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no wvú to toɛ fô bó le. Geenɛn, saaka wvudvu wvù bó to yuwɛɛ to baa fi bó kɛ, njefo wvú to to fô bó le ɛ bó faŋɛ yaa bee wvú le kɛ.
58004003	Fô beene bò nu ɛ bee wvú le nu ɛ beene nulo eley nlɛɛtɛn wvudvu le. Ɛ bonyii bomew ba nu ɛ Nyo' to gay lɛ, “Shém to nu ɛ ton'yɛ me, ɛ me nlew lo lɛ, ‘Kɛ bó nu ke eyuu eley naa lo nlɛɛtɛn wɛm e kɛ.’” Nyo' to jemyi nɛn, naa ɛ lemme diew to ka wase foŋkɛw seke wvú to bomɛɛ woŋ.
58004004	Beene kee lɛ bó nu ɛ saŋ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le bvudvuu bvumew e ɛkumɛ diuu di ɛdiuw ɛsooshwiy ɛ̂ yin je le lɛ, “Nyo' to nu ɛ lem lemme diew dicii, ɛ ɛ̀ ke dioo yiŋsɛn ɛdiuw ɛsooshwiy ɛ wvú lɛɛtɛn.”
58004005	Ɛ dioo nu bvudvuu bvù bó be jemyi wase fó bwɛ le, wvú ɛ bvuu ɛ jeme lɛ, “Kɛ bó nu ke eyuu eley naa nlɛɛtɛn wɛm e kɛ.”
58004006	Fí nu kecɛɛy lɛ nlɛɛtɛn wvun bɛɛ kɛ fó. Ɛ bonyii bomew nu ke eley wvú le. Ɛ bonyii bò to yawɛɛ yuw saaka wvù jee wvun to baa ley nlɛɛtɛn wvun e njefo bó to nu ɛ yuw, geenɛn tun keege no wvú gayte.
58004007	Nonɛn ɛ Nyo' mum kase gɛɛ diuu dimew dì wvú teŋe lɛ “Ɛbɛn.” No wvú gɛkɛɛ ke mum jeme diuw Nfon Dawe le ɛ bilum ɛ fey wase nteen no bonyii bodvu to tunɛɛ keege no wvú gayte. Ɛ fiɛɛ fì wvú to jemyɛɛ nu fí fì beene be yuuke wase lɛ, “Ɛ́ ben yuw lo ɛ Nyo' ɛ jeme ɛ̂ ben ɛbɛn, fo ben etɛme bikuu kɛ.”
58004008	Ɛ́ ɛ̀ nu lɛ bvudvuu bvù Yoshua to joɛ bonyii gɛn ley bô bó fó to nu wase bvudvuu bvu nlɛɛtɛn e bvudvu, tu kɛ Nyo' to bee ebvuu ejeme ɛkumɛ diuu dimew lɛ ɛ̀ nu di nlɛɛtɛn e kɛ.
58004009	Fí ɛ mum ɛ no nu lɛ diuu di nlɛɛtɛn e bɛɛ dvú fwe fô bonyii bo Nyo' le diɛwɛ dì Nyo' to lɛɛtɛnɛɛ dvú diɛ le.
58004010	Fí ɛ no nu lɛ, ɛ́ wee ley nlɛɛtɛn wvun e, tu mwɛtɛn ɛ lɛɛtɛn wase yî lemme diew e dicii lɛŋlɛŋ no Nyo' to lɛɛtɛnɛɛ yî diew lemme le.
58004011	Nonɛn beene emomtè ntay keeke eley nlɛɛtɛn wvun e, wvu lɛ fo wee mvu ke egbwe lɛ ɛ̀ base ɛkolɛ kè tɛmyɛɛn wvú diɛwɛ bonyii bo fwele ba le kɛ.
58004012	Ben ekeè lɛ diɛw Nyo' kɛŋke nshii, lemte. Yí koole fele nyo yì bó nu ɛ fon biba bicii. Yí ké no leyte gɛne buyte fô nshii bô keyoy ke wee le taashi, leyte tɛn ɛ̂ biyuŋ bô bikufɛ bi wee le. Yí ké no bwaashi boŋkpwawcɛ noo mwɛɛm mvù nu ɛ̂ fitele fi wee le.
58004013	Kɛ fiɛɛ nu naa lo dvú fì Nyo' nu ɛ bom fì nulo enyiime ɛ̂ wvú ɛjise kɛ. Mwɛɛm mvunciim yen'yi ɛ̂ wvú ɛjise ɛndan. Ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù beene kɛŋke keeke etaŋe diuw ɛ̂ wvú fwe.
58004014	Nonɛn no beene be ɛ gay wase lɛ beene kɛŋke ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le ke baay, kè ɛ̀ nu Jisos wvù Waa Nyo', ɛ wvú ɛ ben wase ɛ tosɛn ɛbulɛ ɛ gɛn fowe, beene emum ejicì mbee wvù beene ké no seŋe ɛ̂ bonyii le ntay.
58004015	Kɛ ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le kesɛɛbeene kin nu wee wvù nulo emaa kewɛɛyɛ kesɛɛbeene wvu lɛ wvú ecamtè shém fô beene le kɛ. Ɛ̀ nu wee ɛ mmom to to wase tɛn fô wvú le jé le jé le no yí too fô beene le, geenɛn ɛ wvú faŋɛ yaa ge kebefɛ kɛ.
58004016	Nonɛn beene emum ebencì too mbew kawla mbuwma Nyo' le sɛ nfan wvu lɛ wvú ecamtè shen fô beene le, ɛ́ dioo nu kefew kè fiɛɛ ghaake beene ɛ́ wvú ebuw beene bô nfi we.
58005001	Beene kee lɛ bó ké baale ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le ɛ̂ bonyii ɛntelɛŋ egɛɛ lɛ wvú elemtè Nyo' le nje bonyii, ɛ wvú mum no joo nnyá bonyii feese ɛ̂ Nyo', gee tɛn boncese fô bibefɛ bi bonyii le.
58005002	No wvú wvù cee ncese nu tɛn ɛ wvú wɛɛyi jé le nteen, ɛ wvú mum no kee keenu nyɛkeey bô bonyii bò yaa kee kɛ mwɛɛm bvuyte lo le.
58005003	Nje kewɛɛyɛ kew kin, ɛ wvú mum no kɛŋke keegee boncese fô biew bibefɛ le kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no wvú gee fô bi bonyii bomew e.
58005004	Kɛ wee nulo ebense ɛkolɛ kew lɛ wen enù ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le kɛ. Ɛ̀ ké baa Nyo' mwɛtɛn kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no wvú to balɛɛ Ɛlon.
58005005	Ɛ̀ nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no kɛ Klistu to baa bense ɛkolɛ kew lɛ wen enù ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le kɛ. Ɛ̀ to gɛke Nyo' wvú mum gay lɛ, “Wo nu Waa wɛm, ɛ ɛbɛn nu ɛ me ɛ ŋgay wase lɛ me nu Ico.”
58005006	Ɛ wvú bvuu gay bvudvuu bvumew e tɛn lɛ, “Wo nu cee ncese wvù mɛy lo ɛ̂ je yì Mɛlkisɛdɛk nu jó le.”
58005007	Ɛ̀ to nu seke Jisos to nu fokuse fɛn, wvú to ké no bunlee sekecii lɛke fô Nyo' le, beele foweɛwe shiwse misɛm fô wvú wvù Nyo' wvù nulo efi wvú can kpwe le. No ɛ̀ to nu wee ɛ wvú fane bvuu wvumte Nyo', ɛ Nyo' mum yuw bunle ye.
58005008	Naa no Jisos to nu Waa Nyo' nonɛn, boŋgɛw bò wvú to yɛnɛɛ to nu ɛ ge ɛ wvú yɛɛyi keeyuuke kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu Nyo' le.
58005009	Ɛ Nyo' ke ge ɛ wvú no nu wee wvù nu ɛ kpwɛntɛn ɛ gɛn ɛ mɛse, wvù eboysee bonyii bò yuuke wvú le. Ɛ mboyma wvun nu wvù nu sɛ ŋka.
58005010	No Nyo' geɛ nonɛn mum gɛɛ wvú lɛ wvú enù ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le diɛwɛ Mɛlkisɛdɛk e.
58005011	Mwɛɛm nu dvú nteen mvù bese bɛɛ kɛŋke keejeme ɛkumɛ saaka wvun. Geenɛn fí tɛmyi keenɛle ɛ́ fí eyuu fô ben e, njefo ben nu ɛ nɛ wase ɛ no lɛɛ baay keeyuw fiɛɛ.
58005012	Ɛ́ ɛ̀ be nu ɛ̂ lɛŋ e, tu ɛ̀ be yɛɛyi wase ben bonyii keseen. Ben ɛ kaa ɛ nɛ ɛ no nu lɛ bó ebvuu ekase eyɛɛyi lo ben bô mwɛɛm mvu ɛkumɛ diɛw Nyo', ɛ ɛ̀ nu mvù bó ké yaw kɛw yî dvú le. Ben bɛɛ diɛwɛ mvunlɛy mvu boom e mvù bɛɛ yamte ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛmben, ɛ bó baa diee wase mwɛɛm mvudien mvù tɛmyi kɛ.
58005013	Kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wee wvù bɛɛ yɛɛyi lo diɛw Nyo' ekee fiɛɛ fi lɛŋ ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛjise kɛ. Wvú nu diɛwɛ finlɛy fi wan e fì bɛɛ yamte ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛmben e.
58005014	Mwɛɛm mvudien mvù tɛmyi nu ɛ ɛ̀ ké no diee bonyii bò nu ɛ bó ɛ taw wase. Boban nu bonyii bò nu ɛ bó ɛ yɛɛyi wase keetaasse mwɛɛm kee jɛɛy jɛɛy mvù jee bô mvù befe.
58006001	No fí nu nonɛn, beene emum ecinɛ n'yɛɛyi wvu ɛkumɛ Klistu wvù wee ké yaw kɛw yɛɛyi le, egɛnè fwe ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî wvu bonyii bò nu ɛ taw wase le. Fo beene ebvuu ekɛw eleesè kenffuy ke n'yɛɛyi le kè lɛ bonyii ekumɛn mvuntelem mvubole yî gee dibole dì nulo etoo bô kpwe, noo n'yɛɛyi wvù lɛ bonyii elese fitele yî Nyo' le kɛ.
58006002	Kɛ ɛ̀ nulo tɛn ɛ́ beene ebvuu ekɛw eyɛɛyi lo ɛkumɛ no bó cuke bonyii, bô keegɛɛle can yî bonyii le kɛ. Ɛ kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ beene ebvuu ekɛw eyɛɛyi ɛkumɛ mbuy wvu yî kpwe le bô ɛkumɛ nsaw wvù nsumtɛn wvudvu nu wvù mɛy lo kɛ.
58006003	Mwɛɛm mvun nu ɛ beene nulo ecinɛ dvú egɛnè fwe fɛn ɛ Nyo' ɛ fi.
58006004	Beene ecinɛ dvú njefo ɛ́ bonyii nu ɛ bó to yuuse wase bó yî fiɛɛ fi Nyo' le, ɛ bó ɛ mom wase nnya yì nɛn'yi fowe, ɛ bó ɛ kɛŋkɛ wase tɛn Keyoy ke Yuule, ɛ nɛ ɛ kase ɛ tfuw bikaa, tu kɛ je nu naa lo dvú yì ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó ebvuu ege ɛ́ bó ekumɛn mvuntelem mvubole ekase etu jim kɛ.
58006005	Boban bonyii nu ɛ bó ɛ mom wase bvujoŋkɛ bvu diɛw Nyo' le ɛ yuw, ɛ bvuu ɛ kiɛɛ mvuŋgay mvu nshii wvù too le.
58006006	Ɛ́ bó ley wase mwɛɛm mvun e, ɛ kase ɛ tfuw bikaa, tu kɛ je bvuu nu dvú keege ɛ́ bó ekase ekumɛn mvuntelem mvubole etu jim kɛ, njefo fiɛɛ fì bó ge nu ɛ bó kaase joo ɛ ɛ̀ nu Waa Nyo' taa yî kentam e bô can yibo, shoose ya le.
58006007	Wɛɛ wvù jaŋ gbwee yî dvú le sekecii ɛ wvú nyaa mwɛɛm mvù bonyii bò bó lem wɛɛ wvudvu nje bó lɛ bó eboytè yî dvú le, ké no kɛŋke kembonɛn ke Nyo' le.
58006008	Geenɛn, ɛ́ ɛ̀ kuu bisafe bô bíay wɛne dvudvu, tu ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó eciese lo wvú, ke emum enɛ eton lo.
58006009	Nsáa yese shém, naa no bese cim jemyi nɛn, bese kee lɛ ben leeme finɛn ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî mwɛɛm mvù jee fele mvubole, ɛ ɛ̀ nu mvú mvù too bô mboyma fô ben e.
58006010	Kɛ Nyo' nu Nyo' kenlow wvù nulo ke edaayɛ lemme dinɛn dì ben lemte noo keŋkoŋɛn kè ben duŋci ɛ kɛw lo ɛ to ɛ buy keseen e fô bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bew e nje ye kɛ.
58006011	Shiee wese baay nu lɛ wee bô ɛkolɛ kew eleemè kɛ yî fifiɛ fiɛɛ le nonɛn egɛn emɛse, wvu lɛ ben ke ekɛŋkɛ fiɛɛ fì ben nu ɛ lese bvufee bvucii ɛ no taale fwe yî dvú le.
58006012	Fo ben egeè ŋgoy kɛ. Ben ebeŋɛn bonyii bò to lesɛɛ fitele yî Nyo' le, no kuule shém sɛ ke kɛŋkɛ fiɛɛ fì Nyo' to kawɛɛ.
58006013	Ben ekume seke Nyo' to geɛ ŋkawma ɛ̂ Abla'am. Wvú to dioo gee kan ɛ ɛ̀ nu diee diew di wvú wvù Nyo' le, njefo kɛ wee mvu to bvuu nu dvú wvù kuuke fele wvú, wvù wvú ekan diee diew kɛ.
58006014	Wvú to dioo kan gay lɛ, “Kecɛɛy, me nu ŋke embuw wo eŋge ɛ́ boom buw elone lo.”
58006015	No Abla'am yuwɛɛ nonɛn, mum no nu nyɛkeey, ke mum ghan kɛŋkɛ fiɛɛ fì Nyo' to kawɛɛ fidvu.
58006016	Ɛ̀ nu kecɛɛy lɛ wee ké diee kelew ekan ɛ ɛ̀ nu diee di wee wvù kuuke fele wvú le, ɛ kelew kedvu mum sumtɛn nsaw.
58006017	Ɛ̀ nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no Nyo' to dioo gee ŋkawma no gomte keege lɛ bonyii bò nu ke ekɛŋkɛ fiɛɛ fì wvú kaw fin, ekiɛɛ naa ntay lɛ kɛ wen ké kumɛn fiɛɛ fì wen gomte kɛ. Ɛ wvú dioo kaw mum die kelew.
58006018	No Nyo' to kawɛɛ kase die kelew nonɛn, ɛ mwɛɛm mvun mum buy mvunfɛɛm mvù ɛ̀ nulo bó saa ekumɛn kɛ, njefo mvú to buy ɛ ɛ̀ nu diuw Nyo' le, wvù yaa nu naa lo embiay mbiay kɛ. Nonɛn beene bò nu ɛ lewtɛ wase ɛ bɛɛ ɛ̂ wvú ɛkuse emum ekɛŋkè mvuntelem mvù tɛmyi keekaantɛn fiɛɛ fì bó nu ɛ gɛɛ beene ɛ no taale fwe yî dvú le.
58006019	Fiɛɛ fin fì beene taale fwe yî dvú le nu fì jici mvuntelem mvusɛɛbeene le cɛɛy cɛɛy, tɛmyi diɛwɛ keŋ'wow e fo mvú ebuuke. Ɛ̀ nu fí fì nu ke ege ɛ́ beene efey eley egɛn ɛnte fô kecee ke Nyo' le ɛjim jo ndvu yì bó nu ɛ shɛŋke ɛ baŋ jó dvú le.
58006020	Ɛ ɛ̀ nu fó fò Jisos to leyɛɛ wase diɛwɛ nsafwe wesebeene le keekene bvudvuu ɛ̂ beene. Wvú nu ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le wvù mɛy lo ɛ̂ je yì Mɛlkisɛdɛk nu jó le.
58007001	Mɛlkisɛdɛk wvun to nu Nfon wvu Salɛm, bvuu nu cee ncese Nyo' wvù nu Ɛkolɛ ke Mwɛɛm Mvunciim e. Ɛ ɛ̀ ke no nu kefew kemew e, ɛ Abla'am laa jem yuwyɛ bonfon nteen. Ɛ Mɛlkisɛdɛk ke tasɛn bô wvú no wvú to kfuuyi, mum laŋ kembonɛn yî ye le.
58007002	Ɛ Abla'am gaw mwɛɛm mvunciim mvù wvú to yowɛɛ gbwen jem e biba yuufe, nya keba kemwaaŋ ɛ̂ Mɛlkisɛdɛk. Cee ncese wvun nu ɛ diee diew duŋci mwɛɛm mvunfɛɛm. Fi fwe nu lɛ wvú nu “Nfon wvu Teytey” no diee diew dì Mɛlkisɛdɛk duŋci. Ɛ fì bii fó nu lɛ wvú nu “Nfon Nyɛkeey” njefo wvú to nu Nfon wvu Salɛm.
58007003	Kɛ wee kee ice bô bwee kɛnɛɛ kfuu diew kɛ. Ɛ kɛ wee kee tɛn seke bó to bokɛɛ wvú kɛnɛɛ seke wvú to kpweɛ kɛ. Wvú nu cee ncese wvù mɛy lo diɛwɛ Waa Nyo' le.
58007004	Ben kɛ etaa eyɛn wee wvù ɛ̀ to nu Mɛlkisɛdɛk wvun! Wvú to nu naa lo wee ɛ wvú kuuke. Naa ɛ Abla'am wvù to nu cee kfuu di bonyii bo Islael e ke yow mwɛɛm gbwen jem e to dvú gaw biba yuufe, mum nya lo kemwaaŋ ɛ̂ wvú.
58007005	Fi ɛkumɛ boom bo Lɛwe le bò to ké no lemte lemme di bocee ncese le nu ɛ bvudvuu bvumew to jemyi ɛ̂ bonci bo Muses e lɛ bó efiì mwɛɛm ɛ̂ bonyii bo Islael keba kemwaaŋ ɛnte jo yuufe, naa no bonyii ban to cim nu boom bo bwee bó le, ɛ bó bocii nu boom bo Abla'am e.
58007006	Kɛ wee wvun to nu wee kfuu di Lɛwe le kɛ. Geenɛn ɛ ɛ̀ fi wvú mwɛɛm ɛ̂ Abla'am keba kemwaaŋ ɛnte jo yuufe, laŋ kembonɛn yî ye le, ɛ Abla'am nu wee wvù Nyo' to geɛ ŋkawma ɛ̂ wvú.
58007007	Kɛ ɛ̀ nu kemaŋɛn lɛ wee wvù laaŋke kembonɛn yî wee mvu le kuuke fele wee wvù wvú laaŋke kembonɛn yî ye le kɛ.
58007008	Bocee ncese bo ɛ̂ kfuu di Lɛwe le ban to fii mwɛɛm ɛ̂ bonyii keba kemwaaŋ ɛnte jo yuufe, ɛ bó bodvu bò fii nu bonyii ɛ bó kpwee. Geenɛn Mɛlkisɛdɛk wvù to fiɛ mwɛɛm keba kemwaaŋ ɛnte jo yuufe ɛ̂ Abla'am nu ɛ Ŋwa' Nyo' seŋe ɛ̂ beene lɛ ɛ̀ nu wee ɛ wvú to fele.
58007009	Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó egay lɛ Lɛwe kebɛɛ wvù kfuu diew to fii mwɛɛm ɛ̂ bonyii keba kemwaaŋ ɛnte jo yuufe to nu ɛ nya mwew mwɛɛm ɛ̂ Mɛlkisɛdɛk can Abla'am e.
58007010	Bó nulo egay nonɛn njefo seke Mɛlkisɛdɛk to tasɛnɛɛ bô Abla'am nu ɛ wvú wvù Lɛwe to bɛɛ ɛ̂ bvulɛw bvu Abla'am wvù ɛ̀ to nu icee cee cee bó le.
58007011	Ɛ́ ɛ̀ fɛn to nu lɛ lemme dì kfuu di Lɛwe le to gee diɛwɛ bocee ncese le to nu ɛ kocɛn keege ɛ́ bonyii enu teytey ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛjise, tu shiee wvumvu cee ncese to bee ebvuu enu wvu la? Beene kee lɛ Nyo' to nya bonci ɛ̂ bonyii bo Islael bii lemme dì bocee ncese bo ɛ̂ kfuu di Lɛwe le to gee. Fí dioo nu nonɛn, bó kaa ɛ gay lɛ wvuwɛ cee ncese kɛŋke keeke enù ɛ̂ je yì Mɛlkisɛdɛk nu jó le, ɛfey keenu ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ je yì cee ncese wvu ɛ̂ kfuu di Ɛlon e nu jó le nɛɛ le?
58007012	Beene kee lɛ kfuu di bocee ncese le ké kumene, ɛ fí no nu shiee le keekumɛn tɛn bonci.
58007013	Wee wvun wvù beene jemyi ɛkumɛ wvú, nu ɛ wvú to buy ɛ̂ kfuu dimew e jɛɛy, ɛ wee ke baa yuu buy wase ɛ̂ kfuu didvu le elemte fô ketaŋ ke ncese le kɛ.
58007014	Wee wvun nu Tata wesebeene. Ɛ ɛ̀ nu kecɛɛy lɛ wvú to buy ɛ̂ kfuu di Juda le. Ɛ Muses to ke baa yuu jeme fiɛɛ ɛkumɛ kfuu din seke wvú to jemyi ɛkumɛ bocee ncese kɛ.
58007015	Fiɛɛ fin fì beene jemyi ɛkumɛ fí nu ɛ loocɛ ɛ duŋcɛ ye no cee ncese wvumvu nu ɛ buy wase diɛwɛ Mɛlkisɛdɛk e.
58007016	Wvú nu ɛ nɛ ɛ tu cee ncese ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu ɛ̂ je yì nci jemyi le no wee kɛŋke keenu ɛ̂ kfuu di bocee ncese le kɛ. Wvú nu cee ncese ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî mvuŋgay mvu nshii wvù yaa kaa kɛ le.
58007017	Ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì bó nu ɛ saŋ ɛkumɛ wvú lɛ, “Wo nu cee ncese wvù mɛy lo ɛ̂ je yì Mɛlkisɛdɛk nu jó le.”
58007018	Fí ɛ mum ɛ no nu lɛ, je yi yvum yì bó to gee mwɛɛm jó nu ɛ bó ɛ fuwyɛ wase yiyɛ, njefo kɛ yí bvuu kɛŋke mvuŋgay kɛnɛɛ lemme kɛ.
58007019	[Kɛ bonci bo Muses e to ké ge fiɛɛ ɛ fí joŋ gɛn mɛse kɛ.] Geenɛn, keseen nu ɛ Nyo' ɛ duŋcɛ wase je yì jee ntay yì beene egɛɛlè bvufee yî dvú le yì fele yiyɛ. Ɛ̀ nu yí yì beene fele jó sɛ too nceencee fô Nyo' le.
58007020	Ɛ keebvuu ebise fó nu ɛ Nyo' to dioo gɛɛle cee ncese je yi fiɛ yin, die kelew, ɛ kɛ wvú to ké die kelew seke wvú to gɛɛle bomew ba kɛ.
58007021	Geenɛn, ɛ wvú ke dioo gɛɛle wvun, die kelew ɛkumɛ wvú gay lɛ, “Me wvù Tata nu ɛ me ɛ ndie kelew, ɛ kɛ me nu ŋke eŋkumɛn diɛw yɛm kɛ, ‘Wo nu cee ncese wvù mɛy lo.’”
58007022	Kelew kè Nyo' to dieɛ kin ɛ mum ɛ duŋcɛ lɛ Jisos nu wee wvù nu ɛ ge moŋkan mo monfɛm man ɛ no leeme tɛmyi fele mo moyvuum.
58007023	Bocee ncese bò to shee nu fwele to ké no nu nteen, njefo kɛ kpwe to nulo ecinɛ wee le ɛ́ wvú emɛy egee lemme diew di kecee ncese le kɛ.
58007024	Geenɛn, Jisos ɛ no nu fiew cee ncese sekecii njefo kɛ nshii we kɛŋke kendvuse kɛ.
58007025	Nonɛn, wvú nulo eboysee bonyii sekecii bò benci too fô Nyo' le fele can ye le. Ɛ wvú boysee nonɛn, njefo wvú nu dvú sekecii lɛke Nyo' fô bó le.
58007026	Fí nu lɛŋ lɛ beene ekɛŋkè kfuu kekiɛ ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le. Wvú nu fiew wee wvù yuule, ɛ wvú baa kɛŋke jay kɛnɛɛ nlom yî ye le kɛ. Wvú nu fiew ɛ Nyo' ɛ gawsɛn wvú fô bonyii bo bibefɛ le. Nyo' nu ɛ bense wase wvú, wvú ɛ ben naa ɛ fey ɛbulɛ ɛ gɛn fowe.
58007027	Kɛ wvú kɛŋke fiew shiee keegee boncese diɛwɛ bikuu bi bocee ncese le, bì to ké no gee boncese ɛdiuw ɛcii kɛ. Ɛ bó to ké dioo gee yaw ge fô bikuu bibole, keekpwaŋsɛn bibole bibefɛ, sɛ ke no gee fô bi bonyii le. Wvú to ge fiew we ncese kaŋ mwaaŋ no wvú to nyaɛ ɛkolɛ kew keetaŋe bonyii dvú.
58007028	Yî kefew ke bonci bo Muses e nu ɛ bó to baale naa ɛ ɛ̀ nu bonyii ɛ bó wɛɛyi yî nyam ye le lɛ bó enù bikuu bi bocee ncese le. Geenɛn, ɛ ɛ̀ ke dioo nu wase ɛjim jo bonci ban, ɛ Nyo' ge ŋkawma die kelew, mum baa wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu Waa we wvù wvú nu ɛ ge wvú ɛ no jee gɛne mɛɛse sekecii.
58008001	Ɛkolɛ ke fiɛɛ fì beene jemyi ɛkumɛ fí le nu kɛ lɛ, beene kɛŋke kfuu ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le ɛ ɛ̀ nu wee ɛ wvú ɛ shii ɛ̂ ɛbo ke ɛcɛɛy ke kawla Nyo' Bvukukɛ le fowe.
58008002	Wvú nu wee lemme fô Nyo' nu, lemte cun dvù ɛ̀ nu cɛɛy cɛɛy cun yi wvú wvù Nyo' le, ɛ ɛ̀ yaa kene bonyii kɛ. Ɛ̀ kene wvú wvù Tata Nyo' cun yidvu.
58008003	Ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le kecii nu ɛ Nyo' ké baa gɛɛ lɛ wvú ejoò nnyá yi bonyii feese ɛ̂ Nyo' bvuu gee tɛn boncese fô Nyo' le. Nonɛn, fí ɛ no nu shiee le fô wvuwvun cee ncese le keekɛŋke tɛn fiɛɛ fì wvú nulo ege ncese dvú fô Nyo' le.
58008004	Ɛ́ wvú be nu fokuse fɛn, wvú saa enu naa lo cee ncese kɛ, njefo bocee ncese nu wase dvú bò nyaa nnyá bii no nci Muses gomte.
58008005	Lemme dì bó lemte fokuse fɛn nu kɛ lo nfieesɛn bô kenjiŋjiŋ ke di yew dvu Nyo' le fowe. Ɛ̀ nɛɛ fiɛɛ fì ɛ̀ to nu seke Muses to nu keekene cun Nyo' yi fokuse fɛn, ɛ Nyo' tefe wvú gay lɛ, “Yɛnɛ lɛ wo nu ɛ kene fiɛɛ ficii fí ɛ no nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ diɛwɛ fì me nto nduŋcɛɛ ɛ̂ wo yî kum e.”
58008006	Geenɛn Jisos nu ɛ bó ɛ nya lemme ɛ̂ wvú ɛ dí kuuke fele di bocee ncese bo fwele le, kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no moŋkan mò wvú leeme fwe wvudvu ɛntelɛŋ jo Nyo' bô wee wvu wum kuuke tɛn fele mo moyvuum. Mó fele lo njefo moman bii ɛ ɛ̀ nu boŋkawma bò fele bo fwe le.
58008007	Ɛ́ moŋkan mo fwele to nu sɛ mó kɛŋke jay ŋkuuŋ, tu kɛ shiee momew to bee ebvuu enu dvú kɛ.
58008008	Nyo' to nu ɛ yɛn lɛ jay nu dvú bô bonyii, mum gay lɛ, “Me wvù Tata ŋgayte lɛ diuu too lo dì me nu ŋke eŋgbwo moŋkan mo monfɛm bee yew Islael noo yew Juda.
58008009	Ɛ kɛ moŋkan man nu diɛwɛ mò me nto ŋgbwolɛɛ bee bo'icee cee bó diuu dì me nto njicɛɛ bó le yî kebo le, njo mbuy bô bó woŋ wvù Ijiw e kɛ. Moŋkan modvu man nu ɛ bó to baa emɛy eleeme yî dvú le kɛ. Nonɛn, ɛ me mum mbase jim ɛ̂ bó le. Fifin jemyi me wvù Tata.
58008010	Me wvù Tata mbvuu njemyi lɛ, kefew nu ke eto ekocɛn, ɛ́ me embvuu eŋgbwo momew moŋkan bee yew Islael. Mó nu ke enu lɛ, me nu ŋke enlese lo bonci bem ɛ̂ boŋkpwawcɛ bobole, ensaŋ ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ mvuntelem mvubole. Me nu ŋke enu Nyo' wvubo, ɛ bó nu bonyii bem.
58008011	Kɛ wee bɛɛ ke ebvuu eyɛɛyi lo wee we woŋ mvu kɛnɛɛ waa bwee gayte lɛ wvú ekeè Tata Nyo' kɛ, njefo wee tfuu nu ke ekee me ɛ kɛw yî wee wvu caan e ɛ gɛn ɛ buy yî wvu baay e.
58008012	Me nu ŋke encam shen fô bó le, nlɛɛshɛ mwɛɛm mvubole mvù befe. Kɛ me mbɛɛ ŋke embvuu eŋkumyi bibefɛ bibole kɛ.”
58008013	No Nyo' to jemyɛɛ lɛ moŋkan mo monfɛm nu ke enu, tu wvú to yɛne wase lɛ mo fwele ma nu fiɛɛ fi fiyvuum. Ɛ fiɛɛ yvuumene kɛnɛɛ lune wase, tu ɛ̀ shɛɛte caan ɛ́ fí ela ɛ̂ bonyii ɛjise.
58009001	Fí nu lɛ, moŋkan mo fwele to kɛŋke bonci bò duŋci je yì bonyii ebunleè Nyo' jó, bvuu kɛŋke bvudvuu ɛ bó ɛ seyse lɛ ɛ̀ nu yew Nyo' yi fokuse fɛn.
58009002	Bó to nu ɛ kene cun bô ndvu sumtɛn biba bifɛɛ, ɛ keba ke fwe ɛnte nu ɛ bó teŋe lɛ Bvudvuu bvù Yuule. Bvubvun nu fò fiɛɛ fì bó to tomyi ken'yeese yî dvú le noo fò kedaŋ kè bó to ké no gɛɛle blɛɛd wvù bó nu ɛ ge ncese dvú fô Nyo' le to nu.
58009003	Ɛ keba kè bii fó ɛnte nu ɛ bó teŋe lɛ Bvudvuu bvù looci Yuule naa ntay. Bvudvuu bvun to nu ɛjim jo ndvu mi ɛ bó ɛ shɛŋke ɛ sumtɛn cun dvú ɛntelɛŋ.
58009004	Bvubvun bvudvuu nu fò ketaŋ ke jiin e to nu, ɛ bó ɛ seyse ketaŋ kedvu bô ketwaa ke bigew e kè yɛɛle. Ɛ ŋkuw moŋkan mò Nyo' to gbwolɛɛ bô bonyii nu tɛn fó, ɛ bó ɛ seyse ɛ lay ye yidvu yicii bô ketwaa ke bigew e kè yɛɛle. Ɛ̂ ŋkuw wvun e nu ɛ kentee ke mana le to nu jó, ɛ bó ɛ seyse tɛn bô ketwaa ke bigew e kè yɛɛle. Ɛ kembaŋ ke Ɛlon e kiɛ kè bibɛ to comɛɛ yî dvú le nu tɛn ɛ̂ ŋkuw wvun e. Ɛ biwaŋ bi ɛta le bì bó to saŋɛɛ bonci bo moŋkan modvu le nu tɛn ɛ̂ ŋkuw wvudvu le.
58009005	Ɛ̂ we jo ŋkuw wvun nu ɛ bó to leke mwɛɛm mvumew ɛ mvú nu diɛwɛ bonceendaa bo Nyo' le bo n'yuu le, ɛ mvú ɛ saŋ ye ɛ̂ we jo kentaw ke Nyo' le ke nlɛɛshɛ bibefɛ le. Mwɛɛm mvun nu ɛ kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ beene ejemyi gɛne ɛnte jodvu keseen baay kɛ.
58009006	No bó to seysɛɛ mwɛɛm mvun ɛ̂ yiyin je le nɛn, ɛ bocee ncese mum no gɛne leyte ɛ̂ keba ke fwe kiɛ le ɛdiuw ɛcii gee lemme dibole dvú.
58009007	Geenɛn, ɛ wee wvù to ké ley ɛ̂ keba ke ɛnte kiɛ le to nu kɛ ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le maaŋ. Ɛ wvú to ké ley dvú kɛ kaŋ mwaaŋ yî kelum e. Ɛ wvú yaa to ké ley dvú sɛ ɛlɛmɛ ke nyam e kè wvú ege ncese dvú fô ɛkolɛ kew e noo fô bibefɛ bi bonyii le bì bó gee yaa kee kɛ le.
58009008	Nonɛn, yiyin nu je yì Keyoy ke Yuule duŋci ɛ̂ bonyii lɛ je yì wee to nulo eley egɛn fô Bvudvuu bvù looci Yuule naa ntay e to baa yene wase ye kɛ, no cun Nyo' yi fwe yɛ to bɛɛ leeme fó.
58009009	Mwɛɛm mvun mvunciim nu nciise mwɛɛm mvù kooyi kefew ke keseen kin e. Ɛ fifin duŋci lɛ kɛ mwɛɛm mvù bó to nyaa ɛ̂ Nyo' noo boncese bò bó to gee fô Nyo' le nulo ege ɛ́ mvuntelem mvu bonyii bò bunlee Nyo' le enu ɛ mvú yuule gɛne mɛɛse kɛ.
58009010	Mwɛɛm mvudvu kɛŋke kɛ fiɛɛ maaŋ keege ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô mwɛɛm mvudien noo mwɛɛm mvuwuun noo jé yì bonyii cuke ye jó keeyuule ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛjise. Ɛ mvumvun nu mwɛɛm mvù kumte kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu nyam ye le, mvù bó to kɛŋke keegee egɛn ebuy kefew kè ŋkumɛn ke eto le.
58009011	Geenɛn no Klistu wvù nu ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le nu ɛ to wase, ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù nu ɛ to bô mwɛɛm mvù jee, wvú ɛ mum ɛ ley cun, ɛ ɛ̀ nu yi baay yì yuule gɛne mɛɛse le. Kɛ yiyɛ nu yì ɛ̀ yoke bonyii kɛ. Fì nu lɛ, kɛ ɛ̀ nu cun yi yî nshɛ yin e kɛ.
58009012	Fô wvú to leyɛɛ nu Bvudvuu ɛ bvu looci Yuule naa ntay. Ɛ wvú to ley kaŋ mwaaŋ ɛ fí ka lo nonɛn. Wvú to baa eley fofɛn ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô ɛlɛmɛ ke bíe le kɛnɛɛ ke boom bo bona' le kɛ. Wvú to ley ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô kew ɛlɛmɛ. No wvú geɛ nonɛn, ɛ fifin mum sum beene yî bibefɛ le, ɛ nsum wvun nu wvù mɛy lo.
58009013	Ɛ̀ to nu fwele ɛ́ wee ké dioo nu bô ŋkfum ye le, ɛ́ bó jo ɛlɛmɛ ke bie le kɛnɛɛ ke na' le, kɛnɛɛ taan di kejun ke na' wvù bó nu ɛ ton wvú ɛ fie le, mise kɛnɛɛ mwaŋ yî mwɛtɛn e, ɛ wvú kase no yuule.
58009014	Ɛ́ fí to nu nonɛn, tu kɛ ɛlɛmɛ ke Klistu le nulo ege fiɛɛ fì fele fifiɛ? Wvú to nu ɛ nya ɛkolɛ kew ɛ kí nu sɛ nlom ɛ̂ Nyo' fele yî Keyoy kè mɛy lo le. Wvú to ge nonɛn, mum cukɛ mvuntelem mvusɛɛbeene yî mwɛɛm mvù too bô kpwe le, wvu lɛ beene elemtè Nyo' wvù kɛŋke nshii le.
58009015	Ɛ̀ nɛɛ fiɛɛ fì Klistu nu wee wvù leeme fwe moŋkan mo monfɛm man ɛntelɛŋ jo Nyo' bô wee wvu wum. Ɛ wvú leeme wvu lɛ bonyii bò Nyo' nu ɛ tee lɛ ɛ̀ nu bew ke ekɛŋkɛ bvudvuu fô bvujonkɛ bvù mɛy lo bvù Nyo' nu ɛ kaw bó dvú. Bó nu ke ekɛŋkɛ njefo wee nu ɛ kpwe wase, ɛ kpwe ye yin ɛ sum bó yî ŋgɛw wvù to nu keeke eto nje bibefɛ bì bó to shee gee fwele ɛ̂ moŋkan mo moyvuum e.
58009016	Beene kee lɛ wee ké teete kpwe, wee saa ke ebi ntefe kpwe wvudvu le sɛ bó ɛ yɛn lɛ mwɛtɛn nu ɛ kpwe wase kɛ.
58009017	Fí nu nonɛn, njefo kɛ ntefe kpwe ké no kɛŋke mvuŋgay sɛ wee ɛ kpwe kɛ. Kɛ bó ké bi ntefe kpwe le ɛ wee wvù tefe kpwe bɛɛ dvú kɛ.
58009018	Ɛ̀ nɛɛ fiɛɛ fì naa moŋkan mo fwe nu ɛ mó yaa to nulo ke eleem sɛ bó ɛ sɛɛ nyam ɛlɛmɛ ɛ buy kɛ.
58009019	Ɛ̀ to nu seke Muses to taŋɛɛ wase fiɛɛ ficii fì to nu ɛ̂ Ŋwa' bonci le ɛ̂ bonyii bocii, ɛ wvú mum jo tiɛw kete ke isob e ɛ bó ɛ njim yvúw njee yî dvú le ɛ bó ɛ com yí ɛ no yɛɛle, mum jo tɛn ɛlɛmɛ ke boom bo bona' le, bô ke bíe le, noo joo, mise yî ŋwa' bonci bodvu le, mum mise tɛn yî bonyii bocii le.
58009020	Ɛ wvú dioo miise no gayte lɛ, “Ɛlɛmɛ kin nu ke moŋkan mò Nyo' gbwole ben ɛ bó le, gayte lɛ ben eleemè yî dvú le.”
58009021	Ɛ wvú mise tɛn ɛlɛmɛ kedvu yî cun Nyo' yɛ le noo yî mwɛɛm mvu cun dvu dvú le mvù bó gee bunle dvú.
58009022	Fí nu naa lo kecɛɛy lɛ mwɛɛm nteen to shee nu ɛ nci duŋci lɛ bó kɛŋke keege kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô ɛlɛmɛ ɛ́ mvú sɛ no yuule. Ɛ kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó elɛɛshɛ bibefɛ bi wee le sɛ bó ɛ sɛɛ fiɛɛ ɛlɛmɛ ɛ buy kɛ.
58009023	Fí to nu naa shiee le lɛ bó ecukɛ mwɛɛm mvun mvù nu kɛ lo nfieesɛn mwɛɛm mvu fowe ɛ̂ yiyin je le. Geenɛn, ecukɛ mvù looci nu mvu fowe ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô boncese bò fele boban,
58009024	njefo Klistu to ley cun Nyo' le ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu yì ɛ̀ yoke bonyii bô can, yì ɛ̀ nu kɛ lo nfieesɛn cun Nyo' yi cɛɛy cɛɛy kɛ. Wvú to ley ɛ ɛ̀ nu fowe kebɛɛ. Ɛ ɛ̀ nu fò wvú nu keseen fwe dvu Nyo' lɛke Nyo' fô beene le.
58009025	Kɛ wvú nu fó nɛn keebvuu egee boncese bô ɛkolɛ kew fô Nyo' le bokaŋ e bokaŋ e diɛwɛ no ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le to ké no leyte fô Bvudvuu bvù looci Yuule naa ntay e ɛ̂ kelum ɛ̂ kelum, keege ncese bô ɛlɛmɛ sɛ ɛ̀ nu kew ŋkuuŋ.
58009026	Ɛ́ fifin to nu shiee le, tu Klistu be kɛŋke keekpwee jaa we, kaase kpwee ɛ kɛw no bó to bomɛɛ woŋ. Geenɛn no fí nu, nu ɛ wvú ɛ to wase kaŋ mwaaŋ fí ɛ ka lo nonɛn. Wvú to kefew kin kè woŋ kaa wase le keejo ɛkolɛ kew ege ncese dvú, ekpwe keecukɛ bibefɛ.
58009027	Kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no fí nu lɛ wee kɛŋke keekpwe kɛ kaŋ mwaaŋ emum ecɛyte wase ɛ ɛ̀ nu nsaw,
58009028	nu kɛ no Klistu to nyaɛ ɛkolɛ kew kpwe fô bonyii le kaŋ mwaaŋ keetuu bibefɛ bi bonyii le nteen. Ɛ wvú nu ke ekase eto yî bokaŋ bo bofɛɛ le ɛ ɛ̀ yaa bvuu nu keege fiɛɛ bô bibefɛ kɛ. Wvú nu ke eto wase keseen keeboyse bonyii bò cɛyte wvú shiee le.
58010001	Bonci bo Muses e to nu kɛ lo kenjiŋjiŋ ke mwɛɛm mvù jee mvù to nu keeke enu le. Kɛ bó to nu wase cɛɛy cɛɛy mwɛɛm mvù to nu keeke enu kɛ. Ɛ bó mum no shee gee boncese ɛ̂ kelum ɛ̂ kelum, sɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ boncese bodvu ege ɛ́ bonyii bò benci too fô Nyo' le eyuule gɛne mɛɛse ŋkuuŋ.
58010002	Ɛ́ ɛ̀ to nu lɛ boncese bodvu nulo ege ɛ́ bó eyuule nonɛn, tu kɛ bó to bee ebvuu eshee egee boncese bó le bó le kɛ, njefo bonyii bò bunlee Nyo' to bee keenu ɛ bó ɛ cukɛ wase bibefɛ bibole kaŋ mwaaŋ, ɛ mvuntelem mvubole yaa bvuu saake bó yî bibefɛ le kɛ.
58010003	Geenɛn, boncese bò bó to gee ɛ̂ kelum ɛ̂ kelum ban to kaa gee ɛ bonyii kumyi lo bibefɛ bibole.
58010004	Ɛ fí nu nonɛn, njefo kɛ ɛ̀ nu naa lo ɛ́ ɛlɛmɛ ke bona' bô ke bíe le ecukɛ bibefɛ bi wee le kɛ.
58010005	Ɛ̀ nɛɛ fiɛɛ fì to geɛ ɛ Klistu dioo to fokuse fɛn gay ɛ̂ Nyo' lɛ, “Kɛ wo kɛŋke shiee fô boncese bò bó gee bô nyám e, noo fô mwɛɛm mvù bó nyaa ɛ̂ wo le kɛ. Wo nu ɛ nya me ɛ ɛ̀ nu bô ye lɛ me eŋge ncese dvú.
58010006	Kɛ nyám yì bó nyaa ɛ bó tone gee boncese dvú fô wo le, noo mwɛɛm mvù bó nyaa ɛ bó gee boncese dvú keecukɛ bibefɛ bi bonyii le baa cim ege ɛ́ wo eyuuke njoŋ kɛ.
58010007	Me ɛ mum ɛ ŋgay lɛ, ‘O Nyo' taa eyɛn, me nu ɛ nto keeŋge fiɛɛ fì wo shieele, kɛ no bó saŋɛɛ ɛkumɛ me ɛ̂ Ŋwa' wo le.’”
58010008	Wvú to yaw gay ɛ̂ Nyo' lɛ, “Kɛ wo baa kɛŋke shiee kɛnɛɛ yuuke njoŋ bô boncese noo nnyá yì bó nyaa ɛ̂ wo noo nyám yì bó nyaa ɛ bó tone gee boncese dvú fô wo le, noo mwɛɛm mvù bó nyaa ɛ bó gee boncese dvú keecukɛ bibefɛ bi bonyii le kɛ.” Ɛ mwɛɛm mvun nu ɛ bó to gee kɛ naa bii no nci gomte.
58010009	No wvú gay nonɛn, mum bise fó gay ɛ̂ Nyo' lɛ, “Taa eyɛn, me nu ɛ nto keeŋge fiɛɛ fì wo shieele.” Wvú to jeme nonɛn, mum lɛse boncese bo boyvuum keegɛɛ wvu fwɛ.
58010010	No Jisos Klistu to geɛ fiɛɛ fì Nyo' to shieele lɛ wvú ege, ɛ ye ye yì wvú to nyaɛ kaŋ mwaaŋ ɛ fí ka lo nonɛn, ge ɛ beene mum no yuule.
58010011	Cee ncese tfuu ké no gɛne leeme fô bvudvuu bwew bvu lemme le ɛdiuw ɛcii gee boncese biinene bokaŋ e bokaŋ e, sɛ boncese bodvu nulo ecake bibefɛ bi bonyii le ŋkuuŋ.
58010012	Geenɛn Klistu to nu ɛ ge we ncese kɛ kaŋ mwaaŋ ɛ wvú mum kocɛn wvù ecake bibefɛ bi bonyii le kemakaa. No wvú geɛ nonɛn mum shii ɛ̂ ɛbo ke ɛcɛɛy ke Nyo' le.
58010013	Wvú nu fó ɛ kɛw sekekiɛ le, cɛyte egɛn ebuy seke Nyo' ke ejike bonyii bew bo bvuban e diɛwɛ kedvuushɛɛ ke bikaa biew e ɛ́ wvú etome bikaa yî bó le.
58010014	Ncese we wvù mwaaŋ wvun nu ɛ ge bonyii bò wvú gee ɛ bó yuule, ɛ mum ɛ no yuule tɛn ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛjise gɛne mɛɛse sekecii.
58010015	Keyoy ke Yuule jemyi tɛn ɛ̂ beene tomte fiɛɛ fin. Kí to nu ɛ yaw gay lɛ,
58010016	“Tata gayte lɛ, ɛ̀ nɛɛ moŋkan man mò me nu ŋke eŋgbwo bee bó ɛjim jo ɛdiuw yoya le: Me nu ŋke eŋgɛɛ bonci bem ɛ̂ mvuntelem mvubole, embvuu ensaŋ ɛ̂ boŋkpwawcɛ bobole.”
58010017	No wvú gay nonɛn bvuu bise lɛ, “Kɛ me mbɛɛ ŋke embvuu eŋkpwawci bibefɛ bibole kɛnɛɛ gee dibole dì befe kɛ”
58010018	Fí ɛ mum ɛ no nu lɛ ɛ́ bó lɛɛshi wase bibefɛ bi bonyii le, tu kɛ shiee mwɛɛm mvù bó enyaa ɛ bó gee boncese dvú keecukɛ bibefɛ bi bonyii le bvuu bɛɛ kɛ.
58010019	Boom bo bwɛɛm e, fí ɛ mum ɛ no nu lɛ ɛlɛmɛ ke Jisos e nu ɛ yene wase je ɛ beene nulo eley keseen yaa fane kɛ, egɛn fô Bvudvuu bwɛ bvù looci Yuule naa ntay e.
58010020	Beene nulo efey ɛ̂ je yi fiɛ yì nyaa nshii le yì Jisos to yen'yɛɛ fô beene le. Wvú to yene je yin bô ye ye, ɛ fí mum no nu lɛ wvú nu ɛ cake wase ndvu yì bó to shɛŋkɛɛ baŋ bvudvuu bvudvu dvú.
58010021	Beene kɛŋke wase cee ncese wvu baay wvù taale fô yew Nyo' le yì ɛ̀ nu bonyii bew.
58010022	No mwɛɛm mvun nu nonɛn, beene emum ebencì too mbew Nyo' le bô fitele fimwaaŋ ɛ beene ɛ lese fitele yî ye le ficii nu sɛ kemaŋɛn. Beene ebencì njefo bó nu ɛ miawmiaw wase mvuntelem mvusɛɛbeene bô ɛlɛmɛ ke Klistu le mvú ɛ no yuule, yaa bvuu saake beene yî fiɛɛ le kɛ. Ɛ beene bvuu nu tɛn ɛ bó ɛ cukɛ wase ye yesebeene bô joo yì yuule.
58010023	Beene eleemè tɛmyi ntay yî fiɛɛ fì beene taale fwe yî dvú le fì beene ké no jemyi ɛ̂ bonyii ɛkumɛ fí le. Fo beene etuwtenè kɛ, njefo wee wvù kawɛɛ beene leeme yî diɛw ye le.
58010024	Beene egomtè tɛn je keeyvuwse mvuntelem mvu wee noo wee le keekoŋene noo keegee mwɛɛm mvù jee.
58010025	Fo beene ecin'yì keetoo yî kentaashɛ le diɛwɛ no bonyii bomew nu ɛ nɛ wase ɛ no gee kɛ. Beene eyvuwsè lo mvuntelem mvusɛɛbeene, ɛfey mvunciim no beene yɛne wase ɛ diuu dì Tata wesebeene nu ke ekase eto nu wase nceencee.
58010026	Beene ekeè lɛ ɛ́ beene nɛ ɛ bvuu ɛ no gee bibefɛ, gee kee, ɛ beene nu ɛ bó ɛ fiisɛn wase je yi kecɛɛy, ɛ́ beene no keè lɛ kɛ ncese wvumvu bvuu nu dvú wvù ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó ebvuu ege fô bibefɛ bisɛɛbeene le kɛ.
58010027	Ɛ́ wee gee nonɛn, ɛ́ wvú no cɛyte kɛ wase bô nfan ɛ ɛ̀ nu nsaw Nyo' noo ŋguy wvù befe wvù nu ke eyɛse lo bonyii bo bvuban e bo Nyo' le.
58010028	Wee ké ŋgoyte nci Muses, ɛ́ bonyii eleem bofɛɛ kɛnɛɛ botɛte etom lɛ bó nu ɛ yɛn fiɛɛ fì wvú ge le, ɛ́ nsaw mum koo mwɛtɛn, ɛ bó mum yu lo wvú yaa koole yii kɛ.
58010029	Ɛ́ fí nu nonɛn, tu ben kpwaake lɛ wee wvù joo Waa Nyo' ɛkuse, joo ɛlɛmɛ ke moŋkan mò Nyo' gbwolɛɛ keecukɛ wvú dvú ɛ́ wvú eyuule lɛ kí nu fiɛɛ fi ɛcici, nan'yi tɛn Keyoy ke Yuule kè too bô mbuwma Nyo', nu ɛ kfuu ŋgɛw wvù wvuwɛ wee nu ke ekɛŋkɛ nu ke enu nɛɛ?
58010030	We ŋgɛw nu ke ebɛmte lo njefo beene kee wee wvù to gayɛɛ lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu me wvù nu ke etfuse ɛnvukɛ, ɛ ɛ̀ nu me wvù nu ke enya nlawma wvubo.” Ɛ wvú ɛ bvuu ɛ gay lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu me wvù Tata wvù nu ke esaw bonyii bem.”
58010031	Ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fi nfan e baay keegbwe can Nyo' wvù kɛŋke nshii le.
58010032	Geenɛn, ben ekumyì ɛdiuw yo fwe yò bó to yuusɛɛ ben yî fiɛɛ fi Nyo' le. Ben to nu ɛ kuu shém no diuu bô boŋgɛw bò to too fô ben e.
58010033	Kefew kemew e nu ɛ bonyii to ké no nan'yi bvuu nyɛwle bô ben ya le. Kefew kemew e, ɛ ben no leeme ɛjim jo bonyii bò bó nyaa tɛn ŋgɛw ɛ̂ bó ɛ̂ yiyɛ je le.
58010034	Ben to ké no koole shen bô boba bonyii bò nu yî ncaw e, fii bó. Bó to ké loo mwɛɛm mvunɛn, ɛ ben cinɛ kɛ dvú no yuuke ɛ ɛ̀ nu njoŋ, njefo ben kee lɛ ben kɛŋke mwɛɛm mvumew mvù fele mvumwɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu mvù nu ke emɛy nu sekecii.
58010035	Nonɛn, fo ben ecinɛ fiɛɛ fì ben leeme wase yî dvú le kɛ, njefo ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ ɛ fí kɛŋke nlawma wvù kuuke.
58010036	Fiɛɛ fi shiee le fô ben e nu lɛ ben esuu shém wvu lɛ ben nulo egee ɛ ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì Nyo' shieele, ɛ́ ben ke emum ekɛŋkɛ fiɛɛ fì wvú nu ɛ kaw beene dvú.
58010037	Bó nu ɛ saŋ lɛ, “Ɛ̀ shɛɛte kɛ wase caan ɛ́ wee wvù nu keeto emum efɛse. Kɛ wvú nu emoocɛ kɛ.
58010038	Wee wɛm wvu teytey nu ke ekɛŋkɛ nshii nje fitele fì wvú lese yî yɛm e. Geenɛn ɛ́ wvú nɛ lo ɛ no fane ɛ tfuw bikaa, fitele fiem saa ejee bô wvú kɛ.”
58010039	Geenɛn, kɛ beene nu boba bò tfuuke bikaa bò nu ke ela kɛ. Beene nu fisɛɛbeene bonyii bò nu ɛ lese fitele yî Nyo' le bò biyoy bibole nu ke eboy.
58011001	Keelese fitele yî Nyo' le nu keetaale fwe yî fiɛɛ fì Nyo' nu ɛ kaw wee dvú kee naa ntay lɛ wvú nu ke ekɛŋkɛ fí, kee tɛn lɛ fí nu dvú ɛ wvú baa cim yɛn wase fí le kɛ.
58011002	Nyo' to bɛnsee bonyii bo fwele njefo bó to nu ɛ lese fitele yî ye le.
58011003	Ɛ̀ ge tɛn fitele fì beene lese yî Nyo' le beene ɛ sɛ kiɛɛ ntay lɛ Nyo' to bom woŋ wvun ɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ bô diɛw ye, ɛ mwɛɛm mvù beene yɛne to buy yî mvù bó yaa yɛne mvú le kɛ.
58011004	Ɛ̀ to ge fitele fì Ɛbɛl to lesɛɛ yî Nyo' le ɛ wvú sɛ ge ncese wvu lɛŋ fey Kɛɛn. Ɛ Nyo' mum jo wvú lɛ wvú nu wee wvu teytey, mum fi nnya ye keetom lɛ wvú nu wee wvu teytey. Abɛl to nu ɛ kpwe, geenɛn ɛ fitele fì wvú to lesɛɛ yî Nyo' le ɛ ge beene ɛ no yuuke ɛ wvú bɛɛ jemyi ɛ̂ beene ɛ to ɛ buy ɛbɛn e.
58011005	Ɛ̀ to ge tɛn fitele fì Ɛnok to lesɛɛ yî Nyo' le ɛ Nyo' sɛ jo wvú gɛn bô wvú fowe wum ɛ kpwe baa kum wvú le kɛ. Bó to nu ɛ nɛ faŋɛ yaa bvuu yɛn wvú le kɛ, njefo Nyo' to nu ɛ jo wase wvú we. Ɛ́ Nyo' sɛ jo Ɛnok we nu ɛ Ŋwa' Nyo' jemyi lɛ wvú to ké no gee ɛ Nyo' yuuke njoŋ.
58011006	Nonɛn ɛ́ wee nu dvú sɛ wvú nu ɛ lese fitele yî Nyo' le, tu kɛ ɛ̀ nu naa lo ɛ́ Nyo' eyuuke njoŋ bô wvú kɛ, njefo ɛ́ wee gomte keebenci too mbew Nyo' le, tu wvú kɛŋke keebee lɛ Nyo' nu dvú, noo lɛ wvú mawci wee tfuu wvù looci gomte wvú.
58011007	Ɛ̀ to ge tɛn fitele fì Noa' to lesɛɛ yî Nyo' le ɛ Nyo' ke dioo tefe wvú ɛkumɛ fiɛɛ fì to nu keeke ekooy ɛ wvú baa cim yɛn wase fí le, ɛ wvú yuw Nyo' le mum fɛ ŋguw wvu baay keeke eboyse yew ye dvú. No wvú to lesɛɛ fitele nonɛn mum duŋcɛ lɛ kebɛse ke bonyii bo yî woŋ wvun e nu bò befe ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛjise, ɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ wase wvú wvù Nyo' to nyaɛ bvudvuu bvu wee wvu teytey e ɛ̂ wvú, njefo wvú to nu ɛ lese fitele yî Nyo' le.
58011008	Ɛ̀ to ge tɛn fitele fì Abla'am to lesɛɛ yî Nyo' le, ɛ wvú sɛ yuw Nyo' le seke wvú to teŋɛɛ wvú lɛ wvú enɛ woŋ wvubole egɛn wvumew wvù wvú to nu keeke ekɛŋkɛ diɛwɛ woŋ we le. No Abla'am yuwɛɛ nonɛn mum no gɛne kɛ lo, yaa cim kee fô wvú gɛne kɛ.
58011009	Ɛ̀ to ge fitele fì wvú to lesɛɛ yî Nyo' le fidvu ɛ wvú sɛ gɛn no cee woŋ wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ wvú dvú le diɛwɛ tolo wvù nu ɛ gɛn ɛ bɛɛ woŋ bonyii bomew e. Wvú to nu jó ghane cee cún e bô bo Aysik noo Yakow bò Nyo' to kawɛɛ bó bocii bô woŋ wvudvu lɛ ɛ̀ nu ke enu wvubo.
58011010	Wvú to cee cún e nonɛn njefo wvú to taale fwe keeke eley kelaante le ɛ kí kɛŋke kenffuy ɛ ɛ̀ to seyse Nyo' no kelaante kedvu nu ke enu, mum yoo.
58011011	Ɛ̀ to ge tɛn fitele fì Sɛla to lesɛɛ yî Nyo' le ɛ wvú sɛ kɛŋkɛ mvuŋgay keeleem bô fue ɛ wvú ɛ lun naa wase ɛ fesɛn wvù ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wvú ebvuu eboo. Fí to kooyi nonɛn njefo Sɛla to nu ɛ bee lɛ Nyo' wvù kawɛɛ wvú ké no leeme kɛ yî diɛw ye le.
58011012	Ɛ fí mum no nu lɛ wee mwaaŋ wvù Abla'am wvù to nu ɛ wvú ɛ lun wase baay, nu wase diuw kpwe le, to nu ɛ nɛ ɛ ɛngokɛ ke wee le buy yî ye le duule diɛwɛ jón yi we le noo diɛwɛ monshɛɛm mo ŋgem joo yi baay e mò wee yaa nulo etaŋ etoo kɛ.
58011013	Bonyii ban bocii to nu ɛ ghan faŋɛ yaa kɛŋkɛ fiɛɛ fì Nyo' kawɛɛ fidvu kɛ, ke ghan no kpwekene ɛ bó lese kɛ fitele yî Nyo' le. Bó to yɛn kɛ lo fí le ɛ fí bɛɛ too ncejole, fiisɛn bô nlaŋlaŋ, jeme bô dew yibo lɛ, fô bó le nu ɛ bó kee lɛ bowen nu kɛ lo botolo ɛ bó bɛke lo yî nshɛ yin e.
58011014	Ɛ́ bonyii jemyi nɛn, tu fí duŋci naa ntay lɛ bó bɛɛ gomte woŋ wvù ɛ̀ nu wvubo.
58011015	Ɛ́ bó to bvuu kpwawci ɛkumɛ woŋ wvù bó to nɛn'yɛɛ jó, tu bó to nu ɛ kɛŋkɛ je keekase tu jim jó.
58011016	Geenɛn no fí nu, nu ɛ bó to gomte ɛ ɛ̀ nu woŋ wvù fele wvuwɛ, wvù ɛ̀ nu woŋ wvu we. Nonɛn kɛ Nyo' ké no wuumene seke bó teŋe wvú lɛ Nyo' wvubo kɛ, njefo wvú nu ɛ seyse kelaante ɛ gɛɛ ɛ̂ bó.
58011017	Ɛ̀ to nu fitele fì Abla'am to lesɛɛ yî Nyo' le fì to geɛ ɛ Nyo' ke dioo mom wvú, ɛ wvú bee keejo waa we wvù Aysik ege ncese dvú fô Nyo' le. Ɛ wvú wvù Abla'am nu wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ lɛ ɛŋgokɛ ke wee le nu ke ebuy yî ye le. Ɛ wvú bee kɛ keejo waa we ɛ ɛ̀ ka wvú, lɛ wen ege ncese dvú.
58011018	Waa we wvun nu wvù Nyo' to gayɛɛ wase ɛ̂ Abla'am lɛ, “Ɛ̀ nu Aysik wvù nu ke egɛɛ diee di kfuu diuw e.”
58011019	Abla'am to kee kɛ lɛ ɛ́ wee cim kpwe lo, tu Nyo' nulo ekase ege ɛ́ wvú etu dvú. Nonɛn ɛ̂ je mi le nu ɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó ejo lɛ Aysik to nu ɛ kpwe ɛ Nyo' kase nya wvú ɛ̂ Abla'am ɛ wvú nu dvú wum.
58011020	Ɛ̀ to ge fitele fì Aysik to lesɛɛ tɛn yî Nyo' le ɛ wvú sɛ cew Yakow bô Ɛsau jeme ɛ̂ bó ɛkumɛ mbuwma wvù to nu keeke eyuu eto fô bó le.
58011021	Ɛ̀ to ge tɛn fitele fì Yakow to lesɛɛ yî Nyo' le ɛ wvú ke dioo kpwee, cew boom bo Yosɛw wvù waa we le. Ɛ wvú to ceeke nonɛn ɛ wvú ɛ ŋgvuum yî kembaŋ e ɛ no nyaa n'wvum ɛ̂ Nyo'.
58011022	Ɛ̀ to nu fitele fì Yosɛw to lesɛɛ yî Nyo' le fì to geɛ ɛ wvú ke dioo nu wase keekpwe mum no teete kpwe ye duŋci lɛ bonyii bo Islael nu ke eshɛɛ ebuy woŋ wvù Ijiw e. Ɛ wvú mum gay lɛ bó ke edioo ebuyte jó jo bikufɛ biwene.
58011023	Ɛ̀ to nu fitele fì icee Muses bô bwee to lesɛɛ yî Nyo' le fì to geɛ ɛ bó sɛ nyilɛ Muses yî kee le tɛ fo bó eyu seke bó to bokɛɛ wvú. Ɛ bó to nyile nonɛn njefo bó to nu ɛ yɛn lɛ ɛ̀ to nu wan ɛ wvú jee cuu baay. Ɛ bó faŋɛ yaa efane keeŋgoy sa' yì Nfon to bvusɛɛ kɛ.
58011024	Ɛ̀ to nu fitele fì Muses to lesɛɛ tɛn yî Nyo' le seke wvú to kuɛ wase fì to geɛ ɛ wvú tun lɛ fo bó eteŋè wen lɛ waa ŋgonjuu Nfon Fɛlo kɛ.
58011025	Wvú to nu ɛ caw fiew keeyɛne ɛ ɛ̀ nu ŋgɛw bô bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo Nyo' le, ɛfey keeyuuke njoŋ bô mwɛɛm mvù ɛ̀ nu mvù befe ɛ mvú fele lo.
58011026	Wvú to nu ɛ jo lɛ ɛ́ bó eshoose wen njefo wen nu wee Mboyse wvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ, tu fifiɛ kɛŋke sɛw fele keekɛŋke kpwaw wvu Ijiw tfuu. Wvú to jo nonɛn njefo wvú to taale mmawcɛ wvù nu ke eto fô wvú le.
58011027	Ɛ̀ to ge fitele fì wvú to lesɛɛ yî Nyo' le ɛ wvú sɛ nɛ Ijiw yaa fane fiɛɛ fì ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ Nfon ege bô wvú kɛ, naa ɛ wvú cim ton'yi shém bô wvú nɛɛ. Wvú to nu ɛ suu shém nɛ no gɛne njefo wvú to taale fiew ɛ ɛ̀ nu fwe diɛwɛ wvú yɛne Nyo' wvù bó yaa yɛne bô ɛjisɛ le kɛ.
58011028	Ɛ̀ to ge tɛn fitele fì wvú to lesɛɛ yî Nyo' le ɛ wvú sɛ gɛɛ Ŋkaw Daŋɛfey, jo ɛlɛmɛ yefe yî laŋ fwese le, wvu lɛ Nceendaa Kpwe wvù to yuwyi boom bolemsɛ bo fwe yî kfuu le edioo etoo buyte fô dew fwese bonyii bo Islael e emum edaŋ efey.
58011029	Ɛ̀ to ge tɛn fitele fì bonyii bo Islael to lesɛɛ yî Nyo' le ɛ bó gɛn lente Joo yi Baay yì Yɛɛle fokuse kɛ diɛwɛ bó fey yî nshɛ yi yem e. Ɛ bonyii bo Ijiw ke dioo to tɛn buy fô joo yidvu le no momte keefey tɛn nonɛn ɛ yí kuu bó bocii gɛn dvú.
58011030	Ɛ̀ nu tɛn fitele fì bonyii bodvu to lesɛɛ fì to geɛ ɛ bó ke dioo gɛn buy Jɛliku, ke lɛn kɛnɛn kelaante kedvu, ke dioo kɛnɛn nonɛn buy ɛdiuw ɛsooshwiy ɛ kembew ke kelaante kedvu le kesɛ kecii.
58011031	Ɛ̀ to ge fitele fì La'ab wvù to nu kpwoon nsake mvu to lesɛɛ tɛn yî Nyo' le ɛ wvú sɛ boy faŋɛ yaa ekpwe ŋgoo bonyii bobole bo woŋ e bò to tɛmyi bikuu bô bo Nyo' kɛ. Wvú to baa kpwe, njefo bonyii bo Islael to nu ɛ tum bonyii lɛ bó eto eghan ekee woŋ wvudvu, ɛ kpwoon wvudvu fiisɛn bó ɛ̂ wvú yew.
58011032	Ɛ́ ɛ̀ nu lɛ me entaaŋke bonyii bò to lesɛɛ fitele yî Nyo' le, ɛ́ me ŋke entaŋ eŋgɛn embuy fɛɛ? Kɛ kefew nu dvú kè ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me ŋkɛw nyɛy mwɛɛm mvu bonyii le diɛwɛ Gidion, Balak, Samsen, Jɛfta kɛnɛɛ Dawe bô Samwɛl noo bonyii bo ntum Nyo' le bomew e kɛ.
58011033	Bonyii ban bocii nu ɛ bó to lese fitele yî Nyo' le. Ɛ bomew ke so bitum yî jem e, ɛ bomew saw bvunfon ɛ̂ je yi lɛŋ e, ɛ bomew kɛŋkɛ mwɛɛm mvù Nyo' to kawɛɛ bó dvú, ɛ bomew kɛŋkɛ mvuŋgay keebaŋ dew bobvule fo bó eŋgele bó.
58011034	Bomew to nu ɛ kɛŋkɛ mvuŋgay keege ɛ́ ŋguy wvù to bɛɛnci naa bɛmte lo ejimɛ. Ɛ bomew kɛŋkɛ mvuŋgay keebuy can bonyii bò to gomte keegbwocɛ bó bô nyó jem e. Ɛ bomew bò to yen'yi wɛɛyi ke nɛ tu bontɛmemvuŋgay. Ɛ bomew tu bonyii bo jem e bò tɛmyi, ɛ bomew kuŋ bonyii bo jem e bo bitum bimew e ɛ bó fɛɛ lo.
58011035	Bomew to nu bokɛnɛ bò to lesɛɛ tɛn fitele yî Nyo' le. Ɛ Nyo' ge ɛ bonyii bobole bomew bò to nu ɛ kpwekɛn wase kase tu dvú no nu bô bó. Bomew bonyii nu ɛ bó to koole bvuuke bô bimbaŋ, ɛ bó faŋɛ yaa cim ebvuu eshieele lɛ bó ecinɛ bó le kɛ, njefo bó to yɛne lɛ ɛ́ bowen kpwe lo, ke ekase ebuy yî kpwe le ekɛŋkɛ nshii wvù jee fele wvun.
58011036	Bomew nu ɛ bó to kɛɛŋke bó, tamte bô boŋgbwan ɛ ye caafi, kayte bomew bô boncaw fene yew ncaw e.
58011037	Ɛ bomew nu ɛ bó to tumyɛ bô ɛta ɛ bó kpwekɛn, bvuu tan'yi bomew bô nyó yì bó tane bite dvú ɛ bó buyte biba bifɛɛ bifɛɛ, gbwoci bomew bô nyó jem ɛ bó kpwekene. Bomew to ghane jiise ɛ ɛ̀ nu jéw njée bô yi bíe. Bó to nu bonyii bo kefufe le, ɛ bonyii njiŋsene bô bó bvuu nyɛwle bô bó.
58011038	Bó to ghane cee ŋkaante le noo yî dikum e bô ɛ̂ ditfum e noo ɛ̂ bibuw e. Ɛ̀ nu bonyii ɛ woŋ wvun to baa ekocɛn wvù bó ecee wvú le kɛ.
58011039	Bonyii ban nɛn bocii nu ɛ bó to lese fitele yî Nyo' le, ɛ Nyo' bɛnse bó naa ntay. Geenɛn wee mvu bó le to baa emum ekɛŋkɛ fiɛɛ fì Nyo' to kawɛɛ bonyii dvú kɛ.
58011040	Bó to baa ekɛŋkɛ njefo Nyo' to kɛŋke ntaŋ wvù jee ntay fô beene le fele wvubo, wvu lɛ ɛ̀ nu ke enu kɛ seke bó ɛ taashɛ beene ɛ bó, ɛ́ bó sɛ no nu ɛ bó ɛ kpwɛntɛn ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛjise ɛ gɛn ɛ mɛse.
58012001	No beene nu wase ɛ kebombom ke bonyii bò to nu ɛ lese fitele yî Nyo' le ban ɛ gem beene ɛ tase ɛ no duŋci no ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wee elese fitele yî Nyo' le, beene emum ebuy ɛkuse jo bvujitɛ bvucii bvù jewsee beene, noo bibefɛ bì njimte beene, emum ekuu shém elewtè kenlewtɛ kè Nyo' nu ɛ gɛɛ ɛ̂ beene fwe.
58012002	Beene dioo lewte no taale yî Jisos e. Ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù to yen'yɛɛ je fô beene le keelese fitele yî Nyo' le, ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù gee ɛ fitele fì beene lese yî Nyo' le kpwɛntene gɛne mɛɛse. Wvú to nu ɛ bee keekpwe kpwe yi yî kentam e. Wvú to baa ecim etaale ɛ̂ kenshoose ke kfuu yiyɛ kpwe le kɛ, njefo wvú to taale fwe yî bvujoŋkɛ bvù nu ɛ̂ wvú fwe le. Keseen wvú ɛ no nu ɛ wvú ɛ shii ɛ̂ ɛbo ke ɛcɛɛy ke kawla Nyo' le.
58012003	Ben ekpwawcì ɛkumɛ wvuwɛ wee wvù to nu ɛ fiisɛn kfuu wvuwɛ ŋgɛw wvù bonyii bò befe to nyaa ɛ̂ wvú, wvu lɛ fifiɛ ege ɛ́ mvuntelem mvunɛn saa ewɛɛyi, kɛnɛɛ edoose ɛ̂ je kɛ.
58012004	Jem yì ben tumte ben ɛ bo kebefɛ nu ɛ ben baa tum wase egɛn ebuy yì gvune di wee le ejiim lo kɛ.
58012005	Me ŋkpwaake lɛ ben baa edaayɛ wase ntefe wvù Nyo' nyaa ɛ̂ ben diɛwɛ boom bew e kɛ? Wvú gayte lɛ, “Waa wɛm, seke Tata nɛci wo, fo wo ejoò ncɛw kɛ. Ɛ́ wvú dioo saake wo yî fiɛɛ le, fo shem ekpweè wo kɛ.
58012006	Ɛ̀ keè lɛ Tata ké no nɛci ɛ ɛ̀ nu wee wvù wvú kooŋke, tamte ɛ ɛ̀ nu wan tfuu wvù wvú joo lɛ ɛ̀ nu wvuwen.”
58012007	Ben emum ekuulè shém yî boŋgɛw bò ben yɛne le, ekeè lɛ Nyo' nɛci lo ben diɛwɛ boom bew e. Wan mvu nu dvú wvù jay fiɛɛ ɛ́ ice enu sɛ wvú ɛ nɛle wvú e?
58012008	Ɛ́ Nyo' cin'yi ben e sɛ wvú nɛci no wvú ké no nɛci boom bew bocii, tu ben baa enu naa lo boom bew kɛ, tu ben nu bikolɛ.
58012009	Beene kɛŋke tɛn bo'icee bosɛɛbeene bo fokuse fɛn bò to ké no nɛci beene ɛ beene wvumte bó. Ɛ́ beene to wvumte bó nonɛn, tu kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ beene enya bikuu ɛ̂ Icee biyoy bisɛɛbeene efey lo nonɛn, ke ekɛŋkɛ nshii wvù mɛy lo?
58012010	Bocee bosɛɛbeene bodvu to nu ɛ nɛcɛ beene kɛ yî kefew e caan no bó to yɛne lɛ fí nu lɛŋ. Ɛ Icee wesebeene wvun nɛci beene keeseyse lo beene ɛ́ beene eyuule no wvú yuule.
58012011	Ɛ̀ ke dioo nu seke bó tamte wee keenɛle wvú, ɛ wvú no yuuke nlucɛ kefew kekiɛ le, wvú saa yuuke naa lo njoŋ kɛ. Ɛ́ ke edioo enu wase ɛjim jo kefew kedvu, ɛ fifiɛ to bô nyɛkeey noo nce wvu teytey fô wvuwɛ wee wvù Nyo' nu ɛ yɛɛyi wvú ɛ̂ yiyin je le.
58012012	Nonɛn ben ege ɛ́ can yene yì nu ɛ jɛw wase ekase etɛme, ege tɛn ɛ́ ɛnvuw ɛyene yò ndeŋdeŋe wase ekase etɛme.
58012013	Ben egɛnè kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ je yi teytey e, wvu lɛ fo bikoy bì tɛɛse wase emɛse elose kɛ, ɛ́ bí etɛme lo.
58012014	Ben emomtè ntay keecee yî nyɛkeey e ben ɛ bonyii bocii, ebvuu emomtè tɛn ntay keecee nce wvù yuule. Ɛ́ wee nu sɛ wvú cee nce wvù yuule, tu kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wvú ke eyɛn Tata le kɛ.
58012015	Ben eyɛnè fo wee mvu ke ejim keekɛŋkɛ mbuwma Nyo', ebvuu eyɛnè tɛn fo ŋgow mi yì befe ke enɛ ebuy ɛ̂ ben ɛntelɛŋ ke eto bô ŋgɛw ejiŋ bonyii nteen.
58012016	Ben eyɛnè tɛn lɛ fo wee mvu ben e ekɛŋke nce nnyɛn kenjaŋ kɛ. Fo wee tɛn emaà lo Nyo' diɛwɛ Ɛsau wvù to gesɛɛ mbuwma wvù wvú to nu keeke ekɛŋkɛ diɛwɛ wan wvu ŋgaywee le yî mwɛɛm mvudien mvu kaŋ mwaaŋ e maaŋ kɛ.
58012017	Kɛ ben kee lɛ ɛjim jodvu nu ɛ wvú to nɛ bvuu no gomte keekɛŋkɛ mbuwma wvun can ice le, ɛ ice ma lo wvú? Naa no wvú to cim shiwse misɛm ɛ̂ jise gomte keekumɛn fitele fiew, nu ɛ kɛ je to bvuu nu dvú keekumɛn kɛ.
58012018	Ben ekeè lɛ fô ben leeme fó keseen baa nu diɛwɛ bvudvuu bvu fokuse bvù bonyii bo Islael to leeme fó bvù bó yɛne bvú le kɛ. Bó to leeme, ɛ ŋguy bene nɛn lululu, ɛ ɛkfuŋ yiile nɛn taytaytay, ɛ nffum kfune tɛn nɛn kekeke.
58012019	Bó to yuuke tɛn ɛ soŋ saayi, ɛ diɛw mi jemyi. Mwɛɛm mvù diɛw yidvu to jemyi to nu ɛ bɛmse bó, ɛ bó no lɛke lo lɛ fo diɛw yidvu ebvuu ejeme ɛ̂ bó kɛ.
58012020	Bó to lɛke nonɛn njefo fiɛɛ fì diɛw yidvu to jemyɛɛ to nu ɛ ghaw mvuŋgay mvubole. Diɛw yidvu to nu ɛ ciise lo ɛ̂ bó lɛ, “Fo fiɛɛ ebencɛ lo bɛw kum wvun kɛ. Ɛ́ ɛ̀ cim nu nyam, ɛ́ bó tumyɛ lo bô ɛta ɛ yí kpwe.”
58012021	Kecɛɛy, mwɛɛm mvù bó to yɛne fó to bɛmte baay. Ɛ Muses kebɛɛ jeme lɛ, “Nfan wvu baay nu ɛ ge ye ɛ nɛ ɛ no ciiŋke lo me.”
58012022	Ben nu finɛn ɛ ben leeme ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî kum wvù Sayon e, ɛ ɛ̀ nu kelaante kè ɛ̀ nu ke Nyo' wvù kɛŋke nshii le, ɛ ɛ̀ bvuu nu Jɛlusalɛm wvu fowe. Ɛ̀ nu fó fò bonceendaa bo Nyo' le bò wee yaa nulo etaŋ etoo laŋlaŋe yî kentaashɛ le.
58012023	Ben nu ɛ to wase ɛ̂ kentaashɛ ke bonyii bo Nyo' le bò ɛ̀ nu boom bew bo fwe, ɛ wvú ɛ saŋ ɛdiee ɛbo ɛ̂ ŋwa' we le fowe. Ben nu ɛ to wase fwe dvu Nyo' wvù sumtene bonsaw bo bonyii bocii le. Ben nu ɛ to wase tɛn fwe dvu biyoy bi bonyii bò to nu teytey e bì Nyo' nu ɛ ge wase bí ɛ no yuule gɛne mɛɛse le.
58012024	Ben nu ɛ to wase tɛn fô Jisos wvù leeme fwe moŋkan mo monfɛm ɛntelɛŋ jo Nyo' bô bonyii le, ɛ̀ to tɛn fwe dvu ɛlɛmɛ ke Jisos e kè bó to miawmiawɛɛ yî beene le. Ɛlɛmɛ kin jemyi fiɛɛ fì fele fi ɛlɛmɛ ke Abɛl e.
58012025	Ben eyɛnè fo ben etune keebee wee wvù jemyi ɛ̂ ben e. Ben kpwaake lɛ ɛ́ bonyii bo Islael to nu sɛ bó eboy can ŋgɛw wvù to toɛ fô bó le njefo bó to nu ɛ tun keebee wee wvù Nyo' to tumɛɛ lɛ wvú eteetè bó fokuse fɛn e, tu je nu dvú fô beene le keeke eboy fɛn ɛ́ beene ɛ tun keebee wee wvù teete beene ɛ ɛ̀ nu fowe le?
58012026	Ɛ̀ to nu sekekiɛ ɛ wvú jeme ɛ nshɛ shiw. Keseen ɛ no nu ɛ wvú ɛ kaw lɛ, “Seke me ɛ mbvuu ɛ nshiwsɛ, ɛ́ saa eshiw kɛ nshɛ maaŋ kɛ. Ɛbulɛ tɛn nu ke eshiw fó.”
58012027	Diɛw yì lɛ, “Seke me ɛ mbvuu ɛ nshiwsɛ”, duŋci lɛ Nyo' nu ke ecake lo mwɛɛm mvunciim mvù wvú to bomɛɛ mvù ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bó eshiw, wvu lɛ ɛ́ eshɛɛ kɛ wase mwɛɛm mvù yaa nulo ɛ́ bó eshiw kɛ.
58012028	Fí ɛ mum ɛ no nu lɛ beene enyaà keyoone ɛ̂ Nyo' lɛ bvunfon bvù beene nu ɛ fiisɛn nu bvù ɛ̀ yaa nulo ɛ́ bó eshiw bvú kɛ. Nonɛn beene emum ebunleè Nyo' ɛ̂ je yi lɛŋ e, enyaà n'wvum ɛ̂ wvú, fanè wvú.
58012029	Beene enyaà nonɛn njefo, “Nyo' wesebeene nu diɛwɛ ŋguy wvù nulo efiese lo fiɛɛ le.”
58013001	Ben ekoŋenè kɛ nonɛn gɛne fwe diɛwɛ boom bo bwee wan e.
58013002	Fo ben ecinɛ keefiisene botolo ɛla ɛyene le kɛ. Ben ekeè lɛ bonyii bomew nu ɛ fiisɛn wase nonɛn ɛ fiisɛn ɛ ɛ̀ nu bonceendaa bo Nyo' le yaa kee kɛ.
58013003	Ben ekumyì bonyii bò nu yew ncaw e, enù kɛ diɛwɛ ben ɛ bó bocii nu yew ncaw e. Ben ekumyì tɛn bonyii bò bó nyɛwle bô bó, njefo ben tɛn kɛŋke ye.
58013004	Wee tfuu enyaà n'wvum ɛ̂ kentaashɛ ke wee bô kpwɛse le, ɛ́ kpwoon bô diemsɛn eyɛnè fo wee ebvuu ebuy ɛkfuŋ ebefe bô kentaw kebole. Ben ekeè lɛ Nyo' nu ke esaw bonyii bocii bò cee nce nnyɛn noo bò cin'yi kentaashɛ kebole ke wee bô kpwɛse le buyte ɛkfuŋ.
58013005	Fo ben elese bvufee bvunɛn yî bigew e yî nshii wene le kɛ. Wee eyuukè njoŋ bô fiɛɛ fì wvú kɛŋke, njefo Nyo' nu ɛ gay lɛ, “Kɛ me nu ŋke en'yuu encinɛ wo le kɛ, ɛ kɛ me nu ŋke en'yuu enlaŋ wo kɛ.”
58013006	Fifin ɛ mum ɛ ge ɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ beene ejeme sɛ kemaŋɛn no wee to gayɛɛ lɛ, “Tata nu wvù fii me. Kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me enfane fiɛɛ kɛ. Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wee ege la bô me?”
58013007	Ben ekumyì bonyii bò to nu bikuu binɛn bò to yawɛɛ fewcɛ diɛw Nyo' ɛ̂ ben. Ben ekume no nce wvubo to nu, emum ebeŋene je yì bó to lesɛɛ fitele yî Nyo' le jó.
58013008	Kɛ Jisos Klistu ké no kumene kɛ. No wvú se nu foguu, nu kɛ no wvú nu ɛbɛn, ɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ no wvú nu ke enu sekecii.
58013009	Fo ben ecinɛ ɛ́ bonyii eto bô bon'yɛɛyi bo jɛɛy bò bó yaa kee jò bó buy, elɛwe ben dvú kɛ. Fí jee lɛ mvuntelem mvusɛɛbeene etɛmyi nje mbuwma Nyo', ɛfey fo enu nje bonci bo ɛkumɛ mwɛɛm mvudien. Kɛ bonci boban cim fii bonyii bò leeme yî dvú le kɛ.
58013010	Beene kɛŋke ketaŋ ke ncese le, ɛ bocee ncese bò lemte fô ketaŋ ke yew Nyo' yi fokuse fɛn e yaa kɛŋke naa lo mvuŋgay keedie fiɛɛ fì nɛ fô kekin ketaŋ e kɛ.
58013011	Ben ekeè lɛ ɛkolɛ ke bocee ncese le to ké jo ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛlɛmɛ ke nyám e ley dvú fô Bvudvuu bwɛ bvù looci Yuule naa ntay e keege ncese dvú fô bibefɛ bi bonyii le, geenɛn ɛ bó jo nyám yidvu buysɛn ntɛw dvú mum ton ɛ yí fie.
58013012	Jisos to nu ɛ kpwe tɛn ɛkfuŋ jo kelaante wvu lɛ wen ecukɛ bibefɛ bi bonyii le bô ɛlɛmɛ kew.
58013013	Nonɛn beene emum ebuysɛn tɛn ebi wvú le ɛkfuŋ jo ntɛw ekɛŋkɛ tɛn boncun bò wvú to kɛŋkɛɛ.
58013014	Beene kee lɛ kɛ la din dì beene nu fó fɛn nu ke emɛy nu sekecii kɛ. Beene taale fwe ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî la dì bɛɛ too le.
58013015	Nonɛn beene emum ebɛɛ Jisos egeè ncese wvu mbense fô Nyo' le sekecii wvù ɛ̀ nu keeyemte diee diew.
58013016	Fo ben edaayɛ keegee lemme dì jee noo keegawte mwɛɛm mvunɛn mvù ben kɛŋke ben ɛ bonyii bomew kɛ. Ɛ́ ben gee nonɛn, tu ɛ̀ nu ncese wvù jee fô Nyo' le.
58013017	Ben eyuukè bonyii bò nu bikuu binɛn e, geè no bó shieele, njefo bó taale fô biyoy binɛn e diɛwɛ bonyii bò kee lɛ bó nu ke etaŋe diuw ɛkumɛ lemme dibole ɛ̂ Nyo'. Ben egeè nonɛn wvu lɛ bó egee lemme dibole bô nlaŋlaŋ, ɛ ɛ̀ yaa nu kɛ shen shen kɛ. Ɛ́ bó gee shen shen, fifiɛ saa efici ben kɛ.
58013018	Ben ebunleè fô bese le. Bese kee naa kecɛɛy lɛ kɛ fitele saake bese yî fiɛɛ fimew e kɛ, njefo bese ké no shieele keegee fiɛɛ ficii bô n'wvum.
58013019	Me nlooci naa nlɛke baay lɛ ben ebunleè, wvu lɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ me en'yaŋsɛn eŋkase ento fô ben e.
58013020	Nyo' wvù nu Nyo' kembonɛn nu wvù to kasɛɛ bvuse Jisos wvù Tata wesebeene wvù nu Ncɛy Njée wvu baay yî kpwe le. Wvú to bvuse fele yî mvuŋgay mvu ɛlɛmɛ ke moŋkan mò mɛy lo le.
58013021	Me nlɛke lɛ wvú enya ben bô mwɛɛm mvù jee mvunciim, wvu lɛ ben egee fiɛɛ ficii fì wvú shieele. Me nlɛke tɛn lɛ wvú elemtè fiɛɛ ficii yî yene le can Jisos Klistu le fì wvú yɛne lɛ fí jee wvú le. Beene enyaà mbense ɛ̂ Jisos Klistu wvun sekecii sɛ ŋka. Fí enù nonɛn.
58013022	Boom bo bwɛɛm e, me nlɛke lɛ ben ekuu shém eyuw diɛw ntefe yì me nsaŋ fô ben e yin. Fiɛɛ fì me nsaŋ nu kɛ nɛn kfuy.
58013023	Me ŋgomte lɛ ben ekiɛɛ lɛ waa bwee wesebeene wvù Timatio nu ɛ bó ɛ bvuse wase wvú yew ncaw e. Ɛ́ wvú yaŋsene lo ɛ to, ɛ́ bee wvú ke elɛn ɛkalɛ kemwaaŋ eto eyɛn ben e.
58013024	Ben egay bonyii bò nu bikuu binɛn e bocii noo bonyii bò ɛ̀ nu bo Nyo' le bocii enya ɛ̂ me. Boom bo bwee wesebeene le bo Itali ciinse tɛn ŋgayma ɛ̂ ben.
58013025	Nyo' ebuw ben bocii bô kembonɛn.
59001001	Ŋwa' wvun saŋ me wvù Jɛm, waa lemme Nyo' bô Tata Jisos Klistu. Me nsaŋ fô dikfuu di bonyii bo Nyo' le di yuufe ncow difɛɛ dì nu ɛ tawse woŋ e tfuu. Me ŋgayte ben e.
59001002	Boom bo bwɛɛm e, ɛ́ mmom too fô ben e jé le jé le, ɛ́ ben jo lɛ ɛ̀ nu bvujoŋkɛ.
59001003	Me njemyi nonɛn njefo no ben fele ɛ̂ mmom ɛnte, leese kɛ fitele yî Nyo' le, nu ɛ yí nu ege ɛ́ ben ekee keekuu shém ntay.
59001004	Ben ekuulè kɛ shém nonɛn egɛn emɛse, wvu lɛ ben enu bonyii bò nu ɛ taw ɛ kocɛn, yaa tane fiɛɛ yî yene le kɛ.
59001005	Ɛ́ wee mvu ben e tane bvufee keekiɛɛ fiɛɛ fì Nyo' gomte, ɛ́ wvú lɛkɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛ́ wvú enya. Nyo' nu wvù nyaa ɛ̂ wee tfuu bô fitele ficii yaa waale wee kɛ.
59001006	Geenɛn, wee edioo elɛke no leeme kɛ bô Nyo' fitele fimwaaŋ, yaa maŋene kɛ. Ben ekeè lɛ wee wvù maŋene nu diɛwɛ joo yi baay yì fwefwe bvuyte ɛ yí shɛɛŋke bii jò wvú gɛne.
59001007	Fo wee diɛwɛ wvuwɛ le ekpwaakè lɛ wen nu ke elɛkɛ fiɛɛ ɛ̂ Nyo' ekɛŋkɛ kɛ.
59001008	Wvuwɛ wee nu wvù kɛŋke mvuntelem mvunfɛɛm, tuwtene lo yî fiɛɛ ficii fì wvú gee le.
59001009	Wee mbee wvù fuute eyuukè njoŋ lɛ Nyo' nu ɛ bense wase wvú,
59001010	ɛ́ wee kpwaw eyuukè njoŋ lɛ bó nu ɛ shike wase wvú, njefo wvú nu ke egɛn ecinɛ kpwaw we le kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no fow ké looke yî ɛgay e ke nɛ yɛlɛ.
59001011	No diuu ké sane dioo baa ton'yi ɛ ɛgay yowlɛn, ɛ fow wvù yî dvú le yɛlɛ, ɛ bvujoŋkɛ bwew ka, nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no wee wvù ghane kuŋene kpwaw we nu ke egɛn.
59001012	Njoŋ wvu baay nu wvu wee wvù kuule shém seke mmom ɛ to fô wvú le, njefo ɛ̀ nu seke wvú ɛ leem ɛ tɛme, ɛ́ wvú ke ekɛŋkɛ kefo ke bvunfon e kè ɛ̀ nu nshii wvù mɛy lo kè Nyo' nu ɛ kaw wee tfuu wvù kooŋke wvú dvú.
59001013	Fo fiɛɛ ké dioo teeyi wee lɛ wvú ege kebefɛ, ɛ wvú no duù lɛ ɛ̀ teeyi Nyo' wen kɛ, njefo kɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ fiɛɛ etelɛ Nyo' lɛ wvú ege kebefɛ kɛ. Ɛ kɛ Nyo' ké no teeyi fiew wee kɛ.
59001014	Fiɛɛ fì ké telɛ wee nonɛn, nu mwɛɛm mvù befe mvù wvú kɛŋke shiee yî dvú le, ɛ́ mvú dioo ɛ lɛwcɛ wvú mum wow,
59001015	ɛ́ shiee wvun ké tɛme, mum to bô kebefɛ, ɛ́ kebefɛ ké dioo ɛ ku ɛ kocɛn, to bô kpwe.
59001016	Boom bo bwɛɛm e bò nu shém yɛm, fo ben elɛɛlè bikuu binɛn kɛ.
59001017	Mwɛɛm mvunciim mvù jee nu lɛŋ, mvù beene kɛŋke nɛn'yi ɛ ɛ̀ nu fowe fô Nyo' le. Ɛ̀ nu wvú Cee Mbom mwɛɛm mvunciim mvu fowe mvù nyaa n'yuu. Kɛ Nyo' kumene diɛwɛ kenjiŋjiŋ e kè ké no kumene mondvuum kɛ.
59001018	Ɛ̀ nu wvú wvù to cawɛɛ beene nya beene bô diɛw yì nu kecɛɛy ɛ yí nya nshii wvu fwɛ ɛ̂ beene, wvu lɛ beene enù fiɛɛ fi fwe fì wvú to balɛɛ lɛ ɛ̀ nu naa fiew ɛnte jo mwɛɛm mvunciim mvù wvú to bomɛɛ.
59001019	Boom bo bwɛɛm e bò nu shém yɛm, ben ekiɛɛ lɛ wee tfuu kɛŋke keenu cekey keenya bitem yî fiɛɛ le, joò wɛɛ bô njeme, joò wɛɛ bô shém yì ton'yɛɛn,
59001020	njefo kɛ wee wvù ton'yi shém nulo ege fiɛɛ fi teytey fì Nyo' shieele kɛ.
59001021	Fí ɛ no nu lɛ, ben ecinɛ nce nnyɛn e noo keŋge kè tɛmyi le, eshike bikuu binɛn, efiisɛn diɛw Nyo' yì Nyo' nu ɛ lese fô mvuntelem mvunɛn e. Diɛw yin nu yì nulo eboyse ben.
59001022	Fo ben elɛɛlè bikuu binɛn keeyuuke kɛ lo diɛw Nyo' maaŋ kɛ. Ben egeè no yí gayte.
59001023	Wee wvù yuuke kɛ lo diɛw Nyo' yaa gee no yí gayte, nu diɛwɛ wee wvù nu ɛ taa bvushiw bwew ɛ̂ kenlɛɛy e,
59001024	no wvú tale nonɛn, ɛ base jim ɛ mum ɛ kase ɛ daayɛ no nfieesɛn ye nu.
59001025	Geenɛn, wee wvù looci taale ɛ̂ nci wvù taashi bonci bocii bvuu bvuuse bonyii bvunfaw e, leeme yî dvú le sekecii, yaa daayi fiɛɛ fì wvú yuuke ɛ wvú jemyi, gee no wvú gayte, nu ɛ Nyo' nu ke elaŋ kembonɛn yî fiɛɛ ficii fì wvú gee le.
59001026	Ɛ́ wee teŋe ɛkolɛ kew lɛ wen looci nu wee mbee, ɛ faŋɛ yaa ejici leme diew e, tu wvú lɛɛle ɛkolɛ kew, ɛ fiɛɛ fì wvú teŋe ɛkolɛ kew lɛ wen nu wee mbee nu ɛcici.
59001027	Mbee wvù Nyo' Icee wesebeene yɛne ɛ ɛ̀ nu wvu lɛŋ bvuu yuule ɛ̂ wvú ɛjise, nu wvu wee wvù taale fô boom bo boŋkfu le noo fô bokɛ' bo boŋkfu le seke bó nu yî ŋgɛw e. Ɛ ɛ̀ bvuu nu tɛn wvù kemsene bô ɛkolɛ kew fo mwɛɛm mvu yî nshɛ le fɛn elom wvú.
59002001	Boom bo bwɛɛm e, no ben nu ɛ lese wase fitele yî Tata wesebeene wvù Jisos Klistu wvù nu Tata bvukukɛ le, fo ben eduŋcì kejɛɛy jɛɛy kɛ.
59002002	Me njemyi nonɛn njefo ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ bonyii bofɛɛ enɛ eley yew yene nshii le, ɛ wvumvu ɛ jise ndvú ɛ yí jee, ɛ lese mvuncaw ɛ bó ɛ kene bô ketwaa ke bigew e kè yɛɛle, ɛ wvumvu wee nu fiew wee kefufe, ɛ wvú ɛ jise ndvú ɛ yí ɛ sawyɛ.
59002003	Ben ɛ nɛ ɛ gay ɛ̂ wee kefufe lɛ, “Leem fofe,” kɛnɛɛ lɛ, “To eshii fokuse fɛn nshɛ le,” ɛ mum ɛ nya bvufee ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî wee wvù sufe ye wɛ le, ɛ gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Kɛ to eshii fɛn wee wvu baay.”
59002004	Ɛ́ ben nɛ ɛ ge nonɛn, kɛ tu ben nu ɛ tu wase bonyii bò sumtene bonsaw bô mvuntelem mvù yiile? Kɛ fifin yen'yi lɛ ben duŋci kejɛɛy jɛɛy ɛ̂ ben ɛntelɛŋ e?
59002005	Boom bo bwɛɛm e bò nu shém yɛm, ben eyekɛ eyuw, kɛ ɛ̀ nu bonyii bo kefufe le bo fokuse fɛn bò Nyo' nu ɛ caw lɛ bó elooci kɛŋke mbee wvù nu ɛ yiŋsɛn e? Ɛ kɛ ɛ̀ bvuu nu bó bò Nyo' nu ke enya bó bô bvudvuu ɛnte jo bvunfon bwew bvù wvú to kawɛɛ wee tfuu wvù kooŋke wvú dvú le?
59002006	Geenɛn, ben nɛn'yi finɛn kaa no shoose lo wee kefufe ɛ̂ yiyɛ je le, yɛne ɛ ɛ̀ nu wee kpwaw e. Bonyii bò nu ɛ ben ɛ shii yî yene le guute ben gɛne dvú yéw bonsaw e nu baa? Kɛ ɛ̀ nu bonyii bo kpwaw e le?
59002007	Kɛ ɛ̀ bvuu nu kɛ bó bò jemyi díɛw yì befe ɛkumɛ diee di Tata wvù kɛŋke ben e le?
59002008	Ben eloocì gɛɛle nci Nfon wvù Nyo' wvù nu ɛ̂ Ŋwa' we le. Nci wvun nu lɛ, “Ɛ̀ kooŋkè waa bwoo no wo kooŋke ɛkolɛ kuw.” Ɛ́ ben gee nonɛn, tu ben gee lɛŋ.
59002009	Geenɛn, ɛ́ ben duŋci kejɛɛy jɛɛy no me mbe njeme wase, tu ɛ̀ nu kebefɛ ɛ ben gee, tu ben nu ɛ ŋgoy nci wvú ɛ koo ben.
59002010	Ben ekeè lɛ ɛ́ wee gɛɛle naa bonci bo Nyo' le bocii, ɛ ke ɛ ŋgoy mwaaŋ, tu wvú nu ɛ ŋgoy wase bocii.
59002011	Ɛ fí nu nonɛn, njefo Nyo' wvù to gayɛɛ lɛ, “Fo wo ejaŋ kpwɛɛ wee kɛ” nu kɛ tɛn wvú wvù to gayɛɛ lɛ, “Fo wo eyu wee kɛ.” Ɛ́ wo nu sɛ wo nu ɛ jaŋ kpwɛɛ wee, geenɛn ɛ yu wee, tu wo nu ɛ ŋgoy kɛ nci Nyo'.
59002012	Nonɛn, ben ejemyì bvuu geè mwɛɛm diɛwɛ bonyii bò Nyo' nu ke esaw bó bii nci wvù bvuuse bonyii bvunfaw e.
59002013	Ben ekeè lɛ Nyo' nu ke dioo saake nsaw, wvú saa ekoole shen fô wee wvù to baa koole shen fô wee mvu le kɛ. Geenɛn, wee wvù koole shen nu wvù nu ke eboy yî nsaw e.
59002014	Boom bo bwɛɛm e, ɛ́ wee nɛ ɛ no duu lɛ wen nu ɛ lese fitele yî Nyo' le, ɛ gee diew yaa duŋci nonɛn kɛ, ɛ́ fifiɛ ke efi wvú yî la le? Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ fitele fì wvú lese fidvu ke eboyse wvú?
59002015	Bó ejo lɛ, ɛ́ waa bwoo wvù diemsɛn kɛnɛɛ wvù kpwoon nɛ ɛ no tane ndvú bô mwɛɛm mvudien mvu ɛdiuw ɛcii,
59002016	ɛ to fô wo le, wo ɛ gay ɛ̂ wvú lɛ, “Nyo' elaŋ kembonɛn yî yo le ɛ́ wo ekɛŋkɛ ndvú bô mwɛɛm mvudien.” Ɛ́ wo gay kɛ lo nonɛn, sɛ wo ɛ nya wvú bô mwɛɛm mvù wvú shieele, ɛ́ fifiɛ efi wvú yî la le?
59002017	Ben baa yɛn lɛ lɛ ɛ́ wee duu lɛ wen nu ɛ lese fitele yî Nyo' le, sɛ gee diew duŋci nonɛn, tu fitele fì wvú lese ɛfinɛfin nu ɛcici?
59002018	Wee mvu nulo enɛ egay lɛ, fi wee mvu le nu ɛ wvú ɛ lese ɛ ɛ̀ nu fitele yî Nyo' le, ɛ fi wee mvu le nu ɛ wvú gee ɛ ɛ̀ nu gee di lɛŋ. Me ɛ mum ɛ no ŋgayte lɛ wvú eduŋcɛ no ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ wee elese fitele yî Nyo' le sɛ gee diew nu lɛŋ, ɛ́ me nduŋcɛ ɛ̂ wvú no me nu ɛ nlese fitele yî Nyo' le ɛ ɛ̀ nu yî gee diem di lɛŋ e.
59002019	Ɛ́ wee nu ɛ bee lɛ Nyo' nu mwaaŋ, tu ɛ̀ nu lɛŋ. Geenɛn, naa bonceendaa bo dɛwle le tɛn nu ɛ bee kɛ nonɛn ɛ no fane, ciiŋke.
59002020	Wvuwɛ wee nu keyuŋ. Wvú gomte lɛ me enduŋcɛ lɛ ɛ́ wee lese fitele yî Nyo' le sɛ gee dì jee ŋkuuŋ, tu ɛ̀ nu ɛcici?
59002021	Kɛ fiɛɛ fì to geɛ ɛ Nyo' yɛn lɛ Abla'am wvù icee wesebeene nu ɛ kocɛn wee we le to nu gee diew di lɛŋ e? Wvú to nu ɛ jo waa we wvù Aysik, jike yî ketaŋ ke ncese le keege ncese dvú fô Nyo' le.
59002022	Ben ɛ yɛn lɛ lɛ fitele fì wvú to lesɛɛ yî Nyo' le bô gee diew di lɛŋ to lɛne ɛkalɛ kemwaaŋ e? Gee diew di lɛŋ to nu ɛ duŋcɛ lɛ fitele fì wvú to lesɛɛ yî Nyo' le to nu ɛ yiŋsɛn.
59002023	Ɛ fí mum kocɛn no bó to saŋɛɛ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le lɛ, “Abla'am to nu ɛ lese fitele yî Nyo' le, nje nonɛn, ɛ Nyo' yɛn lɛ wvú nu wee wvu teytey.” Ɛ bó mum no teŋe wvú lɛ nsaa Nyo'.
59002024	Ben ɛ bvuu ɛ yɛn lɛ lɛ fiɛɛ fì ké ge ɛ Nyo' yɛn lɛ wee nu ɛ kocɛn wee we le nu gee diew di lɛŋ, ɛ ɛ̀ yaa mɛy kɛ fitele fì wvú lese yî Nyo' le maaŋ kɛ?
59002025	Ɛ̀ nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no fi La'ab wvù to nu kpwoon nsake le to nu. Fiɛɛ fì to geɛ ɛ Nyo' yɛn lɛ wvú nu ɛ kocɛn wee we le to nu gee diew di lɛŋ. Wvú to nu ɛ fiisɛn boŋkee bo Islael ɛ̂ wvú yew, ke duŋcɛ je yimi jɛɛy yì bó etu jim jó.
59002026	Fí ɛ no nu lɛ, kɛ no keyoy cin'yi nyam ye le ɛ yí mum no nu wase fiɛɛ fi ɛcici, nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no wee lese fitele yî Nyo' le sɛ gee di lɛŋ ŋkuuŋ tu fí nu ɛcici.
59003001	Boom bo bwɛɛm e, fo ben nteen egomtè keenu bonyii bo n'yɛɛyi le kɛ. Kɛ ben kee ntay lɛ bonyii bo n'yɛɛyi le nu ɛ wvubo nsaw nu ɛ bó nu ke eloocɛ etasse ntay?
59003002	Ɛ̀ nu kecɛɛy lɛ beene bocii gee bojay nteen. Geenɛn, ɛ́ wee nu dvú wvù yaa ké jay njeme kɛ, tu ɛ̀ nu wee ɛ wvú ɛ kocɛn, bvuu kee tɛn keekemsɛn bô ɛkolɛ kew.
59003003	Beene ké jo ncaw lese ɛmvu jo nyambala keege lɛ yí eyuukè beene le. Ɛ beene mum no baŋse nyam yidvu dvú ɛ yí gɛne jò beene gomte.
59003004	Ben eyɛn tɛn no ŋguw wvu ɛ̂ joo nu. Wvú kuuke naa ntay, ɛ fwefwe wvù tɛmyi ké no domsee. Geenɛn, ɛ fiɛɛ fì wee wvù guute ŋguw baŋse dvú ɛ wvú gɛne jò wvú gomte, nu kɛ nɛn caan.
59003005	Ɛ̀ nu kɛ lɛŋlɛŋ no leme nu. Dí nu kɛ lo fiɛɛ fi caan yî wee le. Geenɛn ké no jemyi mwɛɛm mvù tɛmyi baay. Kɛ ben kee no ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ ŋguy ekpway nɛn kpwayy, ekoo, eshike ɛkowɛ kecile fokuse?
59003006	Leme nu kɛ tɛn diɛwɛ ŋguy e. Mwɛɛm mvù befe mvu fokuse fɛn nu ɛ tase yî leme di wee le, lamte beete bô ye wee yicii. Leme ké fwɛɛ ŋguy ɛ wvú befe bô nshii wee tfuu. Ɛ ŋguy wvun nu ɛ leme joo ɛ ɛ̀ nu fô ŋguy wvu baay e.
59003007	Bonyii nu ɛ mom wase keeyɛɛyi dikfuu di nyám e dicii. Bó nu ɛ yɛɛyi wase nyám yi ŋkpwaante bô mvunyiim noo nyám yì sone bô yi ɛ̂ joo.
59003008	Geenɛn, kɛ wee nu naa lo dvú wvù nulo eyɛɛyi leme kɛ. Leme ké no wɛwte kɛ lo, ɛ dí ɛ yiŋsɛn bô kebefɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu kè nulo eyu wee kɛ diɛwɛ ɛdien ɛ fimbuw e.
59003009	Ɛ̀ nu leme din dì beene ké no bensee Tata wvù Icee wesebeene dvú, ɛ ɛ̀ bvuu nu kɛ dí dì beene ké no nan'yi bonyii dvú, ɛ bonyii ban nu ɛ ɛ̀ bom Nyo' ɛ bó fieesene wvú.
59003010	Diuw mwaaŋ ɛ mum ɛ no bvuuse mbense bvuu bvuuse boncun. Boom bo bwɛɛm e, kɛ fí kɛŋke keenu nonɛn kɛ.
59003011	Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ joo yì yuule bô keduuduu ebuyte diuw mwaaŋ e?
59003012	Boom bo bwɛɛm e, ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ fimbi eyum yî ɛfelɛ le? Nuu lɛ ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ ntuluŋ eyum yî ɛfelɛ le lɛ? Kɛ ɛ̀ nulo tɛn ɛ́ diuw joo lew ebvuuse joo yì jee kɛ.
59003013	Ɛ̀ nu yɛɛ ɛ̂ ben ɛnte wvù duu lɛ wen feefene bvuu kee fiɛɛ? Mwɛtɛn eduŋcɛ ɛkolɛ kew yî nce we wvù jee bô gee diew di lɛŋ dì wvú gee yaa saale kɛ ye, no wee wvù feefene ké no nu.
59003014	Geenɛn, ɛ́ wee ffuuke bô keŋghɛw noo ken'yɛɛ ɛjisɛ fô fitele le, fo wvú esaalè ye lɛ wen feefene lo kɛ. Ɛ́ wvú ge nonɛn, tu wvú tune kecɛɛy.
59003015	Kɛ kfuu bvubwɛ bvufee yaa nu bvu fowe kɛ. Ɛ̀ nu bvu yî nshɛ le, ɛ ɛ̀ nu bvu wee wvu wum e, ɛ ɛ̀ bvuu nu bvu dɛwle le.
59003016	Ben ekeè lɛ naa fɛɛ fô bonyii kɛŋke keŋghɛw bô ken'yɛɛ ɛjisɛ, nu ɛ mwɛɛm ké no bvuuŋke kɛ lo fó. Ɛ bó no gee dikfuu di mwɛɛm mvù befe le mvunciim.
59003017	Geenɛn, wee wvù kɛŋke bvufee bvù nɛn'yi fowe ké no yuule, kooŋke nyɛkeey bvuu nu wɛɛ, nyaa tɛn bitem ɛ̂ wee mvu, nu ɛ wvú ɛ yiŋsɛn bô shen noo gee dì jee, yaa duŋci kejɛɛy jɛɛy kɛ, yaa kɛŋke díɛw fiɛɛ kɛ.
59003018	Bonyii bò gɛɛle nyɛkeey, jewyi ŋgow yì ɛ̀ nu nyɛkeey, ɛ ŋgbwele no nu nce wvu teytey.
59004001	Fiɛɛ fì nɛn'yi no too bô waa noo bvudiuw ɛ̂ ben ɛntelɛŋ nu la? Kɛ ɛ̀ nu shiee mwɛɛm mvù ye yene gomte mvù ffuuke shém yene le le?
59004002	Ben dioo shieele fiɛɛ sɛ ben ɛ kɛŋkɛ mum no gomte keeyu wee sɛ kɛŋkɛ. Ɛ́ ben ké dioo bvuushi ɛjisɛ yî fiɛɛ le, ɛ́ fí fufe, ɛ́ ben mum no waale, diuu. Fiɛɛ fì gee ɛ ben nu sɛ ben kɛŋke mwɛɛm mvun nu njefo kɛ ben ké no lɛke ɛ̂ Nyo' kɛ.
59004003	Ɛ́ ben ké dioo ɛ cim ɛ lɛkɛ, ben saa kɛŋkɛ kɛ, ɛ ɛ̀ nu njefo kɛ ben lɛke bô boŋkpwawcɛ bo lɛŋ kɛ. Ben lɛke mwɛɛm ɛ ɛ̀ nu kɛ keege mwɛɛm mvù ye yene gomte dvú.
59004004	Ben nu naa lo diɛwɛ bokɛnɛ bò nu ɛ cinɛ wase bolemsɛ bobole ɛ no gee ɛ ɛ̀ nu nsake le. Kɛ ben kee lɛ ɛ́ wee kole nsan bô woŋ wvun, tu wvú nu ɛ tu wase wee bvuban fô Nyo' le le? Nonɛn, ben ekeè lɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu naa yɛɛ wvù nu ɛ caw fiew keekoo nsan bô woŋ wvun, tu mwɛtɛn nu ɛ tu wase wee bvuban fô Nyo' le.
59004005	Ɛ̀ nulo ɛ́ ben eghan nɛɛ sɛ no kpwaake lɛ fiɛɛ fì bó to saŋɛɛ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le nu ɛcici? Bó to nu ɛ saŋ lɛ, “Nyo' kɛŋke shiee, beele baay fô keyoy kè wvú to gɛkɛɛ lɛ kí enù yî yese beene le.”
59004006	Nyo' fii naa beene baay. Ɛ̀ nu fiɛɛ fì bó saŋɛɛ ɛ̂ Ŋwa' Nyo' le lɛ, “Nyo' shiwse bonyii bò bensee bikuu bibole, geenɛn buuke bonyii bò shiwse bikuu bibole bô nfi.”
59004007	Nonɛn, ben enya bikuu binɛn ɛ̂ Nyo', ebon ŋaŋ ben ɛ bo dɛwle ɛ́ wvú efɛɛ lo ɛ̂ ben ɛjim.
59004008	Ben eto nceencee mbew Nyo' le, ɛ́ wvú eto tɛn nceencee mbew yene le. Ben bonyii bò befe ebvuushɛ can fô mwɛɛm mvù befe le, ecukɛ mvuntelem mvunɛn ben bò leeme mvuntelem mvunfɛɛm ben ɛ bo Nyo'.
59004009	Ben enù bô yii, beelè shiwsè misɛm nɛn wowwowwow. Ben elu bô dikie, ebeelè ɛ ɛ̀ nu kpwe, elu bô njoŋ wvù ben yuuke, esoò ɛ ɛ̀ nu bikuu.
59004010	Ben eshike bikuu binɛn ɛ̂ Nyo' ɛjise, ɛ́ wvú ecake ben we.
59004011	Boom bo bwɛɛm e, fo wee ejemyì díɛw yì befe ɛkumɛ waa bwee kɛ. Ɛ́ wee jemyi díɛw yì befe ɛkumɛ waa bwee kɛnɛɛ lomte gee di waa bwee le, tu wvú jemyi díɛw yì befe ɛ ɛ̀ nu ɛkumɛ nci Nyo' bvuu lomte nci wvudvu. Ɛ́ wee lomte nci Nyo', tu kɛ wvú bɛɛ wee wvù gɛɛle nci kɛ. Wvuwɛ wee nu ɛ tu wase wee wvù saake lo nci.
59004012	Wee wvù nyaa nci bvuu sumtene bonsaw bo bonyii le nu kɛ mwaaŋ. Ɛ̀ nu kɛ wvú wvù nulo eboyse kɛnɛɛ elɛse wee. Wo ɛ no nu yɛɛ wvù lomte gee di waa bwoo le?
59004013	Ben eyeke eyuw, ben bò nɛn'yi no duu lɛ, “Ɛbɛn kɛnɛɛ ntfuu nu ɛ bese nu egɛn kin kelaante le kɛnɛɛ keki le, ece jó yî kelum e, ekamɛm way, ekɛŋkɛ sɛw.”
59004014	Ben ké dioo jemyi nonɛn no kee fiɛɛ fì nu ebuy ekooy ntfuu le? Ben kee fiɛɛ fì ɛ̀ nu nshii wene? Nshii wene nu diɛwɛ kekfu kè bó yɛne kí le, moocɛ caan ɛ kí ɛ la wase.
59004015	Fiɛɛ fì ben bee ejemyì nu lɛ, “Ɛ́ Nyo' fɛn nu ɛ bee lɛ bese enù dvú, ɛ́ bese ke ege fin fiɛɛ ebvuu ege fifi.”
59004016	Geenɛn, ben nɛn'yi finɛn kaa no saale lo ye, kfune gvuw. Ben ekeè lɛ keesaale ye nonɛn nu kebefɛ.
59004017	Nonɛn, ɛ́ wee kee fiɛɛ fi lɛŋ fì wvú kɛŋke keege, ɛ faŋɛ yaa ege, tu wvú nu ɛ ge kebefɛ.
59005001	Bonyii bo kpwaw e, ben eyekɛ eyuw fiɛɛ fì me njemyi. Ben ebeelè, fuuŋkè kpwe nje ŋgɛw wvù nu ke eto fô ben e.
59005002	Kpwaw wene nu ɛ fo wase, shéw ɛ kan ndvú yene.
59005003	Mwɛɛm mvunɛn mvu bigew e nu ɛ duwsɛ wase. Nduwsɛ wvun nu ke eduŋcɛ nce wene ken'yɛɛ ɛjisɛ, ebvuu edie ye yene diɛwɛ ŋguy e. Ɛyan nu wase ɛdiuw yo fokemɛse, ɛ ben baanci kɛ ɛ ɛ̀ nu kpwaw.
